The ice facade is  लगभग 60 m ऊँची
Ice formations in the Titlis  हिमानी गुफा
A glacier  गुफा is a गुफा formed  within the ice of a glacier .
Glacier caves  हैं प्रायः पुकारा बर्फ गुफाएं , लकिन इस पद is properly प्रयुक्त  to describe bedrock caves that contain year-round ice .
In physics , circular motion is a movement of an  ऑब्जेक्ट साथ the परिधि of a वृत्त or रोटेशन  along a circular path .
It can be uniform , with  निरंतर कोणीय रेट of रोटेशन ( और निरंतर गति  ) , or non-uniform with a changing rate of rotation .
The rotation around a  फिक्स्ड अक्ष of a three-dimensional  body involves circular motion of its parts .
The  equations of गति describe the गति  of the center of mass of a body .
Examples of circular motion include : an artificial satellite orbiting the Earth at constant height , a stone which is tied to a  रस्सी और is होने swung in वृत्त , a car turning through a वक्र in a रेस track , an इलेक्ट्रॉन चलती लम्बवत  to a uniform magnetic field , and a gear turning inside a mechanism .
Since the object 's velocity vector is constantly changing direction , the moving object is  undergoing त्वरण by a अभिकेन्द्रीय फ़ोर्स in the दिशा of the  center of rotation .
Without  इस त्वरण , the ऑब्जेक्ट  would move in a straight line , according to Newton 's laws of motion .
Apollo Creed is a fictional character from the Rocky films  , initially portrayed as the undisputed हेवीवेट  Champion of the World .
He was  निभाई by कार्ल  Weathers .
Creed had multiple nicknames , including The Master of Disaster , The King of  स्टिंग , the नाचना विनाशक , the प्रिंस of पंच , the  One and Only and The Count of Monte Fisto .
Urban legend states that Apollo Creed 's name is a wordplay on the Apostles ' Creed , a  बयान of विश्वास प्रयुक्त in ईसाई चर्च  .
All of Apollo 's championship  झगड़े यहूद अनुसूचित लिये the  15 round distance .
Championship fights did not  बदलें इससे 15 rounds to  12 rounds until 1987 .
Rocky Balboa is often wrongly credited with popularizing the red , white , and blue trunks ; Creed  थी the पहला man to पहनें उन्हें ( latterly worn by रॉकी बाल्बोआ in the 3rd और  4th installments and finally by Tommy `` The Machine '' Gunn ( Tommy Morrison ) in the 5th installment ) although normally he wore red and white , as seen in Rocky II .
Balboa 's signature colors were black and gold—colors  he प्रयुक्त in the नवीनतम फिल्म  .
In the United  राज्य , the शीर्षक of संघीय न्यायधीश प्रायः अर्थात् a न्यायधीश नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त  States and confirmed by the United States Senate pursuant to the Appointments Clause in Article II of the United States Constitution .
In addition to the Supreme Court of the United States , whose existence and some aspects of whose jurisdiction are beyond the constitutional power of Congress to alter , acts of  Congress  have established 13 courts of appeals ( also called `` circuit courts '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over different regions of the United States , and 94 United States district courts .
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a federal judge ; such positions include the Chief  इंसाफ और संबद्ध justices of the परम् अदालत , सर्किट न्यायाधीशों of the न्यायालयों of appeals ,  and district judges of the United States district courts .
All of these judges described thus far are referred to  sometimes as `` आलेख iii न्यायाधीशों '' क्युकी वे कसरत the न्यायिक शक्ति vested in the न्यायिक  branch of the federal government by Article III of the U.S. Constitution .
In addition , judges of the Court of  अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार कसरत न्यायिक  power pursuant to Article III .
Other judges serving in the federal courts , including magistrate judges and bankruptcy judges , are also sometimes referred to as `` federal judges '' ;  however , वे हैं neither नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष nor पुष्टि by the सीनेट , और उनके  power derives from Article I instead .
देखिए आलेख i और  Article III tribunals .
The Beretta 21A Bobcat is a  छोटी pocket-sized semi-automatic  pistol designed by Beretta in Italy .
उत्पादन began in लेट 1984 , solely in the beretta  U.S.A. facility in Accokeek , Maryland .
It is a further development of  the beretta मॉडल 20 , जिनकी उत्पादन  ended in 1985 .
Variable  सार्वभौमिक जीवन बीमे ( प्रायः shortened to vul ) is a  type of life insurance that builds a cash value .
In a VUL , the cash value can be  invested in a चौड़ी किस्में of पृथक खाते , समान to परस्पर निधि , और the चुनाव  of which of the available separate accounts to use is entirely up to the contract owner .
The 'variable ' component in the name refers to this ability to invest in separate accounts  जिनकी मान vary—they vary क्युकी वे हैं invested in भण्डार and/or बंध बाज़ार  .
the 'universal ' घटक in the नाम refers to  the flexibility the owner has in making premium payments .
The premiums can vary from nothing in a given month up to maximums  पारिभाषित by the आतंरिक आय कोड  for life insurance .
This flexibility is in  कंट्रास्ट to पूरे जीवन बीमे कि रै फिक्स्ड प्रीमियम भुगतान कि typically can नहीं be  missed without lapsing the policy ( although one may exercise an Automatic Premium Loan feature , or surrender dividends to pay a Whole Life premium ) .
Variable universal life is a type of permanent  जीवन बीमे , क्युकी the मौत लाभ होगा be सशुल्क if the insured मरता कोई  time as long as there is sufficient cash value to pay the costs of insurance in the policy .
With most if not all VULs , unlike whole life , there is no endowment age ( the age at  जिससे the नकदी मान बराबरी the मौत लाभ राशि , जिससे लिये  whole life is typically 100 ) .
This is yet another  कुंजी लाभ  of VUL over Whole Life .
With a typical whole life policy , the death benefit  is सीमित to the फेस राशि निर्दिष्ट in  the policy , and at endowment age , the face amount is all that is paid out .
Thus with either death or endowment , the insurance  कम्पनी keeps कोई नकदी मान निर्मित up over  the years .
However , some participating whole life policies offer riders which specify that  कोई dividends सशुल्क on the नीति be प्रयुक्त to खरीदें `` सशुल्क up परिवर्धन '' to the  policy which increase both the cash value and the death benefit over time .
if निवेश बना in the पृथक खाते out-perform the सामान्य खाता  of the insurance company , a higher rate-of-return can occur than the fixed rates-of-return typical for whole life .
The combination over the years of no endowment age , continually increasing death benefit , and if a high rate-of-return is earned in the separate accounts of a VUL  नीति , इस could परिणाम in उच्चतर मान to the मालिक or लाभार्थी than  that of a whole life policy with the same amounts of money paid in as premiums .
The outdoor wood boiler is a variant of the classic wood stove adapted for set-up outdoors  जबकि स्टिल transferring the ऊष्मा to आंतरिक इमारतें  .
A mound of  लड़की स्काउट कुकीज़  .
This  mound contains 74 बाक्स  of cookies
Girl Scout  कुकीज़ हैं कुकीज़ बेची by लड़की स्काउट of the यूएसए (  GSUSA ) as one of its major fundraisers for local Scout units .
सदस्यों of the gsusa have  been selling cookies since 1917 to raise funds .
Girls who  participate can  earn prizes for their efforts .
There are  भी ईकाई प्रोत्साहन  if the unit as a whole does well .
As of 2007 , sales were  अनुमानित at परिचय  200 million boxes per year .
विश्वविद्यालयों  Hall
Purdue  विश्वविद्यालयों , स्तिथ in वेस्ट lafayette , इंडियाना ,  is the flagship university of the six-campus Purdue University system .
Purdue was founded on May 6 , 1869 , as a land-grant  विश्वविद्यालयों जब the इंडियाना सामान्य सभा , लेने लाभ of the morrill अधिनियम , स्वीकृत a दान of जमीन और धन इससे lafayette  businessman John Purdue to establish a college of science , technology , and agriculture in his name .
The first classes were held on September 16  , 1874 , साथ छह instructors  and 39 students .
Today , Purdue is a member of the  बिग टेन सम्मेलन , और is a खूब  known world-class research institution .
Purdue enrolls the second largest student body of any university in Indiana as well as the  चौथी largest अंतरराष्ट्रीय छात्र जनसांख्यिकी of कोई विश्वविद्यालयों  in the United States .
purdue offers दोनो undergraduate और ग्रैजुएट कार्यक्रम in over 211  major areas of study , and is well known for its competitive engineering curricula .
The university has also been highly influential in America 's history of aviation , having established the first college credit offered in  उड़ान प्रशिक्षण , the पहला four-year स्नातक 's उपाधि in विमानन , और the पहला  university airport ( Purdue University Airport ) .
Purdue 's aviation technology program remains one of the most competitive  aviation-specific कार्यक्रम in the संसार  .
In the mid-20th century , Purdue 's aviation program  विस्तारित to encompass उन्नत spaceflight प्रौद्योगिकी giving  rise to Purdue 's nickname , Cradle of Astronauts .
Twenty-three Purdue graduates have gone on to become  astronauts , सहित गस grissom ( एक of the असली पारा सात astronauts  ) , Neil Armstrong ( the first person to walk on the moon ) , and Eugene Cernan ( the most recent person to walk on the moon ) .
A sebaceous cyst ( )  is a पद कि loosely refers to either epidermoid cysts ( भी ज्ञात  as epidermal cysts ; L72.0 ) or pilar cysts ( also known as trichilemmal cysts ; L72.1 ) .
Because an epidermoid cyst  originates in the epidermis और a पिलर गाँठ originates इससे बाल follicles  , by definition , neither type of cyst is strictly a sebaceous cyst .
The name  is regarded as a misnomer as the वसीय , श्वेत , semi-solid  material in both of these cyst entities is not sebum , but keratin .
furthermore , अंतर्गत the सूक्ष्मदर्शी  neither entity contains sebaceous glands .
In practice , however ,  the शर्तें हैं प्रायः  used interchangeably .
`` True '' sebaceous cysts are relatively rare  और हैं ज्ञात as steatocystomas or , if अनेक ,  as steatocystoma multiplex .
आधुनिक pointe  shoes .
The edge of the toe pad , which is inserted between the foot and toe  बक्सा लिये cushioning , can be देखी on  the right foot .
A pointe shoe is a  प्रकार of जूता worn by बैले नर्तक  when performing pointe work .
Pointe shoes developed from the  ख्वाहिश लिये नर्तक to appear weightless और sylph -like  and have evolved to enable dancers to dance en pointe ( on the tips of their toes ) for extended periods of time .
They are normally worn by female dancers , though male dancers may wear them for unorthodox  भूमिकाएँ ऐसे as the भद्दा stepsisters in सिंडरेला  , Bottom in A Midsummer Night 's Dream , or men performing as women in dance companies such as Les Ballets Trockadero and Grandiva .
They are manufactured in a variety of colors  , सबसे commonly in शेड्स  of light pink .
This  tablespoon रै a क्षमता  of about 15 mL .
measuring spoons
In the US and parts  of कनाडा , a tablespoon is the largest प्रकार of चमचा प्रयुक्त  for eating from a bowl .
In the UK  , यूरोपीय और सबसे राष्ट्रमंडल देशों , a  tablespoon is a type of large spoon usually used for serving .
In countries where a  tablespoon is a सेवारत  spoon , the nearest equivalent to the US tablespoon is either the dessert spoon or the soup spoon .
A tablespoonful , nominally the capacity  of एक tablespoon , is commonly प्रयुक्त as a माप  of volume in cooking .
It is abbreviated as T , tb ,  tbs , tbsp , tblsp , or tblspn  .
The capacity of  ordinary tablespoons is  not regulated by law and is subject to considerable variation .
In the USA one tablespoon ( measurement unit ) is approximately 15 mL ; the capacity of an actual  tablespoon ( डाइनिंग utensil ) सीमाएँ इससे 7 ml to 14  mL .
In Australia one  tablespoon ( मापन ईकाई ) is 20  mL .
Harry  कुम्हार is a श्रेणी of सात काल्पनिक novels  written by the British author J. K. Rowling .
the किताबे वृत्तान्त the adventures of a जादूगर , हैरी कुम्हार , और उसके मित्रों रोनाल्ड  Weasley and Hermione Granger , all of whom are students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry .
The main story arc concerns Harry 's quest to overcome  the अंधेरा जादूगर रब voldemort , जिनकी aims हैं to become अमर , जीतें the wizarding  world , subjugate non-magical people , and destroy all those who stand in his way , especially Harry Potter .
Since the release of the first novel Harry  कुम्हार और the पारस 's स्टोन on 30 जून 1997 , the किताबे have gained immense  popularity , critical acclaim and commercial success worldwide .
The series has also had some share of criticism ,  सहित चिंता लिये the increasingly  dark tone .
, the book series has sold about 450 million  नक़ल , बनाना it the best-selling किताब  series in history , and has been translated into 67 languages .
The last four books consecutively  नियत रिकॉर्ड as the  fastest-selling books in history .
A series of many genres , including fantasy and coming of age ( with elements of mystery , thriller ,  एडवेंचर , और रोमांस ) , it रै अनेक सांस्कृतिक  meanings and references .
According to Rowling , the  प्रमुख थीम is मौत .
There  हैं भी अनेक अन्य विषयवस्तु in the श्रेणी  , such as prejudice and corruption .
The initial major publishers  of the किताबे यहूद bloomsbury  in the United Kingdom and Scholastic Press in the United States .
The books have since been  प्रकाशित by अनेक प्रकाशक  worldwide .
The books , with the seventh book split into two parts , have been made into  an eight-part फिल्मी श्रेणी by warner भाईs. तस्वीरें , the highest-grossing  film series of all time .
The series also originated much tie-in  merchandise , बनाना the हैरी कुम्हार ब्रांड  worth in excess of $ 15 billion .
Also due to  the कामयाबी of the किताबे और films , हैरी कुम्हार रै महरूम प्रयुक्त  for a theme park , The Wizarding World of Harry Potter in Universal Parks & Resorts 's Islands of Adventure .
rs-68 होने  tested at NASA 's Stennis Space Center .
The nearly  पारदर्शी exhaust is due to इस  engine 's exhaust being mostly superheated steam ( water vapor from its propellants , hydrogen and oxygen )
Viking  5c प्रक्षेपास्त्र  engine
A rocket engine , or simply `` rocket '' , is a jet engine  कि उपयोग तभी भंडारित propellant द्रव्यमान  for forming its high speed propulsive jet .
प्रक्षेपास्त्र इंजन हैं प्रतिक्रिया इंजन और obtain  thrust in accordance with Newton 's third law .
Since they need no external material to form their jet ,  प्रक्षेपास्त्र इंजन can be प्रयुक्त लिये spacecraft नोदन  as well as terrestrial uses , such as missiles .
Most  प्रक्षेपास्त्र इंजन हैं आतंरिक  combustion engines , although non-combusting forms also exist .
Rocket engines as a group  have the उच्चतम exhaust गतियाँ , हैं by दूर  the lightest , but are the least propellant efficient of all types of jet engines .
`` ... Baby One More Time ''  is a सोंग  by American recording artist Britney Spears .
It  परोसा as स्पीयर्स 's डेब्यू सिंगल और शीर्षक track  from her debut studio album , ... Baby One More Time ( 1999 ) .
Written by Max Martin and produced by Martin and Rami , `` ... Baby One  अधिक समय '' थी released  on September 30 , 1998 , by Jive Records .
After recording and sending a demo tape with  an अप्रयुक्त सोंग इससे toni braxton , स्पीयर्स हस्ताक्षरित  a multi-album deal with Jive .
`` ... Baby One More Time '' is a teen pop and  dance-pop सोंग कि refers to a लड़की जो संताप  breaking up with her boyfriend .
The song received generally favorable reviews  इससे आलोचकों , जो praised इसके  composition .
`` ... Baby One More Time '' attained global  कामयाबी , reaching क्रमांक एक in प्रत्येक  country it charted .
It also received numerous certifications around  the संसार , और is एक of the best-selling singles of  all time , with over 10 million copies sold .
An accompanying music video , directed by Nigel Dick , portrays Spears as a student from a Catholic high school , who starts to daydream  कि वो is गायन और नाचना around the स्कूल , जबकि watching उसके प्रेम ब्याज  from afar .
The music video was later referenced in the music video of `` If U Seek Amy `` ( 2008 ) , where Spears 's fictional daughter is dressed with a similar schoolgirl outfit while wearing  गुलाबी ribbons in उसके बाल  .
In 2010 , the music video for `` ... Baby One More Time '' was voted the  तीसरा सबसे influential वीडियो in the इतिहास of पॉप  music , in a poll held by Jam ! .
Spears has performed `` ... Baby One More Time '' in a number of live appearances  और in सब of उसके कॉन्सर्ट टुर .
It was the encore of the ... Baby One More Time Tour ( 1999 )  और सपना भीतर a सपना दौरे ( 2001 ) ; स्पीयर्स  also performed remixed versions of the song during the Oops ! ...
I Did It Again World Tour ( 2000 ) ,  the गोमेद होटल दौरे ( 2004 ) , the m+m 's दौरे ( 2007 ) , the  Circus Starring Britney Spears ( 2009 ) , and the Femme Fatale Tour ( 2011 ) .
`` ... Baby One More Time  '' थी मनोनीत लिये a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन मादा पॉप गायन प्रदर्शन  , and has been included in lists by Blender , Rolling Stone and VH1 .
It has been noted  लिये redefining the  sound of late 1990s music .
Spears has named `` ...  baby एक अधिक समय '' as एक of उसके पसंदीदा  songs from her career .
It was also the final song to be  निभाई on the बीबीसी 's म्यूज़िक कार्यक्रम  Top of the Pops .
Cholera is an infection in the small intestine caused by the  bacterium vibrio cholerae  .
The main symptoms  हैं watery अतिसार  and vomiting .
Transmission occurs primarily by drinking water or eating food that has been contaminated by the feces ( waste  उत्पाद ) of an संक्रमित व्यक्ति , सहित एक साथ no apparent लक्षण  .
The severity of the diarrhea and vomiting can  सीसे to रैपिड निर्जलीकरण और electrolyte असंतुलन ,  and death in some cases .
The primary treatment is oral  पुनर्जलीकरण चिकित्सा , typically साथ मौखिक पुनर्जलीकरण समाधान ,  to replace water and electrolytes .
If this is not tolerated or does not  provide सुधार तेज़ पर्याप्त , intravenous  fluids can also be used .
Antibacterial drugs  हैं फायदेमंद in those साथ कठोर  disease to shorten its duration and severity .
Worldwide , it  affects 3–5 लाख लोगों  and causes 100,000–130,000 deaths a year .
Cholera was one of the earliest  infections to be पढ़ाई by epidemiological  methods .
The Picture of Dorian Gray is the only published novel by Oscar Wilde , appearing as the lead story  in lippincott 's मासिक पत्रिका on 20 जून 1890 , मुद्रित as the जुलाई  1890 issue of this magazine .
The  पत्रिका 's सम्पादक feared the स्टोरी थी अभद्र  as submitted , so they censored roughly 500 words , without Wilde 's knowledge , before publication .
But even with that , the story was still greeted with outrage by British reviewers , some of whom suggested  कि वाइल्ड चाहिए be prosecuted on moral grounds , अग्रणी वाइल्ड to बचाव the अनोखा aggressively  in letters to the British press .
Wilde later revised the story for book publication , making substantial alterations , deleting controversial passages , adding new chapters and  सहित an aphoristic preface जिससे रै चूंकि become प्रसिद्ध in इसके अपना सही  .
the amended संस्करण  was published by Ward , Lock and Company in April 1891 .
Some scholars believe that Wilde would today  have चाही us to पढ़ा the संस्करण  he originally submitted to Lippincott 's .
the अनोखा tells of a यंग man नामित डोरियन धूसर  , the subject of a painting by artist Basil Hallward .
Basil is impressed by Dorian 's beauty and becomes  infatuated साथ उसे , believing उसके सौंदर्य is जिम्मेदार  for a new mode in his art .
Dorian meets Lord Henry Wotton , a friend of Basil 's , and becomes  enthralled by रब हेनरी 's संसार दृश्य  .
Espousing a new hedonism , Lord Henry  suggests the तभी बाते लायक pursuing in जीवन  are beauty and fulfilment of the senses .
Realizing that one day his beauty will fade , Dorian ( whimsically ) expresses a desire to  बेचें उसके आत्मा to ensure the पोर्ट्रेट बेसिल रै चित्रित  would age rather than he .
Dorian 's wish is fulfilled , and when he subsequently pursues a life of  विलासिता , the पोर्ट्रेट serves as a स्मरण of the प्रभाव प्रत्येक अधिनियम रै upon उसके आत्मा , साथ प्रत्येक सिन प्रदर्शित  as a disfigurement of his form , or through a sign of aging .
The Picture of Dorian Gray is  माना a कार्य of क्लासिक गोथिक fiction साथ a  strong Faustian theme .
Sári  gábor ( born 6 फ़रवरी 1917 ) , ज्ञात as ज़ा ज़ा गैबर ( ) , is a हंगेरियाई -born अमरीकी अभिनेत्री  who acted in supporting roles in movies , on Broadway , and occasionally on television .
गैबर थी  also a socialite .
She  began उसके स्टेज करियर  in Vienna at age 15 , and was crowned Miss Hungary in 1936 .
She emigrated to the United States in 1941 and became a sought-after  अभिनेत्री साथ `` यूरोपीय फ्लेयर  and style '' , with a personality that `` exuded charm and grace '' .
Her first movie  भूमिका थी as supporting  actress in Lovely to Look At .
She later acted  in we 're  Not Married !
and played one of her few leading roles in Moulin Rouge ( 1952 ) , directed by John Huston , who described  उसके as  a `` creditable '' actress .
besides उसके फिल्मी और टेलीविज़न दिखावे , वो is बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये having  nine husbands , including hotel magnate Conrad Hilton and actor George Sanders .
She once stated , `` Men have always liked me  और i have सदा liked मेन .
But I like a mannish man , a man who knows how to talk to and  दावत a स्त्री – नहीं बस a man साथ मांसपेशियां  . ''
Bruce Lee ( traditional : 李小龍 ; born Lee Jun-fan ; 27 November 1940 – 20  जुलाई 1973 ) थी a चाइनीज अमरीकी  martial artist , actor , martial arts instructor , philosopher , and filmmaker .
The founder of Jeet  kune do , ली थी the बेटे of  Cantonese opera star Lee Hoi-Chuen .
He is widely considered by commentators , critics , media and other martial artists to  be एक of the सबसे influential  martial artists of all time , and a pop culture icon of the 20th century .
He is often credited  साथ helping to बदलें  the way Asians were presented in American films .
Lee was born in Chinatown , San Francisco on 27 November 1940 to  अभिभावक इससे हांग काँग और थी उठाया in कोलून  with his family until his late teens .
He was introduced to the film  उद्योग by उसके पिता और appeared  in several films as a child actor .
Lee moved to the  संयुक्त राज्य at the आयु of 18 to प्राप्त उसके उच्चतर शिक्षा  , and it was during this time that he began teaching martial arts .
His Hong Kong and Hollywood -produced films elevated the traditional Hong Kong martial arts film to  a नई स्तर of लोकप्रियता और acclaim , sparking a surge of ब्याज in  Chinese martial arts in the West in the 1970s .
The direction and tone of his films changed and influenced  martial कला और martial कला films in हांग  Kong and the rest of the world .
He is noted for his roles in five feature-length films :  lo वेई 's the बिग boss ( 1971 ) और मुट्ठी of फ़्यूरी ( 1972 ) ; रास्ता of the  Dragon ( 1972 ) , directed and written by Lee ; Warner Brothers ' Enter the Dragon ( 1973 ) and The Game of Death ( 1978 ) , both directed by Robert Clouse .
Lee became  an iconic फिगर ज्ञात throughout  the world , particularly among the Chinese , as he portrayed Chinese nationalism in his films .
He initially trained in Wing Chun , but later rejected well-defined martial art styles , favouring instead the use of  तकनीकों इससे विभिन्न स्त्रोत , in the स्पिरिट of उसके निजी martial कला दर्शनशास्त्र , जिससे he उतावले  Jeet Kune Do ( The Way of the Intercepting Fist ) .
Lee held dual  नागरिकता of हांग काँग और  the United States .
He died in Kowloon Tong  on 20 जुलाई 1973 at  age 32 .
Chronic  obstructive pulmonary बीमारी ( copd ) , भी ज्ञात as दीर्घकालिक obstructive फेफड़ों बीमारी ( ठंडा ) , दीर्घकालिक obstructive  airway disease ( COAD ) , chronic airflow limitation ( CAL ) and chronic obstructive respiratory disease ( CORD ) , is the occurrence of chronic bronchitis or emphysema , a pair of commonly co-existing diseases of the lungs in which the airways narrow over time .
This limits airflow to and  इससे the फेफड़े , causing shortness of  breath ( dyspnea ) .
In  नैदानिक अभ्यास , copd is पारिभाषित  by its characteristically low airflow on lung function tests .
In contrast to asthma  , इस limitation is poorly reversible  and usually gets progressively worse over time .
COPD is caused by noxious particles or  गैस , सबसे commonly  from tobacco smoking , which triggers an abnormal inflammatory response in the lung .
the निदान of copd  requires lung function tests .
महत्वपूर्ण प्रबन्धन रणनीति हैं धूम्रपान cessation , vaccinations , पुनर्वास  , and drug therapy ( often using inhalers ) .
कुछ मरीजों go on  to require long-term oxygen therapy or lung transplantation .
विश्वव्यापी , copd क्रमित  as the sixth leading cause of death in 1990 .
It is projected to become the fourth leading cause of death worldwide by 2030 , due to an increase in smoking rates and demographic  परिवर्तन in अनेक देशों  .
COPD is the third leading cause of death in the U.S. , and the economic  बोझ of copd in the u.S. in 2007 थी $ 42.6 अरब  in health care costs and lost productivity .
Annelies `` Anne '' Marie Frank ( , ? , ;  12 जून 1929early कूच 1945 ) is एक of the  most discussed Jewish victims of the Holocaust .
उसके डायरी रै महरूम the  basis for several plays and films .
Born in the city of Frankfurt am Main in Weimar Germany , she lived  सबसे of उसके जीवन in or निकट एम्सटर्डम  , in the Netherlands .
Born a  जर्मनी नेशनल , फ़्रैंक खोया  her citizenship in 1941 .
She  gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय कीर्ति मरणोपरांत  after her diary was published .
It documents her  अनुभवों छुपाना दौरान the जर्मनी occupation  of the Netherlands in World War II .
The Frank family moved from Germany  to एम्सटर्डम in 1933 , the साल the nazis gained  control over Germany .
By the beginning of 1940 , they were trapped in Amsterdam  by the नाजी occupation of  the Netherlands .
As persecutions of the Jewish population increased in  जुलाई 1942 , the परिवार गई into  hiding in the hidden rooms of Anne 's father , Otto Frank 's , office building .
After two years ,  the समूह थी गद्दारी और transported  to concentration camps .
Anne Frank and her sister , Margot , were eventually transferred to the Bergen-Belsen  विशेषज्ञता शिविर , जहाँ वे died of  typhus in March 1945 .
Otto Frank , the only survivor of the family ,  लौटे to एम्सटर्डम बाद the युद्ध to ढूँढें कि ऐनी 's डायरी था महरूम  saved , and his efforts led to its publication in 1947 .
it थी अनूदित इससे इसके  original Dutch and first published in English in 1952 as The Diary of a Young Girl .
It has  चूंकि महरूम अनूदित  into many languages .
The diary , which was given to Anne on  उसके 13th जन्मदिवस  , chronicles her life from 12 June 1942 until 1 August 1944 .

Kurt Donald  कोबेन ( फ़रवरी 20 , 1967 – अप्रैल 5 , 1994 ) थी an अमरीकी संगीतकार और कलाकार  , best known as the lead singer , guitarist and primary songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana .
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen , Washington in 1985 and established it as part of the Seattle music scene , having its debut  एल्बम ब्लीच released on the स्वतंत्र रिकार्ड लेबल sub  Pop in 1989 .
After signing with major label DGC Records , the band found breakthrough success with `` Smells Like  टीन स्पिरिट `` इससे इसके दूसरी एल्बम nevermind (  1991 ) .
Following the success of Nevermind , Nirvana  थी labeled `` the फ्लैगशिप बैंड '' of पीढी x , और  Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation '' .
Cobain , however ,  थी प्रायः असहज और कुंठित , believing उसके संदेश और कलाकारी  vision to have been misinterpreted by the public , with his personal issues often subject to media attention .
He challenged Nirvana 's audience with its final studio  एल्बम in  Utero ( 1993 ) .
During the last years of his life , Cobain  struggled साथ हेरोइन व्यसन , बीमारी  and depression .
He also had difficulty coping with his fame and public image , and the professional  और lifelong निजी pressures surrounding खुद और उसके बीवी , संगीतकार  Courtney Love .
On April 8 , 1994 , Cobain was  मिला मुर्दे at उसके घर in सिएटल , the शिकार  of what was officially ruled a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head .
The circumstances of his death at age 27 have  become a टॉपिक of पब्लिक fascination  and debate .
Since  उनके डेब्यू , निर्वाण , साथ कोबेन as a songwriter  , has sold over 25 million albums in the U.S. , and over 50 million worldwide .

Radial  इंजन of a बाईप्लेन

The radial engine is a reciprocating type internal combustion engine configuration  in जिससे the सिलेंडर पाइंट outward  from a central crankshaft like the spokes of a wheel .
It resembles a stylized star when  viewed इससे the सामने , और is पुकारा a ``  star engine '' ( German Sternmotor ) in some languages .
The radial configuration was very  commonly प्रयुक्त in वायुयान इंजन पहले  turbine engines became predominant .
The  सुनहरी लड़कियों is an अमरीकी sitcom , निर्मित by सुसान  Harris , that originally aired on NBC from September 13 , 1985 , to May 9 , 1992 .
Starring Bea Arthur , Betty White , Rue McClanahan and Estelle Getty ,  the दिखाएँ centers on चार पुरानी महिलाओं sharing a घर  in Miami , Florida .
it थी उत्पादित by witt/thomas/harris  Productions , in association with Touchstone Television , and Paul Junger Witt , Tony Thomas , and Harris served as the original executive producers .
The Golden Girls received critical acclaim throughout most of its run and won several awards ,  सहित the प्राइमटाइम एमी पुरस्कार लिये बकाया कॉमेडी श्रेणी twice  .
It also won three Golden Globe Awards for Best  टेलीविज़न श्रेणी – musical or  Comedy .
All four stars each received an Emmy Award  throughout the श्रेणी ' चलाएं और था अनेक  nominations .
The series also ranked among the top ten  highest-rated कार्यक्रम  for six out of its seven seasons .
deepwater खुदाई is the प्रक्रम of आयल और गैस  exploration and production in depths of more than 500 feet .
By this  परिभाषा , वहीँ हैं लगभग 600  deepwater wells in the Gulf of Mexico .
It has been economically infeasible for  अनेक सालो , लकिन साथ उठती आयल कीमतें , अधिक कंपनियाँ हैं निवेश  in this area .
Major companies working in this sector include  डायमंड offshore , transocean , और  Baker Hughes .
There are basically two kinds of mobile  deepwater खुदाई rigs : semi-submersible  drilling rigs and drillships .
Drilling can also be performed from a  fixed-position संस्थापना ऐसे as a फ्लोटिंग spar ( मंच  ) or tension-leg platform .
हाल उद्योग विश्लेषण रै अनुमानित कि the कुल  expenditure in the global deepwater infrastructure market will reach $ 145bn in 2011 .
“Not all oil is  accessible on जमीन or in  shallow water .
You can find some  आयल जमा दफ्न गहन अंतर्गत  the ocean floor.” ... Using sonic equipment , oil companies determine the drilling sites most likely to produce oil .
Then  वे उपयोग a मोबाईल offshore खुदाई  unit ( MODU ) to dig the initial well .
Some units are converted into production rigs , meaning they switch from drilling for oil to  capturing आयल एकबार it 's  found .
Most of the time , the oil company will replace the MODU with a more permanent oil  उत्पादन रिग to कैप्चर oil.” ... the मोदू 's जॉब is to ड्रिल bas into the समंदर 's मंजिल to ढूँढें  oil deposits .
The part of the drill that extends below the deck and  through the जल  is called the riser .
The riser allows for drilling  fluids to मूव between the मंजिल और the रिग  .
Engineers lower a  ड्रिल स्ट्रिंग -- a श्रेणी of पाइप  designed to drill down to the oil deposit -- through the riser.”
“The expansion of  deepwater खुदाई is happening  despite accidents in offshore fields ... ”
In 2010 a large explosion  occurred हत्या 11 मजदूर और spilling लाखो  of gallons of oil into the Gulf of Mexico while a BP oil rig was drilling in deep waters .
“ ... Despite the risks , the deepwater drilling trend is spreading in the Mediterranean and off the coast of East  अफ़्रीकी बाद a स्ट्रिंग of विशाल discoveries of प्राकृतिक  gas.”
“The reason for the resumption of such drilling , analyst say , is  continuing ऊँची माँग लिये उर्जा worldwide.”
America needs the oil so it is almost necessary to face the high risks  कि आइये साथ deepwater खुदाई in अनुक्रम लिये अमेरिकी  to continue to carry on their everyday lives .
“The Energy Department recently projected that gulf oil  उत्पादन होता विस्तार इससे इसके 2011 स्तर of 1.3 लाख barrels a दिन , स्टिल nearly a  quarter of total domestic production , to 2 million barrels a day by 2020.”
Deepwater  खुदाई affects the पर्यावरण in दोनो  negative and positive ways .
Although Deepwater drilling rarely  कल्याणकारी आयल spills it  is still a hazardous possible outcome .
Oil spills result in oil  डूब to the नीचे of the समंदर smothering  plant life leaving fish without food and shelter to survive .
On the  अन्य हाथ deepwater खुदाई  effects the environment in a positive ways too .
In time once the  deepwater आयल खूब is नहीं in उपयोग anymore पौधे होगा grow on और  around the well making a cave or cavern like shelter ideal for animals to thrive in .
Deepwater drilling also lets us see the  गहराइयों of the समंदर मंजिल कि  are hardly ever seen .
”Cameras on rovers at the bottom of the  कुएं रिकार्ड फुटेज और लो फ़ोटो of विरल मछली कि हैं in वहीँ  natural habitat , giving scientist a look at animals they rarely seen” ( Chevron Corporation ) . ''
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23 , 1973 ) is an American woman with whom United States President Bill  क्लिंटन admitted to having था an `` improper संबंध '' जबकि वो worked at the श्वेत हाउस in 1995  and 1996 .
the affair और इसके परखना ( जिससे  included Clinton 's impeachment ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal .
Francis Albert `` Frank '' Sinatra , , (  दिसम्बर 12 , 1915 – may 14 , 1998 ) थी an अमरीकी  singer and film actor .
Beginning his musical career in the swing  era साथ हैरी जेम्स और टॉमी dorsey , सिनात्रा मिला unprecedented  success as a solo artist from the early to mid-1940s after being signed to Columbia Records in 1943 .
Being the idol of the `` bobby soxers `` , he released  उसके पहला एल्बम , the आवाज़ of फ़्रैंक सिनात्रा  in 1946 .
His professional  करियर था stalled by the 1950s , लकिन it थी पुनर्जन्म in 1953 बाद  he won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his performance in From Here to Eternity .
He signed with Capitol Records in 1953 and released several critically lauded albums ( such as In the Wee Small Hours , Songs for Swingin ' Lovers ! , Come Fly  साथ me , तभी the निर्जन और nice 'n ' आसान )  .
Sinatra left Capitol to found his own record label ,  reprise रिकॉर्ड in 1961 ( ढूंढना कामयाबी साथ एल्बम ऐसे as ring-a-ding-ding  ! , Sinatra at the Sands and Francis Albert Sinatra & Antonio Carlos Jobim ) , toured internationally , was a founding member of the Rat Pack and fraternized with celebrities and statesmen , including John F. Kennedy .
Sinatra turned 50 in 1965 , recorded the retrospective September of My Years , starred in the Emmy -winning television special Frank Sinatra : A Man  और उसके म्यूज़िक , और scored हिट्स साथ `` अजनबी in the रात्रि ``  and `` My Way `` .
With sales of his music dwindling and after appearing in  अनेक poorly प्राप्त films , सिनात्रा  retired for the first time in 1971 .
Two years later , however , he came out of retirement and in 1973 recorded several  एल्बम , स्कोरिंग a शीर्ष 40 hit साथ `` ( थीम इससे ) नई  York , New York `` in 1980 .
Using his Las Vegas shows as a home base , he toured both within the United States and internationally ,  जबतक a छोटी समय पहले उसके मौत  in 1998 .
सिनात्रा भी forged  a highly successful career as a film actor .
After winning Best Supporting Actor in 1953 , he also garnered a nomination for  बेहतरीन कर्ता लिये the man साथ the सुनहरी भुजा , और नाजुक acclaim लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in  The Manchurian Candidate .
He also starred in such musicals as High  समाज , pal जॉय , यारों और डॉल और on  the Town .
Sinatra was honored at the Kennedy Center Honors in 1983 and was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom by Ronald  reagan in 1985 और the congressional  Gold Medal in 1997 .
He was the recipient of eleven  ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , सहित  the Grammy Trustees Award , Grammy Legend Award and the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award .
Sinatra is also one of world’s best-selling artists of  सब समय , having बेची अधिक  than 150 million copies worldwide .
ठेठ  cornhole board
Cornhole , also known as bean bag toss , corn toss , baggo or bags , is a lawn game in  जिससे खिलाड़ी लो turns फेंकना मकई छेद बैग at a उठाया मंच साथ a छेद in the दूर  end .
A bag in the hole scores 3 points , while one on  the मंच स्कोर 1 पाइंट  .
Play continues until a team or  खिलाड़ी पहुँच the  score of 21 .
The American Gold Eagle is an official gold  bullion सिक्का of  the United States .
Authorized under the Gold Bullion Coin Act of 1985 , it was first  released by the  United States Mint in 1986 .
Bikram Yoga is a system of yoga that Bikram Choudhury synthesized from traditional hatha yoga techniques and popularized  शुरूआत in the जल्दी 1970s .
All Bikram Yoga classes run for 90  मिनट्स और consist of the वही श्रेणी  of 26 postures and 2 breathing exercises .
बिक्रम योग is ideally practiced in a रूम heated to  105°F ( ≈ 40.6°C ) with a humidity of 40 % , .
Christopher Michael Massey ( born 26 January 1990 ) is an American actor , comedian and  rapper बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये अभिनीत as माइकल barret in निकलोडियन टेलीविज़न श्रेणी zoey  101 .
Massey has received many  पुरस्कार और नामांकन सहित a यंग  Artist Award and Emmy Awards nominations .
He is also  ज्ञात लिये appearing in अनेक  commercials in the early 2000s .
A conventional  teaspoon बना of  stainless steel .
A teaspoon is an item of cutlery and/or a  measuring यंत्र , as खूब as a ईकाई of मापन of आवाज़  in some countries and customs .
A fern is any one  or अधिक of a समूह of परिचय 12,000 प्रजाति of  plants belonging to the botanical group known as Pteridophyta .
Unlike mosses , they have xylem and phloem  ( बनाना उन्हें vascular पौधे  ) .
वे have तना , पत्ते , और  roots like other vascular plants .
Ferns reproduce via spores  और have neither बीज nor पुष्प  .
By far the largest group of  ferns is the leptosporangiate ferns , लकिन ferns as पारिभाषित यहाँ ( भी पुकारा  monilophytes ) include horsetails , whisk ferns , marattioid ferns , and ophioglossoid ferns .
The term pteridophyte also refers to ferns and a  few अन्य बीजरहित vascular  plants ( see classification section below ) .
Ferns first appear in the fossil record 360 million years ago in the Carboniferous but many  of the वर्तमान परिवारों और प्रजाति किया नहीं appear जबतक roughly 145 लाख सालो पहले in the जल्दी cretaceous ( बाद flowering पौधे आए to dominate  many environments ) .
Ferns are not of major economic importance ,  लकिन कुछ हैं grown or gathered लिये खाना , as शोभायमान  plants , for remediating contaminated soils , and have been the subject of research for their ability to remove some chemical pollutants from the air .
Some are  significant  weeds .
They also  खेल a भूमिका in mythology , आयुर्विज्ञान  , and art .
Flat  roofs  in Israel
Flat  छत in लॉस  Angeles
A flat roof is  a प्रकार of covering  for a building .
In contrast to the more sloped form of roof , a  चपटा छत is आड़ा or nearly  horizontal .
The slope of a roof is  properly ज्ञात as इसके पिच : roofs  which are nearly flat are known as low-pitch roofs ( as the angle of slope increases , so the pitch is said to increase ) .
Any sheet of material used to cover a flat or low-pitched roof is usually  ज्ञात as a झिल्ली और the प्राथमिक purpose of ये झिल्लियों  is to waterproof the roof area .
Materials that cover flat roofs typically allow the water to  चलाएं बंद इससे a पतला inclination or camber into  a gutter system .
Water from some  चपटा roofs ऐसे as on गार्डन sheds sometimes बहती freely  off the edge of a roof , though gutter systems are of advantage in keeping both walls and foundations dry .
Gutters on smaller roofs often lead  जल सीधे onto the मैदान , or बेहतर , into  a specially made soakaway .
Gutters on larger roofs usually lead water into  the rainwater नाले प्रणाली of कोई निर्मित  up area .
Occasionally flat roofs though are designed to collect  जल in a पूल , प्रायः लिये aesthetic उद्देश्य  , or for rainwater buffering .
चपटा roofs मौजूद सब over the संसार और प्रत्येक  area has its own tradition or preference for materials used .
In warmer climes where rainfall is less and  जमने is असंभावित to occur , अनेक चपटा roofs हैं बस निर्मित of चिनाई or कंक्रीट  and this is good at keeping out the heat of the sun and cheap and easy to build where timber is not readily available .
In areas where the roof could become saturated by rain and leak , or where water soaked into the brickwork could freeze to ice and thus lead to 'blowing ' (  तोड़कर up of the mortar/brickwork/concrete by the विस्तार of बर्फ as it  forms ) these roofs are not suitable .
Traditionally  सबसे चपटा roofs in the  western world make use of tar or more usually tar paper applied over roof decking to keep a building watertight .
The tar or tarpaper is in turn covered in gravel to  रखना the सूर्य 's ऊष्मा , uv किरणें और मौसम बंद it और helps protect it  from cracking or blistering and degradation .
Roof decking is usually of plywood ,  chipboard or osb फलक ( osb = उन्मुख strand फलक  , also known as Sterling board ) of around 18mm thickness .
The tar coating is applied in one or more coats as a hot liquid , heated in a tar kettle , or as sheets of tar impregnated 'paper ' glued down  और sealed साथ at joints by hot तारकोल - एकबार it रै cooled  , the gravel is spread evenly over it .
A main reason for failure of these traditional roofs is ignorance or lack of maintenance where people or events cause the gravel to be moved or removed from the tar or tarpaper waterproofing , thus exposing it  to मौसम और सूर्य whereupon cracking और blistering occurs over समय और आखिरकार  water gets in .
Tarpaper is usually a 'paper ' or fibre  सामग्री soaked or impregnated  in tar .
As gravel can not protect  tarpaper सतहों जहाँ वे वृद्धि खड़ा इससे the छत ऐसे as on मुंडेर दीवारें or upstands , tarpaper विसंगतियाँ हैं उत्पादित साथ  fine gravel applied to the hot tar during the process of manufacture such that a permanent layer of gravel is stuck to it in order to give it ongoing protection .
Tarpapers  vary in विशेषता as करता the कारीगरी  and training of those applying it to produce more or less successful results .
In some micro climates or shaded areas these rather 'basic ' tarpaper roofs can last well in  संबंध to the लागत of सामग्री खरीदें और लागत of लेटा उन्हें , however the लागत of आधुनिक झिल्लियों ऐसे as epdm रै आइये bas over हाल सालो to मेक उन्हें  more and more affordable .
There are now more firms supplying modern alternatives and  वहीँ is generally a growing जागरूकता  of their performance and availability .
If a leak does occur on a flat roof then damage often goes unnoticed for long periods of time during  जिससे जल penetrates और soaks the अलंकार और कोई इन्सुलेशन  and/or structure beneath it .
This can lead to expensive damage from the rot which often develops and if  बाएँ can weaken the छत ढांचा  .
There are also various health risks to people and animals breathing the mould spores : the  गंभीरता of इस स्वास्थ्य रिस्क remains  a debated point .
One problem with maintaining flat roofs is that if water does penetrate the barrier covering ( be it traditional or a modern membrane ) it can travel a long way before  causing दृश्य क्षति or टपकती into a भवन  where it can be seen .
Thus it is not easy  to देखिए जहाँ it is टपकती in  order to repair it .
Once underlying roof decking is soaked it often sags causing a  further संग्रहण or puddling of जल  in that area and the problem worsens .
A CD-ROM ( ) is a  pre-pressed कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क  which contains data .
The name is an acronym which  स्टैंड लिये `` कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क read-only मेमोरी ``  .
Computers can read CD-ROMs , but can not  लिखें  on them .
CD-ROMs are popularly used to distribute  कंप्यूटर तन्त्र , सहित वीडियो खेल और मल्टीमीडिया अनुप्रयोग  , though any data can be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ) .
Some  cds , पुकारा उन्नत cds , थाम दोनो कंप्यूटर आंकड़ा और ऑडियो साथ the latter सक्षम of होने निभाई on a cd खिलाड़ी , जबकि  data ( such as software or digital video ) is only usable on a computer ( such as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ) .
The Yellow Book is the technical  मानक कि defines the स्वरूप  of CD-ROMs .
One of a set of color-bound books that contain the technical  विशेषताएँ लिये सब cd स्वरुप , the पीला किताब , निर्मित by सोनी और फिलिप्स , थी the पहला  extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio .
It adapted the format to  थाम कोई रूप of आंकड़ा  .
Joanne `` Jo '' Rowling ( ) , ( born 31  जुलाई 1965 ) , कलम नाम J. K. रोलिंग , is a अंग्रेजों उपन्यासकार , बेहतरीन ज्ञात  as the author of the Harry Potter fantasy series .
The Potter books have  gained विश्वव्यापी ध्यान , जीती अनेक  awards , and sold more than 400 million copies .
They have become the best-selling book series in  इतिहास , और महरूम the आधार लिये a श्रेणी of  films which has become the highest-grossing film series in history .
Rowling had overall approval on  the स्क्रिप्ट as खूब as maintaining रचनात्मक कंट्रोल by सेवारत as  a producer on the final instalment .
Born  in yate , ग्लॉस्टरशायर , रोलिंग थी working  as a researcher and bilingual secretary for Amnesty International when she conceived the idea for the Harry Potter series on a delayed train from Manchester to London in 1990 .
The  seven-year काल कि followed entailed the मौत of उसके माँ , तलाक  from her first husband and poverty until Rowling finished the first novel in the series , Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone ( 1997 ) .
Rowling  subsequently प्रकाशित 6 sequels—the  last , Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows ( 2007 ) —as well as 3 supplements to the series .
in 2012 , रोलिंग parted साथ उसके एजेंसी और resumed  writing in the form of a tragicomedy novel aimed at adult readership , entitled The Casual Vacancy .
Rowling has said she is currently working on two books—one aimed for adults  , the अन्य लिये children younger than the हैरी कुम्हार दर्शक , और वो expects the  latter to be published first .
Rowling has led a `` rags to riches `` life story , in which she progressed from living on state benefits  to multi-millionaire औकात भीतर पाँच सालो  .
वो is the संयुक्त किंगडम 's best-selling  author since records began , with sales in excess of £238m .
The  2008 संडे टाइम्स समृद्ध सूची अनुमानित रोलिंग 's सौभाग्य at £560 लाख ( $ 798 लाख ) , रैंकिंग  her as the twelfth richest woman in the United Kingdom .
Forbes ranked Rowling as the forty-eighth most powerful celebrity of 2007 ,  और समय पत्रिका नामित उसके as a runner-up लिये इसके 2007 व्यक्ति of the साल , noting the सोशल , moral , और राजनैतिक प्रेरणा  she has given her fans .
In October 2010 , Rowling was named the `` Most Influential Woman in Britain '' by  अग्रणी पत्रिका सम्पादक .
She has become a notable philanthropist , supporting such charities as Comic Relief , One Parent Families , Multiple Sclerosis Society  of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और lumos ( formerly the children  's High Level Group ) .
auburndale is a नगर  in Polk County , Florida , United States .
the जनसांख्यिकी  was 11,032 at the 2000 census .
According to the U.S Census estimates of 2005 , the  नगर था a जनसांख्यिकी of  12,381 .
It is part of the Lakeland – Winter Haven  महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल  .
Hurricane Isabel ( 2003 ) as seen from orbit during  expedition 7 of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Space Station .
The eye , eyewall , and surrounding rainbands ,  विशेषताएँ of तीव्र cyclones , हैं clearly दृश्य  in this view from space .
A tropical cyclone is a storm system characterized by a low-pressure  बीच घिरी by a सर्पिल  arrangement of thunderstorms that produce strong winds and heavy rain .
Tropical cyclones strengthen when water evaporated from the ocean is released as the saturated air rises , resulting in  संघनन of जल वाष्प contained in the नम एयर  .
They are fueled by a  अलग ऊष्मा यांत्रिकी than अन्य cyclonic windstorms  such as nor'easters , European windstorms , and polar lows .
the characteristic कि separates तीव्र cyclones इससे अन्य cyclonic प्रणालियों is कि  at any height in the atmosphere , the center of a tropical cyclone will be warmer than its surroundings ; a phenomenon called `` warm core `` storm systems .
The term `` tropical '' refers both to the geographical origin of  ये प्रणालियों , जिससे प्रायः रूप in तीव्र regions of the ग्लोब , और to  their formation in maritime tropical air masses .
The term `` cyclone '' refers to such storms '  cyclonic प्रकृति , साथ counterclockwise हवा प्रवाह in the उत्तरी  Hemisphere and clockwise wind flow in the Southern Hemisphere .
The opposite direction of the  हवा प्रवाह is a परिणाम of the कॉरिऑलिस  force .
depending on इसके स्थान और शक्ति , a तीव्र  cyclone is referred to by names such as hurricane ( , ) , typhoon ( ) , tropical storm , cyclonic storm , tropical depression , and simply cyclone .
While  तीव्र cyclones can उपज अत्यधिक शक्तिशाली हवाएँ और मूसलाधार बरसात  , they are also able to produce high waves , damaging storm surge , and tornadoes .
They develop over large bodies of warm water , and lose their strength if  वे मूव over जमीन due to increased सतह घर्षण और घाटा  of the warm ocean as an energy source .
इस is क्यों तटीय regions can प्राप्त significant क्षति इससे a तीव्र चक्रवात ,  while inland regions are relatively safe from receiving strong winds .
Heavy rains , however , can produce significant flooding inland , and storm surges can produce  extensive तटीय बाढ़ up to इससे the तटरेखा  .
Although their effects on human populations can  be विनाशकारी , तीव्र  cyclones can relieve drought conditions .
They also carry heat energy away from the tropics and transport it toward temperate latitudes , which  makes उन्हें an महत्वपूर्ण भाग of the वैश्विक वायुमंडलीय  circulation mechanism .
As a result , tropical cyclones help to maintain  संतुलन in the धरती 's क्षोभमण्डल , और to maintain a अपेक्षाकृत  stable and warm temperature worldwide .
Many tropical  cyclones develop जब the  atmospheric conditions around a weak disturbance in the atmosphere are favorable .
The background environment is modulated by climatological  चक्र और पैटर्न ऐसे as the madden-julian दोलन , el niño-southern  Oscillation , and the Atlantic multidecadal oscillation .
Others  रूप जब अन्य प्रकार of cyclones acquire  tropical characteristics .
Tropical systems are then moved by  परिचालन हवाएँ in the क्षोभमण्डल ; if the  conditions remain favorable , the tropical disturbance intensifies , and can even develop an eye .
On the other end of the spectrum , if the conditions around the system deteriorate or the  तीव्र चक्रवात makes landfall , the प्रणाली weakens और  eventually dissipates .
It  is नहीं संभावित to artificially  induce the dissipation of these systems with current technology .
Kirk Douglas ( born Issur Danielovitch , ; December 9 , 1916 ) is  an अमरीकी स्टेज और  film actor , film producer and author .
His popular films include Out of the Past (  1947 ) , चैंपियन ( 1949 ) , इक्का in the  Hole ( 1951 ) , The Bad and the Beautiful ( 1952 ) , 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea ( 1954 ) , Lust for Life ( 1956 ) , Paths of Glory ( 1957 ) , Gunfight at the O.K . Corral ( 1957 ) , The Vikings ( 1958 ) , Spartacus ( 1960 ) , Lonely Are the Brave ( 1962 ) , Seven Days in May ( 1964 ) , The Heroes of Telemark ( 1965 ) and Tough Guys ( 1986 ) .
He is No.17 on the  अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान 's सूची of the महानतम पुरूष अमरीकी  screen legends of all time , making him the highest-ranked living person on the list .
In 1996 , he received the Academy Honorary  पुरस्कार `` लिये 50 सालो as a रचनात्मक और moral फ़ोर्स in the  motion picture community . ''
He is one of the last surviving actors from  हॉलीवुड 's `` सुनहरी  age '' .
Robert Clark `` Bob ''  seger ( born may 6 , 1945 ) is an  American rock and roll singer-songwriter , guitarist and pianist .
As a locally successful Detroit-area artist , he performed and recorded  as bob seger और the पिछला सुना और  Bob Seger System throughout the 1960s .
By the early 1970s , he had  dropped the `` प्रणाली '' इससे उसके रिकार्डिंग और जारी  to strive for broader success with other various bands .
In 1973 , he put together The Silver Bullet Band , a group of Detroit-area musicians , with whom he became most successful on the national  स्तर साथ the एल्बम सजीव गोली , अंकित सजीव साथ the चांदी गोली बैंड in 1975 at cobo हॉल in  Detroit , Michigan .
In 1976 , he achieved a national  ब्रेकआउट साथ the स्टुडियो एल्बम रात्रि  Moves .
On  उसके स्टुडियो एल्बम , he भी worked extensively साथ the alabama-based  Muscle Shoals Rhythm Section , which appeared on several of Seger 's best-selling singles and albums .
A roots rocker with a classic raspy , shouting voice  , seger लिखा और अंकित गीतों कि dealt साथ प्रेम , महिलाओं , blue-collar  themes and was an exemplar of heartland rock .
Seger has recorded many hits , including `` Night  चालें , '' `` फेरे the पेज , '' `` we 've मिला tonight , '' `` विरूद्ध the हवा , '' और shakedown कि थी लिखा लिये बेवर्ली पहाड़ियाँ cop ii और  `` Like a Rock , '' and also co-wrote the Eagles ' number-one hit `` Heartache Tonight . ''
His iconic recording of `` Old Time  चट्टान और फेंकें `` थी नामित एक of the गीतों of the  Century in 2001 .
With a career spanning five decades , Seger  continues to perform और रिकार्ड  today .
Seger was  inducted into the चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल of कीर्ति in 2004 और  the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 2012 .
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9 , 1913 – April 22 , 1994 ) was the 37th President of the United States ,  सेवारत इससे 1969 to 1974 , जब he became the तभी अध्यक्ष to इस्तीफा the दफ्तर  .
Nixon had previously served as a Republican U.S.  प्रतिनिधि और सीनेटर इससे कैलिफ़ोर्निया और as  the 36th Vice President of the United States from 1953 to 1961 .
Nixon  थी born in yorba  Linda , California .
He graduated from Whittier College in  1934 और ड्यूक विश्वविद्यालयों  School of Law in 1937 , returning to California to practice law .
He and his wife , Pat Nixon , moved to Washington to work  लिये the संघीय सरकारी  in 1942 .
he subsequently परोसा  in the United States Navy during World War II .
Nixon was  निर्वाचित in कैलिफ़ोर्निया to the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि in 1946 और to the  Senate in 1950 .
His pursuit of the Alger Hiss case established his  प्रतिष्ठा as a अग्रणी  anti-communist , and elevated him to national prominence .
He was  the कार्यशील mate of ड्वाइट D.  Eisenhower , the Republican Party presidential nominee in the 1952 election .
Nixon  परोसा लिये आठ सालो as वाइस  president .
He waged an unsuccessful presidential campaign in  1960 , narrowly खोने to जॉन F. कैनेडी , और खोया a रेस  for Governor of California in 1962 .
In 1968 , he ran again for the  प्रेसिडेंसी और थी  elected .
Although Nixon initially escalated America 's involvement in the Vietnam War  , he subsequently ended u.S.  involvement in 1973 .
Nixon 's visit to the People 's Republic of China in 1972 opened diplomatic relations between the two  राष्ट्र , और he initiated détente और the anti-ballistic  Missile Treaty with the Soviet Union the same year .
Domestically , his administration generally  embraced नीतियों कि transferred शक्ति इससे वॉशिंगटन  to the states .
Among other  बाते , he शुभारम्भ पहलों to लड़ो कर्कट और illegal दवाएँ , imposed मजदूरी  and price controls , enforced desegregation of some Southern schools , and established the Environmental Protection Agency .
Though he presided over the lunar  अवतरण शुरूआत साथ अपोलो  11 , he scaled back manned space exploration .
He was  re-elected by a  landslide in 1972 .
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo , the resignation of his vice president , Spiro Agnew , and a continuing series of revelations about  the वाटरगेट कांड और अन्य misconduct by सदस्यों of the प्रशासन  .
The scandal escalated , costing Nixon much of his political support  , और on अगस्त 9 , 1974 , he resigned in the फेस  of almost certain impeachment and removal from office .
After his resignation , he  controversially प्राप्त a pardon जारी by उसके successor  , Gerald Ford .
In  रिटायरमेंट , निक्सन 's कार्य as an elder statesman  , authoring several books and undertaking many foreign trips , helped to rehabilitate his public image .
He suffered a  debilitating स्ट्रोक on अप्रैल 18 ,  1994 , and died four days later at the age of 81 .
{ { Infobox  सीनेटर
The  डोमिनिकन गणतंत्र annexation सन्धि caused कड़वा contention  between President Grant and Sen. Sumner .
ब्रैडी  1869 ] ]
Sen. Sumner , opposed to  अमरीकी साम्राज्यवाद in the caribbean और fearful कि annexation होता सीसे to the conquest of the neighboring  black republic of Haiti , became convinced that corruption lay behind the treaty , and that men close to the president shared in the corruption .
As chairman of the Senate Foreign Relations  कमेटी , sen. sumner initially withheld उसके राय on the सन्धि on जनवरी  18 , 1870 .
Sen. Sumner had been leaked  सूचना इससे सहायक सचिव of राज्य , bancroft डेविस , कि  U.S . Naval ships were being used to protect President Báez .
Sen. Sumner 's committee voted against annexation and at Sen. Sumner’s suggestion and quite possibly to save the party from  an भद्दा लड़ो or the अध्यक्ष इससे शर्मिंदगी , the सीनेट  held its debate of the treaty behind closed doors in executive session .
अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट persisted और भेजा संदेश to कॉंग्रेस  in favor of annexation on March 14 , 1870 , and May 31 , 1870 .
In closed session , Sen. Sumner spoke out against the treaty ;  warnng कि वहीँ होता be परेशानी साथ the विदेशी  nationals , noting the chronic rebellion that took place on the island , and the risk that the independence of Haiti , recognized by the United States in 1862 , would be lost .
Sumner stated that Grant 's use of the U.S. Navy as a  प्रोटेक्टोरेट थी a उल्लंघन of अंतरराष्ट्रीय  law and unconstitutional .
Finally , on June 30 , 1870 the treaty was voted on by the Senate and  विफल to लाभ the जरूरी 2/3 बहुमत लिये सन्धि ड्योढ़ी  .
The following day , President Grant , feeling betrayed by Sen. Sumner , retaliated  by ordering  the dismissal of Sumner’s close friend J. Lothrop Motley , Ambassador to Britain .
By autumn , Sumner 's personal hostility to the president was public knowledge , and he blamed the Secretary of State for failing to  have resigned , बल्कि than let ग्रान्ट have  his way .
The two  मेन , मित्रों जबतक तब  , cooled into bitter enemies .
In December , 1870 , still fearful that Grant  meant to acquire सेंटो डोमिंगो somehow , sumner दिया a fiercely नाजुक वाक accusing the अध्यक्ष  of usurpation and Babcock of unethical conduct .
Already , President Grant , supported by his Secretary of State Hamilton Fish , had initiated a campaign to depose Sumner  इससे the अध्यक्षता of the सीनेट विदेशी संबंध कमेटी  .
Although Sumner stated he was an `` Administration man '' , in addition to having stopped Grant 's Dominican Republic treaty attempt , Sumner had defeated Grant 's full repeal of the Tenure of Office  अधिनियम , अवरोधित ग्रान्ट 's नामांकन of सिकंदर स्टीवर्ट to u.S. सचिव of राजकोष , और महरूम a निरंतर harassing फ़ोर्स pushing पुनर्निर्माण नीतियों  faster than Grant had been willing to go .
Grant resented Sumner 's  बड़प्पन of manner  , as well .
Told once that  sumner किया नहीं मानना in the बाइबल ,  the president is supposed to have said that he was not surprised : `` he did n't write it . ''
As the rift between Grant  और sumner increased ,  Sumner’s health began to decline .
When the 42nd U.S. Congress convened  on कूच 4 , 1871 , सीनेटरों संबद्ध साथ अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट , ज्ञात  as ‘’New Radicals’’ voted to oust Sen. Sumner from the Senate Foreign Relations Committee chairmanship .
Business ethics ( also corporate ethics ) is a form of applied ethics or professional ethics that examines  नैतिक सिद्धान्त और moral  or ethical problems that arise in a business environment .
It applies  to सब पहलुओं of कारोबार conduct  and is relevant to the conduct of individuals and entire organizations .
Business ethics has  दोनो normative और  descriptive dimensions .
As a  कॉरपोरेट अभ्यास और a करियर  specialization , the field is primarily normative .
लड attempting to समझे  business behavior employ descriptive methods .
The range and quantity of business ethical issues reflects the  बातचीत of profit-maximizing बर्ताव साथ non-economic चिंताएं  .
Interest in business ethics accelerated dramatically during the 1980s and 1990s , both within  प्रमुख corporations और भीतर academia  .
For example , today most major corporations promote their commitment to  non-economic मान अंतर्गत headings ऐसे as आचार कोड  and social responsibility charters .
Adam  स्मिथ कहा , `` लोगों of the वही व्यापार seldom मिलें साथ , भी लिये merriment और diversion  , but the conversation ends in a conspiracy against the public , or in some contrivance to raise prices . ''
Governments use laws and regulations to point business  बर्ताव in कया वे perceive to  be beneficial directions .
Ethics  implicitly regulates क्षेत्रों और विवरण of बर्ताव  that lie beyond governmental control .
The emergence of large corporations with limited relationships and sensitivity to the communities in which they  operate त्वरित the विकास of औपचारिक आचार  regimes .
A  बर्न is a प्रकार of चोट to flesh or स्किन caused by ऊष्मा , विद्युत  , chemicals , friction , or radiation .
Most burns affect only the superficial skin ( known as superficial or first degree )  or extend into the deeper स्किन लकिन do नहीं involve the पूरा मोटाई  of the skin ( known as partial thickness or second degree ) .
Rarely all layers of the skin or deeper tissues , such as  मांसपेशी or अस्थि can be घायल in जिससे मामला the बर्न is either पूरा मोटाई  ( third degree ) or fourth degree .
The  उपचार जरूरी depends on  the severity of the burn .
Superficial burns maybe managed with  छोटी अधिक than सरल पीड़ा हत्यारे जबकि प्रमुख burns may आवश्यकता prolonged  treatment in specialized burn centers .
Cooling  साथ tap जल may सहायता  pain and decrease damage however if exposure is prolonged it may result in low body temperature .
आंशिक मोटाई burns may आवश्यकता  cleaning with soap and water followed by dressings .
Blisters  चाहिए typically  be left unbroken .
Full thickness burns usually require surgical treatments such as skin  कलम और extensive burns प्रायः आवश्यकता विशाल राशि of  intravenous fluids .
The most  आम जटिलताओं of burns  are related to infection .
While large  burns can be fatal , आधुनिक उपचार विकसित in the पिछला 50 सालो  have significantly improved the outcomes , especially in children and young adults .
Globally about 11 million people seek medical treatment and 300,000  लोगों die इससे  burns .
In the United States , of those admitted to a burn  बीच , लगभग 4 % die इससे उनके चोटों  .
The long term outcome is  primarily सम्बन्धित  to the size of burn and the age of the person effected .
The Atlantic Ocean ,  नहीं सहित  Arctic and Antarctic regions
This video was taken by the crew of Expedition 29 on  फलक the iss  .
The pass  starts इससे बस north-east of the द्वीप of  Newfoundland over the North Atlantic Ocean to central Africa , over South Sudan .
The Atlantic Ocean is the second-largest  of the संसार 's oceanic विभाजन  .
With a total area of about ,  it कवर लगभग 20 प्रतिशत of the धरती 's सतह  and about 29 percent of its water surface area .
The first part of its name refers to Atlas of Greek  mythology , बनाना the अटलांटिक the `` समुद्र  of Atlas '' .
The oldest known mention of `` Atlantic '' is in The Histories of Herodotus around 450 BC ( Hdt . 1.202.4 ) : Atlantis thalassa (  यूनानी : ἀτλαντὶς θάλασσα ; अंग्रेज़ी : समुद्र of  Atlas ) .
The term Ethiopic Ocean , derived from Ethiopia , was applied  to the दक्षिणी अटलांटिक as लेट as the  mid-19th century .
Before Europeans discovered other oceans , the term ``  समंदर '' itself थी synonymous साथ the waters परे the जलसन्धि  of Gibraltar that we now know as the Atlantic .
The early Greeks believed  इस समंदर to be a gigantic  river encircling the world .
the अटलांटिक समंदर occupies an elongated , s-shaped  basin extending longitudinally between Eurasia and Africa to the east , and the Americas to the west .
As one component of the interconnected global ocean , it is connected in the north to the Arctic Ocean (  जिससे is sometimes माना a समुद्र of the अटलांटिक ) , to the प्रशांत समंदर in the  southwest , the Indian Ocean in the southeast , and the Southern Ocean in the south .
( Other definitions describe the Atlantic as  extending southward to अंटार्कटिक  . )
The equator subdivides  it into the उत्तर अटलांटिक  Ocean and South Atlantic Ocean .
Due to their long-term persistence , and the need for a unique  पहचानकर्ता in issuing forecasts और चेतावनियाँ , तीव्र cyclones और उपोष्ण cyclones  are given names according to policy ( see Tropical cyclone naming ) .
The following are lists from which these tropical and  उपोष्ण चक्रवात names हैं निकला  .
White light is dispersed by a  प्रिज़्म into the रंगों of the ऑप्टिकल  spectrum .
The visible spectrum is the portion of the  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम कि is दृश्य to (  can be detected by ) the human eye .
Electromagnetic radiation in  इस दायरा of wavelengths  is called visible light or simply light .
A typical human eye will respond to  wavelengths इससे परिचय  390 to 700 nm .
In  शर्तें of आवृत्ति  , this corresponds to a band in the vicinity of 430–790 THz .
A light-adapted eye generally has its maximum  संवेदनशीलता at around 555 nm (  540 THz ) , in the green region of the optical spectrum ( see : luminosity function ) .
The spectrum does not , however , contain all the  रंगों कि the इंसान आँखें और  brain can distinguish .
Unsaturated colors such as pink , or purple  विसंगतियाँ ऐसे as magenta , हैं अनुपस्थित , लिये उदाहरण , क्युकी  they can be made only by a mix of multiple wavelengths .
रंगों containing तभी  one wavelength are also called pure colors .
Visible wavelengths pass through the `` optical window `` , the region of the  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम जिससे allows wavelengths to pass largely unattenuated through the  Earth 's atmosphere .
An example of this phenomenon is that clean air scatters blue  लाइट अधिक than रेड wavelengths , और so the  midday sky appears blue .
The optical window is  भी पुकारा the दृश्य खिड़की क्युकी  it overlaps the human visible response spectrum .
The near infrared ( NIR ) window lies just out of the  इंसान दृष्टि , as खूब as the मीडियम wavelength ir ( mwir ) खिड़की और  the Long Wavelength or Far Infrared ( LWIR or FIR ) window though other animals may experience them .
Many species can see light with  बारंबारता बाहर the `` दृश्य वर्णक्रम , ''  which is defined in terms of human vision .
मधुमक्खियों और अनेक अन्य कीट can detect  ultraviolet light , which helps them find nectar in flowers .
संयंत्र प्रजाति कि निर्भर on कीट परागण may owe reproductive  success to their appearance in ultraviolet light , rather than how colorful they appear to humans .
Birds , too , can see into the ultraviolet ( 300–400 nm ) , and  कुछ have sex-dependent markings on उनके  plumage that are visible only in the ultraviolet range .
Many animals that can see into the ultraviolet range ,  however , can नहीं देखिए रेड लाइट  or any other reddish wavelengths .
Bees ' visible spectrum ends at about 590nm , just before  the नारंगी wavelengths  start .
Birds , however , can see some red wavelengths , but  नहीं as अनेक  as humans .
Zebras ( or  ) हैं अनेक प्रजाति of अफ़्रीकी equids ( घोड़ा परिवार  ) united by their distinctive black and white stripes .
Their stripes come in different patterns ,  अद्वितीय to प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत  .
They are generally social animals that live in  छोटी harems to विशाल  herds .
Unlike their closest relatives , horses and  asses , zebras have never  been truly domesticated .
There are three species of  zebras : the मैदान जेब्रा , the  Grévy 's zebra and the mountain zebra .
The plains zebra and the mountain zebra belong to the subgenus Hippotigris , but Grévy 's zebra is the sole  प्रजाति of subgenus  Dolichohippus .
The latter  resembles an गधा , to जिससे it is closely सम्बन्धित  , while the former two are more horse-like .
All three belong to the genus  equus , साथ साथ  other living equids .
The unique stripes of zebras make them one of the  पशु  most familiar to people .
They occur in a variety of habitats , such as grasslands ,  savannas , वुडलैंड्स , thorny scrublands , kyu  , and coastal hills .
However , various  anthropogenic कारकों have था a कठोर  impact on zebra populations , in particular hunting for skins and habitat destruction .
Grévy  's जेब्रा और  the mountain zebra are endangered .
While plains zebras are much more plentiful , one subspecies , the quagga , became extinct in the late 19th century – though there is currently a plan , called the  quagga प्रोजेक्ट , कि aims to नस्ल zebras कि हैं phenotypically समान to the quagga in a  process called breeding back .
Barry White ,  born बैरी यूजीन कार्टर ( – )  , was an American composer and singer-songwriter .
A two-time Grammy Award -winner known for his distinctive bass voice and romantic image , White 's greatest success came in the 1970s as a solo singer and with the Love Unlimited Orchestra , crafting many enduring soul , funk , and disco songs such as his two biggest  हिट्स , `` तुम 're the पहला , the पिछला , my सबकुछ `` और `` ca n't मिलेंगी पर्याप्त  of Your Love , Babe . ''
Along with  इसहाक़ हेज़ , श्वेत is  considered by Allmusic.com as a pioneer of disco music in the early 1970s .
दौरान the कोर्स of उसके करियर in the म्यूज़िक कारोबार , श्वेत हासिल  106 gold albums worldwide , 41 of which also attained platinum status .
White had 20 gold and 10 platinum singles , with worldwide sales in excess of 100 million , according to  आलोचकों ed होगन और वेड kergan  .
His influences  शामिल रेव . जेम्स क्लीवलैंड , रे चार्ल्स  , Aretha Franklin plus Motown artists The Supremes , The Four Tops and Marvin Gaye .
Angelina Jolie ( ,  born एंजेलीना जोली वोइट ; जून 4 , 1975 ) is an अमरीकी  actress , film director , and screenwriter .
She has  प्राप्त an अकादमी पुरस्कार , दो स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं  Guild Awards , and three Golden Globe Awards , and was named Hollywood 's highest-paid actress by Forbes in 2009 and 2011 .
Jolie promotes humanitarian causes , and is noted for her work with refugees as a Special Envoy and former Goodwill Ambassador for  the संयुक्त राष्ट्र ऊँची कमिश्नर लिये शरणार्थियों  ( UNHCR ) .
She has often been cited as the world 's `` most  खूबसूरत '' स्त्री , a शीर्षक लिये जिससे वो  has received substantial media attention .
Jolie made her screen debut as a child alongside her  पिता jon वोइट in lookin ' to मिलेंगी आउट ( 1982 ) , लकिन उसके फिल्मी करियर began in  earnest a decade later with the low-budget production Cyborg 2 ( 1993 ) .
उसके पहला अग्रणी भूमिका  in a major film was in the cyber-thriller Hackers ( 1995 ) .
वो स्ट्रक्चर in the critically acclaimed biographical टेलीविज़न films जार्ज वालेस  ( 1997 ) and Gia ( 1998 ) , and won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her performance in the drama Girl , Interrupted ( 1999 ) .
Jolie achieved wide  कीर्ति बाद उसके portrayal of वीडियो खेल नायिका लारा क्रॉफ्ट in लारा क्रॉफ्ट  : Tomb Raider ( 2001 ) , and established herself among the highest-paid actresses in Hollywood with the sequel The Cradle of Life ( 2003 ) .
She continued her action star career with Mr. & Mrs. Smith ( 2005 ) and Wanted ( 2008 ) —her biggest non-animated  वाणिज्यिक सफलताओं to date—and प्राप्त further नाजुक acclaim लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in the dramas a mighty दिल ( 2007 ) और changeling  ( 2008 ) , which earned her a nomination for an Academy Award for Best Actress .
Jolie made her directorial debut with the  wartime नाटक in the  Land of Blood and Honey ( 2011 ) .
Divorced from actors Jonny Lee Miller and Billy Bob Thornton , Jolie now  जीवनदान साथ कर्ता ब्रैड pitt , in a संबंध notable लिये  fervent media attention .
Jolie and Pitt have three biological children and  तीन अपनाया  children .
A natural arch produced by the erosion of differentially  weathered चट्टान in jebel kharaz  , Jordan
अपरदन is the प्रक्रम by जिससे मृदा और चट्टान हैं removed इससे the धरती 's सतह by exogenetic  processes such as wind or water flow , and then transported and deposited in other locations .
While erosion is a natural process , human  क्रियाएँ have increased by 10-40 टाइम्स  the rate at which erosion is occurring globally .
excessive अपरदन कल्याणकारी समस्याएं ऐसे as मरुस्थलीकरण , decreases in agricultural उत्पादकता due to जमीन degradation  , sedimentation of waterways , and ecological collapse due to loss of the nutrient rich upper soil layers .
Water and wind erosion are now the two primary causes  of जमीन degradation ; संयुक्त , वे हैं जिम्मेदार लिये 84 % of degraded acreage , बनाना excessive  erosion one of the most significant global environmental problems .
औद्योगिक कृषि , वनों , सड़कें , anthropogenic  climate change and urban sprawl are amongst the most significant human activities in regard to their effect on stimulating erosion .
However , there are many available alternative land use practices that can  काटना or सीमा अपरदन , ऐसे as छत -building , no-till कृषि , और revegetation  of denuded soils .
Jersey Shore is an American reality television series which ran on MTV from December 3 , 2009 to December 20  , 2012 in the संयुक्त  States .
The  श्रेणी फ़ॉलो the जीवनदान of आठ housemates बिता उनके गर्मियाँ  at the Jersey Shore in the U.S. state of New Jersey .
Season 2 followed the cast escaping the cold  पूर्वोत्तर शीत to मियामी  Beach , with Season 3 returning to the Jersey Shore .
the चौथी ऋतु ,  filmed in Italy , premiered on August 4 , 2011 .
The  दिखाएँ लौटे लिये a पांचवां  season , at Seaside Heights on January 5 , 2012 .
The fifth  ऋतु finale aired  on March 15 , 2012 .
On March 19 , 2012 , MTV confirmed that the  श्रेणी होता वापसी लिये उनके छठे  season .
On August 30 , 2012 , MTV announced that the series will end  बाद the छठे  season , which premiered on October 4 .
The  श्रेणी finale aired on  December 20 , 2012 .
The show debuted amid large amounts of controversy regarding the use of the words `` Guido / Guidette , '' portrayals of Italian-American stereotypes , and scrutiny from  स्थानीय क्युकी the डाल सदस्यों यहूद नहीं निवासियों of  the area .
The series garnered record ratings for MTV ,  बनाना it the संजाल 's सबसे viewed  series telecast ever .
The series ' cast have also been  credited साथ introducing अद्वितीय lexicon और वाक्यांश  into American popular culture .
The University of Chicago and the University of Oklahoma are among the educational institutions that have  था वर्ग or सम्मेलनों परिचय  the show .
In 2010 , the cast of Jersey Shore was named on Barbara Walters ' 10 Most Fascinating People  सूची , और the श्रेणी रै चूंकि महरूम exported to दर्जनों of देशों विश्वव्यापी  .
There are several remakes of the show in other countries , with two set in the United Kingdom ; the well known Geordie Shore  , नियत in न्यूकैसल upon tyne ,  England .
The other is The Valleys , the  वेल्श समतुल्य , जिससे  is filmed and set in Cardiff .
The only other official remake of the show is  gandía shore  , set in Gandía , Spain .
