United States territory is any extent of region under the jurisdiction of the federal government of  the संयुक्त राज्य , सहित सब waters ( around आइलैंड्स or महाद्वीपीय tracts ) और सब u.s  . Naval vessels .
The  संयुक्त राज्य रै traditionally  proclaimed the sovereign rights for exploring , exploiting , conserving , and managing its territory .
This extent of territory is all the area belonging to , and under the dominion of , the United States federal government ( which includes tracts lying at a  अलहदा इससे the देश ) लिये प्रशासनिक  and other purposes .
The United States total  territory शामिल a उपसमुच्चय of  political divisions .
The U.S. government is a government with  प्रतिनिधित्व शक्तियां अंतर्गत the संयुक्त राज्य  Constitution .
`` The powers not delegated to the United States by the Constitution  , nor निषिद्ध by it to the राज्य  , are reserved to the States respectively , or to the people '' by the Tenth Amendment .
Terminator 3 : Rise of the Machines ( commonly abbreviated as T3 ) is a 2003 science fiction action film directed by Jonathan Mostow and starring Arnold Schwarzenegger ,  उपनाम stahl , क्लेयर danes  and Kristanna Loken .
It is the second sequel to The  टर्मिनेटर (  1984 ) .
After Skynet fails to kill Sarah Connor  पहले उसके बेटे is born और to मार जॉन खुद as a चाइल्ड , it भेजना वापस  another Terminator , the T-X , in an attempt to wipe out as many Resistance officers as possible .
This includes John 's future wife , but not John  खुद as उसके whereabouts हैं  unknown to Skynet .
John 's life is placed in danger when  the t-x accidentally पाता उसे  .
A  cord of  wood
The cord is a  ईकाई of माप of शुष्क आवाज़ प्रयुक्त in कनाडा  and the United States to measure firewood and pulpwood .
A cord is the amount of wood that ,  जब `` क्रमित और खूब stowed '' ( arranged so टुकड़े हैं लकीर , समानांतर  , touching and compact ) , occupies a volume of .
This corresponds to a well  stacked woodpile ऊँची , long , और गहन ; or कोई अन्य  arrangement of linear measurements that yields the same volume .
The name cord probably  आता इससे the उपयोग  of a cord or string to measure it .
The , is an 8-bit handheld  वीडियो खेल यंत्र विकसित  and manufactured by Nintendo .
It was released in Japan  on , in उत्तर अमेरिका in ,  and in Europe on .
It is the first handheld console in the Game Boy line , and was created by Gunpei Yokoi and Nintendo  शोध & विकास 1 —the वही स्टाफ जो था designed the खेल & देखें श्रेणी as खूब as अनेक  popular games for the Nintendo Entertainment System .
Redesigned versions were released in 1996 and 1998 , in the form of Game Boy Pocket , and  खेल लड़के लाइट ( जापानी तभी ) , क्रमशः  .
The Game Boy is Nintendo 's second handheld system following the  खेल & देखें श्रेणी introduced in , और it संयुक्त सुविधाएँ इससे दोनो the निन्टेंडो  Entertainment System and Game & Watch .
It was originally bundled  साथ the पहेली  game Tetris .
As part of the fourth generation of gaming , the Game Boy competed with the  sega खेल गियर , atari लिंक्स , और the turboexpress  .
Despite these other technologically  श्रेष्ठ हैंडहेल्ड consoles , the खेल  Boy was a tremendous success .
The Game  लड़के और इसके successor , the खेल लड़के रंग  , have both combined sold 118.69 million units worldwide .
Upon its release in the United States ,  it बेची इसके संपूर्ण शिपमेंट of एक  million units within weeks .
The World Trade Center is a complex  of इमारतें अंतर्गत निर्माण in निम्नतर मैनहटन , नई यॉर्क नगर ,  United States , replacing an earlier complex of seven buildings with the same name on the same site .
The original World Trade Center  प्रदर्शित लैंडमार्क जुड़वा मीनारें , जिससे खोली on अप्रैल 4 , 1973 और यहूद नष्ट  in the September 11 attacks of 2001 , along with 7 World Trade Center .
The other buildings in the complex were  क्षतिग्रस्त in the हमले , और उनके तबाह यहूद आखिरकार demolished  .
The site is being rebuilt with five new skyscrapers  और a मेमोरियल to those मारे in the हमले  .
, only one  skyscraper रै महरूम समाप्त ; the अन्य चार हैं अपेक्षित  to be completed before 2020 .
One World Trade Center will be the lead building for the  नई जटिल , reaching  more than 100 stories at its completion .
It became the tallest building in New  यॉर्क नगर on अप्रैल 30 , 2012 , और is अपेक्षित  to be finished by 2013 .
A sixth tower  is प्रतीक्षारत  confirmation .
At the time of their completion , the original 1 World Trade Center ( the North Tower  ) और 2 संसार व्यापार बीच ( the दक्षिण मीनार ) , ज्ञात collectively as the `` जुड़वा मीनारें '' , यहूद the tallest  buildings in the world .
The other buildings included  3 wtc ( the मैरियट  World Trade Center ) , 4 WTC , 5 WTC , 6 WTC , and 7 WTC .
सब of ये इमारतें  were built between 1975 and 1985 .
The cost for the  निर्माण थी $ 400  million ( $ in dollars ) .
The complex was  स्तिथ in the दिल of नई यॉर्क नगर 's  downtown financial district and contained 13.4 million square feet ( 1.24 million m2 ) of office space .
The World Trade Center experienced a fire on , 1975 ,  a bombing on ,  1993 and a robbery on , 1998 .
In  1998 , the बंदरगाहों प्राधिकार decided to privatize the संसार  Trade Center , leasing the buildings to a private company to manage , and awarded the lease to Silverstein Properties in .
On the morning of September 11 , 2001 ,  al-qaeda -संबद्धd hijackers उड़ाया दो बोइंग 767 jets into the जटिल  , one into each tower , in a coordinated terrorist attack .
After burning for 56 minutes , the South Tower ( 2 ) collapsed , followed a half-hour later by the North Tower (  1 ) , साथ the हमले on the संसार व्यापार बीच  resulting in 2,753 deaths .
Falling debris from the towers , combined with fires  कि the मलबा initiated in अनेक surrounding इमारतें , led to the आंशिक or पूरा पतन of सब the अन्य इमारतें  in the complex and caused catastrophic damage to ten other large structures in the surrounding area .
The  प्रक्रम of क्लीनअप और रिकवरी at the संसार व्यापार  Center site took eight months .
Over the following years  , योजनाएँ लिये a rebuilt संसार व्यापार बीच  took form .
The first new  भवन at the साईट थी 7 संसार  Trade Center , which opened in .
The Lower Manhattan Development Corporation ( LMDC ) , established  in to oversee the पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम , व्यवस्थित प्रतियोगिताओं to चुनें a साईट योजना  and memorial design .
Memory Foundations , designed by Daniel Libeskind , was selected as the master  योजना , लकिन इस गई through substantial परिवर्तन  in design .
The new World Trade Center complex will include  एक संसार व्यापार बीच , तीन अन्य high-rise दफ्तर मीनारें , और the नेशनल  September 11 Memorial & Museum .
San  जिबरील  Mountains
San Bernardino Mountains  , साथ mt . सैन gorgonio in the  foreground and Big Bear Lake in the background .
The Transverse Ranges are a group of mountain ranges of  दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया , in the प्रशांत coast सीमाएँ physiographic  region in North America .
The Transverse Ranges begin at the southern end  of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया coast सीमाएँ और झूठ between  Santa Barbara and San Diego counties .
They derive the name Transverse Ranges due to their East-West orientation , making them transverse to  the सामान्य north-south अभिविन्यास of सबसे of कैलिफ़ोर्निया  's coastal mountains .
Periodic table  साथ इलेक्ट्रॉन शेल
An electron shell may be  विचार of as an कक्षा followed  by electrons around an atom 's nucleus .
The closest shell to the nucleus is called the `` 1 shell '' ( also  पुकारा `` k शेल '' ) , followed by the `` 2 शेल  '' ( or `` L shell '' ) , then the `` 3 shell '' ( or `` M shell '' ) , and so on farther and farther from the nucleus .
The shell letters K , L , M , ... , used in the  x-ray संकेतन , हैं वर्णमाला  .
Each shell can contain only a fixed number of electrons : The 1st shell can hold up to  दो electrons , the 2nd शेल can थाम up to आठ electrons , the  3rd shell can hold up to 18 , and 4th shell can hold up to 32 and so on .
Since electrons are electrically attracted to the nucleus , an atom 's electrons  होगा generally occupy बाहरी शेल तभी if the अधिक भीतरी  shells have already been completely filled by other electrons .
However , this is not a strict requirement : Atoms  may have दो or भी तीन अधूरी  outer shells .
( See Madelung rule for  अधिक विवरण  . )
For an  स्पष्टीकरण of क्यों electrons  exist in these shells see electron configuration .
The electrons in the outermost occupied shell ( or  शेल ) determine the रासायनिक गुण  of the atom ; it is called the valence shell .
Each shell consists of one or more subshells , and  प्रत्येक subshell consists of एक or  more atomic orbitals .
vickie lynn मार्शल ( née होगन ; नवम्बर 28 , 1967 – फ़रवरी  8 , 2007 ) , known by her moniker Anna Nicole Smith , was an American model , actress , and television personality .
Smith first gained  लोकप्रियता in प्लेबॉय , बनने the 1993 संगिनी  of the Year .
She modeled for clothing companies ,  सहित अंदाज़ा जीन्स और लेन  Bryant .
स्मिथ dropped आउट  of high school and was married in 1985 .
Her highly publicized second marriage to oil business mogul , J. Howard Marshall , 62 years her senior ,  resulted in अटकलें कि वो शादीशुदा the octogenarian  for his money , which she denied .
following मार्शल 's  death , Smith began a lengthy legal battle over a share of his estate .
Her case , Marshall v. Marshall , reached the U.S.  परम् अदालत on a सवाल of संघीय क्षेत्राधिकार , और again on a सवाल of दिवालियापन  court authority ( now called Stern v. Marshall ) .
Smith died on February 8 , 2007 in a Hollywood , Florida hotel room as a result of  an overdose of नुस्खा दवाएँ  .
Within the final six months of her life , Smith was the  फ़ोकस of a नवीनीकृत दबायें कवरेज surrounding the मौत of उसके बेटे , डेनियल , और  the paternity and custody battle over her newborn daughter , Dannielynn .
The is one  denomination of जापानी  yen .
The current design was first minted in 1959 using  जापानी वर्ण ज्ञात as the `` नई स्क्रिप्ट `` , और यहूद भी  minted from 1949-1958 using `` old-script '' Japanese characters .
Five-yen coins  तिथि to 1870 ( जब , due to the much  higher value of the yen , they were minted in gold ) .
The front of the coin depicts a rice plant  growing आउट of the जल , साथ `` पाँच येन '' लिखा in कांजी  ; the back is stamped with `` Japan '' and the year of issue , also in kanji , separated by sprouts of a tree .
The three graphic elements of the coin represent agriculture and fisheries , the  कुंजी तत्व of the जापानी first-sector  economy .
Around a hole , there is a gear that  represents उद्योग  .
It is the only  जापानी सिक्का in परिसंचरण  to lack Arabic numerals on either face .
TLC is an American girl  समूह जिनकी रंगमंडल spanned r &  B , hip hop , soul , funk , and new jack swing .
originally consisting of सिंगर tionne `` t-boz '' वाटकिंस , rapper लिसा `` बाएँ नजर '' lopes और सिंगर rozonda `` chilli '' थामस  , the group found unprecedented success in the 1990s while also enduring a series of spats with the law , each other , and the group 's record label .
initially , tlc हासिल वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी  following the release of their debut album Ooooooohhh ...
On the TLC  टिप , जिससे बेची 6 लाख  copies worldwide .
However , it was their second album , CrazySexyCool , that catapulted the  समूह to superstar औकात  .
CrazySexyCool went on to be certified diamond  by the riaa — a पहला लिये a मादा समूह , और आखिरकार बेची 23 लाख  copies worldwide .
Five years  बाद , the समूह released उनके तीसरा एल्बम fanmail , जिससे became the समूह  's first album to debut at number one and sold more than 11 million copies worldwide .
The subsequent tour  following fanmails  release became the highest grossing tour of all time by a female band .
In 2002 , Lisa `` Left Eye '' Lopes died in a  car दुर्घटना in होंडुरास  .
Seven months later , T-Boz and Chilli released the  समूह 's चौथी एल्बम 3d , जिससे बेची 2 लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी  , it featured unreleased vocals from Left Eye .
Billboard magazine ranked TLC as  एक of the महानतम musical trios  .
Between 1992 and 2003 , the band accumulated ten top ten singles , four  क्रमांक एक singles , चार multi-platinum एल्बम , और चार ग्रैमी पुरस्कार  .
At the end of 1999 , TLC was ranked as the  सातवाँ सबसे कामयाब अधिनियम  of the 1990s by Billboard .
In 2008 , the group was inducted into the All Time Hot 100  कलाकार हॉल of कीर्ति by the वही पत्रिका , at 56th  place .
That year it was also listed as the # 25  r & b/hip-hop कलाकार of the  preceding 25 years .
TLC has sold more than 65 million records worldwide and they  हैं क्रमित as the दूसरी बेहतरीन selling मादा समूह of सब  time , and the best selling female R & B group of all time .
In 2012 , TLC ranked 12th on VH1 's  100 महानतम महिलाओं in म्यूज़िक , होने क्रमित the  number one all girl group on that list .
Tarzan is a 1999 American animated adventure film produced by Walt Disney Feature Animation  और वितरित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी तस्वीरें .
The 37th film in the Walt Disney Animated Classics , it  is आधारित on the स्टोरी टार्ज़न of the apes by एडगर राइस बरोज , और is  the only major motion picture version of the story Tarzan property to be animated .
Directed by  क्रिस buck और केविन लीमा साथ a पटकथा by tab मर्फी , bob tzudiker , और नोनी श्वेत , टार्ज़न  features the voices of Tony Goldwyn , Minnie Driver , Glenn Close , and Rosie O'Donnell with Brian Blessed , Lance Henriksen , Wayne Knight , and Nigel Hawthorne .
It  थी the पिछला bona fide hit पहले the डिज़्नी slump  of the early 2000s grossing $ 171,091,819 domestically and $ 448,191,819 worldwide , outgrossing its predecessors Hercules ( 1997 ) and Mulan ( 1998 ) .
At the time of its release , its production budget of $ 130 million made it the most expensive animated film ever made , until topped by Disney 's own $  140 लाख खजाना  Planet in 2002 .
It was  भी the पहला डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड  feature to open at # 1 since Pocahontas .
This was the last major box  दफ्तर कामयाबी of the डिज़्नी  Renaissance .
Oil Platform P-51 off the  ब्राज़ीलियाई coast is a semi-submersible  platform .
Oil  मंच mittelplate  in the North sea
An oil platform , ( offshore platform or colloquially  आयल रिग ) is a विशाल ढांचा साथ सुविधाएं to  drill wells , to extract and process oil and natural gas , and to temporarily store product until it can be brought to shore for refining and marketing .
In many cases , the platform contains  सुविधाएं to हाउस the workforce  as well .
Depending on the circumstances , the platform may be fixed to  the समंदर मंजिल , may consist of an कृत्रिम द्वीप , or may  float .
Remote subsea wells may also be connected to a platform by flow  लाइनों और by umbilical कनेक्शन्स .
These subsea solutions may consist of one or more  subsea कुएं , or of एक or अधिक manifold केंद्रों  for multiple wells .
Slaughter is the  हत्या of पशु , प्रायः कि of घरेलू  livestock for food .
The  पशु सबसे commonly slaughtered लिये खाना हैं चौपायों , जल भैंस ( लिये बीफ और वील ) , शीप , बकरियों ( लिये मेमने और मटन ) , सूअर  ( for pork ) , horses ( for horse meat ) , and fowl , largely chickens , turkeys , and ducks and increasingly fish from the aquaculture industry ( fish farming ) .
The White House  , the अध्यक्ष  's official residence and center of the administration
Under the United States Constitution , the President of the United States is the  सिर of राज्य और सिर of सरकारी of the  United States .
As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a whole , the presidency is the highest political  दफ्तर in the संयुक्त राज्य  by influence and recognition .
The president is also the  commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद  Forces .
The president is indirectly elected to a four-year  पद by an चुनावी कॉलेज ( or by the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि चाहिए  the Electoral College fail to award an absolute majority of votes to any person ) .
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second Amendment to the United States Constitution in 1951 , no  व्यक्ति may be निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष अधिक than twice , और no एक जो रै परोसा अधिक than  two years of a term to which someone else was elected may be elected more than once .
Upon the death , resignation , or removal from office of an incumbent  अध्यक्ष , the वाइस अध्यक्ष assumes the दफ्तर  .
The President must be at least 35 years of age and a `` natural born '' citizen  of the संयुक्त राज्य  .
This list includes only those persons who were  sworn into दफ्तर as अध्यक्ष following the अनुसमर्थन of the संयुक्त राज्य  Constitution , which took effect on March 4 , 1789 .
For  अमरीकी नेताओ पहले इस अनुसमर्थन  , see President of the Continental Congress .
The list does not include any Acting  राष्ट्रपतियों अंतर्गत the twenty-fifth  Amendment to the United States Constitution .
There have been 43 people sworn into office  , और 44 presidencies , as ग्रोवर क्लीवलैंड परोसा दो non-consecutive शर्तें  and is counted chronologically as both the 22nd and 24th president .
Of the individuals elected as  अध्यक्ष , चार  died in office of natural causes ( William Henry Harrison , Zachary Taylor , Warren G. Harding , and Franklin D. Roosevelt ) , four were assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln , James A. Garfield , William McKinley , and John F. Kennedy ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ) .
George  वॉशिंगटन , the पहला अध्यक्ष , थी  inaugurated in 1789 after a unanimous vote of the Electoral College .
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in office with 32 days in 1841 , and Franklin D. Roosevelt spent the longest with  over बारह सालो , लकिन died shortly into उसके चौथी पद in  1945 .
He is the only president to serve more than two terms , and a constitutional amendment , affecting presidents after Harry  ट्रूमैन , थी passed to सीमा the क्रमांक of टाइम्स an व्यक्तिगत can be निर्वाचित  president .
Andrew Jackson , the seventh president ,  थी the पहला to be निर्वाचित by मेन of सब वर्ग in 1828  after most laws barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed .
Warren Harding was the  पहला निर्वाचित बाद महिलाओं gained मतदान अधिकारों  in 1920 .
History records four presidents – John Q  एडम्स , रदरफोर्ड B. हेज़ , बेंजामिन  Harrison and George W. Bush – who lost the popular vote but assumed office .
John F. Kennedy has been the only president of Roman Catholic faith , and the current president , Barack  ओबामा , is the पहला अध्यक्ष  of African descent .

AWM-F  स्निपर राइफल साथ संलग्न  suppressor .
A suppressor , sound suppressor , or sound moderator ,  is a यंत्र संलग्न to or भाग of the बैरल of a firearm जिससे reduces the राशि of रव , और  usually the amount of muzzle flash , generated by firing the weapon .
A  suppressor can be प्रयुक्त  both with a firearm and with compressed air gun .
Though it is sometimes referred to as a silencer , this term is a misnomer  popularized by cinematic fiction : the ध्वनि of a प्रक्षेप्य , विशेषकर एक चलती तेज़ than the गति of ध्वनि , through the एयर can नहीं be eliminated  .
Using a suppressor in long distance shooting ( i.e . greater than 300 meters ) can lessen , or retard , the report at  the पल of प्रभाव , और बनाएँ  the impression of silence near the target .
The noise heard near the muzzle as a projectile leaves the barrel , though  subdued , is नहीं मूक at सब  .
A suppressor is usually a metal cylinder with internal mechanisms to reduce the sound of firing by slowing the escaping propellant gas  और sometimes by reducing the गति  of the bullet .
Early suppressors were created  around the शुरूआत of the 20th सदी  by several inventors .
American inventor Hiram Percy Maxim ( not to be confused with  hiram स्टीवंस कहावत , hiram पर्सी 's पिता , और the आविष्कारक of the कहावत यंत्र गन ) , is credited साथ inventing और  selling the first commercially successful models circa 1902 ( patented 30 March 1909 ) .
Maxim gave his device  the trademarked नाम कहावत  Silencer .
The muffler for internal combustion engines was developed in parallel with the firearm suppressor by Maxim in the early 20th century , using many of the same techniques to  provide quieter-running इंजन ( in अनेक यूरोपीय देशों ऑटोमोबाइल mufflers हैं स्टिल पुकारा silencers  ) .
The word silencer in reference to gun suppressor remains in widespread use , although it has since fallen out of favor with some , especially among the firearms industry , being replaced with the more literally accurate term sound suppressor or just suppressor , because a `` sound suppressor '' does not  `` खामोशी '' कोई हथियार , बल्कि it eliminates muzzle फ्लैश और reduces the सोनिक दबाव  of a firearm discharging .
Common usage  और u.S. विधान भाषा एहसान  the historically earlier term , silencer .
In U.S. law , the terms `` firearm  मफलर '' और `` firearm silencer  '' are synonymous .
Suppressors were regularly used by agents of the United States Office of Strategic Services , who favored the newly designed High Standard  hdm .22 long राइफल पिस्टल दौरान संसार  War II .
OSS  निदेशक विलियम जोसेफ `` जंगली  Bill '' Donovan demonstrated the pistol for President Franklin D. Roosevelt at the White House .
According to OSS research chief Stanley Lovell , Donovan ( an old and trusted friend of the President ) was  लहराया into the ओवल दफ्तर , जहाँ रूज़वेल्ट  was dictating a letter .
While Roosevelt finished his message , Donovan turned his back and fired ten shots into a  sandbag he था brought साथ उसे , घोषित कया he था किया और  handed the smoking gun to the astonished president .
The British SOE ( Special Operations Executive ) Welrod assassination pistol with an integral suppressor was  भी प्रयुक्त by the अमरीकी oss on clandestine परिचालन in नाजी occupied यूरोपीय दौरान the दूसरी  World War .
Beatrice `` Bea ''  आर्थर ( may 13 , 1922 – अप्रैल 25 , 2009 ) थी an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री  , comedienne , and singer whose career spanned seven decades .
Arthur achieved fame as the character Maude Findlay on the 1970s sitcoms  सब in the परिवार और maude , और as डोरोथी zbornak on the 1980s sitcom the सुनहरी  Girls , winning Emmy Awards for both roles .
A stage actress both before and after her television success , she won the Tony Award for Best Featured Actress in a Musical  लिये उसके प्रदर्शन as वीरा चार्ल्स in the असली  cast of Mame ( 1966 ) .
is a  2011 जापानी 3d computer-animated फिल्मी आधारित on the tekken  video game series , produced by Digital Frontier and distributed by Asmik Ace Entertainment in association with Bandai Entertainment .
The film premiered in North  अमेरिका by बंदाई entertainment on जुलाई 26 , 2011 , और in  Australia on July 27 , 2011 in a special exclusive one-off screening .
It was released  on सितंबर 3  , 2011 in Japan .
The  फिल्मी थी released on blu-ray डिस्क on नवम्बर  22 , 2011 for USA , and December 1 , 2011 for Japan .
This film was also released on DVD on November  22 , 2011 ( 2d संस्करण तभी )  .
The film was additionally included with the  प्लेस्टेशन 3 खेल , tekken संकर , और the निन्टेंडो 3ds  title , Tekken 3D : Prime Edition .
लिये a चर्चा of nonprofit , voluntary पड़ोस  advocacy groups , see neighborhood association .
In the United States , a homeowner association is a corporation formed by a  रियल एस्टेट डेवलपर लिये the purpose of विपणन , मैनेजिंग , और selling of घरों  and lots in a residential subdivision .
It grants the developer privileged voting rights in governing the association , while allowing the developer to exit financial and legal responsibility of the  संगठन , typically by transferring स्वामित्व of the संघ to the homeowners  after selling off a predetermined number of lots .
Membership in the  homeowners संघ by a आवासीय खरीदार is typically a कंडीशन  of purchase ; a buyer is n't given an option to reject it .
Most  homeowner एसोसिएशन हैं incorporated , और हैं विषय  to state statutes that govern non-profit corporations and homeowner associations .
State oversight of homeowner associations is minimal , and mainly takes  the रूप of कानून जिससे हैं असंगत  from state to state .
Some states , such as Florida and California , have a large body of homeowner association law , and some  राज्य , ऐसे as मैसाचुसेट्स , have वस्तुतः no homeowner  association law .
The fastest growing form of housing in the United States today is common-interest  developments ( cids ) , a श्रेणी कि शामिल planned-unit developments of single-family घरों , condominiums , और सहकारी  apartments .
चूंकि 1964 , homeowner एसोसिएशन  have become increasingly common in the USA .
The Community Associations Institute  व्यापार संघ अनुमानित कि hoas governed  24.8 million American homes and 62 million residents in 2010 .
a prize-winning  lilac-and-white Silkie
There are many breeds of Guinea pig which have  महरूम विकसित चूंकि इसके domestication ca . 5000 bc .
Breeds vary widely in  रूप और purpose , ranging इससे  show breeds with long , flowing hair to those in use as model organisms by science .
From ca . 1200 AD to the Spanish conquest of the Inca Empire in 1532 , selective breeding by  स्वदेशी दक्षिण अमरीकी peoples resulted in अनेक किस्में  of domestic Guinea pigs , which form the basis for some of the modern domestic breeds .
Early Andean  breeds यहूद primarily रखा as agricultural भण्डार लिये खाना , और प्रयत्न  at improving the Guinea pig as a food source continue to the modern era .
With the export of Guinea pigs to Europe in the  15th सदी , the लक्ष्य in प्रजनन shifted to फ़ोकस  on the development of appealing pets .
To this end ,  विभिन्न प्रतिस्पर्धी प्रजनन  organizations were founded by fanciers .
The American Cavy Breeders Association , an adjunct to the  अमरीकी खरगोश प्रजनक संघ  , is the governing body in the United States and Canada .
The  अंग्रेजों cavy परिषद governs  cavy clubs in the United Kingdom .
Similar organizations exist in Australia  ( ऑस्ट्रेलियाई नेशनल cavy परिषद ) और नई जीलैंड  ( New Zealand Cavy Club ) .
Each club  publishes इसके अपना मानक of पूर्णता  and determines which breeds are eligible for showing .
नई breeds continue  to emerge in the 21st century .
Though there are many breeds of  गिनी सुअर , तभी a few breeds हैं  commonly found on the show table as pets .
Most Guinea  सूअर मिला as पालतु यहूद either मिला अवांछनीय by प्रजनक or यहूद करवाया to  be pleasant pets regardless of how well they meet the breed standard of perfection .
The short hair , Abyssinian , Peruvian and  sheltie ( उर्फ silkie ) breeds हैं those  most frequently seen as pets , and the former three are the core breeds in the history of the competitive showing of Guinea pigs .
In addition to their standard  रूप , nearly सब breeds आइये in a  Satin variant .
Satins ,  due to उनके खोखला बाल shafts  , possess coats of a special gloss and shine .
However , there is growing evidence that the genes responsible for the  साटन कोट भी can कारण कठोर अस्थि समस्याएं  , including Osteodystrophy and Paget 's disease .
Showing Satin variations is prohibited by some cavy  प्रजनक ' एसोसिएशन क्युकी of एनिमल welfare कारण  .
All cavy breeds have  कुछ साझा सामान्य मानकों : the सिर प्रोफ़ाइल  should be rounded , with large eyes and large , smooth ears .
The body  चाहिए be दमदार और  of compact build .
Coat colour should in all variations be clearly defined and  thorough इससे रूट to टिप .
These standards are best met by  long स्थापित , commonly करवाया breeds , as  their breeders have had enough time and animals to effectively breed for these qualities .
The coat colour ideal of good definition and thoroughness is rarely met by other than the smooth coated  breeds , जिससे have था खूब स्थापित , पृथक प्रजनन लाइनों लिये अलग  colours .
State schools ( also known as public schools or government schools ) generally refer to primary  or द्वितीयक स्कूलों mandated लिये or offered to सब children बगैर चार्ज सशुल्क लिये , in पूरे or in  part , by taxation .
The term may also refer to institutions of post-secondary education funded , in whole or in part  , और overseen  by government .
the राइबोसोम assembles polymeric  protein molecules whose sequence is controlled by the sequence of messenger RNA molecules .
This is  जरूरी by सब जीना कोशिकाएं  and associated viruses .
The ribosome ( from ribonucleic acid and the Greek soma , meaning `` body '' ) is a large and complex molecular machine , found within all living cells ,  कि serves as the प्राथमिक साईट of biological प्रोटीन संश्लेषण ( अनुवाद  ) .
Ribosomes link amino acids together in the order specified by  मेसेंजर rna ( mrna ) अणुओं  .
Ribosomes consist of two major subunits—the small  ribosomal subunit पढ़े the mrna , जबकि the विशाल subunit  joins amino acids to form a polypeptide chain .
Each subunit is composed of one or more ribosomal RNA ( rRNA  ) अणुओं और a  variety of proteins .
The sequence of DNA encoding for a protein may be copied  अनेक टाइम्स into मेसेंजर rna ( mrna ) जंजीरों  of a similar sequence .
Ribosomes can bind to  an mrna कड़ी और उपयोग it as a टेम्पलेट लिये determining the सही  sequence of amino acids in a particular protein .
Amino acids are selected , collected and carried to the ribosome by transfer RNA ( tRNA molecules ) , which enter one  भाग of the राइबोसोम और bind to the मेसेंजर  RNA chain .
The  संलग्न अमीनो acids हैं तब linked  together by another part of the ribosome .
Once the protein is produced , it can then 'fold ' to produce a specific  कार्यात्मक three-dimensional ढांचा  .
A ribosome is made from complexes of  rnas और प्रोटीन और is इसलिए  a ribonucleoprotein .
Each ribosome is divided into two subunits : the smaller subunit  बांधता to the mrna पैटर्न , जबकि the larger subunit बांधता to the trna  and the amino acids .
When a ribosome  finishes पढना an mrna अणु , ये दो subunits विभाजित  apart .
Ribosomes are ribozymes , because the  catalytic peptidyl transferase कार्यकलाप कि कड़ी  amino acids together is performed by the ribosomal RNA .
Ribosomes from bacteria , archaea and eukaryotes ( the  तीन डोमेन of जीवन on धरती ) differ in उनके आकार , अनुक्रम  , structure , and the ratio of protein to RNA .
The differences in structure allow some antibiotics  to मार जीवाणु by inhibiting उनके ribosomes , जबकि  leaving human ribosomes unaffected .
In bacteria and archaea ,  अधिक than एक राइबोसोम may मूव साथ a सिंगल  mRNA chain at one time , each `` reading '' its sequence and producing a corresponding protein molecule .
The ribosomes in the mitochondria of eukaryotic cells  functionally resemble अनेक सुविधाएँ of those in जीवाणु  , reflecting the likely evolutionary origin of mitochondria .
Albert Claude , Christian de Duve ,  और जार्ज एमिल palade यहूद jointly  awarded the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine , in 1974 , for the discovery of the ribosomes .
The  नोबेल पुरस्कार in रसायन 2009 थी awarded to venkatraman  Ramakrishnan , Thomas A. Steitz and Ada E. Yonath for determining the detailed structure and mechanism of the ribosome .
The  सरलीकृत आतंरिक  structure of a chloroplast
Overview of the  calvin साईकिल और कार्बन  fixation
The  light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ of photosynthesis  are chemical reactions that convert carbon dioxide and other compounds into glucose .
These reactions occur in the stroma ,  the fluid-filled क्षेत्रफल  of a chloroplast outside of the thylakoid membranes .
These reactions take the light-dependent reactions and  perform further रासायनिक प्रक्रियाओं on उन्हें  .
There are three phases to the light-independent reactions , collectively  पुकारा the calvin साईकिल : कार्बन fixation , कटौती प्रतिक्रियाएँ , और ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate  ( RuBP ) regeneration .
Despite its name ,  इस प्रक्रम occurs तभी  when light is available .
पौधे do नहीं carry आउट the  Calvin cycle by night .
They ,  बजाय , रिलीज sucrose  into the phloem from their starch reserves .
This process happens when light is available independent of the kind of photosynthesis ( C3 carbon fixation , C4 carbon fixation , and Crassulacean Acid  चयापचय ) ; कैम पौधे स्टोर malic एसिड in उनके vacuoles  every night and release it by day in order to make this process work .
In mathematics , a square number or perfect square is an integer that is the square of  an पूर्णांक ; in अन्य शब्द , it is the उत्पाद of कुछ  integer with itself .
For example , 9 is a  वर्गाकार क्रमांक , चूंकि it can be  written as .
The usual notation for the formula for the square of a number is not the product , but the  समतुल्य घातांक , प्रायः सुनाया  as `` squared '' .
The name square number comes  इससे the नाम of the आकार ; देखिए  below .
वर्गाकार संख्याएँ हैं  non-negative .
another रास्ता of saying कि a ( non-negative ) क्रमांक is  a square number , is that its square roots are again integers .
लिये उदाहरण , = ±3 , so 9  is a square number .
A positive integer that  रै no पूर्ण वर्गाकार divisors मगर 1  is called square-free .
For a non-negative integer , the th square number is ,  साथ होने the zeroth वर्गाकार  .
The concept of square can be extended  to कुछ अन्य क्रमांक प्रणालियों  .
If rational numbers are included , then a  वर्गाकार is the अनुपात of दो वर्गाकार integers , और , conversely , the  ratio of two square integers is a square ( e.g. , 4/9 = ( 2/3 ) 2 ) .
starting साथ 1 , वहीँ हैं वर्गाकार संख्याएँ up to और सहित  , where the expression represents the floor of the number .
The Era of Good Feelings marked a period in  the राजनैतिक इतिहास of the संयुक्त राज्य कि reflected  a sense of national purpose and a desire for unity among Americans in the aftermath of the Napoleonic Wars .
The era saw the collapse of the Federalist Party and an end to the bitter partisan disputes between it and the dominant  democratic-republican पार्टी दौरान  the First Party System .
President James Monroe endeavored to downplay partisan affiliation in making his nominations , with the ultimate goal of national  एकता और eliminating पार्टियों altogether इससे नेशनल  politics .
The period is so closely associated with  मुनरो 's प्रेसिडेंसी ( 1817–1825 ) और उसके प्रशासनिक लक्ष्य कि उसके नाम और  the era are virtually synonymous .
The Era of Good Feelings  चिह्नित a परिवर्तन in अमरीकी  politics with the end of the Federalist Party as America began to develop after the War of 1812 .
जबकि अमेरिका थी experiencing विकास  and prosperity after the war with Britain , this era also marks the first instance of economic troubles in the growing United States .
Mirroring the American System proposed by Henry Clay , protective tariffs and the chartering of the Second Bank of the United States complicated  the टेंशन between the उत्तर और दक्षिण साथ the coming of the पहला वित्तीय संकट  .
While the term  “era of शुभ feelings” is प्रायः viewed साथ  irony because of the political turmoil , economic factors caused animosity between the North and South .
The designation of the period by historians as one of “good feelings” is often conveyed with irony or skepticism , as the history of the era was one in which the political atmosphere was strained and divisive ,  विशेषकर among गिरोहों भीतर the मुनरो प्रशासन और the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी  .
The phrase “Era of Good Feelings” was coined by Benjamin Russell , in the Boston Federalist newspaper , Columbian Centinel  , on जुलाई 12 , 1817 , following मुनरो 's विज़िट to बोस्टन , मैसाचुसेट्स as भाग  of his good will tour of America .
Mariel Margaret `` Mia '' Hamm ( born March 17 , 1972 ) is a retired  अमरीकी पेशेवर सॉकर  player .
Hamm played many years as a  आगे लिये the संयुक्त राज्य महिलाओं 's नेशनल  soccer team and was a founding member of the Washington Freedom .
Hamm scored 158 international goals , more than any other player , male or female , in the history of soccer and is the third most capped  मादा खिलाड़ी in सॉकर इतिहास पीछे kristine लिली और क्रिस्टी rampone , appearing  in 275 international matches .
Hamm was named the women 's FIFA World Player of the Year the first two times that  पुरस्कार थी दिए ( in 2001 और 2002 ) , और is सूचीबद्ध as एक of फीफा 's  125 best living players ( as chosen by Pelé ) .
She was inducted into the National  सॉकर हॉल of कीर्ति as खूब as the अलबामा खेल  Hall of Fame and Texas Sports Hall of Fame .
She is the author of Go For the Goal : A Champion 's Guide to Winning in Soccer  और जीवन और appeared in the  HBO documentary Dare to Dream : The Story of the U.S. Women 's Soccer Team .
Washington Post  columnist माइकल wilbon पुकारा hamm  , `` Perhaps the most important athlete of the last 15 years . ''
Hamm takes a  कोने  kick .
The New York Red Bulls is an American professional soccer team based  in हैरिसन , नई जर्सी , representing the नई  York metropolitan area .
the टोली competes in the पूर्वी  Conference of Major League Soccer ( MLS ) .
It is one of the ten charter clubs of MLS ,  having competed in the लीग चूंकि इसके  inception .
The team was a founding member of MLS ( 1996 ) , but has  गए through अनेक नाम परिवर्तन  .
The team  थी originally ज्ञात as the नई  York/New Jersey MetroStars through 1997 .
From the 1998 season through the 2005 season , the team  थी ज्ञात as the metrostars  .
On March 9 , 2006 , the team was  बेची to रेड सांड gmbh , अग्रणी  to the team 's current name .
They are the only original MLS franchise not  to have जीती कोई significant ट्रॉफी ( सहित नियमित  season , playoffs , and knockout competition ) since inception .
the टोली 's बेहतरीन  result in the MLS was the MLS Cup final in 2008 .
In  the us खोलें कप , the metrostars पहुँचे तीन semifinals  ( 1997 , 1998 , 2000 ) , before reaching their first final in 2003 , losing 1–0 to the Chicago Fire .
On August 26 , 2000 , the Metros ' Clint Mathis set an MLS record by scoring five  लक्ष्य in a खेल विरूद्ध the डलास  Burn .
Some well-known players that have played for the team include Giovanni Savarese , Tim Howard , Tony Meola , Tab Ramos , Alexi Lalas , Clint Mathis , Jozy  altidore , माइकल ब्राडली , क्लाउडियो reyna , एडी पोप , रॉबर्टो donadoni , lothar matthäus , एडोल्फो वालेंसिया  , Youri Djorkaeff , Amado Guevara , Juan Pablo Ángel , Thierry Henry , Juninho Pernambucano , Jan Gunnar Solli , Rafael Márquez , and Tim Cahill .
The team has also had well-known coaches , including  कार्लोस queiroz , कार्लोस अल्बर्टो parreira , बोरा  Milutinović , Bob Bradley , Mo Johnston , Bruce Arena and Hans Backe .
Confucianism , Taoism , and Buddhism are one , a painting in the litang  स्टाइल portraying तीन मेन हँस by a नदी स्ट्रीम , 12th सदी  , Song Dynasty .
Estimating the number of Buddhists in the world , or in many  देशों , is मुश्किल due to definitional मुद्दे as  well as practical problems of enumeration .
To begin with , the religious beliefs , practices , and identities of East Asians ( who comprise the majority of the world 's Buddhists by any measure ) often blend Buddhism with other  परंपराओं सहित confucianism , the चाइनीज लोक धर्म , daoism , shinto , और कोरियाई shamanism  .
सबसे अनुसरणकर्ता of buddhism do नहीं belong to संरचित congregations  , or observe a definite ritual of adherence such as taking Refuge , making it difficult to accurately estimate the number of practitioners .
An additional challenge is the hostility of several national  सरकारें ( प्रायः कम्युनिस्ट ones ऐसे as चीन  or North Korea ) to religion generally or to Buddhism specifically .
Government policies in these  देशों may प्रोत्साहित the under-reporting or non-reporting of धार्मिक adherence  , resulting in official totals that may drastically underestimate the number of religious practitioners in these countries .
Estimate of the  विश्वव्यापी बौद्ध जनसांख्यिकी दायरा इससे 350 लाख  to over one billion , but cluster nearer to the first figure .
Adherents.com ( as of 2012 )  suggests a फिगर of 397 लाख  .
By major  शाखाओं , the संख्याएँ हैं  as follows:
( 1 ) Mahayana Buddhism , including East Asian Buddhism , with no fewer than 185 million adherents , and possibly  अनेक टाइम्स कि अनेक ( again  , depending on definitional issues ) .
This  is the predominant रूप of buddhism  practiced in China , South Korea , Japan , Taiwan , Singapore , and Vietnam .
( 2 )  थेरवाद buddhism , साथ no कम than  125 million adherents .
This is the predominant form  of buddhism practiced in कंबोडिया , थाईलैंड  , Laos , Sri Lanka , and Burma .
( 3 ) Vajrayana  buddhism , साथ लगभग  20 million adherents .
This form predominates in the greater Tibetan and  मंगोलियाई regions , as खूब as in the  Himalayas .
Besides the  स्वतंत्र देशों of मंगोल और भूटान , और विभिन्न territories  within what is now western China , Vajrayana is traditional to certain regions of Russia ( e.g . Kalmykia , Buryatia ) , India ( e.g . Ladakh , Sikkim ) , and Nepal ( e.g . Khumbu ) .
Vajrayana , also known as Tibetan Buddhism , is often conflated with Tantric Buddhism  , लकिन इस is imprecise , as shingon और अन्य फ़ॉर्म of ईस्ट एशियाई buddhism भी  practice tantra .
At least 7 countries ( Sri Lanka , Thailand , Cambodia , Laos ,  बर्मा , भूटान , और मंगोल ) have unambiguous बौद्ध  majorities .
Depending on how one calculates Chinese and other East Asian adherents , this figure might  विस्तार to शामिल अनेक अधिक  countries .
In addition , Buddhism is the state religion of Cambodia and  भूटान , और receives prominent  mention in the constitutions of Thailand and Sri Lanka .
In northern  इण्डिया और नेपाल , the जमीन जहाँ buddhism  was born , the religion severely declined during the first millennium .
Whether this  मनाही थी due to the इस्लामी conquest of उत्तरी  India , or to other factors , remains controversial .
See the article  मनाही of buddhism  in India .
James  बटलर hickok ( may 27 , 1837 – अगस्त 2 ,  1876 ) , better known as Wild Bill Hickok , was a folk hero of the American Old West .
His skills as a gunfighter and scout , along  साथ उसके प्रतिष्ठा as a lawman , provided the आधार लिये उसके कीर्ति  , although some of his reported exploits are fictionalized .
born और उठाया on a फार्म in ग्रामीण इलिनोइस , hickok गई वेस्ट  at age 18 as a fugitive from justice , first working as a stagecoach driver , before he became a lawman in the frontier territories of Kansas and Nebraska .
He fought for the Union Army during the American Civil War , and gained publicity after the  युद्ध as a स्काउट , marksman , कर्ता , और पेशेवर  gambler .
Between his  law-enforcement कर्तव्य और जुए , जिससे easily  overlapped , Hickok was involved in several notable shootouts .
He was shot and killed while playing poker in the Nuttal &  मन 's सैलून in deadwood , डकोटा territory ( अभी  South Dakota ) .
कलाकार 's धारणा of  the Curiosity rover vaporizing rock on Mars .
The rover landed on Mars in  अगस्त 2012  .
A Mars rover is an  स्वचालित मोटर गाडी जिससे propels  itself across the surface of the planet Mars after landing .
Rovers have several advantages over stationary landers : they examine more  territory , वे can be निर्देशित to दिलचस्प सुविधाएँ , वे can प्लेस themselves in सनी स्थितियाँ to  weather winter months and they can advance the knowledge of how to perform very remote robotic vehicle control .
There have been four successful  robotically संचालित मंगल रोवर्स  .
The Jet  नोदन प्रयोगशाला प्रबंधित the  Mars Pathfinder mission and its now inactive Sojourner rover .
it फिलहाल manages the मंगल खोजी रोवर मिशन  's active Opportunity rover and inactive Spirit , and , as part of the Mars Science Laboratory mission , the Curiosity rover .
A financial audit  , or अधिक accurately , an ऑडिट of वित्तीय कथन  , is the verification of the financial statements of a legal entity , with a view to express an audit opinion .
The audit opinion is intended to  provide उचित परख , लकिन नहीं निरपेक्ष परख , कि the वित्तीय कथन  are presented fairly , in all material respects , and/or give a true and fair view in accordance with the financial reporting framework .
The purpose of an audit is provide and objective independent examination of the financial statements , which increases the value and  विश्वसनीयता of the वित्तीय कथन उत्पादित by प्रबन्धन , यूँ बढ़ाएँ उपयोक्ता विश्वास  in the financial statement , reduce investor risk and consequently reduce the cost of capital of the preparer of the financial statements .
Financial audits are typically performed by firms of practicing  लेखपाल जो हैं विशेषज्ञ in वित्तीय रिपोर्टिंग  .
The financial audit is one of many  परख कृत्यों provided by हिसाब  firms .
Many organizations separately employ or hire internal  auditors , जो do नहीं attest to वित्तीय रिपोर्ट्स लकिन फ़ोकस मुख्यतः  on the internal controls of the organization .
External auditors  may चुनें to प्लेस सीमित रिलायंस on  the work of internal auditors .
Auditing promotes transparency and accuracy in the financial disclosures made by an organization ,  इसलिए होता संभावित to reduce of ऐसे corporations to  conceal unscrupulous dealings .
internationally , the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मानकों on auditing ( isa ) जारी by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय auditing और  Assurance Standards Board ( IAASB ) is considered as the benchmark for audit process .
Almost all jurisdictions require auditors to follow the ISA or  a लोकल विभिन्नता of the  ISA .
Dollar coins have been minted in the  संयुक्त राज्य in सुनहरा , चांदी , और  base metal versions .
The term  चांदी डालर is प्रायः प्रयुक्त लिये कोई विशाल श्वेत  metal coin issued by the United States with a face value of one dollar , although purists insist that a dollar is not silver unless it contains some of that metal .
Silver dollars , the first dollar  सिक्का समस्या , यहूद minted शुरूआत in 1794  .
Gold dollars  और gold-colored डॉलर  have also been produced by the United States .
The Sacagawea and Presidential dollars are  प्रायः referred to as `` सुनहरी डॉलर  '' .
In modern times , dollar coins have not  महरूम बहुत लोकप्रिय in  the United States .
Despite efforts by  the सरकारी  to promote their use , most Americans currently use the one dollar bill rather than dollar coins .
In  सीधा और स्तर उड़ान लिफ्ट ( l  ) equals weight ( W ) .
In a banked  फेरे of 60° , लिफ्ट बराबरी  double the weight ( L=2W ) .
The pilot  अनुभवों 2g  and a doubled weight .
The steeper the bank ,  the वृहद  the g-forces .
इस top-fuel dragster can accelerate  from zero to in 0.86 seconds .
This is a horizontal  त्वरण of 5.3 g. संयुक्त साथ the लंबवत  g-force in the stationary case the Pythagorean theorem yields a g force of 5.4 g .
g-force ( with g from  गुरुत्वाकर्षक ) is a पद लिये accelerations लगा as  weight and measurable by accelerometers .
It is not a force , per se , but a  फ़ोर्स प्रति  unit mass .
Since such a force is perceived as a  वज़न , कोई g-force can be वर्णित as a `` वज़न प्रति ईकाई द्रव्यमान  '' ( see the synonym specific weight ) .
The g-force  त्वरण अधिनियमों as a गुणक of weight-like शक्तियां  for every unit of an object 's mass , and ( save for certain electromagnetic force influences ) is the cause of an object 's acceleration in relation to free-fall .
This acceleration experienced by an object is  due to the वेक्टर योग of non-gravitational शक्तियां  acting on an object free to move .
The accelerations that are not produced by gravity are termed  उचित accelerations , और it is तभी ये कि हैं measured  in g-force units .
They cause  तनावों और strains on  objects .
क्युकी of ये strains  , large g-forces may be destructive .
Gravitation acting alone does not produce a  g-force , भी हालांकि g-forces  are expressed in multiples of the acceleration of a standard gravity .
Thus , the standard gravitational  त्वरण at the धरती 's सतह produces g-force तभी indirectly  , as a result of resistance to it by mechanical forces .
the 1 g-force on an ऑब्जेक्ट बैठे on the धरती 's सतह is caused by mechanical  force exerted in the upward direction by the ground , keeping the object from going into free-fall .
The upward force from the ground ensures that an object at rest on the Earth 's surface is accelerating relative to the free-fall condition , which  is the पाथ कि the ऑब्जेक्ट होता follow जब गिरना freely toward  the Earth 's center .
Objects  अनुमत to free-fall in an inertial trajectory  under the influence of gravitation-only , feel no g-force .
This is demonstrated by the `` zero-g '' conditions inside a freely falling elevator falling toward the Earth  's बीच ( in वैक्यूम ) , or ( to शुभ सन्निकटन ) शर्तें अंदर  a spacecraft in Earth orbit .
These are examples of  निर्देशांक त्वरण ( a बदलें in गति  ) without a sensation of weight .
The  अनुभव of no g-force ( zero-g ) , however  it is produced , is synonymous with weightlessness .
In the absence of gravitational fields , or in directions at right angles to them , proper and coordinate accelerations are  the वही , और कोई निर्देशांक त्वरण जरूर be उत्पादित by a  corresponding g-force acceleration .
An example here is a rocket in free space , in which simple changes in  गति हैं उत्पादित by the इंजन  , and produce g-forces on the rocket and passengers .
An augur holding  a lituus , the curved wand प्रायः प्रयुक्त  as a symbol of augury on Roman coins
the augur थी a पुजारी और आधिकारिक in  the classical world , especially ancient Rome and Etruria .
His main role was to  interpret the होगा of the देवताओं by अध्ययन the उड़ान of पक्षियों : whether वे हैं उड़ती  in groups or alone , what noises they make as they fly , direction of flight and what kind of birds they are .
This  थी ज्ञात as  `` taking the auspices . ''
The ceremony and function of the augur was central to any major  undertaking in रोमन society—public or private—including  matters of war , commerce , and religion .
The Roman historian Livy stresses the importance of the augurs : `` Who  करता नहीं जान कि इस नगर थी संस्थापित तभी बाद लेने the auspices , कि सबकुछ in युद्ध और  in peace , at home and abroad , was done only after taking the auspices ? ''
Farmington Hills is an  affluent जातियाँ in southeastern  Michigan .
It is the second largest  नगर in ओकलैंड काउंटी  in the U.S. state of Michigan .
Its population was 79,740 at  the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  .
It is part of the  upscale northwestern उपनगरों of महानगर डेट्रॉयट और is भी पूर्वोत्तर  of downtown Ann Arbor .
Farmington Hills  consistently बाँधने as एक of the safest  cities in the United States , as well as in the state of Michigan .
In 2010 , the area  क्रमित as the 30th safest नगर  in America .
Although  the दो शहरों have पृथक सेवाएं और पता , farmington  and Farmington Hills are often thought of as the same community .
सुविधाएँ of the जातियाँ शामिल a recently संवर शहर  , boutiques , a vintage cinema , numerous restaurants , exotic car dealerships , art galleries , and public parks including Heritage Park .
There are several  ऐतिहासिक साइट सहित the  Longacre House and the Governor Warner Mansion .
Both cities are served by  farmington पब्लिक स्कूलों  .
farmington पहाड़ियाँ serves  as a major business center for the greater Detroit area .
present-day छाप  of a Late Bronze Age seal
Town seal (  मेट्रिक्स ) of náchod  from 1570
A seal is a device for making an  छाप in मोम , मिट्टी , पेपर , or कुछ अन्य  medium , including an embossment on paper , and is also the impression thus made .
The original purpose was to authenticate a document , a  wrapper लिये एक ऐसे as a आधुनिक लिफाफा , or the कवर of a संग्राहक  or package holding valuables or other objects .
the sealing प्रक्रम is essentially कि of a सांचे , साथ  the final image represented on the device for making the impression by a mirror-image design , incised in sunken- ( or counter- ) relief or intaglio .
The seal-making device is also  referred to as the मुहर मेट्रिक्स or die ; the imprint it creates as the मुहर छाप  ( or , more rarely , the sealing ) .
If the impression is made purely as a relief resulting from the greater pressure on the  पेपर जहाँ the ऊँची भाग of the मेट्रिक्स टच , the मुहर is ज्ञात as a शुष्क मुहर ; in सब अन्य मामले a द्रव or liquified मीडियम (  such as ink or wax ) is used , usually in another color than the paper .
For legal  उद्देश्य , the परिभाषा of a मुहर may be  extended to include rubber stamps , or writing specified words ( `` seal '' or `` L.S . `` ) .
In the United States , the word `` seal '' is sometimes assigned to a facsimile of the seal design ( in monochrome or color ) , which may be  प्रयुक्त in a किस्में of contexts सहित architectural जमावट , on ध्वज , or on आधिकारिक letterheads  .
Thus , for example , the Great Seal of the United States , among other uses , appears  on the रिवर्स of the one-dollar विधेयक ; और अनेक of  the seals of the U.S. states appear on their respective state flags .
In Europe , although coats of arms and heraldic badges may well feature in such contexts as well as on  seals , the मुहर डिज़ाइन in इसके entirety rarely appears as an  emblem .
The  पढ़ाई of seals is ज्ञात as sigillography  or sphragistics .
Groundhog Day (  पेन्सिलवेनिया जर्मनी : grundsaudaag  , Murmeltiertag ) is a day celebrated on February 2 .
According to folklore , if it is cloudy when a groundhog emerges from its burrow on this day , then spring will come early ; if it is  सनी , the groundhog होगा माना देखिए इसके छाया और रिट्रीट वापस into इसके burrow , और the शीत मौसम होगा continue लिये  six more weeks .
आधुनिक कस्टम of the अवकाश involve जश्न  where early morning festivals are held to watch the groundhog emerging from its burrow .
In southeastern  पेन्सिलवेनिया , groundhog lodges ( grundsow lodges ) celebrate  the holiday with fersommlinge , social events in which food is served , speeches are made , and one or more g'spiel ( plays or skits ) are performed for entertainment .
The Pennsylvania German dialect is the only  भाषा बोला at the इवेंट , और those जो बोलो अंग्रेज़ी अदा a दंड , प्रायः in the रूप of  a nickel , dime , or quarter per word spoken , with the money put into a bowl in the center of the table .
The largest  groundhog दिन जश्न is आयोजित  in Punxsutawney , Pennsylvania .
Groundhog Day , already a widely recognized and popular tradition , received widespread attention as a result  of the 1993 फिल्मी groundhog दिन , जिससे थी नियत in punxsutawney , pa ( हालांकि फिल्माया primarily in वुडस्टॉक , il )  and portrayed Punxsutawney Phil .
ऊँची रेज़ोल्यूशन  image of Tampa Bay region
The Tampa Bay area has a humid subtropical climate (  koppen cfa ) , साथ गरम और आर्द्र ग्रीष्म साथ बारंबार thunderstorms और drier सर्दियों  with freezing temperatures occurring every 2–3 years .
The area experiences a significant summer wet season , as nearly  two-thirds of the सालाना वर्षण जलप्रपात in  the months of June through September .
The area is listed by the United States Department of Agriculture ( USDA ) as being  in hardiness मण्डल 10 , जिससे is परिचय the उत्तरी सीमा of जहाँ नारियल हथेलियां और royal  palms can be grown .
Highs usually range between  65 और 95 °f  ( 18 and 35 °C ) year round .
Though known for hot summers , Tampa 's official high has  never पहुँचे 100 °f ( 38 °c ) – the नगर 's all-time  record temperature is 99 °F ( 37 °C ) .
St. Petersburg 's all-time record high  is exactly 100 °f ( 38 °c )  .
Pinellas County lies on a peninsula between Tampa Bay and the  गल्फ of मैक्सिको , और much of the  city of Tampa lies on a smaller peninsula jutting out into Tampa Bay .
This  निकटता to विशाल लाशें of जल दोनो नरमपंथियों  temperatures and introduces large amounts of humidity into the atmosphere .
In general , the local communities  farthest इससे the coast have larger तापमान सीमाएँ  , both during a single day and throughout the seasons of the year .
A diagram of the electromagnetic spectrum  , प्रर्दशित विभिन्न गुण आरपार  the range of frequencies and wavelengths
The electromagnetic spectrum is the range of  सब संभावित बारंबारता of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  radiation .
The ``  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम '' of an ऑब्जेक्ट रै a अलग अर्थ  , and is instead the characteristic distribution of electromagnetic radiation emitted or absorbed by that particular object .
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the low frequencies used for  आधुनिक रेडियो संचार to गामा विकिरण at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency  ) end , thereby covering wavelengths from thousands of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom .
The limit for long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself , while it is thought  कि the छोटी wavelength सीमा is in the vicinity of the प्लांक लंबाई  , although in principle the spectrum is infinite and continuous .
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum are used in science for  spectroscopic और अन्य probing interactions , as तरीके to  study and characterize matter .
In  जोड , विकिरण इससे विभिन्न भाग of the  spectrum has found many other uses for communications and manufacturing ( see electromagnetic radiation for more applications ) .
लेजेंड
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30 , 1882 – April 12 , 1945 ) , also known by his initials  , fdr , थी the 32nd अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1933–1945 ) और a सेंट्रल फिगर in संसार  events during the mid-20th century , leading the United States during a time of worldwide economic depression and total war .
A dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the only American president elected to more than two terms , he built a New  सौदे गठबन्धन कि realigned अमरीकी राजनीती बाद 1932 , as उसके घरेलू नीतियों पारिभाषित  American liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century .
With the bouncy popular song `` Happy Days Are Here Again `` as his campaign theme , FDR defeated incumbent  रिपब्लिकन हर्बर्ट हूवर in नवम्बर 1932 , at the गहराई of the ग्रेट  Depression .
Energized by his personal victory over polio , FDR 's unfailing  आशावाद और सक्रियता contributed to a नवीकरण of the नेशनल स्पिरिट  .
he worked closely साथ अंग्रेजों प्रधान मंत्री विंस्टन चर्चिल और सोवियत सामान्य सचिव जोसेफ  Stalin in leading the Allies against Germany and Japan in World War II , and restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy .
In his first hundred days in office , which began March 4  , 1933 , रूज़वेल्ट पथप्रदर्शन प्रमुख विधान और जारी a profusion of कार्यपालिका आदेश कि instituted the  New Deal —a variety of programs designed to produce relief ( government jobs for the unemployed ) , recovery ( economic growth ) , and reform ( through regulation of Wall Street , banks and transportation ) .
The economy improved  rapidly इससे 1933 to 1937 , लकिन तब  relapsed into a deep recession .
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his packing the Supreme Court or passing any  considerable विधान ; it abolished अनेक of the राहत कार्यक्रम जब बेरोजगारी  diminished during World War II .
Most of  the regulations on कारोबार यहूद ended परिचय 1975–85 , मगर लिये the विनियमन  of Wall Street by the Securities and Exchange Commission , which still exists .
Along with several smaller programs , major surviving programs include the Federal  जमा बीमे निगम , जिससे थी निर्मित in 1933 , और सोशल सुरक्षा  , which Congress passed in 1935 .
As World War II loomed after 1938 ,  साथ the जापानी आक्रमण of चीन और the आक्रामकता of नाजी जर्मनी , fdr  gave strong diplomatic and financial support to China and Great Britain , while remaining officially neutral .
His goal was to make America the `` Arsenal of  लोकतंत्र `` जिससे होता सप्लाई munitions  to the Allies .
In  कूच 1941 , रूज़वेल्ट , साथ congressional स्वीकृति , provided  Lend-Lease aid to the countries fighting against Nazi Germany with Britain .
With very strong national support , he made war on Japan and Germany after the Japanese attack on Pearl  हार्बर on दिसम्बर 7 , 1941 , कॉलिंग it a `` तिथि जिससे  will live in infamy `` .
He supervised the mobilization of the U.S.  अर्थव्यवस्था to support the अलाइड युद्ध प्रयत्न .
As an active military leader ,  रूज़वेल्ट implemented an overall युद्ध रणनीति on दो fronts कि ended in the शिकस्त of the  Axis Powers and the development of the world 's first atom bomb .
In  1942 रूज़वेल्ट ordered the internment of  100,000 Japanese American civilians .
Unemployment dropped to 2 % , relief programs largely ended , and the industrial economy grew rapidly to new heights as  लाखो of लोगों स्थानांतरित to नई कार्य in युद्ध centers , और 16 लाख मेन और 300,000 महिलाओं यहूद drafted  or volunteered for military service .
Roosevelt dominated the American political scene not only during  the बारह सालो of उसके  presidency , but also for decades afterward .
He orchestrated the realignment of voters  कि निर्मित the पांचवां  Party System .
FDR 's New Deal Coalition united labor unions , big city machines  , श्वेत ethnics  , African Americans and rural white Southerners .
He  भी बहकावे the बाद सृष्टि of  the United Nations and Bretton Woods .
Roosevelt is consistently rated by scholars as one of the top three U.S. Presidents , along with Abraham Lincoln  और जार्ज वॉशिंगटन  .
A liberal Democrat , Roosevelt  पारिभाषित उसके वैचारिक स्थिति  as `` a little left of center . ''
A Joint Committee is a term in politics that is used to refer to a committee made up of  सदस्यों of दोनो कक्षों of a bicameral विधानमंडल  .
In other contexts , it refers to a  कमेटी साथ सदस्यों इससे अधिक  than one organization .
The regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated powers of the federal government ; Under the Tenth Amendment  to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान , it is इसलिए exclusively the डोमेन of the राज्य to परमिट , prohibit , or वरना विनियमित वाणिज्यिक sex , मगर  insofar as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the Mann Act .
In most  राज्य , वेश्यावृति is माना a misdemeanor in the श्रेणी  of public order crime , a crime that disrupts the order of a community .
It was at one  समय माना to  be a vagrancy crime .
Currently , Nevada is the only state to allow brothel prostitution , the  शर्तें of जिससे हैं stipulated in the नेवाडा संशोधित  Statutes .
Only 8 counties  फिलहाल contain क्रियाशील brothels  .
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las Vegas–Paradise metropolitan area ) , Washoe  काउंटी ( जिससे contains रेनो ) , कार्सन नगर , डगलस काउंटी  , and Lincoln County .
The other counties theoretically allow  वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति , लकिन कुछ of ये काउंटी  currently have no active brothels .
Street prostitution , `` pandering , '' and living off of the proceeds of a  वेश्या remain illegal अंतर्गत नेवाडा विधि , as elsewhere in the देश  .
As with other  देशों , वेश्यावृति in the संयुक्त  States can be divided into three broad categories : street prostitution , brothel prostitution , and escort prostitution .
The national flag of the United States of America , often simply referred to as the American flag , consists of thirteen equal horizontal stripes of red ( top and bottom ) alternating with white , with a blue rectangle  in the कैण्टन ( referred to specifically as the `` संघ '' ) bearing पचास छोटी , श्वेत , five-pointed सितारों arranged in नौ ऑफसेट आड़ा पंक्ति of छह सितारों ( शीर्ष और  bottom ) alternating with rows of five stars .
The 50 stars on the flag represent the 50 states of the United States of America and the 13 stripes represent the thirteen  अंग्रेजों colonies कि घोषित स्वतंत्रता इससे the किंगडम of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और became the  first states in the Union .
Nicknames for the flag include the `` Stars and Stripes  '' , `` बूढ़ा महिमा `` , और `` the star-spangled  Banner . ''
India is a federal union of states comprising  twenty-eight राज्य और सात संघ territories  .
The states and territories are further  subdivided into जिले और so  on .
congressional जिले  for the 113th United States Congress
2010 Census  change:
Change in apportionment of congressional districts , starting in 2013 , as a  परिणाम of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी .
2000 Census  change:
Change in apportionment of congressional  जिले , इससे 2003 to 2013 , as a परिणाम of  the 2000 census .
This is a complete list of congressional districts  लिये प्रतिनिधित्व in the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस  of Representatives .
The quantity ( apportionment ) and boundaries ( redistricting ) of districts are determined after  प्रत्येक जनसांख्यिकी , हालांकि in कुछ मामले राज्य have बदला the सीमाएँ अधिक than एकबार  per census .
This list includes the 435 current  और over 200 obsolete  districts .
For example , since the 2000 census , Nebraska has had three  जिले , लकिन it प्रयुक्त to have  as many as six .
In the first decade of  the twenty-first सदी , टेक्सास था 32 जिले , लकिन रै चूंकि  added four due to reapportionment as a result of the 2010 census .
अन्य राज्य have खोया जिले चूंकि the  number of congressional seats has been set at 435 by statute .
Also included here are  non-voting delegations : छह वर्तमान  and four obsolete .
The boundaries of  जिले प्रायः शिफ़्ट साथ प्रत्येक redistricting  .
Over time , the region and  जनसांख्यिकी represented in a ज़िला  can change substantially .
Furthermore , districts sometimes retain the same boundaries while  बदलना उनके ज़िला संख्याएँ  .
Mariah Carey ( born March 27 , 1970 ) is an American singer , songwriter ,  रिकार्ड निर्माता , अभिनेत्री , और लोकसेवक  .
Under the guidance of Columbia Records executive  टॉमी mottola , कैरी released उसके self-titled डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम mariah कैरी  in 1990 ; it went multi-platinum and spawned four consecutive number one singles on the U.S . Billboard Hot 100 chart .
following उसके विवाह to mottola in 1993 और कामयाबी  with hit records Emotions ( 1991 ) , Music Box ( 1993 ) , and Merry Christmas ( 1994 ) , Carey was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act .
daydream ( 1995 ) बना म्यूज़िक इतिहास जब इसके दूसरी सिंगल `` एक मीठी  Day `` , a duet with Boyz II Men , spent a record sixteen weeks on top of the Billboard Hot 100 , and remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart history .
During the recording of the album , Carey began to deviate from her R & B and pop  beginnings और धीरे  traversed into hip hop .
This musical change became  evident साथ the रिलीज of तितली ( 1997 ) , at जिससे  time Carey had separated from Mottola .
Carey left Columbia in  2000 , और हस्ताक्षरित a record-breaking  $ 100 million recording contract with Virgin Records .
Before the release of her first  विशेषता फिल्मी glitter ( 2001 ) , वो suffered a शारीरिक  and emotional breakdown and was hospitalized for severe exhaustion .
Following the film 's poor  रिसेप्शन , वो थी खरीदा आउट of उसके रिकॉर्डिंग  contract for $ 50 million , which led to a decline in her career .
वो हस्ताक्षरित a multi-million डालर अनुबंध सौदे साथ द्वीप  Records in 2002 , and after an unsuccessful period , returned to the top of music charts with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ) .
Its second single `` We Belong Together `` became her most  कामयाब सिंगल of the 2000s , और थी बाद नामित `` सोंग of the दशक ''  by Billboard .
Carey once again ventured into film with a well-received starring role in ( 2009 ) ; she was awarded the `` Breakthrough Performance  पुरस्कार '' at the ताड़ स्रोतों अंतरराष्ट्रीय फिल्मी पर्व , और ब्लैक रील और naacp चित्र पुरस्कार  nominations .
In a career spanning over two decades , Carey has sold more than 200 million records worldwide , making her one of the  best-selling म्यूज़िक कलाकारों of सब  time .
In 1998 , she was  सम्मानित as the संसार 's best-selling  recording artist of the 1990s at the World Music Awards .
Carey was also named the  best-selling मादा कलाकार of the  millennium in 2000 .
According to the Recording Industry Association of America , she is the third best-selling female artist in the United  राज्य , साथ 63.5 लाख certified  albums .
साथ the रिलीज of `` टच my देह `` ( 2008 ) , कैरी  gained her eighteenth number one single in the United States , more than any other solo artist .
In 2012 ,  कैरी थी क्रमित दूसरी on vh1 's सूची of the  `` 100 Greatest Women in Music '' .
Aside from her commercial  accomplishments , कैरी रै जीती पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , 17 संसार  Music Awards , 11 American Music Awards , and 31 Billboard Music Awards .
Referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the Guinness  संसार रिकॉर्ड , वो is famed लिये उसके five-octave गायन दायरा , शक्ति  , melismatic style and signature use of the whistle register .
Stratocumulus  stratiformis  cumulogenitus
In meteorology , a cloud is a  दृश्य द्रव्यमान of द्रव droplets or frozen  crystals made of water or various chemicals suspended in the atmosphere above the surface of a planetary body .
These suspended  अणु हैं भी  known as aerosols .
Clouds in  धरती 's माहौल हैं पढ़ाई  in the cloud physics branch of meteorology .
Two processes , possibly acting together , can lead to air  बनने संतृप्त ; कूलिंग the  air or adding water vapor to the air .
In general , precipitation  होगा पतन to the सतह ; an एक्सेप्शन is virga  , which evaporates before reaching the surface .
The international cloud classification system is based on the fact clouds in their most basic forms can show free-convective upward growth like cumulus ,  appear in non-convective परतदार चादरें ऐसे as स्ट्रेट्स , or लो the रूप of  thin fibrous wisps , as in the case of cirrus .
Prefixes  हैं प्रयुक्त in कनेक्शन साथ बादल to एक्स्प्रेस विसंगतियाँ  or complexities in these basic forms or to specify middle or high altitude ranges .
These include strato- for low clouds with limited convection that form mostly in uneven layers , cumulo- for complex highly-convective storm clouds , nimbo- for thick  परतदार बादल of कुछ जटिलता कि can उपज मॉडरेट  to heavy precipitation , alto- for middle clouds , and cirro- for high clouds ; the latter two of which may be of simple or moderately complex structure .
Whether or not a cloud is low ,  मध्य , or ऊँची स्तर depends on कैसा दूर ऊपर  the ground its base forms .
Cloud types with significant vertical  extent can रूप in the कम or मध्य ऊँचाई सीमाएँ depending  on the moisture content of the air .
Clouds in the  क्षोभमण्डल have लैटिन names due to the  popular adaptation of Luke Howard 's cloud categorization system , which began to spread in popularity during December 1802 .
Synoptic  सतह मौसम observations उपयोग कोड संख्याएँ to रिकार्ड  and report the types of tropospheric cloud visible at each scheduled observation time based on the height and physical appearance of the clouds .
While a majority of  बादल रूप in धरती 's क्षोभमण्डल , वहीँ हैं अवसरों  when clouds in the stratosphere and mesosphere can be observed .
These  तीन प्रमुख परतों of the माहौल जहाँ  clouds may be seen are collectively known as the homosphere .
Above this lies the  thermosphere और exosphere , जिससे साथ मेक up  the heterosphere that marks the transition to outer space .
Clouds have been observed on other planets and moons within the Solar System ,  लकिन , due to उनके अलग तापमान विशेषताएँ , वे हैं रचित of अन्य substances ऐसे  as methane , ammonia , and sulfuric acid .
Galveston County is a county located in the  u.S. राज्य of टेक्सास भीतर the houston–sugar  Land–Baytown metropolitan area .
As of the 2010 census , the  जनसांख्यिकी थी 291,309  .
इसके काउंटी सीट  is Galveston .
League City is the largest city in Galveston County in terms of  जनसांख्यिकी ; url_http between 2000 और 2005 it surpassed  Galveston as the county 's largest city .
Galveston County was  संस्थापित in 1838  .

The following table lists the city or town name , the geographic coordinates , the  जनसांख्यिकी as of the 1990 जनसांख्यिकी , an अनुमान  of the population as of 2009 , and the island name .
The Big Ten Conference , formerly Western Conference and Big Nine Conference , is the oldest  प्रभाग i कॉलेज एथलेटिक सम्मेलन in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
Its twelve member institutions ( which are primarily flagship research universities in their respective states ,  well-regarded academically , और साथ अपेक्षाकृत विशाल छात्र नामांकन ) हैं स्तिथ primarily in the मिडवेस्ट , stretching इससे नेब्रास्का in the वेस्ट  to Penn State in the east .
The conference competes in  the ncaa 's प्रभाग i ; इसके फ़ुटबॉल टीमों compete in the फ़ुटबॉल कटोरी subdivision  ( FBS ) , formerly known as Division I-A , the highest level of NCAA competition in that sport .
Member schools of the Big Ten ( or , in  दो मामले , उनके जनक विश्वविद्यालयों प्रणालियों ) भी हैं सदस्यों of the  Committee on Institutional Cooperation , a leading educational and research consortium .
Despite the conference 's name , the Big Ten actually consists  of 12 स्कूलों , following the जोड of the पेन्सिलवेनिया  State University in 1993 and the University of Nebraska–Lincoln in 2011 .
In 2014  , the सम्मेलन होगा विस्तार to 14 सदस्यों साथ  the additions of the University of Maryland , College Park and Rutgers , The State University of New Jersey .
It is not to be confused with the Big 12  सम्मेलन , जिससे रै तभी टेन स्कूलों और represents a अलग  region of the country .
Single Malt Scotch is single malt whisky made in Scotland using a pot still distillation process at a  सिंगल डिस्टिलरी , साथ malted जौ as the तभी अनाज  ingredient .
As with any  स्कॉच व्हिस्की , a सिंगल malt स्कॉच जरूर be आसुत in स्कॉटलैंड  and matured in oak casks in Scotland for at least three years ( most single malts are matured longer ) .
`` Malt '' indicates that the whisky is  आसुत इससे a `` malted '' अनाज  .
Several types of grains can be malted ( for example , barley ,  rye और गेहूं हैं सब दाने जिससे can be malted ) ; however ,  in the case of single malt Scotch , barley is always the only grain used .
`` Single '' indicates  कि सब the malts in the बोतल  come from a single distillery .
Bottlings containing malt whisky from  अनेक distilleries हैं पुकारा `` blended  malt `` .
Until the Scotch Whisky Regulations 2009 ( SWR 2009 ) , the word ``  blended '' तभी appeared ( in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of स्कॉच व्हिस्की ) on बोतलों of व्हिस्की कि contained a मिश्रण of  both barley and non-barley grain whisky , but this is no longer the case .
Under the terminology established by the SWR 2009 , a `` blended malt Scotch whisky '' is a mixture of single malt Scotch whiskies , not a mixture of malted barley whisky and non-barley  व्हिस्की ; those हैं पुकारा `` blended स्कॉच व्हिस्की '' , बगैर  the word `` malt '' .
The term `` blended malt '' replaced `` vatted  malt '' प्रयुक्त अंतर्गत the prior  labelling conventions .
The age statement on a bottle of single malt Scotch is the number  of सालो the व्हिस्की खर्च maturing in  cask .
As  बहुत few whiskies हैं बोतलबंद इससे a सिंगल cask  the age statement reflects the age of the youngest malt in the mix .
A texture may be arranged so as to , `` closely  दृष्टिकोण the single-object औकात of fused-ensemble timbres , लिये उदाहरण , the खूबसूरत 'northern लाइट्स ' कॉर्ड ... , in a बहुत दिलचस्प  distribution of pitches , produces a fused sound supported by a suspended cymbal roll `` ( Erickson ( 1975 ) , p.166 & 168 ) .
In contrast to more traditional musical textures , sound mass composition `` minimizes the importance of individual pitches in preference for texture  , timbre , और डायनामिक्स as प्राथमिक shapers of भाव  and impact . ''
Developed from the modernist tone clusters and  स्प्रेड to orchestral लिखने by the लेट 1950s और 1960s , sound-mass `` obscures  the boundary between sound and noise `` ( Edwards 2001 , pp . 326–27 ) .
Techniques which may create or be used with  ध्वनि द्रव्यमान शामिल विस्तारित तकनीकों ऐसे as मूक पीतल or स्ट्रिंग्स ,  flutter tonguing , wide vibrato , extreme ranges , and glissandos .
Composers and works include Barbara Kolb , Pauline Oliveros ' Sound Patterns  लिये कोरस ( 1961 ) , norma beecroft 's इससे सपनो of पीतल लिये  chorus ( 1963–1964 ) , and Nancy Van de Vate .
Beecroft `` blurs individual pitches in favor of a collective timbre through the use of vocal and  इंस्ट्रूमेंटल क्लस्टर , choral वाक , narrator  , and a wash of sounds from an electronic tape . ''
( ibid  )
A very early example is the opening of Jean-Féry Rebel 's ballet Les Elémens (  1737–38 ) , जहाँ अराजकता is represented by a धीरे cumulating  orchestral cluster of all seven notes of the D minor scale ( Henck 2004 , pp . 52–54 ) .
A later example is the third movement of Ruth Crawford Seeger 's String Quartet  1931 ( nonesuch h-71280 ) जबकि अधिक recently  Phill Niblock 's multiple drone based music serves as an example .
The use of `` chords approaching timbres '' begins with Debussy and  edgard varèse प्रायः carefully scored व्यक्तिगत इंस्ट्रूमेंटल भाग so कि वे होता फ्यूज into  one ensemble timbre or sound mass ( Erickson 1975 , pp . 18 and 21 ) .
Other examples include European  `` textural '' रचनाएं of the fifties और sixties ऐसे  as Krzysztof Penderecki 's Threnody to the Victims of Hiroshima ( 1959 ) and György Ligeti 's works featuring micropolyphony in works like Atmosphères ( 1961 ) and his Requiem ( 1963-65 ) .
Other composers with works using this technique include Henryk  górecki , karel husa , witold lutosławski , kazimierz serocki  , and Steven Stucky .
ध्वनि द्रव्यमान तकनीकों भी appear  in the music of George Crumb ( Anon . n.d. ) .
