The Jewish tradition and use of kosher  वाइन is डेटिंग वापस to biblical  times .
The long history of the use and production of wine  throughout प्राचीन इसराईल is समर्थित up by पुरातत्त्व  evidence .
भीतर the यहूदी  diaspora communities all around the globe , the traditional and religious use of kosher wine continued to this day .
Wine , linked in myth to Dionysus / Bacchus , was common in ancient Greece and Rome , and many of today 's  प्रमुख wine-producing regions of पश्चिमी यूरोपीय यहूद स्थापित  with Phoenician and , later , Roman plantations .
winemaking प्रौद्योगिकी improved considerably दौरान the समय of the रोमन साम्राज्य : अनेक अंगूर किस्में  and cultivation techniques were known ; the design of the wine press advanced ; and barrels were developed for storing and shipping wine .
Rashi , a medieval  फ्रेंच रब्बी और पुकारा the `` पिता '' of सब टीका  that followed on the Talmud and the Tanakh , earned his living as a vintner .
Following the  मनाही of रोम और इसके industrial-scale वाइन उत्पादन लिये निर्यात , the ईसाई  Church in medieval Europe also became a firm supporter of wine , necessary for celebration of the Catholic Mass . Whereas wine was forbidden in medieval Islamic cultures , its use in Christian libation was widely tolerated .
Geber and other Muslim chemists pioneered the distillation of wine for  इस्लामी औषधीय और औद्योगिक उद्देश्य ऐसे as परफ्यूम .
Wine production gradually increased , with consumption  burgeoning इससे the 15th  century onwards .
Wine  उत्पादन बच the विनाशकारी phylloxera जूं  of 1887 and eventually spread to numerous regions throughout the world .
जिले of वेस्ट बंगाल
The Indian state of West Bengal borders with Nepal , Bhutan , Bangladesh and the Indian states of Bihar , Jharkhand  , odisha , असम और सिक्किम  .
The Himalayas lies in the north of the state and  the खाड़ी of बंगाल is at the  south .
In between them , the river Ganges flows eastwards and its  प्रमुख distributary , the हुगली नदी , बहती दक्षिण to पहुँचें  the Bay of Bengal .
The  सिलीगुड़ी corridor , जिससे connects  North-East India with rest of the India , lies in the North Bengal region of the state .
geographically , वेस्ट बंगाल is विभाजित into a किस्में of regions— दार्जिलिंग हिमालयी हिल प्रदेश  , Terai and Doors region , North Bengal plains , Rarh region , Western plateau and high lands , coastal plains , Sunderbans and the Ganges Delta .
In 1947 , when India gained independence , the state of West Bengal was  formed साथ 14 जिले , as प्रति विभाजन योजना of the तब बंगाल प्रांत  of British India .
The former princely state Koch Bihar joined as a district in 1950 , and the former French enclave  chandannagore joined as भाग of the हुगली ज़िला  in 1954 .
The States Reorganisation Act of 1956 led to addition of Purulia district to the  राज्य और to enlargement of  West Dinajpur district .
Later ,  larger जिले  such as West Dinajpur , 24 Parganas and Midnapore were bifurcated .
वेस्ट बंगाल is अभी विभाजित  into nineteen districts under three divisions .
Districts  हैं administered  by District Magistrates , and divisions are administered by Divisional Commissioners .
कोलकाता , the पूंजी  of the state , constitutes the Kolkata district .
Other districts are further divided into administrative units such as  subdivisions और ब्लॉक , administered  by SDO and BDO , respectively .
The Panchayati Raj has a three-tier  ढांचा in the राज्य  .
The  परमाणु ईकाई is पुकारा a ग्राम पंचायत ,  which is the Panchayat organization for a collection of villages .
The block-level  संगठन हैं पुकारा पंचायत samiti  , and the district-level organizations are named Zilla Parishad .
The Caribbean ( or ; ; ; or more commonly Antilles ) is a region that consists of the Caribbean Sea , its islands ( some surrounded by the  caribbean समुद्र और कुछ bordering दोनो the caribbean समुद्र और the उत्तर  Atlantic Ocean ) , and the surrounding coasts .
The region is southeast of the Gulf of Mexico and the North American mainland , east of Central  अमेरिका , और उत्तर of दक्षिण अमेरिका  .
Situated largely on the Caribbean Plate , the  प्रदेश comprises अधिक than 700 आइलैंड्स  , islets , reefs , and cays .
( See the  सूची .  )
These islands generally form island arcs  कि delineate the पूर्वी और  northern edges of the Caribbean Sea .
The Caribbean islands ,  consisting of the वृहद antilles on the उत्तर और the lesser antilles on the दक्षिण और ईस्ट ( सहित the leeward antilles ) , हैं भाग of the somewhat larger  West Indies grouping , which also includes the Lucayan Archipelago ( comprising the Bahamas and Turks and Caicos Islands ) north of the Greater Antilles and Caribbean Sea .
In a wider sense , the mainland countries of Belize and Guyana –  historically और culturally भाग of the अंग्रेजों वेस्ट  Indies – may be included .
Geopolitically , the Caribbean islands are usually regarded as a subregion of North America and are organized into 30 territories including sovereign states , overseas departments , and  dependencies .
From January 3 , 1958 , to May 31 ,  1962 , वहीँ थी a short-lived देश पुकारा the संघ of  the West Indies composed of ten English-speaking Caribbean territories , all of which were then UK dependencies .
The West Indies cricket  टोली continues to represent अनेक  of those nations .
This is a list of the 221 towns and 13 cities  in the u.S. राज्य of  New Hampshire .
For each town/city , the table lists the county to which it belongs ,  इसके तिथि of incorporation , इसके जनसांख्यिकी according to the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी , इसके रूप of  government , and its principal villages .
Cities are  indicated in  boldface .
शहरों और कस्बों हैं treated  identically under state law .
Cities are just towns whose form of  सरकारी थी बदला by a  special act of the New Hampshire legislature .
However , towns currently are able to change their form  of सरकारी by सरल वोटर स्वीकृति of a नई नगरपालिका चार्टर  , with several of the more populous towns having already done so .
The main slave  रूट in मध्यकालीन  Africa .
This  आलेख discusses प्रणालियों , इतिहास , और प्रभाव of  slavery within Africa .
See Arab slave trade , Atlantic slave trade , Maafa  , और गुलामी in समकालीन अफ़्रीकी  for other discussions .
`` स्लेव हस्तांतरण  in Africa '' .
Europeans  प्रायः किया नहीं डालें  the interior regions .
Slavery in Africa has existed  throughout the महाद्वीप लिये अनेक  centuries , and continues in the current day .
Systems of servitude and slavery were common in many parts of the  महाद्वीप , as वे  were in much of the ancient world .
In most African societies where  गुलामी थी प्रचलित , the enslaved लोगों यहूद largely treated as indentured  servants and not treated as chattel slaves .
When the Arab slave trade and Atlantic slave trade began , many of the  लोकल स्लेव प्रणालियों बदला और began supplying captives लिये स्लेव  markets outside of Africa .
Slavery in historical Africa  थी practiced  in many different forms and some of these do not clearly fit the definitions of slavery elsewhere in the world .
Debt  गुलामी , enslavement of युद्ध captives  , military slavery , and criminal slavery were all practiced in various parts of Africa .
Although there had been some trans-Saharan trade from the interior of Sub-Saharan Africa to other regions , slavery was a small part of the economic life of many societies in Africa until  the परिचय of transcontinental स्लेव ट्रेड ( अरब  and Atlantic ) .
Slave  practices यहूद again रूपांतरित साथ यूरोपीय  colonization of Africa and the formal abolition of slavery in the early 1900s .
Brett Lorenzo Favre ( born October 10 , 1969 ) is a former American football  क्वार्टरबैक जो खर्च the बहुमत of उसके करियर  with the Green Bay Packers of the National Football League ( NFL ) .
He was a 20-year veteran of the NFL , having played quarterback for the  अटलांटा falcons ( 1991 ) , ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स ( 1992 – 2007 ) , नई  York Jets ( 2008 ) and Minnesota Vikings ( 2009 – 2010 ) .
favre is the तभी क्वार्टरबैक in एनएफएल  history to throw for over 70,000 yards , over 500 touchdowns , over 300 interceptions , over 6,000 completions , and over 10,000 pass attempts .
Favre started at the quarterback position for the University of Southern Mississippi for four years before being selected  in the दूसरी गोलाकार of the 1991 एनएफएल ड्राफ्ट by अटलांटा ( 33rd overall )  .
He was traded to Green Bay on  फ़रवरी 10 , 1992 , लिये the 19th चुनें in the 1992  NFL Draft .
favre became the पैकर्स ' starting  quarterback in the fourth game of the 1992 season , stepping in for injured quarterback Don Majkowski , and started every game through the 2007 season .
He was traded to the New York Jets and started at quarterback for the 2008 season before signing with  the वाइकिंग्स on अगस्त 18 , 2009 as उनके starting  quarterback .
He made an NFL record 297  लगातार starts ( 321 सहित playoffs  ) .
He is the  तभी खिलाड़ी to जीत the ap सबसे मूल्यवान  Player three consecutive times ( 1995–97 ) .
He has led teams to eight division championships ( 1995 , 1996 , 1997 , 2002 , 2003 , 2004 , 2007 , 2009 ) , five NFC Championship Games ( 1995 , 1996 , 1997 , 2007 , 2009 ) , and two Super Bowl  दिखावे ( सुपर कटोरी xxxi , सुपर कटोरी xxxii ) , जीतना एक (  Super Bowl XXXI ) .
He holds many NFL records , including most career touchdown passes , most career passing yards , most career pass completions , most career pass attempts , most  करियर interceptions thrown , सबसे लगातार starts by a खिलाड़ी , सबसे लगातार starts by a क्वार्टरबैक , सबसे करियर victories  as a starting quarterback , most sacked , and most fumbles .
He is  भी referred to by उसके  nickname `` The Gunslinger '' .
Salesforce.com Inc. is a  वैश्विक एंटरप्राइज़ तन्त्र कम्पनी  headquartered in San Francisco , California .
Though best known for its customer  संबंध प्रबन्धन ( crm ) उत्पाद , salesforce  has also expanded into the `` social enterprise arena '' through acquisitions .
It is currently ranked the most innovative company in America by Forbes  पत्रिका , as खूब as क्रमांक 27 in सौभाग्य पत्रिका 's 100  Best Companies to Work For in 2012 .
as of अप्रैल 2013 , the कम्पनी is क्रमित छठे  in providing services in marketing and customer service automation .
It is listed on the New York Stock Exchange and is a constituent of  the s & p 500 अनुक्रमणिका  .
Seahorse is the title given to 54  प्रजाति of समुद्री मछली in the genus हिप्पोकैम्पस  .
`` Hippocampus  '' आता इससे the प्राचीन यूनानी hippos अर्थ  `` horse '' and kampos meaning `` sea monster '' .
Earth is the  तीसरा ग्रह इससे the सूर्य ,  and the densest and fifth-largest of the eight planets in the Solar System .
It is also the  largest of the सौर प्रणाली 's चार स्थलीय  planets .
It is sometimes referred to as the world  or the ब्लू ग्रह .
Earth formed  लगभग 4.54 अरब सालो पहले , और  life appeared on its surface within its first billion years .
Earth 's biosphere then significantly altered the atmospheric and other basic physical conditions , which enabled the proliferation of  जीवों as खूब as the गठन of the ओज़ोन परत , जिससे साथ साथ धरती 's चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड अवरोधित नुकसानदेह सौर विकिरण , और  permitted formerly ocean-confined life to move safely to land .
The physical properties of the Earth , as well as its  geological इतिहास और कक्षा , have अनुमत  life to persist .
estimates on कैसा much longer the ग्रह होगा  be able to continue to support life range from , to as long as .
Earth 's lithosphere is divided into several rigid segments , or tectonic plates , that migrate across the surface over  अवधि of अनेक लाखो of सालो  .
About 71 %  of the सतह is covered by नमक जल महासागर , साथ the शेष consisting of महाद्वीपों और  islands which together have many lakes and other sources of water that contribute to the hydrosphere .
Earth 's poles are  ज़्यादातर covered साथ बर्फ कि is the ठोस  ice of the Antarctic ice sheet and the sea ice that is the polar ice packs .
The planet 's interior remains active , with a  ठोस आयरन भीतरी कोर , a द्रव बाहरी कोर कि generates the चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड , और a मोटा परत of अपेक्षाकृत  solid mantle .
Earth gravitationally interacts with other objects  in स्पेस , विशेषकर the सूर्य और the चंद्रमा  .
During one orbit around the Sun , the Earth rotates  परिचय इसके अपना अक्ष 366.26 टाइम्स , बनाना 365.26 सौर दिनों  , or one sidereal year .
The Earth 's axis of rotation is  tilted 23.4° दूर इससे the लम्बवत of इसके कक्षीय प्लेन  , producing seasonal variations on the planet 's surface with a period of one tropical year ( 365.24 solar days ) .
The Moon is Earth 's only natural  उपग्रह  .
It began orbiting the Earth  परिचय .
The Moon 's  गुरुत्वाकर्षक बातचीत साथ धरती stimulates  ocean tides , stabilizes the axial tilt , and gradually slows the planet 's rotation .
The planet is home  to लाखो of प्रजाति of जीवन ,  including humans .
Both the mineral resources of the planet and the  उत्पाद of the जीवमंडल योगदान संसाधन कि हैं प्रयुक्त to support a वैश्विक इंसान  population .
These inhabitants are grouped into about 200 independent  sovereign राज्य , जिससे interact through कूटनीति  , travel , trade , and military action .
Human cultures have developed many views of the planet , including its personification as a planetary deity  , इसके आकार as चपटा , इसके स्थिति as the बीच of the ब्रह्मांड  , and in the modern Gaia Principle , as a single , self-regulating organism in its own right .
The Magician from the Waite-Smith tarot , who is depicted  using the वही टूल्स कि आधुनिक  Wiccans use .
In  the neopagan धर्म  of Wicca , a range of magical tools are used in ritual practice .
Each of these tools has  अलग उपयोग और एसोसिएशन  , and are used primarily to direct magical energies .
They are used at an altar  , अंदर a जादू  circle .
In traditional Gardnerian Wicca , the tools are often divided into personal tools , which are for use by , and owned by , an individual Wiccan ,  और आउटटेक टूल्स , प्रयुक्त  collectively by the coven .
This practice may derive partly from Masonic traditions ( such as the use of the Square and  compasses ) , इससे जिससे wicca  draws some material , and partly from the rituals of the Hermetic Order of the Golden Dawn .
The latter made much use of  सामग्री इससे मध्यकालीन grimoires  such as the Key of Solomon , which has many illustrations of magical tools and instructions for their preparation .
Typical  eukaryotic कोशिका .
सेल्यूलर श्वसन is the नियत of the metabolic प्रतिक्रियाएँ और प्रक्रियाओं कि लो प्लेस in the कोशिकाएं  of organisms to convert biochemical energy from nutrients into adenosine triphosphate ( ATP ) , and then release waste products .
The reactions involved in  श्वसन हैं catabolic प्रतिक्रियाएँ , जिससे ब्रेक विशाल अणुओं into छोटी ones , releasing उर्जा in the  process as weak so-called `` high-energy '' bonds are replaced by stronger bonds in the products .
Respiration is one of the key ways a cell gains  उपयोगी उर्जा to ईंधन सेल्यूलर कार्यकलाप  .
Cellular  श्वसन is माना  an exothermic redox reaction .
The overall reaction is broken into many smaller ones when it occurs in the  देह , सबसे of जिससे हैं रेडॉक्स प्रतिक्रियाएँ themselves  .
Although technically , cellular respiration is a combustion reaction , it clearly does not  resemble एक जब it occurs in  a living cell .
This difference is  क्युकी it occurs in अनेक  separate steps .
While the overall reaction is a combustion reaction , no  सिंगल प्रतिक्रिया कि comprises it is a दहन  reaction .
Nutrients that  हैं commonly प्रयुक्त by एनिमल और संयंत्र कोशिकाएं in श्वसन  include sugar , amino acids and fatty acids , and a common oxidizing agent ( electron acceptor ) is molecular oxygen ( O2 ) .
the उर्जा भंडारित in एटीपी ( इसके तीसरा फास्फेट समूह is weakly बंधुआ to the बाकी of the अणु और is cheaply टूटा allowing stronger bonds to रूप  , thereby transferring energy for use by the cell ) can then be used to drive processes requiring energy , including biosynthesis , locomotion or transportation of molecules across cell membranes .
A  stored-pressure आग extinguisher बना  by Amerex
A British fire extinguisher with ID sign  , कॉल पाइंट और आग कार्रवाई  sign
A fire extinguisher , flame extinguisher , or simply an  extinguisher , is an क्रियाशील आग सुरक्षा यंत्र प्रयुक्त to बुझा  or control small fires , often in emergency situations .
It is not intended for use on an out-of-control fire  , ऐसे as एक जिससे रै पहुँचे the छत , endangers  the user ( i.e. , no escape route , smoke , explosion hazard , etc . ) , or otherwise requires the expertise of a fire department .
Typically , a fire extinguisher consists  of a hand-held बेलनाकार दबाव पोत  containing an agent which can be discharged to extinguish a fire .
In the United States , fire extinguishers , in all  इमारतें अन्य than घरों , हैं generally जरूरी to be सर्विस और inspected by a आग  Protection service company at least annually .
Some  jurisdictions आवश्यकता अधिक बारंबार  service for fire extinguishers .
The servicer places a tag on the extinguisher to indicate the  प्रकार of सेवा performed ( सालाना निरीक्षण , रिचार्ज  , new fire extinguisher ) and when .
There are two main types  of आग extinguishers : भंडारित दबाव  and cartridge-operated .
In  भंडारित दबाव इकाई , the expellant  is stored in the same chamber as the firefighting agent itself .
Depending on the agent  प्रयुक्त  , different propellants are used .
With dry chemical extinguishers , nitrogen is typically used ;  जल और झाग extinguishers  typically use air .
Stored  दबाव आग extinguishers  are the most common type .
Cartridge-operated extinguishers contain the  expellant गैस in a पृथक कार्ट्रिज कि is punctured prior  to discharge , exposing the propellant to the extinguishing agent .
This type is not as common ,  प्रयुक्त primarily in क्षेत्रों ऐसे as औद्योगिक सुविधाएं  , where they receive higher-than-average use .
They have the advantage of simple and prompt recharge , allowing an operator to discharge  the extinguisher , रिचार्ज it , और वापसी to  the fire in a reasonable amount of time .
Unlike stored pressure types , these  extinguishers उपयोग संपीडित कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड बजाय of नाइट्रोजन , हालांकि नाइट्रोजन  cartridges are used on low temperature ( -60 rated ) models .
Cartridge operated extinguishers are available in dry chemical and dry powder types in the U.S. and in water , wetting agent , foam , dry chemical (  वर्ग एबीसी और b.c . ) , और शुष्क चूर्ण  ( class D ) types in the rest of the world .
Fire extinguishers are further divided into  हैंडहेल्ड और cart-mounted , भी  called wheeled extinguishers .
Handheld extinguishers weigh from 0.5 to 14 kilograms ( 1 to 30  पाउंड ) , और हैं hence , easily पोर्टेबल  by hand .
Cart-mounted units typically weigh 23+  गामा ( 50+ पाउंड  ) .
These wheeled models are most commonly found  at निर्माण साइट , विमानक्षेत्र runways  , heliports , as well as docks and marinas .
Native Americans in the  संयुक्त राज्य हैं the स्वदेशी peoples in उत्तर अमेरिका भीतर the सीमाएँ of the present-day महाद्वीपीय  United States , Alaska , and the island state of Hawaii .
They are composed of numerous ,  पृथक देशी अमरीकी जनजातियों और जातीय समूह , अनेक of  which survive as intact political communities .
The terms  प्रयुक्त to refer to देशी  Americans have been controversial .
According to a 1995 U.S. Census Census_Bureau Bureau Census_Bureau set of home interviews , most of the respondents with an expressed preference refer to themselves as American Indians ( or simply Indians ) ,  और इस पद रै महरूम अपनाया by प्रमुख अखबारों और कुछ अकादमिक समूह ; however , इस पद करता नहीं typically शामिल देशी hawaiians or निश्चित  Alaskan Natives , such as Aleut , Yup'ik , or Inuit peoples .
Since the end of the 15th  सदी , the माइग्रेशन of europeans to the americas ,  and their importation of Africans as slaves , has led to centuries of conflict and adjustment between Old and New World societies .
Europeans created most of the early written historical record  परिचय देशी अमेरिकी बाद the colonists  ' immigration to the Americas .
Many Native Americans lived as hunter-gatherer societies  और बताई उनके histories  by oral traditions .
In many groups , women carried  आउट sophisticated cultivation of numerous किस्में of स्टेपल  crops : maize , beans and squash .
The indigenous cultures were quite different from  those of the कृषिक , proto-industrial  , mostly Christian immigrants from western Eurasia .
Many Native cultures were  matrilineal ; the लोगों occupied lands  for use of the entire community , for hunting or agriculture .
Europeans at that time had  patriarchal संस्कृतियों और था विकसित अवधारणाओं of व्यक्तिगत  property rights with respect to land that were extremely different .
The differences in cultures between the established Native Americans and immigrant Europeans , as well as shifting  alliances among अलग राष्ट्र of प्रत्येक संस्कृति through the सदियां ,  caused extensive political tension , ethnic violence and social disruption .
The Native  अमेरिकी suffered ऊँची fatalities इससे  the contact with infectious Eurasian diseases , to which they had no acquired immunity .
Epidemics after European contact  caused the महानतम  loss of life for indigenous populations .
Estimates of the pre-Columbian population of what today  constitutes the u.S. vary significantly , ranging  from 1 million to 18 million .
After the colonies revolted against Great Britain and established the United States of America , President George  वॉशिंगटन और हेनरी नॉक्स conceived of the विचार of `` civilizing ''  Native Americans in preparation for assimilation as U.S. citizens .
Assimilation ( whether voluntary as with the Choctaw , or forced ) became  a सतत नीति through अमरीकी administrations  .
During the 19th century ,  the विचारधारा of manifest नियति  became integral to the American nationalist movement .
Expansion of European-American populations to the west after the American  क्रान्ति resulted in increasing दबाव on देशी अमरीकी lands ,  warfare between the groups , and rising tensions .
In 1830 , the U.S. Congress passed the Indian Removal Act , authorizing the government to relocate Native Americans from their  homelands भीतर स्थापित राज्य  to lands west of the Mississippi River , accommodating European-American expansion .
The first European Americans to  एनकाउंटर the पश्चिमी आंतरिक जनजातियों यहूद generally  fur traders and trappers .
There were also  जेसुइट प्रचारकों क्रियाशील in the उत्तरी  Tier .
As United States expansion  पहुँचे into the अमरीकी वेस्ट , settler और  miner migrants came into increasing conflict with the Great Basin , Great Plains , and other Western tribes .
These were complex nomadic cultures based on  घोड़ा संस्कृति और मौसमी  bison hunting .
They carried out strong resistance to United States incursions in the decades after the American Civil War , in a  श्रेणी of भारतीय युद्धों , जिससे यहूद बारंबार up जबतक the 1890s ,  but continued into the 20th century .
The  transcontinental रेलरोड brought अधिक  non-Natives into tribal land in the west .
over समय , the u.S. मजबूर a श्रेणी of treaties और जमीन cessions by  the tribes , and established reservations for them in many western states .
U.S. agents encouraged Native Americans to adopt European-style farming and similar pursuits , but  european-american agricultural प्रौद्योगिकी of the समय थी अपर्याप्त लिये प्रायः शुष्क रिज़र्वेशन  lands .
In 1924 , Native  अमेरिकी जो यहूद नहीं already u.S.  citizens were granted citizenship by Congress .
Contemporary Native Americans have a unique relationship with the United States because they may be members of nations , tribes , or  bands साथ प्रभुता और  treaty rights .
Central America ( ) is the central  भौगोलिक प्रदेश of the americas  .
It is the southernmost , isthmian portion of the North  अमरीकी महाद्वीप , जिससे connects साथ दक्षिण अमेरिका  on the southeast .
When  माना भाग of the एकीकृत महाद्वीपीय  model , it is considered a subcontinent .
Central America consists of seven countries : Belize ,  कोस्टा रिका , el साल्वाडोर , ग्वाटेमाला  , Honduras , Nicaragua , and Panama .
Central America is part of the  mesoamerican  biodiversity hotspot , which extends from northern Guatemala through central Panama .
It is bordered by Mexico to the north , the Caribbean Sea to the east , the  उत्तर प्रशांत समंदर to the वेस्ट , और कोलंबिया to the south-east .
सेंट्रल अमेरिका is an क्षेत्रफल of  , or almost 0.1 % of the Earth 's surface .
As  of 2009 , इसके जनसांख्यिकी  was estimated at 41,739,000 .
It  रै a घनत्व of 77 लोगों  per square kilometer .
Scrubs is an American  चिकित्सा comedy-drama टेलीविज़न श्रेणी निर्मित by विधेयक लॉरेंस  that aired from October 2 , 2001 to March 17 , 2010 on NBC and later ABC .
The series follows  the जीवनदान of कर्मचारी at the  fictional Sacred Heart teaching hospital .
The title is a play on surgical scrubs and a term for  a low-ranking व्यक्ति क्युकी at the शुरूआत of the श्रेणी , सबसे  of the main characters were medical interns .
The series features fast-paced screenplay , slapstick , and surreal  vignettes प्रस्तुत ज़्यादातर as the daydreams  of the central character , Dr. John `` J.D . ''
Dorian , who is  निभाई by zach  Braff .
Actors starring alongside Braff  in the पहला आठ सीज़न शामिल सारा chalke  , Donald Faison , Neil Flynn , Ken Jenkins , John C. McGinley and Judy Reyes .
The series has also featured multiple  अतिथि दिखावे by फिल्मी अभिनेताओं , ऐसे as ब्रेंडन फ्रेज़र , हीथर ग्राहम  , and Colin Farrell .
In the ninth season , many new cast  सदस्यों यहूद introduced और the दिखाएँ सेटिंग  moved from a hospital to a medical school .
Out of the original cast , only Braff , Faison and McGinley became  नियमित डाल सदस्यों , जबकि the अन्य साथ the एक्सेप्शन of रेयेस , बना अतिथि दिखावे  .
Braff  appeared in छह एपीसोड  of the ninth season before departing .
Kerry Bishé , Eliza Coupe , Dave Franco and Michael Mosley became series  regulars साथ bishé बनने the दिखाएँ 's नई narrator  .
Scrubs premiered on October 2  , 2001 on एनबीसी .
The  श्रेणी प्राप्त  a Peabody Award in 2006 .
During the  सातवाँ ऋतु , एनबीसी घोषित कि it  would not renew the show .
Shortly after the  सातवाँ ऋतु finale , एबीसी घोषित it था उठाई up the आठवीं  season of the series , which began January 6 , 2009 .
The ninth season premiered  on दिसम्बर  1 , 2009 .
On May 14 , 2010 , ABC announced it  था officially रद्द  Scrubs .

A steam engine is a heat engine  कि performs mechanical कार्य  using steam as its working fluid .
Using boiling water to produce mechanical motion goes back  परिचय 2,000 सालो , लकिन जल्दी डिवाइस  were not practical .
Since the  लेट 1700s भाप इंजन  have become a major source of mechanical power .
The first  अनुप्रयोग यहूद निकालना  water from mines .
In 1781 James Watt patented a  भाप इंजन कि उत्पादित निरन्तर  rotative motion .
These 10 hp engines  सक्रिय a चौड़ी दायरा of निर्माण  machinery to be powered .
The engines could be  sited anywhere कि जल और  coal or wood fuel could be obtained .
By 1883 , engines that could provide 10,000  hp था become feasible .
Steam engines could also be applied to  वाहनों ऐसे as कर्षण इंजन और the रेल  locomotives which are commonly just called steam engines outside America .
the stationary भाप इंजन थी a कुंजी घटक of the  Industrial Revolution , allowing factories to locate where water power was unavailable .
Today steam turbines generate about 90 % of the  इलेक्ट्रिक शक्ति in the संयुक्त राज्य  using a variety of heat sources .
Steam engines are external combustion engines , where the working fluid  is पृथक इससे the दहन उत्पाद  .
non-combustion ऊष्मा स्त्रोत ऐसे as सौर शक्ति , नाभिकीय  power or geothermal energy may be used .
The ideal  ऊष्मागतिक साईकिल प्रयुक्त  to analyze this process is called the Rankine cycle .
In the cycle  , जल is heated into भाप in a बॉयलर जबतक  it reaches a high pressure .
जब विस्तारित through पिस्टन्स or turbines  , mechanical work is done .
The reduced-pressure steam is then condensed and pumped  वापस into the  boiler .
In general  उपयोग , the पद भाप इंजन can refer to either the एकीकृत भाप पौधे ( सहित बायलरों इत्यादि . ) ऐसे as रेल भाप इंजनों और पोर्टेबल  engines , or may refer to the piston or turbine machinery alone , as in the beam engine and stationary steam engine .
Specialized devices such as steam hammers and  भाप pile ड्राइवर हैं निर्भर on भाप  supplied from a separate boiler .
A  मिल इंजन इससे stott  Park Bobbin Mill , Cumbria , England
A steam locomotive in Germany .This class of engine was built in 1942 –  1950 और संचालित commercially जबतक 1988  .
`` Move Bitch '' ( edited version titled `` Move B***h '' or simply `` Move '' ) is  the तीसरा आधिकारिक सिंगल इससे rapper ludacris  ' album Word of Mouf .
The  सिंगल सुविधाएँ  Mystikal and I-20 .
The single reached # 10  on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 बनाना it  Ludacris 's first top ten hit on the chart , it also reached # 3 on Hot Rap Tracks and # 3 on Hot R & B/Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks .
Puerto Rican  reggaeton duo maicol & मैनुएल sampled the सोंग on  `` Hoy Me Levanté '' on their 2002 release Yakaleo .
The song is also  प्रदर्शित in एपीसोड  2 , Series One of British teen comedy/drama Skins .
The song was also used by World Wrestling Entertainment superstar Montel  vontavious पोर्टर दौरान उसके  short stint in Ring of Honor .
It was also used for April  शिकारी in विभिन्न स्वतंत्र  circuits .
It was featured in the  फिल्म atl अभिनीत t.i . , और ' hancock , ' हालांकि in the  latter , the clean version was used .
A snippet of the song is played during traffic reports on many radio stations ,  प्रायः carrying an urban/hip-hop स्वरूप  .
Retired NBA star and now ESPN analyst Jalen Rose is  प्रदर्शित in the म्यूज़िक वीडियो  .
The  सोंग रै महरूम covered by चट्टान बैंड प्रारंभ ट्रबल  , on their album Every Solution Has Its Problem .
It was featured on  अंग्रेजों sitcom the inbetweeners जब the वर्ण  Jay and Neil took Will on a 'pussy patrol ' in Jay 's red Nissan Micra .
It was sampled by Girl Talk on the  पहला track of उसके एल्बम  All Day , `` Oh No '' .
Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch of 16 sovereign states , known as the  राष्ट्रमंडल realms , और उनके territories और dependencies , और सिर  of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations .
She is Supreme Governor of the Church of England and , in some  of  her realms , carries the title of Defender of the Faith as part of her full title .
On her accession on 6 February 1952 , Elizabeth became  सिर of the राष्ट्रमंडल  and queen regnant of seven independent Commonwealth countries : the United Kingdom , Canada , Australia , New Zealand , South Africa , Pakistan and Ceylon .
From 1956 to 1992 , the number of her  realms varied as territories gained स्वतंत्रता  and some realms became republics .
At present , in addition to the first four aforementioned countries , Elizabeth is Queen of Jamaica , Barbados , the Bahamas , Grenada , Papua New Guinea , the Solomon Islands , Tuvalu  , संत लूसिया , संत विंसेंट और the grenadines , बेलीज़ , अण्टीगुआ और बारबूडा  and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Her reign of  सालो is फिलहाल the दूसरी longest लिये a अंग्रेजों  monarch ; only Queen Victoria has reigned longer at over 63 years .
Elizabeth was born in London  और शिक्षित privately  at home .
Her father acceded to the throne as George VI in 1936 on the abdication of his  bhai एडवर्ड viii , इससे जिससे समय वो थी the  heir presumptive .
She began to undertake public duties during the Second  संसार युद्ध , in जिससे वो परोसा in  the Auxiliary Territorial Service .
In 1947 , she married Prince Philip , Duke of Edinburgh , with whom she has four children : Charles ,  ऐनी , एंड्रयू , और एडवर्ड  .
Her coronation  सेवा took प्लेस  in 1953 and was the first to be televised .
The Queen 's many historic  विज़िट और बैठक शामिल a राज्य विज़िट to the गणतंत्र  of Ireland and reciprocal visits to and from the Pope .
The Queen has seen major  संवैधानिक परिवर्तन in उसके realms , ऐसे as devolution in the  United Kingdom and the patriation of the Canadian constitution .
Times of personal significance have included the  births और विवाह of उसके children , the births of उसके grandchildren , the प्रतिष्ठापन of the प्रिंस of वेल्स ,  and the celebration of milestones such as her Silver , Golden , and Diamond Jubilees in 1977 , 2002 , and 2012 , respectively .
Major events in the Queen 's reign have included the  परेशानियों in उत्तरी आयरलैंड , the falklands युद्ध , युद्धों  with Iraq and the War in Afghanistan .
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include  the मौत of उसके पिता at 56 , the हत्या of प्रिंस फिलिप 's ताऊ , रब माउंटबेटन , the विश्लेषण of उसके children 's विवाह in 1992 ( a साल deemed उसके annus horribilis  ) , the death in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law , Diana , Princess of Wales , and the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002 .
The Queen has  occasionally faced कठोर दबायें आलोचना of the royal परिवार और रिपब्लिकन sentiments , लकिन support लिये  the monarchy and her personal popularity remain high .
Christianity is the  largest धर्म सूचीबद्ध by australians  in the national census .
In the  2011 जनसांख्यिकी  , 61.1 % of Australians were listed as Christian .
ऑस्ट्रेलिया रै no आधिकारिक राज्य धर्म  and the Australian Constitution protects freedom of religion .
The presence of Christianity  in ऑस्ट्रेलिया began साथ the आगमन of the पहला  Fleet of British convicts in 1788 .
The religion grew to account for 96.1 % of the national  जनसांख्यिकी at the समय of the संघ of ऑस्ट्रेलिया  in 1901 .
The Anglican Church of Australia ( formerly known as the Church of England in Australia ) remained the largest denomination until 1986 , when it was surpassed by the  रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर in ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
Post-war multiculturalism and a decline  in धार्मिक observance among कुछ भाग of the जनसांख्यिकी  have diversified the demographics of religion in Australia .
Of the roughly 61 % identifying as Christian in 2011 , the  largest denominations यहूद either रोमन कैथोलिक ( 25 % ) or anglican ( 17 % ) , साथ  the third largest denomination being the 5 % affiliated with the Uniting Church in Australia .
Post-war immigration has  grown the संख्याएँ belonging to चर्च जैसे  the Greek Orthodox Archdiocese of Australia and there are large and growing Pentecostal groups , such as Sydney 's Hillsong Church .
The festivals of  ईस्टर और क्रिसमस हैं पब्लिक  holidays in Australia .
Around a quarter of students attend  गिरिजाघर स्कूलों और ईसाई संगठनों हैं अग्रणी non-government प्रदाताओं of स्वास्थ्य और welfare  services through organisations like Catholic Health Australia , Anglicare , UnitingCare Australia , the Salvation Army and St Vincent de Paul Society .
Historically significant Australian Christians have  शामिल रेव dr जॉन dunmore लैंग , संत मरियम mackillop  , Catherine Helen Spence , Pastor David Unaipon , the Reverend John Flynn and Pastor Sir Doug Nicholls .
High profile contemporary Australian  ईसाइयों शामिल : टिम कॉस्टेलो बैपटिस्ट मंत्री और वर्तमान सीईओ of संसार दृष्टि ऑस्ट्रेलिया ,  Frank Brennan , Jesuit human rights lawyer , Cardinal George Pell , Catholic Archbishop of Sydney , Phillip Aspinall the current Anglican Primate and Archbishop of Brisbane , Kevin Rudd , former Labor Prime Minister , and Tony Abbott , leader for the Federal Opposition Liberal Party .
Charter creating Collegiate School , which  became yale कॉलेज , अक्तूबर 9 ,  1701
Yale University is a private Ivy League research university located in New Haven  , कनेक्टिकट  .
Founded in 1701 in the Colony of  कनेक्टिकट , the विश्वविद्यालयों is the third-oldest संस्था  of higher education in the United States .
Originally chartered as  the `` कॉलेजिएट स्कूल '' , the संस्था traces इसके जड़ें to  17th-century clergymen who sought to establish a college to train clergy and political leaders for the colony .
In 1718 , the College was  renamed `` yale कॉलेज '' to सम्मान a तोहफा इससे elihu yale ,  a governor of the British East India Company .
In 1861 , the Graduate School of Arts and Sciences became the first U.S. institution to award the PhD . Yale became a  founding सदस्य of the संघ of अमरीकी विश्वविद्यालयों in 1900 .
Yale College was transformed , beginning in the 1930s  , through the स्थापना of आवासीय कॉलेजों : 12 अभी  exist and two more are planned .
yale employs over 1,100 संकाय to सिखा और सलाह परिचय  5,300 undergraduate and 6,100 graduate and professional students .
लगभग सब tenured professors सिखा undergraduate  courses , more than 2,000 of which are offered annually .
The University 's assets include an endowment valued at $ 19.4 billion , the  second-largest of कोई अकादमिक संस्था in  the world .
Yale 's  प्रणाली of अधिक than दो दर्जन पुस्तकालयों  holds 12.5 million volumes .
49 Nobel Laureates have been affiliated with the  विश्वविद्यालयों as विद्यार्थी , संकाय  , and staff .
Yale has produced many notable alumni , including  पाँच u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों , 19 u.S. परम् अदालत justices , और अनेक  foreign heads of state .
At the graduate level , Yale Law  स्कूल , yale स्कूल of आर्ट , और yale स्कूल  of Drama are consistently ranked the top programs in their field .
Yale Law  स्कूल is the सबसे चयनात्मक विधि  school in the United States .
Yale students compete intercollegiately as the Yale  bulldogs in the ncaa प्रभाग i  Ivy League .
The oldest intercollegiate athletic event in  the संयुक्त राज्य is the yale-harvard  regatta .
Artemisia  tridentata ( `` बिग sagebrush '' or `` sagebrush '' ) is an खुशबूदार झाड़ी इससे the परिवार asteraceae , जिससे  grows in arid and semi-arid conditions , throughout a range of cold desert , steppe , and mountain habitats in the Intermountain West of North America .
The vernacular name ``  sagebrush '' is भी प्रयुक्त लिये अनेक सम्बन्धित सदस्यों  of the genus Artemisia , such as California Sagebrush ( Artemisia californica ) .
Big  sagebrush और अन्य artemisia प्रजाति हैं the प्रबल पौधे आरपार  large portions of the Great Basin , covering some 422,000 square miles in 11 western U.S. & Canadian states .
it is the राज्य  flower of Nevada .
Sagebrush provides food and habitat for a variety of species , such as sage grouse ,  pronghorn antelope , धूसर vireo , सानो खरगोश  , and mule deer .
Big sagebrush was used as an herbal medicine  by देशी अमेरिकी throughout the intermountain वेस्ट of उत्तर america—especially  for preventing infection in wounds , stopping internal bleeding , and treating headaches and colds .
Chemically , the active medicinal  constituents शामिल camphor , terpenoids ,  and tannins .
Several major threats exist to sage brush ecosystems , including human  settlements , परिवर्तन to agricultural जमीन , पशुधन  grazing , invasive plant species , wildfires , and climate change .
Yahoo ! Mail is a free email service offered  by the अमरीकी ढूंढें इंजन  company Yahoo !
It was launched in 1997 , and , according to comScore , Yahoo !  मेल is the third-largest web-based  email service with 281 million users as of December 2012 .
Currently , Yahoo ! offers  तीन संस्करण of याहू  ! Mail .
The  परंपरागत `` याहू ! मेल  Classic '' continues the availability of the original interface introduced in 1997 .
A version introduced in 2005 included a new Ajax interface ,  drag-and-drop सुविधाएँ , improved ढूंढें कार्यक्षमता , कुंजीपटल शॉर्टकट , पता auto-complete  , tabs , and other updated features .
In October 2010 , Yahoo ! released a beta version of Yahoo ! Mail ,  जिससे शामिल सुधार to the डिज़ाइन , प्रदर्शन , ढूंढें कार्यक्षमता  , and Facebook integration .
In  may 2011 , बीटा परीक्षण लिये the नई संस्करण रोका  , and it became the default interface for Yahoo ! Mail .
In early 2008 , Yahoo  ! began offering असीमित मेल  storage to its users in response to heated competition in the free web-mail market segment .
On June 27 , 2009 , Yahoo !  मेसेंजर थी एकीकृत साथ याहू ! मेल  .
Tacoma ( , ) is a  mid-sized शहरी बंदरगाहों नगर और the काउंटी  seat of Pierce County , Washington , United States .
The city is on Washington 's Puget Sound , southwest  of सिएटल , पूर्वोत्तर of the राज्य पूंजी , ओलंपिया , और उत्तरपश्चिम  of Mount Rainier National Park .
The population was 198,397  , according to the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  .
Tacoma is the second-largest city in the  puget ध्वनि क्षेत्रफल और  the third largest in the state .
Tacoma also serves as the center of business activity for the South Sound  प्रदेश , जिससे रै a जनसांख्यिकी of around  1 million people .
Tacoma  अपनाया इसके नाम बाद the आसपास  Mount Rainier , originally called Mount Tahoma .
It is known as the `` City of Destiny '' because the area was chosen to be the western terminus  of the उत्तरी प्रशांत  Railroad in the late 19th century .
The decision  of the रेलरोड थी बहकावे  by Tacoma 's neighboring deep-water harbor , Commencement Bay .
By connecting the bay with the railroad Tacoma 's motto became  `` जब rails मिलें sails  . ''
Today Commencement Bay serves  the बंदरगाहों of टकोमा , a बीच of अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार on the प्रशांत  Coast and Washington state 's largest port .
Like most  सेंट्रल शहरों , टकोमा suffered a prolonged  decline in the mid-20th century as a result of suburbanization and divestment .
Since the 1990s , developments in the downtown core include the  विश्वविद्यालयों of वॉशिंगटन टकोमा ; टकोमा कड़ी , the पहला आधुनिक इलेक्ट्रिक लाइट रेल सेवा in the राज्य ;  the state 's highest density of art and history museums ; and a restored urban waterfront , the Thea Foss Waterway .
With a long history of blue-collar labor politics — from the railroad  मजदूर of the 19th सदी , to the longshoremen of the 20th सदी , to the मजदूर तैयार मजदूर  of today — Tacoma has long been known for its rough , gritty image .
A song about Tacoma , `` Thrice  सब अमरीकी '' , by अमरीकी singer-songwriter और पूर्व निवासी neko मामला , describes  it as `` a dusty old jewel in the South Puget Sound / where the factories churn / and the timber 's all cut down '' .
Tacoma-Pierce County has been named one  of the सबसे livable  areas in the country .
Tacoma  थी भी recently सूचीबद्ध  as the 19th most walkable city in the country .
In contrast , the city is also  क्रमित as the सबसे stressed-out नगर in the देश  in a 2004 survey .
In 2006 , women 's magazine Self named Tacoma the `` Most Sexually  स्वस्थ नगर '' in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
In 2012  , the एडवोकेट दिया टकोमा the शीर्षक of `` gayest नगर in अमेरिका  '' , in part because of the large diversity of public offices held , and Washington State passing a bill in 2012 allowing LGBT couples to marry .
Tacoma is famous  लिये the 1940 पतन  of the Tacoma Narrows Bridge .
Chula Vista ( ; ) is the second largest city in the San Diego  महानगर क्षेत्रफल , the सातवाँ largest नगर in दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , the fourteenth largest city in the State of California , and the 77th-largest city in the United States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 243,916 as of  the 2010 census .
Located just from downtown San Diego and from the Mexican border in the South  खाड़ी प्रदेश of the महानगर क्षेत्रफल , the नगर is at the बीच of एक of the richest आर्थिक  and culturally diverse zones in the United States .
Chula Vista  is  so named because of its scenic location between the San Diego Bay and coastal mountain foothills .
Founded in the early 19th  सदी , तेज़ जनसांख्यिकी विकास रै recently  been observed in the city .
As the second largest city in  सैन डिएगो काउंटी , chula विस्टा  has quickly become a destination popular to many tourists .
Located in the city is one of America 's few year-round United States Olympic  प्रशिक्षण centers और लोकप्रिय पर्यटक गंतव्यों शामिल क्रिकेट बेतार amphitheater , the  Chula Vista marina , and the Chula Vista Nature Center .
Metes and bounds  is a प्रणाली or विधि of describing जमीन  , real property ( in contrast to personal property ) or real estate .
The system has been  प्रयुक्त in इंग्लैण्ड लिये अनेक सदियां  , and is still used there in the definition of general boundaries .
By custom , it  थी लागू in the असली तेरह colonies कि became the संयुक्त राज्य ,  and in many other land jurisdictions based on English common law .
Typically the system uses physical features of the  लोकल भूगोल , साथ साथ दिशानिर्देश और दूरियाँ , to  define and describe the boundaries of a parcel of land .
The  सीमाएँ हैं वर्णित in a कार्यशील गद्य स्टाइल , working  around the parcel in sequence , from a point of beginning , returning back to the same point ; compare with the oral ritual of beating the bounds .
It may  शामिल सन्दर्भ to अन्य adjoining  parcels ( and their owners ) , and it , in turn , could also be referred to in later surveys .
At the time the description is compiled , it may have been marked on the ground with  स्थाई स्मारक लगाई जहाँ वहीँ यहूद no उपयुक्त प्राकृतिक  monuments .
The term `` metes '' refers to  a boundary पारिभाषित by the मापन of प्रत्येक सीधा चलाएं , निर्दिष्ट by a अलहदा  between the terminal points , and an orientation or direction .
A direction may be a  सरल कम्पास bearing , or a precise  orientation determined by accurate survey methods .
The term `` bounds '' refers to a more general  boundary वर्णन , ऐसे as साथ a निश्चित watercourse , a स्टोन वॉल , an adjoining  public road way , or an existing building .
The system is often used to  define larger टुकड़े of प्रॉपर्टी ( e.g . खेतो ) , और राजनैतिक subdivisions  ( e.g . town boundaries ) where precise definition is not required or would be far too expensive , or previously designated boundaries can be incorporated into the description .
Sir Isaac Newton ( 25 December 164220 March 1727 ) was an English physicist and mathematician who is widely regarded as one of the most  influential वैज्ञानिकों of सब समय और as a कुंजी फिगर  in the scientific revolution .
His book Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica ( `` Mathematical Principles  of प्राकृतिक दर्शनशास्त्र '' ) , पहला प्रकाशित in 1687 , रखी the मूलाधार  for most of classical mechanics .
Newton also made seminal contributions to optics and shares  क्रेडिट साथ गॉटफ्राइड लैबनिट्ज़ लिये the आविष्कार of the infinitesimal  calculus .
Newton 's Principia formulated the laws of motion and universal gravitation that  वर्चस्व वैज्ञानिकों ' दृश्य of the शारीरिक ब्रह्मांड लिये  the next three centuries .
It also demonstrated that the motion of objects on the Earth and that of celestial  लाशें could be वर्णित by the वही  principles .
By deriving Kepler 's laws of planetary motion from his mathematical description of gravity , Newton  removed the पिछला संदेह परिचय the वैध of the heliocentric  model of the cosmos .
Newton built the first practical  reflecting दूरदर्शी और विकसित a सिद्धान्त of रंग आधारित  on the observation that a prism decomposes white light into the many colours of the visible spectrum .
he भी प्रतिपादित  an empirical law of cooling and studied the speed of sound .
In addition to his work on the calculus , as a  गणितज्ञ न्यूटन contributed to the पढ़ाई of शक्ति श्रेणी , generalised the द्विपद प्रमेय  to non-integer exponents , and developed Newton 's method for approximating the roots of a function .
Newton was a fellow of Trinity  कॉलेज और the दूसरी  Lucasian Professor of Mathematics at the University of Cambridge .
He was a devout but unorthodox Christian and  , unusually लिये a सदस्य of the कैम्ब्रिज संकाय , he refused to  take holy orders in the Church of England , perhaps because he privately rejected the doctrine of trinitarianism .
in जोड to उसके कार्य on the गणितीय sciences , न्यूटन भी समर्पित much of उसके समय to  the study of alchemy and biblical chronology , but most of his work in those areas remained unpublished until long after his death .
In his  बाद जीवन , न्यूटन became अध्यक्ष  of the Royal Society .
He also served the British  सरकारी as वार्डन  and Master of the Royal Mint .
Prof. Walter Lewin explains Newton 's law  of gravitation in एमआईटी कोर्स 8.01
Satellites and projectiles all  obey न्यूटन 's विधि of  gravitation
Newton 's law of  सार्वभौमिक gravitation राज्य कि प्रत्येक पाइंट द्रव्यमान in the ब्रह्मांड attracts प्रत्येक अन्य पाइंट द्रव्यमान साथ a फ़ोर्स  that is directly proportional to the product of their masses and inversely proportional to the square of the distance between them .
( Separately it was shown that large  spherically सममित masses आकर्षित और हैं आकर्षित as if सब उनके  mass were concentrated at their centers . )
This is a general physical law derived  इससे अनुभवजन्य observations by कया न्यूटन  called induction .
It is a part of classical mechanics and was formulated in Newton 's work  philosophiæ naturalis प्रिन्सिपिया mathematica ( `` the प्रिन्सिपिया ''  ) , first published on 5 July 1687 .
( When  न्यूटन 's किताब थी प्रस्तुत in 1686 to the royal समाज  , Robert Hooke made a claim that Newton had obtained the inverse square law from him – see History section below . )
In modern  भाषा , the विधि राज्य  the following:
Assuming SI units , F is measured in newtons ( N ) , m1 and m2 in  गामा ( kg ) , r in मीटर ( m ) , और the निरंतर g is  approximately equal to .
The value of the  निरंतर g थी पहला accurately संकल्पित इससे the परिणाम of the कैवेंडिश प्रयोग conducted  by the British scientist Henry Cavendish in 1798 , although Cavendish did not himself calculate a numerical value for G .
This experiment was also the first test of  न्यूटन 's सिद्धान्त of gravitation between masses  in the laboratory .
It took place 111 years after the publication of Newton 's Principia and 71 years after Newton 's death , so none of Newton 's  calculations could उपयोग the मान of g ; बजाय he could तभी गणना a फ़ोर्स सापेक्ष to  another force .
Newton 's law of  gravitation resembles कूलम्ब 's विधि of विद्युत शक्तियां ,  which is used to calculate the magnitude of electrical force between two charged bodies .
Both are inverse-square laws , in which force is  inversely आंशिक to the वर्गाकार of the अलहदा  between the bodies .
Coulomb 's Law has the product of two charges in place of the product of  the masses , और the electrostatic निरंतर in प्लेस of the गुरुत्वाकर्षक  constant .
Newton 's law  रै चूंकि महरूम superseded by आइंस्टीन 's  theory of general relativity , but it continues to be used as an excellent approximation of the effects of gravity .
Relativity is  जरूरी तभी जब वहीँ is a need लिये  extreme precision , or when dealing with gravitation for extremely massive and dense objects .
White and red flags , representing Iraqi and American deaths , sit in the grass  चतुष्कोण of the घाटी पुस्तकालयों on the corvallis , ऑरेगॉन , कैम्पस  of Oregon State University .
As part of the traveling Iraq Body Count  प्रदर्शनी इससे 2008 to 2009 ( नहीं सम्बन्धित to इराकी देह गिनती  project ) , the flags aim to `` raise awareness of the human cost of the Iraq War . ''
(  may  2008 )
Casualties of the conflict in Iraq since 2003 ( beginning with the 2003 invasion of Iraq , and continuing with the ensuing occupation of Iraq , as well as the activities of the various armed groups  ऑपरेटिंग in the देश ) have आइये in अनेक फ़ॉर्म , और the सटीकता of the सूचना उपलब्धियाँ on अलग प्रकार of इराकी युद्ध हताहत varies greatly .
The table below  summarizes विभिन्न estimates of the इराकी  casualty figures .
For troops in the U.S.-led multinational coalition , the death toll is carefully tracked and updated daily , and the names and  छायाचित्र of those मारे in कार्रवाई as खूब as  in accidents have been published widely .
A  कुल of 4,486 u.S. सैनिको  were killed in Iraq between 2003 and 2012 .
Regarding the  इराकी , however , सूचना on दोनो  military and civilian casualties is both less precise and less consistent .
Estimates of casualty levels are  उपलब्धियाँ इससे पत्रकारों on the झाँकी , इससे officials of शामिल संगठन  , and from groups that summarize information on incidents reported in the news media .
The word ``  हताहत `` in इसके सबसे सामान्य भाव शामिल  the injured as well as the dead .
Accounts  of the क्रमांक of गठबन्धन wounded vary widely , partly क्युकी  it is not obvious what should be counted : should only those injuries serious enough to put a soldier out of commission be included ?
Do illnesses or injuries caused by  दुर्घटनाओं गिनती , or चाहिए the फ़ोकस be प्रतिबंधित  to wounds caused by hostile engagement ?
Sources using different definitions may arrive at very different numbers , and  sometimes the precise परिभाषा is नहीं clearly  specified .
Asalto al  coche ( डकैती of the कोच  ) , by Francisco de Goya
A highwayman was  a चोर और brigand  who preyed on travellers .
This type of outlaw usually travelled and robbed by horse  , as compared to a footpad  who travelled and robbed on foot .
Mounted robbers were  widely माना to be socially  superior to footpads .
Such robbers operated in Great Britain and Ireland  इससे the elizabethan era  until the early 19th century .
The word highwayman is first known to be used in the  साल 1617 ; अन्य euphemisms शामिल `` शूरवीरों  of the road '' and `` gentlemen of the road . ''
Two terms applied to 19th-century North American highwaymen were  सड़क एजेंटों in कुछ उदाहरण लिये पहाड़ डाकुओं जबकि in  other cases the term is Rlallaala for mountain-based ruffians .
In the same time period in Australia ,  वे यहूद ज्ञात as  bushrangers .
Earvin `` Magic '' Johnson , Jr. ( born August 14 , 1959 ) is a retired American professional basketball player who played point  गार्ड लिये the लॉस एंजिल्स लेकर्स of the नेशनल  Basketball Association ( NBA ) .
After winning championships in high school and college , Johnson was  चयनित पहला overall in the  1979 NBA Draft by the Lakers .
He won a championship and an NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award in his  रुकी ऋतु , और जीती चार अधिक championships  with the Lakers during the 1980s .
Johnson retired abruptly in 1991  बाद announcing कि he था contracted hiv , लकिन लौटे  to play in the 1992 All-Star Game , winning the All-Star MVP Award .
After protests from his fellow players , he retired again for four  सालो , लकिन लौटे in 1996 , at आयु 36 , to खेल 32 खेल लिये the लेकर्स पहले  retiring for the third and final time .
Johnson 's career achievements include three NBA MVP Awards , nine NBA Finals appearances , twelve All-Star games , and  टेन all-nba पहला  and Second Team nominations .
He led the  लीग in regular-season assists  four times , and is the NBA 's all-time leader in average assists per game , at 11.2 .
Johnson was a member of the `` Dream Team `` , the U.S. basketball  टोली कि जीती the ओलम्पिक सुनहरा पदक in 1992  .
After leaving the NBA in 1992 , Johnson formed the Magic Johnson All-Stars , a  barnstorming टोली कि travelled around the संसार playing प्रदर्शनी  games .
Johnson was honored as one of the 50 Greatest Players in NBA History in  1996 , और enshrined in the बास्केट हॉल of कीर्ति in 2002  .
He was rated the greatest NBA  पाइंट गार्ड of सब समय by ईएसपीएन in  2007 .
His friendship and rivalry  साथ बोस्टन सेल्टिक्स स्टार लैरी बर्ड , जिसको he faced in the 1979 ncaa फाइनल और  three NBA championship series , were well documented .
Since his retirement , Johnson has been an advocate for HIV/ AIDS prevention and safe sex , as  खूब as an उद्योगों , लोकसेवक , प्रसारणकर्ता और प्रेरक स्पीकर  .
Johnson was a part-owner of the Lakers for several years ,  और थी भाग of a समूह कि खरीदा  the Los Angeles Dodgers in 2012 .
Allium cells in different  phases of the कोशिका साईकिल
The  कोशिकाएं of eukaryotes  ( left ) and prokaryotes ( right )
The cell is the basic structural , functional and biological unit of all known  जीना जीवों  .
It is the smallest unit of life that is classified as a living thing (  मगर वायरस , जिससे consists तभी इससे dna/rna covered by प्रोटीन और lipids  ) , and is often called the building block of life .
It consists of a protoplasm enclosed within a membrane , which contains many  biomolecules ऐसे as प्रोटीन और  nucleic acids .
Organisms can be classified as unicellular ( consisting of a single cell ; including most bacteria ) or  बहुकोशिकीय ( सहित पौधे और पशु  ) .
While the number of cells in plants and animals varies  इससे प्रजाति to प्रजाति , इंसानो contain परिचय  100 trillion ( 1014 ) cells .
Most plant and animal cells  हैं between 1 और 100 micrometres और  therefore are visible only under the microscope .
The cell  थी खोजा by  Robert Hooke in 1665 .
The cell theory ,  पहला विकसित in 1839 by matthias jakob schleiden और theodor  Schwann , states that all organisms are composed of one or more cells , that all cells come from preexisting cells , that vital functions of an organism occur within cells , and that all cells contain the hereditary information necessary for regulating cell functions and for transmitting information to the next generation of cells .
Cells emerged on planet Earth at least  4.0–4.3 अरब  years ago .
The word cell comes from the  लैटिन गर्भगृह , अर्थ ``  small room '' .
The descriptive term for the smallest living biological structure was coined by Robert Hooke in a  किताब he प्रकाशित in 1665 जब he compared the कॉर्क कोशिकाएं he देखी through उसके सूक्ष्मदर्शी  to the small rooms monks lived in .
Grecian Formula is a  मेन 's बाल coloring उत्पाद in  the United States .
Canada and Europe previously banned the  उत्पाद क्युकी of इसके  use of lead acetate .
A motor scooter 's front  साथ an अव्यवहारिक क्रमांक और  variety of headlamps , added for decorative purposes
A headlamp is a lamp attached to the front  of a गाडी to लाइट  the road ahead .
Headlamp performance has steadily improved throughout the automobile age  , spurred by the ग्रेट disparity between दिन और nighttime  traffic fatalities : the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration states that nearly half of all traffic-related fatalities occur in the dark , despite only 25 % of traffic travelling during darkness .
While it is common for the term headlight to be used interchangeably in informal discussion , headlamp is the term for the device  itself , जबकि हेडलाइट properly refers to the बीम of लाइट उत्पादित और वितरित  by the device .
Other vehicles , such as trains and aircraft  , हैं जरूरी to  have headlamps .
Bicycle headlamps are often  प्रयुक्त on साइकिल , और हैं जरूरी  in some jurisdictions .
They can be powered by a battery or a small  विद्युत सृजनकर्ता on the  wheel .
Additionally  ऑटोमोटिव रात्रि दृष्टि प्रणालियों कार्य to संपूरक  headlamps .
Women 's rights  हैं the अधिकारों और entitlements claimed लिये महिलाओं  and girls of many societies worldwide .
In some places these rights are institutionalized or supported by law , local custom , and behaviour ,  whereas in अन्य वे may be उपेक्षित or suppressed  .
They differ from broader notions of human rights through  दावा of an अंतर्निहित ऐतिहासिक और परंपरागत पूर्वाग्रह विरूद्ध the कसरत  of rights by women and girls in favour of men and boys .
मुद्दे commonly संबद्ध साथ धारणाएं of महिलाओं 's अधिकारों शामिल , हालांकि हैं नहीं सीमित to , the सही : to  bodily integrity and autonomy ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to hold public office ; to work ; to fair wages or equal pay ; to own property ; to education ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to enter into legal contracts ; and to have marital , parental and religious rights .
Caryn Elaine Johnson , best known as Whoopi  गोल्डबर्ग ( , ( born नवम्बर  13 , 1955 ) is an American comedienne , actress , singer-songwriter , political activist , author and talk show host .
Goldberg  बना उसके फिल्मी डेब्यू in the रंग जामुनी  ( 1985 ) , playing Celie , a mistreated black woman in the Deep South .
She received a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Actress and won her first Golden Globe Award  लिये उसके भूमिका in the फिल्मी  .
In 1990 , she played Oda Mae Brown , a wacky psychic  helping a slain man ( पैट्रिक swayze ) सहेजें उसके प्रेमी ( demi मूर ) in the ब्लॉकबस्टर  Ghost .
This performance won her a second Golden Globe and an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress ; this made Goldberg only the second black woman in the history of  the अकादमी पुरस्कार to जीत an एक्टिंग oscar—the पहला होने हैटी mcdaniel  who won for Gone With the Wind in 1939 .
Notable  बाद films शामिल सिस्टर अधिनियम और सिस्टर अधिनियम 2 , the खिलाड़ी ,  Made in America , How Stella Got Her Groove Back , Girl , Interrupted and Rat Race .
She is also acclaimed for her roles as the bartender Guinan in Star Trek : The Next Generation , as Terry Doolittle in Jumpin ' Jack Flash , and as  कार्मेन tibideaux in ग्ली , as खूब as the आवाज़ of shenzi the लकड़बग्घा in  The Lion King .
Goldberg has been nominated for 13 Emmy  पुरस्कार लिये उसके कार्य in टेलीविज़न  .
वो थी co-producer of the  popular game show Hollywood Squares from 1998 to 2004 .
वो रै महरूम the मॉडरेटर of the दिन  talk show The View since 2007 .
Goldberg has a  ग्रैमी , दो दिन emmys , दो सुनहरी ग्लोब्स  , a Tony ( for production , not acting ) , and an Oscar .
In addition , Goldberg has a British Academy Film Award ,  चार लोगों 's चुनाव पुरस्कार , और रै महरूम सम्मानित साथ a स्टार on the  Hollywood Walk of Fame .
She is one of the few  मनोरंजनकर्ता जो have जीती an एमी , ग्रैमी , ऑस्कर  , and Tony Award .
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit association '' which operates a major professional ice hockey league of 30  franchised सदस्य क्लब , of जिससे सात हैं फिलहाल  located in Canada and 23 in the United States .
Headquartered in New  यॉर्क नगर , the एनएचएल is widely माना to be the प्रीमियर पेशेवर  ice hockey league in the world , and one of the major professional sports leagues in the United States and Canada .
The Stanley Cup , the oldest  पेशेवर खेल ट्रॉफी in उत्तर अमेरिका ,  is awarded annually to the league playoff champion at the end of each season .
The league was organized on November 26 , 1917 , in Montreal , Quebec ,  कनाडा , बाद the बर्खास्तगी of परिचालन of इसके पूर्ववर्ती संगठन ,  the National Hockey Association ( NHA ) , which had been founded in 1909 .
It started with  चार टीमों और , through a श्रेणी of expansions  , contractions , and relocations , the league is now composed of 30 active franchises .
The nation to which the name of the league originally referred  थी कनाडा , हालांकि the लीग रै अभी महरूम binational  since 1924 when it expanded into the United States .
After a labour dispute  कि led to the रद्दीकरण of the संपूर्ण 2004–05 ऋतु , the  league resumed play under a new collective bargaining agreement that included a salary cap .
In 2009 , the NHL enjoyed record highs in terms of  sponsorships , उपस्थिति ,  and television audiences .
The  एनएचएल draws अनेक अत्यधिक skilled  players from all over the world and currently has players from about 20 different countries .
Although Canadians have historically constituted the majority of the players in the NHL , over the past four plus  दशकों the percentages of us और यूरोपीय खिलाड़ी have increased दोनो क्युकी of the एनएचएल 's जारी विस्तार  from six to thirty clubs since 1967 , and the increased availability of highly skilled European players .
Maggots  feeding on carrion  .
A maggot is the larva of a fly ( order Diptera ) ; it is  लागू in particular to the लार्वे of brachyceran उड़ता , ऐसे as houseflies , चीज  flies , and blowflies , rather than larvae of the Nematocera , such as mosquitoes and Crane flies .
`` Maggot '' is not a technical term and should not be taken as  ऐसे ; in अनेक मानक पाठ्यपुस्तकों of कीटविज्ञान it करता नहीं  appear in the index at all .
In  अनेक non-technical ग्रन्थ  the term is used for insect larvae in general .
Other sources have coined their own  परिभाषाएं ; लिये उदाहरण : `` ...
The term applies to a grub when all trace of limbs has disappeared ...  '' और `` ... लागू to the footless लार्वे of dipters  . ''
Maggot-like fly larvae are of wide importance in ecology and medicine ; among other roles , various species are  prominent in रीसाइक्लिंग carrion और कचरा , attacking फसलों और foodstuffs , spreading  microbial infections , and causing myiasis .
Herod ( , Hordos , Greek : , Hērōdēs ) , also known  as हेरोदेस the ग्रेट ( 73/74 bce – 4 bce in  Jericho ) , was a Roman client king of Judea .
His epithet of `` the Great '' is  widely विवादित as he is वर्णित as `` a madman जो murdered उसके अपना  family and a great many rabbis `` .
He is also known for his colossal building projects in Jerusalem and elsewhere , including his expansion of the Second Temple in  जेरूसलम ( sometimes referred to as हेरोदेस 's टेम्पल ) और the निर्माण of the बंदरगाहों at caesarea  Maritima .
Important details of his  जीवनी हैं gleaned इससे the works of the  1st century CE Roman–Jewish historian Josephus Flavius .
The Romans made Herod 's son , Herod Archelaus , ethnarch of Judea , Samaria , and Idumea  ( biblical edom ) इससे 4 bce to 6 ce , referred  to as the tetrarchy of Judea .
Archelaus was judged incompetent by the Roman emperor Augustus  जो तब संयुक्त samaria , judea उचित और idumea into iudaea प्रांत अंतर्गत  rule of a prefect until age 41 .
Herod 's other son Herod Antipas was  tetrarch of galilee इससे  4 BCE–39 CE .
ABO blood  समूह antigens उपस्थित on रेड रक्त कोशिकाएं  and IgM antibodies present in the serum
The ABO blood group system is the most  महत्वपूर्ण रक्त प्रकार प्रणाली ( or रक्त समूह प्रणाली )  in human blood transfusion .
The  संबद्ध anti-a और anti-b antibodies हैं प्रायः igm antibodies , जिससे हैं प्रायः उत्पादित  in the first years of life by sensitization to environmental substances such as food , bacteria , and viruses .
ABO blood types are also  उपस्थित in कुछ अन्य पशु ,  for example apes such as chimpanzees , bonobos , and gorillas .
Year 1907 ( MCMVII ) was a common year starting on Tuesday ( link will display the full calendar ) of the  gregorian पंचांग और a आम साल starting on सोमवार of  the 13-day-slower Julian calendar .
Northville is  an affluent नगर स्तिथ  in and divided by Oakland and Wayne counties in the U.S. state of Michigan .
the क्षेत्रफल  is a suburb of Metropolitan Detroit .
the जनसांख्यिकी थी  5,970 at the 2010 census .
Most of  the नगर is in ओकलैंड  County , and is surrounded by the city of Novi .
The Wayne County  portion is घिरी by  Northville Township .
northville is परोसा  by Northville Public Schools .
The city is located northeast of  ऐन arbor और  northwest of Detroit .
Elaine Stritch ( born February 2 , 1925 ) is an  अमरीकी अभिनेत्री और vocalist  .
She has  appeared in numerous स्टेज plays और musicals , विशेषता films  , and many television programs .
She is known for her performance of `` The Ladies Who Lunch '' in Stephen Sondheim 's 1970 musical  कम्पनी , उसके 2001 one-woman दिखाएँ , ऐलेन stritch at स्वतंत्रता , और recently लिये उसके भूमिका as जोकर donaghy  's mother Colleen on NBC 's 30 Rock .
She  रै महरूम मनोनीत लिये the टोनी  Award five times in various categories .
Stritch is also a  three-time एमी पुरस्कार  winner .
Misfits is a British science fiction comedy-drama television show about a group of  यंग अपराधियों sentenced to कार्य  in a community service programme , where they obtain supernatural powers after a strange electrical storm .
The series  खोली in 2009 और is फिलहाल  ongoing .
Antonia Thomas , Iwan Rheon , Lauren Socha , Nathan Stewart-Jarrett , and Robert Sheehan  हैं introduced as अलीशा डैनियल्स , साइमन bellamy  , Kelly Bailey , Curtis Donovan , and Nathan Young respectively .
Sheehan left after the second series , replaced in  the तीसरा by जोसेफ gilgun  as Rudy Wade .
After the fourth  श्रेणी थी घोषित rheon , थामस और socha था बाएँ उनके भूमिकाएँ और होता be replaced by नई वर्ण  Karla Crome , Nathan McMullen and Matt Stokoe , as Jess , Finn and Alex respectively .
Midway  through the चौथी श्रेणी , stewart-jarrett  left while Natasha O'Keeffe joined the cast as Abbey Smith .
On 19 March 2013 , Channel 4 announced at a press event that they have  नवीनीकृत misfits लिये a पांचवां और फाइनल श्रेणी containing  8 episodes .
Brett Lorenzo Favre ( born October 10 , 1969 ) is a former American football quarterback who spent the majority of his  करियर साथ the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग  ( NFL ) .
He was a 20-year veteran of the NFL , having  निभाई क्वार्टरबैक लिये the अटलांटा falcons ( 1991 ) , ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स (  1992 – 2007 ) , New York Jets ( 2008 ) and Minnesota Vikings ( 2009 – 2010 ) .
favre is the तभी क्वार्टरबैक in एनएफएल इतिहास to  throw for over 70,000 yards , over 500 touchdowns , over 300 interceptions , over 6,000 completions , and over 10,000 pass attempts .
Favre started at the quarterback position for the University of  दक्षिणी मिसिसिपी लिये चार सालो पहले होने चयनित in the दूसरी गोलाकार of the 1991  NFL Draft by Atlanta ( 33rd overall ) .
He was traded to Green Bay on February 10 , 1992 , for the 19th pick  in the 1992 एनएफएल ड्राफ्ट  .
Favre became the Packers '  starting क्वार्टरबैक in the चौथी  game of the 1992 season , stepping in for injured quarterback Don Majkowski , and started every game through the 2007 season .
He was traded to the New York Jets and started at quarterback for the 2008 season before  हस्ताक्षर साथ the वाइकिंग्स on अगस्त 18 , 2009 as उनके starting  quarterback .
He made  an एनएफएल रिकार्ड 297 लगातार  starts ( 321 including playoffs ) .
He is the only player to win  the  AP Most Valuable Player three consecutive times ( 1995–97 ) .
He has led teams to eight division championships ( 1995 , 1996 , 1997  , 2002 , 2003 , 2004 , 2007 , 2009 ) , पाँच nfc चैंपियनशिप खेल ( 1995 , 1996 , 1997 , 2007 , 2009 ) , और दो सुपर कटोरी दिखावे ( सुपर  Bowl XXXI , Super Bowl XXXII ) , winning one ( Super Bowl XXXI ) .
He holds many NFL records , including  सबसे करियर touchdown गुजरता , सबसे करियर गुजर गज , सबसे करियर pass completions , सबसे करियर pass  attempts , most career interceptions thrown , most consecutive starts by a player , most consecutive starts by a quarterback , most career victories as a starting quarterback , most sacked , and most fumbles .
He is also  referred to by उसके उपनाम  `` The Gunslinger '' .
The following  is a सूची of notable वायुयान  hijackings around the world .
The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or W3 , commonly  ज्ञात  as the web ) , is a system of interlinked hypertext documents accessed via the Internet .
With a web browser , one can view web pages that may contain text ,  बिंब , वीडियो , और अन्य मल्टीमीडिया , और navigate between उन्हें via hyperlinks  .
Using concepts from his earlier  हाइपरटेक्स्ट प्रणालियों जैसे enquire , अंग्रेजों इंजीनियर , कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक और at कि समय कर्मचारी of the cern , सर टिम berners-lee  , now Director of the World Wide Web Consortium ( W3C ) , wrote a proposal in March 1989 for what would eventually become the World Wide Web .
At CERN , a European research organisation near  जेनेवा straddling the किनारा between फ़्रांस और स्विट्ज़रलैंड , berners-lee और belgian कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक रॉबर्ट cailliau प्रस्तावित in 1990  to use hypertext `` to link and access information of various kinds as a web of nodes in which the user can browse at will '' , and they publicly introduced the project in December of the same year .
Wayne Lyman Morse ( October 20 , 1900July 22 , 1974 ) was a  राजनेता और attorney इससे ऑरेगॉन , संयुक्त राज्य , ज्ञात लिये उसके proclivity  for opposing his parties ' leadership , and specifically for his opposition to the Vietnam War on constitutional grounds .
Born in Madison , Wisconsin , and  शिक्षित at the विश्वविद्यालयों of wisconsin-madison और the विश्वविद्यालयों of मिनेसोटा विधि स्कूल , मोर्स  moved to Oregon in 1930 and began teaching at the University of Oregon School of Law .
During World War II he was elected to the United States  सीनेट as a रिपब्लिकन ; he became an स्वतंत्र  after Dwight D. Eisenhower 's election to the presidency in 1952 .
जबकि an स्वतंत्र , he नियत a रिकार्ड लिये  performing the second longest one-person filibuster in the history of the Senate .
Morse joined  the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी in 1955  , and was reelected twice while a member of that party .
Morse made a brief run for the  लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी 's  presidential nomination in 1960 .
A few years later , Morse was one of only two Senators who opposed the Gulf of Tonkin Resolution , which authorized the  अध्यक्ष to लो सैन्य कार्रवाई in वियतनाम बगैर a घोषणा of युद्ध .
He  जारी to बोलो आउट विरूद्ध the युद्ध  in the ensuing years , and lost his 1968 bid for reelection to Bob Packwood , who criticized his strong opposition to the war .
Morse made two more bids  लिये reelection to the सीनेट पहले उसके  death in 1974 .
In parliamentary  कार्यविधि , a गति to तालिका रै  two different and contradictory meanings:
In the United States , to table usually means the to lay [ the topic ] on the table or to move for  postponement of विचार ; a प्रस्ताव to बर्खास्तगी विचार of a स्थगित  motion .
much कम प्रायः , it अर्थात् a गति  to `` put on the table '' : a proposal to begin consideration ( or reconsideration ) , a usage consistent with the rest of the English-speaking world .
In the rest of the English-speaking world such as the United Kingdom , to  तालिका अर्थात् to मूव to प्लेस [ the टॉपिक ] upon the तालिका ( or to मूव to प्लेस  on the table ) : a proposal to begin consideration ( or reconsideration ) of a proposal .
Both the American and the British dialects have the  भाव of `` to तालिका '' as to lay [ the टॉपिक ] on  the table or to cause [ the topic ] to lie on the table .
The difference is the idea of what the table is for , that of a shelf off to the  पक्ष , or an क्रियाशील  work bench .
The British meaning has the  भाव of the तालिका as होने an क्रियाशील कार्य बेंच , साथ the टॉपिक होने the बीच of ध्यान , माना और discussed by सब जबतक  it can be resolved , at which point it is taken off the 'table ' .
the अमरीकी भाव is कि the तालिका is जैसे कि of a शेल्फ , अभिलेख  , or long-term storage device , where the topic has been disposed of by sending it to the 'table ' and leaving it there .
Toy Story 3 is a 2010 American 3D computer  एनिमेटेड comedy-drama थाना फिल्मी , और the तीसरा  installment in the Toy Story series .
It was  उत्पादित by पिक्चर्स एनिमेशन  Studios and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures .
Directed  by ली unkrich , the फिल्मी थी released  worldwide from June through October in Disney Digital 3-D , RealD , and IMAX 3D .
Toy Story  3 थी  also the first film to be released theatrically with Dolby Surround 7.1 sound .
The screenplay was written by Michael  arndt , जबकि unkrich लिखा the स्टोरी साथ साथ  John Lasseter and Andrew Stanton , respectively director and co-writer of the two first films .
The plot focuses on the toys Woody , Buzz Lightyear , and their friends dealing with  an अनिश्चित भविष्य as उनके मालिक , एंडी  , prepares to leave for college .
Actors Tom Hanks , Tim  एलन , जोन cusack , डॉन rickles , estelle हैरिस , जॉन ratzenberger  , Wallace Shawn , Jeff Pidgeon , Jodi Benson , R. Lee Ermey , John Morris , and Laurie Metcalf reprised their voice-over roles from the previous films .
Jim Varney ,  जो निभाई slinky श्वान in the पहला दो  films , and Joe Ranft , who portrayed Lenny and Wheezy , both died before production began on Toy Story 3 .
The role of  slinky श्वान थी लिया over by ब्लेक क्लार्क ( a dost of varney ) ,  while Ranft 's characters and various others were written out of the story .
New characters include performances by Ned  beatty , टिमोथी डाल्टन , क्रिस्टन schaal , bonnie  Hunt , Whoopi Goldberg , Jeff Garlin , Richard Kind , and Michael Keaton .
The feature broke Shrek the Thirds record as the  biggest खोलने दिन उत्तर अमरीकी सकल लिये an एनिमेटेड  film unadjusted for inflation , and a big opening with an unadjusted gross of $ 110,307,189 .
It is also the highest-grossing opening weekend for a Pixar film , as well as the highest-grossing  खोलने वीकेंड  for a film to have opened in the month of June .
इस is the highest-grossing फिल्मी of  2010 , both in the United States and Canada , and worldwide .
In early August , it became Pixar 's highest-grossing film at the North American box office ( surpassing  ढूंढना nemo ) , और the highest-grossing एनिमेटेड फिल्मी of सब समय  worldwide ( surpassing Shrek 2 ) ; later that month , Toy Story 3 became the first ever animated film in history to make over $ 1 billion worldwide .
It is currently  the 10th-highest-grossing  film of all time .
खिलौना स्टोरी 3 थी मनोनीत लिये पाँच अकादमी पुरस्कार  , including Best Picture , Best Adapted Screenplay , and Best Sound Editing .
It  थी the तीसरा एनिमेटेड  film ( after Beauty and the Beast and Up ) to be nominated for Academy Award for Best Picture .
It won the awards for Best  एनिमेटेड विशेषता और बेहतरीन असली सोंग  .
जॉन levell starks  ( born August 10 , 1965 ) is an American retired professional basketball shooting guard .
Starks was listed at 6'5 '' and  190 पाउंड दौरान उसके एनबीए  playing career .
Although he was not drafted in the 1988 NBA Draft after attending four colleges in his native Oklahoma , including Oklahoma State University , he gained fame while playing for the New York  knicks of the नेशनल बास्केट संघ  in the 1990s .
Secure Digital or ( SD ) is a non-volatile memory card format for use in portable devices , such as mobile phones ,  डिजिटल कैमरे , gps नेविगेशन डिवाइस , और टैब्लेट कंप्यूटर .
The Secure Digital standard is maintained by the SD Card  संघ ( sda )  .
SD  technologies have महरूम implemented in अधिक than 400 ब्रांड्स  across dozens of product categories and more than 8,000 models .
The Secure Digital format includes four card families  उपलब्धियाँ in तीन अलग रूप कारकों  .
The four families are the original Standard-Capacity (  sdsc ) , the high-capacity ( sdhc ) , the extended-capacity ( sdxc ) ,  and the SDIO , which combines input/output functions with data storage .
The  तीन रूप कारकों हैं the असली आकार  , the `` mini '' size , and the `` micro '' size ( see illustration ) .
There are many combinations of form  कारकों और यंत्र परिवारों  .
Electrically passive adapters allow the  उपयोग of a छोटी कार्ड in a मेजबान यंत्र  built to hold a larger card .
Host devices that comply with  नए संस्करण of the specification provide पिछड़ा  compatibility and accept older SD cards , but this article explains several factors that can prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A newer card may offer greater capacity than the host  यंत्र can हैंडल  .
A newer card may use a file system the host  यंत्र can नहीं navigate  .
Use of an SDIO card requires the host device be designed for the  input/output कृत्यों the कार्ड provides  .
The organization of the card was changed  starting साथ the sdhc परिवार  .
Some vendors produced SDSC cards above 1 GB before the  sda था मानकीकृत a विधि of  doing so .
The SDA uses several  trademarked लोगो to enforce अनुपालन साथ इसके  specifications and assure users of compatibility .
Hugh John Mungo Grant ( born 9 September 1960 ) is a  अंग्रेजों कर्ता और फिल्मी निर्माता .
He has received a Golden  ग्लोब , a  BAFTA , and an Honorary César .
His films have earned  अधिक than us $ 2.4 अरब इससे  25 theatrical releases worldwide .
Grant achieved international stardom after appearing in  रिचर्ड कर्टिस 's कामयाब चार विवाह  and a Funeral ( 1994 ) .
He used this breakthrough role as a frequent cinematic persona  दौरान the 1990s , delivering कॉमिक प्रदर्शन in  mainstream films like Mickey Blue Eyes ( 1999 ) and Notting Hill ( 1999 ) .
By the turn of the 21st century , he had established  खुद as a अग्रणी man skilled साथ a satirical कॉमिक हुनर  .
Grant has expanded his oeuvre with critically acclaimed turns as a cad in Bridget Jones 's  डायरी ( 2001 ) , परिचय a लड़के ( 2002 ) , प्रेम दरअसल ( 2003  ) , and American Dreamz ( 2006 ) .
He later played against type with multiple cameo  भूमिकाएँ in the एपिक नाटक फिल्मी बादल एटलस ( 2012 )  .
Within the film industry , Grant is  cited as an anti-film स्टार जो approaches उसके भूमिकाएँ जैसे a अक्षर  actor , and attempts to make his acting appear spontaneous .
Hallmarks of his comic skills include a nonchalant  टच of विडंबना / sarcasm और पढ़ाई शारीरिक mannerisms  as well as his precisely-timed dialogue delivery and facial expressions .
The entertainment  मीडिया 's कवरेज of ग्रान्ट 's जीवन बंद  the big screen has often overshadowed his work as a thespian .
he रै महरूम गायन परिचय उसके अनादर लिये the व्यवसायिक of  acting , and in his disdain towards the culture of celebrity and hostility towards the media .
In a career spanning 30 years , Grant has repeatedly  claimed कि एक्टिंग is नहीं a सच्चा  calling but just a job he fell into .
The Han Dynasty ( ; ) ( 206 BC – 220 AD ) was an imperial dynasty of China , preceded by the Qin Dynasty (  221–207 bc ) और succeeded by the तीन kingdoms (  220–280 AD ) .
It was founded by the rebel leader  लियू बंग , ज्ञात  posthumously as Emperor Gaozu of Han .
It was  briefly बाधित by the xin राजवंश  ( 9–23 AD ) of the former regent Wang Mang .
