This interregnum separates the Han into two  अवधि : the पश्चिमी हान ( 206 bc – 9  AD ) and Eastern Han ( 25–220 AD ) .
Spanning over four centuries , the period of  the हान राजवंश is माना a  golden age in Chinese history .
To this day , China 's majority ethnic group refers to itself as  the `` हान लोगों '' और the चाइनीज स्क्रिप्ट is referred to  as `` Han characters `` .
The Han Empire was divided into areas directly controlled by the central government , known  as commanderies , और a क्रमांक of semi-autonomous  kingdoms .
These kingdoms gradually lost all  vestiges of उनके स्वतंत्रता , विशेषकर following  the Rebellion of the Seven States .
The Xiongnu , a nomadic confederation which dominated the eastern Eurasian Steppe  , पराजित the हान फौज in बैटल  in 200 BC .
Following the defeat , a political marriage alliance was  negotiated in जिससे the हान became the de facto  inferior partner .
When ,  despite the सन्धि , the xiongnu जारी to  raid Han borders , Emperor Wu of Han ( r. 141–87 BC ) launched several military campaigns against them .
The ultimate Han victory in these wars eventually forced the Xiongnu  to accept vassal औकात as हान tributaries .
These campaigns expanded Han sovereignty into the Tarim Basin of Central Asia and helped  स्थापित the विशाल व्यापार संजाल ज्ञात as the रेशा सड़क , जिससे पहुँचे as दूर  as the Mediterranean world .
Han forces managed to divide  the xiongnu into दो स्पर्धा राष्ट्र , the दक्षिणी  and Northern Xiongnu , and forced the Northern Xiongnu across the Ili River .
Despite these victories , the territories north of Han  's सीमायें यहूद जल्दी overrun by  the nomadic Xianbei Confederation .
After 92 AD , the palace eunuchs increasingly involved themselves in court politics , engaging in violent power struggles between the various  consort clans of the empresses और सम्राज्ञी dowagers , causing the हान 's परम  downfall .
Imperial authority was also seriously challenged by large Daoist religious societies which instigated  the पीला पगड़ी विद्रोह और the पाँच pecks of राइस विद्रोह  .
Following the death of Emperor Ling ( r. 168–189 AD ) , the palace eunuchs suffered wholesale massacre by military officers , allowing  सदस्यों of the aristocracy और सैन्य राज्यपालों to become  warlords and divide the empire .
When Cao Pi , King of Wei , usurped the throne from  सम्राट xian , the हान राजवंश ceased to मौजूद  .
The Han Dynasty was an age of economic prosperity and saw a significant growth of the money economy  पहला स्थापित दौरान the झोऊ राजवंश  ( c. 1050–256 BC ) .
The coinage issued  by the सेंट्रल सरकारी मिंट in 119 bc  remained the standard coinage of China until the Tang Dynasty ( 618–907 AD ) .
To pay for its military campaigns and the settlement of newly conquered  frontier territories , the सरकारी राष्ट्रीयकृत the निजी नमक और आयरन  industries in 117 BC .
These government monopolies were repealed during the Eastern Han period , and the lost revenue was recouped through heavily taxing  निजी उद्यमियों  .
the सम्राट थी at  the pinnacle of Han society .
He presided over the Han  सरकारी लकिन साझा शक्ति साथ दोनो the धामों  and appointed ministers who came largely from the scholarly gentry class .
From the reign of Emperor Wu  onward , the चाइनीज अदालत officially प्रायोजित confucianism  in education and court politics , synthesized with the cosmology of later scholars such as Dong Zhongshu .
This policy endured  जबतक the पतन of the  Qing Dynasty in 1911 AD .
Science and technology  दौरान the हान  period saw significant advances , including papermaking , the nautical steering rudder , the use of negative numbers in mathematics , the raised-relief map , the hydraulic -powered armillary sphere for astronomy , and a seismometer employing an inverted pendulum .
Tourette syndrome ( also called Tourette 's syndrome , Tourette 's disorder , Gilles de la Tourette syndrome , GTS or , more commonly , simply Tourette 's or TS ) is an inherited neuropsychiatric disorder with onset in childhood ,  characterized by अनेक शारीरिक ( मोटर ) tics और at तनिक एक गायन  ( phonic ) tic .
These tics  characteristically मोम और wane  , can be suppressed temporarily , and are preceded by a premonitory urge .
Tourette 's is defined as part of a spectrum of tic disorders  , जिससे शामिल क्षणिक और दीर्घकालिक  tics .
Tourette 's was  एकबार माना a विरल और विचित्र सिंड्रोम , सबसे प्रायः संबद्ध  with the exclamation of obscene words or socially inappropriate and derogatory remarks ( coprolalia ) , but this symptom is present in only a small minority of people with Tourette 's .
Tourette 's is no longer considered a rare condition , but it is not  सदा correctly पहचाना क्युकी  most cases are mild and the severity of tics decreases for most children as they pass through adolescence .
Between 0.4 % and 3.8 % of  children आयु 5 to 18 may have tourette 's ; the व्यापकता of क्षणिक और दीर्घकालिक  tics in school-age children is higher , with the more common tics of eye blinking , coughing , throat clearing , sniffing , and facial movements .
Extreme Tourette 's in adulthood is a rarity , and Tourette 's does not  adversely affect प्रज्ञा or जीवन प्रत्याशा  .
Genetic and  पर्यावरणीय कारकों खेल a भूमिका in the etiology  of Tourette 's , but the exact causes are unknown .
in सबसे मामले  , medication is unnecessary .
There is no  प्रभावी उपचार लिये प्रत्येक मामला  of tics , but certain medications and therapies can help when their use is warranted .
Education is an important part of any treatment  योजना , और स्पष्टीकरण और reassurance  alone are often sufficient treatment .
Comorbid conditions ( co-occurring diagnoses other than Tourette 's ) such  as attention-deficit अतिसक्रियता विकार ( adhd ) और obsessive–compulsive विकार ( ओसीडी ) हैं उपस्थित  in many patients seen in tertiary specialty clinics .
These other conditions often cause more functional impairment to the individual than the tics that are the hallmark of Tourette 's , hence  it is महत्वपूर्ण to correctly पहचानो comorbid शर्तें और  treat them .
The eponym was bestowed by Jean-Martin Charcot ( 1825–1893 ) on behalf of his resident , Georges Albert Édouard Brutus  गाइल्स de la tourette ( 1859–1904 ) , a फ्रेंच चिकित्सक और neurologist  , who published an account of nine patients with Tourette 's in 1885 .
Sunbeam  बैज .
Sunbeam was a marque  पंजीकृत by जॉन marston  Co. Ltd of Wolverhampton , England , in 1888 .
The company first made bicycles , then motorcycles and cars from the late 19th century  जबतक परिचय 1936 , और लागू the marque to सब  three forms of transportation .
The company also  manufactured एयरो इंजन in the पहला संसार युद्ध  and 647 aircraft during the Second World War .
A Sunbeam was the first British car to win a Grand  प्रिक्स रेस , और नियत a क्रमांक  of land speed records .
The company  गई into receivership in 1935 और थी खरीदा  by the Rootes Group , which continued to use the Sunbeam marque .
Fox News Channel ( FNC ) , also known as Fox News , is a cable news channel owned by  the फॉक्स entertainment समूह , a subsidiary of न्यूज निगम  .
As of April 2009 , the channel was available to 102  लाख households in the संयुक्त राज्य और to दर्शक internationally  , broadcasting primarily from its New York studios .
The channel was created by Australian-American media mogul Rupert Murdoch  , जो नियुक्त पूर्व एनबीसी कार्यपालिका रोजर ailes as इसके  founding CEO .
It  शुभारम्भ on अक्तूबर  7 , 1996 to 17 million cable subscribers .
It grew during the late 1990s and 2000s to become the dominant  केबल न्यूज संजाल in the संयुक्त  States .
Critics have  stated कि फॉक्स न्यूज चैनल promotes रूढ़िवादी  political positions and biased reporting .
टीकाकारों , न्यूज anchors , और पत्रकारों at फॉक्स न्यूज चैनल have responded कि न्यूज रिपोर्टिंग और राजनैतिक  commentary operate independently of each other , and have denied any bias in news reporting .
The mandibular first molar or six-year molar is the tooth located distally ( away from the midline  of the फेस ) इससे दोनो the mandibular दूसरी premolars of the मुँह लकिन mesial  ( toward the midline of the face ) from both mandibular second molars .
It is located on the  mandibular ( निम्नतर ) मेहराब of the मुँह , और generally opposes the ऊर्ध्वहनु  ( upper ) first molars and the maxillary 2nd premolar in normal class I occlusion .
The  फलन of इस molar is समान to कि  of all molars in regard to grinding being the principal action during mastication , commonly known as chewing .
There are usually five well-developed cusps on  mandibular पहला molars : दो on the buccal ( पक्ष निकटतम the गाल  ) , two lingual ( side nearest the tongue ) , and one distal .
There are great differences between the  पतझड़ी ( baby ) mandibular molars और  those of the permanent mandibular molars , even though their function are similar .
The  स्थाई mandibular  molars are not considered to have any teeth that precede it .
Despite being named molars , the deciduous molars  हैं followed by स्थाई premolars  .
In the  सार्वभौमिक प्रणाली of संकेतन , the पतझड़ी mandibular  first molars are designated by a letter written in uppercase .
The right  पतझड़ी mandibular पहला  molar is known as `` S '' , and the left one is known as `` L '' .
The international notation has a different  प्रणाली of संकेतन  .
Thus , the right deciduous mandibular first molar is known as `` 84 '' ,  और the बाएँ एक is ज्ञात  as `` 74 '' .
In the  सार्वभौमिक प्रणाली of संकेतन  , the permanent mandibular first molars are designated by a number .
The right permanent  mandibular पहला molar is ज्ञात as `` 30  '' , and the left one is known as `` 19 '' .
The Palmer notation uses a number in  संयोजन साथ a प्रतीक designating  in which quadrant the tooth is found .
For this tooth  , the बाएँ और सही पहला molars होता have the वही क्रमांक , ``  6 '' , but the right one would have the symbol , `` ┐ '' , over it , while the left one would have , `` ┌ '' .
The international notation has a different numbering system than  the पिछला दो , और the सही स्थाई mandibular पहला molar is ज्ञात as `` 46 '' , और the बाएँ  one is known as `` 36 '' .
mandibular प्राथमिक  first molars usually have four pulp horns .
The first molar is usually the first permanent tooth to  erupt और  has adult undertones .
Anatomy : The mandibular first molar has five cusps : the mesiobuccal ( MB , toward midline and cheek ) , mesiolingual ( ML , toward midline and tongue ) , distolingual ( DL , away from midline and towards tongue ) ,  distobuccal ( db , दूर इससे midline और toward गाल ) , और distal ( d , दूर इससे midline ) , सूचीबद्ध in अनुक्रम  of decreasing size .
Listed in order of decreasing height they are : ML , DL , DF , MF ,  और D. an आठवीं cusp थी मिला in a प्राथमिक दूसरी निम्नतर molar  in an Argentinean child .
Viewed from the top of the tooth ( occlusal view ) , the mandibular first molar is pentagonal ( five sided ) in shape and tapers toward the lingual , with the  पहलू होने the buccal सतह , the mesial सतह , the lingual सतह , distal  surface , and the distobuccal surface .
The  occlusal सतह रै  four grooves .
The central groove is not straight but runs down  the बीच of the दाँत mesially to distally और contains चार गड्ढों ( mesial  , central , central , and distal ) .
The distobuccal groove runs from  the distal गड्ढे in the सेंट्रल नाली distobuccally  separating the distal and distobuccal cusps .
The lingual groove runs from the more distal of the central pits in the central  नाली toward the lingual सतह between the mesiolingual और distolingual पुलिन  .
The buccal groove runs from the more mesial of the central pits in the central groove  toward the buccal सतह between the mesiobuccal और distobuccal  cusps ending in the buccal pit .
The portion of the central  नाली between the सेंट्रल गड्ढों  is termed the Lewis offset and is mandatory to account for the locations of the buccal and lingual grooves ( buccal groove being more mesial than the lingual groove while they are parallel ) .
From the buccal (  buccal दृश्य ) , दो जड़ें  are present .
The distal root is  generally straighter , हालांकि दोनो प्रायः have a पतला  distal curvature .
The heights of contour on the mesial and distal contact the adjacent teeth and are located at the  जंक्शन of the occlusal और मध्य तिहाई  of the crown .
The Florida Legislature is the two houses that act as the state  विधानमंडल of the u.S. राज्य  of Florida .
The Florida Constitution states that `` The legislative power  of the राज्य shall be vested in a विधानमंडल of  the State of Florida , '' composed of a Senate and House of Representatives .
The  विधानमंडल is seated at the  Florida State Capitol in Tallahassee .
stained कांच चित्रण  of Daniel interceding with Arioch , the king 's guard .
Arioch  था महरूम चार्ज साथ हत्या सब the हिकमत मेन बाद वे  were not able to interpret Nebuchadnezzar 's dream .
Daniel 2  is the दूसरी अध्याय of the किताब  of Daniel in the Hebrew Bible .
The chapter 's source text  is predominantly लिखा  in Aramaic .
According to the text ,  nebuchadnezzar is the  king of Babylon who is troubled by his dreams .
He demands  an निर्वचन लिये उसके सपनो or  will have his mystic interpreters executed .
डेनियल seeks दैवी अक्ल to interpret the  king 's dreams and praises God with a short psalm .
God  देता डेनियल a दृष्टि in  the night to reveal the king 's dream .
Able to satisfy the  किंग , डेनियल is प्रचारित  over the whole province of Babylon .
एक comcast बीच  , the headquarters of Comcast in Philadelphia , PA .
the बूढ़ा comcast लोगो इससे  1969 to 1999 , when it was replaced with the crescent logo .
The Comcast Corporation is an  अमरीकी प्रदाता of entertainment , सूचना  and communications products and services .
It is the largest cable  ऑपरेटर , एक of the biggest द्रव्यमान मीडिया , घर अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाता , और तीसरा largest घर टेलीफोन सेवा प्रदाता in the संयुक्त राज्य , providing केबल टेलीविज़न , ब्रॉडबैंड  Internet , telephone service and in some areas home security ( including burglar alarms , surveillance cameras , fire alarm systems and home automation ) to both residential and commercial customers in 40 states and the District of Columbia .
The company is  headquartered in फिलाडेल्फिया , पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
In 2011 , Comcast acquired a 51 % majority stake in media conglomerate NBCUniversal  इससे ge in जनवरी 2011 , और began the प्रक्रम of खरीदना the बाकी  49 % on February 12 , 2013 , at a cost of $ 16.7 billion .
it समाप्त  the purchase on March 19 , 2013 .
Comcast also has  significant पकड़कर  in several cable networks ( including E !
Entertainment Television , Style Network , G4 , the Golf Channel and NBC Sports Network ) ,  वितरण ( theplatform ) , और सम्बन्धित व्यवसायों  .
Comcast has been the subject of criticism for activities including  इसके stance on जाल neutrality , as खूब as ग़रीब परिणाम on ग्राहक संतोष  surveys .
Porcupines are rodents with a coat of sharp spines , or  quills , कि बचाव और camouflage  them from predators .
They are indigenous to the  americas , दक्षिणी एशिया ,  and Africa .
Porcupines are the third largest of the rodents  , पीछे the capybara और the बीवर  .
Most  porcupines हैं परिचय long  , with an long tail .
weighing  , they are rounded , large and slow .
porcupines आइये in विभिन्न  shades of brown , gray , and the unusual white .
Porcupines ' spiny protection resembles that of the unrelated  erinaceomorph hedgehogs और monotreme  echidnas .
the आम साही  is a herbivore .
It eats leaves , herbs , twigs and green plants like skunk cabbage  और क्लोवर और in the शीत it may खा छाल  .
The North  अमरीकी साही प्रायः  climbs trees to find food .
The African porcupine is not a  climber और forages on the  ground .
It is  ज़्यादातर nocturnal , लकिन होगा  sometimes forage for food in the day .
Porcupines  have become a pest  in Kenya and are eaten as a delicacy .
The name porcupine comes  इससे मध्य फ्रेंच porc espin  ( spined pig ) .
A regional  अमरीकी नाम लिये the  animal is quill pig .
First page of US patent  129,843 लिये सुधार in lubricators  for Steam-Engines
Elijah J. McCoy ( May 2 , 1844 – October 10 ,  1929 ) थी a ब्लैक canadian-american आविष्कारक और इंजीनियर , जो थी notable लिये उसके 57 u.S. patents , सबसे  to do with lubrication of steam engines .
Born free in Canada , he returned as a five-year-old child with his family to the United States in  1847 , जहाँ he जिया लिये the बाकी of उसके जीवन और became a us नागरिक  .
Honda FCX Clarity , a hydrogen fuel  कोशिका demonstration गाडी  introduced in 2008
A hydrogen vehicle is a vehicle that uses  हाइड्रोजन as इसके onboard ईंधन लिये motive  power .
Hydrogen vehicles include hydrogen fueled space  rockets , as खूब as ऑटोमोबाइल और अन्य परिवहन  vehicles .
The  शक्ति पौधे of ऐसे वाहनों बदलें the रासायनिक उर्जा of हाइड्रोजन to mechanical  energy either by burning hydrogen in an internal combustion engine , or by reacting hydrogen with oxygen in a fuel cell to run electric motors .
Widespread use of hydrogen for fueling  परिवहन is a कुंजी तत्व of a प्रस्तावित  hydrogen economy .
Hydrogen fuel does not occur naturally on  धरती और यूँ is नहीं an उर्जा सोर्स  ; rather it is an energy carrier .
It is most frequently made from methane or other fossil fuels , but it can be produced using sources ( such as wind , solar ,  or नाभिकीय ) कि हैं intermittent , too व्याप्त or too cumbersome to सीधे  propel vehicles .
Integrated wind-to-hydrogen plants , using electrolysis of water ,  हैं exploring technologies to उद्धार लागत कम पर्याप्त , और quantities ग्रेट पर्याप्त  , to compete with traditional energy sources .
Many  कंपनियाँ हैं working to develop technologies कि might  efficiently exploit the potential of hydrogen energy for mobile uses .
The attraction of using hydrogen as an energy currency  is कि , if हाइड्रोजन is prepared बगैर using चट्टान ईंधन inputs ,  vehicle propulsion would not contribute to carbon dioxide emissions .
The drawbacks of hydrogen use are high capital cost , low energy content per unit volume , high tankage weights , very high storage vessel pressures , the storage ,  परिवहन और भरना of गैसीय or द्रव हाइड्रोजन in वाहनों , the विशाल निवेश in अवसंरचना कि होता be जरूरी to ईंधन वाहनों , और the inefficiency  of production processes .
Sacramento is  the पूंजी नगर of the u.S. राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया और  the seat of government of Sacramento County .
It is located at the confluence  of the sacramento नदी और the अमरीकी नदी in the  northern portion of California 's expansive Central Valley .
With an estimated 2011  जनसांख्यिकी of 477,891 , it is the sixth-largest नगर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the 35th  largest city in the United States .
sacramento is the कोर सांस्कृतिक और आर्थिक बीच of the sacramento महानगर क्षेत्रफल जिससे शामिल  seven counties with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123 .
Its metropolitan area is the fourth  largest in कैलिफ़ोर्निया बाद the वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल , सैन  Francisco Bay Area , and the San Diego metropolitan area , as well as the 25th largest in the United States .
sacramento थी cited by समय पत्रिका  as America 's most ethnically and racially integrated city in 2002 .
sacramento became a नगर through the प्रयत्न of the स्विस अप्रवासी जॉन  Sutter , Sr. , his son John Sutter , Jr. , and James W. Marshall .
Sacramento grew quickly thanks to the protection of Sutter 's  फोर्ट , जिससे थी स्थापित by sutter  in 1839 .
During the California Gold Rush , Sacramento was a major distribution  पाइंट , a वाणिज्यिक और agricultural बीच , और a  terminus for wagon trains , stagecoaches , riverboats , the telegraph , the Pony Express , and the First Transcontinental Railroad .
California State University , Sacramento , more commonly  ज्ञात as sacramento राज्य or सैक राज्य  , is the largest local university .
It is one of the  twenty-three campuses of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया  State University system .
Drexel University  sacramento is स्तिथ in शहर  , Sacramento .
University of the  प्रशांत 's mcgeorge स्कूल of विधि is स्तिथ  in the Oak Park neighborhood .
In addition , the University of California , Davis is  स्तिथ in आसपास डेविस , वेस्ट of the पूंजी  .
The UC Davis Medical Center , a  world-renowned शोध हॉस्पिटल , is  located in the city of Sacramento .
The  ठहराना स्टोर is a कड़ी of खुदरा स्टोर्स स्वामित्व और संचालित  by Apple Inc. , dealing in computers and consumer electronics .
The stores sell Macintosh personal  कंप्यूटर  , software , iPods , iPads , iPhones , third-party accessories , and other consumer electronics such as Apple TV .
Some high profile stores feature a Theatre  लिये प्रस्तुतियों और वर्कशॉप और a स्टुडियो लिये प्रशिक्षण साथ ठहराना  products ; all stores offer a Genius Bar for technical support and repairs , as well as free workshops available to the public .
Under the leadership of Ron Johnson , the former Senior Vice President of Retail Operations , the Apple Stores have , according to  an आलेख in the नई यॉर्क टाइम्स , महरूम जिम्मेदार लिये `` [ turning ] the उबाऊ कंप्यूटर बिक्री मंजिल into a sleek playroom  filled with gadgets '' .
, Apple has 405 stores worldwide , with global sales of billion in  merchandise in 2011 , और वे सीसे the संयुक्त राज्य खुदरा मार्केट  in terms of sales per unit area .
स्टीवन पॉल `` स्टीव '' कार्य ( ; फ़रवरी 24 , 1955 – अक्तूबर  5 , 2011 ) was an American entrepreneur and inventor , best known as the co-founder , chairman , and CEO of Apple Inc .
through ठहराना , he थी widely पहचाना as a charismatic पायोनियर  of the personal computer revolution and for his influential career in the computer and consumer electronics fields , transforming `` one industry after another , from computers and smartphones to music and movies ... ''
Jobs also co-founded and served as chief executive of Pixar Animation Studios ; he  became a सदस्य of the  board of directors of The Walt Disney Company in 2006 , when Disney acquired Pixar .
Jobs was among the first to see the commercial potential of Xerox PARC  's चूहा -ड्राइवn आलेखीय उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस , जिससे led to the सृष्टि of the  Apple Lisa and , one year later , the Macintosh .
He also played a role in introducing the  laserwriter , एक of the पहला widely उपलब्धियाँ लेज़र  printers , to the market .
After a power struggle with the board of directors in 1985 , Jobs left Apple and founded NeXT , a computer  मंच विकास कम्पनी specializing in the higher-education और कारोबार  markets .
In 1986 , he acquired the  कंप्यूटर ग्राफिक्स प्रभाग of लुकासफ़िल्म  , which was spun off as Pixar .
He was  credited in खिलौना स्टोरी  ( 1995 ) as an executive producer .
He served  as सीईओ और बहुमत shareholder जबतक डिज़्नी  's purchase of Pixar in 2006 .
In 1996 , after Apple had failed  to उद्धार इसके ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली , copland , gil amelio turned to अगला कंप्यूटर ,  and the NeXTSTEP platform became the foundation for the Mac OS X .
Jobs returned to  ठहराना as an सलाहकार  , and took control of the company as an interim CEO .
Jobs brought Apple from  निकट दिवालियापन to profitability  by 1998 .
As the new CEO of the company , Jobs oversaw the  विकास of the imac , itunes , ipod , iphone , और ipad , और on the सेवाएं पक्ष , the कम्पनी 's ठहराना  Retail Stores , iTunes Store and the App Store .
The success of these products and services provided several years of stable  वित्तीय रिटर्न , और propelled ठहराना to become the संसार 's सबसे मूल्यवान सरेआम  traded company in 2011 .
The reinvigoration of the company is  regarded by अनेक टीकाकारों as एक of the  greatest turnarounds in business history .
In 2003  , कार्य थी diagnosed साथ a  pancreas neuroendocrine tumor .
Though it was initially treated , he reported a hormone imbalance , underwent a liver  प्रत्यारोपण in 2009 , और appeared progressively thinner as  his health declined .
On medical leave for most of 2011 , Jobs resigned in August that year , and  थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष  of the Board .
He died of respiratory arrest related to his metastatic  ट्यूमर on अक्तूबर 5  , 2011 .
Jobs received a number of honors and public recognition for  उसके influence in the प्रौद्योगिकी  and music industries .
He has been referred to as ``  legendary '' , a `` futurist '' or बस `` दूरदर्शी '' , और रै महरूम वर्णित  as the `` Father of the Digital Revolution '' , a `` master of innovation '' , and a `` design perfectionist '' .
Entrance to  खण्ड ( 52 ) of the कोलोसियम  , with numerals still visible
Roman numerals , the numeric system  in प्राचीन रोम , उपयोग combinations of अक्षर इससे the लैटिन  alphabet to signify values .
The numbers 1 to  10 can be expressed  in Roman numerals as follows:
और  .
The  रोमन numeral प्रणाली is a cousin  of Etruscan numerals .
Use of Roman numerals continued after the decline of  the रोमन साम्राज्य .
From  the 14th सदी on , रोमन numerals began to be replaced in सबसे contexts by  more convenient Hindu-Arabic numerals ; however this process was gradual , and the use of Roman numerals in some minor applications continues to this day .
Effective  नाभिकीय चार्ज आरेख
The effective nuclear charge ( often symbolize as or Z* ) is the net positive  चार्ज अनुभवी by an इलेक्ट्रॉन in a multi-electron अणु  .
The term ``  प्रभावी '' is प्रयुक्त क्युकी the shielding प्रभाव of negatively चार्ज electrons  prevents higher orbital electrons from experiencing the full nuclear charge by the repelling effect of inner-layer electrons .
The  प्रभावी नाभिकीय चार्ज अनुभवी by the बाहरी शेल  electron is also called the core charge .
It is possible to determine the strength of the nuclear charge  by looking at the ऑक्सीकरण क्रमांक of the अणु  .
This is a list  of एपीसोड इससे the डिस्कवरी  Channel series , Storm Chasers .
A  ग्रामीण खींचें of i-5 , साथ दो गलियों in प्रत्येक दिशा अलग by a विशाल grassy  median , and with cross-traffic limited to overpasses and underpasses
The  ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर नेशनल प्रणाली of अंतरराज्यीय और रक्षा राजमार्गों ( commonly ज्ञात as the अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग प्रणाली , अंतरराज्यीय फ्रीवे  System , Interstate System , or simply the Interstate ) is a network of freeways that forms a part of the National Highway System of the United States .
The system is named for President Dwight D.  आइज़नहावर , जो championed  its formation .
Construction was authorized by the Federal Aid Highway Act of  1956 , और the असली portion  was completed 35 years later .
The network has since been extended , and , it had a total length of , making it the world 's second longest after China  's . , परिचय one-quarter of सब गाडी मील चलित in the देश उपयोग the  Interstate system .
The cost of construction has been estimated at $  425 अरब ( in  2006 dollars ) , making it the `` largest public works program since the Pyramids `` .
The system has contributed in  shaping the संयुक्त राज्य into a संसार आर्थिक महाशक्ति और  a highly industrialized nation .
.eu  is the देश कोड top-level डोमेन  ( ccTLD ) for the European Union ( EU ) .
Launched on 7 December 2005 , the domain is available  लिये संगठनों  in and residents of EU member states .
The TLD is administered by EURid , a consortium originally consisting of the  नेशनल  ccTLD registry operators of Belgium , Sweden , and Italy , joined later by the national registry operator of the Czech Republic .
Trademark  स्वामी यहूद समर्थ to submit  registrations through a sunrise period , in an effort to prevent cybersquatting .
Full  पंजीकरण प्रारंभ on  7 April 2006 .
Meister means master in German (  as in निपुण craftsman , or as an honorific  title such as Meister Eckhart ) .
The word is akin  to maestro  .
In sports , Meister is used for the current national , European or world  चैंपियन ( deutscher meister , *europameister , weltmeister )  .
अनेक आधुनिक दिन जर्मनी पुलिस शक्तियां  use the title Meister .
During the Second  संसार युद्ध , meister थी the  highest enlisted rank of the Ordnungspolizei .
meister रै महरूम उधार into अंग्रेज़ी  slang , where it is used in compound nouns .
A person referred to as “Meister” is one who has extensive theoretical knowledge and  व्यावहारिक कौशल in उसके व्यवसायिक , कारोबार , or कुछ अन्य दयालु of कार्य or कार्यकलाप  .
For example , a  “puzzle-meister” होता be किसी अत्यधिक  skilled at solving puzzles .
These neologisms sometimes have a sarcastic intent ( for example ,  “stubble-meister” लिये किसी साथ a छोटी , neat दाढ़ी  or “crier-meister” for someone who often cries ) .
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers is an American live-action children 's television series about teenagers with super-powers ,  आधारित on the 16th किश्त of the जापानी सुपर sentai मताधिकार , kyōryū  Sentai Zyuranger .
Both the show and its  सम्बन्धित merchandise देखी unbridled overnight  success , becoming a staple of 1990s pop culture in mere months .
Under the original name , `` Mighty Morphin Power Rangers '' the series ran from 1993  to 1995 और शाखित the विशेषता फिल्मी mighty morphin  Power Rangers : The Movie .
The second and third seasons of the show drew on footage and elements from the Super Sentai series Gosei Sentai Dairanger and  निंजा sentai kakuranger क्रमशः , हालांकि the zyuranger वेशभूषा यहूद स्टिल प्रयुक्त लिये the पाँच प्रमुख  Rangers and several regular villains .
Only the mecha and the Kiba Ranger costume ( worn by the White Ranger ) were retained from  dairanger लिये the दूसरी ऋतु , जबकि तभी the mecha इससे kakuranger यहूद प्रदर्शित  in the third season .
However the  kakuranger वेशभूषा यहूद बाद प्रयुक्त लिये the शीर्षक वर्ण  of the mini-series , Mighty Morphin Alien Rangers .
The series was produced by MMPR Productions  , वितरित by saban entertainment , और aired on फॉक्स बच्चे  .
The show 's merchandise was produced and distributed by  बंदाई entertainment  .
In 1996 , the  श्रेणी थी rebranded as the शक्ति रेंजरों मताधिकार ; renaming the श्रेणी प्रत्येक साल बाद , और  using costumes , props , and footage from subsequent Super Sentai series , as well as changing the cast and storyline .
While an overarching storyline  होता continue जबतक शक्ति रेंजरों खोया  Galaxy , subsequent series after MMPR are not sequels or spin-offs in the traditional sense .
In  2010 , a re-version of mighty morphin शक्ति रेंजरों , साथ a नई लोगो , कॉमिक book-referenced ग्राफिक्स , और अतिरिक्त वैकल्पिक  special effects , was broadcast on ABC Kids , and Bandai produced brand new toys to coincide with the series .
Edgar Allan Poe ( born Edgar Poe ; January 19 ,  1809 – अक्तूबर 7 , 1849 ) थी an अमरीकी लेखक , कवि , एडिटर और साहित्यिक आलोचक  , considered part of the American Romantic Movement .
Best known for his tales of mystery and the macabre , Poe was one of the  earliest अमरीकी practitioners of the छोटी  story and is generally considered the inventor of the detective fiction genre .
He is further credited with  contributing to the उभरते विधा  of science fiction .
He was the first well-known American writer to try to earn a living through writing alone ,  resulting in a financially मुश्किल जीवन  and career .
He was born as Edgar Poe in Boston , Massachusetts ; he was orphaned young when his mother died  shortly बाद उसके पिता abandoned the  family .
Poe was taken in by John and Frances Allan ,  of रिचमंड , वर्जिनिया  , but they never formally adopted him .
He attended the University of Virginia for  एक सेमेस्टर लकिन बाएँ due to कमी of धन  .
After enlisting in the Army and later failing as an officer 's cadet at  वेस्ट पाइंट , पो parted तरीके साथ the allans  .
His publishing career began  विनम्रतापूर्वक , साथ an बेनाम संग्रहण  of poems , Tamerlane and Other Poems ( 1827 ) , credited only to `` a Bostonian '' .
Poe switched his focus to prose and spent the next several years working for literary journals and periodicals , becoming known for  उसके अपना स्टाइल of साहित्यिक आलोचना  .
His work forced him to move among  अनेक शहरों , सहित बाल्टीमोर , फिलाडेल्फिया  , and New York City .
In  बाल्टीमोर in 1835 , he शादीशुदा  Virginia Clemm , his 13-year-old cousin .
In  जनवरी 1845 पो प्रकाशित उसके कविता  , `` The Raven `` , to instant success .
His  बीवी died of तपेदिक  two years after its publication .
he began नियोजन to उपज उसके अपना जर्नल  , The Penn ( later renamed The Stylus ) , though he died before it could be produced .
On October 7 , 1849 , at age 40 , Poe died in Baltimore ; the cause of his death is unknown and has been variously  attributed to दारू , दिमाग जमघट , हैजा , दवाएँ , दिल बीमारी , rabies  , suicide , tuberculosis , and other agents .
Poe and his works influenced literature in the United States and around the world  , as खूब as in specialized फ़ील्ड ,  such as cosmology and cryptography .
Poe and his work appear throughout  लोकप्रिय संस्कृति in साहित्य  , music , films , and television .
a क्रमांक of उसके घरों  are dedicated museums today .
The Mystery Writers of America present an  सालाना पुरस्कार ज्ञात as the एडगर पुरस्कार  for distinguished work in the mystery genre .
Lions are obligate carnivores ; they require up to  सात गामा ( 15 पाउंड ) of मांस  per day .
A major  घटक of उनके आहार is the  flesh of large mammals , like this African buffalo .
A carnivore ( ) meaning 'meat eater ' ( Latin , caro meaning 'meat ' or 'flesh ' and  vorare अर्थ 'to devour ' ) is an सजीव कि गर्भाशयी इसके उर्जा और  nutrient requirements from a diet consisting mainly or exclusively of animal tissue , whether through predation or scavenging .
Animals  कि निर्भर solely on एनिमल flesh लिये उनके  nutrient requirements are considered carnivores while those that also consume non-animal food are considered carnivores .
Omnivores also consume both animal and non-animal food , and apart from the more general definition , there is no clearly defined ratio of  संयंत्र to एनिमल सामग्री कि होता फर्क  a facultative carnivore from an omnivore .
A  carnivore कि sits at  the top of the foodchain is an apex predator .
Plants that capture and  डाइजेस्ट कीट हैं पुकारा  carnivorous plants .
Similarly , fungi that  कैप्चर microscopic पशु हैं प्रायः  called carnivorous fungi .
The FIFA World Cup , often simply the World Cup , is an  अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ फ़ुटबॉल प्रतियोगिता लडे by the वरिष्ठ मेन 's नेशनल  teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ) , the sport 's global governing body .
The championship has been awarded every four years since the inaugural tournament in 1930 , except  in 1942 और 1946 जब it थी नहीं  held because of the Second World War .
The current  champions हैं स्पेन  , who won the 2010 tournament .
The current format of the tournament involves 32 teams competing for the title at venues  भीतर the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a काल of परिचय a माह ; इस phase is प्रायः पुकारा the  World Cup Finals .
A qualification phase , which currently takes place  over the preceding तीन सालो  , is used to determine which teams qualify for the tournament together with the host nation ( s ) .
The 19 World Cup tournaments have been won by  आठ अलग नेशनल  teams .
Brazil have won five times , and they  हैं the तभी टोली to have निभाई in प्रत्येक टूर्नामेंट  .
The other World Cup winners are Italy , with four titles ; Germany , with three titles ;  अर्जेंटीना और inaugural विजेता उरुग्वे  , with two titles each ; and England , France , and Spain , with one title each .
The World  कप is the संसार 's सबसे widely viewed sporting इवेंट ;  an estimated 715.1 million people watched the final match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany .
The next three World Cups will be hosted by Brazil in 2014 , Russia in 2018  , और क़तर in 2022  .
Heroes is an American science fiction television drama series created by Tim Kring that appeared  on एनबीसी लिये चार सीज़न इससे सितंबर 25 , 2006 through  February 8 , 2010 .
The series tells the stories of ordinary people who discover superhuman abilities  , और कैसा ये abilities लो प्रभाव in the  characters ' lives .
The series emulates the aesthetic style and storytelling of American comic books , using  multi-episode स्टोरी arcs कि निर्माण upon a larger , अधिक encompassing चाप  .
The series was produced by  tailwind प्रोडक्शन्स in संघ  with Universal Media Studios .
It was filmed primarily  in लॉस एंजिल्स , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
Four complete seasons  aired , समाप्ति on फ़रवरी 8  , 2010 .
The  critically acclaimed पहला ऋतु था a चलाएं of 23 एपीसोड और garnered an औसत  of 14.3 million viewers in the United States , receiving the highest rating for an NBC drama premiere in five years .
The second season of Heroes attracted an average of 13.1 million viewers in the U.S. , and marked  एनबीसी 's एकमात्र श्रेणी among the शीर्ष 20 क्रमित कार्यक्रम in कुल  viewership for the 2007–2008 season .
Heroes has earned a number of awards and  nominations , सहित प्राइमटाइम एमी पुरस्कार , सुनहरी ग्लोब्स , लोगों  's Choice Awards and British Academy Television Awards .
An online extension of the  श्रेणी  , Heroes 360 Experience , later rebranded as Heroes Evolutions , was created to explore the Heroes universe and provides insight into the show 's mythology .
Other official Heroes media include  मैगज़ीन , कार्रवाई आंकड़े , tie-in और इंटरैक्टिव वेबसाइटों , a मोबाईल खेल , a  novel , clothing and other merchandise .
In the fall of 2008 , NBC Digital Entertainment released a series of online content for the summer ,  सहित अधिक असली वेब सामग्री , बेतार आईटीवी interactivity , ग्राफिक novels उपलब्धियाँ लिये मोबाईल देखने  and webisodes .
NBC announced Heroes  रद्दीकरण on may 14 , 2010  .
Afterward , the network  माना बनाना a टेलीविज़न खास इवेंट to conclude the श्रेणी ; however , on सितंबर 9 , 2010 , एनबीसी  announced the decision to stop any further development of the Heroes franchise .
Tim  क्रिंग तब सुझाया कि the व्यापक आधार of नायक storylines  allowed for the franchise to return for fans , but he did not specify when or in what media format .
On April 17 ,  2013 , tv लकीर reported कि एमएसएन थी in बाते  to revive the series with a new cast .
John Pierpont  `` J. p  . ''
Morgan ( April 17 , 1837 – March 31 , 1913 ) was an  अमरीकी फाइनेंसर , बैंकर , लोकसेवक और आर्ट  collector who dominated corporate finance and industrial consolidation during his time .
In 1892 Morgan arranged the merger of Edison General  इलेक्ट्रिक और thomson-houston इलेक्ट्रिक कम्पनी to रूप  General Electric .
After financing the creation of the Federal Steel Company , he merged in 1901 with the Carnegie Steel Company and several other steel and iron businesses , including Consolidated Steel and  तार कम्पनी स्वामित्व by विलियम edenborn , to रूप the  United States Steel Corporation .
Morgan  died in रोम , इटली , in उसके नींद in 1913 at the आयु of 75 , leaving उसके सौभाग्य  and business to his son , John Pierpont `` Jack '' Morgan , Jr. , and bequeathing his mansion and large book collections to The Morgan Library & Museum in New York .
At the height of Morgan 's career during the early 1900s , he and his partners had financial investments in many large  corporations और यहूद अभियुक्त by आलोचकों of controlling the स्वदेश 's ऊँची वित्त  .
He directed  the बैंकिंग गठबन्धन कि  stopped the Panic of 1907 .
He was the leading financier of the Progressive Era , and his  समर्पण to दक्षता और modernization  helped transform American business .
This  is a सूची of एपीसोड  of the television series .
The episodes were directed by Shigeru Ueda  और उत्पादित by the yggdrasil कार्यपालिका कमेटी  which included Xebec and Genco .
The plot of the episodes is set in Tokyo and revolves around Rin Asōgi , an immortal  निजी अन्वेषक , as वो explores the रहस्य of आधुनिक और near-future संसार और the अलौकिक कार्यक्रम कि घेर  the fictional society of immortals like herself .
There are large time gaps in the  आतंरिक कालक्रम between the पहला पाँच एपीसोड  , ranging from one to thirty years .
The six episodes  यहूद ब्रॉडकास्ट मासिक on at-x  channel in Japan , between February 3 and July 6 , 2008 .
Each episode is 45  मिनट्स long .
Two pieces of theme music are used for the episodes : the opening theme  `` alsatia '' और the समाप्ति थीम `` कारण अस्तव्यस्तता  '' .
Both were composed  और performed by the जापानी  metal band Galneryus .
The series was produced to  commemorate the दसवाँ वर्षगांठ  of the AT-X network it originally aired on .
Aerial photo of FLETC ,  जहाँ us डिजिटल forensics मानकों  were developed in the 1980s and '90s
Digital forensics ( sometimes known as digital forensic science ) is a branch of forensic science encompassing the  रिकवरी और छानबीन of सामग्री मिला in डिजिटल डिवाइस  , often in relation to computer crime .
The term digital  forensics थी originally प्रयुक्त as a पर्याय लिये कंप्यूटर forensics  but has expanded to cover investigation of all devices capable of storing digital data .
With roots in the personal computing revolution of the late 1970s and early '80s , the  अनुशासन विकसित in a haphazard manner दौरान the 1990s , और it थी नहीं जबतक  the early 21st century that national policies emerged .
डिजिटल forensics investigations  have a variety of applications .
The most common is to support or refute a hypothesis before criminal or civil ( as part of the  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक डिस्कवरी प्रक्रम ) न्यायालयों  .
Forensics may also feature in the private sector ; such as during internal corporate investigations or  intrusion छानबीन ( a विशेषज्ञ जांच into the प्रकृति और extent of an अनधिकृत  network intrusion ) .
The technical aspect of an investigation is divided into several sub-branches , relating to the type of digital devices involved ; computer forensics , network forensics ,  forensic आंकड़ा विश्लेषण और मोबाईल यंत्र forensics  .
The typical forensic process encompasses the seizure , forensic  इमेजिंग ( अधिग्रहण ) और विश्लेषण of डिजिटल मीडिया और  the production of a report into collected evidence .
As well as identifying direct evidence of a crime , digital forensics can be used  to विशेषता प्रमाण to विशिष्ट संदिग्धों , confirm alibis  or statements , determine intent , identify sources ( for example , in copyright cases ) , or authenticate documents .
investigations हैं much broader in पैमाना than अन्य क्षेत्रों of forensic विश्लेषण ( जहाँ the usual  aim is to provide answers to a series of simpler questions ) often involving complex time-lines or hypotheses .
A comparison of the  chromaticities enclosed  by some color spaces .
A color model is an  अमूर्त गणितीय मॉडल describing the रास्ता रंगों  can be represented as tuples of numbers , typically as three or four values or color components ( e.g . RGB and CMYK are color models ) .
However , a color model with no associated mapping function to an absolute color space is a more or  कम मनमानी रंग प्रणाली साथ no कनेक्शन to कोई globally समझा प्रणाली of रंग निर्वचन  .
Adding a certain mapping function between the  रंग मॉडल और a निश्चित सन्दर्भ रंग स्पेस परिणाम in a definite  `` footprint '' within the reference color space .
This `` footprint '' is known as a gamut , and , in combination  साथ the रंग मॉडल , defines a नई रंग स्पेस  .
For example , Adobe RGB and sRGB are two different  निरपेक्ष रंग स्पेसेस , दोनो आधारित on the आरजीबी  model .
In the most generic sense of the definition above , color  स्पेसेस can be पारिभाषित बगैर the उपयोग of a रंग  model .
These spaces , such as Pantone , are in  प्रभाव a दिए नियत of names or संख्याएँ जिससे हैं  defined by the existence of a corresponding set of physical color swatches .
This  आलेख focuses on the गणितीय  model concept .
Labor Day  is an अमरीकी संघीय अवकाश observed on the पहला सोमवार in सितंबर  , that celebrates the economic and social contributions of workers .
Life insurance is a contract between an  insured ( बीमे नीति होल्डर ) और an insurer , जहाँ the insurer वादे to अदा a designated  beneficiary a sum of money ( the `` benefits '' ) upon the death of the insured person .
Depending on the contract , other events such as terminal illness or  नाजुक बीमारी may भी ट्रिगर  payment .
The policy  होल्डर typically pays a प्रीमियम  , either regularly or as a lump sum .
Other expenses ( such as funeral  खर्च ) हैं भी sometimes शामिल  in the benefits .
Life policies are legal  अनुबंध और the शर्तें of the अनुबंध describe  the limitations of the insured events .
Specific exclusions are often written into the contract to limit the liability of the insurer ; common examples are claims  relating to आत्महत्या , धोखाधड़ी , युद्ध , riot और सिविल commotion  .
life-based अनुबंध  tend to fall into two major categories:
सुरक्षा नीतियों – designed to provide  a benefit in the event of specified event , typically a lump sum payment .
A common form of this  डिज़ाइन is पद बीमे  .
Investment policies – where  the प्रमुख उद्देश्य is to सुकर the विकास of  capital by regular or single premiums .
Common forms ( in the US ) are whole life ,  सार्वभौमिक जीवन और परिवर्तनीय  life policies .
