Mitzi  gaynor donahue ( born may 2 , 1962 in yorba लिंडा  , Orange County , California ) is an American actress , also credited and more popularly known as Mitzi Kapture .
Kapture  began उसके करियर in films  , most of which were not huge commercial successes .
She went on to make a few television  अतिथि दिखावे ( macgyver , 1st & टेन , और as a प्रतियोगी on the $ 100,000  Pyramid ) before she gained international exposure with her first major television role as Sergeant Rita Lee Lance in the television series Silk Stalkings .
Kapture 's role as Rita , the other half of the  दो `` sams '' लिये लगभग 5 सालो , cemented उसके  popularity .
Paired with Rob Estes who played Sergeant Chris Lorenzo , Kapture gained global  मान्यता साथ साथ उसके costar चूंकि the दिखाएँ थी ब्रॉडकास्ट in अनेक  countries .
Sergeant Lance eventually  became लेफ्टिनेंट तलवार by the समय kapture  left the series in 1995 to have her first child Madison .
During her time with the series , Kapture  briefly सत in the निदेशक 's कुर्सी , लिये दो एपीसोड  .
She was interviewed for the Silk Stalkings Season 1 DVD which was distributed by Anchor Bay  entertainment और  released in September 2004 .
After a  छोटी अंतराल इससे the स्क्रीन  following her exit from Silk Stalkings , Kapture returned in 1997 to the small screen and USA Network .
She played lead roles in two USA Pictures Originals telemovies , Perfect Crime ( based on a true story , also called Hide and Seek : The Joanne  जेन्सेन स्टोरी ) , जिससे भी स्ट्रक्चर चमेली  Guy and His Bodyguard .
She later starred in a few other  स्वतंत्र फिल्मी प्रोजेक्ट और थिएटर  productions and had several television guest appearances .
kapture भी था a पुनरावर्ती  role on Baywatch as Alexis Ryker .
She played Anita Hodges on The Young and the Restless from 2002 through 2004 , where she was  credited as mitzi kapture donahue , और स्ट्रक्चर in the made-for-tv फिल्म रात्रि of आतंक जिससे  premiered March 26 , 2006 on Lifetime Network .
Her latest is a supporting role in God 's Ears ,  released in  2007 .
Kapture is the official celebrity  प्रवक्ता लिये the xeroderma pigmentosum  Society .
The Xbox 360 is the  दूसरी वीडियो खेल कंसोल विकसित  by and produced for Microsoft and the successor to the Xbox .
The Xbox 360 competes with Sony 's PlayStation 3 and Nintendo 's Wii as  भाग of the सातवाँ पीढी of वीडियो  game consoles .
As of September 30 , 2012 , 70  लाख एक्सबॉक्स 360 consoles have महरूम बेची विश्वव्यापी  .
The Xbox 360 was officially unveiled on MTV on May 12 , 2005 , with detailed launch and game  सूचना divulged बाद कि माह at the इलेक्ट्रॉनिक entertainment  Expo ( E3 ) .
The  कंसोल बेची आउट completely  upon release in all regions except in Japan .
Several major features of the Xbox 360 are its integrated Xbox Live service that allows players to compete online ; download arcade games , game demos , trailers , TV  shows , म्यूज़िक और फिल्मों ; और इसके खिड़कियाँ मीडिया बीच मल्टीमीडिया सामर्थ्य  .
The Xbox Live also offers access to various ( often region-specific ) third-party  मीडिया स्ट्रीमिंग अनुप्रयोग  .
At their E3  प्रस्तुतीकरण on जून 14 , 2010 , microsoft घोषित a  redesigned Xbox 360 that would ship on the same day .
The redesigned console is slimmer than the previous Xbox 360 model and features integrated  802.11 b/g/n wi-fi , toslink s/pdif ऑप्टिकल ऑडियो आउटपुट , पाँच usb 2.0 पोर्ट ( compared to  the three from older versions ) and a special AUX port .
Older models of the Xbox  360 have चूंकि महरूम  discontinued .
The first new console to be released features a 250 GB  मुश्किल ड्राइव , जबकि a बाद , कम महंगी  SKU features 4 GB internal storage .
Backpack  may भी refer to a 2001  novel by Emily Barr
a आधुनिक  backpack
स्विस फौज backpack  ca . 1960
एकीकृत तुमको  frame .
A backpack ( also called rucksack , knapsack , packsack , pack ) is , in its simplest form , a cloth sack carried on one 's back and  secured साथ दो straps कि go over the कन्धों , लकिन वहीँ can  be exceptions .
Lightweight types of  backpacks हैं sometimes worn  on only one shoulder strap .
Backpacks are often preferred to handbags for carrying heavy loads or  carrying कोई sort of उपकरण , क्युकी of the सीमित  capacity to carry heavy weights for long periods of time in the hands .
Large backpacks , used to carry loads over 10 kg  ( 22 पाउंड ) , प्रायः offload the largest भाग ( up to  about 90 % ) of their weight onto padded hip belts , leaving the shoulder straps mainly for stabilising the load .
This improves the potential to carry heavy loads , as the hips  हैं stronger than the कन्धों , और  also increases agility and balance , since the load rides nearer the wearer 's own center of mass .
In ancient times , the backpack was used as a means to carry the hunter 's  larger खेल और अन्य प्रकार of शिकार और as a रास्ता  of easier transport for other materials .
In the cases of larger hunts , the hunters would dismember their prey and distribute the pieces of the animal around , each one packing the meat into many  wrappings और तब into बैग  which they placed on to their backs .
The bag itself was made up of different animal hide  और स्किन ( depending on कया sorts of पशु यहूद in the क्षेत्रफल ) और sewn साथ by  the intestines of said animals , which were woven together tightly to make a sturdy thread-like material .
Mexico ( ; ; ) , officially the United Mexican States (  ) , is a संघीय संवैधानिक गणतंत्र  in North America .
It is bordered on the north by the United States ; on the south and west by the Pacific  समंदर ; on the southeast by ग्वाटेमाला , बेलीज़ , और the caribbean समुद्र ; और on the ईस्ट  by the Gulf of Mexico .
Covering almost two million square kilometres ( over 760,000 sq mi ) , Mexico is  the पांचवां largest देश in the americas by कुल क्षेत्रफल और the 13th largest स्वतंत्र  nation in the world .
With an estimated population of over 113 million , it is the world 's eleventh most  populous देश और the सबसे populous spanish-speaking  country .
Mexico is a federation comprising thirty-one states and  a संघीय ज़िला , the  capital city .
In pre-Columbian Mexico many  संस्कृतियों matured into उन्नत सभ्यताओं ऐसे as the olmec , the toltec ,  the Teotihuacan , the Zapotec , the Maya and the Aztec before first contact with Europeans .
In 1521 , Spain conquered and colonized the territory from its base in  méxico-tenochtitlan , जिससे थी administered as the viceroyalty  of New Spain .
This  territory होता आखिरकार become  Mexico following recognition of the colony 's independence in 1821 .
The post-independence period was characterized by economic instability , the Mexican-American War and territorial  cession to the संयुक्त राज्य , a सिविल युद्ध  , two empires and a domestic dictatorship .
The latter led to the Mexican Revolution in 1910 , which culminated with the  promulgation of the 1917 संविधान और the emergence of the देश 's वर्तमान  political system .
Elections held in July 2000 marked the first  समय कि an विपक्ष पार्टी जीती the प्रेसिडेंसी इससे the संस्थागत  Revolutionary Party .
Since 2006 the country has  महरूम in the midst of a ड्रग युद्ध जिससे रै caused  60,000 deaths .
Mexico has  एक of the संसार 's largest economies  , and is considered both a regional power and middle power .
In addition , Mexico was the first Latin American member of  the संगठन लिये आर्थिक co-operation और  Development OECD ( since 1994 ) , and considered an upper-middle income country by the World Bank .
Mexico is  माना a newly industrialized  country and an emerging power .
It has the fourteenth largest nominal GDP and  the eleventh largest जीडीपी by खरीदना शक्ति  parity .
The economy is  strongly linked to those of इसके उत्तर अमरीकी फ़्री व्यापार अनुबंध  ( NAFTA ) partners , especially the United States of America .
Mexico ranks sixth in the world and first in the  americas by क्रमांक of युनेस्को संसार विरासत साइट साथ 31 ,  and in 2007 was the tenth most visited country in the world with 21.4 million international arrivals per year .
Babe Ruth  holds the एमएलबी करियर  slugging percentage record ( .690 ) .
In baseball statistics , slugging percentage (  abbreviated slg ) is a लोकप्रिय माप of  the power of a hitter .
It is calculated as  कुल bases विभाजित  by at bats :
where AB is the  क्रमांक of at-bats लिये a दिए खिलाड़ी , और  1B , 2B , 3B , and HR are the number of singles , doubles , triples , and home runs , respectively .
Walks are specifically  excluded इससे इस गणना  .
For example , in 1920 , Babe  रुथ निभाई उसके पहला ऋतु लिये  the New York Yankees .
In 458 at bats , Ruth had 172 hits , comprising 73 singles , 36  युगल , 9 तिगुना , और 54 घर रनों , जिससे  brings the total base count to ( 73 × 1 ) + ( 36 × 2 ) + ( 9 × 3 ) + ( 54 × 4 ) = 388 .
His total number  of bases ( 388 ) विभाजित by उसके कुल at-bats  ( 458 ) is .847 , his slugging percentage for the season .
The next year he slugged .846 , and these records went unbroken until 2001 , when Barry Bonds achieved 411 bases in 476  at-bats , bringing उसके slugging प्रतिशत to .863  , unmatched since .
is a role-playing video game developed and published by Square ( now Square  एनिक्स ) लिये the सुपर  Nintendo Entertainment System in 1995 .
Chrono Trigger 's development team included three designers that Square dubbed the `` Dream Team '' : Hironobu Sakaguchi , the creator of Square 's Final  काल्पनिक श्रेणी ; yuji horii , a freelance पंक्तियां और  creator of Enix 's popular Dragon Quest series ; and Akira Toriyama , a freelance manga artist famed for his work with Dragon Quest and Dragon Ball .
Kazuhiko Aoki produced the game , Masato Kato wrote most of the plot , while composer Yasunori Mitsuda scored  सबसे of the खेल पहले गिरना बीमार और deferring बाकी ट्रैक्स to फाइनल काल्पनिक composer  Nobuo Uematsu .
The game 's story  फ़ॉलो a समूह of adventurers जो सफर through समय to prevent  a global catastrophe .
Square re-released  a ported संस्करण by tose in जापानी लिये  Sony 's PlayStation in 1999 , later repackaged with a Final Fantasy IV port as Final Fantasy Chronicles in 2001 for the North American market .
A slightly enhanced  chrono ट्रिगर थी released लिये the निन्टेंडो ds on नवम्बर 25 , 2008 , in उत्तर अमेरिका  and Japan , and went on sale in Australia on February 3 , 2009 and in Europe on February 6 , 2009 .
The game was never released in PAL  territories पहले the निन्टेंडो ds संस्करण  .
Chrono Trigger was a critical and commercial  कामयाबी upon रिलीज और is माना आज  to be one of the greatest video games of all time .
Nintendo Power magazine described aspects of Chrono  ट्रिगर as क्रांतिकारी , सहित इसके अनेक endings , plot-related sidequests  focusing on character development , unique battle system , and detailed graphics .
Chrono Trigger was the third best-selling game of 1995 , and the game 's SNES and  प्लेस्टेशन iterations have shipped 2.65 लाख नक़ल as of कूच 2003  .
The version for the  निन्टेंडो ds बेची  790,000 copies as of March 2009 .
Chrono Trigger was also ported to mobile phones  , आभासी कंसोल , the प्लेस्टेशन संजाल ( तभी in the यूएसए ) , आईओएस डिवाइस  , and Android devices .
बकरी  cheese
Goat cheese , or chèvre ( from the French word for goat  ) , is चीज बना आउट of the  milk of goats .
Hyperthermia is elevated body  तापमान due to विफल thermoregulation कि occurs जब a देह produces  or absorbs more heat than it dissipates .
Extreme temperature elevation then  becomes a चिकित्सा आपात requiring तात्कालिक  treatment to prevent disability or death .
The most common causes include  ऊष्मा स्ट्रोक और प्रतिकूल  reactions to drugs .
The former is an acute temperature elevation caused by exposure to excessive heat , or combination of heat  और आर्द्रता , कि overwhelms the heat-regulating mechanisms  .
The latter is a relatively rare side effect of  अनेक दवाएँ , विशेषकर those कि affect the  central nervous system .
Malignant hyperthermia is a rare complication of some  प्रकार of सामान्य एनेस्थीसिया .
Hyperthermia can also be deliberately induced using drugs or medical devices and may be used in the treatment of some  kinds of कर्कट और अन्य शर्तें , सबसे commonly in संयोजन  with radiotherapy .
अतिताप differs इससे ज्वर in कि the  body 's temperature set point remains unchanged .
The opposite is hypothermia , which occurs when the temperature  बूंदें नीचे कि जरूरी to maintain सामान्य चयापचय  .
Belize , is a  देश स्तिथ on the northeastern  coast of Central America .
It is the only country in the area where English is the official language , although  kriol और स्पेनी हैं अधिक commonly बोला  .
Belize  is bordered on the उत्तर by मैक्सिको  , to the south and west by Guatemala and to the east by the Caribbean Sea .
Its  मेनलैंड is परिचय  long and wide .
With  of जमीन और a जनसांख्यिकी of तभी 312,698 निवासियों  ( 2010 census ) , Belize possesses the lowest population density in Central America .
The country 's population growth rate of 3.15 % ( 2012 est . ) is the second highest in the region and  एक of the उच्चतम in the पश्चिमी गोलार्ध  .
Belize 's abundance  of स्थलीय और समुद्री प्रजाति , और इसके विविधता  of ecosystems give it a key place within the globally significant Mesoamerican Biological Corridor .
Belize  रै a विविध समाज , comprising  many cultures and languages .
It is the only nation in the region with a British colonial heritage , but as a part of the Western  caribbean मण्डल , it भी साझा a आम विरासत साथ the fellow anglophone caribbean  countries .
In general , Belize is  माना to be a सेंट्रल अमरीकी और caribbean  nation with strong ties to both the Caribbean and Latin America .
Belize is a member of the  caribbean जातियाँ ( caricom ) , the जातियाँ of  Latin American and Caribbean States ( CELAC ) , and Central American Integration System ( SICA ) .
Belize is known for its September  जश्न , और is the जन्मस्थान  of chewing gum and Punta Rock .
The `` Betsy  रॉस  '' flag
A ``  बेट्सी रॉस '' ध्वज उड़ती  outside San Francisco City Hall
The Betsy Ross flag is an early design of the flag of the United States , popularly  attributed to बेट्सी रॉस , using the आम motifs of प्रत्यावर्ती red-and-white  striped field with five-pointed stars in a blue canton .
The flag was designed during  the अमरीकी क्रान्ति और सुविधाएँ 13  stars to represent the original 13 colonies .
The  distinctive विशेषता of the रॉस ध्वज  is the arrangement of the stars in a circle .
Although  the बेट्सी रॉस स्टोरी is स्वीकृत by सबसे अमेरिकी  , some flag historians and revisionists do not accept the Betsy Ross design as the first American flag .
According to the traditional account , the original flag  थी बना in जून 1776 , जब a छोटी committee—including जार्ज वॉशिंगटन  , Robert Morris and relative George Ross —visited Betsy and discussed the need for a new American flag .
Betsy accepted the job to manufacture the flag  , altering the कमेटी 's डिज़ाइन by replacing  the six-pointed stars with five-pointed stars .
While the Betsy Ross legend is questionable , the flag design is  ज्ञात to have महरूम in उपयोग by 1777 ; अल्फ्रेड b  . Street described it at the surrender of General Burgoyne and understood the circle of stars to represent equality among the American states .
It is one of the oldest versions of U.S. flags known to exist ; while it is not the oldest surviving flag artifact in cloth form , its likeness appears on older physical relics , namely , the  समकालीन रणभूमि paintings by जॉन trumbull और  Charles Willson Peale .
They depict the circular star  व्यवस्था होने flown इससे जलयान masts और  many other places , and thus provide the first known historical documentation of the flag 's appearance .
The seal of the U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs uses the  बेट्सी रॉस ध्वज to represent सेवा to सब दिग्गजों इससे the अमरीकी  Revolution to the present day .
The Betsy Ross design of 13-star US flags has  महरूम प्रदर्शित in अनेक लोकप्रिय artworks ( sometimes inaccurately , as in वॉशिंगटन क्रासिंग the डेलावेयर  ) and films , such as the 1960 version of Pollyanna .
The  ध्वज continues to be एक  of the most popular symbols of the American Revolution .
A purr is a sound made by all species of felids and is a  भाग of बिल्ली संचार .
It  varies between बिल्लियों ( लिये उदाहरण by loudness  and tone ) , and from species to species , but can be characterized as a tonal buzzing .
The term `` purring '' has been used liberally in literature , and it has been claimed that viverrids ( civet ,  नेवला , genet ) , bears , badgers  , hyaenas ( et cetera ) purr .
Other animals that have been said  to purr हैं खरगोश , squirrels  , guinea pigs , tapirs , ring-tailed lemurs , elephants , raccoons and gorillas while eating .
however , using a सख्त परिभाषा of purring कि निरन्तर ध्वनि उत्पादन जरूर वैकल्पिक between pulmonic egressive और ingressive airstream ( और प्रायः go on लिये मिनट्स ) , पीटर्स ( 2002 )  , in an exhaustive review of the scientific literature , reached the conclusion that until then only ‘purring cats’ ( Felidae ) and two species of genets , Genetta tigrina , and most likely also Genetta genetta , had been documented to purr .
The platypus ( Ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic  स्तनधारी endemic to पूर्वी ऑस्ट्रेलिया , सहित  Tasmania .
Together with the four species of echidna  , it is एक of the पाँच extant प्रजाति of  monotremes , the only mammals that lay eggs instead of giving birth .
It is the sole living representative of its family ( Ornithorhynchidae ) and genus ( Ornithorhynchus ) ,  हालांकि a क्रमांक of सम्बन्धित प्रजाति have महरूम मिला in  the fossil record .
The unusual appearance of this egg-laying , duck -billed , beaver -tailed , otter -footed mammal baffled European naturalists when they first encountered  it , साथ कुछ considering it an विस्तृत  fraud .
It is one of the few venomous mammals , the male platypus  having a spur on the हिन्द पैर कि delivers a venom सक्षम of causing  severe pain to humans .
The unique features of the platypus make it an important subject in the study of evolutionary biology and a recognisable  और iconic प्रतीक of ऑस्ट्रेलिया ; it रै appeared as a शुभंकर at नेशनल  events and is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent coin .
The  platypus is the एनिमल  emblem of the state of New South Wales .
Until  the जल्दी 20th सदी , it थी hunted लिये इसके फर  , but it is now protected throughout its range .
Although captive  प्रजनन programmes have था तभी सीमित कामयाबी और the  platypus is vulnerable to the effects of pollution , it is not under any immediate threat .
St.  एलिज़ाबेथ is a गाँव  in Miller County , Missouri , United States .
the जनसांख्यिकी थी 336 at  the 2010 census .
Wilton is a census-designated  प्लेस ( cdp ) in sacramento  County , California , United States .
It is part of the Sacramento  – arden-arcade – roseville  Metropolitan Statistical Area .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 5,363 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी , up  from 4,551 at the 2000 census .
In human-computer interaction ,  काटें और paste और नक़ल और paste हैं सम्बन्धित कमांड कि प्रस्ताव a user-interface बातचीत तकनीक लिये  transferring text , data , files or objects from a source to a destination .
Most ubiquitously , users require the ability  to काटें और paste भाग of मैदान  text .
The cut command removes the selected data from its original position , while the copy  कमांड creates a नकल ; in दोनो मामले the चयनित आंकड़ा is लगाई  in a clipboard .
The data in the clipboard is later  inserted in the स्थिति जहाँ the paste  command is issued .
The command names are an interface  रूपक आधारित on the शारीरिक कार्यविधि  used in manuscript editing to create a page layout .
This interaction technique has close associations with related techniques in  आलेखीय उपयोक्ता अंतरफलक कि उपयोग इंगित डिवाइस ऐसे as a कंप्यूटर चूहा  ( by drag and drop , for example ) .
Economic order quantity is the order quantity that minimizes total  inventory पकड़कर लागत और ordering लागत  .
It is one of the  oldest शास्त्रीय  production scheduling models .
The  फ्रेमवर्क प्रयुक्त to determine इस अनुक्रम मात्रा is  also known as Barabas EOQ Model or Barabas Formula .
The model was developed by Ford W. Harris in 1913 , but R. H. Wilson , a consultant who applied it  extensively , is दिए क्रेडिट लिये उसके in-depth  analysis .
स्टीफन `` स्टीवी '' रे vaughan ( अक्तूबर 3 , 1954 – अगस्त  27 , 1990 ) was an American guitarist , singer-songwriter , and record producer .
Often referred to by his initials SRV ,  vaughan is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a founding सदस्य  and leader of Double Trouble .
साथ साथ वादक क्रिस layton  and bassist Tommy Shannon , they ignited the blues revival of the 1980s .
With a career spanning seven years  , vaughan और दोगुना ट्रबल  consistently sold out concerts while their albums frequently went gold .
He was born and raised in Dallas , Texas  , और लिये a छोटी काल of समय जिया  in Graham , Texas .
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan  , vaughan प्रारंभ playing the गिटार  at age seven and formed several bands that occasionally performed in local nightclubs .
At age 17 , he dropped out of high  स्कूल और स्थानांतरित to ऑस्टिन to further pursue उसके  musical career , joining groups such as Krackerjack , the Nightcrawlers , and the Cobras .
In 1977 , he formed Triple Threat Revue  , a बैंड कि आखिरकार विकसित into दोगुना ट्रबल  and regularly performed around Austin .
In 1982 , Vaughan and Double Trouble performed at the Montreux Jazz Festival in Switzerland , catching the  ध्यान of संगीतकारों दाउद बोवी और  Jackson Browne .
Bowie asked Vaughan to play on his upcoming studio album Let 's Dance , while Browne offered the band  फ़्री उपयोग of उसके निजी स्टुडियो in लॉस एंजिल्स to रिकार्ड an एल्बम  .
In March 1983 , Vaughan and Double Trouble were signed to Epic Records by veteran record producer John  हैमंड sr. और released उनके डेब्यू एल्बम , टेक्सास  Flood in June of that year .
After successful  touring , the समूह released the एल्बम , could n't स्टैंड the मौसम  ( 1984 ) and Soul to Soul ( 1985 ) , the latter of which featured new keyboardist Reese Wynans .
Although his career had  progressed सफलतापूर्वक , vaughan checked into a पुनर्वास  hospital in Atlanta , Georgia to give up a cocaine and alcohol habit and returned to touring with the band .
In June 1989 , In Step was released and earned them a  ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन समकालीन  Blues Performance .
On August 27 ,  1990 , vaughan थी मारे in a हेलीकाप्टर  crash following a performance in East Troy , Wisconsin .
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic  yet तीव्र स्टाइल थी निकला इससे a किस्में  of musical genres .
He was  बहकावे by ब्लूज़ संगीतकारों सहित अल्बर्ट किंग , फ्रेडी किंग , ओटिस फटाफट  , and Muddy Waters , and rock guitarists such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack .
His guitar playing reflected  the क्लासिक ब्लूज़ और pentatonic तराजू  .
He has received wide  नाजुक मान्यता लिये उसके गिटार playing , रैंकिंग  at # 6 on Rolling Stones list of `` 100 Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011 .
He  थी मरणोपरांत inducted into the ब्लूज़ हॉल  of Fame in 2000 and a memorial statue was erected in Austin 's Auditorium Shores park .
Stevie Ray Vaughan is  widely माना to be एक of the महानतम संगीतकारों  to come from the state of Texas .
The Las Vegas Strip  संसार of coca-cola संग्रहालय  in 2003
Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in stores , restaurants  , और वेंडिंग मशीने in  every country except Cuba and North Korea .
It is produced by The Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta , Georgia  , और is प्रायः referred to बस as कोक ( a पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क of the coca-cola  Company in the United States since March 27 , 1944 ) .
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it was invented in the late 19th century by John Pemberton , Coca-Cola was bought out by businessman Asa Griggs Candler  , जिनकी विपणन tactics led कोक to इसके दबदबा of the संसार soft-drink मार्केट throughout  the 20th century .
The company produces concentrate , which is then  बेची to licensed coca-cola bottlers  throughout the world .
The bottlers , who hold territorially exclusive contracts  साथ the कम्पनी , उपज समाप्त उत्पाद in डिब्बे और बोतलों इससे  the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners .
The bottlers then  बेचें , वितरित और merchandise coca-cola  to retail stores and vending machines .
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola Enterprises , which is the  largest सिंगल coca-cola bottler in उत्तर अमेरिका और  western Europe .
The Coca-Cola Company also sells concentrate for soda fountains  to प्रमुख रेस्तरां और खाना  service distributors .
The Coca-Cola Company has , on occasion ,  introduced अन्य कोला पेय  under the Coke brand name .
The most  आम of ये is आहार कोक , साथ अन्य सहित caffeine-free  Coca-Cola , Diet Coke Caffeine-Free , Coca-Cola Cherry , Coca-Cola Zero , Coca-Cola Vanilla , and special versions with lemon , lime or coffee .
Based on  interbrand 's बेहतरीन वैश्विक ब्रांड 2011  , Coca-Cola was the world 's most valuable brand .
Barry Louis Larkin ( born  अप्रैल 28 , 1964 )  is a retired Major League Baseball player .
Larkin played  shortstop लिये the सिनसिनाटी लाल इससे 1986 to  2004 and was one of the pivotal players on the 1990 Reds ' World Series championship team .
Larkin was elected to the National Baseball Hall  of कीर्ति in जनवरी 2012 और थी  inducted on July 22 .
Larkin is considered one of the  शीर्ष खिलाड़ी of उसके era , जीतना  nine Silver Slugger awards and three Gold Glove awards .
He was selected to the Major League  all-star खेल बारह टाइम्स , और थी निर्वाचित the  1995 National League Most Valuable Player .
Brasília ( ) is the federal capital of Brazil and the seat of government of  the संघीय ज़िला  .
administratively , the नगर  is located in the Federal District which is in the Central-West Region .
Physically , it is located in the  ब्राज़ीलियाई हाइलैंड्स .
It has a  जनसांख्यिकी of परिचय 2,562,963 ( 3,716,996 in the महानगर  area ) as of the 2008 IBGE estimate , making it the fourth largest city in Brazil .
However , as a  महानगर क्षेत्रफल , it  ranks lower at sixth in population .
Brasília is the largest city in  the संसार कि किया  not exist at the beginning of the 20th century .
Brasília has the fifth largest GDP among Latin  अमरीकी शहरों  and the third in Brazil .
At around R $ 62,000 Brazilian reais ( equal to approximately $ 30,900 US dollars or €23,000 euros ) , the city  's प्रति capita आय is the उच्चतम among  Brazil 's largest cities .
As the national capital ,  brasília is the सीट of सब तीन शाखाओं of the  federal government of Brazil .
The city also hosts the  मुख्यालय of अनेक ब्राज़ीलियाई  companies .
Planning policies such as the  स्थान of आवासीय इमारतें around expansive शहरी क्षेत्रों , as खूब as भवन the नगर around विशाल avenues  and dividing it into sectors , have sparked a debate and reflection on life in big cities in the 20th century .
The city 's design divides it into numbered blocks as well  as सेक्टर लिये निर्दिष्ट क्रियाएँ , ऐसे  as the Hotel Sector , the Banking Sector or the Embassy Sector .
Brasília hosts 124 foreign  embassies  .
The city was planned and developed in 1956 with Lúcio  कोस्टा as the प्रिंसिपल शहरी प्लानर , ऑस्कर niemeyer as the प्रिंसिपल वास्तु  and Roberto Burle Marx as the landscape designer .
Brasilia is in the Unesco 's World  hertitage सूची due to इसके वास्तुकला  .
On April 22  , 1960 , it formally became ब्राज़ील  's national capital .
Viewed from above , the main  portion of the नगर resembles  an airplane or a butterfly .
The city is commonly referred to as  पूंजी संघीय , or  simply BSB .
Residents of Brasília are known as brasilienses or candangos ( the latter referring  to those नहीं born in the नगर लकिन जो migrated  there after it was established ) .
In local usage , the word `` Brasília '' usually refers only to the  पहला प्रशासनिक प्रदेश ( ra i ) भीतर the संघीय ज़िला ( distrito संघीय  ) , where the most important government buildings are located .
Brasília has a unique status in  ब्राज़ील , as it is an प्रशासनिक  division rather than a legal municipality like nearly all cities in Brazil .
Nationally ,  the पद is लगभग सदा प्रयुक्त synonymously साथ the  Federal District , which constitutes an indivisible Federative Unit , analogous to a state .
Several `` satellite cities '' exist which are also  भाग of the संघीय ज़िला  .
brasília अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र is the प्रमुख विमानक्षेत्र in brasília ,  connecting the capital to all major Brazilian cities and many international destinations .
It is the third  सबसे महत्वपूर्ण  airport in Brazil , in terms of passengers and aircraft movements .
Personifications  of जर्मनी , फ़्रांस , रूस , austria-hungary , और the संयुक्त  Kingdom attempting to keep the lid on the simmering cauldron of imperialist and nationalist tensions in the Balkans to prevent a general European war .
They were successful in 1912 and  1913 लकिन किया नहीं सफल in  in 1914 .
The causes of World War I , which began in  सेंट्रल यूरोपीय in लेट जुलाई 1914 और समाप्त in 1918  , included many factors , such as the conflicts and hostility of the four decades leading up to the war .
Militarism , alliances , imperialism , and nationalism played  प्रमुख भूमिकाएँ in the विरोध  as well .
The immediate origins of the war , however , lay in the decisions taken by statesmen  और सेनापतियों दौरान the संकट of 1914 , casus belli लिये जिससे थी the  assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand ( the Archduke of Austria Hungary ) and his wife Sophie by Gavrilo Princip , an irredentist Serb .
The crisis came after a long and  मुश्किल श्रेणी of राजनयिक clashes between the ग्रेट शक्तियां ( इटली , फ़्रांस , जर्मनी , the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य  , the Austria-Hungarian Empire and Russia ) over European and colonial issues in the decade before 1914 that had left tensions high .
In turn  ये राजनयिक clashes can be traced  to changes in the balance of power in Europe since 1867 .
The more immediate cause for the war was tensions  over territory in  the Balkans .
austria-hungary competed साथ सर्बिया और रूस लिये territory और influence  in the region and they pulled the rest of the Great Powers into the conflict through their various alliances and treaties .
Although the  कड़ी of कार्यक्रम unleashed by the  assassination triggered the war , the war 's origins go deeper , involving national politics , cultures , economics , and a complex web of alliances and counterbalances that had developed between the various European powers since 1870 .
Some of the most important long term or structural causes are  : the विकास of राष्ट्रवाद आरपार यूरोपीय , अनसुलझे territorial विवादों , an intricate प्रणाली of alliances , the आभास विश्लेषण of the संतुलन of शक्ति  in Europe , convoluted and fragmented governance , the arms races of the previous decades , previous military planning , imperial and colonial rivalry for wealth , power and prestige , and economic and military rivalry in industry and trade – e.g. , the Pig War between Austria and Serbia .
Other causes that came into play during the diplomatic crisis that  preceded the युद्ध शामिल misperceptions of intent ( e.g. , the जर्मनी विश्वास कि the संयुक्त  Kingdom would remain neutral ) and delays and misunderstandings in diplomatic communications .
The various categories of  स्पष्टीकरण लिये संसार युद्ध i correspond to अलग  historians ' overall methods .
Most historians and popular commentators  शामिल कल्याणकारी इससे अधिक than एक श्रेणी of स्पष्टीकरण to provide  a rounded account of the causes of the war .
The deepest distinction among these accounts is between stories that see it as the  अपरिहार्य और predictable निष्कर्ष of निश्चित कारकों , और those कि describe it as an  arbitrary and unfortunate mistake .
In attributing causes for the war ,  इतिहासकारों और लड  had to deal with an unprecedented flood of memoirs and official documents , released as each country involved tried to avoid blame for starting the war .
Early releases of information by governments , particularly those released for use  by the `` आयोग on the जिम्मेदारी of the लेखक of the युद्ध '' यहूद  shown to be incomplete and biased .
In addition some documents , especially diplomatic cables  between रूस और फ़्रांस , यहूद मिला to  have been doctored .
Even in later decades however , when much more information had been  released , इतिहासकारों इससे the वही संस्कृति  have been shown to come to differing conclusions on the causes of the war .
Johnson  's नई चार्ट of नेशनल  emblems , published c. 1868 .
The large flags shown in the corners are the 37-star flag of the United States ( flown 1867-1877 ) , the Royal Standard of the United Kingdom , the Russian  इम्पीरियल मानक , और the फ्रेंच tricolore साथ इनसेट इम्पीरियल  Eagle .
Various  अन्य ध्वज flown  by ships are shown .
the ध्वज of क्यूबा  is labelled `` Cuban ( so called ) `` .
The Chinese dragon on  the ध्वज of चीन थी drawn mistakenly  as a western dragon .
A national  ध्वज is a ध्वज कि symbolizes  a country .
The flag  is flown by the सरकारी , लकिन प्रायः can  also be flown by citizens of the country .
Both public and private buildings such as schools and  courthouses may मक्खी the नेशनल  flag .
In  कुछ देशों , the नेशनल ध्वज हैं  only flown from non-military buildings on certain flag days .
There are three distinct  प्रकार of नेशनल ध्वज लिये उपयोग on जमीन , और  three for use at sea , though many countries use identical designs for several ( and sometimes all ) of these types of flag .
The American Civil  युद्ध ( acw ) , भी ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ) , थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the ``  Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its origin in  the समस्या of गुलामी , विशेषकर  the extension of slavery into the western territories .
Foreign powers  किया नहीं intervene  .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure , the Confederacy collapsed  , गुलामी थी abolished , और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल एकता और guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed  slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans ,  led by अब्राहम lincoln , opposed expanding गुलामी  into United States ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before his inauguration on March 4 , 1861 , seven  cotton-based स्लेव राज्य formed the confederacy  .
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the incoming  republicans अस्वीकृत  secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his administration would not  initiate सिविल  war .
Eight remaining slave  राज्य जारी to अस्वीकृत  calls for secession .
confederate शक्तियां जब्त numerous  federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy .
A Peace Conference  विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह , और दोनो  sides prepared for war .
The  confederates assumed कि यूरोपीय देशों  were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began  on अप्रैल 12 , 1861 , जब  Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently , four  अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the confederacy , bringing उनके कुल to ग्यारह  .
The Union soon  नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और  established a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy .
The Eastern  थिएटर थी inconclusive  in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union  राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल of antietam , dissuading  British intervention .
lincoln जारी the emancipation  Proclamation , which made ending slavery a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy , then much of their western armies  , और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in दो at  the Mississippi River .
In  1863 , रॉबर्ट  E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
पश्चिमी सफलताओं led to ulysses  S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864 .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta  और marched to the समुद्र , destroying confederate  infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from  सब दिशानिर्देश , और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण  through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed , leading to Lee 's  आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox अदालत हाउस on अप्रैल 9  , 1865 .
The  अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध थी एक of the  earliest true industrial wars .
Railroads , the  टेलीग्राफ , steamships , और mass-produced  weapons were employed extensively .
The mobilization of civilian factories , mines , shipyards , banks , transportation and  खाना आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed संसार युद्ध  I .
It remains the deadliest war in American history , resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and  an undetermined क्रमांक  of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten  प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा , और 30  percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
Norrie disease is a genetic  विकार कि primarily  affects the eye and almost always leads to blindness .
In addition to the congenital ocular symptoms , some patients suffer from a progressive hearing loss starting mostly in  उनके 2nd दशक of जीवन , जबकि another portion may be मानसिक  challenged .
Patients with Norrie disease may develop cataracts , leukocoria ( a condition where the pupils appear white when light is  shone on उन्हें ) , साथ साथ अन्य developmental मुद्दे in the नजर , ऐसे as shrinking  of the globe and the wasting away of the iris .
Around 30–50 %  of उन्हें होगा भी have developmental डेलाy/ दिमागी  retardation , psychotic-like features , incoordination of movements or behavioral abnormalities .
Most patients are born with  सामान्य सुनना ; however , the onset of सुनना घाटा is  very common in early adolescence .
About 15 % of the patients are estimated to  develop सब the सुविधाएँ of the बीमारी  .
The disease affects almost only male infants at birth or soon  बाद जनम , क्युकी the बीमारी is inherited x-linked  recessive .
Only in very rare cases , females have been  diagnosed साथ norrie बीमारी as खूब  .
The exact incidence number is unknown ;  तभी a few सौ मामले have महरूम reported  so far .
It is a very rare disorder that is  नहीं संबद्ध  with any specific ethnic or racial groups .
A contract is an agreement having a lawful object entered into voluntarily by two or more parties , each of whom intends to create one or  अधिक विधिक दायित्वों between उन्हें  .
The  तत्व of a अनुबंध हैं `` प्रस्ताव  '' and `` acceptance '' by `` competent persons '' having legal capacity who exchange `` consideration '' to create `` mutuality of obligation . ''
Proof of some or all of these elements may be done in  लिखने , हालांकि अनुबंध may be बना entirely orally or by conduct  .
The remedy for breach of contract can be `` damages '' in  the रूप of मुआवजे  of money or specific performance enforced through an injunction .
Both of these remedies award the party at loss  the `` लाभ of the सौदेबाजी '' or अपेक्षा  damages , which are greater than mere reliance damages , as in promissory estoppel .
The parties may  be प्राकृतिक व्यक्तियों  or juristic persons .
A contract is a legally enforceable promise  or undertaking कि कुछ होगा  or will not occur .
The word promise can be used as a legal synonym for contract , although care is required as a promise may not  have the पूरा खड़ा of a अनुबंध , as जब it is an अनुबंध बगैर विचार  .
Contract law varies  greatly इससे एक क्षेत्राधिकार to another , सहित मतभेद in आम विधि compared to सिविल  law , the impact of received law , particularly from England in common law countries , and of law codified in regional legislation .
Regarding Australian Contract Law for example , there are 40 relevant acts which impact  on the निर्वचन of अनुबंध at the राष्ट्रमंडल ( संघीय / नेशनल  ) level , and an additional 26 acts at the level of the state of NSW .
In addition there are 6 international  यंत्र or प्रथाओं जिससे हैं लागू लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय  dealings , such as the United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods .
ASP.NET is a server-side Web  अनुप्रयोग फ्रेमवर्क designed लिये वेब विकास to  produce dynamic Web pages .
It was developed by Microsoft to allow  प्रोग्रामर्स to निर्माण डायनेमिक वेब साइट , वेब अनुप्रयोग  and web services .
It was first released in January 2002 with  संस्करण 1.0 of the .neT फ्रेमवर्क  , and is the successor to Microsoft 's Active Server Pages ( ASP ) technology .
ASP.NET is built on the Common Language Runtime (  clr ) , allowing प्रोग्रामर्स to लिखें asp.net कोड  using any supported .NET language .
The ASP.NET SOAP  एक्सटेंशन फ्रेमवर्क allows asp.net  components to process SOAP messages .
Lysergic acid diethylamide , abbreviated LSD or LSD-25 , also known as lysergide ( INN ) and colloquially as acid , is a semisynthetic psychedelic drug of the ergoline  परिवार , खूब ज्ञात लिये इसके मनोवैज्ञानिक प्रभाव जिससे can शामिल altered सोच प्रक्रियाओं , बंद और खोलें नजर visuals , synesthesia , an altered भाव of समय और आध्यात्मिक अनुभवों  , as well as for its key role in 1960s counterculture .
It is used  मुख्यतः as an entheogen , recreational ड्रग , और  as an agent in psychedelic therapy .
LSD is non-addictive , is not known  to कारण दिमाग क्षति , और रै अत्यधिक  low toxicity relative to dose .
however , प्रतिकूल मनोरोग प्रतिक्रियाएँ  such as anxiety , paranoia , and delusions are possible .
LSD was first synthesized by Albert Hofmann in 1938 from  ergotamine , a रासायनिक निकला by आर्थर stoll इससे ergot , a  grain fungus that typically grows on rye .
the छोटी रूप `` एलएसडी '' आता इससे इसके जल्दी कोड नाम lsd-25 , जिससे  is an abbreviation for the German `` Lysergsäure-diethylamid '' followed by a sequential number .
LSD is sensitive to oxygen , ultraviolet light , and chlorine , especially in solution , though its potency  may पिछला लिये सालो if it is भंडारित दूर इससे लाइट और नमी at कम  temperature .
In pure form it is a  colorless , गंधहीन , tasteless  solid .
LSD is typically delivered orally , usually on a  substrate ऐसे as absorbent blotter पेपर  , a sugar cube , or gelatin .
In its liquid form ,  it can भी be administered by intramuscular  or intravenous injection .
LSD is very potent , with  20–30 μg (  micrograms ) being the threshold dose .
New experiments with LSD  प्रारंभ in 2009 लिये  the first time in 40 years .
Introduced by Sandoz Laboratories , with  trade-name delysid , as a ड्रग साथ विभिन्न मनोरोग उपयोग in 1947 , एलएसडी जल्दी became a therapeutic  agent that appeared to show great promise .
In the 1950s , officials at the  u.S. सेंट्रल प्रज्ञा एजेंसी ( सीआईए ) विचार the ड्रग might be लागू  to mind control and chemical warfare ; the agency 's MKULTRA research program propagated the drug among young servicemen and students .
The  subsequent recreational उपयोग of the  drug by youth culture in the Western world during the 1960s led to a political firestorm that resulted in its prohibition .
Currently , a number of organizations—including the Beckley Foundation , MAPS , Heffter Research Institute and the Albert Hofmann  foundation—exist to निधि , प्रोत्साहित और निर्देशांक शोध into the औषधीय और  spiritual uses of LSD and related psychedelics .
The United States Navy 's Sea , Air , Land Teams , commonly known  as the नेवी seals , हैं the u.S. नेवी 's प्रिंसिपल खास परिचालन फ़ोर्स और a भाग of the नवल  Special Warfare Command and United States Special Operations Command .
`` मुहर '' is सदा  capitalized in reference to members of the Naval Special Warfare community .
The acronym is derived from  उनके क्षमता to operate at समुद्र  , in the air , and on land .
SEALs are  पुरूष सदस्यों of the संयुक्त  States Navy .
An exchange program  साथ the coast गार्ड  , which graduated three Coast Guardsmen as SEALs , was suspended in 2011 .
The CIA 's highly secretive Special Activities Division ( SAD ) and  अधिक specifically इसके elite खास परिचालन  Group ( SOG ) recruits operators from the SEAL Teams .
Joint Navy SEALs and CIA operations go  वापस to the famed macv-sog दौरान the  Vietnam War .
This cooperation still exists today and is seen in the wars in Iraq  और अफगानिस्तान , और in the ढूंढना और हत्या of  Osama bin Laden in Pakistan .
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100 , based on UN 2010 projections  ( रेड , नारंगी , ग्रीन ) और us जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ऐतिहासिक estimates ( ब्लैक  ) .
Actual  अंकित जनसांख्यिकी  figures are in blue .
According to the highest  अनुमान , the संसार जनसांख्यिकी may वृद्धि to 16 अरब  by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate , it may decline to 6 billion .
The world population is the total number of living  इंसानो on धरती  .
As of today , it is estimated  to क्रमांक अरब by the संयुक्त  States Census Bureau ( USCB ) .
The USCB  estimates कि the संसार जनसांख्यिकी exceeded  7 billion on March 12 , 2012 .
according to a पृथक अनुमान by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र जनसांख्यिकी निधि  , it reached this milestone on October 31 , 2011 .
The world population has experienced continuous growth since the end of the Great Famine and the  ब्लैक मौत in 1350 , जब it stood at around 370 लाख .
The highest rates of growth – global population increases above 1.8 % per year – were seen briefly  दौरान the 1950s , और लिये a longer काल दौरान  the 1960s and 1970s .
The growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in  1963 , और था अस्वीकृत to 1.1 % by 2011  .
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s at about 138 million , and are now expected to remain essentially constant at  उनके 2011 स्तर of 134 लाख , जबकि मौतों क्रमांक 56 लाख प्रति साल , और हैं अपेक्षित  to increase to 80 million per year by 2040 .
Current projections show a  जारी बढ़ाएँ in जनसांख्यिकी in the निकट भविष्य ( लकिन a स्थिर मनाही in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट ) ,  with the global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050 .
Various  longer-term estimates भविष्यवाणी further विकास , stagnation  , or even overall decline in the global population by 2150 .
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world population growth , citing the growing  pressures on the पर्यावरण , वैश्विक खाना आपूर्तियाँ , और  energy resources .
Memphis is a city in the  southwestern कोने of the u.S. राज्य of टेनेसी  , and the county seat of Shelby County .
The city is located on the 4th Chickasaw Bluff , south  of the संगम of the भेड़िया  and Mississippi rivers .
Memphis had a population of 672,277 in 2011 making it the largest city in the state of Tennessee , the largest city on the  मिसिसिपी नदी , the तीसरा largest in the southeastern संयुक्त राज्य  , and the 20th largest in the United States .
The greater Memphis  महानगर क्षेत्रफल , सहित सटा काउंटी in मिसिसिपी  and Arkansas , had a 2010 population of 1,316,100 .
This makes Memphis the second largest metropolitan area in Tennessee , surpassed only by  महानगर नैशविले , जिससे रै overtaken मेम्फिस  in recent years .
मेम्फिस is the  youngest of Tennessee 's major cities .
A resident of Memphis is  referred to as a memphian , और the मेम्फिस  region is known , particularly to media outlets , as `` Memphis & The Mid-South `` .
The Cattenom Nuclear  शक्ति संयंत्र in फ़्रांस  .
France produces around three quarters of its electricity by nuclear  शक्ति  .
The Grafenrheinfeld Nuclear Power Plant  in जर्मनी  .
Chancellor Angela Merkel 's coalition announced on May 30 , 2011 , that Germany’s 17 nuclear power  स्टेशन होगा be shut bas  by 2022 , in a policy reversal following Japan 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster .
Currently , 68 reactors  हैं अंतर्गत निर्माण in 15 देशों  .
Nuclear power  स्टेशन operate  in thirty countries .
In 2010 , before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster , it was reported  कि an औसत of परिचय 10 नाभिकीय रिएक्टरों यहूद अपेक्षित to become operational प्रति साल , हालांकि according to the संसार  Nuclear Association , of the 17 civilian reactors planned to become operational between 2007 and 2009 , only five actually came on stream .
As of June  2011 , जर्मनी और स्विट्ज़रलैंड  are phasing-out nuclear power .
As of June 2011 , countries such as Australia , Austria , Denmark ,  यूनानियों , आयरलैंड , इटली , लातवियाई , liechtenstein , ध्वज , मलेशिया , माल्टा , नई  Zealand , Norway and Portugal remain opposed to nuclear power .
Skeletal  मांसपेशियां होमो sapiens
This is a table of muscles  of the इंसान anatomy  .
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human , and almost every muscle constitutes one part of a pair of identical bilateral muscles , found on both sides ,  resulting in लगभग 320 pairs  of muscles , as presented in this article .
Nevertheless , the exact  क्रमांक is मुश्किल to define क्युकी अलग स्त्रोत समूह मांसपेशियां differently , e.g . regarding कया  is defined as different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles .
उदाहरण दायरा इससे  640 to 850 .
The muscles of the human body can be categorized  into a क्रमांक of समूह जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the सिर और  neck , muscles of the torso or trunk , muscles of the upper limbs , and muscles of the lower limbs .
The action  refers to the कार्रवाई of  each muscle from the standard anatomical position .
In other positions , other  क्रियाएँ may be performed  .

The Seminole Wars , also known as the Florida Wars , were three conflicts in Florida between the Seminole — the collective name given to the amalgamation of various groups of  देशी अमेरिकी और ब्लैक लोगों जो settled in फ्लोरिडा in the जल्दी 18th सदी  — and the United States Army .
The First Seminole War was from 1814 to 1819 ( although sources differ ) , the Second Seminole  युद्ध इससे 1835 to 1842 , और the तीसरा seminole युद्ध इससे 1855  to 1858 .
The first conflict  साथ the seminoles arose आउट of तनाव relating to सामान्य  Andrew Jackson 's attack and destruction of Negro Fort in Florida in 1816 .
जैक्सन भी attacked the स्पेनी  at Pensacola .
Ultimately , the Spanish  क्राउन ceded the  colony to United States rule .
Orono is a town in Penobscot County , Maine ,  संयुक्त राज्य  .
It was first settled in 1774 and named in honor  of मुख्य जोसेफ orono of the penobscot स्वदेश  .
It is home to The  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Maine .
the जनसांख्यिकी  was 10,362 at the 2010 census .

Luxor Las Vegas is a hotel and casino on the Las Vegas  स्ट्रिप in स्वर्ग  , Nevada .
The  30-story होटल , स्वामित्व और संचालित by  MGM Resorts International , has a casino with over 2,000 slot machines and 87 table games .
In the 2008 to 2009 renovation , it has a new , highly modernized , and contemporary design and contains a total of 4,400 rooms , including 442 suites , lining the interior walls of a pyramid  स्टाइल मीनार और भीतर जुड़वा 22-story ziggurat मीनारें कि यहूद  built as later additions .
The hotel is named after the city of Luxor ( ancient  thebes ) in मिश्र  .
Luxor is the  दूसरी largest होटल in लास वेगास ( the largest  being the MGM Grand ) and the eighth largest in the world .
As of 2010 , the Luxor has a 4  कुंजी दरजा इससे  the Green Key Eco-Rating Program , which evaluates `` sustainable '' hotel operations .
A pilot experiment , also called a pilot study , is a small scale preliminary study conducted in order to evaluate  feasibility , समय , लागत , प्रतिकूल कार्यक्रम , और प्रभाव आकार ( सांख्यिकीय variability ) in an attempt to भविष्यवाणी an उचित  sample size and improve upon the study design prior to performance of a full-scale research project .
Pilot studies , therefore , may  नहीं be उचित  for case studies .
The Los  एंजिल्स आग विभाग ( lafd ) is the एजेंसी कि provides आग  protection and emergency medical services for the city of Los Angeles .
It may be unofficially referred to as the Los Angeles City  आग विभाग to फर्क  it from the Los Angeles County Fire Department .
The acre is a unit of  क्षेत्रफल प्रयुक्त in the इम्पीरियल  and U.S. customary systems .
An acre is about 40 % of a  हेक्टेयर – थोड़ा  smaller than an American football field .
The acre is no longer commonly used ,  हालांकि a few notable अपवाद शामिल the संयुक्त राज्य  , Australia , Burma and the United Kingdom ( as of 2010 , the acre is no longer officially used in the United Kingdom , though is still used in real estate descriptions ) .
It is still  प्रयुक्त , to कुछ extent  , in Canada .
The international symbol of the acre is  ac , और is पारिभाषित as 1/640  of a square mile .
The most  commonly प्रयुक्त  acre today is the international acre .
In the United States both the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ और the थोड़ा अलग us सर्वेक्षण  acre are in use .
The most  आम उपयोग of the एकड़  is to measure tracts of land .
One international acre is  पारिभाषित as 4046.8564224  square metres .
During the Middle Ages , an acre was the amount of land that could be plowed in one  दिन साथ a  yoke of oxen .

Pawnee , Indiana ( fictional city ) the fictional  सेटिंग of the एनबीसी टेलीविज़न कॉमेडी पार्क  and Recreation .
Broca 's and  wernicke 's क्षेत्रों
Language processing refers to the way human beings use words to communicate  विचार और जज्बात , और कैसा ऐसे संचार  are processed and understood .
यूँ it is  how the brain creates and understands language .
Most recent  theories consider कि इस प्रक्रम is  carried out entirely by and inside the brain .
This is  माना एक of the सबसे characteristic abilities  of the human species - perhaps the most characteristic .
however बहुत छोटी is ज्ञात परिचय it और वहीँ  is huge scope for research on it .
Most of the knowledge acquired to date on the subject has come from patients who have suffered some type of significant head injury , whether external ( wounds , bullets )  or आतंरिक ( स्ट्रोक्स , tumors , अपक्षयी रोगों )  .
Studies have shown that most of the language processing  कृत्यों हैं carried आउट in the दिमागी  cortex .
The essential function of the cortical  भाषा क्षेत्रों is सांकेतिक प्रतिनिधित्व .
Even though language exists in different forms , all of them are based  on सांकेतिक प्रतिनिधित्व  .
The Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a mid-engined grand  touring car , designed और विकसित by the volkswagen समूह और  manufactured in Molsheim , France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S .
The Super Sport version of the Veyron is the fastest  street-legal उत्पादन car in the संसार , साथ a शीर्ष गति  of .
The  असली संस्करण  has a top speed of .
It was named Car of the Decade ( 2000–2009 ) by the BBC  टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम शीर्ष  Gear .
The standard Veyron won Top Gears Best  car चलित सब साल पुरस्कार in 2005  .
On 6 April 2013 ,  bugatti नियत the रिकार्ड लिये the तीव्रतम roadster in the संसार साथ the veyron  Grand Sport Vitesse , reaching on average a top speed of .
The Veyron 's chief designer was Hartmut Warkuss , and the exterior was designed by Jozef Kabaň of Volkswagen  , साथ much of the अभियान्त्रिकी कार्य होने conducted  under the guidance of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber .
A  क्रमांक of खास  variants have been produced .
In December 2010 , Bugatti began  offering prospective खरीदार the क्षमता to मनपसंद exterior और इंटीरियर्स रंग by using the  Veyron 16.4 Configurator application on the marque 's official website .
DVD is an optical  डिस्क भंडार स्वरूप , invented और  developed by Philips , Sony , Toshiba , and Panasonic in 1995 .
DVDs offer higher storage  क्षमता than कॉम्पैक्ट discs जबकि  having the same dimensions .
Pre-recorded DVDs are mass-produced using molding  मशीने कि physically स्टैम्प आंकड़ा onto  the DVD .
Such discs are known as  dvD- rom , क्युकी आंकड़ा can तभी be  read and not written nor erased .
Blank  recordable dvd discs ( dvd-r और dvd+r ) can be अंकित एकबार using a dvd रिकॉर्डर और तब  function as a DVD-ROM . Rewritable DVDs ( DVD-RW , DVD+RW , and DVD-RAM ) can be recorded and erased multiple times .
DVDs are used in DVD-Video consumer digital video format and  in dvd-audio उपभोक्ता डिजिटल ऑडियो स्वरूप  , as well as for authoring AVCHD discs .
DVDs containing other types of information may  be referred to as dvd आंकड़ा discs  .
What Chilli Wants is an American reality series on VH1 starring Chilli ,  one-third of the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार -winning r & b  trio TLC .
The show chronicles Chilli 's quest to find love with the help of  tionna T. smalls , an लेखक और  relationship coach .
The series premiered on April  11 , 2010 , और रै चूंकि महरूम  renewed for a second season .
The second season  premiered on संडे , जनवरी  2 , 2011 .
पीटर जीन hernandez ( born अक्तूबर 8 , 1985 ) , ज्ञात  by his stage name Bruno Mars , is an American singer-songwriter and record producer .
Raised in  होनोलूलू , हवाई , by a परिवार of संगीतकारों , मंगल began बनाना  music at a young age and performed in various musical venues in his hometown throughout his childhood .
He  ग्रैजुएट इससे ऊँची स्कूल और तब  moved to Los Angeles , California , to pursue a musical career .
Mars produced songs for  अन्य कलाकारों , joining उत्पादन टोली  The Smeezingtons .
Mars had an unsuccessful stint  साथ motown रिकॉर्ड , लकिन  then signed with Atlantic in 2009 .
He became recognized as a  सोलो  artist after lending his vocals and co-writing the hooks for the songs `` Nothin ' on You `` by B.o.B , and `` Billionaire `` by Travie McCoy .
He also co-wrote the hits ``  सही गोलाकार `` by flo rida featuring  Ke $ ha , and `` Wavin ' Flag `` by K'naan .
In October 2010 , he released his  डेब्यू एल्बम , doo-wops  & Hooligans .
Anchored by the worldwide  number-one singles `` बस the रास्ता तुम हैं `` और `` ग्रेनेड  `` , the album peaked at number three on the Billboard 200 .
Mars was nominated for  सात grammys at the 53rd ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , जीतना बेहतरीन  Male Pop Vocal Performance for `` Just the Way You Are '' .
His second studio  एल्बम , अपरंपरागत  Jukebox , was released on December 11 , 2012 .
Mars ' music is noted for  displaying a चौड़ी किस्में of शैलियाँ  and influences , and contains elements of many musical genres .
He has  worked साथ an assortment  of artists from various genres .
As a child , he was highly influenced by artists such as Little Richard , Elvis Presley and Michael  जैक्सन और होता प्रायः impersonate ये  artists from a young age .
Mars also incorporates reggae - and  motown -inspired ध्वनि into उसके कार्य  .
विश्वव्यापी , मंगल became the  best-selling digital artist in 2011 .
He had three singles in the top ten , including first place with ``  बस the रास्ता तुम हैं '' , जिससे बेची 12.5  million copies .
Mars won Best International  पुरूष सोलो कलाकार at the 2012 ब्रिट पुरस्कार  .
Bruno  मंगल रै बेची 6 लाख एल्बम और  40 million singles worldwide as a singer .
althought as a song-writer , निर्माता और सिंगर उसके कुल  single download sales surpass 100 million worldwide .

Greek mythology is the body of myths and teachings that belong to the ancient Greeks , concerning their gods and heroes , the nature of the world ,  और the origins और significance of उनके अपना cult और अनुष्ठान  practices .
It was a part of the religion in ancient Greece and is part of religion in  आधुनिक यूनानियों और around the संसार , ज्ञात as hellenismos  .
Modern scholars refer to  और पढ़ाई the मिथकों in an attempt to throw लाइट on the धार्मिक और राजनैतिक  institutions of Ancient Greece and its civilization , and to gain understanding of the nature of myth-making itself .
Greek mythology is explicitly embodied in a large collection of narratives , and implicitly in Greek representational arts ,  ऐसे as vase-paintings और votive  gifts .
Greek myth attempts to explain the origins of the world , and details the lives and adventures of a wide variety of gods ,  देवियाँ , नायक , heroines , और पौराणिक जीव  .
ये खाते initially यहूद disseminated in an  oral-poetic tradition ; today the Greek myths are known primarily from Greek literature .
The oldest known Greek  साहित्यिक स्त्रोत , होमर 's एपिक कविताएं इलियड  and Odyssey , focus on events surrounding the Trojan War .
Two poems by Homer 's near contemporary Hesiod , the Theogony and  the works और दिनों , contain खाते of the उत्पत्ति of the संसार , the उत्तराधिकार of दैवी शासकों , the उत्तराधिकार  of human ages , the origin of human woes , and the origin of sacrificial practices .
Myths are also preserved in the Homeric Hymns , in fragments of epic poems of the Epic  साईकिल , in lyric कविताएं , in the works of the tragedians of the पांचवां सदी bc , in कृतियाँ of विद्वानों  and poets of the Hellenistic Age , and in texts from the time of the Roman Empire by writers such as Plutarch and Pausanias .
Archaeological  निष्कर्षों provide a प्रिंसिपल सोर्स of विवरण परिचय यूनानी  mythology , with gods and heroes featured prominently in the decoration of many artifacts .
Geometric designs on pottery of the eighth century BC depict  दृश्यों इससे the trojan  cycle as well as the adventures of Heracles .
In the  succeeding  Archaic , Classical , and Hellenistic periods , Homeric and various other mythological scenes appear , supplementing the existing literary evidence .
Greek mythology has had an extensive influence on the culture , arts , and  साहित्य of पश्चिमी सभ्यता और remains  part of Western heritage and language .
Poets and artists from ancient times to the present have derived inspiration from Greek mythology and  have खोजा समकालीन significance और प्रासंगिकता  in the themes .
