Mouth &  macneal थी a पॉप duo इससे  the Netherlands .
They are best known for  उनके लाख selling  recording of `` How Do You Do `` .
The Boise State Broncos football program represents Boise State University in  कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल और compete in the फ़ुटबॉल कटोरी subdivision ( fbs  ) of Division I as a member of the Mountain West Conference .
They are currently led by head coach Chris  petersen और खेल उनके घर खेल at bronco  Stadium .
The franc ( sign : Fr . or SFr . ; German : Franken , French and Romansh : franc , Italian : franco ; code : CHF ) is the currency and legal tender of Switzerland and  liechtenstein ; it is भी विधिक टेंडर in the इतालवी exclave campione  d'Italia .
Although  नहीं formally विधिक टेंडर in the जर्मनी exclave büsingen ( the एकमात्र विधिक  currency is the euro ) , it is in wide daily use there .
The  स्विस नेशनल बैंको मुद्दे  banknotes and the federal mint Swissmint issues coins .
The Swiss franc  is the तभी संस्करण of the फ़्रैंक  still issued in Europe .
The smaller denomination , a hundredth of a franc , is a Rappen ( Rp . ) in German , centime  ( c. ) in फ्रेंच , centesimo ( ct. ) in इतालवी , और रैप  ( rp . ) in Romansh .
The ISO code of the currency used by banks and financial  संस्थानों is chf , हालांकि `` fr . '' is प्रयुक्त by सबसे व्यवसायों और विज्ञापनदाता ; कुछ उपयोग  SFr . ; the Latinate `` CH '' stands for Confoederatio Helvetica .
Given the different languages used in Switzerland , Latin is used for  language-neutral  inscriptions on the coins .
Sir Charles Spencer `` Charlie '' Chaplin , ( 16 April  188925 दिसम्बर 1977 ) थी a अंग्रेजों कॉमिक  actor and filmmaker who rose to fame in the silent era .
चैपलिन became a विश्वव्यापी प्रतीक through उसके स्क्रीन persona `` the  Tramp `` and is considered one of the most important figures of the film industry .
His career spanned more than 75 years , from a  चाइल्ड in the विक्टोरियन era to बंद to उसके मौत at the आयु of 88 , और encompassed दोनो  adulation and controversy .
Raised in London , Chaplin 's childhood was defined by  गरीबी और hardship .
He was sent to a workhouse twice before the age of nine ; his father was absent ,  और उसके माँ थी वचनबद्ध to a दिमागी asylum  .
Chaplin began performing from a  यंग आयु , touring म्यूज़िक हॉल और बाद working  as a stage actor and comedian .
at 19 he थी हस्ताक्षरित to the prestigious  Fred Karno company , which took him to America .
Chaplin was scouted by the  फिल्मी उद्योग , और बना उसके पहला दिखावे  in 1914 with Keystone Studios .
He soon developed the Tramp persona and formed a  विशाल प्रशंसक आधार  .
Chaplin  निर्देशित उसके films इससे an जल्दी  stage , and continued to hone his craft as he moved to the Essanay , Mutual , and First National corporations .
By 1918 , he was one  of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध मेन in the  world .
In  1919 , चैपलिन co-founded the वितरण कम्पनी संयुक्त कलाकारों , giving  him complete control over his films .
His first feature-length picture was The Kid ( 1921 ) , followed by A Woman of Paris (  1923 ) , the सुनहरा फटाफट ( 1925 ) , और the सर्कस ( 1928 )  .
He refused  to मूव to ध्वनि films in the  1930s , instead producing City Lights ( 1931 ) and Modern Times ( 1936 ) without dialogue .
Chaplin became increasingly  राजनैतिक और उसके अगला फिल्मी ,  The Great Dictator ( 1940 ) , satirised Adolf Hitler .
the 1940s थी a दशक चिह्नित  with controversy for Chaplin , and his popularity declined rapidly .
He was accused of  कम्युनिस्ट sympathies , जबकि उसके भागीदारी in a paternity  suit and marriages to much younger women were considered scandalous .
An FBI  छानबीन थी खोली on चैपलिन , और he थी आखिरकार  forced to leave the United States and settle in Switzerland .
He abandoned the Tramp for his later films , which include Monsieur Verdoux ( 1947 ) , Limelight ( 1952 ) , A King in New York  ( 1957 ) , और a countess इससे हांग  Kong ( 1967 ) .
Chaplin wrote , directed , produced ,  संपादित , scored , और स्ट्रक्चर in सबसे  of his films .
He  थी a perfectionist , और उसके वित्तीय स्वतंत्रता  meant he often spent years on the development and production of a picture .
उसके films हैं characterised by slapstick संयुक्त  with pathos , and often feature the Tramp struggling against adversity .
Many contain social  और राजनैतिक विषयवस्तु , as खूब  as autobiographical elements .
In 1972 , as part of a renewed appreciation for his work , Chaplin received an Honorary  अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये `` the incalculable प्रभाव he रै था in बनाना  motion pictures the art form of this century '' .
He continues to be held in high regard , with The Gold Rush , City Lights , Modern Times , and The Great  तानाशाह प्रायः क्रमित among the महानतम  films of all time .
Planned Parenthood Federation of America ( PPFA ) , commonly shortened to  नियोजित parenthood , is the u.S. संबद्ध of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नियोजित parenthood संघ  ( IPPF ) and one of its larger members .
PPFA is a non-profit organization providing  reproductive स्वास्थ्य और मातृ और चाइल्ड  health services .
The Planned Parenthood Action Fund , Inc. ( PPAF ) is a related organization which lobbies for pro-choice legislation ,  व्यापक sex शिक्षा , और अभिगम to सस्ती स्वास्थ्य परवाह  in the United States .
Planned Parenthood is the largest U.S. provider of reproductive health services , including cancer  स्क्रीनिंग , hiv स्क्रीनिंग और counseling , निरोधक  , and abortion .
Contraception accounts for 35 % of  ppfa 's कुल सेवाएं और abortions खाता लिये  3 % ; PPFA conducts roughly 300,000 abortions each year , among 3 million people served .
The organization has its  जड़ें in ब्रुकलीन , नई यॉर्क , जहाँ  Margaret Sanger opened the country 's first birth-control clinic .
Sanger founded the American Birth Control League in 1921 , which in 1942 became  भाग of the नियोजित parenthood संघ of अमेरिका  .
Since then , Planned Parenthood has grown to have over 820 clinic locations in  the u.S. , साथ a कुल बजट of us $  1 billion .
PPFA provides an array of services to over three million  लोगों in the संयुक्त राज्य , और supports  services for over one million clients outside the United States .
Mens rea is  लैटिन लिये ``  guilty mind '' .
In  दण्ड विधि  , it is viewed as one of the necessary elements of some crimes .
The standard  आम विधि परीक्षण of दण्ड  liability is usually expressed in the Latin phrase , actus non facit reum nisi mens sit rea , which means `` the act is not culpable unless the mind is guilty '' .
Thus , in  jurisdictions साथ due प्रक्रम , वहीँ जरूर be an actus reus , or `` अपराधी अधिनियम , '' accompanied  by some level of mens rea to constitute the crime with which the defendant is charged ( see the technical requirement of concurrence ) .
As a general rule , criminal liability does not attach to a person  जो acted साथ the अनुपस्थिति  of mental fault .
The exception  is सख्त देयता  crimes .
In civil law , it is usually not necessary  to prove a subjective दिमागी तत्व to स्थापित  liability for breach of contract or tort , for example .
However , if a tort is intentionally committed or a contract is intentionally breached , such  intent may बढ़ाएँ the पैमाना of देयता as  well as the measure of damages payable to the plaintiff .
Therefore , mens rea refers to the mental  तत्व of the अपराध कि accompanies the actus  reus .
In some jurisdictions  , the शर्तें पुरुषों rea और actus reus have महरूम replaced  by alternative terminology .
In Australia , for example , the elements of the federal offences are now designated as `` fault  तत्व '' or `` दिमागी तत्व '' ( पुरुषों rea ) और `` शारीरिक तत्व ''  or `` external elements '' ( actus reus ) .
This terminology was adopted to replace the obscurity of the Latin terms  साथ सरल और सटीक  phrasing .
Ulysses S. Grant ( born Hiram Ulysses Grant ; April 27 , 1822 – July 23 , 1885 ) was the 18th President of the United  राज्य ( 1869–1877 ) following उसके अत्यधिक कामयाब भूमिका as a युद्ध सामान्य in the दूसरी  half of the Civil War .
Under Grant , the Union Army defeated the Confederate military ; having effectively ended the war and  secession साथ the आत्मसमर्पण of रॉबर्ट E. ली 's फौज at appomattox  .
as अध्यक्ष he led the कट्टरपंथी  Republicans in their effort to eliminate all vestiges of Confederate nationalism and slavery .
Upset over uncontrolled  हिंसा in the दक्षिण और having desired to protect अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी  citizenship , President Grant effectively destroyed the Ku Klux Klan in 1871 .
Grant was the first President to establish  सिविल सेवा सुधार having निर्मित a two-year  federally funded Civil Service Commission in 1871 .
In terms of foreign policy , Grant revealed an `` unexpected capacity for deliberation  और परामर्श '' कि प्रचारित the नेशनल ब्याज  .
His reputation was marred by his repeated defense of  भ्रष्ट appointees , और by अमेरिका  's first industrial age economic depression ( called the `` Panic of 1873 `` ) that dominated his second term .
Although his  रिपब्लिकन पार्टी विभाजित in  1872 with reformers denouncing him , Grant was easily reelected .
By 1875 the conservative white Southern opposition regained control of every state in  the दक्षिण और as he बाएँ the श्वेत हाउस in कूच  1877 his policies were being undone .
A career soldier , he graduated from the United  राज्य सैन्य अकादमी  at West Point and served in the Mexican–American War .
When the Civil War began in 1861 ,  ग्रान्ट प्रशिक्षित संघ स्वयंसेवी regiments  in Illinois .
In 1862 , as a general he fought  a श्रेणी of लड़ाइयों और थी प्रचारित to प्रमुख सामान्य बाद  forcing the surrender of a large Confederate army and gaining control of Kentucky and most of Tennessee .
He then led Union forces to victory after  आरंभिक setbacks in the बैटल of shiloh  , earning a reputation as an aggressive commander .
In July 1863 , after a long , complex campaign , Grant  पराजित पाँच uncoordinated confederate सेना ( capturing एक of उन्हें )  and seized Vicksburg .
This famous victory gave the Union full control of the  मिसिसिपी नदी , विभाजित बंद the पश्चिमी  Confederacy , and opened the way for more Union triumphs .
After another win at the Battle of Chattanooga in late 1863 , President Abraham Lincoln made him  लेफ्टिनेंट सामान्य और कमांडर of सब of the संघ  Armies .
As commanding general of the army , Grant confronted Robert E. Lee in a series of very bloody battles in 1864 known as the  overland अभियान कि ended साथ the bottling up of ली at पीटर्सबर्ग , बाहर the confederate  capital of Richmond .
During the siege , Grant coordinated a series of devastating campaigns launched by William  tecumseh शरमन , फिलिप sheridan  , and George Thomas .
आखिरकार तोड़कर through ली  's trenches , the Union Army captured Richmond in April 1865 .
Lee surrendered his depleted forces  to ग्रान्ट at appomattox as the confederacy  collapsed .
Although pro-Confederate historians  attacked ग्रान्ट as a निष्ठुर कसाई  who won by brute force , most historians have hailed his military genius .
Grant 's two consecutive terms as President  stabilized the स्वदेश बाद the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध और दौरान the turbulent  Reconstruction period that followed .
As president , he  enforced पुनर्निर्माण by enforcing  civil rights laws and fighting Ku Klux Klan violence .
Grant won passage of the Fifteenth Amendment ;  giving संवैधानिक सुरक्षा लिये  African-American voting rights .
He used the army to build the Republican Party in the South , based on black voters , Northern  newcomers ( `` carpetbaggers `` ) और देशी  white supporters ( `` Scalawags . '' )
As a  परिणाम , अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी  were represented in the U.S. Congress for the first time in American history in 1870 .
Reformers praised Grant 's  भारतीय सलाम नीति by having टूटा the deadlock on भारतीय appropriations in कॉंग्रेस , the सृष्टि of  the Board of Indian Commissioners to make reform recommendations , and his enlistment of Quaker Protestants who controlled mid western Indian agencies , that effectively curbed Congressional patronage .
Grant remained determined in keeping Indians from being  exterminated इससे श्वेत settler अतिक्रमण or by the  U.S. military .
Grant 's  प्रतिष्ठा as अध्यक्ष by 1875 थी at an all-time ऊँची लिये उसके पिछला  veto of the Inflation Bill , the passage of the Resumption of Specie Act , and Secretary Bristow 's successful raids that shut down the Whiskey Ring .
Grant 's foreign policy , led by Secretary of State Hamilton Fish , implemented International  मध्यस्थता , settled the अलबामा  Claims with Britain and avoided war with Spain over the Virginius Affair .
A jukebox is a partially automated music-playing device , usually a coin-operated  यंत्र , कि होगा खेल a संरक्षक 's चयन इससे self-contained मीडिया  .
The  क्लासिक ज्यूकबॉक्स रै बटन साथ अक्षर और संख्याएँ  on them that , when entered in combination , are used to play a specific selection .
A drug test is a technical analysis of a biological specimen – for example urine , hair , blood , sweat , or oral fluid / saliva – to determine the  उपस्थिति or अनुपस्थिति of निर्दिष्ट जनक दवाएँ or उनके metabolites  .
Major uses of drug testing  हैं to detect the उपस्थिति of प्रदर्शन बढ़ाना  steroids in sport or for drugs prohibited by laws , such as cannabis , cocaine and heroin .
A ``  10-panel मूत्र स्क्रीन  '' consists of the following:
Amphetamines  ( सहित methamphetamine  )
barbiturates
benzodiazepines
cannabinoids  ( THC )
कोका
methadone
methaqualone
Opiates ( Codeine , Morphine , Heroin  , oxycodone , hydrocodone  , etc . )
phencyclidine (  PCP )
propoxyphene
Saturn  v प्रक्षेपास्त्र , प्रयुक्त लिये the अमरीकी  manned lunar landing missions
Space exploration is the discovery and  खोजी of बाहरी स्पेस by  means of space technology .
Physical exploration of space is conducted both by human spaceflights and by  रोबोटिक spacecraft  .
While the observation of objects in space , known as astronomy , predates reliable recorded history , it was the  विकास of विशाल और अपेक्षाकृत कुशल rockets दौरान the जल्दी 20th सदी कि अनुमत शारीरिक स्पेस खोजी to become  a reality .
Common rationales for exploring space include advancing  वैज्ञानिक शोध , uniting अलग राष्ट्र , ensuring  the future survival of humanity and developing military and strategic advantages against other countries .
Various criticisms of  स्पेस खोजी हैं sometimes  made .
Space  खोजी रै प्रायः महरूम  used as a proxy competition for geopolitical rivalries such as the Cold War .
The  जल्दी era of स्पेस खोजी थी चलित by a `` स्पेस रेस `` between the सोवियत संघ और the संयुक्त राज्य , the लॉन्च of the पहला man-made ऑब्जेक्ट to कक्षा the धरती , the ussr 's  Sputnik 1 , on 4 October 1957 , and the first Moon landing by the American Apollo 11 craft on 20 July 1969 are often taken as the boundaries for this initial period .
The Soviet space program achieved many of the first milestones , including the first living being in orbit in 1957 , the first human  spaceflight ( यूरी गगारिन सवार वोस्तोक 1 ) in 1961 , the पहला spacewalk ( by aleksei leonov ) on 18 कूच 1965 , the पहला स्वचालित  landing on another celestial body in 1966 , and the launch of the first space station ( Salyut 1 ) in 1971 .
After the first 20 years of exploration ,  फ़ोकस shifted इससे one-off फ़्लाइट to बेदर्दी  hardware , such as the Space Shuttle program , and from competition to cooperation as with the International Space Station ( ISS ) .
With  the substantial पूर्णता of the  ISS following STS-133 in March 2011 , plans for space exploration by the USA remain in flux .
Constellation , a  बुश प्रशासन कार्यक्रम लिये a वापसी to the चंद्रमा by 2020 थी  judged inadequately funded and unrealistic by an expert review panel reporting in 2009 .
The Obama Administration proposed a revision of Constellation in 2010 to focus on the development of the capability for crewed missions beyond low earth orbit ( LEO ) , envisioning extending the operation of the ISS beyond 2020 , transferring the development of launch vehicles for human crews from NASA to the private sector , and developing technology to enable missions to beyond LEO , such as Earth/Moon L1  , the चंद्रमा , earth/sun l2 , near-earth क्षुद्रग्रह  , and Phobos or Mars orbit .
As of March 2011 , the US Senate and House of  प्रतिनिधि हैं स्टिल working towards a सुलह नासा funding विधेयक , जिससे होगा  probably terminate Constellation and fund development of a heavy lift launch vehicle ( HLLV ) .
In  the 2000s , the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन initiated  a successful manned spaceflight program , while the European Union , Japan , and India have also planned future manned space missions .
China , Russia , Japan , and India have advocated manned missions to the Moon during the 21st century , while the European Union has advocated  मानवयुक्त मिशन to दोनो the चंद्रमा और मंगल दौरान the  21st century .
From the 1990s onwards , private interests began promoting space tourism and then  निजी स्पेस खोजी of the चंद्रमा  ( see Google Lunar X Prize ) .
John Calvin  कूलिज , jr. ( जुलाई 4 , 1872january 5 , 1933  ) was the 30th President of the United States ( 1923–1929 ) .
A Republican lawyer from Vermont , Coolidge worked his way up the ladder of Massachusetts state politics ,  आखिरकार बनने राज्यपाल of कि  state .
His  conduct दौरान the बोस्टन पुलिस स्ट्राइक of  1919 thrust him into the national spotlight and gave him a reputation as a man of decisive action .
Soon after , he was elected as the 29th Vice President in 1920 and succeeded to the  प्रेसिडेंसी upon the अचानक मौत of वारेन G. हार्डिंग  in 1923 .
निर्वाचित in उसके अपना सही in 1924 , he gained a प्रतिष्ठा  as a small-government conservative , and also as a man who said very little .
Coolidge restored public confidence in the White House after the scandals of his predecessor 's  प्रशासन , और बाएँ दफ्तर साथ considerable लोकप्रियता  .
As a Coolidge biographer put it , `` He embodied the spirit and hopes of the  मध्य क्लास , could interpret  their longings and express their opinions .
That he did represent the genius of the average is the  सबसे convincing प्रमाण of  his strength . ''
Some later  criticized कूलिज as भाग of a सामान्य  criticism of laissez-faire government .
His  प्रतिष्ठा underwent a पुनर्जागरण दौरान the रोनाल्ड reagan प्रशासन , लकिन the परम मूल्यांकन of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी  is still divided between those who approve of his reduction of the size of government programs and those who believe the federal government should be more involved in regulating and controlling the economy .
Espresso is a concentrated  पेय brewed by forcing a छोटी राशि of nearly  boiling water under pressure through finely ground coffee beans .
Espresso often has a thicker consistency than coffee brewed by other methods , a higher concentration of suspended and dissolved solids  , और crema ( अर्थ मलाई , लकिन होने a सन्दर्भ to the झाग साथ a मलाईदार बनावट  that forms as a result of the pressure ) .
As a  परिणाम of the pressurized brewing प्रक्रम the जायका  and chemicals in a typical cup of espresso are very concentrated .
एस्प्रेसो is the आधार लिये अन्य पेय , ऐसे as  a latte , cappuccino , macchiato , mocha , or americano .
Espresso has more caffeine per unit volume than most beverages , but the usual  सेवारत आकार is smaller—a ठेठ 60 ml ( 2 us द्रव ounce ) of एस्प्रेसो रै 80 to 150 mg of कैफीन , छोटी  less than the 95 to 200 mg of a standard 240 mL ( 8 US fluid ounces ) cup of drip-brewed coffee .
ब्रायन कैथ केली ( born अक्तूबर  25 , 1961 ) is an American football coach and former player .
He is currently the head  फ़ुटबॉल कोच लिये the notre dame लड़ आयरिश  , a position he has held since December 2009 .
Kelly was  previously सिर कोच at ग्रैंड घाटी राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों ( 1991–2003 ) , सेंट्रल मिशिगन  University ( 2004–2006 ) , and University of Cincinnati ( 2006–2009 ) .
A contract is an agreement having a lawful  ऑब्जेक्ट डाला into voluntarily by दो or अधिक पार्टियों  , each of whom intends to create one or more legal obligations between them .
The elements of a contract are `` offer '' and `` acceptance '' by `` competent  व्यक्तियों '' having विधिक क्षमता जो एक्सचेंज `` विचार '' to बनाएँ ``  mutuality of obligation . ''
Proof  of कुछ or सब  of these elements may be done in writing , though contracts may be made entirely orally or by conduct .
The remedy for breach  of अनुबंध can be `` क्षतिपूर्ति '' in  the form of compensation of money or specific performance enforced through an injunction .
Both of these  remedies पुरस्कार the पार्टी at घाटा the `` लाभ of the सौदेबाजी  '' or expectation damages , which are greater than mere reliance damages , as in promissory estoppel .
The  पार्टियों may  be natural persons or juristic persons .
a अनुबंध is a legally  enforceable promise or undertaking that something will or will not occur .
the शब्द वादा can be प्रयुक्त as a विधिक पर्याय लिये अनुबंध , हालांकि  care is required as a promise may not have the full standing of a contract , as when it is an agreement without consideration .
Contract law varies greatly from one jurisdiction to another , including differences in common law compared to  सिविल विधि , the प्रभाव of प्राप्त विधि , विशेषकर इससे इंग्लैण्ड in  common law countries , and of law codified in regional legislation .
Regarding Australian  अनुबंध विधि लिये उदाहरण  , there are 40 relevant acts which impact on the interpretation of contract at the Commonwealth ( Federal / national ) level , and an additional 26 acts at the level of the state of NSW .
In addition there are 6  अंतरराष्ट्रीय यंत्र or प्रथाओं जिससे हैं लागू लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय  dealings , such as the United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods .
Sidney  पैट्रिक crosby , ons ( born अगस्त  7 , 1987 ) is a Canadian professional ice hockey player who is captain of the Pittsburgh Penguins of the National Hockey League ( NHL ) .
Crosby was drafted first overall by the Penguins  आउट of the क्यूबेक प्रमुख जूनियर हॉकी लीग  ( QMJHL ) .
During his two-year  प्रमुख जूनियर करियर साथ the rimouski océanic , he अर्जित back-to-back  CHL Player of the Year awards and led his club to the 2005 Memorial Cup final .
Nicknamed `` The Next One `` , he was one of the most highly regarded draft picks in hockey history , leading many to refer to  the 2005 ड्राफ्ट लॉटरी as the `` sidney crosby sweepstakes  '' .
In his  पहला एनएचएल ऋतु , crosby समाप्त छठे in लीग स्कोरिंग साथ 102  points ( 39 goals , 63 assists ) and was a runner-up for the Calder Memorial Trophy ( won by Alexander Ovechkin ) .
By his second season , he led the NHL with 120 points ( 36 goals , 84 assists ) to capture the Art Ross  ट्रॉफी , बनने the youngest खिलाड़ी और the तभी किशोरावस्था  to win a scoring title in any major North American sports league .
That same season , Crosby also won the Hart Memorial Trophy as the Professional Hockey  लेखक संघ 's चुनाव लिये सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी और the लेस्टर B. पियर्सन  Award as the NHL Players Association 's choice for most outstanding player , becoming the seventh player in NHL history to earn all three awards in one year .
Crosby started the 2007–08 season with the team  's कप्तानी और subsequently led  them to the 2008 Stanley Cup Finals , where they were defeated by the Detroit Red Wings in six games .
The Penguins returned to the Finals against Detroit the following year and won in seven games  ; crosby became the youngest कप्तान  in NHL history to win the Stanley Cup .
In the 2009–10 season , Crosby scored a career-high 51 goals , tying him with Steven Stamkos for the Rocket Richard Trophy as the league-leader ; with 58 assists , he  totaled 109 अंक , दूसरी in the  NHL .
During the off-season , Crosby received  the चिह्नित मेसियर नेतृत्व  Award .
In 2010–11 ,  crosby sustained a concussion as a  result of hits to the head in back-to-back games .
The injury left him  sidelined लिये  ten and a half months .
However , after playing eight games in the 2011–12 season ,  crosby 's concussion-like लक्षण लौटे in दिसम्बर 2011 , और he किया नहीं  return until mid-March 2012 .
Internationally , Crosby has represented  कनाडा in numerous tournaments लिये the  country 's junior and men 's teams .
After competing in the  2003 u-18 जूनियर संसार कप , he represented कनाडा  in back-to-back IIHF World U20 Championships , winning silver in 2004 and gold in 2005 .
At the 2006 IIHF World Championship , he led the tournament in scoring , while also  कमाई शीर्ष आगे और all-star टोली honours .
Four  सालो बाद , crosby  was named to Team Canada for the 2010 Winter Olympics in Vancouver .
Playing the United States in the gold medal game ,  he scored the game-winning लक्ष्य in ओवरटाइम  .
A United States cent ,  भी ज्ञात as  a penny .
`` My two cents '' ( 2¢ ) and its longer version `` put my two  सेंट in '' is an संयुक्त राज्य ( us ) idiomatic अभिव्यक्ति  , taken from the original English idiom expression : to put in `` my two pennies worth '' or `` my tuppence worth . ''
It is used to  preface the अंतरिम  stating of one’s opinion .
By deprecating the opinion to follow – suggesting its value is only two cents , a very small amount – the  उपयोक्ता of the phrase उम्मीदें to lessen the प्रभाव of a संभवतः बयान , प्रर्दशित politeness और  humility .
However , it is also sometimes used with  विडंबना जब expressing a strongly  felt opinion .
The  phrase is भी प्रयुक्त आउट of आदत  to preface uncontentious opinions .
For  example:
The Chinese Civil  युद्ध थी a सिविल युद्ध in चीन लड़ा between शक्तियां वफ़ादार to the सरकारी  of the Republic of China led by the Kuomintang ( KMT ) and forces of the Communist Party of China ( CPC ) .
The war began in April 1927 , amidst the Northern Expedition ,  और essentially ended जब प्रमुख क्रियाशील लड़ाइयों  ceased in 1950 .
The conflict eventually resulted in two de facto states ,  the गणतंत्र of चीन ( आरओसी ) in ताईवान और the लोगों  's Republic of China ( PRC ) in mainland China , both claiming to be the legitimate government of China .
The war represented an ideological split ( Left vs . Right ) between the  कम्युनिस्ट cpc , और the kmt 's ब्रांड of राष्ट्रवाद  .
The  सिविल युद्ध जारी intermittently जबतक लेट  1937 , when the two parties formed a Second United Front to counter a Japanese invasion .
China 's  full-scale सिविल युद्ध resumed in 1946 , a साल बाद  the end of hostilities with Japan .
After four more years ,  1950 देखी the cessation of प्रमुख सैन्य hostilities—with the newly संस्थापित लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन controlling मेनलैंड  China ( including Hainan ) , and the Republic of China 's jurisdiction being restricted to Taiwan , Penghu , Quemoy , Matsu and several outlying islands .
The Kuomintang defeat is attributed to several factors : Corruption -  च्यांग लिखा in उसके डायरी on जून 1948 कि the kmt था  failed , not because of external enemies but because of rot from within .
Strong initial support from the U.S.  diminished , और तब , रोका  .
( Partly because of KMT  भ्रष्टाचार और anti-democratic शासन , और partly क्युकी of the अनिश्चित u.S. विदेशी नीति  towards Communism between 1945 and 1950 ) ; Communist land reform policy promised poor peasants farmland from their landlords .
This ensured  pla लोकप्रिय  support .
After the  आत्मसमर्पण of जापानी at  the end of World War II , Soviet forces turned over their captured Japanese weapons to the CPC and allowed the CPC to take control of territory in Manchuria .
To this day , no armistice or peace  सन्धि रै कभी महरूम हस्ताक्षरित , और it is debated  as to the whether the Civil War has legally ended .
Cross-Strait relations have been hindered by military threats and political and economic pressure , particularly over Taiwan 's political status  , साथ दोनो सरकारें officially adhering to a `` one-china नीति .  ''
The PRC still actively claims Taiwan as part of its territory and continues to threaten the ROC with a military invasion if the ROC  officially declares स्वतंत्रता by बदलना इसके नाम to और gaining  international recognition as the Republic of Taiwan .
The ROC mutually claims mainland China , and they both continue the fight over  राजनयिक मान्यता  .
Today , the war as such occurs on  the राजनैतिक और आर्थिक fronts  in the form of cross-Strait relations ; however , the two separate de facto states have close economic ties .
The One Hundred Twelfth United States Congress was the meeting of the legislative branch of the United States federal  सरकारी , इससे जनवरी 3 , 2011 जबतक जनवरी  3 , 2013 .
It convened in Washington , D.C. on January 3 , 2011 , and  ended on जनवरी 3 , 2013 , 17 दिनों पहले the समाप्त of the अध्यक्षीय  term to which Barack Obama was elected in 2008 .
Senators elected  to नियमित शर्तें in 2006  completed those terms in this Congress .
This Congress included the last House of Representatives elected  इससे congressional जिले कि यहूद apportioned आधारित on  the 2000 census .
In the 2010 midterm elections , the Republican Party won  the बहुमत in the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  .
While the Democrats kept their Senate  बहुमत , it  was reduced from the previous Congress .
This was the first Congress  in जिससे the हाउस और सीनेट यहूद नियंत्रित by अलग पार्टियों चूंकि the 107th कॉंग्रेस  ( 2001–2003 ) , and the first Congress to begin that way since the 99th Congress ( 1985–1987 ) .
In this  कॉंग्रेस , the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि था the largest  number of Republican members , 242 , since the 80th Congress ( 1947–1949 ) .
It was also the first Congress since 1947 in which no member of the  कैनेडी परिवार परोसा , as खूब as the सबसे नीतियां polarized कॉंग्रेस चूंकि पुनर्निर्माण  , with record low approval ratings .
Wealth in the United States is commonly measured in terms of net worth , which is the sum of all  एसेट , सहित घर इक्विटी ,  minus all liabilities .
The total net worth of US households  और  nonprofit organizations 1945–2009 , unadjusted for inflation or population change .
For example , a household in possession of an $ 800,000 house , $ 5,000 in mutual funds , $ 30,000 in cars , $ 20,000 worth of stock  in उनके अपना कम्पनी , और a $ 45,000 ira होता have  assets totaling $ 900,000 .
Assuming that this household would have a $ 250,000  बंधक , $ 40,000 in car लोन , और $ 10,000 in क्रेडिट कार्ड कर्ज़ , इसके debts होता  total $ 300,000 .
Subtracting the debts from the worth of this household 's  एसेट ( 900,000 - $ 300,000  = $ 600,000 ) , this household would have a net worth of $ 600,000 .
Net worth  can vary साथ  fluctuations in value of the underlying assets .
The wealth  —more specifically , the मध्य  net worth—of households in the United States is varied with relation to race , education , geographic location and gender .
As one  होता expect , households साथ वृहद आय  feature the highest net worths , though high income can not be taken as an always accurate indicator of net worth .
Overall the  क्रमांक of wealthier households is on the वृद्धि , साथ  baby boomers hitting the highs of their careers .
In addition , wealth is unevenly distributed ,  साथ the wealthiest 25 % of us households  owning 87 % of the wealth in the United States , which was $ 54.2 trillion in 2009 .
Including human capital such as skills  , the संयुक्त राष्ट्र अनुमानित  the total wealth of the United States in 2008 to be $ 118 trillion .
This article deals with Selective Dorsal Rhizotomy ( SDR ) rather than the rhizotomy procedures for pain relief  ; लिये those प्रक्रियाओं , जिससे have begun to लो the नाम `` rhizotomy '' in निश्चित उदाहरण , देखिए  facet rhizotomy and similar .
A rhizotomy ( ) is a term chiefly referring to a neurosurgical procedure that selectively destroys problematic nerve roots in the spinal  cord , सबसे प्रायः to relieve the लक्षण of neuromuscular शर्तें ऐसे as spastic diplegia और अन्य  forms of spastic cerebral palsy .
The selective dorsal rhizotomy ( SDR ) for spastic cerebral palsy has been the main  उपयोग of rhizotomy लिये neurosurgeons specialising in spastic cp चूंकि the 1980s ; in इस सर्जरी  , the spasticity-causing nerves are isolated and then targeted and destroyed .
The sensory nerve roots , where spasticity is located , are first separated from the motor ones , and  the तंत्रिका मछली to be काटें हैं तब पहचाना via electromyographic  stimulation .
The ones producing spasticity are then  selectively lesioned साथ छोटा विद्युत  pulses .
In  spasticity , rhizotomy precisely लक्ष्य और नष्ट the क्षतिग्रस्त nerves  that don’t receive gamma amino butyric acid , which is the core problem for people with spastic cerebral palsy .
These over-firing , non-GABA-absorbing nerves generate unusual electrical activity during the EMG testing phase in SDR and are thus considered to be the source of the patient 's hypertonia ;  वे हैं eliminated साथ the विद्युत pulses एकबार पहचाना , जबकि the बाकी  nerves and nerve routes carrying the correct messages remain fully intact and untouched .
This means that the spasticity is permanently dissolved , and that this is done without affecting nervous system sensitivity or function in other areas , because the only nerves  नष्ट हैं the over-firing ones जिम्मेदार लिये the मांसपेशी tightness  .
The terms rhizotomy and neurotomy are also increasingly becoming  interchangeable in the उपचार  of chronic back pain from degenerative disc disease .
This is a procedure called a facet rhizotomy and  is नहीं a सर्जिकल कार्यविधि लकिन is बजाय किया  on an outpatient basis using a simple probe to apply radiofrequency waves to the impinged pain-causing nerve root lying between the facet joint and the vertebral body .
Such radio frequency nerve lesioning results in five to eight or more months of pain relief before the nerve  regenerates और another गोलाकार  of the procedure needs to be performed .
A facet rhizotomy is just one of many different forms of  radiofrequency ablation , और इसके उपयोग of the `` rhizotomy '' नाम चाहिए नहीं be  confused with the SDR procedure .
Migrant workers  in कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , 1935
The term migrant worker has different  आधिकारिक meanings और connotations  in different parts of the world .
The United Nations ' definition is broad ,  सहित कोई लोगों working  outside of their home country .
The term can  भी be प्रयुक्त to describe किसी जो migrates भीतर a देश ,  possibly their own , in order to pursue work such as seasonal work .
फोटोग्राफ of लील वेन  with teardrop tattoos below his eyes .
The  teardrop टैटू or आंसू टैटू is a सांकेतिक  tattoo that is placed underneath the eye .
It  रै no फिक्स्ड  meaning but almost all meanings ( see below ) have some connection to prison .
U.S. Route 75 is a  north–south u.S. राजमार्ग  .
The highway 's northern terminus is in Kittson  काउंटी , मिनेसोटा , at the कनाडाई किनारा , जहाँ it एकबार जारी as मनिटोबा  Highway 75 on the other side of the now-closed border crossing .
Its southern terminus is at Interstate 30 and Interstate  45 in डलास , टेक्सास , जहाँ it is  known as North Central Expressway .
U.S. 75 was a border-to-border  रूट , इससे कनाडा to the गल्फ of  Mexico at Galveston , Texas .
However , the entire segment south of Dallas , Texas has been  decommissioned in एहसान of अंतरराज्यीय  45 , a cutoff section of town-to-town surface road having become State Highway 75 .
निम्नतर नवीं वार्ड  is a neighborhood of the city of New Orleans .
As the name  implies , it is भाग  of the Ninth Ward of New Orleans .
The Lower Ninth Ward is often thought of as the entire area within New Orleans downriver of  the औद्योगिक कनाल ; however , the नगर नियोजन आयोग divides इस क्षेत्रफल  into the Lower Ninth Ward ( 2 ) and Holy Cross ( 3 ) neighborhoods .
The term `` Lower '' refers to its location farther towards the mouth of the Mississippi  नदी , `` bas '' or `` नीचे '' the बाकी of the नगर  in local geographic terminology .
But the 9th Ward ,  जैसे सब wards in नई ऑरलियन्स , is a  voting district .
The 9th Ward was added as  a मतदान ज़िला  in 1852 .
The `` lower '' 9th Ward is composed of Ward 9 Districts 1 , 2 , 4 , and 7 which make  up the पावन क्रॉस क्षेत्रफल और वार्ड 9 जिले 3 ,  5 , 6 , and 8 .
Higher voting district  संख्याएँ in the 9th वार्ड ( 8-27 ) हैं on the  upriver side of the Industrial Canal .
The  क्षेत्रफल आए to नेशनल ध्यान  for its devastation in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina in 2005 .

Red and orange tinted Moon ,  as देखी इससे धरती दौरान a चंद्र ग्रहण  , where the Earth comes between the Moon and Sun
The Moon is the only natural  उपग्रह of the धरती , और the  fifth largest satellite in the Solar System .
It is the  largest प्राकृतिक उपग्रह of a ग्रह in the सौर प्रणाली सापेक्ष to the आकार of इसके  primary , having 27 % the diameter and 60 % the density of Earth , resulting in its mass .
The Moon  is the दूसरी densest  satellite after Io , a satellite of Jupiter .
The Moon is in synchronous rotation with Earth , always showing the same face with its near side marked  by अंधेरा volcanic मरिया कि भरण between  the bright ancient crustal highlands and the prominent impact craters .
it is the brightest ऑब्जेक्ट in the आसमान बाद  the Sun , although its surface is actually very dark , with a reflectance similar to that of coal .
Its prominence in  the आसमान और इसके नियमित साईकिल of phases have , चूंकि  ancient times , made the Moon an important cultural influence on language , calendars , art and mythology .
The Moon 's gravitational influence  produces the समंदर tides और the मिनट  lengthening of the day .
The Moon 's current orbital distance , about thirty times the diameter of  the धरती , कल्याणकारी it to appear लगभग the वही  size in the sky as the Sun , allowing it to cover the Sun nearly precisely in total solar eclipses .
This matching of apparent  विज़ुअल आकार is a संयोग  .
The Moon 's linear distance from the Earth is currently increasing at a rate of 3.82±0.07cm  प्रति साल , लकिन इस रेट  is not constant .
The Moon is thought to have formed nearly 4.5  अरब सालो पहले , नहीं long बाद the  Earth .
Although there have been several hypotheses for its origin in the past , the current most widely accepted explanation is that the Moon formed  इससे the मलबा बाएँ over बाद a दानव प्रभाव between धरती  and a Mars -sized body .
The Moon is the only  celestial देह अन्य than धरती  on which humans have set foot .
The Soviet Union 's Luna programme was the first to reach the Moon with unmanned spacecraft in 1959 ; the United States ' NASA Apollo program achieved the only manned missions to date , beginning  साथ the पहला मानवयुक्त चंद्र orbiting मिशन by अपोलो 8 in 1968 , और छह मानवयुक्त चंद्र अवतरण between 1969 और 1972 , साथ the  first being Apollo 11 .
These missions  लौटे over 380 kg of चंद्र रॉक्स ,  which have been used to develop a geological understanding of the Moon 's origins , the formation of its internal structure , and its subsequent history .
After the Apollo 17 mission in 1972 , the Moon has been  visited तभी by unmanned spacecraft , notably by the फाइनल  Soviet Lunokhod rover .
Since 2004 , Japan , China  , इण्डिया , the  United States , and the European Space Agency have each sent lunar orbiters .
These spacecraft have contributed to confirming the discovery of lunar water ice in  permanently shadowed craters at the डंडे और बंधी  into the lunar regolith .
Future manned missions to the Moon have been  नियोजित , सहित सरकारी as खूब as  privately funded efforts .
The Moon remains , under the Outer Space Treaty  , फ़्री to सब राष्ट्र to explore  for peaceful purposes .
Ronald Wilson Reagan ( ; February 6 , 1911 – June 5 , 2004 ) was the  40th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1981–1989 )  .
Prior to that , he was the 33rd Governor of California (  1967–1975 ) , और a रेडियो , फिल्मी  and television actor .
Born in Tampico  , इलिनोइस , और उठाया in डिक्सन , reagan थी शिक्षित at यूरेका  College , earning a Bachelor of Arts degree in economics and sociology .
After graduating , Reagan moved first to Iowa to work as a radio broadcaster and then ,  in 1937 , to लॉस एंजिल्स जहाँ he began a करियर  as an actor , first in films and later television .
Some of his most notable films include Knute Rockne , All American ( 1940 ) , Kings Row  ( 1942 ) , और bedtime लिये bonzo ( 1951 )  .
Reagan served as President of the Screen Actors  गिल्ड और बाद as a प्रवक्ता लिये सामान्य इलेक्ट्रिक ( ge ) ; उसके  start in politics occurred during his work for GE .
Originally a member of the Democratic Party , his  स्थितियाँ began shifting rightward in the 1950s , और he  switched to the Republican Party in 1962 .
After delivering a rousing speech in support of Barry Goldwater 's presidential  उम्मीदवारी in 1964 , he थी persuaded to तलाश the कैलिफ़ोर्निया  governorship , winning two years later and again in 1970 .
He was defeated in his run for the Republican presidential nomination in 1968 and in 1976 , but won both the nomination and general  चुनाव in 1980 , defeating  incumbent Jimmy Carter .
As president ,  reagan implemented sweeping नई राजनैतिक  and economic initiatives .
His supply-side economic policies , dubbed `` Reaganomics `` , advocated reducing tax rates to spur economic  विकास , controlling the धन सप्लाई to reduce महंगाई , deregulation  of the economy , and reducing government spending .
In his first  पद he बच an हत्या attempt  , took a hard line against labor unions , announced a new War on Drugs , and ordered an invasion of Grenada .
He was re-elected in a  भूस्खलन in 1984 , proclaiming  that it was `` Morning in America `` .
His second term was primarily marked by foreign matters ,  ऐसे as the समाप्ति of the ठंडा युद्ध , the 1986 bombing  of Libya , and the revelation of the Iran-Contra affair .
Publicly  describing the सोवियत संघ as an `` दुष्ट साम्राज्य `` , he समर्थित anti-communist  movements worldwide and spent his first term forgoing the strategy of détente by ordering a massive military buildup in an arms race with the USSR .
Reagan negotiated with Soviet  सामान्य सचिव  Mikhail Gorbachev , culminating in the INF Treaty and the decrease of both countries ' nuclear arsenals .
Reagan  बाएँ दफ्तर in  1989 .
in 1994 , the पूर्व अध्यक्ष disclosed कि he था महरूम diagnosed  with Alzheimer 's disease earlier in the year ; he died ten years later at the age of 93 .
A conservative icon , he ranks  अत्यधिक in पब्लिक राय पोल of u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों  and is credited for generating an ideological renaissance on the American political right .
Complete set of scrolls ,  constituting the संपूर्ण tanakh  .
The Tanakh ( , or ; also Tenakh  , tenak , tanach  ) is a name used in Judaism for the canon of the Hebrew Bible .
The  tanakh is भी ज्ञात  as the Masoretic Text or the Miqra .
The name is an acronym formed from the  आरंभिक यहूदी अक्षर of the masoretic टेक्स्ट 's तीन परंपरागत subdivisions : the  Torah ( `` Teaching '' , also known as the Five Books of Moses ) , Nevi'im ( `` Prophets '' ) and Ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh .
The name `` Miqra '' ( מקרא ) , meaning `` that which is  पढ़ा '' , is an वैकल्पिक यहूदी पद  for the Tanakh .
The books of the Tanakh were relayed with an accompanying oral tradition  passed on by प्रत्येक पीढी  , called the Oral Torah .
The Kawasaki Ninja ZX-6R is a Kawasaki  600 cc क्लास खेल मोटरसाइकिल  .
it थी introduced in  1995 , and has been constantly updated throughout the years in response to new products from Honda , Suzuki , and Yamaha .
The ZX series is what was known as the  निंजा लकीर of कावासाकी मोटरसाइकिल in the 1980s  and still carries the name today .
Assassination attempts and plots on Presidents of the United States have been numerous : more than 20 attempts to kill sitting and  पूर्व राष्ट्रपतियों , as खूब as the presidents-elect , हैं ज्ञात  .
Four sitting presidents have been killed  : अब्राहम lincoln ( the 16th अध्यक्ष ) , जेम्स A. गारफ़ील्ड ( the 20th अध्यक्ष ) , विलियम mckinley  ( the 25th President ) and John F. Kennedy ( the 35th President ) .
Two presidents were injured in attempted assassinations : former President  थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट ( the 26th अध्यक्ष )  , and President Ronald Reagan ( the 40th President ) .
Although the historian J.W . Clarke has suggested that most American assassinations were politically motivated  क्रियाएँ , carried आउट by तर्कसंगत मेन , नहीं सब ऐसे हमले have महरूम undertaken लिये  political reasons .
Some  हमलावर था questionable दिमागी स्थिरता  , and a few were judged legally insane .
Since the Vice President of the United States has for more than a  सदी महरूम निर्वाचित इससे the वही राजनैतिक पार्टी as the अध्यक्ष , the हत्या of  the President is unlikely to result in major policy changes .
This may  बताइये क्यों राजनैतिक समूह typically  do not make such attacks .
Where the Red Fern Grows is a novel written  by विल्सन राल्स  in 1961 about a boy who buys and trains two Redbone Coonhound hunting dogs .
Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa , Cayuga : Gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a state  स्तिथ in वेस्ट दक्षिण सेंट्रल  United States .
Oklahoma is the 20th most extensive and the 28th most  populous of the 50 संयुक्त राज्य  .
The state 's name is derived from the Choctaw  शब्द okla और humma , अर्थ `` रेड लोगों ''  , and it is known informally by its nickname , The Sooner State .
Formed by the combination of Oklahoma Territory and Indian Territory on November 16 , 1907 ,  ओक्लाहोमा थी the 46th राज्य to डालें the  union .
Its residents are  ज्ञात as oklahomans or , informally  `` Okies '' , and its capital and largest city is Oklahoma City .
A major producer of natural gas , oil , and agriculture , Oklahoma relies on  an आर्थिक आधार of विमानन  , energy , telecommunications , and biotechnology .
It has one of the fastest growing economies in the  स्वदेश , रैंकिंग among the शीर्ष राज्य in प्रति capita आय विकास  and gross domestic product growth .
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's primary economic anchors , with nearly two thirds of Oklahomans living within their  महानगर  statistical areas .
With small mountain ranges , prairie , mesas , and eastern forests , most of Oklahoma  झूठ in the ग्रेट मैदान और the u.s . आंतरिक हाइलैंड्स —a प्रदेश विशेषकर prone  to severe weather .
In addition to having a prevalence of  अंग्रेज़ी , जर्मनी , स्कॉटिश , आयरिश और देशी अमरीकी  ancestry , more than 25 Native American languages are spoken in Oklahoma , second only to California .
Oklahoma is located on a confluence of three major American cultural regions and  historically परोसा as a रूट लिये चौपायों ड्राइव , a गंतव्य  for southern settlers , and a government-sanctioned territory for Native Americans .
Redwall , by Brian Jacques , is a  श्रेणी of children 's काल्पनिक  novels .
It is the title of the first book of the series , published in 1986 , as well as the name of the Abbey featured in the book and the name of an animated TV series based on  तीन of the novels ( redwall , mattimeo , और मार्टिन the योद्धा ) , जिससे पहला  aired in 1999 .
The books  हैं primarily aimed at पुरानी children  , but have fans of all ages .
There have been  twenty-two novels और दो  picture books published .
The twenty-second ,  और फाइनल , अनोखा , the दुष्ट क्रू  , was posthumously released on May 3 , 2011 .
Natural  गैस is प्रायः measured by आवाज़ in  the United States and is stated in cubic feet .
A cubic foot of  गैस is the राशि of गैस needed to भरण a आवाज़ of एक घन पैर अंतर्गत नियत शर्तें of दबाव और temperature.to माप larger amounts  of natural gas , a `` therm '' is used to denote 100 cubic feet , and `` mcf '' is used to denote 1,000 cubic feet .
To provide greater  सटीकता in comparing fuels , उर्जा  content is measured in terms of `` British Thermal Units ( BTU 's ) . ''
A BTU is the amount of heat required to raise one pound of water (  लगभग a pint ) , एक उपाधि फ़ारेनहाइट at or बंद to इसके पाइंट of अधिकतम  density .
One British therm ( symbol thm ) is a non- SI unit of heat energy  बराबर to 100,000 अंग्रेजों थर्मल  units ( BTU ) .
It is approximately the energy equivalent of burning  100 घन फीट ( प्रायः referred to as 1 ccf  ) of natural gas .
Since ( Natural Gas ) meters measure volume and not energy  सामग्री , a therm फ़ैक्टर is प्रयुक्त  by ( Natural ) gas companies to convert the volume of gas used to its heat equivalent , and thus calculate the actual energy use .
The therm factor is usually in  the इकाई therms/ccf  .
It will vary with the mix of hydrocarbons in  the प्राकृतिक  gas .
Natural gas with a higher than average concentration of ethane ,  प्रोपेन or ब्यूटेन होगा have a उच्चतर therm  factor .
Impurities , such  as कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड or नाइट्रोजन , निम्नतर  the therm factor .
The volume of  the गैस is गणना as if measured  at standard temperature and pressure ( STP ) .
The heat content of natural gas is  solely निर्भर on the संयोजन of the गैस , और is स्वतंत्र  of temperature and pressure .
One therm  is बराबर to परिचय 105.5 megajoules  , 25,200 kilocalories or 29.3 kilowatt-hours .
One therm can also be provided by  परिचय of प्राकृतिक गैस  .
The therm  sometimes रै महरूम उलझन साथ  the thermie ( see below ) .
The names of  दोनो इकाई आइये  from the Greek word for heat .
a thermie ( th ) is a मीट्रिक  unit of heat energy , part of the meter-tonne-second system sometimes used by European engineers .
The thermie is equal to the amount of energy  जरूरी to उठाएँ the तापमान  of 1 tonne of water by 1 °C .
The thermie is equivalent to 1,000 kilocalories ,  4.1868 megajoules or 3968.3  BTU .
The American  सिविल युद्ध ( acw ) , भी ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए  naming ) , was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery , especially the  एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the पश्चिमी territories  .
विदेशी शक्तियां किया  not intervene .
After four years of bloody  कॉम्बैट कि बाएँ over 600,000 सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना  , the Confederacy collapsed , slavery was abolished , and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans , led  by अब्राहम lincoln , opposed expanding गुलामी  into United States ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before his inauguration on  कूच 4 , 1861 , सात cotton-based स्लेव राज्य formed the confederacy  .
Outgoing Democratic President James  बुकानन और the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत  secession as illegal .
lincoln 's inaugural पता घोषित उसके प्रशासन  would not initiate civil war .
Eight remaining slave states continued to  अस्वीकृत काल्स लिये secession  .
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts within  territory claimed by the confederacy  .
a सलाम सम्मेलन विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह  , and both sides prepared for war .
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so  निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और  none recognized the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April  12 , 1861 , जब confederate शक्तियां fired  upon Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln  पुकारा लिये प्रत्येक राज्य to provide सैनिकों  to retake the fort ; consequently , four more slave states joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the border states and  स्थापित  a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy .
The Eastern Theater was  inconclusive in 1861–62  .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state )  ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल of antietam , dissuading  British intervention .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation  उदघोषणा ,  which made ending slavery a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy , then much of their  पश्चिमी सेना , और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in दो at the  Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee 's  confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the बैटल of gettysburg  .
Western successes led  to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड  of all Union armies in 1864 .
In the  पश्चिमी थिएटर , विलियम T. शरमन drove ईस्ट to  capture Atlanta and marched to the sea , destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way .
the संघ marshaled the संसाधन और जनशक्ति  to attack the Confederacy from all directions , and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate  फौज विफल , अग्रणी to ली  's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil War was one of  the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक युद्धों  .
Railroads , the telegraph , steamships , and mass-produced  हथियार यहूद employed extensively  .
The mobilization of civilian factories , mines , shipyards ,  बैंको , परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed  World War I .
It remains the deadliest war in  अमरीकी इतिहास , resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित  750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death  टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा , और 30  percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
William Bruce Jenner ( born October 28 ,  1949 ) is a पूर्व u.S. track और फ़ील्ड खिलाड़ी  , motivational speaker , socialite , television personality and businessman .
He  जीती the सुनहरा पदक लिये  decathlon in the Montreal 1976 Summer Olympics .
Following his Olympic win and the related  मान्यता , he शादीशुदा क्रिस कार्दशियन , और उसके  professional career evolved into being a television celebrity .
By 1981 , he had starred in  अनेक made-for-tv फिल्मों और थी erik  Estrada 's replacement on the top rated TV series CHiPs .
He has six children : Burt ,  केसी , ब्रैंडन , ब्रोडी , केंडल और  Kylie .
Since his 1991 marriage to Kris Jenner ,  he is the stepfather to कोर्टनी , किम , khloe  and Rob Kardashian .
Since 2007 , he has appeared with his blended  परिवार on keeping up साथ the  Kardashians .
Escherichia coli ( ; commonly  abbreviated E. कोलाई ) is a gram-negative , rod-shaped  bacterium that is commonly found in the lower intestine of warm-blooded organisms ( endotherms ) .
Most E. coli strains are harmless  , लकिन कुछ serotypes can कारण गंभीर खाना विषाक्तता in इंसानो  , and are occasionally responsible for product recalls due to food contamination .
The  हानिरहित strains हैं भाग of the सामान्य फ्लोरा of the आंत , और can लाभ उनके होस्ट  by producing vitamin K2 , and by preventing the establishment of pathogenic bacteria within the intestine .
E. coli and related bacteria constitute about 0.1 % of gut flora , and fecal–oral transmission  is the प्रमुख रूट through जिससे रोगजनक strains  of the bacterium cause disease .
कोशिकाएं हैं समर्थ to जीवित बाहर  the body for a limited amount of time , which makes them ideal indicator organisms to test environmental samples for fecal contamination .
There is , however , a growing body of research that has examined  environmentally persistent E. कोलाई जिससे can जीवित लिये विस्तारित अवधि बाहर  of the host .
The bacterium can also be grown easily and inexpensively in a laboratory setting , and has been  intensively investigated  for over 60 years .
E. coli is the most widely studied prokaryotic model  सजीव , और an महत्वपूर्ण प्रजाति in the फ़ील्ड of जैवप्रौद्योगिकी  and microbiology , where it has served as the host organism for the majority of work with recombinant DNA .
Area code 217 is the North American  टेलीफोन क्षेत्रफल कोड लिये much of पश्चिमी और सेंट्रल  Illinois .
The 217 area includes Illinois '  पूंजी , springfield , प्लस champaign , urbana , decatur ,  Danville , Quincy , and Rantoul .
217  थी एक of the  original area codes , which were created in 1947 .
The only significant change in 217 's  सीमाएँ थी in 1957 , जब इसके उत्तरी portion  was combined with part of area code 815 to form area code 309 .
Image of the largest Antarctic ozone  छेद कभी अंकित ( सितंबर 2006 ) , over  the Southern pole
Layers of the  माहौल ( नहीं to  scale )
Ozone depletion describes two  पृथक लकिन सम्बन्धित phenomena observed चूंकि the लेट 1970s : a स्थिर मनाही of परिचय 4 % प्रति दशक  in the total volume of ozone in Earth 's stratosphere ( the ozone layer ) , and a much larger springtime decrease in stratospheric ozone over Earth 's polar regions .
The latter phenomenon is  referred to as the ओज़ोन  hole .
In addition to these well-known stratospheric phenomena , there are  भी springtime ध्रुवीय tropospheric ओज़ोन depletion कार्यक्रम  .
The details of polar ozone hole formation differ from that of mid-latitude thinning , but the most  महत्वपूर्ण प्रक्रम in दोनो is catalytic विनाश of ओज़ोन  by atomic halogens .
the प्रमुख सोर्स of ये हैलोजन  atoms in the stratosphere is photodissociation of man-made halocarbon refrigerants ( CFCs , freons , halons ) .
These compounds  हैं transported into the stratosphere  after being emitted at the surface .
Both types of ozone depletion were  observed to बढ़ाएँ as emissions of halo-carbons  increased .
CFCs and other contributory substances  हैं referred to as  ozone-depleting substances ( ODS ) .
Since the  ओज़ोन परत रोकता सबसे नुकसानदेह uvb wavelengths ( 280–315 nm ) of पराबैंगनी लाइट ( uv लाइट ) इससे गुजर through the धरती 's  atmosphere , observed and projected decreases in ozone have generated worldwide concern leading to adoption of the Montreal Protocol that bans the production of CFCs , halons , and other ozone-depleting chemicals such as carbon tetrachloride and trichloroethane .
It is suspected that a variety of  biological consequences ऐसे as increases in स्किन कर्कट , cataracts , क्षति to  plants , and reduction of plankton populations in the ocean 's photic zone may result from the increased UV exposure due to ozone depletion .
The Preamble  to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान is a ब्रैड परिचयात्मक  statement of the Constitution 's fundamental purposes and guiding principles .
It  राज्य in सामान्य शर्तें , और न्यायालयों have referred to it as विश्वसनीय प्रमाण of , the founding fathers ' इरादों regarding the  Constitution 's meaning and what they hoped the Constitution would achieve as it pertains to all of the people of the United States .
As the phrase , `` we the people  '' suggests कि the नई सरकारी originates इससे the लोगों of the संयुक्त राज्य  and it sets into motion a question as it pertains to that vast population concerning the individual rights and equality among all people ; this can be seen most broadly in the divide between republicanism and social democracy .
