The  शॉट put ( सुनाया ) is a track और फ़ील्ड इवेंट involving  `` throwing '' / '' putting '' ( throwing in a pushing motion ) a heavy spherical object —the shot—as far as possible .
the शॉट put प्रतियोगिता लिये मेन रै महरूम a भाग of the आधुनिक ओलंपिक  since their revival in 1896 , women 's competition began in 1948 .
Map of the United  राष्ट्र ( un ) सदस्य राज्य , साथ  their territories ( including dependent territories ) recognized by the UN in blue
There are United Nations ( UN ) member states , and  प्रत्येक of उन्हें is a सदस्य of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र  General Assembly .
The criteria for admission of new members are  नियत आउट in the संयुक्त  Nations Charter , Chapter II , Article 4:
A recommendation for admission from the Security Council requires affirmative votes from at least nine of the council 's fifteen  सदस्यों , साथ none of the पाँच स्थाई सदस्यों मतदान  against .
The Security Council 's recommendation must then  be subsequently स्वीकृत in the सामान्य सभा by  a two-thirds majority vote .
In principle , only sovereign states can become UN members , and currently all UN members are sovereign states ( although a few members  यहूद नहीं sovereign जब वे joined  the UN ) .
Because a state can only be admitted to the UN by the approval of the  सुरक्षा परिषद और the सामान्य सभा , a क्रमांक of राज्य कि may be माना sovereign राज्य according to the montevideo सम्मेलन मापदण्ड  are not members because the UN does not consider them to possess sovereignty , mainly due to the lack of international recognition or opposition from certain members .
In addition to the member states , the UN also invites non-member states ( currently two : the Holy See and Palestine ) , intergovernmental organizations , and other international organizations and entities whose statehood or sovereignty are not precisely defined , to become  observers at the सामान्य सभा , allowing उन्हें to participate और बोलो , लकिन नहीं vote , in सामान्य सभा  meetings .
the एफिल मीनार ( , ) is an आयरन जाली मीनार स्तिथ  on the Champ de Mars in Paris , named after the engineer Gustave Eiffel , whose company designed and built the tower .
Erected in 1889 as  the प्रवेश मेहराब to the 1889 संसार 's मेला , it रै become दोनो a वैश्विक  cultural icon of France and one of the most recognizable structures in the world .
The tower is the tallest structure in Paris and the most-visited  सशुल्क स्मारक in the संसार ; 7.1 लाख लोगों  ascended it in 2011 .
The third level observatory 's upper platform is at the highest accessible to public  in the यूरोपीय संघ और the उच्चतम in यूरोपीय as long as the मंच of the ostankino  Tower , at , remains closed as a result of the fire of August 2000 .
The tower received its 250  millionth आगंतुक in  2010 .
The  मीनार स्टैंड लम्बा , परिचय  the same height as an 81-storey building .
During its construction , the Eiffel Tower surpassed the  वॉशिंगटन स्मारक to assume the शीर्षक of the  tallest man-made structure in the world , a title it held for 41 years , until the Chrysler Building in New York City was built in 1930 .
Because of the addition ,  in 1957 , of the एंटीना atop the एफिल मीनार  , it is now taller than the Chrysler Building .
Not  सहित ब्रॉडकास्ट एन्टेना , it is the second-tallest  structure in France , after the Millau Viaduct .
The  मीनार रै तीन स्तर  for visitors .
Tickets  can be खरीदा to ascend , by  stairs or lift ( elevator ) , to the first and second levels .
The walk from ground level to the first level is over 300 steps , as is the  चलना इससे the पहला to the दूसरी स्तर  .
The third and highest level is accessible only by lift—stairs  do मौजूद लकिन हैं प्रायः बंद  to the public .
The first and second  स्तर have रेस्तरां  .
The tower has become the most prominent symbol of both Paris and France ,  प्रायः in the establishing शॉट of films नियत  in the city .
केनेथ वेन `` केन '' जेनिंग्स iii ( born may  23 , 1974 ) is an American game show contestant and author .
Jennings is noted for holding the record for the longest winning streak on the U.S.  syndicated खेल दिखाएँ jeopardy  !
and as being the  all-time अग्रणी धन विजेता  on American game shows .
In  2004 , जेनिंग्स जीती  74 Jeopardy !
games before he was defeated by  चैलेंजर नैंसी zerg  on his 75th appearance .
His  कुल आय  on Jeopardy !
are $ 3,172,700 , consisting of $ 2,520,700 over his 74 wins , a $ 2,000 second-place  पुरस्कार in उसके 75th रूप , a $ 500,000 second-place पुरस्कार in the  Jeopardy !
परम टूर्नामेंट of champions , as  well as half of a $ 300,000 prize in the IBM Challenge .
During  उसके पहला  run of Jeopardy !
appearances , Jennings earned  the रिकार्ड लिये the  highest American game show winnings .
His total was surpassed by  ब्रैड rutter , जो पराजित जेनिंग्स in the फाइनल of the  Jeopardy !
Ultimate  टूर्नामेंट of champions ( पहला aired  on May 25 , 2005 ) , adding $ 2,000,000 to Rutter 's existing Jeopardy !
winnings  .
Jennings regained the record after appearing  on अनेक अन्य खेल shows , culminating in an रूप on हैं तुम होशियार  Than a 5th Grader ?
( first  aired on अक्तूबर 10 ,  2008 ) , though Rutter retains the Jeopardy !
रिकार्ड  .
After his success on Jeopardy ! , Jennings wrote about his experience and explored  अमरीकी ट्रिविया इतिहास और संस्कृति in उसके किताब brainiac  : Adventures in the Curious , Competitive , Compulsive World of Trivia Buffs , published in 2006 .
The Canadian Football League or CFL ( ' [ LCF ] in French ) is a  पेशेवर खेल लीग स्तिथ  in Canada .
The CFL is the highest level of competition in Canadian football , a form  of gridiron फ़ुटबॉल closely  related to American football .
Its eight current teams , which are located in eight separate cities ,  हैं विभाजित into दो विभाजन  of four teams each — the East Division and the West Division .
The league 's  19-week नियमित ऋतु रनों इससे लेट जून to जल्दी नवम्बर  ; each team plays 18 games with one bye week .
Following the regular season , the three teams with the best records in their division ( except if the fourth place team in one division has a better record than  the तीसरा प्लेस टोली in the अन्य प्रभाग , जब the टोली साथ the बेहतर रिकार्ड makes the playoffs और `` crosses over '' to the अन्य प्रभाग 's playoff ) compete in the लीग 's three-week डिवीजनल playoffs , जिससे culminate in the  late-November Grey Cup championship , the country 's largest annual sports and television event .
The CFL was officially founded  on जनवरी 19 , 1958 , बनाना it the दूसरी oldest gridiron  football league in North America still in operation , although all its teams long predate the modern formation of the league .
It is the highest level of play in Canadian football , the most popular football league in Canada , and the second-most  लोकप्रिय प्रमुख खेल लीग in कनाडा , बाद the नेशनल हॉकी लीग .
Although  बर्फ हॉकी is कनाडा 's सबसे लोकप्रिय खेल , the cfl रै increased  the popularity of Canadian football in Quebec and Western Canada .
Canadian football is also played at amateur levels ( i.e .  युवावस्था , ऊँची स्कूल , cjfl , qjfl , cis और वरिष्ठ लीग  such as the Alberta Football League ) .
The 2010s will be a significant decade for the CFL in terms of growth ,  as टीमों have संवर , विस्तारित स्टेडियम , or योजना to निर्माण entirely  new stadiums .
The Montreal Alouettes accomplished this first ,  adding 5,000 सीटे to पर्सिवल molson मेमोरियल स्टेडियम in समय  for the 2010 CFL season .
The Edmonton Eskimos and Calgary  स्तेमपेड्रस भी संवर उनके संबंधित  stadiums and facilities for the 2010 season .
In  2011 , the bc शेर निभाई अंतर्गत a नई , retractable छत  in BC Place after spending one and a half seasons at Empire Field .
तब the विन्निपेग ब्लू बमवर्षक  will play in an entirely new stadium at the University of Manitoba , scheduled to open in time for the 2013 season .
The Hamilton Tiger-Cats , Saskatchewan Roughriders and the new Ottawa franchise are also looking at  नई or extensively-renovated स्टेडियम  in the following years .
There are  भी उम्मीदें of expanding the लीग to अटलांटिक कनाडा ( ideally  basing a team in either the more populated Halifax , or the more centralized Moncton ) , as 2010 and 2011 had regular season games hosted in Moncton .
According to sports historian Douglas Brei , the Canadian Football League holds the distinction of being the only professional sports  लीग in उत्तर अमेरिका , प्रमुख or नाबालिग लीग , in जिससे प्रत्येक मौजूदा मताधिकार  has won at least one league title while in their current location .
Each antibody  बांधता to a विशिष्ट प्रतिजन ; an  interaction similar to a lock and key .
An antibody ( Ab ) , also known as an immunoglobulin ( Ig ) , is a  विशाल y-shaped प्रोटीन उत्पादित by b-cells कि is प्रयुक्त by the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली to पहचानो  and neutralize foreign objects such as bacteria and viruses .
The  एंटीबॉडी recognizes a अद्वितीय भाग of the विदेशी  target , called an antigen .
Each tip of the `` Y '' of an antibody contains a paratope ( a structure  analogous to a ताला ) कि is विशिष्ट लिये एक particular epitope ( similarly analogous to a कुंजी ) on an प्रतिजन , allowing  these two structures to bind together with precision .
Using this binding mechanism , an antibody can tag a microbe or an infected cell for  आक्रमण by अन्य भाग of the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली , or can neutralize इसके निशाना सीधे ( लिये उदाहरण , by ब्लॉकिंग  a part of a microbe that is essential for its invasion and survival ) .
The production  of antibodies is the प्रमुख फलन  of the humoral immune system .
Antibodies are secreted by a type of white blood cell  पुकारा a प्लाज्मा कोशिका .
Antibodies  can occur in दो शारीरिक फ़ॉर्म , a घुलनशील रूप कि is स्रावित इससे the कोशिका  , and a membrane -bound form that is attached to the surface of a B cell and is referred to as the B cell receptor ( BCR ) .
The BCR is only found on the surface of B cells and facilitates the activation of these cells and their subsequent differentiation into either antibody factories  पुकारा प्लाज्मा कोशिकाएं , or मेमोरी b कोशिकाएं कि होगा जीवित in the देह और याद कि वही प्रतिजन so the  B cells can respond faster upon future exposure .
In  सबसे मामले , बातचीत of the b कोशिका साथ a t हेल्पर कोशिका is  necessary to produce full activation of the B cell and , therefore , antibody generation following antigen binding .
Soluble antibodies are released into the blood and tissue fluids , as well as many secretions  to continue to सर्वेक्षण  for invading microorganisms .
Antibodies are glycoproteins belonging to the immunoglobulin  superfamily ; the शर्तें एंटीबॉडी और immunoglobulin  are often used interchangeably .
Antibodies are typically made of  मौलिक संरचनात्मक units—each साथ दो विशाल  heavy chains and two small light chains .
There are several different types of antibody heavy chains , and several different kinds of antibodies  , जिससे हैं grouped into अलग isotypes आधारित on  which heavy chain they possess .
Five different  एंटीबॉडी isotypes हैं ज्ञात in स्तनधारियों , जिससे perform अलग भूमिकाएँ , और सहायता सीधा the उचित प्रतिरक्षा जवाब  for each different type of foreign object they encounter .
Though the general structure of all antibodies is very similar , a small region at the tip of  the प्रोटीन is अत्यधिक परिवर्तनीय , allowing लाखो of antibodies साथ  slightly different tip structures , or antigen binding sites , to exist .
This region is  ज्ञात as the hypervariable  region .
Each of these variants can  bind to a अलग  antigen .
This enormous diversity of antibodies allows the immune system to  recognize an बराबर चौड़ी किस्में of antigens  .
The large and diverse population of antibodies is  उत्पन्न by यादृच्छिक combinations of a नियत of जीन खण्ड कि encode अलग प्रतिजन बाइंडिंग साइट ( or paratopes ) ,  followed by random mutations in this area of the antibody gene , which create further diversity .
Antibody genes also re-organize in  a प्रक्रम पुकारा क्लास switching कि परिवर्तन the आधार of the भारी कड़ी  to another , creating a different isotype of the antibody that retains the antigen specific variable region .
This allows a single antibody to be used by several different  भाग of the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली  .
The symbol used  by the zodiac कातिल  to sign his correspondence
the zodiac कातिल थी a  serial killer who operated in Northern California in the late 1960s and early 1970s .
the कातिल 's पहचान  remains unknown .
The Zodiac  murdered पीड़ितों in benicia , vallejo , झील berryessa  , and San Francisco between December 1968 and October 1969 .
चार मेन और तीन महिलाओं  between the ages of 16 and 29 were targeted .
The killer originated  the नाम `` zodiac '' in a श्रेणी of  taunting letters sent to the local Bay Area press .
These letters included four  cryptograms ( or ciphers  ) .
Of the four cryptograms sent , only one has  महरूम definitively हल  .
Suspects have been named by law enforcement and amateur investigators , but no conclusive evidence  रै surfaced  .
In April 2004 , the San Francisco Police  विभाग चिह्नित the मामला `` निष्क्रिय  '' , yet re-opened the case at some point prior to March 2007 .
The  मामला भी remains खोलें in the नगर of  Vallejo , as well as in Napa County and Solano County .
The California Department of  इंसाफ रै कायम an खोलें मामला  file on the Zodiac murders since 1969 .
Jennings is a small city in and the parish seat of  जेफरसन डेविस मोहल्ला , louisiana ,  United States , near Lake Charles .
The population was 10,383 at the 2010 census , a  छोटी मनाही इससे the 2000 tabulation  .
The city is 68  प्रतिशत श्वेत  .
Jennings is the principal city of the Jennings  micropolitan सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल , जिससे शामिल सब  of Jefferson Davis Parish .
It is also part of the larger Lake  charles-jennings संयुक्त सांख्यिकीय  Area .
Nanotechnology ( sometimes shortened to ``  nanotech '' ) is the हेरफेर  of matter on an atomic and molecular scale .
The earliest , widespread description of  nanotechnology referred to the particular technological लक्ष्य of precisely manipulating अणु  and molecules for fabrication of macroscale products , also now referred to as molecular nanotechnology .
A more generalized description of  nanotechnology थी subsequently स्थापित by the नेशनल nanotechnology पहल , जिससे defines nanotechnology  as the manipulation of matter with at least one dimension sized from 1 to 100 nanometers .
This definition reflects the fact that quantum mechanical effects are important at this quantum-realm scale , and so the definition  shifted इससे a particular technological लक्ष्य to a शोध श्रेणी समावेशी of सब प्रकार of शोध और technologies  that deal with the special properties of matter that occur below the given size threshold .
It is therefore common to see the plural form `` nanotechnologies '' as well  as `` nanoscale technologies '' to refer to the व्यापक दायरा of  research and applications whose common trait is size .
Because of the variety of potential applications (  सहित औद्योगिक और सैन्य ) , सरकारें have invested  billions of dollars in nanotechnology research .
Through its National Nanotechnology  पहल , the यूएसए रै invested 3.7 अरब  dollars .
the यूरोपीय संघ रै invested  1.2 billion and Japan 750 million dollars .
Nanotechnology as defined by size is naturally very  व्यापक , सहित फ़ील्ड of  science as diverse as surface science , organic chemistry , molecular biology , semiconductor physics , microfabrication , etc .
The associated research and applications are equally diverse , ranging from extensions of  conventional यंत्र भौतिकी to completely नई approaches आधारित upon आणविक self-assembly , इससे विकासशील नई सामग्री साथ आयाम on the nanoscale to सीधा  control of matter on the atomic scale .
वैज्ञानिकों फिलहाल बहस  the future implications of nanotechnology .
Nanotechnology may be  समर्थ to बनाएँ अनेक नई सामग्री और डिवाइस साथ a विशाल दायरा of अनुप्रयोग  , such as in medicine , electronics , biomaterials and energy production .
On the other hand , nanotechnology raises many of the same issues as any new technology , including concerns  परिचय the toxicity और पर्यावरणीय प्रभाव of nanomaterials , और उनके संभावित प्रभाव on वैश्विक  economics , as well as speculation about various doomsday scenarios .
These  चिंताएं have led to  a debate among advocacy groups and governments on whether special regulation of nanotechnology is warranted .
Map  of the  Eastern Bloc
The term Eastern Bloc or  कम्युनिस्ट bloc refers to the पूर्व कम्युनिस्ट राज्य of सेंट्रल और पूर्वी यूरोपीय ,  generally the Soviet Union and the countries of the Warsaw Pact .
The terms Communist Bloc and Soviet Bloc were also used to denote  groupings of राज्य लकीर साथ  the Soviet Union , although these terms might include states outside Central and Eastern Europe .
The New Jersey gubernatorial  चुनाव of 2009 took प्लेस on नवम्बर  3 , 2009 .
लोकतांत्रिक राज्यपाल jon corzine थी कार्यशील लिये a दूसरी पद  and was being challenged by Republican Chris Christie , Independent Christopher Daggett and nine others , in addition to several write-in candidates .
क्रिस्टी जीती the चुनाव , साथ परिचय 48.5 प्रतिशत of the  vote , to 44.9 percent for Corzine and 5.8 percent for Daggett .
Christie won the largest  हाशिया लिये a पहला पद  Republican since 1969 .
Christie  assumed दफ्तर on जनवरी  19 , 2010 .
This was the first election to fill the newly created  दफ्तर of लेफ्टिनेंट  Governor .
The candidates for governor and lieutenant  राज्यपाल यहूद joined साथ as a सिंगल चुनाव , so कि मतदाता किया नहीं have the अवसर  to split the ticket .
Kim Guadagno , Christie 's running mate , became New  जर्सी 's पहला लेफ्टिनेंट राज्यपाल  following her inauguration .
Health care in the United States is  provided by अनेक पृथक संगठन  .
Health care facilities  हैं largely स्वामित्व और संचालित by निजी सेक्टर  businesses .
Health insurance for public  सेक्टर कर्मचारी is primarily  provided by the government .
60-65 % of healthcare provision and spending comes from programs such as Medicare , Medicaid , TRICARE , the Children 's Health  बीमे कार्यक्रम , और the दिग्गजों स्वास्थ्य प्रशासन  .
Most of the population under 65 is  insured by उनके or a परिवार सदस्य 's नियोक्ता , कुछ  buy health insurance on their own , and the remainder are uninsured .
Of 17 high-income countries studied by the National Institutes of  स्वास्थ्य in 2013 , the संयुक्त राज्य थी at or निकट the नीचे in शिशु मृत्यु , दिल  and lung disease , sexually transmitted infections , adolescent pregnancies , injuries , homicides , and rates of disability .
Together , such issues place the U.S. at the  नीचे of the सूची लिये जीवन प्रत्याशा  .
On average , a U.S. male can  be अपेक्षित to सजीव लगभग चार कम सालो than those  in the top-ranked country .
According to the World Health Organization ( WHO ) , the United  राज्य खर्च अधिक on स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रति capita ( $ 7,146  ) , and more on health care as percentage of its GDP ( 15.2 % ) , than any other nation in 2008 .
The  राष्ट्रमंडल निधि क्रमित the संयुक्त  States last in the quality of health care among similar countries , and notes U.S. care costs the most .
The U.S. Census Bureau reported that 49.9 million residents , 16.3 % of the population , were uninsured in 2010 ( up from 49.0 million  निवासियों , 16.1 % of the जनसांख्यिकी  , in 2009 ) .
A 2004 Institute of Medicine ( IOM ) report said : `` The United States is among the few industrialized nations in  the संसार कि करता नहीं गारंटी अभिगम to स्वास्थ्य  care for its population . ''
A 2004 OECD report said : `` With  the एक्सेप्शन of मैक्सिको , तुर्कों , और the संयुक्त राज्य , सब oecd देशों  had achieved universal or near-universal ( at least 98.4 % insured ) coverage of their populations by 1990 . ''
A 2010 report observed that lack of  स्वास्थ्य बीमे कल्याणकारी roughly 48,000  unnecessary deaths every year in the United States .
In 2007 , 62.1 % of filers for bankruptcies claimed high  चिकित्सा खर्च  .
A 2013 study found that about 25  % of सब वरिष्ठ नागरिकों घोषित दिवालियापन due  to medical expenses , and 43 % are forced to mortgage or sell their primary residence .
On March 23 , 2010 , the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act ( PPACA ) became law , providing for major  परिवर्तन in स्वास्थ्य बीमे  .
In  physiology , देह जल is the जल  content of the human body .
A  significant भिन्न of the इंसान  body is water .
आर्थर guyton 's textbook of चिकित्सा physiology राज्य कि `` the  total amount of water in a man of average weight ( 70 kilograms ) is approximately 40 litres , averaging 57 percent of his total body weight .
In a newborn infant , this may be as high as 75 percent of the body weight , but it  progressively decreases इससे जनम to बूढ़ा आयु , सबसे  of the decrease occurring during the first 10 years of life .
Also , obesity decreases the  प्रतिशत of जल in the देह , sometimes  to as low as 45 percent '' .
These figures are  सांख्यिकीय averages , so हैं illustrative , और जैसे सब biostatistics  , will vary with things like type of population , age and number of people sampled , and methodology .
So  वहीँ is नहीं , और can नहीं be , a फिगर  that is exactly the same for all people , for this or any other physiological measure .
For example , Jackson 's  ( 1985 ) anatomy & physiology लिये  Nurses gives a figure of 60 % for the proportion of body-weight attributable to water , which approximates Guyton 's 57 % .
In diseased states where body water is affected , the  कम्पार्टमेंट or compartments कि have बदला can दे clues to the प्रकृति  of the problem .
Body water is  regulated by हार्मोन , सहित  anti-diuretic hormone ( ADH ) , aldosterone and atrial natriuretic peptide .
Per Netter 's  एटलस of इंसान physiology , देह जल  is broken down into the following compartments:
Intracellular fluid ( 2/3 of  देह जल  ) .
Per Guyton , in a body containing 40 litres of fluid ,  परिचय 25 लीटर is intracellular , जिससे amounts to 62.5 % ( 5/8 ) , बंद पर्याप्त  to the 2/3 rule of thumb .
Jackson 's texts  राज्य 70 % of देह  fluid is intracellular .
extracellular द्रव  ( 1/3 of body water ) .
Per Guyton 's illustration , for a 40 litre body , about   15 litres is extracellular , which amounts to 37.5 % Again , this is close to the 1/3 rule of thumb cited here .
Plasma ( 1/5 of  extracellular द्रव ) .
Per Guyton 's illustration , of the 15  लीटर of extracellular द्रव , प्लाज्मा  volume averages 3 litres .
This  amounts to 20 % , the  same as per Netter 's Atlas .
Interstitial  द्रव ( 4/5 of extracellular  fluid )
Transcellular fluid ( a.k.a . ``  तीसरा स्पेस , '' सामान्यतः  ignored in calculations )
Contained inside  अंगों , ऐसे as the  gastrointestinal , cerebrospinal , peritoneal , and ocular fluids .
Self-esteem is  a पद प्रयुक्त in मनोविज्ञान to प्रतिबिंबित a व्यक्ति  's overall emotional evaluation of his or her own worth .
It is a judgement  of oneself as खूब as an रवैया  toward the self .
Self-esteem encompasses  मान्यताओं ( लिये उदाहरण , `` i am competent , ''  `` I am worthy '' ) and emotions such as triumph , despair , pride and shame .
Smith and Mackie  define it by saying  `` The self-concept is what we think about the self ; self-esteem , is the positive or negative evaluations of the self , as in how we feel about it . ''
Self-esteem is also known as the evaluative dimension of the self that includes feelings  of worthiness , prides और discouragement  .
One  's self-esteem is भी  closely associated with self-consciousness .
Self-esteem is a disposition that  a व्यक्ति रै जिससे represents उनके निर्णयों  of their own worthiness .
In the  mid-1960s , मॉरिस rosenberg और  social-learning theorists defined self-esteem as a personal worth or worthiness .
nathaniel branden in 1969 पारिभाषित self-esteem as `` the अनुभव  of being competent to cope with the basic challenges of life and being worthy of happiness . ''
According to  branden , self-esteem is the योग of self-confidence  ( a feeling of personal capacity ) and self-respect ( a feeling of personal worth ) .
It exists as a consequence of the implicit judgement that every person has of their ability to face life 's challenges ,  to समझे और solve समस्याएं , और उनके सही to achieve सुख , और  be given respect .
As a  सोशल मनोवैज्ञानिक construct , self-esteem is आकर्षक क्युकी शोधकर्ताओं have conceptualized it as an influential  predictor of relevant outcomes , such as academic achievement ( Marsh 1990 ) or exercise behavior ( Hagger et al . 1998 ) .
In addition , self-esteem has also been treated as an important outcome due to  इसके बंद संबंध साथ मनोवैज्ञानिक well-being  ( Marsh 1989 ) .
Self-esteem can apply specifically to a particular dimension ( for example , `` I believe I am a good  लेखक और i महसूस प्रसन्न परिचय कि '' ) or a वैश्विक extent  ( for example , `` I believe I am a bad person , and feel bad about myself in general '' ) .
Psychologists usually regard self-esteem as an enduring personality characteristic (  `` trait '' self-esteem ) , हालांकि सामान्य , short-term विसंगतियाँ  ( `` state '' self-esteem ) also exist .
Synonyms or near-synonyms of self-esteem include :  self-worth , self-regard , self-respect , और self-integrity  .
A Masonic Lodge , often termed a  निजी आवास or constituent आवास , is the  basic organisational unit of Freemasonry .
Every  नई आवास जरूर be warranted or चार्टर्ड by a ग्रैंड  Lodge , but is subject to its direction only in enforcing the published Constitution of the jurisdiction .
By exception the three surviving lodges that formed the world 's first known Grand Lodge  in लंदन ( आज पुकारा the संयुक्त ग्रैंड आवास of इंग्लैण्ड ) have the अद्वितीय विशेषाधिकार to operate as समय immemorial i.e . बगैर  such warrant ; only one other lodge operates without a warrant - this is the Grand Stewards ' Lodge in London , although it is not also entitled to the `` time immemorial '' title .
A Freemason is generally entitled to visit any Lodge , in any  क्षेत्राधिकार ( i.e . अंतर्गत कोई ग्रैंड  Lodge ) in amity with his own .
In some jurisdictions this privilege is restricted to  निपुण masons ( कि is , freemasons जो have  attained the Order 's third degree ) .
He is first usually required to check , and  certify , the नियमितता of the संबंध  of the Lodge - and be able to satisfy that Lodge of his regularity of membership .
Freemasons gather together as a  आवास to कार्य the तीन  basic Degrees of Entered Apprentice , Fellowcraft and Master Mason .
Pilkington Group Limited is a multinational glass manufacturing company headquartered in St Helens , United Kingdom and a  wholly स्वामित्व subsidiary of the japan-based  NSG Group .
Prior to its acquisition by NSG in 2006 it was an independent company listed on the London Stock  एक्सचेंज और लिये a समय थी a constituent of the ftse  100 Index .
A quotation is the repetition of one expression as part of another one , particularly when  the कोटेड अभिव्यक्ति is well-known or explicitly attributed by citation to  its original source , and it is indicated by ( punctuated with ) quotation marks .
A quotation can also refer to the repeated use of units  of कोई अन्य रूप of अभिव्यक्ति , विशेषकर भाग of कलाकारी works : तत्व  of a painting , scenes from a movie or sections from a musical composition .
Year 1877 ( MDCCCLXXVII ) was a common year starting on Monday ( link will display the full calendar )  of the gregorian पंचांग  and a common year starting on Saturday of the 12-day slower Julian calendar .
Black pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is  a flowering बेल in the परिवार piperaceae , cultivated  for its fruit , which is usually dried and used as a spice and seasoning .
The fruit , known as a  peppercorn जब सूखी , is लगभग in व्यास ,  dark red when fully mature , and , like all drupes , contains a single seed .
Peppercorns , and the ground pepper derived from them , may be described simply as pepper , or more precisely as black pepper ( cooked  और सूखी unripe फल ) , ग्रीन pepper ( सूखी unripe फल  ) and white pepper ( dried ripe seeds ) .
Black pepper is native to south  इण्डिया , और is extensively cultivated  there and elsewhere in tropical regions .
Currently Vietnam is the world 's largest producer and exporter of pepper ,  producing 34 % of the संसार 's पाइपर nigrum  crop as of 2008 .
Dried ground pepper has been  प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्राचीनता लिये दोनो  its flavour and as a medicine .
Black pepper is the world 's  सबसे traded मसाला  .
It is one of  the सबसे आम मसाले added to  European cuisine and its descendants .
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the chemical  piperine , नहीं to be उलझन साथ the  capsaicin that gives fleshy peppers theirs .
It is in the  आधुनिक संसार , प्रायः युग्म  with salt .
Fire hydrant in  charlottesville , वर्जिनिया ,  USA
A fire hydrant ( also known colloquially as a fire plug in the United States or as a johnny pump in New York City ) , is an active fire protection measure , and a source of water provided in most urban , suburban and rural  क्षेत्रों साथ नगरपालिका जल सेवा to enable अग्निशमन to tap into the नगरपालिका  water supply to assist in extinguishing a fire .
Buildings near a hydrant may qualify for an insurance discount since firefighters should be able  to अधिक rapidly बुझा a आग on the insured प्रॉपर्टी  .
The concept of  आग plugs तिथियाँ to at  least the 17th century .
This was a time when firefighters responding to a call would dig down to the wooden  जल मेन्स और hastily bore a छेद to सुरक्षित जल to लड़ो  fires .
The water would fill the hole creating a temporary well , and be transported from the well to  the आग by बाल्टी brigades or , बाद , by hand-pumped आग इंजन  .
The holes were then plugged with stoppers , normally redwood , which  over  time came to be known as fire plugs .
The location of the plug would often be recorded or marked so that it could  be  reused in future fires .
This is the  सोर्स of the colloquial पद आग प्लग  still used for fire hydrants today .
After the Great Fire of  लंदन in 1666 , the नगर संस्थापित जल मेन्स साथ छेद drilled at  intervals , equipped with risers , allowing an access point to the wooden fire plugs from street level .
The invention of a post- or pillar-type fire  hydrant is generally credited to फ्रेडरिक graff sr. , मुख्य इंजीनियर of the  Philadelphia Water Works around the year 1801 .
It had a  संयोजन hose/faucet आउटलेट और  was of `` wet barrel '' design with the valve in the top .
it is कहा कि graff आयोजित the पहला पेटेंट लिये a आग hydrant , लकिन इस can नहीं be  verified because the patent office in Washington D.C. caught on fire in 1836 destroying many patent records from that period in the process .
The President of  the गणतंत्र of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी is the सिर of राज्य और सिर  of government under South Africa 's Constitution .
From 1961 to 1994 , the head of state was  पुकारा the राज्य अध्यक्ष  .
The President is elected by members of the National Assembly , the lower house of Parliament , and is usually the leader of the largest party , which has been the African  नेशनल कॉंग्रेस चूंकि the पहला non-racial चुनावों यहूद आयोजित on 27  April 1994 .
The  भूमिका थी originally संस्थापित to be पृथक इससे the अभी  defunct role of prime minister , but the two roles were merged in the 1983 constitution which specified a four-year term of office .
The 1993 and  बाद constitutions हद  the president 's time in office to two five-year terms .
The first President to be elected under the new constitution was Nelson  मंडेला , और the लाज़िम अध्यक्ष is याक़ूब zuma .
अंतर्गत the अंतरिम संविधान ( मान्य इससे 1994 to 1996 ) , वहीँ थी a सरकारी  of National Unity , in which an MP from the largest opposition party was entitled to a position as Deputy President .
Along with Thabo Mbeki , the last State  अध्यक्ष , f.w . de klerk भी परोसा as डिप्टी अध्यक्ष  , in his capacity as the leader of the National Party which was the second-largest party in the new Parliament .
But De Klerk later resigned  और गई into विपक्ष  with his party .
A voluntary coalition government continues to exist under the new constitution (  अपनाया in 1996 ) , हालांकि वहीँ have महरूम no नियुक्ति of विपक्ष राजनेता  to the post of deputy president .
Special education or special needs education is the education of students with special needs in a way that addresses the  विद्यार्थी ' व्यक्तिगत मतभेद  and needs .
Ideally , this process involves the individually planned and systematically monitored arrangement of teaching procedures , adapted equipment and materials , accessible settings , and other interventions designed to help learners with special  needs achieve a उच्चतर स्तर of निजी self-sufficiency और कामयाबी in स्कूल और जातियाँ than होता be उपलब्धियाँ if the छात्र यहूद तभी दिए अभिगम to a ठेठ कक्षा शिक्षा  .
Common special  needs शामिल चुनौतियां साथ सीखना , संचार चुनौतियां  , emotional and behavioral disorders , physical disabilities , and developmental disorders .
Students with these kinds of special needs are likely to benefit from additional educational services such as different  approaches to शिक्षण , उपयोग of प्रौद्योगिकी , a specifically adapted शिक्षण क्षेत्रफल , or  resource room .
Intellectual giftedness is a difference in learning and can also benefit from  specialized शिक्षण तकनीकों or अलग शैक्षणिक कार्यक्रम , लकिन the पद `` खास शिक्षा '' is generally प्रयुक्त to specifically indicate निर्देश of विद्यार्थी जिनकी खास needs reduce उनके क्षमता to  learn independently or in an ordinary classroom , and gifted education is handled separately .
In most developed countries , educators are modifying teaching methods and environments  so कि the अधिकतम क्रमांक of विद्यार्थी  are served in general education environments .
Special  शिक्षा in विकसित देशों is प्रायः regarded कम as a  `` place '' and more as `` a range of services , available in every school . ''
Integration can reduce social stigmas and improve academic achievement  लिये अनेक विद्यार्थी  .
The opposite  of खास शिक्षा  is general education .
General education is the standard curriculum presented with standard  शिक्षण विधि और बगैर अतिरिक्त supports  .
George Soros ( or ; ; ; born  अगस्त 12 , 1930 , as schwartz györgy ) is a hungarian-american कारोबार  magnate , investor , and philanthropist .
He is the  अध्यक्ष of सोरोस  Fund Management .
Soros supports  progressive-liberal कल्याणकारी .
He is known as `` The  man जो broke the बैंको of इंग्लैण्ड `` क्युकी of उसके in निवेश  profits during the 1992 Black Wednesday UK currency crisis .
Between 1979 and 2011 , Soros gave away over $ 8  अरब to इंसान अधिकारों , पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य  , and education causes .
He played a significant role in the peaceful transition from  साम्यवादी to पूंजीवाद in हंगेरियाई ( 1984–89 ) और  provided one of Europe 's largest higher education endowments to Central European University in Budapest .
सोरोस is भी the  chairman of the Open Society Institute .
An actor portraying  सिकंदर ग्राहम घंटी बोलना into an जल्दी मॉडल  telephone .
The invention of the telephone is the culmination of work done by many individuals , the history of which involves a  संग्रहण of दावा और counterclaims .
The  विकास of the आधुनिक विद्युत टेलीफोन  involved an array of lawsuits founded upon the patent claims of several individuals and numerous companies .
This article covers the early years from 1844 to 1898 , from conception of the idea of an electric voice-transmission  यंत्र , to विफल कोशिशें to उपयोग `` make-and-break '' वर्तमान , to कामयाब प्रयोग साथ इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक telephones by  Alexander Graham Bell and Thomas Watson , and finally to commercially successful telephones in the late 19th century .
A  निपुण of ठीक कला ( mfa , m.f.a . ) is a ग्रैजुएट उपाधि typically requiring 2–3 सालो  of postgraduate study beyond the bachelor 's degree ( BFA ) , although the term of study will vary by country or by university .
The MFA is a creative degree usually  awarded as a टर्मिनल उपाधि in विज़ुअल कला , रचनात्मक  writing , filmmaking , dance , or theatre and other performing arts .
Coursework is  primarily of an लागू or performing प्रकृति साथ the कार्यक्रम  often culminating in a major work or performance .
Master of Fine Arts programs have generally required a bachelor 's degree  prior to प्रवेश , लकिन अनेक do नहीं आवश्यकता कि the undergraduate  major be the same as the MFA field of study .
The most important  admissions आवश्यकता रै प्रायः महरूम a नमूना  portfolio or a performance audition .
The Master of Fine Arts differs from the Master of Arts in that the MFA , while an academic  कार्यक्रम , centers around अभ्यास in the particular फ़ील्ड , whereas कार्यक्रम अग्रणी to the ma प्रायः बीच on the scholarly , अकादमिक , or  critical study of the field .
Additionally , in the United States , an MFA is recognized as a terminal degree for practitioners of Visual Art , Design , Dance , Theatre , Film/Video , New Media , and Creative Writing - meaning that it is considered to be the highest degree in its field , and is used  as a न्यूनतम योग्यता to be समर्थ to लागू  to become a Full-Time Professor teaching at the University level in these disciplines .
There are exceptions to this standard in the Arts , notably in  the मामला of म्यूज़िक प्रदर्शन , जहाँ the mfa is नहीं देखी  as a terminal degree in the context of the more standardized DMA degree .
It is also critical to note that in the interest of extending the connection between creative production and continued  अकादमिक शोध , कुछ विश्वविद्यालयों have स्थापित practice-based ph.d कार्यक्रम  in fields such as creative writing , visual arts , new media , design and theater .
While this has had an effect in Creative Writing , and to a lesser extent  in डिज़ाइन और नई मीडिया , the influx of graduates इससे practice-based phd कार्यक्रम  has not appreciably changed the standard for the MFA as the terminal degree in most Arts disciplines yet .
This is an ongoing contentious topic , and is the frequent subject of academic panels , especially  at the सालाना कॉलेज आर्ट संघ सम्मेलन  .
The CAA 2008 guidelines regarding the MFA strongly  re-affirms कि the phd is नहीं जरूरी as a टर्मिनल  degree in the visual arts .
The atomic bombings of the cities of Hiroshima and Nagasaki in Japan were  conducted by the संयुक्त राज्य दौरान the फाइनल  stages of World War II in 1945 .
The two events are  the तभी उपयोग of नाभिकीय हथियार  in war to date .
Following a firebombing  अभियान कि  destroyed many Japanese cities , the Allies prepared for a costly invasion of Japan .
The war in Europe ended when Nazi Germany  हस्ताक्षरित इसके यंत्र of आत्मसमर्पण on 8 may , लकिन the प्रशांत  War continued .
Together with the United Kingdom and the Republic of China , the United States called for a surrender of Japan in the Potsdam  घोषणा on 26 जुलाई 1945 , threatening जापानी साथ `` संकेत और utter विनाश  '' .
The Japanese  सरकारी उपेक्षित इस ultimatum , और the संयुक्त राज्य तैनात  two nuclear weapons developed by the Manhattan Project .
American airmen dropped Little Boy on the city of Hiroshima on 6 August 1945  , followed by मोटे man over नागासाकी on 9 अगस्त  .
Within the first two to four months of the bombings , the acute effects killed 90,000–166,000 people in  हिरोशिमा और 60,000–80,000 in नागासाकी , साथ roughly  half of the deaths in each city occurring on the first day .
The Hiroshima prefecture health department estimated that , of the people who died on the day of  the विस्फोट , 60 % died इससे फ्लैश or ज्वाला burns ,  30 % from falling debris and 10 % from other causes .
During the following months , large  संख्याएँ died इससे the प्रभाव of burns , विकिरण  sickness , and other injuries , compounded by illness .
In a US estimate of the total immediate and short term cause of death  , 15–20 % died इससे विकिरण बीमारी , 20–30 % इससे burns  , and 50–60 % from other injuries , compounded by illness .
In both cities  , सबसे of the मुर्दे यहूद नागरिकों  , although Hiroshima had a sizeable garrison .
On 15 August , six days after the bombing of Nagasaki , Japan announced its surrender to the Allies ,  हस्ताक्षर the यंत्र of आत्मसमर्पण on 2 सितंबर  , officially ending World War II .
The bombings led , in part , to post-war Japan 's adopting Three Non-Nuclear  सिद्धान्त , forbidding the स्वदेश इससे नाभिकीय armament  .
The role of the bombings in Japan 's surrender and their ethical  औचित्य हैं स्टिल debated  .
Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi ( ; 2 October 1869 – 30 January 1948 ) , commonly known as Mahatma Gandhi , was the  preeminent नेता of भारतीय राष्ट्रवाद in  British-ruled India .
Employing non-violent civil disobedience , Gandhi led India to independence and inspired movements for  non-violence , सिविल अधिकारों और स्वतंत्रता आरपार the  world .
The son of a senior  सरकारी आधिकारिक , गांधी थी born और उठाया in a हिन्दू bania  community in coastal Gujarat , and trained in law in London .
Gandhi became famous by  लड़ लिये the सिविल अधिकारों of मुस्लिम और हिन्दू इंडियंस in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी  , using new techniques of non-violent civil disobedience that he developed .
Returning to India in 1915 , he set about  organising peasants to विरोध excessive land-taxes  .
A lifelong opponent of `` communalism `` ( i.e . basing politics on religion ) he reached out  widely to सब धार्मिक समूह  .
He became a leader of Muslims protesting the  घटती औकात of the खिलाफत  .
Assuming  नेतृत्व of the भारतीय नेशनल कॉंग्रेस  in 1921 , Gandhi led nationwide campaigns for easing poverty , expanding women 's rights , building religious and ethnic amity , ending untouchability , increasing economic self-reliance , and above all for achieving Swaraj —the independence of India from British domination .
Gandhi led Indians in protesting the national salt tax with the Dandi Salt  कूच in 1930 , और बाद in demanding the अंग्रेजों to तत्काल  Quit India in 1942 , during World War II .
He was  imprisoned लिये कि और लिये numerous अन्य  political offenses over the years .
Gandhi sought to practice non-violence and  सच्चाई in सब परिस्थितियों , और advocated कि  others do the same .
He saw  the गांवों as the कोर of the सच्चा इण्डिया और प्रचारित  self-sufficiency ; he did not support the industrialization programs of his disciple Jawaharlal Nehru .
He  जिया modestly in a self-sufficient  residential community and wore the traditional Indian dhoti and shawl , woven with yarn he had hand spun on a charkha .
His chief  राजनैतिक दुश्मन in ब्रिटेन थी विंस्टन  Churchill , who ridiculed him as a `` half-naked fakir . ''
He was a dedicated vegetarian , and undertook long fasts as means of both  self-purification और राजनैतिक  mobilization .
In his last year , unhappy at the  विभाजन of इण्डिया , गांधी  worked to stop the carnage between Muslims , Hindus and Sikhs that raged in the border area between India and Pakistan .
He was assassinated on 30 January 1948  by nathuram गोडसे जो विचार  Gandhi was too sympathetic to India 's Muslims .
30 January is  observed as  Martyrs ' Day in India .
the honorific महात्मा ( `` ग्रेट  Soul '' ) was applied to him by 1914 .
In India he  थी भी पुकारा bapu  ( `` Father '' ) .
He is known in India as the Father of the Nation ;  उसके जन्मदिवस , 2 अक्तूबर , is commemorated वहीँ as गांधी jayanti  , a national holiday , and world-wide as the International Day of Non-Violence .
Gandhi 's  दर्शनशास्त्र थी नहीं सैद्धांतिक लकिन एक  of pragmatism , that is , practicing his principles in the moment .
Asked to give a message to the people  , he होता respond , `` my जीवन is  my message . ''
Joan Crawford ( March 23 , ca . 1904 – May 10 , 1977 ) , born Lucille Fay LeSueur , was an American actress  in फिल्मी , टेलीविज़न और थिएटर  .
Starting as a dancer in traveling theatrical companies before debuting on Broadway ,  क्रॉफर्ड थी हस्ताक्षरित to a गति चित्र  contract by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer in 1925 .
Initially frustrated by the size and quality of her parts ,  क्रॉफर्ड began a अभियान of self-publicity और became nationally ज्ञात  as a flapper by the end of the 1920s .
In the 1930s , Crawford 's fame  rivaled , और बाद outlasted , mgm सहयोगियों  Norma Shearer and Greta Garbo .
Crawford often played hardworking  यंग महिलाओं जो ढूँढें रोमांस और  financial success .
These `` rags-to-riches '' stories were well  प्राप्त by अवसाद -era ऑडियंस  and were popular with women .
Crawford became one of Hollywood 's most prominent movie stars and one of the highest  सशुल्क महिलाओं in the संयुक्त राज्य , लकिन उसके films began खोने धन और  by the end of the 1930s she was labeled `` box office poison '' .
After an absence of nearly two years from the screen , Crawford  मंचन a वापसी by अभिनीत in मिल्ड्रेड पियर्स  ( 1945 ) , for which she won the Academy Award for Best Actress .
In 1955 , she became involved with the  pepsi-cola कम्पनी through उसके विवाह to  company Chairman Alfred Steele .
After his death in 1959 , Crawford was elected to fill  उसके रिक्ति on the फलक of निर्देशकों  but was forcibly retired in 1973 .
She continued acting in film and television regularly through the 1960s , when her performances became fewer ; after  the रिलीज of the अंग्रेजों हॉरर फिल्मी trog in 1970 , क्रॉफर्ड रिटायर्ड इससे the स्क्रीन  .
Following a public appearance in 1974 , after which  unflattering छायाचित्र यहूद प्रकाशित , क्रॉफर्ड withdrew इससे पब्लिक जीवन  and became increasingly reclusive until her death in 1977 .
Crawford  शादीशुदा चार टाइम्स  .
Her first three marriages ended in divorce ; the last ended with the  मौत of husband  Alfred Steele .
She adopted five children , one of  जिसको थी reclaimed by उसके जनम माँ  .
Crawford 's  संबंध साथ उसके  two older children , Christina and Christopher , were acrimonious .
क्रॉफर्ड disinherited the दो और , बाद क्रॉफर्ड 's मौत  , Christina wrote a `` tell-all '' memoir , Mommie Dearest , in which she alleged a lifelong pattern of physical and emotional abuse perpetrated by Crawford .
She was voted the tenth  महानतम मादा स्टार in the इतिहास of अमरीकी सिनेमा  by the American Film Institute .
1910  बुइक tonneau बगैर  tonneau cover
1903  घाट मॉडल a  rear-door Tonneau
1903 lanchester  rear-door Tonneau
Tonneau cover ( or ) describes a hard or  नरम कवर प्रयुक्त to protect unoccupied यात्री सीटे in a  convertible or roadster , or the cargo bed in a pickup truck .
Hard tonneau covers open by a hinging or folding  यांत्रिकी जबकि नरम कवर खोलें by रोलिंग  up .
The tonneau  कवर is प्रयुक्त to छिपाते  cargo .
जब the कवर is खींचा आउट , it keeps वस्तुएं आउट of the  sun and provides extra security by keeping personal items out of sight , as well as shielding the driver from view .
Twitter is an online social networking service and microblogging service that enables its users to send and read  text-based संदेश of up to 140 वर्ण  , known as `` tweets '' .
Twitter was created in March 2006 by  जोकर dorsey और by जुलाई , the सोशल  networking site was launched .
The service rapidly gained worldwide popularity , with  over 500 लाख पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता as of 2012 , generating over 340 लाख tweets  daily and handling over 1.6 billion search queries per day .
चूंकि इसके लॉन्च , ट्विटर रै become एक of the टेन  most visited websites on the Internet , and has been described as `` the SMS of the Internet . ''
Unregistered users can read tweets , while registered users can post tweets through  the जालस्थल इंटरफ़ेस , sms , or a दायरा of ऐप्स  for mobile devices .
Twitter Inc. is based in San Francisco , with additional servers  और कार्यालयों in नई यॉर्क नगर , बोस्टन  , and San Antonio .
The Hangover is a 2009 American  कॉमेडी फिल्मी , co-produced और निर्देशित by  Todd Phillips and written by Jon Lucas and Scott Moore .
It is the first film of The Hangover franchise  .the फिल्मी सितारों ब्राडली कूपर , ed helms  , Zach Galifianakis , Heather Graham , Justin Bartha , and Jeffrey Tambor .
the hangover tells the स्टोरी of फिल wenneck , stu दाम और  Alan Garner , who travel to Las Vegas for a bachelor party to celebrate their friend Doug Billings ' impending marriage .
However , Phil , Stu and Alan  have no मेमोरी of the पिछला रात्रि 's कार्यक्रम  and must find Doug before the wedding can take place .
Lucas and  मूर लिखा the स्क्रिप्ट बाद कार्यपालिका निर्माता क्रिस bender 's dost disappeared  and had a large bill after being sent to a strip club .
After Lucas and Moore sold it to the studio for $ 2 million ,  फिलिप्स और जेरेमी garelick rewrote the स्क्रिप्ट to शामिल a बाघ as खूब as a  subplot involving a baby and a police cruiser , and also including boxer Mike Tyson .
Filming took place in Nevada for 15 days , and during filming , the three main  अभिनेताओं ( कूपर , helms और galifianakis  ) formed a friendship .
The Hangover was released on June 5 , 2009 ,  बनने a नाजुक और  commercial success .
It became the  tenth-highest-grossing फिल्मी of 2009  , with a worldwide gross of over US $ 467 million .
Critics praised the film 's comedic  दृष्टिकोण लकिन criticized it लिये  its vulgarity .
The film won the Golden Globe Award for Best Motion Picture – Musical or  कॉमेडी , और प्राप्त अनेक अन्य  accolades .
It is the tenth-highest-grossing film of  2009 in the संसार , as खूब as the दूसरी highest-grossing r-rated कॉमेडी कभी in the संयुक्त  States , surpassing a record previously held by Beverly Hills Cop for almost 25 years and later being surpassed by Ted in 2012 .
Out of all R-rated  films , it is the तीसरा highest-grossing कभी in the u.S. , पीछे तभी  The Passion of the Christ and The Matrix Reloaded .
A sequel , The Hangover  भाग ii , थी released  in 2011 , and a third and final film , The Hangover Part III , is set for release in 2013 .
कार्यक्रम involving meiosis , प्रर्दशित  chromosomal crossover
Meiosis ( ) is a special type of cell division necessary for sexual  जनन in eukaryotes  .
the कोशिकाएं उत्पादित by  meiosis are gametes or spores .
In many organisms , including all animals and land plants ( but not some other groups  ऐसे as fungi ) , गैमीट हैं पुकारा  sperm and egg cells .
Whilst the  प्रक्रम of meiosis bears a क्रमांक of similarities साथ the 'life-cycle  ' cell division process of mitosis , it differs in two important respects:
the chromosomes in meiosis undergo a recombination which shuffles the genes producing a different genetic combination in each gamete , compared with the co-existence of each of the two  पृथक pairs of प्रत्येक chromosome ( एक प्राप्त इससे प्रत्येक जनक ) in प्रत्येक कोशिका  which results from mitosis .
the outcome of meiosis is potentially four ( genetically  अद्वितीय ) अगुणित कोशिकाएं , compared साथ the दो ( genetically एकसमान  ) diploid cells produced from mitosis .
Meiosis begins with one diploid cell containing two copies of  प्रत्येक chromosome —one इससे the सजीव 's माँ और एक इससे  its father .
The cell divides twice ,  potentially producing up to चार अगुणित  cells containing one copy of each chromosome .
( `` Potentially '' because  in कुछ मामले , ऐसे as the  formation of oocytes in mammals , only one of the possible four haploid cells survives . )
In  पशु the अगुणित कोशिका  resulting from meiosis is a male or female gamete .
Each of the resulting chromosomes in  the gamete कोशिकाएं is a अद्वितीय मिश्रण of मातृ  and paternal DNA , resulting in offspring that are genetically distinct from either parent .
This gives rise to  जेनेटिक विविधता in sexually  reproducing populations .
This genetic diversity can provide the variation of physical and behavioural attributes ( phenotypes ) upon which natural selection can act , but , as described below in Section 6 , Origin  और फलन of meiosis , the जेनेटिक विविधता may be largely a by-product of the समजात recombination  that is primarily employed for its DNA repair function during meiosis .
It is  भी noteworthy कि दौरान meiosis , विशिष्ट जीनों हैं  more highly transcribed , and these are called the meiome , the term used in functional genomics for the meiotic transcriptome .
Meiosis is a key feature for all sexually reproducing eukaryotes in which  समजात chromosome pairing , अन्तर्ग्रथन और recombination  occur .
In addition to strong meiotic stage-specific expression of mRNA ( the meiome ) , however , there are also pervasive translational controls ( e.g . selective usage  of preformed mrna ) , regulating the परम meiotic stage-specific प्रोटीन अभिव्यक्ति of जीनों दौरान meiosis  .
Thus , both the meiome and translational controls determine the broad  restructuring of meiotic कोशिकाएं needed to carry आउट meiosis  .
Prior to the meiosis process the cell 's chromosomes are duplicated by a round of DNA replication , creating from the  मातृ और पैतृक संस्करण of प्रत्येक chromosome ( homologs ) दो सटीक नक़ल , सिस्टर  chromatids , attached at the centromere region .
In the  शुरूआत of meiosis the मातृ  and paternal homologs pair to each other .
Then they typically exchange parts by homologous  recombination अग्रणी to crossovers of डीएनए between the मातृ  and paternal versions of the chromosome .
Spindle  मछली bind to the centromeres of प्रत्येक  pair of homologs and arrange the pairs at the spindle equator .
Then  the मछली खींचो the recombined  homologs to opposite poles of the cell .
As the chromosomes move away from the center the cell divides into two daughter cells ,  प्रत्येक containing a अगुणित क्रमांक of गुणसूत्रों रचित  of two chromatids .
After the recombined maternal and paternal homologs have separated into the two daughter  कोशिकाएं , a दूसरी गोलाकार of कोशिका  division occurs .
There meiosis  ends as the दो सिस्टर chromatids बनाना up प्रत्येक homolog  are separated and move into one of the four resulting gamete cells .
Upon fertilization , for example when a  शुक्राणु enters an अंडा कोशिका , दो gamete कोशिकाएं  produced by meiosis fuse .
The gamete from the mother and the gamete from the father each contribute one half of the set of chromosomes that make  up the नई औलाद  's genome .
Meiosis uses many of the same mechanisms  as समसूत्रण , a प्रकार of कोशिका प्रभाग प्रयुक्त by eukaryotes  like plants and animals to split one cell into two identical daughter cells .
In all plants and in many protists meiosis results in the formation of spores :  अगुणित कोशिकाएं कि can divide vegetatively बगैर undergoing  fertilization .
Boxing ( pugilism , prize fighting , the sweet science or in Greek pygmachia ) is a martial art and combat sport in  जिससे दो लोगों engage in a प्रतियोगिता of शक्ति , गति , reflexes , सहनशीलता  and will by throwing punches with gloved hands .
Amateur boxing is an Olympic and Commonwealth sport and is  a आम fixture in सबसे of the प्रमुख अंतरराष्ट्रीय  games - it also has its own World Championships .
Boxing is supervised by a referee over a series of one- to  three-minute intervals पुकारा  rounds .
The result is decided when an opponent is deemed incapable to continue by a referee , is  disqualified लिये तोड़कर a नियम , resigns by फेंकना in a तौलिया ,  or is pronounced the winner or loser based on the judges ' scorecards at the end of the contest .
The birth hour of boxing  as a खेल may be इसके स्वीकृति by the प्राचीन यूनानियों as an ओलम्पिक खेल  as early as 688 BC .
Boxing evolved from 16th- and 18th-century prizefights , largely in  ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , to the forerunner of आधुनिक मुक्केबाज़ी in the mid-19th  century , again initially in Great Britain and later in the United States .
in 2004 , ईएसपीएन क्रमित मुक्केबाज़ी as the  most difficult sport in the world .
Agreement or concord happens when a word changes form depending  on the अन्य शब्द to जिससे it  relates .
It is an instance of  inflection , और प्रायः involves बनाना  the value of some grammatical category ( such as gender or person ) `` agree '' between different words or parts of the sentence .
For  उदाहरण , in मानक  English , one may say I am or he is , but not `` I is '' or `` he am '' .
This is  क्युकी the व्याकरण of the भाषा  requires that the verb and its subject agree in person .
The pronouns I and he are first and third person  क्रमशः , as हैं the क्रिया फ़ॉर्म am और  is .
The verb form must be selected  so कि it रै the वही व्यक्ति  as the subject .
The agreement based on overt grammatical categories as above is formal agreement , in  कंट्रास्ट to notional अनुबंध , जिससे is आधारित on अर्थ .
For instance , the phrase The United States is treated as singular for purposes of agreement , even  हालांकि it is formally बहुवचन .
This is a list of  स्थान नीचे औसत समुद्र स्तर  that are on land .
Places in tunnels , mines , basements , dug holes ( also with open sky ) , under  जल , अंतर्गत बर्फ , or मौजूदा temporarily as a  result of ebbing of sea tide etc . are not included .
All figures are in meters below  समुद्र level:
Debbie Macomber ( born October 22 , 1948 in Yakima , Washington ) is a  best-selling अमरीकी लेखक of over 150 रोमांस  novels and contemporary women 's fiction .
Over 140 million copies of her books are in print  throughout the संसार , और चार have  become made-for-TV-movies .
Macomber was the inaugural winner of the  fan-voted quill पुरस्कार लिये रोमांस in 2005 और रै  been awarded both a Romance Writers of America RITA and a lifetime achievement award by the Romance Writers of America .
catonsville is a census-designated  place ( CDP ) in Baltimore County , Maryland , United States .
The population was  41,567 at the 2010  census .
The community lies to the west of  बाल्टीमोर साथ the नगर  's border .
Catonsville is the home of  the विश्वविद्यालयों of मेरीलैंड , बाल्टीमोर काउंटी ( umbc ) ,  a public research university with over 12,000 students .
A lawyer , according to Black 's Law Dictionary , is `` a person learned  in the विधि ; as an  attorney , counsel or solicitor ; a person who is practicing law . ''
Law is the system of rules of conduct established by  the sovereign सरकारी of a समाज to सही wrongs , maintain the स्थिरता of राजनैतिक और सोशल प्राधिकार  , and deliver justice .
Working as a lawyer involves the practical application of abstract legal theories and knowledge to solve specific  individualized समस्याएं , or to अग्रिम the रूचि of those जो retain  ( i.e. , hire ) lawyers to perform legal services .
The role of the lawyer varies significantly across legal  jurisdictions , और so it can be treated यहाँ in  only the most general terms .
Vector Marketing is the domestic sales arm of Cutco Corporation , an Olean  , नई यॉर्क आधारित cutlery  manufacturer .
The Family and  चिकित्सा छोड़ अधिनियम of 1993 ( fmla ) is a संयुक्त राज्य संघीय विधि requiring  covered employers to provide employees job-protected and unpaid leave for qualified medical and family reasons .
Qualified medical and family  कारण शामिल : निजी or परिवार बीमारी , परिवार सैन्य छोड़ , गर्भावस्था  , adoption , or the foster care placement of a child .
The FMLA is administered by the Wage and Hour  प्रभाग of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग  of Labor .
The bill was a major part of President Bill Clinton 's agenda  in उसके पहला पद  .
President Clinton signed the bill into law on February 5 , 1993 ( ; 29 U.S.C . sec . 2601 ; 29 CFR 825  ) और it took प्रभाव on अगस्त 5 , 1993 , छह महीने  later .
The FMLA was intended `` to balance  the मांगे of the कार्यस्थल साथ the needs  of families . ''
The Act allows eligible employees to take up to 12 work weeks of unpaid leave during any 12-month period to  attend to the गंभीर स्वास्थ्य कंडीशन of the कर्मचारी , जनक , जीवनसाथी  or child , or for pregnancy or care of a newborn child , or for adoption or foster care of a child .
In order to be  योग्य लिये fmla छोड़ , an कर्मचारी जरूर have महरूम at the कारोबार at तनिक 12 महीने  , and worked at least 1,250 hours over the past 12 months , and work at a location where the company employs 50 or more employees within 75 miles .
The FMLA covers both public- and private-sector employees , but  निश्चित श्रेणी of कर्मचारी हैं excluded , सहित  elected officials and their personal staff members .
The Vietnam War ( )  थी a ठंडा युद्ध -era सैन्य विरोध  that occurred in Vietnam , Laos , and Cambodia from 1 November 1955 to the fall of Saigon on 30 April 1975 .
This war followed the First Indochina War and was fought  between उत्तर वियतनाम , समर्थित by इसके कम्युनिस्ट allies , और the सरकारी of दक्षिण वियतनाम , समर्थित by  the United States and other anti-communist countries .
The Viet  cong ( भी ज्ञात as the नेशनल मुक्ति सामने , or nlf ) , a हलके हथियारबंद दक्षिण वियतनामी कम्युनिस्ट  common front directed by the North , largely fought a guerrilla war against anti-communist forces in the region .
The Vietnam People 's Army ( North Vietnamese Army ) engaged in a more conventional war , at  टाइम्स committing विशाल इकाई into बैटल  .
U.S. and South Vietnamese forces relied on air  बड़प्पन और overwhelming firepower to conduct ढूंढें और नष्ट परिचालन  , involving ground forces , artillery , and airstrikes .
The  u.S. सरकारी viewed भागीदारी in the युद्ध as a रास्ता to prevent a  communist takeover of South Vietnam as part of their wider strategy of containment .
The North Vietnamese government and  viet cong यहूद लड़ to reunify  Vietnam under communist rule .
They viewed the conflict as a colonial war , fought initially against France , backed by the  u.S. , और बाद विरूद्ध दक्षिण वियतनाम , जिससे it regarded as a u.S. कठपुतली राज्य  .
American military advisors arrived in what was  तब फ्रेंच इंडोचायना शुरूआत  in 1950 .
U.S. involvement escalated in the early  1960s , साथ troop स्तर tripling in 1961  and tripling again in 1962 .
U.S. combat units  यहूद तैनात  beginning in 1965 .
Operations spanned international borders  , साथ लाओस और कंबोडिया  heavily bombed .
American involvement in the war peaked in  1968 , at the समय of the  Tet Offensive .
After this , U.S. ground forces were gradually withdrawn  as भाग of a नीति ज्ञात as vietnamization  .
Despite the Paris Peace Accords , signed by  सब पार्टियों in जनवरी  1973 , fighting continued .
U.S. military involvement  ended on 15 अगस्त 1973 as a परिणाम of the case–church  Amendment passed by the U.S. Congress .
the कैप्चर of साइगॉन by the वियतनाम लोगों 's फौज in अप्रैल  1975 marked the end of the war , and North and South Vietnam were reunified the following year .
The war  exacted a विशाल इंसान लागत in  terms of fatalities ( see Vietnam War casualties ) .
Estimates of the number of Vietnamese soldiers and civilians  मारे vary इससे 800,000  to 3.1 million .
Some  200,000–300,000 cambodians , 20,000–200,000  Laotians , and 58,220 U.S. service members also died in the conflict .
Cleveland Volcano in the  aleutian आइलैंड्स of अलास्का photographed  from the International Space Station , May 2006 .
Ash plumes reached a height  of 19 km दौरान the climactic फटना  at Mount Pinatubo , Philippines in 1991 .
A volcano is  an खोलने , or rupture , in a ग्रह 's सतह or क्रस्ट , जिससे  allows hot magma , volcanic ash and gases to escape from the magma chamber below the surface .
Volcanoes are generally found where tectonic  प्लेटों हैं diverging or converging  .
A mid-oceanic ridge , for example the Mid-Atlantic Ridge , has examples of volcanoes caused by divergent tectonic plates  pulling अलावा ; the प्रशांत रिंग of आग रै उदाहरण of ज्वालामुखी caused by अभिसारी tectonic  plates coming together .
By contrast  , ज्वालामुखी हैं प्रायः नहीं निर्मित जहाँ दो tectonic  plates slide past one another .
Volcanoes can also form where there is  stretching और thinning of the धरती 's क्रस्ट in the इंटीरियर्स of प्लेटों , e.g. , in  the East African Rift , the Wells Gray-Clearwater volcanic field and the Rio Grande Rift in North America .
This type of volcanism falls under the  छतरियाँ of `` थाली  hypothesis '' volcanism .
Volcanism away from  थाली सीमाएँ रै भी  been explained as mantle plumes .
These so-called `` hotspots `` , for example Hawaii , are  postulated to उठता इससे upwelling diapirs साथ मैग्मा इससे the  core–mantle boundary , 3,000 km deep in the Earth .
Erupting volcanoes can pose  अनेक जोखिमों , नहीं तभी in the तात्कालिक  vicinity of the eruption .
Volcanic ash can be a threat to aircraft , in particular those with jet engines where  राख अणु can be melted by the ऊँची ऑपरेटिंग  temperature .
Large eruptions can affect temperature  as राख और droplets of sulfuric एसिड अस्पष्ट the सूर्य और कूल the धरती 's निम्नतर माहौल  or troposphere ; however , they also absorb heat radiated up from the Earth , thereby warming the stratosphere .
Historically , so-called  volcanic सर्दियों have caused  catastrophic famines .
A deep pothole  on नई यॉर्क नगर 's दूसरी  Avenue
A pothole ( sometimes called a kettle and known in parts of the Western United States as a chuckhole ) is a type of  disruption in the सतह of a roadway जहाँ a portion of the सड़क सामग्री रै टूटा  away , leaving a hole .
Renal cell carcinoma ( RCC , also known as hypernephroma ) is a kidney cancer that originates in the lining of the proximal convoluted tubule , the very small tubes in  the गुर्दा कि हस्तांतरण gf ( glomerular filtrate ) इससे the glomerulus to the descending limb of the  nephron .
RCC is the most common type of  गुर्दा कर्कट in वयस्कों , जिम्मेदार लिये  approximately 80 % of cases .
It is also known to be the most  lethal of सब the genitourinary  tumors .
Initial  उपचार is सबसे commonly a कट्टरपंथी or  partial nephrectomy and remains the mainstay of curative treatment .
Where the tumor is confined to the renal parenchyma  , the 5-year अस्तित्व रेट is 60-70 % , लकिन इस is lowered considerably जहाँ  metastases have spread .
It is relatively  resistant to विकिरण  therapy and chemotherapy , although some cases respond to immunotherapy .
Targeted cancer therapies such as sunitinib ,  temsirolimus , bevacizumab , interferon-alpha  , and sorafenib have improved the outlook for RCC .
Estée  lauder कंपनियाँ , inc. is a निर्माता और marketer of प्रतिष्ठा  skincare , makeup , fragrance and hair care products .
The company  रै इसके मुख्यालय  in Midtown Manhattan , New York City .
The  peritoneum ( ) is the serous झिल्ली कि फ़ॉर्म the अस्तर of the  abdominal cavity or the coelom —it covers most of the intra-abdominal ( or coelomic ) organs—in amniotes and some invertebrates ( annelids , for instance ) .
It is composed of a layer  of mesothelium समर्थित by a पतला परत of संयोजी  tissue .
the peritoneum दोनो supports the  abdominal organs and serves as a conduit for their blood and lymph vessels and nerves .
The abdominal  गुहा ( the स्पेस bounded by the vertebrae , abdominal मांसपेशियां , diaphragm और श्रोणि मंजिल ) चाहिए  not be confused with the intraperitoneal space ( located within the abdominal cavity , but wrapped in peritoneum ) .
The structures within the intraperitoneal space are called `` intraperitoneal '' ( e.g . the stomach ) , the structures in the abdominal cavity that are located behind the intraperitoneal space  हैं पुकारा `` retroperitoneal `` ( e.g . the गुर्दे ) , और those structures  below the intraperitoneal space are called `` subperitoneal '' or `` infraperitoneal '' ( e.g . the bladder ) .
Modern 2.5 '' SSD used in consumer  लैपटॉप और डेस्कटॉप कंप्यूटर  .
DDR  sdram आधारित  SSD .
अधिकतम  and .
PCI  संलग्न io त्वरक  SSD
PCI-E ,  dram , और नन्द आधारित  SSD .
It uses an external power supply  to मेक the dram  non-volatile .
A solid-state drive ( SSD ) ( also known as a solid-state disk or electronic disk , though it contains no actual ``  डिस्क '' of कोई दयालु ) is a आंकड़ा भंडार यंत्र using एकीकृत सर्किट सभाओं as  memory to store data persistently .
SSD technology uses electronic  अंतरफलक संगत साथ परंपरागत ब्लाक input/output ( i/o  ) hard disk drives .
SSDs have no moving mechanical components , which distinguish them from traditional electromechanical magnetic disks such as  मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव ( hdds ) or फ्लॉपी डिस्क , जिससे contain घूम डिस्क और  movable read/write heads .
Compared with electromechanical disks , SSDs  हैं typically कम susceptible  to physical shock , much quieter , have lower access time , and less latency .
however , जबकि the दाम of ssds रै जारी to  decline in 2012 , SSDs are still about 7 to 8 times more expensive per unit of storage than HDDs .
Many SSDs use I/O interfaces developed for hard disk drives , thus permitting simple  बदलना in आम अनुप्रयोग  .
, most SSDs use NAND-based flash  मेमोरी , जिससे retains  data without power .
For  अनुप्रयोग requiring तेज़ अभिगम , लकिन नहीं necessarily आंकड़ा हठ बाद शक्ति  loss , SSDs may be constructed from random-access memory ( RAM ) .
Such devices may employ separate power sources , such as batteries  , to maintain आंकड़ा बाद शक्ति घाटा  .
Hybrid drives or solid  राज्य संकर ड्राइव ( sshd ) combine the सुविधाएँ of ssds और hdds in the वही ईकाई , containing  a large hard disk drive and an SSD cache to improve performance of frequently accessed data .
These  डिवाइस may प्रस्ताव near-ssd  performance for many applications .
Salmon roe ( left ) and  sturgeon caviar ( सही ) परोसा साथ माँ of पर्ल  caviar spoons to avoid tainting the taste of the caviar .
