Caviar , according to the Food and Agriculture  संगठन , is a उत्पाद बना  from salt-cured fish-eggs of the Acipenseridae family .
The roe can be `` fresh '' ( non-pasteurized ) or pasteurized ,  साथ pasteurization reducing इसके culinary और आर्थिक  value .
Traditionally the  पद caviar refers तभी to roe इससे  wild sturgeon in the Caspian and Black Seas ( Beluga , Ossetra and Sevruga caviars ) .
Depending on the country , caviar may also be used to describe the roe of other fish such as salmon , steelhead ,  ट्राउट , lumpfish , whitefish , और अन्य  species of sturgeon .
caviar is माना a लक्ज़री  delicacy and is eaten as a garnish or a spread .
In 2012 , caviar  बेची लिये $ 2,500  per pound , or $ 3,000 to $ 5,500 per kilo .
The SEC Network is a television syndication  संजाल featuring सजीव प्रसारण of कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल और बास्केट  events from the Southeastern Conference .
It is owned and operated by ESPN Plus and  is दिखाया in अधिक than 50 प्रतिशत of households in the संयुक्त राज्य  , mostly Southeastern United States markets .
The SEC Network typically airs in the noon eastern slot  कि थी पूर्व घर to the raycom खेल सेक खेल  of the week .
Games are shown locally on broadcast stations , regional  खेल संजाल , as खूब  as on ESPN GamePlan , ESPN Full Court , and ESPN3.com .
The SEC Network is also  उपलब्धियाँ in कनाडा via अटलांटा  's WPCH-TV .
The SEC Network uses the  वही on-screen ग्राफिक्स फिलहाल प्रयुक्त  by ESPN on ABC , a version of ESPN 's graphics package .
SEC Network 's football programming still uses a title safe area because most of its affiliates do not  letterbox उनके मानक परिभाषा फ़ीड्स , जबकि ईएसपीएन 's टेलीविज़न संजाल have अनुमत उनके ग्राफिक्स  to abandon the title safe , but letterbox for SD viewers .
starting साथ the सेक 2012 बास्केट ऋतु  , SEC Network 's graphics have been converted to a 16:9 Widescreen-only format .
This is also being used for  the 2013 बास्केट ऋतु , लकिन था स्टिल  adapted the former 4:3-safe graphics format for the 2012 SEC football season .
The 1990s , pronounced and also known as `` the  nineteen-nineties '' or abbreviated as `` the nineties '' or ``  the '90s '' , was a decade that began on January 1 , 1990 , and ended on December 31 , 1999 .
It was the 10th and last decade of the 20th century and the 100th  और पिछला दशक of the 2nd मिलेनियम  .
The decade is best known for the end of the Cold War at the beginning of  the दशक और the विस्तार और व्यावसायीकरण  of the Internet during the second half of the decade .
In much of the West the 1990s is remembered as a period of unprecedented peace and prosperity , though many parts of the so-called Third World faced various problems  सहित नरसंहार , एड्स और नई or continuing जातीय तनाव और सिविल युद्धों  .
Culturally speaking the  दशक थी characterized  by the rise of multiculturalism and alternative media .
Movements such as  grunge , the रेव झाँकी और हिप हॉप स्प्रेड around the संसार  to young people during the decade , aided by then-new technology such as cable television and the Internet .
A combination of factors , including the mass mobilization of capital markets through neoliberalism , the beginning of the widespread  अप्रसार of नई मीडिया ऐसे as the अंतरजाल , और the विच्छेद of the सोवियत संघ led to a realignment और reconsolidation of आर्थिक और राजनैतिक  power across the world , and within countries .
Income inequality among countries in the world rose  sharply between the 1980s और the mid-1990s , पहले levelling बंद और  then falling after 2000 .
New ethnic conflicts  उभरा in अफ़्रीकी , the balkans और the काकेशस , the पूर्व  two which led to the Rwandan genocide and Bosnian genocide , respectively .
The United States began its current  सैन्य occupation of  the Middle East during the summer of 1990 with Desert Shield after it cut off a large portion of the world 's petroleum supply .
Signs of any resolution of tensions between Israel  और the अरब संसार remained elusive , हालांकि the आयरिश परेशानियों आए to a standstill  in 1998 with the Good Friday Agreement after 30 years of violence .
The gray wolf or grey wolf ( Canis lupus ) is a species of canid native to the  wilderness और रिमोट क्षेत्रों of उत्तर अमेरिका , यूरेशिया , और उत्तर अफ़्रीकी .
It is the largest  सदस्य of इसके परिवार , साथ males  averaging , and females .
It is  समान in सामान्य रूप और proportions to a जर्मनी गड़रिये , or  sled dog , but has a larger head , narrower chest , longer legs , straighter tail and bigger paws .
Its winter fur is long and bushy , and predominantly a mottled gray in colour ,  हालांकि nearly pure श्वेत , रेड , or भूरा to ब्लैक भी occur  .
Within the genus Canis , the gray wolf represents a more specialised and progressive form than its smaller cousins ( the coyote and golden jackal ) , as  demonstrated by इसके morphological adaptations to शिकार विशाल शिकार , इसके अधिक मिलनसार प्रकृति और इसके अत्यधिक  advanced expressive behavior .
It  is a सोशल एनिमल  , travelling in nuclear families consisting of a mated pair , accompanied by the pair 's adult offspring .
The gray  भेड़िया is typically an apex परभक्षी throughout इसके दायरा  , with only humans and tigers posing a serious threat to it .
It feeds primarily on large  ungulates , हालांकि it भी eats छोटी  animals , livestock , carrion , and garbage .
The gray wolf is one of the world 's most well researched animals  , साथ संभवतः अधिक किताबे लिखा परिचय it  than any other wildlife species .
It has a long history of association with humans , having been despised and hunted in most agricultural communities due to its attacks on livestock , while  conversely होने आदरणीय by कुछ देशी अमरीकी  tribes .
It is the sole  पूर्वज of the श्वान , जिससे थी  first domesticated in the Middle East .
Although the fear of wolves is prevalent in many human societies , the  बहुमत of अंकित हमले on लोगों  have been attributed to animals suffering from rabies .
Non-rabid wolves have attacked and  मारे लोगों , मुख्यतः children , लकिन इस is असामान्य , as भेड़ियों  are relatively few , live away from people , and have been taught to fear humans by hunters and shepherds .
Hunting and trapping has reduced the species ' range to , though its still relatively widespread range and stable population means that the species is not  threatened at a वैश्विक स्तर , और is इसलिए वर्गीकृत by the आईयूसीएन as तनिक  Concern .
The Roman  साम्राज्य ( ) थी the post- रिपब्लिकन काल of the प्राचीन रोमन सभ्यता , characterised by an निरंकुश  form of government and large territorial holdings around the Mediterranean in Europe , Africa , and Asia .
The  500-year-old रोमन गणतंत्र , जिससे preceded it  , had been destabilized through a series of civil wars .
Several events marked the transition from Republic to Empire , including Julius Caesar 's appointment as perpetual dictator ( 44 BC ) ; the Battle of  actium ( 31 bc ) ; और the granting of the honorific augustus to octavian by the रोमन सीनेट ( 27 bc )  .
The first two centuries of the  साम्राज्य यहूद a काल of unprecedented  stability and prosperity known as the Pax Romana ( `` Roman Peace '' ) .
It reached its greatest expanse during the reign of  त्राजान ( 98–117  AD ) .
In the 3rd century , the Empire underwent a crisis that threatened  इसके अस्तित्व , लकिन थी reunified और stabilized अंतर्गत  the emperors Aurelian and Diocletian .
Christians rose to power in the 4th century , during which time a system of dual  नियम थी विकसित in the लैटिन वेस्ट और यूनानी ईस्ट  .
After  the पतन of सेंट्रल सरकारी in the वेस्ट in the  5th century , the eastern half continued as what would later be known as the Byzantine Empire .
Because of the Empire 's vast extent and  long सहनशीलता , the संस्थानों और संस्कृति of रोम था a profound और स्थायी influence on the विकास of भाषा , धर्म , वास्तुकला , दर्शनशास्त्र , विधि , और फ़ॉर्म of सरकारी in the territory it governed  , particularly Europe , and by means of European expansionism throughout the modern world .
Education in the United States is mainly provided by the public sector , with  कंट्रोल और funding  coming from three levels : local , state , and federal , in that order .
Child education is compulsory , and there are also a large number and wide variety of higher education  संस्थानों throughout the देश कि एक can चुनें to attend , दोनो सरेआम  and privately administered .
Public  शिक्षा is universally  available .
School curricula  , funding , शिक्षण , नियुक्ति , और अन्य नीतियों हैं नियत through locally निर्वाचित  school boards with jurisdiction over school districts with many directives from state legislatures .
School districts  हैं प्रायः पृथक इससे अन्य  local jurisdictions , with independent officials and budgets .
Educational  मानकों और  standardized testing decisions are usually made by state governments .
the आयु लिये अनिवार्य  education vary by state .
It  begins इससे आयु पाँच to आठ और ends  from ages fourteen to eighteen .
Compulsory education requirements can generally be satisfied by educating children in  पब्लिक स्कूलों , state-certified  private schools , or an approved home school program .
In most public and private schools , education is divided into three levels : elementary school , middle school (  sometimes पुकारा जूनियर ऊँची स्कूल ) , और ऊँची स्कूल ( sometimes referred to as द्वितीयक शिक्षा  ) .
In almost all schools at these levels , children are divided by age groups into grades , ranging from kindergarten ( followed by first grade ) for the youngest children  in elementary स्कूल , up to बारहवीं ग्रेड , the फाइनल साल of  high school .
The exact age  दायरा of विद्यार्थी in ये ग्रेड स्तर varies  slightly from area to area .
Post-secondary education , better known as `` college `` in the United States , is generally  governed separately इससे the elementary और ऊँची  school system , and is described in a separate section below .
Government supported , free public schools for all started being established after  the क्रान्ति , और विस्तारित in the 19th सदी , as the परिणाम of  efforts of men like Horace Mann and Booker T. Washington .
By 1870 ,  सब राज्य था फ़्री elementary स्कूलों  , albeit only in urban centers .
As the 20th century drew nearer , states  प्रारंभ गुजर कानून to मेक schooling अनिवार्य  , and by 1910 , 72 percent of children attended school .
Private schools continued to spread during this time , as well as colleges  and—in the  rural centers— land grant colleges .
the साल  of 1910 also saw the first true high schools .
During the rest of the 20th century , educational efforts centered on  reducing the असमानता of the schooling  system .
The  लैंडमार्क परम् अदालत मामला भूरा v. फलक of शिक्षा बना the desegregation of elementary  and high schools a national priority , while the Pell Grant program helped poor minorities gain access to college .
Special education was made  into संघीय विधि in 1975  .
The Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 made  मानकीकृत परीक्षण a आवश्यकता , और in 1983 , a आयोग थी स्थापित to evaluate  their results and propose a course of action .
The  resulting no चाइल्ड बाएँ पीछे  Act of 2001 was controversial and its goals proved to be unrealistic .
A  आयोग स्थापित in 2006 evaluated  higher education , but its recommendations have yet to be fully implemented .
Paul Bragg  ( फ़रवरी 6 , 1895 – दिसम्बर 7 , 1976  ) , nutritionist , was a pioneer in America’s wellness movement .
Health spending per capita , in $ US  ppp-adjusted , साथ the us और कनाडा compared amongst अन्य  first world nations .
Comparison of the health care systems in  कनाडा और the संयुक्त राज्य हैं प्रायः  made by government , public health and public policy analysts .
The two countries had similar health  परवाह प्रणालियों पहले कनाडा reformed इसके प्रणाली in the 1960s  and 1970s .
The United States spends much more money on health care than Canada , on  दोनो a per-capita  basis and as a percentage of GDP .
In 2006 ,  per-capita बिता लिये स्वास्थ्य परवाह in  Canada was US $ 3,678 ; in the U.S. , US $ 6,714 .
The U.S.  खर्च 15.3 % of जीडीपी on  health care in that year ; Canada spent 10.0 % .
In 2006 , 70 % of health care spending in Canada was financed by government ,  बनाम 46 % in  the United States .
Total government spending per capita in the U.S. on health care was 23 % higher than Canadian government spending ,  और u.S. सरकारी व्यय on स्वास्थ्य परवाह थी बस अंतर्गत 83 % of कुल कनाडाई बिता ( पब्लिक और निजी ) हालांकि  these statistics do n't take into account population differences .
अध्ययन have आइये to अलग conclusions  about the result of this disparity in spending .
A 2007  पुनर्विलोकन of सब अध्ययन comparing स्वास्थ्य  outcomes in Canada and the US in a Canadian peer-reviewed medical journal found that `` health outcomes may be superior in patients cared for in Canada versus the United States , but differences are not consistent . ''
Life expectancy is longer in Canada , and its  शिशु मृत्यु रेट is निम्नतर than कि of the u.S. , लकिन  there is debate about the underlying causes of these differences .
One commonly cited comparison , the 2000 World Health Organization 's ratings of `` overall health service performance '' , which used a `` composite measure of achievement in the level of health , the distribution of health ,  the स्तर of responsiveness और निष्पक्षता of वित्तीय योगदान '' , क्रमित कनाडा 30th  and the US 37th among 191 member nations .
This study rated the US ``  responsiveness '' , or विशेषता of सेवा लिये  individuals receiving treatment , as 1st , compared with 7th for Canada .
While the average life expectancy for Canadians was 80.34 years  compared साथ 78.6 सालो लिये निवासियों of the us , बस comparing the जीवन प्रत्याशा of दो समूह साथ अलग जातिगत मेकअप और अलग मोटापा  rates is likely not an effective way of determining which healthcare system is superior .
The WHO 's study methods were  criticized by कुछ analyses  .
Although there is a measure of consensus that life-expectancy and infant mortality mark the most reliable ways to compare nation-wide  स्वास्थ्य परवाह , assuming the जनसांख्यिकी मेकअप is समान , a हाल रपट by the congressional शोध सेवा carefully summarizes  some recent data and notes the `` difficult research issues '' facing international comparisons .
The sound source has  अभी टूटा through the ध्वनि गति अवरोध  , and is traveling at 1.4 times the speed of sound , ( Mach 1.4 ) .
Since the source is moving faster ( with a speed ) than the  ध्वनि लहरें it creates , it दरअसल लीड the advancing तरंगाग्र  .
The sound source will pass by a  stationary निरीक्षक ( साथ a गति ) पहले the निरीक्षक दरअसल  hears the sound it creates .
As a  परिणाम ,  an observer in front of the source will detect
and an observer behind the  सोर्स .
A sonic  बूम उत्पादित by an वायुयान चलती  at M=2.92 , calculated from the cone angle of 20 degrees .
An observer hears the  बूम जब the शॉक वेव , on  the edges of the cone , crosses his or her location .
Mach  कोन कोण
A sonic boom is the sound associated with the shock waves created by  an ऑब्जेक्ट traveling through the एयर  faster than the speed of sound .
Sonic booms generate enormous amounts of sound  उर्जा , sounding much जैसे  an explosion .
The crack of a supersonic bullet passing overhead is an example  of a सोनिक बूम in miniature  .
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno is an American late-night talk show hosted by Jay Leno that initially aired from May 25 , 1992 to  may 29 , 2009 , और resumed  production on March 1 , 2010 .
The fourth incarnation of the Tonight Show franchise made its debut on May 25 , 1992 ,  तीन दिनों following जॉनी कार्सन 's रिटायरमेंट as मेजबान  of the program .
The program originates from NBC Studios in Burbank , California , and  is ब्रॉडकास्ट सोमवार through शुक्रवार at 11:35 pm in the पूर्वी और  Pacific time zones ( 10:35 PM Central / Mountain time ) .
Unlike Carson or his predecessor Jack Paar ,  लीनो तभी एकबार utilized a अतिथि मेजबान , preferring  to host the series by himself .
On April 26 , 1999 , the show began broadcasting in 1080i  hdtv , बनने the पहला अमरीकी nightly बात दिखाएँ  to be shot in high definition .
the दिखाएँ is शॉट  in 16:9 aspect ratio .
The series , which followed the same basic  स्वरूप as कि of उसके पूर्ववर्तियों ( an खोलने monologue followed by कॉमेडी  routines , interviews and performances ) , ran until May 29 , 2009 , after which Leno was succeeded by Conan O'Brien .
NBC signed  लीनो to a नई सौदे  for a nightly talk show in the 10:00 pm ET timeslot .
The primetime series , titled The Jay Leno Show , debuted on September 14  , 2009 , following a समान स्वरूप to the  Leno incarnation of Tonight .
Neither  o'brien 's संस्करण  of the program , which premiered June 1 , 2009 , nor The Jay Leno Show generated the ratings that NBC had expected .
The network decided to move a condensed 30-minute version of Leno 's show to O'Brien 's time slot , and O'Brien  's tonight दिखाएँ a half-hour बाद  .
This decision met with opposition from  o'brien , जिनकी कार्यावधि on the tonight दिखाएँ ended जनवरी 22 , 2010 , बाद जिससे  he began his own talk show on TBS .
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno then began its second and  वर्तमान अवतार , the छठे of the  franchise , on March 1 , 2010 .
rfid चिप अगला  to a grain of rice .
This chip  contains a radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  field coil that modulates an external magnetic field to transfer a coded identification number when queried by a reader device .
This small type is incorporated in consumer  उत्पाद , और implanted in पालतु  , for identification purposes .
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is the wireless non-contact use of radio-frequency electromagnetic  फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र आंकड़ा , लिये the उद्देश्य of automatically  identifying and tracking tags attached to objects .
The tags contain  electronically भंडारित सूचना  .
Some tags are powered  और पढ़ा at छोटी सीमाएँ ( a few मीटर )  via magnetic fields ( electromagnetic induction ) .
Others use a local power source such as a battery  , or else have no बैटरी लकिन collect उर्जा इससे the interrogating em फ़ील्ड , और तब अधिनियम as a passive transponder  to emit microwaves or UHF radio waves ( i.e. , electromagnetic radiation at high frequencies ) .
Battery  संचालित टैग may operate  at hundreds of meters .
Unlike a bar code , the tag does not necessarily need to be within line  of sight of the रीडर , और may be अंतःस्थापित  in the tracked object .
RFID  टैग हैं प्रयुक्त in  many industries .
An RFID tag attached to an automobile during  उत्पादन can be प्रयुक्त to track इसके प्रगति through  the assembly line .
Pharmaceuticals can be  tracked through  warehouses .
Livestock and pets may have tags  injected , allowing धनात्मक पहचान of  the animal .
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing , possessions , or even  implanted भीतर लोगों , the सम्भावना of  reading personally-linked information without consent has raised privacy concerns .
Id , ego  और super-ego हैं the तीन भाग of the मानसिक apparatus पारिभाषित in  Sigmund Freud 's structural model of the psyche ; they are the three theoretical constructs in terms of whose activity and interaction mental life is described .
According to this model of the psyche , the id is the set of  uncoordinated instinctual रुझान ; the super-ego plays the नाजुक और moralizing भूमिका ; और the  ego is the organized , realistic part that mediates between the desires of the id and the super-ego .
The super-ego  can रोकें तुम इससे doing निश्चित बाते कि अपना  id may want you to do .
Even though the model is structural and makes reference to an apparatus , the id , ego and super-ego are functions of the mind rather than parts of the brain and do not correspond one-to-one  साथ वास्तविक दैहिक structures of the दयालु dealt साथ by neuroscience  .
The concepts themselves arose at a late stage in the development of Freud 's thought : the `` structural model '' ( which succeeded his `` economic model '' and `` topographical model  '' ) थी पहला discussed in उसके 1920 निबन्ध `` परे the ख़ुशी principle `` और थी formalized  and elaborated upon three years later in his `` The Ego and the Id `` .
Freud  's प्रस्ताव थी बहकावे by the ambiguity of the  term `` unconscious `` and its many conflicting uses .
Air  फ़ोर्स  ROTC emblem
The Air  फ़ोर्स आरक्षित अधिकारी प्रशिक्षण corps ( afrotc ) is एक of the तीन प्राथमिक commissioning  sources for officers in the United States Air Force , the other two being the United States Air Force Academy ( USAFA ) and Air Force Officer Training School ( OTS ) .
A subordinate command of the Air University within the Air Education and Training Command ( AETC ) , AFROTC is aligned under  the jeanne M. holm  Center for Officer Accessions and Citizen Development at Maxwell AFB , Alabama .
The Holm Center , formerly known as the Air Force  अधिकारी accession और प्रशिक्षण स्कूलों ( afoats  ) , retains direct responsibility for both AFROTC and OTS .
AFROTC is the largest and oldest source of  commissioned अधिकारियों लिये the u.S. एयर फ़ोर्स  .
AFROTC 's stated  मिशन is to उपज विशेषता नेताओ  for the U.S. Air Force .
AFROTC units are located on  144 कॉलेज और विश्वविद्यालयों campuses साथ 984 अतिरिक्त संस्थानों  of higher learning participating in cross-town agreements that allow their students to attend AFROTC classes at a nearby `` host '' college or university .
According to AFOATS HQ , in 2006 , AFROTC commissioned  2,083 यूएसएएफ दूसरी lieutenants , साथ afrotc नामांकन ranging  from 23,605 in 1985 to 10,231 in 1993 , and around 13,000 enrolled today .
AFROTC units at colleges and universities are called `` detachments , '' and are typically headed by an active duty USAF officer in the rank of colonel or  लेफ्टिनेंट कर्नल जो कृत्यों as दोनो the detachment कमांडर  for USAF purposes and with the nominal title of Professor of Aerospace Studies ( PAS ) within the institution 's academic community .
Most colleges and universities will designate the AFROTC  detachment as the विभाग  of Aerospace Studies .
The PAS is assisted by three to four Assistant Professors of  aerospace अध्ययन ( apas ) , सब क्रियाशील ड्यूटी यूएसएएफ  officers in the ranks of major or captain .
Three USAF non-commissioned officers and one senior non-commissioned officer will typically provide military administrative support and are often augmented by  एक to दो civilian स्टाफ support कर्मचारी of the अकादमिक  institution .
Within AFROTC detachments , the students ( referred to as ``  cadets '' ) हैं व्यवस्थित into विंग्स , समूह , squadrons , और  flights , mirroring the USAF functional wing structure .
The AFROTC detachment 's cadet wing or cadet group is separated into two divisions : the General Military Course ( GMC ) consisting of the first two years of training , and the Professional  अधिकारी कोर्स ( poc ) consisting of the पिछला दो सालो of प्रशिक्षण  .
The AFROTC program is also divided into two training functions : the Academic Classroom Program ( Aerospace Studies classes ) and Cadet Activities ( i.e. , Leadership  प्रयोगशाला , शारीरिक  Training , and other training ) .
Paper density ( also known as  आधार वज़न और grammage ) is a पद प्रयुक्त in the गूदा और पेपर  industry and also for fabric industry to denote a measure of mass of the product per unit of area for a type of fabric , paper or paperboard .
The term `` density '' is not  प्रयुक्त in इसके परंपरागत  sense of mass per unit volume .
`` Paper density '' , rather ,  is a माप of  the area density .
पेपर उत्पाद कि let छोटी  or no light pass through ( e.g . poster board ) are considered dense or heavy .
Paper products that allow some light to pass through ( e.g .  ऊतक पेपर ) हैं माना  lightweight .
In the pulp and  पेपर उद्योग , it is आम to  set a commercial paper machine to produce paper to a target paper density .
Paper  घनत्व can भी be प्रयुक्त to फर्क पेपर इससे paperboard  as the latter usually has a grammage greater than 134 g/m2 .
Two ways of  expressing पेपर घनत्व  are commonly used:
Expressed in grams per square meter ( g/m2 ) ,  पेपर घनत्व is भी ज्ञात as grammage  .
This  is the माप  used in most parts of the world .
Expressed in terms  of the द्रव्यमान ( expressed as वज़न ) प्रति क्रमांक of चादरें , it is  known as basis weight .
The convention used in the United  राज्य और a few अन्य देशों using us पेपर आकार is पाउंड of a ream  of 500 ( or in some cases 1000 ) sheets of a given ( raw , still uncut ) basis size .
Japanese paper is  expressed as the वज़न in kg of 1000  sheets .
Candace Nicole Parker ( born April 19 , 1986 ) is an American basketball player  लिये the wnba 's लॉस एंजिल्स स्पार्क्स और ummc  Ekaterinburg of Russia .
She is the younger sister  of एनबीए खिलाड़ी  Anthony Parker .
वो attended the विश्वविद्यालयों  of Tennessee and was drafted by the Sparks in 2008 .
She may be best known for being the first woman to dunk in an NCAA  टूर्नामेंट खेल और the पहला स्त्री to डंक twice in a कॉलेज game—she नियत  both milestones as a redshirt freshman on March 19 , 2006 .
She also became only the second player  to डंक in a wnba खेल on जून  22 , 2008 .
A versatile player , she is mainly a forward , but was  सूचीबद्ध on टेनेसी 's रोस्टर  as a forward , center , and guard .
She was a  प्रारंभ on the महिला vols बास्केट  team , winners of the 2007 and 2008 NCAA championships .
Parker won the 2009 Nickelodeon Kids ' Choice award as the favorite female  खिलाड़ी in the खेल श्रेणी  .
And she was a  अतिथि स्टार on  Figure It Out .
A food guide  पिरामिड is a पिरामिड तराशा मार्गदर्शिका of स्वस्थ भोजन विभाजित into भाग  to show the recommended intake for each food group .
The first food pyramid was  प्रकाशित in स्वीडन in 1974  .
The most widely known food pyramid was introduced by the United States  विभाग of कृषि in the साल 1992 , थी अद्यतनीकृत in 2005  , and then replaced in 2011 .
Over 25 other  देशों और संगठनों  have also published food pyramids .
Hans Christian Andersen ( ; often referred to in Scandinavia as H. C. Andersen ;  अप्रैल 2 , 1805august 4 , 1875 ) थी a डैनिश  author and poet .
Although a prolific writer of plays  , travelogues , novels , और कविताएं , andersen is बेहतरीन remembered  for his fairy tales , a literary genre he so mastered that he himself has become as mythical as the tales he wrote .
Andersen 's popularity is not limited to  children ; उसके stories—called , or `` fantastic  tales '' —express themes that transcend age and nationality .
दौरान उसके आजीवन he थी  acclaimed for having delighted children worldwide and was feted by royalty .
Andersen 's fairy  किस्से , जिससे have महरूम अनूदित into अधिक than 125 भाषाएं , have become culturally अंतःस्थापित in the वेस्ट 's सामूहिक  consciousness , readily accessible to children , but presenting lessons of virtue and resilience in the face of adversity for mature readers as well .
They have  प्रेरित गति तस्वीरें  , plays , ballets , and animated films .
Two figures locking eyes in Caravaggio 's  the सौभाग्य teller
Eye contact occurs when `` two people look at each other  's आँखें at the वही समय  . ''
In human beings , eye  सम्पर्क is a रूप of अशाब्दिक संचार  and is thought to have a large influence on social behavior .
Coined in  the जल्दी to mid-1960s , the पद रै आइये in the  West to often define the act as a meaningful and important sign of confidence and social communication .
The customs  और significance of नजर सम्पर्क  vary widely between cultures , with religious and social differences often altering its meaning greatly .
The study of eye contact is  sometimes ज्ञात as oculesics  .
Bed bugs are parasitic insects of  the cimicid परिवार कि फीड  exclusively on blood .
The term most commonly refers to members of the genus Cimex of which Cimex lectularius , the common bed bug , is the best known as it prefers to feed on  इंसान रक्त हालांकि अन्य cimex प्रजाति हैं specialized to अन्य पशु , e.g. , चमगादड़ बग , C. pipistrelli  ( Europe ) , C. pilosellus ( western US ) , and C. adjunctus ( entire eastern US ) .
The name of the `` bed bug '' is  निकला इससे the पसन्दीदा आवास of cimex  lectularius : warm houses and especially nearby or inside of beds and bedding or other sleep areas .
Bed bugs are mainly  क्रियाशील at रात्रि , लकिन हैं नहीं exclusively  nocturnal .
वे प्रायः फीड on उनके  hosts without being noticed .
A number of adverse health effects may result from bed bug bites , including skin rashes ,  मनोवैज्ञानिक प्रभाव  , and allergic symptoms .
Diagnosis involves both finding bed bugs and the  occurrence of संगत लक्षण  .
Bed bugs  have महरूम ज्ञात as इंसान परजीवी  for thousands of years .
At a point in the early 1940s , they were mostly eradicated in the developed  संसार , लकिन have increased in व्यापकता  since 1995 .
क्युकी infestation of इंसान  habitats has been on the increase , bed bug bites and related conditions have been on the rise as well .
The Book of Isaiah ( ) is the first of the Latter Prophets in  the यहूदी बाइबल , preceding ezekiel , यिर्मयाह और  the Book of the Twelve .
( The order of the  subsequent किताबे differs somewhat  in the Christian Old Testament ) .
The  पहला 39 अध्याय prophesy यातना लिये a गुनाहगार यहूदा और लिये सब the राष्ट्र of the संसार कि oppose परमेश्वर , जबकि the पिछला 27 prophesy  the restoration of the nation of Israel and a new creation in God 's glorious future kingdom ; this section includes the Songs of the Suffering Servant , four separate passages referring to the nation of Israel , interpreted by Christians as prefiguring the coming of Jesus Christ .
Tradition ascribes authorship of the book to Isaiah son of Amoz , but now scholars widely agree that the book is the  कार्य of तीन अलग लेखक - few विद्वानों इनकार इस दृश्य , और those  that do , do so for theological reasons .
The first , termed Proto-Isaiah ( chapters 1–39 ) , contains the words of the 8th-century BCE prophet with 7th-century BCE expansions ; the second , Deutero-Isaiah ( chapters 40–55 ) , is the  कार्य of a 6th-century bce लेखक लिखने निकट the समाप्त of the babylonian  captivity ; and the third , the poetic Trito-Isaiah ( chapters 56–66 ) , was composed in Jerusalem shortly after the return from exile , probably by multiple authors .
Oregon State University ( OSU ) is a coeducational , public research university located  in corvallis  , Oregon , United States .
The university offers undergraduate , graduate and doctoral degrees  और a multitude of शोध अवसर  .
There  हैं अधिक than 200 अकादमिक उपाधि कार्यक्रम offered  through the university .
OSU 's programs in microbiology ,  नाभिकीय अभियान्त्रिकी , पारिस्थितिकी , वानिकी , पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य  , biochemistry , zoology , oceanography , food science and pharmacy are recognized nationally as top tier programs .
The  osu 's उदार कला कार्यक्रम have भी grown significantly  and the department is considered a `` cornerstone '' of the institution .
More than  200,000 लोगों have attended  OSU since its founding .
The Carnegie  न्यास classifies ऑरेगॉन राज्य  University as part of its top tier of research institutions .
As of 2008 ,  osu is एक  of only seventy-three land-grant universities .
The school is also  पहचाना as a sea-grant , space-grant और sun-grant संस्था , बनाना it  one of only two US institutions to retain all four designations and the only public university to do so ( Cornell is the only other with similar designations ) .
As one of the two flagship universities of the Oregon University System , OSU  receives अधिक funding लिये शोध , annually , than सब अन्य पब्लिक उच्चतर  education institutions in Oregon combined .
Female ejaculation is the expulsion of fluid by human females  इससे the paraurethral नलिकाएं through और  around the female urethra during or before an orgasm .
It is also known colloquially as gushing  or squirting , हालांकि ये हैं माना to be अलग  phenomena in some research publications .
The exact source and nature of the fluid continue to be a topic of debate among medical professionals ,  जिससे is भी सम्बन्धित to संदेह over the अस्तित्व of the g-spot  .
The Kanab ambersnail , scientific name Oxyloma haydeni  kanabensis or oxyloma kanabense  , is a critically endangered subspecies or species of small , air-breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusc in the family Succineidae , the amber snails .
The common name of the amber snails is based on the shell , which is  पारदर्शी और जब खाली प्रायः resembles एम्बर in  color .
This species is endemic to the United States ,  specifically the राज्य of एरिज़ोना और यूटा ,  where it was first collected in the early 20th century .
It has  महरूम सूचीबद्ध as endangered on  the United States Fish and Wildlife Service list of endangered species since 8 August 1991 .
This snail lives in wetlands , springs , and seeps , and only two of its natural habitats are known to exist : Three Lakes , a meadow  निकट kanab , यूटा , और vasey 's स्वर्ग , a वसन्त साथ the कोलोराडो  River within Grand Canyon National Park .
In its natural habitat it is rather polyphagous , feeding mainly  on जीवाणु , पौधे और fungi , और reproduces  during the summer .
Now considered a Critically Endangered  प्रजाति on the आईयूसीएन रेड सूची of threatened प्रजाति due to a श्रेणी of कारकों  ( including influence ) , the Kanab ambersnail has been reintroduced to three springs above the historic high water level along the Colorado River .
The  स्पेनी भाषा is the दूसरी  most used language in the United States .
There are more Spanish speakers in the  संयुक्त राज्य than वहीँ हैं अध्यक्षों of चाइनीज  , French , German , Italian , Hawaiian , and the Native American languages combined .
According to the 2010 American Community Survey conducted by the U.S. Census  ब्यूरो , स्पेनी is the प्राथमिक भाषा बोला at घर by लगभग 37 लाख  people aged five or older , a figure more than double that of 1990 .
There are 45 million Hispanophones who speak Spanish as a first or second language , as well as six million Spanish language students , composing the largest national Spanish-speaking community outside of  मैक्सिको और बनाना स्पेनी the रोमांस भाषा और the indo-european भाषा साथ largest क्रमांक of देशी अध्यक्षों in the  world .
Roughly half of all U.S. Spanish  अध्यक्षों भी बोलो अंग्रेज़ी `` बहुत खूब , '' आधारित  on the self-assessment Census question respondents .
The language came to the country since the 16th and 17th centuries with the arrival of Spanish colonists in areas that would later become the states of Florida , Texas , Colorado , New Mexico  , एरिज़ोना , नेवाडा , यूटा , और कैलिफ़ोर्निया और of the स्पेनी explorers - जो छान  areas of 42 states- .
Also  वेस्ट of louisiana territory थी स्पेनी between 1763 - 1800  ( year of the French recovery of territory ) , after the French and Indian War .
After of the incorporation of these states to the U.S. in first half of 19th century , the Spanish language was later reinforced by the acquisition of Puerto Rico in 1898 and by later waves  of the हिस्पैनिक करणों , मूलरूप इससे हिस्पैनिक अमेरिका , to the संयुक्त राज्य  beginning in the second half of 19th century until today .

The Tokyo  mew mew manga और दुश्मनी श्रेणी सुविधाएँ a डाल of  characters designed by Mia Ikumi .
The series takes place in Tokyo , Japan , where  पाँच adolescent लड़कियों , पुकारा mew mews , हैं infused  with the DNA of endangered species to combat aliens attempting to take over the Earth .
The manga series is followed by a short sequel  श्रेणी , टोकियो mew mew a la विधि , जिससे introduces  a new Mew Mew and a new threat .
The Mew Mews are led by the  प्रमुख अक्षर , ichigo momomiya , जिनकी पहला कार्य is to  gather the other four Mew Mews : Mint Aizawa , Lettuce Midorikawa , Pudding Fong , and Zakuro Fujiwara .
As the series progresses , Ichigo goes from having a crush on Masaya Aoyama to  बनने उसके गर्लफ्रेंड जबकि trying to छुपा उसके  secret double life from him .
The series  antagonists शामिल तीन  aliens , Kish , Pie , and Tart , and their leader , Deep Blue .
Originally from  धरती , the एलियंस यहूद मजबूर to छोड़  long ago due to deadly environmental changes .
वे have लौटे to मार the  humans , who they feel are destroying their planet , and reclaim the planet .
In a la Mode , middle school student Berry  shirayuki is introduced as the छठे mew mew और  , in the absence of Ichigo , the temporary leader of the Mew Mews .
A la Mode also introduces new set of antagonists , the Saint Rose  crusaders , a समूह of इंसान  teenagers with various psychic abilities with a desire to create their own utopia .
Led by Duke , they make several  कोशिशें to मार बेरी , आखिरकार turning the लोकल  populace against the Mew Mews .
Ikumi 's initial vision for Tokyo Mew Mew was a story called Tokyo  ब्लैक बिल्ली लड़की कि प्रदर्शित a cat-girl battling  alien invaders .
After the  स्टोरी थी transitioned to a अधिक upbeat स्टोरी of पाँच  female superheroes , the character designs were redone to have a lighter , more colorful feel .
The main series characters were praised  लिये होने a पूर्ण अनुरूप लिये the overall स्टोरी , as खूब  as for their cute appearances .
The characters introduced in a la Mode were also praised for their visual  दिखावे , लकिन criticized as होने  repeats of the original series .
The character Duke was also criticized for  having a डिज़ाइन reminiscent of the  white supremacy group , the Ku Klux Klan .
Middle Triassic marginal marine sequence of siltstones ( below ) and limestones ( above ) ,  वर्जिन गठन , southwestern यूटा ,  USA
Sedimentary rocks are  प्रकार of चट्टान कि हैं formed by the deposition  of material at the Earth 's surface and within bodies of water .
Sedimentation is  the सामूहिक नाम लिये प्रक्रियाओं कि कारण  mineral and/or organic particles ( detritus ) to settle and accumulate or minerals to precipitate from a solution .
अणु कि रूप  a sedimentary rock by accumulating are called sediment .
Before being deposited , sediment was formed by weathering and erosion in a source area , and then transported to the place of deposition by water , wind , ice , mass  गति or ग्लेशियर जिससे हैं पुकारा एजेंटों  of denudation .
The sedimentary rock cover of the continents of the Earth 's crust is extensive ,  लकिन the कुल योगदान of sedimentary रॉक्स is  estimated to be only 8 % of the total volume of the crust .
sedimentary रॉक्स हैं तभी a पतला veneer  over a crust consisting mainly of igneous and metamorphic rocks .
sedimentary रॉक्स हैं deposited in परतों  as strata , forming a structure called bedding .
The study of sedimentary rocks and rock strata provides information about the subsurface that is useful for civil engineering , for example in the  निर्माण of सड़कें , घरों , tunnels , नहरों or अन्य constructions  .
Sedimentary rocks are  भी महत्वपूर्ण स्त्रोत of प्राकृतिक संसाधन  like coal , fossil fuels , drinking water or ores .
The study of the sequence of  sedimentary चट्टान strata is the प्रमुख सोर्स  for scientific knowledge about the Earth 's history , including palaeogeography , paleoclimatology and the history of life .
the वैज्ञानिक अनुशासन कि अध्ययन the  properties and origin of sedimentary rocks is called sedimentology .
Sedimentology is both part of geology and physical geography and overlaps partly with other disciplines in the Earth sciences , such as pedology  , geomorphology , भूरसायन or संरचनात्मक  geology .
