Humans are born with over 270 bones , some of which fuse together into a longitudinal  अक्ष , the अक्षीय कंकाल , to जिससे the appendicular कंकाल  is attached .
Saint Patrick ( ; ; Modern ; ; c.  387 – 17 कूच c. 460 or c.  492 ) was a Romano-British Christian missionary and bishop in Ireland .
Known as the `` Apostle  of आयरलैंड '' , he is  the primary patron saint of the island along with Saints Brigid and Columba .
Two authentic letters from him survive  , इससे जिससे आइये  the only generally accepted details of his life .
When he was  परिचय 16 , he थी captured इससे उसके घर और लिया as a स्लेव to आयरलैंड , जहाँ he जिया लिये छह सालो  before escaping and returning to his family .
After becoming a cleric , he returned to northern and western  आयरलैंड as an ordained बिशप , लकिन छोटी is ज्ञात परिचय  the places where he worked .
By the seventh century , he had already come  to be revered as the संरक्षक संत of  Ireland .
Most available details of his life are from subsequent hagiographies , and these  हैं अभी नहीं स्वीकृत बगैर विस्तृत  criticism .
The Annals of Ulster state that he arrived in Ireland in 432 , ministered in Ulster around 443 ,  और died in 457 or 461 .
The text , however , distinguishes  between `` बूढ़ा पैट्रिक '' ( विचार to औसत palladius  ) and `` Patrick , archapostle of the Scots , '' who died in 492 .
The actual dates of Patrick 's life can not be fixed with certainty but , on a widespread interpretation , he was active as  a मिशनरी in आयरलैंड दौरान the दूसरी हाफ of the 5th सदी  .
He is generally credited with being  the पहला बिशप of armagh  , Primate of All Ireland .
संत पैट्रिक 's दिन is  observed on March 17 , the date of his death .
It is  मनाये दोनो अंदर और बाहर आयरलैंड ,  as both a religious and , especially outside Ireland , secular holiday .
In the dioceses of Ireland , it is both a  solemnity और a पावन दिन of दायित्व ; बाहर  Ireland , it can be a celebration of Ireland itself .
Line segments in the  सुनहरी अनुपात
A golden rectangle with longer side a and shorter side b , when placed adjacent to a square with sides of length a , will produce a similar  सुनहरी आयताकार साथ longer पक्ष a + b और shorter पक्ष  a .
This  illustrates  the relationship .
In mathematics and the arts , two quantities are in the  सुनहरी अनुपात if the अनुपात of the योग of the quantities to the larger मात्रा  is equal to the ratio of the larger quantity to the smaller one .
The figure on the  सही illustrates the ज्यामितीय  relationship .
Expressed  algebraically:
where the  यूनानी अक्षर फाई ( ) represents the  golden ratio .
Its  मान  is:
The golden ratio is also called the  सुनहरी खण्ड ( लैटिन : sectio  aurea ) or golden mean .
Other names include extreme and mean ratio , medial section , divine proportion , divine section (  लैटिन : sectio divina ) , सुनहरी proportion ,  golden cut , and golden number .
Many 20th century artists and architects have proportioned their works to approximate the golden ratio—especially in the  रूप of the सुनहरी आयताकार , in जिससे the अनुपात of the longer पक्ष to the shorter is the सुनहरी ratio—believing इस proportion to be aesthetically  pleasing ( see Applications and observations below ) .
Mathematicians since Euclid have studied the properties of the golden ratio , including its appearance in the dimensions of a  नियमित प्रस्तुतीकरण और in a सुनहरी आयताकार , जिससे can be काटें into a वर्गाकार और a छोटी आयताकार  with the same aspect ratio .
The golden  अनुपात रै भी महरूम प्रयुक्त to analyze the proportions of प्राकृतिक  objects as well as man-made systems such as financial markets , in some cases based on dubious fits to data .
North Myrtle Beach is  a तटीय रिज़ॉर्ट नगर in horry  County , South Carolina , United States .
It was created in 1968 from four existing municipalities north of  myrtle बीच , और serves as एक of the प्राथमिक  tourist towns along the Grand Strand .
The population was 13,752  at the 2010  census .
संसार युद्ध i ( wwi ) थी a वैश्विक  war centred in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918 .
It was predominantly called the World  युद्ध or the ग्रेट युद्ध इससे  its occurrence until the start of World War II in 1939 , and the First World War or World War I thereafter .
It involved all the world 's great powers , which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom , France and Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany ,  austria-hungary और इटली ; लकिन , as austria–hungary  had taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy did not enter into the war ) .
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more  राष्ट्र डाला the युद्ध : इटली , जापानी और the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies , और  the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
Ultimately , more than 70 million  सैन्य कर्मियों  , including 60 million Europeans , were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history .
More than 9 million combatants were killed , largely because of  technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases  in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility .
It  थी the fifth- deadliest विरोध in संसार इतिहास , subsequently  paving the way for various political changes , such as revolutions in many of the nations involved .
One of the long-term causes of the war was the  पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी नीतियों of the ग्रेट  powers of Europe .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary , on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a  राजनयिक संकट जब austria-hungary subsequently वितरित an ultimatum  to the Kingdom of Serbia .
Several alliances formed over the  पिछला दशकों यहूद invoked  .
Within weeks , the major powers were at  युद्ध और , via उनके colonies , the विरोध  soon spread around the world .
On 28 July , the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the war as  तैयारी लिये the आक्रमण of सर्बिया  .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to France , providing a  casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's घोषणा of युद्ध विरूद्ध जर्मनी  .
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called  चमत्कार of the marne —the पश्चिमी सामने settled into  a static battle of attrition with a trench line that changed little until 1917 .
on the पूर्वी सामने , the रूसी  army was successful against the Austro-Hungarians , but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans .
In November the Ottoman Empire joined  the युद्ध , खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस  , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
Italy and  बुल्गारिया गई to युद्ध in 1915 और  Romania in 1916 .
In Russia , the tsar 's government collapsed in March  1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर brought  the Russians to terms with the Central Powers .
After a 1918 German  अप्रिय साथ the पश्चिमी सामने , the allies drove  back the Germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches .
Germany , which had its own trouble with revolutionaries , agreed to an  armistice on 11 नवम्बर 1918  .
The war ended in victory  लिये the allies  .
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts , as the  भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और आर्थिक संसाधन  to fight a total war .
By the end of the war , four major imperial powers—the German , Russian , Austro-Hungarian and  उस्मानी empires—ceased to मौजूद  .
The successor states of the former two lost a great amount of territory ,  जबकि the latter दो यहूद dismantled  entirely .
The map of central Europe  थी redrawn into अनेक  smaller states .
The League of Nations was formed in the hope  of preventing  another such conflict .
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires , the repercussions of Germany 's defeat  और समस्याएं साथ the सन्धि of versailles हैं सहमत to be कारकों contributing  to World War II .
Camden is a city in  camden काउंटी , नई  Jersey , United States .
It is the county seat , located across the Delaware River from  फिलाडेल्फिया  .
As of the 2010 United States Census the city had  a कुल जनसांख्यिकी of 77,344 , representing a मनाही of 2,560 ( 3.2 % ) इससे the 79,904 निवासियों  enumerated during the 2000 Census , which had in turn declined by 7,588 ( 8.7 % ) from the 87,492 counted in the 1990 Census .
Camden ranked as the  12th-most populous नगरपालिका in the राज्य in 2010 बाद having  been ranked 10th in 2000 .
Camden was originally incorporated as a city  on फ़रवरी 13 , 1828 , इससे portions of the  now-defunct Newton Township , while the area was still part of Gloucester County .
On  कूच 13 , 1844 ,  Camden became part of the newly formed Camden County .
हालांकि एकबार a thriving बीच लिये निर्माण  and industry , Camden is perhaps best known for its struggles with urban dysfunction .
Three Camden mayors have been jailed for  भ्रष्टाचार , the सबसे हाल होने मिल्टन मिलान  in 2000 .
Since 2005 the school  प्रणाली और पुलिस विभाग have महरूम  operated by the state of New Jersey ; the takeover expired in 2012 .
In 2008 ,  camden था the उच्चतम अपराधों रेट in the u.S. साथ 2,333  violent crimes per 100,000 people while the national average was 455 per 100,000 .
Camden public schools spent $ 23,770 per student ( $ 19,118 on a budgetary  per-pupil आधार ) in the 2009–10 स्कूल  year and two-thirds of the students graduate .
Two out of  प्रत्येक पाँच निवासियों हैं नीचे the  national poverty line .
amitriptyline ( tryptomer , elavil , tryptizol , laroxyl , saroten , sarotex  , Lentizol , Endep ) is a tricyclic antidepressant ( TCA ) .
It is the most widely used TCA and  रै at तनिक बराबर efficacy विरूद्ध अवसाद as the नए क्लास of ssris  according to a study from early 2001 .
As well as reducing depressive symptoms , these types of tricyclics also ease migraines ,  टेंशन headaches , चिंता हमले और कुछ schizophrenic  symptoms .
It  is भी ज्ञात to reduce  aggression and violent behavior .
A  कंप्यूटर is a सामान्य purpose यंत्र कि can  be programmed to carry out a finite set of arithmetic or logical operations .
Since a sequence of  परिचालन can be readily बदला , the कंप्यूटर can  solve more than one kind of problem .
Conventionally , a computer consists of at least one processing element , typically a central processing  ईकाई ( cpu ) और कुछ रूप of  memory .
The processing element carries out arithmetic and logic operations , and a sequencing and control unit that can change the  अनुक्रम of परिचालन आधारित on भंडारित सूचना .
Peripheral devices allow information to be retrieved from an  बाह्य सोर्स , और the परिणाम of परिचालन saved  and retrieved .
The first  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक डिजिटल कंप्यूटर  were developed between 1940 and 1945 in the United Kingdom and United States .
originally वे यहूद the आकार of a विशाल रूम  , consuming as much power as several hundred modern personal computers ( PCs ) .
In this era mechanical analog computers were used for military  अनुप्रयोग  .
Modern computers based on integrated circuits are millions to billions  of टाइम्स अधिक सक्षम than the जल्दी मशीने , और occupy a भिन्न of  the space .
Simple computers  हैं छोटी पर्याप्त to  fit into mobile devices , and mobile computers can be powered by small batteries .
Personal computers in their various forms are icons of the  सूचना आयु और हैं कया सबसे लोगों सोचो of as  “computers.”
However , the embedded computers found in many devices from MP3 players to fighter  वायुयान और इससे खिलौने to औद्योगिक robots हैं the सबसे numerous  .
`` Barefoot and pregnant '' is a phrase most commonly associated with the controversial idea that women should not  कार्य बाहर the घर और चाहिए have अनेक children दौरान उनके reproductive  years .
It has several  अन्य meanings  as well .
it is a फिगर  of speech .
The phrase `` barefoot and  गर्भवती '' थी संभवतः पहला प्रयुक्त  sometime before 1950 .
An article from 1949  राज्य , `` by जल्दी 1949 , twa was—in the शब्द of इसके नई  president , Ralph S. Damon—both 'barefoot and pregnant . ' ''
Its usage may  तिथि as जल्दी  as the 1910s .
An  आलेख प्रकाशित  in 1958 states the phrase was first used by a `` Dr. Hertzler '' 40 years earlier .
`` Some forty years ago , Dr. Hertzler  उन्नत a परिकल्पना जिससे यंग महिलाओं of आज  seem bent on proving correct. '
The only way to keep a woman happy , ' he said  , 'is to रखना उसके barefoot और गर्भवती  . ' ''
Oakhurst  is a census-designated प्लेस और unincorporated  community within Ocean Township , in Monmouth County , New Jersey , United States .
As of the  2010 संयुक्त राज्य  Census , the CDP 's population was 3,995 .
University of Phoenix Stadium , opened August 1 , 2006 , is a  बहुउद्देशीय फ़ुटबॉल स्टेडियम स्तिथ in ग्लेनडेल  , Arizona .
It is  the घर of the एरिज़ोना कार्डिनल्स  of the National Football League ( NFL ) and the annual Fiesta Bowl .
The stadium is located  अगला द्वार to the jobing.com एरिना और it सुविधाएँ the पहला fully retractable प्राकृतिक  grass playing surface built in the United States on top of an AirField Systems drainage system .
An opening on one side of the stadium allows the playing field to move to the exterior of the building , allowing the entire natural turf  playing सतह to be उजागर to daylight  .
The stadium has hosted Super Bowl XLII , and the 2011  bcs नेशनल चैंपियनशिप खेल , a खेल कि it होस्ट प्रत्येक चार सालो , जिससे नियत the स्थान  's entertainment attendance record of 78,603 on January 11 , 2011 .
It will again host Super  कटोरी xlix in 2015  .
The University of Phoenix acquired the naming  अधिकारों in सितंबर 2006 , shortly बाद the  stadium had opened under the name Cardinals Stadium .
The `` University of  फीनिक्स `` नाम is लागू as a कॉरपोरेट प्रायोजक , और नहीं as the घर स्टेडियम of the विश्वविद्यालयों  ( which has no intercollegiate athletics program ) .
the स्टेडियम रै भी  hosted the WWE event WrestleMania XXVI with 72,219 fans in attendance .
The event was held in the  स्टेडियम on कूच 28th  2010 .
Joshua Lawrence Chamberlain ( September 8 , 1828  – फ़रवरी 24 , 1914 ) , born as लॉरेंस जोशुआ चेम्बरलेन , थी an अमरीकी  college professor from the State of Maine , who volunteered during the American Civil War to join the Union Army .
Although having no earlier education in military strategies , he became a highly respected and  सजा संघ अधिकारी , reaching the  rank of brigadier general ( and brevet major general ) .
For his gallantry at Gettysburg ,  he थी awarded the पदक of  Honor .
He was given the honor of commanding the Union troops at the surrender ceremony for the infantry of Robert E.  ली 's फौज at appomattox , वर्जिनिया  .
After the war , he entered politics  as a रिपब्लिकन और परोसा चार one-year शर्तें of दफ्तर as the 32nd  Governor of Maine .
He served on the faculty , and as president ,  of उसके अल्मा मेटर ,  Bowdoin College .
An inning , or  पारी , is a fixed-length खण्ड of a खेल  in any of a variety of sports – most notably cricket and baseball during which one team attempts to score while the other team attempts to prevent the first from scoring .
In cricket , the term innings is both singular and  बहुवचन और is सदा spelled और सुनाया साथ the टर्मिनल  `` s '' .
In baseball and softball , the  एकवचन रूप is inning और तभी the बहुवचन  takes an `` s '' .
In many other  खेल , the लंबाई of the खेल is लिखवाई by a क्लॉक और टीमों स्वैप अप्रिय और  defensive roles dynamically by taking possession of a ball or similar item .
In baseball and cricket , however , one team , said to be `` batting '' , attempts to score `` runs '' —see run (  बेसबॉल ) और चलाएं ( क्रिकेट ) —while the अन्य टोली , कहा to be `` क्षेत्ररक्षण  '' , attempts to prevent the scoring of runs and get members of the batting team out .
The teams switch  स्थान बाद the क्षेत्ररक्षण टोली रै  succeeded in getting a fixed number of players out , making a clock unnecessary .
In cricket , the term innings is also  प्रयुक्त to refer to the खेल of एक particular  player ( Smith had a poor innings , scoring only 12 ) .
By extension , this term  can be प्रयुक्त in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी लिये लगभग कोई कार्यकलाप जिससे takes a काल of समय  ( The Liberal government had a good innings , but finally lost office in 1972 , or You 've had a fair innings , now it 's my turn , meaning `` you have spoken for long enough , now let me speak '' ) .
It is also used in reference to someone who has  died at a reasonably बूढ़ा आयु  or lived a rich and rewarding life ( Ah , well .
जॉन थी 89  .
At  तनिक he था a शुभ पारी  ) .
The baseball-derived parallel to  इस in अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी  is the term at bat .
According  to the ऑक्सफोर्ड अंग्रेज़ी शब्दकोष , the  term innings has been used in reference to cricket since at least 1735 .
As cricket was a mature  , अत्यधिक व्यवस्थित खेल in the 1600s in इंग्लैण्ड , the पद 's  origin could well precede this first recorded usage .
The word inning meaning 'a gathering in ' is  पहला अंकित in  1522 , and could be related .
Adenosine deaminase deficiency , also called ADA deficiency or  ada-scid , is an autosomal recessive metabolic विकार कि  causes immunodeficiency .
It occurs in fewer than one in  100,000 सजीव births विश्वव्यापी  .
It accounts for about 15 % of all cases of  कठोर संयुक्त immunodeficiency  ( SCID ) .
It is very rare ,  तुम have a  3 % chance of getting this gene .
ADA deficiency may be  उपस्थित in शैशव , बाल्यकाल  , adolescense , or adulthood .
Age of  onset और गंभीरता is सम्बन्धित to  some 29 known genotypes associated with the disorder .
An  उदाहरण of शहरी  poverty in this slum in Jakarta , Indonesia
Poverty  is the राज्य of एक जो lacks a निश्चित  amount of material possessions or money .
Absolute poverty  or destitution refers to the पिछडे of मौलिक इंसान needs , जिससे  commonly includes food , water , sanitation , clothing , shelter , health care and education .
Relative  गरीबी is पारिभाषित contextually as आर्थिक असमानता  in the location or society in which people live .
For much of history , poverty was considered largely unavoidable as traditional modes of  उत्पादन यहूद अपर्याप्त to  give an entire population a comfortable standard of living .
After the industrial revolution , mass production in  कारखानों बना माल increasingly अधिक inexpensive और  accessible .
Of more  महत्व is the modernization of कृषि  , such as fertilizers , in order to provide enough yield to feed the population .
The supply of basic needs can be restricted by constraints on  सरकारी सेवाएं ऐसे as भ्रष्टाचार , कर avoidance , कर्ज़ और ऋण conditionalities और by the दिमाग नाली  of health care and educational professionals .
रणनीति of increasing आय to  make basic needs more affordable typically include welfare , economic freedoms , and providing financial services .
Poverty reduction is a major goal  और समस्या लिये अनेक अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन ऐसे  as the United Nations and the World Bank .
the संसार बैंको अनुमानित 1.29  billion people were living in absolute poverty in 2008 .
Of these , about 400 million people in  निरपेक्ष गरीबी जिया  in India and 173 million people in China .
In USA 1 in 5  children जीवनदान in गरीबी  .
in शर्तें of प्रतिशत of  regional populations , sub-Saharan Africa at 47 % had the highest incidence rate of absolute poverty in 2008 .
Between 1990 and 2010 , about 663  लाख लोगों स्थानांतरित ऊपर  the absolute poverty level .
Still , extreme poverty is a global challenge ; it  is observed in सब भाग of the संसार , सहित the  developed economies .
Mushroom poisoning  ( भी ज्ञात as mycetism ) refers to नुकसानदेह  effects from ingestion of toxic substances present in a mushroom .
These symptoms can vary  इससे पतला जठरांत्र तकलीफ  to death .
The toxins present are secondary metabolites produced  in विशिष्ट biochemical pathways in the  fungal cells .
Mushroom poisoning is usually the result of ingestion of wild  मशरूम बाद misidentification of a विषाक्त  mushroom as an edible species .
The most common reason for this misidentification is close resemblance in terms of  रंग और सामान्य morphology of the  toxic mushrooms species with edible species .
Even very experienced wild mushroom gatherers are upon  विरल अवसर poisoned by खाने विषाक्त प्रजाति , despite होने  well aware of the risks , through carelessness .
To prevent mushroom  विषाक्तता , मशरूम gatherers need to be बहुत परिचित साथ  the mushrooms they intend to collect as well as with any similar-looking toxic species .
in जोड , edibility  of mushrooms may depend on methods of preparation for cooking .
Collectors also need to be well aware that  edibility or toxicity of कुछ प्रजाति varies  with geographic location .
Human height is the distance from the bottom of  the फीट to the शीर्ष of  the head in a human body , standing erect .
When populations share genetic background and  पर्यावरणीय कारकों , औसत ऊँचाई is अक्सर characteristic  within the group .
Exceptional height variation ( around 20 % deviation from average ) within such a population is sometimes due to gigantism or  dwarfism , जिससे हैं चिकित्सा शर्तें caused by विशिष्ट जीनों or अंतःस्रावी  abnormalities .
In regions of extreme poverty or prolonged warfare , environmental factors like chronic malnutrition during childhood or adolescence may account for  विलम्बित विकास and/or ( in कठोर मामले ) चिह्नित reductions in वयस्क stature भी बगैर  the presence of any of these medical conditions .
अपोलो 11 थी the spaceflight कि उतरा the पहला इंसानो  , Americans Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin , on the Moon on July 20 , 1969 , at 20:18 UTC .
Armstrong became the first to step onto the  चंद्र सतह 6 घंटों बाद on जुलाई 21 at  02:56 UTC .
Armstrong  खर्च परिचय दो और a हाफ घंटों  outside the spacecraft , Aldrin slightly less ; and together they collected of lunar material for return to Earth .
A third member of the mission , Michael Collins , piloted the command spacecraft alone in lunar orbit until Armstrong and  एल्ड्रिन लौटे to it बस अंतर्गत a दिन  later for the trip back to Earth .
Launched  by a शनि v प्रक्षेपास्त्र इससे कैनेडी स्पेस बीच  in Merritt Island , Florida on July 16 , Apollo 11 was the fifth manned mission of NASA 's Apollo program .
The Apollo spacecraft had three parts : a Command Module with a cabin for the three astronauts which was the only part  जिससे उतरा वापस on धरती ; a सेवा मोड्यूल जिससे समर्थित the कमांड  Module with propulsion , electrical power , oxygen and water ; and a Lunar Module for landing on the Moon .
After being sent to the Moon by the Saturn V 's upper stage , the astronauts separated the spacecraft from it  और travelled  for three days until they entered into lunar orbit .
Armstrong and  एल्ड्रिन तब स्थानांतरित into the चंद्र  Module and landed in the Sea of Tranquility .
They stayed a total of  परिचय 21 और a हाफ घंटों on  the lunar surface .
After lifting off in the upper part of the Lunar Module and  rejoining कॉलिन्स in the कमांड मोड्यूल , वे लौटे to धरती और उतरा in the प्रशांत  Ocean on July 24 .
Broadcast on live TV to a  world-wide दर्शक , आर्मस्ट्रांग stepped onto the चंद्र सतह और वर्णित  the event as `` one small step for [ a ] man , one giant leap for mankind . ''
Apollo 11 effectively ended the Space Race and fulfilled a national  लक्ष्य प्रस्तावित in 1961 by the लेट u.S. अध्यक्ष जॉन F. कैनेडी in a वाक पहले the संयुक्त  States Congress , `` before this decade is out , of landing a man on the Moon and returning him safely to the Earth . ''
The FIFA World Cup , often simply the World Cup , is an international association football competition contested by the senior men 's national teams of the members of  fédération internationale de फ़ुटबॉल संघ ( फीफा ) , the खेल 's वैश्विक  governing body .
The championship has been awarded every four years since  the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1930 , मगर in 1942 और 1946 जब  it was not held because of the Second World War .
The current  champions हैं स्पेन  , who won the 2010 tournament .
The current format of the tournament involves 32 teams competing for the title at venues within the  मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a काल of परिचय a माह ; इस phase is प्रायः पुकारा  the World Cup Finals .
A qualification phase , which currently takes place over the preceding three years ,  is प्रयुक्त to determine जिससे टीमों qualify लिये the टूर्नामेंट साथ  with the host nation ( s ) .
The 19 World Cup  tournaments have महरूम जीती  by eight different national teams .
Brazil  have जीती पाँच टाइम्स , और वे हैं the तभी टोली  to have played in every tournament .
The other  संसार कप विजेता हैं इटली , साथ चार शीर्षक ; जर्मनी  , with three titles ; Argentina and inaugural winners Uruguay , with two titles each ; and England , France , and Spain , with one title each .
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting  इवेंट ; an अनुमानित 715.1 लाख लोगों देखी the  final match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany .
The next three World Cups will be hosted by  ब्राज़ील in 2014 , रूस in 2018 , और क़तर in  2022 .
Genocide is a term coined in 1944 by Raphael Lemkin to describe the deliberate and  व्यवस्थित विनाश , in पूरे or in भाग , of an जातीय  , racial , religious , or national group .
It is defined in Article 2 of the Convention on the Prevention and Punishment of the Crime of Genocide ( CPPCG ) of 1948 as `` any of the following acts committed with intent to destroy , in whole or in part , a national , ethnical , racial or religious group , as such : killing members of the  समूह ; causing गंभीर bodily or दिमागी नुक़सान to सदस्यों of the समूह ; deliberately inflicting on the समूह शर्तें of जीवन , गणना to लाओ परिचय इसके शारीरिक विनाश in पूरे or in भाग ; imposing उपायों intended  to prevent births within the group ; [ and ] forcibly transferring children of the group to another group . ''
skulls of पीड़ितों of  the Rwandan Genocide
The preamble to the CPPCG not only states that `` genocide is a crime under international law ,  contrary to the स्पिरिट और aims of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र और condemned by the civilized संसार '' , लकिन भी कि `` at सब अवधि of इतिहास नरसंहार  has inflicted great losses on humanity '' .
Determining what historical  कार्यक्रम constitute a नरसंहार और जिससे हैं merely दण्ड  or inhuman behavior is not a clear-cut matter .
In nearly every case where accusations of  नरसंहार have परिचालित , partisans of विभिन्न पहलू have fiercely विवादित the निर्वचन  and details of the event , often to the point of promoting wildly different versions of the facts .
An accusation of  नरसंहार is कतई नहीं लिया हलके और होगा  almost always be controversial .
the following सूची of genocides और कथित genocides  should be understood in this context and can not be regarded as the final word on these subjects .
A timing belt is a non-slipping mechanical drive  बेल्ट और the पद may refer  to either:
Toothed  बेल्ट , a लचीली बेल्ट साथ  teeth moulded onto its inner surface
Timing belt ( camshaft ) , a toothed  बेल्ट प्रयुक्त to ड्राइव the camshaft  ( s ) within an internal combustion engine
The culture of the United States is primarily a Western culture , but is  भी बहकावे by देशी अमरीकी , अफ़्रीकी , एशियाई , पोलिनेशियाई  , and Latin American cultures .
American  संस्कृति प्रारंभ इसके गठन over 10,000 सालो पहले साथ the माइग्रेशन  of Paleo-Indians from Asia into the region that is today the continental United States .
It has its own unique social and cultural characteristics such as dialect , music , arts  , सोशल आदतें , भोजन  , and folklore .
The United States of America is an ethnically and racially diverse country as a result of  large-scale आव्रजन इससे अनेक अलग  countries throughout its history .
Its chief early European influences came from English ,  स्कॉटिश , वेल्श और आयरिश settlers of औपनिवेशिक अमेरिका दौरान अंग्रेजों  rule .
British culture ,  due to औपनिवेशिक ties साथ ब्रिटेन कि स्प्रेड the  English language , legal system and other cultural inheritances , had a formative influence .
Other important  प्रभाव आए इससे अन्य भाग of पश्चिमी  Europe , especially Germany , France , and Italy .
Original elements also play a strong role , such as  the आविष्कार of jeffersonian  democracy .
Thomas Jefferson 's Notes on the State of Virginia was perhaps the first influential domestic  सांस्कृतिक critique by an अमरीकी और a प्रतिक्रियावादी टुकड़ा to the प्रचलित यूरोपीय  consensus that America 's domestic originality was degenerate .
Prevalent ideas  और आदर्शों कि विकसित domestically , ऐसे as नेशनल छुट्टियाँ , uniquely अमरीकी  sports , military tradition , and innovations in the arts and entertainment give a strong sense of national pride among the population as a whole .
American culture includes both conservative and liberal elements ,  वैज्ञानिक और धार्मिक प्रतिस्पर्धात्मकता , राजनैतिक structures , रिस्क लेने  and free expression , materialist and moral elements .
Despite certain consistent ideological principles ( e.g . individualism , egalitarianism , and  आस्था in स्वतंत्रता और लोकतंत्र ) , अमरीकी संस्कृति रै a किस्में of expressions due  to its geographical scale and demographic diversity .
The flexibility of U.S. culture and its highly symbolic nature lead some researchers  to categorize अमरीकी संस्कृति as a mythic पहचान  ; others see it as American exceptionalism .
It also includes elements that evolved from Indigenous Americans , and other ethnic cultures—most prominently the culture of African Americans  , संस्कृतियों इससे लैटिन अमेरिका , और एशियाई अमरीकी संस्कृतियों  .
Many American cultural elements , especially from popular culture , have  स्प्रेड आरपार the ग्लोब through  modern mass media .
The United States has often been thought of as a melting pot , but beginning in the late 1990s and early 2000s ,  it रुझान towards सांस्कृतिक विविधता , बहुलवाद और  the image of a salad bowl instead .
Due to the extent of American culture , there are many integrated but unique social  subcultures भीतर the संयुक्त राज्य  .
The cultural affiliations an individual in  the संयुक्त राज्य may have commonly निर्भर on सोशल  class , political orientation and a multitude of demographic characteristics such as religious background , occupation and ethnic group membership .
Samoan ( Gagana fa'a Sāmoa or Gagana Sāmoa — IPA : ) is the language of the Samoan  आइलैंड्स , comprising the स्वतंत्र देश of समोआ और the  United States territory of American Samoa .
It is an official language—alongside English  —in  both jurisdictions .
samoan , a पोलिनेशियाई भाषा , is  the first language for most of the Samoa Islands ' population of about 246,000 .
With many Samoan people living in  अन्य देशों , the कुल क्रमांक  of speakers worldwide is estimated at 370,000 .
The language is notable for the phonological  मतभेद between औपचारिक और अनौपचारिक वाक  as well as a ceremonial form used in Samoan oratory .
A glucose tolerance test is a medical test in which glucose is given and  रक्त नमूने लिया afterward to determine  how quickly it is cleared from the blood .
The test is  प्रायः प्रयुक्त to परीक्षण लिये मधुमेह , इंसुलिन प्रतिरोध , और sometimes  reactive hypoglycemia and acromegaly , or rarer disorders of carbohydrate metabolism .
In the most commonly performed version of the test , an oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) , a standard  खुराक of ग्लूकोज is ingested by मुँह और रक्त स्तर हैं checked  two hours later .
Many  विसंगतियाँ of the gtt have महरूम devised over the सालो लिये विभिन्न उद्देश्य , साथ अलग मानक doses of ग्लूकोज , अलग रूट of प्रशासन  , different intervals and durations of sampling , and various substances measured in addition to blood glucose .
`` What About Me '' is a song  लिखा by गैरी तुषार और frances swan , पहला अंकित  by Australian rock band Moving Pictures from their album Days of Innocence .
It was the band 's first number-one single in Australia spending six consecutive weeks on  the शीर्ष ; वहीँ , it थी the second-highest selling  single of 1982 .
The success  of the सोंग led उन्हें to अमेरिका जहाँ  it became a hit , reaching # 29 on the U.S . Billboard Hot 100 chart .
The song stayed in the U.S. charts for such a long time that it managed to make  billboards शीर्ष 100 पॉप singles of 1983 , at # 88 ,  a rare feat for a single with such a low peak position .
the सोंग बना an असामान्य वापसी  in 1989 , peaking at # 46 .
On the left a chicken egg , the egg most commonly eaten by humans ,  और on the सही दो बटेर अंडे
Eggs are laid by females of many different species , including birds , reptiles , amphibians , and fish ,  और have महरूम खाया by mankind लिये हज़ारों of सालो  .
Bird and reptile eggs consist of a protective eggshell , albumen ( egg white ) , and vitellus ( egg  yolk ) , contained भीतर विभिन्न पतला झिल्लियों  .
Popular choices for egg  खपत हैं मुर्गा , बतख , बटेर , roe , और caviar , लकिन the अंडा  most often consumed by humans is the chicken egg , by a wide margin .
Egg yolks and whole eggs store  significant amounts of प्रोटीन और choline , और हैं  widely used in cookery .
Due to their protein content , the United States  विभाग of कृषि ( यूएसडीए ) categorizes अंडे as  Meats within the Food Guide Pyramid .
Despite the nutritional value of eggs , there are some potential health issues  arising इससे अंडा विशेषता , भंडार ,  and individual allergies .
Chickens and other  egg-laying जीव हैं widely रखा throughout the संसार , और द्रव्यमान  production of chicken eggs is a global industry .
In 2009 , an estimated 62.1  लाख मीट्रिक टन of अंडे यहूद उत्पादित विश्वव्यापी इससे a कुल लेटा  flock of approximately 6.4 billion hens .
There are issues of regional variation in demand and expectation , as well as  वर्तमान debates concerning विधि of द्रव्यमान उत्पादन , साथ the यूरोपीय संघ 's  ban on battery farming of chickens .
Major League Soccer ( MLS ) is a professional soccer  लीग representing the खेल 's उच्चतम स्तर  in the United States and Canada .
Sanctioned by the United States Soccer  संघ ( u.S. सॉकर ) , the लीग is रचित  of 19 teams — 16 in the U.S. and 3 in Canada .
Seasons presently run from March to  दिसम्बर , साथ प्रत्येक टोली playing 34 खेल in the नियमित  season .
टेन टीमों compete in the postseason mls कप playoffs culminating  in the championship game , the MLS Cup .
Major League Soccer was founded in  1993 as भाग of the संयुक्त राज्य ' बोली to मेजबान  the 1994 FIFA World Cup .
The first season took  प्लेस in 1996 शुरूआत साथ  ten teams .
बजाय of ऑपरेटिंग as an संघ of independently  owned teams , MLS is a single entity where each team is owned and controlled by the league 's investors .
The league 's closed membership makes it one of the  संसार 's few सॉकर लीग नहीं  using promotion and relegation .
The legality of cannabis varies  इससे देश to देश  .
Possession of cannabis is illegal in most countries and has been since the  शुरूआत of फैली कैनबिस निषेध  in the late 1930s .
However , many countries have decriminalized the possession of  छोटी quantities of कैनबिस , विशेषकर in उत्तर अमेरिका , दक्षिण  America and Europe .
Furthermore , possession is legal or effectively legal in the Netherlands , North Korea and  होता be in the u.S. राज्य of कोलोराडो और वॉशिंगटन if it यहूद नहीं लिये संघीय विधि , जिससे governs  persons in all states .
The medicinal use of  कैनबिस is विधिक in a क्रमांक of देशों  , including Canada , the Czech Republic and Israel .
While federal law in the United States bans all sale and possession of cannabis , enforcement varies widely at the state  स्तर और कुछ राज्य have स्थापित औषधीय मारिजुआना कार्यक्रम in कि खण्डन  federal law ; two states ( Colorado and Washington ) have repealed their laws prohibiting the recreational use of cannabis and replaced them with a regulatory regime , also contrary to federal statute .
Some countries have laws that are not as vigorously prosecuted as others but , apart from the countries that offer access to medical marijuana  , सबसे देशों have विभिन्न दंड ranging इससे lenient  to very severe .
Some infractions are taken more  seriously in कुछ देशों than अन्य in लिहाज़ to the cultivation , उपयोग  , possession or transfer of cannabis for recreational use .
A few jurisdictions have lessened penalties for  कब्ज़ा of छोटी quantities of कैनबिस , बनाना  it punishable by confiscation and a fine , rather than imprisonment .
Some jurisdictions/ drug courts use mandatory treatment programs  लिये यंग or बारंबार उपयोक्ता , साथ स्वतंत्रता इससे narcotic दवाएँ as the लक्ष्य और  a few jurisdictions permit cannabis use for medicinal purposes .
वहीँ हैं भी परिवर्तन in  a more restrictive direction as in Canada .
Drug tests to  detect कैनबिस हैं increasingly आम in अनेक देशों और have resulted  in jail sentences and people losing their jobs .
However , simple possession can carry long jail sentences in some countries , particularly in parts of East Asia and Southeast Asia where  the बिक्री of कैनबिस may सीसे to a वाक्य of जीवन in थाना or भी  execution .
In cardiovascular physiology , ejection fraction ( EF ) represents the volumetric fraction of  रक्त उत्तेजित आउट of the ventricle ( दिल ) साथ प्रत्येक दिल  beat or cardiac cycle .
It can be applied to either the right  ventricle जिससे ejects via the pulmonary वाल्व into the  pulmonary circulation or the left ventricle which ejects via the aortic valve into the systemic circulation .
Imaging of the physiology of the mammalian heart is the art  कि allows सार्थक  mathematical expression defining EF .
Noninvasive cardiac imaging has become a worldwide utility enabling  पढ़ाई of हृदय प्रदर्शन reproducibly और  inexpensively .
Simplified , Ejection fraction is  a गणितीय उत्पाद  allowed by cardiac imaging .
As a mathematical term , Ejection Fraction is an  एक्सटेंशन of the कार्य of एडाल्फ फिक in हृदय  output .
Dedicated technology such as Echocardiography , Computed Tomography , Magnetic Resonance Imaging and MUGA scanning have definitively allowed clinically relevant  गणित regarding ischemia , जन्मजात दिल बीमारी और दिल विफलता  .
राज्य रूट 14 ( sr 14 ) is a north–south राज्य  highway in the U.S. state of California , largely in the Mojave Desert .
The  दक्षिणी portion of the राजमार्ग is हस्ताक्षरित  as the Antelope Valley Freeway .
The route connects Interstate 5 , or Golden State  फ्रीवे , निकट  Santa Clarita and with U.S. Route 395 near Inyokern .
Legislatively , the route extends south of I-5 to State  रूट 1 in the प्रशांत palisades क्षेत्रफल of लॉस एंजिल्स , however the portion  south of the junction with I-5 has not been constructed .
The southern part of the constructed route is a busy commuter freeway serving and connecting the communities of Santa Clarita , Palmdale  और lancaster साथ the बाकी of the वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल  .
the उत्तरी portion , इससे विंसेंट ( दक्षिण of palmdale ) to रूट 395 , is legislatively नामित the aerospace राजमार्ग , as the राजमार्ग  serves Edwards Air Force Base , once one of the primary landing strips for NASA 's Space Shuttle .
This section is rural , following the line between the hot Mojave desert and  the forming सिएरा नेवाडा  mountain range .
Most of  रूट 14 is loosely paralleled by a प्रमुख लकीर of the दक्षिणी प्रशांत रेलरोड  , used for the Antelope Valley Line of the Metrolink commuter rail system as well as a connection between Los Angeles and the California Central Valley via Tehachapi Pass .
Linked with US 395 , this road connects Los Angeles with  ऐसे स्थान as मैमथ पहाड़ , मोनो झील , yosemite नेशनल  Park and Reno , Nevada .
Route 14 was part of U.S. Route 6 prior  to truncation in 1964 , जब u.S. 6 थी a coast-to-coast  route from Long Beach to Provincetown , Massachusetts .
The non-freeway segment of SR 14 from Silver Queen Road north of Rosamond to  mojave is ज्ञात as सिएरा राजमार्ग , as is the बूढ़ा रूटिंग between अंतरराज्यीय 5 और चांदी महारानी सड़क  where SR 14 has been moved to a newer freeway alignment .
Portions of Route 14 remain signed with names associated with US 6 , including Midland Trail , Theodore  रूज़वेल्ट राजमार्ग और ग्रैंड फौज of the गणतंत्र  Highway .
This route is part of the California Freeway and  एक्सप्रेसवे प्रणाली  .
Blindness is the condition of  lacking विज़ुअल बोध due to physiological  or neurological factors .
Various scales have been developed to  describe the extent of दृष्टि घाटा और  define blindness .
Total blindness is the complete lack of form and visual light perception and is clinically recorded  as nlp , an संक्षिप्त लिये `` no लाइट बोध  . ''
Blindness is  अक्सर प्रयुक्त to  describe severe visual impairment with vision .
Those described as having only light perception have no more sight than the ability  to बताना लाइट इससे अंधेरा और the सामान्य दिशा of  a light source .
To determine which people may need special assistance because of their visual  disabilities , विभिन्न सरकारी jurisdictions have प्रतिपादित अधिक जटिल  definitions referred to as legal blindness .
In North America and most of Europe , legal blindness is defined as visual acuity ( vision ) of  20/200 ( 6/60 ) or कम in the बेहतर नजर साथ  best correction possible .
This means that a legally blind individual would have to stand  इससे an ऑब्जेक्ट to देखिए it—with corrective lenses  —with the same degree of clarity as a normally sighted person could from .
in अनेक क्षेत्रों , लोगों साथ औसत तीक्ष्णता जो nonetheless have a विज़ुअल फ़ील्ड of  less than 20 degrees ( the norm being 180 degrees ) are also classified as being legally blind .
Approximately ten percent of those  deemed legally अँधा , by कोई माप , have  no vision .
The rest  have कुछ दृष्टि , इससे लाइट बोध  alone to relatively good acuity .
Low  दृष्टि is sometimes प्रयुक्त  to describe visual acuities from 20/70 to 20/200 .
By the 10th Revision of the WHO International Statistical Classification of Diseases , Injuries and Causes of Death , low vision is defined as visual  तीक्ष्णता of कम than 20/60 ( 6/18 ) , लकिन बराबर to or बेहतर than 20/200 ( 6/60 ) , or सम्बन्धित विज़ुअल फ़ील्ड घाटा to कम than 20 डिग्री , in the बेहतर  eye with best possible correction .
Blindness is defined as visual acuity of  कम than 20/400 ( 6/120 ) , or सम्बन्धित विज़ुअल फ़ील्ड घाटा to कम than 10 डिग्री  , in the better eye with best possible correction .
Blind people with undamaged eyes may  स्टिल पंजीकरण लाइट non-visually लिये the purpose of circadian  entrainment to the 24-hour light/dark cycle .
लाइट सिग्नल लिये इस purpose  travel through the retinohypothalamic tract and are not affected by optic nerve damage beyond where the retinohypothalamic tract exits .
Earl Simmons ( born December 18 , 1970 ) ,  बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज names dmx और  Dark Man X , is an American rapper and actor .
In 1999 , DMX released his best-selling album ... And Then There  थी x , जिससे प्रदर्शित the hit सिंगल `` पार्टी up ( up in यहाँ )  `` .
He has acted in films such as Belly , Romeo Must Die , Exit  wounds , पालना 2 the संगीन , और पिछला  Hour .
In  2006 , he स्ट्रक्चर in the वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी  , which was primarily aired on the BET cable television network .
In 2003 , DMX published a book  of उसके memoirs हकदार , e.a.r.l .  : The Autobiography of DMX .
dmx released a mixtape the  Weigh In as a prelude/promotion towards his album Undisputed ( 2012 ) .
DMX has sold  over 30 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी  , making him one of the best-selling hip-hop artists of all time .
Professional certification , trade  प्रमाणन , or पेशेवर नामांकन , प्रायः पुकारा बस प्रमाणन or योग्यता  , is a designation earned by a person to assure qualification to perform a job or task .
Not all certifications that use post-nominal letters are an acknowledgement of educational  उपलब्धि , or an एजेंसी नियुक्त to safeguard the पब्लिक  interest .
Bugs Bunny is a funny animal cartoon character , best remembered for his  अभिनीत भूमिकाएँ in the looney धुनें और merrie melodies श्रेणी of नाट्य छोटी films उत्पादित by warner भाईs. दौरान  the Golden age of American animation .
His popularity during this era  led to उसके बनने a कॉरपोरेट  mascot of Warner Bros. Entertainment .
Bugs is an anthropomorphic  धूसर हरे or खरगोश जो is प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके flippant , व्यक्तित्व  , a pronounced New York accent , his portrayal as a trickster , and his catch phrase `` Eh ...
What  's up  , doc ? ''
( usually said  जबकि चबाने  a carrot ) .
Bugs has appeared in more films than any other cartoon character and  is the नवीं सबसे portrayed फिल्मी व्यक्तित्व in  the world .
According to his 1990 `` biography '' Bugs Bunny : 50 Years and Only One Grey Hare , Bugs was born on July 27 , 1940 in Brooklyn , New York  in a वारेन अंतर्गत ebbets फ़ील्ड , घर of the ब्रुकलीन डॉजर्स  .
In reality , he was brought to life by the animators and staff of Leon Schlesinger Productions ( later Warner Bros. Cartoons ) : including Tex Avery , who directed Bugs ' early definitive short A Wild Hare ( 1940 )  ; रॉबर्ट mckimson , जो निर्मित बग ' निर्णायक अक्षर डिज़ाइन ; और mel blanc , जो originated the आवाज़ of  Bugs .
The mucous membranes ( or mucosae or mucosas ; singular mucosa ) are linings of mostly endodermal  उत्पत्ति , covered in epithelium , जिससे  are involved in absorption and secretion .
They line cavities that are exposed  to the बाह्य पर्यावरण  and internal organs .
They are at several places contiguous with skin : at the  नथुनों , the होठ of the मुँह , the eyelids , the कानों , the  genital area , and the anus .
The sticky , thick  द्रव स्रावित by the श्लेष्मक झिल्लियों और ग्रंथियों  is termed mucus .
The term mucous membrane refers to where they are found in the  देह और नहीं प्रत्येक श्लेष्मक झिल्ली secretes mucus  .
The glans clitoridis , glans penis ( head of the penis ) , along with  the अंदर of the अग्रत्वचा और the  clitoral hood , are mucous membranes .
The urethra is also  a श्लेष्मक झिल्ली  .
The secreted  mucus फंदा the pathogens in the देह , preventing  any further activities of diseases .
A master  सार्जेंट is the सैन्य रैंक लिये a वरिष्ठ  non-commissioned officer in some armed forces .
केक is a रूप  of bread or bread-like food .
In its modern forms ,  it is typically a मीठी baked  dessert .
in इसके oldest फ़ॉर्म , cakes  were normally fried breads or cheesecakes , and normally had a disk shape .
Determining  whether a दिए खाना चाहिए be वर्गीकृत as ब्रैड ,  cake , or pastry can be difficult .
आधुनिक केक , विशेषकर परत cakes , सामान्यतः contain a संयोजन of आटा ,  sugar , eggs , and butter or oil , with some varieties also requiring liquid ( typically milk or water ) and leavening agents ( such as yeast or baking powder ) .
Flavorful ingredients like fruit purées ,  nuts , सूखी or candied फल , or extracts हैं प्रायः added , और numerous substitutions  for the primary ingredients are possible .
Cakes are often filled with fruit preserves or dessert sauces (  जैसे पेस्ट्री मलाई ) , आइस्ड साथ buttercream or अन्य  icings , and decorated with marzipan , piped borders or candied fruit .
Cake is often the dessert of choice for meals at  ceremonial अवसरों , विशेषकर  weddings , anniversaries , and birthdays .
There are countless cake recipes ; some are bread-like , some rich and elaborate , and many  हैं सदियां  old .
Cake making is no longer a complicated procedure ; while at one time considerable labor went into cake making ( particularly the whisking of egg foams ) , baking  उपकरण और दिशानिर्देश have महरूम सरलीकृत so कि  even the most amateur cook may bake a cake .
Tamara Faye LaValley Bakker Messner ( March 7 , 1942 – July 20 , 2007 ) was an American Christian singer ,  इंजीलवादी , उद्योगों , लेखक , बात दिखाएँ मेजबान , और टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व  .
She  थी शादीशुदा इससे 1961 to 1992 to  televangelist , and later convicted felon , Jim Bakker .
She co-hosted  साथ उसे on the ptl क्लबों  ( 1976–1987 ) .
She was a participant in  the 2004 ऋतु of the वास्तविकता दिखाएँ the  Surreal Life .
cambria is a गाँव in कोलंबिया  County , Wisconsin , United States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी  767 at the 2010 census .
It  is भाग of the मैडिसन  Metropolitan Statistical Area .
पब्लिक नीति is the principled मार्गदर्शिका to कार्रवाई लिया by the प्रशासनिक  executive branches of the state with regard to a class of issues in a manner consistent with law and institutional customs .
In general , the foundation is the  pertinent नेशनल और substantial संवैधानिक  law and implementing legislation such as the US Federal code .
Further substrates  शामिल दोनो न्यायिक interpretations और regulations जिससे हैं generally  authorized by legislation .
Other scholars define it as a system of `` courses of action ,  नियामक उपायों , कानून , और funding प्राथमिकताएं concerning a दिए टॉपिक promulgated  by a governmental entity or its representatives . ''
Public policy is  commonly समाविष्ट  `` in constitutions , legislative acts , and judicial decisions . ''
In  the संयुक्त राज्य , इस अवधारणा refers नहीं तभी to the  result of policies , but more broadly to the decision-making and analysis of governmental decisions .
As an academic discipline , public policy is studied by professors and  विद्यार्थी at पब्लिक नीति स्कूलों of प्रमुख विश्वविद्यालयों  throughout the country .
The U.S. professional association of public policy practitioners  , शोधकर्ताओं , विद्वानों , और विद्यार्थी is the संघ लिये पब्लिक  Policy Analysis and Management .
Digestion is the mechanical and chemical  विश्लेषण of खाना into छोटी components कि हैं अधिक easily अवशोषित  into a blood stream , for instance .
Digestion is a form of catabolism : a  विश्लेषण of विशाल खाना अणुओं  to smaller ones .
When food enters the mouth ,  पाचन of the खाना starts by the कार्रवाई of mastication ,  a form of mechanical digestion , and the wetting contact of saliva .
लार , a द्रव स्रावित by the salivary ग्रंथियों , contains salivary amylase , an एंजाइम  which starts the digestion of starch in the food .
बाद undergoing mastication और मंड पाचन  , the food will be in the form of a small , round slurry mass called a bolus .
It will then travel down the esophagus and into  the पेट by the कार्रवाई of peristalsis  .
Gastric juice in  the पेट  starts protein digestion .
Gastric  रस मुख्यतः contains हाइड्रोक्लोरिक  acid and pepsin .
As  ये दो रसायन may क्षति the पेट वॉल  , mucus is secreted by the stomach , providing a slimy layer that acts as a shield against the damaging effects of the chemicals .
At the same time protein digestion is occurring , mechanical mixing occurs by  peristalsis , जिससे हैं लहरें of muscular contractions  that move along the stomach wall .
This allows the mass of  खाना to further मिक्सर  with the digestive enzymes .
After some time ( typically an hour or two in humans , 4–6  घंटों in कुत्तो , somewhat shorter अवधि in  house cats ) , the resulting thick liquid is called chyme .
जब the pyloric sphincter वाल्व opens , chyme enters the duodenum  where it mixes with digestive enzymes from the pancreas , and then passes through the small intestine , in which digestion continues .
When the chyme is fully digested ,  it is अवशोषित into the  blood .
95 % of  अवशोषण of nutrients  occurs in the small intestine .
Water and minerals are reabsorbed  वापस into the रक्त in the कोलन ( विशाल आंत ) जहाँ  the pH is slightly acidic about 5.6 ~ 6.9 .
Some vitamins , such as biotin and  विटामिन k ( k2mk7 ) उत्पादित by जीवाणु in the कोलन  are also absorbed into the blood in the colon .
बर्बाद सामग्री is eliminated इससे  the rectum during defecation .
Henry  viii ( 28 जून 1491 – 28 जनवरी 1547 ) थी किंग  of England from 21 April 1509 until his death .
He was lord , and later king , of  आयरलैंड , as खूब as continuing the नाममात्र  claim by the English monarchs to the Kingdom of France .
Henry was the second monarch of the Tudor dynasty ,  succeeding उसके पिता  , Henry VII .
Besides his six marriages , Henry VIII is known for his role in the  विरह of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड इससे the रोमन  Catholic Church .
Henry 's struggles with Rome led to the separation of the  गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड इससे papal प्राधिकार , the विच्छेद of the monasteries  , and his own establishment as the Supreme Head of the Church of England .
Yet he remained a believer in core  कैथोलिक theological शिक्षाओं  , even after his excommunication from the Roman Catholic Church .
Henry oversaw the  विधिक संघ of इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स साथ  the Laws in Wales Acts 1535 and 1542 .
In 1513 , the new king allied with the Holy Roman Emperor , Maximillian I , and invaded France in  1513 साथ a विशाल , well-equipped फौज , लकिन  achieved little at a considerable financial cost .
Maximillian , for his part ,  प्रयुक्त the अंग्रेज़ी आक्रमण to उसके अपना ends , और  this prejudiced England 's ability to defeat the French .
This foray would prove the start of an obsession for Henry  , जो invaded again in  1544 .
This time , Henry 's forces captured the important city of Boulogne , but again the Holy Roman Emperor , Charles  v , समर्थित हेनरी तभी as long as he  needed to and England , strained by the enormous cost of the war , ransomed the city back for peace .
His  contemporaries माना हेनरी in उसके प्रधान to be an आकर्षक , शिक्षित और संपन्नता  king , and he has been described as `` one of the most charismatic rulers to sit on the English throne '' .
Besides ruling with absolute  शक्ति , he भी सगाई खुद  as an author and composer .
His desire to provide England with a male heir – which stemmed partly from personal vanity and partly because he believed a daughter would be unable to consolidate the  ट्यूडर राजवंश और the नाजुक सलाम कि existed following the युद्धों of the गुलाब – led  to the two things for which Henry is most remembered : his six marriages and the English Reformation .
Henry became  रुग्ण मोटे और उसके स्वास्थ्य  suffered , contributing to his death in 1547 .
He is frequently characterised  in उसके बाद जीवन as a lustful  , egotistical , harsh , and insecure king .
Bongos ( Spanish : bongó ) are an Afro-Cuban  percussion यंत्र  .
The drums are of different  आकार : the larger ढोल is पुकारा  in Spanish the hembra ( female ) and the smaller the macho ( male ) .
They are membranophones , or instruments that  बनाएँ ध्वनि by a स्पंदन of a stretched  membrane .
Different religious groups include different books in their Biblical canons , in varying orders , and sometimes  divide or combine किताबे , or चरितार्थ अतिरिक्त सामग्री into canonical  books .
Christian  bibles दायरा इससे the sixty-six किताबे of the प्रोटोस्टेंट canon to the eighty-one  books of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church canon .
The Hebrew Bible , or  tanakh , contains twenty-four किताबे विभाजित into तीन भाग ; the पाँच किताबे  of the Torah ( `` teaching '' or `` law '' ) , the Nevi'im ( `` prophets '' ) , and the Ketuvim ( `` writings '' ) .
The first part of Christian Bibles is the Old  वसीयत , जिससे contains , at न्यूनतम , the  twenty-four books of the Hebrew Bible divided into thirty-nine books and ordered differently from the Hebrew Bible .
The Catholic Church and Eastern Christian churches also hold  निश्चित deuterocanonical किताबे और passages to be भाग of the बूढ़ा वसीयत  canon .
The second part is the New Testament , containing twenty-seven books ; the four Canonical gospels , Acts of the  रसूलों , twenty-one epistles or अक्षर और the किताब of रहस्योद्घाटन  .
The Eastern Orthodox , Oriental Orthodox and Eastern Catholic churches may have  नाबालिग मतभेद in उनके सूचियाँ of स्वीकृत  books .
The list given  यहाँ लिये ये चर्च is the सबसे समावेशी :  if at least one Eastern church accepts the book it is included here .
The national flag of the United States of America , often simply referred to as the American flag , consists of thirteen equal horizontal  धारियाँ of रेड ( शीर्ष और नीचे ) प्रत्यावर्ती साथ श्वेत , साथ a ब्लू आयताकार in the कैण्टन ( referred to specifically as the `` संघ  '' ) bearing fifty small , white , five-pointed stars arranged in nine offset horizontal rows of six stars ( top and bottom ) alternating with rows of five stars .
The 50 stars on the flag represent the 50  राज्य of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका और the 13 धारियाँ represent the तेरह अंग्रेजों colonies कि घोषित स्वतंत्रता  from the Kingdom of Great Britain and became the first states in the Union .
Nicknames for the flag  शामिल the `` सितारों और धारियाँ  '' , `` Old Glory `` , and `` The Star-Spangled Banner . ''
dred स्कॉट v. sandford , , भी ज्ञात as the dred  Scott Decision , was a landmark decision by the U.S. Supreme Court .
It  बना दो प्रमुख  rulings .
The first ruling was that African-Americans were not citizens ,  और इसलिए था no खड़ा  to sue in federal court .
The second ruling was that the federal government  था no शक्ति to विनियमित गुलामी in कोई territory acquired subsequent to the सृष्टि  of the United States .
Given the first ruling , most scholars and many contemporary political figures ( including the leadership of the  then-new रिपब्लिकन पार्टी ) माना कि the दूसरी सत्ताधारी  was not binding precedent , but mere dictum .
The rationale of the Supreme Court regarding the jurisdictional ruling implied that people of African descent  ( दोनो स्लेव और फ़्री ) यहूद नहीं सुरक्षित by the संविधान  and were not U.S. citizens .
Since passage of the 14th Amendment to the U.S. Constitution , both  rulings हैं superseded और no longer मान्य यही  .
Nonetheless , the case retains historical significance as it is widely regarded as the  worst निर्णय कभी बना by the परम् अदालत  .
The opinion of  the अदालत , लिखा  by Chief Justice Roger B. Taney , stirred debate .
The decision was 7–2 , and every Justice besides Taney wrote a separate  concurrence or dissent  .
For the  पहला समय चूंकि marbury v. मैडिसन , the अदालत  held an Act of Congress to be unconstitutional .
Dred Scott , an African-American slave , had asked a United  राज्य सर्किट अदालत to पुरस्कार उसे उसके स्वतंत्रता क्युकी  he and his master had resided in a state ( Illinois ) and a territory ( Wisconsin Territory ) where slavery had been banned .
Chief Justice Roger Taney , writing for the court , held that Scott , as a person of African ancestry , was not  a नागरिक of the संयुक्त राज्य और इसलिए था no सही to मुकदमा in संघीय अदालत .
This holding was contrary to  the अभ्यास of numerous राज्य at the समय , विशेषकर फ़्री राज्य , जहाँ फ़्री अश्वेतों किया  in fact enjoy the rights of citizens , such as the right to vote and hold public office .
In what is sometimes considered mere obiter dictum , the Court went on to hold  कि कॉंग्रेस था no प्राधिकार to prohibit गुलामी in संघीय territories क्युकी स्लेव हैं निजी प्रॉपर्टी और the पांचवां amendment to the संविधान  protects property owners against deprivation of their property without due process of law .
In reaching this  निर्णय , taney था hoped to settle the growing विवाद  surrounding slavery in the United States , but it had the opposite effect .
The decision was fiercely debated across the country , as perhaps best  सरंचनाओं by the lincoln–douglas debates of 1858  .
Abraham Lincoln , the second-ever Republican  nominee लिये अध्यक्ष , थी समर्थ to जीत the  presidential election in 1860 ; the stopping of the further expansion of slavery was a key Republican party plank .
The decision played an important role in the timing of state secession and the Civil War , although it is extreme to say  the निर्णय `` caused '' the युद्ध  .
The decision is acknowledged for the influential role it played in altering the national political landscape : it is  credited साथ शुभारंभ अब्राहम lincoln’s नेशनल राजनैतिक  career and ultimately allowing for his election .
Although the Supreme Court has never explicitly overruled the Dred Scott case , the Court stated in the Slaughter-House Cases that at least one part of it had already been  overruled by the fourteenth amendment in 1868 , जिससे begins by stating , `` सब व्यक्तियों born or देशीयकृत in the संयुक्त राज्य , और विषय to the क्षेत्राधिकार thereof  , are citizens of the United States and of the State wherein they reside . ''
to जिससे  the Court noted:
The first observation we  have to मेक on इस clause is , कि it puts at  rest both the questions which we stated to have been the subject of differences of opinion .
It declares that persons may be citizens of the United States without regard to their citizenship of a particular State , and it overturns  the dred स्कॉट निर्णय by बनाना सब व्यक्तियों born भीतर the संयुक्त राज्य और विषय to इसके क्षेत्राधिकार  citizens of the United States .
There are dozens of  पड़ोस in कोलंबस  , Ohio .
Some are hard to define ,  as वे encompass विशाल क्षेत्रों  developed at different times—often with sub-neighborhoods within them .
Borders can also change based on popular  समझना of the क्षेत्रफल , as खूब as the  whims of the residents .
This article uses data from the Datasourcecolumbus Web site , Spotcrime.com ,  hellocolumbus.com , as खूब as the विभिन्न कोलंबस क्षेत्रफल आयोग to  define the various areas .

A biologist is a scientist who studies living organisms and their  संबंध to उनके पर्यावरण  .
Biologists involved in basic research attempt to  discover underlying mechanisms  that govern how organisms work .
Biologists involved in applied research attempt to  develop or improve चिकित्सा  , industrial or agricultural processes .
Martinus Willem  beijerinck , a वनस्पतिशास्त्री  and microbiologist
आधार कूद इससे a चट्टान  in a wingsuit .
BASE jumping , also  sometimes लिखा as b.a.s.e . कूद , is an कार्यकलाप  where participants jump from fixed objects and use a parachute to break their fall .
`` BASE '' is an acronym that stands for four categories of fixed objects from which one can jump :  इमारतें , एन्टेना , spans ( पुलों ) , और धरती  ( cliffs ) .
The British Shorthair is a domesticated cat whose features make it a popular  नस्ल in बिल्ली shows  .
It has been the most popular breed of cat registered by the UK 's  शासी परिषद of the बिल्ली फैंसी ( gccf ) चूंकि 2001 , जब it overtook  the Persian breed .
The USA Basketball Men 's Senior National Team , commonly known as the United States men 's national basketball team , represents the United States of  अमेरिका in अंतरराष्ट्रीय मेन 's बास्केट  .
the यूएसए is the सबसे कामयाब टोली in अंतरराष्ट्रीय  competition , winning medals in all seventeen Olympic tournaments it has entered , coming away with fourteen golds .
दो of इसके सुनहरा medal-winning दस्तों यहूद inducted to the naismith मेमोरियल बास्केट  Hall of Fame as teams in August 2010—the 1960 team , which featured six Hall of Famers ( 4 players , 2 coaches ) , and the 1992 `` Dream Team '' , featuring 14 Hall of Famers ( 11 players , 3 coaches ) .
The United States is currently ranked  पहला in the fiba  World Rankings .
Traditionally  रचित of amateur खिलाड़ी , a 1989 नियम बदलें  by FIBA allowed USA Basketball to field teams with professional players .
The first such team , known as the ``  सपना टोली '' , जीती the सुनहरा पदक at the 1992 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक in  Barcelona , Spain , playing in the final against Croatia .
With the introduction of professionals , the team was able to spark a  दूसरी चलाएं of दबदबा बाद capturing तभी a कांस्य  medal in 1988 .
A team of  पेशेवर खिलाड़ी competed at the  1994 FIBA World Championship , finishing first .
In 1996 , 2000 , 2008 , and 2012 the  यूएसए again captured सुनहरा  medals .
Facing increased competition , the USA failed to win a medal at the 2002  fiba संसार चैंपियनशिप , finishing  sixth .
The 2004 Summer Olympic team lost three games on its way to a bronze medal , a record that  represented अधिक नुकसान in a सिंगल साल than the देश 's ओलम्पिक टीमों था suffered in  all previous Olympiads combined .
Determined to put an end to these failures , USA  बास्केट initiated a long-term प्रोजेक्ट aimed at बनाना बेहतर  , more cohesive teams .
The USA won  इसके पहला सात खेल at the 2006 fiba संसार चैंपियनशिप in जापानी पहले खोने  against Greece in the semi-finals , ending the competition with the bronze medal .
The USA won gold  दो सालो बाद , हालांकि ,  at the 2008 Summer Olympics with a dominant performance .
This success was followed up at the 2010 FIBA World Championship , where despite fielding a roster featuring no players from  the 2008 ओलम्पिक टोली , the यूएसए किया नहीं खोना a सिंगल खेल en रूट to defeating मेजबान तुर्कों  for the gold medal .
The USA continued this streak of dominance by going undefeated and capturing  सुनहरा एकबार अधिक at the 2012  Summer Olympics .

The Super Bowl ring is an award in the National Football  लीग दिए to the विजेता of the लीग 's सालाना संसार चैंपियनशिप  game , the Super Bowl .
Since only one Vince Lombardi Trophy is awarded to the team ( ownership ) itself , the Super  कटोरी रिंग offers a collectible memento लिये the वास्तविक खिलाड़ी  and team members to keep for themselves to symbolize the victory .
