to  दृश्य लेबल्स  .
The  डायन 's उंगली  in the Carlsbad Caverns
A stalagmite ( or ; from the Greek σταλαγμίτης - stalagmitês , from σταλαγμίας - stalagmias , `` dropping , trickling '' ) is a  प्रकार of speleothem कि उदय इससे the मंजिल of a चूना गुफा due to the टपकता of mineralized  solutions and the deposition of calcium carbonate .
This stalagmite formation occurs only under  निश्चित ph शर्तें भीतर the भूमिगत  cavern .
The corresponding formation on the ceiling of a cave is  ज्ञात as a stalactite  .
If these formations  grow साथ , the  result is known as a column .
The Hall of Giants in the  carlsbad caverns
Stalagmites should normally not be touched , since the rock buildup is formed by minerals  precipitating आउट of the जल समाधान onto the बूढ़ा सतह ; स्किन oils can alter the सतह जहाँ  the mineral water will cling , thus affecting the growth of the formation .
Oils and dirt  इससे इंसान सम्पर्क can भी दाग the गठन  and change its color permanently .
Similar structures can also form in lava tubes ,  संबद्ध साथ कुछ प्रकार of lavacicles  , although the mechanism of formation is very different .
Stalactites and stalagmites can also form on concrete ceilings and floors  , हालांकि वे रूप much अधिक rapidly वहीँ than  in the natural cave environment .
The largest stalagmite in the world is high and is  स्तिथ  in the cave of Cueva Martin Infierno , Cuba .
In the Zagros Mountains of south  इरान , लगभग इससे the प्राचीन नगर of bishapur , in the shapur गुफा on the चौथी  of five terraces stands the 3rd century CE statue of Shapur I , second ruler of the Sassanid Empire .
The statue , carved  इससे एक stalagmite , is  nearly high .
How I Met Your Mother is an American sitcom that  premiered on सीबीएस on  September 19 , 2005 .
The show was created  by क्रेग थामस और  Carter Bays .
How I Met Your Mother is framed by the year 2030 , when Ted Mosby ( voiced  by bob saget ) gathers उसके बेटी ( lyndsy fonseca ) और बेटे ( दाउद henrie  ) to tell them the story of how he met their mother .
We flashback to where it begins in 2005 with Ted Mosby ( Josh Radnor ) as a single , 27-year-old architect living with his two best friends  इससे wesleyan विश्वविद्यालयों , मार्शल eriksen ( जेसन सेगल ) , a विधि  student , and Lily Aldrin ( Alyson Hannigan ) , a kindergarten teacher , who have been dating for almost nine years when Marshall proposes .
Their engagement causes Ted to think about finding his own  आत्मा mate , much to the disgust of उसके dost बार्नी stinson ( neil  Patrick Harris ) , a womanizer with an unnamed corporate job .
And thus , Ted begins his search for his perfect mate , and meets Robin  scherbatsky ( कोबी स्मल्डर्स ) , जिसको he भी  befriends .
the 100th एपीसोड of कैसा i  Met Your Mother aired on January 11 , 2010 .
On December 21 , 2012 , the  श्रेणी थी नवीनीकृत  for a ninth season .
On January 30 , 2013 , it was  घोषित कि ऋतु 9  will be its final season .
Gringo ( , , ) is a slang Spanish and Portuguese  शब्द प्रयुक्त in ibero-america , to denote विदेशियों  , often from the United States .
The term can be applied to someone  जो is दरअसल a foreigner , or it can denote  a strong association or assimilation into foreign ( particularly US ) society and culture .
In Spanish it does not  have a ऋणात्मक connotation  .
Roger  axtell , a सफर तहज़ीब विशेषज्ञ , टीप कि ``  [ t ] he word gringo is not necessarily a bad word .
It is  कठबोली लकिन is अपमानजनक  only in its use and context . ''
The word was used in Spain  long पहले it crossed the अटलांटिक to denote  foreign , non-native speakers of Spanish .
The great white shark , Carcharodon carcharias , also known as the great white , white pointer , white shark , or  श्वेत मौत , is a प्रजाति of विशाल lamniform शार्क जिससे can be मिला in the तटीय सतह  waters of all the major oceans .
The great white shark is mainly known for its size , with the largest  individuals ज्ञात to have approached or exceeded  in length , and in weight .
इस शार्क पहुँच इसके परिपक्वता  around 15 years of age and can have a life span of over 30 years .
The great white shark is arguably the world 's largest known extant macropredatory fish , and  is एक of the  primary predators of marine mammals .
It is also known to prey upon a variety of other marine  पशु , सहित मछली और seabirds  .
It is the only known surviving species of its genus  carcharodon , और is क्रमित पहला  in having the most attacks on humans .
The IUCN list the great white shark as a vulnerable species ,  जबकि it is शामिल in परिशिष्ट ii  of CITES .
The bestselling novel  जबड़े by पीटर benchley और the subsequent ब्लॉकबस्टर फिल्मी by  Steven Spielberg depicted the great white shark as a `` ferocious man eater `` .
In reality , humans are not the  पसन्दीदा शिकार of the ग्रेट  white shark .
The United States Armed Forces are the military forces of the  संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका  .
They consist of the Army , Navy ,  समुद्री corps , एयर फ़ोर्स , और coast गार्ड  .
The U.S. has a  दमदार परंपरा of  civilian control of the military .
The President is the  सैन्य 's overall सिर , और helps रूप सैन्य नीति साथ the u.S.  Department of Defense ( DoD ) , a federal executive department , acting as the principal organ by which military policy is carried out .
The DoD is headed by the Secretary of Defense , who is a  civilian और कैबिनेट सदस्य .
The Defense Secretary is second in the military 's chain of command , just below the President , and  serves as the प्रिंसिपल सहायक to the अध्यक्ष in सब dod-related  matters .
To  निर्देशांक सैन्य कार्रवाई साथ कूटनीति , the  President has an advisory National Security Council headed by a National Security Advisor .
Both the President and Secretary of  रक्षा हैं advised by a seven-member संयुक्त chiefs of स्टाफ , जिससे शामिल  the head of each of the Defense Department 's service branches as well as the chief of the National Guard Bureau .
Leadership is provided by the Chairman of the Joint  chiefs of स्टाफ और the वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त  Chiefs of Staff .
The Commandant of  the coast गार्ड is नहीं a सदस्य  of the Joint Chiefs of Staff .
All of the branches work together  दौरान परिचालन और संयुक्त मिशन , अंतर्गत the एकीकृत combatant कमांड , अंतर्गत the  authority of the Secretary of Defense with the exception of the Coast Guard .
The Coast Guard falls under the administration of the Department of  मातृभूमि सुरक्षा और receives इसके operational आदेश इससे  the Secretary of Homeland Security .
The Coast Guard may be transferred to the Department of the Navy by the  अध्यक्ष or कॉंग्रेस दौरान a समय of युद्ध  .
All  पाँच हथियारबंद सेवाएं हैं among the सात uniformed  services of the United States ; the others are the U.S. Public Health Service Commissioned Corps and the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Commissioned Corps .
From the time of its inception , the military played a  निर्णायक भूमिका in the इतिहास of the  United States .
A sense of  नेशनल एकता और पहचान थी forged as a परिणाम of विजय  in the First Barbary War and the Second Barbary War .
Even so , the Founders were suspicious of a permanent military  फ़ोर्स और नहीं जबतक the outbreak of संसार युद्ध ii किया a विशाल  standing army become officially established .
The National Security Act of 1947 , adopted following World War II and during the Cold War 's onset , created the modern U.S. military framework ; the Act merged previously  cabinet-level विभाग of युद्ध और the विभाग of the  Navy into the National Military Establishment ( renamed the Department of Defense in 1949 ) , headed by the Secretary of Defense ; and created the Department of the Air Force and National Security Council .
The U.S. military  is एक of the largest militaries in शर्तें  of number of personnel .
it draws इसके जनशक्ति इससे a विशाल पूल of सशुल्क स्वयंसेवक  ; although conscription has been used in the past in various times of both war and peace , it has not been used since 1972 .
As of 2013 , the U.S. spends about $ 554.2 billion annually to fund its military  शक्तियां , और appropriates लगभग  $ 88.5 billion to fund Overseas Contingency Operations .
Put together , the U.S. constitutes roughly 43 percent of  the संसार 's सैन्य expenditures  .
the u.S. हथियारबंद शक्तियां as a पूरे possess विशाल quantities of उन्नत और शक्तिशाली उपकरण , साथ साथ फैली  placement of forces around the world , giving them significant capabilities in both defense and power projection .
Freedom of speech is the political right to communicate one 's opinions and ideas using one 's body  और प्रॉपर्टी to anyone जो is  willing to receive them .
The term freedom of expression is sometimes used synonymously , but includes any act of seeking , receiving and imparting  सूचना or विचार , regardless of the मीडियम प्रयुक्त  .
In practice , the right to  स्वतंत्रता of वाक is नहीं निरपेक्ष in कोई देश और the सही is commonly विषय  to limitations , as with libel , slander , obscenity , sedition ( including , for example inciting ethnic hatred ) , copyright violation , revelation of information that is classified or otherwise .
The right to freedom of expression is recognized as a human right under Article 19 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights and recognized in  अंतरराष्ट्रीय इंसान अधिकारों विधि in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय वचन on सिविल और  Political Rights ( ICCPR ) .
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without interference '' and  `` everyone shall have the सही to स्वतंत्रता of अभिव्यक्ति ; इस सही shall शामिल स्वतंत्रता to तलाश ,  receive and impart information and ideas of all kinds , regardless of frontiers , either orally , in writing or in print , in the form of art , or through any other media of his choice '' .
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` special duties and  जिम्मेदारियों `` और may `` इसलिए be विषय to निश्चित प्रतिबंध  '' when necessary `` [ f ] or respect of the rights or reputation of others '' or `` [ f ] or the protection of national security or of public order ( order public ) , or of public health or morals '' .
Freedom of speech may be  legally curtailed in कुछ धार्मिक  legal systems and in secular jurisdictions where it is found to cause religious offense , such as the British Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006 .
The Big  बंग सिद्धान्त  logo .
The Big Bang Theory is an American comedy television series created and  कार्यपालिका उत्पादित by चक lorre  and Bill Prady .
Like the name of the series  itself , साथ the एक्सेप्शन of the पहला episode— '' पायलट '' —episode शीर्षक of the बिग बंग सिद्धान्त सदा प्रारंभ साथ `` the ''  and resemble the name of a scientific principle , theory or experiment , whimsically referencing a plot point or quirk .
, 133 episodes  have aired  .
The Big  बंग सिद्धान्त रै महरूम नवीनीकृत  for a seventh season .
Dwight David `` Ike '' Eisenhower ( pronounced , ; October 14 , 1890 – March 28 , 1969 ) was  the 34th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य इससे 1953  until 1961 .
He had previously been a five-star general in the United States Army during World War II and served as Supreme Commander of the Allied Forces in Europe ; he had responsibility for planning and supervising  the आक्रमण of उत्तर अफ़्रीकी in आपरेशन मशाल in 1942–43 और the कामयाब आक्रमण of फ़्रांस और  Germany in 1944–45 from the Western Front .
In 1951 , he became the first  परम् कमांडर  of NATO .
Eisenhower was  of पेन्सिलवेनिया डच ancestry और थी reared  in a large family in Kansas by parents with a robust work ethic and religious background .
As one of six sons , he was  conditioned by a प्रतिस्पर्धी माहौल जिससे instilled self-reliance  .
He attended  और ग्रैजुएट इससे  West Point and later married and had two sons .
After World War II , Eisenhower served as Army Chief of Staff under President Harry  S. ट्रूमैन , तब assumed  the post of President at Columbia University .
Eisenhower entered the 1952 presidential race as a Republican to counter the non-interventionism of Senator Robert A. Taft and to crusade  विरूद्ध `` साम्यवादी , कोरियाई और भ्रष्टाचार  '' .
He won by a  भूस्खलन , defeating डेमोक्रेट  Adlai Stevenson and ending two decades of the New Deal Coalition .
In the first year of his  प्रेसिडेंसी , आइज़नहावर अपदस्थ the नेता of इरान in the 1953 ईरानी तख्तापलट d'état और प्रयुक्त  nuclear threats to conclude the Korean War with China .
His New Look policy of nuclear deterrence gave priority to  inexpensive नाभिकीय हथियार जबकि reducing the funding लिये conventional सैन्य शक्तियां ;  the goal was to keep pressure on the Soviet Union and reduce federal deficits .
In 1954 , Eisenhower first  articulated the domino सिद्धान्त in उसके वर्णन of the  threat presented by the spread of communism .
The Congress agreed to his request in 1955 for the Formosa Resolution , which enabled him to prevent Chinese communist aggression against Chinese  राष्ट्रवादियों और स्थापित the u.S. नीति of defending  Taiwan .
When  the soviets शुभारम्भ  Sputnik in 1957 , he had to play catch-up in the space race .
Eisenhower forced Israel , the UK , and France to end  उनके आक्रमण of मिश्र दौरान the स्वेज संकट  of 1956 .
In 1958 , he sent 15,000 US troops to Lebanon to prevent the pro-Western government from falling  to a nasser -inspired क्रान्ति  .
Near the end of his term , his efforts to set up a summit  बैठक साथ the soviets collapsed क्युकी of the u-2 घटना  .
On the domestic front , he  covertly opposed जोसेफ मैकार्थी और contributed  to the end of McCarthyism by openly invoking the modern expanded version of executive privilege .
he वरना बाएँ सबसे राजनैतिक कार्यकलाप  to his Vice President , Richard Nixon .
He was a moderate conservative who continued New Deal agencies and expanded  सोशल सुरक्षा .
Among his enduring innovations , he launched the Interstate Highway System ; the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency ( DARPA ) , which led to the internet , among many invaluable outputs ; the National Aeronautics  और स्पेस प्रशासन ( नासा ) , ड्राइविंग शांतिपूर्ण डिस्कवरी in स्पेस  ; the establishment of strong science education via the National Defense Education Act ; and encouraging peaceful use of nuclear power via amendments to the Atomic Energy Act .
In social policy , he sent federal  सैनिकों to छोटी चट्टान , अरकंसास , लिये the पहला  time since Reconstruction to enforce federal court orders to desegregate public schools .
He also signed civil rights legislation in 1957 and  1960 to protect the सही  to vote .
He implemented  desegregation of the हथियारबंद शक्तियां in दो सालो और  made five appointments to the Supreme Court .
He was  the पहला term-limited अध्यक्ष  in accordance with the 22nd Amendment .
Eisenhower 's two terms were  शांतिपूर्ण ones लिये the सबसे भाग और देखी  considerable economic prosperity except for a sharp recession in 1958–59 .
Eisenhower  is प्रायः क्रमित अत्यधिक  among the U.S. Presidents .
Air Force One is the official air traffic control call sign of a  संयुक्त राज्य एयर फ़ोर्स वायुयान carrying  the President of the United States .
In common  parlance the पद refers to those एयर फ़ोर्स वायुयान specifically  designed , built , and used for the purpose of transporting the president .
The Presidential aircraft  is a prominent प्रतीक  of the American presidency and its power .
The idea of designating specific military aircraft to  हस्तांतरण the अध्यक्ष arose  in 1943 , when officials of the United States Army Air Forces – the predecessor to the U.S. Air Force – became concerned with relying on commercial airlines to transport the President .
A C-87 Liberator  एक्स्प्रेस थी reconfigured लिये उपयोग as a अध्यक्षीय हस्तांतरण  ; however , it was rejected by the Secret Service amid concerns over the aircraft 's safety record .
A C-54 Skymaster was then converted for presidential use ; this  वायुयान , उतावले the पवित्र गाय , transported अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट  to the Yalta Conference in February 1945 , and was subsequently used for another two years by President Harry S. Truman .
The `` Air Force One '' call sign was created  बाद a 1953 घटना दौरान जिससे a उड़ान carrying अध्यक्ष ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर डाला the वही airspace  as a commercial airline flight using the same call sign .
Several aircraft have been used as Air Force One since the creation of the presidential fleet , including two Boeing 707s introduced in the 1960s and 1970s , respectively ; since 1990 , the presidential fleet has  consisted of दो बोइंग vc-25as – specifically विन्यस्त , अत्यधिक customized बोइंग 747-200b श्रेणी वायुयान  .
The  एयर फ़ोर्स is looking into replacing  the two VC-25 aircraft with three replacement aircraft beginning in 2017 .
A wedding anniversary is the  वर्षगांठ of the तिथि  a wedding took place .
Traditional names exist  लिये सबसे of उन्हें : लिये उदाहरण  , 50 years of marriage is called a `` golden wedding anniversary '' or simply a `` golden anniversary '' .
A scanner  साथ duplexing स्वचालित  Document Feeder .
In multifunction or all-in-one printers , fax machines , photocopiers and scanners , an automatic document  फीडर or adf is a विशेषता जिससे takes अनेक पृष्ठों और फ़ीड्स the पेपर एक पेज at a समय into a स्कैनर or कॉपियर  , allowing the user to scan , and thereby copy , print , or fax , multiple-page documents without having to manually replace each page .
Most copiers allow scanning on the flatbed or platen ( the `` glass  '' ) or through a दस्तावेज़ फीडर  .
The vast majority of fax machines have  an adf , allowing the unattended sending  of multi-page faxes .
Due to the ubiquity of ADF in fax machines , some fax machine owners use the fax machine as a  स्कैनर , faxing multi-page दस्तावेज़ to  themselves .
Document feeders are described  by गति , in पृष्ठों प्रति मिनट or ppm , और क्षमता ,  usually in a range from 10 sheets to 200 .
There are two kinds of document feeders capable of two-sided ( duplex ) scanning : a reversing automatic document feeder or RADF scans one side of a page , then flips it  और scans the अन्य  side .
A duplexing automatic document feeder or DADF  scans दोनो पहलू  in one pass .
The  लाभ of the  DADF is faster speed for two-sided originals .
RADFs and DADFs are rated in images per minute ( IPM ) , the number  of पहलू वे can स्कैन प्रत्येक  minute .
Fair Park is a recreational and educational complex  स्तिथ in डलास , टेक्सास ( यूएसए  ) .
The complex is registered  as a डलास लैंडमार्क , नेशनल ऐतिहासिक लैंडमार्क और is घर  to nine museums , six performance facilities , a lagoon , and the largest Ferris wheel in North America .
Many of the buildings on the complex were  constructed लिये the टेक्सास centennial  Exposition in 1936 which drew over six million visitors .
Most of the buildings built for the exposition still survive and  it is पहचाना as a significant उदाहरण of आर्ट  Deco architecture .
Fair Park has been designated a Great Place in America by the  अमरीकी नियोजन संघ  .
The American Planning Association ( APA ) “is  an स्वतंत्र , not-for-profit शैक्षणिक  organization that provides leadership in the development of vital communities.”
The Great Places in American program helps to celebrate  क्षेत्रों साथ “exemplary अक्षर , विशेषता  , and planning.”
होने designated as a ग्रेट प्लेस  in America , Fair Park was one of only ten cities chosen in 2011 .
San Jose ( ; Spanish : St. Joseph ) is the third-largest city in California , the tenth-largest in the U.S. , and the  काउंटी सीट of सांता क्लारा काउंटी जिससे is स्तिथ at the दक्षिणी समाप्त of सैन फ्रांसिस्को  Bay .
San Jose is the largest city within Silicon Valley ,  जिससे is a प्रमुख घटक of the वृहद सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल , a प्रदेश of  8.4 million people and the fifth largest metropolitan area ( CSA ) in the United States .
It is the  largest नगर in उत्तरी  California .
San Jose was founded on November 29 , 1777 , as  el pueblo de सैन जोस de guadalupe , the पहला civilian कस्बा  in the Spanish colony of Nueva California , which later became Alta California .
The city served as a farming community to support Spanish  सैन्य संस्थापना at सैन फ्रांसिस्को  and Monterey .
When California gained statehood in 1850 , San Jose served as  इसके पहला पूंजी  .
After more than 150 years as a small farming city , San Jose and  the surrounding सांता क्लारा घाटी became the पिछला ( और largest ) संलग्न  area of undeveloped land surrounding the San Francisco Bay .
San Jose  अनुभवी increased  demand for housing from soldiers and veterans returning from World War II .
San Jose then continued its aggressive  विस्तार दौरान the 1950s और  1960s by annexing more land area .
The rapid growth of  the high-technology और इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स उद्योग  further accelerated the transition from an agricultural center , to an urbanized metropolitan area .
by the 1990s , सैन जोस 's स्थान भीतर the booming लोकल प्रौद्योगिकी  industry earned the city its nickname , Capital of Silicon Valley .
San Jose now maintains global city status  और is the largest नगर in the सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल in शर्तें  of population , land area , and industrial development .
The U.S. Census Bureau  reported the जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर  to be 945,942 as of the 2010 Census .
As of April 2013 , the  अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी of सैन  Jose was 984,000 .
San Jose , along with the Santa Clara Valley ,  अनुभवी परिचय हाफ a सदी of spectacular suburban sprawl , साथ विशेषताएँ  of intense urbanization similar to the Los Angeles area of Southern California .
The city has taken definite steps to  avoid बनने `` l.A.  North '' .
However , the  sprawl in सैन जोस is बदतर than in  Los Angeles by measures such as population density and public transit safety , investment , and ridership .
Europe depicted by Antwerp cartographer  अब्राहम  Ortelius in 1595
The history of Europe covers the people inhabiting the European continent since it was first populated in prehistoric times to present ,  साथ the पहला होमो sapiens arriving between 45,000 और 25,000  BC .
The earliest settlers to  प्रागैतिहासिक यूरोपीय आए दौरान the  paleolithic era .
The arrival of  कृषि around 7000 bc ushered in  the neolithic age .
पाषाणकालीन यूरोपीय lasted लिये 4000 सालो , अतिव्यापी  with metal-using cultures that gradually spread throughout the continent .
Technological advances during the prehistoric age tended to arrive from the Middle East ,  spreading धीरे to the उत्तरपश्चिम  .
Some of the best-known civilizations of prehistoric Europe were Minoan and Mycenaean , which flourished  दौरान the कांस्य आयु जबतक वे collapsed  in a short period of time around 1200 BC .
The period known as classical antiquity began with the  वृद्धि of the city-states of प्राचीन  Greece .
Greek influence reached its zenith  अंतर्गत the expansive साम्राज्य  of Alexander the Great , spreading throughout Asia .
Northern and  पश्चिमी यूरोपीय यहूद वर्चस्व by  the La Tène culture , a precursor to the Celts .
Rome , a small  city-state traditionally संस्थापित in 753 bc ,  would grow to become the Roman Republic in 509 BC and would succeed Greek culture as the dominant Mediterranean civilization .
The events of the rule of Julius Caesar led to  reorganization of the गणतंत्र into  the Roman Empire .
The empire was later divided  by the सम्राट diocletian into  the Western and Eastern empires .
During the later years of the Roman Empire , the Germanic peoples of northern Europe grew in  शक्ति और दोहराया हमले led to the पतन of the पश्चिमी रोमन साम्राज्य in ad 476 , a तिथि जिससे traditionally marks the समाप्त of the शास्त्रीय काल और  the start of the Middle Ages .
During the Middle  आयु , the पूर्वी रोमन साम्राज्य बच  , though modern historians refer to this state as the Byzantine Empire .
in पश्चिमी यूरोपीय , germanic peoples स्थानांतरित into स्थितियाँ  of power in the remnants of the former Western Roman Empire and established kingdoms and empires of their own .
Of all  of the germanic peoples , the franks होता वृद्धि to a स्थिति of  Hegemony over western Europe , the Frankish Empire reaching its peak under Charlemagne around AD 800 .
Francia was divided into several parts ; West Francia would evolve into the Kingdom of France , while East Francia would evolve into the Holy Roman Empire ,  a precursor to आधुनिक जर्मनी  .
The British Isles  यहूद the साईट of अनेक large-scale  migrations .
Native Celtic peoples had been  अधिकारहीन दौरान the काल of रोमन ब्रिटेन , और जब the romans abandoned  the British Isles during the 400s , waves of Germanic Anglo-Saxons migrated to southern Britain and established a series of petty kingdoms in what would eventually develop into the Kingdom of England by AD 927 .
During this period , the Kingdom of Poland and Kingdom of  हंगेरियाई ( 1000–1945 ) यहूद व्यवस्थित  as well .
The Viking Age , a period of migrations  of scandinavian peoples , वर्चस्व  the period from the late 700s to the middle 1000s .
Chief among the Viking states was the Empire of Cnut the Great , a Danish leader who  होता become किंग of इंग्लैण्ड , डेनमार्क , और  Norway .
The Normans , a  viking लोगों जो settled in उत्तरी फ़्रांस और संस्थापित the duchy of normandy  , would have a significant impact on many parts of Europe , from the Norman conquest of England to Southern Italy and Sicily .
Another Scandinavian people , the  rus ' लोगों , होता go on to मिला kievan rus ' , an जल्दी राज्य जिससे  was a precursor for the modern country of Russia .
As the Viking Age drew to a close , the period known as the Crusades , a series of religiously-motivated military expeditions  originally intended to लाओ the levant वापस into  Christian rule , began .
अनेक जेहादी राज्य  were founded in the eastern Mediterranean .
These were all  short-lived  .
The Crusaders would have a profound  प्रभाव on अनेक भाग of यूरोपीय  .
Their Sack of  कुस्तुंतुनिया in 1204 brought an abrupt समाप्त to the  Byzantine Empire .
Extinct dog  breeds is a संकलन  of dog breeds that have become extinct .
Wii Speak is a  माइक्रोफोन accessory लिये निन्टेंडो  's Wii video game console .
कनेक्ट to the कंसोल via usb , the यंत्र  can be placed near the video display , allowing voice chat to be conducted with the entire room .
The device  सुविधाएँ an led to indicate  when the microphone is active .
Wii Speak was  घोषित at निन्टेंडो 's  2008 E3 media briefing .
It was released separately and bundled with Animal Crossing :  नगर लोक on नवम्बर 16 , 2008 , in उत्तर अमेरिका  , and was released on December 5 , 2008 , in Europe .
The Wii Speak accessory is succeeded by the embedded microphone on the  वी u 's gamepad नियंत्रक  .
निसान बुद्धिमान  Key®
A smart key is an electronic access and authorization system which is  उपलब्धियाँ as an विकल्प or मानक in अनेक गाड़ियाँ  .
It was  पहला विकसित by siemens in the mid-1990s और introduced  by Mercedes-Benz under the name `` Keyless Go '' in 1998 on the W220 S-Class following its design patent filed by Daimler-Benz on May 17 , 1997 .
Univisión ( ) is a Spanish-language  टेलीविज़न संजाल in the  United States .
The network is primarily dedicated for Latin American families who  reside in the संयुक्त राज्य .
It has the  largest दर्शक of spanish-language टेलीविज़न  viewers in the world according to Nielsen ratings .
Randy Falco , ( CEO as of June 29 , 2011 ) COO , has been in  चार्ज of the कम्पनी चूंकि the प्रस्थान of univision संचार अध्यक्ष और सीईओ जो uva in अप्रैल  2010 .
In recent years the network has reached parity with the U.S. 's five major  english-language टेलीविज़न संजाल , और is प्रायः a दमदार पांचवां , outranking the cw , साथ कुछ fourth-place साप्ताहिक placings , और as of  2012 , even first place rankings for individual programs over all five English networks due to the network 's consistent schedule of new telenovelas all 52 weeks of the year .
Univisión is headquartered in New York , and has its major studios , production facilities , and operations in  doral , फ्लोरिडा , a उपनगरीय of मियामी  .
In 2009 , another television studio was announced ,  univision studios , to be निर्मित in  Doral .
Univision is available on cable and satellite in most of the country , with local  स्टेशन in over 50 बाज़ार साथ विशाल हिस्पैनिक और लातीनी populations और a नेशनल केबल संजाल फीड वितरित  in markets without either the availability or the demand for a locally-based station .
Most of these stations air full local news and other local programming  in जोड to संजाल shows , और in प्रमुख बाज़ार ऐसे as लॉस एंजिल्स , नई यॉर्क , और मियामी the लोकल newscasts carried by the संजाल  's owned-and-operated station ( O & O ) stations are equally competitive with their English-language counterparts ratings-wise .
Univisión was acquired on March 29 , 2007 by a  consortium led by haim saban 's  Saban Capital Group ( who had previously owned the entity Saban Entertainment ) , TPG Capital , L.P. , Providence Equity Partners , Madison Dearborn Partners , and Thomas H. Lee Partners for $ 13.7 billion or $ 36.25 per share plus $ 1.4 billion in acquired debt .
The buyout  बाएँ the कम्पनी साथ a कर्ज़ स्तर of  twelve times its annual cash flow , which was twice the norm in buyouts done over the previous two years .
Artist 's  धारणा of a आदिग्रह  disk
The  गठन और of the सौर प्रणाली is अनुमानित to  have begun 4.6 billion years ago with the gravitational collapse of a small part of a giant molecular cloud .
Most of the collapsing mass collected in the centre , forming the Sun , while the  बाकी flattened into a आदिग्रह डिस्क आउट of जिससे the ग्रह , moons , क्षुद्रग्रह , और  other small Solar System bodies formed .
This widely accepted model , known as the nebular hypothesis , was first developed in the 18th century by Emanuel  swedenborg , immanuel kant , और  Pierre-Simon Laplace .
Its subsequent  विकास रै interwoven a किस्में  of scientific disciplines including astronomy , physics , geology , and planetary science .
Since the dawn of the  स्पेस आयु in the 1950s और the डिस्कवरी of extrasolar  planets in the 1990s , the model has been both challenged and refined to account for new observations .
The Solar System has evolved  considerably चूंकि इसके  initial formation .
Many moons have formed from circling discs of gas and dust around their parent planets , while  अन्य moons हैं विचार to have formed independently और बाद महरूम captured  by their planets .
Still  अन्य , as the धरती 's चंद्रमा  , may be the result of giant collisions .
Collisions between bodies have  occurred continually up to the उपस्थित दिन और have  been central to the evolution of the Solar System .
The positions of the planets often shifted , and  ग्रह have switched स्थान  .
This planetary migration is  अभी विचार to have महरूम जिम्मेदार लिये much of the सौर प्रणाली 's  early evolution .
In roughly 5 billion  सालो , the सूर्य होगा कूल और विस्तार outward अनेक टाइम्स इसके वर्तमान व्यास ( बनने a रेड  giant ) , before casting off its outer layers as a planetary nebula and leaving behind a stellar remnant known as a white dwarf .
In the far distant future , the gravity of passing stars will  धीरे reduce the सूर्य 's retinue of ग्रह  .
Some  ग्रह होगा be नष्ट  , others ejected into interstellar space .
Ultimately , over the course of tens of billions of  सालो , it is संभावित  that the Sun will be left with none of the original bodies in orbit around it .
The Trial ( Kafka 's original German title : , later as , and  ) is a अनोखा लिखा by फ्रांज काफ्का in 1914 और 1915 लकिन नहीं  published until 1925 .
एक of काफ्का 's best-known works ,  it tells the story of a man arrested and prosecuted by a remote , inaccessible authority , with the nature of his crime revealed to neither him nor the reader .
Like Kafka 's other novels  , the विचारण थी never समाप्त , हालांकि  it does include a chapter which brings the story to an end .
Because of this there are certain inconsistencies which exist within the  अनोखा , ऐसे as असमानताओं in समय in जोड  to other discontinuities in narration .
After Kafka 's death in 1924 his friend and  साहित्यिक executor अधिकतम brod संपादित the टेक्स्ट लिये  publication by Verlag Die Schmiede .
The original manuscript is held at the Museum  of आधुनिक साहित्य , marbach am neckar , जर्मनी  .
In 1999 , the book was listed in Le Mondes 100 Books of  the सदी और as no . 2 of the बेहतरीन जर्मनी novels of the  Twentieth Century .
Lisa Anne Loeb ( born March  11 , 1968 ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter  and actress .
She  शुभारम्भ उसके करियर in 1994 साथ the सोंग  , `` Stay ( I Missed You ) `` , which was included in the film Reality Bites .
She was the first  कलाकार to have a क्रमांक एक सिंगल in the संयुक्त राज्य  while not signed to a recording contract .
Her five studio CDs include her major label debut , the  gold-selling tails और इसके follow-up , the grammy-nominated , gold-selling पटाखा  .
Loeb has also  worked in  film , television , voice-over work and children’s recordings .
Loeb has appeared in  दो टेलीविज़न श्रेणी , dweezil & लिसा , a साप्ताहिक culinary  adventure for the Food Network and Number 1 Single , a reality show on the E !
Network in 2006 focused on her  क्वेस्ट लिये प्रेम , कामयाबी , करियर , और  family .
Her  children 's म्यूज़िक शामिल the  albums Catch the Moon ( 2003 ) , and Camp Lisa ( 2008 ) .
Her first joint children 's book and album Lisa Loeb 's Silly Sing-Along : The  निराशाजनक पैनकेक और अन्य zany गीतों थी प्रकाशित in 2011  .
In 2010 she founded the Lisa Loeb Eyewear  संग्रहण , जिससे is आधारित on  her own designs .
The Coat of arms of the  राज्य of नई जर्सी  includes:
A shield with three plows  emblazoned , प्रतिनिधि of नई जर्सी 's agricultural  tradition .
A  forward-facing  knight 's helmet .
A horse  's सिर as the crest  of the helmet .
The  मादा आंकड़े स्वतंत्रता  and Ceres , representative of the state 's motto ( see next item ) .
Liberty is holding a staff supporting a  `` स्वतंत्रता कैप `` ; ceres is पकड़कर  an overflowing cornucopia .
The streamer at the foot of the emblem contains the State Motto of New Jersey , ``  स्वतंत्रता और समृद्धि '' , और the साल of statehood , 1776  .
It was originally designed by  पियरे यूजीन du simitiere in 1777 और थी  modified slightly in 1928 .
The seal is the  सेंट्रल मोटिफ in the ध्वज of नई जर्सी और the  Great Seal of the State of New Jersey .
The  कोट of बाहें  contains a horse 's head .
A helmet showing that New Jersey governs itself accordingly and three plows  on a शील्ड referring to the राज्य 's कृषि  tradition , giving it the nickname `` Garden State '' .
The two Goddesses represent the State  motto , `` स्वतंत्रता और समृद्धि  '' .
Liberty is on  the बाएँ  .
She is holding a staff with a liberty  कैप on it , और the शब्द स्वतंत्रता  underneath her .
The goddess on the  सही is ceres , देवी of  agriculture .
She is holding a  cornucopia साथ समृद्धि लिखा  below her .
According  to the मिनट्स of the नई जर्सी सामान्य सभा लिये कूच 11 , 1896 , the तिथि in जिससे  the Assembly officially approved the flag as the state emblem , the buff color is due indirectly to George Washington , who had ordered on October 2 , 1779 , that the uniform coats of the New Jersey Continental Line be dark ( Jersey ) blue , with buff facings .
buff-colored facings था जबतक तब महरूम सुरक्षित तभी लिये  his own uniform and those of other Continental generals and their aides .
Then , on February 28 , 1780 , the Continental War Officers  in फिलाडेल्फिया निर्देशित कि the वर्दी कोट facings of सब regiments यहूद  to be the same as the background color of the regiments ' state flag .

`` We Can Work It Out '' is a song by the  बीटल्स , लिखा by पॉल mccartney  and John Lennon .
It was released as a ``  दोगुना a-sided `` सिंगल साथ `` दिन tripper  `` , the first time both sides of a single were so designated in an initial release .
Both songs were recorded  दौरान the रबर आत्मा सत्र  .
The song is an example of Lennon–McCartney collaboration at a depth that happened only rarely after  वे लिखा the hit singles of  1963 .
This  सोंग , `` a दिन in the जीवन `` , ``  Baby , You 're a Rich Man `` and `` I 've Got a Feeling `` , are among the notable exceptions .
As a medical diagnosis , pedophilia or paedophilia is a  मनोरोग विकार in व्यक्तियों 16 सालो of आयु or पुरानी typically characterized by a प्राथमिक or विशेष यौन ब्याज  toward prepubescent children ( generally age 11 years or younger , though specific diagnosis criteria for the disorder extends the cut-off point for prepubescence to age 13 ) .
An adolescent who is 16 years of age or  पुरानी जरूर be at तनिक पाँच सालो पुरानी than  the prepubescent child before the attraction can be diagnosed as pedophilia .
The term  रै a दायरा of परिभाषाएं , as मिला  in psychiatry , psychology , the vernacular , and law enforcement .
The International Classification of Diseases ( ICD ) defines pedophilia as a `` disorder of adult personality and behaviour  '' in जिससे वहीँ is a यौन वरीयता लिये children of prepubertal or जल्दी pubertal  age .
According to the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders ( DSM  ) , it is a paraphilia in जिससे वयस्कों or adolescents 16 सालो of आयु or पुरानी have तीव्र और तूल यौन प्रेरणाएं towards  and fantasies about prepubescent children that they have either acted on or which cause them distress or interpersonal difficulty .
In popular  उपयोग , pedophilia अर्थात् कोई यौन ब्याज in  children or the act of child sexual abuse , often termed `` pedophilic behavior '' .
For example , The American Heritage Stedman 's Medical Dictionary states , `` Pedophilia is the act  or काल्पनिक on the भाग of an वयस्क of engaging in यौन कार्यकलाप साथ a चाइल्ड  or children . ''
This common use application also extends to  the यौन ब्याज in और यौन सम्पर्क साथ रोमिल or  post-pubescent minors .
Researchers  सुझाएँ कि ये imprecise उपयोग be avoided क्युकी हालांकि लोगों जो कमिट चाइल्ड यौन गाली commonly प्रदर्शनी  the disorder , some offenders do not meet the clinical diagnosis standards for pedophilia and these standards pertain to prepubescents .
Additionally , not  सब pedophiles दरअसल कमिट ऐसे  abuse .
Pedophilia  थी पहला formally पहचाना  and named in the late 19th century .
A significant amount of research in the area has taken  प्लेस चूंकि the 1980s  .
Although mostly documented in men , there are also women who  प्रदर्शनी the विकार , और शोधकर्ताओं assume उपलब्धियाँ  estimates underrepresent the true number of female pedophiles .
No cure for pedophilia has been developed , but there are therapies that can  reduce the incidence of a व्यक्ति committing  child sexual abuse .
In the United States , following Kansas v. Hendricks , sex offenders who are diagnosed with  निश्चित दिमागी विकार , विशेषकर pedophilia , can be विषय to indefinite सिविल प्रतिबद्धता , अंतर्गत विभिन्न राज्य कानून  ( generically called SVP laws ) and the federal Adam Walsh Child Protection and Safety Act of 2006 .
At present , the exact causes of pedophilia  have नहीं महरूम conclusively स्थापित  .
Research suggests that pedophilia  may be correlated साथ अनेक अलग neurological  abnormalities , and often co-exists with other personality disorders and psychological pathologies .
In the contexts of forensic psychology and law enforcement , a variety of  typologies have महरूम सुझाया to categorize pedophiles  according to behavior and motivations .
Julio César  chávez ( born जूलियो césar chávez  González on July 12 , 1962 ) is a retired Mexican professional boxer .
Chávez is  माना by अनेक लोगों  for their sport statistics the greatest fighter ever to come out of Mexico .
He is a six-time  संसार चैंपियन in तीन वज़न विभाजन , और लिये अनेक सालो he थी माना  one of the best pound-for-pound boxer in the world .
In a career that spanned over 25 years , Chávez won five world titles in three weight  विभाजन : wbc सुपर featherweight in 1984 , wba lightweight in  1987 , WBC Lightweight in 1988 , WBC Light Welterweight in 1989 , IBF Light Welterweight in 1990 , and WBC Light Welterweight in 1994 .
He holds records for most successful consecutive defenses of  संसार शीर्षक ( 27 ) , सबसे शीर्षक झगड़े ( 37 ) , सबसे title-fight victories ( 31 ) और he  is after Joe Louis with ( 23 ) for most title defenses won by knockout ( 21 ) .
Chávez also has the  longest अपराजित streak in मुक्केबाज़ी इतिहास  , 13 years .
His record was 89-0-1 going into his  पहला घाटा to फ्रेंकी रान्डेल और था an 87 लड़ो जीत streak जबतक  his `` draw '' with Whitaker .
Julio César Chávez was known for his outstanding punching power , devastating body  आक्रमण , remarkably दमदार  chin and the relentless stalking of his opponents .
He ranks #  24 on ईएसपीएन 's 50 महानतम  Boxers Of All Time .
On December 7 ,  2010 , he थी inducted in the prestigious अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Boxing Hall of Fame for the Class of 2011 .
He is the father of  prospect ओमर chávez  and former WBC Middleweight Champion Julio César Chávez , Jr .

to be भेजा to the सही meant  slave labor ; to the left , the gas chamber .

The Holocaust ( from the Greek ' : hólos , `` whole '' and kaustós , `` burnt '' ) also known as the Shoah ( Hebrew : , HaShoah , `` catastrophe '' ; Yiddish : ,  churben or hurban , इससे the यहूदी लिये `` विनाश '' ) , थी the  mass murder or genocide of approximately six million Jews during World War II , a programme of systematic state-sponsored murder by Nazi Germany , led by Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party , throughout German-occupied territory .
Of the nine million Jews who had  resided in यूरोपीय पहले the holocaust  , approximately two-thirds were killed .
Over one million Jewish children were killed  in the holocaust  , as were approximately two million Jewish women and three million Jewish men .
A network of over  40,000 सुविधाएं in जर्मनी और german-occupied territory  were used to concentrate , hold , and kill Jews and other victims .
Some scholars argue that the mass murder of the Romani and people with disabilities should be included in the definition  , और कुछ उपयोग the आम संज्ञा `` holocaust '' to describe अन्य नाजी द्रव्यमान हत्याएं , सहित those of सोवियत बंदियों of युद्ध , पॉलिश और सोवियत  civilians , and homosexuals .
Recent estimates based on figures obtained since the fall of the Soviet Union indicates some ten to eleven million  नागरिकों और बंदियों of युद्ध यहूद intentionally  murdered by the Nazi regime .
The persecution and genocide were carried  आउट in चरण  .
Various laws to remove the Jews from civil society , most prominently the  nuremberg कानून , यहूद enacted in जर्मनी सालो पहले the outbreak  of World War II .
Concentration camps were established in  जिससे inmates यहूद वशीभूत to स्लेव मजदूर जबतक वे died  of exhaustion or disease .
Where Germany conquered new territory in eastern Europe , specialized units  पुकारा einsatzgruppen murdered यहूदियों  and political opponents in mass shootings .
The occupiers required Jews and Romani to be confined in overcrowded ghettos before being transported by freight train to extermination camps where , if they survived the journey , most were  systematically मारे in गैस  chambers .
Every arm of Germany 's bureaucracy was involved in the logistics that  led to the genocides , turning the तीसरा reich into कया एक  Holocaust scholar has called `` a genocidal state '' .
4-H in the United States is a youth organization administered by the National Institute of  खाना और कृषि of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of कृषि ( यूएसडीए ) , साथ the मिशन of  `` engaging youth to reach their fullest potential while advancing the field of youth development . ''
The name  represents चार निजी विकास क्षेत्रों of फ़ोकस लिये the  organization : head , heart , hands , and health .
The organization has over 6.5  लाख सदस्यों in the संयुक्त राज्य , इससे  ages five to twenty-one , in approximately 90,000 clubs .
The goal of 4-H is to develop citizenship , leadership , responsibility and  जीवन कौशल of युवावस्था through experiential सीखना कार्यक्रम  and a positive youth development approach .
Though typically thought of as an agriculturally focused organization as a result of its history , 4-H today focuses on  नागरिकता , स्वस्थ जीना , विज्ञान , अभियान्त्रिकी , और  technology programs .
Today , 4-H and related programs exist in over eighty countries  around the संसार ; the संगठन और प्रशासन  varies from country to country .
Each of these programs operates independently , but cooperatively through international exchanges ,  वैश्विक शिक्षा कार्यक्रम , और संचार  .
The 4-H motto is `` To  मेक the बेहतरीन बेहतर '' , जबकि इसके स्लोगन  is `` Learn by doing '' ( sometimes written as `` Learn to do by doing '' ) .
The national flag of Chile , consists of two unequal horizontal  bands of श्वेत और रेड और a ब्लू वर्गाकार the वही ऊँचाई as the  white band in the canton , which bears a white five-pointed star in the center .
It was adopted on  18 अक्तूबर 1817  .
The Chilean flag is also known in Spanish as  la estrella solitaria ( the  Lone Star ) .
The star represents a guide to progress and honor ; blue symbolizes the sky and the  प्रशांत समंदर , श्वेत is लिये the snow-covered andes , और रेड स्टैंड लिये the रक्त  spilled to achieve independence .
According to the epic poem  la araucana  , the colors were derived from those from the flag flown by the Mapuche during the Arauco War .
`` Flag Day '' is held each year  on the नवीं of जुलाई to commemorate the 77 सैनिको  who died in the 1882 Battle of La Concepción .
Generation Y , also known as the Millennial Generation  , is the जनसांख्यिकी  cohort following Generation X .
There are no precise  तिथियाँ लिये जब पीढी  Y starts and ends .
Commentators  उपयोग शुरूआत जनम तिथियाँ  from the latter 1970s , or from the early 1980s to the early 2000s .
The Torches of  नीरो , by henryk  Siemiradzki .
According  to tacitus , नीरो targeted ईसाइयों  as those responsible for the fire .
The Great Fire of Rome ( ) was an  शहरी आग कि occurred शुरूआत  19 July AD 64 .
Virginia ( ) , officially the  राष्ट्रमंडल of वर्जिनिया , is  a U.S. state located in the South Atlantic region of the United States .
वर्जिनिया is nicknamed the `` बूढ़ा  Dominion '' and the `` Mother of Presidents '' after the eight U.S. presidents born there .
The geography and climate  of the राष्ट्रमंडल हैं तराशा by the ब्लू लकीरें  Mountains and the Chesapeake Bay , which provide habitat for much of its flora and fauna .
The capital of  the राष्ट्रमंडल is  Richmond ; and Virginia Beach is the most populous city .
फेयरफैक्स काउंटी is the सबसे  populous political subdivision .
The wealthiest is  loudoun काउंटी  .
The  राष्ट्रमंडल 's जनसांख्यिकी  is over eight million .
The area 's history begins with several indigenous groups ,  सहित the powhatan .
In 1607 the  लंदन कम्पनी स्थापित the उपनिवेश of वर्जिनिया  as the first permanent New World English colony .
Slave labor and the land acquired  इससे विस्थापित देशी अमरीकी  tribes each played a significant role in the colony 's early politics and plantation economy .
Virginia was one of the 13 Colonies  in the अमरीकी क्रान्ति और joined the confederacy in the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध  , during which Richmond was made the Confederate capital and Virginia 's northwestern counties seceded to form the state of West Virginia .
हालांकि the राष्ट्रमंडल थी अंतर्गत रूढ़िवादी single-party नियम  for nearly a century following Reconstruction , both major national parties are competitive in modern Virginia .
The Virginia  सामान्य सभा is the oldest  legislature in the Western Hemisphere .
The state government has been repeatedly ranked  सबसे प्रभावी by the pew  Center on the States .
It is unique in how it treats cities and counties equally , manages local roads  , और prohibits इसके राज्यपालों इससे सेवारत लगातार शर्तें  .
Virginia 's economy has many sectors : agriculture in the Shenandoah Valley ; federal agencies in Northern Virginia ,  सहित the मुख्यालय of the विभाग of रक्षा और सीआईए ; और सैन्य सुविधाएं in हैम्पटन सड़कें , the  site of the region 's main seaport .
Virginia 's public schools and many colleges and  विश्वविद्यालयों have contributed to growing मीडिया  and technology sectors .
As a result , computer  चिप्स have  become the state 's leading export .
Windows Movie Maker ( formerly known as Windows Live Movie Maker , codenamed Sundance ) is a  फ्रीवेयर वीडियो संपादन तन्त्र by microsoft  .
It is a part of Windows Essentials software suite and offers the  क्षमता to  create and edit videos as well as to publish them on SkyDrive , Facebook , YouTube , and Flickr .
`` Brenda 's Got A Baby '' is the solo debut single  by तुपाक shakur , और  tenth track from his debut album , 2Pacalypse Now .
The song , which features R & B singer Dave Hollister , is about a twelve year-old girl named Brenda who lives in a ghetto ,  रै a baby , और is incapable of supporting  it .
The song  explores the समस्या of टीन गर्भावस्था और इसके  effect on the young mothers and their families .
Like many of Shakur 's songs , `` Brenda 's Got a  baby '' draws इससे the दुर्दशा of the impoverished  .
Using Brenda to represent young mothers in general , Shakur criticises the  कम स्तर of support इससे the baby 's पिता , the सरकारी  , and society in general .
Shakur wrote the song when he read a newspaper article about a twelve-year-old girl who  मिला गर्भवती इससे उसके cousin और , क्युकी वो किया नहीं want उसके अभिभावक to जान परिचय  the baby , threw it in a trash can .
The official logo of Pokémon  लिये इसके अंतरराष्ट्रीय रिलीज ; `` पोकीमॉन '' is छोटी लिये the असली  Japanese title of `` Pocket Monsters '' .
is a media franchise  प्रकाशित और स्वामित्व by जापानी वीडियो  game company Nintendo and created by Satoshi Tajiri in 1996 .
Originally released as a pair of interlinkable Game Boy role-playing video games developed by Game Freak  , पोकीमॉन रै चूंकि become the second-most कामयाब और lucrative वीडियो game-based मीडिया मताधिकार in  the world , behind only Nintendo 's own Mario franchise .
Pokémon properties have since been merchandised into anime , manga , trading cards  , खिलौने , किताबे , और अन्य  media .
The franchise  मनाये  in 2006 , and , cumulative sales of the video games ( including home console versions , such as the `` Pikachu '' Nintendo 64 ) have reached more than 200 million copies .
In November 2005 , 4Kids Entertainment , which had managed the  non-game सम्बन्धित लाइसेंसिंग of पोकीमॉन , घोषित  that it had agreed not to renew the Pokémon representation agreement .
Pokémon USA Inc. ( now The Pokémon Company  अंतरराष्ट्रीय ) , a subsidiary of जापानी 's पोकीमॉन co. , अभी oversees सब पोकीमॉन लाइसेंसिंग  outside of Asia .
The name Pokémon is the romanized contraction of  the जापानी ब्रांड  .
The term Pokémon , in addition to referring to the Pokémon franchise itself , also collectively refers to the 649 fictional species that have made appearances in Pokémon media as of the release of the fifth generation titles Pokémon Black 2 and White 2 ;  साथ the आगामी रिलीज of पोकीमॉन x और y , 6 नई पोकीमॉन have महरूम प्रदर्शित in प्रचार लिये the खेल .
`` Pokémon '' is identical in both the singular and plural , as is each  व्यक्तिगत प्रजाति नाम ; it is grammatically सही to कह ``  one Pokémon '' and `` many Pokémon '' , as well as `` one Pikachu `` and `` many Pikachu '' .
कवर of the पहला संस्करण of  the publication Dada by Tristan Tzara ; Zurich , 1917
Dada ( ) or Dadaism was an  आर्ट गति of the यूरोपीय avant-garde  in the early 20th century .
Many claim Dada began in Zurich , Switzerland in  1916 , spreading to बर्लिन shortly thereafter  but the height of New York Dada was the year before in 1915 .
To quote Dona  budd 's the भाषा of आर्ट ज्ञान , दादा  was born out of negative reaction to the horrors of World War I .
This international movement was begun  by a समूह of कलाकार और कवियों संबद्ध साथ the  Cabaret Voltaire in Zurich .
Dada rejected reason  और लॉजिक , prizing बकवास  , irrationality and intuition .
The origin of the  नाम दादा is unclear  ; some believe that it is a nonsensical word .
अन्य maintain कि it originates इससे the रोमानियाई कलाकारों ट्रिस्टन  Tzara and Marcel Janco 's frequent use of the words da , da , meaning yes , yes in the Romanian language .
Another theory says that the name `` Dada '' came during a meeting of the group when a paper knife stuck into a  french-german शब्दकोष happened to पाइंट to 'डैडa  ' , a French word for 'hobbyhorse ' .
The movement primarily  शामिल विज़ुअल कला , साहित्य , काव्य , आर्ट manifestoes , आर्ट सिद्धान्त , थिएटर , और ग्राफिक डिज़ाइन  , and concentrated its anti-war politics through a rejection of the prevailing standards in art through anti-art cultural works .
In addition to being anti-war , Dada was also anti- bourgeois and had  राजनैतिक affinities साथ the  radical left .
Dada  क्रियाएँ शामिल पब्लिक महफिलों , demonstrations , और प्रकाशन of  art/literary journals ; passionate coverage of art , politics , and culture were topics often discussed in a variety of media .
Key figures in the movement included Hugo Ball , Emmy Hennings , Hans Arp , Raoul Hausmann , Hannah Höch , Johannes Baader , Tristan Tzara , Francis Picabia , Richard  huelsenbeck , georg grosz , जॉन heartfield , मार्सल duchamp , beatrice लकडी , कर्ट schwitters , और hans रिक्टर , among अन्य  .
The  गति बहकावे बाद शैलियाँ जैसे the  avant-garde and downtown music movements , and groups including surrealism , Nouveau réalisme , pop art and Fluxus .
Dada is the groundwork to abstract art and sound poetry , a starting point for performance art , a prelude to postmodernism , an  influence on पॉप आर्ट , a जश्न of antiart to be बाद embraced लिये  anarcho-political uses in the 1960s and the movement that lay the foundation for Surrealism .
First  trophic स्तर  .
The plants in this image , and  the शैवाल और phytoplankton  in the lake , are primary producers .
They take  nutrients इससे the मृदा or the जल , और manufacture  their own food by photosynthesis , using energy from the sun .
The trophic level of an organism  is the स्थिति it occupies  in a food chain .
The word trophic derives  इससे the यूनानी τροφή ( trophē ) referring  to food or feeding .
A food chain represents a succession of organisms that eat  another सजीव और हैं , in फेरे , खाया themselves  .
The number of steps an organism is  इससे the प्रारंभ of the कड़ी is a माप of इसके  trophic level .
Food chains start at trophic level 1 with primary producers such as  पौधे , मूव to herbivores at स्तर 2 , परभक्षी at स्तर 3 और typically  finish with carnivores or apex predators at level 4 or 5 .
The path along the chain can form either a  one-way प्रवाह , or a  food `` web . ''
ecological समुदायों साथ उच्चतर  biodiversity form more complex trophic paths .
Four of the  सबसे महत्वपूर्ण domesticated  silk moths .
Top  to नीचे : bombyx mori , hyalophora cecropia  , Antheraea pernyi , Samia cynthia .
From Meyers  konversations-lexikon  ( 1885-1892 )
A  silk-producing  raspy cricket .
Silk is  a प्राकृतिक प्रोटीन fibre , कुछ फ़ॉर्म  of which can be woven into textiles .
The protein fibre  of रेशा is रचित मुख्यतः of fibroin  and produced by certain insect larvae to form cocoons .
The  best-known प्रकार of रेशा is प्राप्त  from the cocoons of the larvae of the mulberry silkworm Bombyx mori reared in captivity ( sericulture ) .
The shimmering appearance of silk is  due to the triangular प्रिज़्म -like ढांचा of the रेशा fibre , जिससे  allows silk cloth to refract incoming light at different angles , thus producing different colors .
Silks are produced by several other insects , but generally only the silk of moth  caterpillars रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये वस्त्र निर्माण  .
There  रै महरूम कुछ शोध into अन्य  silks , which differ at the molecular level .
Many silks are mainly produced by the larvae of insects undergoing complete metamorphosis  , लकिन कुछ वयस्क कीट ऐसे as webspinners उपज रेशा , और कुछ कीट ऐसे as raspy झींगुर  produce silk throughout their lives .
Silk  उत्पादन भी occurs in कलापक्ष ( मधुमक्खियों , wasps , और चींटियों )  , silverfish , mayflies , thrips , leafhoppers , beetles , lacewings , fleas , flies and midges .
Other types of arthropod  उपज रेशा , सबसे notably विभिन्न  arachnids such as spiders ( see spider silk ) .
लेट दिखाएँ साथ दाउद लेटरमैन is an अमरीकी  late-night talk show hosted by David Letterman on CBS .
The show debuted on August 30 , 1993 , and is produced by Letterman 's production  कम्पनी , विश्वव्यापी पैंट  Incorporated .
The show 's  म्यूज़िक निदेशक और band-leader of the हाउस  band , the CBS Orchestra , is Paul Shaffer .
The head writer is Matt Roberts and  the उद्घोषक  is Alan Kalter .
Of the major U.S.  late-night कार्यक्रम , लेट दिखाएँ बाँधने दूसरी  in cumulative average viewers over time and third in number of episodes over time .
The show  लीड अन्य लेट रात्रि shows  in ad revenue with $ 271 million in 2009 .
In most U.S. markets the show airs at 11:35 p.m.  eastern/pacific समय , लकिन is अंकित सोमवार through बुधवार at 4:30 p.m. , और गुरुवार  at 3:30 p.m and 6:00 p.m .
The  दूसरी गुरुवार एपीसोड प्रायः  airs on Friday of that week .
In 2002 , Late Show with David Letterman was  क्रमित no . 7 on tv मार्गदर्शिका 's 50 महानतम  TV Shows of All Time .
CBS has a contract with Worldwide Pants to  continue the दिखाएँ through 2014 ; by तब , लेटरमैन  will surpass Johnny Carson as the longest tenured late-night talk show host .
The  रियल housewives of नारंगी  County is an American reality documentary television program on Bravo , set in Orange County , California .
It was the first  the रियल housewives कार्यक्रम  in the series .
The series is a voyeuristic look into the wealthy lives  of ये housewives , as वे दूकान , मिलेंगी प्लास्टिक सर्जरी , गपशप , लड़ो  and live lavishly .
The financial crisis , the beginning of which coincided  लगभग exactly साथ the पहला ऋतु 's ब्रॉडकास्ट , रै चूंकि  trimmed the housewives ' lifestyles with job losses , evictions , mortgage defaults , foreclosures , and marital stress—all recorded in progressive seasons of the show .
Cyberstalking is the use of the Internet or  अन्य इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  means to stalk or harass an individual , a group of individuals , or an organization .
It may include the making of false accusations or statements of fact ( as in  मानहानि ) , निगरानी , बनाना खतरे , पहचान चोरी , क्षति to आंकड़ा or उपकरण ,  the solicitation of minors for sex , or gathering information that may be used to harass .
The  परिभाषा of `` उत्पीड़न '' जरूर मिलें the मानदंड कि  a reasonable person , in possession of the same information , would regard it as sufficient to cause another reasonable person distress .
cyberstalking is अलग इससे स्थानिक or ऑफ़लाइन stalking in कि it occurs  through the use of electronic communications technology such as the internet .
However , it sometimes  लीड to it , or is accompanied  by it .
Both are  दण्ड offenses  .
Cyberstalking shares  महत्वपूर्ण विशेषताएँ साथ  offline stalking .
Many stalkers – online or  बंद – हैं प्रेरित by a ख्वाहिश to  control their victims .
A cyberstalker may be an online  अजनबी or a व्यक्ति जिसको the निशाना  knows .
A cyberstalker may be anonymous and may solicit involvement of other  लोगों ऑनलाइन जो do नहीं भी जान the निशाना  .
cyberstalking is a दण्ड ठोकर कि आता into खेल अंतर्गत  state anti-stalking laws , slander laws , and harassment laws .
A cyberstalking conviction can result in a restraining order , probation , or even  दण्ड दंड विरूद्ध the assailant , सहित कारावास .
A business letter is usually used when writing from one company to another , or for correspondence between such organizations and their customers ,  क्लाइंट और अन्य बाह्य पार्टियों .
The overall style of letter will depend on  the संबंध between  the parties concerned .
There are many reasons to write a  कारोबार अक्षर .
It could be to request direct  सूचना or कार्रवाई इससे another पार्टी , to अनुक्रम आपूर्तियाँ इससे a प्रदायक , to पहचानो  a mistake that was committed , to reply directly to a request , to apologize for a wrong or simply to convey goodwill .
Even  आज , the कारोबार अक्षर is स्टिल बहुत उपयोगी  because it produces a permanent record , is confidential , formal and delivers persuasive , well-considered messages .
Tilapia ( ) is the  आम नाम लिये nearly a सौ प्रजाति of cichlid  fish from the tilapiine cichlid tribe .
Tilapia are mainly freshwater fish , inhabiting shallow streams , ponds , rivers  और झीलों , और कम commonly मिला  living in brackish water .
historically , वे have महरूम of प्रमुख महत्व in कारीगर फ़िशिंग  in Africa and the Levant , and are of increasing importance in aquaculture .
Tilapia can become problematic invasive species in new warm-water habitats , whether  deliberately or accidentally introduced , लकिन generally नहीं in शीतोष्ण climates due to उनके अक्षमता  to survive in cooler waters below about .
Turner & Hooch is a 1989 comedy drama crime film starring Tom Hanks and Beasley the Dog as the  eponymous वर्ण , टर्नर  and Hooch respectively .
The film also stars Mare Winningham ,  क्रेग T. नेल्सन , और रेगिनाल्ड  VelJohnson .
It was  निर्देशित by रोजर spottiswoode  ; the film was originally slated to be directed by Henry Winkler , but he was terminated due to `` creative differences '' .
It was co-written by Michael  blodgett इससे परे the घाटी  of the Dolls fame .
Although K-9 ( with James Belushi ) was released prior to this film ( exactly three months earlier ) , Turner & Hooch became more popular  और seemingly निष्प्रभ  its greater success , even though K-9 had a very similar plot .
A pilot for a Turner & Hooch TV series was made  और भागा as a भाग of the जादुई संसार of डिज़्नी .

Adolf Hitler ( ; 20 April 1889 – 30 April 1945 ) was an Austrian -born German politician and the leader of  the नाजी पार्टी ( ( nsdap ) ; नेशनल समाजवादी जर्मनी  Workers Party ) .
He was chancellor of Germany from 1933 to 1945 and dictator of  नाजी जर्मनी ( as führer und reichskanzler ) इससे  1934 to 1945 .
Hitler was at the centre of  नाजी जर्मनी , संसार युद्ध ii  in Europe , and the Holocaust .
हिटलर थी a सजा  veteran of World War I .
He joined the German  मजदूर ' पार्टी ( precursor of the nsdap  ) in 1919 , and became leader of the NSDAP in 1921 .
In 1923 , he attempted a coup d'état in Munich  , ज्ञात as the बियर  Hall Putsch .
The failed coup resulted in Hitler 's imprisonment , during  जिससे समय he लिखा उसके संस्मरण , mein  Kampf ( My Struggle ) .
After his  रिलीज in 1924 , हिटलर gained लोकप्रिय support by  attacking the Treaty of Versailles and promoting Pan-Germanism , antisemitism , and anti-communism with charismatic oratory and Nazi propaganda .
After  उसके नियुक्ति as चांसलर in 1933 , he रूपांतरित the  Weimar Republic into the Third Reich , a single-party dictatorship based on the totalitarian and autocratic ideology of Nazism .
Hitler 's aim was to establish a New  अनुक्रम of निरपेक्ष नाजी जर्मनी आधिपत्य  in continental Europe .
To this end , his foreign and domestic policies had the aim of seizing Lebensraum ( `` living  स्पेस '' ) लिये the germanic  people .
He directed the rearmament of Germany and the invasion of Poland by the Wehrmacht  in सितंबर 1939 , resulting in the outbreak of संसार युद्ध ii in  Europe .
Under Hitler  's नियम , in 1941 जर्मनी शक्तियां और उनके यूरोपीय allies  occupied most of Europe and North Africa .
In 1943 ,  जर्मनी था महरूम मजबूर onto the  defensive and suffered a series of escalating defeats .
In the final days of the war , during the Battle of Berlin  in 1945 , हिटलर शादीशुदा उसके long-time  partner , Eva Braun .
On 30  अप्रैल 1945 , कम  than two days later , the two committed suicide to avoid capture by the Red Army , and their corpses were burned .
Hitler 's aggressive foreign policy is considered  the प्रमुख कारण of the outbreak  of World War II in Europe .
His antisemitic policies and racially motivated ideology  resulted in the मौतों of at तनिक 5.5 लाख यहूदियों , और लाखो  of other people deemed racially inferior .
अंगूठा
a डोमेन नाम is an पहचान स्ट्रिंग कि defines a फ्रेम  of administrative autonomy , authority , or control on the Internet .
Domain names  हैं formed by the नियम  and procedures of the Domain Name System ( DNS ) .
Technically , any name  पंजीकृत in the डीएनएस is a डोमेन  name .
Domain names are used in various networking contexts and  application-specific नामकरण और संबोधित उद्देश्य  .
In general , a domain name represents an Internet Protocol ( IP ) resource ,  ऐसे as a निजी कंप्यूटर प्रयुक्त to अभिगम the अंतरजाल , a सर्वर  computer hosting a web site , or the web site itself or any other service communicated via the Internet .
Domain names are organized in  अधीनस्थ स्तर ( subdomains ) of the  DNS root domain , which is nameless .
The first-level set of  डोमेन names हैं the top-level डोमेन ( tlds ) , सहित the जेनेरिक top-level डोमेन ( gtlds ) , ऐसे as the  prominent domains com , info , net and org , and the country code top-level domains ( ccTLDs ) .
Below these top-level domains in the DNS hierarchy are the second-level and  third-level डोमेन names कि हैं typically खोलें लिये रिज़र्वेशन by end-users जो काश  to connect local area networks to the Internet , create other publicly accessible Internet resources or run web sites .
The registration  of ये डोमेन names  is usually administered by domain name registrars who sell their services to the public .
A fully qualified domain name ( FQDN ) is a  डोमेन नाम कि is completely निर्दिष्ट in the पदानुक्रम  of the DNS , having no omitted parts .
Domain names are usually written in  लोअरकेस , हालांकि लेबल्स in the डोमेन  Name System are case-insensitive .
Nitrate  is a polyatomic आयन साथ the आणविक सूत्र no3− और a आणविक द्रव्यमान of  62.0049 g/mol . Nitrates also describe the organic functional group RONO2 .
These nitrate esters are a  specialized क्लास  of explosives .
