This photo from a 1921 encyclopedia  shows a ट्रैक्टर ploughing a क्रॉप फ़ील्ड  .
Agriculture is a major industry in the United  राज्य और the देश  is a net exporter of food .
As of the last census of  कृषि in 2007 , वहीँ यहूद 2.2 लाख  farms , covering an area of , an average of per farm .
Although agricultural activity occurs in most states , it is  विशेषकर concentrated in the विशाल expanse of चपटा ,  arable land known as the Great Plains , which encompasses the central region of the nation .
The Mpemba effect , named after Tanzanian  छात्र erasto mpemba , is the assertion कि  warmer water can freeze faster than colder water .
Although there is  anecdotal support लिये the प्रभाव , वहीँ is no अनुबंध on exactly कया  the effect is and under what circumstances it occurs .
There  have महरूम रिपोर्ट्स of समान phenomena  since ancient times , although with insufficient detail for the claims to be replicated .
The phenomenon seems contrary to thermodynamics , but a number of possible  स्पष्टीकरण लिये the प्रभाव have महरूम प्रस्तावित  .
Further investigations will  need to decide on a precise  definition of `` freezing '' and control a vast number of starting parameters in order to confirm or explain the effect .
The Siamese ( , ) is one of the first  distinctly पहचाना breeds  of Oriental cat .
The breed originated in Thailand ( formerly known as Siam ) , where they are one of several  देशी breeds और हैं पुकारा wichian mat  ( วิเชียรมาศ , a name meaning `` moon diamond '' ) .
In the 20th century the Siamese cat became one of the most  लोकप्रिय breeds in यूरोपीय  and North America .
Quality Food Centers ( QFC )  is a सुपरमार्केट कड़ी आधारित in bellevue , वॉशिंगटन  , with 64 stores in the Puget Sound region of Washington state and in the Portland , Oregon metropolitan area .
In  अर्थशास्त्र , the धन  supply or money stock , is the total amount of monetary assets available in an economy at a specific time .
There are several ways to define `` money , '' but standard measures usually include currency in  परिसंचरण और माँग जमा ( जमाकर्ताओं ' easily  accessed assets on the books of financial institutions ) .
Money supply  आंकड़ा हैं अंकित और प्रकाशित , प्रायः by the  government or the central bank of the country .
Public and private sector analysts have long monitored  परिवर्तन in धन सप्लाई क्युकी of इसके प्रभाव on the दाम स्तर , महंगाई , the एक्सचेंज  rate and the business cycle .
That relation between money  और कीमतें is historically संबद्ध  with the quantity theory of money .
There is strong empirical evidence of a direct relation between money-supply growth and long-term price  महंगाई , at तनिक लिये रैपिड increases in the राशि of धन in the  economy .
That is , a country such as Zimbabwe which saw rapid  increases in इसके धन सप्लाई भी देखी रैपिड  increases in prices ( hyperinflation ) .
This is one reason for the reliance  on मौद्रिक नीति as a अर्थात्  of controlling inflation .
The  प्रकृति of इस  causal chain is the subject of contention .
Some heterodox economists argue that the money supply is endogenous ( determined by the workings of the economy , not by  the सेंट्रल बैंको ) और कि the स्त्रोत of महंगाई जरूर be मिला in the distributional  structure of the economy .
In addition , those economists seeing the central bank 's control over the money supply as feeble say  कि वहीँ हैं दो कमजोर कड़ी between the विकास of the  money supply and the inflation rate .
First , in the aftermath of a recession , when many resources are underutilized , an increase in the money supply can cause  a sustained बढ़ाएँ in रियल उत्पादन  instead of inflation .
Second , if the velocity of money , i.e. , the ratio between nominal GDP and money supply , changes , an  बढ़ाएँ in the धन सप्लाई could have either no प्रभाव , an अतिरंजित प्रभाव , or an  unpredictable effect on the growth of nominal GDP .
Logo  लिये imax  .
Warren  थिएटर imax सिनेमा  , Wichita , Kansas , USA , 601 seats .
A comparison  between 35 mm और  15/70 mm negative areas .
IMAX ( an abbreviation for Image Maximum ) is a motion picture film format and a set of cinema  प्रक्षेप मानकों निर्मित by the कनाडाई  company IMAX Corporation .
IMAX has the capacity to record and display images of far greater  आकार और रेज़ोल्यूशन than conventional फिल्मी प्रणालियों  .
Since 2002 , some feature films have been converted ( or  upgraded ) into imax स्वरूप लिये प्रदर्शक in imax थिएटर और  some have also been partially shot in IMAX .
IMAX is the most widely  प्रयुक्त प्रणाली लिये special-venue  film presentations .
, there are 697 IMAX  थिएटर in 52 देशों  .
Today 's Special is a Canadian children  's टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ उत्पादित by क्लाइव  VanderBurgh at TVOntario from 1981 to 1987 .
It also ran on Nickelodeon and the  आस्था और मान channel/odyssey ( अभी the hallmark चैनल ) as  well as many PBS stations throughout the United States .
It was set in a department store ,  आधारित on the फ्लैगशिप स्थान of the अभी defunct  Simpson 's in Toronto .
Many sequences for it were shot at the Queen Street West  और yonge गली  store after hours .
संविधानवाद , in इसके सबसे सामान्य अर्थ , is `` a जटिल of विचार , attitudes , और पैटर्न of  behavior elaborating the principle that the authority of government derives from and is limited by a body of fundamental law '' .
A political organization is constitutional to the extent that it `` contain [ s ] institutionalized mechanisms of power control for  the सुरक्षा of the रूचि और लिबर्टीज of the citizenry , सहित those  that may be in the minority `` .
As described by political  वैज्ञानिक और संवैधानिक विद्वान  David Fellman :
an ice-cream सिरदर्द , भी ज्ञात as दिमाग फ्रीज , cold-stimulus सिरदर्द , or इसके दिए वैज्ञानिक  name sphenopalatine ganglioneuralgia ( meaning `` nerve pain of the sphenopalatine ganglion `` ) , is a form of brief cranial pain or headache commonly associated with consumption ( particularly quick consumption ) of cold beverages or foods such as ice cream and ice pops .
It is caused by having something cold touch the roof of the mouth ( palate ) , and is believed to result from a nerve response causing rapid  constriction और सूजन of रक्त बरतन or a `` referring `` of पीड़ा इससे the छत of the मुँह to the सिर  .
The rate of intake for  ठंडा भोजन रै महरूम  studied as a contributing factor .
There are people who can not  अनुभव `` दिमाग फ्रीज  '' or similar symptoms .
The term ice-cream headache has been in use since at least 31 January 1937 , contained in a journal entry by Rebecca Timbres published in the 1939 book We did n't ask Utopia : a Quaker  परिवार in सोवियत रूस  .
The  पहला प्रकाशित उपयोग of the पद दिमाग फ्रीज  , as it pertains to cold-induced headaches , was on 27 May 1991 .
`` Auld Lang Syne '' ( : note `` s '' rather than `` z '' ) is a Scots poem written by Robert Burns in 1788  और नियत to the धुन of a परंपरागत  folk song ( Roud # 6294 ) .
It is well known in many countries , especially in the  english-speaking संसार ; इसके परंपरागत उपयोग होने to  celebrate the start of the New Year at the stroke of midnight .
By extension , it is also sung at funerals , graduations and as a farewell  or समाप्ति to अन्य अवसरों  .
The international Boy Scout youth movement ,  in अनेक देशों  , uses it as a close to jamborees and other functions .
The song 's Scots title may be translated into English  वस्तुतः as `` बूढ़ा long चूंकि '' , or अधिक  idiomatically , `` long long ago '' , `` days gone by '' or `` old times '' .
Consequently `` For auld lang  syne '' , as it appears in the पहला लकीर of the कोरस , might  be loosely translated as `` for ( the sake of ) old times '' .
The phrase `` Auld Lang Syne '' is also used in similar poems by Robert Ayton ( 1570–1638 ) , Allan  ramsay ( 1686–1757 ) , और जेम्स  Watson ( 1711 ) as well as older folk songs predating Burns .
मैथ्यू fitt उपयोग the phrase  `` In the days of auld lang syne '' as the equivalent of `` Once upon a time ...
`` in his  retelling of परी  tales in the Scots language .
Ben Schulz , player of  leeroy  Jenkins at BlizzCon 2007
Leeroy Jenkins , sometimes misspelled Leroy Jenkins and often elongated with numerous  अतिरिक्त अक्षर , is an अंतरजाल मीम नामित लिये  a player character created by Ben Schulz in Blizzard Entertainment 's MMORPG , World of Warcraft .
The character became popular due to a video of the game that  परिचालित around the अंतरजाल  .
The phenomenon has  चूंकि स्प्रेड परे the सीमाएँ of the  gaming community into other online and mainstream media .
Oscar Grant was fatally  शॉट by बार्ट पुलिस अधिकारी योहानेस mehserle in ओकलैंड , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , United States , in the early morning hours of New Year 's Day 2009 .
Responding to reports of a fight on a crowded Bay Area Rapid Transit train returning from San  फ्रांसिस्को , बार्ट पुलिस अधिकारियों detained ऑस्कर ग्रान्ट और अनेक अन्य यात्री on  the platform at the Fruitvale BART Station .
Officer Johannes Mehserle  और another अधिकारी यहूद restraining  Grant , who was prostrate and allegedly resisting arrest .
Officer Mehserle  stood और , according to गवाह , कहा : `` मिलेंगी वापस ,  I 'm gon na tase him . ''
Then  mehserle खींचा उसके गन और शॉट ग्रान्ट एकबार in the वापस ; mehserle appeared  stunned , put his hands to his head and exclaimed , `` Oh , my God ! ''
During his court testimony ,  mehserle कहा कि ग्रान्ट  then exclaimed , `` You shot me ! ''
Grant turned out to be unarmed ; he was  सुनाया मुर्दे the अगला morning  at Highland Hospital in Oakland .
The events were captured on  अनेक डिजिटल वीडियो  and cell phone cameras .
The footage was disseminated to media outlets and to various  वेबसाइटों , जहाँ it थी देखी लाखो of टाइम्स  .
the following दिनों  saw both peaceful and violent protests .
The shooting has been variously labeled an involuntary manslaughter and a  सारांश निष्पादन .
On  जनवरी 13 , alameda काउंटी prosecutors  charged Mehserle with murder for the shooting .
he resigned उसके स्थिति  and pleaded not guilty .
the विचारण began  on June 10 , 2010 .
Michael Rains , Mehserle 's criminal defense attorney , argued that Mehserle  mistakenly शॉट ग्रान्ट साथ उसके पिस्टल , intending to उपयोग  his Taser when he saw Grant reaching for his waistband .
Pretrial filings argue that his client did not commit first-degree murder and asked a Los  एंजिल्स न्यायधीश to instruct the जूरी to सीमा इसके deliberations to either  second-degree murder or acquittal .
ओकलैंड सिविल अधिकारों attorney जॉन burris दायर  a $ 25 million wrongful death claim against BART on behalf of Grant 's family .
On July 8 , 2010 , the  जूरी लौटे इसके verdict : mehserle थी मिला अपराधी  of involuntary manslaughter and not guilty of second-degree murder and voluntary manslaughter .
Initial protests against the ruling were peacefully organized ; looting , arson , destruction of  प्रॉपर्टी , और छोटी दंगे broke आउट बाद अंधेरा  .
Nearly  80 लोगों यहूद आखिरकार  arrested .
On Friday , July 9 , 2010 , the U.S. Justice Department opened a civil rights case against Mehserle ; the federal  सरकारी can prosecute उसे independently लिये the वही अधिनियम अंतर्गत the पृथक अधिपति  exception to double jeopardy .
The  विभाग of इंसाफ होगा be working  with the U.S. Attorney 's office in San Francisco and the FBI .
On November 5 , 2010 , Mehserle  थी sentenced to दो सालो , ऋण  time served .
He served his time in the Los Angeles County Jail ,  occupying a निजी कोशिका दूर इससे अन्य बंदियों  .
He was released on June 13  , 2011 और is  now on parole .
Major  प्रतिनिधि of the  Harlem Renaissance .
The Harlem Renaissance was a  सांस्कृतिक गति कि spanned the  1920s .
At the time , it was  ज्ञात as the `` नई नीग्रो गति  '' , named after the 1925 anthology by Alain Locke .
Though it was centered in the Harlem  पड़ोस of नई यॉर्क नगर , अनेक french-speaking  black writers from African and Caribbean colonies who lived in Paris were also influenced by the Harlem Renaissance .
The Harlem  पुनर्जागरण is unofficially  recognized to have spanned from about 1919 until the early or mid-1930s .
Many of its ideas lived  on much longer  .
The zenith of this `` flowering of Negro literature '' , as James Weldon Johnson preferred to call the Harlem Renaissance , was placed between 1924 ( the year that Opportunity : A  जर्नल of नीग्रो जीवन hosted a पार्टी लिये ब्लैक लेखक जहाँ अनेक श्वेत प्रकाशक यहूद in उपस्थिति ) और 1929 ( the साल of the भण्डार  market crash and the beginning of the Great Depression ) .
African States  between 500 bce और 1500  CE
obelisk at  temple of Luxor , Egypt .
c. 1200  bce  .
African knight of  baguirmi in पूरा padded  armour suit .
The history of Africa begins with  the प्रागितिहास of अफ़्रीकी और the emergence of होमो sapiens in ईस्ट अफ़्रीकी , continuing  into the present as a patchwork of diverse and politically developing nation states .
Some early  प्रमाण of कृषि in अफ़्रीकी तिथियाँ  from 16,000 BCE , and metallurgy from about 4000 BCE .
The  अंकित इतिहास of जल्दी सभ्यता arose in  Egypt , and later in Nubia , the Maghreb and the Horn of Africa .
During the Middle  आयु , islam स्प्रेड through  the regions .
Crossing the Maghreb and the  सहेल , a प्रमुख बीच of मुस्लिम  culture was Timbuktu .
Some notable pre-colonial states and societies in Africa include the Nok culture , Mali Empire , Ashanti Empire , Kingdom of  mapungubwe , किंगडम of ज्या , किंगडम of saloum , किंगडम of baol , किंगडम of ज़िम्बाब्वे , किंगडम  of Kongo , Ancient Carthage , Numidia , Mauretania , the Aksumite Empire , the Ajuuraan State and the Adal Sultanate .
From the  लेट 15th सदी , europeans  and Arabs took slaves from West , Central and Southeast Africa overseas in the African slave trade .
European colonization of Africa developed rapidly in the  हाथापाई लिये अफ़्रीकी of the लेट  19th and early 20th centuries .
Following struggles for independence in many parts of the continent , as well as a weakened Europe after the Second World  युद्ध ; decolonization took प्लेस  .
Africa 's history has been challenging for researchers in the field of African studies  क्युकी of the किल्लत of लिखा  sources in large parts of sub-Saharan Africa .
Scholarly techniques such as  the रिकॉर्डिंग of मौखिक इतिहास , ऐतिहासिक  linguistics , archaeology and genetics have been crucial .
Curry Foley was the  पहला खिलाड़ी in प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल  history to hit for the cycle .
In baseball , hitting for the cycle is the accomplishment of one  बैटर hitting a सिंगल , a दोगुना , a ट्रिपल , और a घर चलाएं  in the same game .
Collecting  the हिट्स in कि अनुक्रम is ज्ञात as  a `` natural cycle '' .
Cycles are uncommon in Major League Baseball ( MLB ) ,  और have occurred 294 टाइम्स चूंकि  the first by Curry Foley in 1882 .
The cycle is roughly as common as a no-hitter ( 279 occurrences in MLB history ) ; it has been called `` one of the rarest '' and `` most  मुश्किल feats '' in बेसबॉल  .
Based on 2009 offensive levels , the probability  of an औसत एमएलबी खिलाड़ी hitting लिये a साईकिल विरूद्ध an औसत टोली in a खेल is  approximately 0.00590 % ; this corresponds to about 2.5 cycles in a 162-game season with 30 teams .
In other  बेसबॉल लीग , the  cycle is achieved less frequently .
Through September  4 , 2008 , 62 खिलाड़ी in निप्पन पेशेवर  Baseball ( NPB ) , the top-level baseball organization in Japan , have hit for the cycle , the most recent being Michihiro Ogasawara .
Two  खिलाड़ी have hit लिये the साईकिल on the वही  day once in NPB history ; this has occurred twice in MLB history .
One NPB player has also hit for the cycle  in an npb all-star खेल  .
No player has ever hit for the  साईकिल in the एमएलबी all-star खेल  or the postseason .
The main slave routes  in मध्यकालीन अफ़्रीकी .
This article  discusses प्रणालियों , इतिहास  , and effects of slavery within Africa .
See Arab slave trade , Atlantic slave trade , Maafa , and Slavery in contemporary Africa  लिये अन्य चर्चाएँ  .
`` Slave  हस्तांतरण in अफ़्रीकी  '' .
Europeans  प्रायः किया नहीं डालें  the interior regions .
Slavery in Africa has existed throughout the  महाद्वीप लिये अनेक सदियां , और continues in the वर्तमान  day .
Systems of servitude and slavery were common in many parts of the continent , as they were in much of  the प्राचीन संसार .
In most African societies where  गुलामी थी प्रचलित , the enslaved लोगों यहूद largely treated as indentured बन्दों  and not treated as chattel slaves .
When the Arab slave trade and Atlantic slave trade began , many of the  लोकल स्लेव प्रणालियों बदला और began supplying captives लिये स्लेव  markets outside of Africa .
Slavery in historical Africa was practiced in many different forms and some of these do not clearly fit the definitions of  गुलामी elsewhere in  the world .
Debt slavery ,  enslavement of युद्ध captives  , military slavery , and criminal slavery were all practiced in various parts of Africa .
Although there had been some trans-Saharan trade from the interior of Sub-Saharan Africa to other regions , slavery was a small part of the economic  जीवन of अनेक समाजों in अफ़्रीकी जबतक the परिचय of transcontinental स्लेव  trades ( Arab and Atlantic ) .
Slave practices were again transformed with European colonization of Africa and the  औपचारिक abolition of गुलामी in the  early 1900s .
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor  अनुप्रयोग शामिल साथ the microsoft खिड़कियाँ nt परिवार of ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों कि provides सीमित सूचना परिचय कंप्यूटर प्रदर्शन और कार्यशील अनुप्रयोग , प्रक्रियाओं और cpu उपयोग , कमिट चार्ज और मेमोरी सूचना , संजाल कार्यकलाप और आंकडे , logged-in उपयोक्ता , और प्रणाली सेवाएं ( और as प्रायः is the मामला साथ  software tools provided by Microsoft for Windows , 3rd party software is available which fills the requirements more thoroughly , e.g , `` Process Explorer '' , `` Extended Task Manager '' , `` Anvir Task Manager '' , `` Process Hacker '' , and `` System Explorer '' ) .
The Task Manager can also be used to set process priorities , processor affinity , forcibly terminate processes , and  shut bas , restart , hibernate or log बंद इससे खिड़कियाँ  .
Windows Task Manager  थी introduced साथ खिड़कियाँ  NT 4.0 .
Previous  संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ nt शामिल the  Task List application , which had far fewer features .
The task list was capable of listing currently running processes and  हत्या उन्हें , or बनाना a नई प्रक्रम  .
In Windows XP only , a Shutdown menu is also present that allows  अभिगम to standby , hibernate , फेरे बंद , restart , log बंद और  Switch User .
पहले संस्करण of microsoft खिड़कियाँ ( microsoft  Windows 3.x , Windows 95 , Windows 98 ) had a program known as tasks to display the programs currently running .
This file was executed by running the  taskman.exe संचिका इससे  the C : \Windows directory .
The Troop is  an american-canadian live-action , सिंगल कैमरा कॉमेडी -adventure टेलीविज़न श्रेणी  about a trio of teenagers who fight and capture monsters and other supernatural phenomena that invade the fictional town of Lakewood .
Created and executive produced by  अधिकतम burnett , ग्रेग कूलिज और क्रिस  Morgan , the series premiered on Nickelodeon on September 18 , 2009 .
The second season premiered on June 25 ,  2011 और निकलोडियन रद्द the श्रेणी मिडवे  through it 's second season .
The remaining  एपीसोड of ऋतु 2 यहूद aired  on Nicktoons except the last 3..
Sparsely populated in relation to its area , the Democratic Republic of the Congo ( DRC ) is home to a vast potential of natural resources and mineral wealth , its untapped  जमा of कच्चा खनिज हैं अनुमानित to be लायक in excess of us $ 24 खरब , yet the अर्थव्यवस्था  of the DRC has declined drastically since the mid-1980s .
At the time of  इसके स्वतंत्रता in 1960 , drc थी the दूसरी  most industrialized country in Africa after South Africa ; it boasted a thriving mining sector and its agriculture sector was relatively productive .
If the viewer  stares at इस चित्र लिये 20–60 सेकेंड और stares at a श्वेत  object , a negative afterimage will appear ( in this case , it will be cyan on magenta ) .
This can also be  हासिल by the दर्शक closing  his/her eyes and tilting their head up .
an afterimage or भुत चित्र or चित्र burn-in is an ऑप्टिकल भ्रम  that refers to an image continuing to appear in one 's vision after the exposure to the original image has ceased .
One of the most common  afterimages is the उज्जवल glow कि seems  to float before one 's eyes after looking into a light source for a few seconds .
Closing the eye can help achieve a  बेहतर भाव of the रंग in इसके  own aspect .
Afterimages  आइये in दो फ़ॉर्म , ऋणात्मक ( उलट  ) and positive ( retaining original color ) .
The process behind positive afterimages is unknown ,  हालांकि विचार to be सम्बन्धित  to neural adaptation .
On the other hand  , ऋणात्मक afterimages हैं a retinal घटना  and are well understood .
Lost is an American serial drama  टेलीविज़न श्रेणी कि premiered on  September 22 , 2004 on the American Broadcasting Company ( ABC ) .
The series was created  by J. J. abrams और डैमन lindelof ,  based upon an original pilot script titled Nowhere written by Jeffrey Lieber .
Six seasons of the show aired , in addition to numerous  काटें shows to पूर्वावलोकन पिछला एपीसोड  .
ABC announced that Lost would end after six seasons ,  having उत्पादित a कुल of 121 एपीसोड  .
The series  फ़ॉलो the पास्ट , उपस्थित , और भविष्य अनुभव ( s ) of the survivors of a प्लेन क्रैश on  a passenger jet , Oceanic Flight 815 , flying from Sydney to Los Angeles after it crashes on a tropical island in the South Pacific .
The series also includes stories of the lives of  लोगों already जीना on the द्वीप — वे शामिल  the `` Others `` , who initially antagonize the survivors , as well as a group of people who arrive on the freighter Kahana .
Each episode typically features action on the island as well  as a द्वितीयक कथानक इससे another पाइंट  in a character 's life .
Season 6 features a detailing of the  जीवनदान of the survivors in a अलग वास्तविकता  , as if the flight had never crashed .
In the following list , the term `` featured character ( s ) '' refers to the character or characters  जो हैं प्रदर्शित in the द्वितीयक कथानक of प्रत्येक एपीसोड  .
``  no  .
in series '' refers to the episode 's number in  the overall श्रेणी , whereas ``  No .
in season ''  refers to the एपीसोड  's number in each particular season .
`` U.S. viewers  ( लाख ) '' refers to the क्रमांक  of Americans in millions who watched the episode live .
A total of 121  एपीसोड of खोया यहूद उत्पादित  , the last of which aired on May 23 , 2010 .
All seasons are available on DVD in Regions 1–4 and  on blu-ray in regions a और  B .
Flat feet ( also called pes planus or fallen arches ) is a formal reference to a medical condition in which the arch of the foot  collapses , साथ the संपूर्ण एकमात्र of the पैर coming into पूरा or near-complete सम्पर्क साथ  the ground .
In some  individuals ( an अनुमानित  20–30 % of the general population ) the arch simply never develops in one foot ( unilaterally ) or both feet ( bilaterally ) .
तीन अध्ययन ( देखिए citations नीचे in सैन्य खण्ड  ) of military recruits have shown no evidence of later increased injury , or foot problems , due to flat feet , in a population of people who reach military service age without prior foot problems .
However , these studies can not be used to judge possible future  क्षति इससे इस कंडीशन जब diagnosed  at younger ages .
They also can not be applied to persons whose flat feet are associated  साथ पैर लक्षण , or निश्चित लक्षण in अन्य भाग of the देह ( ऐसे as  the leg or back ) possibly referable to the foot .
Generation X , commonly abbreviated to Gen X , is the  पीढी born बाद the  Western post-World War II baby boom .
demographers , इतिहासकारों और टीकाकारों उपयोग  beginning birth dates from the early 1960s to the early 1980s .
The term was  popularized by डगलस coupland 's  1991 novel Generation X : Tales for an Accelerated Culture .
Before that , it  था महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये विभिन्न subcultures  or countercultures after the 1950s .
दबाव छाले , भी ज्ञात as decubitus छाले or bedsores , हैं स्थानीयकृत चोटों to the स्किन and/or underlying  tissue usually over a bony prominence , as a result of pressure , or pressure in combination with shear and/or friction .
Most commonly this will be the sacrum , coccyx , heels or the hips , but other sites such as  the elbows , अदब , ankles or the वापस of the cranium  can be affected .
The cause of pressure  छाले is दबाव लागू  to soft tissue so that blood flow to the soft tissue is completely or partially obstructed .
shear is भी a कारण  ; shear pulls on blood vessels that feed the skin .
Pressure  छाले सबसे commonly develop in व्यक्तियों  who are not moving about or are confined to wheelchairs .
It is widely believed that other factors can influence the tolerance of skin for pressure  और shear thereby increasing the रिस्क of दबाव  ulcer development .
These factors are protein-calorie malnutrition , microclimate ( skin wetness caused by sweating or incontinence ) , diseases that reduce blood flow to the skin , such  as arteriosclerosis or रोगों कि reduce the अहसास in the स्किन , ऐसे as paralysis  or neuropathy .
The healing of pressure  छाले may be slowed by the आयु of the व्यक्ति , चिकित्सा शर्तें (  such as arteriosclerosis , diabetes or infection ) , smoking or medications such as antiinflammatory drugs .
Although often prevented and treatable if found early , pressure ulcers can be very  मुश्किल to prevent in critically बीमार मरीजों , frail बड़ो , व्हीलचेयर उपयोक्ता ( विशेषकर जहाँ स्पाइनल  injury is involved ) and terminally ill patients .
Primary prevention is to  redistribute दबाव by turning the रोगी  regularly .
the लाभ of turning to avoid further sores  is well documented since at least the 19th century .
In addition to turning and re-positioning the patient in bed or wheelchair , eating a balanced diet with adequate protein  और keeping the स्किन फ़्री इससे एक्सपोज़र to मूत्र  and stool is very important .
The prevalence of  दबाव छाले in हॉस्पिटल जमावट is ऊँची  , but improvements are being made .
According to the 2010 IPUP ( International Pressure Ulcer Prevalence Survey ) conducted in Canada , there was a significant decrease  in the overall facility-acquired व्यापकता of दबाव छाले  from 2009-2010 .
Ulcers were most commonly identified at the sacral/coccyx ulcer location ; however  , एड़ी छाले यहूद the सबसे आम facility-acquired स्थान  in the survey .

Green Bay is a city in and the county seat of Brown County in the U.S.  राज्य of विस्कॉन्सिन , स्तिथ at the सिर of ग्रीन  Bay , a sub-basin of Lake Michigan , at the mouth of the Fox River .
It has an elevation of above  समुद्र स्तर और  is located north of Milwaukee .
the जनसांख्यिकी  was 104,057 at the 2010 census .
It is the third-largest city in the state of  विस्कॉन्सिन , बाद मिल्वौकी और  Madison .
It is also the third-largest  नगर on the वेस्ट shore  of Lake Michigan , after Chicago and Milwaukee .
Green Bay is home to the Green Bay Packers of the National Football League , making it by far the  smallest महानगर क्षेत्रफल in  the USA to host a major professional sports franchise .
Green Bay is the principal city of the Green Bay  महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल , जिससे कवर भूरा , kewaunee , और oconto  Counties and had a combined population of 282,599 at the 2000 census .
Green Bay is an industrial city with several meatpacking and  पेपर पौधे , और a बंदरगाहों on ग्रीन खाड़ी , an भुजा of झील मिशिगन  that locals call the Bay of Green Bay , to avoid conflating it with the eponymous city .
It is home to the National Railroad Museum ; the Neville Public Museum , with exhibitions of art , history , and  विज्ञान ; और the विश्वविद्यालयों of wisconsin–green खाड़ी  .
Luteinizing hormone ( LH , also known as lutropin and sometimes lutrophin ) is a hormone  उत्पादित by gonadotroph कोशिकाएं in the अग्रवर्ती pituitary  gland .
In females  , an अधि वृद्धि of lh  ( `` LH surge '' ) triggers ovulation and development of the corpus luteum .
In males , where LH had  भी महरूम पुकारा अंतरालीय  cell-stimulating hormone ( ICSH ) , it stimulates Leydig cell production of testosterone .
It acts  synergistically साथ  FSH .
सेलिना quintanilla-pérez ( अप्रैल 16  , 1971 – March 31 , 1995 ) , known simply as Selena , was an American singer-songwriter .
She was named the `` top Latin artist of the '90s '' and `` Best  selling लैटिन कलाकार of the दशक '' by बिलबोर्ड लिये उसके चौदह top-ten  singles in the Top Latin Songs chart , including seven number-one hits .
Selena  था the सबसे कामयाब singles of 1994  and 1995 , `` Amor Prohibido `` and `` No Me Queda Más `` .
She was called `` The Queen  of tejano म्यूज़िक ``  and the Mexican equivalent of Madonna .
Selena released her  पहला एल्बम , सेलिना y लॉस  Dinos , at the age of twelve .
She won Female Vocalist of the Year at the 1987 Tejano  म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार और उतरा a रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध साथ emi  a few years later .
Her fame grew throughout the early 1990s , especially in Spanish-speaking countries , and she  था begun रिकॉर्डिंग  in English as well .
Selena was murdered at the age of 23 on March 31 , 1995 by Yolanda Saldívar , the  पूर्व अध्यक्ष of उसके प्रशंसक क्लबों .
On April 12 , 1995 , two  सप्ताह बाद उसके मौत , जार्ज W. बुश , राज्यपाल  of Texas at the time , declared her birthday `` Selena Day '' in Texas .
Warner Bros. produced Selena ,  a फिल्मी आधारित on उसके जीवन अभिनीत जेनिफर लोपेज़ , in 1997 .
Selena 's life was  भी the आधार of the musical  Selena Forever starring Veronica Vazquez as Selena .
In June  2006 सेलिना थी commemorated साथ a life-sized कांस्य  statue ( Mirador de la Flor in Corpus Christi , Texas ) and a Selena museum opened there .
She has sold over  60 लाख एल्बम विश्वव्यापी , बनाना उसके एक of  the best-selling artists of all time .
She is also  the तभी मादा कलाकार to have पाँच  albums in U.S . Billboard 200 at the same time .
German  stahlhelm इससे संसार  War II
Insignia of the Bolivian Army Colorados regiment  , प्रर्दशित a stahlhelm और दो  crossed bayonets
Stahlhelm ( plural ,  stahlhelme ) is जर्मनी लिये  `` steel helmet '' .
The Imperial German Army began to replace  the परंपरागत boiled-leather pickelhaube ( spiked  combat helmet ) with the Stahlhelm during World War I in 1916 .
The term Stahlhelm refers both to a generic steel  हेल्मेट , और अधिक specifically to the distinctive  ( and iconic ) German design .
The Stahlhelm , with its distinctive `` coal scuttle `` shape , was an instantly recognizable icon  लिये सैन्य imagery और became a आम तत्व of सैन्य प्रचार on दोनो पहलू  , just like the Pickelhaube before it .
Its name was  भी प्रयुक्त by the stahlhelm , a अर्धसैनिक  nationalist organization established at the end of 1918 .
Glow-in-the-dark  may refer  to:
Bioluminescence , the production and  उत्सर्जन of लाइट by a जीना सजीव
Chemiluminescence  , is the उत्सर्जन of लाइट  ( luminescence ) without emission of heat
Phosphorescence , a specific type of photoluminescence  सम्बन्धित to प्रतिदीप्ति
radioluminescence , उत्पादन of संदीप्ति in  a material by the bombardment of ionizing radiation
Glow in the Dark Tour  , a 2008 कॉन्सर्ट दौरे by  Kanye West
Frankfurt Airport serves as a hub city for Lufthansa and  receives फ़्लाइट इससे स्टार गठबंधन वाहक  .
Airline hubs are airports ranked as large , medium , small , and non-hubs as one of the FAA airport  श्रेणी जिससे हैं re-evaluated प्रत्येक साल आधारित on क्रमांक of वाणिज्यिक यात्री  .
The more common but informal use for the phrase airline hub is an airport that an airline uses  as a ट्रांसफ़र पाइंट to मिलेंगी यात्री to उनके intended गंतव्य  .
it is भाग of a हब और spoke मॉडल , जहाँ travelers चलती between एयरपोर्ट नहीं  served by direct flights change planes en route to their destinations .
इस is as opposed to  the Point to Point model .
Many hubs of the  एयरलाइंस हैं भी situated  at airports in the cities of the respective head offices .
Some airlines may use only a  सिंगल हब , जबकि  other airlines use multiple hubs .
hubs हैं प्रयुक्त लिये दोनो यात्री  flights as well as cargo flights .
Many airlines also use focus cities , which  फलन much the वही as  hubs .
Airlines may also use secondary hubs , a non-technical  पद  for large focus cities .
A hub in the middle of a route is more effective  than at either समाप्त as connecting ट्रैफ़िक अधिक easily भरता the प्लेन - यात्री prefer a one-stop (  two-leg ) route over a two-stop ( three-leg ) route .
Hollow  lacedaemon  .
Site of the  menelaion , the shrine to हेलेन और menelaus constructed  anciently in the Bronze Age city that stood on the hill of Therapne on the left bank of the Eurotas River overlooking the future site of Dorian Sparta .
आरपार the घाटी  the successive ridges of Mount Taygetus are in evidence .
Sparta ( Doric Greek : ; Attic Greek : ) , or Lacedaemon , was a prominent city-state in ancient Greece ,  situated on the बैंको of the eurotas नदी in laconia , in  south-eastern Peloponnese .
It emerged as a political entity around the 10th century BC , when the invading Dorians  subjugated the लोकल , non-dorian जनसांख्यिकी  .
around 650 bc , it  rose to become the dominant military land-power in ancient Greece .
Given its military  pre-eminence , स्पार्टा थी पहचाना as the overall नेता of the संयुक्त  Greek forces during the Greco-Persian Wars .
Between 431 and 404 BC  , स्पार्टा थी the प्रिंसिपल दुश्मन of एथेंस दौरान the peloponnesian  War , from which it emerged victorious , though at great cost .
स्पार्टा 's शिकस्त by thebes in the बैटल  of Leuctra in 371 BC ended Sparta 's prominent role in Greece .
However , it  कायम इसके राजनैतिक स्वतंत्रता जबतक the  Roman conquest of Greece in 146 BC .
It then underwent a long period of decline , especially in the Middle Ages ,  जब अनेक spartans स्थानांतरित to  live in Mystras .
Modern Sparta is the capital of the Greek regional unit of  laconia और a बीच लिये the प्रसंस्करण of goods  such as citrus and olives .
Sparta was unique in ancient Greece for its social system  और संविधान , जिससे completely केन्द्रित on सैन्य प्रशिक्षण  and excellence .
Its inhabitants were classified as Spartiates ( Spartan citizens , who enjoyed full rights ) , Mothakes ( non-Spartan free men raised as Spartans ) , Perioikoi (  freedmen ) , और helots ( state-owned serfs , enslaved non-spartan लोकल  population ) .
Spartiates underwent the rigorous agoge training  और शिक्षा regimen , और spartan phalanges  were widely considered to be among the best in battle .
spartan महिलाओं enjoyed considerably अधिक  rights and equality to men than elsewhere in the classical world .
Sparta was the subject of  fascination in इसके अपना दिन , as खूब as in the वेस्ट following  the revival of classical learning .
This  प्रेम or admiration  of Sparta is known as Laconism or Laconophilia .
Fantasy football is an interactive competition in  जिससे उपयोक्ता compete विरूद्ध प्रत्येक  other as general managers of virtual teams .
The players that an individual is able to manage are  पेशेवर अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल खिलाड़ी in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग  .
The different actions people are able to make are drafting ,  व्यापार , adding or छोड़ने खिलाड़ी , और बदलना  rosters .
Due to the growth of the Internet , Fantasy football has vastly increased in popularity , particularly  क्युकी काल्पनिक फ़ुटबॉल प्रदाताओं ऐसे as ईएसपीएन , याहू , सीबीएस , और the एनएफएल itself हैं समर्थ to रखना track of आंकडे entirely ऑनलाइन , eliminating  the need to check box scores and newspapers regularly to keep track of players .
Most  लीग have a सिंगल सप्ताह चैंपियनशिप  in Week 16 of the NFL season .
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100 , based  on un 2010 projections ( रेड , नारंगी , ग्रीन  ) and US Census Bureau historical estimates ( black ) .
Actual recorded population  आंकड़े हैं in ब्लू  .
According to the highest estimate , the world population may rise to 16  अरब by 2100 ; according to the  lowest estimate , it may decline to 6 billion .
The world population is  the कुल क्रमांक of जीना इंसानो  on Earth .
As of today , it is estimated to number billion by  the संयुक्त राज्य  Census Bureau ( USCB ) .
The USCB  estimates कि the संसार जनसांख्यिकी exceeded  7 billion on March 12 , 2012 .
According to a separate estimate by the United  राष्ट्र जनसांख्यिकी निधि , it पहुँचे  this milestone on October 31 , 2011 .
The world  जनसांख्यिकी रै अनुभवी निरन्तर  growth since the end of the Great Famine and the Black Death in 1350 , when it stood at around 370 million .
The highest rates of growth – global population increases  ऊपर 1.8 % प्रति साल – यहूद देखी briefly दौरान the 1950s , और लिये  a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s .
The growth rate peaked at 2.2  % in 1963 , और था अस्वीकृत  to 1.1 % by 2011 .
Total annual births were highest  in the लेट 1980s at परिचय 138 लाख , और हैं अभी अपेक्षित to remain essentially  constant at their 2011 level of 134 million , while deaths number 56 million per year , and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040 .
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the near  भविष्य ( लकिन a स्थिर मनाही in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट ) , साथ the वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी अपेक्षित  to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050 .
Various longer-term estimates predict further growth , stagnation  , or भी overall मनाही in the वैश्विक  population by 2150 .
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further  संसार जनसांख्यिकी विकास , citing the growing pressures on the पर्यावरण  , global food supplies , and energy resources .
skeletal मांसपेशियां  homo sapiens
This  is a तालिका of मांसपेशियां of  the human anatomy .
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human , and almost every muscle constitutes one part of a pair of  एकसमान द्विपक्षीय मांसपेशियां , मिला on दोनो पहलू , resulting in लगभग 320  pairs of muscles , as presented in this article .
Nevertheless , the exact number is difficult to define because  अलग स्त्रोत समूह मांसपेशियां differently , e.g . regarding कया is पारिभाषित as  different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles .
उदाहरण दायरा  from 640 to 850 .
The muscles of the human body can be categorized into a number of groups  जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the सिर और गर्दन , मांसपेशियां of the धड़ or  trunk , muscles of the upper limbs , and muscles of the lower limbs .
the कार्रवाई refers to the कार्रवाई  of each muscle from the standard anatomical position .
In other positions ,  अन्य क्रियाएँ may be performed  .
A gold bar is a quantity of refined metallic gold of any shape that is made by a bar producer meeting  मानक शर्तें of manufacture , labeling , और रिकार्ड  keeping .
Larger gold bars that are produced by  pouring the molten मेटल into molds हैं पुकारा  ingots .
Smaller bars may be  manufactured by minting or stamping इससे appropriately  rolled gold sheets .
The standard gold bar held as gold reserves by central banks and traded among bullion dealers is the 400-troy-ounce  ( 12.4 kg or 438.9 औंस  ) Good Delivery gold bar .
The kilobar  , जिससे is to कह 1000 गामा in द्रव्यमान  , is the bar that is more manageable and is used extensively for trading and investment .
The premium on these bars when traded is very low over the spot  मान of the  gold making it ideal for small transfers between banks and traders .
Most kilobars are flat ,  हालांकि कुछ निवेशकों , विशेषकर  in Europe , prefer the brick shape .
Elisha Archibald `` Archie '' Manning III ( born May 19 , 1949 ) is a  पूर्व अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक in the नेशनल  Football League , playing for the New Orleans Saints from 1971 to 1982 , then for the Houston Oilers and Minnesota Vikings .
He is the father of current Denver Broncos quarterback Peyton Manning , current New York Giants starting quarterback Eli  मैनिंग , और पूर्व ओले मिस receiver कूपर मैनिंग  .
Advocacy is a political process by an individual or group  जिससे aims to influence public-policy और संसाधन आवंटन  decisions within political , economic , and social systems and institutions .
Advocacy can include many activities that a person or  संगठन undertakes सहित मीडिया अभियान , पब्लिक  speaking , commissioning and publishing research or polls or the filing of an amicus brief .
Lobbying ( often by lobby groups ) is a form of  वकालत जहाँ a सीधा दृष्टिकोण  is made to legislators on an issue which plays a significant role in modern politics .
Research is beginning to explore how advocacy groups in the U.S. and Canada are  using सोशल मीडिया to सुकर नागरिक  engagement and collective action .
The flag of Mexico ( Spanish : Bandera de México ) is a vertical tricolor of green , white , and red with the national coat of arms  चार्ज in the बीच of the  white stripe .
While the meaning of the colors has changed over time ,  ये तीन रंगों यहूद अपनाया by मैक्सिको following स्वतंत्रता इससे स्पेन  during the country 's War of Independence , and subsequent First Mexican Empire .
The current flag  थी अपनाया in 1968 , लकिन the overall डिज़ाइन रै महरूम  used since 1821 , when the First National Flag was created .
The current law of national  प्रतीकों , विधि on the नेशनल बाहें , ध्वज ,  and Anthem , that governs the use of the national flag has been in place since 1984 .
रेड , श्वेत , और ग्रीन हैं the रंगों  of the national liberation army in Mexico .
The central emblem is the Aztec pictogram for Tenochtitlan (  अभी मैक्सिको नगर ) , the बीच of उनके  empire .
It recalls the legend  कि प्रेरित the aztecs to settle on  what was originally a lake-island .
The form of the  कोट of बाहें थी सबसे recently  revised in 1968 .
A ribbon  in the नेशनल रंगों is at the  bottom of the coat of arms .
Throughout history  , the ध्वज रै बदला चार टाइम्स , as the डिज़ाइन  of the coat of arms and the length-width ratios of the flag have been modified .
However , the coat of  बाहें रै था the वही सुविधाएँ throughout : an त्रिभुज , पकड़कर a serpent  in its talon , is perched on top of a prickly pear cactus ; the cactus is situated on a rock that rises above a lake .
The coat of arms is derived from an Aztec  लेजेंड कि उनके देवताओं बताई उन्हें to निर्माण a नगर जहाँ वे स्पॉट an त्रिभुज on  a nopal eating a serpent , which is now Mexico City .
The current national flag , the  चौथी नेशनल ध्वज , is भी प्रयुक्त as the  Mexican naval ensign by ships registered in Mexico .
A destination marketing organization or convention and visitor bureau promotes a town ,  नगर , प्रदेश , or देश in अनुक्रम to बढ़ाएँ  the number of visitors .
It promotes the development and  विपणन of a गंतव्य , focusing on सम्मेलन बिक्री , पर्यटन विपणन  , and services .
Such organizations promote economic development of a destination by increasing visits from tourists and business travelers , which generates overnight lodging for a  गंतव्य , विज़िट to रेस्तरां , और खरीदारी revenues .
Convention and visitor bureaus are the most important tourism marketing  संगठन in उनके संबंधित पर्यटक गंतव्यों , as वे हैं सीधे जिम्मेदार लिये विपणन  the destination brand through travel and tourism `` product awareness '' to visitors .
DMOs produce billions of  डॉलर in सीधा और अप्रत्यक्ष आय और कर लिये  their destinations ' economies with their marketing and sales expertise .
Destination marketing organizations are often called  सफर , सम्मेलन , विज़िटर , or पर्यटन  bureaux , welcome centers , information centers and more .
Regardless of the name  , ये संगठन प्रस्ताव अनेक  services to the traveling public .
The elk or wapiti ( Cervus canadensis ) is  एक of the largest प्रजाति of हिरण in the संसार , और एक of the  largest land mammals in North America and eastern Asia .
It was long believed to be a subspecies of the European red deer ( Cervus elaphus ) , but evidence from a 2004  पढ़ाई of the mitochondrial डीएनए indicates कि the दो  are distinct species .
This  एनिमल चाहिए नहीं be  confused with the larger moose ( Alces alces ) , to which the name `` elk '' applies in Eurasia .
अलावा इससे the मूस , the  only other member of the deer family to rival the elk in size is the south Asian sambar ( Rusa unicolor ) .
Elk range in  वन और forest-edge आवास  , feeding on grasses , plants , leaves , and bark .
Although native to North America and eastern Asia , they have adapted well to countries where they have  महरूम introduced , सहित अर्जेंटीना , ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , and New Zealand .
Their great adaptability may  threaten endemic प्रजाति और ecosystems  into which they have been introduced .
Male elk have large antlers  जिससे हैं शेड  each year .
Males also engage in ritualized mating behaviors during the rut ,  सहित posturing , antler कुश्ती ( sparring ) , और bugling , a लाउड श्रेणी of vocalizations  which establishes dominance over other males and attracts females .
नीलगाय हैं susceptible to a क्रमांक of संक्रामक  diseases , some of which can be transmitted to livestock .
Efforts to  eliminate संक्रामक रोगों इससे नीलगाय populations , largely  through vaccination , have had mixed success .
Some  संस्कृतियों आदर the  elk as a spiritual force .
In parts of Asia , antlers and their velvet are  प्रयुक्त in परंपरागत दवाइयाँ  .
Elk are hunted as a game species ; the meat  is leaner और उच्चतर in  protein than beef or chicken .
The George Washington University ( GW , GWU , or George  वॉशिंगटन ) is a व्यापक निजी , coeducational  research university located in Washington , D.C. .
It awards  प्रमाणपत्र , स्नातक डिग्री ,  Masters degrees , and PhDs across several dozen disciplines .
The university  थी चार्टर्ड by an अधिनियम of कॉंग्रेस on फ़रवरी  9 , 1821 as The Columbian College in the District of Columbia .
The lion (  पेंथेरा leo ) is एक of the चार बिग बिल्लियों in the genus  Panthera and a member of the family Felidae .
With  कुछ males exceeding in वज़न , it is  the second-largest living cat after the tiger .
Wild lions  फिलहाल मौजूद in sub-saharan अफ़्रीकी और in एशिया ( जहाँ an endangered remnant जनसांख्यिकी  resides in Gir Forest National Park in India ) while other types of lions have disappeared from North Africa and Southwest Asia in historic times .
Until the late Pleistocene , about 10,000 years ago , the lion was  the सबसे फैली विशाल जमीन  mammal after humans .
They were found in most of  अफ़्रीकी , आरपार यूरेशिया इससे पश्चिमी  Europe to India , and in the Americas from the Yukon to Peru .
The lion is a vulnerable species , having seen a  प्रमुख जनसांख्यिकी मनाही of 30–50 % over the पास्ट दो  decades in its African range .
शेर populations हैं untenable  outside designated reserves and national parks .
Although  the कारण of the मनाही is नहीं fully समझा , आवास घाटा और  conflicts with humans are currently the greatest causes of concern .
Within Africa , the West African lion  जनसांख्यिकी is विशेषकर endangered  .
Lions live for 10–14  सालो in the जंगली , जबकि in captivity  they can live longer than 20 years .
In the wild , males seldom live longer than 10  सालो , as चोटों sustained इससे continual लड़ साथ प्रतिद्वंद्वी males  greatly reduce their longevity .
They typically inhabit savanna and  घासभूमि , हालांकि वे may लो  to bush and forest .
Lions  हैं unusually सोशल  compared to other cats .
A pride of  शेर consists of सम्बन्धित  females and offspring and a small number of adult males .
Groups of female lions typically hunt together ,  preying ज़्यादातर on विशाल ungulates  .
Lions  हैं apex और keystone परभक्षी , हालांकि  they scavenge as opportunity allows .
जबकि शेर do  not typically hunt humans , some have been known to do so .
sleeping मुख्यतः  during the day , lions are primarily nocturnal , although bordering on crepuscular in nature .
Highly distinctive , the male lion is easily recognised by its mane , and its face is one  of the सबसे widely recognised एनिमल प्रतीकों in इंसान संस्कृति  .
Depictions have existed from the Upper Paleolithic period ,  साथ उत्कीर्णन और paintings इससे the lascaux और chauvet गुफाएं , through  virtually all ancient and medieval cultures where they once occurred .
It has been extensively depicted in sculptures , in  paintings , on नेशनल  flags , and in contemporary films and literature .
शेर have महरूम रखा in menageries चूंकि the समय of the रोमन  Empire , and have been a key species sought for exhibition in zoos over the world since the late 18th century .
Zoos are cooperating worldwide in  प्रजनन कार्यक्रम लिये the endangered  Asiatic subspecies .
In the history of video games , the seventh generation of consoles is the previous generation , and  शामिल consoles released चूंकि लेट by निन्टेंडो ,  Microsoft , and Sony .
For home  consoles , the सातवाँ पीढी began on 22 नवम्बर 2005 साथ the रिलीज  of Xbox 360 and continued with the release of PlayStation 3 on 11 November 2006 , and Wii on 19 November 2006 .
Each  नई कंसोल introduced a नई प्रकार  of breakthrough in technology .
The Xbox 360 offered games rendered natively at HD resolutions , the PlayStation 3 offered , in addition to FHD gaming ,  hd फिल्म प्लेबैक via a built-in 3d blu-ray डिस्क खिलाड़ी , और the वी केन्द्रित  on integrating controllers with movement sensors as well as joysticks .
Joining Nintendo in the motion market ,  सोनी released the प्लेस्टेशन मूव in सितंबर  2010 .
The PlayStation Move features  गति संवेदन गेमिंग , समान to कि of the  Wii .
microsoft भी joined सोनी  and Nintendo , with its Kinect .
नापसंद the अन्य दो प्रणालियों ( प्लेस्टेशन 3 और वी ) , kinect करता  not use any controllers of any sort and makes the users the `` controller . ''
Having sold 8 million  इकाई in इसके पहला 60 दिनों on the मार्केट , kinect रै claimed the गिनीज  World Record of being the `` fastest selling consumer electronics device '' .
While the Xbox 360 offers wired controllers as a standalone product , all PlayStation 3  परिरक्षक can be प्रयुक्त in तार और बेतार  configurations .
starting साथ हैंडहेल्ड consoles , the सातवाँ पीढी began on 21 नवम्बर 2004 साथ the उत्तर अमरीकी परिचय  of the Nintendo DS as a `` third pillar '' , alongside Nintendo 's existing Game Boy Advance and GameCube consoles .
The Nintendo DS ( NDS ) features a touch  स्क्रीन और built-in  microphone , and supports wireless IEEE 802.11 ( Wi-Fi ) standards .
Additionally , the revised version of the NDS , the DSi  , सुविधाएँ दो निर्मित in कैमरे  , the ability to download games from the DSi store , and a web browser .
The PlayStation Portable , or PSP , released later the same year on 12 December 2004  , followed a अलग  pattern .
It became the first handheld video game console to use an optical disc format  , सार्वभौमिक मीडिया डिस्क (  UMD ) , as its primary storage media .
Sony also gave  the psp मजबूत multi-media काबिलियत , कनेक्टिविटी  with the PlayStation 3 and other PSPs , and Internet connectivity .
The Nintendo DS  likewise रै कनेक्टिविटी to the अंतरजाल through the निन्टेंडो wi-fi कनेक्शन और निन्टेंडो ds ब्राउजर  , as well as wireless connectivity to other DS systems and Wii consoles .
Despite high sales numbers for both consoles , PlayStation Portable sales have consistently lagged behind those of the  निन्टेंडो ds ; nevertheless , the प्लेस्टेशन पोर्टेबल  has the distinction of being the best-selling non-Nintendo handheld gaming system .
Sgt . Pepper 's Lonely Hearts Club Band  ( प्रायः shortened to sgt . pepper ) is the आठवीं  studio album by English rock band the Beatles .
released in जून 1967 , the एल्बम शामिल गीतों ऐसे as `` साथ  a Little Help from My Friends `` , `` Lucy in the Sky with Diamonds `` , and `` A Day in the Life `` .
Continuing the artistic maturation seen on the band 's album Revolver ( 1966 ) , Sgt . Pepper further departed from the conventional pop rock  मुहावरा of the समय और incorporated  balladry , psychedelic , music hall , and symphonic influences .
During the Sgt . Pepper sessions , the group improved upon the quality  of उनके म्यूज़िक 's उत्पादन जबकि exploring प्रायोगिक  recording techniques .
Producer George  मार्टिन 's अभिनव दृष्टिकोण शामिल  the use of an orchestra .
Widely acclaimed and imitated , the album cover , designed by English pop artists Peter  ब्लेक और jann haworth , थी प्रेरित by a  sketch by Paul McCartney that depicted the band posing in front of a collage of some of their favourite celebrities .
Sgt . Pepper was a worldwide critical and commercial  कामयाबी , बिता 27 सप्ताह at the शीर्ष of the uk  Album Chart and 15 weeks at number one on the US Billboard 200 .
A  seminal कार्य in the उभरते साइकेडेलिक चट्टान स्टाइल , the एल्बम थी  critically acclaimed upon release and won four Grammy Awards in 1968 .
With an  अनुमानित 32 लाख नक़ल बेची  , it is one of the world 's best selling albums .
Sgt . Pepper is considered by many to be the most influential and famous rock album ever , and has  महरूम नामित the महानतम एल्बम of सब समय by दोनो सब समय  Top 1000 Albums and Rolling Stone .
The temporal lobe is a region of the cerebral  cortex कि is स्तिथ beneath the पार्श्ववर्ती फिशर on दोनो दिमागी  hemispheres of the mammalian brain .
The temporal lobes are involved in the retention of visual memories , processing sensory input  , comprehending भाषा , storing नई यादें , जज्बात  , and deriving meaning .
The  इंसान फेफड़े हैं the अंगों  of respiration in humans .
Humans have two lungs , a  सही फेफड़ों और a बाएँ  lung .
The right lung consists of three lobes while the left lung is slightly  छोटी consisting of तभी दो निर्मोक ( the बाएँ फेफड़ों रै a `` हृदय पायदान ''  allowing space for the heart within the chest ) .
Together , the lungs contain approximately of airways and 300 to 500 million alveoli ,  having a कुल सतह क्षेत्रफल of परिचय ( ) in वयस्कों — roughly the वही क्षेत्रफल as एक पक्ष of a टेनिस  court .
Furthermore , if all of the  capillaries कि घेर the alveoli यहूद unwound  and laid end to end , they would extend for about .
Each  फेफड़ों weighs , इसलिए  making the entire organ about .
इंसान  lungs
The trachea divides into two  bronchi ( एक लिये प्रत्येक पक्ष ) at the  level of T4 .
This  जंक्शन is भी ज्ञात as  the carina .
The conducting zone contains the trachea , the bronchi ,  the bronchioles , और the टर्मिनल bronchioles the respiratory मण्डल contains the respiratory  bronchioles , the alveolar ducts , and the alveoli .
The conducting zone  और the respiratory stuffers (  but not the alveoli ) are made up of airways .
The conducting zone has no gas exchange with the blood , and is  reinforced साथ उपास्थि in अनुक्रम to थाम खोलें the एयरवेज़  .
The conducting zone  warms the  air to and humidifies the air .
It also cleanses  the एयर by निकालना अणु via  cilia located on the walls of all the passageways .
The lungs are  घिरी by  the rib cage .
The  respiratory मण्डल is the साईट of गैस एक्सचेंज  with blood .
The sympathetic nervous system via  noradrenaline एक्टिंग on the बीटा receptors  causes bronchodilation .
The  parasympathetic बेचैन प्रणाली via acetylcholine , जिससे  acts on the M-3 muscarinic receptors , maintains the resting tone of the bronchiolar smooth muscle .
This action  is सम्बन्धित , हालांकि माना  distinct from bronchoconstriction .
Many other non-autonomic  बेचैन और biochemical stimuli , सहित कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड और ऑक्सीजन  , are also involved in the regulation process .
The pleural cavity is the potential space between the parietal pleura , lining the  भीतरी वॉल of the thoracic पिंजरा , और the visceral pleura अस्तर the फेफड़े .
The lung parenchyma is strictly used to refer solely to alveolar tissue with respiratory  bronchioles , alveolar नलिकाएं और टर्मिनल bronchioles  .
However , it often includes any form of lung  ऊतक , भी सहित bronchioles , bronchi , रक्त बरतन और फेफड़ों  interstitium .
The margarita is a Mexican cocktail consisting of tequila mixed with Cointreau  or समान नारंगी -flavoured liqueur और लाइम or नीबू रस , प्रायः परोसा साथ नमक on the कांच रिम .
It is the  सबसे आम tequila-based  cocktail in the United States .
The drink is served shaken with ice ( on the  रॉक्स ) , blended साथ बर्फ ( frozen मार्गरिटा ) , or बगैर  ice ( straight up ) .

Burgundy is a dark red  रंग संबद्ध साथ the बरगंडी वाइन of the वही नाम ,  which in turn is named after the Burgundy region of France .
The  रंग बरगंडी is  similar to other shades of dark red such as maroon .
When referring to the color , ``  बरगंडी '' is प्रायः नहीं capitalized  .
The first recorded use of ``  बरगंडी '' as a रंग नाम in अंग्रेज़ी  was in 1881 .

Missing in action ( MIA ) is a casualty Category assigned under the Status of Missing to armed services personnel who are  reported लापता दौरान क्रियाशील  service .
They may have been killed , wounded  , become a कैदी of युद्ध , or उजाड़  .
If  मृतक , neither उनके remains  nor grave can be positively identified .
Becoming MIA has been an occupational risk  लिये सेवा कर्मियों लिये as long as  there has been warfare .
