First  बैपटिस्ट गिरिजाघर at 117 कोरा गली  in Center is located next to the downtown section .
First Christian Church at 124 Cora Street in Center is one of the  oldest congregations in the जातियाँ  .
Center is a city in Shelby County  , टेक्सास , संयुक्त राज्य  .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 5,193 at  the 2010 census .
It is the  काउंटी सीट of  Shelby County .
It is named for its location near the  बीच of शेल्बी काउंटी , नहीं लिये इसके स्थान  in Texas as it is located near the Louisiana border .
Intense red-eye effect in blue  आँखें साथ dilated pupil
The red-eye effect in photography is the common  रूप of रेड विद्यार्थियों in रंग छायाचित्र of  eyes .
It occurs when using a  फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक फ्लैश बहुत बंद to the कैमरा लेंस ( as साथ  most compact cameras ) , in ambient low light .
The effect appears in the eyes of humans and animals  कि have tapetum lucidum .
Theatrical followspot operators , positioned nearly coincidentally with a very bright light and somewhat  दूर इससे the अभिनेताओं , occasionally गवाह red-eye in अभिनेताओं on स्टेज  .
The effect is not visible to  the बाकी of the दर्शक क्युकी it is reliant  on the very small angle between the followspot operator and the light .
The University of California , Santa Barbara ( commonly referred to as UC Santa Barbara or UCSB ) is a public research  विश्वविद्यालयों और एक of the टेन सामान्य campuses of the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया  system .
The main campus is located on a site in Goleta , California , United States , from Santa  बारबरा और उत्तरपश्चिम of लॉस एंजिल्स  .
Tracing its roots back to 1891 as an independent teachers ' college , UCSB joined the University of California system in 1944 and is the  third-oldest general-education कैम्पस in the प्रणाली  .
UCSB is one of America 's  पब्लिक आइवी विश्वविद्यालयों , जिससे recognizes शीर्ष पब्लिक  research universities in the United States .
The university is a comprehensive doctoral university and is organized into  पाँच कॉलेजों और स्कूलों offering 87 undergraduate डिग्री  and 55 graduate degrees .
The campus  is the 6th-largest in the uc प्रणाली by नामांकन साथ  18,977 undergraduate and 2,950 graduate students .
In 2012 , UCSB was ranked 41st among `` National  विश्वविद्यालयों '' और 10th among पब्लिक विश्वविद्यालयों  by U.S. News & World Report .
The university was  भी क्रमित 35th विश्वव्यापी by the टाइम्स उच्चतर शिक्षा संसार  University Rankings and 34th worldwide ( 6th worldwide for engineering ) by the Academic Ranking of World Universities in 2012. < ref name= '' Shanghairanking.com/FieldENG2012 '' >
UC Santa Barbara is a `` very high activity ''  शोध विश्वविद्यालयों और खर्च $ 191.2 लाख on शोध expenditures  in the 2007 fiscal year , 97th-largest in the United States .
UCSB houses twelve national research centers  , सहित the प्रसिद्ध kavli संस्थान  for Theoretical Physics .
UCSB faculty includes five Nobel Prize  laureates , एक फ़ील्ड medalist , 29 सदस्यों of the नेशनल अकादमी of sciences  , 27 members of the National Academy of Engineering , and 31 members of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences .
UCSB was the No . 3 host on the ARPAnet  और थी निर्वाचित to the संघ of अमरीकी  Universities in 1995 .
The UC Santa Barbara Gauchos compete  in the ncaa प्रभाग i बिग  West Conference .
The Gauchos have won NCAA national  championships in मेन 's सॉकर और मेन 's जल  polo .
संत जोसेफ  with the Infant Jesus by Guido Reni
Saint Joseph 's Day , March 19 , the Feast of  st. जोसेफ is in पश्चिमी christianity the प्रिंसिपल feast  day of Saint Joseph , Spouse of the Blessed Virgin Mary .
He is also  the step-father of यीशु  of Nazareth /Jesus Christ .
It has the rank of a  solemnity in the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर ; catholics जो follow  the Missal of 1962 celebrate it as a first class feast .
Previous to  1962 it थी मनाये as a feast  of the rank of double of the first class .
It is a feast or commemoration in the provinces of the Anglican  नियाज़ , और a feast or पर्व  in the Lutheran Church .
Saint  जोसेफ 's दिन is the patronal feast दिन लिये कैंडल as खूब as लिये कनाडा , व्यक्तियों नामित  Joseph , Josephine , etc. , for religious institutes , schools and parishes bearing his name , and for carpenters .
It is also Father 's Day in some  कैथोलिक देशों , मुख्यतः स्पेन  , Portugal , and Italy .
March 19 was dedicated to Saint Joseph in several Western  पंचांग by the दसवाँ सदी , और इस कस्टम थी  established in Rome by 1479 .
Pope St. Pius V extended its use to the entire Roman Rite by  उसके अपोस्टोलिक संविधान quo  Primum ( July 14 , 1570 ) .
Since 1969 , Episcopal  सम्मेलनों may , if वे काश , ट्रांसफ़र  it to a date outside Lent .
Between 1870 and 1955 , a feast was celebrated in honor of St. Joseph as Spouse of the  धन्य वर्जिन मरियम और संरक्षक of the सार्वभौमिक गिरिजाघर , the latter  title having been given to him by Pope Pius IX .
Originally celebrated on the third Sunday after  ईस्टर साथ an अष्टक , बाद divino afflatu of st. पायस x (  see Reform of the Roman Breviary by Pope Pius X ) , it was moved to the preceding Wednesday .
The feast was also retitled The  solemnity of संत  Joseph .
This celebration and its accompanying octave was abolished during the modernisation and  सरलीकरण of rubrics अंतर्गत पोप  Pius XII in 1955 .
It is  स्टिल कायम by catholics  who follow the missal of 1962 or earlier missals .
As the traditional holiday of the Apostles Ss . Philip and James , May 1 , had faded  इससे the मेमोरी of सबसे catholics by the mid-twentieth सदी , कि of जोसेफ the कार्यकर्ता थी निर्मित in अनुक्रम to coincide साथ  the celebration of international Labour Day ( May Day ) in many countries .
The feast of Ss .  फिलिप और जेम्स , जिससे था महरूम मनाये on कि तिथि चूंकि  the sixth century , was moved from its traditional place .
In the new  पंचांग प्रकाशित in 1969 , the feast , जिससे  at one time occupied the highest possible rank in the Church calendar , was reduced to an optional Memorial , the lowest rank for a saint 's day .
The Eastern  परंपरागत गिरिजाघर मनाता  Saint Joseph on the Sunday after Christmas .
Mariah Carey ( born March 27 , 1970 ) is an American singer , songwriter ,  रिकार्ड निर्माता , अभिनेत्री , और लोकसेवक  .
Under the guidance of Columbia Records  कार्यपालिका टॉमी mottola , कैरी released उसके self-titled डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम mariah कैरी in  1990 ; it went multi-platinum and spawned four consecutive number one singles on the U.S . Billboard Hot 100 chart .
Following her marriage to Mottola in 1993 and success  साथ hit रिकॉर्ड भाव ( 1991 ) , म्यूज़िक बक्सा  ( 1993 ) , and Merry Christmas ( 1994 ) , Carey was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act .
Daydream ( 1995 ) made music history when its second single `` One Sweet Day `` , a duet with Boyz II Men , spent a record sixteen weeks on top  of the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 , और remains the longest-running  number-one song in U.S. chart history .
During the recording of the album , Carey began to  deviate इससे उसके r &  B and pop beginnings and slowly traversed into hip hop .
This musical change became evident with the release of Butterfly (  1997 ) , at जिससे समय  Carey had separated from Mottola .
Carey left Columbia in 2000 , and  हस्ताक्षरित a record-breaking $ 100  million recording contract with Virgin Records .
Before the release of her first feature film Glitter ( 2001 ) , she suffered a physical  और emotional विश्लेषण और थी hospitalized  for severe exhaustion .
Following the film 's poor reception , she was bought out of her recording contract for $ 50 million ,  जिससे led to a मनाही in उसके करियर  .
She signed a multi-million dollar contract  सौदे साथ द्वीप रिकॉर्ड in 2002 , और  after an unsuccessful period , returned to the top of music charts with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ) .
Its second single `` We Belong Together `` became her most successful single of the 2000s , and was later named `` Song  of the दशक '' by बिलबोर्ड .
Carey once again ventured into film with a well-received starring  भूमिका in ( 2009 ) ; वो थी awarded the `` भेदन  Performance Award '' at the Palm Springs International Film Festival , and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award nominations .
In a  करियर spanning over दो दशकों , कैरी रै बेची अधिक than 200 लाख  records worldwide , making her one of the best-selling music artists of all time .
In 1998 , she was honored as the world 's  best-selling रिकॉर्डिंग  artist of the 1990s at the World Music Awards .
Carey was  भी नामित the best-selling मादा  artist of the millennium in 2000 .
According to the Recording Industry Association of America , she is the third best-selling female  कलाकार in the संयुक्त राज्य , साथ  63.5 million certified albums .
With the release of `` Touch My Body `` ( 2008 ) , Carey  gained उसके eighteenth क्रमांक एक सिंगल in the संयुक्त राज्य , अधिक  than any other solo artist .
In 2012 , Carey was ranked second on VH1 's list of  the `` 100 महानतम महिलाओं in  Music '' .
Aside from her  वाणिज्यिक accomplishments , कैरी रै जीती पाँच  Grammy Awards , 17 World Music Awards , 11 American Music Awards , and 31 Billboard Music Awards .
Referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the Guinness World  रिकॉर्ड , वो is famed लिये उसके five-octave गायन दायरा  , power , melismatic style and signature use of the whistle register .
A bumblebee  is कोई सदस्य of the मधुमक्खी genus bombus  , in the family Apidae .
There are over 250  ज्ञात प्रजाति , मौजूदा primarily in the उत्तरी  Hemisphere although they also occur in South America .
They have been introduced to New Zealand and  the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई राज्य of  Tasmania .
Bumblebees are social insects that are  characterised by ब्लैक  and yellow body hairs , often in bands .
However , some species have orange or red  on उनके लाशें , or may be entirely  black .
Another obvious ( but not  अद्वितीय ) characteristic is the नरम प्रकृति of the बाल ( long  , branched setae ) , called pile , that covers their entire body , making them appear and feel fuzzy .
They are best distinguished from similarly large , fuzzy bees by the form  of the मादा हिन्द लेग , जिससे is परिवर्धित to रूप a corbicula : a चमकदार concave  surface that is bare , but surrounded by a fringe of hairs used to transport pollen ( in similar bees , the hind leg is completely hairy , and pollen grains are wedged into the hairs for transport ) .
Like their relatives the honey bees , bumblebees feed on nectar  और एकत्रित पराग  to feed their young .
A man  खुलकर carrying a handgun  in a Burger King in Eagle , Colorado .
In the United States , open  carry is आशुलिपि शब्दावली लिये `` खुलकर carrying a firearm in पब्लिक '' ,  as distinguished from concealed carry , where firearms can not be seen by the casual observer .
The  अभ्यास of खोलें carry , जहाँ गन स्वामी खुलकर carry firearms  while they go about their daily business , has seen an increase in the U.S. in recent years .
This has been marked by a  क्रमांक of व्यवस्थित कार्यक्रम intended to बढ़ाएँ  the visibility of open carry and public awareness about the practice .
Proponents of open carry point to history and  आंकडे , noting कि अपराधियों प्रायः  conceal their weapons .
Encouraged by groups like  opencarry.org , georgiacarry.org और कुछ भागीदार of the फ़्री राज्य प्रोजेक्ट , खोलें carry रै देखी a पुनरुद्धार in हाल  years , but it is not yet clear if this represents just a short-term trend .
The gun rights community has been mixed in  इसके जवाब  .
एलन gottlieb of the दूसरी amendment न्यास और the nra have महरूम cautious in expressing support  , while special-interest groups such as the aforementioned OpenCarry.org and GeorgiaCarry.org , and certain national groups such as the Gun Owners of America ( GOA ) have been more outspoken in favor of the practice .
Open carry is strongly opposed by gun control groups such as the Brady Campaign and the  गठबन्धन to रोकें गन हिंसा  .
the cattenom नाभिकीय  Power Plant in France .
France  produces around तीन quarters  of its electricity by nuclear power .
The Grafenrheinfeld Nuclear  शक्ति संयंत्र in जर्मनी  .
चांसलर एंजेला मार्केल 's गठबन्धन घोषित on may 30 , 2011 , कि  Germany’s 17 nuclear power stations will be shut down by 2022 , in a policy reversal following Japan 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster .
Currently  , 68 रिएक्टरों हैं अंतर्गत  construction in 15 countries .
नाभिकीय शक्ति  stations operate in thirty countries .
In 2010 , before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster , it  थी reported कि an औसत of परिचय 10 नाभिकीय रिएक्टरों यहूद अपेक्षित to become operational प्रति साल , हालांकि  according to the World Nuclear Association , of the 17 civilian reactors planned to become operational between 2007 and 2009 , only five actually came on stream .
as of जून 2011 , जर्मनी और  Switzerland are phasing-out nuclear power .
As of June 2011 , countries such as Australia , Austria , Denmark , Greece , Ireland , Italy , Latvia , Liechtenstein , Luxembourg ,  मलेशिया , माल्टा , नई जीलैंड , नार्वे और पुर्तगाल  remain opposed to nuclear power .
Color motion picture film refers both to unexposed color photographic film in a format suitable for use in a motion picture camera , and to finished motion picture film , ready for use  in a प्रोजेक्टर , जिससे bears बिंब in रंग .
The first color  cinematography थी by अर्थात् of योगात्मक रंग प्रणालियों ऐसे as  the one patented in England by Edward Raymond Turner in 1899 and tested in 1902 .
A simplified additive system was developed by George Albert Smith and successfully  commercialized  in 1909 as Kinemacolor .
These early systems used black-and-white film to photograph and project  दो or अधिक घटक बिंब through अलग  color filters .
Still from footage recorded  by एडवर्ड टर्नर  in 1902
With the present-day technology , there are two distinct processes : Eastman Color Negative 2 chemistry (  कैमरा ऋणात्मक स्टॉक्स , duplicating interpositive और internegative स्टॉक्स ) और eastman रंग  Positive 2 chemistry ( positive prints for direct projection ) , usually abbreviated as ECN-2 and ECP-2 .
Fuji 's  उत्पाद हैं  compatible with ECN-2 and ECP-2 .
Ashanti Shequoiya Douglas ( born October 13 , 1980 ) is an American singer-songwriter ,  रिकार्ड निर्माता , और अभिनेत्री  .
Ashanti is most famous for her eponymous debut album , which featured the hit song `` Foolish `` , and  बेची over 503,000 नक़ल in इसके पहला सप्ताह of रिलीज throughout  the U.S. in April 2002 .
The  एल्बम नियत a soundscan रिकार्ड as the biggest  opening week sales for a new female artist , outselling debuts by Alicia Keys and Lauryn Hill .
In the same week , she became the first female performer to simultaneously hold the top two places on the  बिलबोर्ड hot 100 singles चार्ट साथ `` foolish ''  , and `` What 's Luv ? ``
( with  मोटे जो )  .
Ashanti broke records again by having three top ten songs , `` Foolish ,  '' `` कया 's luv ? '' और `` सदा on समय `` , on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट in the वही सप्ताह  , being the first woman to accomplish this feat and being second only to the Beatles .
In 2003 , the  self-titled डेब्यू एल्बम जीती  Ashanti her first Grammy Award for Best Contemporary R & B album .
As of April 1st 2013 ,  ashanti रै बेची over 27.7 लाख  records worldwide .
Ashanti ended the decade ( 2000–09 ) as the  तीसरा शीर्ष नई r & b कलाकार पीछे एलिसिया  Keys and Beyoncé .
वो भी ended the दशक  at number 38 on the Top Artist of the Decade list .
She is currently on the list of The Twenty Best Selling  म्यूज़िक singles चूंकि 1990 लिये उसके सिंगल foolish लिये selling 7.2  million copies to-date .
Ashanti has an  अनुमानित जाल लायक of $  40 million dollars [ USD ] .
Ashanti wrote and sang background on Jennifer Lopez 's `` Ai n't It Funny ( Murder Remix ) `` , which reached number one on Billboard Hot 100 , which  थी भी in the शीर्ष 10 चार्ट at the वही समय as `` foolish '' , `` सदा  on Time '' ( with Ja Rule ) , and `` What 's Luv '' ( with Fat Joe ) .
Later that year , she  थी acclaimed as the `` राजकुमारी of hip-hop &  R & B '' by her label and capped off her successful debut by winning eight Billboard awards and two American Music Awards .
Within  सात सालो of ashanti  's career , she has scored 16 top 40 hits on the Hot 100 .
Ashanti has endorsed numerous  उत्पाद सहित गैप , हर्बल  Essences and Mudd Jeans .
Ashanti cites Whitney Houston , Janet Jackson , Prince , Madonna , Tupac Shakur , Mary J. Blige , Ella Fitzgerald  , नशीले रॉबिन्सन , डोना गर्मियाँ , और ब्लू जादू as उसके musical  influences .
Praised as a gifted songwriter by her peers and critics  alike , ashanti रै written/co-written the बल्क  of all her music .
वो is फिलहाल working on  her own publishing company entitled Written Entertainment .
She released her fourth studio album entitled The Declaration on June 3 ,  2008 और is फिलहाल in the स्टुडियो  working on her fifth .
She also performed the charity tune `` Just Stand Up `` alongside 15 other female singers for the `` Stand Up to  कर्कट '' सजीव टेलीविज़न खास जिससे helped उठाएँ $ 100 लाख  dollars for cancer research .
The United  राज्य फौज एयर शक्तियां ( usaaf or aaf ) थी the सैन्य विमानन भुजा of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका दौरान और तत्काल बाद  World War II , and the direct predecessor of the United States Air Force .
The AAF was a component of the United States Army , which in 1942  थी विभाजित functionally by कार्यपालिका अनुक्रम into तीन autonomous शक्तियां :  the Army Ground Forces , the Services of Supply ( which in 1943 became the Army Service Forces ) , and the AAF .
Each of these forces had a commanding general who reported directly to the  मुख्य of स्टाफ of the संयुक्त राज्य  Army .
The AAF administered all parts of military aviation  formerly वितरित among the फौज एयर corps , सामान्य मुख्यालय एयर फ़ोर्स , और मैदान शक्तियां corps क्षेत्रफल कमांडरों , और यूँ became the पहला एयर  organization of the U.S. Army to control its own installations and support personnel .
in अभ्यास , the aaf थी  virtually autonomous inside the Army .
The peak size of the AAF was over 2.4 million men and women in  सेवा और nearly 80,000 वायुयान in 1944 , और 783 घरेलू  bases in December 1943 .
By VE Day it had 1.25 million men  stationed विदेशी और संचालित इससे  more than 1,600 airfields worldwide .
The Air Corps became the Army Air  शक्तियां in जून 1941 to provide the एयर भुजा a वृहद स्वायत्तता in जिससे to विस्तार अधिक efficiently , और to provide a ढांचा लिये  the additional command echelons required by a vastly increased force .
Although other nations already had separate air forces independent of  the फौज or नेवी ( ऐसे as the अंग्रेजों royal एयर फ़ोर्स और the जर्मनी luftwaffe ) , the  AAF remained a part of the United States Army until the United States Air Force came into being in September 1947 .
However , in its expansion and conduct of the  युद्ध , the aaf became अधिक  than just an arm of the greater organization .
By the end of World War II the AAF had  become वस्तुतः an स्वतंत्र सेवा  .
By regulation and executive order , the AAF was  a अधीनस्थ एजेंसी of the युद्ध विभाग tasked तभी साथ आयोजन , प्रशिक्षण  , and equipping combat units , limited in responsibility to the continental United States , as were the Army Ground Forces and the Army Service Forces .
In reality , Headquarters AAF controlled the conduct of all aspects of the air war in every part of  the संसार , determining एयर नीति और issuing आदेश बगैर  transmitting them through the Chief of Staff .
This `` contrast  between सिद्धान्त और फैक्ट is ... आधारभूत  to an understanding of the AAF . ''
The Freedom of Information Act ( FOIA ) is a federal freedom of  सूचना विधि कि allows लिये the पूरा or आंशिक प्रकटीकरण of  previously unreleased information and documents controlled by the United States government .
The Act defines agency records subject to disclosure  , outlines अनिवार्य  disclosure procedures and grants nine exemptions to the statute .
It was originally signed into law by  अध्यक्ष lyndon B. जॉनसन , despite  his misgivings , on July 4 , 1966 as and went into effect the following year .
The Federal Government 's Freedom of  सूचना अधिनियम चाहिए नहीं be उलझन  with the different and varying Freedom of Information Acts passed by the individual states .
Many of  those राज्य अधिनियमों may  be similar but not identical to the federal act .
the यूरोपीय संघ ( eu ) is an आर्थिक और  political union of 27 member states that are located primarily in Europe .
The EU operates  through a प्रणाली of supranational स्वतंत्र संस्थानों और intergovernmental  negotiated decisions by the member states .
Institutions of the EU  शामिल the यूरोपीय आयोग , the परिषद of the यूरोपीय  Union , the European Council , the Court of Justice of the European Union , the European Central Bank , the Court of Auditors , and the European Parliament .
the यूरोपीय पार्लियामेंट  is elected every five years by EU citizens .
The EU 's de  facto पूंजी  is Brussels .
The EU traces its origins from the European Coal and Steel Community ( ECSC ) and the European  आर्थिक जातियाँ ( eec ) , formed by the भीतरी  Six countries in 1951 and 1958 respectively .
In the intervening years the community and its successors have grown in size by the accession of new member states and in power by the  जोड of नीति क्षेत्रों  to its remit .
The Maastricht Treaty  स्थापित the यूरोपीय  Union under its current name in 1993 .
The latest major amendment  to the संवैधानिक आधार of the eu , the सन्धि  of Lisbon , came into force in 2009 .
The EU has  विकसित a सिंगल मार्केट through a  standardised system of laws that apply in all member states .
Within the Schengen Area ( which includes 22 EU and 4 non-EU  राज्य ) पासपोर्ट नियंत्रण have महरूम  abolished .
EU policies aim to ensure the free movement of people , goods , services , and capital , enact  विधान in  justice and home affairs , and maintain common policies on trade , agriculture , fisheries and regional development .
A monetary union , the eurozone , was  स्थापित in 1999 और is रचित of 17 सदस्य  states .
Through the Common Foreign and  सुरक्षा नीति the eu रै विकसित  a role in external relations and defence .
Permanent  राजनयिक मिशन  have been established around the world .
The EU is represented  at the संयुक्त राष्ट्र  , the WTO , the G8 and the G-20 .
With a combined population of over 500 million inhabitants , or 7.3 % of the world population , the EU  , in 2012 , उत्पन्न a नाममात्र सकल घरेलू उत्पाद ( जीडीपी ) of 16.584 खरब us डॉलर , representing लगभग 20 %  of the global GDP when measured in terms of purchasing power parity , and represents the largest nominal GDP and GDP PPP in the world .
The EU was the recipient of the 2012  नोबेल सलाम पुरस्कार  .
The Wales national rugby league  टोली represent  Wales in international rugby league football matches .
Currently the team is seventh in the  rlif संसार rankings .
The team were run under the auspices of the Rugby Football League , but an independent  देह , वेल्स रग्बी लीग , अभी रनों the  team from Cardiff .
A  कुल of तीन वेल्श खिलाड़ी have  been entered into the Rugby League Hall Of Fame .
Similar to many other Welsh national sporting teams , Wales strip has  महरूम primarily रेड लिये अनेक सालो , सहित  now .
However in their last World Cup campaign in 2000 they did wear a shirt featuring the  वेल्श ध्वज , adding a टच of ग्रीन और श्वेत  .
the टोली is ज्ञात as `` the ड्रेगन ''  and so the teams logo on the shirt is a red dragon .
The  टोली तिथि वापस to 1907 , बनाना उन्हें the  third oldest national side after England and New Zealand .
And it  थी a touring नई जीलैंड पक्ष कि वेल्स  first played against in 1908 , winning 9-8 at Aberdare .
Since  तब वेल्स have regularly निभाई इंग्लैण्ड , चूंकि 1935 फ़्रांस , as खूब as सत्कार  the touring Australia and New Zealand teams , although they rarely toured themselves , not playing a match in the Southern Hemisphere until 1975 .
For twenty-six years Wales  competed विरूद्ध उनके दो biggest विरोधियों , इंग्लैण्ड और फ़्रांस  , in the European Nations Cup , winning the trophy four times .
Wales have also competed in the World Cup on three  अवसरों , the पहला समय होने in  1975 .
in 1995 और 2000 वे था उनके सबसे कामयाब tournaments  to date , surprisingly making the Semi-Finals on both occasions before being beaten by England and Australia respectively .
Wales failed to qualify for the 2008 World Cup , being the second highest ranked side  नहीं to do so , having खोया to स्कॉटलैंड on अंक अंतर over दो  matches .
In  2008 ऑस्ट्रेलियाई जॉन डिक्सन became the  new head coach and appointed Lee Briers as captain , having played for Wales since 1998 .
In recent seasons Wales have taken massive strides under former player Iestyn Harris who has coached Wales to back to back  यूरोपीय कप सफलताओं , जिससे culminated in a चार राष्ट्र रूप  in 2011 .
Cardiomyopathy ( literally `` heart muscle disease '' )  is the measurable deterioration of the फलन of the myocardium ( the दिल मांसपेशी ) लिये कोई कारण , प्रायः  leading to heart failure ; common symptoms are dyspnea ( breathlessness ) and peripheral edema ( swelling of the legs ) .
People with cardiomyopathy are often at risk of dangerous forms  of irregular दिल  beat and sudden cardiac death .
The most common form of  cardiomyopathy is dilated cardiomyopathy  .
Fuck in its literal meaning  refers to the अधिनियम of यौन  intercourse .
It is an English word that is often used as a profanity , either to  denote तिरस्कार or as an intensifier  .
The origin of  the शब्द is  obscure .
It is usually considered to be first attested to  around 1475 , लकिन it may be considerably  older .
In modern usage , fuck and its derivatives ( such as fucker and fucking ) can be used in the position of  a संज्ञा , a क्रिया , an  adjective or an adverb .
There are many common phrases which make use of the  शब्द , as खूब as a क्रमांक of  compounds incorporating it , such as motherfucker .
Note : this article adopts the U.S. Department of Transportation 's  परिभाषा of a यात्री गाडी , to औसत a car or ट्रक , प्रयुक्त लिये  passengers , excluding buses and trains .
The United States is home to the  largest यात्री  vehicle market of any country in the world .
Overall , there were an estimated 254.4 million  पंजीकृत यात्री वाहनों in the  United States according to a 2007 DOT study .
This number , along with the average age of vehicles , has increased steadily since 1960 , indicating a  growing क्रमांक of वाहनों प्रति capita  .
The Chinese car market ,  however , is poised to जल्द exceed the संयुक्त राज्य ; by the समाप्त of 2012  , there were over 240 million cars on the road in China .
The United States is also home  to तीन विशाल गाडी निर्माताओं  : General Motors , Ford Motor Company and Chrysler , which have historically been referred to as the `` Big Three . ''
Chrysler however is no longer among the top three ; but  is क्रमांक पाँच , पीछे टोयोटा  and Honda .
The motor car has clearly become an integral part of American life , with  वाहनों outnumbering licensed  drivers .
Clinical laboratory in a Hospital setting  प्रर्दशित अनेक स्वचालित analysers  .
A  चिकित्सा प्रयोगशाला or नैदानिक प्रयोगशाला is a प्रयोगशाला जहाँ परीक्षण हैं  done on clinical specimens in order to get information about the health of a patient as pertaining to the diagnosis , treatment , and prevention of disease .
in पोकर , खिलाड़ी construct हैंड्स of पाँच ताश according  to predetermined rules , which vary according to which variant of poker is being played .
These hands are compared  using a हाथ रैंकिंग प्रणाली कि is मानक आरपार सब  variants of poker , the player with the highest-ranking hand winning that particular deal in most variants of poker .
In some  विसंगतियाँ , the lowest-ranking  hand can win or tie .
These hand  rankings हैं भी प्रयुक्त in कुछ अन्य कार्ड खेल  , and in poker dice .
The ranking of a  particular हाथ is increased by सहित अनेक ताश of the वही  card rank , by all five cards being from the same suit , or by all five cards being of consecutive rank .
The  सापेक्ष रैंकिंग  of the various hand categories is based on the probability of being randomly dealt such a hand from a well- shuffled deck .
Bruce Randall Hornsby ( born November 23 , 1954 ) is an  अमरीकी virtuoso ; a सिंगर , pianist , सिंथेसाइज़र  , accordion , and dulcimer player , and songwriter .
Known for the spontaneity and creativity of his live performances ,  hornsby draws अक्सर इससे शास्त्रीय , जैज़ , ब्लूग्रास , लोक , motown , इन्जील , चट्टान , ब्लूज़ , और jam बैंड musical  traditions with his songwriting and the seamless improvisations contained within .
Hornsby 's recordings have been recognised on  a क्रमांक of अवसरों साथ उद्योग पुरस्कार , सहित the बेहतरीन नई कलाकार ग्रैमी  in 1987 with Bruce Hornsby and the Range , the Best Bluegrass Recording Grammy in 1990 , and the Best Pop Instrumental Grammy in 1993 .
Hornsby has also achieved recognition for his solo albums and performances , his touring band Bruce Hornsby and the Noisemakers , his bluegrass project with Ricky Skaggs and  उसके दिखावे as a session- और guest-musician  .
He also collaborated with Grateful Dead and was a member of the band from September  1990 to कूच 1992 , playing at over एक सौ shows दौरान कि  period .
Sugarcane  वृक्षारोपण in ग्रामीण  Cuba
Agriculture in  क्यूबा रै निभाई an महत्वपूर्ण भाग  in the economy for several hundred years .
Agriculture  contributes कम than 10 प्रतिशत to the सकल घरेलू  product ( GDP ) , but it employs roughly 20 percent of the working population .
About 30  प्रतिशत of the देश 's  land is used for crop cultivation .
The inefficient  agricultural उद्योग in क्यूबा रै  led to the need to import large amounts of foods .
क्यूबा अभी imports परिचय 80 %  of the food it rations to the public .
The rationing program  खाते लिये परिचय a तीसरा of the खाना उर्जा  the average Cuban consumes .
Overall , however , Cuba is dependent on  imports लिये तभी 16  % of its food .

Mega Millions ( initially called The Big Game Mega Millions  as the successor of the बिग खेल ) is an अमरीकी multi-jurisdictional  $ 1 lottery game .
The first ( The Big Game ) Mega Millions drawing  थी in 2002 ( देखिए नीचे  ) .
The minimum Mega Millions  advertised जैकपॉट is $ 12,000,000 , सशुल्क in 26  equal yearly installments ( unless the cash option is chosen ) ; usually , the jackpot increases when there is no top-prize winner .
However , despite no jackpot winner for the $  12,000,000 दिसम्बर 18 , 2012 आरेखण , the  jackpot remained at $ 12,000,000 for the drawing to be held on December 21 .
( See below  लिये सूचना on कैसा the खेल 's  jackpot is funded . )
Reflecting common practice among  अमरीकी lotteries , the जैकपॉट  is advertised as a nominal value of annual installments .
A cash value option ( the  usual चुनाव ) , जब चुनी by a जैकपॉट विजेता ( देखिए नीचे ) , pays the  approximate present value of the installments .
Mega Millions currently uses a  5/56 ( श्वेत गेंदें ) प्लस 1/46 ( the आचमन बॉल ) दोगुना  matrix to select its winning numbers .
Each game  लागत $  1 .
In 43 of the 44 Mega Millions jurisdictions ( California is the exception ) , there is an option , called Megaplier ( such  खेल हैं $ 2 प्रत्येक ) जहाँ non-jackpot पुरस्कार हैं  multiplied by 2 , 3 , or 4 .
The Megaplier was made available to all Mega Millions jurisdictions in January 2011 ; it began as a  टेक्सास -only विकल्प  .
Mega Millions is drawn at 10:59 p.m. Eastern time  मंगलवार और शुक्रवार , सहित  holidays .
Mega Millions is administered by a consortium of its 12  असली lotteries और the drawings हैं आयोजित at wsb-tv  in Atlanta , Georgia .
supervised  by the जॉर्जिया लॉटरी  .
The largest jackpot in Mega Millions , as well as  in अमरीकी लॉटरी इतिहास , थी $ 656,000,000 annuitized ( साथ a नकदी विकल्प of $ 474,000,000 ) लिये the कूच 30 , 2012  drawing in which there were three jackpot-winning tickets ; one each in Illinois , Kansas , and Maryland .
All  तीन टिकटें था महरूम claimed as of  April 18 , with each set of winners choosing the cash option .
is a  जापानी manga श्रेणी निर्मित by लेखक tsugumi  Ohba and manga artist Takeshi Obata .
The main  अक्षर is लाइट yagami , a ऊँची स्कूल छात्र जो discovers  a supernatural notebook , the `` Death Note '' , dropped on Earth by a shinigami ( a god of death ) named Ryuk .
The Death  नोट अनुदान इसके उपयोक्ता the क्षमता to मार anyone जिनकी नाम  and face they know , by writing the name in the notebook while picturing their face .
The series centers around Light 's attempt to create and rule a world `` cleansed of evil '' as `` God ''  using the कोपी , और the प्रयत्न of a जासूस  known as L to stop him .
Death Note was first serialized  in 108 अध्याय by shueisha in the जापानी manga  magazine Weekly Shōnen Jump from December 2003 to May 2006 .
The  श्रेणी थी भी प्रकाशित in tankōbon स्वरूप in जापानी starting  in May 2004 and ending in October 2006 with a total of thirteen volumes .
The anime series aired  in जापानी इससे अक्तूबर 3 , 2006  , to June 26 , 2007 .
Composed of 37 episodes , the anime was  विकसित by madhouse और निर्देशित  by Tetsuro Araki .
A light novel based on  the श्रेणी , लिखा by nisio  Isin , was released in Japan .
Additionally ,  विभिन्न वीडियो खेल have महरूम  published by Konami for Nintendo DS .
The  श्रेणी थी adapted into live-action films  released in Japan on June 17 , 2006 , November 3 , 2006 , and February 2 , 2008 .
Viz Media licensed the Death Note manga in North America and has published all the twelve volumes from the series , a 13th  आवाज़ जिससे serves as a `` रीडर 's मार्गदर्शिका '' , as खूब  as the light novels .
The episodes from the  दुश्मनी पहला appeared in  North America as downloadable by IGN .
Viz later  licensed the दुश्मनी श्रेणी और it aired  on Bionix in Canada and on Cartoon Network in the United States .
The live-action films briefly played  in निश्चित उत्तर अमरीकी  theaters since 2008 .
however , none of the वीडियो खेल have यूँ दूर  been published in North America or Europe .
Death  नोट is एक of साप्ताहिक shōnen jumps best-selling  manga series of all time , with sales over 26.5 million copies .
Halloween or  hallowe'en ( a संकुचन of `` सब hallows ' संध्या `` ) , भी ज्ञात as सब hallows ' संध्या , is a वार्षिक जश्न observed  in a number of countries on October 31 , the eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas .
According to many scholars , All Hallows ' Eve is a Christianised feast originally influenced by western European  कटाई त्यौहार , और त्यौहार of the मुर्दे साथ संभावित pagan जड़ें , विशेषकर the सेल्टिक samhain  .
Other scholars maintain that it originated independently of  samhain और रै solely ईसाई जड़ें  .
Typical festive Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ) ,  उपस्थित वेशभूषा पार्टियों , नक्काशी pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns , lighting bonfires , ठहराना bobbing , visiting haunted आकर्षण ,  playing pranks , telling scary stories , and watching horror films .
New York City taxicabs during  midtown फटाफट घंटा  in Manhattan
The taxicabs of New York City , with  उनके distinctive पीला पेंट , हैं a widely पहचाना  icon of the city .
Taxicabs are operated by  निजी कंपनियाँ और licensed by the  New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission ( TLC ) .
it भी oversees over 40,000 अन्य for-hire वाहनों  , including `` black cars '' , commuter vans and ambulettes .
`` Medallion taxis , '' the familiar yellow cabs , are the only vehicles  in the नगर permitted to चुनें up यात्री in जवाब  to a street hail .
Schematic cross section of part of  पत्ता , जाइलम दिखाया as रेड वृत्त at  figure 8 .
जाइलम is एक of the दो प्रकार of हस्तांतरण ऊतक  in vascular plants ( phloem is the other ) .
The word xylem  is निकला इससे the यूनानी  word ξύλον ( xylon ) , meaning `` wood '' ; the best-known xylem tissue is wood , though it is found throughout the plant .
Its basic function is to transport  जल , लकिन it भी transports कुछ  nutrients through the plant .
U.S. women  suffragists demonstrating  for the right to vote , February 1913 .
Women 's suffrage also known  as स्त्री suffrage is the सही of  women to vote and to run for office .
Limited  मतदान अधिकारों यहूद gained by महिलाओं  in Sweden , Finland and some western U.S. states in the late 19th century .
International organizations were formed to coordinate efforts , especially the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय परिषद of महिलाओं ( 1888 )  and the International Woman Suffrage Alliance ( 1904 ) .
In 1893 , New Zealand , then a self-governing British colony , granted adult women the right to vote and the self-governing British colony of South  ऑस्ट्रेलिया किया the वही in 1895 , लकिन भी permitted महिलाओं to चलाएं लिये  office .
Australia federated in 1901 , and  महिलाओं acquired the सही to vote और स्टैंड in संघीय चुनावों इससे 1902 , हालांकि  uneven restrictions on Aboriginal women voting in national elections were not completely removed until 1962 .
The first European country to introduce women 's suffrage was the Grand Duchy of  फिनलैंड , तब भाग of the रूसी साम्राज्य , जिससे भी उत्पादित the संसार 's पहला मादा सदस्यों of पार्लियामेंट  in the 1907 parliamentary elections .
Norway followed , granting  पूरा महिलाओं 's suffrage  in 1913 .
In most Western countries , women 's suffrage came after World I War I I , with some important late adopters being France in  1944 और स्विट्ज़रलैंड in  1971 .
Women 's suffrage has generally been recognized after political  अभियान to obtain it यहूद waged  .
In  अनेक देशों  it was granted before universal suffrage .
Women 's suffrage is explicitly stated as a right under the Convention on the Elimination of  सब फ़ॉर्म of पक्षपात विरूद्ध महिलाओं , अपनाया by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र in 1979 .
The  तेरहवीं टेल ( 2006 ) by डायने setterfield  is a gothic suspense novel , the author 's first published book .
Jehovah 's Witnesses is a millenarian restorationist Christian denomination with nontrinitarian beliefs distinct from mainstream Christianity .Sources for descriptors : • Millenarian : •  restorationist : • ईसाई : • denomination : the संगठन रिपोर्ट्स विश्वव्यापी सदस्यता of over 7.78 लाख adherents शामिल in इंजीलवाद  , convention attendance of over 12 million , and annual Memorial attendance of over 19 million .
They are directed by the Governing Body of Jehovah 's  गवाह , a समूह of बड़ो in ब्रुकलीन , नई  York , that establishes all doctrines .
Jehovah 's  गवाह ' मान्यताओं हैं आधारित on उनके interpretations of the बाइबल  and they prefer to use their own translation , the New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures .
They believe that the destruction of the present world system at  armageddon is निकट , और कि the स्थापना of परमेश्वर 's किंगडम on धरती is the तभी  solution for all problems faced by mankind .
The group emerged from the Bible Student movement —founded in the late 1870s by  चार्ल्स taze रसेल साथ the  formation of Zion 's Watch Tower Tract Society —with significant organizational and doctrinal changes under the leadership of Joseph Franklin Rutherford .
The name Jehovah 's witnesses , based on Isaiah 43:10–12 , was adopted in 1931 to distinguish  themselves इससे अन्य बाइबल छात्र समूह और symbolize a ब्रेक साथ the विरासत of रसेल  's traditions .
Jehovah  's गवाह हैं बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये  their door-to-door preaching , distributing literature such as The Watchtower and Awake !
, and refusing military service  और रक्त transfusions  .
वे consider उपयोग of  the name Jehovah vital for proper worship .
They reject Trinitarianism , inherent immortality of the soul , and hellfire , which they consider to be  unscriptural doctrines  .
They do not observe Christmas ,  ईस्टर , जन्मदिन , or अन्य छुट्टियाँ और कस्टम वे consider to have  pagan origins incompatible with Christianity .
Adherents commonly refer to their body of  मान्यताओं as `` the सच्चाई '' और consider  themselves to be `` in the truth '' .
They consider secular society  to be morally  corrupt and under the influence of Satan , and most limit their social interaction with non-Witnesses .
Congregational  अनुशासनात्मक क्रियाएँ शामिल  disfellowshipping , their term for formal expulsion and shunning .
Baptized individuals who  formally छोड़ हैं माना  disassociated and are also shunned .
Disfellowshipped and  disassociated individuals may आखिरकार be reinstated if  deemed repentant .
The religion 's position  regarding ईमानदार आपत्ति to सैन्य  service and refusal to salute national flags has brought it into conflict with some governments .
Consequently , Jehovah  's गवाह have महरूम persecuted  and their activities are banned or restricted in some countries .
Persistent legal challenges by Jehovah 's  गवाह have बहकावे विधान सम्बन्धित to सिविल  rights in several countries .
Last Tango in Paris ( ) is a 1972 Franco-Italian  रोमांटिक नाटक फिल्मी निर्देशित by बर्नार्डो bertolucci जिससे portrays a हाल अमरीकी विधुर  who begins an anonymous sexual relationship with a young , betrothed Parisian woman .
It stars Marlon Brando , Maria Schneider  , और jean-pierre  Léaud .
The film 's raw portrayal of sexual violence and emotional turmoil led to international  विवाद और खींचा विभिन्न स्तर of सरकारी  censorship .
The  mpaa दिया the फिल्मी an x दरजा  upon release in the United States .
After revisions were made to  the mpaa दरजा कोड  , it was classified as an NC-17 in 1997 .
MGM  released a censored r-rated  cut in 1981 .
The  फिल्मी रै इसके nc-17 दरजा लिये  `` some explicit sexual content . ''
Windows XP is an operating system produced by Microsoft for use on personal  कंप्यूटर , सहित घर और कारोबार desktops , लैपटॉप  and media centers .
First released to computer manufacturers on August 24 , 2001 , it is the second  सबसे लोकप्रिय संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ , आधारित on संस्थापित  user base .
The name `` XP '' is  छोटी लिये `` अनुभव '' , highlighting  the enhanced user experience .
Windows XP  , the successor to खिड़कियाँ  2000 and Windows ME , was the first consumer-oriented operating system produced by Microsoft to be built on the Windows NT kernel .
Windows XP was released worldwide for retail sale on October 25 , 2001 , and over  400 लाख नक़ल यहूद in उपयोग in जनवरी  2006 .
It was succeeded by Windows Vista  in जनवरी 2007  .
Direct OEM and retail sales of  खिड़कियाँ xp ceased on जून 30 , 2008  .
Microsoft continued to sell Windows XP through their System Builders ( smaller OEMs who sell assembled  कंप्यूटर ) कार्यक्रम जबतक जनवरी 31 , 2009  .
On April 10 , 2012 , Microsoft reaffirmed that extended support for Windows XP and Office 2003 would end on April 8 , 2014  और सुझाया कि प्रशासकों शुरू तैयारी  to migrate to a newer OS .
The NT -based versions of Windows , which are programmed in C ,  C++ , और सभा , हैं ज्ञात  for their improved stability and efficiency over the 9x versions of Microsoft Windows .
Windows XP presented a significantly redesigned graphical user interface  , a बदलें microsoft प्रचारित as अधिक user-friendly  than previous versions of Windows .
In an attempt to further ameliorate the `` DLL hell `` that plagued the past versions of Windows , improved side-by-side assembly technology in  खिड़कियाँ xp allows side-by-side संस्थापना , पंजीकरण और सर्विसिंग of अनेक संस्करण of globally  shared software components in full isolation .
It is also the first version of Windows to  उपयोग उत्पाद सक्रियण to कॉम्बैट  illegal copying .
दौरान खिड़कियाँ xp 's विकास  , the project was codenamed `` Whistler '' , after Whistler , British Columbia , as many Microsoft employees skied at the Whistler-Blackcomb ski resort .
according to वेब analytics आंकड़ा उत्पन्न by  Net Applications , Windows XP was the most widely used operating system until August 2012 , when Windows 7 overtook it .
, Windows XP market share is at 38.99 % ,  having decreased लगभग प्रत्येक माह चूंकि at तनिक नवम्बर 2007 , the पहला माह लिये  which statistics are publicly available from Net Applications .
`` Por una Cabeza '' is an Argentine tango with music and lyrics written  in 1935 by कार्लोस gardel और अल्फ्रेडो le प्रभा क्रमशः  .
The name is a Spanish horse-racing phrase meaning `` by a head '' , which refers to a horse  जीतना a रेस by the लंबाई of एक  head .
The lyrics speak of a compulsive horse-track gambler who compares his addiction  लिये घोड़े साथ उसके आकर्षण  to women .
Alfredo Le Pera was a Brazilian from São Paulo , a much Italian-influenced area in  ब्राज़ील , और भी the जन्मस्थान of zequinha de abreu , composer  of Tico-Tico no Fubá .
Le Pera and Gardel died in an airplane crash  in medellín , ( कोलंबिया ) , on  June 24 , 1935 .
Por  ऊना cabeza
The tango has since been  performed by numerous टैंगो orchestras .
Tango scenes with `` Por una Cabeza '' appear in Delicatessen ( 1991 ) , Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ) , Schindler 's List ( 1993 ) , True Lies ( 1994 ) , Titanic ( 1996 ) , Bad Santa ( Uncut  संस्करण , 2003 ) , सब the किंग 's मेन ( 2006 ) , ग्रह 51 ( 2009 ) , एपीसोड 37 of nip/tuck ( 2003–2010 ) , एपीसोड 9 of दक्षिण कोरियाई नाटक श्रेणी मीठी जासूस ( 2005–08 ) , the शुरूआत और समाप्ति क्रेडिट of the दक्षिण कोरियाई नाटक ब्रॉडकास्ट i 'm sorry , i प्रेम  You ( 2004 ) , and the episode `` Down the Rabbit Hole `` ( 2007 ) .
In the movie Frida ( Salma  हायेक , 2002 ) , gardel is सुना  singing it on a radio .
It is also quoted in David Del  tredici 's `` शुभ न्यूज  !
Nilda is Back '' ( from the  सोंग साईकिल miz inez  Sez ) .
In Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ) , the  टैंगो is performed by the `` the टैंगो प्रोजेक्ट '' , जो दरअसल  appear in the dancing scene starring Al Pacino ( the recording used is available on one of their CD albums ) .
John Williams arranged a version of the piece that appears on the album  `` सिनेमा serenade '' साथ the सारंगी सोलो performed by  Itzhak Perlman .
Perlman and Williams  (  conducting ) have also performed the piece together in live concerts .
In 2012 a dance version was released  by the समूह `` da करेरा '' featuring the असली  vocal recording by Carlos Gardel .
The baroreflex or baroreceptor reflex is one  of the देह 's homeostatic mechanisms  for maintaining blood pressure .
It provides a negative  प्रतिक्रिया लूप in जिससे an elevated रक्त दबाव reflexively कल्याणकारी दिल रेट to घटी इसलिए causing रक्त  pressure to decrease ; likewise , decreased blood pressure activates the baroreflex , causing heart rate to increase thus causing an increase in blood pressure .
The  प्रणाली relies on specialized न्यूरॉन्स , ज्ञात as baroreceptors , in the aortic मेहराब  , carotid sinuses , and elsewhere to monitor changes in blood pressure and relay them to the brainstem .
Subsequent changes in blood  दबाव हैं mediated by the  autonomic nervous system .
Atrial natriuretic  पेप्टाइड फ़ॉर्म a समानांतर ऋणात्मक प्रतिक्रिया  loop in an endocrinological contrast to the renin-angiotensin system .
The Loma Prieta earthquake , also known as the Quake of '89 and the World Series Earthquake ,  थी a प्रमुख भूकंप कि struck the सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया on  October 17 , 1989 , at 5:04 pm local time .
Caused by a slip along the San Andreas Fault ,  the भूकंप lasted 10–15 सेकेंड और measured 6.9 on दोनो the  moment magnitude scale ( surface-wave magnitude 7.1 ) and on the open-ended Richter Scale .
The  भूकंप मारे 63 लोगों throughout उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया , घायल  3,757 and left some 3,000–12,000 people homeless .
The earthquake occurred during the warm-up practice for the third  खेल of the 1989 संसार श्रेणी , featuring दोनो of the खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल 's प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल टीमों , the ओकलैंड  Athletics and the San Francisco Giants .
Because of game-related sports coverage , this was the first major earthquake in the United States to have  इसके आरंभिक धक्का ब्रॉडकास्ट सजीव on टेलीविज़न .
Pawn in the  मानक staunton पैटर्न
The pawn ( ♙♟ ) is the most numerous and in most circumstances the weakest piece in the game of chess ,  historically representing infantry or , अधिक विशेषकर , हथियारबंद peasants or pikemen  .
In chess , each player begins the  खेल साथ आठ प्यादे , एक  on each square of the rank immediately in front of the other pieces .
( In algebraic  संकेतन , the  white pawns start on a2 , b2 , c2 , ... , h2 , while black pawns start on a7 , b7 , c7 , ... , h7 . )
व्यक्तिगत प्यादे हैं referred to by the  file on which they stand .
For example , one speaks of `` White 's f-pawn '' or `` Black 's b-pawn '' , or less  commonly ( using वर्णनात्मक संकेतन ) , `` श्वेत 's किंग 's बिशप साहूकार '' or `` ब्लैक 's महारानी 's  knight pawn '' .
It is also  आम to refer to a rook साहूकार , अर्थ कोई साहूकार on the a- or h-file , a नाईट साहूकार (  on the b- or g-file ) , a bishop pawn ( on the c- or f-file ) , a queen pawn ( on the d-file ) , a king pawn ( on the e-file ) , and a central pawn ( on either the d- or e-file ) .
The military forces of the world have differing approaches to the enlistment of  homosexual ( gay और लेस्बियन ) और द्विलिंगी individuals  .
The armed forces of most  विकसित देशों have अभी removed नीतियों excluding non-heterosexual  individuals ( with strict policies on sexual harassment ) .
Nations that permit gay people to serve openly in the military include the 4 of the 5 members of the UN Security Council ( United States ,  संयुक्त किंगडम , फ़्रांस , और रूस ) , the गणतंत्र of चीन ( ताईवान ) , ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , Israel , South Africa , Argentina , and all NATO members excluding Turkey .
Hydrogen  उत्पादन is the परिवार of औद्योगिक  methods for generating hydrogen .
Currently the dominant technology for direct  उत्पादन is भाप reforming इससे hydrocarbons  .
Many other methods are known including  electrolysis और thermolysis  .
In 2006 , the United States  थी अनुमानित to have a उत्पादन क्षमता  of 11 million tonnes of hydrogen .
5 million tonnes of hydrogen were consumed on-site in oil refining , and in the production of ammonia ( Haber process ) and  methanol  ( reduction of carbon monoxide ) .
0.4 million tonnes were an incidental by-product of the  chlor-alkali प्रक्रम  .
हाइड्रोजन उत्पादन  is an estimated $ 100 billion industry .
A basis point ( often denoted as bp ,  colloquially referred to in the बहुवचन as `` bips ''  , also known as a `` beep '' ) is a unit equal to one hundredth of a percentage point , or one part per ten thousand , 1/10000 .
The same unit is also ( rarely )  पुकारा a permyriad , वस्तुतः अर्थ 'for ( प्रत्येक ) असंख्य ( टेन हजार ) ' , और in कि कॉन्टेक्स्ट is लिखा  with which looks like a percent sign ( % ) with two extra zeroes at the end ( like a stylized form of the four zeros in the denominator , although it originates as a natural extension of the percent ( % ) and permille ( ‰ ) signs ) .
A basis  पाइंट is पारिभाषित  as:
1  आधार पाइंट  = 1 permyriad = one one-hundredth percent
1 bp = 1 = 0.01 %  = 0.1‰ = 10−4  = = 0.0001
1 % = 100  bp = 100
Basis points are used as a convenient unit of measurement  in contexts जहाँ प्रतिशत मतभेद  of less than 1 % are discussed .
The most common example is interest rates , where differences in interest rates of  कम than 1 % प्रति साल हैं प्रायः सार्थक to  talk about .
For example , a difference of 0.10 percentage points is  समतुल्य to a बदलें of 10 आधार अंक ( e.g . a 4.67 % रेट increases  by 10 basis points to 4.77 % ) .
Like percentage points , basis points avoid the ambiguity between relative and  निरपेक्ष चर्चाएँ परिचय ब्याज दरों by dealing  only with the absolute change in numeric value of a rate .
For example , if a report says there has been a `` 1 % increase '' from a 10 % interest rate , this could refer to an increase either from 10 % to 10.1 % ( relative  , 1 % of 10 % ) , or इससे 10 % to 11 % ( निरपेक्ष ,  1 % plus 10 % ) .
If , however , the report says there has been a `` 10 basis point increase ''  इससे a 10 % ब्याज रेट , तब we जान कि the ब्याज रेट of 10 % रै increased  by 0.10 % ( the absolute change ) to a 10.1 % rate .
It is  आम अभ्यास in the वित्तीय उद्योग to उपयोग आधार अंक to denote a रेट  change in a financial instrument , or the difference ( spread ) between two interest rates , including the yields of fixed-income securities .
Since certain loans and bonds may commonly be  कोटेड in संबंध to कुछ अनुक्रमणिका or underlying सुरक्षा  , they will often be quoted as a spread over ( or under ) the index .
For example , a loan that  bears ब्याज of 0.50 % प्रति annum ऊपर  the London Interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ) is said to be 50 basis points over LIBOR , which is commonly expressed as `` L+50bps '' or simply `` L+50 '' .
The term `` basis point '' has its origins in trading the `` basis  '' or the स्प्रेड between दो ब्याज  rates .
Since the basis is usually small , these are quoted  multiplied up by 10000 , और hence a `` पूरा पाइंट ''  movement in the `` basis '' is a basis point .
Contrast with pips in  fx आगे बाज़ार  .
The relationship between percentage changes and basis  अंक can be summarized as फ़ॉलो : 1 प्रतिशत पाइंट बदलें = 100  basis points , and 0.01 percentage points = 1 basis point .
So , a bond whose yield increases from 5 % to 5.5 % is said to increase by 50 basis points  ; or ब्याज दरों कि have risen  1 percentage point are said to have increased by 100 basis points .
The British Royal Family is the  समूह of बंद रिश्तेदारों of the monarch of the  United Kingdom .
The term is also commonly applied to the same group of people who are the relations of the monarch in her or his role as sovereign of any of the other Commonwealth realms  , यूँ sometimes at variance साथ आधिकारिक नेशनल शर्तें लिये the परिवार  .
Members of the Royal Family belong to , either by birth or marriage , the House of  विंडसर , चूंकि 1917 , जब जार्ज v बदला the नाम of the  royal house from Saxe-Coburg and Gotha .
This decision was primarily taken because Britain and her Empire were at war with Germany and  दिए the अंग्रेजों royal परिवार 's दमदार जर्मनी ancestry ; it थी लगा कि इसके पब्लिक चित्र  could be improved by choosing a more British house name .
The new name chosen , Windsor , had absolutely no connection other than as the name of the castle which  थी और continues to be a royal निवास  .
Although in the United Kingdom there is no strict  विधिक or औपचारिक परिभाषा of जो is or is नहीं a सदस्य of the royal परिवार , और अलग सूचियाँ होगा शामिल अलग लोगों , those  carrying the style Her or His Majesty ( HM ) , or Her or His Royal Highness ( HRH ) are always considered members , which usually results in the application of the term to the monarch , the consort of the monarch , the widowed consorts of previous monarchs , the children of the monarch and previous monarchs , the male-line grandchildren of the monarch and previous monarchs , and the spouses and the widows of a monarch 's and previous monarch 's sons and male-line grandsons .
On 30 November 1917 , King George V issued Letters Patent defining who are members of the Royal  परिवार ; the टेक्स्ट of the सूचना इससे the लंदन  Gazette is as follows:
In 1996 , Her Majesty The Queen  परिवर्धित ये अक्षर पेटेंट ,  as was evidenced by this Notice from the London Gazette:
In 2013 Letters Patent were issued to extend a title and a style borne by members of the Royal Family to  अतिरिक्त व्यक्तियों to be born , evidenced by इस सूचना इससे  the London Gazette:
Members and relatives of the  अंग्रेजों royal परिवार historically represented the monarch in विभिन्न स्थान  throughout the British Empire , sometimes for extended periods as viceroys , or for specific ceremonies or events .
Today , they often perform ceremonial and social duties throughout  the संयुक्त किंगडम और विदेश on निमित्त of the  United Kingdom .
Aside from the monarch , their only constitutional role in the affairs of government is to serve , if eligible and when appointed by letters patent , as a Counsellor of State , two  or अधिक of जिसको कसरत the प्राधिकार of the क्राउन ( भीतर stipulated  limits ) in the indisposal or absence from the British realm of the monarch .
In the  अन्य realms of the राष्ट्रमंडल  royalty do not serve as Counsellors of State .
However in each such realm the monarch 's  परिवार सदस्यों may अधिनियम on निमित्त of , हैं वित्तपोषित by , और represent  the sovereign of that particular state , and not the United Kingdom .
The Queen , her consort  , उसके children और grandchildren , as खूब as सब पूर्व अधिपति ' children और grandchildren  hold places in the first sections of the official orders of precedence in England and Wales , Scotland , and Northern Ireland .
Wives of the said enjoy their husbands '  पूर्वता , और पतियों of राजकुमारियों हैं unofficially  but habitually placed with their wives as well .
However , the Queen changed the private order of precedence in the Royal Family in favour of Princesses Anne and Alexandra , who henceforth take private precedence over the  duchess of कॉर्नवॉल , जो is वरना the फ्रेम 's उच्चतम रैंकिंग स्त्री बाद  the Queen herself .
She did not alter the relative precedence of  अन्य born-princesses , ऐसे as the बेटियां  of her younger sons .
Haiti ( ; Haitian Creole Ayiti ) ,  officially the गणतंत्र of हैती ( ; ) , is a caribbean  country .
It occupies the western , smaller portion of the island of Hispaniola , in the Greater  antillean द्वीपसमूह , जिससे it साझा  with the Dominican Republic .
Ayiti (  जमीन of ऊँची kyu  ) was the indigenous Taíno or Amerindian name for the island .
The  देश 's उच्चतम  point is Pic la Selle , at .
The  कुल क्षेत्रफल of हैती is  and its capital is Port-au-Prince .
Haitian Creole and  फ्रेंच हैं the आधिकारिक  languages .
हैती 's क्षेत्रीय  , historical , and ethno-linguistic position is unique for several reasons .
It was the first independent nation of Latin America and the Caribbean , the first black -led republic in the world , and the second republic in the Americas when it gained independence in 1804 as  भाग of a कामयाब स्लेव क्रान्ति स्थायी nearly a दशक  .
in 2012 , हैती घोषित इसके इरादे to  seek associate membership status in the African Union .
Haiti is the most populous of the predominantly  francophone स्वतंत्र राष्ट्र  in the Americas .
It is one of only two independent nations in the Americas ( along with Canada ) to designate French as an official  भाषा ; the अन्य french-speaking क्षेत्रों हैं सब  overseas départements , or collectivités , of France .
Haiti is the most populous full  member-state of  the Caribbean Community ( CARICOM ) .
It is  the poorest देश in the americas as  measured by the Human Development Index .
Political violence has occurred  regularly throughout इसके इतिहास  , leading to government instability .
Most recently , in February 2004 , a  तख्तापलट d'état originating in  the north of the country forced the resignation and exile of President Jean-Bertrand Aristide .
A provisional government  took कंट्रोल साथ सुरक्षा provided  by the United Nations Stabilization Mission in Haiti ( MINUSTAH ) .
Michel Martelly , the current  अध्यक्ष , थी निर्वाचित  in the Haitian general election , 2011 .
The island has had a  इतिहास of destructive  earthquakes .
A 7.0  परिमाण भूकंप struck  Haiti on 12 January 2010 and devastated Port-au-Prince .
The highest  विश्वसनीय मौत गिनती थी  estimated at 220,000 .
Haitian  सरकारी estimates  were higher .
The Presidential palace ,  पार्लियामेंट और अनेक अन्य महत्वपूर्ण structures यहूद नष्ट , साथ साथ  countless homes and businesses , leaving hundreds of thousands of people homeless .
The country has yet to recover from the  2010 भूकंप ( और subsequent incidents ) due to दोनो the गंभीरता of  the damage Haiti endured in 2010 , as well as a government that was ineffective well before the earthquake .
United States aid  संगठन have दान  $ 2 billion .
Combined with other international donations , these funds are intended  to योगदान to the पुनर्निर्माण of the  country .
The Bloody Beetroots is the pseudonym of Sir Bob Cornelius Rifo , the  इतालवी इलेक्ट्रो हाउस और dance-punk म्यूज़िक  producer , DJ and photographer .
the खूनी beetroots is well-known लिये  the black Venom mask he wears during performances .
In fact , the only identifying public feature of Rifo is the year `` 1977 '' tattooed across his chest ,  जिससे is दोनो the साल कि the निर्माता और punk-rock  was born .
`` The Bloody Beetroots DJ set ''  contains सर bob कॉर्नेलियस  Rifo and Tommy Tea .
A Motorola  सलाहकार alphanumeric पेजर प्रयुक्त  in Brazil in the 1990s , operated by Teletrim
A pager is a wireless telecommunications device that receives and  प्रदर्शक न्यूमेरिक or टेक्स्ट संदेश , or receives  and announces voice messages .
One-way pagers can only receive messages , while  जवाब pagers और two-way pagers can भी acknowledge , जवाब  to , and originate messages using an internal transmitter .
Pagers operate as part of a paging  प्रणाली जिससे शामिल एक or अधिक फिक्स्ड ट्रांसमीटरों ( or in the मामला of जवाब pagers और  two-way pagers , one or more base stations ) , as well as a number of pagers carried by mobile users .
These systems can range from a  रेस्तरां प्रणाली साथ a सिंगल low-power ट्रांसमीटर , to a देशभर प्रणाली साथ हज़ारों  of high-power base stations .
एक of the पहला व्यावहारिक paging सेवाएं  was launched in 1950 for physicians in the New York City area .
Physicians paid US $ 12 per month for the service and carried a ( 6 oz ) pager  कि होता प्राप्त फोन संदेश भीतर ( 25 mi ) of  a single transmitter tower .
The system was manufactured by  the reevesound कम्पनी  and operated by Telanswerphone .
In 1960 , John Francis Mitchell combined elements of  मोटोरोला 's walkie talkie और ऑटोमोबाइल रेडियो technologies to बनाएँ the पहला transistorized पेजर  , and from this point , paging technology continued to advance , and pager adoption continued to expand , until the early 1990s .
However , by the mid-1990s , as cellular technologies became cheaper and more widely  उपलब्धियाँ , उन्नत सेवाएं began to displace paging as a वाणिज्यिक  product .
Today , pagers exist largely as niche products , finding preferential use in applications such as hospitals , public safety  , और खुदरा स्थितियाँ जहाँ उनके सादगी , ऊँची विश्वसनीयता  , and low cost represent significant advantages .
Reevesville is a town  in dorchester काउंटी , दक्षिण कैरोलिना  , United States .
The population was 196  at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  .
As defined by the U.S. Office of Management and Budget , and used by the U.S. Census Bureau for statistical purposes  तभी , reevesville is शामिल भीतर the charleston-north charleston-summerville  metropolitan area .
Frida Kahlo de Rivera (  born magdalena कार्मेन frieda kahlo y calderón ; जुलाई 6 , 1907 – जुलाई 13 , 1954 ) थी a मैक्सिकन चित्रकार  , born in Coyoacán , who is best known for her self-portraits .
kahlo 's जीवन began और ended in  Mexico City , in her home known as the Blue House .
She gave her birth  तिथि as जुलाई 7 , 1910  , but her birth certificate shows July 6 , 1907 .
Kahlo had allegedly wanted the year of her birth to coincide with the  साल of the शुरूआत of the मैक्सिकन क्रान्ति  so that her life would begin with the birth of modern Mexico .
Her work has been celebrated in Mexico as emblematic of national  और स्वदेशी परंपरा , और by  feminists for its uncompromising depiction of the female experience and form .
मैक्सिकन संस्कृति और amerindian सांस्कृतिक परंपरा हैं महत्वपूर्ण  in her work , which has been sometimes characterized as Naïve art or folk art .
Her work has also been described as `` surrealist '' , and in 1938 André Breton , principal  initiator of the surrealist गति  , described Kahlo 's art as a `` ribbon around a bomb '' .
Kahlo had a volatile  विवाह साथ the प्रसिद्ध मैक्सिकन कलाकार डिएगो  Rivera .
She  suffered lifelong स्वास्थ्य  problems .
Many of her  स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं यहूद the परिणाम  of a traffic accident she survived as a teenager .
Recovering from her injuries isolated her from other people and this  अलगाव बहकावे उसके works  , many of which are self-portraits of one sort or another .
Kahlo suggested , `` I paint myself because I am so often alone and because I  am the विषय i जान बेहतरीन .  ''
She also stated , `` I was  born a कुतिया .
i थी born  a painter . ''
