theresienwiese on the  day before Oktoberfest 2006
Oktoberfest is a 16-day festival celebrating beer  आयोजित annually in म्यूनिख , बायर्न , जर्मनी , कार्यशील इससे लेट  September to the first weekend in October .
It is one of the most famous events in Germany and  is the संसार 's largest मेला , साथ अधिक than 6 लाख  people from around the world attending the event every year .
To the locals , it is not  पुकारा oktoberfest  , but `` die Wiesn '' , after the colloquial name of the fairgrounds themselves .
The Oktoberfest is an important part of Bavarian culture  , having महरूम आयोजित  since 1810 .
Other cities across the world also hold  oktoberfest जश्न , modeled बाद the  original Munich event .
The Munich Oktoberfest originally  took प्लेस दौरान the सोलह  days up to , and including , the first Sunday in October .
In 1994 , the schedule was  परिवर्धित in जवाब to जर्मनी reunification so कि if the पहला संडे in अक्तूबर  falls on the 1st or 2nd , then the festival would go on until October 3 ( German Unity Day ) .
Thus , the festival is now 17 days when the  पहला संडे is अक्तूबर  2 and 18 days when it is October 1 .
In 2010 , the festival lasted until the  पहला सोमवार in अक्तूबर  , to mark the anniversary of the event .
The festival is held in an area named the  theresienwiese ( फ़ील्ड , or मर्ग , of therese ) , प्रायः  called Wiesn for short , located near Munich 's center .
Large quantities of Oktoberfest Beer are consumed , with almost 7  लाख liters परोसा दौरान the 16 दिन पर्व  in 2007 .
Visitors may also enjoy a wide variety of traditional food such as Hendl ( chicken ) , Schweinebraten ( roast pork ) , Schweinshaxe ( grilled ham hock ) , Steckerlfisch ( grilled fish on a stick ) , Würstl ( sausages ) along with Brezeln ( Pretzel ) , Knödel ( potato or  ब्रैड पकौड़ी ) , käsespätzle ( चीज नूडल्स ) , reiberdatschi ( आलू pancakes ) , sauerkraut or rotkohl/blaukraut ( रेड गोभी ) साथ साथ ऐसे bar delicacies as obatzda ( a spiced cheese-butter स्प्रेड ) और weisswurst ( a श्वेत सॉसेज  ) .
A platter  साथ चीज और  garnishes
पहियों of  Gouda
चीज is a जेनेरिक पद लिये a विविध  group of milk-based food products .
Cheese is produced in  wide-ranging जायका , बनावट  , and forms .
Cheese consists of proteins and fat  इससे मिल्क , प्रायः the मिल्क of गायों , भैंस  , goats , or sheep .
it is उत्पादित by जामन  of the milk protein casein .
Typically , the milk is acidified  और जोड of the एंजाइम  rennet causes coagulation .
The solids are separated  और दबाया into फाइनल  form .
Some cheeses have molds  on the rind or  throughout .
Most cheeses melt  at कुकिंग तापमान  .
Hundreds  of प्रकार of चीज इससे  various countries are produced .
Their styles , textures and flavors depend on the origin of the milk ( including the animal 's  आहार ) , whether वे have महरूम pasteurized , the butterfat सामग्री  , the bacteria and mold , the processing , and aging .
Herbs  , मसाले  , or wood smoke may be used as flavoring agents .
The yellow to red  रंग of अनेक cheeses , ऐसे as रेड लीसेस्टर , is सामान्यतः formed  from adding annatto .
For a few cheeses  , the मिल्क is curdled by adding  acids such as vinegar or lemon juice .
Most cheeses are acidified to a lesser degree by bacteria , which turn milk sugars into lactic acid , then the  जोड of rennet completes the curdling  .
Vegetarian alternatives to rennet are available ; most are  उत्पादित by fermentation of the  fungus Mucor miehei , but others have been extracted from various species of the Cynara thistle family .
Cheese  is valued लिये इसके पोर्टेबिलिटी  , long life , and high content of fat , protein , calcium , and phosphorus .
चीज  is more compact and has a longer shelf life than milk , although how long a cheese will keep may depend on the type of cheese ; labels on packets of cheese often claim that a cheese should be consumed within three to five days of opening .
Generally speaking , hard  cheeses पिछला longer than नरम cheeses , ऐसे as brie  or goat 's milk cheese .
Cheesemakers near a dairy region may benefit from fresher ,  lower-priced मिल्क , और निम्नतर शिपिंग  costs .
The long storage  जीवन of कुछ चीज , विशेषकर if it  is encased in a protective rind , allows selling when markets are favorable .
अतिरिक्त संघटक may be added  to some cheeses , such as black peppers , garlic , chives or cranberries .
A specialist seller of cheese is  sometimes ज्ञात as a  cheesemonger .
To become an expert in this field , like wine or cooking , requires  कुछ औपचारिक शिक्षा और सालो of चख  and hands-on experience .
This position is typically responsible for all aspects of the  चीज inventory ; selecting the चीज मेनू  , purchasing , receiving , storage , and ripening .
Legal citation signals are a set of brief abbreviated  वाक्यांश or शब्द प्रयुक्त to clarify the प्राधिकार or significance  of a legal citation as it relates to a proposition .
Signals help a reader quickly discern meaning or usefulness of a particular  सन्दर्भ जब the सन्दर्भ itself करता नहीं provide पर्याप्त  information .
सबसे citation सिग्नल हैं लगाई  in front of the citation to which they apply .
For  उदाहरण , in  the paragraph When writing a legal argument , it is important to refer to primary sources .
To assist  पाठक in locating ये  sources , it is desirable to use a standardized citation format .
See  generally हार्वर्ड विधि पुनर्विलोकन संघ  , The Bluebook : A Uniform System of Citation ( 18th ed . 2005 ) .
नोट , however , कि कुछ न्यायालयों  may require any legal papers that are submitted to them to conform to a different citation format .
the signal is the phrase `` see generally , '' which indicates that the citation `` The Bluebook : A Uniform System of Citation ( 18th ed . 2005 ) '' provides general  पृष्ठभूमि सूचना  on the topic .
Neil Alden Armstrong ( August 5 , 1930 –  अगस्त 25 , 2012 ) थी an अमरीकी astronaut और  the first person to walk on the Moon .
He was also an  aerospace इंजीनियर  , naval aviator , test pilot , and university professor .
पहले बनने an astronaut , आर्मस्ट्रांग थी  an officer in the U.S. Navy and served in the Korean War .
After the war , he earned his bachelor 's degree at Purdue University and served as a test pilot at the National Advisory Committee for Aeronautics  high-speed उड़ान स्टेशन , अभी ज्ञात as the ड्राइडेन उड़ान शोध बीच , जहाँ he logged over 900 फ़्लाइट  .
he बाद समाप्त ग्रैजुएट  studies at the University of Southern California .
A participant in the U.S. Air Force 's Man in Space Soonest and X-20 Dyna-Soar human spaceflight programs , Armstrong  joined the नासा astronaut corps in 1962  .
he बना उसके पहला स्पेस उड़ान , as कमांड पायलट  of Gemini 8 , in 1966 , becoming NASA 's first civilian astronaut to fly in space .
On this mission , he performed the first docking of two  spacecraft , साथ पायलट दाउद  Scott .
आर्मस्ट्रांग 's दूसरी और पिछला spaceflight थी as मिशन कमांडर of  the Apollo 11 moon landing , in July 1969 .
On this mission , Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin descended to the lunar surface and spent two and a half hours exploring , while  माइकल कॉलिन्स remained in  lunar orbit in the Command Module .
Along with Collins and Aldrin , Armstrong was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom by President Richard Nixon ; in 1978 , President Jimmy Carter presented Armstrong the Congressional Space Medal of Honor  in 1978 ; he और उसके पूर्व crewmates प्राप्त the congressional सुनहरा पदक  in 2009 .
Armstrong died in Cincinnati , Ohio , on August 25 , 2012 , at the age of 82 , after  जटिलताओं इससे कोरोनरी धमनी  bypass surgery .
Secretariat ( March 30 , 1970 – October 4 , 1989 ) was an American Thoroughbred  racehorse कि in 1973 became the पहला u.s . ट्रिपल क्राउन चैंपियन in 25  years .
He set race records in all three events in the Series — the Kentucky  डर्बी ( 1:59.4 ) , the preakness stakes ( 1:53 ) , और the belmont stakes ( 2:24 ) — रिकॉर्ड  that still stand today .
He is considered to be one of the  महानतम thoroughbreds of सब  time .
In 1999 , ESPN ranked Secretariat the 35th best athlete of the  20th सदी , the उच्चतम रैंकिंग racehorse  on the list URL_http .
He ranked  दूसरी पीछे man o ' युद्ध in the blood-horse  's List of the Top 100 U.S. Racehorses of the 20th Century .
सचिवालय थी sired by  Bold Ruler out of Somethingroyal , by Princequillo .
He was foaled at  the मर्ग in कैरोलीन  County , Virginia .
Like his famous predecessor Man o ' War , Secretariat was a large chestnut  टट्टू और थी दिए  the same nickname , `` Big Red . ''
सचिवालय 's grandsire , nasrullah  , is also the great-great-grandsire of 1977 Triple Crown winner Seattle Slew .
Owned by Penny Chenery , he  थी प्रशिक्षित by lucien laurin और मुख्यतः ridden by कनाडाई jockey रॉन  Turcotte , along with apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano ( first two races ) , and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race ) .
He raced  in chenery 's मर्ग stable 's ब्लू और  white checkered colors and his groom was Eddie Sweat .
Secretariat stood  लगभग  tall , and weighed , with a 75-inch girth , in his racing prime .
Madrid ( , ) is the capital  और largest नगर  of Spain .
The population of the city is roughly 3.3 million and the entire population of the Madrid metropolitan area is  गणना to be around 6.5 लाख .
It is  the third-largest नगर in the यूरोपीय  Union , after London and Berlin , and its metropolitan area is the third-largest in the European Union after London and Paris .
The city spans  a कुल of  .
The city is located on the Manzanares river in the centre of both the country and the Community of Madrid ( which comprises the city of  मैड्रिड , इसके conurbation और विस्तारित उपनगरों और  villages ) ; this community is bordered by the autonomous communities of Castile and León and Castile-La Mancha .
As the capital city of Spain , seat of government , and residence of the Spanish  monarch , मैड्रिड is भी the राजनैतिक , आर्थिक और सांस्कृतिक  centre of Spain .
the वर्तमान महापौर is ana botella  from the People 's Party ( PP ) .
The Madrid urban agglomeration has the third-largest GDP  in the यूरोपीय संघ और इसके प्रभाव in राजनीती , शिक्षा  , entertainment , environment , media , fashion , science , culture , and the arts all contribute to its status as one of the world 's major global cities .
Due to its economic output , high standard  of जीना , और मार्केट आकार , मैड्रिड is माना the प्रमुख  financial centre of Southern Europe and the Iberian Peninsula ; it hosts the head offices of the vast majority of the major Spanish companies , such as Telefónica , Iberia or Repsol .
Madrid is the most  touristic नगर of स्पेन , the fourth-most touristic of  the continent , and the seventh most visited city in the world according to Forbes .
Is the 10th most livable city in the world  according to monocle पत्रिका , in इसके  2010 index .
Madrid also ranks among the 12 greenest European cities in 2010. < ref name= '' http :  //www.citymayors.com/environment/greenest-cities-europe.html '' > मैड्रिड is फिलहाल  a Candidate City for the 2020 Summer Olympics .
Madrid houses the headquarters of the World Tourism Organization ( WTO ) , belonging to the  संयुक्त राष्ट्र संगठन ( un ) , the segib , the संगठन  of Ibero-American States ( OEI ) , and the Public Interest Oversight Board ( PIOB ) .
It also hosts major international  संस्थानों regulators of स्पेनी : the खड़ा कमेटी of the संघ of स्पेनी भाषा अकादमियों  , headquarters of the Royal Spanish Academy ( RAE ) , the Cervantes Institute and the Foundation of Urgent Spanish ( Fundéu ) .
मैड्रिड organizes मेलों as fitur , आरको  , SIMO TCI and the Cibeles Madrid Fashion Week .
While Madrid possesses a modern  अवसंरचना , it रै preserved the dekh और महसूस of  many of its historic neighbourhoods and streets .
Its landmarks include the Royal Palace of Madrid ; the Teatro Real ( Royal theatre ) with its restored 1850 Opera House ; the Buen Retiro Park , founded in 1631 ; the 19th-century National  पुस्तकालयों भवन ( संस्थापित in 1712 ) containing कुछ of स्पेन 's ऐतिहासिक अभिलेख ; a विशाल क्रमांक of नेशनल संग्रहालय , और the सुनहरी त्रिभुज of आर्ट , स्तिथ साथ the paseo डेल प्राडो  and comprising three art museums : Prado Museum , the Museo Nacional Centro de Arte Reina Sofía , a museum of modern art , and the Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum , which completes the shortcomings of the other two museums .
cibeles राजमहल और फव्वारा  have become the monument symbol of the city .
The  पाथ of the via appia  and of the Via Appia Traiana .
Remains of the Appian Way in  रोम , निकट quarto miglio
निकट रोम  .
The Appian Way ( Latin and Italian : Via Appia ) was one of  the earliest और रणनीतिक सबसे  important Roman roads of the ancient republic .
It  कनेक्ट रोम to brindisi  , Apulia , in southeast Italy .
Its importance is  indicated by  its common name , recorded by Statius :
Appia teritur regina  longarum viarum
`` the Appian way is the queen of  the long सड़कें ''
The road is named after Appius Claudius Caecus , the Roman censor  जो began और समाप्त the पहला खण्ड as a सैन्य सड़क to  the south in 312 BC during the Samnite Wars .
The Draupner wave , a single giant wave measured on New Year 's Day 1995 ,  आखिरकार पुष्टि the अस्तित्व of freak लहरें , जिससे था previously  been considered near-mythical
Rogue waves ( also known as freak  लहरें , दानव लहरें , कातिल लहरें ,  extreme waves , and abnormal waves ) are relatively large and spontaneous ocean surface waves that occur far out at sea , and are a threat even to large ships and ocean liners .
In oceanography , they are more precisely defined as waves whose height is more than twice the significant wave height ( SWH ) , which is itself  पारिभाषित as the औसत of the largest तीसरा of लहरें in a वेव रिकार्ड  .
Therefore rogue waves are not necessarily the biggest waves found  at समुद्र ; वे हैं , बल्कि , surprisingly विशाल लहरें लिये  a given sea state .
Rogue waves seem  नहीं to have a सिंगल पृथक कारण , लकिन occur जहाँ शारीरिक कारकों ऐसे as  high winds and strong currents cause waves to merge to create a single exceptionally large wave .
electress sophia of हनोवर  ( 1630–1714 )
the लकीर of उत्तराधिकार to the अंग्रेजों सिंहासन is the  ordered sequence of all those people eligible to succeed to the throne of the United Kingdom and the other 15 Commonwealth realms .
The Act of Settlement 1701 bestowed  उत्तराधिकार on the electress sophia of हनोवर और उसके  descendants while excluding Roman Catholics .
The British government does not publish an official list  of सब those in लकीर to सफल , लकिन the कार्य of genealogical  authors and amateur researchers suggests that there are several thousand people potentially in line .
At a summit in Perth , Western Australia in 2011 , the heads of government of all 16 Commonwealth realms agreed to take steps to adopt  निरपेक्ष primogeniture , समाप्त the exclusion of लोगों शादीशुदा to रोमन catholics ,  and make other changes in the succession rules .
The line of succession is also used to  चुनें the counsellors of राज्य ( और a रीजेंट if the need arises ) अंतर्गत the प्रावधानों  of the Regency Act 1937 .
For earlier versions of the line of succession , see  इतिहास of the अंग्रेजों लकीर of उत्तराधिकार  .
Edward Montgomery Clift ( October 17 , 1920July 23 , 1966 ) was an American film and  स्टेज कर्ता the नई यॉर्क times’ obituary  noted his portrayal of `` moody , sensitive young men '' .
He often played outsiders and `` victim-heroes  '' ; उदाहरण शामिल the सोशल climber in जार्ज स्टीवंस 's a प्लेस in the सूर्य , the anguished कैथोलिक पुजारी  in Hitchcock 's I Confess , the doomed regular soldier Robert E. Lee Prewitt in Fred Zinnemann 's From Here to Eternity , and the Jewish GI bullied by antisemites in Edward Dmytryk 's The Young Lions .
Later , after a disfiguring car crash in 1956 , and alcohol and prescription drug abuse , he became  erratic  .
Nevertheless  महत्वपूर्ण भूमिकाएँ यहूद स्टिल उसके , सहित `` the लापरवाह , alcoholic , mother-fixated रोडियो यजमान  '' in John Huston 's The Misfits , the title role in Huston 's , and the concentration camp victim in Stanley Kramer 's Judgment at Nuremberg . ''
Clift  प्राप्त चार अकादमी पुरस्कार nominations दौरान  his career , three for Best Actor and one for Best Supporting Actor .
The War on Terror ( also known as the Global War on Terrorism ) is a  पद commonly लागू to an अंतरराष्ट्रीय सैन्य अभियान  which started as a result of the 11 September 2001 terrorist attacks on the United States .
This resulted  in an अंतरराष्ट्रीय सैन्य  campaign to eliminate al-Qaeda and other militant organizations .
The United Kingdom and  अनेक अन्य नाटो और non-nato राष्ट्र participate  in the conflict .
The phrase 'War on  आतंक ' थी पहला प्रयुक्त by us अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश  on 20 September 2001 .
The Bush administration and the Western media have since used the term to signify a global military , political , lawful , and conceptual struggle—targeting both  संगठन designated as आतंकवादी  and regimes accused of supporting them .
It was typically  प्रयुक्त साथ a particular फ़ोकस on उग्रवादी  Islamists , al-Qaeda , and other jihadi groups .
Although the term is not officially used by the administration of US President Barack Obama ( which instead uses the  पद विदेशी आकस्मिकता आपरेशन ) , it is स्टिल commonly प्रयुक्त by राजनेता , in the मीडिया और by कुछ पहलुओं of सरकारी  officially , such as the United States ' Global War on Terrorism Service Medal .
German battleship Schleswig-Holstein ,  westerplatte , सितंबर  1 , 1939
Destroyer USS  शॉ exploding बाद उसके आगे पत्रिका थी  detonated during the Attack on Pearl Harbor
The main causes of World War II were  nationalistic मुद्दे , अनसुलझे मुद्दे , और resentments resulting इससे संसार युद्ध i और the interwar काल  in Europe , in addition to the effects of the Great Depression in the 1930s .
The culmination of events that led to the outbreak of war are generally understood to be the  1939 आक्रमण of कैंडल by जर्मनी और सोवियत रूस और the 1937 आक्रमण of the  Republic of China by the Empire of Japan .
These military aggressions were the result of decisions made by the  सत्तावादी सत्ताधारी नाजी elite in जर्मनी और by the नेतृत्व of the  Kwantung Army in Japan .
World War II started after these aggressive  क्रियाएँ यहूद मिले साथ an आधिकारिक घोषणा  of war and/or armed resistance .

The list does not include creatures ; for these ,  देखिए सूची of यूनानी पौराणिक  creatures .
The Mitsubishi Galant is an automobile manufactured by  मित्सुबिशी मोटर्स between 1969 और 2012  .
The name was  निकला इससे the फ्रेंच शब्द galant  , meaning `` chivalrous '' .
There have  महरूम नौ पृथक पीढियां  , and cumulative sales now exceed five million .
It began as a compact sedan , but over the course of its life has  विकसित into a larger mid-size  car .
Initial production was only based in Japan , but since 1994 the American market has been served by vehicles assembled at  the पूर्व diamond-star मोटर्स ( dsm ) सुविधा in सामान्य  , Illinois .
Blood pressure ( BP ) , sometimes referred to as arterial blood pressure , is the pressure  exerted by circulating रक्त upon the दीवारें of रक्त बरतन  , and is one of the principal vital signs .
When used without further specification , `` blood  दबाव '' प्रायः refers to the arterial दबाव of  the systemic circulation .
During each heartbeat , blood pressure varies  between a अधिकतम ( systolic ) और a न्यूनतम  ( diastolic ) pressure .
The blood pressure in the circulation is principally due  to the pumping कार्रवाई of the  heart .
मतभेद in औसत रक्त दबाव हैं जिम्मेदार  for blood flow from one location to another in the circulation .
The rate of mean blood flow depends on the resistance to flow  प्रस्तुत by the रक्त  vessels .
Mean blood pressure decreases as the circulating blood  चालें दूर इससे the दिल  through arteries and capillaries due to viscous losses of energy .
Mean blood  दबाव बूंदें over the पूरे परिसंचरण , हालांकि  most of the fall occurs along the small arteries and arterioles .
Gravity affects blood pressure via hydrostatic forces ( e.g. , during  खड़ा ) और valves in रगों , श्वास , और pumping इससे संकुचन of skeletal मांसपेशियां भी  influence blood pressure in veins .
Blood  दबाव बगैर further specification प्रायः refers to the प्रणालीगत arterial दबाव measured at a व्यक्ति 's अपर भुजा  and is a measure of the pressure in the brachial artery , the major artery in the upper arm .
A person’s blood  दबाव is प्रायः expressed in शर्तें of the systolic  pressure over diastolic pressure and is measured in millimetres of mercury ( mmHg ) , for example 120/80 .
A  वीटो – लैटिन लिये `` i forbid '' – is the शक्ति ( प्रयुक्त by an  officer of the state , for example ) to unilaterally stop an official action , especially the enactment of legislation .
A veto can be absolute , as for instance in  the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा  Council , whose permanent members ( China , France , Russia , United Kingdom , United States of America ) can block any resolution .
Or it can be limited , as in the  विधान प्रक्रम of the संयुक्त राज्य  , where a two-thirds vote in both the House and Senate may override a Presidential veto of legislation .
A veto only gives power to stop  परिवर्तन , नहीं to अपनाना उन्हें ( मगर लिये the विरल  `` amendatory veto '' ) .
Thus a veto  allows इसके होल्डर to  protect the status quo .
The concept of a veto  देह originated साथ  the Roman consuls and tribunes .
Either of the two consuls holding office in a given year could  ब्लाक a सैन्य or सिविल निर्णय by the अन्य ; कोई ट्रिब्यून था the शक्ति to unilaterally  block legislation passed by the Roman Senate .
Sulfur dioxide ( also sulphur dioxide ) is the  रासायनिक यौगिक साथ the सूत्र  .
It is a toxic gas with a pungent , irritating smell , that  is released by ज्वालामुखी और in विभिन्न  industrial processes .
Since coal and petroleum often contain  गंधक यौगिकों , उनके दहन generates गंधक डाइऑक्साइड जबतक the गंधक  compounds are removed before burning the fuel .
Further oxidation of SO2 , usually in the presence of  a उत्प्रेरक ऐसे as no2 , फ़ॉर्म h2so4 , और यूँ एसिड बरसात  .
Sulfur dioxide emissions are also a precursor to  अभिकण in the माहौल  .
Both of these impacts are cause for concern over the  पर्यावरणीय प्रभाव of ये fuels  .
Myasthenia gravis ( from Greek μύς `` muscle '' , ``  कमज़ोरी '' , और `` गंभीर '' ;  abbreviated MG ) is an autoimmune neuromuscular disease leading to fluctuating muscle weakness and fatigability .
It is an autoimmune disorder , in which weakness is caused by  circulating antibodies कि ब्लाक acetylcholine receptors at the postsynaptic neuromuscular जंक्शन  , inhibiting the excitatory effects of the neurotransmitter acetylcholine on nicotinic receptors throughout neuromuscular junctions .
Myasthenia is treated medically with  acetylcholinesterase inhibitors  or immunosuppressants , and , in selected cases , thymectomy .
The disease  incidence is 3–30 मामले प्रति लाख  per year and rising as a result of increased awareness .
MG must be distinguished from congenital myasthenic syndromes that can  उपस्थित समान लक्षण लकिन प्रस्ताव no जवाब to immunosuppressive  treatments .
परावर्तक मुड़ nematic  liquid crystal display .
Polarizing filter  फिल्मी साथ a लंबवत  axis to polarize light as it enters .
कांच substrate  with ITO electrodes .
The shapes of these electrodes will  determine the आकार कि होगा appear जब  the LCD is turned ON .
Vertical  ridges  etched on the surface are smooth .
Twisted nematic  द्रव क्रिस्टल .
Glass substrate with  आम एलेक्ट्रोड फिल्मी ( ito ) साथ आड़ा  ridges to line up with the horizontal filter .
Polarizing filter  फिल्मी साथ a आड़ा  axis to block/pass light .
परावर्तक सतह to भेजें लाइट  back to viewer .
( In a backlit LCD  , इस परत is replaced  with a light source . )
A liquid-crystal display (  एलसीडी ) is a चपटा फलक प्रदर्शक  , electronic visual display , or video display that uses the light modulating properties of liquid crystals .
द्रव crystals do  not emit light directly .
LCDs are available to display arbitrary images ( as in a general-purpose computer display ) or fixed images which can be displayed or hidden , such as preset  शब्द , अंक , और 7-segment प्रदर्शक as in a डिजिटल क्लॉक  .
They use the same basic  प्रौद्योगिकी , मगर कि मनमानी बिंब  are made up of a large number of small pixels , while other displays have larger elements .
LCDs are used in a wide range of  अनुप्रयोग सहित कंप्यूटर मॉनीटर , टेलीविज़न  , instrument panels , aircraft cockpit displays , and signage .
They are  आम in उपभोक्ता डिवाइस ऐसे as वीडियो खिलाड़ी , गेमिंग डिवाइस , घड़ियाँ ,  watches , calculators , and telephones , and have replaced cathode ray tube ( CRT ) displays in most applications .
They are available in a wider  दायरा of स्क्रीन आकार than crt और प्लाज्मा प्रदर्शक  , and since they do not use phosphors , they do not suffer image burn-in .
LCDs are , however , susceptible  to चित्र हठ  .
The LCD screen is  अधिक उर्जा कुशल और can  be disposed of more safely than a CRT .
Its low electrical power consumption enables it to be used in battery  -powered इलेक्ट्रॉनिक उपकरण  .
It is an electronically modulated optical device  बना up of कोई क्रमांक of खण्ड भर साथ द्रव crystals और arrayed in सामने of a लाइट  source ( backlight ) or reflector to produce images in color or monochrome .
Liquid  crystals यहूद पहला  discovered in 1888 .
By 2008 , worldwide sales of televisions with LCD screens exceeded annual sales of CRT units ; the  crt became obsolete लिये सबसे उद्देश्य  .
The Borgata Hotel Casino and Spa is a  लक्ज़री होटल , कसीनो , और स्पा in अटलांटिक नगर , नई जर्सी  , United States .
It is  स्वामित्व by मरीना ज़िला विकास , a संयुक्त venture  between Boyd Gaming and a divesture trust established by MGM Resorts International .
The $ 1.1 billion  कसीनो होटल सुविधाएँ 2,002 कक्ष  and is the largest hotel in New Jersey .
The Borgata opened in July 2003 as a Las Vegas-style megaresort  और is the top-grossing कसीनो in अटलांटिक  City .
A  बोतल of ऊँची potency  B-complex vitamin supplement pills .
A vitamin ( or ) is an organic compound  जरूरी by an सजीव as a vital nutrient  in limited amounts .
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of  यौगिकों ) is पुकारा a विटामिन जब it can नहीं be synthesized in sufficient quantities  by an organism , and must be obtained from the diet .
Thus , the term is  सशर्त दोनो on the  circumstances and on the particular organism .
For example , ascorbic acid ( vitamin C ) is a vitamin  लिये इंसानो , लकिन नहीं लिये  most other animals , and biotin and vitamin D are required in the human diet only in certain circumstances .
By convention , the term vitamin includes neither  अन्य अनिवार्य nutrients , ऐसे as dietary खनिज , अनिवार्य वसीय acids , or अनिवार्य अमीनो acids ( जिससे हैं needed in larger amounts  than vitamins ) nor the large number of other nutrients that promote health but are otherwise required less often .
Thirteen vitamins are  universally पहचाना  at present .
Vitamins are classified by their biological and chemical  कार्यकलाप , नहीं उनके ढांचा  .
Thus , each `` vitamin '' refers to a  क्रमांक of vitamer यौगिकों कि सब  show the biological activity associated with a particular vitamin .
Such a set of chemicals is grouped under an alphabetized vitamin `` generic descriptor '' title , such as `` vitamin A `` , which  शामिल the यौगिकों retinal , रेटिनॉल , और चार  known carotenoids .
Vitamers by definition are convertible to the active form of the vitamin in the  देह , और हैं sometimes inter-convertible to एक another  , as well .
विटामिन have विविध  biochemical functions .
Some have hormone-like functions as regulators of mineral metabolism ( such as vitamin D )  , or regulators of कोशिका और ऊतक विकास और differentiation ( ऐसे  as some forms of vitamin A ) .
Others function as antioxidants (  e.g. , विटामिन e और sometimes  vitamin C ) .
The largest number of vitamins ( such as B complex vitamins ) function as precursors for enzyme cofactors ,  कि सहायता एंजाइमों in उनके कार्य as catalysts  in metabolism .
In this  भूमिका , विटामिन may be tightly बंधी to एंजाइमों as भाग of prosthetic  groups : For example , biotin is part of enzymes involved in making fatty acids .
Vitamins may also be less tightly bound to enzyme catalysts as coenzymes , detachable molecules that function  to carry रासायनिक समूह or electrons between अणुओं  .
For  उदाहरण , फोलिक एसिड may  carry methyl , formyl , and methylene groups in the cell .
Although these roles in assisting enzyme-substrate reactions are  विटामिन ' best-known फलन , the अन्य  vitamin functions are equally important .
Until the mid-1930s , when the first commercial yeast-extract vitamin B complex and semi-synthetic vitamin C supplement tablets were sold , vitamins were obtained solely through food intake , and changes in diet (  जिससे , लिये उदाहरण , could occur दौरान a particular growing ऋतु ) प्रायः greatly  altered the types and amounts of vitamins ingested .
However , vitamins have been produced as commodity chemicals and made widely available as inexpensive semisynthetic and synthetic-source  multivitamin dietary और खाना पूरक और एडिटिव , चूंकि the मध्य of  the 20th century .
World Muslim population by percentage ( Pew  शोध बीच , 2009  )
World  मुस्लिम जनसांख्यिकी  in millions
Islam is the world 's  दूसरी largest धर्म  after Christianity .
according to a 2010 पढ़ाई , islam रै 1.62  billion adherents , making up over 23 % of the world population .
Islam is the predominant religion in the  मध्य ईस्ट , in सहेल , in the  Horn of Africa and northern Africa , and in some parts of Asia .
Large communities of Muslims are  भी मिला in चीन , the balkans , और  Russia .
Other parts of the world host  विशाल मुस्लिम अप्रवासी समुदायों ; in पश्चिमी यूरोपीय , लिये  instance , Islam is the second largest religion after Christianity , where it represents 6 % of the total population .
According to the Pew  शोध बीच in 2010 वहीँ यहूद 49 muslim-majority  countries .
Around 62 % of the world 's Muslims live in South and Southeast Asia ,  साथ over 1 अरब adherents  .
The largest Muslim country is Indonesia , home to 12.7 % of the world 's Muslims , followed by Pakistan ( 11.0 %  ) , इण्डिया ( 10.9 % ) , और  Bangladesh ( 9.2 % ) .
About 20  % of मुसलमान सजीव in  Arab countries .
In the Middle East , the non-Arab  देशों of तुर्कों और इरान हैं the largest muslim-majority देशों ; in अफ़्रीकी  , Egypt and Nigeria have the most populous Muslim communities .
A study conducted by  the pew शोध बीच in 2010 और released जनवरी  2011 found that there are 1.62 billion Muslims around the world .
The study found more Muslims in the United Kingdom than in Lebanon and more  in चीन than in सीरियाई  .
Rhode  द्वीप ( or ) , officially the राज्य  of Rhode Island and Providence Plantations , is a state in the New England region of the United States .
Rhode Island is the smallest in area ,  the आठवीं तनिक populous , लकिन the दूसरी सबसे densely  populated of the 50 US states behind New Jersey .
Rhode Island is bordered by Connecticut to the west and  मैसाचुसेट्स to the उत्तर और ईस्ट , और it साझा a जल boundary साथ नई यॉर्क  's Long Island to the southwest .
Rhode Island was the first  of the 13 असली colonies to घोषित स्वतंत्रता  from British rule , declaring itself independent on May 4 , 1776 , two months before any other colony .
The State was also the last of the thirteen original colonies to  ratify the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान  .
Rhode Island 's official nickname is `` The Ocean State '' , a reference to the State 's geography , since Rhode Island  रै अनेक विशाल bays और inlets कि राशि to परिचय 14 % of  its total area .
इसके जमीन क्षेत्रफल is  , but its total area is significantly larger .
Dubai ( ; ' , ) is a city in the United Arab  अमीरात , स्तिथ भीतर  the emirate of the same name .
The emirate of Dubai is located on the southeast coast of the Persian Gulf on  the arabian प्रायद्वीप और  is one of the seven emirates that make up the country .
it रै the largest  population in the UAE ( 2,106,177 ) and the second-largest land territory by area ( 4,114 km2 ) after Abu Dhabi .
Dubai and Abu Dhabi , the national capital , are the only  दो अमीरात to have वीटो शक्ति over नाजुक matters of नेशनल  importance in the country 's legislature .
The city of Dubai is  स्तिथ on the अमीर 's उत्तरी तटरेखा और  heads up the Dubai-Sharjah-Ajman metropolitan area .
Dubai is nowadays often misperceived as a country or city-state and ,  in कुछ मामले , the uae as a पूरे रै महरूम वर्णित  as 'Dubai ' .
The earliest mention of Dubai is in 1095  ad , और the earliest  recorded settlement in the region dates from 1799 .
The Sheikhdom of Dubai was formally established in 1833 by Sheikh Maktoum  बिन butti al-maktoum जब he persuaded around 800 सदस्यों of उसके जनजाति of the bani yas , जीना in कया थी तब the  Second Saudi State and now part of Saudi Arabia , to follow him to the Dubai Creek by the Abu Falasa clan of the Bani Yas .
It remained under the tribe 's control when the United Kingdom assumed protection of the Sheikhdom in 1892 and joined the  nascent संयुक्त अरब अमीरात upon स्वतंत्रता in 1971 as the  country 's second emirate .
Its strategic geographic location made the town an important trading  हब और by the शुरूआत of the 20th सदी , दुबई  was already an important regional port .
Today , Dubai has emerged as a cosmopolitan metropolis that  रै grown steadily to become a वैश्विक नगर और a कारोबार और सांस्कृतिक हब of the मध्य ईस्ट और  the Persian Gulf region .
Although Dubai 's economy was historically built on the oil industry , the emirate 's Western-style model of business  ड्राइव इसके अर्थव्यवस्था साथ the  main revenues now coming from tourism , real estate , and financial services .
Dubai has recently attracted world attention through many  अभिनव विशाल निर्माण प्रोजेक्ट  and sports events .
The city has become symbolic for its skyscrapers and high-rise buildings , such as the  संसार 's tallest burj खलीफा , in जोड to महत्वाकांक्षी विकास प्रोजेक्ट सहित  man-made islands , hotels , and some of the largest shopping malls in the region and the world .
This  increased ध्यान रै भी highlighted मजदूर और  human rights issues concerning the city 's largely South Asian paid workforce .
दुबई 's प्रॉपर्टी मार्केट अनुभवी a  major deterioration in 2008–2009 as a result of the worldwide economic downturn following the financial crisis of 2007-2008 .
However , Dubai has made a steady and gradual  रिकवरी साथ सहायता coming  from neighboring emirates .
The handful of new projects that are in the pipeline  have महरूम समर्थ to सहायता दुबई रियल एस्टेट मेक  a comeback .
As of 2012 , Dubai is the 22nd most expensive city in the world ,  और the सबसे महंगी नगर in the मध्य ईस्ट , surpassing  Israel 's Tel Aviv ( 31st ) .
Dubai has also been rated as one of the  बेहतरीन स्थान to सजीव in the मध्य ईस्ट , सहित by us अमरीकी  global consulting firm Mercer who rated the city as the best place to live in the Middle East in 2011 .
The following is a list  of कॉलेजों और विश्वविद्यालयों in the u.S.  state of Illinois .
Surface of the Atlantic ocean  बैठक the धरती 's ग्रहीय boundary  layer and troposphere .
Waves on  an समंदर coast  .
This animation  उपयोग धरती विज्ञान आंकड़ा इससे a किस्में of सेंसर on नासा  Earth observing satellites to measure physical oceanography parameters such as ocean currents , ocean winds , sea surface height and sea surface temperature .
An ocean ( ; the World Ocean of classical antiquity ) is a body of saline  जल कि composes a विशाल  part of a planet 's hydrosphere .
In the context of Earth , it refers to  एक or सब of the प्रमुख विभाजन of the ग्रह  's World Ocean – they are , in descending order of area , the Pacific , Atlantic , Indian , Southern ( Antarctic ) , and Arctic Oceans .
The word `` sea  `` is प्रायः प्रयुक्त interchangeably साथ `` समंदर '' , लकिन सख्ती  speaking a sea is a body of saline water ( possibly a division of the World Ocean ) partly or fully enclosed by land .
Earth is the only planet known to have an ocean ( or  कोई विशाल amounts of खोलें द्रव जल  ) .
Approximately 72 % of  the ग्रह 's सतह ( ~3.6x108 km2 ) is covered by saline जल कि  is customarily divided into several principal oceans and smaller seas , with the ocean covering approximately 71 % of the Earth 's surface .
In terms of the hydrosphere of the Earth , the  समंदर contains 97 % of  the Earth 's water .
Oceanographers have stated that  आउट of 97 % , तभी 5 % of the समंदर  as a whole on Earth has been explored .
Because it is the principal component of Earth 's hydrosphere , the world ocean is integral to all known life , forms part of the carbon cycle , and influences climate and weather  पैटर्न  .
The total volume is  लगभग 1.3 अरब घन किलोमीटर ( 310  million cu mi ) with an average depth of .
It is the  आवास of 230,000 ज्ञात प्रजाति , हालांकि much of the समंदर 's  depths remain unexplored and it is estimated that over two million marine species exist .
The origin of Earth  's महासागर is स्टिल अनजान  , but oceans are believed to have formed in the Hadean period and may have been the impetus for the emergence of life .
extraterrestrial महासागर may be रचित  of a wide range of elements and compounds .
The only confirmed large stable bodies of extraterrestrial surface liquids are the lakes of Titan , although there  is प्रमाण  for the existence of oceans elsewhere in the Solar System .
Early in their  भूगर्भिक histories , मंगल और शुक्र  are theorized to have had large water oceans .
The Mars  समंदर परिकल्पना suggests कि nearly a तीसरा of the सतह  of Mars was once covered by water , though the water on Mars is no longer oceanic , and a runaway greenhouse effect may have boiled away the global ocean of Venus .
Compounds such as salts and ammonia dissolved in water lower its freezing point , so that water might exist in  विशाल quantities in extraterrestrial environments as brine or convecting  ice .
Unconfirmed oceans are speculated beneath the  सतह of अनेक बौना ग्रह और प्राकृतिक satellites ; notably , the  ocean of Europa is believed to have over twice the water volume of Earth .
The Solar  प्रणाली 's गैस दानव ग्रह हैं  also believed to possess liquid atmospheric layers of yet to be confirmed compositions .
Oceans may also exist on exoplanets and exomoons ,  सहित सतह महासागर of द्रव जल  within a circumstellar habitable zone .
Ocean planets are a hypothetical type of planet with a surface completely  covered साथ द्रव  .
Elvis Aaron Presley  ( जनवरी 8 , 1935 – अगस्त 16 , 1977  ) was an American singer and actor .
A cultural icon , he is  commonly ज्ञात by  the single name Elvis .
One of the most popular  संगीतकारों of the 20th सदी , he is प्रायः referred  to as the `` King of Rock and Roll '' or `` the King '' .
Born in Tupelo , Mississippi , Presley  स्थानांतरित to मेम्फिस , टेनेसी  , with his family at the age of 13 .
He  began उसके करियर वहीँ in 1954 , working साथ सूर्य रिकॉर्ड मालिक  Sam Phillips , who wanted to bring the sound of African-American music to a wider audience .
Accompanied by guitarist Scotty Moore and bassist Bill Black , Presley was the most important popularizer of rockabilly , an  uptempo , backbeat -ड्राइवn संलयन of देश  and rhythm and blues .
RCA Victor acquired his contract in a deal arranged  by कर्नल tom पार्कर , जो गई on to मैनेज  the singer for over two decades .
Presley 's first  आरसीए सिंगल , `` heartbreak होटल `` , released in  January 1956 , was a number-one hit .
He became the leading figure of the newly popular sound of rock and roll with a series of network  टेलीविज़न दिखावे और chart-topping  records .
His energized interpretations of songs , many from African-American sources , and his uninhibited  प्रदर्शन स्टाइल बना उसे enormously  popular—and controversial .
In November 1956 , he made his film debut  in प्रेम me टेंडर  .
Drafted into military service in 1958 , Presley relaunched his recording career two years later with some  of उसके सबसे commercially कामयाब  work .
He  मंचन few कॉन्सर्ट however , और हिदायत by पार्कर  , proceeded to devote much of the 1960s to making Hollywood movies and soundtrack albums , most of them critically derided .
In 1968 , after seven years away from the stage , he returned to live performance in a  मनाये वापसी टेलीविज़न खास कि led to an विस्तारित लास वेगास कॉन्सर्ट रेसिडेंसी  and a string of profitable tours .
In 1973 Presley staged the first concert broadcast  globally via उपग्रह , aloha इससे  Hawaii .
नुस्खा ड्रग गाली severely deteriorated  his health , and he died suddenly in 1977 at the age of 42 .
प्रेस्ली is regarded as एक of  the most important figures of 20th-century popular culture .
He had a  बहुमुखी आवाज़ और unusually चौड़ी कामयाबी encompassing  many genres , including country , pop ballads , gospel , and blues .
He is  the best-selling सोलो कलाकार  in the history of popular music .
Nominated for 14 competitive Grammys ,  he जीती तीन , और प्राप्त the ग्रैमी आजीवन  Achievement Award at age 36 .
He has been  inducted into अनेक म्यूज़िक हॉल  of fame .
A  कांच of  root beer with foam
Root beer is a carbonated ,  sweetened पेय , originally बना using the रूट of a sassafras संयंत्र ( or  the bark of a sassafras tree ) as the primary flavor .
Root beer , popularized  in उत्तर अमेरिका ,  comes in two forms : alcoholic and soft drink .
The historical root beer was analogous to small beer in that the process  provided a पेय साथ a बहुत कम दारू सामग्री  .
Although roots are used as the source of many  नरम पेय throughout  the world , often different names are used .
Fluorescent minerals emit visible light when  उजागर to पराबैंगनी  light
Fluorescence is the emission of light by  a पदार्थ कि रै अवशोषित  light or other electromagnetic radiation .
It is a form  of संदीप्ति  .
In most cases , the  उत्सर्जित लाइट रै a longer wavelength , और  therefore lower energy , than the absorbed radiation .
However , when the absorbed electromagnetic radiation is intense , it is possible for one electron to absorb two photons ; this  two-photon अवशोषण can सीसे to उत्सर्जन of विकिरण having a shorter wavelength than the अवशोषित विकिरण  .
The  उत्सर्जित विकिरण may भी be of the  same wavelength as the absorbed radiation , termed `` resonance fluorescence '' .
The  सबसे striking उदाहरण of प्रतिदीप्ति occur जब the अवशोषित विकिरण is in the पराबैंगनी  region of the spectrum , and thus invisible to the human eye , and the emitted light is in the visible region .
Fluorescence has many practical applications , including mineralogy , gemology , chemical sensors ( fluorescence  स्पेक्ट्रमिकी ) , fluorescent लेबलिंग  , dyes , biological detectors , and , most commonly , fluorescent lamps .
Informal  लॉजिक , intuitively  , refers to the principles of logic and logical thought outside of a formal setting .
However , perhaps because of the informal in the title , the precise definition of  अनौपचारिक लॉजिक is a पदार्थ of कुछ विवाद  .
Ralph H. Johnson and J. Anthony Blair define informal logic as `` a branch of logic whose task is to develop non-formal standards , criteria ,  प्रक्रियाओं लिये the विश्लेषण , निर्वचन , मूल्यांकन , आलोचना और  construction of argumentation . ''
This definition reflects what had been implicit in their practice and what others were doing in  उनके अनौपचारिक लॉजिक  texts .
Informal logic is associated with ( informal ) fallacies , critical thinking , the Thinking  कौशल गति और the interdisciplinary पूछताछ ज्ञात as  argumentation theory .
Frans H. van  eemeren writes कि the लेबल `` अनौपचारिक लॉजिक '' कवर a `` संग्रहण of normative approaches  to the study of reasoning in ordinary language that remain closer to the practice of argumentation than formal logic . ''
USA annual real GDP 1910–60 ,  साथ the सालो of the  Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted .
Unemployment rate in the US  1910–1960 , साथ the सालो of the ग्रेट अवसाद  ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted .
The Great Depression began in August of  1929 , जब the संयुक्त राज्य अर्थव्यवस्था  first went into an economic recession .
Although the country spent two months with declining GDP , it was not until the Wall Street Crash of October ,  1929 कि the प्रभाव of a घटती अर्थव्यवस्था यहूद लगा , और a प्रमुख  worldwide economic downturn ensued .
The market crash marked the beginning of a decade of high unemployment , poverty , low  profits , अपस्फीति , plunging फार्म incomes , और खोया अवसर लिये  economic growth and personal advancement .
Although its causes are still  अनिश्चित और विवादास्पद , the जाल प्रभाव  was a sudden and general loss of confidence in the economic future .
The usual explanations include numerous factors , especially high consumer debt , ill-regulated  बाज़ार कि permitted overoptimistic लोन by बैंको और निवेशकों , और the कमी of high-growth नई उद्योग  , all interacting to create a downward economic spiral of reduced spending , falling confidence , and lowered production .
Industries that  suffered the सबसे शामिल निर्माण , कृषि as dust-bowl शर्तें persisted  in the agricultural heartland , shipping , mining , and logging as well as durable goods like automobiles and appliances that could be postponed .
The economy reached bottom in the winter of 1932–33  ; तब आए चार सालो of  very rapid growth until 1937 , when the Recession of 1937 brought back 1934 levels of unemployment .
The  अवसाद caused प्रमुख राजनैतिक  changes in America .
Three years into the depression , Herbert Hoover lost the 1932  अध्यक्षीय चुनाव to फ्रैंकलिन delano रूज़वेल्ट  in a sweeping landslide .
Roosevelt  's आर्थिक रिकवरी योजना , the नई सौदे , instituted unprecedented कार्यक्रम  for relief , recovery and reform , and brought about a major realignment of American politics .
The  अवसाद भी resulted in an बढ़ाएँ  of emigration of people to other countries for the first time in American history .
For example , some immigrants went back to their native  देशों , और कुछ देशी us नागरिकों गई  to Canada , Australia , and South Africa .
It also resulted in the mass migration of people  इससे badly hit क्षेत्रों in the ग्रेट मैदान और the दक्षिण to स्थान  such as California and the North , respectively ( see Okies and the Great Migration of African Americans ) .
Racial  तनाव भी increased  during this time .
By the 1940s  आव्रजन था लौटे वापस  to normal , and emigration declined .
A well-known example of an emigrant was Frank McCourt , who went to  आयरलैंड , as recounted in  his book Angela 's Ashes .
The memory of the Depression also shaped modern theories of economics and resulted in many changes in how the government dealt  साथ आर्थिक downturns , ऐसे as the उपयोग of stimulus पैकेज , keynesian  economics , and Social Security .
It also shaped modern American literature , resulting in famous  novels ऐसे as जॉन steinbeck 's `` the अंगूर  of Wrath `` and `` Of Mice and Men `` .
The Great Depression of the 1930s started with the stock  मार्केट क्रैश of अक्तूबर 1929 .
Turkey ( ) , officially the Republic  of तुर्कों , is a transcontinental देश  , located mostly on Anatolia in Western Asia and on East Thrace in Southeastern Europe .
Turkey is bordered by eight countries : Bulgaria to the northwest ; Greece to the west ; Georgia to the northeast ; Armenia ,  इरान और the अज़रबैजानी exclave of nakhchivan to the ईस्ट ; और इराकी और सीरियाई  to the southeast .
The Mediterranean Sea is to the  दक्षिण ; the ईजियन समुद्र is to the वेस्ट  ; and the Black Sea is to the north .
the समुद्र of मरमरा , the bosphorus और the dardanelles ( जिससे साथ रूप the तुर्की  Straits ) demarcate the boundary between Thrace and Anatolia ; they also separate Europe and Asia .
Turkey 's location at the  क्रॉसरोड्स of यूरोपीय और एशिया makes  it a country of significant geostrategic importance .
The country 's  आधिकारिक भाषा is तुर्की , a turkic भाषा , जिससे is बोला  by approximately 85 % of the population as mother tongue .
The most numerous ethnic group is the Turks , who constitute between 70 %  और 75 % of the जनसांख्यिकी according to the संसार factbook  .
Kurds are the largest ethnic minority and , according to the same source ,  क्रमांक around 18 % of the जनसांख्यिकी  while other ethnic minorities are estimated to be at 7–12 % .
The vast majority of  the जनसांख्यिकी is मुस्लिम  .
The area now called Turkey has been inhabited since the Paleolithic , including  विभिन्न प्राचीन आनातोलियाई सभ्यताओं  and Thracian peoples .
After  सिकंदर the ग्रेट 's conquest , the क्षेत्रफल  was Hellenized , which continued with the Roman rule and the transition into the Byzantine Empire .
The Seljuk Turks began migrating into the area in the 11th century , starting the process of Turkification , which was greatly accelerated by the  सलजूक़ विजय over the byzantines at the बैटल of manzikert in 1071  .
The Seljuk Sultanate of Rûm  शासित आनातोलिया जबतक the mongol आक्रमण  in 1243 , upon which it disintegrated into several small Turkish beyliks .
Starting from the late 13th century , the Ottoman beylik united Anatolia and  निर्मित an साम्राज्य encompassing much of southeastern यूरोपीय , पश्चिमी एशिया और उत्तर  Africa .
After the Ottoman  साम्राज्य collapsed following इसके शिकस्त in संसार युद्ध i , भाग  of it were occupied by the victorious Allies .
A cadre of young military officers , led by Mustafa Kemal Atatürk and his colleagues , organized a successful resistance to the Allies ; in 1923 they established the modern  गणतंत्र of तुर्कों , साथ अतातुर्क as इसके पहला अध्यक्ष .
Turkey is  a लोकतांत्रिक , धर्मनिरपेक्ष , एकात्मक , संवैधानिक  republic with a diverse cultural heritage .
Turkey has  become increasingly एकीकृत साथ the वेस्ट through सदस्यता in संगठनों ऐसे  as the Council of Europe , NATO , OECD , OSCE and the G-20 major economies .
Turkey began full  सदस्यता negotiations साथ the यूरोपीय संघ in 2005 , having महरूम  an associate member of the European Economic Community since 1963 and having joined the EU Customs Union in 1995 .
Turkey has also fostered close cultural , political and economic relations with the Middle East , Caucasus , the Turkic states of Central Asia and the African countries through membership in organisations such as the Turkic Council , Joint Administration of  turkic कला और संस्कृति , संगठन of इस्लामी सहयोग  and the Economic Cooperation Organisation .
Turkey 's growing economy and  राजनयिक पहलों  have led to its recognition as a regional power .
Turkey is the world 's 17th largest  अर्थव्यवस्था by नाममात्र जीडीपी और the 16th largest  by purchasing power parity .
Caryn Elaine Johnson , best known as Whoopi Goldberg ( , ( born November 13 , 1955 ) is an American comedienne , actress ,  singer-songwriter , राजनैतिक activist , लेखक  and talk show host .
Goldberg made her film debut  in the रंग जामुनी ( 1985 ) , playing  Celie , a mistreated black woman in the Deep South .
She  प्राप्त a नामांकन लिये the अकादमी  Award for Best Actress and won her first Golden Globe Award for her role in the film .
In 1990 , she  निभाई oda mae भूरा , a wacky मानसिक helping a slain man ( पैट्रिक swayze ) सहेजें  his lover ( Demi Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost .
This  प्रदर्शन जीती उसके a दूसरी सुनहरी ग्लोब और an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री ; इस बना गोल्डबर्ग तभी the दूसरी ब्लैक स्त्री in  the history of the Academy Awards to win an acting Oscar—the first being Hattie McDaniel who won for Gone With the Wind in 1939 .
Notable  बाद films शामिल सिस्टर  Act and Sister Act 2 , The Player , Made in America , How Stella Got Her Groove Back , Girl , Interrupted and Rat Race .
She is also acclaimed for her roles as the  बारटेंडर guinan in स्टार ट्रेक : the अगला पीढी , as टेरी doolittle in jumpin ' जोकर फ्लैश , और as कार्मेन  Tibideaux in Glee , as well as the voice of Shenzi the hyena in The Lion King .
गोल्डबर्ग रै महरूम मनोनीत  for 13 Emmy Awards for her work in television .
She was co-producer of the popular game show  हॉलीवुड वर्गों इससे 1998  to 2004 .
She has been the moderator of the daytime  बात दिखाएँ the दृश्य चूंकि  2007 .
Goldberg has a Grammy , two Daytime  emmys , दो सुनहरी ग्लोब्स , a टोनी ( लिये उत्पादन  , not acting ) , and an Oscar .
In addition ,  गोल्डबर्ग रै a अंग्रेजों अकादमी फिल्मी पुरस्कार , चार लोगों 's चुनाव पुरस्कार , और  has been honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
She is  एक of the few मनोरंजनकर्ता  who have won an Emmy , Grammy , Oscar , and Tony Award .
augusta is a संचित नगर in the u.S. राज्य of जॉर्जिया ,  located at the fall line of the Savannah River , at the head of its navigable portion .
As of the 2010 census , the Augusta–  रिचमंड काउंटी जनसांख्यिकी थी 195,844 नहीं गिनती the unconsolidated  cities of Hephzibah and Blythe .
Augusta is the principal city of the Augusta – Richmond County Metropolitan Statistical  क्षेत्रफल , जिससे as of 2010 था an अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी of 556,877 , बनाना it दोनो the second-largest  city and the second-largest metro area in the state after Atlanta .
It is  the 116th-largest  city in the United States .
Internationally , Augusta is best known for  होस्टिंग the मास्टर्स टूर्नामेंट in गोल्फ़ प्रत्येक  spring .
A CD-ROM ( )  is a pre-pressed कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क  which contains data .
The name is an acronym which stands for ``  कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क read-only मेमोरी ``  .
कंप्यूटर can पढ़ा  CD-ROMs , but can not write on them .
CD-ROMs are popularly used to distribute computer  तन्त्र , सहित वीडियो खेल  and multimedia applications , though any data can be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ) .
Some CDs , called enhanced  cds , थाम दोनो कंप्यूटर आंकड़ा और  audio with the latter capable of being played on a CD player , while data ( such as software or digital video ) is only usable on a computer ( such as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ) .
The Yellow  किताब is the तकनीकी  standard that defines the format of CD-ROMs .
One of a set of  color-bound किताबे कि contain the तकनीकी विशेषताएँ लिये सब cd स्वरुप , the पीला  Book , created by Sony and Philips , was the first extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio .
It  adapted the स्वरूप to थाम  any form of data .
The Chicago Blackhawks ( spelled as Black Hawks  पहले 1986 , और ज्ञात colloquially as  the Hawks ) are a professional ice hockey team based in Chicago , Illinois .
They are members of the  सेंट्रल प्रभाग of the पश्चिमी सम्मेलन  of the National Hockey League ( NHL ) .
They have won four Stanley Cup  championships चूंकि उनके founding in 1926 , सबसे  recently in 2009–10 .
The Blackhawks are one of the Original Six NHL teams , along with  the डेट्रॉयट रेड विंग्स , मॉन्ट्रियल canadiens , टोरंटो मेपल leafs , बोस्टन bruins  and New York Rangers .
Since the  ब्लैकहॉक्स have निभाई उनके घर खेल  at the United Center after having spent 65 years playing at Chicago Stadium .
Lent celebrants  carrying आउट a गली  procession during Holy Week .
The violet color is often associated with  penance और detachment .
Similar Christian penitential practice is seen in other Catholic  देशों , sometimes संबद्ध साथ mortification of the flesh  .
Granada ,  निकारागुआ  .
Lent ( Latin : Quadragesima ) is a solemn observance in the liturgical year of many  ईसाई denominations , स्थायी लिये a काल of लगभग छह सप्ताह अग्रणी  up to Easter Sunday .
In the general Latin-rite and most Western denominations Lent is taken  to चलाएं इससे राख बुधवार to maundy  Thursday ( Holy Thursday ) morning or to Easter Eve .
In  the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर , lent lasts  until Holy Thursday , while other denominations run until Easter Eve .
The  परंपरागत purpose of lent is the तैयारी of the  believer through prayer , penance , repentance , almsgiving , and self-denial .
Its institutional purpose is heightened in the annual commemoration of Holy Week , marking the death , burial and  क़यामत of यीशु , जिससे recalls the कार्यक्रम of the बाइबल जब यीशु is crucified on शुभ शुक्रवार , जिससे तब culminates in the जश्न  on Easter Sunday of the Resurrection of Jesus Christ .
During Lent ,  अनेक of the वफादार कमिट  to fasting or giving up certain types of luxuries as a form of penitence .
The  स्टेशन of the क्रॉस , a devotional commemoration of मसीह 's  carrying the Cross and of his execution , are often observed .
Many Roman Catholic and some Protestant  चर्च हटाएँ पुष्प इससे उनके altars , जबकि crucifixes , धार्मिक मूर्तियाँ , और  other elaborate religious symbols are often veiled in violet fabrics in solemn observance of the event .
In certain pious Catholic countries , some  adherents चिह्नित the ऋतु साथ the परंपरागत abstention  from the consumption of meat .
In some countries , grand religious processions and cultural customs  हैं observed , और the वफादार attempt  to visit seven churches during Holy Week in honor of Jesus Christ heading to Mount Calvary .
Lent is traditionally described as lasting for  चालीस दिनों , in commemoration of the चालीस दिनों जिससे , according to the gospels  of Matthew , Mark and Luke , Jesus spent fasting in the desert before the beginning of his public ministry , where he endured temptation by the Devil .
However , different Christian denominations  गणना the चालीस दिनों of lent differently  .
In most Western traditions the Sundays are not  गिने as भाग of lent ; यूँ  the period from Ash Wednesday until Easter consists of 40 days when the Sundays are excluded .
However in  the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर lent is अभी लिया to समाप्त  on Holy Thursday rather than Easter Eve , and hence lasts 38 days excluding Sundays , or 44 days in total .
This event ,  साथ साथ इसके परहेज़गारों कस्टम हैं observed  by Catholics , Lutherans , Methodists , Presbyterians , and Anglicans .
Location of Chernobyl  नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र
The abandoned  नगर of pripyat साथ chernobyl  plant in the distance
Abandoned  आवास ब्लॉक  in Pripyat
The  chernobyl विपत्ति ( , chornobylska katastrofa – chornobyl प्रलय ) थी  a catastrophic nuclear accident that occurred on 26 April 1986 at the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant in Ukraine ( then officially the Ukrainian SSR ) , which was under the direct jurisdiction of the central authorities of the Soviet Union .
An explosion and  आग released विशाल quantities of रेडियोसक्रिय अणु into the माहौल , जिससे  spread over much of the western USSR and Europe .
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst nuclear power plant  दुर्घटना in इतिहास , और is एक of तभी दो वर्गीकृत as a स्तर 7 इवेंट on the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नाभिकीय इवेंट स्केल ( the अन्य होने the फुकुशिमा  Daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ) .
The battle to contain the contamination and  avert a वृहद प्रलय ultimately शामिल over 500,000  workers and cost an estimated 18 billion rubles .
The official Soviet  casualty गिनती of 31 मौतों रै महरूम विवादित , और long-term प्रभाव ऐसे as  cancers and deformities are still being accounted for .
In grammar , a subject complement is a predicative expression that follows a  linking क्रिया ( copula ) और कि complements ( completes ) the विषय of the  sentence by either ( 1 ) renaming it or ( 2 ) describing it .
In the former case , a renaming noun  phrase ऐसे as a संज्ञा or सर्वनाम is पुकारा a predicative  nominal .
An adjective following the copula and describing the  विषय is पुकारा a predicative क्रियाशील  .
In  either मामला the predicative  complement in effect mirrors the subject .
विषय complements हैं प्रयुक्त साथ a छोटी क्लास  of verbs called linking verbs or copula , of which be is the most common .
Since copula are stative verbs , subject  complements हैं नहीं प्रभावित by कोई कार्रवाई of the क्रिया  .
Subject complements  हैं typically नहीं clause वितर्क  , nor are they clause adjuncts .
throughout the fifty-five साल इतिहास of the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार  , many significant records have been set .
This page only includes the  प्रतिस्पर्धी पुरस्कार जीती  by various artists .
This does not include the various special awards that are presented by the  नेशनल अकादमी of रिकॉर्डिंग कला और sciences ऐसे as आजीवन उपलब्धि पुरस्कार , trustees पुरस्कार , तकनीकी  Awards or Legend Awards .
The page however does include other non-performance related Grammys (  ज्ञात as the शिल्प & उत्पादन  Fields ) that may have been presented to the artist ( s ) .
Marshall Bruce Mathers  iii ( born अक्तूबर 17 , 1972 ) , बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम एमिनेम ( stylized as eminǝm ) और by  his alter ego Slim Shady , is an American rapper , record producer , songwriter and actor .
Eminem , along with his solo  करियर , is a सदस्य of उसके समूह d12 , और भी एक हाफ  of the hip hop duo Bad Meets Evil , with Royce da 5'9 '' .
Eminem is  एक of the best-selling कलाकारों in the संसार  and is the best-selling artist of the 2000s .
He has been listed and ranked as one of the  महानतम कलाकारों of सब  time by many magazines , including Rolling Stone magazine which ranked him 82nd on its list of The 100 Greatest Artists of All Time .
The  वही पत्रिका घोषित  him The King of Hip Hop .
Including his work with D12 and Bad Meets Evil , Eminem has achieved  टेन number-one एल्बम on the बिलबोर्ड  200 .
He has sold  अधिक than 100 लाख  records worldwide , including 42 million tracks and 49.1 million albums in the United States .
As  an भूमिगत rapper एमिनेम released  his debut solo album , Infinite in 1996 .
the एल्बम थी a नाजुक  and commercial failure .
He gained mainstream popularity in 1999 after the release of his  major-label डेब्यू एल्बम the  Slim Shady LP .
The LP also earned Eminem his first Grammy  पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन रैप  Album .
His next two  रिकॉर्ड the मार्शल mathers lp ,  and The Eminem Show , also won Best Rap Album Grammy Awards , making Eminem the first artist to win Best Rap Album for three consecutive LPs .
This was followed by  another स्टुडियो रिलीज in 2004 titled  Encore .
एमिनेम तब गई  on hiatus after touring in 2005 .
He released his first album in five years titled Relapse  , on may 15 , 2009  .
In 2010 , Eminem released  उसके सातवाँ स्टुडियो एल्बम  Recovery .
Recovery was  an अंतरराष्ट्रीय कामयाबी और थी नामित the बेहतरीन selling एल्बम  of 2010 worldwide , joining The Eminem Show , which was the best seller of 2002 .
Eminem won Grammy Awards for both Relapse  और रिकवरी , giving उसे a कुल of 13 grammys  in his career .
Eminem has opened other ventures ,  सहित उसके अपना रिकार्ड लेबल छायादार  Records with his manager Paul Rosenberg .
He also  रै उसके अपना रेडियो  channel , Shade 45 on Sirius XM Radio .
Eminem began an acting career in 2002 ,  जब he स्ट्रक्चर in the  hip hop drama film 8 Mile .
He won the Academy Award for  बेहतरीन असली सोंग , बनने the पहला  rap artist ever to win the award .
He has also made cameo  दिखावे in the  Wash ( 2001 ) , Funny People ( 2009 ) and the television series Entourage .
The acre is a unit of area used in the imperial and U.S.  प्रथागत प्रणालियों  .
An acre is about 40 % of a hectare – slightly  छोटी than an अमरीकी  football field .
The acre is no longer commonly used , although a few  notable अपवाद शामिल the संयुक्त राज्य , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , बर्मा  and the United Kingdom ( as of 2010 , the acre is no longer officially used in the United Kingdom , though is still used in real estate descriptions ) .
It  is स्टिल प्रयुक्त  , to some extent , in Canada .
The international  प्रतीक of the एकड़ is ac , और is पारिभाषित as 1/640 of  a square mile .
The  सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त एकड़ आज is  the international acre .
In the United States both the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ और the थोड़ा अलग  US survey acre are in use .
The  सबसे आम उपयोग  of the acre is to measure tracts of land .
One international  एकड़ is पारिभाषित as 4046.8564224  square metres .
During  the मध्य आयु , an एकड़ थी the राशि  of land that could be plowed in one day with a yoke of oxen .
Antoine Lavoisier 's discovery of the Law of  संरक्षण of द्रव्यमान led to अनेक नई निष्कर्षों  in the 19th century .
Joseph Proust 's law of definite proportions and John Dalton 's  परमाणु सिद्धान्त branched इससे the discoveries  of Antoine Lavoisier .
Lavoisier 's quantitative  प्रयोग नाज़िल कि दहन शामिल ऑक्सीजन बल्कि than कया थी  previously thought to be phlogiston .
The law of conservation of mass , or principle of mass conservation , states that for any system closed to all transfers of  पदार्थ और उर्जा ( दोनो of जिससे have द्रव्यमान ) , the द्रव्यमान of the प्रणाली जरूर remain निरंतर over समय , as प्रणाली द्रव्यमान can नहीं बदलें मात्रा if  it is not added or removed .
Hence , the quantity of  द्रव्यमान is `` conserved ''  over time .
The  विधि implies कि द्रव्यमान can neither be निर्मित nor नष्ट , हालांकि it may be rearranged in स्पेस , or the entities संबद्ध साथ it  may be changed in form , as for example when light or physical work is transformed into particles that contribute the same mass to the system as the light or work had contributed .
The law implies ( requires ) that during any chemical reaction , nuclear reaction , or radioactive decay in an  पृथक प्रणाली , the द्रव्यमान of the reactants  or starting material must equal the mass of the products .
The concept of mass conservation is widely used in many fields such as chemistry  , यांत्रिकी , और द्रव डायनामिक्स  .
Historically , mass  संरक्षण थी खोजा in रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ by एंटोनी लाव्वाज़्ये  in the late 18th century , and was of crucial importance in the progress from alchemy to the modern natural science of chemistry .
The  closely सम्बन्धित अवधारणा of पदार्थ संरक्षण थी मिला to थाम शुभ in रसायन to ऐसे ऊँची सन्निकटन कि it  failed only for the high energies treated by the later refinements of relativity theory , but otherwise remains useful and sufficiently accurate for most chemical calculations , even in modern practice .
In special relativity ,  needed लिये सटीकता जब विशाल उर्जा हस्तांतरण between प्रणालियों is शामिल , the  difference between thermodynamically closed and isolated systems becomes important , since conservation of mass is strictly and perfectly upheld only for so-called isolated systems , i.e . those completely isolated from all exchanges with the environment .
In this circumstance , the  mass-energy equivalence प्रमेय राज्य कि द्रव्यमान संरक्षण is समतुल्य to कुल उर्जा संरक्षण ,  which is the first law of thermodynamics .
By contrast , for a thermodynamically closed system ( i.e. , one which is closed to exchanges of  पदार्थ , लकिन खोलें to exchanges of non-material उर्जा , ऐसे  as heat and work , with the surroundings ) mass is ( usually ) only approximately conserved .
The input or output of non-material energy must change the mass of the system in relativity theory , although the change is usually small , since  अपेक्षाकृत विशाल amounts of ऐसे उर्जा ( by तुलना साथ ordinary अनुभव ) carry  only a small amount of mass ( again by ordinary standards of measurement ) .
In  खास आपेक्षिकता , द्रव्यमान is नहीं परिवर्तित to उर्जा , चूंकि उर्जा in सब of  its forms always retains its equivalent amount of mass throughout any transformation or translocation into , or out of , a system .
However ,  निश्चित प्रकार of पदार्थ ( a अलग अवधारणा ) may  be converted to energy , so long as the mass of the system is unchanged in the process .
However , if such energy is removed from systems , they must lose  the द्रव्यमान कि is संबद्ध  with it .
In general relativity , mass ( and energy ) conservation in expanding volumes of space is a complex concept , subject to different  परिभाषाएं , और neither द्रव्यमान nor उर्जा is as सख्ती और बस conserved as is  the case in special relativity and in Minkowski space .
For a  चर्चा ,  see mass in general relativity .
A pig is any of the  पशु in the genus सस ,  within the Suidae family of even-toed ungulates .
Pigs include the domestic pig , its ancestor the wild boar , and  अनेक अन्य जंगली रिश्तेदारों  .
Young and  छोटी सूअर हैं ज्ञात  as piglets .
Pigs  हैं omnivores और हैं  highly social and intelligent animals .

8-inch , -inch  ( full height ) , and -inch drives
A 3.5-inch  diskette 's `` फ्लॉपी '' चुम्बकीय सामग्री  , removed from its housing
A floppy disk , or diskette , is a disk storage medium composed of a disk of  पतला और लचीली चुम्बकीय भंडार मीडियम , sealed in a आयताकार प्लास्टिक  carrier lined with fabric that removes dust particles .
They are read and written by a floppy  डिस्क ड्राइव ( fdd  ) .
Floppy disks , initially as media and later in and 3.5-inch ( 90 mm ) sizes , were a ubiquitous form of data storage and  एक्सचेंज इससे the mid-1970s खूब into the  first decade of the 21st century .
By 2010 , computer motherboards were rarely manufactured with floppy drive support ; `` floppies could be used as an  बाह्य usb ड्राइव , लकिन `` , 8 `` , और  non-standard drives could only be handled by old equipment .
While floppy disk drives still have some limited uses , especially with legacy industrial computer equipment , they have been superseded by data storage methods with much  वृहद क्षमता , ऐसे as usb फ्लैश ड्राइव , पोर्टेबल बाह्य मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव  , optical discs , memory cards , and computer networks .
An animated  आरेख of a कटर
In baseball , a cutter , or cut fastball , is a type of fastball which breaks  थोड़ा toward the पिचर 's दस्ताने पक्ष as it  reaches home plate .
इस पिच is कही between a स्लाइडर और a fastball  , as it is usually thrown faster than a slider but with more motion than a typical fastball .
Some pitchers use  a कटर as a रास्ता  to prevent hitters from expecting their regular fastballs .
A common technique used to throw a cutter is to use a  four-seam fastball पकड़ साथ the बेसबॉल  set slightly off center in the hand .
जब a बैटर is समर्थ to hit a कटर पिच , it प्रायः परिणाम  in soft contact and an easy out , due to the pitch 's movement keeping the ball away from the bat 's sweet spot .
The cutter is typically  2–5 किमी धीमा than a पिचर  's four-seam fastball .
In 2010 , the average  पिच वर्गीकृत as a कटर by pitchf/x thrown by a right-handed  pitcher was 88.6 mph ; the average four-seamer was 92.1 mph .
`` What It Takes '' is a power  ballad by अमरीकी मुश्किल चट्टान बैंड एरोस्मिथ  .
It was written by Steven Tyler , Joe Perry ,  और डेसमंड  Child .
It was released in 1990 as the third single from  एरोस्मिथ 's critically और commercially  successful 1989 album Pump .
In the video The Making of Pump , A & R man John Kalodner  वर्णित the सोंग as ``  a masterpiece '' .
During live  प्रदर्शन , टायलर गाती the पहला श्लोक a cappella  and belts out one of his signature screams right before the chorus .
The album version of the song is  followed by an बेनाम  hidden track .

Odysseus ( or ; Greek : , ) ,  भी ज्ञात by the रोमन नाम ulysses ( ; ) , थी a legendary  Greek king of Ithaca and a hero of Homer 's epic poem the Odyssey .
Odysseus also plays a key role  in होमर 's इलियड और अन्य  works in that same Epic Cycle .
Husband of Penelope , father of Telemachus , and son of Laërtes ( or Sisyphus ) and Anticlea , Odysseus is renowned for his brilliance , guile , and versatility ( polytropos ) , and is hence known by  the epithet odysseus the cunning ( mētis , or `` cunning  intelligence `` ) .
He is most famous for the ten eventful years he took to return home after the  decade-long trojan युद्ध और उसके प्रसिद्ध trojan घोड़ा ploy to कैप्चर the नगर  of Troy .
Erie is a Statutory Town in Boulder  और वेल्ड काउंटी in the u.S. राज्य  of Colorado .
The population according to the 2010 census is  18,135 और थी अंकित as 6,291  at the 2000 census .
The  कस्बा of erie is स्तिथ बस वेस्ट of i-25 लिये  easy access to I-70 , Denver International Airport and Colorado 's entire Front Range .
Erie 's Planning Area spans 48 square miles , extending from the north side of State Highway 52  दक्षिण to राज्य राजमार्ग 7 , और between us 287 on the वेस्ट और अंतरराज्यीय 25  to the east .
Erie is approximately 35 minutes from Denver International Airport , 25  मिनट्स to डेनवर और 20 मिनट्स  from Boulder .
The Board of Trustees serves as the legislative and governing body of the Town of Erie and is  जिम्मेदार लिये establishing कस्बा नीतियों  and goals .
The Board has the authority to adopt laws , ordinances and resolutions as needed to conduct the business of the Town , and by ordinance may enter into contracts or  intergovernmental समझौतों to furnish , प्राप्त सेवाएं or to provide लिये सहकारी  service delivery .
Appointed by and serving at the pleasure of the Board of Trustees , the Town Administrator is  the मुख्य ऑपरेटिंग और प्रशासनिक अधिकारी of the कस्बा और is जिम्मेदार लिये providing पेशेवर  leadership in the administration and execution of policies and objectives formulated by the Board .
The mission of the Erie Police Department is to  communicate और कार्य साथ the जातियाँ to maintain a सुरक्षित पर्यावरण  , prevent crime and enforce the law , while protecting the rights of all .
Erie Municipal Airport ( EIK ) is owned and operated by the Town of Erie and is strategically located in the  denver-boulder महानगर क्षेत्रफल on कोलोराडो राजमार्ग 7 , a छोटी  over three miles west of Interstate 25 .
The main runway is concrete paved and  4,700 फीट long  .
the is a घर वीडियो खेल कंसोल  produced by Sony Computer Entertainment .
It is the  successor to the प्लेस्टेशन  2 , as part of the PlayStation series .
The PlayStation 3 competes with  microsoft 's एक्सबॉक्स 360 और निन्टेंडो 's वी as भाग  of the seventh generation of video game consoles .
It  थी पहला released on नवम्बर 11 , 2006  , in Japan , with international markets following shortly thereafter .
The console was  पहला officially घोषित  at E3 2005 .
Originally set for a spring 2006 release date ,  it थी विलम्बित अनेक टाइम्स जबतक आखिरकार hitting  stores at the end of the year .
It was the first and currently only console to use Blu-ray Disc  as इसके प्राथमिक भंडार मीडियम  .
Major features of the console include its unified online gaming service , the PlayStation Network  , और इसके कनेक्टिविटी साथ the प्लेस्टेशन पोर्टेबल और प्लेस्टेशन वीटा , in सितंबर  2009 the updated PlayStation 3 Slim , was released .
This Slim is lighter and thinner than the  असली संस्करण , हालांकि it lacks प्लेस्टेशन 2 पीछे  compatibility ( removed on later original models ) , but notably featured a re-designed logo and marketing design .
As of November 4 , 2012  , 70 लाख प्लेस्टेशन 3s have  been sold worldwide .
Its  successor , प्लेस्टेशन  4 , is set for a Q4 2013 release .
Salvador Domingo Felipe Jacinto Dalí i Domènech , 1st Marqués de Dalí de Pubol ( May 11 , 1904January 23 , 1989 ) , known as Salvador Dalí ( ) , was a  prominent स्पेनी surrealist चित्रकार born in figueres  , Spain .
Dalí was a  skilled draftsman , बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये the striking  and bizarre images in his surrealist work .
His painterly  कौशल हैं प्रायः  attributed to the influence of Renaissance masters .
His  best-known कार्य , the हठ  of Memory , was completed in 1931 .
Dalí 's expansive artistic repertoire included film , sculpture , and  छायाचित्र , in सहयोग साथ a दायरा of  artists in a variety of media .
Dalí attributed his `` love of  सबकुछ कि is gilded और excessive , my जुनून लिये लक्ज़री और my प्रेम  of oriental clothes '' to a self-styled `` Arab lineage '' , claiming that his ancestors were descended from the Moors .
Dalí was highly imaginative , and also enjoyed  indulging in असामान्य और वैभवशाली  behavior .
His eccentric manner and attention-grabbing public actions sometimes drew more  ध्यान than उसके कलाकृति , to the dismay of those जो आयोजित उसके कार्य  in high esteem , and to the irritation of his critics .
