The humanities are academic disciplines that study human culture , using methods that are  primarily विश्लेषणात्मक , नाजुक , or सट्टे , और having a significant ऐतिहासिक तत्व , as विशिष्ट इससे  the mainly empirical approaches of the natural sciences .
The humanities include ancient and modern languages ,  साहित्य , दर्शनशास्त्र , धर्म , और विज़ुअल और performing कला  such as music and theatre .
The humanities that are also regarded as social sciences include history , anthropology , area studies ,  संचार अध्ययन , सांस्कृतिक अध्ययन , विधि  , economics and linguistics .
Scholars working in the humanities are  sometimes वर्णित as `` humanists  '' .
however , कि पद भी describes the philosophical स्थिति  of humanism , which some `` antihumanist `` scholars in the humanities reject .
Some secondary schools offer humanities  वर्ग , प्रायः consisting of अंग्रेज़ी साहित्य  , global studies , and art .
Human disciplines like history , cultural  मानवशास्त्र और मनोविश्लेषण पढ़ाई विषय matters to जिससे the प्रायोगिक  method does not apply , and they have access instead to the comparative method and comparative research .
The 2005 Blue Room  क्रिसमस पेड़
the श्वेत हाउस क्रिसमस पेड़ , भी ज्ञात as the ब्लू रूम  Christmas Tree , is the official indoor Christmas tree at the residence of the President of the United States , the White House .
The first indoor Christmas tree was installed in the White House sometime  in the 19th सदी ( वहीँ हैं varying दावा as to the सटीक साल ) और  since 1961 the tree has had a themed motif at the discretion of the First Lady of the United States .
The President of the United States of America ( POTUS ) is the head of  राज्य और सिर of सरकारी of the संयुक्त  States .
The president leads the  कार्यपालिका शाखा of the संघीय सरकारी और  is the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces .
Article II of the U.S. Constitution vests the executive power of the United  राज्य in the अध्यक्ष और आरोप उसे साथ the निष्पादन of संघीय विधि , alongside the जिम्मेदारी of  appointing federal executive , diplomatic , regulatory , and judicial officers , and concluding treaties with foreign powers , with the advice and consent of the Senate .
The president is further empowered to grant federal  pardons और reprieves ,  and to convene and adjourn either or both houses of Congress under extraordinary circumstances .
Since the founding of the United States , the power of the president and the federal government have grown substantially and each modern president , despite possessing no formal legislative powers beyond signing or vetoing congressionally passed bills , is largely responsible for  dictating the विधान कार्यसूची of उसके पार्टी और the विदेशी और घरेलू नीति  of the United States .
The president is  अक्सर वर्णित as the सबसे  powerful person in the world .
The president is indirectly elected by the people  through the चुनावी कॉलेज to a four-year  term , and is one of only two nationally elected federal officers , the other being the Vice President of the United States .
The  twenty-second amendment , अपनाया in 1951 , prohibits anyone  from ever being elected to the presidency for a third full term .
It also prohibits a person from being elected to the presidency more than once if that person previously had served as president ,  or एक्टिंग अध्यक्ष , लिये अधिक than दो  years of another person 's term as president .
In all , 43  individuals have परोसा 55 four-year  terms .
On  जनवरी 20 , 2009 , बराक ओबामा became the  44th and current president .
On  नवम्बर 6 , 2012 , he थी re-elected  and is scheduled to serve until January 20 , 2017 .
Senses are physiological capacities of  जीवों कि provide आंकड़ा  for perception .
The senses and their operation , classification , and theory are overlapping topics studied by a variety of fields , most notably  neuroscience , संज्ञानात्मक मनोविज्ञान ( or संज्ञानात्मक  science ) , and philosophy of perception .
The nervous system has a specific sensory system or organ ,  समर्पित to प्रत्येक भाव .
इंसानो have a multitude  of senses .
Sight ( ophthalmoception ) , hearing ( audioception ) , taste ( gustaoception ) ,  महकते ( olfacoception or olfacception ) , और टच (  tactioception ) are the five traditionally recognized .
While the ability to detect other stimuli beyond those governed by  the परंपरागत होश exists , सहित तापमान ( thermoception ) , kinesthetic भाव ( proprioception ) , पीड़ा ( nociception ) , संतुलन ( equilibrioception  ) , acceleration ( kinesthesioception ) , and various internal stimuli ( e.g . the different chemoreceptors for detecting salt and carbon dioxide concentrations in the blood ) , only a small number of these can safely be classified as separate senses in and of themselves .
What constitutes a sense is a matter of some debate ,  अग्रणी to कठिनाइयों  in defining what exactly a sense is .
Animals also have receptors to sense the world around  उन्हें , साथ डिग्री of काबिलियत varying greatly between  species .
Humans have a  comparatively कमजोर भाव of महकते  , while some animals may lack one or more of the traditional five senses .
Some animals may also intake and  interpret संवेदी stimuli in बहुत अलग तरीके  .
Some species of animals are able to sense the world in a way that humans can not ,  साथ कुछ प्रजाति समर्थ to भाव विद्युत  and magnetic fields , and detect water pressure and currents .
Spiders ( order Araneae ) are air-breathing arthropods that have eight legs and  chelicerae साथ fangs कि इंजेक्ट  venom .
They are the largest order of arachnids and rank seventh in total species  विविधता among सब अन्य समूह of जीवों  .
Spiders are found worldwide on every  महाद्वीप मगर लिये अंटार्कटिक , और  have become established in nearly every habitat with the exception of air and sea colonization .
As of 2008 , at least  43,678 मकड़ी प्रजाति , और 109 परिवारों have महरूम अंकित by taxonomists ; however , वहीँ रै महरूम  confusion within the scientific community as to how all these families should be classified , as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications that have been proposed since 1900 .
Anatomically , spiders differ from other arthropods in that the usual body segments  हैं fused into दो tagmata , the cephalothorax और उदर , और joined by a छोटी  , cylindrical pedicel .
Unlike insects ,  मकड़ियों do नहीं have antennae  .
In all except the most primitive group , the Mesothelae , spiders have the most centralized nervous systems of all arthropods ,  as सब उनके ganglia हैं fused into एक द्रव्यमान in the cephalothorax  .
नापसंद सबसे arthropods , मकड़ियों have no extensor  muscles in their limbs and instead extend them by hydraulic pressure .
Their abdomens bear appendages that have been  परिवर्धित into spinnerets  that extrude silk from up to six types of silk glands within their abdomen .
मकड़ी webs vary widely in आकार  , shape and the amount of sticky thread used .
It now appears that the spiral orb web may be one  of the earliest फ़ॉर्म , और मकड़ियों कि उपज उलझे  cobwebs are more abundant and diverse than orb-web spiders .
Spider-like arachnids with silk-producing spigots appeared in  the devonian काल परिचय , लकिन  these animals apparently lacked spinnerets .
True spiders have been found in Carboniferous rocks from , and are very similar  to the सबसे आदिम surviving  order , the Mesothelae .
The main groups of modern spiders , Mygalomorphae and Araneomorphae , first  appeared in the triassic काल  , before .
A herbivorous  प्रजाति , bagheera kiplingi , थी वर्णित in 2008 , लकिन सब अन्य  known species are predators , mostly preying on insects and on other spiders , although a few large species also take birds and lizards .
Spiders use a wide  दायरा of रणनीति to कैप्चर शिकार : trapping it  in sticky webs , lassoing it with sticky bolas , mimicking the prey to avoid detection , or running it down .
Most detect prey mainly by sensing vibrations , but the active hunters have acute vision , and hunters of the genus Portia show signs of intelligence in their  चुनाव of tactics और क्षमता  to develop new ones .
मकड़ियों ' गुस्ताखी हैं too सीमित to लो solids , और वे liquidize उनके  food by flooding it with digestive enzymes and grinding it with the bases of their pedipalps , as they do not have true jaws .
Male spiders identify themselves by a variety of  जटिल प्रेमालाप संस्कार to avoid  being eaten by the females .
Males of most species survive a few matings ,  सीमित मुख्यतः by उनके छोटी जीवन spans .
Females weave silk egg-cases , each of which may  contain सैंकड़ों of अंडे  .
Females of many species care for their young , for example by carrying  उन्हें around or by sharing खाना साथ  them .
A minority of species are  सोशल , भवन सांप्रदायिक webs  that may house anywhere from a few to 50,000 individuals .
Social behavior ranges from precarious toleration , as in the widow  मकड़ियों , to co-operative शिकार और food-sharing  .
हालांकि सबसे मकड़ियों सजीव लिये at सबसे दो  years , tarantulas and other mygalomorph spiders can live up to 25 years in captivity .
While the venom of a few species is dangerous to humans , scientists are now researching the  उपयोग of मकड़ी venom in आयुर्विज्ञान और as non-polluting pesticides  .
Spider silk provides a combination of lightness , strength and elasticity that is superior  to कि of सिंथेटिक सामग्री , और मकड़ी रेशा जीनों have महरूम  inserted into mammals and plants to see if these can be used as silk factories .
As a result  of उनके चौड़ी दायरा of व्यवहार , मकड़ियों have become आम प्रतीकों in आर्ट और mythology  symbolizing various combinations of patience , cruelty and creative powers .
Grey  's anatomy is an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न  medical drama that premiered on the American Broadcasting Company ( ABC ) , as a mid-season replacement on March 27 , 2005 .
The series has aired nine seasons , and focuses  on the fictional जीवनदान of सर्जिकल interns और निवासियों  as they gradually evolve into seasoned doctors , while trying to maintain personal lives .
The show 's premise originated with Shonda Rhimes , who serves as an executive producer ,  साथ साथ बेट्सी beers , चिह्नित गॉर्डन , क्रिस्टा vernoff ,  Rob Corn , Mark Wilding , and Allan Heinberg .
The series was created  to be racially विविध , utilizing  a color-blind casting technique .
It is primarily filmed in  लॉस एंजिल्स , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
The series ' protagonist is Dr.  मेरेडिथ धूसर ( एलेन pompeo ) , जो originally is स्वीकृत  into the residency program at the fictional Seattle Grace Hospital .
Meredith is  आबंटित to कार्य अंतर्गत dr. मिरांडा बेली ( चन्द्रा विल्सन ) , साथ साथ dr. क्रिस्टीना यांग ( सैंड्रा oh  ) , Dr. George O'Malley ( T. R. Knight ) , Dr. Izzie Stevens ( Katherine Heigl ) , and Dr. Alex Karev ( Justin Chambers ) .
following o'malley 's मौत और स्टीवंस ' प्रस्थान , the हॉस्पिटल 's विलय साथ रहमत वेस्ट brings in dr. जैक्सन  Avery ( Jesse Williams ) and Dr. April Kepner ( Sarah Drew ) , in the sixth season .
The surgical  wing is primarily पर्यवेक्षित by dr. रिचर्ड webber (  James Pickens , Jr. ) , who is eventually replaced by Dr. Derek Shepherd ( Patrick Dempsey ) , and later Dr. Owen Hunt ( Kevin McKidd ) .
Dr. Preston Burke ( Isaiah Washington ) departs at the conclusion of the third season , and is replaced by  dr. एरिका hahn ( ब्रुक स्मिथ ) , जो पत्ते the दिखाएँ दौरान the पांचवां ऋतु , और बाद dr. टेडी altman ( किम raver  ) , who departs at the end of the eighth season .
Introduced in the second season is Dr. Addison Montgomery ( Kate Walsh ) , who  पत्ते the दिखाएँ at the समाप्त of the तीसरा ऋतु ,  in order to launch her own spin-off medical drama Private Practice .
Dr. Callie Torres ( Sara Ramirez ) and Dr. Mark Sloan ( Eric Dane )  भी डालें the दिखाएँ in the दूसरी ऋतु , जबकि the latter मरता in the प्रीमियर  of the ninth season .
Meredith 's half-sister , Dr. Lexie Grey ( Chyler Leigh ) , appears from season three and  मरता at the  end of season eight .
dr. एरिज़ोना रॉबिन्स ( जेसिका capshaw  ) is given series regular status at the beginning of the sixth season .
Grey 's Anatomy is the  highest-rated नाटक in the कुंजी  18–49 demographic .
Previously  among the overall top-ten रेटेड shows in the संयुक्त राज्य , धूसर 's anatomy  has been well received by critics .
Considered  an प्रभाव on संस्कृति , the श्रेणी रै प्राप्त numerous पुरस्कार  , and has also been included in various critics ' top ten lists .
The  दिखाएँ रै उत्पादित अनेक specials , as खूब as वितरित  all seasons to DVD , and released a collection of merchandise .
In  2012 , धूसर 's anatomy थी नामित the fifth-highest आय कमाई दिखाएँ  , in terms of advertising per half-hour .
On May 11 , 2012 , the  श्रेणी थी नवीनीकृत  for a ninth season , which premiered on September 27 , 2012 .
Schizophrenia ( or ) is a mental disorder  characterized by a विश्लेषण of विचार प्रक्रियाओं और by  a deficit of typical emotional responses .
Common symptoms include auditory hallucinations , paranoid or  विचित्र delusions , or disorganized वाक और सोच , और it  is accompanied by significant social or occupational dysfunction .
The onset of symptoms typically occurs in young  adulthood , साथ a वैश्विक आजीवन  prevalence of about 0.3–0.7 % .
Diagnosis is based on observed  बर्ताव और the रोगी 's  reported experiences .
Genetics , early environment , neurobiology , and psychological and social processes appear to be  महत्वपूर्ण contributory कारकों ; कुछ recreational और नुस्खा दवाएँ appear to कारण  or worsen symptoms .
Current research is focused on the role of  neurobiology , हालांकि no सिंगल पृथक सशुल्क  cause has been found .
The many possible combinations of symptoms have triggered debate about  whether the निदान represents a सिंगल विकार or  a number of discrete syndromes .
Despite the etymology of the term from the Greek roots  skhizein ( σχίζειν , `` to विभाजित '' ) और phrēn , phren- ( φρήν , φρεν- ; `` दिमाग '' ) , schizophrenia करता नहीं imply a `` विभाजित व्यक्तित्व ''  , or `` multiple personality disorder '' ( which is known these days as dissociative identity disorder ) —a condition with which it is often confused in public perception .
Rather , the term means a `` splitting of mental functions '' , because of the  symptomatic प्रस्तुतीकरण of  the illness .
The mainstay of treatment is antipsychotic medication ,  जिससे primarily दबा  dopamine ( and sometimes serotonin ) receptor activity .
मनोचिकित्सा और वोकेशनल और सोशल पुनर्वास  are also important in treatment .
In more serious  cases—where वहीँ is रिस्क to स्वः और others— involuntary  hospitalization may be necessary , although hospital stays are now shorter and less frequent than they once were .
The disorder is thought mainly to affect cognition , but it also usually contributes to chronic problems  साथ बर्ताव और जज्बात  .
People with schizophrenia are likely to have additional ( comorbid ) conditions , including major depression  और चिंता विकार ; the आजीवन occurrence of पदार्थ  use disorder is almost 50 % .
Social problems , such as long-term  बेरोजगारी , गरीबी , और homelessness  are common .
The average life expectancy of  लोगों साथ the विकार is 12 to 15 सालो  less than those without , the result of increased physical health problems and a higher suicide rate ( about 5 % ) .
Paul Leslie Snider ( April 15 , 1951–August 14 , 1980 ) was the estranged husband and  मैनेजर of प्लेबॉय मॉडल डोरोथी stratten  , whom he murdered before killing himself the same day .
The Epic of Gilgamesh , an epic poem from Mesopotamia , is amongst the earliest surviving works  of साहित्य  .
The literary history of Gilgamesh begins with five independent Sumerian poems  परिचय 'bilgamesh ' ( sumerian लिये gilgamesh  ) , king of Uruk .
Four of  ये यहूद प्रयुक्त as सोर्स सामग्री  for a combined epic in Akkadian .
This first combined epic , known as the `` Old Babylonian '' version , dates to the 18th century BC and is  titled बाद इसके incipit , shūtur एली  sharrī ( `` Surpassing All Other Kings '' ) .
Only a few  fragments of it  have survived .
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates  इससे the 13th to the 10th सदियां bc  and bears the incipit Sha naqba īmuru ( `` He who Saw the Deep '' ) .
Fragments of  लगभग दो तिहाई  of this longer , twelve-tablet version have been recovered .
Some of  the बेहतरीन नक़ल यहूद खोजा in the पुस्तकालयों तबाह  of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal .
The story  centers on a दोस्ती  between Gilgamesh and Enkidu .
Enkidu is a wild man created by the  देवताओं as gilgamesh 's बराबर  to distract him from oppressing the people of Uruk .
Together , they journey to the Cedar  पहाड़ to शिकस्त humbaba , इसके  monstrous guardian .
Later  वे मार the सांड of स्वर्ग , जिससे  the goddess Ishtar sends to punish Gilgamesh for spurning her advances .
As a  दंड लिये ये क्रियाएँ  , the gods sentence Enkidu to death .
The second half of the epic focuses on Gilgamesh 's  तकलीफ at enkidu 's मौत , और उसके क्वेस्ट  for immortality .
In order to learn the secret of  अनन्त जीवन , gilgamesh undertakes a long और  perilous journey .
He  learns कि `` the जीवन  that you are seeking you will never find .
When the gods created man they allotted to him  मौत , लकिन जीवन वे retained in उनके अपना keeping  . ''
This quote was originally attributed to Siduri in the Old Babylonian version of the epic , and then  attributed to the अमर बाढ़ नायिका utnapishtim in the अक्कादी संस्करण  of the epic .
Nevertheless , Gilgamesh 's fame lived on after his death , because of his great building  प्रोजेक्ट , और उसके खाता of कया utnapishtim बताई उसे happened दौरान the  flood .
The story  रै महरूम अनूदित into अनेक अलग भाषाएं ,  and Gilgamesh has since become adapted in works of popular fiction .
A eukaryote ( or ) is an organism whose cells contain complex structures  enclosed भीतर  membranes .
eukaryotes may अधिक formally be referred  to as the taxon Eukarya or Eukaryota .
The defining membrane-bound structure that sets  eukaryotic कोशिकाएं अलावा इससे prokaryotic कोशिकाएं is the केंद्रक  , or nuclear envelope , within which the genetic material is carried .
The  उपस्थिति of a केंद्रक देता eukaryotes उनके नाम , जिससे आता  from the Greek ( eu , `` good '' ) and ( karyon , `` nut '' or `` kernel '' ) .
Most eukaryotic  कोशिकाएं भी contain अन्य membrane-bound organelles  such as mitochondria , chloroplasts and the Golgi apparatus .
All large complex organisms are eukaryotes ,  सहित पशु , पौधे और fungi  .
The group also includes many  एककोशिकीय  organisms .
Cell division in eukaryotes is  अलग इससे कि in जीवों  without a nucleus ( Prokaryote ) .
It involves separating the  duplicated गुणसूत्रों , through  movements directed by microtubules .
There are two types of  प्रभाग प्रक्रियाओं  .
In mitosis , one cell divides to  उपज दो genetically  identical cells .
In meiosis , which is required in sexual reproduction ,  एक द्विगुणित कोशिका ( having दो उदाहरण of प्रत्येक chromosome , एक इससे प्रत्येक जनक ) undergoes recombination of प्रत्येक जोड़ी of parental  chromosomes , and then two stages of cell division , resulting in four haploid cells ( gametes ) .
Each gamete has  बस एक पूरक of गुणसूत्रों , प्रत्येक a  unique mix of the corresponding pair of parental chromosomes .
eukaryota appears to be monophyletic  , and so makes up one of the three domains of life .
The two other domains ,  जीवाणु और आर्किया , हैं prokaryotes  and have none of the above features .
Eukaryotes represent a tiny minority of all living things ; even in a human body  वहीँ हैं 10 टाइम्स अधिक  microbes than human cells .
However , due to their much larger size their collective  विश्वव्यापी बायोमास is अनुमानित at परिचय बराबर  to that of prokaryotes .
They are considered to  have पहला विकसित लगभग  1.6–2.1 billion years ago .
The use of Internet services or software with Internet access to defraud victims or to otherwise take advantage of them , for example by  चोरी निजी सूचना , जिससे can भी सीसे to पहचान चोरी  .
A very common form of  अंतरजाल धोखाधड़ी is the वितरण  of rogue security software .
Internet services can be used to present fraudulent solicitations to  prospective पीड़ितों , to conduct बेईमान ट्रांजेक्शन , or to संचारण the  proceeds of fraud to financial institutions or to others connected with the scheme .
Internet fraud can occur in chat rooms ,  ईमेल , संदेश फलक , or on  websites .
The International Security  सहायता फ़ोर्स ( isaf ) is a नाटो -led सुरक्षा मिशन in अफगानिस्तान  that was established by the United Nations Security Council in December 2001 by Resolution 1386 , as envisaged by the Bonn Agreement .
Its main purpose is to  ट्रैन the अफगान नेशनल सुरक्षा शक्तियां ( ansf ) और assist अफगानिस्तान in पुनर्निर्माण कुंजी सरकारी संस्थानों  but is also engaged in the 2001-present war with insurgent groups .
ISAF was initially charged with  securing काबुल और surrounding क्षेत्रों इससे the तालिबान , al qaeda और factional warlords , so as to allow लिये the स्थापना  of the Afghan Transitional Administration headed by Hamid Karzai .
In October 2003 , the UN Security Council authorized the expansion of the ISAF mission throughout  अफगानिस्तान , और isaf subsequently विस्तारित the मिशन in चार प्रमुख चरण over the पूरे of  the country .
From 2006 to 2011 , ISAF had been involved  in increasingly अधिक intensive कॉम्बैट परिचालन in  southern and eastern Afghanistan .
Troop contributors include from  the संयुक्त राज्य , संयुक्त किंगडम  , NATO member states and a number of other countries .
The intensity of the combat faced by  contributing राष्ट्र varies greatly , साथ the संयुक्त राज्य , संयुक्त किंगडम , और कनाडा sustaining the  majority of casualties in intensive combat operations , with other contributors sustaining significantly less .
As of early 2010  , वहीँ यहूद at तनिक 700 सैन्य bases  inside Afghanistan but more were expected to be built in the coming years .
About 400 of these were used by American‐led  नाटो शक्तियां और 300 by ansf .
Cocaine ( benzoylmethylecgonine ) ( INN ) is a crystalline  tropane एल्कलॉएड कि is प्राप्त  from the leaves of the coca plant .
The name comes from `` coca '' and the alkaloid suffix -ine ,  forming कोका .
It is a stimulant , an  भूख suppressant  , and a topical anesthetic .
Biologically , cocaine acts as a serotonin–norepinephrine–dopamine reuptake inhibitor , also  ज्ञात as a ट्रिपल reuptake inhibitor ( ट्राई )  .
It is  addictive क्युकी of इसके प्रभाव  on the mesolimbic reward pathway .
Unlike most molecules , cocaine has pockets  साथ दोनो ऊँची hydrophilic और lipophilic दक्षता ,  violating the rule of hydrophilic-lipophilic balance .
This causes it to cross the blood–brain barrier far better than other psychoactive chemicals  और may भी induce blood-brain अवरोध  breakdown .
It is illegal to possess ,  उपज , or वितरित कोका लिये non-medicinal  and non-government-sanctioned purposes in almost every country .
Whole beef  tri-tip rump ,  roasted medium rare
The tri-tip is a cut of  बीफ इससे the नीचे  sirloin primal cut .
It is a small  triangular मांसपेशी , प्रायः 1.5 to 2.5 पाउंड .  ( 675 to 1,150g ) per side of beef .
the वैज्ञानिक नाम of इस मांसपेशी is प्रदिश fasciae latae , inserted in the fascia lata , the संयोजी ऊतक covering the quadriceps  femoris , also called quadriceps extensor , a group of four muscles which in turn insert in the patella , or knee cap of the animal .
Willmar is a city in , and the county  सीट of , kandiyohi काउंटी , मिनेसोटा  , United States .
The population was  19,610 at the 2010  census .
Willmar has been assigned ZIP code 56201 by the United  राज्य डाक सेवा  .
U.S .  रूट 12 और 71 और मिनेसोटा राज्य  Highways 23 and 40 are four of the main routes in the city .
The  स्पीकर of the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  ( or Speaker of the House ) is the presiding officer of the chamber .
The office  थी स्थापित in 1789 by आलेख i , खण्ड 2 of the संयुक्त राज्य  Constitution , which states in part , `` The House of Representatives shall chuse their Speaker ... ''
The current Speaker is John  boehner , a रिपब्लिकन जो represents  Ohio 's 8th congressional district .
the संविधान करता नहीं आवश्यकता कि the स्पीकर be a सदस्य of  Congress , but no non-member has ever been elected to the office .
The  स्पीकर is दूसरी in the संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्षीय लकीर of उत्तराधिकार  , after the Vice President and ahead of the President pro tempore of the U.S. Senate .
Unlike some Westminster system parliaments , in which the office  of स्पीकर is माना non-partisan , in the संयुक्त राज्य the स्पीकर of the हाउस is a नेतृत्व स्थिति  and the office-holder actively works to set the majority party 's legislative agenda .
The  स्पीकर प्रायः करता नहीं personally preside over debates , बजाय delegating  the duty to members of the House from the majority party .
Aside from duties relating to heading the House and the majority political party , the Speaker also performs  प्रशासनिक और प्रक्रियात्मक कृत्यों , और represents उसके  or her Congressional district .
A bicycle frame is the main component of a bicycle , on to  जिससे पहियों और अन्य  components are fitted .
The modern and most common frame design for an upright bicycle is based on the safety bicycle , and  consists of दो त्रिकोण , a प्रमुख त्रिभुज और a युग्म पश्च  triangle .
This is known as the  डायमंड फ़्रेम  .
Frames are required to be strong , stiff and light ,  जिससे वे do by combining अलग सामग्री  and shapes .
`` Simple gravity  लोलक '' मॉडल assumes  no friction or air resistance .
An exemplar animation of a pendulum  प्रर्दशित the गति  and acceleration vectors
A pendulum is a weight suspended  इससे a so  that it can swing freely .
When a pendulum is displaced sideways from its resting equilibrium position , it is subject to a  restoring फ़ोर्स due to गम्भीरता कि होगा accelerate it वापस toward the संतुलन स्थिति  .
When released , the restoring force combined with the pendulum 's mass causes it to oscillate about  the संतुलन स्थिति , सुहाने वापस और forth  .
The time for one complete cycle  , a बाएँ झूले और  a right swing , is called the period .
A pendulum  swings साथ a विशिष्ट काल जिससे  depends ( mainly ) on its length .
From its  डिस्कवरी around 1602 by गैलीलियो गैलिली the नियमित गति of pendulums थी  used for timekeeping , and was the world 's most accurate timekeeping technology until the 1930s .
Pendulums are  प्रयुक्त to विनियमित लोलक घड़ियाँ , और  are used in scientific instruments such as accelerometers and seismometers .
Historically they were used as gravimeters to  माप the त्वरण  of gravity in geophysical surveys , and even as a standard of length .
The word 'pendulum ' is new  लैटिन , इससे the लैटिन pendulus , अर्थ  'hanging ' .
The simple gravity pendulum is an  idealized गणितीय मॉडल of a लोलक  .
इस is a वज़न ( or bob ) on  the end of a massless cord suspended from a , without friction .
When given an initial push , it will swing back  और forth at a निरंतर आयाम .
Real pendulums are subject to friction  और एयर खीचें , so the आयाम of उनके  swings declines .
The First Battle of Bull Run , also known as First Manassas ( the name used by  confederate शक्तियां ) , थी लड़ा on जुलाई 21 , 1861 , in प्रिंस विलियम काउंटी  , Virginia , near the city of Manassas .
it थी the पहला प्रमुख जमीन  battle of the American Civil War .
Just months after the start of the war at Fort Sumter , the Northern public clamored for a march against the  confederate पूंजी of रिचमंड , वर्जिनिया , जिससे वे अपेक्षित to लाओ an जल्दी समाप्त to the विद्रोह  .
Yielding to political pressure , Brig . Gen. Irvin McDowell led his unseasoned Union Army across Bull  चलाएं विरूद्ध the बराबर अनुभवहीन confederate  Army of Brig . Gen. P. G. T. Beauregard camped near Manassas Junction .
McDowell 's ambitious plan for a surprise flank attack on the Confederate left was poorly executed by his officers and men ; nevertheless ,  the confederates , जो था महरूम नियोजन to आक्रमण the संघ बाएँ  flank , found themselves at an initial disadvantage .
Confederate reinforcements under Brig . Gen.  जोसेफ E. johnston arrived इससे the shenandoah घाटी  by railroad and the course of the battle quickly changed .
A brigade of Virginians under a relatively unknown colonel from  the वर्जिनिया सैन्य संस्थान , थामस J. जैक्सन , stood उनके मैदान  and Jackson received his famous nickname , `` Stonewall Jackson '' .
The Confederates then launched a strong counterattack , and as the Union troops began withdrawing under fire , many panicked and it  turned into a rout as mcdowell 's मेन frantically भागा बगैर अनुक्रम in the दिशा of वॉशिंगटन  , D.C .
Both armies were sobered by the fierce fighting and many casualties , and realized  the युद्ध थी going to be much  longer and bloodier than either had anticipated .

Weather is  the राज्य of the माहौल , to the उपाधि कि it is hot or ठंडा ,  wet or dry , calm or stormy , clear or cloudy .
Most weather  phenomena occur in the क्षोभमण्डल  , just below the stratosphere .
Weather  generally refers to day-to-day तापमान और वर्षण कार्यकलाप  , whereas climate is the term for the average atmospheric conditions over longer periods of time .
When used without qualification , `` weather '' is  समझा to be the मौसम of  Earth .
Weather is driven by air pressure ( temperature  और नमी ) मतभेद  between one place and another .
These pressure and temperature differences can occur due to the sun angle at any particular  स्पॉट , जिससे varies by अक्षांश  from the tropics .
The strong  तापमान कंट्रास्ट between ध्रुवीय  and tropical air gives rise to the jet stream .
Weather systems in the mid-latitudes ,  ऐसे as extratropical cyclones , हैं caused by instabilities  of the jet stream flow .
Because the Earth 's axis is tilted relative to its  कक्षीय प्लेन , धूप is घटना at अलग कोण  at different times of the year .
On Earth 's surface , temperatures usually range ±40  °c ( −40 °f to 100 °f  ) annually .
Over thousands of years , changes in Earth 's orbit affect the amount and distribution of solar energy  प्राप्त by the धरती और influence long-term जलवायु  and global climate change .
Surface  तापमान मतभेद in फेरे कारण  pressure differences .
Higher  altitudes हैं कूलर than निम्नतर  altitudes due to differences in compressional heating .
Weather forecasting is the application of science and technology to  भविष्यवाणी the राज्य of the माहौल लिये a भविष्य  time and a given location .
The atmosphere is a chaotic system , so small changes to one part of the system  can grow to have विशाल प्रभाव on the  system as a whole .
Human attempts to control the weather have occurred throughout human history , and there is  प्रमाण कि इंसान कार्यकलाप ऐसे as कृषि  and industry has inadvertently modified weather patterns .
Studying how the weather works on other planets has been  सहायक in समझना  how weather works on Earth .
A famous landmark in the Solar  प्रणाली , बृहस्पति 's ग्रेट रेड स्पॉट , is an  anticyclonic storm known to have existed for at least 300 years .
However  , मौसम is नहीं सीमित  to planetary bodies .
A star 's corona is constantly being lost to space , creating what is  essentially a बहुत पतला  atmosphere throughout the Solar System .
The movement  of द्रव्यमान ejected इससे  the Sun is known as the solar wind .
Katy Perry is an  अमरीकी singer-songwriter इससे  Santa Barbara , California .
वो हस्ताक्षरित साथ  Capitol Records .
Perry has released three studio albums , including her debut  ईसाई प्रयत्न कैटी हडसन , एक of the लड़कों  , and Teenage Dream .
Perry 's mainstream career was kicked off with the massive  चार्ट कामयाबी of उसके  debut single `` I Kissed a Girl `` .
During her career , Perry has been  मनोनीत लिये numerous प्रमुख म्यूज़िक  awards , primarily for Teenage Dream and One of the Boys .
The following is a list of  sovereign राज्य और territories जहाँ अंग्रेज़ी is an  official language or language of government .
In 2012 ,  वहीँ यहूद  88 states in total ( 60 sovereign states and 28 non-sovereign states ) .
In many  देशों अंग्रेज़ी is the प्रबल भाषा  , but does not have official status .
In Australia , English is spoken by the vast majority of the population and is the only language  प्रयुक्त in सरकारी संस्थानों , लकिन ऑस्ट्रेलिया करता नहीं have an  official language .
The case is the same in the United Kingdom and the United States , though many states and regions  भीतर the u.S. do have अंग्रेज़ी as an आधिकारिक  language .
English is the dominant language of New Zealand and an official language of  कनाडा ( साथ साथ फ्रेंच ) , इण्डिया ( साथ साथ हिंदी  and several other languages ) , Ireland ( along with Irish ) , and the Philippines ( along with Tagalog ) .
English is the sole official language of the Commonwealth of  राष्ट्र और the राष्ट्रमंडल खेल .
English is one of the official languages of the United  राष्ट्र , the यूरोपीय संघ और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Olympic Committee .
Many of these countries are current or former colonies or dependencies of the United Kingdom ( see also British Empire ) , or of the United States ,  itself a पूर्व उपनिवेश  of the UK .
Notable exceptions  शामिल रवांडा ,  which was a former Belgian colony and Eritrea , which was an Italian colony where the British Empire spanned its control only in World War II and shortly after ( 1941-1952 ) .
India  's भाषाई चित्र  is complex .
According to the Constitution of India , `` Hindi in the Devanagari script '' is the official language of the union ; and English the 'subsidiary official language ' ; however , English is mandated for the authoritative  ग्रन्थ of सब संघीय कानून और परम् अदालत निर्णय और ( साथ  with Hindi ) is one of the two languages of the Indian Parliament .
English is used almost  exclusively लिये उच्चतर  education , business and science .
Courses  in बहुमत of the स्कूलों हैं सिखाया  exclusively in English .
English is extensively  प्रयुक्त लिये प्रशासनिक  purposes in India .
India is the  second-largest english-speaking देश  in the world by number of speakers , after the United States .
As such , many consider  अंग्रेज़ी  to be the de facto official language of India .
देखिए आधिकारिक  languages of India .
The linguistic makeup of  पाकिस्तानी is similarly  complex .
While the national language  is उर्दू , अंग्रेज़ी is  an official language and used in business , government and law .
English is  a अनिवार्य भाषा  in schools .
All school  पाठ्यक्रम हैं सिखाया in अंग्रेज़ी  .
Pakistan is the 9th largest English-speaking  देश in the संसार by जनसांख्यिकी  .
Southern Cone ( , ) is  a भौगोलिक प्रदेश रचित of the southernmost  areas of South America , south of the Tropic of Capricorn .
Although geographically this includes Southern and part of Southeast ( São Paulo ) of Brazil , in terms of political geography the Southern cone has  traditionally comprised अर्जेंटीना  , Chile , Paraguay , and Uruguay .
In the narrowest sense , it only covers Argentina , Chile and Uruguay , bounded on the north by the states of Brazil , Paraguay , Bolivia and Peru ,  on the वेस्ट by the प्रशांत समंदर , और दक्षिण to the जंक्शन between the प्रशांत और अटलांटिक  Oceans , which it is the closest continental area of Antarctica ( 1000 km ) .
High life expectancy , the highest Human Development Index of Latin America , high Standard of living , significant participation in the  वैश्विक बाज़ार और the उभरते अर्थव्यवस्था of इसके सदस्यों मेक the दक्षिणी कोन the सबसे prosperous macro-region in दक्षिण अमेरिका  .
For  multi-event एथलेटिक प्रतियोगिताओं  see Track and Field Competitions , section `` Meetings '' .
Meetings  हैं sometimes आयोजित around  conference tables .
In  a बैठक , दो or अधिक लोगों आइये  together to discuss one or more topics , often in a formal setting .
An official game in baseball ,  भी sometimes पुकारा a विनियमन खेल , is a  game that has progressed beyond the point at which it can be considered complete if necessary .
This is approximately  the halfway पाइंट  of the game .
In the case of inclement  मौसम , कोई खेल जिससे रै पहुँचे  this point may be stopped and shortened as needed , with the result being final , and all records and statistics counted .
A game which has not reached this point before being stopped is either considered a  निलंबित खेल ( to be जारी at a बाद तिथि इससे the पाइंट of stoppage  ) , or is simply canceled and replayed from the start .
( This depends on the rules of each  व्यक्तिगत लीग  . )
in either मामला , no  statistics are counted until the game becomes official .
Since most professional baseball games are nine innings long , the fifth inning is used as the  दहलीज  for an official game .
If the visiting team is leading , or  the खेल is tied , the समाप्त of the  fifth inning marks this point .
If the home team ( which bats last ) is already ahead in the score ,  और theoretically होता नहीं need  its half of the fifth inning , then 41⁄2 innings ( i.e. , the middle of the fifth ) is considered an official game .
The  खेल is भी माना आधिकारिक if the घर टोली स्कोर to लो the सीसे in the नीचे  of the fifth inning , since the game would end immediately if the same thing happened in the ninth .
In nearly all cases , the `` official game '' status is used to determine  whether a बरसात जाँच होगा be सम्मानित लिये प्रशंसक पकड़कर टिकटें  .
If a game is started but does not reach the point of becoming official , fans are entitled to a new  टिकट लिये the make-up खेल or ( in सबसे मामले ) कोई अन्य उपलब्धियाँ खेल of उनके  choice .
If a game is halted after it becomes  आधिकारिक , the खेल is बस shortened और  no rain check is given .
The `` official game '' statistic received some  ध्यान दौरान the 1995 ऋतु , जब कैलोरी ripken , jr. थी approaching the  record for consecutive games played , previously held by Lou Gehrig .
विशाल संख्याएँ यहूद लटका on the पक्ष of the  B & O Warehouse at Oriole Park at Camden Yards to show the number of games in Ripken 's streak .
Each day , a new number was unfurled during the fifth  inning बाद प्रत्येक खेल था become आधिकारिक ( चूंकि  the statistic would not have counted if the game had been stopped before that point ) .
A similar practice has been used to count down toward the demolition of several stadiums ( including Veterans Stadium in Philadelphia in 2003 , Busch Memorial Stadium in St. Louis in 2005 , and the original Yankee Stadium and Shea Stadium in New York City in 2008 ) ; as each game became  आधिकारिक , the टोली होता unveil a नई ( निम्नतर ) क्रमांक प्रर्दशित the क्रमांक of खेल बाएँ to be निभाई  in the stadium .
A telephone number or phone number is a sequence of digits used to call from one telephone line to  another in a पब्लिक switched टेलीफोन संजाल  .
When telephone numbers were invented , they  यहूद छोटी — as few as एक , दो or तीन अंक  — and were given orally to a switchboard operator .
As phone systems have grown and  interconnected to encompass  the world , telephone numbers have become longer .
In addition  to telephones , वे अभी अभिगम अन्य  devices , such as computers and fax machines .
The number contains the information necessary  to पहचानो uniquely the intended endpoint  for the telephone call .
Each such endpoint must  have a अद्वितीय क्रमांक भीतर  the public switched telephone network .
Most countries use  फिक्स्ड लंबाई संख्याएँ ( लिये सामान्य लाइनों at तनिक ) और  therefore the number of endpoints determines the necessary length of the telephone number .
It is also possible for each subscriber to have a set of shorter  संख्याएँ लिये the endpoints सबसे प्रायः  used .
These `` shorthand '' or `` speed calling '' numbers are  automatically अनूदित to अद्वितीय  telephone numbers before the call can be connected .
Some special services have their own short numbers ( e.g. , 1-1-9 , 9-1-1 , 0-0-0 , 9-9-9 , 1-1-1 , and 1-1-2 being the Emergency Services numbers for China , Japan , South Korea , Taiwan and Sri Lanka ; Canada and the United States ; Australia ; the United Kingdom , Ireland , South Africa , Poland , Saudi Arabia , the United Arab Emirates , Morocco , Macao ,  बहरीन , क़तर , बांग्लादेश , बोत्सवाना , घाना , कीनिया , हांग काँग , मलेशिया , मॉरीशस , सिंगापुर , ज़िम्बाब्वे , त्रिनिदाद , टोबैगो ; नई जीलैंड ; कुवैत और the यूरोपीय संघ ,  respectively . )
Many systems  भी allow काल्स भीतर a लोकल  area to be made without dialing the local area code .
For example , a phone number in North America will start with  तीन संख्याएँ ( ऐसे as 661 ) , जिससे is the क्षेत्रफल कोड , followed by सात अंक विभाजित into भाग of तीन  and four ( such as 550-1212 ) , which is the local number .
Some areas now have  अनिवार्य ten-digit डायलिंग in  place , even for local calls .
Most telephone  संजाल आज ( अपवाद होने निजी intercom और सुरक्षित फोन संजाल ) हैं interconnected  in the international telephone network , where the format of telephone numbers is standardized by ITU-T in the recommendation E.164 .
This specifies that the entire  क्रमांक चाहिए be 15 अंक or shorter  , and begin with a country prefix .
For most countries ,  इस is followed by an क्षेत्रफल कोड or नगर कोड और the सदस्य क्रमांक , जिससे  might consist of the code for a particular telephone exchange .
ITU-T recommendation E.123 describes how to represent an international  टेलीफोन क्रमांक in लिखने or छपाई , starting साथ a प्लस चिह्न  ( `` + '' ) and the country code .
When calling an international number from a fixed line phone , the + must be replaced  साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय कॉल उपसर्ग चुनी by the देश  the call is being made from .
Some mobile phones  allow the + to be डाला  directly .
The  स्वरूप और आवंटन of लोकल फोन संख्याएँ हैं नियंत्रित by प्रत्येक  nation 's respective government , either directly or by sponsored organizations ( such as NANPA overseen by NeuStar Inc. ) .
Before a telephone call is connected , the telephone number must be dialed by the calling  पार्टी  or Caller .
The called party might have equipment that presents  कॉलर id पहले the कॉल is answered  .
A  संग्रहण एजेंसी is a कारोबार कि  pursues payments of debts owed by individuals or businesses .
Most  संग्रहण एजेंसियों operate as एजेंटों of  creditors and collect debts for a fee or percentage of the total amount owed .
There are many types of  संग्रहण  agencies .
First-party agencies  हैं oftentimes subsidiaries of the असली  company the debt is owed to .
Third-party agencies are separate companies contracted by a company to collect debts  on उनके निमित्त लिये a शुल्क  .
Debt buyers purchase the  कर्ज़ at a प्रतिशत  of its value , then attempt to collect it .
Each country has its own rules and  regulations  regarding them .
Cannabis  पुष्प साथ दृश्य  trichomes
Cannabis , also known as marijuana ( from the Mexican Spanish  marihuana ) , और by अन्य names , is a तैयारी of the कैनबिस संयंत्र intended  for use as a psychoactive drug and as medicine .
pharmacologically , the प्रिंसिपल psychoactive constituent of कैनबिस is tetrahydrocannabinol ( thc ) ; it  is one of 483 known compounds in the plant , including at least 84 other cannabinoids , such as cannabidiol ( CBD ) , cannabinol ( CBN ) , tetrahydrocannabivarin ( THCV ) .
and  cannabigerol ( cbg  ) .
This is  a सूची of अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल quarterbacks जो have प्रारंभ लिये the  Washington Redskins , as well as its predecessors the Boston Braves ( 1932 ) and Boston Redskins ( 1933 – 1936 ) , in the National Football League ( NFL ) .
The Washington Redskins franchise was originally founded in Boston , Massachusetts as the  बोस्टन braves , नामित  after the local baseball franchise .
The name was  बदला the following साल  to the Redskins .
In 1937 ,  the मताधिकार स्थानांतरित to  Washington , D.C .
Of  the 49 redskins starting quarterbacks , दो have महरूम inducted  into the Pro Football Hall of Fame : Sammy Baugh and Sonny Jurgensen .

1st Special Forces Operational Detachment-Delta ( 1st SFOD-D ) , popularly known as Delta Force , is one of the  संयुक्त राज्य ' चार गुपचुप tier-one counter-terrorism और खास मिशन  Units .
It was formerly listed as the Combat Applications Group by the Department of Defense but  रै चूंकि महरूम officially re-designated  the Army Compartmented Elements ( ACE ) .
While 1st SFOD-D is administratively  समर्थित by usasoc , it जलप्रपात अंतर्गत the operational कंट्रोल of the  Joint Special Operations Command .
Delta Force and its Navy counterpart , the Naval  खास warfare विकास समूह , हैं the संयुक्त राज्य सैन्य 's  primary counter-terrorism units .
Delta Force 's primary tasks are counter-terrorism , direct action , and national  हस्तक्षेप परिचालन , हालांकि it is an अत्यधिक बहुमुखी समूह सक्षम of conducting अनेक प्रकार of गुप्त मिशन , सहित , लकिन नहीं सीमित to  , hostage rescues and raids .
The Central Intelligence Agency 's highly secretive Special  क्रियाएँ प्रभाग ( उदास ) और अधिक specifically इसके elite खास परिचालन समूह ( sog  ) often works with – and recruits – operators from Delta Force .
Alpha decay is one example type of radioactive  क्षय , in जिससे an परमाणु केंद्रक emits an अल्फा कण , और thereby परिणत ( or 'क्षयs  ' ) into an atom with a mass number 4 less and atomic number 2 less .
अनेक अन्य प्रकार  of decays are possible .
Radioactive decay , also known as nuclear decay or radioactivity , is the process by which a nucleus of an unstable  अणु loses उर्जा by emitting अणु  of ionizing radiation .
A material that spontaneously emits this kind of radiation — which includes the emission of  ऊर्जावान अल्फा अणु , बीटा अणु  , and gamma rays — is considered radioactive .
There are many different types of  रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय ( देखिए तालिका  below ) .
A decay , or loss of  उर्जा , परिणाम जब an अणु साथ एक प्रकार of केंद्रक , पुकारा the जनक radionuclide , परिणत  to an atom with a nucleus in a different state , or to a different nucleus containing different numbers of protons and neutrons .
Either of these products  is नामित  the daughter nuclide .
In some decays the parent and daughter are different  रासायनिक तत्व , और यूँ the क्षय प्रक्रम परिणाम in नाभिकीय transmutation  ( creation of an atom of a new element ) .
The first decay processes to be discovered were alpha decay , beta  क्षय , और गामा क्षय .
Alpha decay  occurs जब the केंद्रक ejects an अल्फा कण  ( helium nucleus ) .
This is the most common process of emitting nucleons ,  लकिन in rarer प्रकार of decays , nuclei can  eject protons , or specific nuclei of other elements ( in the process called cluster decay ) .
Beta decay occurs when the nucleus  emits an इलेक्ट्रॉन or positron और a प्रकार of न्यूट्रिनो , in a प्रक्रम कि परिवर्तन a प्रोटॉन to  a neutron or the other way around .
The nucleus may capture an orbiting electron , converting a proton  into a न्यूट्रॉन ( इलेक्ट्रॉन  capture ) .
सब of ये प्रक्रियाओं  result in nuclear transmutation .
By  कंट्रास्ट , वहीँ मौजूद रेडियोसक्रिय  decay processes that do not result in transmutation .
The energy of an excited nucleus may be emitted as a gamma ray in gamma  क्षय , or प्रयुक्त to eject an कक्षीय इलेक्ट्रॉन by बातचीत साथ the उत्साहित  nucleus in a process called internal conversion .
Radioisotopes occasionally  emit neutrons , और इस परिणाम in a बदलें in an  element from one isotope to another .
One type of radioactive decay results in  उत्पाद जिससे हैं नहीं पारिभाषित , लकिन appear in a दायरा of ``  pieces '' of the original nucleus .
इस क्षय is पुकारा  spontaneous fission .
This decay happens when a large unstable nucleus spontaneously splits into two ( and occasionally three ) smaller daughter nuclei , and usually  emits गामा किरणें , neutrons , or अन्य अणु as a consequence  .
Radioactive decay is a stochastic ( i.e. , random ) process at the level of single atoms , in that , according to quantum theory , it is  नामुमकिन to भविष्यवाणी जब a particular अणु होगा  decay .
However , the  मौका कि a दिए अणु  will decay is constant over time .
For a large number of atoms , the decay rate for the collection is computable from the  measured क्षय स्थिरांक of the न्यूक्लाइड  ( or equivalently from the half-lifes ) .
Waxing is a form of  semi-permanent बाल हटाना जिससे  removes the hair from the root .
New hair will not grow  वापस in the previously waxed  area for two to eight weeks , although some people will start to see regrowth in only a week .
Almost any area of the body can be waxed , including eyebrows ,  फेस , बिकिनी क्षेत्रफल , टाँगे , बाहें , वापस , उदर  and feet .
There are many types of  वैक्सिंग उपयुक्त लिये निकालना  unwanted hair .
Strip waxing is accomplished by spreading a wax  thinly over the  skin .
A cloth or paper strip is then  दबाया on the शीर्ष और ripped  off the direction of hair growth .
इस removes the  wax along with the hair .
Strip  मोम can भी be बना  at home using lemon juice , water , sugar and honey .
Hot waxing utilizes Hot wax  ( as opposed to स्ट्रिप मोम  ) .
In this case , the wax is  लागू somewhat thickly और साथ no cloth  or paper strips .
The wax then hardens when it  cools , यूँ allowing the आसान हटाना by a चिकित्सक बगैर the  aid of cloths .
This waxing method is very beneficial to  लोगों जो have संवेदनशील  skin .

Ancient  रोमन संस्कृति existed throughout  the almost 1200-year history of the civilization of Ancient Rome .
The term refers to the culture of the Roman Republic , later the Roman Empire ,  जिससे , at इसके शिखर , covered an क्षेत्रफल इससे lowland स्कॉटलैंड और  Morocco to the Euphrates .
Life in ancient Rome revolved around the  नगर of रोम , इसके famed सात पहाड़ियाँ , और इसके स्मारकीय structures ऐसे as the flavian amphitheatre ( अभी पुकारा  the Colosseum ) , the Forum of Trajan , and the Pantheon .
The  नगर भी था अनेक थिएटर  , gymnasiums , and many taverns , baths , and brothels .
throughout the territory अंतर्गत प्राचीन रोम 's कंट्रोल , आवासीय वास्तुकला ranged इससे बहुत modest घरों to देश  villas , and in the capital city of Rome , there were imperial residences on the elegant Palatine Hill , from which the word palace is derived .
The vast majority of the population lived in the city center  , packed into insulae ( अपार्टमेंट  blocks ) .
The city of Rome was the largest megalopolis of  कि समय , साथ a जनसांख्यिकी कि may  well have exceeded one million people , with a high end estimate of 3.6 million and a low end estimate of 450,000 .
Historical estimates indicate that around 30 percent of the  जनसांख्यिकी अंतर्गत the नगर 's क्षेत्राधिकार जिया in innumerable शहरी centers , साथ जनसांख्यिकी of at तनिक 10,000 और  several military settlements , a very high rate of urbanization by pre-industrial standards .
The most urbanized part of the Empire was Italy , which had an estimated rate of urbanization  of 32 % , the वही रेट of शहरी of इंग्लैण्ड  in 1800 .
Most Roman towns and cities had a forum , temples and the same type of  इमारतें , on a छोटी स्केल , as मिला in रोम  .
The large urban population required an endless supply of food which was a complex logistical task , including  acquiring , transporting , storing और वितरण of खाना लिये रोम और अन्य  urban centers .
Italian farms supplied vegetables and fruits , but fish  और मांस यहूद luxuries  .
Aqueducts were built to bring water  to शहरी centers और वाइन और आयल यहूद आयातित  from Hispania , Gaul and Africa .
वहीँ थी a बहुत विशाल राशि of कॉमर्स between  the provinces of the Roman Empire , since its transportation technology was very efficient .
The  औसत लागत of हस्तांतरण और the प्रौद्योगिकी  were comparable with 18th-century Europe .
The later city of Rome did not fill the  स्पेस भीतर इसके प्राचीन aurelian दीवारें जबतक  after 1870 .
Eighty percent of the population under the jurisdiction of ancient Rome lived in the  countryside in settlements साथ कम than 10 हजार निवासियों  .
Landlords generally resided in cities and their  estates यहूद बाएँ in the परवाह of फार्म प्रबंधक  .
The plight  of ग्रामीण स्लेव थी generally बदतर than  their counterparts working in urban aristocratic households .
To stimulate a higher labor productivity most landlords freed a  विशाल क्रमांक of स्लेव और अनेक प्राप्त  wages .
Some records indicate that `` as many as 42 people lived in one small farm hut in Egypt , while  छह परिवारों स्वामित्व a सिंगल ज़ैतून पेड़ .  '' .
Such a rural environment continued to induce migration of population to urban centers until the early 2nd century ,  जब the शहरी जनसांख्यिकी रोका growing और प्रारंभ to मनाही  .
Starting in the middle of the 2nd century BC , private Greek culture was  increasingly in ascendancy , in spite of tirades विरूद्ध the `` softening '' प्रभाव  of Hellenized culture from the conservative moralists .
By the time of Augustus , cultured Greek household  स्लेव सिखाया the रोमन यंग ( sometimes भी the लड़कियों  ) ; chefs , decorators , secretaries , doctors , and hairdressers—all came from the Greek East .
Greek sculptures  सुशोभित hellenistic लैंडस्केप बागवानी on  the Palatine or in the villas , or were imitated in Roman sculpture yards by Greek slaves .
The Roman cuisine preserved in the  cookery किताबे ascribed to apicius is essentially  Greek .
Roman writers  disdained लैटिन  for a cultured Greek style .
Only in law and  शासन थी the तिरछा प्रकृति  of Rome 's accretive culture supreme .
Against this human background , both the urban and rural setting ,  एक of इतिहास 's सबसे influential सभ्यताओं  took shape , leaving behind a cultural legacy that survives in part today .
James Joseph `` Duffy '' Waldorf ,  jr. ( born अगस्त 20 , 1962  ) is an American professional golfer .

Glass production involves two  प्रमुख विधि – the  float glass process , which produces sheet glass , and glassblowing which produces bottles and other containers .
A season is a subdivision  of the साल , चिह्नित  by changes in weather , ecology , and hours of daylight .
सीज़न परिणाम इससे the वार्षिक क्रान्ति of the धरती  around the Sun and the tilt of the Earth 's axis relative to the plane of revolution .
In temperate and polar regions , the seasons are marked  by परिवर्तन in the तीव्रता of धूप कि पहुँच the धरती  's surface , variations of which may cause animals to go into hibernation or to migrate , and plants to be dormant .
During May , June and July , the  उत्तरी गोलार्ध is उजागर to  more direct sunlight because the hemisphere faces the sun .
The same is  सच्चा of the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध in नवम्बर  , December and January .
It is the tilt of the Earth that causes the Sun to be higher in the  आसमान दौरान the गर्मियाँ  months which increases the solar flux .
However , due to seasonal lag , June , July and August are the hottest months in the northern hemisphere and December , January and February are  the hottest महीने in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध  .
In temperate and subpolar regions , generally four calendar -based seasons ( with their adjectives ) are  पहचाना : वसन्त ( vernal ) , गर्मियाँ ( estival ) , पतझड़ ( autumnal ) और शीत  ( hibernal ) .
However , ecologists mostly use a six season model  लिये शीतोष्ण जलवायु regions कि शामिल pre-spring ( prevernal ) और लेट  summer ( serotinal ) as distinct seasons along with the traditional four .
Hot regions have two or three seasons ; the rainy ( or wet , or monsoon )  ऋतु और the शुष्क ऋतु , और in कुछ तीव्र क्षेत्रों ,  a cool or mild season .
In some parts of  the संसार , खास `` सीज़न '' हैं loosely पारिभाषित  based on important events such as a hurricane season , tornado season or a wildfire season .
The six  ecological सीज़न
The four calendar seasons ,  चित्रित in an  ancient Roman mosaic from Tunisia
The Battle of Fort Sumter ( April 12–14 , 1861 ) was  the बमबारी और आत्मसमर्पण of फोर्ट sumter , निकट चार्ल्सटन , दक्षिण  Carolina , that started the American Civil War .
Following declarations of secession  by सात दक्षिणी राज्य , दक्षिण कैरोलिना मांगे कि the  U.S. Army abandon its facilities in Charleston Harbor .
On December 26 , 1860 , U.S.  प्रमुख रॉबर्ट एंडरसन surreptitiously स्थानांतरित उसके छोटी कमांड इससे  the indefensible Fort Moultrie on Sullivan 's Island to Fort Sumter , a substantial fortress controlling the entrance of Charleston Harbor .
An attempt by U.S. President James Buchanan to reinforce and resupply Anderson , using the unarmed merchant ship Star of the  वेस्ट , विफल जब it थी fired upon by shore बैटरी  on January 9 , 1861 .
दक्षिण कैरोलिना अधिकारियों  then seized all Federal property in the Charleston area , except for Fort Sumter .
During the early months  of 1861 , the हालात around फोर्ट sumter increasingly began  to resemble a siege .
In March  , ब्रिगेडियर . gen. P. G. T. beauregard , the पहला सामान्य  officer of the newly formed Confederate States of America , was placed in command of Confederate forces in Charleston .
Beauregard energetically directed the strengthening of  बैटरी around चार्ल्सटन हार्बर aimed  at Fort Sumter .
शर्तें in the फोर्ट grew dire as the  Union soldiers rushed to complete the installation of additional guns .
Anderson  थी छोटी of मेन  , food , and supplies .
The  resupply of फोर्ट sumter became the पहला संकट  of the administration of President Abraham Lincoln .
He notified  the राज्यपाल of दक्षिण कैरोलिना , फ्रांसिस W. pickens , कि  he was sending supply ships , which resulted in an ultimatum from the Confederate government : evacuate Fort Sumter immediately .
Major  एंडरसन refused to आत्मसमर्पण  .
Beginning at 4:30 a.m. on April 12 , the  confederates bombarded the फोर्ट इससे तोपखाने बैटरी  surrounding the harbor .
Although the  संघ गैरीसन लौटे आग , वे यहूद significantly outgunned  and , after 34 hours , Major Anderson agreed to evacuate .
There was no loss of life on either side as a direct result of this engagement , although a gun explosion during  the आत्मसमर्पण ceremonies on  April 14 caused two Union deaths .
Following the battle , there was  फैली support इससे दोनो उत्तर और दक्षिण लिये  further military action .
Lincoln 's immediate call for 75,000 volunteers to suppress  the विद्रोह resulted in an अतिरिक्त चार दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य  also declaring their secession and joining the Confederacy .
The Civil War  था begun  .
3G , short for third Generation , is the third generation of  मोबाईल दूरसंचार प्रौद्योगिकी  .
3G telecommunication networks support  सेवाएं कि provide an सूचना  transfer rate of at least 200 kbit/s .
However , many services advertised  as 3g provide उच्चतर गति  than the minimum technical requirements for a 3G service .
Recent 3G releases , often denoted 3.5G and 3.75G , also  provide मोबाईल ब्रॉडबैंड अभिगम of अनेक mbit/s to स्मार्टफ़ोन और मोबाईल modems  in laptop computers .
3G finds application in wireless voice telephony , mobile Internet access ,  फिक्स्ड बेतार अंतरजाल अभिगम , वीडियो काल्स और मोबाईल tv .
`` Mazel Tov ! ''  लिखा on  a wine glass tag
traditionally , बाद the दूल्हे ब्रेक  the glass , the guests shout `` Mazel Tov ! `` .
A birthday cake , iced with the words `` מזל טוב '' ( mazal  tov ) , as is प्रायः किया  in Israel .
Here the  phrase is लिखा in यहूदी  cursive .
`` Mazel tov '' or `` mazal tov '' ( Hebrew / Yiddish : `` מזל  טוב '' , यहूदी : `` mazal tov '' ; यहूदी  : `` mazel tov '' ; lit .
`` good luck '' ) is a phrase used to express  बधाई लिये a प्रसन्न और  significant occasion or event .
hepatitis c is an संक्रामक बीमारी affecting  primarily the liver , caused by the hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) .
The infection is often asymptomatic , but  दीर्घकालिक संक्रमण can सीसे to scarring of the जिगर  and ultimately to cirrhosis , which is generally apparent after many years .
In some cases , those with  cirrhosis होगा go on to develop  liver failure , liver cancer or life-threatening esophageal and gastric varices .
HCV is spread  primarily by blood-to-blood सम्पर्क संबद्ध साथ intravenous ड्रग उपयोग  , poorly sterilized medical equipment and transfusions .
An  अनुमानित 130–200 लाख  people worldwide are infected with .
The existence of ( originally `` non- A non- B  hepatitis '' ) थी postulated in the 1970s  and proven in 1989 .
only infects  इंसानो और chimpanzees  .
the वायरस persists in  the liver in about 85 % of those infected .
This persistent infection can be  treated साथ दवा : the मानक चिकित्सा is a संयोजन of peginterferon  and ribavirin , with either boceprevir or telaprevir added in some cases .
overall , 50–80 % of  people treated are cured .
those जो develop cirrhosis  or liver cancer may require a liver transplant .
is the leading cause of liver  प्रत्यारोपण , हालांकि the वायरस  usually recurs after transplantation .
No vaccine against  is उपलब्धियाँ  .
A flexible spending account ( FSA ) , also known as a flexible spending arrangement , is one of a number of  tax-advantaged वित्तीय खाते कि can be नियत up through a कैफेटेरिया योजना of an नियोक्ता in the संयुक्त  States .
An FSA allows an employee to set aside a portion of  आय to अदा लिये योग्य खर्च as स्थापित in the कैफेटेरिया  plan , most commonly for medical expenses but often for dependent care or other expenses .
Money deducted from an employee 's pay into  an fsa is नहीं विषय  to payroll taxes , resulting in substantial payroll tax savings .
One significant  disadvantage to using an fsa is कि निधि नहीं प्रयुक्त by the समाप्त  of the plan year are lost to the employee , known as the `` use it or lose it '' rule .
The most common type of flexible spending account , the medical expense FSA ( also medical FSA or health FSA  ) , is समान to a स्वास्थ्य बचत खाता ( hsa ) or a स्वास्थ्य reimbursement  account ( HRA ) .
However , while  hsas और hras हैं लगभग exclusively प्रयुक्त as components  of a consumer driven health care plan , medical FSAs are commonly offered with more traditional health plans as well .
In  जोड , निधि in a स्वास्थ्य बचत  account are not lost when the plan year is over , unlike funds in an FSA .
Paper  फ़ॉर्म or an fsa डेबिट कार्ड ,  also known as a Flexcard , may be used to access the account funds .
Tennessee ( ) ( ) is a U.S. state  स्तिथ in the southeastern  United States .
Tennessee is the 36th  सबसे extensive और the  17th most populous of the 50 United States .
Tennessee is bordered by Kentucky and Virginia to the north , North Carolina to the east , Georgia , Alabama , and  मिसिसिपी to the दक्षिण , और अरकंसास और मिसौरी  to the west .
The  एपलाशियन kyu dominate the पूर्वी भाग of the राज्य , और the मिसिसिपी नदी  forms the state 's western border .
टेनेसी 's पूंजी और दूसरी  largest city is Nashville , which has a population of 609,644 .
मेम्फिस is the राज्य 's largest  city , with a population of 652,050 .
The state of Tennessee is rooted in the Watauga Association  , a 1772 frontier अनुबंध generally regarded as  the first constitutional government west of the Appalachians .
What is now Tennessee was initially part of North Carolina , and later part  of the दक्षिणपश्चिम territory  .
Tennessee was admitted to the  संघ as the 16th राज्य  on June 1 , 1796 .
Tennessee was the last state to leave the Union and join the Confederacy at the outbreak of the U.S. Civil War in 1861 , and the  पहला राज्य to be readmitted to the संघ at the समाप्त of the युद्ध  .
टेनेसी सुसज्जित अधिक सैनिको लिये the confederate फौज than  any other state , and more soldiers for the Union Army than any other Southern state .
in the 20th सदी , टेनेसी transitioned  from an agrarian economy to a more diversified economy , aided at times by federal entities such as the Tennessee Valley Authority .
In the early 1940s , the city  of ओक लकीरें थी स्थापित to हाउस the मैनहटन प्रोजेक्ट 's यूरेनियम संवर्धन सुविधाएं  , helping to build the world 's first atomic bomb .
Tennessee has played a critical role  in the विकास of अनेक  forms of American popular music , including rock and roll , blues , country , and rockabilly .
beale गली in मेम्फिस is माना by अनेक to be the जन्मस्थान of the  blues , with musicians such as W.C . Handy performing in its clubs as early as 1909 .
Memphis was also home to Sun Records , where musicians such as Elvis  प्रेस्ली , इसहाक़ हेज़ , जॉनी नकदी , कार्ल perkins , जेरी ली लुईस , रॉय orbison  , and Charlie Rich began their recording careers , and where rock and roll took shape in the 1950s .
The 1927 Victor recording sessions in Bristol generally mark  the शुरूआत of the देश म्यूज़िक विधा और the वृद्धि of the ग्रैंड ओले opry in the 1930s helped मेक  Nashville the center of the country music recording industry .
Three bricks and mortar museums recognize Tennessee 's role in nurturing various forms  of लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक : the मेम्फिस चट्टान n ' आत्मा संग्रहालय , the देश  Music Hall of Fame and Museum in Nashville , and the International Rock-A-Billy Museum in Jackson .
In addition , the Rockabilly Hall of  कीर्ति , an ऑनलाइन साईट recognizing the विकास of rockabilly  in which Tennessee played a crucial role , is based in Nashville .
Tennessee 's  प्रमुख उद्योग शामिल कृषि  , manufacturing , and tourism .
Poultry , soybeans , and cattle are the state 's primary agricultural products , and major  निर्माण निर्यात शामिल रसायन , परिवहन उपकरण  , and electrical equipment .
The  ग्रेट smoky kyu नेशनल पार्क , the स्वदेश 's सबसे visited नेशनल  park , is headquartered in the eastern part of the state , and a section of the Appalachian Trail roughly follows the Tennessee-North Carolina border .
Other major tourist attractions include the Tennessee Aquarium  in चट्टानूगा , the sunsphere in knoxville , dollywood in कबूतर forge , the पार्थेनन , the देश म्यूज़िक हॉल of  Fame and Museum , and Ryman Auditorium in Nashville , and Elvis Presley 's Graceland residence and tomb in Memphis .
One  डिज़ाइन रूपांतर of  a cock ring .
A cock ring is a ring that can be placed around a man 's penis , usually at the  आधार , primarily to slow the प्रवाह of रक्त इससे the वीर्यपात  penile tissue , thus maintaining an erection for a much longer period of time .
Cock rings can be worn  around बस the शिश्न or दोनो the शिश्न और scrotum , or  just the scrotum alone , though this is usually called a testicle cuff .
Rings can be made of a  किस्में of अलग सामग्री , सबसे commonly चमड़े , रबर , or  silicone , though nylon and metal are also used either as the main component or part of the closure .
The term cock ring is sometimes used as a synonym for a Prince Albert piercing , a piercing of the penis  कि is प्रायः , हालांकि नहीं सदा  , a metal ring .
When used in cases of erectile dysfunction they are known by  विभिन्न names ऐसे as `` स्तंभन रिंग  '' and `` tension ring '' .
The headquarters of Major League  बेसबॉल at 245 पार्क एवेन्यू ,  Midtown Manhattan , New York City , USA .
Major League Baseball ( MLB ) is a  पेशेवर बेसबॉल लीग , consisting  of teams that play in the National League and the American League .
Dating to 1876 and 1901 respectively , the two leagues merged in 2000 into a single organization led by the Commissioner of Baseball , after 100 years as  पृथक विधिक entities  .
MLB constitutes one of the major  पेशेवर खेल लीग  of the United States and Canada .
It is composed of 30 teams — 29 in the  संयुक्त राज्य और एक in  Canada .
Teams in MLB  खेल 162 खेल प्रत्येक ऋतु  over six months ( April through September ) .
Five teams in each league advance to a four-round postseason tournament that culminates in the World Series , a best-of-seven-games  चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी between the दो लीग champions जिससे तिथियाँ to 1903  .
The organization oversees many minor-league baseball leagues which operate about 240  टीमों संबद्ध साथ the major-league क्लब  .
साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय बेसबॉल संघ , the लीग  also manages the international World Baseball Classic tournament .
MLB has the  उच्चतम ऋतु उपस्थिति of कोई खेल लीग in the संसार  with nearly 75 million spectators in 2012 .
Delaware ( ) is a U.S. state located on the Atlantic Coast in the Mid-Atlantic  प्रदेश of the संयुक्त  States .
It is bordered to the south and west  by मेरीलैंड , to the पूर्वोत्तर by नई जर्सी  , and to the north by Pennsylvania .
The state takes its name from Thomas West , 3rd Baron De La Warr , an English nobleman and Virginia 's first colonial  राज्यपाल , बाद जिसको कया is अभी पुकारा केप  Henlopen was originally named .
Delaware is located in  the northeastern portion of the delmarva प्रायद्वीप और is the  second smallest , the sixth least populous , but the sixth most densely populated of the fifty United States .
Delaware is  विभाजित into तीन  counties .
From north to south , these three counties are New Castle  , केंट , और ससेक्स  .
While the  दक्षिणी दो काउंटी have historically  been predominantly agricultural , New Castle County has been more industrialized .
Before its coastline was explored by Europeans in the 16th century , Delaware was  inhabited by अनेक समूह of देशी अमेरिकी , सहित the lenape in the उत्तर और nanticoke  in the south .
It was initially colonized by Dutch  व्यापारियों at zwaanendael , स्तिथ निकट the उपस्थित  town of Lewes , in 1631 .
Delaware was one of the 13 colonies participating in the American Revolution and on  दिसम्बर 7 , 1787 , became the पहला राज्य to ratify  the Constitution of the United States , thereby becoming known as The First State .
Energy  परिवर्तन in  Energy Systems Language
Energy transformation or energy  परिवर्तन is the प्रक्रम  of changing one form of energy to another .
In physics , the term energy describes the capacity to produce certain changes within a system , without  लिहाज़ to सीमाएं in परिवर्तन  imposed by Entropy .
Changes in total energy of systems can only be accomplished by adding or subtracting  उर्जा इससे उन्हें , as उर्जा is a मात्रा जिससे is conserved  , according to the first law of thermodynamics .
According to special relativity ,  परिवर्तन in the उर्जा of प्रणालियों होगा भी coincide साथ परिवर्तन in the प्रणाली  's mass , and the total amount of mass of a system is a measure of its energy .
Energy in a system may be transformed so  कि it resides in a अलग राज्य , or a अलग  type of energy .
Energy in many  राज्य may be प्रयुक्त to do अनेक किस्में  of physical work .
Energy may be used in natural processes or machines , or else to  provide कुछ सेवा to समाज ( ऐसे  as heat , light , or motion ) .
For example , an internal combustion engine converts the potential chemical energy in gasoline  और ऑक्सीजन into ऊष्मा , जिससे is तब रूपांतरित into the propulsive उर्जा ( गतिज  energy that moves a vehicle ) .
A solar cell converts solar radiation into electrical  उर्जा कि can तब be प्रयुक्त to लाइट  a bulb or power a computer .
The generic name for a device which converts energy  इससे एक रूप to another , is a  transducer .
In general , most types of energy , save for thermal  उर्जा , may be परिवर्तित  efficiently to any other kind of energy .
Sometimes this occurs with an efficiency of essentially 100 % , such as when potential energy is  परिवर्तित to गतिज उर्जा as an ऑब्जेक्ट जलप्रपात in वैक्यूम , or जब it orbits nearer  or farther from another object , in space .
Conversion of other types of  energies to ऊष्मा may भी occurs साथ  nearly perfect efficiency ( many types of friction do this ) .
Exceptions for perfect conversion efficiency ( even for isolated systems ) occur when energy has already been partly  वितरित among अनेक उपलब्धियाँ क्वांटम राज्य लिये a संग्रहण of अणु , जिससे हैं freely अनुमत to explore  any state of momentum and position ( phase space ) .
In such circumstances , a measure called Entropy , or  evening-out of उर्जा वितरण in ऐसे राज्य , dictates  that future states of the system must be of at least equal evenness in energy distribution .
( There is no way , taking the universe as a whole , to collect  उर्जा into कम राज्य , एकबार it रै  spread to them ) .
A consequence of this requirement is that there are limitations to the efficiency with which thermal energy can be converted to other kinds of energy , since thermal energy in equilibrium at a given temperature already represents the maximal  evening-out of उर्जा between सब संभावित राज्य  .
Such energy is  sometimes माना `` degraded  energy , '' because it is not entirely usable .
The second law of thermodynamics is a way of stating that , for this reason , thermal  उर्जा in a प्रणाली may be परिवर्तित to अन्य kinds of उर्जा साथ efficiencies approaching 100 % , तभी if the एन्ट्रॉपी ( even-ness or विकार ) of the ब्रह्मांड is increased  by other means , to compensate for the decrease in entropy associated with the disappearance of the thermal energy and its entropy content .
Otherwise , only a part of thermal energy may be converted to other kinds of energy ( and thus , useful work ) , since the remainder of the heat must be reserved to be transferred to a thermal reservoir at a lower  तापमान , in ऐसे a रास्ता कि the बढ़ाएँ in एन्ट्रॉपी लिये इस प्रक्रम अधिक than compensates लिये the एन्ट्रॉपी घटी संबद्ध साथ परिवर्तन of the बाकी of the ऊष्मा into अन्य प्रकार  of energy .
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit association '' which operates a major professional ice hockey league of  30 franchised सदस्य क्लब , of जिससे सात हैं फिलहाल स्तिथ in कनाडा  and 23 in the United States .
Headquartered in New York City , the NHL is widely considered to be the premier professional ice  हॉकी लीग in the संसार , और एक of the प्रमुख पेशेवर खेल लीग in the संयुक्त  States and Canada .
The Stanley Cup , the oldest  पेशेवर खेल ट्रॉफी in उत्तर अमेरिका  , is awarded annually to the league playoff champion at the end of each season .
The league was organized on November 26 , 1917 , in Montreal , Quebec , Canada  , बाद the बर्खास्तगी of परिचालन of इसके पूर्ववर्ती संगठन , the नेशनल हॉकी संघ  ( NHA ) , which had been founded in 1909 .
It started with four teams and ,  through a श्रेणी of expansions , contractions  , and relocations , the league is now composed of 30 active franchises .
The nation to  जिससे the नाम of the लीग originally referred थी कनाडा  , although the league has now been binational since 1924 when it expanded into the United States .
After a labour dispute that led to the cancellation of the entire 2004–05 season , the league resumed play under a new collective  bargaining अनुबंध कि शामिल a सैलरी कैप .
In 2009 , the NHL enjoyed record  highs in शर्तें of sponsorships , उपस्थिति , और टेलीविज़न  audiences .
The  एनएचएल draws अनेक अत्यधिक skilled खिलाड़ी इससे  all over the world and currently has players from about 20 different countries .
Although Canadians have  historically गठित the बहुमत of the खिलाड़ी in the एनएचएल , over the पास्ट चार प्लस दशकों the percentages of us और यूरोपीय खिलाड़ी  have increased both because of the NHL 's continued expansion from six to thirty clubs since 1967 , and the increased availability of highly skilled European players .
This is the complete list  of the ratified और unratified amendments to the संयुक्त राज्य  Constitution which received the approval of the United States Congress .
Twenty-seven amendments have been ratified since the original signing of the  संविधान , the पहला टेन of जिससे हैं ज्ञात collectively as  the Bill of Rights .
The procedure  लिये amending the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान  is governed by Article V of the original text .
There have been many other proposals for amendments to the  संयुक्त राज्य संविधान introduced in कॉंग्रेस , लकिन नहीं सुपुर्द  to the states .
Before an amendment can take effect , it must be proposed to the states by a two-thirds vote of both houses of Congress or by a convention ( known as an Article V convention ) called  by two-thirds of the राज्य , और ratified by three-fourths of the राज्य or by three-fourths of प्रथाओं thereof , the विधि of अनुसमर्थन होने संकल्पित by कॉंग्रेस  at the time of proposal .
To date , no convention for proposing  amendments रै महरूम पुकारा by the राज्य , और तभी once—in  1933 for the ratification of the twenty-first amendment —has the convention method of ratification been employed .
FMR LLC ( Fidelity Management and Research ) or Fidelity Investments is an  अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय वित्तीय सेवाएं निगम  .
It is one of the  largest परस्पर निधि और वित्तीय  services groups in the world .
It was founded in 1946 and serves  उत्तर  American investors .
Fidelity Ventures is  इसके venture पूंजी  arm .
Fidelity International Limited ( FIL ) , was an  अंतरराष्ट्रीय संबद्ध संस्थापित in 1969 , सेवारत  most countries in the rest of the world .
In September 2011 , FIL was rebranded  as 'fidelity विश्वव्यापी निवेश  ' .
Fidelity Investments manages a large family of mutual funds , provides fund distribution and investment advice services , as well as providing discount brokerage services , retirement services , wealth management ,  प्रतिभूति निष्पादन और क्लीयरेंस , जीवन बीमे  and a number of other services .

Sociology is the scientific study of human society and its origins ,  विकास , संगठन ,  and institutions .
It is a social science which uses various methods of empirical investigation and  नाजुक विश्लेषण to develop a देह of ज्ञान परिचय इंसान सोशल  activity , structures , and functions .
A goal for many sociologists is to conduct research which may be  लागू सीधे to सोशल नीति  and welfare , while others focus primarily on refining the theoretical understanding of social processes .
Subject matter ranges from the micro level of individual agency and interaction to the macro  स्तर of प्रणालियों और the सोशल  structure .
The traditional focuses of sociology  शामिल सोशल स्तरीकरण , सोशल क्लास , संस्कृति , रेस  and ethnicity , gender and sexuality , social mobility , religion , secularization , law , and deviance .
As all spheres of  इंसान कार्यकलाप हैं प्रभावित by the interplay between सोशल ढांचा और व्यक्तिगत एजेंसी , समाजशास्त्र रै धीरे विस्तारित इसके फ़ोकस to  further subjects , such as health , medical , military and penal institutions , the Internet , environmental sociology , political economy and the role of social activity in the development of scientific knowledge .
The range of social  वैज्ञानिक विधि रै भी  expanded .
Social researchers draw upon a variety of  गुणात्मक और quantitative  techniques .
The linguistic and cultural turns of the mid-twentieth century led to increasingly  interpretative , hermeneutic , और philosophic approaches  to the analysis of society .
Conversely , recent decades have seen the rise of new analytically , mathematically and computationally  कठोर तकनीकों , ऐसे as agent-based मॉडलिंग और  social network analysis .
Sociology should not be confused with various general social studies  पाठ्यक्रम जिससे भालू छोटी संबंध to समाजशास्त्रीय  theory or social science research methodology .
Thunder is the  ध्वनि caused  by lightning .
Depending on the nature of the  बिजली और अलहदा of the श्रोता , थंडर  can range from a sharp , loud crack to a long , low rumble ( brontide ) .
The sudden  बढ़ाएँ in दबाव और तापमान इससे बिजली  produces rapid expansion of the air surrounding and within a bolt of lightning .
In  फेरे , इस विस्तार of एयर creates a सोनिक शॉक  wave , similar to a sonic boom , which produces the sound of thunder , often referred to as a clap , crack , or peal of thunder .
The distance of  the बिजली can be गणना by the श्रोता  based on the time interval from when the lightning is seen to when the sound is heard .
Palma ( , , ) , in full Palma de Mallorca , is  the प्रमुख नगर और बंदरगाहों on the द्वीप of majorca ( mallorca  ) and capital city of the autonomous community of the Balearic Islands in Spain .
The names  ciutat de mallorca ( नगर of majorca ) और ciutat ( नगर ) यहूद प्रयुक्त पहले  the War of the Spanish Succession and are still used by people in Majorca .
However , the official name  थी mallorca , the वही  as the island .
It is  situated on the दक्षिण coast of the द्वीप  on the Bay of Palma .
As of the 2009 census , the population of the city of Palma proper was 401,270 , and the  जनसांख्यिकी of the संपूर्ण शहरी क्षेत्रफल थी 517,285 , रैंकिंग as the बारहवीं  largest urban area of Spain .
Almost half of  the कुल जनसांख्यिकी of majorca  live in Palma .
The  cabrera द्वीपसमूह , हालांकि widely अलग इससे पालमा उचित ,  is administratively considered part of the municipality .
Its  विमानक्षेत्र , बेटे सन्त  Joan , serves over 22 million passengers each year .
The Marivent Palace  थी offered by the नगर to  the then Prince Juan Carlos I of Spain .
The royals have  चूंकि खर्च उनके गर्मियाँ  holidays in Palma .
