For  अन्य उपयोग , देखिए लूथर  ( disambiguation ) .
Alexander Joseph `` Lex '' Luthor is a fictional character , a  supervillain appearing in कॉमिक किताबे प्रकाशित by dc कॉमिक्स  .
Luthor is  the archenemy of सुपरमैन , और as a high-status supervillain , रै  also come into conflict with Batman and other superheroes in the DC Universe .
Created by Jerry Siegel  और जो shuster , the अक्षर पहला appeared in  Action Comics # 23 ( April 1940 ) .
luthor is वर्णित as `` a power-mad , दुष्ट  scientist '' of high intelligence and incredible technological prowess .
Luthor 's goals typically  बीच on हत्या सुपरमैन , the foremost बाधा  to achieving the villain 's megalomaniacal goals .
Despite periodically wearing a powered exoskeleton ,  luthor रै traditionally lacked  superpowers or a dual identity .
The character was originally depicted as a mad scientist who , in  the रग of गूदा novels , wreaks कहर on the संसार साथ  his futuristic weaponry .
In his earliest  दिखावे , luthor is दिखाया साथ a पूरा सिर  of red hair .
Despite this , the character  बाद became hairless as  the result of an artist 's mistake .
A 1960 story by Jerry Siegel expanded upon Luthor 's origin and motivations , revealing him to be a childhood friend of Superman 's who lost his hair when a fire  नष्ट उसके प्रयोगशाला ; luthor vowed  revenge .
Following the 1985 limited series Crisis on Infinite Earths , the character was re-imagined as a Machiavellian industrialist and  white-collar दण्ड , भी briefly सेवारत as अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त  States .
In recent years ,  विभिन्न लेखक have  revived Luthor 's mad scientist persona from the 1940s .
The character was  क्रमित as the 8th महानतम विलेन  by Wizard on its 100 Greatest Villains of All Time list .
IGN 's list of the Top 100 Comic Book Villains of  सब समय क्रमित luthor  as # 4 .
luthor is भी वर्णित as a `` megavillain '' by कॉमिक किताब आलोचक पीटर sanderson , एक of a few genre-crossing  villains whose adventures take place `` in a world in which the ordinary laws of nature are slightly suspended '' ; characters such as Professor Moriarty , Count Dracula , Hannibal Lecter , Doctor Doom , and Darth Vader , also fit this description .
Martin Luther King , Jr. Day is a United States federal holiday  अंकन the जन्मदिवस of रेव . dr. मार्टिन लूथर  King , Jr .
It is observed on the  तीसरा सोमवार of जनवरी प्रत्येक साल , जिससे is around the समय  of King 's birthday , January 15 .
The floating holiday is similar to holidays set under the Uniform  सोमवार अवकाश अधिनियम , हालांकि the अधिनियम predated the  establishment of Martin Luther King , Jr. Day by 15 years .
King was the chief spokesman for nonviolent  सक्रियता in the सिविल अधिकारों गति , जिससे सफलतापूर्वक  protested racial discrimination in federal and state law .
The  अभियान लिये a संघीय अवकाश in किंग 's सम्मान  began soon after his assassination in 1968 .
Ronald Reagan signed the holiday into  विधि in 1983 , और it थी पहला observed  on January 20 , 1986 .
At first , some states resisted observing the  अवकाश as ऐसे , giving it वैकल्पिक  names or combining it with other holidays .
It was officially  observed in सब 50 राज्य लिये the पहला  time in 2000 .
The camera phone solution  allows तत्काल sharing  of pictures .
As it 's automatic and instant , the  उपयोक्ता करता नहीं have to उपयोग a केबल or removable  media to connect to a personal computer .
A camera  फोन is a मोबाईल फोन जिससे is समर्थ to कैप्चर  still photographs ( and usually video ) .
Since early in the 21st century the majority  of मोबाईल फोन in उपयोग  are camera phones .
Most camera  फोन हैं simpler  than separate digital cameras .
Their usual fixed focus lenses and smaller  सेंसर सीमा उनके प्रदर्शन  in poor lighting .
Lacking a physical shutter ,  सबसे have a long शटर  lag .
Flash , where  उपस्थित , is प्रायः  weak .
Optical  जूम और तिपाई  screws are rare .
Some also lack a USB  कनेक्शन , removable मेमोरी कार्ड , or अन्य रास्ता of transferring  their pictures more quickly than by the phone 's inherent communication feature .
Some of the more expensive camera phones have only a few of these  तकनीकी disadvantages , जिससे लागू सबसे acutely in कम लाइट शर्तें और  in any case have not inhibited their widespread use .
Most model lines improve in  ये प्रणाम प्रत्येक साल  or two .
Some , such as the Droid Incredible  तभी have a मेनू चुनाव to प्रारंभ an अनुप्रयोग  program to activate the camera .
Others , such as the BlackBerry Storm 2 , Droid  x , मोटोरोला v980 और नोकिया 5800 भी have  a separate camera button for quickness and convenience .
Windows Phones can  be विन्यस्त to operate as a कैमरा  even if the phone is asleep .
Some camera phones are designed to resemble separate low-end digital compact cameras in appearance and to some extent in features and picture quality  , और हैं ब्रांडेड as दोनो मोबाईल फोन और कैमरे  , including certain Sony phones .
The principal advantages of camera phones are cost  और compactness ; बेशक लिये a उपयोक्ता जो carries a मोबाईल फोन वैसे  , the additional size and cost are negligible .
Smartphones that are camera phones may run mobile  अनुप्रयोग to add सामर्थ्य ऐसे  as geotagging and image stitching .
A few high end phones can use their touch screen to  सीधा उनके कैमरा to फ़ोकस on a particular ऑब्जेक्ट in the फ़ील्ड of दृश्य , giving भी an अनुभवहीन उपयोक्ता a उपाधि of फ़ोकस कंट्रोल  exceeded only by seasoned photographers using manual focus .
`` Whatever Happened to  the man of कल ? '' is a 1986 कॉमिक किताब स्टोरी featuring  the DC Comics character of Superman .
Written by Alan Moore with help from long-time , and soon to be retiring , Superman editor , Julius Schwartz , the story was  प्रकाशित in दो भाग , शुरूआत in सुपरमैन # 423 और समाप्ति in कार्रवाई कॉमिक्स # 583 , दोनो  published in September 1986 .
The story was drawn by long-time artist Curt Swan , in his final major  योगदान to the सुपरमैन शीर्षक , और थी inked by जार्ज pérez in the समस्या  of Superman and Kurt Schaffenberger in the issue of Action Comics .
The story was an imaginary tale which told the final story of the Silver Age Superman and his long history , which was being  rebooted following the कार्यक्रम of संकट on अनन्त earths , पहले उसके आधुनिक परिचय in the जॉन byrne श्रेणी  , The Man of Steel .
Moore wanted his plot to honor the long history  of the अक्षर और to serve  as a complete conclusion to his mythology .
The story is a frame story set ten years after Superman was last seen ,  जहाँ लोइस लेन recounts the टेल of the समाप्त of सुपरमैन 's करियर  to a reporter from the Daily Planet .
Her story  शामिल numerous हिंसक हमले विरूद्ध सुपरमैन by उसके दुश्मनों , the पब्लिक  revelation of his secret identity of Clark Kent and a number of deaths of those closest to him .
The story has  महरूम cited as एक of the बेहतरीन कहानियां  of the character of Superman , and critics and audiences frequently choose it as one of the most memorable comics ever published .
It  is प्रयुक्त as an उदाहरण of कैसा to बंद  the long-time continuity of a comic book character .
The story 's legacy has  endured साथ समान कहानियां लिखा  as tributes to it .
The title is a reference to one of the nicknames of Superman  as the man of कल , और थी प्रयुक्त in the  title of another Superman .
The Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a mid-engined grand  touring car , designed और विकसित by the volkswagen  Group and manufactured in Molsheim , France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S .
The  सुपर खेल संस्करण of the veyron is the  fastest street-legal production car in the world , with a top speed of .
The original  संस्करण रै a शीर्ष गति  of .
It was named Car of the Decade ( 2000–2009 )  by the बीबीसी टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम  Top Gear .
The  मानक veyron जीती शीर्ष  Gears Best Car Driven All Year award in 2005 .
On 6 April 2013 , Bugatti set the record for the fastest roadster in the world with the  veyron ग्रैंड खेल vitesse , reaching on औसत a  top speed of .
The Veyron 's chief designer was Hartmut  warkuss , और the exterior थी designed by jozef kabaň of volkswagen , साथ much of the अभियान्त्रिकी कार्य होने conducted अंतर्गत  the guidance of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber .
A number of  खास विसंगतियाँ have  been produced .
In  दिसम्बर 2010 , bugatti began offering prospective खरीदार the क्षमता to मनपसंद exterior और  interiors colours by using the Veyron 16.4 Configurator application on the marque 's official website .
The institution of the Eucharist has been a key theme in the depictions of the Last Supper in Christian  आर्ट , as in इस 16th-century जुआन de juanes पेंटिंग  .
`` At the Last Supper , on the night he was betrayed , our Savior  instituted the eucharistic बलिदान of उसके  Body and Blood . ''
( Catechism of the  कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर 1323  )
Eucharist in the Catholic Church refers to both the celebration of the  द्रव्यमान , कि is , the eucharist  liturgy , and the bread and wine which after the consecration are transubstantiated ( changed in substance ) into the body and blood of Jesus Christ , Lord and God , a declaration formulated by the Council of Trent with an anathema against anyone who denied this .
Blessed Sacrament is a devotional term used in the Roman Catholic Church to refer to the Eucharistic species ( the  देह और रक्त  of Christ ) .

A short story is a  ब्रैड कार्य of साहित्य , प्रायः  written in narrative prose .
Emerging from earlier oral storytelling  परंपराओं in the 17th सदी , the छोटी स्टोरी रै grown  to encompass a body of work so diverse as to defy easy characterization .
At its most prototypical the  छोटी स्टोरी सुविधाएँ a छोटी  cast of named characters , and focuses on a self-contained incident with the intent of evoking a `` single effect '' or mood .
In so  doing , छोटी कहानियां मेक उपयोग of प्लाट , अनुनाद  , and other dynamic components to a far greater degree than is typical of an anecdote , yet to a far lesser degree than a novel .
While the short story is  largely पृथक इससे the अनोखा , लेखक  of both generally draw from a common pool of literary techniques .
Short stories have  no नियत लंबाई  .
In terms of word count there is  no आधिकारिक demarcation  between an anecdote , a short story , and a novel .
Rather , the form 's parameters are  दिए by the rhetorical और व्यावहारिक कॉन्टेक्स्ट in जिससे a दिए स्टोरी is उत्पादित  and considered , so that what constitutes a short story may differ between genres , countries , eras , and commentators .
Like the novel , the short story 's predominant shape reflects the demands of  the उपलब्धियाँ बाज़ार लिये प्रकाशन , और the एवोल्यूशन of the रूप seems closely tied to the एवोल्यूशन of the प्रकाशन उद्योग और the सबमिशन  guidelines of its constituent houses .
The short story has been  माना दोनो an शिक्षुता रूप preceding अधिक lengthy  works , and a crafted form in its own right , collected together in books of similar length , price , and distribution as novels .
Short story writers may  define उनके works as भाग of the कलाकारी और निजी  expression of the form .
They may also attempt to resist  categorization by विधा और फिक्स्ड रूप  .
Area codes  in मिशिगन
Area code 810 is the telephone  क्षेत्रफल कोड सेवारत पूर्वी  Michigan .
The raccoon ( , Procyon lotor ) , sometimes spelled racoon , also known as the common raccoon , North American raccoon  , उत्तरी raccoon और colloquially as कून , is a medium-sized स्तनधारी देशी  to North America .
The raccoon  is the largest of the procyonid परिवार  , having a body length of and a body weight of .
Its grayish coat  ज़्यादातर consists of घना underfur जिससे  insulates against cold weather .
Two of the raccoon 's most distinctive features are its  अत्यधिक dexterous सामने पंजे और इसके फेशियल मुखौटा ,  which are themes in the mythology of several Native American tribes .
Raccoons are noted for their intelligence , with studies showing that they are able to  याद the समाधान to कार्य लिये up to तीन  years .
The diet of the omnivorous raccoon  , जिससे is प्रायः nocturnal , consists of परिचय  40 % invertebrates , 33 % plant foods , and 27 % vertebrates .
The original habitats of the raccoon are deciduous and  मिश्रित वनों , लकिन due to उनके adaptability वे have विस्तारित उनके दायरा  to mountainous areas , coastal marshes , and urban areas , where some homeowners consider them to be pests .
As a result of escapes and deliberate introductions in the mid-20th century , raccoons are  अभी भी वितरित आरपार the यूरोपीय मेनलैंड , the काकेशस  region and Japan .
Though previously thought to be solitary ,  वहीँ is अभी प्रमाण कि raccoons engage in gender-specific  social behavior .
Related females often share a common area , while unrelated males live together in groups of up to four animals to  maintain उनके स्थितियाँ विरूद्ध विदेशी males दौरान  the mating season , and other potential invaders .
Home range sizes vary anywhere from 3 hectares ( 7 acres ) for  महिलाओं in शहरों to 50 km2  ( 20 sq mi ) for males in prairies .
बाद a gestation काल of परिचय  65 days , two to five young , known as `` kits '' , are born in spring .
The kits are subsequently raised by  उनके माँ जबतक dispersion  in late fall .
Although captive raccoons have been known to live over 20 years , their average life  प्रत्याशा in the जंगली is तभी  1.8 to 3.1 years .
In many areas , hunting and  vehicular चोट  are the two most common causes of death .
The 2010 Haiti earthquake was a catastrophic magnitude 7.0 Mw earthquake ,  साथ an उपरिकेंद्र निकट the कस्बा of léogâne ( ouest विभाग ) , लगभग  west of Port-au-Prince , Haiti 's capital .
The  भूकंप occurred at 16:53 लोकल समय ( 21:53  UTC ) on Tuesday , 12 January 2010 .
By 24 January , at  तनिक 52 aftershocks measuring  4.5 or greater had been recorded .
An estimated three million  लोगों यहूद प्रभावित  by the quake .
The highest reliable  मौत गिनती थी अनुमानित  at 220,000 .
Haitian government  estimates यहूद  higher .
The government of Haiti  अनुमानित कि 250,000 निवास और 30,000  commercial buildings had collapsed or were severely damaged .
The earthquake caused major damage in  port-au-prince , jacmel और अन्य settlements  in the region .
Many  notable लैंडमार्क इमारतें यहूद significantly क्षतिग्रस्त or नष्ट , सहित the अध्यक्षीय  Palace , the National Assembly building , the Port-au-Prince Cathedral , and the main jail .
Among those killed were Archbishop of Port-au-Prince Joseph  सर्ज miot , और विपक्ष  leader Micha Gaillard .
The headquarters of the United Nations Stabilization  मिशन in हैती ( minustah ) , स्तिथ in the पूंजी , collapsed  , killing many , including the Mission 's Chief , Hédi Annabi .
Many countries responded to appeals for humanitarian aid ,  pledging निधि और dispatching बचाव और चिकित्सा  teams , engineers and support personnel .
Communication systems , air , land , and sea transport facilities , hospitals , and electrical networks had been damaged by the earthquake , which  hampered बचाव और सहायता प्रयत्न ; भ्रम over जो थी in चार्ज  , air traffic congestion , and problems with prioritisation of flights further complicated early relief work .
Port-au-Prince 's morgues were  अभिभूत साथ  tens of thousands of bodies .
These had to be  दफ्न in द्रव्यमान  graves .
As  छुटकारा tailed बंद ,  supplies , medical care and sanitation became priorities .
Delays in aid distribution led to angry appeals  इससे सहायता मजदूर और survivors , और  looting and sporadic violence were observed .
On 22 January the United Nations  विख्यात कि the आपात phase of the राहत आपरेशन थी आरेखण to a बंद , और on the following  day the Haitian government officially called off the search for survivors .
Mister Ed is a fictional talking horse , originally appearing in short stories by Walter R. Brooks , and later in an American television situation comedy produced by Filmways that first aired  in अनुप्रयोग इससे जनवरी 5 to जुलाई 2 , 1961 , और तब on  CBS from October 1 , 1961 to February 6 , 1966 .
The stars of the show were  मिस्टर ed , a palomino घोड़ा जो could `` बात '' , निभाई by gelding बाँसुरी harvester  and voiced by former Western star Allan Lane ( who went uncredited for the entire length of the series ) , and his owner , an eccentric and enormously klutzy , yet friendly , architect named Wilbur Post ( Alan Young ) .
much of the कार्यक्रम 's  humor stemmed from the fact Mister Ed would speak only to Wilbur , as well as Ed 's notoriety as a troublemaker .
Other running jokes centered on Wilbur 's  अक्षर होने a विशाल klutz और inadvertently causing  harm to himself or others .
According to the show 's producer , Arthur Lubin , Young was chosen as the lead character  क्युकी he `` बस लगा जैसे the sort of guy  a horse would talk to '' .
Lubin , a friend of Mae  वेस्ट , scored a तख्तापलट  by persuading the screen icon to guest star in one episode .
In the United States , reruns aired on Nick  at नाइट इससे कूच 3 , 1986 , to  February 1 , 1993 .
Sister station  tv जमीन भी reran  the show from 1996–98 and again from 2003-06 .
The series  is फिलहाल ब्रॉडकास्ट प्रत्येक morning on इस tv  , along with Highway Patrol , and The Patty Duke Show .
It  is भी फिलहाल ब्रॉडकास्ट on hallmark  Movie Channel .
As of January 1 , 2011 , the first two  सीज़न of the दिखाएँ हैं  available on Hulu .
The Rapture is a term in Christian eschatology which  refers to the `` होने caught up '' discussed in 1 thessalonians 4:17 ,  when the `` dead in Christ '' and `` we who are alive and remain '' will be `` caught up in the clouds '' to meet `` the Lord in the air '' .
the पद `` rapture '' is प्रयुक्त  in at least two senses .
In the pre-tribulation  दृश्य , a समूह of लोगों होगा be  left behind on earth after another group literally leaves `` to meet the Lord in the air . ''
This is  अभी the सबसे आम उपयोग of the  term , especially among fundamentalist Christians and in the United States .
The other , older use of the term `` Rapture '' is simply as a synonym for the final  क़यामत generally , बगैर a विश्वास कि a समूह of लोगों is बाएँ पीछे on धरती लिये an विस्तारित tribulation  period after the events of 1 Thessalonians 4:17 .
This distinction is important as  कुछ प्रकार of christianity never refer to `` the rapture '' in धार्मिक  education , but might use the older and more general sense of the word `` rapture '' in referring to what happens during the final resurrection .
There are many views among Christians regarding the timing of Christ 's return ( including whether it will occur in one event or two ) ,  और विभिन्न दृश्य regarding the गंतव्य of the aerial महफ़िल वर्णित  in 1 Thessalonians 4 .
Denominations such as Roman Catholics , Orthodox Christians , Lutheran Christians , and Reformed Christians believe in a  rapture तभी  in the sense of a general final resurrection , when Christ returns a single time .
They do not believe that a  समूह of लोगों is बाएँ पीछे on धरती लिये an विस्तारित  Tribulation period after the events of 1 Thessalonians 4:17 .
Pre-tribulation rapture theology was developed in the 1830s by John Nelson Darby and the Plymouth Brethren ,  और popularized in the संयुक्त राज्य in the जल्दी 20th सदी by the चौड़ी परिसंचरण  of the Scofield Reference Bible .
Kris Nathan Humphries ( born February 6  , 1985 ) is an अमरीकी पेशेवर बास्केट  player with the Brooklyn Nets .
The Philistine cities  of गाजा , ashdod  , Ashkelon , Ekron , and Gath
The Philistines ( , , , or ; , Plištim ) , Pleshet or Peleset , were a people who as part of the Sea Peoples  appeared in the दक्षिणी तटीय क्षेत्रफल of canaan at the शुरूआत of the आयरन आयु  ( circa 1175 BC ) , most probably from the Aegean region .
According to the Bible , they ruled the five city-states ( the `` Philistine Pentapolis '' ) of Gaza , Ashkelon , Ashdod  , ekron और gath , इससे wadi गाजा in the दक्षिण to the yarqon नदी in the उत्तर , लकिन  with no fixed border to the east .
The  बाइबल paints उन्हें as the किंगडम  of Israel 's most dangerous enemy .
Originating somewhere in the Aegean , their population was around 25,000 in the 12th century BC , rising to a peak of  30,000 in the 11th सदी bc , of जिससे the ईजियन तत्व थी नहीं अधिक than हाफ the कुल  , and perhaps much less .
Nothing is known for certain about the original language or  भाषाएं of the philistines  , however they were not part of the Semitic Canaanite population .
There is some limited evidence in favour of the assumption that the  philistines यहूद indo-european-speakers either इससे यूनानियों and/or luwian  speakers from the coast of Asia Minor .
Philistine-related  शब्द मिला in the बाइबल हैं नहीं सामीती , और can in कुछ  cases , with reservations , be traced back to Proto-Indo-European roots .
By the  शुरूआत of the 1st मिलेनियम bce वे था अपनाया  the general Canaanite language of the region .
The Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery ( ASVAB ) is a multiple choice test , administered by the United States Military Entrance  प्रसंस्करण कमांड , प्रयुक्त to determine योग्यता लिये  enlistment in the United States armed forces .
It is often offered  to अमरीकी ऊँची स्कूल विद्यार्थी जब वे हैं  in the 10th , 11th and 12th grade , though anyone eligible for enlistment may take it .
Although the test is administered by the  सैन्य , it is नहीं ( और never रै महरूम ) a आवश्यकता  that a test-taker with a qualifying score enlist in the armed forces .
In financial accounting , a balance sheet or statement of financial  स्थिति is a सारांश of the वित्तीय balances of a एकमात्र बंदोबस्त  , a business partnership , a corporation or other business organization , such as an LLC or an LLP .
Assets , liabilities and ownership equity are listed as of a  विशिष्ट तिथि , ऐसे as the  end of its financial year .
a संतुलन चादर is  often described as a `` snapshot of a company 's financial condition '' .
Of the four basic financial statements , the balance sheet  is the तभी बयान जिससे applies to a सिंगल पाइंट  in time of a business ' calendar year .
A standard company balance sheet has  तीन भाग : एसेट  , liabilities and ownership equity .
The main categories of  एसेट हैं प्रायः सूचीबद्ध  first , and typically in order of liquidity .
Assets  हैं followed by the  liabilities .
The difference between the assets and the liabilities is known as  इक्विटी or the जाल एसेट or the जाल लायक or पूंजी of the कम्पनी और according to the हिसाब समीकरण , जाल लायक  must equal assets minus liabilities .
Another way to look at the same equation is that assets equals  देनदारी प्लस मालिक 's इक्विटी  .
Looking at the equation in this way shows how assets were financed : either by borrowing money (  देयता ) or by using the मालिक 's धन ( मालिक 's इक्विटी )  .
Balance sheets are usually presented  साथ एसेट in एक खण्ड और देनदारी और जाल लायक in  the other section with the two sections `` balancing . ''
A  कारोबार ऑपरेटिंग entirely in नकदी can माप  its profits by withdrawing the entire bank balance at the end of the period , plus any cash in hand .
however , अनेक व्यवसायों हैं नहीं सशुल्क तत्काल  ; they build up inventories of goods and they acquire buildings and equipment .
In other words : businesses have assets and so they can not , even if they want to ,  तत्काल फेरे ये into नकदी at the समाप्त of प्रत्येक काल  .
Often , these businesses owe money to suppliers and to tax authorities , and the proprietors do not withdraw  सब उनके असली पूंजी और profits at the समाप्त of प्रत्येक  period .
In other words businesses also  have देनदारी  .
.17 Hornady Magnum Rimfire  , commonly ज्ञात as the .17  HMR , is a rimfire rifle cartridge developed by the ammunition company Hornady in 2002 .
It descended from the .22 Magnum by necking down the .22 Magnum case to take a .17 caliber ( 4.5 mm ) bullet , and it is more costly to shoot than traditional .22 caliber rimfire  कारतूस  .
Commonly loaded with a 17 grain ( 1.1  g ) गोली , it can उद्धार muzzle गतियाँ in excess  of 2550 ft/s ( 775 m/s ) .
The Schaumburg Flyers were a professional baseball team  आधारित in schaumburg , इलिनोइस , in the संयुक्त  States .
The Flyers were to be a charter member of the North American League , which is not affiliated with Major League Baseball ,  however , the टोली folded in कूच 2011 , पहले वे began  play in the NAL .
इससे the 1999 ऋतु to the  2010 season , the Flyers played their home games at Alexian Field , near the Elgin O'Hare Expressway .
The  टोली formerly निभाई in थंडर खाड़ी , ओंटारियो , जहाँ वे यहूद  known as the Thunder Bay Whiskey Jacks .
The team was originally a member  of the उत्तरी लीग इससे  1993 to 2010 .
On July 27 , 2009 , the Flyers played host to Battle of the Sexes II , which pitted the Flyers against the National Pro  fastpitch सॉफ्टबॉल champions  , the Chicago Bandits .
Played by  आधिकारिक सॉफ्टबॉल नियम , the  game was seen by an overflow record crowd of 8,918 , and was won by the Bandits 4-2 .
In 1999 , the Flyers hired their  पहला मैनेजर , रॉन kittle  .
Kittle is best known for his playing days with the Chicago White Sox , and former Chicago Cubs and White  sox खिलाड़ी ग्रेग hibbard थी the pitching  coach .
दौरान the जल्दी सालो of the मताधिकार , kittle किया a श्रेणी of  TV commercials to promote the team , using the gimmick `` Ma Kittle . '' where he played both himself and his `` Ma . ''
The ads were successful at sparking some initial  ब्याज in the टोली as the flyers hoped  to steal away fans from the nearby Kane County Cougars .
The ad mimicked the highly successful Converse  विज्ञापन जहाँ लैरी जॉनसन स्ट्रक्चर as दोनो खुद और `` gramama  . ''
At the end of the 2001  ऋतु , however , kittle resigned इससे उसके  managerial position , and Jim Boynewicz was hired to replace him .
In 2004 , the  flyers बना it to the उत्तरी  League Championship Series against the St. Paul Saints .
Despite leading the  five-game श्रेणी 2-1  , Schaumburg eventually lost the series .
In Game 5 , Flyers relief pitcher Lyle Prempas allowed a game winning  ग्रैंड स्लैम by st. पॉल infielder मार्क mirizzi  in the ninth inning .
The Flyers appeared in the Northern  लीग playoffs चार टाइम्स ( 1999 , 2003 , 2004 , 2006 ) लकिन  never won the championship .
Some famous players who played for the Flyers were former  ओकलैंड a 's outfielder ozzie canseco और पूर्व शिकागो  Cubs outfielder Dwight Smith .
रेचल हन्ना वाइज़ ( / वाइस / ; born 7 कूच  1970 ) is an English film and theatre actress and former fashion model .
Weisz began her acting  करियर at ट्रिनिटी हॉल , कैम्ब्रिज in the जल्दी 1990s , तब प्रारंभ working in टेलीविज़न , appearing in इंस्पेक्टर मोर्स , the अंग्रेजों  mini-series Scarlet and Black , and the television film Advocates II .
She made her film début in the film Death Machine ( 1994 ) ,  लकिन उसके भेदन भूमिका आए in the फिल्मी कड़ी प्रतिक्रिया ( 1996 ) , अग्रणी to a high-profile भूमिका as  Evelyn Carnahan-O'Connell in the films The Mummy ( 1999 ) and The Mummy Returns ( 2001 ) .
Other notable films featuring Weisz are Enemy at the Gates , About a Boy , Constantine , The  फव्वारा और the निरंतर माली , लिये जिससे वो प्राप्त an अकादमी पुरस्कार , a सुनहरी ग्लोब और a स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं  ' Guild award for her supporting role as Tessa Quayle .
She has been labelled an `` English  रोज़ '' चूंकि उसके नाबालिग भूमिका in चोरी  Beauty ( 1996 ) .
वाइज़ भी  works in theatre .
Her  स्टेज भेदन थी the 1994 पुनरुद्धार  of Noël Coward 's play Design for Living , which earned her the London Critics Circle Award for the most promising newcomer .
Weisz 's performances also include the 1999 Donmar Warehouse  उत्पादन of टेनेसी विलियम्स ' एकाएक , पिछला गर्मियाँ , और उनके 2009 पुनरुद्धार of a स्ट्रीटकार  Named Desire .
Her portrayal of Blanche DuBois in the  latter खेल अर्जित उसके the आलोचकों ' वृत्त  Theatre Award for Best Actress .
She has recently played  evanora in oz the ग्रेट और  Powerful .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' )  और अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि घोषित उनके secession और formed the confederate  States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its origin in the issue  of गुलामी , विशेषकर  the extension of slavery into the western territories .
Foreign powers did not  intervene  .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure , the Confederacy collapsed , slavery was abolished  , और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल एकता और guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed  slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans , led by Abraham Lincoln , opposed expanding  गुलामी into संयुक्त  States ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before his inauguration on  कूच 4 , 1861 , सात  cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing  लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और  the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural address  घोषित उसके प्रशासन  would not initiate civil war .
Eight remaining slave states  जारी to अस्वीकृत काल्स लिये secession  .
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts within  territory claimed by the confederacy  .
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise ,  और दोनो पहलू prepared  for war .
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King  कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना the नई confederate राज्य of अमेरिका  .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 , when  confederate शक्तियां fired upon  Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln  पुकारा लिये प्रत्येक राज्य to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट  ; consequently , four more slave states joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the border states and established a naval  नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the दक्षिणी  economy .
The  पूर्वी थिएटर  was inconclusive in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with Confederate retreat at the  बैटल of antietam , dissuading अंग्रेजों हस्तक्षेप  .
Lincoln issued  the emancipation उदघोषणा  , which made ending slavery a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy , then much of their western armies , and the  संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in दो at the मिसिसिपी  River .
In 1863 , Robert E.  ली 's confederate incursion  north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
Western  सफलताओं led to ulysses  S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864 .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to  the समुद्र , destroying confederate अवसंरचना  along the way .
The  संघ marshaled the संसाधन और जनशक्ति to आक्रमण the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश , और  could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed  , अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox  Court House on April 9 , 1865 .
The  अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध थी एक of the  earliest true industrial wars .
Railroads , the  टेलीग्राफ , steamships , और mass-produced  weapons were employed extensively .
The mobilization of civilian factories ,  खानों , shipyards , बैंको , परिवहन और खाना  supplies all foreshadowed World War I .
It remains the deadliest war in American history  , resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined  number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all  उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा , और 30 प्रतिशत of सब  Southern white males aged 18–40 .
Potato bread is a form of bread in which potato  replaces a portion of the नियमित  wheat flour .
It is cooked in a variety of methods ,  सहित  by baking it on a hot griddle or pan , or in an oven .
It  may be leavened  or unleavened , and may have a variety of other ingredients baked into it .
The ratio  of आलू to गेहूं आटा varies significantly इससे रेसिपी to रेसिपी ,  with some recipes having a majority of potato , and others having a majority of wheat flour .
Some  व्यंजनों कॉल लिये mashed  potatoes , with others calling for dehydrated potato flakes .
It is available as a  वाणिज्यिक उत्पाद in अनेक  countries , with similar variations in ingredients , cooking method , and other variables .
The  प्रशांत समय  Zone observes standard time by subtracting eight hours from Coordinated Universal Time ( ) .
The clock time in this zone is  आधारित on the औसत सौर समय of the 120th मध्याह्न वेस्ट  of the Greenwich Observatory .
During daylight saving time  , इसके समय ऑफसेट is .
In the United States and  कनाडा , इस समय मण्डल is generically  called Pacific Time ( PT ) .
Specifically , it is Pacific  मानक समय ( pst ) जब observing मानक समय  ( winter ) , and Pacific Daylight Time ( PDT ) when observing daylight saving time ( summer ) .
सबसे of  Canada uses daylight saving time .
In Mexico the UTC−8 time zone is known as  the उत्तरपश्चिम मण्डल , जिससे is synchronized साथ the u.S. पीडीटी  daylight saving schedule .
The largest city in the Pacific Time Zone is Los Angeles in California from USA ; the city 's  महानगर क्षेत्रफल is the largest  in the zone .
The zone is  एक घंटा ahead of the अलास्का समय मण्डल , एक घंटा पीछे the पहाड़  Time Zone and three hours behind the Eastern Time Zone .
Stereo 8 , commonly known as the eight-track cartridge  , eight-track टेप , or बस  eight-track , is a magnetic tape sound recording technology .
It was  लोकप्रिय in the  United States from the mid-1960s through to the early 1980s , but was relatively unknown in many European countries .
It  थी , however , बहुत लोकप्रिय in the  United Kingdom during this period .
Stereo 8 was  निर्मित in 1964 by a consortium led by विधेयक lear of lear जेट निगम , साथ साथ  Ampex , Ford Motor Company , General Motors , Motorola , and RCA Victor Records ( RCA ) .
It was a further  विकास of the समान stereo-pak four-track  cartridge created by Earl `` Madman '' Muntz .
A later quadraphonic version of the format was  घोषित by आरसीए in अप्रैल 1970 और पहला ज्ञात as quad-8 , तब  later changed to just Q8 .
Ramesses II ( 1303 BC – July or August 1213 BC ; Egyptian : , alternatively transcribed as Rameses and Ramses or ) , referred to as Ramesses  the ग्रेट , थी the तीसरा मिश्र pharaoh ( reigned 1279 bc – 1213 bc ) of the उन्नीसवीं राजवंश  .
He is often  regarded as the महानतम , सबसे मनाये  , and most powerful pharaoh of the Egyptian Empire .
His  successors और बाद उन्होंने  called him the `` Great Ancestor . ''
रामेसेस ii led अनेक सैन्य  expeditions into the Levant , re-asserting Egyptian control over Canaan .
He also led expeditions to the south  , into नुबिया , commemorated in inscriptions at  Beit el-Wali and Gerf Hussein .
At age fourteen ,  रामेसेस थी नियुक्त  Prince Regent by his father Seti I .
He is believed to have taken the throne in his late teens and is known to have ruled Egypt  इससे 1279 bc to 1213 bc लिये 66 सालो और 2 महीने , according to  both Manetho and Egypt 's contemporary historical records .
he थी एकबार कहा to  have lived to be 99 years old , but it is more likely that he died in his 90th or 91st year .
If he became Pharaoh in 1279 BC as most Egyptologists today believe , he would have  assumed the सिंहासन on may 31 , 1279 bc , आधारित on उसके ज्ञात  accession date of III Shemu day 27 .
Ramesses II celebrated an unprecedented 14 sed festivals ( the first held after thirty years of a  pharaoh 's शासनकाल , और तब प्रत्येक तीन सालो  ) during his reign—more than any other pharaoh .
On his death , he was buried in a tomb in the Valley of the Kings ; his body was later moved to a  royal संचय जहाँ it थी खोजा in 1881 , और is अभी on प्रदर्शक  in the Cairo Museum .
The early part of his reign was focused on building cities  , मंदिरों और स्मारक  .
He established the city of Pi-Ramesses  in the nile डेल्टा as उसके नई पूंजी और  main base for his campaigns in Syria .
This city was built on the remains of the city of Avaris ,  the पूंजी of the हिक्सोस जब वे took over , और थी the  location of the main Temple of Set .
He is also known as Ozymandias in the  यूनानी स्त्रोत , इससे a लिप्यन्तरण into यूनानी of a भाग of रामेसेस  's throne name , , `` Ra 's mighty truth , chosen of Ra '' .
The Texas Rangers are a professional baseball team  स्तिथ in the dallas-fort  Worth Metroplex , based in Arlington , Texas .
The Rangers  मताधिकार is फिलहाल a सदस्य of the पश्चिमी प्रभाग  of Major League Baseball 's American League .
Since , the Rangers have played in Rangers  ballpark in आर्लिंगटन in आर्लिंगटन  , Texas .
The team  's नाम is उधार इससे the प्रसिद्ध  law enforcement agency of the same name .
The franchise was established in 1961 by the name of the Washington  सीनेटरों , an विस्तार टोली awarded to वॉशिंगटन , d.C. , बाद the नगर 's पहला  ballclub , the original Washington Senators , moved to Minnesota and became the Twins .
After the season  , the नई सीनेटरों स्थानांतरित to  Arlington , Texas , and debuted as the Rangers the following spring .
The Texas Rangers  बेसबॉल क्लबों रै बना छह दिखावे in the एमएलबी postseason ,  all following division championships , in 1996 , 1998 , 1999 , 2010 , 2011 and 2012 .
In 2010 , the  रेंजरों उन्नत पास्ट the प्रभाग श्रेणी  for the first time , defeating the Tampa Bay Rays .
Texas then brought home their first American League Pennant  बाद धड़कन the नई यॉर्क यांकीज़  in six games .
In the 2010  संसार श्रेणी , the मताधिकार 's पहला , the  Rangers fell to the San Francisco Giants in five games .
उनके लोन विजय बना उन्हें the पहला टेक्सास टोली to जीत  a World Series game , the Houston Astros having been swept in their 2005 World Series appearance .
They repeated as American League champions the  following साल , तब खोया the 2011 संसार श्रेणी to  the St. Louis Cardinals in seven games .
Gaius Julius Caesar ( , July 100 BC – 15 March 44 BC ) was a Roman  सामान्य , statesman , कौंसुल और notable  author of Latin prose .
He played a critical role in the events that led  to the निधन of the रोमन गणतंत्र और  the rise of the Roman Empire .
in 60 bc , सीज़र , crassus और pompey  formed a political alliance that was to dominate Roman politics for several years .
Their attempts to amass power through populist tactics were opposed by the  रूढ़िवादी elite भीतर the रोमन सीनेट , among उन्हें केटो the younger साथ the  frequent support of Cicero .
Caesar 's conquest of Gaul , completed by 51 BC , extended  रोम 's territory to the अंग्रेज़ी  Channel and the Rhine .
Caesar became the first Roman general to cross  दोनो जब he निर्मित a सेतु आरपार the राइन  and conducted the first invasion of Britain .
These achievements granted him unmatched military power  और threatened to ग्रहण the खड़ा of pompey , जो था  realigned himself with the Senate after the death of Crassus in 53 BC .
With the Gallic  युद्धों concluded , the सीनेट ordered सीज़र to  lay down his military command and return to Rome .
Caesar refused , and marked his defiance in 49 BC by  क्रासिंग the rubicon साथ a लीजन , leaving  his province and illegally entering Roman territory under arms .
Civil war resulted , from which he  उभरा as the unrivaled नेता  of Rome .
After assuming control of government , Caesar began a program of  सोशल और सरकारी reforms ,  including the creation of the Julian calendar .
He centralised the bureaucracy of the  गणतंत्र और थी आखिरकार proclaimed  `` dictator in perpetuity '' .
But the underlying political  विरोध था नहीं महरूम resolved , और on the ides of  March ( 15 March ) 44 BC , Caesar was assassinated by a group of senators led by Marcus Junius Brutus .
A new  श्रेणी of सिविल युद्धों broke आउट , और the संवैधानिक  government of the Republic was never restored .
Caesar 's adopted heir Octavian ,  बाद ज्ञात as augustus , रोज़ to एकमात्र शक्ति  , and the era of the Roman Empire began .
Much of Caesar 's life is known from his own accounts of his military campaigns , and from other contemporary sources , mainly  the अक्षर और भाषणों of सिसरो और the ऐतिहासिक कृतियाँ  of Sallust .
The later  biographies of सीज़र by suetonius और प्लूटार्क  are also major sources .
Caesar is deemed to be one of the greatest military  कमांडरों  of history .
Linguistic  मैप of सीरियल ,  Cameroon , and Benin .
चिह्न in अंग्रेज़ी ,  outside the University of Lagos
There are hundreds of  भाषाएं बोला  in Nigeria .
The major languages  हैं योरूबा , हौसा , इग्बो  , Edo , Fulfulde , Kanuri , and Ibibio .
The official language of Nigeria ,  अंग्रेज़ी , the पूर्व औपनिवेशिक भाषा , थी चुनी to  facilitate the cultural and linguistic unity of the country .
अंग्रेज़ी , however , remains an विशेष बचाना of the देश  's urban elite , and is not widely spoken in rural areas , which comprise three quarters of the countries population .
Nigeria 's linguistic  विविधता is a microcosm of अफ़्रीकी as a पूरे , encompassing  three major African languages families : Afroasiatic , Nilo-Saharan , and Niger–Congo .
Nigeria also has several as-yet unclassified languages , such as Cen Tuum , which may represent a  relic of an भी वृहद विविधता prior to the  spread of the current language families .
Daucus carota ( common names include wild carrot , ( UK ) bird 's nest , bishop 's lace , and Queen Anne 's lace ( North America ) ) is a flowering plant in the  परिवार apiaceae , देशी to शीतोष्ण regions of यूरोपीय , दक्षिणपश्चिम एशिया और naturalised to उत्तर अमेरिका  and Australia .
Domesticated carrots are cultivars of a  subspecies , daucus carota subsp . sativus  .
In the United  राज्य , the शीर्षक of संघीय न्यायधीश प्रायः अर्थात् a न्यायधीश नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य और  confirmed by the United States Senate pursuant to the Appointments Clause in Article II of the United States Constitution .
In addition to the Supreme Court of the United States , whose existence and some aspects of whose jurisdiction are beyond the constitutional power of Congress to alter , acts of Congress have established 13 courts of appeals ( also called `` circuit courts '' ) with  appellate  jurisdiction over different regions of the United States , and 94 United States district courts .
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a federal judge ; such positions include the Chief Justice and Associate Justices  of the परम् अदालत , सर्किट  Judges of the courts of appeals , and district judges of the United States district courts .
All of these judges described thus far are referred to sometimes as `` Article III judges '' because they exercise the judicial  शक्ति vested in the न्यायिक शाखा of the संघीय सरकारी by आलेख iii of the u.S. संविधान  .
In addition , judges of the Court of International Trade  कसरत न्यायिक शक्ति pursuant to आलेख  III .
Other judges serving in the federal courts , including magistrate judges and bankruptcy judges , are also  sometimes referred to as `` संघीय न्यायाधीशों '' ; however , वे हैं neither नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष nor पुष्टि by the सीनेट , और उनके शक्ति गर्भाशयी  from Article I instead .
See Article I  और आलेख  III tribunals .
Nelly Kim Furtado ( born December 2 , 1978 ) is a  कनाडाई सिंगर , songwriter और अभिनेत्री  .
She has sold 20 million albums worldwide and more 20 million singles , bringing her  कुल बिक्री to over 40 लाख रिकॉर्ड around  the world .
फ़र्टाडो पहला gained  fame with her debut album , Whoa , Nelly !
, which spawned two successful singles  , `` i 'm जैसे a बर्ड `` और `` फेरे बंद the लाइट  `` . ``
I 'm Like A Bird '' won a 2001 Juno  पुरस्कार लिये सिंगल of the साल और a 2002 ग्रैमी पुरस्कार  for Best Female Pop Vocal Performance .
In 2003 , Furtado released  लोकगीत , जिससे उत्पादित तीन अंतरराष्ट्रीय  singles— `` Powerless ( Say What You Want ) `` , `` Try `` and `` Força `` .
Three years later she released  ढीला , a विश्वव्यापी वाणिज्यिक  success .
the एल्बम शाखित चार number-one हिट्स : `` promiscuous ``  , `` Maneater `` , `` Say It Right `` and `` All Good Things ( Come to an End ) `` .
After a three-year  ब्रेक , वो released उसके पहला  full-length Spanish album , Mi Plan , and Furtado received a Latin Grammy for Best Female Pop Vocal Album .
In 2012 , Furtado 's fourth English-language  स्टुडियो एल्बम , the स्पिरिट अविनाशी  was released .
Furtado 's work has earned her numerous awards  और accolades , सहित 2 ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , 10 juno पुरस्कार , 3 muchmusic  Video Awards and a star on Canada 's Walk of Fame .
जीव of the  Night is the tenth studio album by Kiss .
It is the band 's last album for Casablanca  रिकॉर्ड , the तभी लेबल the समूह था कभी अंकित  for at that point .
The album was dedicated to the memory of Casablanca founder and early Kiss supporter Neil  bogart , जो था died of कर्कट दौरान the रिकॉर्डिंग  sessions .
It is also the band 's last album recorded with Ace Frehley credited as an official member ( until 1998 's Psycho Circus ) , and its first album with Vinnie  विंसेंट as the initially uncredited सीसे guitarist ( विंसेंट होता बाद be credited , लकिन नहीं प्रदर्शित  pictorially on the cover , of 1985 's reissue of the album ) .
Touch is a  निर्णायक अर्थात् of receiving  information .
This photo shows tactile markings identifying  सीढ़ियाँ लिये visually impaired  people .
The somatosensory system is a diverse sensory system comprising the receptors and processing centres to produce the sensory modalities such as  टच , तापमान , proprioception ( देह स्थिति ) , और  nociception ( pain ) .
The sensory receptors cover the skin and epithelia ,  skeletal मांसपेशियां , हड्डियों और joints , आतंरिक  organs , and the cardiovascular system .
While touch is considered one of the five traditional senses , the impression  of टच is formed इससे अनेक modalities  .
In medicine , the colloquial term `` touch '' is usually replaced with  `` दैहिक होश '' to बेहतर प्रतिबिंबित  the variety of mechanisms involved .
Somatic senses are  sometimes referred to as somesthetic होश , साथ the समझना कि somesthesis शामिल  touch , proprioception and ( depending on usage ) also haptic perception .
The system reacts to diverse stimuli using different receptors :  thermoreceptors , nociceptors , mechanoreceptors और chemoreceptors  .
हस्तांतरण of सूचना इससे the receptors गुजरता via संवेदी nerves  through tracts in the spinal cord and into the brain .
Processing primarily occurs in the primary  somatosensory क्षेत्रफल in the parietal पालि of the दिमागी cortex  .
The cortical  homunculus थी devised  by Wilder Penfield .
At its simplest , the system works when activity in a  संवेदी न्यूरॉन is triggered by a विशिष्ट stimulus ऐसे as ऊष्मा ; इस सिग्नल आखिरकार  passes to an area in the brain uniquely attributed to that area on the body—this allows the processed stimulus to be felt at the correct location .
The point-to-point mapping of the body surfaces in the  दिमाग is पुकारा a homunculus और is अनिवार्य  in the creation of a body image .
This  brain-surface ( `` cortical  '' ) map is not immutable , however .
नाटकीय शिफ्ट can occur in  response to stroke or injury .
magnolia is a विशाल genus  of about 210 flowering plant species in the subfamily Magnolioideae of the family Magnoliaceae .
It is named after  फ्रेंच वनस्पतिशास्त्री पियरे  Magnol .
Magnolia  is an प्राचीन  genus .
Appearing before bees did , the  पुष्प विकसित to प्रोत्साहित परागण  by beetles .
To avoid damage from  pollinating भृंग , the carpels of magnolia  flowers are extremely tough .
Fossilised specimens of Magnolia acuminata have been found dating to 20 million years ago , and of  पौधे identifiably belonging to the magnoliaceae डेटिंग to 95 लाख सालो पहले  .
Another aspect of Magnolias that is considered to represent an ancestral state is that the flower bud is  enclosed in a bract बल्कि than in sepals ; the perianth भाग हैं undifferentiated और पुकारा  tepals rather than distinct sepals and petals .
Magnolia shares the tepal characteristic with several other  flowering पौधे निकट the आधार of the flowering संयंत्र lineage  such as Amborella and Nymphaea ( as well as with many more recently derived plants such as Lilium ) .
The natural  दायरा of magnolia प्रजाति is a disjunct वितरण , साथ a  main centre in east and southeast Asia and a secondary centre in eastern North America , Central America , the West Indies , and some species in South America .
अंगूठा
`` White Christmas '' is an Irving  बर्लिन सोंग reminiscing परिचय an old-fashioned  Christmas setting .
According to the Guinness Book of World  रिकॉर्ड , the संस्करण सुंग by bing crosby is the best-selling सिंगल of  all time , with estimated sales in excess of 50 million copies worldwide .
Accounts vary  as to जब और जहाँ  Berlin wrote the song .
One story is that he wrote it in 1940 , in warm La Quinta , California , while staying at the La Quinta Hotel , a frequent  हॉलीवुड रिट्रीट भी favored by writer-producer फ़्रैंक capra , हालांकि the एरिज़ोना biltmore  also claims the song was written there .
He often stayed up all night writing  — he बताई उसके सचिव , `` पकड़ें अपना कलम और  take down this song .
I just wrote the best song I 've ever written — heck , I just wrote  the बेहतरीन सोंग कि  anybody 's ever written ! ''
Cross-country skiing ( or XC skiing ) is a form of ski touring in which participants propel  themselves आरपार snow-covered मैदान using skis और डंडे .
The activity is popular in many  स्थान साथ विशाल snowfields , primarily  Northern Europe , Canada , and Alaska .
Cross-country skiing is part of the Nordic skiing  खेल परिवार , जिससे शामिल स्की कूद , nordic संयुक्त ( cross-country स्कीइंग और स्की  jumping ) , Biathlon ( skiing and rifle marksmanship ) and ski-orienteering ( which includes map navigation along snow trails and tracks ) .
Cross-country skiing is the modern style of skiing that most resembles prehistoric skiing ,  विशेषकर जब किया in the  backcountry .
It is also  सम्बन्धित to telemark  skiing .
A use tax in United States is complementary to sales  कर जिससे अर्थात् , if तुम ख़रीदे a taxable product/services बगैर  paying any Sales tax to vendor , you owe use tax .
You must self assess use tax and pay it directly to  the राज्य जहाँ the उत्पाद यहूद खपत or सेवाएं  were rendered .
Use tax typically  is a कर on खपत लकिन if तुम ख़रीदे an मद (  without paying sales tax ) and store it in your warehouse initially , use tax applies to that location where goods were stored .
Later on when the final consumption takes place at some other location , you are required to pay  the अवकल of कर रेट to the क्षेत्राधिकार of परम  place of consumption .
This really means that you do n't have to pay both Sales Tax as well as Use Tax on  एक लेनदेन  .
It is only one or the other  कि तुम हैं जरूरी to अदा on खरीदें of taxable  products/services .
If vendor does n't charge any Sales tax on its invoice then it is the obligation of the buyer to  स्वः assess उपयोग कर और अदा it to the  appropriate Jurisdication .
Use Tax is generally charged  at the वही कर रेट of बिक्री कर  but in some states the tax rate is different .
Use tax is also termed as ``  खपत कर ''  or `` Consumer Use Tax '' .
A use tax is a type  of excise कर levied in the संयुक्त राज्य  by numerous state governments .
It is assessed upon tangible personal property purchased by a resident of the assessing state for use , storage , or consumption in that state ( not for resale ) , regardless of  जहाँ the खरीदें took प्लेस  .
If a resident of a state makes a purchase  भीतर उसके घर राज्य , पूरा बिक्री  tax is paid at the time of the transaction .
The use tax applies when a resident of the assessing state  purchases an मद कि is नहीं विषय to  his home state 's sales tax .
Usually , this is due to out-of-state purchases , as well as ordering  वस्तुएं through the मेल , by फोन , or over the अंतरजाल इससे अन्य  states .
The use tax is  typically assessed at the वही रेट as the बिक्री कर कि होता have महरूम owed ( if  any ) had the same goods been purchased in the state of residence .
For example , a resident of Massachusetts , with a 6.25 % `` sales and use tax '' on certain goods and services , purchases  non-exempt goods or सेवाएं in नई हैम्पशायर लिये उपयोग , भंडार or  other consumption in Massachusetts .
Under New Hampshire law , the New Hampshire vendor collects no sales taxes on the goods  , लकिन the मैसाचुसेट्स purchaser/user जरूर स्टिल अदा 6.25  % of the sales price directly to the Department of Revenue in Massachusetts as a use tax .
If the same goods are purchased in a US state that does collect sales tax for such goods at time of purchase , whatever taxes were paid by the purchaser to that  राज्य can be deducted ( as a कर क्रेडिट ) इससे the 6.25  % owed for subsequent use , storage or consumption in Massachusetts .
With few exceptions , no state 's vendors will charge the native state 's sales tax on  goods shipped आउट of राज्य , अर्थ सब goods ordered इससे out-of-state  are essentially free of sales tax .
The purchaser is therefore required to declare  और अदा the उपयोग कर to उसके  home state on these ordered goods .
The assessing  क्षेत्राधिकार may मेक the उपयोग कर  payable annually , but some states require a monthly payment .
For example , where a Vermont resident has not paid at least 6 % sales tax on property brought in for use in the state , Vermont law requires filing a tax  वापसी ( रूप su-452 और भुगतान ) by the 20th दिन of the माह following non-exempt purchases to avoid a $ 50 लेट शुल्क , a 5 % दंड प्रति माह , to a अधिकतम  of 25 % , plus statutory interest on the unpaid tax and penalties .
Typical exemptions include purchases by  charitable non-profit संगठन or सरकारी एजेंसियों , purchases लिये पुनर्विक्रय in कॉमर्स , और  purchases via `` casual sales '' by individuals not in the ordinary course of business .
Also note that there are thousands of tax  jurisdictions in the u.S. और अनेक have ever-changing सूचियाँ of विशिष्ट प्रकार  of goods and services that are not taxable .
As an illustration of the complexities : a 2006 Massachusetts law requires payment of tax on `` pre-written '' ( not custom ) software  खरीदा और डाउनलोड over the अंतरजाल लिये संस्थापना और उपयोग in मैसाचुसेट्स  , regardless of where it originates .
However , the actual use of the same software downloaded by a Massachusetts resident to a  सर्वर in another राज्य remains a non-taxed  `` service '' .
In contrast , Arkansas generally does not tax anything delivered over the Internet ( such as downloaded  तन्त्र or म्यूज़िक ) , मगर voip जिससे is specifically  defined as taxable `` telecommunications services '' .
Software ( pre-written or custom ) `` delivered thru a tangible medium '' ( i.e. , on disk ) in Arkansas is taxable even if ordered online , except `` custom software for a  particular ग्राहक '' जिससे is non-taxable `` प्रोग्रामिंग सेवाएं '' भी if वितरित  on a disk .
In most cases , this complexity is part  of the underlying बिक्री कर कानून ; लकिन जबकि a brick-and-mortar स्टोर रै to सौदे साथ तभी the बिक्री कर कानून of इसके अपना स्थान , रिमोट विक्रेता have to सौदे  with the use tax laws of many jurisdictions—up to every US state and locality that assesses them , if the company has a presence or `` nexus '' in every state ( as large `` brick-and-mortar '' sellers like Wal-Mart and Best Buy do ) .
In medicine , pulmonary hypertension ( PH ) is an increase of blood pressure in the pulmonary artery , pulmonary vein , or pulmonary capillaries , together known as  the फेफड़ों vasculature , अग्रणी to shortness of साँस , dizziness , fainting  , and other symptoms , all of which are exacerbated by exertion .
Pulmonary hypertension can be a severe disease with  a markedly decreased कसरत  tolerance and heart failure .
It was first identified by Dr.  अर्नस्ट वोन romberg in 1891  .
According to the most recent classification , it can be  एक of पाँच अलग प्रकार : arterial , venous , hypoxic , thromboembolic  or miscellaneous .

Sanuk , a division of Deckers Outdoor Corporation , is a  जूते ब्रांड आधारित in दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
Sanuk , the Thai word  लिये मजा , थी संस्थापित by दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया देशी जेफ़ kelley जब  he started making sandals out of indoor-outdoor carpet .
The first product created was green carpeted and entitled the  `` फर रियल '' बाद एक दूकान  owner asked if the novelty sandal was `` For Real . ''
The Fur  रियल पहला became a runaway hit  through boutique stores and not the intended surf shops .
The novelty act was followed up by a sandal wrapped in wire mesh , a leopard print  संस्करण , और शैलियाँ बना आउट of a poncho सामग्री  in a variety of colors .
Sanuk has grown to  शामिल स्टाइल विकल्प लिये मेन , महिलाओं और  youth and is distributed across the United States and in over 50 countries throughout Europe , Asia , South America and Australia .
Sanuk centers  itself around a धनात्मक जीवनशैली  advocating the slogan , `` Smile , Pass it on ! `` .
In computer science , array programming languages ( also known as vector or multidimensional languages )  generalize  operations on scalars to apply transparently to vectors , matrices , and higher dimensional arrays .
सरणी प्रोग्रामिंग primitives concisely  express broad ideas about data manipulation .
The level of conciseness can be dramatic in certain cases : it is not uncommon to find array  प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा one-liners कि आवश्यकता अधिक than a युगल of पृष्ठों of जावा  code .
APL , designed by Ken Iverson , was the first programming  भाषा to provide सरणी प्रोग्रामिंग  capabilities .
The  mnemonic apl refers to the शीर्षक of उसके seminal किताब `` a  Programming Language '' and not to arrays per se . Iverson 's contribution to rigor and clarity was probably more important than the simple extension of dimensions to functions .
In the United States an annuity contract is created when an insured party , usually an individual ,  pays a जीवन बीमे कम्पनी a सिंगल प्रीमियम कि होगा  later be distributed back to the insured party over time .
Annuity contracts traditionally provide a guaranteed distribution of income over time , such as via fixed payments , until the death of the person or persons named in  the अनुबंध or जबतक a फाइनल तिथि , whichever  comes first .
However , the majority of modern annuity customers use annuities only to accumulate funds free of  आय और पूंजी gains कर और to बाद लो lump-sum withdrawals बगैर  using the guaranteed-income-for-life feature .
President  बराक ओबामा  .
Barack  ओबामा साथ उसके पहला  Supreme Court nominee , Sonia Sotomayor .
Following is a list of all United States federal judges appointed by  अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा दौरान उसके प्रेसिडेंसी  .
As of April 30 , 2013 , 187 Obama nominees to Article III judgeships have been confirmed by the United States Senate , namely two Justices to the Supreme Court of the United States , 35 judges to the  संयुक्त राज्य न्यायालयों of appeals और 150 न्यायाधीशों to the संयुक्त राज्य ज़िला न्यायालयों .
25 further nominations are currently  प्रतीक्षारत सीनेट कार्रवाई .
There are currently 16 vacancies on the United States Courts of  appeals , 67 vacancies on the संयुक्त राज्य ज़िला  courts and 22 additional federal judiciary vacancies that are anticipated to occur before the end of Obama 's second term .
Obama has not made any  recess नियुक्ति  to the federal courts .
Obama has made two nominations to the United States  अदालत of अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार , an आलेख iii  tribunal .
Obama  भी designated बैठे न्यायधीश एमिली C. हेविट  of the United States Court of Federal Claims , an Article I court , to be Chief Judge of that court .
This is a list of airports in  मैक्सिको , sorted  by location .
Mexico has about 1,834 airports , ranking 2nd in  क्रमांक of एयरपोर्ट in उत्तर अमेरिका  , and 3rd in the world .
Only major  नेशनल  and International Airports are shown .
Agency debt also known as an Agency bond  is a सुरक्षा , प्रायः a  bond , issued by a U.S. government-sponsored agency .
The offerings of  ये एजेंसियों हैं समर्थित लकिन नहीं गारंटी by the us सरकारी  since the agencies are private entities .
Some prominent issuers of these  प्रतिभूति हैं छात्र ऋण विपणन संघ ( sallie mae ) , संघीय नेशनल बंधक  Association ( Fannie Mae ) and Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation ( Freddie Mac ) .
Agency securities are usually  exempt इससे राज्य और लोकल कर , लकिन  not federal tax .
Agency  कर्ज़ is भी  called an agency security .
The Susquehanna Steam Electric  स्टेशन , a खौलते जल रिएक्टर  .
The  रिएक्टरों हैं स्तिथ  inside the rectangular containment buildings towards the front of the cooling towers .
Three nuclear-powered American warships , ( top to bottom ) nuclear cruisers  uss bainbridge और uss long बीच साथ uss एंटरप्राइज़ the पहला  nuclear-powered aircraft carrier in 1964 .
Crew members are spelling out  आइंस्टीन 's mass-energy equivalence  formula E = mc2 on the flight deck .
The Russian nuclear-powered icebreaker NS Yamal on a 1994 joint  expedition साथ  the NSF .
Nuclear power is the use of  sustained नाभिकीय परिवर्द्धन  to generate heat and electricity .
नाभिकीय शक्ति पौधे provided परिचय 5.7 %  of the world 's energy and 13 % of the world 's electricity , in 2012 .
In 2013 , the IAEA report that there are 437 operational nuclear power reactors (  हालांकि नहीं सब हैं producing विद्युत ) ,  in 31 countries .
In addition , there  हैं लगभग  140 naval vessels using nuclear propulsion in operation , powered by some 180 reactors .
There is an ongoing debate about the  उपयोग of नाभिकीय उर्जा  .
Proponents , such as  the संसार नाभिकीय संघ , the iaea और पर्यावरणविद  for Nuclear Energy contend that nuclear power is a sustainable energy source that reduces carbon emissions .
Opponents , such as Greenpeace  अंतरराष्ट्रीय और nirs , मानना कि नाभिकीय  power poses many threats to people and the environment .
Nuclear power plant accidents include the  chernobyl विपत्ति ( 1986 ) , फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति ( 2011 ) , और the  Three Mile Island accident ( 1979 ) .
There have also been some  nuclear-powered पनडुब्बी  mishaps .
Research  into सुरक्षा सुधार is continuing  and nuclear fusion , believed to be safer , may be used in the future .
As of 2012 , according to the IAEA ,  विश्वव्यापी वहीँ यहूद 68 सिविल नाभिकीय  power reactors under construction in 15 countries .
In the US the licenses of almost half its reactors have been extended to 60 years , and plans to build  another दर्जन हैं अंतर्गत गंभीर विचार  .
However , Japan 's 2011 Fukushima Daiichi nuclear  विपत्ति prompted a पुनर्विचार of  nuclear energy policy in many countries .
Germany decided to close all its  रिएक्टरों by 2022 , और इटली रै बैन नाभिकीय शक्ति  .
Following Fukushima , the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय उर्जा एजेंसी halved  its estimate of additional nuclear generating capacity to be built by 2035 .
फोटोग्राफ  of the Berlin Wall taken from the West side .
The Wall was built  in 1961 to prevent ईस्ट  Germans from fleeing from Communism .
It was an iconic symbol of the Cold  युद्ध और इसके पतन in 1989 चिह्नित  the end of the War .
The Cold War , often dated from 1947 to 1991 , was a sustained state of political and military tension between powers in  the पश्चिमी bloc , वर्चस्व by the संयुक्त राज्य साथ नाटो among इसके allies , और शक्तियां in the पूर्वी bloc , वर्चस्व by the सोवियत  Union along with the Warsaw Pact .
This began after the  कामयाबी of उनके अस्थाई wartime गठबंधन विरूद्ध नाजी जर्मनी , leaving  the USSR and the US as two superpowers with profound economic and political differences .
A neutral faction arose with the Non-Aligned Movement  संस्थापित by मिश्र , इण्डिया , और यूगोस्लाविया ; इस गुट अस्वीकृत संघ साथ either  the US-led West or the Soviet-led East .
The Cold War was so named because the two major powers—each possessing  नाभिकीय हथियार और thereby threatened साथ परस्पर assured  destruction —never met in direct military combat .
Instead , in their  संघर्ष लिये वैश्विक influence वे  engaged in ongoing psychological warfare and in regular indirect confrontations through proxy wars .
चक्र of सापेक्ष शांत होता be followed  by high tension , which could have led to world war .
The tensest times were during the Berlin Blockade ( 1948–1949 ) , the Korean War ( 1950–1953 ) , the Suez Crisis ( 1956 ) , the Berlin Crisis of 1961 , the Cuban missile crisis  ( 1962 ) , the वियतनाम युद्ध ( 1959–1975 ) , the योम kippur युद्ध ( 1973 ) , the सोवियत युद्ध in अफगानिस्तान ( 1979–1989 ) , the सोवियत downing of कोरियाई एयर लाइनों उड़ान 007 ( 1983 )  , and the `` Able Archer '' NATO military exercises ( 1983 ) .
The  विरोध थी expressed through सैन्य coalitions , रणनीतिक conventional फ़ोर्स deployments , extensive  aid to client states , espionage , massive propaganda campaigns , conventional and nuclear arms races , appeals to neutral nations , rivalry at sports events ( in particular the Olympics ) , and technological competitions such as the Space Race .
The US and USSR became involved in political and military conflicts in  the तीसरा संसार देशों of लैटिन अमेरिका , अफ़्रीकी , the मध्य ईस्ट , और southeast  Asia .
To alleviate the risk of a potential nuclear war , both  पहलू sought राहत of राजनैतिक तनाव  through détente in the 1970s .
In the 1980s , the  संयुक्त राज्य increased राजनयिक , सैन्य , और आर्थिक pressures on the सोवियत संघ , at a समय  when the communist state was already suffering from economic stagnation .
In the mid-1980s , the new Soviet President Mikhail  गोर्बाचेव introduced the liberalizing reforms of  perestroika ( `` reorganization '' , 1987 ) and glasnost ( `` openness '' , ca . 1985 ) .
Pressures  लिये नेशनल स्वतंत्रता  grew stronger in Eastern Europe , especially Poland .
They reached a breaking point when  गोर्बाचेव refused to उपयोग सोवियत सैनिकों to support the faltering  government of East Germany in late 1989 .
Within weeks all the satellite states broke free from Moscow in a peaceful wave of  revolutions ( वहीँ थी कुछ हिंसा in रोमानिया  ) .
The pressures escalated inside the Soviet  संघ , जहाँ साम्यवादी गिरी और the ussr थी  formally dissolved in late 1991 .
The United States  remained as the संसार  's only superpower .
The Cold War and its events have left a  significant विरासत , और it is प्रायः referred to in लोकप्रिय संस्कृति , विशेषकर  in media featuring themes of espionage and the threat of nuclear warfare .
Pikes Peak State Park is a state park  of आयोवा , यूएसए , featuring a bluff निहार  the Upper Mississippi River opposite the confluence of the Wisconsin River .
The park  is संचालित by the आयोवा  Department of Natural Resources .
It is  nearly a हजार एकड़  ( 4 km2 ) in extent .
The  निकटतम नगर is मैकग्रेगर  , Iowa .
Iowa Highway 76  लगभग defines  its northern boundary .
It  gets इसके नाम इससे the आयोवा अवतार of pikes शिखर  , a particularly high point overlooking the gorge of the Upper Mississippi , and like Pikes Peak in Colorado , is named for Zebulon Pike .
There are  चढ़ाई trails , campgrounds  and RV facilities .
Mountain bikes are  permitted in निश्चित portions  of the park .
Aside from recreational development , the land in the park was never cleared and to a large extent remains  as it थी पहले the आगमन of श्वेत उपनिवेश  .
It is part of a  larger जटिल of पार्क , reserves और refuges जिससे शामिल  Effigy Mounds National Monument , the various components of the Yellow River State Forest , the enormous Upper Mississippi River National Wildlife and Fish Refuge and much smaller , much less well known Driftless Area National Wildlife Refuge .
The Northeast Iowa Legacy  ट्रेल प्रणाली is undergoing  development , and will connect elements of these sites .
Zac  भूरा बैंड is an अमरीकी country/folk  band based in Atlanta , Georgia .
The lineup consists of Zac Brown (  सीसे vocals , गिटार ) , jimmy de मार्टिनी ( चलाऊ , vocals ) , जॉन driskell हॉपकिंस ( बास गिटार , vocals ) , coy bowles ( गिटार , keyboards  ) , Chris Fryar ( drums ) , Clay Cook ( guitar , keyboards , mandolin , steel guitar , vocals ) , and Daniel de los Reyes ( percussion ) .
The band has  toured throughout the संयुक्त राज्य , सहित  a slot on the 2009 and 2010 Bonnaroo Music Festival .
They have also recorded five studio albums , and charted nine Number One singles on the Billboard country charts : `` Chicken Fried `` , `` Toes `` , ``  राजमार्ग 20 सवारी `` , `` फ़्री `` , `` as वो 's चलना दूर `` , `` colder मौसम `` , `` घुटना गहन  `` , `` Keep Me In Mind `` , and `` Goodbye in Her Eyes `` in addition to the singles `` Whatever It Is `` and `` No Hurry `` , which peaked at number 2 on the same chart .
Talk radio is a radio format  containing चर्चा परिचय  topical issues .
Most shows are regularly hosted by a single individual ,  और प्रायः विशेषता साक्षात्कार साथ a क्रमांक of अलग  guests .
Talk radio  typically शामिल an तत्व of श्रोता  participation , usually by broadcasting live conversations between the host and listeners who `` call in '' ( usually via telephone ) to the show .
Listener contributions are usually screened by a show 's producer ( s )  in अनुक्रम to अधिकतम दर्शक ब्याज और , in the मामला of वाणिज्यिक  talk radio , attract advertisers .
Generally , the shows are organized into segments , each separated by a pause for advertisements ; however , in public or  non-commercial रेडियो , म्यूज़िक is sometimes निभाई in प्लेस of commercials to पृथक  the program segments .
Variations of talk  रेडियो शामिल रूढ़िवादी  talk , hot talk , liberal talk and sports talk .
While talk radio has historically been associated with AM/FM , starting around  2005 the प्रौद्योगिकी लिये internet-based talk-radio  shows became cost effective in the form of podcasts .
Now , it is possible for an individual to use a variety of  सेवाएं to मेजबान an internet-based talk-radio दिखाएँ  without carriage by a traditional radio station .
In addition TV programming from talk  और न्यूज आउटलेट  such as BBC , CNN , Bloomberg and Fox are now often available expanding the world of talk radio further .
Talk radio listening is now enjoyed not only on radios , but a wide  किस्में of अन्य डिवाइस और सेवाएं सहित pcs using  iTunes , station directories such as Tunein , show directory smartphones with apps such as Stitcher .
Hippa is a  genus of decapod crustaceans in the  family Hippidae , containing the following species:
hippa adactyla  Fabricius , 1787
hippa admirabilis  ( Thallwitz , 1892 )
hippa alcimede  ( De Man , 1902 )
Hippa  australis  Hale , 1927
hippa carcineutes  Holthuis & Manning , 1970
Hippa  celaeno ( de  Man , 1896 )
hippa granulatus  ( Borradaile , 1904 )
Hippa  hirtipes ( दाना  , 1852 )
Hippa indica Haig ,  मुरुगन & बालकृष्णन नायर  , 1986
Hippa  marmorata ( hombron & jacquinot  , 1846 )

It is closely related to the genus Emerita , and species  have प्रायः महरूम transferred between the  two genera .
Jakarta ( ) , officially known as the Special Capital  प्रदेश of जकार्ता ( ) , is the पूंजी और largest  city of Indonesia .
Located on the northwest coast of Java , Jakarta is the country 's economic , cultural and political centre , and with a population of 10,187,595 as of November 2011  , it is the सबसे populous नगर in इंडोनेशिया और in southeast एशिया , और is the  thirteenth most populated city in the world .
The official metropolitan area , known as Jabodetabek ( a name formed by combining the  आरंभिक syllables of जकार्ता , bogor ,  Depok , Tangerang and Bekasi ) , is the second largest in the world , yet the metropolis 's suburbs still continue beyond it .
Jakarta is listed as a global city in the 2008 Globalization and World Cities Study Group  और संजाल ( gawc )  research .
and has  an  area of .
This area has population of  खूब over 28 लाख , बनाना it एक of the संसार 's largest conurbations  in terms of number of inhabitants .
In 2011 , Jakarta ranked 17th  among the संसार 's 200 largest शहरों  , a jump from its 2007 ranking of 171 .
Jakarta has grown more rapidly than  kuala lumpur , बीजिंग और बैंकॉक  .
Established in  the चौथी सदी , the नगर  became an important trading port for the Kingdom of Sunda .
It was the de facto capital of the Dutch East Indies ( when it was known as Batavia ) and has continued as the capital  of इंडोनेशिया चूंकि the देश 's स्वतंत्रता थी घोषित  in 1945 .
The  नगर is the सीट  of the ASEAN Secretariat .
Jakarta  is परोसा by the soekarno–hatta अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र , हलीम perdanakusuma  International Airport , and Tanjung Priok Harbour ; it is connected by several intercity and commuter railways , and served by several bus lines running on reserved busways .
A typical home air  कंडीशनिंग खिड़की ईकाई  .
Air conditioning is the process of altering the properties of air (  primarily तापमान और आर्द्रता ) to अधिक favourable  conditions .
More generally , air conditioning can refer to any form of  technological कूलिंग , हीटिंग , वेंटिलेशन , or कीटाणुशोधन कि  modifies the condition of air .
An air conditioner ( often referred to as air con , AC or A/C , and not to be confused with the abbreviation for alternating current ) is a  प्रमुख or घर appliance , प्रणाली , or यांत्रिकी designed to बदलें the एयर तापमान और आर्द्रता भीतर an क्षेत्रफल  ( used for cooling and sometimes heating depending on the air properties at a given time ) .
The cooling is typically done using a simple refrigeration cycle , but sometimes  वाष्पीकरण is प्रयुक्त , commonly लिये सुकून कूलिंग  in buildings and motor vehicles .
In construction ,  a पूरा प्रणाली of हीटिंग  , ventilation and air conditioning is referred to as `` HVAC `` .
`` 6 Foot 7 Foot '' ( also  styled as `` 6'7 '' ) is a सोंग by अमरीकी  rapper Lil Wayne featuring label mate , Cory Gunz .
It is  लिया इससे उसके नवीं  studio album , Tha Carter IV ( 2011 ) .
It was officially released on  itunes on दिसम्बर 16 , 2010  .
It  थी उत्पादित by  `` A Milli `` producer Bangladesh .
The song samples `` Day-O ( The Banana  नाव सोंग ) `` by हैरी  Belafonte .
DC Talk ( styled as dc Talk ) , is a  ग्रैमी -winning ईसाई रैप  trio .
The group was formed in Lynchburg , Virginia in 1987 by Toby  mckeehan , माइकल tait , और केविन अधिकतम स्मिथ .
They have released five major studio albums  साथ : dc बात ( 1989 ) , nu थांग ( 1990 ) ,  Free at Last ( 1992 ) , Jesus Freak ( 1995 ) , and Supernatural ( 1998 ) .
In 2002 , the Encyclopedia of Contemporary  ईसाई म्यूज़िक पुकारा dc बात `` the सबसे लोकप्रिय  overtly Christian act of all time . ''
In 2000 ,  the समूह released an ep titled सोलो जिससे contained  two solo songs from each member .
Since that time , DC  बात रै महरूम on an indefinite अंतराल ,  and the three band members have each led solo careers .
They have performed  और अंकित व्यक्तिगत गीतों साथ अनेक टाइम्स दौरान the 2000s  , although the group never officially reunited or disbanded .
the समूह 's musical  style evolved significantly throughout their career .
Their first two releases , DC Talk  और nu थांग , यहूद of the हिप  hop genre .
DC Talk 's third album , Free at Last , also mainly  took influence इससे the हिप हॉप स्टाइल , हालांकि  their music began taking on a rock sound .
The trio 's last two albums ,  यीशु freak और अलौकिक , यहूद  predominantly pop rock .
The Bible is  a संकलन of अनेक shorter  books written at different times and later assembled into the biblical canon .
All but the shortest of these books have been divided into chapters , generally a page or so in length , since the  जल्दी 13th  century .
Since the mid-16th century , each chapter has  महरूम further विभाजित into `` आयतें ''  of a few short lines or sentences .
Sometimes a sentence spans more than one  श्लोक , as in the मामला of , और sometimes  there is more than one sentence in a single verse , as in the case of .
As the chapter and verse  विभाजन यहूद नहीं भाग of the असली ग्रन्थ , वे रूप  part of the paratext of the Bible .
The Jewish divisions of the Hebrew text  differ at विभिन्न अंक इससे those प्रयुक्त by ईसाइयों  .
For instance , in Jewish tradition , the ascriptions to many Psalms are regarded as independent verses , making  116 अधिक आयतें , whereas the स्थापित ईसाई  practice is to count and number each Psalm ascription together with the first verse following it .
Some chapter divisions also  occur in अलग स्थान , e.g . in  Hebrew Bibles is numbered as in Christian translations .
An index ( plural : indexes ) is a list  of शब्द or वाक्यांश ( 'headings ' ) और संबद्ध संकेतक ( 'लोकेटरs ' ) to जहाँ उपयोगी सामग्री relating  to that heading can be found in a document .
In a traditional  back-of-the-book अनुक्रमणिका the headings होगा शामिल names  of people , places and events , and concepts selected by a person as being relevant and of interest to a possible reader of the book .
The pointers are typically page numbers  , अनुच्छेद संख्याएँ  or section numbers .
In a  पुस्तकालयों कैटलॉग the शब्द  are authors , titles , subject headings , etc. , and the pointers are call numbers .
Internet search engines ,  ऐसे as google , और पूरा टेक्स्ट searching सहायता provide अभिगम to सूचना लकिन हैं नहीं as चयनात्मक  as an index , as they provide non-relevant links , and may miss relevant information if it is not phrased in exactly the way they expect .
In United States financial regulation , a suspicious activity report ( or SAR ) is a report made by a financial institution  to the वित्तीय अपराधों प्रवर्तन संजाल ( fincen ) , an एजेंसी of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of the राजकोष  , regarding suspicious or potentially suspicious activity .
