Facebook is an online social networking service , whose  नाम तना इससे the colloquial  name for the book given to students at the start of the academic year by some university administrations in the United States to help students get to know each other .
It was founded in February 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg with his college roommates and fellow Harvard University students  एडुआर्डो saverin , एंड्रयू mccollum , डस्टिन moskovitz  and Chris Hughes .
the जालस्थल 's सदस्यता थी initially सीमित by the संस्थापकों to  Harvard students , but was expanded to other colleges in the Boston area , the Ivy League , and Stanford University .
It gradually added support for  विद्यार्थी at विभिन्न अन्य विश्वविद्यालयों पहले खोलने  to high school students , and eventually to anyone aged 13 and over .
Facebook now allows any users who declare themselves to  be at तनिक 13 सालो बूढ़ा to  become registered users of the site .
Users must  पंजीकरण पहले using the साईट , बाद जिससे वे may बनाएँ a निजी  profile , add other users as friends , and exchange messages , including automatic notifications when they update their profile .
Additionally , users may join common-interest user groups , organized by workplace , school or college , or  अन्य विशेषताएँ , और categorize उनके मित्रों into सूचियाँ ऐसे as `` लोगों इससे  Work '' or `` Close Friends '' .
As  of सितंबर 2012  , Facebook has over one billion active users .
According to a May 2011 Consumer Reports survey , there are 7.5 million  children अंतर्गत 13 साथ खाते और 5 लाख अंतर्गत 10  , violating the site 's terms of service .
In May 2005  , accel साझेदार  invested $ 12.7 million in Facebook , and Jim Breyer added $ 1 million of his own money to the pot .
A  जनवरी 2009 compete.com पढ़ाई क्रमित  Facebook as the most used social networking service by worldwide monthly active users .
Entertainment Weekly included the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list  , saying , `` कैसा on धरती  did we stalk our exes , remember our co-workers ' birthdays , bug our friends , and play a rousing game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
Critics , such as Facebook Detox , state that Facebook has turned into a national  obsession in the संयुक्त राज्य , resulting in  vast amounts of time lost and encouraging narcissism .
Quantcast estimates Facebook has 138.9  लाख मासिक अद्वितीय  U.S. visitors in May 2011 .
According to Social Media Today , in April 2010 an estimated 41.6 % ( 129.5 million )  of the u.S. जनसांख्यिकी था a फेसबुक  account .
Nevertheless , Facebook 's market growth  प्रारंभ to स्टाल in कुछ regions , साथ the साईट खोने 7 लाख क्रियाशील  users in the United States and Canada in May 2011 .
Facebook eventually filed for an initial public offering on February 1 , 2012 ,  और थी headquartered  in Menlo Park , California .
Facebook Inc. began  selling भण्डार to  the public and trading on the NASDAQ on May 18 , 2012 .
सल्फोनेमाइड  functional group
hydrochlorothiazide  is a sulfonamide and a thiazide .
furosemide is a सल्फोनेमाइड  , but not a thiazide .
Sulfonamide or sulphonamide is the basis of  अनेक समूह  of drugs .
The original antibacterial sulfonamides ( sometimes called sulfa drugs or sulpha drugs ) are synthetic  रोगाणुरोधी एजेंटों कि contain the सल्फोनेमाइड  group .
Some  sulfonamides हैं भी विहीन of जीवाणुरोधी  activity , e.g. , the anticonvulsant sultiame .
The sulfonylureas and thiazide diuretics are  नए ड्रग समूह आधारित on the जीवाणुरोधी  sulfonamides .
Sulfa allergies are common , hence  medications containing sulfonamides हैं विहित  carefully .
It is important to make a distinction between sulfa drugs and other sulfur-containing drugs and additives , such as sulfates  और sulfites , जिससे हैं chemically unrelated to the सल्फोनेमाइड समूह , और do नहीं कारण the वही hypersensitivity प्रतिक्रियाएँ देखी in the sulfonamides  .
This  is a सूची of वर्ण  from George Lopez .
Domestic geese ( Anser anser domesticus or Anser cygnoides ) are  domesticated धूसर geese ( either ग्रेलैग geese or swan geese ) रखा as मुर्गीपालन लिये उनके मांस  , eggs , and down feathers since ancient times .
30 Seconds to Mars is an  अमरीकी चट्टान बैंड इससे लॉस एंजिल्स  , formed in 1998 .
Since 2007 , the band has consisted of actor Jared Leto ( lead vocals , rhythm  गिटार , songwriter ) , शैनन leto ( ड्रम , percussion ) और tomo miličević ( सीसे  guitar , keyboards ) .
Following the departure of  मैट wachter ( अभी of फ़रिश्ते & airwaves ) in 2007 , टिम kelleher became the bassist लिये the  group , performing live only with both Jared and Miličević recording bass for studio recordings , while Braxton Olita ( keyboards ) was added to the touring lineup in 2009 .
Previously , the group  भी प्रदर्शित guitarists solon bixler ( अभी  of Great Northern ) and Kevin Drake ( now of Polaroid Kiss ) .
To date , 30 Seconds to Mars have released three studio albums – 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2002 ) , A Beautiful Lie ( 2005 ) ,  इस is युद्ध ( 2009 ) और तीन विस्तारित  plays – AOL Sessions Undercover ( 2007 ) , To the Edge of the Earth ( 2008 ) , and MTV Unplugged : 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2011 ) .
30 Seconds to Mars ' music has been associated  ज़्यादातर साथ neo-prog , प्रगतिशील मेटल और post-grunge ,  but they have also included emo , screamo , space rock and synthrock into their music .
They have been compared to Pink Floyd ( who were an influence on  उनके कार्य ) और औजार  because of their use of philosophical and spiritual lyrics , concept albums and their use of experimental music .
A Christmas Story is a 1983 American Christmas comedy film  आधारित on the छोटी कहानियां और semi-fictional उपाख्यानों of लेखक और raconteur जां गड़रिये , आधारित on उसके किताब in परमेश्वर we  Trust , All Others Pay Cash , with some elements derived from Wanda Hickey 's Night of Golden Memories .
It was directed  by bob क्लार्क  .
The film has since become a holiday classic and is shown numerous times on television during the Christmas  ऋतु on the संजाल tbs , प्रायः  in a 24-hour marathon .
In 2012 , the film was  चयनित लिये संरक्षण in the नेशनल फिल्मी रजिस्ट्री by the पुस्तकालयों of कॉंग्रेस लिये होने  `` culturally , historically , or aesthetically significant '' .
A Joe 's Crab Shack  शाखा in  San Diego , CA .
The building was  initially a rowing क्लबों  and was later converted into the restaurant .
Joe 's Crab  shack is an अमरीकी कड़ी  of beach-themed seafood casual dining restaurants owned by Ignite Restaurant Group .
Founded  in ह्यूस्टन , टेक्सास , the रेस्तरां अभी operates  locations all across the United States of America .

It is  आधारित in ह्यूस्टन  , Texas .

The New York Passenger Ship Terminal ( also known as the Luxury Liner Row or Manhattan Cruise Terminal or  नई यॉर्क क्रूज टर्मिनल ) is a टर्मिनल लिये ocean-going  passenger ships on Manhattan 's west side .
The terminal consists of North River Piers 88 , 90 , 92 and 94 on the Hudson River between West 46th  और वेस्ट 54th गली  .
(  as a सामान्य नियम , बांध संख्याएँ  in Manhattan can be determined by adding 40 to the corresponding cross-street . )
Ships  अभी डॉक at पियर  88 , 90 and 92 .
बांध 94 on the उत्तर पक्ष is  now used for exhibition space .
Pier 86 , once used by  संयुक्त राज्य लाइनों , is अभी घर  to the USS Intrepid .
In 2003 ,  the टर्मिनल संभाला  900,000 passengers .
The city is forecasting that 1.5  लाख होगा उपयोग the टर्मिनल by 2017  .
The piers are  long और अलावा  .
They were first completed in 1935 to replace the Chelsea  पियर as the नगर 's लक्ज़री  liner terminal .
The new terminal was built to handle bigger ships that had  outgrown the चेल्सी  Piers .
The piers were  संवर in 1970 और हैं फिलहाल undergoing  another $ 150 million renovation .
The renovated  योजनाएँ कॉल लिये it to हैंडल तीन  large ships at a time .
In doing renovations , the  नगर is भी considering  decommissioning Pier 92 .
Logo  of the नई यॉर्क  Cruise Terminal.For
decades the terminal was the only ocean-going  यात्री टर्मिनल in नई यॉर्क  harbor .
With an upsurge in cruise ship traffic and the terminal 's ability to handle comfortably only three large ships at a time , two new terminals have opened in the harbor — the Cape Liberty Cruise Port opened in 2004 in Bayonne , New Jersey ( used by Royal Caribbean Cruise Line , Celebrity Cruises and Azamara  क्रूज़ ) , और the ब्रुकलीन क्रूज टर्मिनल ( प्रयुक्त by the महारानी मरियम 2 और अन्य जहाजों of the कार्निवल निगम  cruise brands ) opened in 2006 in Brooklyn , New York .
The West Side Highway takes a small jog east from the piers to  नीचे वेस्ट 42nd गली क्युकी जब the टर्मिनल थी निर्मित जमीन था to  be taken away from Manhattan to allow for longer piers .
The US Army Corps of Engineers ,  जो कंट्रोल the waterfront आयाम , होता नहीं extend the pierhead लकीर दूर into  the river , so the city extended the pier by cutting away at the land .
The city earlier did this for the Chelsea Piers ; however in  चेल्सी तभी लैंडफिल  was taken away .
At the Passenger Terminal actual  मैनहटन schist थी लिया  away .
इससे डाउनस्ट्रीम  in the river
Many major passenger ships have docked there ,  सहित the rms महारानी मरियम 2 और स्वतंत्रता of the समंदर , पहले the  Brooklyn and Bayonne terminals opened .

The Normandie , renamed USS Lafayette , lies  capsized in the frozen मिट्टी at बांध 88 in the शीत  of 1942
Norwegian  क्रूज लकीर 's जल्द to be नवीनतम जलयान the नॉर्वेजियाई  Breakaway will sail year-round out of the New York Passenger Ship Terminal .

Christian right is a term used in the United States to describe right-wing Christian political groups that  हैं characterized by उनके दमदार support of socially रूढ़िवादी  policies .
Christian conservatives principally seek to apply their understanding of the teachings of Christianity to politics and public policy by  proclaiming the मान of those शिक्षाओं and/or by seeking to उपयोग those शिक्षाओं to influence  law and public policy .
In the U.S. , the Christian right is an informal coalition  formed around a कोर of धर्मान्तरण protestants कि draws `` support इससे नीतियां  conservative Catholics , Jews , Mormons , and occasionally secularists '' who share their goals .
The movement has its roots  in अमरीकी राजनीती going वापस as दूर  the 1940s and has been especially influential since the 1970s .
Their  influence draws , in भाग , इससे grassroots सक्रियता as खूब as उनके फ़ोकस on सोशल मुद्दे और  ability to motivate the electorate around those issues .
The Christian right is notable today for advancing socially conservative positions  on मुद्दे सहित स्कूल दुआ , स्टेम कोशिका शोध ,  homosexuality , contraception , abortion , and pornography .
Although the Christian right is usually associated with the U.S. , the movement has been a key factor in the politics of  कनाडा , the नीदरलैंड्स , उत्तरी आयरलैंड और ऑस्ट्रेलिया , among  others .
Far  ईस्ट गति ( stylized as far★east गति  or abbreviated FM ) is an American hip hop band quartet based in Los Angeles .
The group formed in 2003 and consists of Kev Nish ( Kevin Nishimura ) , Prohgress ( James Roh ) ,  j-splif ( jae choung ) , और dj virman  ( Virman Coquia ) .
Far East Movement 's first claim to fame was their song `` Round Round ''  प्रदर्शित in the हॉलीवुड फिल्म , the तेज़ और the क्रोधित : टोकियो बहाव  , and its subsequent soundtrack , video game and DVD .
Since `` Round Round '' , the group has been featured on various network shows including , ,  अनुगामी , गपशप लड़की , और finishing the खेल ( a प्रदर्शित  film at Sundance 2007 ) .
Their single  `` जैसे a g6 `` hit क्रमांक एक on  the Billboard Hot 100 Chart and on iTunes as well in late October 2010 .
Far East Movement also has the distinction of being the first Asian-American group to  earn a # 1 hit on the बिलबोर्ड  Hot 100 in the United States .
LR44 is the IEC designation for an  क्षारीय 1.5 वोल्ट बटन कोशिका , commonly प्रयुक्त in छोटी led  flashlights , digital thermometers , calculators , calipers , watches , clocks , toys and laser pointers .
LR44  क्षारीय  cell
The battery nomenclature is defined by the International Electrotechnical Commission (  आईईसी ) in इसके 60086-3 मानक ( प्राथमिक बैटरी , भाग 3 देखें  batteries ) .
The letter L indicates the electrochemical  प्रणाली प्रयुक्त ; a जस्ता ऋणात्मक एलेक्ट्रोड , मैंगनीज डाइऑक्साइड  depolarizer and positive electrode , and an alkaline electrolyte .
R44 indicates a round cell 11.4±0.2 mm diameter and  5.2±0.2 mm ऊँचाई as पारिभाषित by the आईईसी मानक 60086  .
Manufacturers have  उनके अपना भाग संख्याएँ  for IEC type LR44 batteries including:
lr44 , lr44g  , LR44GD , LR44H
LR1154 , L1154 , L1154C , L1154F ,  l1154g , l1154h
6135-99-792-8475 ( nsn )
1166a
AG13 , A613 , AG14 ,  ag-14 , g13a , g13-a
157 ,  303 , 357
A76 , GDA76 , GP76A  , gpa7 , gpa75 , gpa76 ,  GPS76A,

Other types of batteries are or were  बना in the r44  size .
Formerly , mercury batteries were made  as बटन कोशिकाएं ( प्रकार mr44 और  NR44 ) .
Zinc-air  बैटरी प्रकार pr44 आवश्यकता  air to work .
Silver-oxide batteries  प्रकार sr44 may provide अतिरिक्त क्षमता  compared to LR44 types but have slightly different voltage characteristics .
Performance of a device  meant to उपयोग a silver-oxide बैटरी may be degraded साथ प्रतिस्थापन  of LR44 types .

Hurricane Katrina was the deadliest and most destructive  अटलांटिक hurricane of the 2005 अटलांटिक  hurricane season .
It was the costliest natural disaster , as well as one of the five  deadliest hurricanes , in the इतिहास of the  United States .
Among recorded Atlantic hurricanes , it was the  छठे strongest overall  .
At least 1,833 people died in the hurricane  और subsequent floods , बनाना it the deadliest u.S. hurricane चूंकि the 1928 okeechobee hurricane  ; total property damage was estimated at $ 81 billion ( 2005 USD ) , nearly triple the damage brought by Hurricane Andrew in 1992 .
Hurricane Katrina formed over the Bahamas on August 23 , 2005 and crossed southern Florida as a  मॉडरेट श्रेणी 1 hurricane , causing कुछ मौतों और बाढ़ वहीँ पहले strengthening  rapidly in the Gulf of Mexico .
The hurricane strengthened to a Category 5 hurricane over the warm Gulf water , but weakened before making its second landfall  as a श्रेणी 3 hurricane on the morning of सोमवार , अगस्त 29 in southeast louisiana  .
It  caused कठोर विनाश साथ the  Gulf coast from central Florida to Texas , much of it due to the storm surge .
The most significant  क्रमांक of मौतों occurred in नई ऑरलियन्स , louisiana , जिससे flooded as  the levee system catastrophically failed , in many cases hours after the storm had moved inland .
Eventually 80 % of the city and large tracts of neighboring  parishes became flooded , और the floodwaters lingered  for weeks .
However , the worst property damage occurred in coastal areas , such as all Mississippi beachfront towns , which were flooded over 90  % in घंटों , as नौकाएँ और कसीनो barges rammed इमारतें  , pushing cars and houses inland , with waters reaching 6–12 miles ( 10–19 km ) from the beach .
The hurricane surge protection failures in New Orleans are considered the worst civil  अभियान्त्रिकी विपत्ति in u.S. इतिहास और prompted a मुकदमा  against the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers ( USACE ) , the designers and builders of the levee system as mandated by the Flood Control Act of 1965 .
Responsibility for the failures and flooding was laid squarely  on the फौज corps in जनवरी 2008 by न्यायधीश stanwood  Duval , U.S. District Court , but the federal agency could not be held financially liable due to sovereign immunity in the Flood Control Act of 1928 .
There was also  an छानबीन of the प्रतिक्रियाएँ इससे संघीय , राज्य और लोकल सरकारें , resulting in the इस्तीफा of संघीय  Emergency Management Agency ( FEMA ) director Michael D. Brown , and of New Orleans Police Department ( NOPD ) Superintendent Eddie Compass .
अनेक एजेंसियों सहित the संयुक्त राज्य coast गार्ड ( uscg ) ,  National Hurricane Center ( NHC ) , and National Weather Service ( NWS ) were commended for their actions .
They  provided सटीक hurricane मौसम  tracking forecasts with sufficient lead time .
Even the most insistent appeals from national , state and local  पब्लिक officials to निवासियों to evacuate पहले the तूफ़ान किया नहीं warn कि the  levees could breach and fail .
U.S. debt from  1940 to 2011  .
Red lines indicate the `` debt held by the public '' and black lines  indicate the कुल नेशनल कर्ज़ or सकल  public debt .
The difference is the `` intragovernmental debt , '' which includes  दायित्वों to सरकारी कार्यक्रम ऐसे as सोशल सुरक्षा  .
Stated as a  सूत्र , नेशनल कर्ज़ = कर्ज़  held by the Public + Intragovernmental Debt .
The second panel shows the two debt figures as a percentage of U.S. GDP ( dollar value  of u.S. आर्थिक उत्पादन लिये कि साल  ) .
The top panel is  deflated so प्रत्येक साल is  in 2010 dollars .
The United States public debt is the money borrowed by the federal government of the United States through  the issuing of प्रतिभूति by the राजकोष और अन्य  federal government agencies .
US public  कर्ज़ consists  of two components:
कर्ज़ आयोजित by the पब्लिक  includes Treasury securities held by investors outside the federal government , including that held by individuals , corporations , the Federal Reserve System and foreign , state and local governments .
Debt held by government accounts or intragovernmental debt includes non-marketable Treasury securities held  in खाते administered by the संघीय सरकारी कि हैं owed to कार्यक्रम  beneficiaries , such as the Social Security Trust Fund .
Debt held by government accounts represents the cumulative surpluses ,  सहित ब्याज आय , of ये खाते कि have महरूम invested  in Treasury securities .
Public debt increases or decreases as a result of the  सालाना एकीकृत बजट deficit  or surplus .
The  संघीय सरकारी बजट deficit or surplus is the अंतर  between government receipts and spending , ignoring intra-governmental transfers .
However , some spending that is excluded from the deficit  ( supplemental appropriations ) भी adds to the  debt .
Historically , the US  पब्लिक कर्ज़ as a share of जीडीपी increased  during wars and recessions , and subsequently declined .
For example , debt held by the public as a share of GDP peaked  बस बाद संसार युद्ध ii ( 113 % of जीडीपी in 1945 ) , लकिन  then fell over the following 30 years .
In recent decades , however , large budget deficits and the resulting  increases in कर्ज़ have led to चिंता परिचय the long-term स्थिरता of the संघीय सरकारी  's fiscal policies .
On 2 April  2013 , कर्ज़ आयोजित by the पब्लिक  was approximately $ 11.959 trillion or about 75 % of GDP .
Intragovernmental holdings stood at $ 4.846 trillion ,  giving a संयुक्त  total public debt of $ 16.805 trillion .
As of January 2013 , $ 5.6 trillion or approximately 47 % of the  कर्ज़ आयोजित by the पब्लिक थी स्वामित्व by विदेशी निवेशकों ,  the largest of which were the People 's Republic of China and Japan at just over $ 1.1 trillion each .
In basketball , an assist is attributed to a player who passes the  बॉल to a teammate in a रास्ता कि लीड to a स्कोर by फ़ील्ड लक्ष्य , अर्थ कि  he or she was `` assisting '' in the basket .
There is some  निर्णय शामिल in deciding  whether a passer should be credited with an assist .
An assist can be scored for the passer even if the player who  receives the pass makes a बास्केट बाद ड्रिब्लिंग the  ball .
However , the original definition of an assist did not include such situations , so the  तुलना of assist आंकडे आरपार eras is a  complex matter .
Only the pass directly before the score may be counted as an assist , so no more  than एक assist can be अंकित प्रति फ़ील्ड लक्ष्य ( नापसंद in अन्य खेल , ऐसे as  ice hockey ) .
A pass that leads to a shooting foul and scoring by free throws does  नहीं गिनती as an assist in the  NBA , but does in FIBA play ( only one assist is awarded per set of free throws in which at least one free throw is made ) .
Point guards tend to get the most assists  प्रति खेल ( apg ) , as उनके भूमिका is primarily  that of a passer and ballhandler .
Centers tend to get fewer assists , but centers with  शुभ मंजिल उपस्थिति और अदालत दृष्टि can  dominate a team by assisting .
Being inside the key , the center often has the best angles and the best  स्थिति लिये `` बर्तन '' और अन्य छोटी गुजरता in the  scoring area .
Center  wilt चेम्बरलेन led the  NBA in assists in 1968 .
A strong  बीच साथ inside-scoring prowess , ऐसे as पूर्व एनबीए बीच hakeem olajuwon , can भी be  an effective assistor because the defense 's double-teaming tends to open up offense in the form of shooters .
The NBA single-game assist record is 30 , held by Scott Skiles of the Orlando Magic against the Denver Nuggets , on  दिसम्बर 30 , 1990  .
The NBA record for most career assists is held  by जॉन स्टॉकटन साथ  15,806 .
The mill or mille ( ) ( sometimes mil in the UK  , जब discussing प्रॉपर्टी कर in the संयुक्त राज्य , or previously  in Cyprus and Malta ) is a now-abstract unit of currency used sometimes in accounting .
In the United States , it is a  notional ईकाई समतुल्य to of a संयुक्त  States dollar ( a tenth of a cent ) .
In the United  किंगडम it थी प्रस्तावित दौरान the दशकों  of discussion on the decimalization of the pound as a division of the pound sterling .
Several other  मुद्राएँ प्रयुक्त the मिल ,  such as the Maltese lira .
The term  आता इससे the लैटिन `` millesimum ''  , meaning `` thousandth part '' .
The  greco-persian युद्धों ( भी प्रायः पुकारा the पारसी युद्धों ) यहूद a श्रेणी of विरोध  between the Achaemenid Empire of Persia and city-states of the Hellenic world that started in 499 BC and lasted until 449 BC .
The collision between the fractious  राजनैतिक संसार of the यूनानियों और the विशाल  empire of the Persians began when Cyrus the Great conquered Ionia in 547 BC .
Struggling to rule the independent-minded cities of Ionia , the Persians appointed  उत्पीड़क to नियम प्रत्येक of उन्हें  .
This would prove to be  the सोर्स of much ट्रबल लिये  the Greeks and Persians alike .
In 499 BC , the then tyrant of Miletus , Aristagoras , embarked on an expedition to  जीतें the द्वीप of naxos , साथ पारसी support ; however , the expedition थी a क़हर  and , pre-empting his dismissal , Aristagoras incited all of Hellenic Asia Minor into rebellion against the Persians .
This was the beginning of the Ionian Revolt  , जिससे होता पिछला जबतक 493 bc , progressively आरेखण अधिक regions of एशिया नाबालिग  into the conflict .
Aristagoras secured military support from Athens and  eretria , और in 498 bc ये शक्तियां helped to  capture and burn the Persian regional capital of Sardis .
The Persian king Darius the  ग्रेट vowed to have बदला  on Athens and Eretria for this act .
The revolt continued  , साथ the दो पहलू  effectively stalemated throughout 497–495 BC .
In 494 BC ,  the फारसियों regrouped , और attacked the  epicentre of the revolt in Miletus .
At the Battle of Lade , the Ionians  suffered a निर्णायक शिकस्त , और the विद्रोह collapsed , साथ  the final members being stamped out the following year .
Seeking to secure his empire from further revolts and from the interference of the  मेनलैंड यूनानियों , दारा embarked on a योजना to जीतें यूनानियों और to सजा  Athens and Eretria for burning Sardis .
The first Persian invasion of Greece began in 492 BC , with  the पारसी सामान्य mardonius conquering thrace और macedon पहले अनेक  mishaps forced an early end to the campaign .
In 490  bc a दूसरी फ़ोर्स थी भेजा to यूनानियों , इस समय आरपार  the Aegean Sea , under the command of Datis and Artaphernes .
This expedition  subjugated the cyclades , पहले  besieging , capturing and razing Eretria .
However , while en route to attack Athens , the Persian force was decisively defeated by the Athenians at the Battle of  मैराथन , समाप्ति पारसी प्रयत्न लिये the  time being .
Darius then began to plan to complete the conquest of Greece , but died in 486 BC and responsibility for  the conquest passed to  his son Xerxes I .
In 480 BC , Xerxes personally led the second Persian invasion of Greece with one  of the largest प्राचीन सेना कभी  assembled .
Victory over the 'Allied ' Greek states ( led by Sparta and Athens ) at the Battle of Thermopylae allowed the  फारसियों to मशाल एथेंस और overrun  most of Greece .
However , while seeking to  नष्ट the संयुक्त यूनानी बेड़े  , the Persians suffered a severe defeat at the Battle of Salamis .
The following year , the confederated Greeks went on the offensive , defeating the Persian army at the Battle of Plataea , and  समाप्ति the आक्रमण of यूनानियों  .
The allied  यूनानियों followed up उनके कामयाबी  by destroying the rest of the Persian fleet at the Battle of Mycale , before expelling Persian garrisons from Sestos ( 479 BC ) and Byzantium ( 478 BC ) .
The  क्रियाएँ of the सामान्य pausanias at the घेरा of byzantium alienated अनेक of the यूनानी राज्य  from the Spartans , and the anti-Persian alliance was therefore reconstituted around Athenian leadership , as the so-called Delian League .
The Delian League continued to campaign against Persia for the next three decades , beginning with the  expulsion of the बाकी पारसी garrisons इससे यूरोपीय  .
At the Battle of the Eurymedon  in 466 bc , the लीग जीती a दोगुना विजय कि आखिरकार secured  freedom for the cities of Ionia .
However , the League  's भागीदारी in an मिश्र विद्रोह ( इससे 460–454 bc ) resulted  in a disastrous defeat , and further campaigning was suspended .
A fleet was sent to Cyprus in  451 bc , लकिन हासिल छोटी , और जब it  withdrew the Greco-Persian Wars drew to a quiet end .
Some historical sources suggest the end of hostilities was marked by a peace treaty  between एथेंस और फारस , the so-called सलाम of callias  .
hooverville निकट पोर्टलैंड  , Oregon
A ``  hooverville  '' is the popular name for shanty towns built by homeless people during the Great Depression .
They were named after Herbert  हूवर , जो थी अध्यक्ष  of the United States during the onset of the Depression and widely blamed for it .
The term was  coined by चार्ल्स माइकेल्सन , publicity  chief of the Democratic National Committee .
Matthew Michael Hasselbeck ( born September 25 , 1975 ) is an  अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक लिये the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस  of the National Football League ( NFL ) .
He was drafted in  the छठे गोलाकार of the  1998 NFL Draft by the Green Bay Packers .
After a season on the practice squad and two seasons backing up Brett Favre ,  he थी traded to the सिएटल  Seahawks in 2001 .
Hasselbeck gained the starting role in 2003 , and led  सिएटल to छह playoff दिखावे और a सुपर कटोरी रूप ; he थी चयनित  to three Pro Bowls and an All-Pro selection .
Following ten seasons with the  सीहॉक्स , hasselbeck  joined the Tennessee Titans in 2011 .
Hasselbeck then  हस्ताक्षरित a अनुबंध साथ the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस in 2013 कम  than 24 hours after being released by the Tennessee Titans .
ICT is  inevitably सम्बन्धित to the  computer network .
Information and Communications Technology or ( ICT ) , is often used as an extended synonym for information technology ( IT ) , but is a more specific term that stresses the role of unified communications and the integration of telecommunications (  टेलीफोन लाइनों और बेतार सिग्नल ) , कंप्यूटर as खूब as जरुरी एंटरप्राइज़ तन्त्र , middleware , भंडार  , and audio-visual systems , which enable users to access , store , transmit , and manipulate information .
The phrase  आईसीटी था महरूम प्रयुक्त by अकादमिक शोधकर्ताओं चूंकि the 1980s , लकिन it became लोकप्रिय बाद it थी प्रयुक्त in a रपट to the  UK government by Dennis Stevenson in 1997 and in the revised National Curriculum for England , Wales and Northern Ireland in 2000 .
The term ICT is now also used to refer to the convergence of audio-visual and  टेलीफोन संजाल  with computer networks through a single cabling or link system .
वहीँ हैं विशाल आर्थिक प्रोत्साहन ( विशाल लागत बचत due to विलोपन  of the telephone network ) to merge the audio-visual , building management and telephone network with the computer network system using a single unified system of cabling , signal distribution and management .
The term  infocommunications is प्रयुक्त in कुछ मामले as a  shorter form of information and communication ( s ) technology .
In fact Infocommunications is the expansion of telecommunications with information processing and content  हैंडलिंग कृत्यों on a आम डिजिटल प्रौद्योगिकी  base .
For a comparison  of ये और अन्य शर्तें  , see .
For ICT  विकास अनुक्रमणिका  around the world , see .
This is a list of  वर्ण इससे जार्ज लोपेज़  .
A schematic presentation of the plum pudding model of the atom ; in Thomson 's mathematical model the ``  corpuscles '' ( or आधुनिक electrons ) यहूद  arranged non-randomly , in rotating rings
The current model of the sub-atomic  ढांचा involves a घना केंद्रक घिरी  by a probabilistic `` cloud '' of electrons
The plum pudding model  of the अणु by J. J. thomson , जो खोजा the इलेक्ट्रॉन in 1897 , थी  proposed in 1904 before the discovery of the atomic nucleus in order to add the electron to the atomic model .
In this model , the atom is composed of electrons ( which Thomson still called `` corpuscles '' , though G. J. Stoney had proposed that atoms of electricity be called electrons in  1894 ) घिरी by a सूप of धनात्मक चार्ज to संतुलन the electrons ' ऋणात्मक आरोप , जैसे negatively चार्ज `` plums `` घिरी by positively  charged `` pudding `` .
The electrons ( as we know them today ) were thought to be positioned throughout the atom , but with many structures possible for  positioning अनेक electrons , विशेषकर घूर्णन बजती of electrons ( देखिए  below ) .
बजाय of a सूप , the अणु थी  also sometimes said to have had a `` cloud '' of positive charge .
With this model , Thomson abandoned his earlier `` nebular atom '' hypothesis in which the  अणु थी रचित of immaterial vortices  .
Now , at least part of the atom  थी to be रचित of thomson 's particulate ऋणात्मक corpuscles , हालांकि  the rest of the positively charged part of the atom remained somewhat nebulous and ill-defined .
the 1904 thomson मॉडल थी  disproved by the 1909 gold foil experiment of Hans Geiger and Ernest Marsden .
इस थी interpreted  by Ernest Rutherford in 1911
to  imply a बहुत छोटी केंद्रक of the अणु containing a बहुत ऊँची  positive charge ( in the case of gold , enough to balance about 100 electrons ) , thus leading to the Rutherford model of the atom .
Although gold has an atomic number of 79 , immediately after Rutherford 's paper appeared in 1911  antonius वैन डेन broek बना the सहज सुझाव कि  atomic number is nuclear charge .
The matter  जरूरी  experiment to decide .
Henry Moseley 's work  दिखाया experimentally in 1913 ( देखिए moseley 's विधि ) कि  the effective nuclear charge was very close to the atomic number ( Moseley found only one unit difference ) , and Moseley referenced only the papers of Van den Broek and Rutherford .
This work culminated in the solar-system-like ( but  quantum-limited ) bohr मॉडल of the अणु in the वही साल , in जिससे  a nucleus containing an atomic number of positive charge is surrounded by an equal number of electrons in orbital shells .
Bohr had also  प्रेरित moseley  's work .
Thomson 's  मॉडल थी compared ( हालांकि  not by Thomson ) to a British dessert called plum pudding , hence the name .
Thomson 's paper was published in the March 1904 edition of the Philosophical Magazine , the leading British science  जर्नल of the  day .
In Thomson 's view : ...  the अणु of the तत्व consist of a क्रमांक of negatively  electrified corpuscles enclosed in a sphere of uniform positive electrification , ...
In this model ,  the electrons यहूद फ़्री  to rotate within the blob or cloud of positive substance .
These orbits were stabilized in  the मॉडल by the फैक्ट कि जब an इलेक्ट्रॉन स्थानांतरित दूर  from the center of the positive cloud , it felt a larger net positive inward force , because there was more material of opposite charge , inside its orbit ( see Gauss 's law ) .
In Thomson 's model , electrons were free to rotate in rings which were further stabilized by interactions between  the electrons , और spectra यहूद to be accounted लिये by उर्जा मतभेद  of different ring orbits .
Thomson attempted to make his model account for some of the major spectral lines known for some elements , but  थी नहीं notably कामयाब  at this .
Still , Thomson 's model ( along with a similar Saturnian ring model for atomic electrons , also put forward in 1904 by Nagaoka after James Clerk Maxwell 's model of Saturn 's rings ) , were earlier harbingers of the later  और अधिक कामयाब solar-system-like bohr मॉडल of the अणु  .
Typical strip  of बेकन  .
Bacon is a cured meat prepared  इससे a सुअर  .
It is first cured using large quantities of salt , either in a brine or  in a शुष्क पैकिंग ; the परिणाम  is fresh bacon ( also known as green bacon ) .
भैस बेकन may तब be further  dried for weeks or months in cold air , or it may be boiled or smoked .
Fresh and dried  बेकन is typically पकाया पहले  eating .
Boiled bacon is ready to eat , as is some smoked bacon , but may be  पकाया further  before eating .
Bacon  is prepared इससे  several different cuts of meat .
It is usually made from  पक्ष और वापस कटौती of पोर्क , मगर in the संयुक्त राज्य , जहाँ  it is almost always prepared from pork belly ( typically referred to as `` streaky '' , `` fatty '' , or `` American style '' outside of the US and Canada ) .
The side cut has more  मांस और कम मोटे than the  belly .
Bacon may  be prepared इससे either of दो पृथक वापस कटौती  : fatback , which is almost pure fat , and pork loin , which is very lean .
Bacon-cured pork loin is  ज्ञात as वापस बेकन  .
Uncooked pork belly  बेकन स्ट्रिप्स  .
Bacon may be eaten smoked , boiled ,  fried , baked , or ग्रील्ड  , or used as a minor ingredient to flavor dishes .
Bacon is also used for barding  और larding roasts , विशेषकर खेल , e.g  . venison , pheasant .
The word is derived from the Old High  जर्मनी bacho , अर्थ `` buttock '' , `` हैम '' or `` पक्ष  of bacon '' , and cognate with the Old French bacon .
In continental Europe  , इस भाग of the सुअर is प्रायः नहीं स्मोक्ड जैसे बेकन is  in the United States ; it is used primarily in cubes ( lardons ) as a cooking ingredient , valued both as a source of fat and for its flavor .
In Italy , this is called pancetta and is usually cooked in small cubes or served  uncooked और thinly sliced as  part of an antipasto .
Meat from other animals , such as beef , lamb , chicken ,  बकरी , or तुर्कों , may भी be काटें , cured , or वरना prepared to resemble  bacon , and may even be referred to as `` bacon '' .
Such  उपयोग is आम in क्षेत्रों साथ  significant Jewish and Muslim populations .
The USDA defines bacon as `` the cured belly of a swine carcass '' ; other cuts and  विशेषताएँ जरूर be separately योग्य ( e.g. , `` स्मोक्ड  pork loin bacon '' ) .
For  सुरक्षा , बेकन जरूर be treated to prevent trichinosis  , caused by Trichinella , a parasitic roundworm which can be destroyed by heating , freezing , drying , or smoking .
Bacon is distinguished from salt pork  और हैम by मतभेद  in the brine ( or dry packing ) .
Bacon brine has added curing ingredients , most notably sodium nitrite , and occasionally sodium nitrate  or पोटैशियम नाइट्रेट ( साल्टपीटर ) ; सोडियम ascorbate or erythorbate  are added to accelerate curing and stabilize color .
Flavorings such  as भूरा शुगर or मेपल हैं प्रयुक्त लिये  some products .
If used , sodium polyphosphates are added to improve sliceability and  reduce spattering जब the  bacon is pan fried .
Today , a brine for ham , but not bacon ,  शामिल a विशाल राशि of शुगर  .
historically , `` हैम '' और `` बेकन '' referred to अलग कटौती of  meat that were brined or packed identically , often together in the same barrel .
The Employee  रिटायरमेंट आय सुरक्षा अधिनियम of 1974 ( erisa ) ( , संहिताबद्ध in भाग at ) is  a federal law which establishes minimum standards for pension plans in private industry and provides for extensive rules on the federal income tax effects of transactions associated with employee benefit plans .
ERISA was enacted to protect the interests of employee benefit  योजना भागीदार और उनके beneficiaries  by:
Requiring the disclosure of financial  और अन्य सूचना concerning  the plan to beneficiaries ;
establishing मानकों of  conduct for plan fiduciaries ;
Providing for appropriate  remedies और अभिगम to the  federal courts .
ERISA is sometimes used to  refer to the पूरा देह of कानून regulating कर्मचारी लाभ  plans , which are found mainly in the Internal Revenue Code and ERISA itself .
Responsibility for the  निर्वचन और प्रवर्तन of erisa is विभाजित among the विभाग  of Labor , the Department of the Treasury ( particularly the Internal Revenue Service ) , and the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation .
Illegal immigration to the United  राज्य is the अधिनियम of विदेशी नागरिकों प्रवेश the संयुक्त राज्य , बगैर सरकारी  permission and in violation of United States nationality law , or staying beyond the termination date of a visa , also in violation of the law .
A  चेतावनी चिह्न at the अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary  between the United States and Canada in Point Roberts , Washington .
A much different approach at the U.S.-Mexico  किनारा निकट el पासो , टेक्सास
The  undocumented अप्रवासी जनसांख्यिकी of the संयुक्त राज्य  in 2008 was estimated by the Center for Immigration Studies to be about 11 million people , down from 12.5 million people in 2007 .
Other estimates  दायरा इससे 7 to 20 लाख  .
According to a 2005 Pew Hispanic Center report , 56 % of undocumented immigrants were from Mexico ; 22 % were from other Latin American countries ; 13 % were from Asia ; 6 % were from  यूरोपीय और कनाडा ; और 3 % यहूद इससे अफ़्रीकी और the बाकी of the संसार .
Alvin Independent School District is a school  ज़िला आधारित in एल्विन , टेक्सास  ( USA ) .
Alvin ISD is a large suburban school district south of Houston in the communities of Alvin , Manvel ,  pearland , hillcrest , rosharon , आयोवा उपनिवेश , लिवरपूल  , and Amsterdam .
AISD serves Pearland city 's rapidly growing western portion of the city  सहित the नई विशाल master-planned समुदायों of छाया  Creek Ranch , South Fork , and Southern Trails .

In human anatomy , the ulnar nerve is a  तंत्रिका जिससे रनों निकट  the ulna bone .
The ulnar collateral ligament of elbow joint is in  संबंध साथ the ulnar तंत्रिका  .
The nerve is the largest unprotected nerve in the human body ( meaning unprotected by  मांसपेशी or अस्थि ) , so चोट  is common .
This nerve is directly connected to  the छोटी उंगली , और the सटा हाफ of the रिंग  finger , supplying the palmar side of these fingers , including both front and back of the tips , perhaps as far back as the fingernail beds .
One method  of injuring the तंत्रिका is to स्ट्राइक the medial epicondyle of the humerus इससे posteriorly  , or inferiorly with the elbow flexed .
The ulnar nerve  is फंस between  the bone and the overlying skin at this point .
This is  commonly referred  to as bumping one 's `` funny bone '' .
This name is thought to be a pun , based on the  ध्वनि प्रतिरूप between the नाम  of the bone of the upper arm , the `` humerus `` and the word `` humorous `` .
Alternatively , according to the Oxford English Dictionary it may refer to  `` the peculiar सनसनी अनुभवी जब it is struck  '' .
Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry , shortened Hogwarts , is a fictional British school of magic for students aged eleven to eighteen , and is the  प्राथमिक सेटिंग लिये the पहला छह किताबे in j.K.  Rowling 's Harry Potter series .
Rowling has suggested that she may have inadvertently taken the name from the hogwort plant ( Croton capitatus ) , which she had seen at Kew Gardens  कुछ समय पहले लिखने the श्रेणी , हालांकि the names `` the  Hogwarts '' and `` Hoggwart '' appear in the 1954 Nigel Molesworth book How To Be Topp by Geoffrey Willans .
हॉग्वार्ट्स स्कूल थी voted as the 36th  best Scottish educational establishment in a 2008 online ranking , outranking Edinburgh 's Loretto School .
According to a director of the Independent Schools Network Rankings ,  it थी added to the स्कूलों लिस्टिंग `` लिये मजा '' और थी तब voted on  .
The U.S.  subprime बंधक संकट थी a नियत of  events and conditions that led to a financial crisis and subsequent recession that began in 2008 .
It was characterized by a rise in subprime mortgage delinquencies and foreclosures , and  the resulting मनाही of प्रतिभूति समर्थित by कहा  mortgages .
Several major financial institutions collapsed in September 2008 , with significant disruption in the flow of  क्रेडिट to व्यवसायों और उपभोक्ता और the onset of  a severe global recession .
There were many causes of the crisis , with commentators assigning different levels of blame to financial  संस्थानों , regulators , क्रेडिट एजेंसियों , सरकारी  housing policies , and consumers , among others .
A proximate cause  थी the वृद्धि in  subprime lending .
The percentage of  lower-quality subprime mortgages  originated during a given year rose from the historical 8 % or lower range to approximately 20 % from 2004 to 2006 , with much higher ratios in some parts of the U.S .
A high percentage of these subprime  mortgages , over 90 % in  2006 for example , were adjustable-rate mortgages .
These two changes were part of a broader trend of lowered lending  मानकों और higher-risk बंधक उत्पाद  .
Further , U.S. households had become increasingly indebted , with the ratio of debt to disposable personal income rising  इससे 77 % in 1990 to 127 % at the समाप्त of 2007 , much of इस बढ़ाएँ mortgage-related  .
When U.S. home prices declined steeply after peaking in mid-2006 , borrowers '  क्षमता to पुनर्वित्त उनके लोन became अधिक  difficult .
As adjustable-rate mortgages began to reset at higher interest rates ( causing higher monthly  भुगतान ) , बंधक delinquencies  soared .
Securities backed with mortgages , including subprime  mortgages , widely आयोजित by वित्तीय firms  globally , lost most of their value .
Global investors also drastically reduced purchases of mortgage-backed debt and other securities as part of a decline  in the क्षमता और willingness of the निजी वित्तीय प्रणाली to support  lending .
Concerns about the  soundness of u.S. क्रेडिट और वित्तीय  markets led to tightening credit around the world and slowing economic growth in the U.S. and Europe .
The crisis had severe , long-lasting  consequences लिये the u.S. और यूरोपीय economies  .
The U.S. entered a  गहन मंदी , साथ nearly 9 लाख कार्य खोया  during 2008 and 2009 , roughly 6 % of the workforce .
U.S. housing prices fell  nearly 30 % on औसत और the u.S. भण्डार  market fell approximately 50 % by early 2009 .
As of early 2013 , the U.S. stock market had recovered to its pre-crisis peak but housing prices  remained निकट उनके कम पाइंट और बेरोजगारी  remained elevated .
Economic growth remained below  pre-crisis स्तर  .
Europe also continued to struggle with  इसके अपना आर्थिक संकट .
Carl Jung  in 1910  .
Myers and Briggs extrapolated their MBTI theory from Jung 's  कृतियाँ in उसके किताब मनोवैज्ञानिक  Types .
The Myers-Briggs Type Indicator ( MBTI )  मूल्यांकन is a psychometric प्रश्नावली designed to माप  psychological preferences in how people perceive the world and make decisions .
These preferences were extrapolated from the typological theories proposed by Carl Gustav Jung and first published in his 1921  किताब मनोवैज्ञानिक प्रकार ( अंग्रेज़ी  edition , 1923 ) .
Jung theorized that there are four principal psychological functions by which we experience  the संसार : सनसनी , अंतर्ज्ञान  , feeling , and thinking .
एक of  these four functions is dominant most of the time .
The original developers  of the व्यक्तित्व inventory यहूद katharine कुक briggs और उसके बेटी , इसाबेल briggs मायर्स  ; these two , having studied extensively the work of Jung , turned their interest of human behavior into a devotion of turning the theory of psychological types to practical use .
They  began बनाना the indicator दौरान संसार युद्ध ii , believing कि a ज्ञान of व्यक्तित्व वरीयताओं  would help women who were entering the industrial workforce for the first time to identify the sort of war-time jobs that would be `` most comfortable and effective '' .
The  आरंभिक प्रश्नावली grew into the myers-briggs  Type Indicator , which was first published in 1962 .
The MBTI focuses on normal populations and emphasizes the  मान of naturally occurring  differences .
Robert Kaplan and Dennis Saccuzzo believe `` the underlying assumption of the MBTI is that we all have specific preferences in the way we  construe हमारी अनुभवों , और ये वरीयताओं underlie हमारी रूचि , needs , मान , और प्रेरणा  '' ( p. 499 ) .
`` Judas ''  is a सोंग by अमरीकी रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार  Lady Gaga , from her second studio album Born This Way ( 2011 ) .
It was  released by interscope रिकॉर्ड on अप्रैल  15 , 2011 , four days ahead of its scheduled release .
Written and  उत्पादित by महिला गागा और redone , `` यहूदा '' is  a dance and electro house song about a woman in love with a man who betrayed her .
It  embodies the incidents कि have haunted गागा in the पास्ट , और  its core meaning refers to the negative parts of her life that she ca n't escape .
Gaga has further explained that the song was  भी परिचय honoring एक 's भीतरी अंधेरा  in order to bring oneself into the light .
the कलाकृति लिये the सिंगल थी  designed by Gaga in Microsoft Word .
In spite of a polarizing impact on several religious groups , the song was generally  खूब प्राप्त by आलोचकों , जो likened  the song to `` Bad Romance `` with some noting it should have been the album 's lead single .
The song has a similar sound to Gaga 's previous  redone-produced ट्रैक्स , सहित `` पोकर फेस  `` , `` LoveGame `` , `` Bad Romance '' , and `` Alejandro `` .
It contains three distinct  hooks और a हाउस -influenced  break down .
Gaga explained that the lines spoken during the breakdown talk about her as beyond redemption ,  regarding the परंपरागत दृश्य of कया a स्त्री चाहिए be .
`` Judas '' initially had a strong sales opening , but was  कम कामयाब commercially in तुलना  to Gaga 's previous singles .
The song reached the top ten of the charts in most major music markets , and also reached the top of the  चार्ट in दक्षिण कोरियाई  .
A music video for the song was filmed in April 2011 , co-directed by Gaga and Laurieann Gibson  और co-starring नॉर्मन reedus  .
It has a Biblical storyline  जहाँ reedus निभाई यहूदा इस्कैरियट और गागा निभाई  Mary Magdalene .
The video portrays them as  आधुनिक दिन प्रचारकों going  to Jerusalem .
It included the Biblical story  of यहूदा betraying यीशु , और ended  with Gaga as Magdalene getting stoned to death .
Before its release , the Catholic League condemned Gaga for the alleged  उपयोग of धार्मिक  imagery and her role in the video .
However , critics generally praised the  वीडियो , नहीं ढूंढना कोई अप्रिय  content .
The video was  मनोनीत लिये दो पुरस्कार at the 2011  MTV Video Music Awards .
Gaga has performed `` Judas '' on a  क्रमांक of टेलीविज़न shows , सहित  The Graham Norton Show , Saturday Night Live , Good Morning Americas `` Summer Concert Series '' , the French X Factor as well as on The Ellen DeGeneres Show .
Marvin Gaye ( April 2 ,  1939april 1 , 1984 ) , born मारविन pentz gay , jr. , थी an अमरीकी singer-songwriter  and musician .
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s  साथ a स्ट्रिंग of हिट्स सहित `` कैसा मीठी it is ( to be loved by तुम ) `` और `` i सुना it through the grapevine `` और duet  recordings with Mary Wells and Tammi Terrell , later earning the titles `` Prince of Motown '' and `` Prince of Soul '' .
During the 1970s , Gaye recorded the concept albums What 's  going on और let 's मिलेंगी it on और became among the पहला कलाकारों in motown  to break away from the reins of its production company .
Gaye  's बाद रिकार्डिंग बहकावे  several R & B subgenres such as quiet storm and neo-soul .
Following a period in Europe under a tax exile in the early 1980s , Gaye released the 1982 Grammy  award-winning hit `` यौन healing `` और the मध्यरात्रि  Love album .
Since his death in 1984 , Gaye has been posthumously honored by many institutions , including the Grammy Lifetime  उपलब्धि पुरस्कार और the चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल of कीर्ति  .
The Academy Award for Best Picture is one of the Academy Awards of Merit presented annually by the Academy  of गति चित्र कला और sciences ( ampas ) to निर्माता working in the गति चित्र उद्योग और is the तभी श्रेणी in जिससे  every member is eligible to nominate for .
Best Picture is considered the most important of the Academy Awards , as it represents all the  directing , एक्टिंग , म्यूज़िक composing , लिखने , संपादन  and other efforts put forth into a film .
Consequently , Best Picture is the final award and  the निष्कर्ष of the सालाना अकादमी  Awards ceremony .
The Grand Staircase columns at  the dolby थिएटर in लॉस एंजिल्स , जहाँ the अकादमी पुरस्कार ceremonies  have been held since 2002 , showcase every film that has won the Best Picture title since the award 's inception 85 years ago .
Heavy  बरसात is an इंटरैक्टिव नाटक  action-adventure video game created by French developer Quantic Dream exclusively for the PlayStation 3 .
The game is written and  निर्देशित by quantic सपना 's संस्थापक  and CEO David Cage .
Heavy Rains story is a  नाटकीय थ्रिलर modelled बाद फिल्मी noir , featuring चार protagonists शामिल साथ the रहस्य of the  Origami Killer , a serial killer who uses extended periods of rainfall to drown his victims .
Ethan Mars is trying to save his son from being the next victim ,  जबकि investigative पत्रकार मैडिसन paige , एफबीआई profiler नॉर्मन jayden , और  private detective Scott Shelby are each trying to track down clues to the Origami Killer 's identity .
The player interacts with the game by performing actions highlighted on screen related to motions on the controller , and in some  मामले , performing a श्रेणी of जल्दी समय कार्यक्रम दौरान fast-paced कार्रवाई sequences  .
The player 's decisions and  क्रियाएँ दौरान the खेल होगा affect  the narrative .
The main characters can be killed , and certain actions may  सीसे to अलग दृश्यों और endings  .
A playable demo  थी released on 11  February 2010 .
The demo was released prior to this date for  लोगों जो took भाग in a चार दिन चुनौती on 5 फ़रवरी  2010 .
A patch to allow use of the  प्लेस्टेशन मूव नियंत्रक to खेल the खेल थी  released in September 2010 .
Heavy Rain was  critically acclaimed और  has sold over two million copies .
It won 2010 's Game of the Year  इससे सीएनएन और गेमिंग संघ , और  Best PS3 Game of 2010 by GameSpy and IGN .
A  परिवर्धित संस्करण of the खेल थी released titled भारी बरसात संस्करण modifiée  exclusively in France , aimed towards a younger audience .
In 2010 , the game was included in the  किताब 1001 वीडियो खेल तुम  Must Play Before You Die .
Total superannuation  उद्योग देनदारी : सदस्यों निधि  and reserves ( A $ millions ) since 1988 .
Annual total superannuation industry asset  विकास 1996-2005  .
superannuation in ऑस्ट्रेलिया refers to the इंतजाम जिससे लोगों मेक  in Australia to have funds available for them in retirement .
In Australia , superannuation arrangements are government-supported  और प्रोत्साहित , और न्यूनतम प्रावधानों हैं अनिवार्य लिये  employees .
For example , employers are required to pay a proportion of an employee 's salaries and wages (  फिलहाल 9 % ) into a superannuation निधि , लकिन लोगों  are encouraged to put aside additional funds into superannuation .
The minimum obligation required by employers is set to  बढ़ाएँ to 12 % धीरे stepping  annually from 2013 to 2020 .
an व्यक्तिगत can withdraw निधि आउट of a superannuation निधि जब  the person meets one of the conditions of release contained in Schedule 1 of the Superannuation Industry ( Supervision ) Regulations 1994 .

Electoral College map showing  the परिणाम of the 2012  U.S. presidential election .
President Barack Obama ( D - IL ) won the popular vote in 26 states and  the ज़िला of कोलंबिया ( denoted  in blue ) to capture 332 electoral votes .
Former Governor Mitt Romney ( R - MA ) won the popular vote in 24  राज्य ( denoted in रेड ) to कैप्चर 206 चुनावी  votes .
Cartogram representation of the Electoral College  vote लिये the 2012 चुनाव ,  with each square representing one electoral vote .
The United States Electoral College is the institution that officially elects the President  और वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य प्रत्येक  four years .
The  अध्यक्ष और वाइस अध्यक्ष हैं  not elected directly by the voters .
Instead , they are elected by `` electors '' who are chosen by popular  vote on a state-by-state आधार .
Electors are  apportioned to प्रत्येक राज्य और the ज़िला of कोलंबिया , लकिन नहीं to territorial  possessions of the United States , such as Puerto Rico and Guam .
The number of electors in  प्रत्येक राज्य is बराबर to the क्रमांक  of members of Congress to which the state is entitled .
The Twenty-third Amendment has  सदा resulted in the ज़िला of कोलंबिया having तीन निर्वाचक  .
There are  538 निर्वाचक , आधारित on वहीँ होने  435 representatives and 100 senators , plus the three electors from the District of Columbia .
Electors are pledged to particular presidential and vice presidential  उम्मीदवार , हालांकि unpledged  electors are possible .
In all states , except Maine and Nebraska , electors are  निर्वाचित on a `` winner-take-all '' आधार  .
That is , all electors pledged to the  अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी जो विन्स  the most votes in a state become electors for that state .
Maine and Nebraska use the `` congressional district method '' , selecting one  elector भीतर प्रत्येक congressional ज़िला by लोकप्रिय vote  and selecting the remaining two electors by a statewide popular vote .
Although no elector is required by federal law to honor a pledge , there  have तभी महरूम बहुत few अवसरों जब an elector voted contrary  to a pledge .
The Twelfth Amendment  specifies कैसा a अध्यक्ष और वाइस अध्यक्ष हैं निर्वाचित और requires  each elector to cast one vote for President and another vote for Vice President .
Critics  argue कि the चुनावी कॉलेज is inherently undemocratic और देता  swing states disproportionate influence in electing the President and Vice President .
The Electoral College gives a numeric advantage in the election of the president to the smaller states ,  as the न्यूनतम क्रमांक of निर्वाचक लिये the छोटी राज्य is तीन  compared to one for the election of representatives .
On the other hand , the winner-take-all  विधि of मतदान favors the  larger states .
A number of constitutional amendments have been proposed seeking to alter the Electoral  कॉलेज or बदलें it साथ a सीधा  popular vote .
बराक hussein ओबामा ii ( ; born अगस्त 4 , 1961 ) is  the 44th and current President of the United States , the first African American to hold the office .
Born in Honolulu , Hawaii ,  ओबामा is a ग्रैजुएट of कोलंबिया विश्वविद्यालयों  and Harvard Law School , where he was president of the Harvard Law Review .
He was a community organizer in  शिकागो पहले कमाई उसके  law degree .
He worked as a civil  अधिकारों attorney in शिकागो और सिखाया संवैधानिक विधि at the  University of Chicago Law School from 1992 to 2004 .
He served  तीन शर्तें representing the 13th ज़िला in the  Illinois Senate from 1997 to 2004 , running unsuccessfully for the United States House of Representatives in 2000 .
In 2004 , Obama received national attention during his campaign to represent Illinois in the United States Senate with his victory in the March Democratic Party primary , his keynote address at the  लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल सम्मेलन in जुलाई , और उसके  election to the Senate in November .
He began his presidential campaign in 2007 , and in 2008 , after a close primary campaign against Hillary  rodham क्लिंटन , he जीती sufficient delegates in the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी primaries  to receive the presidential nomination .
He then defeated Republican nominee John McCain in the general  चुनाव , और थी उदघाटन  as president on January 20 , 2009 .
Nine months later , Obama was named the 2009 Nobel  सलाम पुरस्कार laureate  .
He was re-elected president in  नवम्बर 2012 , defeating रिपब्लिकन nominee mitt romney , और थी sworn in  for a second term on January 20 , 2013 .
Early in his first term in office , Obama signed into law economic stimulus legislation in response to the Great Recession in the form  of the अमरीकी रिकवरी और reinvestment अधिनियम of 2009 और the कर राहत , बेरोजगारी बीमे reauthorization , और जॉब  Creation Act of 2010 .
Other major domestic initiatives in his presidency include the  रोगी सुरक्षा और सस्ती परवाह अधिनियम , प्रायः referred to as ``  Obamacare '' ; the Dodd–Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act ; the Do n't Ask , Do n't Tell Repeal Act of 2010 ; the Budget Control Act of 2011 ; and the American Taxpayer Relief Act of 2012 .
In May 2012 , he became the first sitting U.S. president to publicly support same-sex marriage and in 2013 his administration filed briefs which  urged the परम् अदालत to नियम in एहसान of same-sex युगल in  two high-profile cases .
In foreign policy , Obama ended U.S. military involvement in the Iraq War , increased  troop स्तर in अफगानिस्तान , हस्ताक्षरित the नई प्रारंभ बाहें कंट्रोल सन्धि साथ  Russia , ordered U.S. military involvement in Libya , and ordered the military operation that resulted in the death of Osama bin Laden .
The Honda  cbr1100xx सुपर blackbird थी a होंडा मोटरसाइकिल  made from 1996 to 2007 .
The bike was developed to challenge the Kawasaki Ninja ZX-11 as the world 's fastest  उत्पादन मोटरसाइकिल , और होंडा succeeded साथ a शीर्ष गति of  .
Two years later the  शीर्षक passed to the  Suzuki Hayabusa , which reached .
The  blackbird is नामित बाद the लॉकहीड  SR-71 , also a speed record holder .
नमूना दृश्य of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  health record based on images
Sample  दृश्य of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  health record
An electronic health record ( EHR ) is an evolving  अवधारणा पारिभाषित as a व्यवस्थित  collection of electronic health information about individual patients or populations .
It  is a रिकार्ड in डिजिटल स्वरूप कि  is theoretically capable of being shared across different health care settings .
In some cases this sharing can  occur by रास्ता of network-connected enterprise-wide सूचना  systems and other information networks or exchanges .
EHRs may  शामिल a दायरा of आंकड़ा , सहित जनसांख्यिकी , चिकित्सा इतिहास , दवा और allergies , immunization  status , laboratory test results , radiology images , vital signs , personal stats like age and weight , and billing information .
The Mariner up on the mast  in a तूफ़ान  .
One of the  wood-engraved illustrations  by Gustave Doré .
The Rime of the Ancient Mariner (  originally the rime of the ancyent marinere ) is the longest प्रमुख कविता by the अंग्रेज़ी कवि सैमुएल टेलर कॉलरिज  , written in 1797–98 and published in 1798 in the first edition of Lyrical Ballads .
Modern editions use a later  संशोधित संस्करण मुद्रित in 1817 कि  featured a gloss .
Along with other poems in Lyrical Ballads , it was a signal shift to  आधुनिक काव्य और the शुरूआत of अंग्रेजों  Romantic literature .
A proxy auto-config ( PAC ) file defines how web browsers and other user agents can automatically choose the appropriate  प्रॉक्सी सर्वर ( अभिगम विधि ) लिये fetching  a given URL .
A PAC  संचिका contains a जावास्क्रिप्ट  function “FindProxyForURL ( url , host ) ” .
This function  रिटर्न a स्ट्रिंग साथ एक or अधिक  access method specifications .
These specifications cause  the उपयोक्ता एजेंट to उपयोग a particular  proxy server or to connect directly .
Multiple specifications provide a fall-back when a  प्रॉक्सी fails to respond .
The browser fetches this  pac संचिका पहले requesting अन्य  URLs .
The URL of the PAC file is either configured  हस्तचालित or संकल्पित automatically by the वेब प्रॉक्सी  Autodiscovery Protocol .
Zendaya Coleman ( born September 1 ,  1996 ) , ज्ञात mononymously as  Zendaya , is an American actress , singer and dancer .
she  सितारों on the डिज़्नी चैनल  sitcom Shake It Up as Rocky Blue .
She has starred in two films and played one of the  सीसे भूमिकाएँ in the फिल्मी frenemies  as Halley Brandon .
वो voiced फर्न  in the Pixie Hollow Games .
She appeared in Good Luck Charlie as Rocky Blue and in a Good  लक चार्ली और शेक it up क्रॉसओवर  title Charlie Shake It Up .
She appeared on PrankStars as herself in the episode `` Walk The Prank ''  और on a.n.t . फार्म as sequoia जोन्स in the एपीसोड `` रचनात्मक  ConsultANT . ''
zendaya is  also a musician .
She signed a deal with Hollywood Records on August 8 , 2012 and  प्रारंभ रिकॉर्डिंग गीतों लिये उसके डेब्यू एल्बम on अगस्त  12 , 2012 .
She released a single from an independent label called `` Swag It  आउट `` और  another single with Bella Thorne called `` Watch Me , '' which is featured on the Break It Down album .
On March 20 , 2012 , Zendaya and Bella Thorne released an album together  पुकारा शेक it up : सजीव 2 नृत्य , प्रत्येक have उनके अपना सोंग on it , साथ साथ a mash-up  of both songs together as one .
On August 21 , 2012 , Zendaya and Bella Thorne  released an ep पुकारा शेक it up : बना  In Japan .
Zendaya has a Christmas song called `` Shake Santa Shake ,  '' जिससे is on the डिज़्नी चैनल अवकाश प्लेलिस्ट cd , जिससे थी released  on October 2 , 2012 .
On March 5 , 2013 the third Shake It Up soundtrack was released , entitled I < 3  नृत्य ; on it , zendaya रै दो गीतों साथ बेला - `` संक्रामक प्रेम '' और `` इस is my नृत्य मंजिल  '' - as well as one solo song , `` Beat of My Drum . ''
This is a list of  एयरपोर्ट in पेन्सिलवेनिया ( a u.S. राज्य ) , grouped  by type and sorted by location .
It contains all public-use and  सैन्य एयरपोर्ट in the राज्य  .
Some private-use and former airports may be included where notable , such as airports that were previously  public-use , those साथ वाणिज्यिक enplanements अंकित by the faa or एयरपोर्ट आबंटित an  IATA airport code .
iOS ( previously iPhone OS ) is a mobile operating system developed and distributed by Apple Inc . Originally released in 2007 for the iPhone  और ipod टच प्लेटफ़ॉर्म , it रै महरूम विस्तारित to support अन्य ठहराना डिवाइस ऐसे as the ipad और  Apple TV .
नापसंद microsoft 's खिड़कियाँ फोन और google  's Android , Apple does not license iOS for installation on non-Apple hardware .
, Apple 's App Store contained more than 700,000  आईओएस अनुप्रयोग , जिससे have collectively महरूम डाउनलोड  more than 30 billion times .
It had a 21 % share of the smartphone mobile operating system units shipped in the fourth  क्वार्टर of 2012 , पीछे तभी google 's एंड्रॉइड  .
In  जून 2012 , it accounted लिये 65 % of मोबाईल वेब  data consumption ( including use on both the iPod Touch and the iPad ) .
At the half of  2012 , वहीँ यहूद 410  million devices activated .
According to the special media event held  by ठहराना on सितंबर 12 , 2012 , 400 लाख डिवाइस have महरूम बेची through  June 2012 .
The user interface of iOS is based on  the अवधारणा of सीधा हेरफेर , using multi-touch  gestures .
Interface  कंट्रोल तत्व consist of  sliders , switches , and buttons .
Interaction with the OS includes gestures such as swipe , tap , pinch , and reverse pinch , all of which have  विशिष्ट परिभाषाएं भीतर the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the आईओएस ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली  and its multi-touch interface .
Internal accelerometers are used by some applications to respond to shaking the device ( one common result is the undo command ) or  घूर्णन it in तीन आयाम ( एक आम परिणाम  is switching from portrait to landscape mode ) .
आईओएस is निकला इससे os  X , with which it shares the Darwin foundation .
iOS is Apple 's mobile version of the OS X  ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली प्रयुक्त on ठहराना कंप्यूटर  .
In iOS , there are four abstraction layers  : the कोर os परत , the कोर सेवाएं परत  , the Media layer , and the Cocoa Touch layer .
The current version of the operating system ( iOS 6.1.3 ) dedicates 1-1.5  gb of the यंत्र 's फ्लैश मेमोरी  for the system partition , using roughly 800 MB of that partition ( varying by model ) for iOS itself .
iOS currently runs  on iphone , ipad , ipod  touch and Apple TV .

A spoiler is an automotive aerodynamic device whose intended design function is to 'spoil ' unfavorable air movement  आरपार a देह of a गाडी in गति , प्रायः वर्णित as turbulence  or drag .
Spoilers on the front of a vehicle are often called air dams , because in addition to directing air flow they also reduce  the राशि of एयर बहती underneath the गाडी जिससे generally reduces  aerodynamic lift and drag .
विघ्न हैं प्रायः fitted to  race and high-performance sports cars , although they have become common on passenger vehicles as well .
Some spoilers are added to cars primarily for  स्टाइलिंग उद्देश्य और have either छोटी aerodynamic  benefit or even make the aerodynamics worse .
Spoilers for cars are  प्रायः incorrectly उलझन साथ , or the पद प्रयुक्त  interchangeably with , wings .
Automotive wings are devices whose intended design is to generate downforce as air  गुजरता around उन्हें , नहीं बस disrupt मौजूदा  airflow patterns .
Mario , who serves as Nintendo 's mascot , is a fictional character  निर्मित by खेल पंक्तियां शिगेरू miyamoto और  voiced by Charles Martinet .
This is a list of video games where the character Mario plays a  भाग , either as the समर्थक , विपक्षी , supporting अक्षर , as भाग of  an ensemble cast , as a cameo , or in a game within a game .
It does not include simple  सन्दर्भ to the अक्षर , ऐसे as the portraits  of Mario found in The Legend of Zelda : A Link to the Past .
The year indicated is the year the game was first released , most commonly in Japan ; games were  sometimes released सालो बाद in  other regions of the world .
The list includes ports ,  remakes और compilations  .
It  करता n't शामिल कोई  Virtual Console re-releases .
`` Man of Constant Sorrow '' ( also known as `` I Am A Man of Constant Sorrow '' ) is a  परंपरागत अमरीकी लोक सोंग पहला अंकित by लंड burnett , a partially अँधा fiddler  from Kentucky .
The song was originally  अंकित by burnett as `` विदाई सोंग  '' printed in a Richard Burnett songbook , circa 1913 .
An early version was recorded by Emry  आर्थर in 1928 ( vocalion vo  5208 ) .
Public  ब्याज in the सोंग थी नवीनीकृत  after the release of the 2000 film O Brother , Where Art Thou ?
, as it plays a central role in  the फिल्मी 's  plot .
the सोंग थी भी शामिल  in the film 's highly successful , multiple-platinum selling soundtrack .
Josephson junction array chip developed by  the नेशनल ब्यूरो of मानकों  as a standard volt
The volt ( symbol : V ) is the SI derived unit for electric potential ( voltage ) , electric  संभावित अंतर , और विद्युतवाहक  force .
The volt is named in honor of the Italian physicist  alessandro volta ( 1745–1827 ) , जो  invented the voltaic pile , possibly the first chemical battery .
A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination and  कदम of gavrilo princip ( चित्र लिया in 1987 , पहले कदम यहूद removed in 1992 और प्लैक  changed from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A plaque commemorating the  स्थान of the साराजेवो  assassination ( image taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914 , Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne , and his wife , Sophie , Duchess of Hohenberg , were  शॉट मुर्दे in साराजेवो , by gavrilo princip , एक of a समूह of छह बोस्नियाई serb हत्यारे समन्वित  by Danilo Ilić .
The political objective of the  हत्या थी to ब्रेक बंद austria-hungary 's  south-Slav provinces so they could be combined into a Greater Serbia or a Yugoslavia .
The  हत्यारे ' motives यहूद सतत  with the movement that later became known as Young Bosnia .
सर्बियाई सैन्य अधिकारियों  stood behind the attack .
At the top of these Serbian military conspirators was Chief  of सर्बियाई सैन्य प्रज्ञा dragutin dimitrijević  , his righthand man Major Vojislav Tankosić , and Masterspy Rade Malobabić .
Major Tankosić  हथियारबंद the हत्यारे साथ बम और  pistols and trained them .
The assassins were given access to the same clandestine tunnel of safe-houses  और एजेंटों कि rade  Malobabić used for the infiltration of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary .
The assassins , the key members of  the clandestine टनल , और the कुंजी सर्बियाई सैन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों जो यहूद स्टिल जिंदा  were arrested , tried , convicted and punished .
Those  जो यहूद गिरफ्तार in बोस्निया  were tried in Sarajevo in October 1914 .
the अन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों यहूद गिरफ्तार और आजमाया पहले a सर्बियाई कंगारू अदालत on the  French-controlled Salonika Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated false charges ; Serbia executed three of the top military conspirators .
much of कया is ज्ञात  about the assassinations comes from these two trials and related records .
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing and murders of 28 June is highly  विवादास्पद क्युकी the आक्रमण led to the outbreak  of World War I one month later .
Mission San Juan Capistrano was a Spanish  मिशन in दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया , स्तिथ in present-day सैन  Juan Capistrano .
It was founded on All Saints ' Day November 1 ,  1776 , by स्पेनी catholics of the franciscan  Order .
Named for Giovanni da Capistrano , a 15th century theologian and `` warrior priest '' who resided in the Abruzzo region of Italy , San Juan Capistrano has  the भेद of होने घर to the oldest भवन in कैलिफ़ोर्निया स्टिल in उपयोग , a चैपल निर्मित in 1782 .
Known alternately as `` Serra 's Chapel '' and ``  पिता सेरा 's गिरिजाघर , '' it is the तभी extant ढांचा जहाँ it रै महरूम प्रलेखित  that the padre Junipero Serra celebrated mass .
One of the best known of the Alta California missions ( and one  of the few मिशन to have दरअसल महरूम संस्थापित twice—others होने मिशन सैन  Gabriel Arcángel and Mission La Purísima Concepción ) .
The site was originally consecrated on October 30 , 1775 , by Father Fermín Lasuén , but was quickly  abandoned due to अशांति among the स्वदेशी जनसांख्यिकी  in San Diego .
The success of the  उपनिवेश is evident  in its historical records .
Prior to the  आगमन of the प्रचारकों , कुछ 550 natives यहूद  scattered throughout the local area .
By 1790 , the number of converted Christians had grown to 700 , and just six years  बाद nearly 1,000 `` neophytes `` ( हाल converts ) जिया in  or around the Mission compound .
1,649 baptisms  यहूद conducted कि साल अलोन , आउट of the कुल 4,639  souls converted between 1776 and 1847 .
अधिक than 2,000 पूर्व निवासियों ( ज़्यादातर juaneño  Indians ) are buried in unmarked graves in the Mission 's cemetery ( campo santo ) .
The remains of  पिता ( बाद monsignor ) st. जॉन o'sullivan , जो पहचाना the प्रॉपर्टी 's ऐतिहासिक मान और working tirelessly to conserve  and rebuild its structures , are buried at the entrance to the cemetery on the west side of the property , and a statue raised in his honor stands at the head of the crypt .
The surviving chapel also serves as the final resting place of three padres who passed on while serving at the Mission : Fathers José Barona ,  विसेंट fustér , और विसेंट पास्कुआल oliva हैं सब entombed beneath  the sanctuary floor .
The Criolla or `` Mission grape , '' was first planted at San Juan Capistrano in 1779 ; in  1783 , the पहला वाइन उत्पादित in alta कैलिफ़ोर्निया उभरा  from the Mission 's winery .
The Mission entered a long period of  क्रमिक मनाही बाद secularization in  1833 .
Numerous efforts were made over the years to restore the Mission to its former glory , but none met with great success until  the आगमन of पिता o'sullivan  in 1910 .
Restoration efforts continue , and `` Serra 's Chapel  '' is स्टिल प्रयुक्त लिये धार्मिक सेवाएं  .
About half-a-million visitors , including 80,000  स्कूल children , आइये to the मिशन प्रत्येक साल  .
And while the ruins of ``  the ग्रेट स्टोन गिरिजाघर '' ( जिससे थी सब लकिन leveled by an 1812 भूकंप ) हैं a प्रसिद्ध architectural  wonder , the Mission is perhaps best known for the annual `` Return of the Swallows '' which is traditionally observed every March 19 ( Saint Joseph 's Day ) .
Mission San Juan Capistrano has served as a favorite subject for many notable artists , and has been immortalized in literature and on film  numerous टाइम्स , शायद अधिक than कोई अन्य मिशन  .
In 1984 , a modern church complex was  constructed बस उत्तर और वेस्ट of the मिशन यौगिक  and is now known as Mission Basilica San Juan Capistrano .
Today , the mission compound serves as a museum , with the Serra Chapel  भीतर the यौगिक सेवारत as a चैपल लिये the मिशन मोहल्ला  .
बेहतर बंद मुर्दे is a 1985 अमरीकी  teen romantic comedy film starring John Cusack and written and directed by Savage Steve Holland .
It tells the story of high school student Lane Myer who is suicidal after his girlfriend breaks  up साथ उसे .
mercedes-benz superdome ( originally louisiana superdome और commonly  The Superdome ) is a sports and exhibition stadium , located in the Central Business District of New Orleans , Louisiana , USA .
Plans were drawn up in 1967 , by the New Orleans  modernist architectural कड़ of कर्टिस और डेविस  .
Its steel frame covers a  expanse  .
इसके गुम्बद is बना of a lamella multi-ringed  frame and has a diameter of , making it the largest fixed domed structure in the world .
It is home to the NFL 's New Orleans Saints , the NCAA 's Division I-A Tulane Green Wave football team ( the largest football stadium in  सम्मेलन यूएसए ) , the राज्य फार्म bayou क्लासिक , the r+l  Carriers New Orleans Bowl , the Allstate Sugar Bowl and , every fourth year , the BCS National Championship Game .
Because of the size and location in one  of the प्रमुख पर्यटक गंतव्यों in the संयुक्त राज्य  , the Superdome routinely makes the `` short list '' of candidates being considered for major sporting events , such as the Super Bowl and the Final Four .
In 2005 , the Superdome gained international attention of a  अलग प्रकार जब it housed हज़ारों of लोगों seeking  shelter from Hurricane Katrina .
The building suffered extensive damage as a result of  the तूफ़ान , और थी बंद लिये अनेक महीने  afterward .
On  अक्तूबर 3 , 2011 , it थी घोषित  that German automaker Mercedes-Benz purchased naming rights to the stadium .
The new name took effect on  अक्तूबर 23 , 2011  .
It is the third stadium that has naming  अधिकारों इससे mercedes-benz ( और पहला in the संयुक्त राज्य ) , बाद  the Mercedes-Benz Arena , the stadium of Bundesliga club VfB Stuttgart , in Stuttgart , Germany and the Mercedes-Benz Arena in Shanghai , China .
