Disney 's Animal Kingdom Lodge  is an african-themed डीलक्स रिज़ॉर्ट  at the Walt Disney World Resort .
it खोली on अप्रैल  16 , 2001 .
the रिज़ॉर्ट is स्वामित्व  and operated by Walt Disney Parks and Resorts .
Disney 's Animal Kingdom Lodge is located in the Animal Kingdom Resort Area  , सटा to डिज़्नी 's एनिमल  Kingdom .
It gives guests the  अवसर to दृश्य चरने वन्यजीव बाहर उनके कक्ष और  public areas in the resort within proximity of the animals , conveying the feeling of being in an African savanna .
The People 's Party , also  ज्ञात as the `` populists '' , थी a short-lived राजनैतिक पार्टी in the  United States established in 1891 during the Populist movement ( United States , 19th Century ) .
It was most important in  1892-96 , और तब rapidly धुंधली दूर  .
Based  among ग़रीब , श्वेत कपास किसानो in the दक्षिण ( विशेषकर उत्तर कैरोलिना , अलबामा  , and Texas ) and hard-pressed wheat farmers in the plains states ( especially Kansas and Nebraska ) , it represented a radical crusading form of agrarianism and hostility to banks , railroads , and elites generally .
It sometimes formed coalitions with labor unions , and  in 1896 the डेमोक्रेट endorsed उनके अध्यक्षीय nominee  , William Jennings Bryan .
The terms `` populist '' and `` populism `` are  commonly प्रयुक्त लिये anti-elitist appeals in विपक्ष to स्थापित रूचि  and mainstream parties .
भाषाई मैप of सीरियल  , Cameroon , and Benin .
Sign in English , outside  the विश्वविद्यालयों  of Lagos
There are hundreds of  भाषाएं  spoken in Nigeria .
The major languages are Yoruba , Hausa ,  इग्बो , ईदो , fulfulde , कनूरी ,  and Ibibio .
The official language of Nigeria , English , the former colonial language , was chosen to  सुकर the सांस्कृतिक और भाषाई एकता of the देश  .
English , however , remains an exclusive preserve of the  देश 's शहरी elite , और is नहीं widely बोला in ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों , जिससे comprise  three quarters of the countries population .
सीरियल 's भाषाई विविधता is a microcosm of अफ़्रीकी as a पूरे  , encompassing three major African languages families : Afroasiatic , Nilo-Saharan , and Niger–Congo .
Nigeria also has several as-yet unclassified languages , such as Cen Tuum , which may represent a relic of an even greater diversity prior to the spread of the current  भाषा परिवारों  .
A series of events led to the  आक्रमण on पर्ल  Harbor .
युद्ध between जापानी और the संयुक्त राज्य था महरूम a  possibility that each nation 's military forces planned for since the 1920s , though real tension did not begin until the 1931 invasion of Manchuria by Japan .
Over the next decade ,  जापानी विस्तारित धीरे into चीन ,  leading to all out war between the two in 1937 .
In 1940 Japan  invaded फ्रेंच इंडोचायना in an प्रयत्न to embargo सब imports into  China , including war supplies purchased from the U.S .
This move prompted the United States to embargo all oil exports ,  अग्रणी the इम्पीरियल जापानी नेवी to अनुमान कि it था  less than two years of bunker oil remaining and to support the existing plans to seize oil resources in the Dutch East Indies .
Planning had been underway for some time on an attack on  the `` दक्षिणी संसाधन क्षेत्रफल '' to add it to the वृहद ईस्ट एशिया co-prosperity  Sphere that Japan envisioned in the Pacific .
The Philippine islands , at that time an  अमरीकी territory  , were also a Japanese target .
The Japanese military concluded that an  आक्रमण of the फिलीपीन होता provoke an  American military response .
Rather than seize and fortify the islands , and wait for the inevitable US counterattack , Japan 's military leaders instead  decided on the pre-emptive पर्ल हार्बर आक्रमण , जिससे वे assumed होता negate the अमरीकी  forces needed for the liberation and reconquest of the islands .
Planning for the attack had begun in very early  1941 , by admiral isoroku यामामोटो  .
He  आखिरकार जीती assent इससे the नवल ऊँची कमांड by , among  other things , threatening to resign .
The attack was approved in the summer at  an इम्पीरियल सम्मेलन और again  at a second Conference in the fall .
simultaneously over the साल , पायलटों  were trained , and ships prepared for its execution .
Authority for the attack was granted at the  दूसरी इम्पीरियल सम्मेलन if a राजनयिक परिणाम  satisfactory to Japan was not reached .
After final approval by Emperor Hirohito the order to attack was issued  at the शुरूआत of दिसम्बर  .
A  आम दफ्तर stapler
A  आम  school stapler
A stapler is a mechanical device that joins sheets of paper or similar material by driving a  पतला मेटल स्टेपल through the चादरें और फोल्डिंग the ends .
Staplers are widely used in government ,  कारोबार , कार्यालयों , घरों  and schools .
The word `` stapler '' can actually  refer to a क्रमांक of अलग  devices of varying uses .
In addition to joining paper sheets together ,  staplers can भी be प्रयुक्त in a सर्जिकल सेटिंग to जुड़ें ऊतक साथ साथ सर्जिकल स्टेपल्स  to close a surgical wound ( much in the same way as stitches or sutures ) .
typically , सबसे  staplers are used to join multiple sheets of paper .
Paper staplers come in  दो पृथक प्रकार : हस्तचालित और  electric .
Manual staplers are normally hand-held ,  हालांकि मॉडल कि हैं प्रयुक्त जबकि नियत on a डेस्क  or other surface are not uncommon .
इलेक्ट्रिक staplers मौजूद  in a variety of different designs and models .
Their primary  ऑपरेटिंग फलन is to जुड़ें विशाल संख्याएँ of  paper sheets together in rapid succession .
Some  इलेक्ट्रिक staplers  can join up to 20 sheets at a time .
Swallowing , known scientifically as deglutition , is the process in the human or animal body that  makes कुछ pass इससे the मुँह , to the pharynx , और into the  esophagus , while shutting the epiglottis .
If this fails  और the ऑब्जेक्ट goes through the  trachea , then choking or pulmonary aspiration can occur .
In the human body it is controlled  by the swallowing reflex  .
Thaddeus Stevens ( April 4 , 1792 – August 11 , 1868 ) , of Pennsylvania , was a leader of the Radical  रिपब्लिकन गुट of the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी और a  fierce opponent of slavery .
He was one of  the सबसे influential  members in the history of Congress .
As chairman of the powerful House Ways and Means Committee , Stevens , a witty , sarcastic speaker and flamboyant party  नेता , वर्चस्व the हाउस इससे 1861  until his death .
He wrote much of the financial legislation  कि सशुल्क लिये the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध  .
Stevens and Senator Charles Sumner were the prime leaders of  the कट्टरपंथी republicans दौरान the  war and Reconstruction era .
Scholarly views of Stevens have swung sharply since his death as  interpretations of पुनर्निर्माण have  changed .
इतिहासकारों of the dunning स्कूल ( 1890s–1940s ) आयोजित स्टीवंस जिम्मेदार लिये demanding हर्ष उपचार of the श्वेत  South and violating American traditions of republicanism , depicting Stevens as a villain for his advocacy of harsh measures in the South such as disfranchising all ex-Confederates .
This highly negative  characterization आयोजित sway into  the 1950s .
The rise of the neo-abolitionist school in the 1950s led to a strong positive appreciation of  स्टीवंस ' कार्य on सिविल अधिकारों लिये freedmen  .
A recent biographer characterizes him as , `` The Great Commoner , savior of free public education in Pennsylvania , national Republican leader in the struggles against slavery in the United States and intrepid mainstay of the attempt to secure racial  इंसाफ लिये the freedmen दौरान पुनर्निर्माण , the तभी सदस्य of the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि कभी to have महरूम ज्ञात  as the 'dictator ' of Congress . ''
Overview of  the अनुवाद of  eukaryotic messenger RNA
आरेख प्रर्दशित the अनुवाद  of mRNA and the synthesis of proteins by a ribosome
In molecular biology and genetics , translation is the  प्रक्रम through जिससे सेल्यूलर  ribosomes manufacture proteins .
It is  भाग of the प्रक्रम  of gene expression .
In translation , messenger RNA ( mRNA )  उत्पादित by ट्रांसक्रिप्शन is decoded by the राइबोसोम to उपज a विशिष्ट अमीनो एसिड कड़ी  , or polypeptide , that will later fold into an active protein .
In bacteria ,  अनुवाद occurs in the कोशिका 's कोशिकाद्रव्य , जहाँ the विशाल और  small subunits of the ribosome are located , and bind to the mRNA .
In eukaryotes , translation  occurs आरपार the झिल्ली of the endoplasmic reticulum  in a process called vectorial synthesis .
The ribosome facilitates decoding by inducing the binding of tRNAs with complementary  anticodon sequences to कि  of the mRNA .
The tRNAs carry specific amino acids that are  chained साथ into a polypeptide as the mrna  passes through and is `` read '' by the ribosome in a fashion reminiscent to that of a stock ticker and ticker tape .
In many instances , the entire  ribosome/mrna जटिल बांधता to the बाहरी झिल्ली of the अशिष्ट endoplasmic reticulum और रिलीज the nascent प्रोटीन polypeptide  inside for later vesicle transport and secretion outside of the cell .
Many types of transcribed RNA , such as transfer RNA ,  ribosomal rna , और छोटी नाभिकीय rna , do नहीं undergo  translation into proteins .
Translation  proceeds in चार phases : दीक्षा , elongation , translocation  and termination ( all describing the growth of the amino acid chain , or polypeptide that is the product of translation ) .
Amino acids are  brought to ribosomes और समवेत  into proteins .
In activation , the  सही अमीनो एसिड is covalently बंधुआ  to the correct transfer RNA ( tRNA ) .
The amino acid is  joined by इसके carboxyl  group to the 3 ' OH of the tRNA by an ester bond .
When the tRNA has an  अमीनो एसिड linked to it , it  is termed `` charged '' .
Initiation involves the small subunit of the ribosome binding to the 5 ' end of mRNA with  the सहायता of दीक्षा कारकों (  IF ) .
Termination of the  polypeptide happens जब the a साईट of the  ribosome faces a stop codon ( UAA , UAG , or UGA ) .
No tRNA can  recognize or bind to इस  codon .
Instead , the stop  codon induces the बाइंडिंग of a रिलीज फ़ैक्टर प्रोटीन कि prompts  the disassembly of the entire ribosome/mRNA complex .
A number of antibiotics act by inhibiting translation ; these include anisomycin , cycloheximide ,  chloramphenicol , tetracycline , streptomycin , erythromycin , और puromycin , among अन्य  .
Prokaryotic ribosomes have a different structure from that of eukaryotic ribosomes ,  और यूँ एंटीबायोटिक can specifically  target bacterial infections without any detriment to a eukaryotic host 's cells .
a मल्टीमीडिया  message on a mobile phone .
Multimedia Messaging Service ( MMS ) is a standard way to send messages that include  मल्टीमीडिया सामग्री to और इससे मोबाईल फोन  .
It extends the core SMS ( Short Message Service ) capability that  अनुमत एक्सचेंज of टेक्स्ट संदेश तभी up to 160 वर्ण  in length .
The most popular use is to send photographs from camera-equipped handsets , although it is also popular as a method of delivering  न्यूज और entertainment सामग्री सहित वीडियो , तस्वीरें , टेक्स्ट पृष्ठों और ringtones  .
The standard is developed by the Open Mobile  गठबंधन ( ओमो ) , हालांकि दौरान विकास it  was part of the 3GPP and WAP groups .
Smallpox was an infectious disease unique  to इंसानो , caused by either of दो  virus variants , Variola major and Variola minor .
The disease is also known by the Latin names Variola or Variola vera , derived  इससे varius ( `` spotted '' ) or varus ( `` मुंहासे '' )  .
The disease was originally known in English as the `` pox '' or `` red  प्लेग '' ; the पद `` smallpox '' थी पहला  used in Britain in the 15th century to distinguish variola from the `` great pox '' ( syphilis ) .
The last naturally occurring case of smallpox ( Variola minor )  थी diagnosed on 26 अक्तूबर 1977  .
Smallpox localized in  छोटी रक्त  vessels of the skin and in the mouth and throat .
In the  स्किन it resulted in a characteristic  maculopapular rash and , later , raised fluid-filled blisters .
V. major produces a more serious  बीमारी और रै an overall  mortality rate of 30–35 % .
V. minor causes a milder form of disease ( also known  as alastrim , cottonpox , milkpox  , whitepox , and Cuban itch ) which kills about 1 % of its victims .
Long-term complications of  V. प्रमुख संक्रमण शामिल characteristic  scars , commonly on the face , which occur in 65–85 % of survivors .
Blindness resulting from corneal ulceration and scarring , and limb deformities due to  गठिया और osteomyelitis हैं कम आम  complications , seen in about 2–5 % of cases .
Smallpox  is believed to have  emerged in human populations about 10,000 BC .
The earliest physical evidence of it is probably the pustular  खाज on the mummified देह of pharaoh ramses v of मिश्र  .
The disease killed an estimated 400,000  europeans annually दौरान the closing सालो of the 18th सदी (  including five reigning monarchs ) , and was responsible for a third of all blindness .
Of all those infected ,  20–60 % —and over 80 %  of infected children—died from the disease .
Smallpox was responsible for an estimated  300–500 लाख मौतों  during the 20th century .
As recently as 1967 , the World Health Organization ( WHO ) estimated that 15  लाख लोगों contracted the बीमारी और कि दो  million died in that year .
After  टीकाकरण अभियान throughout the 19th और 20th सदियां ,  the WHO certified the eradication of smallpox in 1979 .
Smallpox is one of two infectious diseases to have been eradicated , the  अन्य होने rinderpest , जिससे थी घोषित eradicated  in 2011 .
`` I Want to Hold Your Hand ''  is a सोंग by the  English rock band the Beatles .
Written by John Lennon and Paul McCartney , and recorded in October 1963 , it was the  पहला बीटल्स रिकार्ड to be बना using four-track  equipment .
With advance orders exceeding one million copies in the United Kingdom , `` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' would ordinarily  have गए सीधा to the शीर्ष of the अंग्रेजों रिकार्ड चार्ट on इसके दिन of रिलीज ( 29 नवम्बर 1963 ) था it नहीं महरूम  blocked by the group 's first million seller `` She Loves You `` , the Beatles ' previous UK single , which was having a resurgent spell in the top position following intense media coverage of the group .
Taking two weeks to dislodge its predecessor , `` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' stayed at number  एक लिये पाँच सप्ताह और remained in the uk शीर्ष पचास लिये  twenty-one weeks in total .
It was also the group 's first American number one , entering the  बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट on 18 जनवरी 1964 at क्रमांक  forty-five and starting the British invasion of the American music industry .
By 1 February it held the number one spot — for seven  सप्ताह — पहले होने replaced by `` वो loves तुम '' , a रिवर्स परिदृश्य of कया था  occurred in Britain , and remained in the US charts for a total of fifteen weeks .
`` i want  to Hold Your Hand '' became the Beatles ' best-selling single worldwide .
A gasser  थी a प्रकार of hot लाठी originating on the dragstrips of the संयुक्त राज्य  in the late 1950s and continued until the early 1970s .
Gassers were based on production models from the 1930s to  mid-1960s , जिससे have महरूम stripped of extraneous वज़न और jacked up using a ट्रक बीम धुरी to provide बेहतर वज़न वितरण  on acceleration ( Beam axles are also lighter than an independent front suspension ) , though a raised stock front suspension is common as well .
Common weight  कटौती तकनीकों शामिल fiberglass देह panels  , stripped interiors and plexiglass windows ( sometimes color tinted ) .
Because they were primarily  निर्मित लिये रेसिंग , ये गाड़ियाँ typically  had the engine swapped to a larger or more powerful one , the existing stock engine modified ( often heavily ) or both .
It was very common to fit a Roots supercharger and mechanical fuel injection , such as one  इससे algon , hilborn , or crower  .
With form being dictated by function , their appearance is often very top heavy and ungainly , largely due to front  ends होने उठाया उच्चतर than भण्डार , to assist in the  weight transfer during rapid acceleration ( racing ) .
Having their exhaust pipes exit through the  सामने फेंडर खूब is a आम characteristic of gassers  , as is having bodies painted in flamboyant metalflakes , pearls , and candy finishes complemented by lettering in wild fonts .
The name arose because they competed in a gasoline -fueled drag  रेसिंग क्लास , बल्कि than एक using methanol or nitromethane  .
The gasser is the predecessor  of the आधुनिक मजेदार car  .
Twelve-lead EKG of a  26-year-old  male
Electrocardiography ( ECG or EKG from ) is a transthoracic ( across the thorax or chest ) interpretation of the electrical activity of the heart over a period of time , as  detected by electrodes संलग्न to the सतह of  the skin and recorded by a device external to the body .
The  रिकॉर्डिंग उत्पादित by इस noninvasive  procedure is termed an electrocardiogram ( also ECG or EKG ) .
An ECG is used to measure the rate and regularity of heartbeats , as well as the size and position of the chambers , the presence of any damage  to the दिल , और the प्रभाव of दवाएँ or डिवाइस प्रयुक्त to  regulate the heart , such as a pacemaker .
Most ECGs are performed for diagnostic or research purposes on human hearts , but may also be  performed on पशु , प्रायः लिये निदान  of heart abnormalities or research .
Donald John Trump , Sr. ( born June  14 , 1946 ) is an अमरीकी कारोबार महारथी  , television personality and author .
He is the chairman and  अध्यक्ष of the ट्रम्प संगठन और the  founder of Trump Entertainment Resorts .
Trump 's extravagant lifestyle , outspoken manner , and role on the NBC reality show The  प्रशिक्षु have बना उसे a well-known हस्ती जो थी no .  14 on the 2012 Forbes Celebrity 100 list .
Trump is the son of Fred Trump , a wealthy  नई यॉर्क नगर real-estate  developer .
He worked for his father 's firm , Elizabeth Trump & Son , while  उपस्थित the व्हार्टन स्कूल of the विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया , और in 1968 officially joined  the company .
He was  दिए कंट्रोल of the कम्पनी in 1971 और  renamed it The Trump Organization .
In 2010 , Trump expressed an interest in becoming a candidate for president of the United States in the 2012 election  , हालांकि in may 2011 , he घोषित he होता  not be a candidate .
In December 2011 ,  ट्रम्प थी सुझाया as a संभावित  vice presidential selection by Michele Bachmann , if she were to win the Republican nomination .
`` A Change Is Gon na Come '' is a 1964 single by R & B singer-songwriter Sam  cooke , लिखा और पहला अंकित in 1963 और released अंतर्गत  the RCA Victor label shortly after his death in late 1964 .
Though only a modest hit for  cooke in तुलना साथ उसके पिछला singles  , the song came to exemplify the 1960s ' Civil Rights Movement .
The song has gained in popularity and critical  acclaim in the दशकों चूंकि इसके रिलीज , और is # 12 on  Rolling Stone 's 500 Greatest Songs of All Time .
Steam rising from the Nesjavellir Geothermal  शक्ति स्टेशन in आइसलैंड  .
Geothermal energy is thermal energy generated and  भंडारित in the धरती  .
Thermal energy is the  उर्जा कि determines  the temperature of matter .
The Geothermal energy of the Earth 's crust originates from the  असली गठन of the ग्रह ( 20 % )  and from radioactive decay of minerals ( 80 % ) .
The geothermal gradient ,  जिससे is the अंतर in तापमान between the कोर of the ग्रह और  its surface , drives a continuous conduction of thermal energy in the form of heat from the core to the surface .
The adjective geothermal originates  इससे the यूनानी जड़ें γη ( ge ) , अर्थ धरती , और θερμος  ( thermos ) , meaning hot .
At the core of the Earth , thermal energy is created by radioactive decay and temperatures  may पहुँचें over 5000 °c ( 9,000 °f  ) .
Heat conducts from the core to surrounding  कूलर चट्टान  .
The high temperature and pressure cause some rock to melt , creating magma convection upward since  it is हल्का than the ठोस  rock .
The magma  heats चट्टान और जल in the  crust , sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ) .
From hot springs , geothermal energy has  महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये स्नान चूंकि paleolithic टाइम्स और लिये स्पेस  heating since ancient Roman times , but it is now better known for electricity generation .
Worldwide , about 10,715  megawatts ( mw ) of geothermal  power is online in 24 countries .
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal heating capacity is installed  लिये ज़िला हीटिंग , स्पेस हीटिंग , स्पा  , industrial processes , desalination and agricultural applications .
Geothermal power  is लागत प्रभावी , विश्वसनीय , चिरस्थायी  , and environmentally friendly , but has historically been limited to areas near tectonic plate boundaries .
Recent technological advances have dramatically expanded  the दायरा और आकार of सुगठित संसाधन , विशेषकर लिये अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as घर हीटिंग  , opening a potential for widespread exploitation .
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases trapped deep within the earth , but these emissions  हैं much निम्नतर प्रति उर्जा ईकाई than those of  fossil fuels .
As a result , geothermal  शक्ति रै the संभावित to सहायता mitigate वैश्विक  warming if widely deployed in place of fossil fuels .
The Earth 's geothermal resources  हैं theoretically अधिक than पर्याप्त to सप्लाई  humanity 's energy needs , but only a very small fraction may be profitably exploited .
Drilling and exploration for  गहन संसाधन is बहुत महंगी  .
Forecasts for the future of geothermal power depend  on assumptions परिचय प्रौद्योगिकी , उर्जा  prices , subsidies , and interest rates .
Pilot programs like EWEB 's customer opt in Green  शक्ति कार्यक्रम दिखाएँ कि ग्राहक होता be willing  to pay a little more for a renewable energy source like geothermal .
But  as a परिणाम of सरकारी assisted शोध  and industry experience , the cost of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the past two decades .
In 2001 ,  geothermal उर्जा लागत between  two and ten cents per kwh .
Ownership of property may be private , collective , or common and  the प्रॉपर्टी may be वस्तुएँ , land/real एस्टेट  , or intellectual property .
Determining ownership in law involves determining who  रै निश्चित अधिकारों और कर्तव्य over  the property .
These rights and duties , sometimes called a  'bundle of अधिकारों ' , can be अलग और आयोजित by अलग पार्टियों  .
The question of ownership  पहुँच वापस to the प्राचीन दार्शनिकों  , Plato and Aristotle , who held different opinions on the subject .
Plato ( 428/427 BC – 348/347 BC ) thought private property created  divisive inequalities , जबकि अरस्तू ( 384 bc – 322 bc ) विचार निजी प्रॉपर्टी सक्रिय लोगों  to receive the full benefit of their labor .
Private property can circumvent what is now referred to as the “ tragedy of  the कॉमन्स ” प्रॉब्लम , जहाँ लोगों tend to रुसवा आम प्रॉपर्टी  more than they do private property .
Given a short-sighted owner , however , a  निजी प्रॉपर्टी प्रणाली can मेक ये tragedies worse—for उदाहरण , a निजी मालिक of a टुकड़ा of oil-rich प्रॉपर्टी , depending on उसके worldview  , might be more interested in short-term financial gain than incremental use with an eye toward other 's concerns ( e.g. , those of future generations , the disenfranchised , etc . ) .
While Aristotle justified  the अस्तित्व of निजी स्वामित्व , he बाएँ खोलें सवाल of ( 1 ) कैसा to allocate  property between what is private and common and ( 2 ) how to allocate the private property within society .
over the सहस्राब्दियों , और आरपार  cultures what can be property and how it is regarded culturally have varied widely .
Ownership is the basis for many other concepts that form the foundations of ancient and modern  समाजों ऐसे as धन , व्यापार , कर्ज़ , दिवालियापन , the criminality  of theft , and private vs. public property .
Ownership is the key  भवन ब्लाक in the विकास  of the capitalist socio-economic system .
आदम स्मिथ stated कि एक of the  sacred laws of justice was to guard a person 's property and possessions .
The process and  यांत्रिकी of स्वामित्व हैं fairly जटिल : एक can लाभ  , transfer and lose ownership of property in a number of ways .
To acquire property one can purchase it with money , trade it  लिये अन्य प्रॉपर्टी , प्राप्त it as a  gift , steal it , find it , make , it or homestead it .
One can transfer or lose ownership of property by selling it for money , exchanging it for other property , giving it as a gift , being robbed of it , it , or having it  stripped  from one 's ownership through legal means such as eviction , foreclosure , seizure , or taking .
Ownership is  self-propagating in कि the मालिक of कोई  property will also own the economic benefits of that property .
``  कया 's my नाम ? '' is a सोंग  recorded by Barbadian recording artist Rihanna , for her fifth studio album Loud ( 2010 ) .
Featuring guest vocals from Canadian rapper Drake , the song was released as the second single  इससे लाउड on अक्तूबर 29 , 2010 through डेफ jam रिकार्डिंग  .
The R & B song was produced by the Norwegian production duo StarGate , and was written by the  duo साथ साथ ester डीन , traci hale  , and Drake .
lyrically , it incorporates  themes of sexual intercourse and romance .
म्यूज़िक आलोचकों दिया the सोंग धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ , citing  it some of Rihanna 's best vocal work to date ; there was a praise regarding its romantic nature , as well as its sexual tones .
`` What 's My Name ? '' was a commercial success and topped the US  बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट , giving रिहाना उसके तीसरा number-one सिंगल in 2010  , as well as her eighth overall on the chart .
The song also  अव्वल the चार्ट in हंगेरियाई और the संयुक्त  Kingdom and reached the top five in Canada , Ireland , New Zealand , Norway and Slovakia .
The song received a nomination at  the 54th ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन rap/sung  Collaboration .
An accompanying music video , directed by Philip Andelman , portrays a  रोमांटिक एनकाउंटर between रिहाना और ड्रेक in a किराना स्टोर साथ साथ रोमांटिक दृश्यों between the जोड़ी और रिहाना  walking through Manhattan 's Lower East Side .
`` What 's My Name ? '' was promoted with live performances across both sides of the Atlantic , including Saturday Night Live  in अमेरिका और the श्रेणी सात finale of the x फ़ैक्टर in the संयुक्त  Kingdom .
The latter performance resulted in an investigation  इससे the देश 's मीडिया नियामक ,  Ofcom , for the raunchy nature of Rihanna 's outfit .
a गणितीय निरंतर is a खास  number , usually a real number , that is `` significantly interesting in some way '' .
Constants arise in many different areas of mathematics , with constants such as e ( mathematical constant ) | and pi| occurring in such diverse contexts as  भूगोल  , number theory and calculus .
What it means for a constant to arise `` naturally '' , and what makes a constant  `` दिलचस्प '' , is ultimately a पदार्थ of स्वाद , और कुछ गणितीय स्थिरांक  are notable more for historical reasons than for their intrinsic mathematical interest .
The more popular constants have been studied  throughout the आयु और computed  to many decimal places .
All mathematical  स्थिरांक हैं definable संख्याएँ और प्रायः हैं भी computable  numbers ( Chaitin 's constant being a significant exception ) .
Elections to the United States Senate were held on November 2 , 2010 , for 37  of the संयुक्त राज्य  Senate 's 100 seats .
( A special election on January 19 , 2010 in  मैसाचुसेट्स थी आयोजित पहले in the साल  . )
Thirty-four  of the सीटे यहूद लिये six-year  terms to the Senate 's `` class three '' , and three were special elections for shorter terms .
Of the 37 elections , 19 featured incumbent Democrats ( 7 of whom retired or were defeated in the primary ) and 18 featured  लाज़िम republicans ( आठ of जिसको रिटायर्ड or यहूद पराजित in the  primary ) .
After the previous elections ( in  2008 ) , the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट थी रचित of 58 डेमोक्रेट  , 40 Republicans , and 2 independents who caucus with the Democrats .
Republicans won four  सीटे आयोजित by retiring डेमोक्रेट  and Republicans defeated two incumbent Democrats .
This was the largest number of Republicans gains since the 1994 elections and also the first time since that  चुनाव कि republicans सफलतापूर्वक defended सब  of their own seats .
This was the fourth consecutive  चुनाव of `` क्लास 3 '' सीनेटरों जहाँ डेमोक्रेट have विफल to लाभ  seats and the third consecutive mid-term election held in a president 's first term where Republicans have picked-up seats .
Despite these Republican wins , however , the Democrats retained a majority of the Senate with 51 seats  प्लस 2 independents जो caucus साथ उन्हें , compared  to the 47 Republicans .
A solstice is an astronomical event that occurs twice each year as the Sun reaches its  उच्चतम or न्यूनतम excursion सापेक्ष to  the celestial equator on the celestial sphere .
As a result , on the  दिन of the संक्रांति , the सूर्य appears to have पहुँचे इसके उच्चतम or न्यूनतम सालाना ऊँचाई  in the sky above the horizon at local solar noon .
The word solstice is derived from the  लैटिन सोल ( सूर्य ) और sistere ( to स्टैंड स्टिल ) , क्युकी at the solstices  , the Sun stands still in declination ; that is , the seasonal movement of the Sun 's path ( as seen from Earth ) comes to a stop before reversing direction .
The solstices  , साथ  with the equinoxes , are connected with the seasons .
In many cultures the solstices mark  either the शुरूआत  or the midpoint of winter and summer .
The term solstice can also be used in a broader sense ,  as the तिथि ( दिन ) जब इस occurs  .
The day of the solstice is either the  longest दिन of the साल ( in गर्मियाँ )  or the shortest day of the year ( in winter ) for any place outside of the tropics .
Jerry Lee Lewis ( born September 29 , 1935 ) is an  अमरीकी चट्टान और फेंकें और देश म्यूज़िक singer-songwriter  and pianist .
He is known  by the उपनाम `` the कातिल '' और is प्रायः viewed  as “rock & roll 's first great wild man” .
An early  पायोनियर of चट्टान और फेंकें  music , in 1956 Lewis made his first recordings at Sun Records .
`` Crazy Arms `` sold 300,000 copies in the South , but it was his 1957 hit `` Whole Lotta  shakin ' going on `` कि शॉट लुईस to कीर्ति विश्वव्यापी .
Lewis followed this in that same year when he recorded songs such as ``  ग्रेट गेंदें of आग `` , `` breathless `` और `` ऊँची स्कूल गोपनीय  `` .
Lewis sold more records than Elvis  प्रेस्ली at इस समय .
However , Lewis ' rock 'n '  फेंकें करियर faltered in the वेक of  his marriage to his young cousin .
he था छोटी कामयाबी in the चार्ट following  the scandal and his popularity quickly faded .
His live performance fees plummeted from  $ 10,000 प्रति  night to $ 250 .
In the  meantime he थी संकल्पित  to gain back some of his popularity .
During the early 60’s he did  n't have much चार्ट कामयाबी साथ few अपवाद  such as `` What 'd I Say `` .
उसके सजीव प्रदर्शन at इस  time were increasingly wild and energetic .
His album Live at the Star Club , Hamburg  इससे 1964 is प्रायः regarded by अनेक  music journalists and fans as one of the wildest and greatest rock and roll concert albums ever .
After recording songs such as `` I 'm on Fire '' for several years  साथ छोटी कामयाबी , in 1968 लुईस बना a परिवर्तन  into country music and had hits with songs such as `` Another Place , Another Time '' .
This  reignited उसके करियर और throughout the लेट '60s  and '70s he regularly topped the country-western charts .
His # 1 country hits  शामिल `` to मेक प्रेम मीठी लिये तुम `` , `` वहीँ जरूर be  More to Love Than This `` , `` Would You Take Another Chance on Me `` and `` Me And Bobby McGee `` .
Lewis 's successes continued throughout the decade and he  embraced उसके चट्टान 'n ' फेंकें पास्ट साथ गीतों ऐसे as a कवर of the बिग bopper 's ``  Chantilly Lace `` and `` Rockin ' My Life Away `` .
In the 21st century Lewis continues to  दौरे to ऑडियंस around the संसार और  still releases new albums .
One such album , titled Last Man Standing , is  उसके बेहतरीन selling to तिथि at over a लाख  copies sold worldwide .
This was followed by  औसत बूढ़ा man जिससे रै  received some of the best sales of Lewis’s career .
Lewis has had a dozen gold records in both rock and country ,  जीती अनेक ग्रैमी  awards , including a Lifetime Achievement Award .
Lewis was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1986 ,  और उसके pioneering योगदान to the विधा रै  been recognized by the Rockabilly Hall of Fame .
In  1989 , उसके जीवन थी chronicled in  the movie Great Balls of Fire , starring Dennis Quaid .
In 2003 ,  रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका सूचीबद्ध उसके बक्सा नियत सब कातिल , no फिलर  : The Anthology number 242 on their list of `` 500 greatest albums of all time `` .
In 2004 , they ranked him number 24 on their list of the 100  महानतम कलाकारों of सब  Time .
Lewis is the last surviving member of Sun Records ' Million Dollar  quartet और the क्लास of '55 एल्बम , जिससे भी शामिल जॉनी नकदी , कार्ल  Perkins , Roy Orbison and Elvis Presley .
Henry Louis Stephens ,  बेनाम watercolor ( 1863 ) of a man पढना a समाचारपत्र साथ  headline `` Presidential Proclamation / Slavery '' .
The Emancipation Proclamation was an order issued to all segments of the Executive branch  ( सहित the फौज और नेवी ) of the संयुक्त राज्य by अध्यक्ष अब्राहम lincoln  on January 1 , 1863 , during the American Civil War .
It was based on the president 's  संवैधानिक प्राधिकार as कमांडर in मुख्य of the हथियारबंद  forces ; it was not a law passed by Congress .
It proclaimed all those enslaved in Confederate territory to be forever free , and ordered the Army ( and all segments of  the कार्यपालिका शाखा ) to दावत as फ़्री सब those enslaved in टेन  states that were still in rebellion , thus applying to 3.1 million of the 4 million slaves in the U.S .
The Proclamation could not be enforced in areas still under rebellion , but as  the फौज took कंट्रोल of confederate regions , the स्लेव in those  regions were emancipated rather than returned to their masters .
From 20,000 to 50,000 former slaves in regions where rebellion had  already महरूम subdued यहूद तत्काल emancipated  , and over 3 million more were emancipated as the Union army advanced .
The Proclamation did not apply to the five slave states that were not in rebellion , nor to most regions already controlled by the Union army ; emancipation there would come after separate  राज्य क्रियाएँ and/or the दिसम्बर 1865 अनुसमर्थन of the तेरहवीं amendment , जिससे बना गुलामी illegal everywhere  in the U.S .
the उदघोषणा किया नहीं compensate the स्वामी  , did not itself outlaw slavery , and did not make the ex-slaves ( called freedmen ) citizens .
It made the eradication of slavery  an सुस्पष्ट युद्ध लक्ष्य , in जोड  to the goal of reuniting the Union .
On September 22 , 1862 , Lincoln had issued a preliminary proclamation that he would order the emancipation of all slaves in any state of the  confederate राज्य of अमेरिका कि किया नहीं वापसी to संघ कंट्रोल  by January 1 , 1863 .
None returned , and the order , signed and issued January 1 , 1863 , took effect  मगर in स्थितियाँ जहाँ the संघ था  already mostly regained control .
The Proclamation outraged white Southerners who envisioned a race war , angered some Northern Democrats ,  सक्रिय anti-slavery शक्तियां , और weakened शक्तियां in यूरोपीय कि चाही to intervene to सहायता the confederacy  .
It also  lifted the आत्माओं of अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी दोनो in the दक्षिणी और उत्तरी राज्य , और  led to many slaves escaping their masters and running behind Union lines in order to have their emancipation enforced .
Sucker Punch is a 2011 American fantasy action film directed by Zack  स्नाइडर और co-written by उसे  and Steve Shibuya .
It  is स्नाइडर 's पहला  film based on an original script .
The film stars Emily Browning , Abbie Cornish ,  जेना malone , वैनेसा  Hudgens , Jamie Chung , and Carla Gugino .
The storyline follows the fantasies of a young woman who is committed to a mental institution  , as वो makes a योजना to एस्केप the हॉस्पिटल पहले कष्ट  a lobotomy .
The film was released  in दोनो conventional और imax थिएटर  in the United States at midnight on March 25 , 2011 .
It received generally  ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों ,  but was a moderate box office success .
Front and back of Canon PowerShot A95 , a typical  pocket-size डिजिटल  camera
Haselblad 503CW with Ixpress V96C digital back , an example  of a पेशेवर डिजिटल  camera system
A digital camera ( or digicam ) is a  कैमरा कि takes वीडियो or स्टिल छायाचित्र by  recording images on an electronic image sensor .
Most cameras sold today are digital , and  डिजिटल कैमरे हैं incorporated into अनेक डिवाइस ranging  from PDAs and mobile phones ( called camera phones ) to vehicles .
Digital and film cameras share an optical system ,  typically using a लेंस साथ a परिवर्तनीय diaphragm  to focus light onto an image pickup device .
The  diaphragm और शटर admit the सही राशि  of light to the imager , just as with film but the image pickup device is electronic rather than chemical .
However , unlike film cameras , digital cameras can display images on a screen immediately after  होने अंकित , और स्टोर  and delete images from memory .
Many digital cameras can also  रिकार्ड चलती वीडियो साथ ध्वनि  .
Some digital cameras can crop and  सिलाई तस्वीरें और perform  other elementary image editing .
The inside and front of a Dell  poweredge वेब सर्वर , a कंप्यूटर designed  for rack mounting
Multiple web servers may be used for a high  ट्रैफ़िक जालस्थल , यहाँ चार सूर्य आग x4200 सर्वर हैं  installed together
Web server can refer to either the hardware ( the computer ) or the software ( the computer application  ) कि helps to उद्धार वेब सामग्री कि can be पहुँचा through the अंतरजाल  .
The most common use of web servers is to host websites , but there are  अन्य उपयोग ऐसे as गेमिंग , आंकड़ा भंडार or कार्यशील  enterprise applications .
The American Red Cross ( ARC ) , also known as the American National Red  क्रॉस , is a humanitarian संगठन कि provides आपात  assistance , disaster relief and education inside the United States .
It is the designated U.S. affiliate of the International Federation of Red Cross and  रेड crescent समाजों .
Today , in addition to domestic disaster relief , the American Red Cross offers services in five other areas : community  सेवाएं कि सहायता the मोहताज ; संचार सेवाएं और सुकून लिये सैन्य सदस्यों और उनके परिवार सदस्यों ; the संग्रहण , प्रसंस्करण और  distribution of blood and blood products ; educational programs on preparedness , health , and safety ; and international relief and development programs .
Issued a corporate charter by the United States Congress under Title 36 of the United States Code , Section 3001 , the American National Red Cross is governed by volunteers and supported by  जातियाँ दान , आय इससे स्वास्थ्य और सुरक्षा प्रशिक्षण और उत्पाद , और आय इससे रक्त उत्पाद .
The American Red Cross  is headquartered in वॉशिंगटन  , D.C .
The Chairman of the Board of Governors ,  सेवारत उसके दूसरी three-year पद , is bonnie mcelveen-hunter  .
The current President and Chief  कार्यपालिका अधिकारी is गेल  J. McGovern .
A  मुर्गा in कोसोवो
A rooster , showing wattles  , earlobes और कंघी
A  मुर्गा crowing (  with audio )
सही
A rooster ( also called a cockerel or cock ) is a  पुरूष gallinaceous बर्ड  .
It  प्रायः refers to a पुरूष  chicken ( Gallus gallus ) .
Immature male chickens less  than एक साल बूढ़ा हैं पुकारा cockerels  .
The term `` rooster '' originates in the United States , and the term is widely used  throughout उत्तर अमेरिका , as खूब as ऑस्ट्रेलिया  and New Zealand .
In the United Kingdom and Ireland the  पुरानी पद `` cockerel '' is अधिक commonly  used .
`` Cock '' is in general use as the  नाम लिये a पुरूष of अन्य प्रजाति  of bird , for example `` Cock sparrow '' .
`` Roosting '' is the action of perching  aloft to नींद at रात्रि  , and is done by both sexes .
The rooster is polygamous , but  can नहीं गार्ड अनेक nests  of eggs at once .
He guards the general area where his hens are nesting ,  और होगा आक्रमण अन्य roosters कि  enter his territory .
During the daytime , he usually sits on a high perch , usually 3–5 feet  बंद the मैदान to serve as a lookout लिये उसके झुण्ड  .
He  होगा ध्वनि a distinctive  alarm call if predators are nearby .
The Pokémon Trading Card Game ( Pokémon TCG ) is a collectible card game based on the Pokémon video game  श्रेणी , पहला प्रकाशित in अक्तूबर 1996 by  Media Factory in Japan .
In the US  , it थी initially प्रकाशित by wizards  of the Coast , the company that produces , in December 1998 .
Nintendo  took over प्रकाशन  in June 2003 .
It  is एक of निन्टेंडो 's पिछला  remaining strong links to its heritage as a playing card company .
Land Rover is a British car manufacturer with its headquarters in Gaydon , Warwickshire ,  संयुक्त किंगडम जिससे specialises in four-wheel-drive  vehicles .
It is part of the Jaguar Land Rover group , a  subsidiary of tata मोटर्स of  India .
it is the दूसरी oldest four-wheel-drive  car brand in the world ( after Jeep ) .
The Land Rover name  थी originally प्रयुक्त by the रोवर कम्पनी लिये  one specific vehicle model , named simply the Land Rover , launched by Rover in 1948 .
Over the following years it developed  into a marque encompassing a दायरा of four-wheel-drive मॉडल , सहित  the Defender , Discovery , Freelander , Range Rover , Range Rover Sport and Range Rover Evoque .
Land Rovers  हैं फिलहाल समवेत in the कम्पनी 's halewood और solihull पौधे , साथ  research and development taking place at JLR 's Gaydon and Whitley engineering centres .
Land Rover sold  194,000 वाहनों विश्वव्यापी  in 2009 .
Although the brand originates from the original 1948 model , Land  रोवर as a कम्पनी रै तभी existed चूंकि 1978  .
Prior to this , it was a product line of the Rover Company which was subsequently  अवशोषित into the rover-triumph प्रभाग of the अंग्रेजों  Leyland Motor Corporation ( BL ) following Leyland Motor Corporation ’s takeover of Rover in 1967 .
The ongoing commercial success of the original Land Rover series models , and latterly  the दायरा रोवर in the 1970s in the midst of bl’s खूब प्रलेखित कारोबार परेशानियों prompted the स्थापना  of a separate Land Rover company but still under the BL umbrella , remaining part of the subsequent Rover Group in 1988 , under the ownership of British Aerospace after the remains of British Leyland were broken up and privatised .
In  1994 रोवर समूह  plc was acquired by BMW .
In 2000 , Rover Group was broken-up by BMW and Land Rover was sold  to घाट मोटर कम्पनी , बनने  part of its Premier Automotive Group .
In 2006 Ford  खरीदा the रोवर ब्रांड इससे bmw लिये  around £6 million .
This reunited the Rover and Land Rover brands for the first time since 2000  जब the रोवर समूह  was broken up by BMW .
In June 2008 , Ford sold both Land  रोवर और जैगुआर गाड़ियाँ  to Tata Motors .
This sale  भी शामिल the dormant  Rover brand
The cover of the  पहला dvd संकलन released  by Aniplex of The New Captain Shūsuke Amagai arc
The ninth  ऋतु of the ब्लीच  anime series is named .
The  श्रेणी is आधारित  on Tite Kubo 's manga with same name .
The episodes are directed  by noriyuki abe और  produced by TV Tokyo , Dentsu , and Studio Pierrot .
The episodes ' plot focuses on the introduction of a new Soul Reaper captain , Shūsuke Amagai ,  और the रहस्य surrounding the kasumiōji गोत्र  , one of the families that constitute the nobility of Soul Society .
The season began airing on  अप्रैल 23 , 2008 in जापानी on tv टोकियो और ended  on October 7 , 2008 .
The English adaptation of the Bleach anime is  licensed by viz मीडिया , और इस चाप began airing on अगस्त 28 ,  2010 on Cartoon Network 's Adult Swim , and finished on January 29 , 2011 .
Five DVD compilations , each containing four episodes of the season , have been released by Aniplex ;  the पहला dvd संकलन थी released  on November 26 , 2008 and the fifth on March 25 , 2009 .
A DVD box will be  प्रकाशित by viz मीडिया on दिसम्बर  13 , 2011 .
The episodes use three pieces of theme music : one  खोलने थीम और दो closing  themes .
The opening theme is ``  chu-bura `` by kelun  .
The first closing theme is `` Orange '' by  lil'b , प्रयुक्त लिये एपीसोड 168 to 179 , और the दूसरी closing  theme is `` Gallop '' by pe'zmoku , used for the remainder of the episodes .
The regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated powers of the federal government ; Under the Tenth Amendment to the United States  संविधान , it is इसलिए exclusively the डोमेन of the राज्य to परमिट , prohibit , or वरना विनियमित वाणिज्यिक sex , मगर  insofar as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the Mann Act .
In most states , prostitution is considered a  misdemeanor in the श्रेणी of पब्लिक  order crime , a crime that disrupts the order of a community .
it थी at एक समय  considered to be a vagrancy crime .
Currently , Nevada is the only state to allow brothel  वेश्यावृति , the शर्तें of जिससे हैं stipulated in the नेवाडा  Revised Statutes .
Only 8  काउंटी फिलहाल contain क्रियाशील  brothels .
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las  vegas–paradise महानगर क्षेत्रफल ) , washoe काउंटी ( जिससे contains रेनो ) , कार्सन नगर  , Douglas County , and Lincoln County .
The other counties theoretically allow brothel prostitution ,  लकिन कुछ of ये काउंटी  currently have no active brothels .
Street prostitution , `` pandering , '' and   living off of the proceeds of a prostitute remain illegal under Nevada law , as elsewhere in the country .
As with other countries , prostitution in the United States can be divided into three broad categories : street  वेश्यावृति , वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति , और अनुरक्षण  prostitution .
The East Coast of the United States , also known as the Eastern Seaboard or the Atlantic  seaboard और commonly shortened to ईस्ट coast , refers to the  easternmost coast of the United States along the Atlantic Ocean .
The states which have shoreline on the East Coast  हैं , इससे उत्तर to दक्षिण , the u.S. राज्य of maine , नई हैम्पशायर , मैसाचुसेट्स , rhode द्वीप , कनेक्टिकट , नई  York , New Jersey , Delaware , Maryland , Virginia , North Carolina , South Carolina , Georgia , and Florida .
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9 , 1913 – April 22 , 1994 ) was  the 37th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य , सेवारत इससे 1969 to  1974 , when he became the only president to resign the office .
Nixon had previously served as a Republican U.S. representative and senator from  कैलिफ़ोर्निया और as the 36th वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य  from 1953 to 1961 .
निक्सन थी born  in Yorba Linda , California .
He graduated from Whittier College in 1934 and Duke University  स्कूल of विधि in 1937 , returning to कैलिफ़ोर्निया  to practice law .
He and his  बीवी , पैट निक्सन ,  moved to Washington to work for the federal government in 1942 .
He subsequently served in the  संयुक्त राज्य नेवी दौरान संसार  War II .
Nixon was elected in  कैलिफ़ोर्निया to the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  in 1946 and to the Senate in 1950 .
His pursuit of the Alger Hiss case  स्थापित उसके प्रतिष्ठा as a अग्रणी anti-communist  , and elevated him to national prominence .
He was the  कार्यशील mate of ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर , the रिपब्लिकन  Party presidential nominee in the 1952 election .
निक्सन परोसा लिये आठ  years as vice president .
He waged an unsuccessful presidential campaign in 1960 , narrowly losing to John F. Kennedy ,  और खोया a रेस लिये राज्यपाल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया in 1962  .
In 1968 , he ran again for  the प्रेसिडेंसी  and was elected .
Although Nixon initially escalated America 's  भागीदारी in the वियतनाम युद्ध , he subsequently ended  U.S. involvement in 1973 .
Nixon 's visit to the People 's Republic of China in 1972  खोली राजनयिक संबंध between the दो  nations , and he initiated détente and the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty with the Soviet Union the same year .
Domestically , his  प्रशासन generally embraced नीतियों कि  transferred power from Washington to the states .
Among other things , he launched initiatives to fight cancer and illegal drugs , imposed wage and price controls , enforced  desegregation of कुछ दक्षिणी स्कूलों , और स्थापित the पर्यावरणीय  Protection Agency .
Though he presided over the  चंद्र अवतरण शुरूआत साथ अपोलो 11 , he scaled वापस मानवयुक्त  space exploration .
He was  re-elected  by a landslide in 1972 .
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo , the resignation of his vice president , Spiro Agnew , and a continuing series of  खुलासे परिचय the वाटरगेट कांड और अन्य misconduct by सदस्यों  of the administration .
The scandal escalated , costing Nixon much of his political support , and on  अगस्त 9 , 1974 , he resigned in the फेस of लगभग निश्चित महाभियोग  and removal from office .
After his resignation  , he controversially प्राप्त  a pardon issued by his successor , Gerald Ford .
In retirement , Nixon 's work as an  elder statesman , authoring अनेक किताबे और undertaking अनेक विदेशी  trips , helped to rehabilitate his public image .
He suffered a debilitating  स्ट्रोक on अप्रैल 18 , 1994 , और died  four days later at the age of 81 .
Sertraline hydrochloride ( trade names Zoloft , Lustral  ) is an antidepressant of the चयनात्मक serotonin reuptake inhibitor  ( SSRI ) class .
It was  introduced to the  market by Pfizer in 1991 .
Sertraline is primarily prescribed for major depressive disorder in adult outpatients as well as  obsessive–compulsive , दहशत , और सोशल चिंता विकार in दोनो वयस्कों और children .
In 2011 , it was the second-most prescribed antidepressant on the U.S. retail  मार्केट , साथ 37,208,000 prescriptions  .
the efficacy of sertraline लिये अवसाद  is similar to that of older tricyclic antidepressants , but its side effects are much less pronounced .
Differences with newer  antidepressants हैं subtler  and also mostly confined to side effects .
Evidence suggests that  sertraline may कार्य बेहतर than fluoxetine ( prozac )  for some subtypes of depression .
Treatment of panic disorder with sertraline results in  a significant घटी of the क्रमांक of दहशत  attacks and in improved quality of life .
For obsessive-compulsive disorder , sertraline is not as effective as cognitive behavioral therapy ; the best  परिणाम have महरूम हासिल by combining ये  two treatments .
Although approved for social phobia and posttraumatic stress disorder , sertraline leads to only  modest सुधार in ये शर्तें  .
sertraline भी alleviates the लक्षण of premenstrual  dysphoric disorder and can be used in sub-therapeutic doses or intermittently for its treatment .
Sertraline shares the common side effects and contraindications of other SSRIs , with high rates of nausea , diarrhea , insomnia , and sexual side effects ; however , it does  नहीं कारण वज़न लाभ , और इसके प्रभाव on दोनो संज्ञान और सतर्कता  are relatively mild .
In pregnant women taking sertraline , the drug was present in significant  एकाग्रता in fetal रक्त , और थी भी संबद्ध साथ a उच्चतर रेट of विभिन्न  birth defects .
Similarly to other  antidepressants , the उपयोग of sertraline लिये अवसाद may  be associated with a higher rate of suicidality .
The Five Heartbeats is a 1991 musical drama film directed by Robert Townsend , who  co-wrote the स्क्रिप्ट साथ keenan  Ivory Wayans .
Distributed by 20th Century Fox ,  the फिल्मी 's प्रमुख डाल शामिल टाउनसेंड , माइकल राइट , लिओन रॉबिन्सन , हैरी  J. Lennix , Tico Wells , Harold Nicholas of the Nicholas Brothers , and Diahann Carroll .
The plot of  the फिल्मी ( जिससे is loosely आधारित on the जीवनदान of अनेक कलाकारों : the dells ,  The Temptations , Four Tops , Wilson Pickett , James Brown , Frankie Lymon , Sam Cooke and others ) follows the three decade career of the R & B vocal group The Five Heartbeats .
The film depicts the rise and fall of a Motown inspired soul act through the eyes of the film 's main protagonist ,  डोनाल्ड `` बतख '' matthews ( portrayed by टाउनसेंड ) , जो serves  as a narrator throughout the film .
However , a  बहुमत of the सिनेमा is प्रस्तुत in a लगातार समय लकीर  as opposed to traditional flash backs .
The film  शामिल a significant राशि of असली म्यूज़िक conceived by विभिन्न कलाकारों लिये the  film 's soundtrack , including singles such as `` A Heart Is a House for Love `` , `` We Have n't Finished Yet '' , and `` Nothing But Love '' .
The film was released to most North American audiences March 29 , 1991 however  it थी नहीं बना उपलब्धियाँ to ऑडियंस in अन्य महाद्वीपों  until 2002 when a DVD was released prior to another DVD release in 2006 for the film 's 15th anniversary .
The movie received mixed  समीक्षाएँ इससे  critics .
Secretariat ( March 30 , 1970 – October 4 , 1989  ) थी an अमरीकी thoroughbred racehorse कि in 1973 became the  first U.S . Triple Crown champion in 25 years .
He set  रेस रिकॉर्ड in सब तीन कार्यक्रम in the श्रेणी — the केंटकी डर्बी  ( 1:59.4 ) , the Preakness Stakes ( 1:53 ) , and the Belmont Stakes ( 2:24 ) — records that still stand today .
He is  माना to be एक of the महानतम  Thoroughbreds of all time .
In 1999 , ESPN ranked Secretariat the 35th best athlete of the 20th  सदी , the उच्चतम रैंकिंग racehorse  on the list URL_http .
He ranked second behind Man  o ' युद्ध in the blood-horse 's सूची of the शीर्ष 100 u.S. racehorses  of the 20th Century .
सचिवालय थी sired  by Bold Ruler out of Somethingroyal , by Princequillo .
He was  foaled at the मर्ग  in Caroline County , Virginia .
Like his famous predecessor Man o ' War , Secretariat was  a विशाल शाहबलूत टट्टू और थी दिए the वही उपनाम , `` बिग रेड  . ''
Secretariat 's grandsire ,  nasrullah , is भी the great-great-grandsire  of 1977 Triple Crown winner Seattle Slew .
Owned by Penny Chenery , he was trained by Lucien Laurin and mainly ridden by Canadian jockey Ron Turcotte , along with apprentice  jockey पॉल फेलिसियानो ( पहला दो दौड़ ) , और दिग्गज एडी मेपल ( पिछला  race ) .
He raced in Chenery 's Meadow  stable 's ब्लू और श्वेत  checkered colors and his groom was Eddie Sweat .
सचिवालय stood लगभग लम्बा , और  weighed , with a 75-inch girth , in his racing prime .
A typical 12 V  , 40 ah lead-acid  car battery
An automotive battery is a type of rechargeable battery that  आपूर्तियाँ इलेक्ट्रिक उर्जा to an ऑटोमोबाइल  .
Usually this refers to an SLI battery ( starting ,  lighting , प्रज्वलन ) to शक्ति the प्रारंभ मोटर , the  lights , and the ignition system of a vehicle’s engine .
ऑटोमोटिव sli बैटरी हैं प्रायः lead-acid प्रकार  , and are made of six galvanic cells in series to provide a 12 volt system .
Each cell provides 2.1  volts लिये a कुल of  12.6 volt at full charge .
Heavy vehicles such as highway trucks or tractors  , प्रायः equipped साथ डीज़ल इंजन  , may have two batteries in series for a 24 volt system , or may have parallel strings of batteries .
Lead-acid batteries are made up  of प्लेटों of सीसे और पृथक प्लेटों of सीसे डाइऑक्साइड , जिससे हैं submerged  into an electrolyte solution of about 38 % sulfuric acid and 62 % water .
This causes a  रासायनिक प्रतिक्रिया कि रिलीज electrons , allowing  them to flow through conductors to produce electricity .
As the battery discharges , the acid of the  electrolyte प्रतिक्रियाएँ साथ the सामग्री of  the plates , changing their surface to lead sulfate .
When the battery is recharged , the chemical  प्रतिक्रिया is reversed : the सीसे सल्फेट reforms  into lead dioxide and lead .
With the plates restored to their original  कंडीशन , the प्रक्रम may अभी  be repeated .
Battery recycling of automotive batteries reduces the  need लिये संसाधन जरूरी लिये manufacture of नई  batteries , diverts toxic lead from landfills , and prevents risk of improper disposal .
Full-time employment is employment in which a  व्यक्ति works a न्यूनतम  number of hours defined as such by his/her employer .
Full-time employment often comes with benefits that are not typically offered to part-time , temporary ,  or लचीली मजदूर , ऐसे as सालाना छोड़ ,  sickleave , and health insurance .
full-time कार्य हैं प्रायः  considered careers .
They  generally अदा अधिक  than part-time jobs , and usually carry more hours per week .
The Fair Labor Standards Act (  flsa ) करता नहीं define full-time नियुक्ति  or part-time employment .
This is a matter generally to be  संकल्पित by the नियोक्ता ( us  Department of Labor ) .
The definition by employer can vary and is generally published  in a कम्पनी 's कर्मचारी  Handbook .
Companies commonly require from 30–35 or 40 hours per week to be defined as full-time  और इसलिए योग्य लिये  benefits .
Full-Time status varies  between कम्पनी और is प्रायः आधारित on the शिफ़्ट  the employee must work during each work week .
The `` standard '' work week consists of five eight-hour days  , commonly  served between 9:00AM to 5:00PM totaling 40 hours .
While a  four-day सप्ताह generally consists of चार ten-hour दिनों  ; it may also consist of as little as nine hours for a total of a 36 hour work week .
Twelve-hour shifts are often  तीन दिनों प्रति सप्ताह , जबतक the कम्पनी  has the intention of paying out the employee overtime .
Overtime  is legally सशुल्क आउट anytime an कर्मचारी works  more than 40 hours per week .
The legal minimum for  ओवरटाइम starts  at Base Pay + One-Half .
The increased payout is considered to compensate slightly for the increased fatigue which a  व्यक्ति अनुभवों on  such long shifts .
Shifts can also be very  irregular , as in खुदरा , लकिन  are still full-time if the required number of hours is reached .
There are some situations where a person who needs full-time work is dropped to part-time , which is  sometimes a रूप of constructive dismissal to avoid paying बेरोजगारी लाभ  to a laid-off worker .
Seahorse is the title given to 54  प्रजाति of समुद्री मछली in  the genus Hippocampus .
`` Hippocampus '' comes from the Ancient Greek hippos meaning ``  घोड़ा '' और kampos अर्थ  `` sea monster '' .
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the Congress of the United  राज्य as शीर्षक ii of the व्यापक ड्रग गाली रोकथाम  and Control Act of 1970 .
The CSA is the federal U.S.  ड्रग नीति अंतर्गत जिससे the manufacture , importation  , possession , use and distribution of certain substances is regulated .
The Act also  परोसा as the नेशनल implementing  legislation for the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs .
The legislation created five Schedules ( classifications ) ,  साथ varying योग्यता लिये  a substance to be included in each .
Two federal agencies , the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug  प्रशासन , determine जिससे substances हैं added to or removed इससे the विभिन्न schedules , हालांकि the statute passed by कॉंग्रेस निर्मित the आरंभिक लिस्टिंग , और कॉंग्रेस रै sometimes अनुसूचित अन्य substances through विधान ऐसे as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of  2000 , which placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I . Classification decisions are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ) , currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States , and international treaties .
माया numerals
Maya numerals are a  vigesimal ( आधार - बीस  ) numeral system used by the Pre-Columbian Maya civilization .
The numerals are made up of three  प्रतीकों ; शून्य ( शेल आकार ) ,  one ( a dot ) and five ( a bar ) .
For example , thirteen is written as three dots in a  आड़ा पंक्ति ऊपर दो आड़ा  lines stacked above each other .
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( August 27 , 1908 – January 22 , 1973 ) , often  referred to as lbj , थी the 36th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1963–1969 ) , a स्थिति he assumed  after his service as the 37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ) .
He is one of only four people who  परोसा in सब चार निर्वाचित संघीय कार्यालयों of the संयुक्त राज्य :  Representative , Senator , Vice President , and President .
Johnson , a Democrat from Texas , served as a United  राज्य प्रतिनिधि इससे 1937–1949 और as a सीनेटर इससे 1949–1961 , सहित छह सालो as संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट  Majority Leader , two as Senate Minority Leader and two as Senate Majority Whip .
After  campaigning unsuccessfully  for the Democratic nomination in 1960 , Johnson was asked by John F. Kennedy to be his running mate for the 1960 presidential election .
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the assassination of John F. Kennedy on November 22 , 1963 , completed Kennedy 's term and was  निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष in उसके अपना सही , जीतना by a विशाल हाशिया over बैरी  Goldwater in the 1964 election .
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic Party and as President , he was responsible for designing the  `` ग्रेट समाज `` विधान कि शामिल कानून कि  upheld civil rights , public broadcasting , Medicare , Medicaid , environmental protection , aid to education , and his `` War on Poverty . ''
जॉनसन थी प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके domineering व्यक्तित्व  and the `` Johnson treatment , '' his coercion of powerful politicians in order to advance legislation .
Meanwhile , Johnson escalated American involvement in the Vietnam War ,  इससे 16,000 अमरीकी advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 कॉम्बैट  troops in early 1968 , as American casualties soared and the peace process bogged down .
The involvement stimulated a large angry  antiwar गति आधारित विशेषकर on विश्वविद्यालयों  campuses in the U.S. and abroad .
Summer riots broke out in most major cities after 1965 , and crime rates  soared , as उसके प्रतिद्वंद्वियों उठाया  demands for `` law and order '' policies .
The Democratic Party split in multiple feuding factions  , और बाद जॉनसन किया poorly in the 1968 नई हैम्पशायर प्राथमिक  , he ended his bid for reelection .
रिपब्लिकन रिचर्ड  Nixon was elected to succeed him .
Historians argue that Johnson 's presidency marked the  शिखर of आधुनिक उदारतावाद in the संयुक्त  States after the New Deal era .
Johnson is ranked favorably by  कुछ इतिहासकारों क्युकी  of his domestic policies .
प्रोजेस्टेरोन भी ज्ञात as p4 ( pregn-4-ene-3,20-dione ) is a c-21 स्टेरॉयड हार्मोन  involved in the female menstrual cycle , pregnancy ( supports gestation ) and embryogenesis of humans and other species .
Progesterone belongs to a class of hormones  पुकारा progestogens , और is the प्रमुख naturally  occurring human progestogen .
Big  बर्ड is a समर्थक of  the children 's television show Sesame Street .
Officially  performed by caroll spinney चूंकि 1969 , he is an eight-foot  two-inch ( 249 cm ) tall bright primrose-yellow bird .
He can roller skate , ice skate ,  नृत्य , गाओ , लिखें काव्य  , draw and even ride a unicycle .
But despite this wide array of talents , he is prone to frequent misunderstandings , on one occasion even singing the alphabet as one  बिग long शब्द ( इससे the सोंग पुकारा `` abc-def-ghi , '' सुनाया `` ab-keddef-gajihkel-monop-quristuv-wixyz  '' ) , pondering what it could ever mean .
He lives in a large nest behind the 123  तिल गली brownstone और रै a टेडी भालू नामित  Radar .

It provides web , social , and mobile  analytics और अन्य तन्त्र  solutions related to marketing intelligence .

The Second Crusade (  1145–1149 ) थी the दूसरी प्रमुख crusade  launched from Europe .
The Second Crusade was started in  जवाब to the पतन of the काउंटी of edessa the पिछला  year to the forces of Zengi .
The county had been founded during the First  crusade ( 1096–1099 ) by baldwin  of Boulogne in 1098 .
While it was the first Crusader state to be founded , it  थी भी the पहला to  fall .
The Second Crusade was announced by Pope Eugene III , and was the first of the crusades to be led by European kings , namely Louis VII of France  और कोनराड iii of जर्मनी , साथ सहायता इससे a क्रमांक of  other European nobles .
the सेना of the दो किंग्स marched separately  across Europe .
After crossing Byzantine territory into Anatolia , both armies  यहूद separately पराजित  by the Seljuq Turks .
The main Western  ईसाई सोर्स , odo of deuil  , and Syriac Christian sources claim that the Byzantine emperor Manuel I Comnenus secretly hindered the crusaders ' progress , particularly in Anatolia where he is alleged to have deliberately ordered Turks to attack them .
Louis and Conrad and the  remnants of उनके सेना पहुँचे जेरूसलम और , in  1148 , participated in an ill-advised attack on Damascus .
The  crusade in the ईस्ट थी a विफलता लिये the crusaders  and a great victory for the Muslims .
It would ultimately have a key influence on the fall of  जेरूसलम और दे वृद्धि to the तीसरा crusade at  the end of the 12th century .
the तभी कामयाबी of the दूसरी crusade आए to  a combined force of 13,000 Flemish , Frisian , Norman , English , Scottish , and German crusaders in 1147 .
Travelling from  इंग्लैण्ड , by जलयान , to the पावन जमीन , the फौज रोका और helped the छोटी ( 7,000 ) पुर्तगाली  army in the capture of Lisbon , expelling its Moorish occupants .
Wal-Mart Stores , Inc. ( ) , branded as Walmart , is  an अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय खुदरा  corporation that runs chains of large discount department stores and warehouse stores .
The company is the world 's third largest public corporation , according to the Fortune Global 500 list in 2012 , the  biggest निजी नियोक्ता in the संसार साथ over दो लाख कर्मचारी , और is  the largest retailer in the world .
Walmart  remains a family-owned कारोबार , as the कम्पनी is नियंत्रित  by the Walton family , who own a 48 percent stake in Walmart .
It is also  एक of the संसार 's सबसे  valuable companies .
The company was founded by Sam Walton in 1962 , incorporated on October 31 , 1969 ,  और सरेआम traded on the नई यॉर्क भण्डार एक्सचेंज  in 1972 .
It is  headquartered in  Bentonville , Arkansas .
Walmart is also the largest  किराना रिटेलर in the संयुक्त  States .
In 2009 , it  उत्पन्न 51 प्रतिशत of इसके us $ 258 अरब  sales in the U.S. from grocery business .
It also owns and  operates the sam 's क्लबों खुदरा warehouses  in North America .
By 1988 ,  wal-mart थी the सबसे लाभप्रद रिटेलर in the us , और  by November 1990 , it outsold K-mart .
By 1991 it outsold Sears in  खुदरा , बनाना it अमेरिका 's largest रिटेलर , a भेद  it still holds .
Walmart has 8,500  स्टोर्स in 15 देशों , अंतर्गत  55 different names .
The company operates under the Walmart name in the United States ,  सहित the 50 राज्य और प्यूर्टो रीको  .
It operates in  मैक्सिको as walmex , in the संयुक्त  Kingdom as Asda , in Japan as Seiyu , and in India as Best Price .
It has wholly owned operations  in अर्जेंटीना ,  Brazil , and Canada .
Walmart 's investments outside North America have had mixed results : its operations in the United Kingdom , South America , and  चीन हैं अत्यधिक कामयाब , whereas ventures in जर्मनी और दक्षिण कोरियाई यहूद  unsuccessful .
Robert William Gary Moore ( 4 April 1952 – 6 February 2011 ) , was a Northern Irish musician , most widely  recognised as a सिंगर और  guitarist .
In a career dating back to the 1960s , Moore played with artists including Phil Lynott  और ब्रायन downey दौरान उसके  teens , leading him to memberships with the Irish bands Skid Row and Thin Lizzy on three separate occasions .
Moore shared the stage  साथ ऐसे ब्लूज़ और चट्टान luminaries as  B.B . King , Albert King , Colosseum II , George Harrison and Greg Lake , as well as having a successful solo career .
He guested on a number of albums recorded by high profile musicians , including a cameo appearance playing  the सीसे गिटार सोलो on `` वो 's my baby `` इससे traveling wilburys  Vol . 3 .
An example of rack mounted  सर्वर
A web hosting service is a type of Internet hosting service that allows individuals and  संगठन to मेक उनके जालस्थल accessible  via the World Wide Web .
Web hosts are companies that provide  स्पेस on a सर्वर स्वामित्व or leased  for use by clients , as well as providing Internet connectivity , typically in a data center .
Web hosts can also provide data center space and connectivity to the Internet for other servers  स्तिथ in उनके आंकड़ा बीच , पुकारा colocation  , also known as Housing in Latin America or France .
The scope of web hosting  सेवाएं  varies greatly .
The most basic is web page and small-scale file  होस्टिंग , जहाँ फाइलें can be अपलोड via संचिका ट्रांसफ़र  Protocol ( FTP ) or a Web interface .
The files are usually  वितरित to the वेब `` as is '' or साथ  minimal processing .
Many Internet  सेवा प्रदाताओं ( isps  ) offer this service free to subscribers .
Individuals and organizations may also obtain Web  पेज होस्टिंग इससे वैकल्पिक सेवा  providers .
Personal web  साईट होस्टिंग is  typically free , advertisement-sponsored , or inexpensive .
Business  वेब साईट होस्टिंग प्रायः  has a higher expense depending upon the size and type of the website .
Single page  होस्टिंग is generally  sufficient for personal web pages .
A complex site calls for a more comprehensive package that provides database support  और अनुप्रयोग विकास प्लेटफ़ॉर्म ( e.g . पीएचपी , जावा , माणिक्य on  Rails , ColdFusion , or ASP.NET ) .
These facilities allow  ग्राहक to लिखें or स्थापना स्क्रिप्ट लिये अनुप्रयोग  like forums and content management .
Also , Secure Sockets  परत ( एसएसएल ) is typically  used for e-commerce .
The host may also provide an interface or control  फलक लिये मैनेजिंग the वेब सर्वर और installing स्क्रिप्ट , as खूब as अन्य मौड्यूल और  service applications like e-mail .
Some hosts specialize in certain software or services ( e.g . e-commerce ) ,  जिससे हैं commonly प्रयुक्त  by larger companies that outsource network infrastructure .
Obstetrics ( from the Latin obstare , `` to stand by '' ) is the medical specialty dealing with the care of all women 's  reproductive tracts और उनके children दौरान गर्भावस्था ( prenatal काल  ) , childbirth and the postnatal period .
Many obstetricians  हैं भी स्त्रीरोग , अर्थ  they perform in both specialties .
In the  संयुक्त राज्य , ये physicians  are commonly referred to as OB/GYNs .
The Wright brothers , Orville ( August 19 , 1871 – January 30 , 1948 ) and Wilbur ( April 16 , 1867 – May 30 , 1912 ) , were two American brothers , inventors , and aviation pioneers who were credited with inventing and building the world 's first successful  वायुयान और बनाना the पहला नियंत्रित , संचालित और sustained heavier-than-air इंसान  flight , on December 17 , 1903 .
From 1905 to 1907  , the भाइयो विकसित उनके उड़ती  machine into the first practical fixed-wing aircraft .
Although not the first to build and fly experimental aircraft  , the राइट भाइयो यहूद the पहला to इफ़तेरा वायुयान  controls that made fixed-wing powered flight possible .
The brothers '  आधारभूत भेदन थी उनके आविष्कार of three-axis  control , which enabled the pilot to steer the aircraft effectively and to maintain its equilibrium .
इस विधि became मानक और remains  standard on fixed-wing aircraft of all kinds .
From the beginning of their aeronautical work , the Wright brothers focused on developing a reliable method of pilot  कंट्रोल as the कुंजी to solving `` the  flying problem '' .
This approach differed significantly from other  experimenters of the समय जो put अधिक जोर on विकासशील  powerful engines .
Using a small homebuilt wind tunnel , the Wrights also collected more accurate data than any before , enabling  उन्हें to डिज़ाइन और निर्माण विंग्स और propellers कि यहूद अधिक कुशल  than any before .
Their first U.S. patent , 821,393 , did not claim invention of a flying machine , but rather ,  the आविष्कार of a प्रणाली of aerodynamic कंट्रोल  that manipulated a flying machine 's surfaces .
They gained the mechanical skills  अनिवार्य लिये उनके कामयाबी by working  for years in their shop with printing presses , bicycles , motors , and other machinery .
Their work with  साइकिल in particular बहकावे उनके विश्वास कि  an unstable vehicle like a flying machine could be controlled and balanced with practice .
From 1900 until their first powered flights in late 1903 , they  conducted extensive glider परीक्षण कि भी विकसित उनके कौशल  as pilots .
Their bicycle shop employee Charlie  टेलर became an महत्वपूर्ण भाग of the टोली , भवन उनके पहला वायुयान  engine in close collaboration with the brothers .
The Wright brothers '  औकात as आविष्कारक of the वायुयान रै महरूम  subject to counter-claims by various parties .
Much controversy persists  over the अनेक स्पर्धा दावा  of early aviators .

the साईकिल 's promotional सोंग  is Lady Gaga 's `` The Fame '' .

A  मॉडलिंग अनुबंध  with Elite Model Management .
