A 100,000 contract with  covergirl कॉस्मेटिक्स  .
The first half of the cycle took place in New York City ,  चलती the दिखाएँ वापस इससे लॉस एंजिल्स  last season .
The international destination  लिये इस साईकिल is são पाउलो , ब्राज़ील , the श्रेणी  first visit to South America .
The  क्रमांक of लड़कियों थी घटाया  to 13 , the first time since Cycle 9 , after being maintained at 14 in the last two cycles .
इस थी the पिछला समय paulina  Porizkova participated as judge .
The winner was  20-year-old teyona एंडरसन  from Woodstown , New Jersey .
This season averaged 4.35  लाख दर्शक  per episode .
Exxon Mobil Corporation , or ExxonMobil , is an  अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय आयल और गैस निगम  headquartered in Irving , Texas , United States .
It is a direct  वंशज of जॉन D. rockefeller 's मानक आयल कम्पनी , और थी formed  on November 30 , 1999 , by the merger of Exxon and Mobil .
It is affiliated with  इम्पीरियल आयल जिससे operates in  Canada .
ExxonMobil is the world 's largest company by revenue and in 2013 , became the largest publicly traded company by market  capitalization  in the world .
The company  is क्रमित # 5 globally in  Forbes Global 2000 list in 2013 .
Exxon  mobil 's reserves यहूद 72  billion oil-equivalent barrels at the end of 2007 and , at then ( 2007 ) rates of production , are expected to last over 14 years .
With 37 oil refineries in 21 countries constituting a combined daily  शोधन क्षमता of , exxon mobil is the largest refiner in the संसार , a शीर्षक कि  was also associated with Standard Oil since its incorporation in 1870 .
ExxonMobil is the largest of the world 's supermajors with daily production of 3.921  लाख boe ( barrels of आयल समतुल्य  ) .
In 2008 , this was approximately 3 % of world production , which is  कम than अनेक of the largest state-owned पेट्रोलियम  companies .
When  क्रमित by आयल और गैस reserves  it is 14th in the world with less than 1 % of the total .
A 2012  आलेख in the रोज़ टेलीग्राफ says कि exxonmobil रै ``  grown into one of the planet’s most hated corporations , able to determine American foreign policy and the fate of entire nations '' .
In terms  of इसके पर्यावरणीय रिकार्ड , exxonmobil increasingly drills in  terrains leased to them by dictatorships , such as those in Chad and Equatorial Guinea .
Lee  रेमंड , the corporation’s मुख्य  executive until 2005 , was `` notoriously sceptical about climate change and disliked government interference at any level '' .
The company was  widely criticized लिये इसके slow जवाब to सफ़ाई  its 1989 Valdez oil spill in Alaska .
इस आलेख is परिचय the  Globe Theatre of Shakespeare .
For the modern reconstruction in  लंदन , देखिए शेक्सपियर 's ग्लोब  .
For other  उपयोग , देखिए ग्लोब  Theatre ( disambiguation ) .
The Globe Theatre was a theatre in London  संबद्ध साथ विलियम  Shakespeare .
It was built in 1599 by Shakespeare 's playing company , the Lord Chamberlain 's Men , on land owned by Thomas Brend and inherited by his son , Nicholas Brend and  पोता सर मैथ्यू brend , और थी नष्ट by आग on 29 जून  1613 .
A second Globe Theatre was built on the same site by June  1614  and closed in 1642 .
A  आधुनिक पुनर्निर्माण of the ग्लोब , नामित `` शेक्सपियर  's Globe `` , opened in 1997 approximately from the site of the original theatre .
It 's a Wonderful Life is a 1946 American Christmas drama film produced  और निर्देशित by फ़्रैंक capra , आधारित on the छोटी स्टोरी `` the महानतम तोहफा `` , जिससे फिलिप वैन doren stern  wrote in 1939 and privately published in 1945 .
The film is considered one of the most loved films in American cinema and has become traditional viewing during  the क्रिसमस ऋतु , alongside लोकप्रिय क्लासिक ऐसे as चार्ल्स  Dickens ' A Christmas Carol .
The film stars James Stewart as George Bailey , a man who has  दिए up उसके सपनो in अनुक्रम to सहायता अन्य और जिनकी निकट आत्महत्या on क्रिसमस संध्या brings परिचय the  intervention of his guardian angel , Clarence Odbody ( Henry Travers ) .
क्लेरेंस shows जार्ज सब the जीवनदान he रै छुआ और  how different life in his community of Bedford Falls would be had he never been born .
Despite initially performing poorly at the box office due to high production costs and stiff competition at the  समय of इसके रिलीज , the फिल्मी रै आइये to be regarded as a क्लासिक  and is a staple of Christmas television around the world .
theatrically , the फिल्मी 's break-even पाइंट थी दरअसल  $ 6.3 million , approximately twice the production cost , a figure it never came close to achieving in its initial release .
An appraisal in 2006 reported : `` Although it was not the complete box office failure that today everyone believes ... it was initially a major disappointment and  पुष्टि , at तनिक to the studios , कि capra थी no longer सक्षम of turning आउट the populist सुविधाएँ कि बना उसके films the must-see , money-making कार्यक्रम वे एकबार  were . ''
The film was  मनोनीत लिये पाँच ऑस्कर और रै महरूम  recognized by the American Film Institute as one of the 100 best American films ever made , placing number 11 on its initial 1998 greatest movie list , and would also place number one on its list of the most inspirational American films of all time .
Data  गोदाम अवलोकन
In computing , a data warehouse  or एंटरप्राइज़ आंकड़ा गोदाम ( dw , dwh , or edw ) is  a database used for reporting and data analysis .
It is a central repository of  आंकड़ा जिससे is निर्मित by  integrating data from one or more disparate sources .
Data warehouses store current as well as historical data and are used for creating trending reports  लिये वरिष्ठ प्रबन्धन रिपोर्टिंग ऐसे as सालाना और  quarterly comparisons .
The data stored in the warehouse are uploaded from the operational systems ( such  as विपणन , बिक्री etc. , दिखाया in the फिगर  to the right ) .
The data may pass through an operational data  स्टोर लिये अतिरिक्त परिचालन पहले वे हैं  used in the DW for reporting .
The typical  etl -आधारd आंकड़ा गोदाम  uses staging , data integration , and access layers to house its key functions .
The  स्टेजिंग परत or स्टेजिंग डेटाबेस स्टोर्स  raw data extracted from each of the disparate source data systems .
The integration  परत integrates the disparate आंकड़ा सेट by transforming the आंकड़ा इससे the स्टेजिंग परत  often storing this transformed data in an operational data store ( ODS ) database .
The integrated data are then moved to yet another database , often called the data warehouse database , where  the आंकड़ा is arranged into hierarchical समूह प्रायः पुकारा आयाम और into तथ्य  and aggregate facts .
The combination  of तथ्य और आयाम is sometimes पुकारा  a star schema .
The access  परत helps उपयोक्ता retrieve  data .
A data warehouse constructed from an integrated data source systems does not  आवश्यकता etl , स्टेजिंग databases , or operational  data store databases .
The integrated data source systems may be considered  to be a भाग of a  distributed operational data store layer .
Data federation methods or data virtualization methods may be used to access the distributed integrated source data systems to  consolidate और कुल आंकड़ा  directly into the data warehouse database tables .
Unlike the ETL-based data warehouse , the integrated  सोर्स आंकड़ा प्रणालियों और the आंकड़ा गोदाम हैं सब एकीकृत चूंकि  there is no transformation of dimensional or reference data .
This integrated data warehouse architecture  supports the ड्रिल bas इससे  the aggregate data of the data warehouse to the transactional data of the integrated source data systems .
आंकड़ा warehouses can be subdivided  into data marts .
Data marts store subsets of data  इससे a गोदाम  .
This definition of the  आंकड़ा गोदाम focuses  on data storage .
The main source of the data is cleaned , transformed , cataloged and made available for use by  प्रबंधक और अन्य कारोबार पेशेवर लिये आंकड़ा खनन , ऑनलाइन विश्लेषणात्मक प्रसंस्करण , मार्केट शोध  and decision support ( Marakas & O'Brien 2009 ) .
However , the means to retrieve and analyze data , to extract , transform and load data , and to manage the  आंकड़ा शब्दकोष हैं भी माना अनिवार्य components of a  data warehousing system .
Many references to data  warehousing उपयोग इस broader  context .
Thus , an expanded definition for data warehousing includes business intelligence tools , tools to extract , transform and load data into  the repository , और टूल्स to मैनेज और retrieve  metadata .
Portland stone quarry on the Isle  of पोर्टलैंड , इंग्लैण्ड
An abandoned construction aggregate  पाषाण निकट एडिलेड , दक्षिण  Australia
A quarry is a type of  open-pit मेरा इससे जिससे चट्टान or खनिज  are extracted .
Quarries are generally used for extracting  भवन सामग्री , ऐसे as आयाम स्टोन , निर्माण  aggregate , riprap , sand , and gravel .
They are often collocated with concrete and  डामर पौधे due to the आवश्यकता लिये विशाल  amounts of aggregate in those materials .
Open mines that produce minerals are typically  referred to as खोलें गड्ढे खानों  .
The word quarry can include underground quarrying for  स्टोन , ऐसे as नहाना  stone .
Mormons ( ) are a  धार्मिक और सांस्कृतिक समूह सम्बन्धित to mormonism , the  principal branch of the Latter Day Saint movement of Restorationist Christianity , which began with the visions of Joseph Smith in upstate New York during the 1820s .
After Smith 's death in 1844 the Mormons  followed ब्रिघम यंग to कया होता become the  Utah Territory .
Today  mormons हैं समझा to be सदस्यों  of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints ( LDS Church ) .
Some  mormons हैं भी either  independent or non-practicing .
The center of Mormon cultural influence is in Utah , and North America has more Mormons than  कोई अन्य महाद्वीप , हालांकि the बहुमत of mormons सजीव बाहर the संयुक्त राज्य  .
Mormons have developed a strong sense of  communality कि तना इससे  their doctrine and history .
During the 19th century Mormon converts tended to gather to a central geographic location , and  between 1852 और 1890 a अल्पसंख्यक of mormons खुलकर practiced बहुवचन विवाह , a रूप of धार्मिक  polygamy .
mormons dedicate विशाल amounts of समय और  resources to serving in their church , and many young Mormons choose to serve a full-time proselytizing mission .
mormons have a स्वास्थ्य कोड कि eschews alcoholic  beverages , tobacco , coffee , tea , and other addictive substances .
They tend to be very family-oriented , and have strong connections across  पीढियां और साथ  extended family , reflective of their belief that families can be sealed together beyond death and throughout eternity .
Mormons also have a strict law of chastity , requiring abstention from sexual  संबंध बाहर of विवाह और सख्त वफ़ादारी भीतर  marriage .
Mormons self-identify as  ईसाई , हालांकि कुछ of उनके मान्यताओं differ  from mainstream Christianity .
Mormons believe in the Bible , as well as other books of scripture , such as  the किताब of mormon .
They have a unique view of cosmology , and believe that all  लोगों हैं spirit-children  of God .
Mormons believe that returning to God requires following the  उदाहरण of यीशु मसीह , और accepting उसके प्रायश्चित through ordinances  such as baptism .
They believe that  मसीह 's गिरिजाघर थी  restored through Joseph Smith , and is guided by living prophets and apostles .
Central to Mormon  आस्था is the विश्वास कि परमेश्वर बोलती  to his children and answers their prayers .
In financial  हिसाब , एसेट हैं आर्थिक  resources .
Anything tangible or intangible that is  सक्षम of होने स्वामित्व or नियंत्रित to उपज मान और कि  is held to have positive economic value is considered an asset .
Simply stated , assets represent value of  स्वामित्व कि can be परिवर्तित  into cash ( although cash itself is also considered an asset ) .
the संतुलन चादर of  a firm records the monetaryJ .
G. Siegel , N. Dauber & J. K. Shim , `` The Vest Pocket CPA '' , Wiley , 2005.There are different  विधि of assessing the मौद्रिक मान of the एसेट अंकित on  the Balance Sheet .
In some cases , the Historical Cost is used ; such that the value of the asset when it was bought in the past is  प्रयुक्त as the मौद्रिक  value .
In other instances , the present fair market value of the asset is  प्रयुक्त to determine the मान दिखाया on the संतुलन  sheet .
value of the assets  स्वामित्व by the कड़  .
It is money and other valuables belonging  to an व्यक्तिगत or  business .
Two major asset classes are tangible assets and  intangible एसेट  .
Tangible assets contain  विभिन्न subclasses , सहित  current assets and fixed assets.J .
Downes , J.E . Goodman , `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment Terms '' , Baron 's Financial Guides , 2003 Current assets include inventory , while fixed assets include such items as buildings and equipment .J . Downes , J.E . Goodman , `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment Terms '' , Baron 's Financial Guides , 2003 ; and J. G. Siegel , N. Dauber & J. K. Shim ,  `` the बनियान जेब cpa '' , wiley , 2005  .
Intangible assets are  nonphysical संसाधन और अधिकारों कि have a मान  to the firm because they give the firm some kind of advantage in the market place .
Examples of intangible assets are goodwill ,  copyrights , trademarks , patents और कंप्यूटर  programs , and financial assets , including such items as accounts receivable , bonds and stocks .
A neuron ( or ; also known as a neurone or nerve cell ) is an electrically  excitable कोशिका कि प्रक्रियाओं और transmits सूचना through  electrical and chemical signals .
A chemical signal occurs via a synapse ,  a specialized कनेक्शन साथ  other cells .
Neurons connect to each other to  रूप neural संजाल .
Neurons are  the कोर components of the बेचैन प्रणाली ,  which includes the brain , spinal cord , and peripheral ganglia .
A number of specialized types of neurons exist : sensory neurons respond to touch , sound , light and  numerous अन्य stimuli affecting कोशिकाएं of the संवेदी अंगों  that then send signals to the spinal cord and brain .
Motor neurons receive  सिग्नल इससे the दिमाग और स्पाइनल cord , कारण  muscle contractions , and affect glands .
interneurons कनेक्ट न्यूरॉन्स to अन्य न्यूरॉन्स भीतर  the same region of the brain or spinal cord .
A typical neuron possesses a cell body ( often called  the सोम ) , dendrites , और  an axon .
Dendrites are thin structures that arise from the cell body ,  प्रायः extending लिये सैंकड़ों of micrometres  and branching multiple times , giving rise to a complex `` dendritic tree '' .
An axon is a special cellular extension that arises from the cell  देह at a साईट पुकारा the axon उभरकर और ट्रेवल्स लिये  a distance , as far as 1 meter in humans or even more in other species .
The cell body of a neuron frequently  देता वृद्धि to अनेक dendrites , लकिन never to अधिक than एक  axon , although the axon may branch hundreds of times before it terminates .
At the majority of  synapses , सिग्नल हैं  sent from the axon of one neuron to a dendrite of another .
वहीँ हैं , however , अनेक अपवाद to ये नियम : न्यूरॉन्स कि कमी dendrites  , neurons that have no axon , synapses that connect an axon to another axon or a dendrite to another dendrite , etc .
All neurons are  electrically excitable , maintaining वोल्टेज अनुपात आरपार उनके झिल्लियों by अर्थात् of metabolically चलित आयन पंपों , जिससे combine  with ion channels embedded in the membrane to generate intracellular-versus-extracellular concentration differences of ions such as sodium , potassium , chloride , and calcium .
Changes in the  cross-membrane वोल्टेज can alter  the function of voltage-dependent ion channels .
If the voltage  परिवर्तन by a विशाल पर्याप्त राशि , an all-or-none electrochemical पल्स पुकारा an कार्रवाई संभावित is उत्पन्न  , which travels rapidly along the cell 's axon , and activates synaptic connections with other cells when it arrives .
Neurons do not  undergo कोशिका प्रभाग  .
In most cases , neurons are  उत्पन्न by खास प्रकार of स्टेम कोशिकाएं  .
Astrocytes , a type of glial  कोशिका , have भी महरूम observed to फेरे  into neurons by virtue of the stem cell characteristic pluripotency .
In humans , neurogenesis largely ceases during adulthood—but in two brain areas , the hippocampus and olfactory bulb ,  वहीँ is दमदार प्रमाण लिये पीढी of substantial संख्याएँ of नई  neurons .
Super  कटोरी xliii थी an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल खेल between the अमरीकी  Football Conference ( AFC ) champion Pittsburgh Steelers and the National Football Conference ( NFC ) champion Arizona Cardinals to decide the National Football League ( NFL ) champion for the 2008 season .
The Steelers defeated the  कार्डिनल्स by the स्कोर  of 27–23 .
The game was played  on फ़रवरी 1  , 2009 , at Raymond James Stadium in Tampa , Florida .
With this win , the  स्टीलर्स became the पहला टोली  to win six Super Bowls .
Pittsburgh , who finished the regular season with a 12–4 record , also won their second Super Bowl in four years after winning  सुपर कटोरी xl at the समाप्त of the 2005 ऋतु  .
The Cardinals entered the game seeking their first NFL title  चूंकि 1947 , the longest चैंपियनशिप  drought in the league .
The club became an unexpected winner during the regular season , compiling a 9–7  रिकार्ड , और the playoffs साथ the सहायता of सिर कोच केन whisenhunt  , who was the Steelers ' offensive coordinator in Super Bowl XL , and the re-emergence of quarterback Kurt Warner , who was the Super Bowl MVP in Super Bowl XXXIV with his former team , St. Louis Rams .
Pittsburgh jumped to a 17–7 halftime lead , aided by linebacker James  हैरिसन 's सुपर कटोरी रिकार्ड 100-yard interception वापसी लिये a touchdown  .
Trailing 20–7 at the start of the fourth quarter , Arizona scored 16 unanswered points , including wide receiver  लैरी fitzgerald 's 64-yard touchdown रिसेप्शन , to लो the सीसे  with 2:37 remaining in the game .
But the Steelers marched 78 yards to score on wide receiver Santonio Holmes ' 6-yard  game-winning touchdown कैच साथ 35  seconds left .
Holmes , who caught nine passes for 131 yards and a touchdown , including four receptions for 73 yards on that final  game-winning ड्राइव , थी नामित सुपर  Bowl MVP .
He became the  छठे चौड़ी receiver to जीत  the award , and also was the third Pittsburgh receiver to win the award , following Lynn Swann and Hines Ward .
Despite  the वैश्विक वित्तीय संकट और सीमित राशि of आनुषंगिक festivities कि हैं सामान्यतः आयोजित पहले the खेल  , the NBC television network broadcast attracted an average U.S. audience of 98.7 million viewers , making it the most watched Super Bowl in history to that point .
A diagram of the  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम , प्रर्दशित विभिन्न गुण आरपार the दायरा  of frequencies and wavelengths
The electromagnetic spectrum is the range of all possible  बारंबारता of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  radiation .
The `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an object has a different meaning , and is instead the  characteristic वितरण of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण उत्सर्जित  or absorbed by that particular object .
the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम extends इससे नीचे the कम बारंबारता प्रयुक्त लिये आधुनिक रेडियो संचार  to gamma radiation at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end , thereby covering wavelengths from thousands of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom .
The limit for long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself , while it is thought that the short wavelength limit is in  the vicinity of the  Planck length , although in principle the spectrum is infinite and continuous .
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum are used in science for spectroscopic and other probing interactions  , as तरीके to पढ़ाई और characterize पदार्थ  .
In addition , radiation from various parts of the spectrum has found many other uses for  संचार और निर्माण ( देखिए इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण लिये  more applications ) .
लेजेंड
marchantia  , a liverwort
Bryophyte is a traditional name used to refer to all embryophytes ( land plants ) that  do नहीं have सच्चा vascular ऊतक और हैं इसलिए पुकारा ' non-vascular पौधे  ' .
Some bryophytes do have specialized tissues  लिये the हस्तांतरण of जल ; however  since these do not contain lignin , they are not considered to be true vascular tissue .
Currently bryophytes are thought not to be a natural or monophyletic  समूह ; however the नाम is सुविधाजनक  and remains in use as a collective term for mosses , hornworts , and liverworts .
bryophytes उपज enclosed reproductive  structures ( gametangia and sporangia ) , but they produce neither flowers nor seeds , reproducing via spores .
The term  ब्रायोफाइटा आता इससे यूनानी βρύον , bryon , `` tree-moss  , oyster-green '' + φυτόν - phyton `` plant '' .
A bank is a  वित्तीय संस्था और a वित्तीय intermediary  that accepts deposits and channels those deposits into lending activities , either directly by loaning or indirectly through capital markets .
A bank is the connection between customers that have capital  deficits और ग्राहक साथ पूंजी surpluses  .
Due to their influence within a financial  प्रणाली और an अर्थव्यवस्था , बैंको हैं generally  highly regulated in most countries .
Most banks operate  अंतर्गत a प्रणाली ज्ञात as fractional आरक्षित बैंकिंग जहाँ वे थाम तभी  a small reserve of the funds deposited and lend out the rest for profit .
They are generally subject to minimum capital requirements which are based on an international set of  पूंजी मानकों , ज्ञात as the basel  Accords .
The  oldest बैंको स्टिल in अस्तित्व is मोंटे देई  Paschi di Siena , headquartered in Siena , Italy , which has been operating continuously since 1472 .
It is followed by Berenberg  बैंको of हैम्बर्ग  ( 1590 ) and Sveriges Riksbank of Sweden ( 1668 ) .
Banking in its  आधुनिक भाव विकसित in समृद्ध शहरों of पुनर्जागरण इटली , ऐसे as  Florence , Venice and Genoa .
In the history of banking , a number of banking dynasties —among them notably Medici , Fugger , Welser , Berenberg ,  baring और रोथ्सचाइल्ड —have निभाई a सेंट्रल भूमिका over अनेक सदियां  .
The Xbox is a video  खेल कंसोल manufactured by  Microsoft .
It was  released on नवम्बर 15 , 2001 in उत्तर अमेरिका  , February 22 , 2002 in Japan , and March 14 , 2002 in Australia and Europe .
It was  microsoft 's पहला foray into  the gaming console market .
As part of the sixth-generation of gaming , the Xbox competed with Sony 's PlayStation 2 , Sega  's dreamcast ( जिससे रोका अमरीकी बिक्री पहले  the Xbox went on sale ) , and Nintendo 's GameCube .
The Xbox was the first  कंसोल offered by an अमरीकी कम्पनी बाद  the Atari Jaguar stopped sales in 1996 .
The integrated Xbox Live service launched in  नवम्बर 2002 अनुमत खिलाड़ी to खेल  games online with a broadband connection .
It first competed with  dreamcast 's ऑनलाइन सेवा लकिन  later primarily competed with PlayStation 2 's online service .
Although these two are free while Xbox Live required a subscription , as well as broadband-only connection which was not completely adopted yet , Xbox Live was a success due to  बेहतर सर्वर , सुविधाएँ ऐसे as a दोस्त सूची , और पड़ाव शीर्षक जैसे हेलो 2 released in नवम्बर 2004 , जिससे is the best-selling एक्सबॉक्स वीडियो खेल और थी by दूर  the most popular online game for years .
Xbox 's  successor , the एक्सबॉक्स 360 , थी  launched in November 2005 .
The Xbox was discontinued in late 2005  in जापानी जहाँ बिक्री यहूद  poor .
It was  discontinued in लेट 2006 in यूरोपीय और  early 2007 in North America .
The last Xbox game in Europe was Tony Hawk 's  प्रोजेक्ट 8 released in नवम्बर 2006 , और the  last game in North America was Madden NFL 09 released in August 2008 .
Support for out-of-warranty Xbox consoles was discontinued on March 2 , 2009 , stating that any  in-warranty मरम्मत अभी needed होगा नहीं be undertaken  .
Xbox access to Xbox Live  थी रोका  on April 15 , 2010 .
The Gospel According to John ( Greek τὸ κατὰ Ἰωάννην εὐαγγέλιον ) , commonly referred to as the  इन्जील of जॉन or बस जॉन और प्रायः referred to in नई वसीयत स्कॉलरशिप as the  Fourth Gospel , is an account of the public ministry of Jesus .
It begins with the witness and affirmation by John the Baptist and concludes with the death , burial  , क़यामत , और post-resurrection दिखावे  of Jesus .
This account is  चौथी of the canonical  gospels , after the synoptics Matthew , Mark and Luke .
states  कि the किताब गर्भाशयी इससे the गवाही  of the ' disciple whom Jesus loved . '
Along with Peter , the unnamed  शिष्य is विशेषकर बंद to यीशु , और early-church परंपरा पहचाना  him as John the Apostle , one of Jesus ' Twelve Apostles .
The gospel is closely related in style and content to the three surviving Epistles of John such that  टीकाकारों दावत the चार किताबे साथ , yet , according to सबसे आधुनिक विद्वानों , जॉन थी नहीं the लेखक  of any of these books .
Recent Christian Scripture scholarship more and more has  लगाई जॉन भीतर a first-century यहूदी  context .
Raymond E. Brown did pioneering work to trace the  विकास of the  tradition from which the gospel arose .
The discourses seem  to be चिंतित साथ the वास्तविक  issues of the church-and-synagogue debate at the time when the Gospel was written .
It is notable  कि , in the इन्जील , the जातियाँ स्टिल appears to  define itself primarily against Judaism , rather than as part of a wider Christian church .
Though  christianity प्रारंभ  as a movement within Judaism , gradually Christians and Jews became bitterly opposed .
John presents a  `` उच्चतर '' christology than the synoptics  , meaning that it describes Jesus as the incarnation of the divine Logos through whom all things were made , as the object of veneration , and more explicitly as God incarnate .
Only in John does Jesus talk at length about himself  और उसके दैवी भूमिका , प्रायः  shared with the disciples only .
Against the  synoptics , जॉन focuses largely on अलग  miracles ( including resurrecting Lazarus ) , given as signs meant to engender faith .
Synoptic elements such as  parables और exorcisms हैं  not found in John .
It  presents a एहसास eschatology in जिससे मोक्ष  is already present for the believer .
The Plagues of Egypt ( ) , also called the Ten Plagues ( ) or the Biblical Plagues , were ten calamities that  , according to the biblical किताब of exodus , इसराईल 's परमेश्वर , yahweh , inflicted upon मिश्र to राजी pharaoh to  release the ill-treated Israelites from slavery .
Pharaoh capitulated after the tenth  प्लेग , triggering the exodus of  the Jewish people .
The  plagues यहूद designed  to contrast the power of Yahweh with the impotence of Egypt 's various gods .
Some commentators have associated several of the plagues with judgment on  विशिष्ट देवताओं संबद्ध साथ the nile , प्रजनन और प्राकृतिक  phenomena .
The plagues of Egypt are also mentioned in the  कुरान ( 7,133–136  ) .
According to the Book of Exodus  , परमेश्वर proclaims कि सब the देवताओं of  Egypt will be judged through the tenth and final plague:
John Martin  's पेंटिंग of the  plague of hail and fire ( 1823 ) .
A role-playing game ( RPG and sometimes roleplaying game ) is a game in which players  assume the भूमिकाएँ of वर्ण  in a fictional setting .
Players take responsibility for acting out these roles within a  कथा , either through  literal acting or through a process of structured decision-making or character development .
Actions taken within many games succeed  or असफल according to a औपचारिक प्रणाली  of rules and guidelines .
There are several  फ़ॉर्म of आरपीजी .
The original form , sometimes called the tabletop RPG , is conducted  through चर्चा , whereas in सजीव कार्रवाई role-playing  games ( LARP ) players physically perform their characters ' actions .
In both of these  फ़ॉर्म , an arranger पुकारा a खेल निपुण ( gm ) प्रायः decides on the नियम और सेटिंग to be प्रयुक्त और अधिनियमों as रेफरी , जबकि  each of the other players plays the role of a single character .
Several varieties of RPG also exist in electronic media , such as multi-player text-based MUDs and their  graphics-based successors , massively एकाधिक  online role-playing games ( MMORPGs ) .
Role-playing games also  शामिल single-player ऑफ़लाइन role-playing  video games in which players control a character or team who undertake quests , and may include capabilities that advance using statistical mechanics .
These games often share settings and rules with tabletop RPGs , but emphasize  अक्षर उन्नति अधिक than collaborative storytelling  .
Despite this variety of forms , some  खेल फ़ॉर्म ऐसे as व्यापार कार्ड खेल  and wargames that are related to role-playing games may not be included .
role-playing कार्यकलाप  may sometimes be present in such games , but it is not the primary focus .
The term is also sometimes used to describe roleplay simulation games and exercises used in  शिक्षण , प्रशिक्षण , और अकादमिक  research .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave  राज्य कि घोषित उनके secession और formed the confederate राज्य  of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war  था इसके उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of गुलामी  , especially the extension of slavery into the western territories .
Foreign  शक्तियां किया नहीं  intervene .
After four years of bloody combat that left over  600,000 सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना , the confederacy collapsed , गुलामी थी abolished  , and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860  अध्यक्षीय चुनाव , republicans , led by अब्राहम lincoln ,  opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before his inauguration  on कूच 4 , 1861 , सात cotton-based स्लेव  states formed the Confederacy .
outgoing लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन  and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal .
Lincoln  's inaugural पता घोषित  his administration would not initiate civil war .
Eight  बाकी स्लेव राज्य जारी  to reject calls for secession .
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts within territory  claimed by the confederacy  .
A Peace Conference  विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह , और  both sides prepared for war .
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ;  none किया और none पहचाना  the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 , when Confederate forces fired upon  फोर्ट sumter , a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by संघ सैनिकों in दक्षिण कैरोलिना  .
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the  फोर्ट ; नतीजतन , चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the  Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The  संघ जल्द नियंत्रित the  border states and established a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy .
The Eastern  थिएटर थी inconclusive  in 1861–62 .
The  पतझड़ 1862 confederate  campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
lincoln जारी the emancipation  Proclamation , which made ending slavery a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy , then much of their western armies , and the Union at Vicksburg  विभाजित the confederacy in दो at the मिसिसिपी  River .
In  1863 , रॉबर्ट E. ली 's confederate  incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
Western successes led to Ulysses S.  ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब संघ सेना  in 1864 .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched  to the समुद्र , destroying confederate अवसंरचना  along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions , and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the  overland अभियान towards रिचमंड ,  the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed , leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court  हाउस on अप्रैल 9 , 1865  .
The American Civil War  थी एक of the earliest  true industrial wars .
Railroads , the  टेलीग्राफ , steamships  , and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively .
The mobilization of civilian factories , mines ,  shipyards , बैंको  , transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I .
It remains the deadliest war in American  इतिहास , resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined क्रमांक  of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45  सालो बूढ़ा , और 30 प्रतिशत of सब दक्षिणी श्वेत  males aged 18–40 .
The definition of the world 's busiest airport has been  निर्दिष्ट by the एयरपोर्ट  Council International in Geneva , Switzerland .
the aci defines और उपायों  the following three types of airport traffic:
यात्री ट्रैफ़िक : कुल यात्री emplaned  and deplaned , passengers in transit counted once
कार्गो ट्रैफ़िक : loaded और मोड  freight and mail in metric tonnes
Traffic movements :  अवतरण और take-offs  of aircraft
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in  यूरोपीय कि began on 28 जुलाई 1914  and lasted until 11 November 1918 .
It was predominantly called the  संसार युद्ध or the ग्रेट युद्ध इससे  its occurrence until the start of World War II in 1939 , and the First World War or World War I thereafter .
It involved all the world 's great powers , which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente  of the संयुक्त किंगडम , फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल  Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany , Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but , as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy did not enter into the war ) .
ये alliances यहूद दोनो reorganised  and expanded as more nations entered the war : Italy , Japan and the United States joined the Allies , and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
Ultimately , more than 70 million military personnel ,  सहित 60 लाख europeans , यहूद mobilised in एक of the largest  wars in history .
More than 9 million combatants were killed , largely because of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the  lethality of हथियार बगैर सम्बन्धित सुधार in सुरक्षा  or mobility .
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history , subsequently paving the way for various political changes , such as revolutions in many of the  राष्ट्र शामिल  .
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign  नीतियों of the ग्रेट शक्तियां of यूरोपीय  .
More immediately , the assassination of  archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया , the वारिस to  the throne of Austria-Hungary , on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia .
Several alliances formed over the  पिछला दशकों यहूद invoked  .
Within weeks , the major powers were at war and , via their colonies , the  विरोध जल्द स्प्रेड around  the world .
On 28 July , the Austro-Hungarians fired the  पहला गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as तैयारी लिये the आक्रमण  of Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and  ध्वज on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस , providing a casus belli लिये  Britain 's declaration of war against Germany .
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static  बैटल of अपघर्षण साथ a गर्त लकीर कि बदला छोटी जबतक  1917 .
On the Eastern Front , the Russian army  थी कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians  , but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans .
In November the Ottoman  साम्राज्य joined the युद्ध , खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस  , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
Italy and Bulgaria went to  युद्ध in 1915 और रोमानिया in 1916  .
In Russia , the tsar 's  सरकारी collapsed in कूच 1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति  in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers .
After a 1918 German offensive along the  पश्चिमी सामने , the allies drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी  of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches .
Germany ,  जिससे था इसके अपना ट्रबल साथ क्रांतिकारियों  , agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918 .
The war ended in  विजय लिये the allies  .
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts , as the  भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और आर्थिक  resources to fight a total war .
By the end of the war , four major imperial powers—the German ,  रूसी , austro-hungarian और उस्मानी empires—ceased  to exist .
The successor states of the  पूर्व दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory , जबकि the latter  two were dismantled entirely .
The map of central  यूरोपीय थी redrawn into अनेक  smaller states .
The League of Nations was formed in  the आशा of preventing another  such conflict .
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of  empires , the परखना of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं साथ the  Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II .
The Deepwater Horizon oil spill ( also referred to as the BP oil spill , the BP oil disaster , the Gulf of  मैक्सिको आयल spill , और the macondo blowout ) थी an आयल spill in the गल्फ of मैक्सिको on the bp -operated macondo prospect , माना the largest आकस्मिक समुद्री आयल  spill in the history of the petroleum industry , estimated to be between 8 % and 31 % larger in volume than the earlier Ixtoc I oil spill .
Following the  विस्फोट और डूब of the deepwater क्षितिज आयल रिग , जिससे claimed 11 जीवनदान , a sea-floor आयल gusher flowed unabated  for 87 days , until it was capped on 15 July 2010 .
The  कुल निर्वहन  is estimated at .
A massive response ensued to protect beaches , wetlands and estuaries from the  spreading आयल utilizing skimmer जहाजों , फ्लोटिंग  booms , controlled burns and of Corexit oil dispersant .
After several failed efforts to contain  the प्रवाह , the खूब थी  declared sealed on 19 September 2010 .
Some reports indicate the well site  continues to लीक  .
Due to the months-long spill , along with adverse effects from the  जवाब और क्लीनअप क्रियाएँ , extensive क्षति to समुद्री और वन्यजीव habitats  , fishing and tourism industries , and human health problems have continued through 2013.Three years after the spill , tar balls could still be found on the Mississippi coast .
Numerous  investigations छान the  causes of the explosion and record-setting spill .
Notably , the U.S. government 's September 2011 report pointed to defective cement on the well ,  faulting ज़्यादातर bp , लकिन भी खूब  operator Transocean and contractor Halliburton .
Earlier in 2011 , a White House commission likewise blamed BP and its partners for a series of cost-cutting decisions and an insufficient safety system , but also  concluded कि the spill resulted इससे `` प्रणालीगत '' रूट कल्याणकारी और `` अनुपस्थित significant सुधार in दोनो उद्योग practices  and government policies , might well recur '' .
In November 2012 , BP and the United States Department of Justice settled federal criminal  आरोप साथ bp pleading अपराधी to 11 रिश्तो of manslaughter , दो misdemeanors  , and a felony count of lying to Congress .
bp भी सहमत to चार सालो of सरकारी निगरानी of इसके सुरक्षा practices और आचार  , and the Environmental Protection Agency announced that BP would be temporarily banned from new contracts with the US government .
BP  और the विभाग of इंसाफ सहमत to a record-setting $ 4.525 अरब in जुर्माना और अन्य भुगतान लकिन further विधिक  proceedings not expected to conclude until 2014 are ongoing to determine payouts and fines under the Clean Water Act and the Natural Resources Damage Assessment .
as of फ़रवरी 2013 , दण्ड और सिविल  settlements and payments to a trust fund had cost the company $ 42.2 billion .
`` Where the Streets Have No Name '' is  a सोंग by चट्टान  band U2 .
It is the opening track from their 1987 album The Joshua Tree and was released as the album 's  तीसरा सिंगल in अगस्त 1987  .
The song 's hook is a repeating guitar arpeggio using a delay effect , played  दौरान the सोंग 's परिचय और again  at the end .
Lead vocalist Bono wrote  the गीत in जवाब to the ख़्याल कि  it is possible to identify a person 's religion and income based on the street on which they lived , particularly in Belfast .
During the band 's difficulties recording the song , producer Brian Eno  माना erasing the सोंग 's टेपों to have उन्हें प्रारंभ  from scratch .
`` Where the Streets Have No Name '' was praised by critics and became a commercial  कामयाबी , peaking at क्रमांक तेरह in the us , क्रमांक चौदह in कनाडा , क्रमांक टेन in the नीदरलैंड्स , और क्रमांक चार in the संयुक्त  Kingdom .
The song has become one of the band 's most popular songs and has remained a staple of their live  अधिनियम चूंकि the सोंग debuted in 1987 on  The Joshua Tree Tour .
The song was notably performed on a Los Angeles rooftop for the filming of its music video , which won a  ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन प्रदर्शन म्यूज़िक वीडियो .recently the सोंग रै महरूम प्रयुक्त by the एनएफएल 's बाल्टीमोर ravens as उनके  entrance song in Super Bowl XLVII
Thomas Jeffrey `` Tom '' Hanks  ( born जुलाई 9 , 1956  ) is an American actor , producer , writer , and director .
Hanks is known for his roles in  अपोलो 13 , बिग , कि बात  You Do !
, The Green Mile , You 've Got Mail , Sleepless in Seattle , Charlie Wilson 's War , Catch Me If You Can ,  फॉरेस्ट गंप , डाल दूर , a लीग of उनके अपना , the da विंची कोड , फ़रिश्ते & राक्षसों , as  well as animated films like the Toy Story film series , The Polar Express , and The Simpsons Movie .
He has earned and been  मनोनीत लिये numerous पुरस्कार दौरान उसके करियर , सहित जीतना a सुनहरी ग्लोब लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता  and an Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in Philadelphia and a Golden Globe , an Academy Award , a Screen Actors Guild Award , and a People 's Choice Award for Best Actor for his role in Forrest Gump , and earning the Stanley Kubrick Britannia Award for Excellence in Film from the BAFTAs in 2004 .
Hanks  is भी ज्ञात लिये उसके सहयोग साथ फिल्मी निदेशक स्टीवन स्पिलबर्ग  on Saving Private Ryan and the mini-series Band of Brothers , which launched Hanks also as a successful director , producer and writer .
As of 2012 , Hanks ' films have grossed over $ 4.2 billion at the United States box office alone , and over  $ 8.5 अरब विश्वव्यापी बनाना उसे the उच्चतम all-time  box office star .
The Cape is an  अमरीकी सुपरहीरो  drama series .
It premiered on NBC during the 2010–2011 television season as a mid-season replacement beginning with a two-hour pilot  एपीसोड on संडे , जनवरी 9 , 2011 at 9 pm पूर्वी और प्रशांत  Time .
An encore played on Monday , January 10 , with follow-up episodes  continuing on सोमवार evenings  in the 9 pm timeslot beginning on January 17 .
NBC  subsequently काटें the कुल  number of episodes to be aired from 13 to 10 as a result of low ratings .
On March 2 , 2011 , NBC  घोषित कि the श्रेणी finale होता तभी be aired on  the network 's website .
Halley 's  धूमकेतु or धूमकेतु हैली (  or ) , officially designated 1P/Halley , is the best-known of the short-period comets and is visible from Earth every 75–76 years .
Halley is the only short-period comet that is clearly visible to the  नग्न नजर इससे धरती , और यूँ the तभी naked-eye धूमकेतु  that might appear twice in a human lifetime .
अन्य naked-eye धूमकेतुओं may be उज्जवल और अधिक spectacular  , but will appear only once in thousands of years .
Halley 's  रिटर्न to the भीतरी सौर प्रणाली have  been observed and recorded by astronomers since at least 240 BCE .
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were made by Chinese , Babylonian , and medieval  यूरोपीय chroniclers , लकिन यहूद नहीं पहचाना as reappearances of the वही  object at the time .
The comet 's periodicity was first determined in 1705 by  अंग्रेज़ी astronomer edmond हैली , बाद जिसको it is अभी  named .
Halley 's Comet last appeared in  the भीतरी सौर प्रणाली  in 1986 and will next appear in mid-2061 .
During its 1986 apparition , Halley became the first comet to be observed in detail by spacecraft ,  providing the पहला observational आंकड़ा on the ढांचा of a धूमकेतु केंद्रक और the यांत्रिकी of कोमा और टेल गठन  .
ये observations समर्थित a क्रमांक of longstanding hypotheses परिचय धूमकेतु निर्माण , विशेषकर फ्रेड whipple  's `` dirty snowball '' model , which correctly predicted that Halley would be composed of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water , carbon dioxide and ammonia – and dust .
The missions also provided data which substantially  reformed और reconfigured ये विचार ; लिये उदाहरण it is अभी समझा कि हैली 's सतह is largely  composed of dusty , non-volatile materials , and that only a small portion of it is icy .
The following  is a सूची of the सबसे populous incorporated  places of the United States of America .
As defined by the United States Census  ब्यूरो , an `` incorporated प्लेस `` शामिल a किस्में of designations  , including city , town , village , borough , and municipality .
A few  असाधारण जनसांख्यिकी designated  Places ( CDPs ) are also included in the Census Bureau 's listing of incorporated places .
Consolidated  city-counties represent a पृथक प्रकार of सरकारी कि  includes the entire population of a county , or county equivalent .
Some  संचित city-counties  , however , include multiple incorporated places .
This list presents only that portion ( or `` balance '' ) of such consolidated city-counties that are not a part of  another incorporated प्लेस  .
Note that this list refers only to the population of individual municipalities within their defined limits , which does not include other  municipalities or unincorporated suburban क्षेत्रों भीतर शहरी agglomerations  .
A different ranking is evident  जब considering u.S. महानगर क्षेत्रफल  populations .
The Mayflower was the ship that in 1620 transported  102 अंग्रेज़ी तीर्थयात्रियों , सहित a कोर समूह of separatists  , to New England .
Their story is one of  travail और अस्तित्व in a हर्ष  New World environment .
A New Zealand forward ( in white ) takes a shot on goal  विरूद्ध कैमरून in  the 2011 FIFA U-20 World Cup .
आगे , भी ज्ञात as strikers , हैं the खिलाड़ी on  a team in association football who play nearest to the opposing team 's goal , and are therefore principally responsible for scoring goals .
This very advanced position and its limited defensive  जिम्मेदारियों औसत आगे सामान्यतः स्कोर अधिक लक्ष्य than अन्य  players .
This position requires intelligence , speed , and power , both of execution and of thought , to perform  the भूमिका खूब  .
आधुनिक टोली formations प्रायः  include one to three forwards ; two is the most common .
Coaches typically field one striker who  plays in an उन्नत स्थिति ( the केन्द्र आगे ) , और another  attacking forward who plays somewhat deeper and assists in making goals as well as scoring ( the second striker ) .
It should be noted that inside forwards  develop इससे attacking midfield  positions and hence are naturally midfielders .
Barcelona FC star Lionel Messi is a typical Attacking Midfielder seen as a  आगे due to उसके शॉट सटीकता  .
A California domestic partnership is a legal relationship available  to same-sex युगल , और to निश्चित opposite-sex युगल in जिससे  at least one party is at least 18 years of age .
It affords the couple `` the same rights , protections , and benefits , and ... the same  जिम्मेदारियों , दायित्वों , और कर्तव्य अंतर्गत विधि ... ''  as married spouses .
Enacted in 1999 , the domestic partnership registry was the  पहला of इसके दयालु in the संयुक्त राज्य निर्मित  by a legislature without court intervention .
initially , घरेलू partnerships enjoyed  very few privileges—principally just hospital-visitation rights and the right to be claimed as a next of kin of the estate of a deceased partner .
The legislature has since  विस्तारित the पैमाना of कैलिफ़ोर्निया घरेलू partnerships to शामिल  all of the rights and responsibilities common to marriage .
As such , California domestic partnerships are  functionally समतुल्य to सिविल संघ offered in अनेक अन्य राज्य  .
Although the program  enjoys व्यापक support in कैलिफ़ोर्निया , it रै  been the source of some controversy .
Groups opposed to the recognition  of same-sex परिवारों have challenged  the expansion of domestic partnerships in court .
Conversely , advocates of same-sex marriage contend that anything less than full marriage rights extended to same-sex  साझेदार is analogous to the `` पृथक लकिन बराबर '' जातिगत कानून of the जिम कौवा  era .
Mark A. Jackson ( born April 1 , 1965 ) is an American basketball coach , and former player  जो is the वर्तमान सिर कोच  of the Golden State Warriors of the NBA .
A point guard from St. John 's University  , he निभाई लिये the नई यॉर्क knicks , इंडियाना पेसर्स , लॉस एंजिल्स क्लिपर्स  , Denver Nuggets , Toronto Raptors , Utah Jazz and Houston Rockets in the NBA in a career spanning from 1987 to 2004 .
Jackson has also  worked as a कमेंटेटर लिये ईएसपीएन और एबीसी alongside उसके पूर्व कोच जेफ़  Van Gundy and play-by-play man Mike Breen .
He was previously an NBA  विश्लेषक लिये the यस  Network 's New Jersey Nets games .
South Africa has eleven official languages : Afrikaans , English , Ndebele , Northern Sotho  , sotho , swazi , tswana , सोंगा , venda , ख़ोसा और  Zulu .
Fewer than two percent of South Africans  बोलो a पहला भाषा अन्य than an आधिकारिक  one .
Most South Africans can speak more  than एक भाषा .
डच और अंग्रेज़ी यहूद  the first official languages of South Africa from 1910 to 1925 .
Afrikaans was added as a  भाग of  Dutch in 1925 .
Dutch was replaced by Afrikaans when  दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी became a गणतंत्र in 1961 , और डच थी dropped in 1983 , so between  1983 and 1994 , South Africa had two official languages : English and Afrikaans .
The English version of the South African constitution refers  to the भाषाएं by the names in those भाषाएं : isizulu , isixhosa , अफ्रीकी , sepedi ( referring to उत्तरी sotho ) , setswana  , English , Sesotho ( referring to Southern Sotho ) , Xitsonga , Siswati , Tshivenda and isiNdebele ( referring to Southern Ndebele ) .
In South Africa , Southern Ndebele is known simply as Ndebele , as most  अध्यक्षों of उत्तरी ndebele सजीव in ज़िम्बाब्वे  .
The 1993 version of the Constitution referred to Northern Sotho as  sesotho sa leboa , लकिन the 1996 संस्करण  referred to the language as Sepedi .
Different  सरकारी विभाग और आधिकारिक लाशें  use different terms to denote Northern Sotho .
The main language of government is English even if South Africans often take pride in using  स्वदेशी भाषाएं लिये कोई purpose  .
Afrikaans also features  prominently in कॉमर्स साथ साथ अंग्रेज़ी as the भाषाएं  with the highest number of fluent speakers are Afrikaans and English .
In terms of linguistic classification , the official languages include two  west-germanic भाषाएं ( अंग्रेज़ी और  Afrikaans ) and nine Bantu languages .
Four of these are Nguni  भाषाएं ( ज़ुलू , ख़ोसा , स्वाति  and Ndebele ) and three are Sotho–Tswana languages ( Northern Sotho , Southern Sotho and Tswana ) .
Tsonga is a  tswa–ronga भाषा  .
South African Sign Language is a distinct though incompletely emerged  नेशनल मानक भाषा जिससे भी subsumes  a cluster of semi-standardised dialects .
Aluminium nitrate is a salt of aluminium and nitric acid , existing normally as a crystalline hydrate , most  commonly as एल्युमिनियम नाइट्रेट  nonahydrate , Al ( NO3 ) 3·9H2O .
The New York Jets are a professional  फ़ुटबॉल टोली headquartered  in Florham Park , New Jersey , representing the New York metropolitan area .
The team is a member of the Eastern Division of the American Football  सम्मेलन ( afc ) in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ) .
In a unique arrangement for the league , the Jets share MetLife Stadium in East  रदरफोर्ड , नई जर्सी साथ the नई यॉर्क  Giants .
The  मताधिकार is legally और corporately पंजीकृत  as New York Jets , LLC .
the टोली थी संस्थापित  in 1959 as the Titans of New York , an original member of the American Football League ; later , the franchise joined the NFL in the AFL–NFL merger .
the टोली began to खेल  in 1960 at the Polo Grounds .
Under new ownership , the current name was adopted in  1963 और the मताधिकार थी relocated to shea स्टेडियम in 1964  and then to the Meadowlands Sports Complex in 1984 .
The Jets advanced to the playoffs for the first time  in 1968 और गई on to compete in सुपर कटोरी  III where they defeated the Baltimore Colts , becoming the first AFL team to defeat an NFL club in an AFL-NFL World Championship Game .
Since 1968 , the Jets have appeared in the playoffs thirteen times ,  और in the afc चैंपियनशिप खेल चार  times , most recently losing to the Pittsburgh Steelers in 2010 .
However , the Jets have never returned to the Super Bowl , making them one of three NFL teams to win their lone Super Bowl appearance ,  साथ साथ the नई ऑरलियन्स संतो और tampa  Bay Buccaneers .
The team 's  प्रशिक्षण सुविधा , अटलांटिक  Health Jets Training Center , which opened in 2008 , is located in Florham Park .
The team currently holds their annual training camp sessions on the campus of the  राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों of नई यॉर्क at cortland in cortland , नई  York while holding occasional sessions at the Florham Park complex .
psilocybe semilanceata
Psilocybin mushrooms , also known as psychedelic mushrooms , are  fungi कि contain psychoactive indole alkaloids  .
वहीँ हैं अनेक colloquial शर्तें  for psilocybin mushrooms , the most common being shrooms and magic mushrooms .
Biological genera containing psilocybin mushrooms include Agrocybe , Conocybe , Copelandia ,  galerina , gerronema , gymnopilus , hypholoma  , Inocybe , Mycena , Panaeolus , Pluteus , and Psilocybe .
There are approximately 190 species of  psilocybin मशरूम और सबसे of उन्हें पतन in the genus psilocybe  .
psilocybin मशरूम have संभावित महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि  prehistoric times and may have been depicted in rock art .
Many cultures have used these  मशरूम in धार्मिक  rites .
In modern Western society they are used recreationally for their  साइकेडेलिक प्रभाव  .
Recent studies done at Imperial College London and Johns Hopkins  स्कूल of आयुर्विज्ञान conclude कि जब प्रयुक्त properly , psilocybin  acts as an anti-depressant as suggested by fMRI brain scans .
Alaska ( ) is a state in the United  राज्य , situated in the उत्तरपश्चिम extremity of the उत्तर अमरीकी महाद्वीप , साथ  the international boundary with Canada to the east , the Arctic Ocean to the north , and the Pacific Ocean to the west and south , with Russia further west across the Bering Strait .
Alaska is the  largest राज्य in the संयुक्त राज्य by क्षेत्रफल , the 4th  least populous and the least densely populated of the 50 United States .
लगभग हाफ of अलास्का 's 731,449 निवासियों सजीव भीतर  the Anchorage metropolitan area .
Alaska 's economy  is वर्चस्व by the आयल , प्राकृतिक गैस , और फ़िशिंग  industries ; it has these resources in abundance .
अलास्का थी खरीदा इससे रूस on कूच 30 , 1867 , लिये $ 7.2 लाख  ( $ adjusted for inflation ) at approximately two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ) .
the जमीन गई through अनेक प्रशासनिक परिवर्तन पहले बनने an व्यवस्थित  ( or incorporated ) territory on May 11 , 1912 , and the 49th state of the U.S. on January 3 , 1959 .
The name `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced in the Russian colonial period , when it was used only for the peninsula and is derived from  the aleut alaxsxaq , अर्थ `` the मेनलैंड '' or , अधिक वस्तुतः  , `` the object towards which the action of the sea is directed '' .
It is also known as Alyeska , the `` great land '' , an Aleut  शब्द निकला इससे the वही  root .
The 101  फ्रेंच विभाग हैं विभाजित into 342 arrondissements  , which may be translated into English as districts .
The capital of  an arrondissement/district  is called a subprefecture .
When an arrondissement contains the prefecture ( capital ) of the department , that prefecture is the  पूंजी of the arrondissement , एक्टिंग दोनो as a प्रीफ़ेक्चर  and as a subprefecture .
arrondissements हैं further  divided into cantons and communes .
The vagina ( from Latin vāgīna , literally `` sheath '' or `` scabbard `` ) is a tubular tract which is a sex organ and has two main  कृत्यों ; यौन मैथुन  and childbirth .
In humans , this passage leads from the opening of the  भग to the गर्भाशय ( गर्भ ) , लकिन  the vaginal tract ends at the cervix .
Unlike men , who have only one genital orifice ,  महिलाओं have दो , the urethra और the योनि  .
The vaginal  खोलने is much larger than the urethral  opening , and both openings are protected by the labia .
The inner mould of  the योनि रै a foldy बनावट जिससे can बनाएँ  friction for the penis during intercourse .
During  arousal , the योनि gets नम to सुकर  the entrance of the penis .
The  latinate बहुवचन `` vaginae  '' is rarely used in English .
Colloquially , the  शब्द योनि is प्रायः प्रयुक्त to refer to the  vulva or to the female genitals in general .
However , by its dictionary and anatomical definitions , vagina refers  exclusively to the विशिष्ट  internal structure .
The  सिनसिनाटी लाल हैं a प्रमुख लीग  Baseball team based in Cincinnati , Ohio .
They are members of the National  लीग सेंट्रल प्रभाग  .
Established in 1881 as an independent club , the  टोली became a चार्टर सदस्य of the  American Association in 1882 , and joined the National League in 1890 .
The club  traditionally traces इसके उत्पत्ति to बेसबॉल  's first openly professional team in 1869 .
The Reds have won five  संसार श्रेणी शीर्षक , एक अमरीकी  Association pennant , nine National League pennants and ten division titles .
The Reds played in the National League West between  1969 और 1993 और have महरूम in the नेशनल  League Central since 1994 .
Since 2003 , the Reds have played at Great  अमरीकी बॉल पार्क , निर्मित अगला to उनके घर  from 1970 to 2002 , Riverfront Stadium .
Bob  castellini रै स्वामित्व the  Cincinnati Reds since 2006 .
A  शरारत बदबू बमबारी  .
A stink bomb is a device  designed to बनाएँ an अप्रिय  smell .
They range in effectiveness from simple pranks to military grade  malodorants or riot कंट्रोल रासायनिक  agents .
The  गिनीज किताब  of Records lists two smelliest substances .
One is  `` us सरकारी मानक बाथरूम malodor '' ; a मिश्रण  of eight chemicals with a stench resembling human feces , only much stronger , designed to test the efficacy of deodorizers and air fresheners .
Another one , `` Who me ? `` ,  is a मिश्रण of पाँच sulfur-containing  chemicals and smells like rotting food and carcasses .
The  कहावत `` a चित्र is लायक a हजार  words '' refers to the notion that a complex idea can be conveyed with just a single still image .
it भी aptly characterizes एक of the  main goals of visualization , namely making it possible to absorb large amounts of data quickly .
The  अभिव्यक्ति ``  Use a picture .
It 's worth a thousand words . '' appears in a 1911 newspaper article quoting newspaper  एडिटर आर्थर ब्रिसबेन discussing पत्रकारिता और publicity  .
1913  समाचारपत्र  advertisement
A similar phrase , `` One Look Is Worth A Thousand Words '' , appears in a 1913 newspaper  विज्ञापन लिये the  Piqua Auto Supply House of Piqua , Ohio .
An early use of the exact phrase appears in an 1918 newspaper  विज्ञापन लिये the सैन अंतोनियो लाइट जिससे says : एक of the स्वदेश 's महानतम सम्पादक says : एक चित्र is  Worth a Thousand Words The San Antonio Light 's Pictorial Magazine of the War Exemplifies the truth of the above statement -- judging from the warm reception it has received at the hands of the Sunday Light readers .
It is believed by some that the modern use of the phrase stems from an article by Fred R.  बर्नार्ड in the विज्ञापन व्यापार जर्नल मुद्रक ' स्याही , promoting the उपयोग of बिंब  in advertisements that appeared on the sides of streetcars .
The  दिसम्बर 8 , 1921 समस्या carries  an ad entitled , `` One Look is Worth A Thousand Words . ''
another ad by बर्नार्ड appears in the कूच 10  , 1927 issue with the phrase `` One Picture Worth Ten Thousand Words , '' where it is labeled a Chinese proverb ( 一圖勝萬言 ) .
The Home Book of Proverbs , Maxims ,  और परिचित वाक्यांश उद्धरण बर्नार्ड as saying  he called it `` a Chinese proverb , so that people would take it seriously . ''
Soon after , the proverb would become popularly  attributed to कन्फ्यूशियस  .
The discussion of `` One Picture Worth Thousand Words ''  बनाम `` एक चित्र लायक टेन हजार शब्द '' wan येन i hua और 10.000 मील  worth 10.000 books is cited in Information graphics where the concept of many in different disciplines and cultures .
A  चित्र is लायक a हजार  words
Despite this modern origin of the popular  phrase , the भावना रै महरूम expressed  by earlier writers .
For example the Russian writer Ivan Turgenev wrote ( in Fathers and Sons in 1862 ) , `` A picture  shows me at a glance कया it  takes dozens of pages of a book to expound . ''
Computer programmer and author  फ्रेड ब्रूक्स makes an विपरीत बयान regarding  programming in The Mythical Man-Month : `` Show me your flowcharts and conceal your tables , and I shall continue to be mystified .
Show me your tables , and I won’t usually need your  flowcharts ; they’ll be  obvious . ''
The phrase has  भी महरूम spoofed by जॉन मैकार्थी , the प्रसिद्ध कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक , to  make the opposite point : `` As the Chinese say , 1001 words is worth more than a picture . ''
A season is a subdivision of the year ,  चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in मौसम , पारिस्थितिकी , और घंटों of  daylight .
Seasons result from  the वार्षिक क्रान्ति of the धरती  around the Sun and the tilt of the Earth 's axis relative to the plane of revolution .
In temperate and polar regions , the seasons are marked by changes in the intensity of sunlight that reaches the Earth 's  सतह , विसंगतियाँ of जिससे may  cause animals to go into hibernation or to migrate , and plants to be dormant .
During May , June and July , the northern hemisphere is exposed  to अधिक सीधा धूप क्युकी the गोलार्ध चेहरों  the sun .
The same is true of the southern  गोलार्ध in नवम्बर , दिसम्बर और जनवरी  .
It is the tilt of the Earth that causes the Sun to be higher in the sky  दौरान the गर्मियाँ महीने जिससे increases the  solar flux .
However , due to seasonal lag , June , July and August are the hottest months in the northern  गोलार्ध और दिसम्बर , जनवरी और फ़रवरी  are the hottest months in the southern hemisphere .
In temperate and subpolar regions , generally four  पंचांग -आधारd सीज़न ( साथ उनके adjectives ) हैं पहचाना  : spring ( vernal ) , summer ( estival ) , autumn ( autumnal ) and winter ( hibernal ) .
However , ecologists mostly use a six season model for temperate climate regions  कि शामिल pre-spring ( prevernal ) और लेट गर्मियाँ ( serotinal ) as पृथक सीज़न साथ साथ  the traditional four .
Hot regions have two or three seasons ; the rainy ( or  गीला , or मानसून ) ऋतु और the शुष्क ऋतु  , and in some tropical areas , a cool or mild season .
In some  भाग of the संसार , खास `` सीज़न '' हैं loosely पारिभाषित आधारित  on important events such as a hurricane season , tornado season or a wildfire season .
The  छह ecological  seasons
The four calendar seasons  , चित्रित in an  ancient Roman mosaic from Tunisia
Dutch  निर्यात  in 2006
At the time of writing the Netherlands is the 17th largest  अर्थव्यवस्था of the  world .
(  देखिए : सूची  of countries by GDP ( nominal ) )
GDP per capita is roughly $ 42,000 which puts it in  the शीर्ष 10 of richest राष्ट्र in the संसार ( देखिए : सूची of देशों by  GDP ( PPP ) per capita ) .
between 1996 और 2000 सालाना आर्थिक  growth ( GDP ) averaged over 4 % , well above the European average .
Growth  slowed considerably  in 2001-05 as part of the global economic slowdown .
2006 and 2007 however showed economic  विकास of 3.4 % और 3.9 %  .
The Dutch economy was hit considerably by the ongoing global  वित्तीय संकट और the ensuing  European debt crisis .
अनेक बैंको गई दिवालिया , और  a number of others had to receive governmental aid .
In 2009 the economy  अस्वीकृत साथ 3.5 % , followed by दो सालो of mild  growth .
The Dutch economy is currently in a recession again ,  साथ an आर्थिक मनाही  of 0.5 % in 2012 .
महंगाई is  at 3.2 % in February 2013 .
Unemployment has been  अपेक्षाकृत कम compared to अन्य eu राष्ट्र लिये दशकों लकिन बाद  mid-2012 it has seen a fast increase and in February 2013 it has hit 7.7 % .
The Netherlands managed to maintain its AAA rating at  तनिक जबतक कूच 2013 according to the तीन  major credit rating agencies .
Historically , the Dutch introduced and invented the stock market by  the merchandise व्यापार through  Dutch West India Company .
The Netherlands is a founding member of the European Union ,  the oecd और the संसार  Trade Organization .
Loyal to the Game is the tenth studio album  और छठे स्टुडियो एल्बम  by Tupac Shakur .
it contains remixes of previously  unreleased music recorded by Shakur before his death in 1996 .
Released in the United States on December 14 , 2004 ( December 12 in the United  किंगडम ) , वफ़ादार to the खेल थी  produced by Eminem .
The original panel of The View ; Meredith Vieira , Star Jones , Debbie  matenopoulos और बारबरा walters  in 1997 .
The View is an American talk show broadcast on ABC that debuted in  1997 as भाग of the संजाल 's दिन प्रोग्रामिंग  block .
Created by Barbara Walters and Bill Geddie , who both also serve as the show 's  कार्यपालिका निर्माता , the कार्यक्रम सुविधाएँ a फलक  of women as co-hosts .
Along with Walters , the  वर्तमान फलक शामिल whoopi गोल्डबर्ग , जो  serves as the moderator , Joy Behar , Elisabeth Hasselbeck , and Sherri Shepherd .
International versions of the program  हैं aired in अनेक देशों  .
As of the 2012–13 season , its 16th ,  the दृश्य is the fourth-longest कार्यशील नेशनल दिन बात दिखाएँ in इतिहास , पीछे the फिल donahue  Show ( 29 ) , the variously-named Live !
programs ( 25 ) , and The  ओपरा विनफ्रे दिखाएँ (  25 ) .
Prunus virginiana , commonly called  bitter-berry , chokecherry , वर्जिनिया बर्ड चेरी और पश्चिमी chokecherry ( भी ब्लैक chokecherry लिये P. virginiana var . demissa  ) , is a species of bird cherry ( Prunus subgenus Padus ) native to North America ; the natural historic range of P. virginiana includes most of the continent , except for the far north and far south .
Los Angeles International Airport  is the प्राथमिक विमानक्षेत्र सेवारत the वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स  Area , the second-most populated metropolitan area in the United States .
It is  सबसे प्रायः referred to by इसके iata विमानक्षेत्र  code LAX , with the letters pronounced individually .
LAX is located in southwestern Los Angeles  साथ the प्रशांत coast in the पड़ोस of westchester , इससे the शहर कोर और is the प्राथमिक विमानक्षेत्र  of Los Angeles World Airports ( LAWA ) , an agency of the Los Angeles city government formerly known as the Department of Airports .
In 2011 , LAX was the sixth busiest airport in the world after Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International  विमानक्षेत्र , बीजिंग पूंजी अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र , लंदन हीथ्रो विमानक्षेत्र  , Chicago O'Hare International Airport , and Tokyo Haneda International Airport with 61,862,052 passengers .
The airport holds the claim  लिये `` the संसार 's व्यस्ततम उत्पत्ति और गंतव्य ( o & d ) विमानक्षेत्र '' in 2011  that involves non-connecting passenger traffic .
It is also  the तभी विमानक्षेत्र to रैंक among  the top five U.S. airports for both passenger and cargo traffic .
LAX is the busiest airport in the Greater Los Angeles Area , but other airports including Bob Hope  विमानक्षेत्र , जॉन वेन विमानक्षेत्र , long बीच विमानक्षेत्र , la/ontario अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport , and Palm Springs International Airport also serve the region .
LAX is  भी the व्यस्ततम विमानक्षेत्र in कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the वेस्ट coast of the संयुक्त राज्य in शर्तें of उड़ान परिचालन  , passenger traffic and air cargo activity , leading it to be referred to as the `` Gateway to the Pacific Rim `` .
Peyton Williams Manning ( born  कूच 24 , 1976 ) is an अमरीकी  football quarterback for the Denver Broncos of the National Football League ( NFL ) .
He played for the  इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस लिये 14 सीज़न  from 1998 to 2011 .
He is the son of  पूर्व एनएफएल क्वार्टरबैक आर्ची मैनिंग  and an elder brother of New York Giants quarterback Eli Manning .
Manning played college football for the University of Tennessee , leading the Volunteers  to the 1997 सेक चैंपियनशिप in उसके  senior season .
However , No . 3 Tennessee lost to the No . 2 Nebraska Cornhuskers 42-17 in the Orange Bowl  giving नेब्रास्का और tom ओसबोर्न उनके 3rd नेशनल  championship in 4 years .
He was chosen by the Indianapolis Colts with  the पहला overall चुनें in the  1998 NFL Draft .
From 1998 to 2010 , he led the Colts to eight ( seven AFC South and one AFC East ) division championships , two AFC championships , and to  a सुपर कटोरी चैंपियनशिप (  Super Bowl XLI ) .
He has won a record four league most valuable player awards , was the most valuable  खिलाड़ी of सुपर कटोरी xli , रै महरूम नामित to बारह प्रो प्याले , रै बारह 4,000-yard गुजर सीज़न , और is  the Indianapolis Colts ' all-time leader in passing yards ( 54,828 ) and touchdown passes ( 399 ) .
In 2009 , he was named the  बेहतरीन खिलाड़ी in the एनएफएल और फॉक्स खेल  along with Sports Illustrated named him the NFL player of the decade of the 2000s .
In May 2011 , he underwent neck surgery to alleviate neck pain and  भुजा कमज़ोरी he dealt साथ दौरान the पिछला few सीज़न पहले हस्ताक्षर a five-year  , $ 90 million contract extension with the Colts in July 2011 .
Manning had hoped to play in the 2011  ऋतु , लकिन in सितंबर 2011 , he underwent a much अधिक गंभीर  second surgery : a level one cervical fusion procedure .
Manning had never missed an NFL game in his career , but  थी मजबूर to मिस the संपूर्ण 2011 ऋतु  .
he थी released by the कोल्टस on कूच 7 , 2012 , और बाद  an almost two-week period where he visited with and worked out for several NFL teams , he signed with the Denver Broncos on March 20 , 2012 .
Manning 's pre-snap routine has earned him the nickname , `` The  शेरिफ '' और is एक of the सबसे recognizable और parodied  in the NFL .
The  इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस ' लगभग विशेष उपयोग of the hurry-up ठोकर led to मैनिंग using an सरणी  of gestures and verbal commands to call the play at the line of scrimmage rather than in the huddle .
The America  मीनार of the अमरीकी सामान्य  Center , the headquarters of Baker Hughes
Baker  ह्यूजेस is एक of the संसार 's largest oilfield  services companies .
It operates in  over 90 देशों , providing the आयल और गैस उद्योग साथ उत्पाद  and services for drilling , formation evaluation , completion , production and reservoir consulting .
Baker Hughes has its headquarters in the  अमेरिका मीनार in the अमरीकी सामान्य  Center in Neartown , Houston .
Baker Hughes Incorporated was formed when  बेकर अंतरराष्ट्रीय और ह्यूजेस  Tool Company merged in 1987 .
Baker Hughes operates worldwide with major offices in  लिवरपूल , संयुक्त किंगडम ; सिंगापुर ; दुबई ; a शोध और मेंटेनेंस  facility in Celle , Germany ; Lafayette , Louisiana ; Houston , Texas ; Pescara , Italy ; and Kuala Lumpur , Malaysia .
the कम्पनी is administered broadly in दो बांटती : the पूर्वी गोलार्ध साथ पाँच regions ( यूरोपीय , अफ़्रीकी , the मध्य ईस्ट , एशिया प्रशांत और  Russia/Caspian ) and the western hemisphere with four regions ( Canada , US Land , US Gulf , and Latin America ) .
Each of these  regions is subdivided into  markets .
The United States one- cent coin , commonly known as a penny , is a unit of currency  equaling एक one-hundredth of a संयुक्त राज्य डालर  .
The cent  's प्रतीक is  ¢ .
Its obverse has  प्रदर्शित the प्रोफ़ाइल of अध्यक्ष अब्राहम  Lincoln since 1909 , the centennial of his birth .
इससे 1959 ( the sesquicentennial of lincoln  's birth ) to 2008 , the reverse featured the Lincoln Memorial .
Four different reverse designs in 2009 honored Lincoln 's 200th birthday and a new ,  स्थाई रिवर्स – the संघ शील्ड – थी introduced  in 2010 .
The  सिक्का is 0.75 इंच  ( 19.05 mm ) in diameter and 0.061 inches ( 1.55 mm ) in thickness .
The U.S. Mint 's official name for a penny is `` '' and the U.S.  राजकोष 's आधिकारिक नाम is `` एक cent  piece '' .
The colloquial term penny derives from the British coin of the  वही नाम , the pre-decimal संस्करण of जिससे था a समान मान  .
In American  अंग्रेज़ी , कौड़ी is the बहुवचन रूप , अन्य  plural forms pence and pee ( standard use in British English ) are not used .
As of 2012 , it costs the U.S. Mint 2.00 cents to make a cent  क्युकी of the लागत of  materials and production .
This figure includes the Mint’s fixed  components लिये वितरण  and fabrication , estimated at $ 13 million in FY 2011 .
It also includes Mint overhead allocated to the  पैनी , जिससे थी $ 17.7  million for 2011 .
Fixed costs and overhead  होता have to be अवशोषित by अन्य circulating  coins without the penny .
The loss  in profitability  due to producing the one cent coin in the United States for the year of 2012 was $ 58,000,000 .
This was a slight decrease from 2011 , the year  पहले , जिससे  had a production loss of $ 60,200,000 .

Some of  the प्रमुख रंगों हैं  white , black , red , yellow , blue , and cream .
The most popular category of koi is the Gosanke , which is made up of the  kohaku , taisho sanshoku  , and Showa Sanshoku varieties .
The American Federation of Government Employees ( AFGE ) is an American labor union representing over 650,000 employees of the federal government , about 5,000 employees of the District of Columbia ,  और a few सौ निजी सेक्टर कर्मचारी , ज़्यादातर  in and around federal facilities .
AFGE is the largest union for civilian , non- postal federal employees and the largest union for District of Columbia employees who report  सीधे to the महापौर ( i.e. ,  outside of D.C. public schools ) .
It is  संबद्ध साथ  the AFL-CIO .

The evolution of plants has resulted in increasing levels of  जटिलता , इससे the earliest algal मैट्स , through bryophytes  , lycopods , ferns to the complex gymnosperms and angiosperms of today .
While many of the  समूह जिससे appeared पहले  continue to thrive , especially in the environments in which they evolved , for a time each new grade of organisation became more `` successful '' than its predecessors .
In  the ordovician काल ,  around , the first land plants appeared .
These began to diversify in the late Silurian Period , around , and the results of their diversification are displayed in remarkable detail in an early Devonian fossil  assemblage  from the Rhynie chert .
This chert preserved early plants in  सेल्यूलर विवरण , petrified  in volcanic springs .
By the middle of the  devonian काल , सबसे of the सुविधाएँ recognised in पौधे आज हैं उपस्थित , सहित  roots , leaves and secondary wood ; and , by late Devonian times , seeds had evolved .
Late Devonian plants had thereby reached a degree of sophistication that allowed them to  रूप वनों of लम्बा  trees .
Evolutionary innovation  जारी into the carboniferous काल  and is still ongoing today .
Most  संयंत्र समूह यहूद अपेक्षाकृत unscathed by the permo-triassic  extinction event , although the structures of communities changed .
This may have set the scene for the  रूप of the flowering पौधे in the triassic  ( ~ ) , and their later diversification in the Cretaceous and Paleogene .
The latest major group of plants to evolve were the grasses , which  became महत्वपूर्ण in the mid-paleogene  , from around .
The grasses , as well as many other groups ,  विकसित नई mechanisms of चयापचय to जीवित the कम और  warm , dry conditions of the tropics over the last .
