The Super Bowl is an annual American football game  कि determines the चैंपियन of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल  League ( NFL ) .
The contest is held in an American city that is chosen three to four years beforehand ,  प्रायः in warm-weather or domed साइट  .
Since 1971 , the winner of the American Football Conference ( AFC )  चैंपियनशिप खेल रै faced the विजेता of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन  ( NFC ) Championship Game in the culmination of the NFL playoffs .
Before the 1970 merger between the American Football League ( AFL ) and the National  फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ) , the दो लीग मिले in चार  such contests .
The first two were known as  the `` afl-nfl संसार चैंपियनशिप  Game . ''
Super Bowl III in  1969 थी the पहला ऐसे खेल कि carried the `` सुपर कटोरी  '' moniker , the names `` Super Bowl I `` and `` Super Bowl II `` were retroactively applied to the first two games .
The NFC  /nfL लीड in सुपर कटोरी विन्स  with 25 , while the AFC /AFL has won 22 .
Eighteen different franchises , including teams that  relocated to another नगर , have जीती the सुपर  Bowl .
The Pittsburgh Steelers have won the most Super Bowls with six championships ( record 6–2 ) , while both the Dallas Cowboys and San Francisco 49ers  have पाँच विन्स प्रत्येक ( cowboys 5–3 ;  49ers 5–1 ) .
डलास और पिट्सबर्ग have the सबसे सुपर कटोरी  appearances with eight , while the Buffalo Bills have the most consecutive appearances with four losses in a row from 1990 to 1993 .
The New England Patriots  , डेनवर broncos और मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स have भी खोया a रिकार्ड  four Super Bowls .
Buffalo and  मिनेसोटा हैं दोनो 0–4 , डेनवर is 2–4  and New England is 3–4 .
The record for  लगातार विन्स is दो और is साझा by सात franchises : the 1966-67  Green Bay Packers , the 1972-73 Miami Dolphins , the 1974-75 and 1978-79 Pittsburgh Steelers ( the only team to accomplish this feat twice ) , the 1988-89 San Francisco 49ers , the 1992-93 Dallas Cowboys , the 1997-98 Denver Broncos , and the 2003-04 New England Patriots .
The  तभी टोली साथ अनेक सुपर कटोरी दिखावे और no  losses is the Baltimore Ravens , who in winning Super Bowl XLVII unseated and replaced the 49ers in that position .
Four current NFL teams have never appeared in a Super Bowl , including franchise relocations and renaming : the Cleveland Browns , Detroit Lions , Jacksonville Jaguars , and Houston Texans ,  हालांकि दोनो the भूरा और शेर था जीती एनएफएल चैंपियनशिप  games prior to the creation of the Super Bowl .
Martin  काउंटी is a काउंटी स्तिथ  in the U.S. state of Texas .
As of the  2010 जनसांख्यिकी , इसके जनसांख्यिकी  was 4,799 .
इसके सीट is  Stanton .
The county is  नामित लिये wylie मार्टिन , an जल्दी  settler .
Martin County is  एक of 30 निषेध , or entirely  dry , counties in the state of Texas .
Alkaline phosphatase ( ALP , ALKP ) ( ) is a hydrolase enzyme responsible for removing phosphate groups from many types of molecules ,  सहित nucleotides , प्रोटीन , और  alkaloids .
The process  of निकालना the  phosphate group is called dephosphorylation .
As  the नाम suggests  , alkaline phosphatases are most effective in an alkaline environment .
It is  sometimes प्रयुक्त synonymously as मौलिक  phosphatase .
Triticale ( × Triticosecale ) , ( ) is a hybrid of wheat (  triticum ) और rye ( secale ) पहला करवाया in laboratories  during the late 19th century .
the अनाज थी originally  bred in Scotland and Sweden .
Commercially available triticale is almost always a second generation  संकर , i.e. , a क्रॉस between दो kinds of प्राथमिक  ( first cross ) triticales .
As a rule , triticale combines the  उपज संभावित और अनाज विशेषता of गेहूं साथ the बीमारी  and environmental tolerance ( including soil conditions ) of rye .
Only recently has it been  विकसित into a commercially सुगठित  crop .
Depending on  the cultivar , triticale can  more or less resemble either of its parents .
It is grown mostly  लिये forage or चारा , हालांकि कुछ triticale-based भोजन can be खरीदा at  health food stores or are to be found in some breakfast cereals .
जब क्रासिंग गेहूं और rye , गेहूं  is used as the female parent and rye as the male parent ( pollen donor ) .
The resulting hybrid is sterile ,  और जरूर be treated साथ colchicine to  induce polyploidy and thus the ability to reproduce itself .
The primary producers of triticale are  कैंडल , जर्मनी ,  France , Belarus and Australia .
In 2009 , according to the Food and Agriculture Organization ( FAO ) ,  15.0 लाख टन यहूद harvested in 29  countries across the world .
The triticale hybrids are all amphidiploid , which means the plant is  द्विगुणित लिये दो genomes निकला इससे अलग प्रजाति  .
In other  शब्द , triticale is  an allotetraploid .
In  पहले सालो , सबसे कार्य थी  done on octoploid triticale .
Different ploidy  स्तर have  been created and evaluated over time .
The tetraploids showed little  वादा , लकिन hexaploid  triticale was successful enough to find commercial application .
The CIMMYT triticale improvement program wanted to improve food  उत्पादन और पोषण in विकासशील देशों  .
Triticale has potential in the production of bread and other food products , such  as कुकीज़ , पास्ता , पिज़्ज़ा आटा  and breakfast cereals .
The protein content is higher than that of wheat , although the  glutenin भिन्न  is less .
The grain has also been stated to have higher  स्तर of lysine  than wheat .
Assuming increased acceptance , the milling industry will have to adapt to triticale  , as the मिलिंग तकनीकों employed लिये गेहूं हैं  unsuited to triticale .
Sell et al . found triticale could be used as a feed grain , and later research  मिला इसके मंड थी विशेषकर  readily digested .
As a feed grain ,  triticale is already खूब स्थापित  and of high economic importance .
It has received attention  as a संभावित उर्जा क्रॉप , और शोध is फिलहाल होने  conducted on the use of the crop 's biomass in bioethanol production .
`` Puff  , the जादू ड्रैगन '' is a सोंग लिखा by लियोनार्ड lipton  and Peter Yarrow , and made popular by Yarrow 's group Peter , Paul and Mary in a 1963 recording .
The song  हासिल ग्रेट  popularity .
A college football national championship in the  उच्चतम स्तर of कॉलेजिएट खेल in the संयुक्त राज्य , फिलहाल the नेशनल कॉलेजिएट एथलेटिक संघ ( ncaa ) प्रभाग i फ़ुटबॉल  Bowl Subdivision ( FBS ) , is a designation awarded annually by various third-party organizations to their selection ( s ) of the best college football team ( s ) .
प्रभाग i fbs ( formerly प्रभाग i-a )  football is the only NCAA sport in which a yearly champion is not determined by an NCAA sanctioned championship event .
Because the  चैंपियनशिप टोली is नहीं संकल्पित by a ncaa चैंपियनशिप or टूर्नामेंट  event , it is sometimes unofficially referred to as a `` mythical national championship `` .
Since the NCAA , the sport 's  शासी देह , करता नहीं determine  or declare a national champion in this field , determination of such has often engendered controversy .
A  चैंपियनशिप टोली is independently घोषित  by various individuals and organizations , often referred to as `` selectors '' .
These  चुनाव हैं sometimes  at odds with each other .
जबकि the ncaa रै never officially endorsed an  annual championship team , it has documented the choices of several selectors in the official NCAA Football Bowl Subdivision Records .
In addition , various third party analysts have  independently प्रकाशित उनके अपना सूचियाँ of कया वे  have determined to be the most legitimate selections for each season .
These are also often at odds with each other as well as individual school 's claims on national championships ,  जिससे , लिये कोई particular ऋतु , may or may नहीं correlate to the चयन प्रकाशित  elsewhere .
Currently , two widely recognized national champions selectors are the Associated Press , which conducts a poll of football sportswriters , and the USA Today Coaches ' Poll , a poll of American Football Coaches  संघ क्रियाशील कोच कि is contractually obligated to नाम the विजेता of the कटोरी चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी चैंपियनशिप  game as its national champion .
The Milwaukee Brewers are a  पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली आधारित in मिल्वौकी  , Wisconsin .
The team is a member of the Central Division of Major League Baseball 's National  लीग और plays इसके घर खेल  at Miller Park .
The team is so named because of the city 's  संघ साथ the brewing  industry .
The Washington Nationals are a  पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली  based in Washington , D.C .
The Nationals are a  सदस्य of the ईस्ट प्रभाग of the नेशनल  League of Major League Baseball ( MLB ) .
The team 's home ballpark is Nationals  पार्क , स्तिथ on दक्षिण कैपिटल गली in  Southeast D.C. , near the Anacostia River .
The park opened in  2008 , replacing rfk स्टेडियम  , the team 's home from 2005 to 2007 .
The Nationals ' name derives from the former  वॉशिंगटन बेसबॉल टोली कि था the वही नाम  ( used interchangeably with Senators ) .
Their nickname is `` the Nats '' —a shortened  संस्करण कि थी भी प्रयुक्त  by the old D.C. teams .
An expansion franchise , the club was founded in as  the मॉन्ट्रियल expos ,  the first major league team in Canada .
They were based in Montreal , Quebec , and played their home  खेल at jarry पार्क स्टेडियम और बाद  in Olympic Stadium .
In , the Expos won a division championship , won their first-ever playoff  श्रेणी by defeating the फिलाडेल्फिया फ़िलीज़ , 3–2 , और उन्नत to the नेशनल लीग चैंपियनशिप  Series , where they would go on to lose to the Los Angeles Dodgers , 3–2 , in their only postseason appearance during the strike-shortened season .
the expos था उनके उच्चतम जीतना प्रतिशत in  the strike-shortened season of , when the team had the best record in baseball .
The team 's subsequent  shedding of खिलाड़ी caused प्रशंसक  interest to drop off .
After the  2001 ऋतु , एमएलबी माना  revoking the team 's franchise , along with either the Minnesota Twins or the Tampa Bay Devil Rays .
After being purchased by MLB in 2002 , the team was moved before the  ऋतु to वॉशिंगटन और renamed the नागरिकों , the  first relocation since the second Washington Senators moved to Arlington , Texas , and became the Texas Rangers in .
The Nationals are one of two MLB franchises , and the only one in  the नेशनल लीग , कि रै never निभाई in a संसार श्रेणी ( the सिएटल मैरीनेर्स  are the other ) .
A contingent fee ( in the United States ) or conditional fee ( in  इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स ) is कोई शुल्क लिये सेवाएं provided जहाँ the शुल्क is देय तभी if वहीँ is  a favourable result .
In the law , it is defined as a `` fee charged for a lawyer 's services only if  the मुकदमा is कामयाब or is favorably  settled out of court ... .
Contingent fees are usually calculated as a  प्रतिशत of the क्लाएंट 's जाल रिकवरी  . ''
In the English legal system , it is  generally referred to as no जीत  no fee .
A  सशर्त शुल्क अनुबंध between  a law firm and a client .
The usual form of this agreement is that the  solicitor होगा लो a विधि मामला on the समझना  that if lost , no payment is made .
however , if the मामला is जीती  , the lawyer will be entitled to the normal fee based on hourly billing , plus a success fee .
The success fee in  इंग्लैण्ड जरूर be as a प्रतिशत  no greater than 100 % of the normal fee .
This contrasts with the contingency fee in the US , which gives the  कामयाब attorney a प्रतिशत of the क्षतिपूर्ति awarded in एहसान of उसके क्लाएंट .
This makes it easier for the  ग़रीब to pursue उनके सिविल अधिकारों चूंकि वरना ,  to sue someone for a tort , one must first be wealthy enough to pursue such litigation in the first place .
However , because of the high risk , few attorneys will  लो मामले on a आकस्मिकता आधार जबतक  they feel the case has good merit .
According to a 2004 book by law professor Herbert  kritzer , निर्भर शुल्क यहूद अनुमत as of कि साल in the following देशों : ऑस्ट्रेलिया , ब्राज़ील  , Canada , the Dominican Republic , France , Greece , Ireland , Japan , New Zealand , the United Kingdom and the United States .
They are also allowed  in निजी चोट  actions in Lithuania .
Recently , they have been allowed in  बेल्जियम as खूब .
A Convocation (  लैटिन 'calling साथ ' , translating the यूनानी  ecclesia ) is a group of people formally assembled for a special purpose .
Sons of Anarchy is a television  नाटक श्रेणी निर्मित by कर्ट sutter परिचय the जीवनदान of a close-knit गैरकानूनी मोटरसाइकिल  club operating in Charming , a fictional town in California 's Central Valley .
The show centers on protagonist Jackson `` Jax '' Teller  ( चार्ली hunnam ) , the then-vice अध्यक्ष of  the club , who begins questioning the club and himself .
Sons  of अराजकता premiered on सितंबर  3 , 2008 , on cable network FX .
The  तीसरा ऋतु of the श्रेणी आकर्षित an औसत of 4.9 लाख दर्शक प्रति सप्ताह , बनाना it fx 's उच्चतम  rated series ever , surpassing FX 's other hits The Shield , Nip/Tuck , and Rescue Me .
On February 3 , 2012 ,  बेटे of अराजकता थी नवीनीकृत लिये दो  additional seasons , a fifth and a sixth .
Those involved in the production of the series imply that a seventh and  फाइनल ऋतु is निर्माता कर्ट sutter 's  plan .
The Grímsvötn sub-glacial lakes ( ; vötn = `` waters '' , singular : ) and  the ज्वालामुखी of the वही नाम हैं in south-east आइसलैंड  .
They are in the highlands of Iceland at the  northwestern पक्ष of the vatnajökull  ice-cap .
The  झीलों हैं  at , at an elevation of .
Beneath the lakes is  the मैग्मा  chamber of the Grímsvötn volcano .
grímsvötn is a basaltic ज्वालामुखी जिससे रै the उच्चतम फटना आवृत्ति of  all the volcanoes in Iceland and has a southwest-northeast-trending fissure system .
The massive climate-impacting Laki fissure eruption of  1783–1784 थी a भाग of the वही फिशर  system .
Grímsvötn was  erupting at the वही समय as laki  during 1783 , but continued to erupt until 1785 .
Because most of the volcano lies underneath  vatnajökull , सबसे of इसके eruptions have  been subglacial and the interaction of magma and meltwater from the ice causes phreatomagmatic explosive activity .
On 21 May 2011 at 19:25 UTC , an eruption began , with high  plumes accompanied by अनेक भूकंप , resulting in रद्दीकरण of 900 फ़्लाइट in आइसलैंड  , and in the United Kingdom , Greenland , Germany , Ireland and Norway on 22–25 May .
Until 25 May the  फटना स्केल था महरूम larger  than that of the 2010 eruption of Eyjafjallajökull .
The eruption stopped at 02:40 UTC on 25 May 2011 , although there was some explosive activity from the tephra vents affecting  तभी the क्षेत्रफल around the crater  .
Vetting is the process of performing a background check on  किसी पहले offering उन्हें नियुक्ति , डाक्टरेट an पुरस्कार  , etc .
A prospective person  or प्रोजेक्ट may be vetted  before making a hiring decision .
In addition , in intelligence gathering ,  एसेट हैं vetted to determine  their usefulness .
Former  मुख्यालय और वर्तमान कॉरपोरेट  offices
Caesars Entertainment Corporation ( formerly Harrah 's Entertainment from 1995 to 2010 ) is an American public gaming corporation that owns and  operates over 50 कसीनो , होटल , और सात गोल्फ़ पाठ्यक्रम अंतर्गत अनेक ब्रांड्स  .
The company , based in Paradise , Nevada ,  is the largest गेमिंग कम्पनी in the संसार , साथ सालाना  revenues of $ 8.9 billion ( 2010 ) .
Caesars is a public company , with a joint venture of Apollo Global Management and Texas Pacific Group ownig a  विशाल portion of the स्टेक और blackstone  Group also holding a significant stake .
The name change from `` Harrah 's Entertainment Inc. '' to `` Caesars Entertainment  निगम '' थी बना आधिकारिक on नवम्बर 23  , 2010 .
Harrah 's remains a  कुंजी ब्रांड in the कम्पनी .
On November 5 ,  2010 , harrah 's घोषित an आरंभिक पब्लिक offering  of 31,250,000 shares but retracted this offering on November 19 .
A Permanent Resident in Canada is a person who is not a  कनाडाई नागरिक लकिन जो रै महरूम granted अनुमति  to live and work in Canada without any time limit on his or her stay .
A permanent resident must live in  कनाडा लिये दो सालो आउट of प्रत्येक पाँच or रिस्क खोने  that status .
A  स्थाई निवासी holds अनेक of the वही अधिकारों और जिम्मेदारियों as a कनाडाई  citizen , among others the right to work for any enterprise as well as for the federal or provincial government ( under restriction of access rights to certain regulated professions ) .
The main differences  हैं कि निवासियों  can not :
vote in  चुनावों in कनाडा  ;
चलाएं लिये निर्वाचित  office ;
hold  कनाडाई passports  ;
In addition , they may be allowed  to जुड़ें कनाडा 's हथियारबंद शक्तियां if  the national interest would not be prejudiced .
Permanent residents also risk  प्रत्यर्पण लिये गंभीर अपराधों वचनबद्ध जबकि  resident in Canada .
Permanent residents may apply for Canadian  नागरिकता बाद तीन सालो in कनाडा ; however इस is नहीं अनिवार्य  .
Erica Kane is a  fictional अक्षर इससे the अमरीकी  ABC Daytime soap opera All My Children .
The character was portrayed by actress Susan Lucci from her debut on January 16 , 1970 until the last  ब्रॉडकास्ट टेलीविज़न एपीसोड aired on सितंबर 23 , 2011  .
On February 11 , 2013 , it was announced that Lucci  होगा guest-star on the  Prospect Park 's continuation of All My Children .
in the u.S. , एरिका is माना  to be the most popular character in soap opera history .
Regarding the North-American market , TV Guide calls her ``  unequivocally the सबसे प्रसिद्ध साबुन ओपेरा अक्षर in the इतिहास of  daytime TV '' , and included her in their 2013 list of The 60 Nastiest Villains of All Time .
A graph of the US CPI from 1913 to 2006 ( in blue )  , और इसके प्रतिशत सालाना  change ( in red )
A  उपभोक्ता दाम अनुक्रमणिका ( cpi ) उपायों  changes in the price level of a market basket of consumer goods and services purchased by households .
The CPI in the United States is defined by the Bureau of Labor  आंकडे as `` a माप of the औसत बदलें over समय in the कीमतें सशुल्क by शहरी उपभोक्ता  for a market basket of consumer goods and services . ''
The CPI is a statistical estimate  constructed using the कीमतें of a नमूना of प्रतिनिधि  items whose prices are collected periodically .
Sub-indexes and sub-sub-indexes are computed for  अलग श्रेणी और sub-categories of goods और सेवाएं , होने संयुक्त to उपज  the overall index with weights reflecting their shares in the total of the consumer expenditures covered by the index .
It is one of several price indices calculated by most  नेशनल सांख्यिकीय एजेंसियों  .
The annual percentage  बदलें in a cpi is  used as a measure of inflation .
A CPI can be used to index ( i.e. , adjust for the effect of inflation ) the real value of wages , salaries  , pensions , लिये regulating कीमतें और लिये deflating मौद्रिक  magnitudes to show changes in real values .
In most countries , the CPI is , along with the population census and the USA  नेशनल आय और उत्पाद खाते , एक of the सबसे closely देखी नेशनल  economic statistics .
Knocking on wood , or to touch wood , refers to the apotropaic tradition  in पश्चिमी लोकगीत of वस्तुतः touching/knocking on लकडी , or merely stating कि तुम हैं doing or intend वही  , in order to avoid `` tempting fate `` after making a favourable observation , a boast , or declaration concerning one 's own death .
रॉकर  arm
Generally referred to within the context of the internal combustion engine of automotive , marine ,  मोटरसाइकिल और प्रत्यागमनी विमानन इंजन , the रॉकर  arm is an oscillating lever that conveys radial movement from the cam lobe into linear movement at the poppet valve to open it .
One end is raised and  lowered by a घूर्णन पालि of the camshaft ( either सीधे  or via a tappet ( lifter ) and pushrod ) while the other end acts on the valve stem .
When the camshaft lobe  उठाता the बाहर of the भुजा , the अंदर दबाता  down on the valve stem , opening the valve .
When the outside of the arm is permitted to return due to the  camshafts रोटेशन , the अंदर उदय , allowing the वाल्व वसन्त to बंद  the valve .
The drive  कैम is चलित by  the camshaft .
This pushes the rocker arm up and down about the  trunnion pin or रॉकर शाफ्ट  .
Friction may be reduced at the point of contact with the  वाल्व स्टेम by a रोलर कैम अनुसरणकर्ता  .
A similar arrangement transfers the motion via  another रोलर कैम अनुसरणकर्ता to a दूसरी  rocker arm .
This rotates about the rocker shaft , and transfers  the गति via a tappet  to the poppet valve .
In this case this opens the intake valve  to the बेलन सिर  .
The effective leverage of the arm ( and thus the force it can exert on the valve stem )  is संकल्पित by the रॉकर भुजा अनुपात , the अनुपात of the अलहदा इससे  the rocker arm 's center of rotation to the tip divided by the distance from the center of rotation to the point acted on by the camshaft or pushrod .
Current automotive design favors rocker arm ratios of  परिचय 1.5:1 to 1.8:1  .
However , in the past smaller positive ratios ( the valve lift is greater than the cam lift ) and even negative ratios  ( वाल्व लिफ्ट छोटी than the  cam lift ) have been used .
Many pre-WW2 engines use 1:1 (  न्यूट्रल ) ratios  .
For car engines the rocker arms are  generally स्टील stampings , providing  a reasonable balance of strength , weight and economical cost .
Because the rocker arms are , in part , reciprocating weight , excessive mass especially at the  लीवर ends हद the इंजन 's क्षमता to पहुँचें ऊँची  operating speeds .
`` The Night the Lights Went Out in  जॉर्जिया '' is a दक्षिणी गोथिक सोंग लिखा by songwriter bobby  Russell and performed in 1972 by his then-wife Vicki Lawrence .
Reba McEntire later  covered it in 1991  .
Recorded in late October 1972 in  united/western studios on सूर्यास्त in हॉलीवुड और released कम than दो सप्ताह बाद in नवम्बर 1972  , the song centers around the older brother of the narrator , falsely convicted of and executed for a murder , which the narrator herself has committed .
In postal mail , a return address is an explicit  समावेश of the पता of the  person sending the message .
It provides the recipient ( and sometimes authorized intermediaries ) with a means to determine how to  respond to the प्रेषक of the संदेश if needed  .
The return address need not include a sender 's name , but  चाहिए शामिल पता or p.o . बक्सा विवरण in the वही रास्ता as the डिलीवरी पता  should .
In some countries , the return address is  conventionally स्तिथ in the अपर बाएँ हाथ  corner of the envelope , card , or label .
In the  संयुक्त किंगडम , the वापसी पता is प्रायः  placed on the reverse of the envelope , near the top .
व्यवसायों प्रायः उपयोग लिफाफे  preprinted with a return address .
Many individuals  have चादरें of चिपकने लेबल्स preprinted  with their home address to affix to their correspondence .
Charities  sometimes शामिल ऐसे  sheets in mailshots .
Rolls of Return Address Labels can be purchased from companies that sell personalized labels to provide  individuals an आसान रास्ता to छिलके और स्टिक वापसी  address labels to their envelopes .
The  वापसी पता is  not required on postal mail .
However , lack of a return address prevents the postal service from being  समर्थ to वापसी the मद if it proves undeliverable ; ऐसे as इससे क्षति , postage  due , or invalid destination .
Such mail may thus become  मुर्दे अक्षर मेल  .
Should the return address be of a different state or  देश , the मेल may be routed through  that location for ease of return .
A nerve guidance conduit ( also referred to as an artificial nerve conduit or artificial nerve graft , as opposed to an autograft ) is an  कृत्रिम अर्थात् of guiding axonal regrowth to सुकर तंत्रिका regeneration और is एक of अनेक नैदानिक  treatments for nerve injuries .
When direct suturing of the two stumps of a severed nerve can not be accomplished without tension , the standard  नैदानिक उपचार लिये परिधीय तंत्रिका चोटों  is autologous nerve grafting .
Due to the limited availability of donor tissue and functional recovery in autologous nerve grafting , neural tissue engineering research has focused on the development of bioartificial nerve  मार्गदर्शन conduits as an वैकल्पिक उपचार  , especially for large defects .
Similar techniques are also being explored for nerve repair in the spinal cord but nerve regeneration  in the सेंट्रल बेचैन प्रणाली मुद्राएँ a वृहद चुनौती क्युकी इसके axons do नहीं regenerate appreciably  in their native environment .
The creation of artificial conduits is also known as entubulation because the  तंत्रिका ends और intervening गैप हैं enclosed भीतर a ट्यूब रचित of biological or  synthetic materials .
Whether the conduit is in the form of a biologic tube , synthetic tube or tissue-engineered conduit , it should facilitate neurotropic and neurotrophic communication between  the proximal और distal ends of the तंत्रिका गैप , ब्लाक बाह्य inhibitory कारकों  , and provide a physical guidance for axonal regrowth .
The most basic objective of a nerve  मार्गदर्शन conduit is to combine शारीरिक , रासायनिक  , and biological cues under conditions that will foster tissue formation .
Materials that have been used to make biologic tubes include blood vessels and skeletal muscles , while nonabsorbable and bioabsorbable  सिंथेटिक tubes have महरूम बना इससे silicone और polyglycolide  respectively .
Tissue-engineered nerve guidance conduits are a combination of many elements : scaffold structure , scaffold material , cellular therapies ,  neurotrophic कारकों और biomimetic सामग्री  .
The choice of which physical , chemical and biological cues to use is based on the properties of the nerve  पर्यावरण , जिससे is नाजुक in बनाना the सबसे वांछनीय पर्यावरण लिये axon regeneration  .
The factors that  कंट्रोल सामग्री चयन शामिल biocompatibility  , biodegradability , mechanical integrity , controllability during nerve growth , implantation and sterilization .
हार्डकोर साहूकार is an अमरीकी वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी उत्पादित by rdf यूएसए ( बाद zodiak यूएसए ) और रिचर्ड dominick  Productions for truTV about the day-to-day operations of American Jewelry and Loan , a family-owned pawn shop located at 20450 Greenfield Road , between 8 Mile Road and the John C. Lodge Freeway in Detroit , Michigan .
The series premiered on  अगस्त 16 ,  2010 , delivering two million viewers , setting a record as truTV 's most-watched series premiere ever .
amoxicillin  BP
Amoxicillin ( INN ) , formerly amoxycillin ( BAN ) , and abbreviated amox , is a moderate-spectrum , bacteriolytic , β-lactam antibiotic used  to दावत बैक्टीरियल infections caused by susceptible microorganisms  .
It is usually  the ड्रग of चुनाव भीतर the  class because it is better absorbed , following oral administration , than other β-lactam antibiotics .
Amoxicillin is one of the most  आम एंटीबायोटिक विहित लिये children  .
The drug  became उपलब्धियाँ  in 1972 .
Amoxicillin is susceptible to degradation by β-lactamase -producing bacteria , which are resistant to a broad spectrum of  β-lactam एंटीबायोटिक , ऐसे as पेनिसिलीन .
For this reason , it is often combined with  clavulanic एसिड , a β-lactamase inhibitor  .
This increases effectiveness by  reducing इसके susceptibility to  β-lactamase resistance .
Lyndon  baines जॉनसन ( अगस्त 27 , 1908 – जनवरी 22 , 1973 ) , प्रायः referred  to as LBJ , was the 36th President of the United States ( 1963–1969 ) , a position he assumed after his service as the 37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ) .
He is one of only  चार लोगों जो परोसा in सब चार निर्वाचित संघीय कार्यालयों  of the United States : Representative , Senator , Vice President , and President .
Johnson , a Democrat from Texas , served as  a संयुक्त राज्य प्रतिनिधि इससे 1937–1949 और as a सीनेटर इससे 1949–1961  , including six years as United States Senate Majority Leader , two as Senate Minority Leader and two as Senate Majority Whip .
After campaigning unsuccessfully for the Democratic nomination in 1960 , Johnson was asked by  जॉन F. कैनेडी to be उसके कार्यशील mate लिये the 1960 अध्यक्षीय  election .
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the assassination of John F. Kennedy on November  22 , 1963 , समाप्त कैनेडी 's पद और थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष in उसके अपना सही  , winning by a large margin over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 election .
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic Party and as  अध्यक्ष , he थी जिम्मेदार लिये डिजाइनिंग the `` ग्रेट समाज `` विधान कि  included laws that upheld civil rights , public broadcasting , Medicare , Medicaid , environmental protection , aid to education , and his `` War on Poverty . ''
Johnson was renowned for his domineering  व्यक्तित्व और the `` जॉनसन उपचार , '' उसके coercion of  powerful politicians in order to advance legislation .
Meanwhile , Johnson escalated  अमरीकी भागीदारी in the वियतनाम युद्ध , इससे 16,000 अमरीकी advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000  combat troops in early 1968 , as American casualties soared and the peace process bogged down .
The involvement stimulated a large angry antiwar movement based especially on  विश्वविद्यालयों campuses in the u.S. और विदेश  .
Summer riots broke out in most  प्रमुख शहरों बाद 1965 , और अपराधों दरों soared , as उसके प्रतिद्वंद्वियों उठाया  demands for `` law and order '' policies .
The Democratic Party split in multiple feuding factions , and after Johnson did poorly in the  1968 नई हैम्पशायर प्राथमिक  , he ended his bid for reelection .
Republican Richard  निक्सन थी निर्वाचित to सफल  him .
Historians argue that Johnson 's presidency marked  the शिखर of आधुनिक उदारतावाद in the संयुक्त राज्य  after the New Deal era .
Johnson is  क्रमित favorably by कुछ  historians because of his domestic policies .
The Big Bang Theory cast at Comic Con  2009 , इससे बाएँ : कुणाल नय्यर , साइमन helberg , kaley  Cuoco , Jim Parsons , and Johnny Galecki
The American sitcom The Big Bang Theory , created and executive  उत्पादित by चक lorre और विधेयक prady , premiered on सीबीएस on  September 24 , 2007 .
The show centers on five characters : roommates Sheldon Cooper and Leonard  hofstadter , दो caltech physicists ; पैनी , a वेट्रेस और aspiring अभिनेत्री जो जीवनदान आरपार the हॉल ; और लियोनार्ड और शेल्डन 's मित्रों  and co-workers aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz , and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali .
Over time , several supporting characters have been promoted to starring roles : Leslie Winkle ( season 1 recurring ; season 2 regular ; season 3 guest ) , a physicist colleague , and , at different times , a lover of both Leonard and Howard ; Bernadette Rostenkowski-Wolowitz  ( ऋतु 3 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ) , a microbiologist , हावर्ड 's fiancée और subsequent बीवी , और पूर्व part-time वेट्रेस alongside पैनी ; neuroscientist एमी farrah fowler ( ऋतु 3 अतिथि ; ऋतु 4 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ) , जो joins the समूह बाद होने matched to शेल्डन on a डेटिंग जालस्थल ; और कॉमिक  book store-owner , Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ) , who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space .
The show also  सुविधाएँ numerous supporting वर्ण  , each of whom plays a prominent role in a small group of episodes .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) ,  भी ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ) , थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा  from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its origin in the  समस्या of गुलामी , विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी  into the western territories .
विदेशी शक्तियां  did not intervene .
After four years of  खूनी कॉम्बैट कि बाएँ over 600,000 सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना , the confederacy collapsed , गुलामी थी abolished  , and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans , led by  अब्राहम lincoln , opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त  States ' territories .
Lincoln won ,  लकिन पहले उसके उद्घाटन on कूच  4 , 1861 , seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic  अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the  incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's  inaugural पता घोषित उसके प्रशासन  would not initiate civil war .
Eight remaining slave states  जारी to अस्वीकृत काल्स लिये secession  .
Confederate  शक्तियां जब्त numerous संघीय दुर्गों  within territory claimed by the Confederacy .
A Peace  सम्मेलन विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह , और  both sides prepared for war .
The Confederates assumed that European countries  यहूद so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना  the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 , when Confederate forces fired  upon फोर्ट sumter , a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by संघ सैनिकों  in South Carolina .
lincoln पुकारा लिये प्रत्येक राज्य to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन , चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य  joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the border states and established a  नवल नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the दक्षिणी  economy .
The Eastern Theater was  inconclusive in 1861–62  .
The autumn 1862  confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended  with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation  उदघोषणा , जिससे बना समाप्ति गुलामी  a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the  confederate नदी नेवी , तब much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना , और  the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion  उत्तर ended at the बैटल  of Gettysburg .
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant  कमांड of सब संघ सेना  in 1864 .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea ,  destroying confederate अवसंरचना साथ the  way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the  confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश , और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण  through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending  confederate फौज विफल , अग्रणी  to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9 , 1865 .
The  अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध थी एक  of the earliest true industrial wars .
Railroads  , the टेलीग्राफ , steamships , और  mass-produced weapons were employed extensively .
The mobilization of civilian  कारखानों , खानों , shipyards , बैंको , परिवहन  and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I .
It remains the deadliest war in  अमरीकी इतिहास , resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित  750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males  20–45 सालो बूढ़ा , और 30 प्रतिशत of सब दक्षिणी  white males aged 18–40 .
इंसान एवोल्यूशन refers to the विकासवादी  process leading up to the appearance of modern humans .
While it began with the last common ancestor of  सब जीवन , the टॉपिक प्रायः कवर तभी the विकासवादी इतिहास  of primates , in particular the genus Homo , and the emergence of Homo sapiens as a distinct species of hominids ( or `` great apes '' ) .
The study of human evolution involves many scientific disciplines , including physical anthropology ,  primatology , पुरातत्व , भाषाविज्ञान , विकासवादी मनोविज्ञान , भ्रूणविज्ञान  and genetics .
According to genetic studies , primates diverged from other mammals about in the Late Cretaceous  काल , और the earliest जीवाश्मों  appear in the Paleocene , around .
The family Hominidae diverged from the Hylobatidae ( Gibbon ) family 15-20 million years ago , and  around , the ponginae ( orangutans ) , diverged इससे  the Hominidae family .
Bipedalism is the  मौलिक adaption of the hominin लकीर , और the earliest bipedal hominin  is considered to be either Sahelanthropus or Orrorin , with Ardipithecus , a full bipedal , coming somewhat later .
The gorilla  और चिंपैंजी diverged around the वही समय , परिचय 4-6 लाख सालो पहले , और either  Sahelanthropus or Orrorin may be our last shared ancestor with them .
The  जल्दी bipedals आखिरकार  evolved into the australopithecines and later the genus Homo .
The earliest documented members of the genus Homo are Homo habilis which evolved around ; the  earliest प्रजाति लिये जिससे वहीँ is धनात्मक प्रमाण of उपयोग  of stone tools .
The brains of these  जल्दी hominins यहूद परिचय  the same size as that of a chimpanzee .
During the next million years a process of  encephalization began , और साथ the आगमन of होमो इरेक्टस in the चट्टान रिकार्ड , cranial  capacity had doubled to 850 cm3 .
Homo erectus and Homo  ergaster यहूद the पहला of the hominina to छोड़ अफ़्रीकी , और ये प्रजाति  spread through Africa , Asia , and Europe between .
It is believed that these species  यहूद the पहला to उपयोग आग और  complex tools .
According to the Recent African Ancestry theory , modern humans evolved in Africa possibly from Homo  heidelbergensis , होमो rhodesiensis or होमो antecessor और migrated आउट of the महाद्वीप कुछ 50,000 to 100,000 सालो पहले , replacing  local populations of Homo erectus , Homo denisova , Homo floresiensis and Homo neanderthalensis .
Archaic Homo sapiens , the  forerunner of anatomically आधुनिक इंसानो , विकसित  between 400,000 and 250,000 years ago .
Recent DNA evidence suggests that several haplotypes of Neanderthal origin are  उपस्थित among सब non-african populations , और neanderthals और अन्य hominids , ऐसे as denisova hominin may have contributed  up to 6 % of their genome to present-day humans. < ref name= '' 10.1126/science.1209202 '' > Anatomically modern humans evolved from archaic Homo sapiens in the Middle Paleolithic , about 200,000 years ago .
The transition to behavioral modernity with the development of symbolic culture , language , and specialized  lithic प्रौद्योगिकी happened around 50,000 सालो पहले according to अनेक विज्ञानियों  although some suggest a gradual change in behavior over a longer time span .
Lisa Cuddy , M.D . , is a  fictional अक्षर on  the Fox network medical drama House .
वो is portrayed by  Lisa Edelstein .
Cuddy was the Dean of Medicine and hospital administrator of the  fictional princeton-plainsboro शिक्षण हॉस्पिटल in  New Jersey .
She also becomes House 's  प्रेम ब्याज through the सालो  to start a relationship with him in season seven .
Cuddy quit her job after the events of season  सात 's finale `` चलती on ``  .
Track and field is a sport comprising various competitive athletic contests based on running  , कूद , और फेंकना  .
The name of the sport derives from the  प्रतियोगिता स्थान : a  stadium with an oval running track around a grass field .
The throwing and jumping  कार्यक्रम generally लो प्लेस  in the central enclosed area .
Track and  फ़ील्ड जलप्रपात अंतर्गत the छतरियाँ खेल of एथलेटिक्स , जिससे भी शामिल  road running , cross country running , and race walking .
The two most prestigious international track and field competitions are held under the banner of athletics : the athletics  प्रतियोगिता at the ओलम्पिक खेल और the आइएएएफ  World Championships in Athletics .
The International Association of Athletics Federations is the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय शासी देह लिये track और फ़ील्ड  .
Track and field events are generally  व्यक्तिगत खेल साथ एथलीट चुनौतीपूर्ण प्रत्येक  other to decide a single victor .
The racing events are won by the athlete with  the तीव्रतम समय , जबकि the कूद  and throwing events are won by the athlete who has achieved the greatest distance or height in the contest .
The running  कार्यक्रम हैं categorised as sprints ,  middle and long-distance events , relays , and hurdling .
Regular jumping events include long jump ,  ट्रिपल जम्प , ऊँची जम्प और ध्रुव वॉल्ट , जबकि the सबसे आम फेंकना  events are shot put , javelin , discus and hammer .
There are also `` combined events ''  , ऐसे as heptathlon और decathlon , in जिससे  athletes compete in a number of the above events .
रिकॉर्ड हैं रखा of the बेहतरीन प्रदर्शन in  specific events , at world and national levels , right down to a personal level .
However , if athletes are deemed  to have violated the  event 's rules or regulations , they are disqualified from the competition and their marks are erased .
In North America , the term track and field may be used to refer to  एथलेटिक्स in सामान्य , बल्कि than specifically track  and field events .
The Gulf War ( 2 August 1990 – 28 February  1991 ) , codenamed आपरेशन मरुस्थल तूफ़ान ( 17 जनवरी  1991 – 28 February 1991 ) was a war waged by a U.N.-authorized Coalition force from 34 nations led by the United States , against Iraq in response to Iraq 's invasion and annexation of Kuwait .
The war is also known under other names , such as the Persian Gulf War , First Gulf War , Gulf War I , or the First Iraq War , before the term `` Iraq War '' became  पहचाना बजाय साथ the 2003 इराकी युद्ध ( भी referred to in the  U.S. as `` Operation Iraqi Freedom '' ) .
Kuwait 's invasion by Iraqi troops that began 2 August 1990 was met with international condemnation , and brought immediate economic  प्रतिबंधों विरूद्ध इराकी by सदस्यों  of the U.N. Security Council .
U.S. President George H. W. Bush deployed U.S. forces into Saudi Arabia , and  urged अन्य देशों to भेजें उनके अपना शक्तियां  to the scene .
An  सरणी of राष्ट्र joined  the Coalition .
The great majority of the Coalition  's सैन्य शक्तियां यहूद  from the U.S. , with Saudi Arabia , the United Kingdom and Egypt as leading contributors , in that order .
सऊदी अरब सशुल्क  around US $ 36 billion of the US $ 60 billion cost .
The war was marked by the beginning of live news on the front lines of the fight , with the primacy  of the u.S. संजाल सीएनएन  .
The war has also earned the nickname Video Game War after the daily  ब्रॉडकास्ट बिंब on फलक the u.S. बमवर्षक दौरान आपरेशन  Desert Storm .
The initial conflict to expel Iraqi  सैनिकों इससे कुवैत began साथ an aerial  bombardment on 17 January 1991 .
This was followed by a  मैदान उत्पीड़न on 24  February .
This was a decisive victory for  the गठबन्धन शक्तियां , जो liberated कुवैत  and advanced into Iraqi territory .
The Coalition ceased their advance , and declared a  cease-fire 100 घंटों बाद the मैदान  campaign started .
Aerial and ground combat was confined to Iraq , Kuwait ,  और क्षेत्रों on सऊदी अरब 's  border .
Iraq launched Scud  मिसाइलें विरूद्ध गठबन्धन सैन्य  targets in Saudi Arabia and against Israel .
The nickel ,  in अमरीकी उपयोग , is a  five- cent coin issued by the United States Mint .
Composed of 75 %  तांबे और 25 % निकल , the टुकड़ा रै  been struck since 1866 .
The silver half dime , equal to five cents , had been issued  चूंकि the 1790s  .
The American Civil War caused economic hardship , driving gold and silver from circulation ; in response , in place  of low-value सिक्के , the सरकारी at पहला  issued paper currency .
In 1865 , Congress  abolished the five-cent fractional करेंसी नोट बाद स्पेंसर M. क्लार्क , सिर of the करेंसी  Bureau ( today the Bureau of Engraving and Printing ) , placed his own portrait on the denomination .
After successful introduction of two-cent and three-cent pieces ,  बगैर अनमोल मेटल , कॉंग्रेस भी प्राधिकृत a five-cent  piece consisting of base metal ; the Mint began striking this version in 1866 .
The initial design of the Shield nickel was struck until 1883 , then replaced by  the स्वतंत्रता सिर निकल  .
The Buffalo nickel was introduced in 1913 as part  of a ड्राइव to बढ़ाएँ the सौंदर्य of  American coinage ; in 1938 , the Jefferson nickel followed .
In 2004 and 2005  , खास डिजाइन in सम्मान of the bicentennial  of the Lewis and Clark Expedition were issued .
In 2006 , the Mint reverted to using Jefferson nickel  पंक्तियां फेलिक्स schlag 's असली रिवर्स ( or `` tails '' पक्ष ) , हालांकि  a new obverse , by Jamie Franki , was substituted .
As of 2013 , it costs  अधिक than ग्यारह सेंट to उपज a निकल ; the मिंट is  exploring the possibility of reducing cost by using less expensive metals .
A  पोस्टर साथ पुष्प or क्लस्टर of पुष्प उत्पादित  by twelve species of flowering plants from different families
A flower , sometimes known as a bloom or blossom , is the reproductive structure found in flowering plants ( plants of the division  magnoliophyta , भी पुकारा angiosperms )  .
The  biological फलन of a पुष्प is to  effect reproduction , usually by providing a mechanism for the union of sperm with eggs .
Flowers may facilitate outcrossing ( fusion of sperm and eggs from different individuals in a population ) or allow  selfing ( संलयन of शुक्राणु और अंडा इससे the वही  flower ) .
Some flowers  उपज diaspores बगैर  fertilization ( parthenocarpy ) .
Flowers contain sporangia and  हैं the साईट जहाँ gametophytes  develop .
पुष्प दे वृद्धि  to fruit and seeds .
Many flowers have evolved to be attractive to  पशु , so as to कारण उन्हें  to be vectors for the transfer of pollen .
In addition to facilitating the reproduction of flowering plants , flowers  have long महरूम admired और प्रयुक्त by इंसानो to beautify उनके पर्यावरण , और भी as  objects of romance , ritual , religion , medicine and as a source of food .
The McDonnell Douglas ( now Boeing ) F-15 Eagle is a twin-engine , all-weather tactical fighter  designed by mcdonnell डगलस to लाभ और maintain एयर बड़प्पन  in aerial combat .
It is  माना among the सबसे कामयाब आधुनिक  fighters , with over 100 aerial combat victories with no losses in dogfights .
Following reviews of proposals , the  संयुक्त राज्य एयर फ़ोर्स चयनित mcdonnell डगलस ' डिज़ाइन  in 1967 to meet the service 's need for a dedicated air superiority fighter .
the त्रिभुज पहला  flew in July 1972 , and entered service in 1976 .
Since the 1970s , the Eagle has been exported to  इसराईल , जापानी , सऊदी अरब , और  other nations .
The F-15 was originally envisioned as a  pure एयर बड़प्पन वायुयान  .
Its design included a  द्वितीयक ground-attack काबिलियत  that was largely unused .
The design proved flexible enough that an all-weather strike  डेरिवेटिव , the f-15e स्ट्राइक त्रिभुज  , was later developed , and entered service in 1989 .
The F-15  त्रिभुज is अपेक्षित to be in सेवा  with the U.S. Air Force past 2025 .
Mimio is a brand name  of a लकीर of प्रौद्योगिकी उत्पाद aimed at  the education market .
The primary products are focused  around कंप्यूटर whiteboard इंटरैक्टिव  teaching devices .
MimioCapture devices also allow users to capture all of the ink  स्ट्रोक्स कि हैं लिखा  on the whiteboard .
When used in  संयोजन साथ a वीडियो प्रोजेक्टर it turns the ordinary  whiteboard surface into a fully interactive whiteboard .
the उत्पाद लकीर थी originally  designed by Virtual Ink .
on अक्तूबर 4 , 2006 newell rubbermaid acquired  the Mimio interactive whiteboard ( iWB ) product line .
rahab of  Jericho
Rahab , ( ; ; ) was , according to the Book of Joshua , a woman who  जिया in जेरिको in the promised जमीन और  assisted the Israelites in capturing the city .
Nearly all English translations of Joshua  describe उसके  as a harlot or prostitute .
The Organization of American States  ( स्पेनी : organización de लॉस estados americanos , पुर्तगाली : organização  dos Estados Americanos , French : Organisation des États américains ) , or the OAS , is a regional international organization .
The OAS was founded on 30 April 1948 , and  रै इसके मुख्यालय in वॉशिंगटन  , D.C. , United States .
Its members  हैं the 35 स्वतंत्र  states of the Americas .
Since 26 May 2005 , the  सचिव सामान्य of  OAS has been José Miguel Insulza .
Christopher Columbus ( Italian : Cristoforo Colombo ; Spanish : Cristóbal Colón ; Portuguese : Cristóvão Colombo ; before 31 October 145120  may 1506 ) थी an इतालवी एक्सप्लोरर , नाविक , और colonizer , born in the गणतंत्र of जेनोआ , in कया is आज northwestern  Italy .
Under the auspices of the Catholic Monarchs of Spain , he completed four voyages across the  अटलांटिक समंदर कि led to सामान्य यूरोपीय जागरूकता of the अमरीकी  continents .
Those voyages , and  उसके प्रयत्न to स्थापित स्थाई settlements  on the island of Hispaniola , initiated the Spanish colonization of the New World .
In the context of emerging western imperialism and economic competition between European kingdoms seeking wealth through the establishment of trade routes and colonies , Columbus 's speculative proposal , to reach the East Indies by sailing westward , eventually received the  support of the स्पेनी क्राउन , जिससे देखी in it a वादा , however रिमोट , of gaining the अपर हाथ over प्रतिद्वंद्वी शक्तियां in the प्रतियोगिता लिये the lucrative मसाला व्यापार साथ  Asia .
During his first voyage in 1492 , instead of  reaching जापानी as he था intended , कोलंबस उतरा in the बहामा द्वीपसमूह  , at a locale he named San Salvador .
Over the course of three more voyages , Columbus visited the  वृहद और lesser antilles , as खूब as the caribbean coast of  Venezuela and Central America , claiming them for the Spanish Empire .
Though Columbus was not the first European explorer to reach the Americas ( having been preceded by the Norse expedition led by Leif  ericson in the 11th सदी ) , कोलंबस 's voyages led to the पहला स्थायी यूरोपीय सम्पर्क साथ the americas  , inaugurating a period of European exploration , conquest , and colonization that lasted for several centuries .
They had , therefore , an enormous impact in the historical  विकास  of the modern Western world .
Columbus himself saw his accomplishments primarily in the light of the  spreading of the ईसाई  religion .
Never admitting that he had reached a continent previously unknown to Europeans , rather than  the ईस्ट इंडीज he था नियत आउट लिये , कोलंबस पुकारा the निवासियों  of the lands he visited indios ( Spanish for `` Indians `` ) .
कोलंबस 's strained संबंध साथ the स्पेनी क्राउन और इसके नियुक्त औपनिवेशिक प्रशासकों in अमेरिका  led to his arrest and dismissal as governor of the settlements on the island of Hispaniola in 1500 , and later to protracted litigation over the benefits which Columbus and his heirs claimed were owed to them by the crown .
Bred in Germany , the Boxer is a breed of stocky  , medium-sized , short-haired  dogs .
the कोट is चिकना और tight-fitting  ; colors are fawn or brindled , with or without white markings , which may cover the entire body .
Boxers are brachycephalic ( they have broad , short skulls ) , and have a square  muzzle , mandibular prognathism ( an underbite ) , बहुत दमदार जबड़े , और a शक्तिशाली काटना  ideal for hanging on to large prey .
The Boxer was bred from the Old English Bulldog and  the अभी विलुप्त bullenbeisser  , and is part of the Molosser group .
Boxers were first  exhibited in a श्वान दिखाएँ लिये st. bernards in म्यूनिख in 1895 ,  the first Boxer club being founded the next year .
Based on 2012  अमरीकी kennel क्लबों आंकडे , मुक्केबाज आयोजित स्थिर as the सातवाँ  most popular breed of dog in the United States for the third consecutive year .
Serial ATA ( SATA ) is a computer bus interface that connects host  बस adapters to द्रव्यमान भंडार डिवाइस ऐसे as मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव और ऑप्टिकल  drives .
Serial ATA replaces the older AT Attachment standard ( ATA ; later referred to as Parallel ATA or PATA ) ,  offering अनेक लाभ over the पुरानी इंटरफ़ेस : घटाया केबल आकार और लागत ( सात conductors बजाय of 40 ) , देशी hot swapping , तेज़ आंकड़ा ट्रांसफ़र  through higher signalling rates , and more efficient transfer through an ( optional ) I/O queuing protocol .
SATA host adapters and  डिवाइस communicate via a high-speed सीरियल  cable over two pairs of conductors .
In contrast , parallel ATA ( the redesignation  लिये the विरासत ata विशेषताएँ ) प्रयुक्त a 16-bit चौड़ी आंकड़ा  bus with many additional support and control signals , all operating at much lower frequency .
To ensure backward  संगतता साथ विरासत ata तन्त्र और अनुप्रयोग , sata उपयोग the वही  basic ATA and ATAPI command-set as legacy ATA devices .
SATA has replaced parallel ATA in consumer desktop and laptop computers , and has largely  replaced pata in नई अंतःस्थापित अनुप्रयोग  .
SATA 's market share  in the डेस्कटॉप pc मार्केट  was 99 % in 2008 .
PATA remains widely used in industrial and embedded  अनुप्रयोग कि उपयोग compactflash  storage , even though the new CFast standard is based on SATA .
Serial  ata उद्योग संगतता विशेषताएँ originate  from The Serial ATA International Organization ( aka .
sata-io , serialata.org  ) .
The SATA-IO group collaboratively  creates , समीक्षाएँ  , ratifies , and publishes the interoperability specifications , the test cases , and plug-fests .
As with many other industry compatibility standards , the SATA content  स्वामित्व is transferred to अन्य उद्योग लाशें :  primarily the INCITS T13 subcommittee ATA , the INCITS T10 subcommittee ( SCSI ) ; a subgroup of T10 responsible for Serial Attached SCSI ( SAS ) .
the पूरा specification  from SATA-IO .
The remainder of this article will try  to उपयोग the शब्दावली  and specifications of SATA-IO .
The history of the Internet began with the  विकास  of electronic computers in the 1950s .
The public was first introduced to the concepts that would lead to the Internet when a message was sent over the ARPANet from computer science  प्राध्यापक लियोनार्ड kleinrock 's प्रयोगशाला at विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया , लॉस एंजिल्स ( ucla ) , बाद the दूसरी टुकड़ा of संजाल उपकरण थी  installed at Stanford Research Institute ( SRI ) .
Packet switched networks such as  arpanet , चिह्नित i at npl in the uk , cyclades , मेरिट संजाल , tymnet , और telenet , यहूद  developed in the late 1960s and early 1970s using a variety of protocols .
The ARPANET in particular led to the development of protocols for internetworking , in which multiple separate networks  could be joined साथ into a संजाल of संजाल .
In 1982 , the Internet protocol suite ( TCP/IP ) was  मानकीकृत , और नतीजतन , the अवधारणा of a world-wide संजाल  of interconnected TCP/IP networks , called the Internet , was introduced .
Access to the  arpanet थी विस्तारित in 1981 जब the नेशनल विज्ञान न्यास ( nsf  ) developed the Computer Science Network ( CSNET ) and again in 1986 when NSFNET provided access to supercomputer sites in the United States from research and education organizations .
Commercial  अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाताओं ( isps  ) began to emerge in the late 1980s and early 1990s .
The  arpanet थी decommissioned  in 1990 .
the अंतरजाल थी commercialized in 1995 जब  NSFNET was decommissioned , removing the last restrictions on the use of the Internet to carry commercial traffic .
Since the mid-1990s , the Internet has had a revolutionary impact on culture and commerce , including the rise of near-instant communication by electronic mail , instant messaging ,  आवाज़ over अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( voip ) `` फोन काल्स '' , two-way इंटरैक्टिव वीडियो काल्स , और the संसार चौड़ी वेब साथ इसके चर्चा  forums , blogs , social networking , and online shopping sites .
The research and education  जातियाँ continues to develop और उपयोग उन्नत संजाल ऐसे as nsf 's बहुत ऊँची गति  Backbone Network Service ( vBNS ) , Internet2 , and National LambdaRail .
Increasing amounts of data are transmitted at  उच्चतर और उच्चतर speeds over रेशा ऑप्टिक संजाल ऑपरेटिंग at 1-gbit/s  , 10-Gbit/s , or more .
The Internet 's takeover over the global communication landscape was almost instant in historical terms : it only communicated 1 % of the information  बहती through two-way दूरसंचार संजाल in the साल 1993  , already 51 % by 2000 , and more than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007 .
Today the Internet continues to grow , driven by ever  वृहद amounts of ऑनलाइन सूचना  , commerce , entertainment , and social networking .
The Gift is the second album by Scottish singer Susan Boyle ,  जिससे थी released on 8 नवम्बर 2010  .
Boyle hinted that the album has a 1960s feel  `` क्युकी कि  was [ her ] era '' .
on 30 November 2011 , the album received a nomination in 54th Grammy Awards for  बेहतरीन परंपरागत  Pop Vocal Album .
`` This Is Just To Say '' ( 1934 ) is a  प्रसिद्ध imagist  poem by William Carlos Williams .
प्राध्यापक ऐल्बस पर्सिवल wulfric ब्रायन डम्बल्डोर  is a major character and protagonist of J. K. Rowling 's Harry Potter series .
For  सबसे of the श्रेणी , he is  the headmaster of the wizarding school Hogwarts .
As part of his backstory , it is revealed that he is the founder and leader of the Order of the Phoenix , an organisation  समर्पित to लड़ the प्रमुख विपक्षी of the श्रेणी  , Lord Voldemort .
डम्बल्डोर is portrayed by रिचर्ड हैरिस in the फिल्मी adaptions of हैरी  Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone and Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets .
After Harris ' death , Michael  gambon portrayed डम्बल्डोर लिये सब of  the remaining films .
Rowling stated she  chose the नाम डम्बल्डोर , जिससे is an जल्दी आधुनिक अंग्रेज़ी शब्द  for `` bumblebee `` , because of Dumbledore 's love of music : she imagined him walking around `` humming to himself a lot '' .
calcitonin ( भी ज्ञात as thyrocalcitonin ) is a 32-amino एसिड रैखिक polypeptide  hormone that is produced in humans primarily by the parafollicular cells ( also known as C-cells ) of the thyroid , and in many other animals in the ultimobranchial body .
It acts to reduce blood calcium ( Ca2+  ) , opposing the प्रभाव  of parathyroid hormone ( PTH ) .
Calcitonin has been found in fish ,  सरीसृपों , पक्षियों , और स्तनधारियों  .
Its importance in humans has not been as well established as its  महत्व in अन्य पशु , as इसके फलन is प्रायः नहीं  significant in the regulation of normal calcium homeostasis .
It belongs  to calcitonin-like  protein family .
A mousepad with a padded  कलाई बाकी  .
A mousepad ( US ) or mouse mat ( UK ) is a  सतह लिये रखकर  and moving a computer mouse .
A mousepad enhances the usability of the mouse compared to using a mouse directly on a table by providing a surface to allow  the ट्रैकिंग led or बॉल ( in पूर्व मॉडल ) to माप गति accurately और बगैर जिटर  .
Some mousepads increase ergonomics by  providing a padded कलाई  rest .

This photo was taken  इससे the पश्चिमी concourse of ग्रेट अमरीकी  Ball Park .
A small portion of the Riverfront Stadium site is now occupied by the Reds ' Hall of  कीर्ति और संग्रहालय और प्रमुख गली , जिससे थी विस्तारित जब the नई  park was built .
The Cincinnati Bengals '  पॉल भूरा स्टेडियम is in the  distance .
Riverfront Stadium (  1970–1995 ) , बाद ज्ञात as cinergy फ़ील्ड ( 1996–2002 ) , थी the घर of  the Cincinnati Reds National League baseball team and the Cincinnati Bengals National Football League team .
Located on the  ओहियो नदी in शहर सिनसिनाटी , the स्टेडियम थी बेहतरीन ज्ञात as  the home of `` The Big Red Machine `` , as the Reds were often called in the 1970s .
निर्माण began on फ़रवरी 1 , 1968 , और थी  completed at a cost of less than $ 50 million .
On June 30 , 1970 , the Reds hosted the  अटलांटा braves in उनके ग्रैंड खोलने  , with Hank Aaron hitting the first ever home run at Riverfront .
Two  सप्ताह बाद on जुलाई 14 , 1970  , Riverfront hosted the 1970 Major League Baseball All-Star Game .
This game is best remembered for the  often-replayed टक्कर at घर थाली between  Reds star Pete Rose and catcher Ray Fosse of the Cleveland Indians .
In September 1996 , Riverfront  स्टेडियम थी renamed `` cinergy फ़ील्ड  '' in a sponsorship deal with Greater Cincinnati 's energy company , Cinergy Corporation .
In  2001 , to मेक रूम लिये ग्रेट अमरीकी बॉल पार्क  , the seating capacity at Cinergy Field was reduced to 39,000 .
वहीँ थी a विशाल वॉल in बीच फ़ील्ड दृश्य  after the renovations , to serve as the batter 's eye .
the स्टेडियम थी demolished  by implosion on December 29 , 2002 .
Nexen Tire is a tire manufacturer , headquartered in Yangsan , South Gyeongsang Province  , और सियोल , दोनो in दक्षिण कोरियाई  .
Its major domestic competitors are Hankook Tire  और kumho टायर  .
the कम्पनी 's नाम is reflected in the कम्पनी  slogan , `` Next Century Tire . ''
The silent majority is an unspecified  विशाल बहुमत of लोगों in a देश  or group who do not express their opinions publicly .
The term was  popularized ( हालांकि नहीं पहला प्रयुक्त ) by u.S. अध्यक्ष रिचर्ड निक्सन in a नवम्बर 3 , 1969 , वाक  in which he said , `` And so tonight—to you , the great silent majority of my fellow Americans—I ask for your support . ''
In this usage it referred to  those अमेरिकी जो किया नहीं जुड़ें in the विशाल demonstrations विरूद्ध the वियतनाम युद्ध at the समय , जो किया  not join in the counterculture , and who did not participate in public discourse .
Nixon along with many  अन्य देखी इस समूह of मध्य अमेरिकी as होने निष्प्रभ  in the media by the more vocal minority .
The phrase was used in the 19th century as a euphemism referring to all the people who have died , and  अन्य have प्रयुक्त it पहले और बाद निक्सन to refer to समूह of मतदाता  in various nations of the world .
Sam , a rhesus monkey ,  उड़ाया to an ऊँचाई  of 88 km in 1959 .
(  नासा  )
Before humans went into space , several animals were launched into space , including numerous monkeys , so that  वैज्ञानिकों could investigate the biological  effects of space travel .
The  संयुक्त राज्य शुभारम्भ  flights containing primate cargo primarily between 1948-1961 with one flight in 1969 and one in 1985 .
France  शुभारम्भ दो monkey-carrying  flights in 1967 .
The Soviet Union and Russia  शुभारम्भ बंदरों between 1983 और  1996 .
Most  बंदरों यहूद anesthetized पहले  lift-off .
overall thirty-two बंदरों उड़ाया  in the space program ; none flew more than once .
Numerous  back-up बंदरों भी गई  through the programs but never flew .
Monkeys from several species were used , including rhesus monkeys , cynomolgus  बंदरों , गिलहरी बंदरों , और pig-tailed  macaques .
Some chimpanzees ( which are  apes बल्कि than बंदरों )  were also used .
RAID ( redundant array of independent disks ,  originally अनावश्यक सरणी of inexpensive डिस्क ) is  a storage technology that combines multiple disk drive components into a logical unit .
Data is distributed across  the ड्राइव in एक of अनेक तरीके पुकारा  `` RAID levels '' , depending on the level of redundancy and performance required .
The term `` RAID '' was first defined by David Patterson ,  garth A. गिब्सन , और रैंडी katz at the विश्वविद्यालयों  of California , Berkeley in 1987 .
Marketers representing industry RAID manufacturers later  attempted to reinvent the पद to describe a अनावश्यक सरणी of स्वतंत्र डिस्क as a अर्थात्  of disassociating a low-cost expectation from RAID technology .
RAID is now used as an umbrella term for computer data storage schemes that can divide and replicate data among  अनेक शारीरिक ड्राइव : रेड is an उदाहरण of भंडार  virtualization and the array can be accessed by the operating system as one single drive .
The different schemes or  architectures हैं नामित by the शब्द रेड followed by a क्रमांक ( e.g .  RAID 0 , RAID 1 ) .
Each scheme provides  a अलग संतुलन between the कुंजी लक्ष्य : विश्वसनीयता  and availability , performance and capacity .
RAID levels greater than RAID 0 provide protection against unrecoverable ( sector ) read  त्रुटियाँ , as खूब as पूरे डिस्क  failure .
A lymphocyte is a type of white  रक्त कोशिका in the vertebrate प्रतिरक्षा  system .
Under the microscope ,  lymphocytes can be विभाजित  into large lymphocytes and small lymphocytes .
Large  granular lymphocytes शामिल  natural killer cells ( NK cells ) .
Small lymphocytes  consist of t कोशिकाएं और b कोशिकाएं  .
The Big Lebowski is a 1998 dark  कॉमेडी फिल्मी लिखा  and directed by Joel and Ethan Coen .
Jeff Bridges stars as Jeff  lebowski , an बेरोजगार लॉस एंजिल्स  slacker and avid bowler , nicknamed `` The Dude . ''
After a case of mistaken identity , The Dude is  introduced to a करोड़पति भी नामित  Jeffrey Lebowski .
When the millionaire Lebowski 's trophy wife is later kidnapped  , he आयोग the यार to उद्धार the फिरौती to सुरक्षित  her release .
The plan goes awry  जब the यार 's dost वाल्टर  Sobchak ( John Goodman ) schemes to keep the full ransom .
Steve Buscemi , Philip Seymour Hoffman , David Huddleston , Julianne  मूर , tara reid , और जॉन turturro भी स्टार in the फिल्मी , जिससे  is narrated by a cowboy known only as `` The Stranger '' , played by Sam Elliott .
The film is loosely  प्रेरित by  the work of Raymond Chandler .
Joel Coen stated : `` We wanted to do a Chandler kind of story – how  it चालें episodically , और सौदे साथ the वर्ण  trying to unravel a mystery , as well as having a hopelessly complex plot that 's ultimately unimportant . ''
The  असली स्कोर थी रचित  by Carter Burwell , a longtime collaborator of the Coen Brothers .
The Big Lebowski was a disappointment at  the u.S. बक्सा दफ्तर और प्राप्त  mixed reviews at the time of its release .
समीक्षाएँ have trended towards the धनात्मक over समय , और  the film has become a cult favorite , noted for its idiosyncratic characters , dream sequences , unconventional dialogue , and eclectic soundtrack .
Severus Snape is a fictional character in the Harry Potter book  श्रेणी लिखा by j.K.  Rowling .
In the first novel of the series , he  is शत्रु toward हैरी और is निर्मित up to be the प्राथमिक विपक्षी  until the final chapters .
As the series progresses , Snape 's character  becomes अधिक परतदार और जटिल  .
Rowling  करता नहीं fully खुलासा the विवरण of उसके  true loyalties until the end of the final book , Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows .
Over the course of the  श्रेणी , snape 's portrayal evolves इससे कि of a दुर्भावनापूर्ण और दलगत टीचर  to that of a pivotal character of considerable complexity and moral ambiguity .
Snape primarily teaches Potions at Hogwarts , though in  the छठे अनोखा he सिखाती  Defence Against the Dark Arts , a position which he was known to have desired throughout the series .
he ultimately becomes हेडमास्टर  of Hogwarts in the final novel .
Rowling has described him as `` a  तोहफा of a अक्षर  '' .
Grits refers to a ground-corn food of Native American origin  , कि is आम in the दक्षिणी संयुक्त  States and mainly eaten at breakfast .
Modern  grits हैं commonly बना of  alkali-treated corn known as hominy .
Grits are similar to other thick maize-based porridges from  around the संसार ऐसे as polenta or the thinner  farina .
`` Instant grits '' have  महरूम processed to गति  cooking .
The word `` grits '' derives from the Old English word  `` grytt ,  '' meaning coarse meal .
इस शब्द originally referred to गेहूं  and other porridges now known as groats in parts of the U.K..
Maize , unknown in Europe in the Middle Ages , is a food derived from corn ( a New World  संयंत्र ) और `` मकई '' था महरूम प्रयुक्त to describe गेहूं उत्पाद in अनेक यूरोपीय  regions .
`` Grits '' may be either singular  or बहुवचन ; historically , in the अमरीकी दक्षिण the शब्द थी invariably एकवचन notwithstanding इसके बहुवचन  form ( cf . such food names as `` spaghetti '' or `` linguine '' , likewise plural in form , but singular in use ) .
Sometimes , grits are called  sofkee or sofkey ( इससे  a native American Muskogee word ) .
In molecular biology , human chorionic  gonadotropin ( hcg ) is a हार्मोन उत्पादित by the निषेचित  egg after conception .
Later during pregnancy it is made by the developing placenta , and  बाद by the placental घटक syncytiotrophoblast  .
Some cancerous tumors produce this hormone ;  इसलिए , elevated स्तर measured जब the रोगी is नहीं गर्भवती  can lead to a cancer diagnosis .
However , it is not known  whether इस  production is a contributing cause or an effect of tumorigenesis .
The pituitary analogue of hCG , known as luteinizing hormone ( LH ) , is produced in the  pituitary ग्रंथि of males और महिलाओं  of all ages .
, the FDA has prohibited the sale of ``  होम्योपैथिक '' और over the काउंटर hcg आहार उत्पाद  and declared them fraudulent and illegal .
The Las Vegas Strip  संसार of coca-cola  museum in 2003
Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in stores ,  रेस्तरां , और वेंडिंग मशीने in प्रत्येक देश  except Cuba and North Korea .
It is produced  by the coca-cola कम्पनी of अटलांटा , जॉर्जिया , और is प्रायः referred to बस as कोक  ( a registered trademark of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March 27 , 1944 ) .
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it was invented in the late 19th century by John Pemberton , Coca-Cola was bought out by businessman Asa Griggs Candler , whose marketing tactics led Coke to its dominance of the  संसार soft-drink मार्केट throughout the 20th सदी  .
The company produces concentrate , which is then sold to licensed Coca-Cola  bottlers throughout the संसार .
The bottlers , who hold territorially exclusive  अनुबंध साथ the कम्पनी , उपज समाप्त  product in cans and bottles from the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners .
The bottlers then sell , distribute and merchandise  coca-cola to खुदरा  stores and vending machines .
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola  उद्यमों , जिससे is the largest सिंगल coca-cola bottler in  North America and western Europe .
The Coca-Cola Company also sells concentrate for soda  स्रोतों to प्रमुख रेस्तरां और खाना सेवा  distributors .
The Coca-Cola Company has , on occasion , introduced other  कोला पेय अंतर्गत the कोक ब्रांड  name .
The most common of these is Diet Coke , with others including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola , Diet Coke Caffeine-Free , Coca-Cola Cherry , Coca-Cola Zero ,  coca-cola वैनिला , और खास संस्करण साथ नीबू , लाइम or कॉफी  .
Based on  interbrand 's बेहतरीन वैश्विक ब्रांड  2011 , Coca-Cola was the world 's most valuable brand .
An ombudsman is an official , usually appointed by the government or by parliament but with a  significant उपाधि of स्वतंत्रता , जो is चार्ज साथ representing the रूचि  of the public by investigating and addressing complaints of maladministration or violation of rights .
In some countries an Inspector General , Citizen Advocate or other official may have duties similar to those of a national  ombudsman , और may भी be नियुक्त by the विधानमंडल  .
Below the national level an ombudsman may be appointed by a state , local or  नगरपालिका सरकारी , और unofficial ombudsmen may be नियुक्त by , or भी कार्य लिये , a निगम  such as a utility supplier or a newspaper , for an NGO , or for a professional regulatory body .
whether नियुक्त by the विधानमंडल , the कार्यपालिका , or an संगठन ( or , कम अक्सर , निर्वाचित  by the constituency that he or she serves ) , the typical duties of an ombudsman are to investigate complaints and attempt to resolve them , usually through recommendations ( binding or not ) or mediation .
Ombudsmen  sometimes भी उद्देश्य to पहचानो  systemic issues leading to poor service or breaches of people 's rights .
At the national level , most ombudsmen have a wide mandate to deal with the entire public sector , and sometimes also  तत्व of the निजी सेक्टर ( लिये  example , contracted service providers ) .
In some cases , there is a more  प्रतिबंधित जनादेश , लिये उदाहरण साथ particular  sectors of society .
More recent developments have  शामिल the सृष्टि of specialised children  's Ombudsman and Information Commissioner agencies .
In some jurisdictions an ombudsman charged with the handling of concerns about national government is more formally referred to as the ``  संसदीय कमिश्नर '' ( e.g . the संयुक्त किंगडम संसदीय  Commissioner for Administration , and the Western Australian state Ombudsman ) .
In many countries where the ombudsman 's remit extends beyond dealing with alleged  maladministration to promoting और protecting इंसान  rights , the ombudsman is recognised as the national human rights institution .
The post of ombudsman had by the end  of the 20th सदी महरूम instituted by सबसे सरकारें  and by some intergovernmental organizations such as the European Union .
Making a complaint  to an ombudsman is प्रायः  free of charge .
