New England is a region in the northeastern corner of the United States consisting of the  छह राज्य of maine , नई हैम्पशायर , वर्मांट ,  Massachusetts , Rhode Island , and Connecticut .
New England is bordered  by नई यॉर्क राज्य to the दक्षिणपश्चिम , क्यूबेक to the उत्तरपश्चिम , और  New Brunswick and the Atlantic Ocean to the east .
In one of the earliest English settlements in North America , Pilgrims from England first  settled in नई इंग्लैण्ड in 1620 , to रूप plymouth उपनिवेश  .
Ten years later , the Puritans settled north of Plymouth Colony in  बोस्टन , यूँ forming मैसाचुसेट्स  Bay Colony .
Over the next 130 years , New England fought in four French and Indian Wars , until the British defeated  the फ्रेंच और उनके देशी allies in उत्तर अमेरिका  .
In the late 18th century , the  नई इंग्लैण्ड colonies initiated the प्रतिरोध to the अंग्रेजों पार्लियामेंट 's प्रयत्न  to impose new taxes without the consent of the colonists .
The Boston Tea Party was a protest to which Great Britain responded with a series of punitive laws stripping  मैसाचुसेट्स of self-government , जिससे यहूद termed the `` असहनीय अधिनियमों `` by the colonists  .
The confrontation led to open warfare in 1775 , the expulsion of the British authorities from New England in spring  1776 , और the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता in जुलाई  1776 .
Some of the first movements of American literature  , दर्शनशास्त्र , और  education originated in New England .
The region played a prominent  भूमिका in the गति to abolish गुलामी , और थी the पहला प्रदेश of the संयुक्त राज्य  to be transformed by the Industrial Revolution .
Today , New  इंग्लैण्ड is a प्रमुख संसार बीच  of education , high technology , insurance , and medicine .
Boston  is इसके सांस्कृतिक , वित्तीय , शैक्षणिक  , medical and transportation center .
Each state is principally subdivided into small incorporated  municipalities ज्ञात as नई इंग्लैण्ड कस्बों , जिससे हैं  often governed by town meeting .
The only  unincorporated territory in नई इंग्लैण्ड exists  in the sparse , northern regions of Vermont , New Hampshire , and Maine .
Since 1970 , voters have more often supported liberal candidates at the  राज्य और संघीय स्तर than those of कोई अन्य प्रदेश  in the United States .
नई इंग्लैण्ड is the तभी एक of the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो 's नौ  regional divisions whose name does not derive from its geography , and it is the only multi-state region with clear , consistent boundaries .
It maintains a strong sense of cultural identity set apart from the rest of the country ,  हालांकि the शर्तें of इस पहचान हैं प्रायः लडे , combining puritanism साथ उदारतावाद , कृषिक  life with industry , and isolation with immigration .
आपात  !
is an American television series that  combines the चिकित्सा नाटक और action-adventure  genres .
It was produced by Mark VII  सीमित और वितरित by सार्वभौमिक  Studios .
It  debuted as a midseason बदलना on जनवरी  15 , 1972 , on NBC , replacing the two short-lived series The Partners and The Good Life , and ran until September 3 , 1977 , with six additional two-hour television films during the following two years .
आपात  !
was created and produced by Jack Webb  और रॉबर्ट A. cinader , दोनो of जिसको  were also responsible for the police dramas Adam-12 and Dragnet .
The  पूर्वी समय मण्डल ( et ) encompasses 17 u.S. राज्य in the पूर्वी भाग  of the contiguous United States , parts of Canada and three countries in South America .
Places that use Eastern Standard  समय ( est ) जब observing मानक समय ( autumn/winter  ) are 5 hours behind Coordinated Universal Time ( ) .
Eastern Daylight Time ( EDT ) , when observing  daylight छायांकन समय ( spring/summer ) is 4 घंटों पीछे समन्वित  Universal Time ( ) .
In the northern parts of the time zone , during the second Sunday  in कूच , at 2:00 a.m. est , घड़ियाँ हैं उन्नत  to 3:00 a.m. EDT leaving a one hour `` gap . ''
During the first Sunday in November , at 2:00 a.m. EDT ,  घड़ियाँ हैं स्थानांतरित वापस to 1:00 a.m. est  , thus `` duplicating '' one hour .
Southern parts of the zone ( Panama and the Caribbean ) do not  observe daylight छायांकन  .
मानक रूप of the  periodic table .
The colors represent different  श्रेणी of तत्व समझाया  below .
The periodic table is a tabular  प्रदर्शक of the रासायनिक तत्व , व्यवस्थित  on the basis of their atomic numbers , electron configurations , and recurring chemical properties .
तत्व हैं प्रस्तुत  in order of increasing atomic number ( number of protons ) .
The  मानक रूप of तालिका comprises an 18 × 7 ग्रिड or  main body of elements , positioned above a smaller double row of elements .
The table can also be deconstructed into four rectangular blocks : the s-block to the left , the  p-block to the सही , the d-block in the मध्य , और  the f-block below that .
The rows of the table are called periods ; the columns  of the s- , d- , और p-blocks हैं पुकारा  groups , with some of these having names such as the halogens or the noble gases .
Since , by definition , a periodic table incorporates recurring trends , any such table can be used to derive relationships between  the गुण of the तत्व और भविष्यवाणी the गुण of नई , yet to be खोजा  or synthesized , elements .
As a result , a periodic table—whether in the standard form or some other variant—provides a  उपयोगी फ्रेमवर्क लिये analyzing रासायनिक बर्ताव ,  and such tables are widely used in chemistry and other sciences .
Although precursors exist ,  dmitri mendeleev is generally credited साथ the  publication , in 1869 , of the first widely recognized periodic table .
He developed his table to  illustrate आवधिक रुझान in the  properties of the then-known elements .
Mendeleev also predicted some properties of  then-unknown तत्व कि होता  be expected to fill gaps in this table .
Most of his predictions were proved correct when the elements in  सवाल यहूद subsequently खोजा  .
Mendeleev 's periodic table has since been expanded and refined with the  डिस्कवरी or संश्लेषण of further नई तत्व और the विकास of नई  theoretical models to explain chemical behavior .
All  तत्व इससे परमाणु  numbers 1 ( hydrogen ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have been discovered or synthesized .
The elements from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have been found to exist naturally , although some are found only in trace amounts and were  initially खोजा by संश्लेषण in  laboratories .
The elements after 98 have only been  synthesized in laboratories  .
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is being pursued , with the question of how the periodic table may need to  be परिवर्धित to accommodate कोई ऐसे परिवर्धन  being a matter of ongoing debate .
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally  occurring तत्व  have also been produced in laboratories .
Minecraft is a sandbox indie game  originally निर्मित by स्वीडिश प्रोग्रामर markus  `` Notch '' Persson and later developed and published by Mojang .
It was publicly released for the PC on May 17 , 2009 , as a developmental alpha version and , after gradual  अद्यतन , थी प्रकाशित as a पूरा रिलीज संस्करण on  November 18 , 2011 .
A  संस्करण लिये एंड्रॉइड थी released a माह पहले  on October 7 , and an iOS version was released on November 17 , 2011 .
On May 9 , 2012 , the game was released on Xbox 360  as an एक्सबॉक्स सजीव आर्केड खेल , co-developed  by 4J Studios .
All  संस्करण of minecraft  receive periodic updates .
The creative and building aspects of Minecraft allow players to build  constructions आउट of textured घन in a  3D procedurally generated world .
Other  क्रियाएँ in the खेल शामिल खोजी , महफ़िल  resources , crafting and combat .
Gameplay in its commercial release has two principal modes : survival , which requires  खिलाड़ी to acquire संसाधन और maintain उनके स्वास्थ्य और भूख ; और रचनात्मक , जहाँ खिलाड़ी have an असीमित सप्लाई of संसाधन  , the ability to fly , and no health or hunger .
A third gameplay mode named hardcore is the same as survival , differing only in difficulty ; it is set to hardest  सेटिंग और respawning is  disabled , forcing players to delete their worlds upon death .
Minecraft received five awards from the 2011 Game Developers Conference : it was awarded the Innovation Award , Best Downloadable Game Award , and the Best Debut Game Award from the Game Developers  चुनाव पुरस्कार ; और the दर्शक पुरस्कार , as खूब as the seumas mcnally ग्रैंड पुरस्कार , इससे the स्वतंत्र  Games Festival in 2011 .
In 2012 , Minecraft  थी awarded a सुनहरी जॉयस्टिक पुरस्कार  in the category Best Downloadable Game .
As of April 8 , 2013 , the game has sold over 10 million copies on PC and as of  जनवरी 22 , 2013 , over 20 लाख नक़ल आरपार सब प्लेटफ़ॉर्म  .
The Dark Knight is a 2008 British-American superhero film directed  , उत्पादित , और co-written by क्रिस्टोफर  Nolan .
Based on the DC Comics character  बैटमैन , the फिल्मी is the दूसरी भाग of नोलन 's बैटमैन फिल्मी श्रेणी  and a sequel to 2005 's Batman Begins .
Christian Bale reprises the lead role of Bruce Wayne/Batman , with a returning cast of  माइकल caine as अल्फ्रेड pennyworth , गेरी oldman as जेम्स गॉर्डन और मॉर्गन  Freeman as Lucius Fox .
The film introduces the character of Harvey Dent ( Aaron Eckhart ) , Gotham 's newly elected District Attorney and  the consort of ब्रूस वेन 's बाल्यकाल dost रेचल dawes ( मैगी जिलएनहॉल ) , जो joins बैटमैन और the  police in combating the new rising threat of a criminal mastermind calling himself `` The Joker `` ( Heath Ledger ) .
Nolan 's  प्रेरणा लिये the फिल्मी थी the जोकर 's कॉमिक किताब डेब्यू in 1940 , the 1988  graphic novel , and the 1996 series , which retold Two-Face 's origin .
The nickname `` the Dark Knight '' was first applied to  बैटमैन in बैटमैन no . 1 ( 1940 ) , in a स्टोरी  written by Bill Finger .
The Dark Knight  थी फिल्माया primarily in शिकागो , as खूब as in अनेक अन्य  locations in the United States , the United Kingdom , and Hong Kong .
Nolan used an IMAX camera to film some sequences ,  सहित the जोकर 's पहला रूप  in the film .
On January 22 , 2008 , some months after he  था समाप्त फिल्मांकन on the अंधेरा नाईट  and six months before the film 's release , Heath Ledger died from a toxic combination of prescription drugs , leading to intense attention from the press and movie-going public .
Warner Bros. had initially created a viral  विपणन अभियान लिये the अंधेरा नाईट , विकासशील promotional वेबसाइटों  and trailers highlighting screen shots of Ledger as the Joker , but after Ledger 's death , the studio refocused its promotional campaign .
The Dark Knight was released on July 16 , 2008 in Australia , on  जुलाई 18 , 2008 in उत्तर अमेरिका , और on जुलाई 24  , 2008 in the United Kingdom .
Considered one of  the बेहतरीन films of the 2000s और एक of the बेहतरीन सुपरहीरो films कभी  made , the film received highly positive reviews and set numerous records during its theatrical run .
With over $ 1 billion in revenue worldwide , it is the 14th-highest-grossing film of all time  , unadjusted लिये महंगाई  .
The film received eight Academy Award nominations ; it won  the पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन ध्वनि संपादन और लेजर थी मरणोपरांत  awarded Best Supporting Actor .
The Dark Knight Rises , the  फाइनल भाग of the त्रयी , थी released  on July 20 , 2012 .
The  समयरेखा of रेडियो सूचियाँ भीतर the इतिहास of रेडियो , the  technology and events that produced instruments that use radio waves and activities that people undertook .
Later , the history is  वर्चस्व by प्रोग्रामिंग और  contents , which is closer to general history .
The Sydney Opera House is a  multi-venue performing कला केन्द्र in नई दक्षिण वेल्स , ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
It was conceived and largely built by Danish architect Jørn Utzon , opening  in 1973 बाद a long gestation कि  began with his competition-winning design in 1957 .
Joseph Cahill 's  नई दक्षिण वेल्स सरकारी दिया  the go-ahead for work to begin in 1958 .
The  सरकारी 's बिंदास निर्णय to चुनें  Utzon 's design is often overshadowed by the scandal that followed .
It is on Bennelong Point in Sydney  harbour , बंद to the सिडनी harbour सेतु  .
It sits at the northeastern tip of the Sydney central business district ( the  सीबीडी ) , घिरी on तीन पहलू by the harbour  ( Sydney Cove and Farm Cove ) and inland by the Royal Botanic Gardens .
Contrary to its  नाम , it घरों अनेक प्रदर्शन  venues .
It is among the busiest performing arts centres in the world , hosting over 1,500  प्रदर्शन प्रत्येक साल attended by कुछ 1.2 लाख लोगों  .
It provides a venue for many performing-arts companies , including the four key resident companies Opera Australia , The Australian  बैले , the सिडनी थिएटर कम्पनी और the सिडनी सिंफनी ऑर्केस्ट्रा , और presents a चौड़ी दायरा of प्रोडक्शन्स  on its own account .
It is also one  of the सबसे लोकप्रिय आगंतुक आकर्षण  in Australia , with more than seven million people visiting each year , 300,000 of whom take a guided tour .
It is administered by the  सिडनी ओपेरा हाउस विश्वास , अंतर्गत the  New South Wales Ministry of the Arts .
On 28 June 2007 , it was made a  युनेस्को संसार विरासत साईट  .
It is  एक of the 20th सदी 's सबसे distinctive इमारतें और  one of the most famous performing arts centres in the world .
A graph of body mass  अनुक्रमणिका as a फलन of देह द्रव्यमान और देह  height is shown above .
the dashed लाइनों  represent subdivisions within a major class .
For instance the `` Underweight ''  वर्गीकरण is further विभाजित into `` कठोर '' , `` मॉडरेट  '' , and `` mild '' subclasses .
The body mass index ( BMI ) , or Quetelet index , is a measure for human body shape based on  an व्यक्तिगत 's वज़न और ऊँचाई  .
It was devised between 1830 and 1850 by the Belgian polymath Adolphe  quetelet दौरान the कोर्स of विकासशील `` सोशल  physics '' .
Body mass index is defined as  the व्यक्तिगत 's देह द्रव्यमान विभाजित  by the square of their height .
the formulae universally प्रयुक्त in आयुर्विज्ञान  produce a unit of measure of kg/m2 .
बीएमआई can भी be संकल्पित using a बीएमआई चार्ट , जिससे प्रदर्शक बीएमआई as a फलन of वज़न ( आड़ा  axis ) and height ( vertical axis ) using contour lines for different values of BMI or colors for different BMI categories .
†  the फ़ैक्टर लिये uk/us इकाई is अधिक precisely  703.06957964 , but that level of precision is not meaningful for this calculation .
To work from stone and pounds first multiply the stone by 14 then add the pounds to give the whole mass  in पाउंड ; to कार्य इससे फीट और इंच पहला गुणा the फीट by 12 तब add the इंच  to give the whole height in inches .
Thomas Paine ( January 29 , 1737 ( NS  फ़रवरी 9 , 1737 ) – जून 8 , 1809 ) थी an english-american राजनैतिक  activist , author , political theorist and revolutionary .
As the author of two highly influential pamphlets at the start of the American Revolution , he  प्रेरित the देशप्रेमी in 1776 to घोषित स्वतंत्रता  from Britain .
His ideas reflected  आत्मज्ञान era बयानबाजी of transnational इंसान  rights .
He has  महरूम पुकारा `` a corsetmaker  by trade , a journalist by profession , and a propagandist by inclination . ''
Born in Thetford , England , in the county of Norfolk , Paine emigrated to the British American colonies in 1774 with the help of Benjamin  फ्रैंकलिन और he arrived in समय to participate in the अमरीकी क्रान्ति  .
His principal contributions were the powerful , widely read pamphlet Common Sense ( 1776 ) , the all-time best-selling American book that advocated colonial  अमेरिका 's स्वतंत्रता इससे the किंगडम of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , और the अमरीकी संकट ( 1776–83 ) , a pro-revolutionary  pamphlet series .
Common Sense was so influential that John Adams said , `` Without the pen of the  लेखक of आम भाव , the तलवार of वॉशिंगटन होता  have been raised in vain.”
Paine lived in France for most of the 1790s , becoming  deeply शामिल in the फ्रेंच  Revolution .
He wrote the Rights of  man ( 1791 ) , in भाग a रक्षा  of the French Revolution against its critics .
उसके हमले on अंग्रेजों लेखक एडमंड बुर्के  led to a trial and conviction in absentia in 1792 for the crime of seditious libel .
In 1792 , despite not  होने समर्थ to बोलो फ्रेंच , he थी निर्वाचित  to the French National Convention .
The  girondists regarded  him as an ally .
Consequently , the Montagnards , especially  robespierre , regarded उसे  as an enemy .
in दिसम्बर 1793 ,  he was arrested and imprisoned in Paris , then released in 1794 .
He became notorious because of The Age of Reason (  1793–94 ) , उसके किताब कि अधिवक्ताओं देववाद , promotes कारण और freethinking  , and argues against institutionalized religion in general and Christian doctrine in particular .
he भी लिखा the pamphlet कृषिक इंसाफ ( 1795  ) , discussing the origins of property , and introduced the concept of a guaranteed minimum income .
In 1802 , he returned to America  जहाँ he died on जून  8 , 1809 .
Only six people attended his funeral as he  था महरूम ostracized लिये उसके उपहास  of Christianity .
Clinical trials are sets of tests in medical research and drug development that generate safety and efficacy data ( or more specifically  , सूचना परिचय प्रतिकूल ड्रग प्रतिक्रियाएँ और प्रतिकूल प्रभाव of अन्य उपचार ) लिये स्वास्थ्य  interventions ( e.g. , drugs , diagnostics , devices , therapy protocols ) .
They are conducted only after satisfactory  सूचना रै महरूम gathered on the विशेषता of the गैर नैदानिक सुरक्षा , और  health authority/ethics committee approval is granted in the country where approval of the drug or device is sought .
Previously , many emerging  देशों किया नहीं आवश्यकता लोकल ट्रायल लिये उत्पाद  approvals .
Now , though  उभरते देशों स्टिल accept आंकड़ा इससे u.s./europe  , they also require some local trials .
Depending on the type of  उत्पाद और the स्टेज of इसके विकास , जांचकर्ताओं initially enroll स्वयंसेवक and/or मरीजों into छोटी पायलट अध्ययन , और subsequently conduct  larger scale studies in patients that often compare the new product with others already approved for the affliction of interest .
As positive safety and  efficacy आंकड़ा हैं gathered , the क्रमांक  of patients is typically increased .
Clinical trials can vary in size , and can involve a single research  एंटिटी in एक देश or अनेक ऐसे entities in  multiple countries .
A full series of  ट्रायल may incur sizable लागत , और the बोझ of paying  for all the necessary people and services is usually borne by the sponsor , which may be a governmental organization or a pharmaceutical , biotechnology or medical device company .
When the diversity of required support roles exceeds the resources of the sponsor , a clinical trial is  प्रबंधित by an outsourced संगी , ऐसे as a अनुबंध  research organization or a clinical trials unit in the academic sector .
The Green Bay  पैकर्स हैं an अमरीकी  football team based in Green Bay , Wisconsin .
They are members of the North Division of the National  फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) in  the National Football League ( NFL ) .
Green Bay is  the third-oldest मताधिकार in the एनएफएल  , having been organized and playing in 1919 .
The Packers are  the तभी non-profit , community-owned प्रमुख  league professional sports team in the United States .
The Packers are the last vestige of `` small  कस्बा टीमों '' कि यहूद एकबार आम  in the NFL during the 1920s and 1930s .
Founded in  1919 by अर्ल `` घुंघराले '' lambeau ( hence the नाम lambeau  Field on which the team plays ) and George Whitney Calhoun , the Green Bay Packers can trace their lineage to other semi-professional teams in Green Bay dating back to 1896 .
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a  semi-professional फ़ुटबॉल टोली विरूद्ध क्लब इससे around विस्कॉन्सिन  and the Midwest .
They joined the American Professional  फ़ुटबॉल संघ ( apfa ) in 1921 , the forerunner  to what is known today as the National Football League ( NFL ) .
Although Green Bay is the last NFL `` small town '' team , its local fan base and media extends  into आसपास मिल्वौकी ; the टोली  also played selected home games there between 1933 and 1994 .
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than any other team in the  एनएफएल ) , सहित नौ एनएफएल championships prior to the सुपर कटोरी era और चार सुपर  Bowl victories —in 1967 ( Super Bowl I ) , 1968 ( Super Bowl II ) , 1997 ( Super Bowl XXXI ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ) .
The Packers have long-standing , bitter  rivalries साथ उनके nfc उत्तर ( formerly the nfc सेंट्रल  ) opponents , the Chicago Bears , Minnesota Vikings and the Detroit Lions .
The Bears-Packers rivalry is one of the oldest  rivalries in एनएफएल इतिहास , डेटिंग वापस  to 1921 .
Ethanol fuel is ethanol ( ethyl alcohol ) , the same type  of दारू मिला in alcoholic  beverages .
It is most  प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a मोटर ईंधन , मुख्यतः  as a biofuel additive for gasoline .
World ethanol production for transport fuel tripled between 2000 and 2007  इससे 17  billion to more than 52 billion liters .
From 2007 to 2008 , the share  of इथेनॉल in वैश्विक गैसोलीन प्रकार ईंधन  use increased from 3.7 % to 5.4 % .
In 2011 worldwide ethanol fuel production reached 22.36 billion U.S. liquid gallons ( bg ) ( 84.6 billion liters ) , with the United  राज्य as the शीर्ष निर्माता साथ 13.9 bg ( 52.6 अरब liters ) , हिसाब लिये 62.2 % of वैश्विक उत्पादन , followed  by Brazil with 5.6 bg ( 21.1 billion liters ) .
Ethanol fuel has a `` gasoline gallon equivalency `` ( GGE )  मान of , जिससे अर्थात् 1.5 गैलन of इथेनॉल उपज  the energy of one gallon of gasoline .
Ethanol fuel is widely used in Brazil  और in the संयुक्त राज्य , और साथ दोनो देशों यहूद जिम्मेदार लिये 87.1 % of the  world 's ethanol fuel production in 2011 .
सबसे गाड़ियाँ on the सड़क आज in the u.S. can चलाएं on मिश्रणों  of up to 10 % ethanol , and ethanol represented 10 % of the U.S. gasoline fuel supply derived from domestic sources in 2011 .
Since 1976 the  ब्राज़ीलियाई सरकारी रै बना it अनिवार्य to मिश्रण इथेनॉल साथ गैसोलीन , और चूंकि 2007 the  legal blend is around 25 % ethanol and 75 % gasoline ( E25 ) .
By December 2011 Brazil had a fleet of 14.8 million flex-fuel automobiles and light trucks and 1.5 million flex-fuel  मोटरसाइकिल कि regularly उपयोग neat  ethanol fuel ( known as E100 ) .
Bioethanol is a  रूप of बेदर्दी उर्जा  that can be produced from agricultural feedstocks .
It can be made from very common crops  ऐसे as शुगर cane , आलू ,  manioc and corn .
There has been considerable debate about how useful bioethanol  होगा be in replacing  gasoline .
Concerns about its production and use relate to increased  खाना कीमतें due to the विशाल राशि of arable जमीन जरूरी लिये फसलों  , as well as the energy and pollution balance of the whole cycle of ethanol production , especially from corn .
Recent  developments साथ cellulosic इथेनॉल उत्पादन  and commercialization may allay some of these concerns .
Cellulosic ethanol offers promise because cellulose fibers , a major and universal component in plant cells  दीवारें , can be प्रयुक्त to उपज  ethanol .
According to the International Energy Agency , cellulosic  इथेनॉल could allow इथेनॉल fuels to खेल a much बडे भूमिका in the भविष्य  than previously thought .
Saab 9-3  sportcombi biopower  .
The second E85 flexifuel model  introduced by साब in the स्वीडिश  market .
A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination and steps of Gavrilo  princip ( चित्र लिया in 1987 , पहले कदम यहूद removed in 1992  and plaque changed from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A plaque commemorating the location  of the साराजेवो हत्या ( चित्र  taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914 , Archduke Franz Ferdinand of  ऑस्ट्रिया , वारिस presumptive to the austro-hungarian सिंहासन , और उसके बीवी , सोफी , duchess of hohenberg ,  were shot dead in Sarajevo , by Gavrilo Princip , one of a group of six Bosnian Serb assassins coordinated by Danilo Ilić .
The  राजनैतिक उद्देश्य of the हत्या थी to ब्रेक बंद austria-hungary  's south-Slav provinces so they could be combined into a Greater Serbia or a Yugoslavia .
The assassins ' motives were  सतत साथ the गति  that later became known as Young Bosnia .
Serbian military  अधिकारियों stood पीछे the आक्रमण  .
At the top of these Serbian military conspirators was Chief of Serbian Military Intelligence Dragutin Dimitrijević , his righthand  man प्रमुख vojislav tankosić , और masterspy  Rade Malobabić .
Major Tankosić armed the  हत्यारे साथ बम और pistols  and trained them .
The assassins were given access to the  वही clandestine टनल of safe-houses और एजेंटों कि rade malobabić  used for the infiltration of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary .
The assassins , the key members of the clandestine tunnel , and the key Serbian military  षड्यंत्रकारियों जो यहूद स्टिल जिंदा यहूद गिरफ्तार , आजमाया  , convicted and punished .
Those who were arrested in Bosnia were tried in Sarajevo in  अक्तूबर 1914  .
The other conspirators were arrested and tried before a Serbian kangaroo court on the  french-controlled salonika सामने in 1916–1917 on unrelated गलत आरोप  ; Serbia executed three of the top military conspirators .
Much of what is known about the  assassinations आता इससे  these two trials and related records .
Assignment of responsibility for  the bombing और हत्याएं of 28 जून is अत्यधिक विवादास्पद क्युकी the आक्रमण led  to the outbreak of World War I one month later .
Renée  कैथलीन zellweger ( born अप्रैल  25 , 1969 ) is an American actress and producer .
Zellweger first gained widespread attention for her role in the film Jerry Maguire ( 1996 ) , and subsequently received two nominations for the Academy Award for Best  अभिनेत्री लिये उसके भूमिकाएँ as ब्रिजेट जोन्स in the कॉमेडी ब्रिजेट जोन्स 's डायरी ( 2001 ) , और as roxie हार्ट in the musical  Chicago ( 2002 ) .
She won the Academy Award  लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in the नाटक  Cold Mountain ( 2003 ) .
She has won  an अकादमी पुरस्कार , तीन सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार , तीन स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार , और a bafta पुरस्कार  ; was named Hasty Pudding 's Woman of the Year in 2009 ; and established herself as one of the highest-paid Hollywood actresses as of 2007 .
The ossicles ( also called auditory ossicles ) are the three smallest bones in the human body , the  malleus ,  the incus and the stapes .
They are contained within the middle ear space and  serve to संचारण ध्वनि इससे the एयर to the fluid-filled  labyrinth ( cochlea ) .
The absence of the auditory ossicles would constitute a  moderate-to-severe सुनना घाटा  .
The term `` ossicles '' literally means `` tiny bones '' and commonly refers to the auditory  ossicles , हालांकि the पद may refer to कोई छोटी अस्थि throughout  the body .
The New  वचन ( यहूदी • • — यूनानी • • diatheke kaine ) is a biblical  interpretation originally derived from a phrase in the Book of Jeremiah , in the Hebrew Scriptures .
It is often thought of as an  eschatological मुक्तिदाता आयु or संसार to आइये और is सम्बन्धित to the biblical  concept of the Kingdom of God .
Generally ,  ईसाइयों मानना कि the नई वचन थी instituted at  the Last Supper as part of the Eucharist , which in the Gospel of John includes the New Commandment .
There are several Christian eschatologies  कि further define the नई वचन , as an उदाहरण an उदघाटन eschatology defines और describes the नई वचन as an जारी संबंध between  Christian believers and God that will be in full fruition after the Second Coming of Christ ; that is , it will not only be in full fruition in believing hearts , but in the future external world as well .
The connection between the Blood of Christ and the New Covenant is seen in  सबसे आधुनिक अंग्रेज़ी अनुवाद of the नई वसीयत साथ the saying  : `` this cup that is poured out for you is the new covenant in my blood '' .
Christians believe that Jesus is the mediator of the New Covenant , and that the Blood of Christ shed at his  crucifixion is the  required blood of the covenant .
As with all  covenants between परमेश्वर और man वर्णित in  the Bible , the New Covenant is considered `` a bond in blood sovereignly administered by God . ''
It has been theorized  कि the नई वचन is the विधि of  Christ as spoken during his Sermon on the Mount .
The following List  of लोगों pardoned or granted दया by the अध्यक्ष  of the United States documents the most prominent cases of each presidency .
As granted by the Constitution ( Article II  , खण्ड 2 , clause 1 ) , राष्ट्रपतियों have the शक्ति to ग्रान्ट दया in एक  or more of the following ways : the ability to grant a full pardon , to commute a sentence , or to rescind a fine .
U.S. Presidents  have no शक्ति to ग्रान्ट दया  for crimes prosecuted under state law .
As to the  अंतर between a pardon और  a commutation:
A pardon is an  कार्यपालिका अनुक्रम vacating  a conviction .
A commutation is the mitigation of the sentence of someone currently serving a sentence for a crime pursuant to a conviction ,  बगैर vacating the conviction  itself .
Approximately  20,000 pardons और clemencies  were issued by U.S. presidents in the 20th century alone .
The records of acts of clemency were  पब्लिक जबतक 1934  .
In 1981 the Office of the Pardon Attorney was created  और रिकॉर्ड इससे अध्यक्ष  H. W. Bush forward are now listed .
This list includes pardons  और commutations  .
Tampa ( )  is a नगर in the u.S. राज्य  of Florida .
It serves as the county seat for  hillsborough काउंटी और is स्तिथ on the वेस्ट coast of फ्लोरिडा  , on Tampa Bay near the Gulf of Mexico .
The population of  tampa in 2011  was 346,037 .
The current location of Tampa was once inhabited by indigenous peoples of the Safety Harbor culture  , सबसे notably the tocobaga और the pohoy , जो जिया साथ the shores  of Tampa Bay .
It was briefly explored by Spanish explorers in the  जल्दी 16th सदी , लकिन वहीँ यहूद no स्थाई अमरीकी or यूरोपीय  settlements within today 's city limits until after the United States had acquired Florida from Spain in 1819 .
In 1824 , the United States Army established a frontier outpost called  फोर्ट ब्रुक at the मुँह of the hillsborough  River , near the site of today 's Tampa Convention Center .
The first civilian residents were pioneers who settled near the fort for protection from the  आसपास seminole जनसांख्यिकी  .
The town grew slowly until the 1880s , when railroad links , the discovery of phosphate , and the arrival  of the सिगार उद्योग jump-started tampa 's विकास और helped it to grow  into an important city by the early 1900s .
Today ,  tampa is a भाग of  the metropolitan area most commonly referred to as the Tampa Bay Area .
लिये u.S. जनसांख्यिकी उद्देश्य  , Tampa is part of the Tampa-St. Petersburg-Clearwater , Florida Metropolitan Statistical Area .
The four-county area is composed of roughly 2.7 million residents , making it the second largest metropolitan  सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल ( एमएसए ) in the राज्य , और the चौथी largest in the southeastern  United States , behind Miami , Washington , D.C. , and Atlanta .
The  वृहद tampa खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल रै बस over  4 million residents and generally includes the Tampa and Sarasota metro areas .
The Tampa Bay Partnership and U.S. Census data  दिखाया an औसत सालाना विकास of 2.47 प्रतिशत  , or a gain of approximately 97,000 residents per year .
Between 2000 and 2006 , the Greater  tampa खाड़ी मार्केट अनुभवी a संयुक्त विकास रेट of 14.8 प्रतिशत , growing  from 3.4 million to 3.9 million and hitting the 4 million people mark on April 1 , 2007 .
A 2012 estimate shows the Tampa Bay area population to have  4,310,524 लोगों और a 2017 प्रक्षेप  of 4,536,854 people .
Tampa has a number of sports teams , such as  the tampa खाड़ी buccaneers of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग , the tampa खाड़ी बिजली of  the National Hockey League , and the Tampa Bay Storm of the Arena Football League .
The Tampa Bay Rays in Major League Baseball and the Tampa Bay Rowdies of  the उत्तर अमरीकी सॉकर लीग खेल उनके घर खेल in neighboring st.  Petersburg , Florida .
In 2008 , Tampa was ranked as  the 5th बेहतरीन बाहरी नगर  by Forbes .
A 2004 survey by the NYU  समाचारपत्र वॉशिंगटन वर्गाकार न्यूज क्रमित tampa as  a top city for `` twenty-somethings . ''
Tampa  is अभी क्रमित as a `` गामा  '' world city by Loughborough University .
according to loughborough  , Tampa ranks alongside other world cities such as Phoenix , Santo Domingo , and Osaka .
In recent  सालो tampa रै देखी a notable upsurge  in high-market demand from consumers , signaling more wealth concentrated in the area .
tampa hosted the 2012  Republican National Convention .
The  शेवरलेट cavalier थी  a compact automobile produced from 1982 to 2005 by General Motors .
Built on the company 's J platform , the  cavalier उत्पादित the उच्चतम  sales in 1984 .
AT & T Mobility LLC branded and referred to as AT & T ( formerly Cingular Wireless LLC ) , is a wholly owned subsidiary of AT & T  inc. कि provides बेतार सेवाएं to 107 लाख सदस्य in the संयुक्त राज्य , सहित  Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands .
AT & T Mobility is  the दूसरी largest बेतार दूरसंचार प्रदाता in the  United States and Puerto Rico , behind Verizon Wireless , which serves 115.78 million customers as of the fourth quarter of 2012 .
AT & T Mobility is headquartered in  the lenox पार्क क्षेत्रफल of dekalb co. जॉर्जिया  , just outside Atlanta .
Originally Cingular  बेतार llc इससे 2000 to 2007 , a संयुक्त venture between sbc संचार और bellsouth , the कम्पनी acquired  the old AT & T Wireless in 2004 ; SBC later acquired the original AT & T and re-branded as `` AT & T '' .
Cingular became wholly owned by AT & T in  दिसम्बर 2006 as a परिणाम of at & t  's acquisition of BellSouth .
In January 2007 , Cingular confirmed it  होता re-brand itself अंतर्गत the at &  T name .
Although the legal corporate name change occurred immediately , for both  नियामक और brand-awareness कारण दोनो ब्रांड्स यहूद प्रयुक्त  in the company 's signage and advertising during a transition period .
The transition concluded in late June , just prior  to the rollout of the ठहराना  iPhone .
On March 20 ,  2011 , at & t गतिशीलता घोषित इसके इरादे  to acquire T-Mobile USA from Deutsche Telekom for $ 39 billion .
If it had received government and regulatory approval , AT  & t होता have था अधिक than 130 लाख  subscribers .
However , the U.S. Department of Justice , the Federal  संचार आयोग , और at & t गतिशीलता 's प्रतिस्पर्धी ( ऐसे as स्प्रिंट nextel  ) opposed the move on the grounds that it would reduce competition in the cellular communications market .
In December 2011 , in the face of both governmental and  फैली उपभोक्ता विपक्ष , at & t withdrew उनके प्रस्ताव  to complete the merger .
Martin Luther  किंग , jr. ( जनवरी 15 , 1929 – अप्रैल 4 , 1968 )  was an American clergyman , activist , and leader in the African-American Civil Rights Movement .
He is  बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके भूमिका in the उन्नति  of civil rights using nonviolent civil disobedience .
किंग रै become a नेशनल  icon in the history of American progressivism .
A  बैपटिस्ट मंत्री , किंग became  a civil rights activist early in his career .
He led the 1955 Montgomery Bus Boycott and helped  मिला the दक्षिणी ईसाई नेतृत्व सम्मेलन ( sclc  ) in 1957 , serving as its first president .
With the SCLC , King led an unsuccessful struggle against segregation in Albany , Georgia , in 1962 , and  व्यवस्थित nonviolent विरोध in बर्मिंघम , अलबामा , कि आकर्षित नेशनल ध्यान following टेलीविज़न न्यूज  coverage of the brutal police response .
King also helped to organize the 1963 March on Washington , where he  वितरित उसके `` i have  a Dream `` speech .
There , he established his  प्रतिष्ठा as एक of the महानतम orators in अमरीकी  history .
He also established his reputation as a radical , and became an object of the Federal Bureau of Investigation 's  cointelpro लिये the बाकी of उसके जीवन  .
FBI agents investigated him for possible communist ties , recorded  उसके extramarital liaisons और reported on उन्हें to सरकारी officials , और on  one occasion , mailed King a threatening anonymous letter that he interpreted as an attempt to make him commit suicide .
On October 14 , 1964  , किंग प्राप्त the नोबेल सलाम  Prize for combating racial inequality through nonviolence .
In 1965 , he and the SCLC helped to organize the Selma to Montgomery marches and the  following साल , he took the गति उत्तर to  Chicago .
In the final years of his life ,  किंग विस्तारित उसके फ़ोकस to शामिल गरीबी और the वियतनाम युद्ध  , alienating many of his liberal allies with a 1967 speech titled `` Beyond Vietnam '' .
King was planning a national  occupation of वॉशिंगटन , d.C. , पुकारा the  Poor People 's Campaign .
King was assassinated on April 4 , 1968  , in मेम्फिस ,  Tennessee .
His death was followed by riots  in अनेक u.S. शहरों  .
Allegations that James Earl Ray , the man convicted of killing King , had been framed or acted in concert with government agents  persisted लिये दशकों बाद the शूटिंग , और  the jury of a 1999 civil trial found Loyd Jowers to be complicit in a conspiracy against King .
किंग थी awarded the अध्यक्षीय  Medal of Freedom and the Congressional Gold Medal posthumously .
Martin Luther King ,  jr. दिन थी स्थापित as  a U.S. federal holiday in 1986 .
Hundreds of streets in the U.S.  have महरूम renamed in उसके  honor .
A memorial  प्रतिमा on the नेशनल मॉल थी खोली  to the public in 2011 .
The tiger (  पेंथेरा tigris ) is the largest बिल्ली प्रजाति , reaching  a total body length of up to and weighing up to .
It is the third largest land  carnivore ( पीछे तभी the ध्रुवीय  bear and the brown bear ) .
Its most recognizable feature is a pattern of dark vertical stripes on  reddish-orange फर साथ a हल्का underside  .
It has exceptionally stout teeth , and the canines are the longest  among जीना felids साथ a क्राउन ऊँचाई of as much as or भी  .
In  zoos , टाइगर्स have  lived for 20 to 26 years , which also seems to be their longevity in the wild .
They are territorial and generally solitary but social animals , often requiring  विशाल संलग्न क्षेत्रों of आवास कि support उनके शिकार  requirements .
This , coupled with the fact that they are indigenous to some of the more densely populated places on Earth ,  रै caused significant विरोध साथ इंसानो  .
Tigers once ranged widely across Asia , from Turkey in the west to the  पूर्वी coast of रूस  .
Over the  पास्ट 100 सालो , वे have खोया 93 % of उनके ऐतिहासिक दायरा , और have  been extirpated from southwest and central Asia , from the islands of Java and Bali , and from large areas of Southeast and Eastern Asia .
Today , they range  इससे the siberian ताइगा to खोलें grasslands  and tropical mangrove swamps .
The remaining six tiger  subspecies have  been classified as endangered by IUCN .
The global  जनसांख्यिकी in the जंगली is अनुमानित to क्रमांक between 3,062 और 3,948 individuals , bas  from around 100,000 at the start of the 20th century , with most remaining populations occurring in small pockets isolated from each other .
प्रमुख कारण लिये जनसांख्यिकी  decline include habitat destruction , habitat fragmentation and poaching .
The extent of  क्षेत्रफल occupied by टाइगर्स is अनुमानित at कम  than , a 41 % decline from the area estimated in the mid-1990s .
Tigers are among the most recognisable and  लोकप्रिय of the संसार 's charismatic  megafauna .
They have  प्रदर्शित prominently in प्राचीन mythology  and folklore , and continue to be depicted in modern films and literature .
Tigers  appear on अनेक ध्वज , coats  of arms , and as mascots for sporting teams .
The Bengal tiger  is the नेशनल एनिमल  of both India and Bangladesh .
The simplified  आतंरिक ढांचा  of a chloroplast
Overview of the  calvin साईकिल और  carbon fixation
The light-independent  प्रतिक्रियाएँ of photosynthesis हैं रासायनिक  reactions that convert carbon dioxide and other compounds into glucose .
These reactions occur in the stroma , the  fluid-filled क्षेत्रफल of a हरितलवक बाहर of  the thylakoid membranes .
These reactions take the  light-dependent प्रतिक्रियाएँ और  perform further chemical processes on them .
There are three phases  to the light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ , collectively पुकारा the calvin साईकिल : कार्बन fixation , कटौती  reactions , and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration .
Despite its name , this process  occurs तभी जब लाइट  is available .
Plants do  नहीं carry आउट the calvin  cycle by night .
They , instead , release sucrose into the  फ्लोएम इससे उनके मंड  reserves .
This process  happens जब लाइट is उपलब्धियाँ स्वतंत्र of the दयालु of photosynthesis ( c3 कार्बन fixation , c4 कार्बन fixation  , and Crassulacean Acid Metabolism ) ; CAM plants store malic acid in their vacuoles every night and release it by day in order to make this process work .
A linen handkerchief with  खींचा लड़ी कढ़ाई around  the edges
Linen cloth recovered from Qumran  गुफा 1 निकट the मुर्दे  Sea .
Linen ( ) is a textile made from the  मछली of the flax संयंत्र , linum  usitatissimum .
Linen is labor-intensive to manufacture ,  लकिन जब it is बना into  garments , it is valued for its exceptional coolness and freshness in hot weather .
The word `` linen ''  is of वेस्ट germanic उत्पत्ति और cognates साथ the लैटिन नाम  for the flax plant linum , and the earlier Greek λινόν ( linon ) .
This word history has given rise to a number of  अन्य शर्तें in अंग्रेज़ी , the सबसे notable of जिससे is the अंग्रेज़ी शब्द लकीर  , derived from the use of a linen ( flax ) thread to determine a straight line .
वस्त्र in a लिनेन बुनते बनावट , भी जब बना  of cotton , hemp and other non-flax fibers are also loosely referred to as `` linen '' .
Such fabrics generally  have उनके अपना विशिष्ट names अन्य than लिनेन ; लिये  example , fine cotton yarn in a linen-style weave is called Madapolam .
The collective term `` linens `` is still often used generically to describe a class of woven and  भी knitted bed , नहाना , तालिका और रसोईघर वस्त्र  .
The  नाम linens is retained क्युकी traditionally , लिनेन  was used for many of these items .
In the past , the word `` linens '' was also used to mean lightweight  undergarments ऐसे as शर्ट , chemises , waistshirts , lingerie  ( a word also cognate with linen ) , and detachable shirt collars and cuffs , which were historically made almost exclusively out of linen .
The inside cloth layer of fine  कम्पोजिट कपडे garments ( as लिये उदाहरण jackets ) थी traditionally  made of linen , and this is the origin of the word lining .
Linen textiles appear to be some of the oldest in  the संसार : उनके  history goes back many thousands of years .
Fragments of straw , seeds , fibers , yarns , and various types of fabrics which  तिथि वापस to परिचय 8000 bc have महरूम मिला in  Swiss lake dwellings .
Dyed flax fibers found in a prehistoric cave in Georgia suggest the use of  woven लिनेन fabrics इससे जंगली flax may तिथि वापस  even earlier to 36,000 BP .
Linen was sometimes used as currency in  प्राचीन मिश्र .
Egyptian  mummies यहूद लपेटा in लिनेन क्युकी  it was seen as a symbol of light and purity , and as a display of wealth .
कुछ of ये fabrics , woven इससे हाथ spun yarns ,  were very fine for their day , but are coarse compared to modern linen .
Today , linen is usually an expensive textile ,  और is उत्पादित in अपेक्षाकृत छोटी  quantities .
It has a long `` staple '' ( individual fiber  लंबाई ) सापेक्ष to कपास और अन्य प्राकृतिक  fibers .
Many products are made of linen : aprons ,  बैग , तौलिये ( swimmers , नहाना , बीच , देह और धो तौलिये  ) , napkins , bed linens , linen tablecloths , runners , chair covers , and men 's & women 's wear .
The FIFA World Cup , often simply the World Cup , is an  अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ फ़ुटबॉल प्रतियोगिता लडे by the वरिष्ठ मेन 's नेशनल टीमों  of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ) , the sport 's global governing body .
The championship has been  awarded प्रत्येक  four years since the inaugural tournament in 1930 , except in 1942 and 1946 when it was not held because of the Second World War .
The current  champions हैं स्पेन , जो  won the 2010 tournament .
The current format of the tournament involves 32 teams competing for the title at venues  भीतर the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a काल  of about a month ; this phase is often called the World Cup Finals .
A qualification phase , which currently takes place over the preceding three years , is used to  determine जिससे टीमों qualify लिये the टूर्नामेंट साथ साथ  the host nation ( s ) .
The 19 World Cup tournaments have been won by  आठ अलग नेशनल  teams .
Brazil have won five times , and they  हैं the तभी टोली to  have played in every tournament .
The other World Cup winners are Italy , with four titles ; Germany , with three titles ; Argentina and inaugural winners  उरुग्वे , साथ दो शीर्षक प्रत्येक ; और इंग्लैण्ड , फ़्रांस , और स्पेन , साथ एक  title each .
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting event ; an  अनुमानित 715.1 लाख लोगों  watched the final match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany .
The next three World Cups will be hosted by Brazil in  2014 , रूस in 2018 , और क़तर in  2022 .
The is an expansion device for the Wii Remote video game controller  लिये the वी कि allows  it to more accurately capture complex motion .
According to  निन्टेंडो , the सेंसर in the यंत्र पूरक the  accelerometer and Sensor Bar capabilities of the Wii Remote to enable actions to be rendered identically on the screen in real time .
The Wii 's successor console , the Wii U , supports the Wii MotionPlus and its peripherals in games where use of its touchscreen-built-in primary controller  is नहीं जरुरी .
majulah singapura ( onward  Singapore ) is the national anthem of Singapore .
रचित by zubir कहा in 1958 as a थीम सोंग लिये आधिकारिक  functions of the City Council of Singapore , the song was selected in 1959 as the island 's anthem when it attained self-government .
Upon full independence in 1965 , Majulah Singapura was formally adopted as  सिंगापुर 's नेशनल  anthem .
By law the anthem may only be sung with its original Malay lyrics  , हालांकि वहीँ मौजूद प्राधिकृत अनुवाद of the  lyrics of the anthem in Singapore 's three other official languages : English , Mandarin and Tamil .
Originally composed in the key of G major , in 2001 the national anthem was  officially relaunched in the निम्नतर कुंजी of f प्रमुख as इस थी कहा to allow लिये a ``  grander and more inspiring arrangement '' .
The national anthem is regularly performed or sung in schools and armed forces camps at ceremonies held at the beginning and/or the end of each day ,  दौरान जिससे the नेशनल ध्वज is भी उठाया और lowered और the नेशनल  pledge is taken .
Singaporeans are especially  प्रोत्साहित to गाओ the नेशनल गान on अवसरों of नेशनल जश्न or नेशनल significance ऐसे as at the  National Day Parade , at National Day observance ceremonies conducted by educational institutions and government departments , and at sporting events at which Singapore teams are participating .
An  expedition 's  shipwrights building a brigantine , 1541 .
shipbuilding is the निर्माण of जहाजों  and floating vessels .
It normally takes place in a  specialized सुविधा ज्ञात as a डॉकयार्ड .
Shipbuilders , also  पुकारा shipwrights , follow a specialized occupation  that traces its roots to before recorded history .
shipbuilding और जलयान मरम्मत ,  both commercial and military , are referred to as `` naval engineering '' .
The construction of  नौकाएँ is a समान कार्यकलाप  called boat building .
The dismantling of ships is  पुकारा जलयान तोड़कर  .
wakonda is a कस्बा in मिट्टी काउंटी  , South Dakota , United States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी  321 at the 2010 census .
The following is a list of the most populous  incorporated स्थान of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका  .
As defined by the United States Census Bureau , an ``  incorporated प्लेस `` शामिल a किस्में of designations  , including city , town , village , borough , and municipality .
A few exceptional  जनसांख्यिकी designated स्थान ( cdps ) हैं  also included in the Census Bureau 's listing of incorporated places .
संचित city-counties represent a पृथक प्रकार of सरकारी  that includes the entire population of a county , or county equivalent .
Some  संचित city-counties  , however , include multiple incorporated places .
This list presents only that portion (  or `` संतुलन  '' ) of such consolidated city-counties that are not a part of another incorporated place .
Note that this list refers only to  the जनसांख्यिकी of व्यक्तिगत municipalities भीतर  their defined limits , which does not include other municipalities or unincorporated suburban areas within urban agglomerations .
A different ranking is evident when considering U.S.  महानगर क्षेत्रफल  populations .

Nintendo DS storage devices are devices used to store a licensed developer 's  work-in-progress बिंब , homebrew वीडियो खेल और डाउनलोड वाणिज्यिक खेल ( चूंकि the निन्टेंडो ds is नहीं  sold with a rewritable storage medium ) .
Licensed  डेवलपर , however , can उपयोग a ब्लू बुद्धिमान  Systems Nitro Emulator box to flash cards .
These devices are  भी ज्ञात as `` flashcarts  '' or `` flashcards '' .
There are two main classes of flashcarts : older devices which  अनुरूप in slot-2 ( the खेल लड़के अग्रिम खेल पाक  slot ) and newer devices that fit in Slot-1 ( the DS Game Card slot ) .
Slot-2 ( or first-generation ) devices have been historically cheaper due to economies of scale ( inherited from their use  साथ खेल लड़के अग्रिम ) , लकिन आवश्यकता a booting औजार  in Slot-1 in order to use the touch screen and other DS features .
Second-generation devices ( those which only use Slot-1 ) do not work with GBA  homebrew , लकिन became कम महंगी और easier to उपयोग , rivaling अनेक slot-2 डिवाइस  in price .
First-generation  डिवाइस शामिल gba फ्लैश कारतूस  , GBAMP CF , SuperCard , and M3 .
Second-generation devices include R4  क्रान्ति , cyclods , g6 रियल और  DS-X .
The storage device either  contains फ्लैश मेमोरी or a स्लॉट  for a memory card to store homebrew .
Storage devices with a memory-card  स्लॉट प्रायः have अधिक भंडार क्षमता than  flash-memory devices .
Although flash-memory capacity is usually measured  in megabits ( mb ) , memory-card  capacity is usually measured in megabytes ( MB ) ( where 8 Mb is 1 MB ) .
Storage-device brands differ in their support  लिये homebrew ; ds और खेल लड़के अग्रिम roms  ; special features ( such as ability to play media files ) ; physical size and cost .
Strictly speaking , a storage device is not  जरुरी लिये ds साथ flashme संस्थापित क्युकी  homebrew can be sent to the DS using WMB .
However , this is not an easily-portable method because the DS needs to be  भीतर दायरा of a उपयुक्त wi-fi  card .
हैं अमरीकी लोगों  of Japanese heritage .
Japanese Americans have historically been among the three largest Asian American  समुदायों , लकिन in हाल दशकों , it रै become the छठे largest समूह at roughly  1,304,286 , including those of mixed-race or mixed-ethnicity .
In the 2010 census , the largest Japanese American communities were found in California with 272,528 , Hawaii with 185,502 , New York with  37,780 , वॉशिंगटन साथ 35,008 , और इलिनोइस साथ  17,542 .
Southern California has the  largest japanese-american  population in North America .

This is a comprehensive listing which highlights significant achievements and milestones based upon Billboard magazine  's singles चार्ट , सबसे notably the बिलबोर्ड hot 100  .
This list spans from the  समस्या दिनाँक जनवरी 1 , 1955 to  present .
The Billboard Hot 100 began with the issue dated August 4 ,  1958 , और is फिलहाल the मानक लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक चार्ट  in the United States .
Prior to the creation of the Hot 100 , Billboard published four singles charts : `` Best Sellers in Stores '' ,  `` सबसे निभाई by jockeys '' , `` सबसे निभाई in jukeboxes '' और ``  The Top 100 '' .
These charts , which ranged  इससे 20 to 100 स्लॉट , यहूद phased आउट  at different times between 1957 and 1958 .
हालांकि technically नहीं भाग of the hot  100 chart history , their data is included for computational purposes , and to avoid unenlightening or misleading characterizations .
All items listed below are from the Hot 100 era ,  जबतक वरना विख्यात ( pre-hot 100  charts ) .
V is an American science fiction television series that ran for two  सीज़न on एबीसी , इससे नवम्बर 3 , 2009 to कूच  15 , 2011 .
A remake of the 1983  miniseries निर्मित by केनेथ जॉनसन , the नई श्रेणी क्रॉनिकल्स the आगमन  on Earth of a technologically advanced alien species which ostensibly comes in peace , but actually has sinister motives .
V stars Morena Baccarin , Lourdes Benedicto , Morris Chestnut ,  जोएल gretsch , लोगन huffman , चार्ल्स mesure , एलिज़ाबेथ मिशेल , लौरा  Vandervoort and Scott Wolf , and was executive produced by Scott Rosenbaum , Yves Simoneau , Scott Peters , and Jace Hall .
The series was produced by The Scott  पीटर्स कम्पनी , hdfilms और warner भाईs. टेलीविज़न  .
Geocaching is an outdoor recreational activity , in which the participants  उपयोग a वैश्विक positioning प्रणाली ( gps ) receiver or मोबाईल यंत्र और अन्य navigational तकनीकों  to hide and seek containers , called `` geocaches '' or `` caches '' , anywhere in the world .
A typical cache is a small waterproof container containing a logbook where the  geocacher enters the तिथि वे मिला it और लक्षण  it with their established code name .
After signing into the log , the cache  जरूर be लगाई वापस exactly जहाँ  the person found it .
Larger containers  ऐसे as प्लास्टिक भंडार containers ( tupperware or समान )  or ammunition boxes can also contain items for trading , usually toys or trinkets of little value .
geocaching साझा  many aspects with benchmarking , trigpointing , orienteering , treasure-hunting , letterboxing , and waymarking .
Boogie Down Productions was a hip  हॉप समूह कि  was originally composed of KRS-One , D-Nice , and DJ Scott La Rock .
DJ Scott La  चट्टान थी murdered on अगस्त 27 , 1987 , महीने  after the release of BDP 's debut album , Criminal Minded .
The name of the group , Boogie Down ,  गर्भाशयी इससे a उपनाम लिये the दक्षिण bronx खण्ड of the bronx ,  one of the five boroughs of New York City .
The group  pioneered the संलयन of डांसहॉल रेगी और हिप हॉप म्यूज़िक और उनके डेब्यू lp  Criminal Minded contained frank descriptions of life in the South Bronx of the late 1980s thus setting the stage for what would eventually become gangsta rap .
a नगरपालिका बंध is a बंध जारी  by a local government , or their agencies .
Potential issuers of municipal bonds include states ,  शहरों , काउंटी , redevelopment एजेंसियों , special-purpose जिले , स्कूल जिले  , public utility districts , publicly owned airports and seaports , and any other governmental entity ( or group of governments ) at or below the state level .
Municipal bonds may be general obligations of the issuer or  secured by निर्दिष्ट revenues  .
In the United States , interest income received by holders of municipal bonds is often exempt from the federal income tax and from the income tax of the state in which they are issued , although  नगरपालिका bonds जारी लिये निश्चित उद्देश्य  may not be tax exempt .
Unlike new issue stocks that are brought to market with price restrictions until the deal is  बेची , नगरपालिका bonds हैं फ़्री to व्यापार at कोई समय एकबार वे  are purchased by the investor .
Professional traders regularly  व्यापार और retrade the वही bonds अनेक  times a week .
`` Gim me Some Lovin ' '' is a song written  by स्टीव winwood , स्पेंसर  Davis and Muff Winwood , and originally performed by The Spencer Davis Group .
The basic riff of the song was borrowed from the Homer  बैंको सोंग `` ( ai n't कि ) a लॉट of प्रेम '' , लिखा  by Banks and Willie Dean `` Deanie '' Parker .
`` Gim me Some Lovin ' '' was a UK  # 2 in the पतझड़ of 1966  and a US # 7 .
The song is ranked # 247 on the Rolling Stone  पत्रिका 's सूची of the 500 महानतम  Songs of All Time .
The version issued in the UK ( and probably most of Europe ) is different from  कि जारी in the us on the संयुक्त कलाकारों  label , being slower , and lacking the backing vocals and `` live sounding '' performance found on the US single .
( The US version has more often  महरूम प्रयुक्त on reissue cds , भी those  coming from Europe . )
The single  सुविधाएँ the ध्वनि of the  Hammond B-3 organ .
The Internet Movie Database ( IMDb ) is an  ऑनलाइन डेटाबेस of सूचना सम्बन्धित to films , टेलीविज़न  programs , and video games .
This includes actors , production crew personnel , and fictional  वर्ण प्रदर्शित in ये तीन विज़ुअल  entertainment media .
It is one of  the सबसे लोकप्रिय ऑनलाइन entertainment गंतव्यों , साथ  over 100 million unique users each month and a solid and rapidly growing mobile presence .
IMDb was  शुभारम्भ on अक्तूबर 17 , 1990 , और in  1998 was acquired by Amazon.com .
As of April 27 , 2013 , IMDb had 2,503,783 titles ( includes episodes )  और 5,192,493 personalities in इसके डेटाबेस , as खूब as 43 लाख  registered users .
The website has an Alexa  रैंक of  48 .
Fibre Channel Host Bus Adapter (  64-bit pci-x कार्ड  )
SCSI  मेजबान बस एडाप्टर  ( 16-bit ISA card )
In computer hardware , a host controller , host adapter , or host bus adapter (  hba ) connects a मेजबान प्रणाली ( the कंप्यूटर  ) to other network and storage devices .
The terms are primarily used to refer to devices for connecting SCSI , Fibre Channel and eSATA  डिवाइस  .
However , devices for connecting to  आईडीई , ईथरनेट , firewire , usb और अन्य  systems may also be called host adapters .
Recently , the advent of iSCSI and Fibre Channel over Ethernet has brought about Ethernet HBAs , which are different from Ethernet NICs  in कि वे शामिल टीसीपी offload इंजन  .
There are also converged  hbas कि support दोनो ईथरनेट और fibre चैनल  called Converged Network Adapters ( CNAs ) .
cashmere  Scarves
Modern men 's  cashmere sweaters  for sale .
Cashmere wool , usually simply known as cashmere , is a fiber  प्राप्त इससे cashmere बकरियों और अन्य प्रकार  of goat .
The word cashmere derives from an  बूढ़ा स्पेलिंग of काश्मीर  .
Cashmere is fine  in बनावट , दमदार  , light , and soft .
garments बना इससे it provide  excellent insulation .
In the United States , under the U.S . Wool Products Labeling Act of 1939 , as amended , ( 15 Uction 68b ( a ) ( 6 ) ) , states  कि a ऊन or वस्त्र उत्पाद may नहीं be labeled as containing cashmere  unless:
such wool product is the  ठीक ( dehaired ) undercoat मछली उत्पादित  by a cashmere goat ( Capra hircus laniger ) ;
the average diameter of the  रेशा of ऐसे ऊन उत्पाद करता  not exceed 19 microns ; and
such wool product does not contain more than 3  प्रतिशत ( by वज़न ) of cashmere मछली  with average diameters that exceed 30 microns .
The  औसत रेशा व्यास may be विषय to a गुणांक  of variation around the mean that shall not exceed 24 percent .
Jennifer Convertibles Inc. is the owner and licensor of sofabed and leather specialty retail stores in the United  राज्य , साथ स्टोर्स स्तिथ throughout the पूर्वी seaboard , in the मिडवेस्ट  , on the West Coast and in the Southwest .
The company  थी संस्थापित in 1975  and is based in Woodbury , New York .
On July 19 , 2010 , the company announced that it had filed for bankruptcy as a  consequence of `` substantial नुकसान  '' .
According to Furniture Today the company was number 48  among फर्नीचर रिटेलर साथ us $ 114 लाख in बिक्री  for the year ending August 29 , 2009 .
It subsequently emerged from  अध्याय 11 अंतर्गत the कंट्रोल of इसके प्रमुख  supplier , the Haining Mengnu Group .
Egg roll is a term used for  अनेक अलग भोजन around the संसार  .
2__Egg_roll __ Varieties of egg rolls are found in mainland China , many Chinese-speaking  regions of एशिया , और चाइनीज अप्रवासी  communities around the world .
Egg rolls as referred  to in चीन .
In Guangdong and Hong Kong , egg roll usually refers to  बिस्किट फेंकें  .
This  is a प्रकार  of biscuit .
the संघटक शामिल  egg , flour and sugar .
Egg roll also is a dish  in कैण्टन और हांग  Kong , this is usually made with vegetable .
Within China egg rolls are eaten predominantly in the southeast and are not as  commonly खपत in the उत्तर और पश्चिमी  parts of China .
In American Chinese cuisine , an egg  फेंकें is a savory डिश typically परोसा  as an appetizer .
It is usually stuffed with chicken , pork  or झींगा , गोभी , गाजर , टमाटर , सेम  sprouts and other vegetables , and then deep fried .
This variety of the egg roll is very common and popular , across even regional  किस्में of अमरीकी चाइनीज खाना , और is प्रायः शामिल as भाग of a `` संयोजन platter  '' .
In Montreal , Canada , open-ended  eggrolls हैं a jewish-chinese  fusion dish .
They can be either  कोषेर certified or  merely kosher style .
Pain  और कष्ट is the विधिक पद लिये the शारीरिक और emotional  stress caused from an injury ( see also pain and suffering ) .
Some damages that might be under this category would be :  aches , अस्थाई और स्थाई सीमाएं on कार्यकलाप , संभावित shortening of जीवन  , depression or scarring .
When filing a lawsuit as a result of an injury , it is common for someone to seek money  दोनो in मुआवजे लिये वास्तविक धन कि  is lost and for the pain and stress associated with virtually any injury .
In a suit , pain and suffering is part of the `` general damages '' section of the claimant 's  अर्जी , or , alternatively , it is an तत्व of `` compensatory '' non-economic क्षतिपूर्ति कि allows रिकवरी लिये the दिमागी anguish and/or  physical pain endured by the claimant as a result of injury for which the plaintiff seeks redress .
Apart from money damages awarded in trial , money damages are also given informally outside the  न्यायिक प्रणाली in mediations , मध्यस्थता ( दोनो of जिससे may be अदालत annexed  or non litigated claims ) as well as in routine insurance settlements .
Individual claimants or those  represented by वकील प्रायः उपस्थित  demands to insurers to settle for money .
These  माँग लिये bodily चोट मुआवजे monies प्रायः नियत  out damages that are similarly used in the court litigated pleadings .
Demands are  प्रायः लिखा summaries of a claimant 's चिकित्सा परवाह  and the facts which resulted in the injury .
Sample of a Medallion signature  गारंटी stampin
the  संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा , a medallion हस्ताक्षर गारंटी is  a special signature guarantee for the transfer of securities .
It is a guarantee by the transferring financial institution that the signature is genuine and the financial  संस्था स्वीकृत देयता लिये कोई जालसाजी .
Signature guarantees protect shareholders by preventing unauthorized transfers and possible  निवेशकों नुकसान  .
They also limit the liability of  the ट्रांसफ़र एजेंट जो स्वीकृत  the certificates .
Different institutions have different policies as to what  प्रकार of पहचान वे आवश्यकता to provide the गारंटी  and whether they charge a fee for such service ( usually nominal if any ) .
Most institutions will not  गारंटी a हस्ताक्षर of किसी जो रै नहीं already  been their customer .
A medallion signature guarantee is not the same as an acknowledgment by a notary public , in the sense that a `` signature guarantee '' is a certification by the institution that the signature is authentic  , और an acknowledgment is a प्रमाणन by a नोटरी पब्लिक attesting कि the signer हस्ताक्षरित  a document voluntarily .
Some banks may no longer provide this service , however , many still do as well as  अन्य वित्तीय संस्थानों ऐसे as  a Savings and Loans and Credit Unions .
At  उनके एकमात्र discretion , ये संस्थानों may  still decline to provide the Medallion Signature Guarantees .
When US citizens are abroad , some  वित्तीय संस्थानों may accept संयुक्त राज्य दूतावास seals  , in place of the Medallion Signature Guarantee Stamp .
प्रशांत इलेक्ट्रिक रेल streetcars stacked  at a junkyard on Terminal Island , Los Angeles County , California , March 1956
The General Motors streetcar conspiracy ( also known as the Great American streetcar scandal ) refers to allegations and convictions in relation to a program  by सामान्य मोटर्स ( gm ) और अन्य कंपनियाँ जो खरीदा और तब dismantled स्ट्रीटकार और इलेक्ट्रिक  train systems in many American cities .
Between 1936 and 1950 , National City Lines and Pacific City Lines —with investment from GM , Firestone Tire , Standard Oil of California , Phillips Petroleum , Mack Trucks , and the Federal Engineering Corporation—bought over 100 electric surface-traction systems in 45  शहरों सहित बाल्टीमोर , न्यूर्क , लॉस एंजिल्स , नई यॉर्क नगर , ओकलैंड और सैन डिएगो और परिवर्तित  them into bus operation .
Several of the companies involved were convicted in 1949  of षड्यंत्र to monopolize  interstate commerce but were acquitted of conspiring to monopolize the ownership of these companies .
Some suggest that this program played a key role in the decline of public transit in cities across the United States ;  notably एडविन J. quinby , जो पहला खींचा ध्यान to the कार्यक्रम in 1946 , और तब  Bradford C. Snell , an anti-trust attorney for the United States Senate whose controversial 1974 testimony to a Senate inquiry brought the issue to national awareness .
Both Quinby and Snell argued that  the deliberate विनाश of streetcars थी  part of a larger strategy to push the United States into automobile dependency .
अन्य कह कि स्वतंत्र आर्थिक कारकों brought परिचय परिवर्तन in the पारगमन प्रणाली , सहित the ग्रेट अवसाद , the पब्लिक यूटिलिटी पकड़कर कम्पनी  Act of 1935 , labor unrest , market forces , rapidly increasing traffic congestion , urban sprawl , taxation policies that favored private vehicle ownership , and general enthusiasm for the automobile .
One writer on the subject has suggested that Snell and others fell  into simplistic षड्यंत्र सिद्धान्त सोच , bordering on paranoid  delusions saying `` Clearly , GM waged a war on electric traction .
It was  बेशक an सब आउट उत्पीड़न , लकिन by no अर्थात्  the single reason for the failure of rapid transit .
Also , it is just as clear that actions  और inactions by सरकारी  contributed significantly to the elimination of electric traction . ''
Only a small handful of U.S. cities have surviving  प्रभावी rail-based शहरी हस्तांतरण  systems based on streetcars or trams , including Newark , Philadelphia , San Francisco , Pittsburgh , and Boston ; others are re-introducing them .
The story has been explored several times in print  , फिल्मी और अन्य मीडिया , notably in जो framed रोजर खरगोश , लिया लिये a सवारी और  The End of Suburbia .
corwin हाउस , सलेम , मैसाचुसेट्स  , built ca . 1660 , First Period English
American colonial architecture includes several building design styles  संबद्ध साथ the औपनिवेशिक काल of the संयुक्त राज्य , सहित पहला काल अंग्रेज़ी ( late-medieval ) ,  French Colonial , Spanish Colonial , Dutch Colonial and Georgian .
These styles are associated  साथ the घरों  , churches and government buildings of the period from about 1600 through the 19th century .
`` In the Mood '' is a big band era # 1 hit  अंकित by अमरीकी bandleader ग्लेन  Miller .
It topped the charts in 1940 in  the u.S. और एक साल बाद थी प्रदर्शित in the  movie Sun Valley Serenade .
in 1999 , नेशनल पब्लिक रेडियो ( npr )  included the 1939 Glenn Miller recording on RCA Bluebird on the NPR 100 , the list of `` The 100 most important American musical works of the 20th century '' .
वरुण लोगो
The NEPTUNE  कनाडा प्रोजेक्ट is the world’s पहला regional-scale भाटे समंदर  observatory that plugs directly into the Internet .
Since December 2009 , it has allowed  लोगों to `` लहरे '' the seafloor जबकि समंदर वैज्ञानिकों चलाएं  deep-water experiments from labs and universities around the world .
Along with its sister project ,  शुक्र , वरुण offers a अद्वितीय  approach to ocean science .
traditionally , समंदर वैज्ञानिकों have relied on infrequent  ship cruises or space-based satellites to carry out their research , while the NEPTUNE project uses a remotely operated crawler .
A gramophone record , commonly known as a phonograph record ( in American English ) , vinyl record ( in reference to vinyl , the  सामग्री सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त बाद परिचय 1950 ) , or colloquially  , `` a record '' , is an analog sound storage medium consisting of a flat disc with an inscribed , modulated spiral groove .
The groove usually starts  निकट the periphery और ends निकट the बीच  of the disc .
Phonograph records are generally described by their diameter in inches ( 12-inch , 10-inch , 7-inch , etc . ) , the rotational speed at which they  हैं निभाई ( `` 33 आरपीएम `` , `` 78 '' , `` 45 '' , इत्यादि . ) , उनके समय क्षमता ( `` long playing '' ) , उनके reproductive सटीकता , or `` वफ़ादारी  `` ( `` high fidelity '' , `` Orthophonic '' , `` full-range '' , etc . ) , and the number of channels of audio provided ( `` mono `` , `` stereo `` , `` quadraphonic `` , etc . ) .
Phonograph records were the primary medium used for music  जनन लिये सबसे of the 20th सदी , replacing the फोनोग्राफ बेलन ,  with which it had co-existed , by the 1920s .
By the late 1980s , digital media had gained a  larger मार्केट share , और the विनाइल रिकार्ड बाएँ the मुख्यधारा  in 1991 .
They  continue to be manufactured और  sold in the 21st century .
In 2008 , nearly 2.9 million units shipped , the most in any year  चूंकि 1998 और the स्वरूप रै जारी to धीरे  regain popularity .
They are  विशेषकर प्रयुक्त by djs और audiophiles लिये अनेक  types of music .
As of 2013 , vinyl records continue  to be प्रयुक्त लिये वितरण  .
