An Inner  मंगोलियाई घासभूमि  in the People 's Republic of China
Grasslands are  क्षेत्रों जहाँ the वनस्पति is वर्चस्व by grasses ( पोएसी ) , however sedge  ( Cyperaceae ) and rush ( Juncaceae ) families can also be found .
Grasslands occur  naturally on सब महाद्वीपों मगर  Antarctica .
In temperate  latitudes , ऐसे as northwestern यूरोपीय और the ग्रेट मैदान और कैलिफ़ोर्निया in उत्तर अमेरिका , देशी  grasslands are dominated by perennial bunch grass species , whereas in warmer climates annual species form a greater component of the vegetation .
Grasslands  हैं मिला in सबसे ecoregions  of the Earth .
For example there are five terrestrial ecoregion classifications ( subdivisions ) of the temperate grasslands , savannas , and shrublands biome  ( ' ecosystem ' ) , जिससे is एक of आठ स्थलीय ecozones  of the Earth 's surface .
Henna ( Lawsonia inermis  , भी पुकारा हिना पेड़ ) or हिना is a flowering संयंत्र , the  sole species in the genus Lawsonia in the family Lythraceae .
The English name `` henna  '' आता इससे the अरबी ( ala-lc : ḥinnāʾ /  pronounced ) or colloquially , loosely pronounced .
The name is  भी प्रयुक्त लिये डाई preparations  derived from the plant , and for the art of temporary tattooing based on those dyes .
Henna has been  प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्राचीनता to डाई स्किन , बाल  , and fingernails , as well as fabrics including Silk , wool and leather .
Additionally , the name is misused for other skin and hair  dyes , ऐसे as ब्लैक हिना or न्यूट्रल हिना , जिससे हैं नहीं निकला  from the plant .
A thin film is a  परत of सामग्री ranging इससे भिन्नों of  a nanometer ( monolayer ) to several micrometers in thickness .
Electronic semiconductor devices and optical coatings are the main  अनुप्रयोग लाभकारी  from thin-film construction .
A familiar application of thin films is the  household दर्पण , जिससे typically रै a पतला मेटल कोटिंग on the वापस  of a sheet of glass to form a reflective interface .
The process of  silvering थी एकबार commonly प्रयुक्त to  produce mirrors .
A very-thin-film coating ( less than a nanometer thick  ) is प्रयुक्त to उपज two-way  mirrors .
The performance of optical coatings ( e.g . antireflective , or AR , coatings ) are  typically उन्नत जब the thin-film कोटिंग consists of अनेक परतों having varying thicknesses  and refractive indices .
Similarly , a periodic structure of alternating thin films of  अलग सामग्री may collectively रूप a so-called superlattice  which exploits the phenomenon of quantum confinement by restricting electronic phenomena to two-dimensions .
Work is being done with ferromagnetic and ferroelectric thin films for use as  कंप्यूटर मेमोरी  .
It is also being applied to  दवाएँ  , via thin-film drug delivery .
Thin-films are used  to उपज thin-film बैटरी  .
Thin  films हैं  also used in dye-sensitized solar cells .
Ceramic  पतला films  are in wide use .
The relatively high  कठोरता और inertness of सिरेमिक सामग्री मेक इस प्रकार of पतला कोटिंग of ब्याज लिये सुरक्षा  of substrate materials against corrosion , oxidation and wear .
In particular , the use of such coatings on cutting tools can extend  the जीवन of ये वस्तुएं by अनेक आदेश  of magnitude .
Research is being done on a new class of  thin-film अकार्बनिक ऑक्साइड सामग्री , पुकारा amorphous heavy-metal cation multicomponent आक्साइड  , which could be used to make transparent transistors that are inexpensive , stable , and environmentally benign .
Gears of War is a military science fiction third-person  शूटर वीडियो खेल विकसित by एपिक खेल  and published by Microsoft Game Studios .
It was initially released as an exclusive title for the Xbox 360 in November 2005  in उत्तर अमेरिका , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , और सबसे of यूरोपीय और शामिल a `` सीमित  Collector 's Edition '' with added content and an art book titled Destroyed Beauty that detailed much of the game 's back-story .
Despite the initial statements of Xbox 360 exclusivity , a Microsoft Windows version of the game was developed in conjunction  साथ लोगों can मक्खी और released a साल बाद , featuring नई सामग्री सहित अतिरिक्त  campaign levels , a new multiplayer game mode , and Games for Windows Live functionality .
The  खेल focuses on the सैनिकों of डेल्टा स्क्वाड as वे wield a हताश , last-ditch attempt to सहेजें the बाकी  human inhabitants of the fictional planet Sera from a relentless and seemingly unstoppable subterranean enemy known as the Locust Horde .
The player assumes the role of Marcus Fenix ( but can also play as Dominic Santiago ) , a  पूर्व कैदी और war-hardened  soldier .
The game is based on the use of cover and strategic fire for the player to advance through the scenarios ; a second player  can खेल cooperatively through  the main campaign to assist .
The game also  सुविधाएँ अनेक  online multiplayer game modes for up to eight players .
Gears of War sold over three million copies in just ten weeks and was  the fastest-selling वीडियो खेल of 2005 as खूब as the  second-most played game over Xbox Live during .
It currently stands as the 5th best  selling एक्सबॉक्स 360 खेल of  all time .
The  खेल रै चूंकि बेची over  five million copies by September 2008 .
The game was well received by critics , who praised its  gameplay और विस्तृत visuals , और it जीती अनेक  `` Game of the Year '' awards in 2006 .
The success of the game has led to the development of the Gears of War  मताधिकार , सहित the 2008 sequel गियर्स of युद्ध 2 और इसके follow-up , गियर्स of युद्ध 3 , जिससे थी released on सितंबर 20 , 2011 , बाद  having initially been set to have been released on April 5 , 2011 , the date upon which Epic Games ' Cliff Bleszinski was a guest on Late Night with Jimmy Fallon .
Adaptations to books , comics , as  खूब as a विशेषता फिल्मी हैं to  be expected .
A Tree Grows in Brooklyn is a 1943  अनोखा लिखा by बेट्टी स्मिथ .
The story  focuses on an irish-american परिवार  in Williamsburg , Brooklyn , New York City .
The novel is set  in the पहला और दूसरी  decades of the 20th century .
The book was an  immense कामयाबी  .
The main metaphor of the book is  the हार्डी पेड़ of स्वर्ग , देशी to चीन और  Taiwan , now considered invasive , and common in the vacant lots of New York City .
World map with the  intertropical मण्डल  highlighted in red .
Tropical  जलवायु zones of the धरती जहाँ  all twelve months have mean temperatures above 18 °C ( 64 °F ) .
The tropics is a region of  the धरती surrounding the equator  .
It is limited in latitude by the Tropic of Cancer in the northern  गोलार्ध at लगभग n और the tropic of मकर in the दक्षिणी  hemisphere at S ; these latitudes correspond to the axial tilt of the Earth .
The  ऊष्णकटिबन्ध हैं भी referred to as the तीव्र  zone and the torrid zone ( see geographical zone ) .
The tropics include all the  क्षेत्रों on the धरती जहाँ the सूर्य पहुँच  a point directly overhead at least once during the solar year .
The tropics are distinguished from the other climatic and biomatic regions of  धरती , the मध्य latitudes और the ध्रुवीय regions on either  side of the equatorial zone .
For the INXS song ,  देखिए कया तुम need ( सोंग  ) .
`` What You Need '' is  an एपीसोड of the अमरीकी टेलीविज़न  anthology series The Twilight Zone .
It is based on the short story of the same name by Lewis  padgett ( हेनरी kuttner और C. L. मूर  ) .
PlayhouseSquare  , in the क्लीवलैंड थिएटर ज़िला in शहर  Cleveland , Ohio , is the second-largest theater complex in the United States , second only to New York City 's Lincoln Center ) .
Constructed in a span of 19 months in the early 1920s , the  थिएटर यहूद subsequently बंद bas , लकिन यहूद revived through a grassroots प्रयत्न  .
Their renovation and reopening helped usher in a new era of  शहर पुनरोद्धार in क्लीवलैंड , और थी पुकारा `` एक of the शीर्ष  ten successes in Cleveland history . ''
The driver  और यात्री सामने airbags  , after having been deployed , in a British Peugeot 306 car .
An airbag is  a गाडी सुरक्षा  device .
It is an occupant restraint system consisting of a flexible fabric envelope or cushion designed to  inflate rapidly दौरान an ऑटोमोबाइल  collision .
Its purpose is to cushion occupants during a crash and provide protection to their  लाशें जब वे स्ट्राइक आंतरिक वस्तुएँ ऐसे as the परिचालन व्हील or a खिड़की .
Modern vehicles may contain multiple airbag modules in various side and frontal locations of the passenger  seating स्थितियाँ , और सेंसर may तैनात एक or अधिक airbags in an प्रभाव मण्डल at परिवर्तनीय दरों आधारित  on the type , angle and severity of impact ; the airbag is designed to only inflate in moderate to severe frontal crashes .
Airbags  हैं सामान्यतः designed साथ the इरादे of supplementing  the protection of an occupant who is correctly restrained with a seatbelt .
Most designs are inflated  through pyrotechnic अर्थात्  and can only be operated once .
Newer side-impact airbag modules consist of compressed air cylinders that are  triggered in the इवेंट of a पक्ष प्रभाव गाडी  impact .
The first commercial designs were introduced in  यात्री ऑटोमोबाइल दौरान the 1970s  with limited success .
Broad commercial adoption of airbags occurred in many markets during the late 1980s and early 1990s with a  ड्राइवर एयरबैग , और a सामने यात्री एयरबैग as खूब on कुछ गाड़ियाँ  ; and many modern vehicles now include four or more units .
IRS tax forms are used for taxpayers and  tax-exempt संगठन to रपट वित्तीय सूचना  to the Internal Revenue Service ( IRS ) of the United States .
वे हैं प्रयुक्त to रपट आय , गणना कर to be सशुल्क to the संघीय  government of the United States , and disclose other information as required by the Internal Revenue Code ( IRC ) .
वहीँ हैं over 800 विभिन्न  forms and schedules .
The best-known of these is Form 1040  प्रयुक्त by individuals  .
In the United States , driver 's licenses are  जारी by प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत राज्य ( सहित वॉशिंगटन , d.C.  and territories ) , rather than the federal government because of the political concept of federalism .
Drivers are normally required to obtain a license from their state of residence and all  राज्य recognize प्रत्येक अन्य 's पंक्तियां लिये अस्थाई विज़िटर  subject to normal age requirements .
A state may also suspend an individual 's  ड्राइविंग विशेषाधिकार भीतर इसके सीमायें  for traffic violations .
Many  राज्य share a आम प्रणाली of अनुज्ञा  classes , with some exceptions , and commercial license classes are standardized by federal regulation at 49 CFR part 383 .
चीन रै महरूम the सोर्स of अनेक आविष्कारों , सहित the  Four Great Inventions : papermaking , the compass , gunpowder , and printing ( both woodblock and movable type ) .
The list below  contains ये और अन्य आविष्कारों  .
The Chinese invented technologies involving mechanics , hydraulics , and mathematics applied to  horology , metallurgy , खगोलशास्त्र , कृषि , अभियान्त्रिकी , म्यूज़िक सिद्धान्त  , craftsmanship , nautics , and warfare .
By the Warring States Period ( 403–221 BC ) , they had advanced  metallurgic प्रौद्योगिकी , सहित the धमाका भट्टी और cupola भट्टी  , while the finery forge and puddling process were known by the Han Dynasty ( 202 BC – AD 220 ) .
A sophisticated economic system  in चीन दिया जनम to आविष्कारों ऐसे  as paper money during the Song Dynasty ( 960–1279 ) .
The invention of gunpowder by the 10th century led to an array of inventions such as the fire lance , land mine , naval mine , hand cannon ,  exploding गोलों , multistage प्रक्षेपास्त्र , और प्रक्षेपास्त्र  bombs with aerodynamic wings and explosive payloads .
With the navigational aid of  the 11th-century कम्पास और क्षमता to steer at ऊँची समुद्र साथ  the 1st-century sternpost rudder , premodern Chinese sailors sailed as far as East Africa and Egypt .
In water-powered clockworks , the premodern Chinese had used the escapement mechanism since the 8th century and the endless power-transmitting chain  ड्राइव in the 11th सदी  .
They also made large mechanical puppet theaters  चलित by waterwheels और carriage पहियों  and wine-serving automatons driven by paddle wheel boats .
The contemporaneous Peiligang and Pengtoushan cultures represent the  oldest पाषाणकालीन संस्कृतियों of चीन और यहूद formed around  7000 BC .
Some of the first inventions of Neolithic , prehistoric China include semilunar and rectangular stone knives , stone hoes and spades , the cultivation of millet , rice and the soybean  , the refinement of sericulture , the भवन of rammed धरती structures साथ लाइम -plastered हाउस floors , the सृष्टि of the कुम्हार 's व्हील , the सृष्टि of pottery साथ  cord-mat-basket designs , the creation of pottery tripods and pottery steamers , and the development of ceremonial vessels and scapulimancy for purposes of divination .
Francesca Bray argues that the domestication of the ox and buffalo  दौरान the longshan संस्कृति ( c. 3000–c . 2000 bc ) काल , the अनुपस्थिति of longshan-era सिंचाई or high-yield फसलों , पूरा प्रमाण of longshan cultivation  of dry-land cereal crops which gave high yields `` only when the soil was carefully cultivated , '' suggest that the plow was known at least by the Longshan culture period and explains the high agricultural production yields which allowed the rise of Chinese civilization during the Shang Dynasty ( c. 1600–c . 1050 BC ) .
With later inventions such as the multiple-tube seed drill and heavy moldboard iron  हल , चीन 's agricultural आउटपुट could sustain a much larger जनसांख्यिकी  .
For the purposes of this list , inventions are regarded as technological firsts developed in China , and as such does not include foreign technologies which the Chinese  acquired through सम्पर्क , ऐसे as the पवनचक्की इससे the मध्य ईस्ट or the दूरदर्शी इससे जल्दी आधुनिक यूरोपीय  .
It also does not include technologies developed elsewhere and later invented  separately by the चाइनीज  , such as the odometer and chain pump .
Scientific , mathematic or  प्राकृतिक discoveries , परिवर्तन in नाबालिग अवधारणाओं of डिज़ाइन or स्टाइल और  artistic innovations can not be regarded as inventions and do not appear on the list .
Gross domestic product in 2011 US dollars per capita , adjusted for inflation and purchasing power parity ( log scale ) from  1860 to 2011 , साथ जनसांख्यिकी ( डिस्क क्षेत्रफल ) लिये the us ( पीला ) , uk ( नारंगी ) , जापानी ( रेड ) , चीन  ( red ) , and India ( blue ) .
Globalization ( or globalisation—see spelling differences ) is the process of international integration arising from the  इंटरचेंज of संसार दृश्य , उत्पाद , विचार , और अन्य पहलुओं of  culture .
Put in simple terms , globalization refers to processes that  प्रचार world-wide exchanges  of national and cultural resources .
Advances in transportation and  दूरसंचार अवसंरचना , सहित the वृद्धि of the अंतरजाल , हैं प्रमुख कारकों in वैश्वीकरण  , generating further interdependence of economic and cultural activities .
हालांकि अनेक विद्वानों प्लेस the origins of वैश्वीकरण  in modern times , others trace its history long before the European age of discovery and voyages to the New World .
Some even trace the origins to the third  मिलेनियम bce  .
Since the beginning of the 20th century , the pace of globalization has intensified at  a रैपिड रेट , विशेषकर दौरान the पोस्ट ठंडा युद्ध  era .
The term  वैश्वीकरण रै महरूम  in increasing use since the mid-1980s and especially since the mid-1990s .
In 2000 , the International Monetary Fund ( IMF ) identified four basic aspects of  वैश्वीकरण : व्यापार और ट्रांजेक्शन , पूंजी और निवेश  movements , migration and movement of people and the dissemination of knowledge .
Further , environmental challenges such as climate change , cross-boundary water  और एयर प्रदूषण , और over-fishing of the समंदर  are linked with globalization .
Globalizing processes affect and are affected by business  और कार्य संगठन , अर्थशास्त्र , socio-cultural संसाधन  , and the natural environment .
The  replacements is a 2000 अमरीकी  sports comedy film directed by Howard Deutch .
It stars  कियानू रीव्स , जीन  Hackman , and Brooke Langton .
An American Airlines  वायुयान takes बंद इससे dallas/fort  Worth International Airport .
This airport is the  एयरलाइन 's largest  hub .
American Airlines flies to 79 domestic  गंतव्यों और 78 अंतरराष्ट्रीय गंतव्यों  in 48 countries .
( as  of December 2012 )
The list includes the city , country , the codes of the International Air Transport Association ( IATA airport code ) and  the अंतरराष्ट्रीय सिविल विमानन संगठन ( icao विमानक्षेत्र कोड ) , और the विमानक्षेत्र 's नाम  , with the airline 's hubs , focus cities and seasonal destinations marked .
The list also contains  गंतव्यों no longer परोसा by the  airline , which are marked as terminated destinations .
It does not include destinations served for American  एयरलाइंस by इसके क्षेत्रीय affiliates अमरीकी त्रिभुज  Airlines , Executive Airlines , and AmericanConnection .
`` Day-O ( The Banana  नाव सोंग ) '' is a परंपरागत jamaican mento लोक सोंग , the best-known संस्करण of जिससे  was sung by Harry Belafonte and an alternate version interspersed with another Jamaican folksong , Hill and Gully Rider , by Dame Shirley Bassey .
Despite the song 's mento influences , `` Day-O ( The Banana Boat  सोंग ) '' is widely  known as an example of calypso music .
It is a work song ,  इससे the पाइंट of दृश्य of डॉक  workers working the night shift loading bananas onto ships .
daylight रै आइये , the शिफ़्ट is over  and they want their work to be counted up so that they can go home .
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in Europe that  began on 28 जुलाई 1914 और lasted जबतक  11 November 1918 .
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from its  occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939 ,  and the First World War or World War I thereafter .
It involved all the world 's great powers , which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom , France  और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल गठबंधन of जर्मनी , austria-hungary और इटली ; लकिन , as austria–hungary था लिया the अप्रिय विरूद्ध  the agreement , Italy did not enter into the war ) .
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : Italy , Japan and  the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies , और the  Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
Ultimately ,  अधिक than 70 लाख सैन्य कर्मियों ,  including 60 million Europeans , were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history .
More than 9 million combatants were killed ,  largely क्युकी of technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases in the lethality  of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility .
It was the fifth- deadliest  विरोध in संसार इतिहास , subsequently paving the रास्ता  for various political changes , such as revolutions in many of the nations involved .
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign  नीतियों of the ग्रेट शक्तियां  of Europe .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to the throne of  austria-hungary , on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक संकट  when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia .
Several alliances formed over the  पिछला दशकों यहूद invoked  .
Within weeks , the major  शक्तियां यहूद at युद्ध और , via उनके colonies  , the conflict soon spread around the world .
On 28 July , the  austro-hungarians fired the पहला गोलियाँ of the  war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans invaded  न्यूट्रल बेल्जियम और ध्वज on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस , providing a casus  belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany .
After the German march  on पेरिस थी brought to a halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the marne —the पश्चिमी सामने  settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench line that changed little until 1917 .
On the Eastern Front , the Russian army was successful against  the austro-hungarians , लकिन थी रोका in इसके आक्रमण of  East Prussia by the Germans .
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the war , opening up  fronts in the काकेशस , मेसोपोटामिया और the sinai  .
Italy and Bulgaria went to war in 1915 and  रोमानिया in 1916  .
In  रूस , the त्सार 's सरकारी collapsed in कूच 1917  and a subsequent revolution in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers .
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front , the  allies drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी of कामयाब  offensives and American forces began entering the trenches .
Germany , which had its own trouble  साथ क्रांतिकारियों , सहमत to an  armistice on 11 November 1918 .
The war  ended in विजय लिये  the Allies .
Events on the home fronts were as  उग्र as on the बैटल fronts  , as the participants tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war .
By the end of the war , four major imperial powers—the German ,  रूसी , austro-hungarian और उस्मानी empires—ceased  to exist .
The successor states of the former two lost a great  राशि of territory , जबकि the latter दो यहूद dismantled  entirely .
The map of central Europe  थी redrawn into अनेक  smaller states .
The League of Nations was formed in  the आशा of preventing another  such conflict .
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires , the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors  contributing to संसार युद्ध  II .
Nurse Jackie is an American series that premiered on June 8  , 2009 , on showtime ,  Movie Central and The Movie Network .
The series stars Edie Falco as the title character Jackie Peyton ,  an आपात विभाग नर्स at सब संतो ' हॉस्पिटल in  New York City .
For Jackie , `` Every day is a high wire act of juggling  मरीजों , डॉक्टर , fellow नर्स और उसके अपना  indiscretions . ''
Keeping Up with the Kardashians ( often referred to simply as The Kardashians ) is an  अमरीकी वास्तविकता  television series that premiered on October 14 , 2007 , on E ! .
It follows the lives of the  kardashian/jenner परिवार , सहित बहनों  Kourtney , Kim , and Khloé Kardashian .
The series ' success has led to the spin-offs Kourtney and Kim Take New York , Khloé & Lamar , Kourtney and Khloé Take Miami  , और कोर्टनी और किम लो मियामी  .
Afghanistan ( ; ; ) , officially the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan , is a  landlocked sovereign राज्य forming भाग of दक्षिण एशिया , सेंट्रल एशिया  , and to some extent Western Asia .
It has a population of around 30 million inhabiting an area of  लगभग , बनाना it the 42nd सबसे populous और 41st largest स्वदेश  in the world .
It is bordered  by पाकिस्तानी in the दक्षिण और  the east , Iran in the west , Turkmenistan , Uzbekistan and Tajikistan in the north , and China in the far northeast .
Afghanistan has been an ancient  फोकल पाइंट of the रेशा सड़क  and human migration .
archaeologists have मिला प्रमाण of इंसान  habitation from as far back as the Middle Paleolithic .
Urban civilization may have begun in  the क्षेत्रफल as जल्दी  as 3,000 to 2,000 BCE .
Sitting at an important  geostrategic स्थान कि connects the मध्य ईस्ट संस्कृति साथ सेंट्रल एशिया और the भारतीय उपमहाद्वीप , the जमीन रै महरूम घर to  various peoples through the ages and witnessed many military campaigns , notably by Alexander the Great , Genghis Khan , and in modern era Western forces .
The land also served as a source from which the Greco-Bactrians , Kushans , Hephthalites  , saffarids , ghaznavids , ghorids , khiljis , timurids , मुगलों  , Durranis , and others have risen to form major empires .
The political history of the modern  राज्य of अफगानिस्तान begins in 1709 , जब the hotaki  dynasty was established in Kandahar followed by Ahmad Shah Durrani 's rise to power in 1747 .
In the late 19th century , Afghanistan became a buffer  राज्य in the `` ग्रेट खेल `` between  the British and Russian empires .
Following the 1919 Anglo-Afghan War , King Amanullah began a European style  modernization of the देश लकिन थी रोका by the  ultra-conservatives .
During the Cold War , after the withdrawal of the British from  neighboring इण्डिया in 1947 , the संयुक्त राज्य और the सोवियत संघ began spreading प्रभाव in अफगानिस्तान , जिससे led to a खूनी युद्ध  between the US-backed mujahideen forces and the Soviet-backed Afghan government in which over a million Afghans lost their lives .
This was followed  by the 1990s सिविल युद्ध , the वृद्धि और पतन of the  extremist Taliban government and the 2001–present war .
In December 2001 ,  the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा परिषद प्राधिकृत the सृष्टि of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Security Assistance Force ( ISAF ) to help maintain security in Afghanistan and assist the Karzai administration .
Three decades of war made Afghanistan  एक of the संसार 's सबसे खतरनाक देशों  , including the largest producer of refugees and asylum seekers .
While the international community is rebuilding war-torn Afghanistan , terrorist groups such as the Haqqani Network and Hezbi Islami are actively involved in a  देशभर तालिबान -led उग्रवाद , जिससे शामिल सैंकड़ों of assassinations और आत्महत्या  attacks .
According to the United Nations , the insurgents were responsible for 80 % of  civilian हताहत in 2011  and 2012 .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and  अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि घोषित उनके secession और formed the confederate राज्य of अमेरिका ( the `` confederacy  '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery , especially the  एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the पश्चिमी territories .
Foreign  शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene  .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and  नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना , the  Confederacy collapsed , slavery was abolished , and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election ,  republicans , led by अब्राहम lincoln , opposed expanding  slavery into United States ' territories .
Lincoln  जीती , लकिन पहले उसके उद्घाटन  on March 4 , 1861 , seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing  लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans  rejected secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his  प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate  civil war .
Eight remaining slave  राज्य जारी to  reject calls for secession .
Confederate forces seized  numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory  claimed by the Confederacy .
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise , and  दोनो पहलू prepared लिये युद्ध .
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would  intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना  the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 , when  confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट sumter , a कुंजी  fort held by Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for  प्रत्येक राज्य to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन  , four more slave states joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union  जल्द नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य  and established a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy .
The Eastern Theater was  inconclusive  in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland  ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate  retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation  उदघोषणा , जिससे बना  ending slavery a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the  confederate नदी नेवी , तब much of उनके पश्चिमी  armies , and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 ,  रॉबर्ट E. ली 's confederate incursion उत्तर  ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant  कमांड of सब संघ  armies in 1864 .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched  to the समुद्र , destroying confederate अवसंरचना  along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions , and  could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the  Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed , leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at  appomattox अदालत हाउस on अप्रैल 9  , 1865 .
The American Civil War was one of the  earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक  wars .
Railroads , the telegraph ,  steamships , और mass-produced  weapons were employed extensively .
The mobilization  of civilian कारखानों , खानों  , shipyards , banks , transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I .
It remains the deadliest war in American history  , resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000  soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death  टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो  old , and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
Cost of goods sold ( COGS ) refer to  the inventory लागत of those goods a कारोबार  has sold during a particular period .
Costs are associated with particular goods using one of several formulas  , सहित विशिष्ट पहचान , first-in first-out  ( FIFO ) , or average cost .
Costs include all costs of purchase , costs of conversion and other costs  incurred in bringing the inventories to उनके उपस्थित स्थान और  condition .
Costs of goods made by the business  शामिल सामग्री , मजदूर  , and allocated overhead .
The costs of those goods not yet sold are deferred as  लागत of inventory जबतक the inventory is बेची or लिखा  down in value .
freak lunchbox कैंडी स्टोर  in Halifax , Nova Scotia
A confectionery store ( more commonly referred to as a sweet shop in the United Kingdom , a candy store in the North America , or a lolly shop  in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ) बिकता confectionery और is प्रायः  targeted to children .
Most confectionery stores are  भर साथ an assortment of मिठाई दूर larger than  a grocer or convenience store could accommodate .
They often offer a selection of  बूढ़ा fashioned ट्रीट , और मिठाई इससे  different countries .
Very often unchanged in  लेआउट चूंकि उनके inception  , confectioneries are known for their warming and nostalgic feel .
The village of Pateley Bridge claims  to have the oldest confectionery  store in England .
The oldest sweet shop in England  , in the गाँव of pateley सेतु
Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee :  uukuhuúwa , cay : gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a राज्य  located in West South Central United States .
Oklahoma is  the 20th सबसे extensive और  the 28th most populous of the 50 United States .
The state 's name is derived  इससे the choctaw शब्द okla और humma , अर्थ `` रेड लोगों '' ,  and it is known informally by its nickname , The Sooner State .
Formed by the combination of Oklahoma Territory and Indian Territory  on नवम्बर 16 , 1907 , ओक्लाहोमा थी the 46th राज्य to  enter the union .
Its  निवासियों हैं ज्ञात as oklahomans or , informally `` okies  '' , and its capital and largest city is Oklahoma City .
A major producer of natural gas , oil , and agriculture ,  ओक्लाहोमा relies on an आर्थिक आधार of  aviation , energy , telecommunications , and biotechnology .
It has one of the fastest growing economies in the nation , ranking among  the शीर्ष राज्य in प्रति capita आय विकास और सकल घरेलू  product growth .
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's primary economic anchors , with nearly two  तिहाई of oklahomans जीना भीतर उनके महानगर  statistical areas .
साथ छोटी पहाड़ सीमाएँ , प्रेयरी , mesas , और पूर्वी  forests , most of Oklahoma lies in the Great Plains and the U.S . Interior Highlands —a region especially prone to severe weather .
In addition to having  a व्यापकता of अंग्रेज़ी , जर्मनी , स्कॉटिश , आयरिश और देशी अमरीकी  ancestry , more than 25 Native American languages are spoken in Oklahoma , second only to California .
Oklahoma is located on a confluence of  तीन प्रमुख अमरीकी सांस्कृतिक regions और historically परोसा as a रूट लिये चौपायों  drives , a destination for southern settlers , and a government-sanctioned territory for Native Americans .
stacked और खड़ा  car tires
A tire ( or tyre ) is a ring-shaped covering that  fits around a व्हील 's रिम to protect it और  enable better vehicle performance .
Most tires ,  ऐसे as those लिये ऑटोमोबाइल और साइकिल , provide कर्षण between  the vehicle and the road while providing a flexible cushion that absorbs shock .
The materials of modern  न्यूमेटिक टायर हैं सिंथेटिक रबर , प्राकृतिक रबर , कपड़ा  and wire , along with carbon black and other chemical compounds .
They  consist of a tread  and a body .
The tread provides traction while the body  provides containment लिये a मात्रा of  compressed air .
पहले रबर थी विकसित , the पहला संस्करण of  tires were simply bands of metal that fitted around wooden wheels to prevent wear and tear .
Early rubber tires  यहूद ठोस ( नहीं  pneumatic ) .
Today , the majority of tires are pneumatic inflatable structures , comprising a doughnut-shaped body of cords and  wires encased in रबर और generally भर साथ संपीडित एयर  to form an inflatable cushion .
Pneumatic tires are used on many types of  वाहनों , सहित गाड़ियाँ , साइकिल , मोटरसाइकिल , ट्रक ,  earthmovers , and aircraft .
Metal tires are still used on locomotives and railcars , and solid rubber ( or other  पॉलिमर ) टायर हैं स्टिल प्रयुक्त in विभिन्न non-automotive अनुप्रयोग , ऐसे as कुछ  casters , carts , lawnmowers , and wheelbarrows .
Dr. Joseph Warren ( June 11 , 1741 – June 17 , 1775 ) was an American doctor who played a leading role in American Patriot organizations in Boston in early days of the American Revolution ,  आखिरकार सेवारत as अध्यक्ष of the क्रांतिकारी मैसाचुसेट्स  Provincial Congress .
Warren enlisted Paul Revere and William Dawes on April 18 , 1775 , to leave Boston and spread the alarm that the  अंग्रेजों गैरीसन in बोस्टन थी सेटिंग आउट to रेड the  town of Concord and arrest rebel leaders John Hancock and Samuel Adams .
Warren  participated in the अगला दिन 's लड़ाइयों of lexington और concord  , which are commonly considered to be the opening engagements of the American Revolutionary War .
Warren had been  commissioned a प्रमुख सामान्य in the उपनिवेश 's मिलिशिया shortly  before the June 17 , 1775 Battle of Bunker Hill .
Rather than exercising his rank , Warren served in the battle as a private soldier , and  थी मारे in कॉम्बैट जब अंग्रेजों सैनिकों stormed the redoubt  atop Breed 's Hill .
His death , immortalized in John Trumbull 's painting , The Death of General Warren at the Battle of Bunker 's Hill , June 17 , 1775 , galvanized  the विद्रोही शक्तियां , और he रै महरूम स्मरणीय in अनेक प्लेस  names in the United States .
STM image  of self-assembled supramolecular जंजीरों of  the organic semiconductor Quinacridone on Graphite .
An organic semiconductor is an organic material with semiconductor  गुण , कि is , साथ an विद्युत चालकता between  that of insulators and that of metals .
सिंगल अणुओं , छोटी कड़ी  ( oligomers ) and organic polymers can be semiconductive .
Semiconducting small  अणुओं ( खुशबूदार hydrocarbons ) शामिल the polycyclic खुशबूदार  compounds pentacene , anthracene , and rubrene .
Polymeric organic  semiconductors शामिल बहु ( 3-hexylthiophene  ) , poly ( p-phenylene vinylene ) , as well as polyacetylene and its derivatives .
There are two major overlapping classes  of सशुल्क semiconductors  .
These are organic charge-transfer complexes and various  linear-backbone conductive polymers निकला इससे polyacetylene  .
Linear backbone organic  semiconductors शामिल polyacetylene itself और इसके डेरिवेटिव  polypyrrole , and polyaniline .
At least locally ,  charge-transfer देवालय  often exhibit similar conduction mechanisms to inorganic semiconductors .
Such mechanisms arise from  the उपस्थिति of छेद और इलेक्ट्रॉन conduction  layers separated by a band gap .
While such classic mechanisms are important  locally , as साथ अकार्बनिक amorphous semiconductors , tunnelling , स्थानीयकृत राज्य , गतिशीलता  gaps , and phonon -assisted hopping also significantly contribute to conduction , particularly in polyacetylenes .
Like inorganic semiconductors ,  सशुल्क semiconductors  can be doped .
Organic semiconductors susceptible to doping  ऐसे as polyaniline ( ormecon  ) and are also known as organic metals .
Typical current carriers in organic  semiconductors हैं छेद  and electrons in π-bonds .
Almost all organic  solids हैं insulators  .
But when their constituent molecules have π-conjugate systems , electrons can move via π-electron  बादल overlaps , विशेषकर by hopping  , tunnelling and related mechanisms .
Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons and phthalocyanine  नमक crystals हैं उदाहरण of इस  type of organic semiconductor .
Mainly due to low mobility , even unpaired electrons  may be stable in charge-transfer  complexes .
ऐसे unpaired  electrons can function as current carriers .
This type of  सेमीकंडक्टर is भी प्राप्त by pairing  an electron donor molecule with an electron acceptor molecule .
Female  स्खलन is the expulsion of द्रव by इंसान  females from the paraurethral ducts through and around the female urethra during or before an orgasm .
It is also known colloquially as gushing or  squirting , हालांकि ये हैं माना to be अलग  phenomena in some research publications .
The exact source and nature of the fluid continue to be a topic of debate among  चिकित्सा पेशेवर , जिससे is भी सम्बन्धित to संदेह over the अस्तित्व  of the G-Spot .
The FIFA Women  's संसार कप is an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ फ़ुटबॉल प्रतियोगिता लडे by the वरिष्ठ महिलाओं  's national teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ) , the sport 's global governing body .
The championship has been  awarded प्रत्येक चार सालो चूंकि  the inaugural tournament in 1991 .
जापानी जीती the 2011 टूर्नामेंट  in a penalty shootout .
The current format of the tournament  involves 16 टीमों स्पर्धा लिये the शीर्षक at venues भीतर the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over  a period of about three weeks ; – this phase is often called the World Cup Finals .
A qualification phase , which currently takes place over the preceding three years , is used to  determine जिससे टीमों qualify लिये the टूर्नामेंट  together with the host nation ( s ) .
The FIFA Women 's World Cup is recognized as the most important International competition  in महिलाओं 's फ़ुटबॉल और is निभाई amongst महिलाओं  's national football teams of the member states of FIFA , the sport 's global governing body .
The first Women 's World Cup tournament , named the Women 's World  चैंपियनशिप , थी आयोजित in 1991 , sixty-one सालो बाद the मेन 's पहला  FIFA World Cup tournament in 1930 .
the छह संसार कप tournaments  have been won by four different national teams .

'Son of man ' is the  अनुवाद of विभिन्न यहूदी और यूनानी वाक्यांश  used in both the Hebrew Bible and the New Testament .
It has  विविध meanings , ranging इससे a  normal human being to a prophesied eternal , divine ruler .
The  यहूदी अभिव्यक्ति `` बेटे of man '' ( בן–אדם  i.e . ben-'adam ) appears one hundred and seven times in the Hebrew Bible .
This is the most common Hebrew construction for the  एकवचन लकिन is प्रयुक्त ज़्यादातर in ezekiel  ( 93 times ) and 14 times elsewhere .
In thirty two cases the phrase  appears in इंटरमीडिएट बहुवचन  form `` sons of men '' , i.e . human beings .
As generally interpreted by Jews , it  denotes humankind generally  .
In the  koine यूनानी of the नई वसीयत , `` the बेटे of man  '' is invariably used as `` ὁ υἱὸς τοὺ ἀνθρώπου '' with a definite article .
The use of the definite article in `` the son  of man '' in the ईसाई gospels is अनोखा , और पहले इसके उपयोग वहीँ , no रिकॉर्ड  of its use in any of the surviving Greek documents of antiquity exist .
Geza  vermes रै stated कि `` the बेटे of man '' in the ईसाई  gospels is unrelated to Hebrew Bible usages .
In Christian usage , unlike the Son of God title , which has been an essential element of Christian creeds  चूंकि the अपोस्टोलिक आयु , the उदघोषणा of `` यीशु  as the Son of man '' has never been an article of faith in Christianity .
The interpretation of the use of `` the Son of man '' in the New  वसीयत रै remained चुनौतीपूर्ण  and after 150 years of debate no consensus on the issue has emerged among scholars .
Master of foxhounds leads the field from Powderham Castle in Devon  , इंग्लैण्ड , साथ the hounds  in front .
Fox hunting is an activity involving the tracking , chase , and sometimes killing of a fox , traditionally a red fox , by trained foxhounds or other scent hounds  , और a समूह of निहत्थे अनुसरणकर्ता led by a निपुण of foxhounds , जो follow the  hounds on foot or on horseback .
Fox hunting originated in the form practised until recently in the United Kingdom in the 16th century , but is practised all over the world ,  सहित in ऑस्ट्रेलिया , कनाडा , फ़्रांस , आयरलैंड , इटली और the संयुक्त राज्य  .
In Australia , the  पद भी refers to the शिकार  of foxes with firearms similar to spotlighting or deer hunting .
In much of the world hunting in general is understood to relate to any game animals or weapons ( e.g. , deer hunting with bow and arrow ) ; in Britain and Ireland  , `` शिकार '' बगैर योग्यता implies फॉक्स शिकार ( or अन्य फ़ॉर्म of शिकार  with hounds- beagling , stag hunting , mink hunting , drag hunting or hunting the clean boot ) as described here .
The sport is controversial , particularly in the UK , where it was banned in Scotland in 2002 , and in England and Wales in  नवम्बर 2004 ( विधि enforced इससे फ़रवरी 2005 ) , हालांकि शूटिंग foxes  as vermin remained legal .
Proponents of fox hunting view it as an important  भाग of ग्रामीण संस्कृति और उपयोगी लिये कारण of  conservation and pest control , while opponents argue that it is cruel and unnecessary .
Tobacco  विज्ञापन is the विज्ञापन of तम्बाकू उत्पाद or उपयोग ( typically सिगरेट धूम्रपान  ) by the tobacco industry through a variety of media including sponsorship , particularly of sporting events .
It is now one  of the सबसे अत्यधिक regulated  forms of marketing .
Some or all forms of tobacco  विज्ञापन हैं बैन  in many countries .
Bally Technologies  , inc. is a निर्माता of  slot machines and other gaming technology based in Las Vegas , Nevada .
The company was founded in  1968 as उन्नत पेटेंट  Technology .
It  आखिरकार बदला इसके नाम to गठबंधन गेमिंग और acquired  , in 1996 , Bally Gaming International , a former division of Bally Manufacturing .
In 2006 , the entire company adopted the Bally name , a trademark that  originated in 1932 by the बल्ली निर्माण  Corporation .
Gustave Doré 's engravings  illustrated the दैवी कॉमेडी ( 1861–1868  ) ; here , Dante is lost in Canto 1 of the Inferno .
Inferno ( Italian for ``  नरक `` ) is the पहला भाग of दांते एलीगियरी 's  14th-century epic poem Divine Comedy .
It is followed by Purgatorio and  paradiso .
It is an allegory telling of the journey of Dante through Hell ,  हिदायत by the रोमन कवि  Virgil .
In the  कविता , नरक is चित्रित as नौ वृत्त of कष्ट  located within the Earth .
Allegorically , the Divine Comedy  represents the यात्रा of the आत्मा  towards God , with the Inferno describing the recognition and rejection of sin .
Smirnoff is a brand of vodka owned and produced by the  अंग्रेजों कम्पनी  Diageo .
the स्मरनॉफ ब्रांड began साथ a वोदका डिस्टिलरी  founded in Moscow by Pyotr Arsenievich Smirnov ( 1831–1898 ) .
It is  अभी वितरित  in 130 countries .
It is produced in several countries including India , Ireland , Italy , the  संयुक्त किंगडम और the संयुक्त राज्य  .
Smirnoff products include vodka ,  flavoured वोदका , और malt पेय  .
In March 2006 , Diageo North America claimed that Smirnoff vodka was the  best-selling आसुत स्पिरिट ब्रांड in  the world .
Big Brown ( foaled April 10 , 2005 in Kentucky ) is a retired champion American Thoroughbred racehorse and winner of the 2008 Kentucky Derby and 2008  preakness stakes  .
Bred by Dr. Gary B. Knapp 's  monticule खेतो in lexington , केंटकी , he  won his first five race starts .
He was sired by Grade III winner Boundary , a son of North  अमरीकी चैंपियन sire danzig  , a son of Northern Dancer .
Big Brown 's dam was Mien  , भी a  granddaughter of Northern Dancer through her sire , Nureyev .
The Serenity Prayer is the common name for an originally untitled  दुआ by the अमरीकी theologian  Reinhold Niebuhr ( 1892–1971 ) .
It has been adopted by Alcoholics  बेनाम और अन्य twelve-step कार्यक्रम .
The best-known form is : God , grant me the  serenity to accept the बाते  I can not change,
The  हिम्मत to बदलें the  things I can,
And wisdom  to जान the  difference .
The Declaration and Resolves of the First Continental Congress ( also known as the Declaration of Colonial Rights , or the Declaration of Rights ) , was a statement adopted by the First Continental Congress on October 14 , 1774 ,  in जवाब to the असहनीय अधिनियमों passed by the अंग्रेजों पार्लियामेंट .
The Declaration outlined colonial objections to the Intolerable  अधिनियमों , सूचीबद्ध a औपनिवेशिक विधेयक of अधिकारों , और provided a विस्तृत सूची  of grievances .
It was similar to the Declaration of Rights and Grievances , passed by the Stamp  अधिनियम कॉंग्रेस a दशक पहले  .
The  घोषणा concluded साथ an रूपरेखा of कॉंग्रेस 's योजनाएँ : to डालें into a बहिष्कार of अंग्रेजों व्यापार ( the महाद्वीपीय  Association ) until their grievances were redressed , to publish addresses to the people of Great Britain and British America , and to send a petition to the King .
पल्स दबाव is the दबाव  that is felt when feeling the pulse .
Measured in  millimeters of पारा ( mmhg ) , the दबाव अंतर between the systolic और  diastolic pressures is the pressure change to create the pulse , which is the pulse pressure .
If resting blood pressure is ( systolic/diastolic ) 120/80 millimeters of mercury  ( mmhg ) , पल्स दबाव is  40 .
The Hills is a reality television series  जिससे originally aired on एमटीवी  from May 31 , 2006 until July 13 , 2010 .
The show uses a  वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न स्वरूप , following the निजी जीवनदान of अनेक यंग वयस्कों जीना in लॉस  Angeles , California , but tends towards a narrative format more commonly found in scripted genres such as soap operas .
The series originally followed  the निजी जीवन of पूर्व लगुना बीच स्टार  Lauren Conrad and her friends ' new lives in Los Angeles .
After five seasons , Conrad left the  श्रेणी और थी replaced by another पूर्व लगुना बीच स्टार , kristin cavallari , शुरूआत in  the second half of the fifth season .
The  श्रेणी concluded at the  end of the sixth season .
entertainment साप्ताहिक क्रमित the पहाड़ियाँ  82nd on their list of `` The 100 Best Shows of the Last 25 Years , '' stating that the series was a `` New Classic . ''

The series premiered in syndication in  the पतन of 2009 alongside लगुना बीच : the रियल  Orange County .
In poker , bad beat is a subjective term for a hand in which a  खिलाड़ी साथ कया appear to be दमदार ताश  nevertheless loses .
It most often occurs where one player bets the  clearly stronger हाथ और उनके प्रतिद्वन्दी makes a ग़रीब कॉल  that eventually `` hits '' and wins .
There is no consensus among poker players as to what exactly constitutes a bad beat and often players will  असहमत परिचय whether a particular हाथ थी a ख़राब ताल  .
The goldfish ( Carassius  auratus auratus ) is a freshwater  fish in the family Cyprinidae of order Cypriniformes .
It was one of the earliest fish to be domesticated ,  और is एक of the सबसे commonly  kept aquarium fish .
A relatively small member of the carp family ( which also includes the koi carp  और the crucian कार्प ) , the goldfish is a domesticated संस्करण  of a less-colorful carp ( Carassius auratus ) native to east Asia .
It was first domesticated in China more  than a हजार सालो पहले , और अनेक पृथक  breeds have since been developed .
Goldfish breeds vary greatly in size , body shape  , जोडे विन्यास और coloration (  various combinations of white , yellow , orange , red , brown , and black are known ) .
uncooked  Rouladen
Rouladen ( or Rinderroulade , singular : roulade ) is a German meat roulade usually  consisting of बेकन , प्याज , सरसों और अचार  wrapped in thinly sliced beef which is then cooked .
In some  देशों , the roulade  is also known as `` beef olive '' .
Beef or veal is used as meat though some food scholars tend to believe that the  असली संस्करण थी संभवतः venison or पोर्क  , and pork is still popular in some areas .
The beef rouladen as we know them today have become  लोकप्रिय over the पिछला  century .
The cut is usually  topside बीफ or silverside चूंकि  this is the cheaper cut .
The  अधिक महंगी संस्करण होता be the गोलाकार स्टीक ,  also known as rump steak .
The  मांस is काटें into  large , thin slices .
The filling is a mixture of smoked and cooked pork  पेट , कटा प्याज और कटा अचार ( gurken ) जिससे is at टाइम्स varied by adding  minced meat , sausage meat , pine nuts and mustard .
The mixture  varies इससे प्रदेश to प्रदेश  .
Rouladen are traditionally  परोसा लिये डिनर  .
Red wine is  प्रायः परोसा  with this dish .
Typical  eukaryotic कोशिका .
Cellular respiration is the set of the metabolic reactions and processes that take place in the cells of organisms to convert biochemical energy from  nutrients into एडीनोसिन ट्राइफॉस्फेट ( एटीपी ) , और तब रिलीज बर्बाद उत्पाद  .
The reactions involved in respiration are catabolic  प्रतिक्रियाएँ , जिससे ब्रेक विशाल अणुओं into छोटी ones , releasing उर्जा in the प्रक्रम as कमजोर so-called `` high-energy  '' bonds are replaced by stronger bonds in the products .
श्वसन is एक of the  key ways a cell gains useful energy to fuel cellular activity .
Cellular respiration is considered an  ऊष्माक्षेपी रेडॉक्स प्रतिक्रिया  .
The overall reaction is broken into many smaller ones when it occurs in the body  , सबसे of जिससे हैं रेडॉक्स प्रतिक्रियाएँ  themselves .
हालांकि technically , सेल्यूलर श्वसन is a  combustion reaction , it clearly does not resemble one when it occurs in a living cell .
This difference is because it  occurs in अनेक पृथक  steps .
While the overall  प्रतिक्रिया is a दहन प्रतिक्रिया , no सिंगल  reaction that comprises it is a combustion reaction .
Nutrients that are commonly used by animal and plant cells in respiration include sugar , amino acids and fatty acids , and a  आम oxidizing एजेंट ( इलेक्ट्रॉन acceptor ) is आणविक ऑक्सीजन  ( O2 ) .
The energy stored in ATP (  इसके तीसरा फास्फेट समूह is weakly बंधुआ to the बाकी of the अणु और is cheaply टूटा allowing stronger  bonds to form , thereby transferring energy for use by the cell ) can then be used to drive processes requiring energy , including biosynthesis , locomotion or transportation of molecules across cell membranes .
देशों by 2011 जीडीपी ( नाममात्र  ) according to the CIA World Factbook .
इस आलेख शामिल a सूची of देशों in the संसार sorted  by their gross domestic product ( GDP ) , the market value of all final goods and services from a nation in a given year .
The GDP dollar estimates presented here are calculated at market or  सरकारी आधिकारिक एक्सचेंज दरों  .
Several economies which are not  माना to be देशों ( संसार , the eu ,  and some dependent territories ) are included in the lists because they appear in the sources .
These economies are not ranked in the charts here , but are  सूचीबद्ध जहाँ लागू  .
The figures presented here do not take into account differences in the cost of living in different countries , and the results  can vary greatly इससे एक साल to another आधारित on  fluctuations in the exchange rates of the country 's currency .
Such fluctuations may change  a देश 's रैंकिंग इससे  one year to the next , even though they often make little or no difference to the standard of living of its population .
इसलिए ये आंकड़े चाहिए be प्रयुक्त  with caution .
Some countries/regions may have  नागरिकों जिससे हैं on  average wealthy .
ये countries/regions could  appear in this list as having a small GDP .
This would be because the country/region listed has a  छोटी जनसांख्यिकी , और इसलिए  small total economy ; the GDP is calculated as the population times the wealth per capita .
Comparisons of national wealth are also frequently made on the basis of purchasing power parity ( PPP ) , to adjust for  मतभेद in  the cost of living in different countries .
( See  सूची of देशों by  GDP ( PPP ) )
PPP largely removes the exchange rate problem , but has its own drawbacks ; it does not reflect the value of  आर्थिक आउटपुट in अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार , और it भी requires  more estimation than nominal GDP .
On the whole , PPP per  capita आंकड़े हैं अधिक narrowly स्प्रेड than  nominal GDP per capita figures .
The first list includes data compiled by  the संयुक्त राष्ट्र आंकडे  Division for 2011 .
The second list largely includes data (  अनुमान ) compiled by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Monetary Fund for 2012 .
The  तीसरा सूची shows the संसार बैंको 's ज़्यादातर 2011 estimates  , and the fourth list includes mostly 2012 estimates from the CIA World Factbook .
Lapping is a  machining प्रक्रम , in जिससे दो सतहों हैं मला साथ साथ an अक्खड़ between उन्हें  , by hand movement or by way of a machine .
इस can  take two forms .
The first type of lapping ( traditionally called grinding ) , typically involves rubbing a brittle material such as glass against a  सतह ऐसे as आयरन or कांच itself ( भी ज्ञात as the `` गोद '' or पीस औजार ) साथ an अक्खड़  such as aluminum oxide , jeweller 's rouge , optician 's rouge , emery , silicon carbide , diamond , etc. , in between them .
This produces microscopic conchoidal fractures as  the अक्खड़ रोल्स परिचय between the दो सतहों और removes  material from both .
The other form of lapping involves a softer material such as pitch or a  सिरेमिक लिये the गोद , जिससे is `` चार्ज '' साथ the अक्खड़  .
The lap is then  प्रयुक्त to काटें a harder  material—the workpiece .
The abrasive embeds within the softer material which  holds it और permits it to स्कोर आरपार  and cut the harder material .
Taken to a finer limit , this  होगा उपज a polished सतह ऐसे as साथ a पॉलिशिंग  cloth on an automobile , or a polishing cloth or polishing pitch upon glass or steel .
Taken to the ultimate limit , with the aid of accurate interferometry and specialized  पॉलिशिंग मशीने or skilled हाथ पॉलिशिंग , lensmakers  can produce surfaces that are flat to better than 30 nanometers .
इस is एक बीसवीं of the wavelength  of light from the commonly used 632.8 nm helium neon laser light source .
Surfaces this flat can be molecularly bonded ( optically contacted ) by bringing them  साथ अंतर्गत the सही  conditions .
( This is not the same as the wringing effect of  जोहानसन ब्लॉक , हालांकि it is समान  ) .
The term `` America 's Team '' is a  लोकप्रिय उपनाम in  the United States that refers to the Dallas Cowboys in the National Football League .
The nickname originated  साथ the टोली 's 1978 हाइलाइट फिल्मी , जहाँ the narrator opens साथ the following परिचय : the पद is पहचाना और प्रायः  used by media outlets , including ESPN , Yahoo ! , HBO Sports , and Sports Illustrated .
My  दाई 's a पिशाच ( फ्रेंच : ma gardienne est un पिशाच  ) is a 2011 Canadian television series , based on the television film of the same name .
In Canada , the series premiered in French on Télétoon on February 28 , 2011 , in  अंग्रेज़ी on teletoon on कूच 14 , 2011 ,  and on Disney Channel in the United States on June 27 , 2011 .
The show  थी निर्मित by भैस  TV , creators of 6teen and Total Drama .
The show follows Ethan Morgan ( Matthew Knight ) , who , in the television film , learns that  उसके दाई सारा ( वैनेसा मॉर्गन ) is a पिशाच  .
In the film , he learns he is able to have visions and his best  dost बेनी वीयर ( atticus मिशेल )  is a spellmaster .
The series follows the three as they take on supernatural forces and have adventures , with occasional help from  fellow vampires रोरी ( cameron कैनेडी ) और एरिका ( केट  Todd ) , while dealing with the troubles of regular high school life .
A second season was confirmed to start production in September 2011  और it पहला premiered on डिज़्नी चैनल on जून 29 , 2012 , it premiered  on Teletoon September 6 , 2012 .
