A pickup  ट्रक or pick-up , प्रायः बस  referred to as a pickup , is a light motor vehicle with an open-top , rear cargo area ( bed ) .
In North America , the term pickup is used for light trucks with a lighter duty chassis and factory built , integrated bed , as well as for coupé utility vehicles , often based on a personal car chassis , but also  प्रायः on a खास समर्पित chassi लिये  such use .
Some countries have their own terms similar to pickup , such as  ute in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई  Zealand , or bakkie in South Africa .
विशाल पिकअप ट्रक हैं somewhat विरल in यूरोपीय  , where vans and light lorries are commonly used for similar roles .
The  अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका  ( POTUS ) is the head of state and head of government of the United States .
The president leads the executive branch of the federal government  और is the commander-in-chief  of the United States Armed Forces .
Article II of the U.S. Constitution  vests the कार्यपालिका शक्ति of the संयुक्त राज्य in the अध्यक्ष और आरोप उसे  with the execution of federal law , alongside the responsibility of appointing federal executive , diplomatic , regulatory , and judicial officers , and concluding treaties with foreign powers , with the advice and consent of the Senate .
The president is further  सशक्त to ग्रान्ट संघीय pardons और  reprieves , and to convene and adjourn either or both houses of Congress under extraordinary circumstances .
Since the founding of the United States , the power of the president and the federal government have grown substantially and each modern president , despite possessing no formal legislative powers beyond  हस्ताक्षर or vetoing congressionally passed बिल्स , is largely  responsible for dictating the legislative agenda of his party and the foreign and domestic policy of the United States .
The  अध्यक्ष is अक्सर  described as the most powerful person in the world .
The president is indirectly elected by the  लोगों through the चुनावी कॉलेज to a four-year पद  , and is one of only two nationally elected federal officers , the other being the Vice President of the United States .
The Twenty-second Amendment , adopted in 1951 , prohibits anyone from  कभी होने निर्वाचित to the प्रेसिडेंसी लिये a तीसरा पूरा  term .
It also prohibits a person from being  निर्वाचित to the प्रेसिडेंसी अधिक than एकबार if कि  person previously had served as president , or acting president , for more than two years of another person 's term as president .
In  सब , 43 individuals  have served 55 four-year terms .
On  जनवरी 20 , 2009 ,  Barack Obama became the 44th and current president .
On  नवम्बर 6 , 2012 , he थी re-elected और is  scheduled to serve until January 20 , 2017 .
Bottled  खनिज जल
Bottled water is drinking water ( e.g.  , खूब जल , आसुत जल , खनिज जल , or वसन्त  water ) packaged in plastic or glass water bottles .
बोतलबंद जल  may be carbonated or not .
Sizes range from small single serving bottles  to विशाल carboys  for water coolers .
Map of the major rivers , lakes , and  टंकी in  India
Map showing rivers  और बाढ़ prone क्षेत्रों in  India
Rivers of India play an  महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in the जीवनदान  of the Indian people .
The river systems provide irrigation , potable water , cheap transportation , electricity , and the  livelihoods लिये a विशाल क्रमांक of लोगों सब over  the country and to rural areas .
This easily explains  क्यों nearly सब the  major cities of India are located by the banks of rivers .
The rivers also have an  महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in हिन्दू mythology  and are considered holy by all Hindus in the country .
Seven major  नदियाँ साथ साथ उनके numerous tributaries  make up the river system of India .
Most of the rivers pour their waters into the Bay of Bengal ; however ,  कुछ of the नदियाँ जिनकी पाठ्यक्रम लो उन्हें through the पश्चिमी भाग of the देश  and towards the east of the state of Himachal Pradesh empty into the Arabian Sea .
Parts of Ladakh , northern parts of the  aravlli दायरा और the arid भाग of the थार  Desert have inland drainage .
Dr.Francis Buchanan  surveyed the पाठ्यक्रम of the नदियाँ  of India along with their tributaries and branches in 1810-11 AD and presented a minute account of it .
The shifting of  the पाठ्यक्रम और  bed over the centuries is very remarkable .
Many of the channels mentioned in that survey have  अभी become मुर्दे , सूखी or भी  extinct .
All major rivers of India originate  इससे एक of the  three main watersheds :
The  हिमालय और  the Karakoram ranges
विंध्य और satpura सीमाएँ और chotanagpur  plateau in central India
Sahyadri or Western  ghats in पश्चिमी  India
The Bretton Woods system of monetary management established the rules  लिये वाणिज्यिक  and financial relations among the world 's major industrial states in the mid-20th century .
The Bretton Woods system was the first example of a  fully negotiated मौद्रिक अनुक्रम intended to govern मौद्रिक संबंध among  independent nation-states .
Preparing to rebuild the international economic system as World War II was still  raging , 730 delegates इससे सब 44 अलाइड राष्ट्र gathered at the माउंट वॉशिंगटन होटल in bretton  Woods , New Hampshire , United States , for the United Nations Monetary and Financial Conference .
The delegates deliberated during 1–22 July 1944 , and signed  the अनुबंध on इसके फाइनल  day .
Setting up a system of rules , institutions , and procedures to regulate the international monetary system , the planners at Bretton Woods established  the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मौद्रिक निधि ( imf ) और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय बैंको लिये पुनर्निर्माण और विकास ( ibrd  ) , which today is part of the World Bank Group .
These  संगठन became operational  in 1945 after a sufficient number of countries had ratified the agreement .
The chief features of the Bretton Woods system were an  दायित्व लिये प्रत्येक देश to अपनाना a मौद्रिक नीति कि कायम the एक्सचेंज रेट by tying इसके  currency to the U.S. dollar and the ability of the IMF to bridge temporary imbalances of payments .
On 15 August 1971 , the United States  unilaterally terminated convertibility of the us  $ to gold .
This brought the Bretton  वुड्स प्रणाली to an समाप्त  and saw the dollar become fiat currency .
This action , referred to as the Nixon  शॉक , निर्मित the हालात in जिससे the संयुक्त राज्य डालर  became a reserve currency used by many states .
At the same time , many fixed currencies ( such as GBP ,  लिये उदाहरण ) , भी became फ़्री फ्लोटिंग  .
Ducati Motor Holding S.p.A. is an Italian  कम्पनी  that designs and manufactures motorcycles .
Headquartered in Bologna , Italy , Ducati is owned by Audi  through इसके इतालवी subsidiary  Lamborghini .
A credit score is a numerical expression based on  a सांख्यिकीय विश्लेषण of a व्यक्ति 's क्रेडिट  files , to represent the creditworthiness of that person .
A credit score is primarily  आधारित on क्रेडिट रपट  information typically sourced from credit bureaus .
Lenders , such as banks and credit card companies , use credit scores to evaluate the  संभावित रिस्क posed by lending धन  to consumers and to mitigate losses due to bad debt .
Lenders use credit scores to determine who qualifies for a  ऋण , at कया ब्याज रेट , और  what credit limits .
Lenders also use credit scores to  determine जिससे ग्राहक हैं संभावित to लाओ in  the most revenue .
The use of credit or identity scoring prior to authorizing access or granting credit is  an क्रियान्वयन of a विश्वसनीय  system .
Credit  स्कोरिंग is नहीं सीमित  to banks .
Other organizations ,  ऐसे as मोबाईल फोन कंपनियाँ , बीमे  companies , landlords , and government departments employ the same techniques .
Credit scoring also has a lot of overlap with  आंकड़ा खनन , जिससे  uses many similar techniques .
These techniques combine  हज़ारों of कारकों लकिन वे हैं अधिक or कम समान  or the same .
The seven SI base units and the interdependency of their definitions : for example , to extract the definition of the metre from the speed of light  , the परिभाषा of the दूसरी जरूर be ज्ञात जबकि the ampere  and candela are both dependent on the definition of energy which in turn is defined in terms of length , mass and time .
The International System of Units ( SI ) defines seven  इकाई of माप as a मौलिक नियत इससे जिससे  all other SI units are derived .
These SI base units and their  शारीरिक quantities  are:
metre for length  ( us अंग्रेज़ी :  meter )
किलोग्राम लिये द्रव्यमान ( नोट  : not the gram )
दूसरी  for time
ampere  लिये इलेक्ट्रिक  current
kelvin  लिये तापमान
candela लिये  luminous intensity
mole for the amount  of पदार्थ  .
The SI base quantities form a set of mutually  स्वतंत्र आयाम as जरूरी by आयामी  analysis commonly employed in science and technology .
however , in a दिए realization of ये इकाई वे may  well be interdependent , i.e . defined in terms of each other .
The names of SI units are written in lowercase  वर्ण ( the 'degree सेल्सियस ' meets इस नियम , as  'degree ' is the unit , and 'Celsius ' is a modifier ) .
The symbols  of इकाई हैं लिखा in लोअरकेस ( e.g . मीटर रै the प्रतीक m ) , मगर  that symbols for units named after persons are written with an initial capital letter ( e.g. , the hertz has the uppercase symbol Hz ) .
Many other units , such as the litre (  us अंग्रेज़ी : लीनियर ) , हैं formally नहीं भाग of the si  , but are accepted for use with SI .
स्मारक  Canyon
Colorado National Monument ( locally referred to as The Monument ) is a  भाग of the नेशनल पार्क  Service near the city of Grand Junction , Colorado .
Spectacular canyons cut  गहन into sandstone और भी granite–gneiss–schist  rock formations , in some areas .
This is an area of desert land high on the Colorado Plateau , with pinion and  juniper वनों on the पठार  .
The park hosts a wide range of wildlife , including red-tailed hawks and golden eagles , ravens ,  jays , मरुस्थल bighorn शीप , और  coyotes .
Activities include hiking , horseback riding ,  सड़क bicycling , और दर्शनीय ड्राइव ; a आगंतुक  center on the west side contains a natural history museum and gift shop .
वहीँ हैं भव्य दृश्य इससे trails और the  Rim Rock Drive , which winds along the plateau .
Nearby are the Book Cliffs  , और the largest flat-topped पहाड़  in the world , the Grand Mesa .
Its feature attraction is Monument Canyon , which runs the width of the park , and includes rock formations  ऐसे as स्वतंत्रता स्मारक  , the Kissing Couple , and Coke Ovens .
The monument includes 20,500 acres ( 32 square  मील ) , much of जिससे रै महरूम अनुशंसित to कॉंग्रेस लिये नामांकन  as wilderness .
left to right : Utility  वर्दी , ब्लू पोशाक वर्दी , सेवा वर्दी  , and Evening Dress uniforms
The Uniforms of the United  राज्य समुद्री corps  serve to distinguish Marines from members of other services .
Among current uniforms in the United States Armed Forces , the Marines '  वर्दी have महरूम in सेवा the longest .
The Marine Dress Blue uniform has , with few changes , been worn in essentially  इसके वर्तमान रूप चूंकि the 19th सदी  .
North American telephone area codes 419 and 567 serve the northwest  quadrant of the u.S. राज्य of  Ohio .
The largest city served by these area codes  is टोलेडो ( और इसके उपनगरों of हॉलैंड , maumee , northwood , ऑरेगॉन  , Ottawa Hills , Perrysburg , Rossford , Sylvania , Swanton , Waterville , and Whitehouse ) .
अन्य शहरों परोसा by ये क्षेत्रफल कोड शामिल एडीए , ashland , bellevue , bluffton , बोलिंग ग्रीन , ब्रायन , bucyrus , celina , क्लाइड , crestline , defiance , delphos , एडिसन  , Erastus , Findlay , Fostoria , Fremont , Galion , Kenton , Lima , Mansfield , Mount Gilead , Napoleon , Norwalk , Oak Harbor , Port Clinton , Sandusky , Shelby , St. Marys , Tiffin , Upper Sandusky , Van Wert , Wapakoneta , Wauseon , Willard .
Other areas served include the Lake  erie आइलैंड्स उत्तर  of Port Clinton and west of Sandusky .
The main area code , 419 , was created as one of the original area codes in October  1947 ; the ओवरले क्षेत्रफल कोड 567 थी निर्मित on जनवरी 1 ,  2002 .
Despite the presence of Toledo , the state  's fourth-largest नगर , 419 थी the पिछला of ओहियो 's असली चार क्षेत्रफल  codes to have been split or overlaid .
Mickey Leroy Gilley ( born March 9 , 1936 )  is an अमरीकी देश म्यूज़िक  singer and musician .
हालांकि he प्रारंभ आउट गायन straight-up देश और पश्चिमी  material in the 1970s , he moved towards a more pop -friendly sound in the 1980s , bringing him further success on not just the country charts , but the pop charts as well .
Among his biggest hits are ``  रूम पूरा of गुलाब , '' `` do n't the लड़कियों सब मिलेंगी  Prettier at Closing Time , '' and the remake of the Soul hit `` Stand by Me `` .
He is also the cousin of Jerry Lee  लुईस , कार्ल mcvoy , जिम gilley और  Jimmy Swaggart .
According to the Federal Aviation Administration ,  gilley is a licensed पायलट , जो holds an यंत्र दरजा साथ वाणिज्यिक पायलट privileges लिये multi-engine airplanes  , as well as private pilot privileges for single engine aircraft .
The September 11 attacks ( also referred to as September 11 , September 11th , or 9/11 ) were a series of  चार समन्वित आतंकवादी हमले शुभारम्भ by the इस्लामी  terrorist group al-Qaeda upon the United States in New York City and the Washington , D.C. area on September 11 , 2001 .
Four passenger airliners were hijacked by 19  al-qaeda आतंकवादी so वे could  be flown into buildings in suicide attacks .
Two of those planes , American Airlines Flight 11 and United Airlines Flight 175 , were crashed into the North and  दक्षिण मीनारें , क्रमशः , of the संसार व्यापार बीच जटिल  in New York City .
Within two hours , both towers collapsed with debris and the resulting fires causing partial or complete  पतन of सब अन्य इमारतें in the wtc जटिल , as खूब as प्रमुख क्षति to टेन अन्य विशाल  surrounding structures .
A third plane , American Airlines  उड़ान 77 , थी क्रैश into the प्रस्तुतीकरण ( the  headquarters of the United States Department of Defense ) , leading to a partial collapse in its western side .
The fourth plane , United Airlines Flight 93 , was targeted at the United States Capitol in  वॉशिंगटन , d.C. , लकिन क्रैश into a फ़ील्ड निकट shanksville , पेन्सिलवेनिया , बाद  its passengers tried to overcome the hijackers .
In total ,  लगभग 3,000 लोगों died in the हमले , सहित  the 227 civilians and 19 hijackers aboard the four planes .
Suspicion  जल्दी गिरी on  al-Qaeda .
Although the group 's leader , Osama bin Laden ,  initially अस्वीकृत कोई भागीदारी , in 2004 he claimed जिम्मेदारी  for the attacks .
Al-Qaeda and bin Laden cited U.S. support of Israel , the presence of  u.S. सैनिकों in सऊदी अरब , और प्रतिबंधों विरूद्ध इराकी  as motives for the attacks .
The United States responded to the attacks by launching the War on Terror and invading Afghanistan to  depose the तालिबान , जिससे था harbored  al-Qaeda .
Many  देशों strengthened उनके anti-terrorism  legislation and expanded law enforcement powers .
Having evaded capture for years , bin Laden  थी स्तिथ और मारे by u.S. शक्तियां  in May 2011 .
The  विनाश of the जुड़वा मीनारें और अन्य गुण caused  serious damage to the economy of Lower Manhattan and had a significant effect on global markets .
Cleanup of the  संसार व्यापार बीच साईट थी समाप्त  in May 2002 , and the Pentagon was repaired within a year .
Numerous memorials have been  constructed , सहित the नेशनल सितंबर 11 मेमोरियल & संग्रहालय in नई यॉर्क , the प्रस्तुतीकरण  Memorial , and the Flight 93 National Memorial in Pennsylvania .
After a lengthy delay , the One World Trade Center is expected to  be समाप्त at मैदान शून्य in नई यॉर्क नगर in 2013  .
Finding Nemo is a 2003  अमरीकी computer-animated comedy-drama एडवेंचर फिल्मी लिखा और निर्देशित by एंड्रयू stanton , released  by Walt Disney Pictures , and the fifth film produced by Pixar Animation Studios .
It tells the story of the over-protective clownfish named Marlin ( Albert Brooks ) who , along with a regal  तंग नामित dory ( एलेन degeneres ) , खोज लिये उसके abducted बेटे nemo ( सिकंदर gould )  all the way to Sydney Harbour .
साथ the रास्ता , marlin learns  to take risks and let Nemo take care of himself .
It is Pixar 's first film to be released  in cinemas in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध  summer .
The film was re-released for the first time in 3D on  सितंबर 14 , 2012 , और it थी released  on Blu-ray on December 4 , 2012 .
A sequel ,  ढूंढना dory , is फिलहाल  in development , set to be released on November 25 , 2015 .
The film received universal critical acclaim and won the  अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन एनिमेटेड विशेषता , और थी मनोनीत in तीन  more categories including Best Original Screenplay .
It was the  दूसरी highest-grossing फिल्मी of  2003 , earning a total of $ 921 million worldwide .
Finding Nemo is also the best-selling DVD of all time , with  over 40 लाख नक़ल बेची as of 2006 , और थी the highest-grossing g-rated फिल्मी of सब समय  before Pixar 's own Toy Story 3 overtook it .
It is also the 23rd highest-grossing film of all time , as well as the 3rd  highest-grossing एनिमेटेड फिल्मी .
In 2008 , the American Film Institute  नामित it the दसवाँ महानतम एनिमेटेड  film ever made during their Top 10 .
The sixth season of America  's बेहतरीन नृत्य क्रू , भी ज्ञात as अमेरिका 's बेहतरीन  Dance Crew : Season of the Superstars , premiered on April 7 , 2011 and concluded on June 5 , 2011 .
Auditions were held in four cities from January 21 through  फ़रवरी 5 : शिकागो , ह्यूस्टन , नई  York , and Los Angeles .
This season takes a different  रूट इससे पास्ट सीज़न  .
The crews must perform to the music of one specific artist each week ,  सहित रिहाना  , Lil Wayne , and other popular stars .
This season also features  खास अतिथि दिखावे by विभिन्न म्यूज़िक  celebrities including Justin Bieber , The Black Eyed Peas , Katy Perry , Kesha , Nicki Minaj , and Kanye West .
Dominic `` D-Trix '' Sandoval , a former member of Quest Crew , the winner of the third  ऋतु of अमेरिका 's बेहतरीन नृत्य क्रू , joins returning न्यायाधीशों लील मामा  and JC Chasez as the newest judge .
In the season finale , I aM mE was declared the winner of Season 6 and received  the $ 100,000 ( usd ) पुरस्कार  .
In the United States , Social Security refers to the Old-Age ,  survivors , और विकलांगता बीमे ( oasdi ) संघीय कार्यक्रम  .
The  असली सोशल सुरक्षा अधिनियम ( 1935 ) और the वर्तमान संस्करण of the अधिनियम  , as amended , encompass several social welfare and social insurance programs .
Social Security is primarily  वित्तपोषित through समर्पित payroll कर पुकारा संघीय  Insurance Contributions Act tax ( FICA ) .
Tax deposits are formally entrusted to the Federal Old-Age and Survivors  बीमे विश्वास निधि , the संघीय विकलांगता बीमे विश्वास निधि , the संघीय हॉस्पिटल बीमे  Trust Fund , or the Federal Supplementary Medical Insurance Trust Fund which comprise the Social Security Trust Fund .
Upward redistribution of income is responsible for about 43 % of the projected Social  सुरक्षा shortfall over  the next 75 years .
According to economist Martin Feldstein , the combined spending  लिये सब सोशल बीमे कार्यक्रम in 2003 गठित 37 % of सरकारी  expenditure and 7 % of the gross domestic product .
Social Security  is फिलहाल अनुमानित to  keep roughly 40 percent of all Americans age 65 or older out of poverty .
The Social Security  प्रशासन is headquartered  in Woodlawn , Maryland , just west of Baltimore .
The alcohol by volume shown on  a बोतल of absinthe  .
Alcohol by volume ( abbreviated as ABV , abv , or alc/vol ) is a  मानक माप of कैसा much दारू ( इथेनॉल ) is contained  in an alcoholic beverage ( expressed as a percentage of total volume ) .
the abv मानक  is used worldwide .
In some countries , alcohol by volume is referred to as  डिग्री gay-lussac ( बाद the फ्रेंच केमिस्ट  Joseph Louis Gay-Lussac ) .
Laurel  खोखला is a गाँव in the कस्बा of सीप खाड़ी  in Nassau County , New York in the United States .
The population  थी 1,952 at the  2010 census .
Charles John Huffam  डिकेंस ( ; 7 फ़रवरी 1812 – 9 जून 1870  ) was an English writer and social critic .
he निर्मित कुछ of the संसार 's सबसे यादगार fictional  characters and is generally regarded as the greatest novelist of the Victorian period .
During his life , his works enjoyed  unprecedented कीर्ति , और by the बीसवीं सदी  his literary genius was broadly acknowledged by critics and scholars .
His novels and short stories  continue to be widely  popular .
Born in Portsmouth , England , Dickens left  स्कूल to कार्य in a फैक्टरी बाद उसके पिता थी thrown  into debtors ' prison .
Although he had little formal education , his  जल्दी impoverishment drove उसे to सफल  .
Over his career he edited a weekly journal for 20 years , wrote 15 novels , 5 novellas and hundreds of short stories and non-fiction articles , lectured and performed  extensively , थी an indefatigable अक्षर लेखक  , and campaigned vigorously for children 's rights , education , and other social reforms .
Dickens sprang to fame with the 1836  सीरियल प्रकाशन of the pickwick  Papers .
Within a few years he had become an international literary celebrity , famous for his  ह्यूमर , व्यंग्य , और keen अवलोकन of अक्षर और समाज  .
His novels , most published in monthly or weekly instalments , pioneered the serial publication of narrative fiction , which became the  प्रबल विक्टोरियन विधि लिये अनोखा प्रकाशन  .
The instalment format allowed Dickens to evaluate his  दर्शक 's प्रतिक्रिया , और he प्रायः परिवर्धित उसके  plot and character development based on such feedback .
For example , when his wife 's chiropodist  expressed तकलीफ at the रास्ता मिस mowcher in दाउद कॉपरफील्ड लगा  to reflect her disabilities , Dickens went on to improve the character with positive lineaments .
Fagin in Oliver Twist apparently mirrors the famous fence Ikey Solomon  ; उसके कैरीकेचर of leigh हंट in the फिगर of mr skimpole in bleak हाउस  was likewise toned down on advice from some of his friends , as they read episodes .
In the same novel , both  लॉरेंस boythorne और मूनी the beadle हैं drawn इससे रियल जीवन – boythorne  from Walter Savage Landor and Mooney from 'Looney ' , a beadle at Salisbury Square .
His plots were carefully  constructed , और डिकेंस प्रायः wove in तत्व  from topical events into his narratives .
Masses of the illiterate poor chipped in ha'pennies to have each new monthly episode  पढ़ा to उन्हें , खोलने up और प्रेरणादायी a नई क्लास of पाठक  .
Dickens was regarded as the  साहित्यिक colossus of  his age .
His 1843 novella , A Christmas Carol , is one of the most influential works ever written , and it  remains लोकप्रिय और continues to inspire adaptations in प्रत्येक कलाकारी  genre .
His creative genius  रै महरूम praised by  fellow writers—from Leo Tolstoy to G. K. Chesterton and George Orwell —for its realism , comedy , prose style , unique characterisations , and social criticism .
On the other hand Oscar Wilde , Henry James and Virginia Woolf complained of a lack of  मनोवैज्ञानिक गहराई , ढीला लिखने , और a रग of  saccharine sentimentalism .
Martin Luther King and other civil rights leaders in front of the statue of Abraham  lincoln , अगस्त 28 , 1963
The civil rights  गति थी a श्रेणी of विश्वव्यापी राजनैतिक आंदोलनों  for equality before the law that peaked in the 1960s .
In many situations it took  the रूप of अभियान of सिविल प्रतिरोध  aimed at achieving change by nonviolent forms of resistance .
In some situations it was  accompanied , or followed , by  civil unrest and armed rebellion .
The  प्रक्रम थी long और tenuous in अनेक देशों , और अनेक of ये  movements did not fully achieve their goals although , the efforts of these movements did lead to improvements in the legal rights of previously oppressed groups of people .
The main aim of the civil rights movement included  , और शामिल , ensuring कि the अधिकारों of सब लोगों  are equally protected by the law , including the rights of minorities .
Civil rights movements ranging from the global LGBT rights movement to the global Women 's  अधिकारों गति to विभिन्न जातिगत अल्पसंख्यक अधिकारों  movements around the world continue .
The 2010 FIFA World Cup was the 19th FIFA World Cup , the world championship  लिये मेन 's नेशनल संघ  football teams .
It took place  in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी इससे  11 June to 11 July 2010 .
The bidding process for hosting the tournament finals was open  तभी to अफ़्रीकी राष्ट्र ; in 2004 , the अंतरराष्ट्रीय फ़ुटबॉल संघ , फीफा , चयनित दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी over  Egypt and Morocco to become the first African nation to host the finals .
The matches were played in ten stadiums in nine host cities around the country , with the final played at the  सॉकर नगर स्टेडियम in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी 's largest नगर , जोहान्सबर्ग  .
Thirty-two teams were selected for participation via a worldwide  योग्यता  tournament that began in August 2007 .
In the first round of the tournament finals , the teams competed in  round-robin समूह  of four teams for points , with the top two teams in each group proceeding .
These sixteen teams advanced to the knockout stage , where three rounds of  खेल decided जिससे टीमों होता participate in the  final .
In the final , Spain , the European champions , defeated third-time finalists the Netherlands 1–0 after extra time , with Andrés Iniesta 's goal in the 116th minute  giving स्पेन उनके पहला संसार शीर्षक , बनने the आठवीं स्वदेश to जीत the टूर्नामेंट , और the पहला यूरोपीय स्वदेश to जीत the  tournament outside its home continent .
मेजबान स्वदेश दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी , 2006 संसार champions  Italy and 2006 runners-up France were all eliminated in the first round of the tournament .
It was the first time that the hosts  यहूद eliminated in the पहला  round .
New Zealand with their three draws were the only undefeated team in  the टूर्नामेंट , लकिन यहूद भी eliminated in the पहला गोलाकार  .
The McMuffin  is a परिवार of नाश्ता सैंडविच in विभिन्न आकार और configurations  , sold by the fast-food restaurant chain McDonald 's .
The Egg McMuffin is the signature  नाश्ता सैंडविच ; it थी invented by the लेट मैकडोनाल्ड 's वाल  Herb Peterson in the late 1960s and was introduced nationwide in 1972 .
John Lennon was an English musician who gained worldwide fame as one of the  संस्थापकों of the बीटल्स , लिये उसके subsequent सोलो करियर , और  for his political activism and pacifism .
He was shot by Mark David Chapman at the entrance of the building where he lived , The Dakota , in  नई यॉर्क नगर on 8 दिसम्बर 1980 .
Lennon had just returned from Record Plant Studio  साथ उसके बीवी , योको  Ono .
Lennon was pronounced dead on arrival at St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital Center , where it was stated that  nobody could have जिया लिये अधिक than a few मिनट्स बाद sustaining ऐसे चोटों  .
Shortly after local news  स्टेशन reported लेनन 's मौत , crowds  gathered at Roosevelt Hospital and in front of the Dakota .
Lennon was cremated on 10  दिसम्बर 1980 at the ferncliff कब्रिस्तान in hartsdale  , New York ; the ashes were given to Ono , who chose not to hold a funeral for him .
The first report of Lennon 's death to a  u.S. नेशनल दर्शक थी घोषित by हावर्ड cosell , on  ABC 's Monday Night Football .
New Orleans ( or , locally or ; ) is a major United States port  और the largest नगर और  metropolitan area in the state of Louisiana .
The population  of the नगर थी 343,829  as of the 2010 U.S. Census .
The New Orleans  महानगर क्षेत्रफल ( नई orleans–metairie–kenner महानगर  Statistical Area ) had a population of 1,167,764 in 2010 and was the 46th largest in the United States .
The New  orleans–metairie–bogalusa संयुक्त सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल , a larger व्यापार  area , had a 2010 population of 1,214,932 .
The city is named after Orléans , a city located on the Loire River in Centre , France , and is well known for its distinct  फ्रेंच क्रियोल वास्तुकला , as खूब as इसके cross-cultural और बहुभाषी विरासत  .
New Orleans is also famous for its  भोजन , म्यूज़िक ( विशेषकर as the जन्मस्थान of जैज़ ) , और इसके  annual celebrations and festivals , most notably Mardi Gras .
The city is often  referred to as  the `` most unique '' in America .
New Orleans  is स्तिथ in southeastern louisiana  , straddling the Mississippi River .
The city and  ऑरलियन्स मोहल्ला  ( ) are .
The city and parish are bounded by the parishes of St. Tammany  to the उत्तर , st. बर्नार्ड  to the east , Plaquemines to the south and Jefferson to the south and west .
Lake Pontchartrain , part of which is included in the city limits , lies to the north  और झील borgne झूठ to the ईस्ट  .
The United States presidential election of 1968 was the 46th quadrennial  अध्यक्षीय चुनाव , आयोजित on मंगलवार , नवम्बर 5 , 1968  .
The Republican nominee , former Vice-President Richard Nixon , won the election over the Democratic  nominee , लाज़िम vice-president  Hubert Humphrey .
Nixon ran  on a अभियान कि promised to restore विधि और अनुक्रम  to the nation 's cities , torn by riots and crime .
Analysts have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning  चुनाव as it permanently disrupted the नई सौदे गठबन्धन कि था  dominated presidential politics for 36 years .
Coming four years after Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson  जीती in a ऐतिहासिक भूस्खलन , the चुनाव देखी the लाज़िम अध्यक्ष मजबूर आउट of the रेस और a रिपब्लिकन  elected for the first time in twelve years .
It was a wrenching  नेशनल अनुभव , conducted दौरान a साल of हिंसा कि शामिल the हत्या of सिविल अधिकारों नेता मार्टिन लूथर किंग , jr. , और subsequent रेस दंगे आरपार the स्वदेश , the assasination of लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्षीय  candidate Robert F. Kennedy , widespread opposition to the Vietnam War across university campuses , and violent confrontations between police and anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic National Convention as the Democratic party split again and again .
The  चुनाव प्रदर्शित the strongest तीसरा  party effort since 1912 by former Alabama Governor George Wallace , a Democrat .
Because Wallace 's  अभियान opposed संघीय हस्तक्षेप in the दक्षिण to  end school segregation , he carried the Deep South and ran well in ethnic industrial districts in the North .
This was the last election in which New York had the most votes  in the चुनावी कॉलेज  ( 43 votes ) .
After the 1970 census , California gained the most  चुनावी मत और रै remained the सबसे populous राज्य  since then .
This is the latest election where a presidential ticket won without  carrying the वाइस अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी  's home state .
Karak ( ; also known as Garak , Garrak , and Gorg ) is a village in  gamasiyab ग्रामीण ज़िला , in the सेंट्रल ज़िला of nahavand  County , Hamadan Province , Iran .
At the 2006  जनसांख्यिकी , इसके जनसांख्यिकी थी  294 , in 65 families .

Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20 , 1967  – अप्रैल 5 , 1994 ) थी an अमरीकी संगीतकार और कलाकार , बेहतरीन  known as the lead singer , guitarist and primary songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana .
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen , Washington in  1985 और स्थापित  it as part of the Seattle music scene , having its debut album Bleach released on the independent record label Sub Pop in 1989 .
After signing  साथ प्रमुख लेबल dgc रिकॉर्ड , the बैंड मिला भेदन कामयाबी  with `` Smells Like Teen Spirit `` from its second album Nevermind ( 1991 ) .
Following the success of  nevermind , निर्वाण थी labeled `` the फ्लैगशिप बैंड '' of पीढी x  , and Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation '' .
Cobain ,  however , थी प्रायः असहज और कुंठित , believing  his message and artistic vision to have been misinterpreted by the public , with his personal issues often subject to media attention .
He challenged Nirvana 's audience  साथ इसके फाइनल स्टुडियो एल्बम  In Utero ( 1993 ) .
During the last years of his life  , कोबेन struggled साथ हेरोइन व्यसन  , illness and depression .
He also  था परेशानी coping साथ उसके कीर्ति और पब्लिक चित्र  , and the professional and lifelong personal pressures surrounding himself and his wife , musician Courtney Love .
On April 8 , 1994 , Cobain was found dead at his  घर in सिएटल , the शिकार of कया थी officially शासित a आत्महत्या  by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head .
The circumstances  of उसके मौत at आयु 27 have become a टॉपिक  of public fascination and debate .
Since their debut , Nirvana , with Cobain as a songwriter , has sold  over 25 लाख एल्बम in the u.S. , और over 50 लाख  worldwide .
A millwright is a craftsman or  tradesman सगाई साथ the निर्माण और  maintenance of machinery .
More generally in the English speaking world , early millwrights were specialist carpenters who erected  मशीने प्रयुक्त in कृषि , खाना प्रसंस्करण और प्रसंस्करण lumber और  paper .
In the early part of the Industrial Revolution , their skills  यहूद दबाया into सेवा भवन the earliest संचालित वस्त्र  mills .
Modern millwrights work with steel and other materials in addition to wood and must often combine the skills of several skilled trades in order to  सफलतापूर्वक fabricate औद्योगिक मशीनरी or to इकट्ठे मशीने  from pre-fabricated parts .
The modern millwright must also be able to read blueprints and  अन्य schematics to सहायता उसे in the निर्माण  of complex systems .
Millwrights are frequently unionized ,  साथ around 45 % unionized in the us , हालांकि अनुभवी millwrights  often set themselves up as independent contractors .
The Adjustment Bureau is a 2011 American romantic action thriller film loosely based on the  फिलिप K. लंड छोटी स्टोरी , `` समायोजन टोली  `` .
the फिल्मी थी लिखा  and directed by George Nolfi and stars Matt Damon and Emily Blunt .
The cast also includes Anthony  mackie , जॉन slattery , माइकल केली , और  Terence Stamp .
The score was composed by Thomas Newman , with two songs by Richard Ashcroft ( ``  भविष्य 's उज्जवल '' लिये the खोलने अनुक्रम ; `` हैं तुम तैयार ?  '' for the closing credits ) .
Sodium azide is  the अकार्बनिक यौगिक  with the formula NaN3 .
This colorless salt is the gas-forming component  in अनेक car एयरबैग प्रणालियों  .
It is  प्रयुक्त लिये the तैयारी  of other azide compounds .
It is an ionic substance , is highly soluble in  जल , और is बहुत acutely विषाक्त  .
Double rainbow and supernumerary rainbows  on the अंदर of the प्राथमिक चाप  .
The shadow of the photographer 's head on the  नीचे marks the केन्द्र of the  rainbow circle ( antisolar point ) .
A rainbow is an optical and meteorological phenomenon that is caused by reflection of  लाइट in जल droplets in the धरती  's atmosphere , resulting in a spectrum of light appearing in the sky .
it takes the रूप  of a multicoloured arc .
rainbows caused by धूप  always appear in the section of sky directly opposite the sun .
In a `` primary rainbow '' , the arc shows red on the  बाहरी भाग और बैंगनी on the  inner side .
This rainbow is caused by light being refracted while  प्रवेश a droplet of जल , तब reflected  inside on the back of the droplet and refracted again when leaving it .
In a double rainbow , a second arc is seen  बाहर the प्राथमिक चाप , और  has the order of its colours reversed , red facing toward the other one , in both rainbows .
This second rainbow  is caused by लाइट reflecting  twice inside water droplets .
The  रूढ़िवादी पार्टी , officially the रूढ़िवादी और  Unionist Party and colloquially referred to as the Tory Party or the Tories , is a centre-right political party in the United Kingdom that espouses the philosophies of conservatism and British unionism .
it is the largest political party in the United Kingdom , being the largest single party in the House of  कॉमन्स साथ 303 mps , the largest पार्टी in लोकल सरकारी साथ 9,391 पार्षदों , और the largest  British party in the European Parliament with 25 MEPs .
It governs in  गठबन्धन साथ the उदार डेमोक्रेट ,  with party leader David Cameron as Prime Minister .
The  रूढ़िवादी पार्टी थी संस्थापित in 1834 , और थी  one of two dominant parties in the 19th century , along with the Liberal Party .
It changed its name to the Conservative and Unionist Party in 1912 after merging with the Liberal Unionist Party , although that name  is rarely प्रयुक्त और it is generally referred to as बस  the Conservative Party .
In the 1920s , the Liberal vote greatly diminished and the Labour Party  became the conservatives ' प्रमुख विरोधियों  .
Conservative Prime Ministers led governments for 57 years of the 20th century , including Winston  चर्चिल ( 1940–45 , 1951–55 ) और मार्गरेट थैचर  ( 1979–90 ) .
Thatcher 's tenure led to wide-ranging economic liberalisation and saw the  conservatives become the सबसे eurosceptic  of the three major parties .
The party was returned to government in coalition , having failed to win a  बहुमत , in 2010 अंतर्गत the अधिक `` उदार '' नेतृत्व  of David Cameron .
In the European Parliament , the Conservatives are the largest British party with 25 MEPs , who sit with the soft eurosceptic European Conservatives and Reformists ( ECR )  संसदीय समूह , जबकि the पार्टी itself is a सदस्य of the गठबंधन of यूरोपीय conservatives  and Reformists ( AECR ) Europarty .
They  हैं the third-largest पार्टी in the स्कॉटिश पार्लियामेंट  and second-largest in the Welsh Assembly .
They were formally allied to the Ulster Unionist Party ( UUP ) as part  of the ulster conservatives और unionists व्यवस्था , साथ the uup फिलहाल participating  in the five-party Northern Ireland Executive .
Destiny 's Child was an American R & B girl group whose final , and perhaps most recognizable , line-up comprised  बेयोंस नॉलेस , केली rowland और मिशेल विलियम्स  .
Formed in 1990 in Houston , Texas , Destiny 's Child members began their  musical endeavors as लड़की 's टीमे comprising , among  others , Knowles , Rowland , LaTavia Roberson and LeToya Luckett .
After years of limited  कामयाबी , वे यहूद हस्ताक्षरित to कोलंबिया रिकॉर्ड  as Destiny 's Child .
Destiny 's Child was launched into mainstream recognition following the  रिलीज of उनके best-selling दूसरी एल्बम , the लिखने 's on the वॉल  , which contained the number-one singles `` Bills , Bills , Bills `` and `` Say My Name `` .
despite नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी , the समूह थी plagued by आतंरिक विरोध और विधिक turmoil , as roberson और luckett attempted  to split from the group 's manager Mathew Knowles , citing favoritism of Knowles and Rowland , his daughter and niece , respectively .
Both Roberson and Luckett were soon  replaced साथ विलियम्स और farrah फ्रैंकलिन ; however , in 2000 , फ्रैंकलिन थी  dismissed , leaving them as a trio .
Their third album , Survivor , which contains themes the public  interpreted as a चैनल to the समूह 's अनुभव , contains the  worldwide hits `` Independent Women `` , `` Survivor `` and `` Bootylicious `` .
In 2002 , they announced a hiatus and re-united two years later  लिये the रिलीज of उनके चौथी स्टुडियो एल्बम ,  Destiny Fulfilled ( 2004 ) .
Destiny  's चाइल्ड रै बेची अधिक  than 50 million records worldwide to date .
Billboard magazine ranks the group as one of the greatest musical trios of all time , the ninth most  कामयाब artist/band of the 2000s , और लगाई the समूह 68th in इसके  All-Time Hot 100 Artists list in 2008 .
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention ( CDC ) is a United States federal agency under the Department of Health and Human  सेवाएं headquartered in druid पहाड़ियाँ , unincorporated dekalb  County , Georgia , in Greater Atlanta .
It works to protect public health and  सुरक्षा by providing सूचना to बढ़ाएँ स्वास्थ्य निर्णय , और it promotes स्वास्थ्य  through partnerships with state health departments and other organizations .
The CDC focus national attention on developing and applying disease prevention and control ( especially infectious diseases and foodborne pathogens and other microbial infections ) , environmental  स्वास्थ्य , occupational सुरक्षा और स्वास्थ्य , स्वास्थ्य प्रमोशन , चोट रोकथाम और शिक्षा क्रियाएँ designed to improve the  health of the people of the United States .
The CDC is the United States ' national public  स्वास्थ्य संस्थान और is a founding सदस्य of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ  of National Public Health Institutes .
Earthquake prediction `` is usually defined as the specification of the time , location , and magnitude of a future  भूकंप भीतर stated हद '' , और विशेषकर of `` the अगला दमदार भूकंप to occur in a प्रदेश  . ''
This can be distinguished from earthquake forecasting , which is the probabilistic assessment of general earthquake hazard ,  सहित the आवृत्ति और परिमाण of damaging भूकंप ,  in a given area over periods of years or decades .
This can be further  विशिष्ट इससे real-time भूकंप चेतावनी प्रणालियों , जिससे , upon डिटेक्शन of  a severe earthquake , can provide neighboring regions a few seconds warning of potentially significant shaking .
To be useful , an earthquake prediction must  be precise पर्याप्त to वारंट the लागत of increased एहतियात , सहित  disruption of ordinary activities and commerce , and timely enough that preparation can be made .
Predictions must also be reliable , as false alarms and cancelled alarms are not only  economically costly , लकिन seriously undermine  confidence in , and thereby the effectiveness of , any kind of warning .
With over 7,000 earthquakes around the world each year with a magnitude of 4.0 or greater , trivial success in  भूकंप भविष्यवाणी is easily प्राप्त using fear व्यापक पैरामीटर्स  of time , location , or magnitude .
However , such trivial `` successful  पूर्वानुमान '' हैं नहीं  useful .
Major earthquakes are often followed by reports that they were  पूर्वानुमानित , or at तनिक anticipated , लकिन no अर्जी of a कामयाब भविष्यवाणी  of a major earthquake has survived close inquiry .
In the 1970s there was intense optimism amongst scientists that some method of predicting earthquakes might be  मिला , लकिन by the 1990s continuing विफलता led अनेक वैज्ञानिकों to सवाल whether it  was even possible .
While many  वैज्ञानिकों स्टिल थाम कि , दिए पर्याप्त संसाधन , भविष्यवाणी might be  possible , many others maintain that earthquake prediction is inherently impossible .
Deborah Ann `` Debby '' Ryan ( born May 13 , 1993  ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री , सिंगर , संगीतकार , songwriter  and record producer .
Ryan is best known for starring as Bailey Pickett in the Disney  चैनल असली श्रेणी the सुइट जीवन  on Deck .
In 2008 , The Suite Life on Deck ranked as  tv 's शीर्ष श्रेणी among बच्चे 6-11 और the no . 2  scripted series among tweens 9-14 .
रयान प्रारंभ एक्टिंग in पेशेवर थिएटर at the आयु of सात  ; in 2007 she appeared in the Barney & Friends straight-to-DVD film Barney : Let 's Go to the Firehouse and then was discovered in a nationwide search by Disney .
She is also known for appearing in  the 2008 विशेषता फिल्मी the longshots as  Edith .
In 2009 , she guest  स्ट्रक्चर in an एपीसोड of wizards of waverly प्लेस in wizards on डेक साथ हन्ना मोंटाना as बेली पिकेट  along with her other cast mates from The Suite Life on Deck .
Then , in 2010 , she starred in the film 16 Wishes ,  जिससे थी the सबसे देखी केबल कार्यक्रम on  the day of its premiere on the Disney Channel .
16 Wishes introduced Ryan to new audiences ; the movie received high viewership in  the वयस्कों जनसांख्यिकी ( 18-34 )  .
Soon after that ,  रयान स्ट्रक्चर in the स्वतंत्र नाट्य फिल्मी  , What If ... , which premiered on August 20 , 2010 .
Ryan also starred in the new  डिज़्नी चैनल असली फिल्म , रेडियो विद्रोही , जहाँ वो portrays the भूमिका of tara  Adams , a shy 17-year-old girl who adopts the radio personality , Radio Rebel .
released फ़रवरी  17 , 2012 .
Ryan  सितारों in the titular भूमिका in the डिज़्नी  Channel Original Series , Jessie .
Stührling  tourbillon गति (  ) .
In  horology , a tourbillon ( ; `` whirlwind  '' ) is an addition to the mechanics of a watch escapement .
Developed around 1795 by the French-Swiss watchmaker Abraham-Louis Breguet from an earlier idea by the English chronometer maker John Arnold , a tourbillon aims to  काउंटर the प्रभाव of गम्भीरता by mounting the escapement और संतुलन व्हील in a घूर्णन पिंजरा , to negate the प्रभाव of गम्भीरता जब the  timepiece ( thus the escapement ) is stuck in a certain position .
Originally an attempt to improve accuracy , tourbillons are still included in some  महंगी आधुनिक घड़ियाँ as a विलक्षणता और demonstration  of watchmaking virtuosity .
The  यांत्रिकी is प्रायः उजागर  on the watch 's face to show it off .
The Windows Installer ( previously known as Microsoft Installer ) is a software  घटक प्रयुक्त लिये the संस्थापना , मेंटेनेंस , और हटाना of तन्त्र on आधुनिक  Microsoft Windows systems .
The installation information , and often the files themselves , are packaged in installation packages , loosely relational  databases संरचित as com संरचित storages और commonly ज्ञात as `` msi फाइलें '' , इससे  their default file extension .
Windows Installer contains significant changes  इससे इसके पूर्ववर्ती , सेटअप  API .
New features include a GUI framework and automatic  पीढी of the uninstallation  sequence .
Windows Installer is positioned as an  वैकल्पिक to stand-alone executable installer  frameworks such as older versions of InstallShield and NSIS .
Microsoft encourages third parties to use Windows Installer as the basis for  संस्थापना frameworks , so कि वे synchronize correctly साथ अन्य installers और रखना the आतंरिक  database of installed products consistent .
Important  सुविधाएँ ऐसे as rollback और versioning  depend on a consistent internal database for reliable operation .
furthermore , खिड़कियाँ installer facilitates  the principle of least privilege by performing software installations by proxy for unprivileged users .
Four Loko is a line of alcoholic beverages ,  originally marketed as उर्जा पेय , बेची by phusion  Projects of Chicago , Illinois .
Phusion operates as  पेय चार brewing  Company .
Four Loko , the company 's most  लोकप्रिय पेय , debuted in the संयुक्त राज्य  market in 2005 .
It is now  बेची in 48 राज्य , और in कनाडा ,  The Bahamas , Bolivia , Honduras , and Europe .
The  नाम `` चार '' is निकला इससे  the original energy drink 's four main ingredients : alcohol , caffeine , taurine , and guarana .
Four branded products have been the object of legal , ethical , and health concerns related to the  कम्पनी allegedly विपणन उन्हें to the underaged  and the purported danger of combining alcohol and caffeine .
After the beverage was banned in several states , a product reintroduction  in दिसम्बर 2010 removed कैफीन , taurine , और guarana as संघटक , और the malt पेय is no  longer marketed as an energy drink .
The neck of a guitar showing the nut  ( in the पृष्ठभूमि , coloured श्वेत ) और पहला  four metal frets .
A fret is a  उठाया तत्व on the  neck of a stringed instrument .
frets प्रायः extend  across the full width of the neck .
On most modern western  fretted यंत्र  , frets are metal strips inserted into the fingerboard .
On some historical instruments and non-European  यंत्र , frets हैं बना of टुकड़े  of string tied around the neck .
Frets divide the neck into  फिक्स्ड खण्ड at intervals सम्बन्धित to a musical  framework .
On  यंत्र ऐसे as guitars , प्रत्येक fret represents  one semitone in the standard western system where one octave is divided into twelve semitones .
Fret is often  प्रयुक्त as a क्रिया , अर्थ  simply `` to press down the string behind a fret . ''
fretting प्रायः refers to the frets  and/or their system of placement .
वहीँ थी खपत of दारू  both during and after prohibition .
The 18th Amendment prohibited the production  , वितरण और बिक्री of alcoholic पेय in the संयुक्त राज्य और थी widely समर्थित  by the American public when it went into effect in 1920 .
The temperance movement had popularized the belief that alcohol was the major cause of most personal and  सोशल समस्याएं और निषेध थी देखी as the समाधान to the  nation 's poverty , crime , violence , and other ills .
Upon ratification of the amendment , the famous  इंजीलवादी बिली संडे कहा कि ``  The slums will soon be only a memory .
We will  फेरे हमारी जेलों into  factories and our jails into storehouses and corncribs . ''
(  compare christianity  and alcohol . )
Since alcohol was to be banned and since it was seen as the cause of most , if not all ,  अपराधों , कुछ समुदायों बेची उनके  jails .
The nation was highly optimistic and the leading prohibitionist in the United States Congress  confidently asserted कि `` वहीँ is as much मौका of repealing the eighteenth amendment as वहीँ is लिये  a hummingbird to fly to the planet Mars with the Washington Monument tied to its tail.”
The metre ( meter in American English ) , ( SI unit  प्रतीक : m ; si आयाम  symbol : L ) , is the fundamental unit of length in the International System of Units ( SI ) .
Originally intended to be one ten-millionth of the distance from the  धरती 's equator to the उत्तर ध्रुव ( at समुद्र स्तर ) , इसके परिभाषा  has been periodically refined to reflect growing knowledge of metrology .
Since 1983 , it has  महरूम पारिभाषित as `` the लंबाई  of the path travelled by light in vacuum during a time interval of 1/299,792,458 of a second . ''
Geologists exploring Jurassic sedimentary rocks in Makhtesh  gadol , negev मरुस्थल  , Israel
geologists explaining  the importance of volcanic ash layers to students on field in Iceland
A geologist is a scientist who studies the solid and liquid  पदार्थ कि constitutes the धरती as खूब as the  processes and history that has shaped it .
Geologists  प्रायः engage in अध्ययन  geology .
Geologists , studying more of an  लागू विज्ञान than a सैद्धांतिक एक , जरूर  approach Geology using physics , chemistry and biology as well as other sciences .
Geologists , compared to scientists engaged in  अन्य फ़ील्ड , हैं generally अधिक उजागर to the बाहरी than रहकर  in laboratories ; although some geologists prefer to perform most of their studies in the lab .
Geologists are engaged in exploration for mining  कंपनियाँ in ढूंढें  of metals , oils , and other Earth resources .
They are also in the  forefront of प्राकृतिक जोखिमों और आपदाओं चेतावनी और शमन , अध्ययन भूकंप , volcanic कार्यकलाप , tsunamis , मौसम तूफ़ान  , and the like ; their studies are used to warn the general public of the occurrence of these events .
Currently , geologists  हैं भी सगाई in the चर्चा of जलवायु बदलें , as वे पढ़ाई  the history and evidence for this Earth process .
Below is a comprehensive drill and tap  आकार चार्ट लिये सब drills , इम्पीरियल  and metric , and taps up to 36.5 mm .
Modern vacuum  tubes , ज़्यादातर miniature  style
In electronics , a  वैक्यूम ट्यूब , इलेक्ट्रॉन ट्यूब ( in उत्तर अमेरिका ) , तापायनिक वाल्व , ट्यूब , or वाल्व  is a device controlling electric current through a vacuum in a sealed container .
The container is often thin  पारदर्शी कांच in a roughly  cylindrical shape .
The simplest vacuum  ट्यूब , the डायोड , is essentially  an incandescent light bulb with an added electrode inside .
When  the बल्ब 's फिलामेंट is heated white-hot , electrons हैं  `` boiled '' off its surface and into the vacuum inside the bulb .
If the electrode -- called a `` plate '' or `` anode '' -- is made more  धनात्मक than the hot फिलामेंट , a सीधा वर्तमान बहती  through the vacuum to the electrode ( a demonstration of the Edison effect ) .
As the current only flows in one  दिशा , it makes it संभावित to बदलें  an alternating current applied to the filament to direct current .
The introduction of a third electrode , a grid  between the फिलामेंट और the थाली  , yields another function .
A voltage applied  to the ग्रिड नियंत्रण  the current flowing from the filament to the plate .
Thus , it allows the device to be used as an  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक प्रवर्धक .
Vacuum tubes are thus used  लिये rectification , प्रवर्धन , switching  , or similar processing or creation of electrical signals .
The vast majority of modern day tubes consist of a sealed container  साथ a वैक्यूम अंदर , और essentially rely on तापायनिक उत्सर्जन of electrons  from a hot filament or a cathode heated by the filament .
Some exceptions to this are dealt with in the  खण्ड परिचय gas-filled  tubes below .
Vacuum tubes were critical to the development of electronic technology , which drove the expansion and commercialization of radio broadcasting , television , radar ,  ध्वनि reinforcement , ध्वनि रिकॉर्डिंग और जनन , विशाल टेलीफोन संजाल  , analog and digital computers , and industrial process control .
Although some applications had counterparts using earlier technologies such as the  चिंगारी गैप ट्रांसमीटर or mechanical कंप्यूटर , it थी the आविष्कार of the वैक्यूम ट्यूब साथ तीन  electrodes ( called a triode ) and its capability of electronic amplification that made these technologies widespread and practical .
In most applications , solid-state devices such as  transistors और अन्य सेमीकंडक्टर  devices have replaced tubes .
Solid-state devices last longer and are smaller , more  कुशल , अधिक विश्वसनीय , और सस्ता than tubes  .
Tubes can be fragile , sometimes generate significant unwanted heat , and can take many seconds—many minutes in critical applications—after  powering on to गरम to a तापमान जहाँ वे  perform within operational tolerance .
However , tubes still find uses where solid-state devices have not been developed , are impractical , or where a tube has superior performance , as with some devices in  पेशेवर ऑडियो और high-power रेडियो ट्रांसमीटरों .
Tubes are  स्टिल उत्पादित लिये  such applications .
Tubes are less likely than semiconductor devices to be destroyed  by the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक पल्स उत्पादित by नाभिकीय विस्फोट और geomagnetic  storms produced by giant solar flares .
Skittles is a brand of  fruit-flavoured मिठाई , फिलहाल उत्पादित और marketed by the wm .  Wrigley Jr. Company , a division of Mars , Inc .
They have hard  शुगर शेल जिससे carry  the letter S .
The inside is mainly  शुगर , मकई सिरप , और hydrogenated ताड़ कर्नेल आयल साथ साथ फल रस  , citric acid , and natural and artificial flavours .
The confectionery has been sold in a variety of flavour  संग्रहण , ऐसे as तीव्र और जंगली बेरी  .
Sir Winston Leonard Spencer-Churchill  , ( 30 नवम्बर 1874 – 24 जनवरी 1965 ) थी a अंग्रेजों राजनेता  who was the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1940 to 1945 and again from 1951 to 1955 .
Widely regarded as  एक of the महानतम wartime नेताओ of the 20th सदी ,  Churchill was also an officer in the British Army , a historian , a writer , and an artist .
He is the only British Prime Minister in history to have received the Nobel  पुरस्कार in साहित्य , और थी भी the पहला व्यक्ति to be बना an मानद नागरिक of the संयुक्त राज्य  .
Churchill was born into an  वैभवशाली परिवार as the पोता  of the 7th Duke of Marlborough .
His father ,  रब randolph चर्चिल , थी a charismatic राजनेता जो परोसा as  Chancellor of the Exchequer ; his mother , Jennie Jerome , was an American socialite .
As a young army officer , he saw action in British  इण्डिया , the सूडान , और the  Second Boer War .
He gained fame as a war correspondent and wrote books about  उसके अभियान  .
At the forefront of  राजनीती लिये पचास  years , he held many political and cabinet positions .
Before the First World War , he served as President of the Board of Trade , Home Secretary , and First Lord of the Admiralty  as भाग of the asquith उदार  government .
During the war , he continued as First Lord of the Admiralty until the disastrous Gallipoli Campaign caused his departure  इससे सरकारी  .
He then briefly resumed active army service on the  पश्चिमी सामने  as commander of the 6th Battalion of the Royal Scots Fusiliers .
He returned to government as Minister of  munitions , सचिव of राज्य लिये युद्ध , और सचिव  of State for Air .
After  the युद्ध , चर्चिल परोसा as चांसलर of the exchequer in the रूढ़िवादी ( baldwin ) सरकारी of 1924–29 , controversially returning  the pound sterling in 1925 to the gold standard at its pre-war parity , a move widely seen as creating deflationary pressure on the UK economy .
Also controversial was his  विपक्ष to increased घर नियम लिये इण्डिया और उसके प्रतिरोध  to the 1936 abdication of Edward VIII .
Out of office and politically `` in the wilderness '' during the 1930s , Churchill took the  सीसे in चेतावनी परिचय नाजी जर्मनी और in campaigning  for rearmament .
On the outbreak  of the दूसरी संसार युद्ध , he थी  again appointed First Lord of the Admiralty .
Following the resignation of  नेविली चेम्बरलेन on 10 may  1940 , Churchill became Prime Minister .
His steadfast refusal to consider  शिकस्त , आत्मसमर्पण , or a सुलह सलाम helped  inspire British resistance , especially during the difficult early days of the War when Britain stood alone among European countries in its active opposition to Adolf Hitler .
Churchill was particularly noted for his speeches  और रेडियो प्रसारण , जिससे helped inspire the अंग्रेजों  people .
He led  ब्रिटेन as प्रधान मंत्री  until victory over Nazi Germany had been secured .
After the Conservative Party lost the 1945 election  , he became नेता of the विपक्ष to the श्रमिक (  Attlee ) government .
After  जीतना the 1951 चुनाव , he again  became Prime Minister , before retiring in 1955 .
Upon his death , Elizabeth II granted him the honour of a state funeral , which saw one of  the largest सभाओं of संसार कूटनीतिज्ञों in  history .
Named the Greatest Briton of all time in a 2002 poll , Churchill is widely regarded as  होने among the सबसे  influential people in British history .
Ruby Gloom is  an एनिमेटेड  television show based on an apparel franchise .
The show is  उत्पादित by nelvana और began airing  on October 13 , 2006 in Canada on the network YTV .
It stars the voices of  सारा gadon , एमिली  Hampshire , and Peter Keleghan .
The Ford Focus  is a कॉम्पैक्ट car ( c-segment in यूरोपीय )  manufactured by the Ford Motor Company since 1998 .
Ford began  बिक्री of the फ़ोकस to यूरोपीय  in July 1998 and in North America during 1999 for the 2000 model year .
In Europe ,  दक्षिण अमेरिका , उत्तर अमेरिका और दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी  , the Focus replaced the various versions of the Ford Escort sold in those markets .
In Asia and  australasia , it replaced  the Ford Laser .
As of the first half of  2012 , the फ़ोकस surpassed the टोयोटा कोरोला to become  the world 's best selling automobile nameplate .
The Focus has been considered  एक of the 50 महानतम गाड़ियाँ of the पास्ट पचास सालो  by British magazine CAR .
An agar  थाली -- an उदाहरण of a बैक्टीरियल  growth medium .
Specifically , it is a streak  थाली ; the नारंगी लाइनों और dots  are formed by bacterial colonies .
A growth medium or culture medium is a  द्रव or gel designed to support the विकास of microorganisms  or cells , or small plants like the moss Physcomitrella patens .
There are different types of media for growing  अलग प्रकार of कोशिकाएं  .
There are two major types of growth media : those used for cell culture , which use  विशिष्ट कोशिका प्रकार निकला इससे पौधे or पशु , और microbiological संस्कृति , जिससे हैं प्रयुक्त लिये growing microorganisms  , such as bacteria or yeast .
The most common growth media for microorganisms are nutrient broths and agar plates ;  specialized मीडिया हैं sometimes जरूरी  for microorganism and cell culture growth .
कुछ जीवों , termed सुकुमार जीवों , आवश्यकता specialized  environments due to complex nutritional requirements .
Viruses , for example ,  हैं obligate intracellular  parasites and require a growth medium containing living cells .
A talent agent , or booking agent , is a person who finds jobs for actors , authors , film directors ,  संगीतकारों , मॉडल , निर्माता , पेशेवर एथलीट , लेखक और अन्य  people in various entertainment businesses .
An  एजेंट भी defends , supports  and promotes the interest of his/her clients .
Agents  can नहीं उपज उनके अपना shows  due to conflict of interest .
A talent agent must be  परिचित साथ उनके क्लाइंट  .
An agent has to know what kind of work the client  can और can नहीं do in अनुक्रम to मैच उन्हें साथ  various jobs .
Having an agent is not required , but  करता सहायता  the artist in getting jobs .
In many cases casting directors , or other businesses , go to talent agencies  to ढूँढें कलाकारों वे हैं looking  for .
The agent is paid a percentage of the star 's earnings  ( typically 10 % ) .
Agents  sometimes होगा be referred to as  `` 10 percenters . ''
There  हैं अलग regulations कि govern अलग प्रकार of एजेंटों कि हैं  established by artist 's unions and the legal jurisdiction in which the agent operates .
There are also  पेशेवर संगठन  that license talent agencies .
Since the decline in viewership in theaters , from the 1950s to 1960s , this caused a monumental shift in how studios would produce  films और यूँ reducing the लागत of विशेष और महंगी अभिनेताओं  .
Actors and actresses were working for the studios but were not owned by one major studio entity and so were able  to कार्य on भीतर उनके समय और साथ अन्य studios  .
Because of this , agents were now seen  as a necessity बजाय of an विकल्प  .
Agents now became third parties  कि negotiated between studios  and clients , this making their services imperative between each party .
Since talent agencies are working with lucrative contracts , all talent agencies must be licensed under special sections of the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया मजदूर कोड , जिससे काल्स an एजेंट a `` व्यक्ति or निगम जो engages in the occupation of  procuring , offering , promising , or attempting to procure employment for artist or artists . ''
Mars has two known  moons , phobos  and Deimos , which are thought to be captured asteroids .
Both  satellites यहूद खोजा in 1877  by Asaph Hall and are named after the characters Phobos ( panic/fear ) and Deimos ( terror/dread ) who , in Greek mythology , accompanied their father Ares , god of war , into battle .
Ares was known as  मंगल to the romans  .
It is  संभावित कि मंगल may have moons छोटी than 50 - 100  meters and a dust ring between Phobos and Deimos may be present but none have been discovered .
In law enforcement parlance , the term murder book  refers to the मामला संचिका of a हत्या  investigation .
Typically , murder books include crime scene photographs and sketches ,  पोस्टमार्टम और forensic रिपोर्ट्स , transcripts of जांचकर्ताओं  ' notes and witness interviews .
The murder book encapsulates the complete paper trail of a murder investigation  , इससे the समय the हत्या is पहला reported through  the arrest of a suspect .
Law enforcement  एजेंसियों typically गार्ड हत्या किताबे carefully , और it is असामान्य लिये नागरिकों to be  given unfettered access to these kinds of records , especially for unsolved cases .
a melon  baller
Melon balls are balls of melon made using a melon baller that varies from around 1 centimeter to 3 centimeters  ( परिचय 3/8 इंच  to 1 inch ) .
वे हैं generally  used in fruit salad .
A KSA , or Knowledge , Skills , and Abilities , is a series of  कथा कथन कि हैं जरूरी जब applying to  United States Federal government job openings .
KSAs are used to determine , along with resumes , who the  बेहतरीन आवेदकों हैं जब अनेक उम्मीदवार  qualify for a job .
The knowledge  , कौशल और abilities ( ksas ) जरुरी लिये the कामयाब प्रदर्शन  of a position are contained on each job vacancy announcement .
In 2009 the Office of Personal Management asked federal  एजेंसियों to रोकें requiring जॉब आवेदकों to भरण आउट the questionnaires  , to be phased out within a year .
KSAs are brief and focused essays about one 's career and educational background  कि presumably qualify एक to perform the कर्तव्य of the स्थिति  being applied for .
A knowledge , skills , and abilities ( KSA ) is a concise  निबन्ध परिचय एक 's हुनर और विशेषज्ञता और सम्बन्धित अनुभवों ( कार्य , शिक्षा , स्वयंसेवी  ) and accomplishments .
A series of KSA statements are usually  जरूरी जब applying लिये सबसे संघीय सरकारी  and some state and city government jobs .
KSAs are used as a yardstick to assess the capabilities of  a prospective आवेदक in शर्तें of संभावित क्षमता to perform  the duties of the job .
Most government hiring  officials dekh लिये a छोटी , कुरकुरे और साफ ksa कि emphasizes परिणाम  or accomplishments obtained in previous work .
KSA statements are also  ज्ञात as मूल्यांकन कारकों  .
Other  एजेंसियों sometimes कॉल उन्हें `` दरजा कारकों '' , `` विशेषता रैंकिंग कारकों '' , `` ज्ञान , abilities  , skills and Other Characteristics '' , or `` Job Elements '' .
The name can be just a name but often it influences  सामग्री और लंबाई of the  essay .
Every agency has its own  regulations लकिन सबसे of the समय the प्रत्येक ksa फ़ैक्टर  should be 1/2 to 11⁄2 pages long .
The below definitions are  पारिभाषित by the u.S. दफ्तर  of Personnel Management :
Knowledge , Skills , and Abilities ( KSAs ) - The attributes required to perform a job and are  generally demonstrated through qualifying सेवा  , education , or training .
ज्ञान - is a देह of सूचना लागू  directly to the performance of a function .
Skill - Is an  observable competence to  perform a learned psychomotor act .
Ability - Is competence to perform an observable behavior or  a बर्ताव कि परिणाम  in an observable product .
The scoring of KSA essays is based  on a स्केल of इससे  one to 100 .
Job applicants must score  ऊपर 70 to be माना  for the position .
High scores are derived through answering the KSA question as specifically as possible , providing examples from previous employment  or प्रशिक्षण कि  clearly demonstrate you meet the qualifications .
When  applying to संघीय सरकारी स्थितियाँ , a संघीय  Resume is usually required in addition to KSA statements .

Love Always is the debut album of American R & B duo K-Ci & JoJo ,  released on जून 17 , 1997 , by mca  Records .
It was recorded at various studios in New York and  the लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल in 1996  and 1997 .
It was produced  by जोजो और अनेक अन्य , सहित devante  Swing , James Mtume , and Jeff Redd .
The duo were originally a part  of jodeci पहले इस एल्बम .
The album peaked at sixth on the US Billboard 200  और भी appeared on अंतरराष्ट्रीय चार्ट  .
The single `` All My Life `` charted number one in multiple countries , and all four of the album 's singles peaked above the top 25  in the us hot r & b/hip-hop गीतों और the  New Zealand Top 40 Singles .
Love Always was received favorably by critics , who  praised the भाइयो ' गायन  ability and the production .
The album has been certified three times  प्लेटिनम by the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ of अमेरिका ( riaa ) और  gold by Music Canada and IFPI Sweden .
As of June 1999 it  था बेची 2.9 लाख नक़ल  in the United States .
A variable-rate mortgage , adjustable-rate mortgage ( ARM ) , or tracker mortgage  is a बंधक ऋण साथ the  interest rate on the note periodically adjusted based on an index which reflects the cost to the lender of borrowing on the credit markets .
The loan may be  offered at the lender  's standard variable rate/ base rate .
There may be a direct and  legally-defined कड़ी to the underlying अनुक्रमणिका , लकिन जहाँ  the lender offers no specific link to the underlying market or index the rate can be changed at the lender 's discretion .
The term ``  variable-rate बंधक '' is सबसे आम बाहर the संयुक्त राज्य , whilst in the संयुक्त राज्य , `` adjustable-rate  mortgage '' is most common , and implies a mortgage regulated by the Federal government , with caps on charges .
In many countries , adjustable rate mortgages are the  norm , और in ऐसे स्थान , may बस be referred  to as mortgages .
Among the most common indices are the rates on  1-year constant-maturity राजकोष ( cmt  ) securities , the Cost of Funds Index ( COFI ) , and the London Interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ) .
A few lenders  उपयोग उनके अपना लागत of निधि  as an index , rather than using other indices .
इस is किया to ensure a स्थिर हाशिया लिये the  lender , whose own cost of funding will usually be related to the index .
Consequently , payments made by the borrower  may बदलें over समय साथ the बदलना ब्याज रेट (  alternatively , the term of the loan may change ) .
This is distinct from the graduated payment mortgage , which  offers बदलना भुगतान amounts  but a fixed interest rate .
Other forms of mortgage loan include the interest  तभी बंधक , the फिक्स्ड रेट बंधक , the ऋणात्मक  amortization mortgage , and the balloon payment mortgage .
समायोज्य दरों ट्रांसफ़र भाग of the  interest rate risk from the lender to the borrower .
They can be used where unpredictable interest rates make fixed  रेट लोन मुश्किल to obtain  .
The borrower benefits if the interest  रेट जलप्रपात लकिन loses if the ब्याज  rate increases .
The borrower  लाभ इससे घटाया मार्जिन to the underlying लागत  of borrowing compared to fixed or capped rate mortgages .
The assassination of Robert Francis `` Bobby '' Kennedy , a United States Senator  और bhai of assassinated अध्यक्ष जॉन fitzgerald `` जोकर '' कैनेडी , took प्लेस shortly बाद मध्यरात्रि on जून  5 , 1968 , in Los Angeles , California , during the campaign season for the United States Presidential election , 1968 .
After winning the California and South Dakota primary elections for the Democratic nomination for President of the United States , Kennedy was shot as he walked  through the रसोईघर of the दूत होटल और died in the शुभ सामरी  Hospital twenty-six hours later .
Sirhan Sirhan , a 24-year-old Palestinian / Jordanian  अप्रवासी , थी convicted of कैनेडी 's हत्या और is सेवारत a  life sentence for the crime .
Sirhan  's वकील have released कथन  claiming evidence that he was framed .
The shooting was  अंकित on ऑडियो टेप by a freelance समाचारपत्र  reporter , and the aftermath was captured on film .
Kennedy 's body lay in repose at St. Patrick 's Cathedral in  नई यॉर्क लिये दो दिनों पहले a अंत्येष्टि द्रव्यमान  was held on June 8 .
His body was interred near his  bhai जॉन at आर्लिंगटन  National Cemetery .
His  मौत prompted the सुरक्षा of अध्यक्षीय  candidates by the United States Secret Service .
Hubert Humphrey went on to win the Democratic nomination  लिये the प्रेसिडेंसी , लकिन ultimately narrowly  lost the election to Richard Nixon .
As with his  bhai जोकर 's मौत , bobby 's हत्या  and the circumstances surrounding it have spawned a variety of conspiracy theories .
As of 2013 Kennedy  remains एक of तभी दो बैठे संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटरों  to be assassinated ( the other being Huey Long ) .
The Modern Age of Comic Books is an informal name for the period in the history of  मुख्यधारा अमरीकी कॉमिक किताबे generally माना to पिछला इससे  the mid-1980s until present day .
In this period , comic book characters generally became darker and more psychologically complex , creators became  better-known और क्रियाशील in बदलना the उद्योग , स्वतंत्र कॉमिक्स flourished , और larger प्रकाशन घरों became  more commercialized .
An  वैकल्पिक नाम लिये इस काल is the अंधेरा आयु of  Comic Books , due to the popularity and artistic influence of grim titles , such as and Watchmen .
When Harry Met Sally ... is a 1989 American  रोमांटिक कॉमेडी फिल्मी लिखा by नोरा ephron  and directed by Rob Reiner .
It stars Billy Crystal as Harry and  मेग रयान as सैली  .
The story follows the title characters from the time they meet just before sharing a  cross-country ड्राइव , through बारह सालो or so of मौका मुठभेड़ों  in New York City .
The film raises the question `` Can men and women ever just be friends ? '' and advances many ideas about relationships  कि became household अवधारणाओं  , such as those of the `` '' girlfriend and the `` transitional person '' .
The  origins of the फिल्मी आए इससे reiner 's  return to single life after a divorce .
An interview Ephron conducted with Reiner  provided the आधार  for Harry .
Sally  थी आधारित on ephron और  some of her friends .
Crystal came on  फलक और बना उसके अपना योगदान to the  screenplay , making Harry funnier .
Ephron  supplied the ढांचा of the फिल्मी साथ much of the संवाद  based on the real-life friendship between Reiner and Crystal .
The soundtrack consists of standards performed by Harry Connick , Jr. ,  साथ a बिग बैंड और ऑर्केस्ट्रा arranged by  Marc Shaiman .
Connick won his  पहला ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन जैज़ पुरूष  Vocal Performance .
Columbia Pictures released the film using the `` platform '' technique , which  शामिल खोलने it in a few चुनें शहरों , letting धनात्मक शब्द of मुँह generate ब्याज  , and then gradually expanding distribution over subsequent weeks .
When Harry Met Sally ... grossed a  कुल of us $ 92 .8 लाख  in North America .
Ephron received a British Academy Film Award , an Oscar nomination , and a Writers Guild of  अमेरिका पुरस्कार नामांकन  for her screenplay .
The film is ranked 23rd on AFI 's 100 Years ... 100 Laughs list of the top comedy films in American  सिनेमा और क्रमांक 60 on ब्रावो  's `` 100 Funniest Movies '' .
In early 2004 , the film was  adapted लिये the स्टेज in  a production starring Luke Perry and Alyson Hannigan .

Hamburger Helper is a line of packaged food products primarily consisting  of boxed पास्ता bundled साथ a पैकेट  or packets of powdered sauce or seasonings .
The contents of each box  हैं संयुक्त साथ browned मैदान बीफ  , water and milk to create a complete dish .
The product line also features products with other  starches ऐसे as राइस or आलू बजाय of पास्ता  .
it is बना  by General Mills .
Although the classic boxed Hamburger Helper products only supply the starch item and the sauce packets , some varieties  of the उत्पाद शामिल  ground beef .
These include  a frozen खाना लकीर , जिससे सुविधाएँ कुछ of the ब्रांड 's क्लासिक किस्में in a पूरा  meal kit form , with frozen ground beef and frozen sauce packaged separately from the noodles in the same bag .
वहीँ is भी an `` तत्काल '' संस्करण of हैमबर्गर हेल्पर containing  dehydrated meat , noodles and seasonings in a small pouch , requiring only water to be added .
The Hamburger Helper mascot is the `` Helping Hand '' , an anthropomorphic animated , four fingered left-hand  दस्ताने , जिससे appears in the  product 's television commercials and on the packages .

It is the only dwarf  ग्रह in the  asteroid belt .
