A dwarf planet is a planetary-mass object that is neither a  ग्रह nor  a satellite .
More explicitly , the International Astronomical Union ( IAU ) defines a dwarf planet as a  celestial देह in सीधा कक्षा of the सूर्य कि is विशाल पर्याप्त लिये इसके आकार to be नियंत्रित  by gravitation , but that unlike a planet has not cleared its orbital region of other objects .
The term dwarf planet was adopted in 2006 as part of a three-way  categorization of लाशें orbiting the सूर्य , brought परिचय by an बढ़ाएँ in discoveries of trans-neptunian  objects that rivaled Pluto in size , and finally precipitated by the discovery of an even more massive object , Eris .
This classification states that bodies large enough to have cleared the  neighbourhood of उनके कक्षा हैं पारिभाषित as ग्रह , जबकि those कि हैं नहीं विशाल पर्याप्त to be rounded by उनके अपना गम्भीरता  are defined as small Solar System bodies .
बौना ग्रह  come in between .
The exclusion of dwarf planets from the roster of planets by the IAU has been both praised and criticized ; it was  कहा to be the `` सही निर्णय '' by माइक भूरा , जो खोजा और अन्य नई बौना ग्रह , लकिन  has been rejected by Alan Stern , who had coined the term dwarf planet in 1990 .
The IAU currently recognizes five dwarf  ग्रह in the सौर प्रणाली  : , Pluto , , , and .
However , only two of these bodies , Ceres  और प्लूटो , have महरूम observed in पर्याप्त विवरण  to demonstrate that they fit the definition .
Eris has been  स्वीकृत as a बौना ग्रह  because it is more massive than Pluto .
The IAU subsequently decided that unnamed  trans-neptunian वस्तुएँ साथ an निरपेक्ष परिमाण उज्जवल than +1 ( और hence a व्यास of ≥838 km assuming a  geometric albedo of ≤1 ) are to be named under the assumption that they are dwarf planets .
The only two such objects known at the time , Makemake and Haumea , went through this naming procedure and  यहूद घोषित  to be dwarf planets .
It is suspected that  another सौ or so ज्ञात वस्तुएँ  in the Solar System are dwarf planets .
Estimates are that up to 200 dwarf planets may be found when the  संपूर्ण प्रदेश ज्ञात as the kuiper बेल्ट is छान , और कि the क्रमांक may exceed 10,000 जब वस्तुएँ बिखरे  outside the Kuiper belt are considered .
Individual astronomers recognize several of these , and in August  2011 माइक भूरा प्रकाशित a सूची of 390 प्रत्याशी  objects , ranging from `` nearly certain '' to `` possible '' dwarf planets . '
Brown identifies nine known objects – the five accepted by the  iau प्लस , , , और – as `` वस्तुतः निश्चित '' , साथ  another two dozen highly likely , and there are probably a hundred or so such objects in total .
The classification of bodies in other planetary systems with  the विशेषताएँ of बौना ग्रह  has not been addressed .
A debit card ( also known as a bank card or check card ) is a plastic payment card that  provides the cardholder इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अभिगम to उसके or उसके बैंको खाता  ( s ) at a financial institution .
Some cards have a stored  मान साथ जिससे a भुगतान is बना ,  while most relay a message to the cardholder 's bank to withdraw funds from a payee 's designated bank account .
The card ,  जहाँ स्वीकृत  , can be used instead of cash when making purchases .
In some cases , the primary account number is assigned exclusively for use  on the अंतरजाल और वहीँ is no शारीरिक  card .
In many countries , the use of debit cards has become so widespread that their volume has overtaken or entirely  replaced cheques और , in कुछ उदाहरण ,  cash transactions .
The development of debit cards  , नापसंद क्रेडिट ताश और चार्ज ताश , रै generally महरूम देश विशिष्ट resulting  in a number of different systems around the world , which were often incompatible .
चूंकि the mid-2000s , a क्रमांक  of initiatives have allowed debit cards issued in one country to be used in other countries and allowed their use for internet and phone purchases .
Unlike credit and charge cards , payments using a debit card are immediately transferred from the cardholder 's  designated बैंको खाता , बजाय of उन्हें paying the धन वापस  at a later date .
Debit cards usually also allow for instant  वापसी of नकदी , एक्टिंग as the  ATM card for withdrawing cash .
Merchants may also offer cashback  सुविधाएं to ग्राहक , जहाँ  a customer can withdraw cash along with their purchase .
Francois Henri `` Jack '' LaLanne ( September 26 , 1914 - January 23 , 2011 ) was an American fitness , exercise , and nutritional expert and motivational speaker who is sometimes called ``  the गॉडफादर of फ़िटनेस '' और the `` पहला फ़िटनेस सुपरहीरो . ''
He described himself as being a `` sugarholic '' and  a `` जंक खाना junkie '' जबतक he थी  15 .
He also had behavioral problems , but `` turned his life around '' after listening to a public lecture by Paul  ब्रैग , a well-known पोषण स्पीकर .
During his career ,  he आए to मानना कि the देश 's overall स्वास्थ्य depended on the स्वास्थ्य of इसके  population , writing that `` physical culture and nutrition — is the salvation of America . ''
Decades before health  और फ़िटनेस began होने प्रचारित by हस्तियाँ जैसे जेन फोंडा और रिचर्ड सीमन्स ,  LaLanne was already widely recognized for publicly preaching the health benefits of regular exercise and a good diet .
He  प्रकाशित numerous किताबे on  fitness and hosted a fitness television show between 1953 and 1985 .
As early as 1936 , at age 21 , he opened one of the nation 's first fitness gyms in Oakland ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया , जिससे became a प्रोटोटाइप लिये दर्जनों of समान gyms using उसके नाम .
One of his 1950s television exercise programs was aimed toward women ,  जिसको he भी प्रोत्साहित to जुड़ें उसके स्वास्थ्य क्लब  .
He invented a number of exercise machines ,  सहित leg-extension और चरखी  devices .
Besides producing his own series of  वीडियो , he coached the बुजुर्ग और निष्क्रिय नहीं to forgo कसरत , believing  it would enable them to enhance their strength .
LaLanne also gained recognition for his success as a bodybuilder , as well as for his prodigious feats of  शक्ति  .
Arnold Schwarzenegger once stated , `` That  जोकर lalanne 's an एनिमल ! , '' बाद lalanne , at 54 , ताल a 21-year-old  Schwarzenegger `` badly '' in an informal contest .
On  the अवसर of lalanne 's मौत , श्वार्ज़नेगर credited lalanne  for being `` an apostle for fitness '' by inspiring `` billions all over the world to live healthier lives , '' and , as governor of California , had earlier placed him on his Governor 's Council on Physical Fitness .
Steve Reeves credited LaLanne as his  प्रेरणा to निर्माण उसके muscular  physique while keeping a slim waist .
He was  inducted to the कैलिफ़ोर्निया हॉल of कीर्ति  and has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
Air forces of  सबसे of the देशों  use system similar to Armies .
However , the RAF and the air forces of many Commonwealth countries , or those formerly under a British influence , use a different set of ranks loosely based on naval equivalents ; Lieutenant , Commander , Captain and Commodore are prefixed for air force  उपयोग साथ उड़ान , wing , समूह और एयर , क्रमशः ( the पहला तीन होने the इकाई कि वे प्रयुक्त  to command ) .
Penélope Cruz Sánchez ( ; born April 28 ,  1974 ) is a स्पेनी अभिनेत्री  .
Signed by an agent at age 15 , she made her  एक्टिंग डेब्यू at 16 on टेलीविज़न और उसके विशेषता फिल्मी डेब्यू  the following year in Jamón , jamón ( 1992 ) , to critical acclaim .
Her subsequent roles in the 1990s and 2000s included  खोलें अपना आँखें ( 1997  ) , The Hi-Lo Country ( 1999 ) , The Girl of Your Dreams ( 2000 ) and Woman on Top ( 2000 ) .
Cruz achieved recognition for her lead  भूमिकाएँ in the 2001 films  Vanilla Sky and Blow .
She has since built a successful  करियर , appearing in films इससे a चौड़ी दायरा of जाति , सहित the कॉमेडी waking up in रेनो ( 2002 ) , the  thriller Gothika ( 2003 ) , the Christmas movie Noel ( 2004 ) , and the action adventure Sahara ( 2005 ) .
She has received critical acclaim for her roles  in volver ( 2006 ) और नौ ( 2009 ) receiving सुनहरी  Globe and Academy Award nominations for each .
She won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress in 2008  लिये विक्की क्रिस्टीना बार्सिलोना  .
She was the first Spanish  अभिनेत्री in इतिहास to प्राप्त an अकादमी पुरस्कार और the पहला  Spanish actress to receive a star at the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
Cruz has modeled for companies  ऐसे as आम , ralph  Lauren and L'Oréal .
Penélope and  उसके younger सिस्टर  Mónica Cruz have designed items for Mango .
She has donated both her time  और धन to  charities .
Cruz has volunteered in Uganda and India , where she spent one week working for Mother Teresa ; she  दान उसके सैलरी इससे ' to  help fund the late nun 's mission .
A wax sculpture of Cruz  होगा be लगाई in a प्रीमियर स्पॉट in the  Grevin Wax Museum in Paris .
File Explorer , previously known as Windows Explorer , is a file manager application and also a navigation tool  कि is शामिल साथ रिलीज of the microsoft खिड़कियाँ ऑपरेटिंग  system from Windows 95 onwards .
It provides a graphical user interface for  accessing the  file systems .
It is also the component of the operating system  कि presents अनेक उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस वस्तुएं  on the monitor such as the taskbar and desktop .
Controlling the computer is possible without Windows Explorer running ( for  उदाहरण , the संचिका | चलाएं कमांड in कार्य मैनेजर on nt-derived संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ होगा फलन  without it , as will commands typed in a command prompt window ) .
Located in the C : \Windows directory , it is sometimes referred  to as the खिड़कियाँ शेल , explorer.exe  , or simply “Explorer” .
The Care Bears are characters created by American  बधाई in 1981 लिये उपयोग on ग्रीटिंग  cards .
The original artwork for the  ताश थी चित्रित by कलाकार एलेना  Kucharik .
In 1983 , Kenner turned the Care Bears  into plush  teddy bears .
The Care Bears appeared in their own TV specials called The  परवाह bears in the जमीन बगैर जज्बात ( 1983 ) और  The Care Bears Battle the Freeze Machine ( 1984 ) .
They also had their own television series from  1985 to 1988 , in जोड to तीन विशेषता  films : The Care Bears Movie ( 1985 ) , Care Bears Movie II : A New Generation ( 1986 ) , and The Care Bears Adventure in Wonderland ( 1987 ) .
Each Care Bear  आता in a अलग रंग और रै a specialized  insignia on its belly that represents its duty and personality .
इस तमगा थी ज्ञात  as their `` tummy symbol . ''
however , the फिल्म परवाह bears : oopsy करता  It ! renamed them `` belly badges '' .
Adding  to the परवाह भालू परिवार हैं the `` परवाह भालू cousins ''  , which feature a lion , rabbit , penguin , raccoon , and other such animals created in the same style as the teddy bears .
In 2002 , the bears were  reintroduced साथ नई खिलौने  .
Made by Play-Along Toys , the new toys offered features such as  illuminated bellies upon  touch , aerobic bears , and glow-in-the-dark bears .
As part of this comeback , the Bears have appeared in two  computer-animated फिल्मों : परवाह bears : यात्रा to joke-a-lot ( 2004 ) और the  Care Bears ' Big Wish Movie ( 2005 ) .
In  2007 , the मताधिकार मनाये इसके 25th वर्षगांठ  ; another relaunch took place , as well as the release of Care Bears : Oopsy Does It ! .
In mid-2011 , AG announced a revival TV  एनिमेटेड श्रेणी titled `` परवाह  Bears : Welcome to Care-a-Lot `` .
The premiere of the series utilizes  `` 30 सालो  of caring '' .
It premiered  on the हब on जून  2 , 2012 .
As of 2013 ,  परवाह bears merchandise is  still being marketed .
During 2008 and 2009 , Canada 's Cookie Jar Group and France 's  moonscoop समूह attempted to acquire the  franchise from AGC , with no apparent success .
Interstate 70 ( I-70 ) is  an अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग in the संयुक्त  States that runs from Interstate 15 near Cove Fort , Utah , to a Park and Ride near Baltimore , Maryland .
It was the  पहला अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग  project in the United States .
I-70 approximately  traces the पाथ of u.S. रूट 40 ( और भी  the old National Road ) east of the Rocky Mountains .
West  of the rockies  , the route of I-70 was derived from multiple sources .
I-70 is the fifth longest Interstate  राजमार्ग , बाद i-90 , i-80 , i-40 , और i-10 .
The construction of I-70 in Colorado and Utah is considered an  अभियान्त्रिकी आश्चर्य as the रूट गुजरता through the आइज़नहावर  Tunnel , Glenwood Canyon , and the San Rafael Swell .
The Eisenhower Tunnel is  the उच्चतम पाइंट साथ the अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग  system with an elevation of .
The sections of the interstate in Missouri  और कान्सास have रखी अर्जी to be the पहला  interstate in the United States .
Though disputed , the Federal Highway Administration has claimed the section  of i-70 through glenwood canyon , समाप्त in 1992 , थी the पिछला टुकड़ा of the अंतरराज्यीय  Highway system , as originally planned , to open to traffic .
Photo of  1999 कुल  eclipse
As seen from the Earth , a solar eclipse occurs when the Moon passes between the Sun and Earth , and the  चंद्रमा fully or partially ब्लॉक ( `` occults  `` ) the Sun .
इस can happen तभी at नई चंद्रमा , जब  the Sun and the Moon are in conjunction as seen from Earth in an alignment referred to as syzygy .
In a total eclipse , the disk of the Sun is fully  obscured by the चंद्रमा .
In partial and annular  eclipses तभी भाग of the सूर्य is obscured  .
If the Moon were in a perfectly circular orbit , a little closer to the Earth , and in the same orbital plane , there  होता be कुल सौर eclipses प्रत्येक सिंगल  month .
However , the Moon 's orbit is  inclined ( tilted ) at अधिक than 5 डिग्री  to Earth 's orbit around the Sun ( see ecliptic ) so its shadow at new moon usually misses Earth .
Earth 's orbit  is पुकारा the ecliptic प्लेन as the चंद्रमा 's कक्षा  must cross this plane in order for an eclipse ( both solar as well as lunar ) to occur .
In  जोड , the चंद्रमा 's वास्तविक कक्षा is अंडाकार , प्रायः लेने it  far enough away from Earth that its apparent size is not large enough to block the Sun totally .
The orbital planes cross each year at a line of nodes  resulting in at तनिक  two , and up to five , solar eclipses occurring each year ; no more than two of which can be total eclipses .
However , total solar eclipses are rare at any particular  स्थान क्युकी totality exists तभी साथ a सीमित पाथ on  Earth 's surface traced by the Moon 's shadow or umbra .
an ग्रहण is a प्राकृतिक  phenomenon .
nevertheless , in कुछ प्राचीन और आधुनिक संस्कृतियों , सौर eclipses  have been attributed to supernatural causes or regarded as bad omens .
A total solar eclipse can be frightening to people who are unaware of its astronomical  स्पष्टीकरण , as the सूर्य seems to गायब दौरान  the day and the sky darkens in a matter of minutes .
Because  it is खतरनाक to dekh सीधे at the सूर्य , observers चाहिए उपयोग खास  eye protection or indirect viewing techniques when viewing a partial eclipse , or the partial phases of a total eclipse .
It is safe to view the total phase of a total solar  ग्रहण साथ the unaided नजर और बगैर सुरक्षा  , however .
लोगों referred to as ग्रहण chasers or umbraphiles होगा  travel to remote locations to observe or witness predicted central solar eclipses .
A political party ( from , Genitive partis , `` part '' , `` portion '' ) is a political organization that typically seeks to influence ,  or entirely कंट्रोल , सरकारी नीति , प्रायः by nominating उम्मीदवार साथ लकीर राजनैतिक दृश्य और  trying to seat them in political office .
Parties participate in  चुनावी अभियान और शैक्षणिक मंगवाने  or protest actions .
Parties often  espouse an विचारधारा or दृष्टि , expressed  in a party program , bolstered by a written platform with specific goals , forming a coalition among disparate interests .
The mango is a fleshy stone  फल belonging to the genus  Mangifera , consisting of numerous tropical fruiting trees in the flowering plant family Anacardiaceae .
The mango is native to South Asia , from where it has been  वितरित विश्वव्यापी  to become one of the most cultivated fruits in the tropics .
जबकि अन्य mangifera प्रजाति ( e.g . घोड़ा आम , M. foetida ) हैं भी  grown on a more localized basis , Mangifera indica – the 'common mango ' or 'Indian mango ' – is the only mango tree commonly cultivated in many tropical and subtropical regions .
It is the national fruit of India  , पाकिस्तानी और फिलीपीन  .
In several cultures , its fruit and leaves  हैं ritually प्रयुक्त as पुष्पक सजावट at विवाह , पब्लिक जश्न  and religious ceremonies .
Gill Arnette Byrd , < ref name > http :  //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/b/byrdgi00.htm ( born फ़रवरी 20 , 1961 in सैन फ्रांसिस्को , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  ) is a former professional American football player .
He was a two  समय प्रो कटोरी cornerback in 1991 और 1992 लिये the सैन डिएगो chargers  after graduating from San Jose State University .
Byrd was inducted  into the chargers हॉल  of Fame in 1998 .
He was an  all-city कार्यशील वापस और रक्षात्मक वापस  at Lowell High School ( San Francisco ) , helping to lead the Cardinals to the city championship in his senior season of 1978 .
World map  प्रर्दशित the tropic  of Cancer
The Tropic of Cancer , also referred to as the Northern tropic , is the circle of latitude on the Earth  कि marks the सबसे northerly स्थिति at जिससे the सूर्य may appear सीधे  overhead at its zenith .
This event occurs once per year , at the time  of the जून संक्रांति , जब the उत्तरी गोलार्ध is tilted  toward the Sun to its maximum extent .
It currently ( Year 2013 ) lies at 23° 26′  15.143′′ उत्तर of the equator  .
Its Southern Hemisphere  बंटवारा , अंकन the सबसे southerly स्थिति at जिससे  the Sun may appear directly overhead , is the Tropic of Capricorn .
These tropics are two of the five major degree measures or major circles of latitude that mark maps of the Earth  , besides the आर्कटिक और अंटार्कटिक वृत्त और the equator  .
The positions of these circles of latitude ( other than the Equator ) are dictated by the tilt of the Earth  's अक्ष of रोटेशन सापेक्ष to the प्लेन of इसके कक्षा  .
DVD-Video is a consumer video format used to store digital video on DVD discs , and is currently the dominant  उपभोक्ता वीडियो स्वरूप in एशिया , उत्तर अमेरिका , यूरोपीय , और ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
Discs using the DVD-Video specification require a DVD drive and an H.262/MPEG-2  भाग 2 डिकोडर ( e.g. , a dvd खिलाड़ी , or a कंप्यूटर  DVD drive with a software DVD player ) .
Commercial  dvd फिल्मों हैं एनकोडेड using a संयोजन of h.262/mpeg-2  Part 2 compressed video and audio of varying formats ( often multi-channel formats as described below ) .
typically , the आंकड़ा रेट लिये dvd फिल्मों  ranges from 3 Mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s , and the bit rate is usually adaptive .
it थी पहला उपलब्धियाँ  for retail around 1997 .
The DVD-Video specification was created by DVD Forum and can be  प्राप्त इससे dvd format/logo लाइसेंसिंग  Corporation for a fee of $ 5,000 .
The specification is not publicly available , because every  सदस्य जरूर चिह्न a non-disclosure अनुबंध  .
निश्चित सूचना in  the DVD Book is proprietary and confidential .
In computing and specifically Internet , a leech is one who benefits , usually  deliberately , इससे अन्य ' सूचना or प्रयत्न लकिन करता नहीं प्रस्ताव anything in वापसी  , or makes only token offerings in an attempt to avoid being called a leech .
In economics ,  इस प्रकार of बर्ताव is पुकारा ``  free riding '' and is associated with the free rider problem .
Depending on context , leeching does not necessarily refer to illegal use of computer resources  , लकिन प्रायः बजाय to लालची उपयोग according to तहज़ीब  : to wit , using too much of what is freely given without contributing a reasonable amount back to the community that provides it .
The name derives  इससे the जोंक , an एनिमल कि झंझट  blood and then tries to leave unnoticed .
Other terms  हैं प्रयुक्त , ऐसे as ``  freeloader '' , but leech is the most common .

The United States Postal Service ( USPS ) , also known as the Post Office and U.S. Mail , is an independent agency  of the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय सरकारी जिम्मेदार लिये providing डाक  service in the United States .
It is  एक of the few सरकारी एजेंसियों  explicitly authorized by the United States Constitution .
The USPS traces its roots to 1775 during the  दूसरी महाद्वीपीय  Congress , where Benjamin Franklin was appointed the first postmaster general .
The cabinet-level Post Office Department was created in 1792 from Franklin 's operation and  रूपांतरित into इसके वर्तमान रूप in 1971 अंतर्गत the डाक  Reorganization Act .
The USPS employs  over 574,000 मजदूर और operates  over 260,000 vehicles .
The  usps is the ऑपरेटर  of the largest vehicle fleet in the world .
the usps is legally obligated  to serve all Americans , regardless of geography , at uniform price and quality .
The USPS has exclusive access to letter boxes marked `` U.S. Mail '' and  निजी letterboxes in the संयुक्त राज्य , लकिन  still competes against private package delivery services , such as UPS and FedEx .
The USPS has not directly received taxpayer-dollars since the early  1980s साथ the नाबालिग एक्सेप्शन of subsidies लिये लागत संबद्ध  with the disabled and overseas voters .
Since the 2006 all-time peak mail volume , after which Congress passed the Postal Accountability and Enhancement Act `` , ( which mandated $ 5.5 billion per year to be paid into an account to pre-fund retiree health-care , 75 years  into the भविष्य , a आवश्यकता अद्वितीय among संगठन और व्यवसायों in the u.S. ) , आय dropped sharply due to recession-influenced घटती मेल आवाज़ , prompting the डाक  service to look to other sources of revenue while cutting costs to reduce its budget deficit .
Washington , D.C. has been the  पूंजी of the संयुक्त राज्य  since 1800 .
आठ अन्य शहरों have परोसा as the बैठक प्लेस लिये  Congress and are therefore considered to have once been the capital of the United States .
In addition , each of the 50 U.S. states and the five principal  territories of the संयुक्त राज्य maintains इसके अपना  capital .
राजकुमारी काटें  diamond set in a ring
The  राजकुमारी काटें is the दूसरी सबसे लोकप्रिय  cut shape for diamonds , next to a round brilliant .
The face-up shape of the princess cut is square or rectangular and the profile or side-on  आकार is समान to कि of an उलट पिरामिड साथ चार  beveled sides .
The  राजकुमारी काटें is a अपेक्षाकृत नई डायमंड  cut , having been created in the 1960s .
It has gained in popularity in recent years as a more  distinctive वैकल्पिक to the अधिक लोकप्रिय गोलाकार शानदार काटें , in जिससे the शीर्ष of डायमंड  , called the crown , is cut with a round face-up shape and the bottom , called the pavilion , is shaped similar to a cone .
A princess cut with the same width as the  व्यास of a गोलाकार शानदार होगा तौल  more as it has four corners which would otherwise have been cut off and rounded to form a round brilliant .
The princess cut is  sometimes referred to as a  square modified brilliant .
However , while displaying the same high degree of brilliance , its faceting  स्टाइल is अद्वितीय और completely अलग इससे कि  of a round brilliant .
The Princess cut had its  origins in the जल्दी `` फ्रेंच '' काटें , having a step-modified `` double-french '' or `` क्रॉस '' काटें क्राउन और a श्रेणी of अद्वितीय  , chevron-shaped facets in the pavilion which combine to give a distinct cross-shaped reflection when the stone is viewed directly through the table .
Effectively , the Princess cut combines the high  उपाधि of लाइट वापसी of a गोलाकार शानदार काटें साथ  a distinctive square or rectangular shape .
The square princess cut diamond is usually  थोड़ा सस्ता than गोलाकार शानदार काटें ईंट  of the same carat weight because it retains about 80 % of the rough diamond , as opposed to the round brilliant which retains only about 50 % of the rough .
The ability to retain  अधिक क्रिस्टल वज़न makes इस आकार  popular amongst diamond cutters .
Accredited Gem Appraisers ( AGA ) and American Gem Society Laboratory ( AGSL ) and European Gem Laboratories-USA ( EGL-USA )  हैं फिलहाल the तभी लैब्स कि ग्रेड the राजकुमारी  cut for cut .
There is no universal definition of what measurements make an ideal  राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड और अनेक डायमंड निर्माताओं मार्केट आदर्श ईंट साथ  differing facet patterns and angles as `` ideal cut '' .
In contrast to the AGSL , AGA , and EGL-USA the Gemological Institute of America ( GIA ) has stated that there is not enough industry consensus or empirical data to  बताएँ काटें ग्रेडिंग मानकों लिये राजकुमारी काटें ईंट और to do so is at the रिस्क of उपभोक्ता जो may be धोखे by ईंट  accompanied by unqualified Ideal or Excellent cut grades .
The name `` Princess Cut '' was  originally प्रयुक्त in कनेक्शन साथ another डायमंड काटें , वरना  known as the `` Profile '' cut , designed by Arpad Nagy , a London cutter , in 1961 .
The same name was  बाद प्रयुक्त और बना लोकप्रिय by ygal पर्लमैन  , Betzalel Ambar , and Israel Itzkowitz in Israel in 1979 .
A similar cut with only 49  facets , as opposed to the असली 58 facets of the राजकुमारी काटें  , was later branded the `` Quadrillion '' and initially distributed by Ambar Diamonds in Los Angeles .
Three years of optical research yielded a square stone with  faceting समान to कि of a गोलाकार शानदार काटें  diamond .
A  तुलना
The  क्रमांक of chevrons can affect  the overall outlook of a princess cut diamond .
This can  प्रायः be संकल्पित by the तार आरेख  that is plotted in diamond grading reports .
By adding more chevrons on the pavilion side of  the डायमंड , the व्यक्तिगत facets of the डायमंड होगा अभी be टूटा bas  into smaller facets .
As a result , it can give a  राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड a `` कुचल बर्फ  '' look .
Vice versa , when a princess  काटें डायमंड रै lesser chevrons , it tends to दे the  diamond a chunky outlook due to broader facets .
The domestic dog ( Canis lupus familiaris ) is a subspecies of the gray wolf ( Canis lupus ) , a  सदस्य of the कैनिडाए परिवार of the mammalian अनुक्रम carnivora  .
The term `` domestic dog '' is generally used for  दोनो domesticated और feral किस्में  .
The dog has been the first animal to be  domesticated और रै महरूम the सबसे widely रखा  working , hunting , and pet animal in human history .
The word `` dog '' may also mean the male of a canine species , as opposed to the word `` bitch '' for  the मादा of the प्रजाति  .
MtDNA evidence shows an evolutionary split between the modern dog 's lineage and the modern  भेड़िया 's lineage around 100,000 सालो पहले लकिन , , the oldest चट्टान नमूनों genetically  linked to the modern dog 's lineage date to approximately 33,000-36,000 years ago .
Dogs ' value to  जल्दी इंसान hunter-gatherers led to उन्हें जल्दी  becoming ubiquitous across world cultures .
Dogs perform many roles for people  , ऐसे as शिकार , herding , pulling loads , सुरक्षा , assisting  police and military , companionship , and , more recently , aiding handicapped individuals .
This impact on human society has given them the nickname  `` man 's बेहतरीन dost  '' in the Western world .
In some cultures , dogs  हैं भी a सोर्स of मांस  .
In 2001 ,  वहीँ यहूद अनुमानित to be 400  million dogs in the world .
सबसे breeds of कुत्तो हैं at सबसे a few सौ  years old , having been artificially selected for particular morphologies and behaviors by people for specific functional roles .
Through this selective breeding , the dog has developed into hundreds of varied breeds , and shows more behavioral  और morphological विभिन्नता  than any other land mammal .
For example , height measured to the withers ranges from in the Chihuahua to about in the Irish Wolfhound ;  रंग varies इससे श्वेत through grays ( प्रायः पुकारा `` ब्लू '' ) to ब्लैक , और भूरा इससे लाइट ( तन ) to अंधेरा ( `` रेड '' or `` चॉकलेट  '' ) in a wide variation of patterns ; coats can be short or long , coarse-haired to wool-like , straight , curly , or smooth .
It is  आम लिये सबसे breeds  to shed this coat .
Diagram of a transmission  इलेक्ट्रॉन सूक्ष्मदर्शी
A 1973  siemens इलेक्ट्रॉन सूक्ष्मदर्शी  , Musée des Arts et Métiers , Paris
An electron microscope ( EM ) is a type of microscope that  उपयोग an इलेक्ट्रॉन बीम to illuminate a नमूना और  produce a magnified image .
An EM has  वृहद resolving शक्ति than a लाइट  microscope and can reveal the structure of smaller objects because electrons have wavelengths about 100,000 times shorter than visible light photons .
They can achieve better than 50 pm resolution and magnifications of up to about 10,000,000x whereas ordinary ,  non-confocal लाइट microscopes हैं सीमित by विवर्तन to परिचय 200 nm रेज़ोल्यूशन  and useful magnifications below 2000x .
The  इलेक्ट्रॉन सूक्ष्मदर्शी उपयोग electrostatic  and electromagnetic lenses to control the electron beam and focus it to form an image .
These electron  ऑप्टिकल lenses हैं  analogous to the glass lenses of a light optical microscope .
Electron microscopes are used to investigate the  ultrastructure of a चौड़ी दायरा of biological और अकार्बनिक नमूनों सहित microorganisms  , cells , large molecules , biopsy samples , metals , and crystals .
Industrially , the electron microscope is  प्रायः प्रयुक्त लिये विशेषता कंट्रोल  and failure analysis .
Modern electron microscopes produce electron micrographs , using specialized digital  कैमरे or फ़्रेम grabbers to कैप्चर the चित्र  .
Popeyes Louisiana  रसोईघर is a कड़ी of fried मुर्गा तेज़ खाना रेस्तरां संस्थापित in 1972 in नई  Orleans , Louisiana .
Often referred to as  popeyes और sometimes as popeyes मुर्गा & बिस्कुट or popeyes मुर्गा & seafood , it थी acquired  by Sandy Springs , Georgia -based AFC Enterprises , originally America 's Favorite Chicken Company , in 1993 .
According to a company press release dated June 29 , 2007 , Popeyes is the second-largest `` quick-service chicken restaurant group , measured by number of units '' , with more than 1,800  रेस्तरां in अधिक than 40 राज्य और the ज़िला of कोलंबिया , और over 22 देशों विश्वव्यापी सहित तुर्कों , उत्तरी साइप्रस , बहरीन , चीन , हांग काँग , इराकी  , Indonesia , Jordan , Kuwait , United Arab Emirates , Japan , Malaysia , Saudi Arabia , South Korea , Singapore , Canada , Jamaica , Guyana , Suriname , Mexico , Trinidad , Puerto Rico , Honduras , Vietnam , Panama , Peru , and Costa Rica .
परिचय तीस स्थितियाँ हैं company-owned  , the rest franchised .
The leg press is a weight training exercise in which the individual pushes a  वज़न or प्रतिरोध दूर इससे उन्हें using उनके  legs .
The  पद लेग दबायें भी refers to the  apparatus used to perform this exercise .
The leg press can be used to evaluate an athlete 's overall lower  देह शक्ति ( इससे  knee joint to hip ) .
Using  the तिर्यक sled-type लेग  press machine .
There are  दो प्रमुख प्रकार  of leg press:
The diagonal or vertical  'sled ' प्रकार लेग दबायें .
Weight disks ( plates ) are attached directly to the sled  , जिससे is आरोहित on  rails .
The user sits below the sled and pushes it  upward साथ उनके  feet .
These machines normally include adjustable safety brackets that prevent  the उपयोक्ता इससे होने फंस अंतर्गत the वज़न  .
the 'cable ' प्रकार लेग दबायें , or 'seated  leg press ' , commonly found on multigyms .
The  उपयोक्ता sits कतरा और pushes आगे साथ उनके  feet onto a plate that is attached to the weight stack by means of a long steel cable .
Wendy Williams Hunter ( born Wendy Joan Williams ; July 18 , 1964  ) is an अमरीकी मीडिया व्यक्तित्व , अभिनेत्री और लेखक  .
She hosts a syndicated  टेलीविज़न बात दिखाएँ , the वेन्डी विलियम्स  Show .
Prior to television , Williams  थी a `` शॉक jockette `` on  several radio shows .
Williams has gained notoriety for  उसके on-air spats साथ हस्तियाँ  .
She was  the विषय of the 2006 vh1 वास्तविकता  TV series called The Wendy Williams Experience which broadcast events surrounding her radio show .
She has written an  आत्मकथा और अनेक अन्य किताबे , और रै निर्मित a उत्पाद लकीर पुकारा  Adorn by Wendy Williams .
Patrick Henry  `` देशद्रोह '' वाक पहले the  House of Burgesses in an 1851 painting by Peter F. Rothermel
``  दे me स्वतंत्रता , or दे me मौत ! '' is a quotation attributed  to Patrick Henry from a speech he made to the Virginia Convention .
On that day , at St. John 's  गिरिजाघर in रिचमंड , वर्जिनिया , और is credited साथ having swung the संतुलन in convincing the वर्जिनिया  House of Burgesses to pass a resolution delivering the Virginia troops to the Revolutionary War .
Among the  delegates to the सम्मेलन  were future US Presidents Thomas Jefferson and George Washington .
Newfoundland and Labrador (  , locally ) is the easternmost  province of Canada .
Situated in the country 's Atlantic region , it incorporates the island of Newfoundland  और मेनलैंड labrador to the उत्तरपश्चिम , साथ a संयुक्त क्षेत्रफल  of .
In 2011 , the  प्रांत 's जनसांख्यिकी थी  514,536 .
Approximately 92 percent of the  प्रांत 's जनसांख्यिकी जीवनदान on the द्वीप of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड ( सहित  its associated smaller islands ) , of which more than half live on the Avalon Peninsula .
The province is Canada 's  सबसे linguistically homogenous , साथ 97.6  % of residents reporting English ( Newfoundland English ) as their mother tongue in the 2006 census ; .
historically , न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड थी भी घर to अद्वितीय किस्में  of French , and Irish , as well as the now-extinct Beothuk language .
In Labrador , local dialects of  innu-aimun और inuktitut हैं भी बोला .
न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador 's पूंजी और largest नगर , st. जॉन 's , is कनाडा 's 20th-largest जनसांख्यिकी महानगर  Area , and is home to almost 40 percent of the province 's population .
St. John 's is the  सीट of सरकारी , घर to the हाउस of सभा of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  and Labrador and the highest court in the jurisdiction , the Newfoundland and Labrador Court of Appeal .
A former colony and dominion of  the संयुक्त किंगडम , न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador became the दसवाँ  province to enter the Canadian Confederation on March 31 , 1949 , as Newfoundland .
On December 6 , 2001 , an amendment was made to the Constitution of Canada to change the province 's official name to  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador .
In day-to-day conversation , however , Canadians generally still  refer to the प्रांत itself as न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और to the प्रदेश on the  Canadian mainland as Labrador .
थियोडोर `` t.r  . ''
Roosevelt , Jr. ( ; October 27 , 1858—January 6 , 1919 )  थी the 26th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त  States ( 1901–1909 ) .
He is noted for his exuberant personality , range of interests and  उपलब्धियाँ , और उसके नेतृत्व of the प्रगतिशील गति , as खूब as उसके  `` cowboy `` persona and robust masculinity .
He was a leader of the Republican Party and  संस्थापक of the पहला अवतार of the  short-lived Progressive ( `` Bull Moose '' ) Party of 1912 .
Before becoming  अध्यक्ष , he आयोजित कार्यालयों  at the city , state , and federal levels .
Roosevelt  's उपलब्धियाँ as a naturalist , एक्सप्लोरर , शिकारी , लेखक , और सिपाही हैं as much  a part of his fame as any office he held as a politician .
Roosevelt was 42 years old when sworn in as President of the United  राज्य in 1901 , बनाना उसे the youngest अध्यक्ष कभी ; he ताल आउट the youngest निर्वाचित  president , John F. Kennedy , by only one year .
Roosevelt was also the  पहला of तभी तीन बैठे राष्ट्रपतियों to have जीती  the Nobel Peace Prize .
The Teddy bear is named after him ,  despite उसके  contempt for being called `` Teddy '' .
Born into a wealthy family in New York City , Roosevelt was a  sickly चाइल्ड जो suffered इससे दमा और  stayed at home studying natural history .
To overcome his physical  कमज़ोरी , he embraced a ज़ोरदार  life .
home-schooled , he became an eager  student of nature .
He attended Harvard University , where he studied  जीवविज्ञान ,  boxed and developed an interest in naval affairs .
In 1881 , one year out of Harvard , he was elected to the New York  राज्य सभा , जहाँ he became a नेता of the सुधार गुट  of his Republican Party ( the `` GOP '' ) .
His The Naval War of 1812 ( 1882 ) established his professional  प्रतिष्ठा as a गंभीर इतिहासकार ; he लिखा numerous किताबे on शिकार  , the outdoors , and current political issues , as well as frontier history .
In 1884 , his first  बीवी और उसके माँ died  on the same day .
He temporarily left politics and went to the frontier ,  बनने a rancher in the `` badlands '' in the dakotas  .
Returning to New York City , he ran for mayor in 1886 ,  finishing तीसरा साथ 60,000  votes .
He later gained fame by taking vigorous  चार्ज  of the city police .
At the  नेशनल स्तर  , he was a leader in civil service reform .
The Spanish–American War broke out in 1898  जबकि रूज़वेल्ट थी , effectively , कार्यशील  the Department of the Navy .
He promptly resigned and formed the Rough Riders – a volunteer  प्यादे रेजीमेंट कि लड़ा in क्यूबा  .
The war hero  थी निर्वाचित राज्यपाल  in 1898 and in 1900 was nominated for vice president .
He successfully energized the GOP base as a highly visible campaigner to reelect President  विलियम mckinley on a मंच of ऊँची tariffs  , the gold standard , imperialism , prosperity at home and victory abroad .
In 1901 , President William McKinley was  assassinated और रूज़वेल्ट  became President .
He attempted to move the Republican Party ( GOP ) toward Progressivism ,  सहित विश्वास busting और increased  regulation of businesses .
Roosevelt  became the पहला व्यक्ति निर्वाचित to a पद in उसके अपना सही in 1904 बाद having  ascended to the Presidency ( from the Vice-Presidency ) upon the death of his predecessor , winning the largest percentage of the popular vote since the uncontested election of 1820 .
Roosevelt coined the phrase `` Square Deal  `` to describe उसके घरेलू कार्यसूची , emphasizing  that the average citizen would get a fair share under his policies .
As an outdoorsman  और naturalist , he प्रचारित  the conservation movement .
On the world stage ,  रूज़वेल्ट 's नीतियों यहूद characterized by  his slogan , `` Speak softly and carry a big stick `` .
A cousin is a relative with whom a person shares one or  अधिक आम पूर्वज ( s ) ( अन्य than a जनक , child/descendant , सहोदर , child/descendant  of a sibling , or sibling of a parent/ancestor ) .
However in common parlance , ``  cousin '' सामान्यतः specifically  means `` first cousin '' .
प्रणालियों of `` डिग्री '' और `` removals '' हैं  used in the English-speaking world to describe the exact relationship between two cousins ( in the broad sense ) and the ancestor they have in common .
Various governmental entities have established systems for legal use that can more precisely  बताएँ kinships साथ आम पूर्वजो मौजूदा कोई क्रमांक of पीढियां in the पास्ट , हालांकि आम उपयोग  often eliminates the degrees and removals and refers to people with common ancestry as simply `` distant cousins '' or `` relatives '' .
Webster is an American situation comedy that aired on ABC from  सितंबर 16 , 1983 जबतक may 8 , 1987 , और in first-run अनुप्रयोग इससे  September 21 , 1987 until March 10 , 1989 .
The series was  निर्मित by stu चांदी  .
The show stars Emmanuel Lewis in the title role as a young boy who , after losing his  अभिभावक , is अपनाया by उसके एनएफएल -pro गॉडफादर , portrayed by एलेक्स karras , और उसके नई socialite  wife , played by Susan Clark .
The focus was largely on how this impulsively married couple had to adjust to  उनके नई जीवनदान और अचानक parenthood , लकिन it थी  the congenial Webster himself who drove much of the plot .
The series was produced by Georgian Bay Ltd. , Emmanuel Lewis  entertainment उद्यमों , inc. ( 1986-1989 ) और सर्वोपरि  Television .
Like NBC 's earlier hit Diff'rent Strokes , Webster featured a young African-American boy  अपनाया by a  white family .
तीन प्रकार of कोशिका  division
Cell division is the process by which a parent cell divides into two  or अधिक बेटी कोशिकाएं  .
कोशिका प्रभाग प्रायः occurs  as part of a larger cell cycle .
In eukaryotes , there are two distinct type of cell division : a vegetative division , whereby each  बेटी कोशिका is genetically एकसमान to the जनक कोशिका ( समसूत्रण ) , और a reductive कोशिका प्रभाग  , whereby the number of chromosomes in the daughter cells is reduced by half , to produce haploid gametes ( meiosis ) .
Both of these cell division cycles are required in sexually reproducing organisms at some point in their life cycle , and  दोनो हैं believed to be उपस्थित in the पिछला eukaryotic आम पूर्वज  Prokaryotes also undergo a vegetative cell division known as binary fission , where their genetic material is segregated equally into two daughter cells .
All cell divisions , regardless of organism ,  हैं preceded by a  single round of DNA replication .
For simple  एककोशिकीय जीवों ऐसे as the amoeba  , one cell division is equivalent to reproduction – an entire new organism is created .
On a larger scale , mitotic cell division can create progeny from  बहुकोशिकीय जीवों , ऐसे as पौधे कि grow इससे cuttings  .
Cell division also enables sexually reproducing  जीवों to develop इससे the one-celled zygote , जिससे itself थी  produced by cell division from gametes .
And after growth ,  कोशिका प्रभाग allows लिये continual निर्माण और  repair of the organism .
A  इंसान होने 's देह अनुभवों परिचय 10,000  trillion cell divisions in a lifetime .
Cell  प्रभाग रै महरूम modeled  by finite subdivision rules .
The primary concern of cell division is the maintenance  of the असली कोशिका  's genome .
Before division can occur , the genomic information that is stored in  गुणसूत्रों जरूर be replicated , और the duplicated genome जरूर be अलग cleanly  between cells .
A great deal of cellular infrastructure is involved in keeping genomic  सूचना सतत between `` पीढियां  '' .
पहाड़ सीमाएँ of  Massachusetts , United States .
Howard Jones ( born John Howard Jones ,  23 फ़रवरी 1955 , southampton , हैम्पशायर , इंग्लैण्ड  ) is a British musician , singer and songwriter .
according to the गिनीज किताब of अंग्रेजों hit singles & एल्बम , `` जोन्स is an  accomplished singer-songwriter who was a regular chart visitor in the mid-1980s with his brand of synthpop .
Jones , who was equally  लोकप्रिय in the  U.S. , appeared at Live Aid `` .
Allmusic  पत्रकार , स्टीफन थामस erlewine adds  , `` Jones was one of the defining figures of mid-1980s synthpop .
His music merged the technology intensive sound of New Wave with the cheery optimism  of hippies  and late 1960s pop .
जोन्स racked up a स्ट्रिंग of हिट्स in the  mid and late 1980s , before he retreated into being a cult figure in the 1990s '' .
The International Isle of Man TT ( Tourist Trophy ) Race is a motorcycle racing event  आयोजित on the आइल of man और थी लिये अनेक सालो the सबसे prestigious  motorcycle race in the world .
The  इवेंट थी भाग of the fim मोटरसाइकिल ग्रैंड प्रिक्स संसार चैंपियनशिप दौरान the काल 1949–1976  before being transferred to the United Kingdom after safety concerns and run by the FIM as the British Grand Prix for the 1977 season .
The Isle of Man TT Races became part of the  tt सूत्र 1 चैंपियनशिप इससे 1977  to 1990 to preserve the event 's racing status .
From 1989 the racing  रै महरूम विकसित by the आइल of man विभाग  of Tourism as the Isle of Man TT Festival .
the रेस is चलाएं in a time-trial स्वरूप on  public roads closed for racing by the provisions of an Act of Tynwald ( the parliament of the Isle of Man ) .
the पहला रेस थी आयोजित on मंगलवार 28 may 1907  and was called the International Auto-Cycle Tourist Trophy .
The event  थी संगठित by the auto-cycle  Club over 10 laps of the St John 's Short Course of 15 miles 1,470 yards for road-legal touring motorcycles with exhaust silencers , saddles , pedals and mud-guards .
The winner of  the single-cylinder क्लास , और overall विजेता of the पहला इवेंट in 1907 , थी चार्ली collier सवारी a matchless मोटरसाइकिल  in a time of 4 hours , 8 minutes and 8 seconds at an average race speed of 38.21 mph .
The winner of the  twin-cylinder क्लास थी rem fowler सवारी a peugeot एंजिन  Norton in a time of 4 hours 21 minutes and 52 seconds at an average race speed of 36.21 mph .
The trophy presented to  चार्ली collier as the विजेता of the 1907 आइल  of Man TT Race , was donated by the Marquis de Mouzilly St. Mars .
It  प्रदर्शित a stylised संस्करण of ओलम्पिक  God Hermes by Giovanni Da Bologna as a silver figurine astride a winged wheel .
The trophy was  समान in डिज़ाइन to the 18 कैरेट सुनहरा montague ट्रॉफी प्रस्तुत to जॉन नेपियर ( arrol-johnston  ) as the inaugural winner of the Isle of Man Tourist Trophy car race in 1905 now known as the RAC Tourist Trophy .
The Marquis de Mouzilly St. Mars Trophy is now presented annually to the winner  of the आइल of man वरिष्ठ tt motor-cycle रेस  .
The 2007 Isle of Man TT was the Centenary event which ran between  26 may और 8 जून 2007 और प्रदर्शित a खास re-enactment of the 1907 आइल of man  TT Race held on the village green next to Tynwald Hill in St John 's on Monday 28 May 2007 .
The  विंटेज परेड of 100 क्लासिक मोटरसाइकिल लिये the centenary re-enactment on the असली  St John 's Short Course was flagged away by former World Motor-Cycle Champion Geoff Duke .
The first of the participants to be flagged away was the recently restored twin-cylinder  peugeot-norton ridden by rem fowler दौरान the पहला आइल  of Man TT Race in 1907 .
Also participating in the 2007 Re-enactment was TT race  प्रतिस्पर्धी guy मार्टिन सवारी a 1938 triumph बाघ 100 500 cc और अन्य पूर्व  TT competitors including Alan Cathcart , Sammy Miller , Nick Jefferies and Mick Grant also completed the Re-enactment lap .

बेरोजगारी ( or joblessness ) occurs जब लोगों हैं  without work and actively seeking work .
The  बेरोजगारी रेट is a माप of the व्यापकता of बेरोजगारी और it is गणना  as a percentage by dividing the number of unemployed individuals by all individuals currently in the labor force .
During periods of recession , an economy  प्रायः अनुभवों a अपेक्षाकृत ऊँची  unemployment rate .
According to  अंतरराष्ट्रीय श्रमिक संगठन रपट , अधिक than 197 लाख लोगों globally  are out of work or 6 % of the world 's workforce were without a job in 2012 .
There remains considerable  सैद्धांतिक बहस regarding the कल्याणकारी , consequences  and solutions for unemployment .
Classical  अर्थशास्त्र , नई शास्त्रीय अर्थशास्त्र , और the आस्ट्रिया स्कूल  of economics argue that market mechanisms are reliable means of resolving unemployment .
These theories argue against interventions imposed on the labor market from the outside , such as unionization , minimum wage  कानून , कर , और अन्य regulations कि वे अर्जी discourage  the hiring of workers .
Keynesian  अर्थशास्त्र emphasizes the cyclical प्रकृति of बेरोजगारी और अनुशंसा  government interventions in the economy that it claims will reduce unemployment during recessions .
This theory focuses on recurrent shocks that  एकाएक reduce कुल माँग लिये goods और सेवाएं और  thus reduce demand for workers .
Keynesian models recommend government interventions designed to increase demand for workers ; these can include  वित्तीय stimuli , सरेआम वित्तपोषित जॉब सृष्टि , और expansionist  monetary policies .
In addition to these comprehensive theories of unemployment , there are a few  categorizations of बेरोजगारी कि हैं प्रयुक्त to अधिक  precisely model the effects of unemployment within the economic system .
The main types of unemployment include structural unemployment which focuses on structural problems in the economy and inefficiencies inherent in labour markets ,  सहित a बेमेल between the सप्लाई और माँग of laborers साथ  necessary skill sets .
Structural arguments  emphasize कल्याणकारी और समाधान सम्बन्धित to  disruptive technologies and globalization .
Discussions of frictional unemployment focus on  voluntary निर्णय to कार्य आधारित on प्रत्येक individuals ' valuation of उनके अपना कार्य और  how that compares to current wage rates plus the time and effort required to find a job .
Causes and solutions for  frictional बेरोजगारी प्रायः पता  job entry threshold and wage rates .
Behavioral economists  हाइलाइट व्यक्तिगत biases in निर्णय बनाना , और प्रायः involve  problems and solutions concerning sticky wages and efficiency wages .
Collectivism is any philosophic ,  राजनैतिक , धार्मिक , आर्थिक , or सोशल आउटलुक कि emphasizes  the interdependence of every human being in a society or civilization .
Collectivism is a basic cultural element that exists as the reverse of individualism in  इंसान प्रकृति ( in the वही रास्ता ऊँची कॉन्टेक्स्ट संस्कृति  exists as the reverse of low context culture ) .
Collectivist  orientations तनाव the महत्व of मिलाप भीतर सोशल समूह  ( such as an `` in-group '' , in what specific context it is defined ) and in some cases , the priority of group goals over individual goals .
collectivists प्रायः फ़ोकस on  community , society , nation or country .
It has been used as an element in many different and diverse types of government and political ,  आर्थिक और शैक्षणिक तत्त्वज्ञान throughout इतिहास और सबसे  human societies in practice contain elements of both individualism and collectivism .
Some examples of collectivist cultures  शामिल इण्डिया और जापानी  .
Collectivism can be divided  into आड़ा collectivism और लंबवत  collectivism .
Horizontal collectivism stresses collective decision-making among equal individuals , and is thus  प्रायः आधारित on decentralization  and egalitarianism .
Vertical collectivism is based on hierarchical structures of power and on moral and cultural conformity ,  और is इसलिए आधारित on centralization और पदानुक्रम .
A cooperative enterprise would be an example  of आड़ा collectivism , whereas  a military hierarchy would be an example of vertical collectivism .
Acute disseminated encephalomyelitis ( ADEM ) is an immune  mediated बीमारी of the दिमाग  .
It usually occurs following a viral infection but may appear  following टीकाकरण , बैक्टीरियल  or parasitic infection , or even appear spontaneously .
As it involves  असंक्राम्य demyelination , it is समान  to multiple sclerosis , and is considered part of the Multiple sclerosis borderline diseases .
The incidence rate is about 8 per  1,000,000 लोगों प्रति साल  .
Although it  occurs in सब आयु , सबसे reported मामले हैं in children और  adolescents , with the average age around 5 to 8 years old .
The mortality  रेट may be as ऊँची as 5 % , पूरा रिकवरी is देखी in 50 to  75 % of cases , while up to 70 to 90 % recover with some minor residual disability .
The average time to recover is  एक to छह महीने  .
ADEM produces multiple inflammatory lesions in the  दिमाग और स्पाइनल cord ,  particularly in the white matter .
Usually these are found in the subcortical and central white matter and cortical gray-white junction of both cerebral hemispheres  , cerebellum , brainstem , और स्पाइनल cord , लकिन periventricular श्वेत पदार्थ और धूसर पदार्थ of the cortex  , thalami and basal ganglia may also be involved .
When the patient suffers more than one demyelinating episode , it is called recurrent disseminated  encephalomyelitis or multiphasic disseminated encephalomyelitis  ( MDEM ) .
The stomach is a muscular , hollow , dilated part of the digestion system which functions as an important organ of the digestive tract  in कुछ पशु , सहित vertebrates ,  echinoderms , insects ( mid-gut ) , and molluscs .
It is involved in the second phase  of पाचन , following mastication  ( chewing ) .
The stomach is located between  the ग्रासनाल और  the small intestine .
It secretes protein-digesting enzymes called protease and strong acids to aid in food digestion , ( sent to it via esophageal  peristalsis ) through चिकना  muscular contortions ( called segmentation ) before sending partially digested food ( chyme ) to the small intestines .
The word stomach is  निकला इससे the लैटिन stomachus जिससे is निकला इससे the यूनानी शब्द stomachos  ( στόμαχος ) , ultimately from stoma ( ) , `` mouth '' .
The words  gastro- और gastric ( अर्थ सम्बन्धित  to the stomach ) are both derived from the Greek word gaster ( ) .
1940 Pontiac Special  श्रेणी 25 woodie
A woodie is a car body style , especially a station  वैगन , जहाँ the पश्च bodywork is constructed  of wood framework with infill panels of wood or painted metal .
After the demise of  वास्तविक लकडी निर्माण , निर्माताओं प्रयुक्त अनुकरण  woodgrain sheet vinyl—sometimes augmented with three-dimensional , simulated framework—to recall wood construction .
In 2008  , लकडी निर्माण थी जगाई  abstractly on the Ford Flex with a series of side and rear horizontal grooves .
A pearl is a hard object produced within the  नरम ऊतक ( specifically the mantle  ) of a living shelled mollusc .
Just like the  शेल of a clam , a पर्ल is बना up of कैल्सियम  carbonate in minute crystalline form , which has been deposited in concentric layers .
The ideal pearl is perfectly round and  चिकना , लकिन अनेक अन्य आकार of मोती ( बरॉक  pearls ) occur .
The finest quality natural pearls have been highly valued as gemstones and objects of beauty for many centuries , and because of this , the word pearl has become a  रूपक लिये कुछ बहुत विरल , ठीक , सराहनीय  , and valuable .
The most valuable  मोती occur अनायास  in the wild , but they are extremely rare .
These wild  मोती हैं referred  to as natural pearls .
Cultured or farmed pearls from pearl oysters and  freshwater mussels मेक up the बहुमत of those कि  are currently sold .
Imitation pearls are also widely  बेची in inexpensive आभूषण , लकिन the विशेषता of उनके iridescence is प्रायः बहुत  poor , and often , artificial pearls are easily distinguished from genuine pearls .
Pearls have been harvested and  cultivated primarily लिये उपयोग in आभूषण , लकिन in the पास्ट  they were also stitched onto lavish clothing .
Pearls have also been  कुचल और प्रयुक्त in कॉस्मेटिक्स , दवाइयाँ  , and in paint formulations .
Whether wild or cultured , gem quality pearls  हैं लगभग सदा nacreous  and , as is the interior of the shell that produces them .
However , almost all species of shelled molluscs are capable of producing pearls ( formally  referred to as `` calcareous concretions '' by कुछ स्त्रोत ) of lesser चमक  or less spherical shape .
Although these may also be legitimately referred to as `` pearls '' by gemological labs  और भी अंतर्गत u.S. संघीय व्यापार आयोग नियम , और हैं formed in the  same way , most of them have no value , except as curiosities .
Bing ( known  previously as सजीव ढूंढें , खिड़कियाँ सजीव ढूंढें  , and MSN Search ) is a web search engine ( advertised as a `` decision engine `` ) from Microsoft .
Bing was unveiled by  microsoft सीईओ स्टीव बाल्मर on may 28 , 2009  at the All Things Digital conference in San Diego for release on June 1 .
Notable changes include the listing of search suggestions while queries are entered and a list of related searches ( called `` Explore pane '' ) based  on semantic प्रौद्योगिकी इससे powerset जिससे microsoft खरीदा in 2008  .
On  जुलाई 29 , 2009 , microsoft और याहू ! घोषित  a deal in which Bing would power Yahoo ! Search .
All Yahoo ! Search global  ग्राहक और साझेदार हैं अपेक्षित  to have made the transition by early 2012 .
In October 2011 , Bing announced it was  working on नई back-end ढूंढें अवसंरचना , साथ the लक्ष्य of  delivering faster and slightly more relevant search results for users .
Known as `` Tiger '' , the new  index-serving प्रौद्योगिकी रै महरूम incorporated into  Bing globally , since August 2011 .
In May 2012 ,  bing घोषित another redesign of इसके ढूंढें इंजन कि शामिल `` साइडबार  '' , a social feature that searches users ' social networks for information relevant to the search query .
A diagram showing an I Formation on  ठोकर और a 4-3 गठन  on defense
In American football , each team  रै ग्यारह खिलाड़ी on the  field at one time .
the विशिष्ट भूमिका कि a खिलाड़ी takes  on the field is called their position .
Under the modern rules of American football , teams  हैं अनुमत असीमित subsititutions , कि is टीमों  may change any number of players after any play .
This has resulted in the development of three ``  platoons '' of खिलाड़ी , the ठोकर ( the टोली साथ the  ball , who is trying to score ) , the defense ( the team trying to prevent the other team from scoring , and to take the ball from them ) , and the special teams ( who play in kicking situations ) .
Within  those platoons , विभिन्न विशिष्ट स्थितियाँ मौजूद depending  on what the player 's main job is .
The  आयरिश लोगों ( or na héireannaigh ; ulster-scots : airish fowk ) हैं an जातीय  group who originate in Ireland , an island in northwestern Europe .
Ireland has been populated for around 9,000 years (  according to पुरातत्व अध्ययन  , see Prehistoric Ireland ) .
The Irish people 's earliest ancestors are recorded in legends – they are claimed  to be descended इससे समूह ऐसे as the nemedians , fomorians ,  Fir Bolg , Tuatha Dé Danann and the Milesians .
Lebor Gabála Érenn , a book of Irish mythology tells that Milesians  यहूद स्काइथियन वंशजों  .
The main  समूह कि interacted साथ the आयरिश  in the Middle Ages include the Picts , Scots , and the Vikings .
Due to this  सम्पर्क , icelanders  are noted for having some Irish descent .
The Anglo-Norman  आक्रमण of the ऊँची मध्य आयु , the अंग्रेज़ी बागानों  and the subsequent English rule of the country introduced the Normans and Flemish into Ireland .
Welsh , Picts , Bretons , and small parties of Gauls and even Anglo-Saxons  हैं ज्ञात in आयरलैंड इससे much  earlier times .
There have been many notable  आयरिश लोगों throughout  history .
The 6th century Irish monk and missionary Columbanus is  regarded as एक of the `` fathers of यूरोपीय ''  , followed by Kilian of Würzburg and Vergilius of Salzburg .
the वैज्ञानिक रॉबर्ट  Boyle is considered the `` father of chemistry `` .
Famous Irish explorers include Brendan the  नाविक , रॉबर्ट mcclure , अर्नेस्ट shackleton और  Tom Crean .
By some accounts , the first European child born in North America had Irish  descent on दोनो पहलू ; और an irishman थी the पहला यूरोपीय to नियत पैर  on American soil in Columbus ' expedition of 1492 .
There are  वंशजों of आयरिश लोगों जीना in अनेक पश्चिमी  countries , particularly in English-speaking countries .
Historically , emigration  रै महरूम caused by राजनीती , अकाल  and economic issues .
An estimated 50 to 80 million people are descendants of Irish people , primarily in the United Kingdom , the United States , Australia , Canada and Iceland ; there are also smaller  संख्याएँ in अर्जेंटीना , चिली , मैक्सिको , जमैका , बारबाडोस , दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी , नई जीलैंड , फ़्रांस , जर्मनी और ब्राज़ील  .
The largest  क्रमांक of वंशजों of आयरिश  people live in the United States .
The number of people  जीना in ऑस्ट्रेलिया जो हैं of आयरिश descent  is higher , as a percentage of total population , than that of any other country .
लगभग चालीस प्रतिशत of the उपनिवेश  population of Iceland came from Ireland or Scotland .
The very first  निवासियों of आइसलैंड  were Irish .
The Hubble  स्पेस दूरदर्शी ( hst ) is a स्पेस दूरदर्शी कि थी carried  into orbit by a Space Shuttle in 1990 and remains in operation .
A aperture telescope in low  धरती कक्षा , हबल 's चार प्रमुख यंत्र observe in the  near ultraviolet , visible , and near infrared .
The  दूरदर्शी is नामित बाद the  astronomer Edwin Hubble .
Hubble 's orbit outside the  distortion of धरती 's माहौल allows it to लो अत्यधिक शार्प  images with almost no background light .
Hubble 's Deep Field have been some of the most detailed visible-light images ever ,  allowing a गहन दृश्य into स्पेस  and time .
Many Hubble observations have led  to सफलताएँ in astrophysics , ऐसे as accurately  determining the rate of expansion of the universe .
Although not the first space telescope , Hubble is one of the largest and most  बहुमुखी , और is खूब ज्ञात as दोनो a vital  research tool and a public relations boon for astronomy .
The HST was built by the United States  स्पेस एजेंसी नासा , साथ योगदान इससे the  European Space Agency , and is operated by the Space Telescope Science Institute .
The HST is one of NASA 's Great Observatories ,  साथ साथ the कॉम्पटन गामा रे वेधशाला , the चन्द्रा  X-ray Observatory , and the Spitzer Space Telescope .
Space  telescopes यहूद प्रस्तावित  as early as 1923 .
Hubble was funded in the 1970s , with a proposed launch  in 1983 , लकिन the प्रोजेक्ट थी घिरा by तकनीकी  delays , budget problems , and the Challenger disaster .
When finally launched in 1990 ,  वैज्ञानिकों मिला कि the प्रमुख दर्पण था महरूम  ground incorrectly , compromising the telescope 's capabilities .
The telescope was restored to its intended quality by a  सर्विसिंग मिशन in 1993  .
Hubble  is the तभी दूरदर्शी designed  to be serviced in space by astronauts .
Between 1993 and 2002 , four missions repaired , upgraded , and replaced systems on the  दूरदर्शी ; a पांचवां मिशन थी रद्द  on safety grounds following the Columbia disaster .
However , after spirited public discussion , NASA administrator  माइक griffin स्वीकृत एक फाइनल सर्विसिंग मिशन  , completed in 2009 by Space Shuttle Atlantis .
The  दूरदर्शी is अभी अपेक्षित to फलन  until at least 2013 .
Its scientific  successor , the जेम्स webb स्पेस दूरदर्शी  ( JWST ) , is to be launched in 2018 or possibly later .
anti-inflammatory refers to the  property of a substance or treatment that reduces inflammation .
Anti-inflammatory drugs make up about half  of analgesics , remedying पीड़ा by reducing सूजन as opposed to opioids  , which affect the central nervous system .
The Tonight Show is a US late-night talk  दिखाएँ कि रै  aired on NBC since 1954 .
It is the longest currently running regularly scheduled entertainment program in the US  और the तीसरा longest-running दिखाएँ on एनबीसी बाद  Meet the Press and Today .
The Tonight Show was hosted by Steve Allen ( 1954–1957 ) , Jack Paar (  1957–1962 ) , जॉनी कार्सन ( 1962–1992 ) , jay लीनो ( 1992–2009 , 2010–present  ) , and Conan O'Brien ( 2009–2010 ) .
Several guest hosts also appeared ,  विशेषकर दौरान the paar और  Carson eras .
The longest-serving host to date was Johnny Carson , who hosted The Tonight Show Starring Johnny Carson for 30 seasons from the fall of  1962 through the वसन्त of 1992  .
The current host of the show is Jay Leno , who had  previously hosted the दिखाएँ इससे 1992 to 2009 और began  his second tenure on March 1 , 2010 .
On April 3 , 2013 ,  एनबीसी घोषित jimmy fallon  would become the new host of The Tonight Show .
The Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon will premiere  फ़रवरी 24 , 2014 , the दिन बाद the closing  ceremonies of the 2014 Winter Olympics .
SS Andrea  डोरिया .
Pronounced was an ocean liner for the Italian Line ( Società di navigazione Italia ) home ported in Genoa , Italy  , सबसे प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके डूब in 1956 , जब  52 people died ( 51 from immediate impact ) .
Named after the 16th-century Genoese admiral Andrea Doria , the ship had a gross  पंजीकरण tonnage of 29,100 और a क्षमता of परिचय 1,200  passengers and 500 crew .
For a country attempting to rebuild its economy and reputation after World War II  , एंड्रिया डोरिया थी an प्रतीक of इतालवी नेशनल  pride .
Of all Italy 's ships at the time , Andrea  डोरिया थी the largest , तीव्रतम  and supposedly safest .
Launched on 16 June 1951 , the ship  undertook इसके maiden voyage on 14 जनवरी  1953 .
On 25 July 1956 , while the  एंड्रिया डोरिया थी approaching the coast of nantucket , मैसाचुसेट्स , बंधी लिये नई यॉर्क नगर , the eastbound  of the Swedish American Line collided with it in what became one of history 's most infamous maritime disasters .
Struck in the side , the top-heavy Andrea Doria immediately started to list  severely to स्टारबोर्ड , जिससे बाएँ हाफ of  its lifeboats unusable .
The consequent shortage of lifeboats might have resulted in significant loss of life , but the efficiency of the  जलयान 's तकनीकी डिज़ाइन अनुमत it to रहो  afloat for over 11 hours after the ramming .
The good behavior of the crew , improvements in communications  और the रैपिड जवाब of अन्य जहाजों averted  a disaster similar in scale to that of the in 1912 .
1,660 passengers and crew were rescued and survived , while 46 people died as a  consequence of the टक्कर  .
The  evacuated लक्ज़री लाइनर capsized और  sank the following morning .
This accident  remains the worst मेरीटाइम विपत्ति to  occur in United States waters since the sinking of the in 1915 .
The incident and its aftermath were heavily  covered by the न्यूज मीडिया  .
While the rescue efforts were both successful and commendable , the  कारण of the टक्कर साथ the स्टॉकहोम और the  loss of Andrea Doria generated much interest in the media and many lawsuits .
Largely because of an out-of-court settlement agreement between the two shipping companies during hearings  तत्काल बाद the विपत्ति , no determination of the कारण ( s ) थी कभी formally प्रकाशित  .
Although greater blame appeared initially to fall on the  इतालवी लाइनर , अधिक हाल discoveries have indicated  that a misreading of radar on the Swedish ship may have initiated the collision course , leading to errors on both ships .
Andrea Doria was the last major transatlantic passenger vessel to sink before aircraft  became the पसन्दीदा विधि of  travel .
डायलिसिस  tubing
Dialysis tubing is a type of semi- or partially permeable  झिल्ली tubing बना इससे regenerated cellulose or सेलोफेन  .
It can be used for diffusion with solutes  or परासरण if प्रयुक्त साथ  water only .
Osmosis is when water  गुजरता through a semi-permeable  layer to reach equilibrium .
diffusion , on the अन्य हाथ , allows  the movement of molecules from high concentration to low concentration .
It will only allow molecules to pass through a  semi-permeable झिल्ली or परत if the अणु is छोटी पर्याप्त  to fit through the membrane or a membrane 's pore .
This usually  परिणाम साथ the प्रभाव of diffusion through a  membrane only really affects small molecules , and almost never larger molecules .
Dialysis tubing is used in clinical circumstances to ensure a  filtered प्रवाह of अणुओं , preventing the प्रवाह of larger solute अणुओं  .
Small  अणुओं can be `` धोया '' आउट of a समाधान जिससे is उत्तेजित through the  tubing into a solvent , usually water , which surrounds it and in which they can be flushed away .
In demonstrations of semi-permeable membranes , a solution containing several types of molecules , usually glucose and starch , is  लगाई into a semi-permeable डायलिसिस थैला , ऐसे as a cellulose झिल्ली साथ छिद्र  , and the bag is sealed with a knot or elastic band .
the sealed डायलिसिस थैला is  placed in a container of a different solution , or water .
Molecules small enough to pass through the tubing ( water , salts , monosaccharides , and other small  अणुओं ) tend to मूव into or आउट of the डायलिसिस थैला in the दिशा of अवरोहण विशेषज्ञता , इसलिए displaying  diffusion .
Larger molecules ( such as proteins , or polysaccharides )  कि have आयाम significantly वृहद than the pore व्यास हैं  retained inside the dialysis bag .
The water and smaller solutes in a  hypotonic समाधान ( a समाधान कि रै a lesser solute विशेषज्ञता than the समाधान it is संदर्भित to ) होगा क्रॉस a semi-permeable  membrane , like dialysis tubing , into a hypertonic solution ( a solution that has a higher solute concentration than the solution it is referenced to ) in an attempt to reach equilibrium , where the solute concentration of each solution is in equilibrium .
Mercury  प्रयोगशाला  thermometer
A thermometer ( from the Greek , thermos , meaning `` hot '' and μἐτρον , metron , `` measure '' ) is a  यंत्र कि उपायों तापमान  or temperature gradient using a variety of different principles .
A thermometer has two important elements  : the तापमान सेंसर ( e.g . the बल्ब on a mercury-in-glass थर्मामीटर ) in जिससे कुछ शारीरिक बदलें occurs साथ तापमान  , plus some means of converting this physical change into a numerical value ( e.g . the visible scale that is marked on a mercury-in-glass thermometer ) .
There are many  प्रकार और अनेक उपयोग लिये thermometers  , as detailed below in sections of this article .
Snow White and the  सात dwarfs is a 1937 अमरीकी एनिमेटेड musical काल्पनिक फिल्मी  produced by Walt Disney and released by RKO Radio Pictures .
Based on the German fairy tale by the Brothers Grimm , it is the first  full-length cel एनिमेटेड विशेषता फिल्मी और the earliest in  the Walt Disney Animated Classics series .
The story was adapted by storyboard artists Dorothy Ann Blank , Richard Creedon , Merrill De Maris , Otto Englander  , अर्ल hurd , लंड rickard , टेड सियर्स  and Webb Smith .
दाउद हाथ थी the supervising निदेशक , जबकि विलियम cottrell , विल्फ्रेड  Jackson , Larry Morey , Perce Pearce , and Ben Sharpsteen directed the film 's individual sequences .
Snow White premiered at the Carthay Circle Theatre on December 21 , 1937 , followed by a nationwide release on February 4 , 1938 , and with international  आय of $ 8 लाख दौरान इसके आरंभिक रिलीज briefly assumed the रिकार्ड  of highest grossing sound film at the time .
The popularity of the film has led to it being re-released theatrically many  टाइम्स , जबतक इसके घर वीडियो रिलीज in  the 1990s .
Adjusted for inflation , it is  एक of the शीर्ष टेन performers at the उत्तर  American box office .
At the  11th अकादमी पुरस्कार , वॉल्ट डिज़्नी थी  awarded an honorary Oscar , and the film was nominated for Best Musical Score .
It was added to the United  राज्य नेशनल फिल्मी रजिस्ट्री in 1989 और is क्रमित  in the American Film Institute 's list of the 100 greatest American films , who also named the film as the greatest American animated film of all time in 2008 .
Disney 's take on the fairy tale has had a big  सांस्कृतिक प्रभाव , resulting in a लोकप्रिय  theme park attraction , a video game , and a Broadway musical .
Childbirth , labour , delivery ,  जनम , partus , or parturition is the culmination of  a pregnancy period with the expulsion of one or more newborn infants from a woman 's uterus .
The process of normal childbirth is categorized in three stages of labour : the shortening and dilation of the  ग्रीवा , descent और जनम  of the infant , and birth of the placenta .
In many cases and with increasing frequency , childbirth is achieved through  प्रेरण of मजदूर or caesarean खण्ड , जिससे is the हटाना of the neonate through a सर्जिकल incision in  the abdomen , rather than through vaginal birth .
Childbirth by C-Sections increased 50 % in the U.S. from 1996  to 2006 , और comprise nearly 32  % of births in the U.S. and Canada .
With respect to induced labor , more than 22 % of women  undergo प्रेरण of श्रमिक in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
Medical professional policy makers find that induced births and  elective cesarean can be नुकसानदेह to the भ्रूण और neonate as खूब as नुकसानदेह or बगैर लाभ to the माँ , और have स्थापित सख्त दिशानिर्देश  for non-medically indicated induced births and elective cesarean before 39 weeks .
Viva La Bam was an MTV & Viva show  जिससे followed bam margera और उसके क्रू as वे undertook चुनौतियां  , performed stunts and traveled the world .
the दिखाएँ भागा लिये 5 सीज़न  between 2003 and 2005 .
Flushed Away is a 2006  british/american कंप्यूटर एनिमेटेड कार्रवाई / एडवेंचर  comedy film directed by David Bowers and Sam Fell .
It was made in the partnership between Aardman Animations and DreamWorks Animation , and  is aardman 's पहला completely computer-animated विशेषता  as opposed to the usual stop-motion .
The film stars the  आवाज़ talents of ह्यूज जैकमैन , केट विंसलेट , एंडी  Serkis , Bill Nighy , Ian McKellen , Shane Richie and Jean Reno .
The story was by Sam Fell , Peter Lord , Dick Clement , and Ian La Frenais , and the screenplay  थी लिखा by लंड सहनशील , इयान la frenais , क्रिस्टोफर लॉयड , जो keenan  , and William Davies .
The film was released in US on 3  नवम्बर 2006 , और in uk on दिसम्बर 1 2006 , और थी  distributed by Paramount Pictures , except for Switzerland , Spain , and the Netherlands , which were handled by Universal Pictures .
The Atlanta Braves are a  पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली  based in Atlanta .
The Braves are a member of the Eastern Division of Major  लीग बेसबॉल 's नेशनल लीग  .
The Braves  have निभाई in टर्नर  Field since 1997 .
The `` Braves '' name , which was first used in  1912 , originates इससे a पद लिये  a Native American warrior .
वे हैं nicknamed `` the bravos '' , और प्रायः referred to as  `` America 's Team `` in reference to the team 's games being broadcast on the nationally available TBS from the 1970s until 2007 , gaining a wide fanbase .
From 1991 to 2005 the Braves were one of the most successful franchises in baseball , winning division  शीर्षक an unprecedented 14 लगातार टाइम्स in कि काल ( omitting the strike-shortened 1994 ऋतु in जिससे  there were no official division champions ) .
The Braves won the NL West 1991–93 and the NL East 1995–2005 , and  लौटे to the playoffs as the नेशनल लीग जंगली  Card in 2010 .
The Braves advanced to the World Series five times in  the 1990s , जीतना the शीर्षक in  1995 .
Since their debut in the National League in 1876 , the  मताधिकार रै जीती 16 डिवीजनल शीर्षक , 17 नेशनल लीग pennants , as खूब as तीन संसार श्रेणी championships—in 1914 as the बोस्टन braves  , in 1957 as the Milwaukee Braves , and in 1995 in Atlanta .
The Braves are the  तभी एमएलबी मताधिकार to have जीती the संसार श्रेणी  in three different home cities .
The club is one of the National League 's two remaining charter franchises ( the other being the Chicago Cubs ) and was founded  in बोस्टन , मैसाचुसेट्स , in 1871 as the बोस्टन रेड stockings ( नहीं to be उलझन साथ the अमरीकी लीग 's बोस्टन रेड sox  ) .
They are considered ``  the oldest  continuously playing team in major North American sports . ''
There is an argument as to who is actually older because although the Cubs are a full season `` older '' ( formed as the Chicago White Stockings in 1870 ) Chicago  खोया दो सीज़न to the ग्रेट शिकागो आग , यूँ the braves have निभाई अधिक लगातार सीज़न  .
After various name  परिवर्तन ( ऐसे as the बोस्टन beaneaters ) ,  the team operated as the Boston Braves for most of the first half of the 20th century .
In 1953 , the  टोली स्थानांतरित to मिल्वौकी , विस्कॉन्सिन  and became the Milwaukee Braves , followed by the move to Atlanta in 1966 .
The team 's tenure in Atlanta is famous  लिये हांक  Aaron breaking Babe Ruth 's career home run record in 1974 , though the majority of Aaron 's home runs were hit while the team was in Milwaukee .
His record stood until  2007 , जब सैन फ्रांसिस्को बाएँ क्षेत्ररक्षक बैरी  Bonds broke the record .

A leaf is an organ of a vascular plant , as defined  in वनस्पति शर्तें , और in particular  in plant morphology .
Foliage is a mass noun that  refers to पत्ते as a विशेषता  of plants .
Typically a leaf is a thin , flattened organ borne above ground and specialized for photosynthesis , but many types of leaves are adapted in ways almost unrecognisable in those terms : some are not flat ( for example many succulent leaves and conifers ) , some are not  ऊपर मैदान ( ऐसे as बल्ब तराजू ) , और कुछ हैं बगैर प्रमुख photosynthetic फलन ( consider लिये उदाहरण cataphylls  , spines , and cotyledons ) .
Conversely , many structures of  non-vascular पौधे , or भी of कुछ lichens , जिससे हैं नहीं पौधे  at all ( in the sense of being members of the kingdom Plantae ) , do look and function much like leaves .
Furthermore  , अनेक structures मिला in vascular  plants look like leaves but are not actually leaves ; they differ from leaves in their structures and origins .
Examples  शामिल phyllodes , cladodes  , and phylloclades .

Our  गिरोह ( भी ज्ञात as the छोटी दुष्टों or एचएएल रोच 's दुष्टों  ) are a series of American comedy short films about a group of poor neighborhood children and their adventures .
Created by comedy producer Hal Roach , the series is noted for showing children behaving in a relatively natural way , as Roach and original  निदेशक रॉबर्ट F. mcgowan worked to फिल्मी the unaffected , कच्चा nuances apparent in नियमित children बल्कि than have उन्हें  imitate adult acting styles .
In addition , Our Gang notably put boys , girls , whites and blacks together in a group as equals ,  कुछ कि `` broke  new ground , '' according to film historian Leonard Maltin .
Such a thing had  never महरूम किया पहले in सिनेमा लकिन रै  since been repeated after the success of Our Gang .
The first production at the Roach  स्टुडियो in 1922 थी a श्रेणी  of silent short subjects .
When Roach changed  वितरकों इससे pathé to metro-goldwyn-mayer ( mgm ) in 1927 , और  converted the series to sound in 1929 , the series took off even further .
Production continued at the  रोच स्टुडियो जबतक 1938 , जब the श्रेणी थी बेची to mgm  , who then continued producing the comedies until 1944 .
The Our Gang series includes a total of 220 shorts and one  विशेषता फिल्मी , सामान्य spanky , featuring over forty-one  child actors .
As MGM retained the rights to the Our Gang trademark  following उनके खरीदें of the उत्पादन अधिकारों , the 80 roach-produced `` टॉकीज़ '' यहूद syndicated  for television under the title The Little Rascals beginning in 1955 .
Both Roach 's The Little Rascals package (  अभी स्वामित्व by सीबीएस टेलीविज़न वितरण ) और mgm 's हमारी गिरोह पैकेज ( अभी स्वामित्व  by Warner Bros. Entertainment ) have since remained in syndication , with periodic new productions based on the shorts surfacing over the years , including a 1994 Little Rascals feature film released by Universal Pictures .
Zacharias Janssen ( also  zacharias जानसन or sacharias जानसन ) ( b.1580-88 , d.pre-1632 to  1638 ) was a Dutch spectacle-maker from Middelburg associated with the invention of the first optical telescope .
Janssen is sometimes also  credited लिये inventing the पहला  truly compound microscope .
However , the origin  of the सूक्ष्मदर्शी , बस जैसे the उत्पत्ति  of the telescope , is a matter of debate .
Lake Tahoe ( ; Washo : dáʔaw ) is a  विशाल freshwater झील in the सिएरा  Nevada of the United States .
At a surface elevation of , it is located along the border between California  और नेवाडा , वेस्ट of कार्सन नगर  .
Lake Tahoe is  the largest अल्पाइन  lake in North America .
Its depth is , making it the United State 's  second-deepest ( the deepest is crater झील in ऑरेगॉन  , being deeper , at ) .
Additionally , Lake Tahoe is  सूचीबद्ध as the 26th largest  lake by volume in the world at .
The lake was formed about 2 million years ago and is a part of  the झील tahoe जलाशय साथ the आधुनिक  lake being shaped during the ice ages .
It is known for the clarity of  इसके जल और the परिदृश्य of surrounding  mountains on all sides .
The area surrounding the lake is  भी referred to as झील tahoe  , or simply Tahoe .
Lake Tahoe is a major tourist attraction  in दोनो नेवाडा और कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
It is home to a number of ski resorts , summer  बाहरी मनोरंजन , और पर्यटक  attractions .
हिम और स्कीइंग हैं  a significant part of the area 's economy and reputation .
Mountain and lake scenery are  आकर्षण throughout  the year .
The Nevada side also  शामिल विशाल  casinos .
Highways provide  year-round अभिगम इससे रेनो , कार्सन  City , and Sacramento .

The Twenty-seventh Amendment ( Amendment XXVII ) prohibits any  विधि कि increases or decreases the सैलरी of सदस्यों  of the Congress from taking effect until the start of the next set of terms of office for Representatives .
It is the most recent amendment  to the संयुक्त  States Constitution .
It was submitted to the states for  अनुसमर्थन in 1789 और  was adopted in 1992 .
“First they came ... ” is a famous  बयान और उत्तेजक कविता attributed  to pastor Martin Niemöller ( 1892–1984 ) about the sloth of German intellectuals following the Nazis ' rise to power and the subsequent purging of their chosen targets , group after group .
There is some disagreement over the exact wording of the quotation and when it was created ; the content of the quotation may  have महरूम प्रस्तुत differently by niemöller on अलग  occasions .
