The Four Thirds system is a standard created by Olympus and Kodak for digital single-lens reflex camera ( DSLR )  डिज़ाइन और development. < संदर्भ name='dpreview.com  2001-02-13 ' >
The system provides a standard that , with digital cameras and lenses available from multiple manufacturers , allows  लिये the इंटरचेंज of lenses और लाशें इससे अलग  manufacturers .
seems  to कवर  the standard .
Proponents describe it as an  खोलें मानक , लकिन कंपनियाँ may तभी  use it under a non-disclosure agreement .
Unlike older SLR systems , Four Thirds has  महरूम designed इससे the मैदान up to be  entirely digital .
Many lenses are extensively computerized , to the point  कि ओलम्पस offers फर्मवेयर अद्यतन  for many of them .
Lens design has  महरूम tailored to the आवश्यकताएँ of डिजिटल सेंसर  , most notably through telecentric designs .
The size of the sensor is  significantly छोटी than लिये सबसे dslrs और इस implies कि  lenses , especially telephoto lenses , can be smaller .
For example , a Four Thirds lens with a  300 mm फोकल लंबाई होता कवर परिचय the वही कोण  of view as a 600 mm focal length lens for the 35 mm film standard , and is correspondingly more compact .
Thus , the Four Thirds System has crop factor ( focal  लंबाई गुणक ) of परिचय 2 , और जबकि इस enables longer फोकल लंबाई लिये वृहद आवर्धन  , it does n't aid the manufacture of wide angle lenses .
The image sensor format , generally intermediate  between those of larger slrs और छोटी कॉम्पैक्ट कैमरे , generally देता स्तर  of cost , performance and convenience intermediate between those two classes .
HVAC systems use ventilation air ducts installed throughout a building to supply conditioned air to a room through outlet vents ,  पुकारा diffusers ; और नलिकाएं to हटाएँ एयर through return-air  grilles .
HVAC  ( हीटिंग , वेंटिलेशन  , and air conditioning ) is the technology of indoor and automotive environmental comfort .
HVAC system  डिज़ाइन is a subdiscipline of mechanical अभियान्त्रिकी  , based on the principles of thermodynamics , fluid mechanics , and heat transfer .
प्रशीतन is sometimes  added to the field 's abbreviation as HVAC & R or HVACR , or ventilating is dropped as in HACR ( such as the designation of HACR-rated circuit breakers ) .
HVAC is important in the design of medium to large industrial and office buildings such as skyscrapers and in marine environments such as  एक्वैरियम , जहाँ सुरक्षित और स्वस्थ भवन शर्तें हैं  regulated with respect to temperature and humidity , using fresh air from outdoors .
Ventilation on the downdraught system , by  impulsion , or the 'plenum ' principle , लागू to  schoolrooms ( 1899 )
Heating , ventilating , and air conditioning is based on inventions and discoveries made by Nikolay Lvov , Michael Faraday , Willis  वाहक , reuben trane , जेम्स जूल , विलियम rankine  , Sadi Carnot , and many others .
The invention of the components of HVAC systems went hand-in-hand with the industrial revolution , and new  विधि of modernization , उच्चतर दक्षता  , and system control are constantly introduced by companies and inventors worldwide .
The three central functions of heating , ventilating , and air-conditioning are interrelated , especially with the need to provide thermal  सुकून और स्वीकार्य अंदर एयर विशेषता भीतर उचित संस्थापना , आपरेशन  , and maintenance costs .
HVAC systems can provide  वेंटिलेशन , reduce एयर घुसपैठ , और maintain दबाव  relationships between spaces .
The means of air delivery and removal from  स्पेसेस is ज्ञात as रूम  air distribution .
The starting point in carrying out an  अनुमान दोनो लिये कूलिंग और  heating depends on the exterior climate and interior specified conditions .
However before taking up the heat load calculation  , it is जरुरी to ढूँढें भैस  air requirements for each area in detail , as pressurization is an important consideration .
In modern buildings the design , installation , and control systems of these functions are integrated into  एक or अधिक hvac प्रणालियों  .
लिये बहुत छोटी इमारतें , ठेकेदारों सामान्यतः  capacity engineer and select HVAC systems and equipment .
For larger buildings , building services  designers और इंजीनियर्स , ऐसे as mechanical  , architectural , or building services engineers analyze , design , and specify the HVAC systems , and specialty mechanical contractors fabricate and commission them .
Building permits and code-compliance inspections of the installations are  सामान्यतः जरूरी लिये  all sizes of buildings .
The HVAC industry is a worldwide enterprise , with roles including operation and maintenance , system design and  निर्माण , उपकरण निर्माण और बिक्री , और in शिक्षा  and research .
The HVAC industry  थी historically regulated by the निर्माताओं of hvac उपकरण , लकिन regulating और मानकों संगठन ऐसे as hardi , ashrae , smacna  , ACCA , Uniform Mechanical Code , International Mechanical Code , and AMCA have been established to support the industry and encourage high standards and achievement .
Royal Navy Commander James Bond , CMG , RNVR , is a fictional character  निर्मित by अंग्रेजों पत्रकार और  novelist Ian Fleming in 1953 .
He is the  समर्थक of the जेम्स बंध श्रेणी  of novels , films , comics and video games .
Fleming wrote twelve Bond novels and two short story collections before his death , although the  पिछला दो books— the man साथ the सुनहरी गन और octopussy और the जीना daylights  —were published posthumously .
The Bond character is a Secret Service  एजेंट , कोड क्रमांक 007 , residing in लंदन  but active internationally .
Bond was a  कम्पोजिट अक्षर जो थी आधारित on a क्रमांक of कमांडो जिसको फ्लेमिंग knew दौरान उसके सेवा in the नवल प्रज्ञा  Division during World War II , to whom Fleming added his own style and a number of his own tastes ; Bond 's name was appropriated from American ornithologist James Bond .
Bond has a number of character traits which run  throughout the किताबे , सहित an enjoyment of गाड़ियाँ , a प्रेम  of food and drink , and an average intake of sixty custom-made cigarettes a day .
Since Fleming 's death in 1964 , there have been other authorised writers of Bond material , including John Gardner , who wrote fourteen novels  और दो novelizations और रेमंड बेंसन , जो लिखा छह novels ,  three novelizations and three short stories .
There have also been three authors who wrote one book each , Kingsley Amis ( writing as Robert  markham ) , सेबेस्टियन faulks और jeffery deaver  .
Additionally a  श्रेणी of novels आधारित on बंध 's youth—  Young Bond —was written by Charlie Higson .
As spin-offs from the literary works , there was a television adaptation of the  पहला अनोखा , कसीनो royale , in जिससे बंध थी  played as an American agent .
A comic strip series  भी भागा in  the Daily Express newspaper .
There have also  महरूम twenty-five बंध films ; सात अभिनेताओं  have played Bond in these films .
`` Nature Boy  '' is a सोंग by ईडन ahbez  , published in 1947 .
The song tells a fantasy of a `` strange enchanted boy ... who wandered very far '' only to learn that ``  the महानतम बात ... थी बस to प्रेम और be loved in वापसी  '' .
Nat King Cole 's 1948 recording  of the सोंग थी a प्रमुख hit और  `` Nature Boy '' has since become a pop and jazz standard , with dozens of major artists interpreting the song .
Louisiana ( or ; , ; Louisiana Creole : Léta de la Lwizyàn ) is a  राज्य स्तिथ in the दक्षिणी प्रदेश  of the United States of America .
Louisiana is the 31st most  extensive और the 25th सबसे  populous of the 50 United States .
इसके पूंजी is baton  Rouge and largest city is New Orleans .
Louisiana is the  तभी राज्य in the u.S. साथ राजनैतिक subdivisions termed  parishes , which are local government 's equivalent to counties .
The largest  मोहल्ला by जनसांख्यिकी is ईस्ट baton रूज मोहल्ला , और  the largest by land area is Cameron Parish .
Much of  the राज्य 's lands यहूद formed इससे sediment धोया bas the  Mississippi River , leaving enormous deltas and vast areas of coastal marsh and swamp .
These contain a rich southern biota ;  ठेठ उदाहरण शामिल  birds such as ibis and egrets .
There  हैं भी अनेक प्रजाति of पेड़ मेंढक  , and fish such as sturgeon and paddlefish .
In more elevated areas , fire is a natural process in the landscape , and has produced extensive  क्षेत्रों of longleaf पाइन वन और  wet savannas .
These support an exceptionally large number of plant species ,  सहित अनेक प्रजाति of orchids और  carnivorous plants .
Some Louisiana urban environments have a multicultural , multilingual heritage , being so strongly  बहकावे by an जिसमें of 18th-century फ्रेंच , स्पेनी , देशी अमरीकी ( भारतीय ) और अफ़्रीकी संस्कृतियों  that they are considered to be somewhat exceptional in the U.S .
Before the  अमरीकी खरीदें of the territory , the वर्तमान  Louisiana State had been both a Spanish and French colony .
In addition , the pattern of development included importing numerous African slaves in the 18th  सदी , साथ अनेक इससे the वही प्रदेश of वेस्ट अफ़्रीकी , यूँ  concentrating their culture .
In the post-Civil War  पर्यावरण , anglo-americans increased the दबाव लिये anglicization  , and in 1915 , English was made the only official language of the state .
Women 's rights are  the अधिकारों और entitlements claimed लिये  women and girls of many societies worldwide .
In some  स्थान ये अधिकारों हैं institutionalized  or supported by law , local custom , and behaviour , whereas in others they may be ignored or suppressed .
They differ from broader notions of human rights through claims of  an अंतर्निहित ऐतिहासिक और परंपरागत पूर्वाग्रह विरूद्ध the कसरत of अधिकारों by  women and girls in favour of men and boys .
Issues commonly associated with notions of women 's rights include  , हालांकि हैं नहीं सीमित to , the सही : to bodily अखंडता और स्वायत्तता ; to vote  ( suffrage ) ; to hold public office ; to work ; to fair wages or equal pay ; to own property ; to education ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to enter into legal contracts ; and to have marital , parental and religious rights .
The laws of science or scientific laws are statements that describe ,  भविष्यवाणी , और शायद बताइये क्यों , a दायरा of phenomena व्यवहार as वे appear to in  nature .
The term `` law ''  रै विविध उपयोग in अनेक मामले : सन्निकट , सटीक  , broad or narrow theories , in all natural scientific disciplines ( physics , chemistry , biology , geology , astronomy etc . ) .
An analogous  पद लिये a वैज्ञानिक  law is a principle .
वैज्ञानिक विधिs:
summarize a large collection of facts  संकल्पित by प्रयोग into a सिंगल  statement,
can usually be formulated mathematically as one or several statements or equation , or at least stated in  a सिंगल वाक्य , so कि it can be प्रयुक्त to भविष्यवाणी the निष्कर्ष of an प्रयोग  , given the initial , boundary , and other physical conditions of the processes which take place,
are strongly supported by empirical evidence - they are scientific  ज्ञान कि प्रयोग have repeatedly सत्यापित  ( and never falsified ) .
Their accuracy does not change when new theories are worked out , but rather the scope of  अनुप्रयोग , चूंकि the समीकरण ( if कोई )  representing the law does not change .
As with other scientific knowledge , they do not  have निरपेक्ष certainty जैसे गणितीय theorems or पहचान , और it is सदा  possible for a law to be overturned by future observations .
are often quoted as a fundamental  controlling influence बल्कि than a वर्णन of observed तथ्य  .
I.e .  `` the कानून of गति  require that ''
Laws differ from hypotheses and postulates , which are  प्रस्तावित  during the scientific process before and during validation by experiment and observation .
These are not  कानून चूंकि वे have नहीं महरूम सत्यापित to the वही उपाधि और may नहीं be fear सामान्य  , although they may lead to the formulation of laws .
A law is a more  solidified और औपचारिक बयान , आसुत  from repeated experiment .
Although the concepts of a law or principle in nature is borderline to philosophy , and presents the depth to which  गणित can describe प्रकृति , वैज्ञानिक कानून हैं माना इससे a वैज्ञानिक परिप्रेक्ष्य और follow the वैज्ञानिक विधि ; वे `` serve उनके purpose '' बल्कि than `` questioning वास्तविकता '' ( philosophical )  or `` statements of logical absolution '' ( mathematical ) .
For  उदाहरण , whether a  law `` refers to reality '' is a philosophical issue , rather than scientific .
fundamentally , सब वैज्ञानिक कानून follow इससे भौतिकी  , laws which occur in other sciences ultimately follow from physical laws .
Often , from mathematically fundamental viewpoints ,  सार्वभौमिक स्थिरांक emerge  from scientific laws .
The launch of the PlayStation 3 into the Japanese market on 10 November 2006  चिह्नित the दूसरी प्रमुख सातवाँ पीढी entertainment  system to be released .
The system was released seven days later on 17 November in the  संयुक्त राज्य  .
Introduction into other world markets was delayed by a shortage of diodes for use in the Blu-ray disc player ;  the यंत्र थी शुभारम्भ in यूरोपीय और अन्य संसार बाज़ार in the पहला  half of 2007 .
Lauren Fenmore Baldwin ( formerly  विलियम्स और grainger ) is a fictional अक्षर  from the CBS soap operas The Young and the Restless and The Bold and the Beautiful , portrayed by Tracey E. Bregman .
She made her debut  दौरान the एपीसोड airing  on January 21 , 1983 .
In  1992 , bregman began बनाना विरल दिखावे on the बिंदास और the खूबसूरत  , later resulting in the character migrating there fully in 1995 .
Following a guest appearance in 2000 , Bregman returned to The Young and the Restless on  अगस्त 24 , 2001 , बाकी on पुनरावर्ती औकात  .
In 2013 ,  it थी घोषित कि bregman  had been placed on contract .
Much of Lauren 's history has revolved around her  romances साथ पॉल विलियम्स , स्कॉट grainger , sr. , और माइकल baldwin among अनेक अन्य causing a fierce फंसने  with Traci Abbott Connolly .
लॉरेन is भी प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके long , हिंसक  rivalry with Sheila Carter .
The 2010 NBA Finals was the National Basketball Association (  एनबीए ) चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी लिये the 2009–10 ऋतु  .
The best-of-seven playoff was contested between the Los Angeles Lakers  , champions of the पश्चिमी सम्मेलन और defending एनबीए champions  , and the Boston Celtics , champions of the Eastern Conference .
The Lakers defeated the Celtics , four games to three , to win the franchise 's  16th एनबीए चैंपियनशिप  .
The 64th edition of the championship series was played between June 3  और जून  17 , was broadcast on ABC , and was watched by an average of 18.1 million people .
The Celtics  अर्जित उनके berth into the  playoffs by winning the Atlantic Division .
The Lakers won  the प्रशांत प्रभाग  to earn their berth .
The Celtics reached the NBA Finals by defeating the Miami Heat in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference First Round , the Cleveland Cavaliers in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference Semifinals , and defending Eastern conference  चैंपियन ऑरलैंडो जादू in the best-of-seven पूर्वी सम्मेलन  Finals .
The Lakers reached  the एनबीए फाइनल by defeating the ओक्लाहोमा नगर थंडर in the best-of-seven पश्चिमी सम्मेलन पहला गोलाकार , the यूटा  Jazz in the best-of-seven Western Conference Semifinals , and the Phoenix Suns in the best-of-seven Western Conference Finals .
The NBA Finals were scheduled in the Major League Baseball World Series 2–3–2 seven game format , with the Lakers possessing  home-court लाभ as a बदला लिये finishing साथ बेहतर नियमित  season record than the Celtics .
Repeated baskets from starters Kobe Bryant ,  pau gasol , और रॉन artest brought the लेकर्स बंद  to victory in Game 1 .
A record breaking  प्रदर्शन इससे रे एलन 's आठ three-point  baskets ensured the Celtics a Game 2 triumph .
Derek Fisher ’s 11 points in the fourth quarter helped  the लेकर्स जीत खेल  3 .
The Celtics won Game 4 ; it did n't hurt that they netted an excellent performance in baskets by the team’s reserves , while  पॉल पियर्स led the टोली to a खेल 5 जीत साथ 27 अंक on 57 % शूटिंग  from the floor .
The Lakers avoided elimination by winning a decisive  खेल 6 साथ 24 अंक contributed by उनके बेंच  .
Although  वे trailed the सेल्टिक्स by 13 अंक जल्दी in the तीसरा क्वार्टर , the लेकर्स rallied और जीती उनके दूसरी लगातार चैंपियनशिप  by taking over an exciting Game 7 aided by late contributions on offense by Pau Gasol and Artest and rebounding .
Bryant was named Most Valuable Player of the  फाइनल लिये उसके दूसरी लगातार  trophy .
This was the first NBA Finals to go the full seven games since and only  the चौथी चूंकि the एनबीए फाइनल लौटे to a  2–3–2 format in .
The Laker franchise has 16 NBA Championships ( Five in  मिनियापोलिस , 11 in लॉस एंजिल्स ) trailing the सेल्टिक्स ' सत्रह  championships .
The NBA Finals used the `` World Series '' Format in 1949 Minneapolis Lakers defeated the Washington Capitols  4 खेल to 2 ; in 1953 मिनियापोलिस पराजित the नई यॉर्क knicks 4 खेल to 1 ; in 1954 मिनियापोलिस  defeated the Syracuse Nationals 4 games to 3 ; and in 1955 Syracuse Nationals defeated the Fort Wayne Pistons 4 games to 3 .
The NBA  होता वापसी to the 2–2–1–1–1 नेशनल  Hockey League seven game series format until 1985 .
Black pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering vine in the  परिवार piperaceae , cultivated लिये इसके  fruit , which is usually dried and used as a spice and seasoning .
The fruit , known as a peppercorn when dried , is approximately in diameter , dark red  जब fully वयस्क , और , जैसे सब drupes , contains  a single seed .
Peppercorns , and the ground pepper derived from them , may be  वर्णित बस as pepper , or अधिक precisely as ब्लैक  pepper ( cooked and dried unripe fruit ) , green pepper ( dried unripe fruit ) and white pepper ( dried ripe seeds ) .
Black  pepper is देशी to दक्षिण इण्डिया , और is extensively  cultivated there and elsewhere in tropical regions .
Currently Vietnam is the world  's largest निर्माता और निर्यातक of pepper , producing  34 % of the world 's Piper nigrum crop as of 2008 .
Dried ground pepper  रै महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्राचीनता  for both its flavour and as a medicine .
Black pepper is the world 's  सबसे traded मसाला  .
It is one of the most common spices added to  यूरोपीय भोजन  and its descendants .
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the chemical  piperine , नहीं to be उलझन साथ the capsaicin  that gives fleshy peppers theirs .
It is in  the आधुनिक संसार  , often paired with salt .
In cardiovascular physiology , ejection fraction ( EF ) represents the volumetric fraction of  रक्त उत्तेजित आउट of the ventricle ( दिल ) साथ प्रत्येक दिल ताल  or cardiac cycle .
It can be applied  to either the सही ventricle जिससे  ejects via the pulmonary valve into the pulmonary circulation or the left ventricle which ejects via the aortic valve into the systemic circulation .
Imaging of the physiology of the  mammalian दिल  is the art that allows meaningful mathematical expression defining EF .
noninvasive हृदय इमेजिंग रै become a विश्वव्यापी  utility enabling study of cardiac performance reproducibly and inexpensively .
Simplified , Ejection fraction is a mathematical  उत्पाद अनुमत by हृदय  imaging .
As a  गणितीय पद , ejection भिन्न is an एक्सटेंशन  of the work of Adolph Fick in cardiac output .
Dedicated technology such as Echocardiography , Computed Tomography , Magnetic Resonance Imaging and MUGA  स्कैनिंग have definitively अनुमत clinically प्रासंगिक गणित regarding ischemia , जन्मजात दिल  Disease and Heart Failure .
The prosecutor is the chief legal representative of the prosecution in countries with either  the आम विधि adversarial प्रणाली , or the सिविल विधि inquisitorial  system .
The prosecution is the legal party responsible for  पेश the मामला in a दण्ड विचारण  against an individual accused of breaking the law .
Strawberry shortcake  सबसे commonly अर्थात् a मिठाई in the shortcake  family of cakes .
Strawberry shortcake  may भी refer to:
स्ट्रॉबेरी shortcake , a अक्षर  and franchise created by American Greetings
The shortened title  of स्ट्रॉबेरी on the shortcake  , a Japanese romance movie .
Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 June 632 ) , also transliterated as Muhammad ( ) , was a religious ,  राजनैतिक , और सैन्य नेता इससे मक्का जो एकीकृत अरब into a सिंगल धार्मिक polity अंतर्गत islam  .
He is believed by Muslims and Bahá'ís to be a messenger  और नबी of परमेश्वर  .
Muhammad is almost  universally माना by मुसलमान as the पिछला नबी  sent by God for mankind .
Non-Muslims regard  मुहम्मद as the संस्थापक  of Islam .
Muslims consider him to be the restorer of an unaltered original monotheistic faith of  आदम , नूह , अब्राहम , मूसा , यीशु , और अन्य नबियों  .
Born in about 570 CE in the Arabian city of Mecca , he was orphaned  at an जल्दी आयु और brought up अंतर्गत the परवाह of उसके ताऊ  Abu Talib .
He later worked mostly as a merchant , as well  as a गड़रिये , और थी पहला शादीशुदा by आयु 25  .
Being in the habit of periodically  retreating to a गुफा in the surrounding kyu लिये अनेक नाइट्स of seclusion और दुआ , he बाद reported  that it was there , at age 40 , that he received his first revelation from God .
Three years after this event Muhammad started preaching these revelations publicly ,  proclaiming कि `` परमेश्वर is एक `` , कि पूरा `` आत्मसमर्पण '' to  Him ( lit .
islām ) is the only way ( dīn )  स्वीकार्य to परमेश्वर , और कि he खुद  was a prophet and messenger of God , in the same vein as other Islamic prophets .
Muhammad gained few followers early on , and was  मिले साथ दुश्मनी इससे कुछ meccan जनजातियों ; he और उसके अनुसरणकर्ता  were treated harshly .
To escape persecution , Muhammad sent some of his followers to Abyssinia before he and his  अनुसरणकर्ता in मक्का migrated to मदीना ( तब ज्ञात as yathrib ) in the साल  622 .
This event  , the हिज्र , marks the शुरूआत  of the Islamic calendar , which is also known as the Hijri Calendar .
In Medina , Muhammad united the tribes  अंतर्गत the संविधान of मदीना  .
After eight years of fighting with the Meccan tribes  , उसके अनुसरणकर्ता , जो by तब था grown to 10,000 , took  control of Mecca in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca .
He destroyed the pagan idols in the city and then sent his  अनुसरणकर्ता आउट to नष्ट सब of the बाकी pagan मंदिरों  in Eastern Arabia .
In 632 , a few months after  returning to मदीना  from The Farewell Pilgrimage , Muhammad fell ill and died .
By the time  of उसके मौत , सबसे of the arabian प्रायद्वीप था परिवर्तित  to Islam , and he had united Arabia into a single Muslim religious polity .
The  खुलासे  ( or Ayah , lit .
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — which Muhammad reported receiving until his death – form the verses of the Quran , regarded by Muslims  as the `` शब्द of परमेश्वर '' और around जिससे the धर्म  is based .
Besides the Quran ,  मुहम्मद 's जीवन ( सिरा ) और परंपराओं  ( sunnah ) are also upheld by Muslims as the sources of sharia law .
They discuss Muhammad and other prophets of Islam with reverence , adding the phrase peace be  upon उसे whenever उनके names हैं उल्लेखित  .
While conceptions  of मुहम्मद in मध्यकालीन christendom और premodern टाइम्स यहूद  largely negative , appraisals in modern history have been far less so .
The Great   Books ( second edition )
Great Books of the Western World is a series of books originally  प्रकाशित in the संयुक्त राज्य in 1952 by ब्रिटैनिका विश्वकोष  Inc. to present the Great Books in a single package of 54 volumes .
The series is now  in इसके दूसरी संस्करण और contains  60 volumes .
The original editors of the series chose three criteria for inclusion : a book must be relevant to contemporary issues , and not only  महत्वपूर्ण in इसके ऐतिहासिक कॉन्टेक्स्ट ; it जरूर बदला rereading ; और it जरूर be a  part of `` the great conversation about the great ideas , '' relevant to at least 25 of the 102 great ideas identified by the editors .
Books were not chosen on the  आधार of जातीय or सांस्कृतिक inclusiveness , ऐतिहासिक  influence , or the editors ' agreement with the views expressed .
`` Cocaine '' is a song written and  अंकित by jj cale in 1976 , लकिन भी  known as a cover version recorded by Eric Clapton .
Allmusic calls the latter `` among [ Clapton 's ] most enduringly popular hits '' and notes that `` even for an artist  जैसे क्लैप्टन साथ a विशाल देह of high-quality कार्य , 'cocaine ' बाँधने among  his best . ''
Glyn Johns , who had previously worked with The Who , Led Zeppelin and The Rolling Stones , produced the Clapton recording ,  जिससे थी released on क्लैप्टन 's 1977 एल्बम slowhand और as a सिंगल in 1980  .
The live version of `` Cocaine '' , from the Just One Night album recorded in Tokyo , charted on the Billboard Hot 100 as the  b-side of `` तुलसा समय `` , जिससे थी a  No . 30 hit in 1980. ``
Cocaine '' was one  of अनेक of cale 's गीतों अंकित by क्लैप्टन , सहित  `` After Midnight `` and `` Travelin ' Light '' .
The attack on  पर्ल हार्बर ( पुकारा हवाई आपरेशन or आपरेशन ai by the जापानी इम्पीरियल सामान्य मुख्यालय ( आपरेशन  Z in planning ) and the Battle of Pearl Harbor ) was a surprise military strike conducted by the Imperial Japanese Navy against the United States naval base at Pearl Harbor , Hawaii , on the morning of December 7 , 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ) .
From the standpoint of the defenders , the attack  commenced at 7:48 a.m. हवाई समय .
The attack was intended as a preventive  कार्रवाई in अनुक्रम to रखना the u.S. प्रशांत बेड़े इससे दखल साथ सैन्य क्रियाएँ  the Empire of Japan was planning in Southeast Asia against overseas territories of the United Kingdom , the Netherlands , and the United States .
the आधार थी attacked by 353 जापानी  fighters , bombers and torpedo planes in two waves , launched from six aircraft carriers .
सब आठ u.S. नेवी battleships  were damaged , with four being sunk .
Two of these were later raised , and with the  बाकी चार repaired , छह battleships लौटे  to service later in the war .
The Japanese also sank or damaged three cruisers , three destroyers , an  anti-aircraft प्रशिक्षण जलयान  , and one minelayer .
188 U.S. aircraft were destroyed  ; 2,402 अमेरिकी यहूद मारे  and 1,282 wounded .
Important base installations such as the power station , shipyard , maintenance , and fuel and torpedo  भंडार सुविधाएं , as खूब as the पनडुब्बी पियर और मुख्यालय भवन  ( also home of the intelligence section ) were not attacked .
Japanese losses were light : 29 aircraft and five midget submarines lost , and  65 servicemen मारे or wounded  .
One Japanese  नाविक थी  captured .
The attack came as a profound shock to the American people and led directly to the American entry into  संसार युद्ध ii in दोनो the प्रशांत और यूरोपीय थिएटर  .
The following  दिन ( दिसम्बर 8 ) ,  the United States declared war on Japan .
Domestic support for  non-interventionism , जिससे था महरूम दमदार  , disappeared .
clandestine support of ब्रिटेन ( लिये उदाहरण  the Neutrality Patrol ) was replaced by active alliance .
subsequent परिचालन by the u.S. prompted जर्मनी और इटली to घोषित युद्ध on the  U.S. on December 11 , which was reciprocated by the U.S. the same day .
There were numerous  ऐतिहासिक precedents लिये unannounced सैन्य  action by Japan .
However , the lack of any formal warning , particularly while  negotiations यहूद स्टिल जाहिर जारी , led अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट  to proclaim December 7 , 1941 , `` a date which will live in infamy `` .
Project Runway Season 2 was the second season of Bravo 's  कामयाब प्रोजेक्ट रनवे , a वास्तविकता  competition for fashion designers .
Season 2 began  airing on दिसम्बर  7 , 2005 .
Following a nationwide search earlier in the year , sixteen  designers यहूद चुनी as semi-finalists और  brought to New York City in June , 2005 .
After the first challenge , called `` Road To The  रनवे '' , चौदह गई on  to compete as finalists .
The winning designer , Chloe Dao , received $ 100,000 in seed money to help launch her own line , a 2007 Saturn Sky  roadster , a स्प्रेड in elle पत्रिका , और a mentorship साथ the banana गणतंत्र डिज़ाइन टोली  .
Winning  alongside dao थी उसके मॉडल , अनुग्रह kelsey , जो  received the ELLE Magazine spread .
Michael Kors and Nina Garcia  लौटे as न्यायाधीशों लिये the दूसरी  season .
The fourth judging seat rotated each  सप्ताह , आधारित on the चुनौती  .
Tim Gunn , fashion chair at  पार्सन्स the नई स्कूल  for Design , returned as a mentor for the designers .
Kara Janx later  appeared in प्रोजेक्ट रनवे : सब सितारों in 2012  , where she finished 7th out of 13 .
Andrae Gonzalo , in the  वही साल , competed in the दूसरी ऋतु of the सब  Stars edition placing 10th out of 13 .
An example of  a heraclius  mule
In numismatics , a mule is a coin or medal minted with  obverse और रिवर्स डिजाइन नहीं  normally seen on the same piece .
These can be intentional or  उत्पादित by गलती  .
This type of error is highly  sought बाद , और उदाहरण can लाने  steep prices from collectors .
The earliest mules are found among ancient  यूनानी और रोमन सिक्के  .
Opinion is divided between those who think that they are accidental , the  परिणाम of an गलत संयोजन of a नई die साथ एक कि था officially  been withdrawn from use , or the work of coiners working with dies stolen from an official mint , perhaps at a time when one of them should have been destroyed .
The name derives from the mule , the hybrid offspring of a  घोड़ा और a गधा , due to ऐसे a सिक्का having दो पहलू intended लिये अलग  coins , much as a mule has parents of two different species .
This page documents the  tornadoes और बवंडर outbreaks  of 2010 .
the बहुमत of tornadoes  form in the U.S. , but they can occur almost anywhere under the right conditions .
A lesser  क्रमांक occur बाहर the u.S. , सबसे notably in भाग of neighboring दक्षिणी कनाडा  during the Northern Hemisphere 's summer season , but are also known in South America , Europe , Asia , and Australia .
There were 1,531 tornadoes reported in the United  राज्य in 2010 ( of जिससे at तनिक  1,266 were confirmed ) , with 45 confirmed fatalities .
Elsewhere in the world  , 11 लोगों यहूद मारे in tornadoes , छह in अर्जेंटीना , तीन  in the Bahamas , one in Bangladesh , and one in Germany .
The year was near average for tornadoes despite an extremely quiet early  वसन्त काल , however ऐसे बदला बाद a विशाल  upswing starting in late April and a busy late spring and summer period .
The autumn  महीने यहूद थोड़ा  above average .
A  lymphocyte is a प्रकार of श्वेत रक्त  cell in the vertebrate immune system .
Under the microscope ,  lymphocytes can be विभाजित into विशाल lymphocytes  and small lymphocytes .
Large granular lymphocytes include  प्राकृतिक कातिल कोशिकाएं ( nk  cells ) .
Small lymphocytes consist of T  कोशिकाएं और b कोशिकाएं  .
Windows PowerShell is  microsoft 's कार्य स्वचालन फ्रेमवर्क , consisting  of a command-line shell and associated scripting language built on .NET Framework .
PowerShell provides full access to COM and WMI , enabling  प्रशासकों to perform प्रशासनिक कार्य on दोनो लोकल  and remote Windows systems .
In PowerShell ,  प्रशासनिक कार्य हैं generally performed by cmdlets ( सुनाया command-lets  ) , which are specialized .NET classes implementing a particular operation .
Sets of cmdlets may be combined together in scripts , executables ( which  हैं स्टैंडअलोन अनुप्रयोग ) , or by instantiating  regular .NET classes ( or WMI/COM Objects ) .
These work by accessing data in different data stores , like the filesystem or registry , which are made  उपलब्धियाँ to the powershell runtime  via Windows PowerShell providers .
Windows  powershell भी provides a होस्टिंग api साथ  which the Windows PowerShell runtime can be embedded inside other applications .
These applications  can तब उपयोग खिड़कियाँ powershell कार्यक्षमता  to implement certain operations , including those exposed via the graphical interface .
This capability has been used by Microsoft Exchange Server 2007 to expose its management functionality as PowerShell  cmdlets और प्रदाताओं और implement the आलेखीय प्रबन्धन टूल्स as powershell होस्ट जिससे invoke  the necessary cmdlets .
Other Microsoft  अनुप्रयोग सहित microsoft एसक्यूएल सर्वर 2008 भी  expose their management interface via PowerShell cmdlets .
With PowerShell  , आलेखीय interface-based प्रबन्धन अनुप्रयोग  on Windows are layered on top of Windows PowerShell .
A PowerShell scripting interface for Windows  उत्पाद is mandated by the  Common Engineering Criteria .
खिड़कियाँ powershell शामिल इसके अपना extensive , console-based  help , similar to man pages in Unix shells , via the Get-Help cmdlet .
Mary Poppins is a 1964 musical film starring Julie Andrews , Dick Van  dyke , दाउद tomlinson , और glynis जॉन्स , उत्पादित by वॉल्ट  Disney , and based on the Mary Poppins books series by P. L. Travers .
The film was directed by Robert Stevenson  और लिखा by विधेयक वाल्श और डॉन dagradi , साथ गीतों  by the Sherman Brothers .
It was shot at Walt  डिज़्नी studios in burbank  , California .
Julie Andrews won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance as Mary Poppins and the film also won Oscars for Best Film  संपादन , असली म्यूज़िक स्कोर , बेहतरीन सोंग लिये `` chim chim  Cher-ee '' and Best Visual Effects , and received a total of 13 nominations .
a स्टोरी चाप is an विस्तारित or continuing कथानक  in episodic storytelling media such as television , comic books , comic strips , boardgames , video games , and in some cases , films .
On a television program , for example , the story would unfold  over अनेक एपीसोड  .
In television , the use of the  स्टोरी चाप is much अधिक आम in dramas  than in comedies , especially in soap operas .
Webcomics are more likely to use story arcs than newspaper comics , as most web comics have readable archives online  कि a newcomer to the स्ट्रिप can पढ़ा in अनुक्रम to समझे  what is going on .
Although story arcs  have existed लिये दशकों , the पद `` स्टोरी चाप '' थी  coined in 1988 in relation to the television series Wiseguy , and was quickly adapted for other uses .
Many  अमरीकी कॉमिक किताब श्रेणी हैं  now written in four or six-issue arcs , within a continuing series .
Short story arcs are easier to package as  व्यापार paperbacks लिये पुनर्विक्रय , और अधिक accessible  to the casual reader than the never-ending continuity that once characterised comics .
Black Friday is the day following Thanksgiving Day  in the संयुक्त राज्य , प्रायः regarded as the शुरूआत of  the Christmas shopping season .
In recent years , most major retailers have opened extremely early and offered  promotional बिक्री to लात बंद the अवकाश खरीदारी ऋतु , समान  to Boxing Day sales in many Commonwealth Nations .
Black Friday is not an official  पब्लिक अवकाश as ऐसे , लकिन अनेक  non-retail employees and schools have both Thanksgiving and the day after off , followed by a weekend , thereby increasing the number of potential shoppers .
It has routinely been the busiest shopping day of the year since 2005 , although news reports , which at  कि समय यहूद inaccurate , have वर्णित it as the व्यस्ततम खरीदारी दिन of  the year for a much longer period of time .
The day 's name  originated in फिलाडेल्फिया , जहाँ it originally थी प्रयुक्त to describe the  heavy and disruptive pedestrian and vehicle traffic which would occur on the day after Thanksgiving .
Use of the term started  पहले 1961 और began to देखिए broader  use outside Philadelphia around 1975 .
Later an alternative explanation began to be offered  : कि `` ब्लैक शुक्रवार '' indicates the पाइंट  at which retailers begin to turn a profit , or are `` '' .
For many years , it  थी आम लिये रिटेलर to खोलें  at 6:00 a.m. , but in the late 2000s many had crept to 5:00 or even 4:00 .
This was taken to  a नई चरम in 2011 , जब अनेक रिटेलर ( सहित  Target , Kohl 's , Macy 's , Best Buy , and Bealls ) opened at midnight for the first time .
In 2012 ,  walmart और अनेक अन्य रिटेलर घोषित कि वे होता खोलें सबसे of उनके स्टोर्स at 8:00  p.m. on Thanksgiving Day ( except in states where opening on Thanksgiving is prohibited due to blue laws , such as Massachusetts where they still opened around midnight ) , prompting calls for a walkout among some workers .
Black Friday shopping is known for attracting aggressive crowds , with  सालाना रिपोर्ट्स of assaults , shootings , और throngs of लोगों trampling  on other shoppers in an attempt to get the best deal on a product before supplies run out .
The Family That Preys is a 2008 American movie  नाटक लिखा , उत्पादित , और  directed by Tyler Perry .
The screenplay focuses on two families , one  धनवान और the अन्य working क्लास , जिनकी जीवनदान हैं  intertwined in both love and business .
The movie is the second of four in which Perry 's  हस्ताक्षर अक्षर , madea , करता नहीं मेक  an appearance .
It is also the second  perry-directed फिल्मी ( alongside पापा  's Little Girls ) that is not based on any of the filmmaker 's stage plays .
Net 10 , Net 15 , Net 30 and Net 60 ( also Net 10  दिनों , et al ) हैं फ़ॉर्म of व्यापार क्रेडिट जिससे बताएँ कि the जाल राशि ( the कुल बकाया on the चालान  ) is expected to be paid in full and received by the seller within 10 , 15 , 30 or 60 days after the goods are dispatched or service is completed .
Net 30 or Net 60  शर्तें हैं प्रायः coupled  with a credit for early payment .
The word net  in इस भाव अर्थात्  `` total after all discounts . ''
It originally derives from the Latin nitere ( to shine ) and nitidus ( elegant  , trim ) , और अधिक recently इससे the फ्रेंच जाल ( शार्प  , neat , clean ) .
roadtown  , Tortola
The British  वेस्ट इंडीज यहूद the आइलैंड्स in  and around the Caribbean that were part of the British Empire .
In 1912  , the अंग्रेजों वेस्ट इंडीज यहूद विभाजित into आठ colonies : the  Bahamas , Barbados , British Guiana , British Honduras , Jamaica ( with its dependencies the Turks and Caicos Islands and the Cayman Islands ) , Trinidad and Tobago , the Windward Islands and the Leeward Islands .
Between 1958 and 1962 , all of the island territories except the British Virgin Islands , the  बहामा , अंग्रेजों होंडुरास और अंग्रेजों guiana यहूद संगठित into the  West Indies Federation .
It was hoped that  the संघ होता become स्वतंत्र as a सिंगल  nation , but it had limited powers , many practical problems , and a lack of popular support .
नतीजतन , the वेस्ट इंडीज  Federation was dissolved .
Most of the territories , including all the larger ones , are now independent as separate countries , with membership to many international forums such as the Organization of American States , the Association of Caribbean States , the World Trade  संगठन , the संयुक्त राष्ट्र , the caribbean जातियाँ , the राष्ट्रमंडल of राष्ट्र और the caribbean विकास बैंको among  others .
The  शेष हैं अंग्रेजों  overseas territories .
All the former nations  of the अंग्रेजों वेस्ट इंडीज , मगर the राष्ट्रमंडल  of Dominica , Guyana and Trinidad and Tobago , are Commonwealth Realms .
The term is still used for British Overseas Territories in the  caribbean , ऐसे as the केमन आइलैंड्स  .
The  बाकी अंग्रेजों  West Indies
`` What a  अद्भुत संसार '' is a सोंग लिखा by bob  Thiele ( as `` George Douglas '' ) and George David Weiss .
It was first recorded by Louis Armstrong and  released as a सिंगल in  1967 .
Thiele and Weiss were both prominent in the music world (  thiele as a निर्माता और वेइस as a composer/performer  ) .
Armstrong 's recording was inducted in  the ग्रैमी हॉल of कीर्ति in  1999 .
The publishing for  इस सोंग is नियंत्रित by मेमोरी लेन म्यूज़िक  Group , Carlin Music Corp. , and Bug Music , Inc .
उद्घाटन दिन 2009 on the वेस्ट कदम  of the U.S. Capitol .
President George W. Bush and  पहला महिला लौरा बुश सीसे the inaugural परेड  down Pennsylvania Avenue to the White House , 2005
The inauguration of the president of the United States is a ceremonial event marking the  शुरुआत of a नई four-year पद of  a president of the United States .
The day a  अध्यक्षीय उद्घाटन occurs is ज्ञात as `` उद्घाटन दिन  '' and occurs on January 20 ( or 21st if the 20th is a Sunday ) .
( Prior to the Twentieth Amendment , the date was March 4 , the day  of the साल on जिससे the संविधान of the संयुक्त राज्य पहला took प्रभाव in 1789 ; the पिछला उद्घाटन to लो प्लेस on the पुरानी तिथि  was Franklin D. Roosevelt 's first one on March 4 , 1933 . )
The most recent public presidential inauguration ceremony , the swearing in of President Barack Obama to begin his second four-year term in office , took  प्लेस on सोमवार , जनवरी 21 , 2013  .
The only inauguration element mandated by the United States Constitution is that  the अध्यक्ष मेक an शपथ or प्रतिज्ञान पहले कि व्यक्ति can `` डालें on the  Execution '' of the office of the presidency .
However , over the years , various traditions have arisen that  have विस्तारित the उद्घाटन इससे a सरल oath-taking रस्म to a day-long  event , including parades , speeches , and balls .
इससे the प्रेसिडेंसी of एंड्रयू जैक्सन through  that of Jimmy Carter , the primary Inauguration Day ceremony took place on the Capitol 's East Portico .
Since the 1981 inauguration of Ronald Reagan , the ceremony has been  आयोजित at the कैपिटल  's West Front .
the inaugurations  of William Howard Taft in 1909 and Reagan in 1985 were moved indoors at the Capitol due to cold weather .
the युद्ध of 1812 और संसार युद्ध ii caused दो  inaugurations to be held at other locations in Washington , D.C .
When George Washington was inaugurated , the oath was administered by Robert Livingston , Chancellor of New York State , in 1789 , and by William  cushing , संबद्ध इंसाफ of  the Supreme Court , in 1793 .
Since Chief Justice Oliver Ellsworth swore in President  जॉन एडम्स , no मुख्य इंसाफ रै  missed an Inauguration Day .
When Inauguration Day has fallen on a Sunday ,  the मुख्य इंसाफ रै administered the शपथ to the अध्यक्ष  on the Sunday privately and then again the next day publicly .
When a new president takes over mid-term due to the death or resignation of a president , the oath of office  is administered लकिन औपचारिक , पब्लिक उद्घाटन  events have not been held .
Stefani Joanne  एंजेलीना germanotta ( ; born कूच 28 , 1986 ) , ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज  name Lady Gaga , is an American singer , songwriter , record producer , dancer , activist , businesswoman , fashion designer , actress and philanthropist .
Born and  उठाया in नई यॉर्क नगर , वो primarily पढ़ाई at the कान्वेंट of the पवित्र दिल  and briefly attended New York University 's Tisch School of the Arts before withdrawing to focus on her musical career .
She soon began performing in the rock  म्यूज़िक झाँकी of मैनहटन  's Lower East Side .
By the  समाप्त of 2007 , रिकार्ड कार्यपालिका और निर्माता  Vincent Herbert signed her to his label Streamline Records , an imprint of Interscope Records .
Initially working as a songwriter at Interscope Records , her vocal abilities captured the attention of recording artist Akon , who  भी हस्ताक्षरित उसके to kon सजीव वितरण , उसके अपना लेबल अंतर्गत interscope  .
Lady Gaga came to  prominence as a रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार following the रिलीज of उसके डेब्यू एल्बम , the कीर्ति ( 2008 ) , जिससे थी a नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक  success that topped charts around the world and included the international number-one singles `` Just Dance `` and `` Poker Face `` .
After  embarking on the the कीर्ति बॉल दौरे , वो followed the एल्बम  with The Fame Monster ( 2009 ) , which spawned the worldwide hit singles `` Bad Romance `` , `` Telephone `` , and `` Alejandro `` .
The Fame Monsters success allowed her to embark on the eighteen-month  long दानव बॉल दौरे , जिससे बाद became एक of the highest-grossing कॉन्सर्ट टुर  of all time .
Her most recent  एल्बम , born इस रास्ता ( 2011  ) , topped the charts of most major markets and generated more international chart-topping singles , including `` Born This Way `` , `` Judas `` , and `` The Edge of Glory `` .
Influenced by Britney  स्पीयर्स , दाउद बोवी , माइकल जैक्सन , मैडोना , और महारानी , महिला  Gaga is recognized for her flamboyant , diverse and outré contributions to the music industry through her fashion , performances and music videos .
As of October 2011 , she has sold an estimated 23 million  एल्बम और 64 लाख singles विश्वव्यापी  and her singles are some of the best-selling worldwide .
Her  उपलब्धियाँ शामिल पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार  and 13 MTV Video Music Awards .
Lady Gaga has consecutively appeared on Billboard magazine 's Artists of the Year ( scoring the definitive title in 2010 ) , ranked fourth in VH1 's list of 100 Greatest Women in Music , is  the छठे बेहतरीन selling डिजिटल singles कलाकार in us according to riaa , is regularly लगाई on  lists composed by Forbes magazine and was named one of the most influential people in the world by Time magazine .
besides उसके musical करियर , वो involves  herself with humanitarian causes and LGBT activism .

A  चित्र of the 1924  Baseball team
The Florida Gators baseball team  represents the विश्वविद्यालयों  of Florida in the sport of baseball .
The Florida Gators compete in  प्रभाग i of the नेशनल कॉलेजिएट एथलेटिक्स संघ ( ncaa ) , और the पूर्वी  Division of the Southeastern Conference ( SEC ) .
They play their home games in Alfred A. McKethan  स्टेडियम on the विश्वविद्यालयों  's Gainesville , Florida campus , and are currently led by head coach Kevin O'Sullivan .
In the ninety-eight season history of the  gators बेसबॉल कार्यक्रम , the टोली रै जीती बारह  SEC championships and has appeared in eight College World Series tournaments .

A political campaign is an organized effort which seeks to influence the  निर्णय बनाना प्रक्रम भीतर a विशिष्ट समूह .
In democracies , political  अभियान प्रायः refer to चुनावी अभियान  , wherein representatives are chosen or referendums are decided .
In modern politics , the most high profile political campaigns are focused on candidates for head of  राज्य or सिर of सरकारी , प्रायः a अध्यक्ष or  Prime Minister .
Elizabeth Cady Stanton and her  बेटी , harriot
Elizabeth Cady Stanton ( November 12 , 1815 – October 26 , 1902 ) was an  अमरीकी सोशल activist , abolitionist , और अग्रणी फिगर of the जल्दी महिलाओं 's अधिकारों  movement .
Her Declaration of Sentiments , presented at the first women 's rights convention held in 1848 in Seneca Falls , New York , is often credited with initiating the first  व्यवस्थित महिलाओं 's अधिकारों और महिलाओं 's suffrage आंदोलनों in the संयुक्त राज्य .
Before Stanton narrowed her political focus almost  exclusively to महिलाओं 's अधिकारों , वो थी  an active abolitionist together with her husband , Henry Brewster Stanton and cousin , Gerrit Smith .
नापसंद अनेक of those शामिल in the महिलाओं 's अधिकारों गति  , Stanton addressed various issues pertaining to women beyond voting rights .
Her concerns included women 's parental and custody rights , property rights , employment and income rights , divorce , the economic health  of the परिवार , और जनम कंट्रोल .
She was also an outspoken supporter of  the 19th-century temperance गति  .
After the American Civil War , Stanton 's commitment to female suffrage caused a schism in the women 's rights movement when she , together  साथ सुसान B. एंथोनी , अस्वीकृत to support ड्योढ़ी of the fourteenth और पंद्रहवीं amendments to the  United States Constitution .
She  opposed giving added विधिक सुरक्षा और मतदान अधिकारों  to African American men while women , black and white , were denied those same rights .
Her position on this  समस्या , साथ साथ उसके विचार on व्यवस्थित christianity और महिलाओं 's मुद्दे परे मतदान अधिकारों , led to the गठन of  two separate women 's rights organizations that were finally rejoined , with Stanton as president of the joint organization , approximately twenty years after her break from the original women 's suffrage movement .
Stanton died in 1902 having  authored दोनो the स्त्री 's बाइबल और उसके आत्मकथा , साथ साथ अनेक आलेख  and pamphlets concerning female suffrage and women 's rights .
My Fair Lady is a musical based upon George Bernard  शॉ 's pygmalion और साथ किताब और गीत  by Alan Jay Lerner and music by Frederick Loewe .
The  स्टोरी चिंताएं eliza doolittle , a काकनी पुष्प लड़की  who takes speech lessons from professor Henry Higgins , a phoneticist , so that she may pass as a well-born lady .
The musical 's 1956 Broadway production was a hit , setting what was then the record for the longest run of any major musical  थिएटर उत्पादन in  history .
It was followed by a  hit लंदन उत्पादन , a लोकप्रिय फिल्मी  version , and numerous revivals .
it रै महरूम पुकारा  `` the perfect musical '' .
Deregulation is the act or process of removing or  reducing राज्य regulations  .
It is therefore opposite of regulation , which   refers to the process of the government regulating certain activities .

The network 's flagship station is WBZ-FM /98.5-  बोस्टन , मैसाचुसेट्स  .

This article is about  the छोटी स्टोरी  .
For  the कविता by सारा teasdale  , see There Will Come Soft Rains .
`` There Will Come Soft Rains '' is a short story by  विज्ञान fiction लेखक रे bradbury जिससे थी  first published in the May 6 , 1950 issue of Collier 's .
Later that  वही साल the स्टोरी थी शामिल  in Bradbury 's The Martian Chronicles ( 1950 ) .
With over 1.2  अरब लोगों , हान चाइनीज  is the largest ethnic group in the world .
Pashtun people of the Pashtunistan region , which sits in an area between south of the Hindu Kush in  अफगानिस्तान और the सिंधु नदी in पाकिस्तानी  .
They  क्रमांक around  50 million .
The  korowai लोगों of पापुआ गिने  just around 3,000 people , and were uncontacted until the 1970s .
Ethnicity or ethnic group is a socially defined category  आधारित on आम संस्कृति or राष्ट्रीयता  .
Ethnicity can , but does not have to , include common ancestry , appearance ,  भोजन , ड्रेसिंग स्टाइल , विरासत , इतिहास , भाषा or dialect , धर्म , प्रतीकों ,  traditions , or other cultural factor .
Ethnic identity is constantly  reinforced through आम विशेषताएँ जिससे  set the group apart from other groups .
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar plant in  स्पेन सुविधाएँ 15 घंटों of भंडार और can सप्लाई शक्ति  24 hours a day .
Solar energy , radiant light and heat from the sun , has been harnessed by humans since ancient times  using a दायरा of ever-evolving technologies  .
Solar energy technologies include solar heating , solar photovoltaics , solar thermal electricity , solar architecture and artificial photosynthesis , which can make considerable contributions to solving some of the most  तात्कालिक उर्जा समस्याएं the संसार  now faces .
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive solar or  क्रियाशील सौर depending on the रास्ता वे  capture , convert and distribute solar energy .
Active solar techniques  शामिल the उपयोग of photovoltaic panels और  solar thermal collectors to harness the energy .
Passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun ,  selecting सामग्री साथ अनुकूल थर्मल द्रव्यमान  or light dispersing properties , and designing spaces that naturally circulate air .
In 2011 , the International Energy Agency said that `` the  विकास of सस्ती , inexhaustible और साफ सौर उर्जा technologies  will have huge longer-term benefits .
It will increase countries’ energy security through reliance on an indigenous , inexhaustible and mostly  import-independent संसाधन , बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता , reduce प्रदूषण , निम्नतर the लागत  of mitigating climate change , and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise .
These  लाभ  are global .
Hence the additional costs of the incentives for early deployment should be considered learning investments  ; वे जरूर be बुद्धिमानी खर्च और need to be widely  shared '' .
The classical Latin alphabet or Roman alphabet evolved from a western variety of the  यूनानी वर्णमाला पुकारा the cumaean वर्णमाला , जिससे थी अपनाया  and modified by the Etruscans who ruled early Rome .
The Etruscan alphabet was in turn adopted and further modified  by the प्राचीन romans to लिखें  the Latin language .
During the Middle Ages , the Latin  वर्णमाला थी adapted to रोमांस भाषाएं  , direct descendants of Latin , as well as to Celtic , Germanic , Baltic , and some Slavic languages .
With the age of colonialism and Christian evangelism , the Latin script was spread overseas  , और लागू to स्वदेशी अमरीकी , ऑस्ट्रेलियाई , ऑस्ट्रोनीशियाई , austroasiatic  , and African languages .
More recently , linguists have also tended to prefer the Latin script or the International Phonetic Alphabet ( itself largely based on Latin script ) when  transcribing or बनाना लिखा मानकों लिये non-european भाषाएं  , such as the African reference alphabet .
The term Latin alphabet may refer to either the alphabet used to write Latin ( as described in this article ) , or other alphabets  आधारित on the लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट , जिससे is the मौलिक नियत of अक्षर आम to the विभिन्न alphabets descended इससे the  classical Latin one , such as the English alphabet .
These Latin-derived alphabets may discard letters ,  जैसे the rotokas वर्णमाला , or add नई  letters , like the Danish and Norwegian alphabet .
Letter shapes have changed over the centuries , including the creation for Medieval Latin of lower case  फ़ॉर्म जिससे किया नहीं मौजूद in the शास्त्रीय  period .
The assassination of  संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्ष अब्राहम lincoln took प्लेस on शुभ  Friday , April 14 , 1865 , as the American Civil War was drawing to a close .
The  हत्या occurred पाँच दिनों बाद the कमांडर of the confederate फौज of उत्तरी वर्जिनिया  , General Robert E. Lee , surrendered to Lieutenant General Ulysses S. Grant and the Union Army of the Potomac .
Lincoln was the first American president  to be assassinated , हालांकि an unsuccessful attempt था महरूम  made on Andrew Jackson 30 years before in 1835 .
The assassination was planned and carried  आउट by the well-known स्टेज कर्ता जॉन  Wilkes Booth , as part of a larger conspiracy in a bid to revive the Confederate cause .
Booth 's co-conspirators were Lewis Powell and David Herold , who were assigned to  मार सचिव of राज्य विलियम H. seward , और जार्ज atzerodt जो  was to kill Vice President Andrew Johnson .
By simultaneously  eliminating the शीर्ष तीन लोगों in the प्रशासन , बूथ और उसके co-conspirators  hoped to sever the continuity of the United States government .
Lincoln was shot while watching the play Our  अमरीकी cousin साथ उसके बीवी मरियम टॉड lincoln at घाट 's थिएटर  in Washington , D.C. on the night of April 14 , 1865 .
He died early  the अगला morning  .
The rest of the conspirators ' plot failed ; Powell only managed to wound  seward , जबकि atzerodt , जॉनसन  's would-be assassin , lost his nerve and fled Washington .
add-on might  mean:
Plug-in ( computing  ) , a टुकड़ा of तन्त्र जिससे  enhances another software application and usually can not be run independently
Browser extension , which modifies  the इंटरफ़ेस and/or बर्ताव  of web browsers
add-on ( मोज़िला ) , a टुकड़ा of तन्त्र कि  enhances and customizes Mozilla-based applications
Add-ons for Firefox ( addons.mozilla.org ) ,  the आधिकारिक मोज़िला न्यास वेब साईट जिससे serves as a repository  of add-ons for Mozilla-based applications
परिधीय , an वैकल्पिक कंप्यूटर हार्डवेयर घटक कि significantly  supplements or enhances the functionality of the original unit
Video game accessory , a piece of  हार्डवेयर प्रयुक्त in संयोजन साथ a वीडियो खेल कंसोल  for playing video games
Club level seating is a special section of  seating in आधुनिक  sports stadiums .
The Club Level is usually located towards the middle of the stage of  seating भाग , ऊपर the निम्नतर डेक लकिन  below the upper deck .
They are usually right next to the Luxury Boxes , either  सही ऊपर , सही नीचे , or sandwiched  between two levels of Luxury Boxes .
क्लबों स्तर seating  is considered as higher class than sitting anywhere else in the arena , but lower class compared to the Luxury Boxes .
Unlike the Luxury Boxes , most club  स्तर do नहीं रैप entirely around  the arena .
Some club levels stop at a certain point , giving way to an expansion of the Mezzanine , while  अन्य दे रास्ता to निम्नतर क्लास लक्ज़री बाक्स ( ऐसे  as `` Party Suites '' ) .
A notable exception to  इस is अमीरात स्टेडियम in लंदन  , which has a complete tier of club seating .
Club Levels allow fans multiple levels of  entertainment .
Club Level seating is open to the elements , as opposed to the entirely enclosed luxury boxes , which gives more of an outdoors  छाप at roofless और open-roof स्टेडियम  and arenas .
क्लबों स्तर seating is सामान्यतः खरीदा  on a contract basis to allow for maximum profit on the part of the stadium .
The Club Level provides fans with special access  to an अंदर भाग of the एरिना विशेष to प्रशंसक साथ खास टिकटें  .
These areas are air conditioned and allow  अभिगम to खास रेस्तरां , merchandise  stands , and lounge areas of the stadium that are not otherwise available .
Concession stands and vendors on the Club Level also often offer different menus  than in अन्य स्टैंड to दे अधिक of a खास महसूस to the क्लबों  .
These areas are closed off to the rest of the stadium , and they usually  can तभी be पहुँचा through  the exclusive , private club entrances .
Sophia  लोरेन ( ; born सोफिया villani scicolone  ; 20 September 1934 ) is an Italian actress .
Loren is widely recognized as Italy 's most  प्रसिद्ध और सम्मानित अभिनेत्री  .
She  थी the पहला अभिनेत्री of the talkie era to जीत an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये  a non-English-speaking performance , for her portrayal of Cesira in Vittorio De Sica 's Two Women .
Her other awards include a Grammy Award , five  खास सुनहरी ग्लोब्स , a bafta पुरस्कार  and a Laurel Award .
In 1995 she received  the सेसिल B. demille पुरस्कार लिये आजीवन  achievements , one of many such awards .
उसके films शामिल : houseboat ( 1958 ) , el सीआईडी ( 1961 ) , कल , आज और कल  ( 1963 ) , Marriage Italian-Style ( 1964 ) , and A Special Day ( 1977 ) .
In later years she has appeared in American  blockbusters ऐसे as grumpier बूढ़ा मेन  ( 1995 ) , and Nine ( 2009 ) .
In 1994 she starred in Robert Altman 's Prêt-à-Porter , which earned her a Golden  ग्लोब नामांकन the वही साल  .
She has also achieved critical  और वाणिज्यिक  success in TV movies such as Courage ( 1986 ) .
Deaths  लिये self-inflicted चोटों  per 100,000 inhabitants in 2004 .
Incidence of suicide is  underreported due to दोनो धार्मिक और सोशल  pressures , and possibly completely unreported in some areas .
Nevertheless , from reported cases ,  निश्चित रुझान हैं apparent  .
Since the  आंकड़ा is skewed  , comparing suicide rates between nations is statistically unsound .
The trends  themselves हैं नहीं the कारण ,  but may be indicative of a root cause .
The Oprah Winfrey Leadership Academy for Girls - South Africa is a female boarding school founded in January 2007 and located in Henley on Klip near  meyerton , दक्षिण of जोहान्सबर्ग  , South Africa .
The academy was founded by Oprah Winfrey with  the लक्ष्य of providing शैक्षणिक और नेतृत्व अवसर  for academically gifted girls from impoverished backgrounds .

Digicel is a mobile phone network  प्रदाता ऑपरेटिंग in 31 बाज़ार आरपार the  Caribbean , Central America , and Oceania regions .
The company is owned by Irishman Denis  o'brien , is incorporated in बरमूडा , और आधारित  in Jamaica .
it रै परिचय  13 million wireless users .
As of 2012 , Digicel 's markets comprise : Anguilla , Antigua and Barbuda , Aruba , Barbados , Bermuda , Bonaire , the British Virgin Islands , the Cayman  आइलैंड्स , कुराकाओ , डोमिनिकन  , El Salvador , Fiji , French Guiana , Grenada , Guadeloupe , Guyana , Haiti , Jamaica , Martinique , Nauru , Panama , Papua New Guinea , Samoa , Saint Kitts and Nevis , Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent and the Grenadines , Suriname , Tonga , Trinidad & Tobago , Turks and Caicos , and Vanuatu .
This is a list of  रिकॉर्ड of the फीफा संसार  Cup and its qualification matches .
Hospital Emergency Codes  हैं प्रयुक्त in अस्पताल विश्वव्यापी to चेतावनी स्टाफ to  various emergencies .
The use of codes is intended to convey essential  सूचना जल्दी  and with minimal misunderstanding to staff , while preventing stress and panic among visitors to the hospital .
These codes may be posted on  placards throughout the हॉस्पिटल , or मुद्रित on कर्मचारी  identification badges for ready reference .
Back of a hospital ID badge  प्रर्दशित विपत्ति  codes .
Hospital emergency codes may denote different events at  अलग अस्पताल , सहित आसपास ones  .
Because many physicians work at more than one  सुविधा , इस may सीसे to भ्रम in emergencies  , so uniform systems have been proposed .
The route of the Eifel aqueduct ,  साथ इसके औसत  slope .
The Eifel Aqueduct  थी एक of the longest  aqueducts of the Roman Empire .
The aqueduct , constructed in AD 80 , carried water some from the hilly Eifel region of what is now Germany to the ancient city of Colonia  claudia आरा agrippinensium ( present-day  Cologne ) .
If the auxiliary spurs to  अतिरिक्त स्रोतों हैं शामिल  , the length was .
The  निर्माण थी लगभग entirely नीचे मैदान , और the प्रवाह of the  water was produced entirely by gravity .
A few bridges , including one  up to in लंबाई  , were needed to pass over valleys .
नापसंद कुछ of the अन्य प्रसिद्ध रोमन aqueducts , the eifel जलसेतु थी specifically  designed to minimize the above-ground portion to protect it from damage and freezing .
In chemistry , a disulfide  बंध ( br.e . disulphide बंध ) is a covalent बंध , प्रायः  derived by the coupling of two thiol groups .
The linkage is also called an  ss-bond or disulfide सेतु  .
The overall  कनेक्टिविटी is  therefore R-S-S-R .
The terminology is  widely प्रयुक्त in biochemistry  .
In formal terms , the connection is a persulfide , in analogy to its congener , peroxide ( R-O-O-R ) , but this terminology is obscure and  is no longer प्रयुक्त ( मगर in सन्दर्भ to r-s-s-h  or H-S-S-H compounds ) .
Formal  चित्रण of disulfide  bond formation as an oxidation .
वेस्टमिंस्टर ऐबी  is used for the coronation of British monarchs
Religion in the  संयुक्त किंगडम और in the देशों कि preceded it , रै महरूम वर्चस्व ,  for over 1,400 years , by various forms of Christianity .
According to some  सर्वेक्षण , a बहुमत of नागरिकों स्टिल पहचानो साथ christianity , हालांकि नियमित गिरिजाघर उपस्थिति रै गिरे dramatically  since the middle of the 20th century , and immigration and demographic change have contributed to the growth of other faiths .
Religious affiliations of UK citizens are recorded by regular surveys ,  the चार प्रमुख ones होने the uk जनसांख्यिकी , the श्रमिक फ़ोर्स सर्वेक्षण , the अंग्रेजों सोशल attitudes सर्वेक्षण  and the European Social Survey .
According to the 2001 UK  जनसांख्यिकी , christianity is the प्रमुख धर्म , followed  by Islam , Hinduism , Sikhism , Judaism and Buddhism in terms of number of adherents .
This , and the relatively large number of individuals with nominal or no religious  संबद्धों रै led टीकाकारों to variously  describe the United Kingdom as a multi-faith , secularised , or post-Christian society .
The United Kingdom was formed by the union of previously independent countries from  1707 , और नतीजतन सबसे of the largest धार्मिक समूह do  not have UK-wide organisational structures .
While some groups have  पृथक structures लिये the व्यक्तिगत देशों of the संयुक्त किंगडम , अन्य may have a  single structure covering England and Wales or Great Britain .
Similarly , due to the relatively recent creation of Northern Ireland in 1921 , most major religious  समूह in उत्तरी आयरलैंड हैं संगठित on an all-ireland  basis .
the 1967 न्यूर्क दंगे यहूद  a major civil disturbance that occurred in the city of Newark , New Jersey between July 12 and July 17 , 1967 .
the छह दिनों of rioting , लूटने , और  destruction left 26 dead and hundreds injured .
In  संयुक्त राज्य कॉलेज एथलेटिक्स  , redshirt is a delay or suspension of an athlete 's participation in order to lengthen his or her period of eligibility .
Typically , a student 's  एथलेटिक पात्रता in a दिए खेल is चार सीज़न , a क्रमांक निकला इससे the चार सालो of  academic classes that are normally required to obtain a bachelor 's degree at an American college or university .
However , a student  खिलाड़ी may be offered the अवसर to redshirt लिये up to दो सालो , जिससे allows the खिलाड़ी  to spread those four years of eligibility over five , or sometimes six years .
In a  redshirt साल , a छात्र खिलाड़ी may attend  classes at the college or university , practice with an athletic team , and dress for play but he or she may not compete during the game .
Using this mechanism , a student athlete has up  to पाँच अकादमिक सालो to उपयोग  the four years of eligibility , thus becoming a fifth-year senior .
The term is used as  a क्रिया , संज्ञा ,  and adjective .
For example , a coach may choose to redshirt a player  जो is तब referred to as a redshirt freshman or  simply a redshirt .
The opposite of this  is a `` सच्चा freshman . ''
World War I ( WWI ) was a global  युद्ध केंद्रित in यूरोपीय कि began  on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918 .
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War  इससे इसके occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार  War II in 1939 , and the First World War or World War I thereafter .
It involved all the world 's great powers , which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the  ट्रिपल entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम , फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल गठबंधन  of Germany , Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but , as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy did not enter into the war ) .
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : Italy , Japan and  the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies  , and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
Ultimately ,  अधिक than 70 लाख सैन्य कर्मियों  , including 60 million Europeans , were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history .
More than 9  लाख combatants यहूद मारे , largely क्युकी of technological advancements  that led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility .
It was the fifth- deadliest  विरोध in संसार इतिहास , subsequently paving the  way for various political changes , such as revolutions in many of the nations involved .
One of the long-term causes of the war  थी the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी नीतियों of the ग्रेट  powers of Europe .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary , on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav  राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a  diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia .
Several  alliances formed  over the previous decades were invoked .
Within  सप्ताह , the प्रमुख शक्तियां यहूद at  war and , via their colonies , the conflict soon spread around the world .
On 28 July , the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the war  as तैयारी लिये  the invasion of Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to France , providing a  casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's घोषणा  of war against Germany .
After the German march on Paris  थी brought to a halt—the so-called  Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench line that changed little until 1917 .
On the Eastern Front , the Russian  फौज थी कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians  , but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans .
In November the Ottoman  साम्राज्य joined the युद्ध , खोलने up  fronts in the Caucasus , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
Italy and Bulgaria  गई to युद्ध in 1915 और रोमानिया  in 1916 .
In Russia , the tsar 's government collapsed in  कूच 1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर  brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers .
After a 1918  जर्मनी अप्रिय साथ the पश्चिमी सामने , the allies drove  back the Germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches .
Germany , which had its own trouble with  क्रांतिकारियों , सहमत to an armistice on 11 नवम्बर  1918 .
The  युद्ध ended in विजय  for the Allies .
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts , as the participants tried to  mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और आर्थिक संसाधन to लड़ो a कुल  war .
By the end of the war , four major imperial powers—the  जर्मनी , रूसी , austro-hungarian और उस्मानी  empires—ceased to exist .
The successor states of the former two lost a great amount of  territory , जबकि the latter दो यहूद dismantled entirely  .
The map of central Europe was redrawn  into अनेक छोटी  states .
The  लीग of राष्ट्र थी  formed in the hope of preventing another such conflict .
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires , the  परखना of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं  with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II .
Map of countries that declared themselves to be socialist states under the  marxist–leninist or माओवादी परिभाषा - कि is to कह , `` कम्युनिस्ट राज्य '' - between  1979 and 1983 .
This period marked the greatest  territorial extent of कम्युनिस्ट राज्य  .
A communist state is a state  जहाँ the अर्थात् of उत्पादन हैं collectively  owned by the society .
It has a  रूप of सरकारी characterized by single-party नियम or dominant-party नियम of a कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी ( referred as तानाशाही of the proletariat  by its proponents ) and a professed allegiance to a Leninist or Marxist–Leninist ideology as the guiding principle of the state .
Technically , `` communist state '' is a contradictio in terminis as a communist  समाज as पारिभाषित by दोनो माक्र्सवादी और anarcho-communists  is in principle stateless .
इससे इस परिप्रेक्ष्य  , the term Marxist-Leninist state is more appropriate .
Historically , a `` communist state '' referred to a system where public ownership of all or most means of production by the Communist party -run state is deemed necessary to further  the रूचि of the working क्लास ; आज , a कम्युनिस्ट राज्य can भी , लिये उदाहरण , refer to समकालीन चीन और वियतनाम , जहाँ a कम्युनिस्ट  Party-run state exists alongside a mixed economy .
According to Marxist–Leninists , the state is a tool in the  हैंड्स of the सत्ताधारी क्लास , जिससे in a समाजवादी समाज is the working क्लास  , so a socialist state is , according to Leninists , a state of the working class .
In practice , communist states do  नहीं दरअसल refer to themselves as ऐसे  .
They do this not to disguise the fact that the  सत्ताधारी पार्टी is कम्युनिस्ट , लकिन बल्कि  because they do not consider themselves to be a communist society at present .
Instead , they constitutionally identify themselves as  समाजवादी राज्य or मजदूर '  states .
The primary goal of these states , which also explains their official  नाम , is to मार्गदर्शिका उनके संबंधित देशों in the प्रक्रम of भवन समाजवादी , ultimately अग्रणी to  communism .
Communist states may have several legal political parties , but the communist party is usually granted a special or  प्रबल भूमिका in सरकारी , प्रायः by statute or  under the constitution .
Consequently , the  संस्थानों of the राज्य और of the कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी become intimately  entwined , such as in the development of parallel institutions .
In the 20th century , most  कम्युनिस्ट राज्य अपनाया नियोजित economies  .
However , there were exceptions : The Soviet Union during the 1920s and late 1980s and Yugoslavia after World War II  अनुमत सीमित बाज़ार और a उपाधि of कार्यकर्ता self-management , जबकि चीन , वियतनाम और  Laos introduced far-reaching market reforms after the 1980s .
In the 21st century , China and Vietnam  have अनुमत a मिश्रित अर्थव्यवस्था  to develop .
The fundamental concepts of communist states often  diverge इससे the असली socio-economic विचारधाराओं इससे जिससे वे  develop .
As a result , many adherents of these ideologies often oppose the political  प्रणालियों commonly संबद्ध साथ ये राज्य  .
For example , dissenting communists such as Trotskyists were often opposed to the  कम्युनिस्ट राज्य of the 20th सदी , claiming either कि वे था nothing to do साथ `` रियल '' साम्यवादी or कि the  ideology of such states had reached a point of irrevocable corruption .
Michael Fred Phelps II ( born June 30 , 1985 ) is a retired American swimmer and the most  सजा ओलंपियन of सब समय , साथ a कुल of 22 medals  .
Phelps also holds the all-time records for Olympic gold medals ( 18 , double the second highest record holders ) , Olympic gold medals in individual  कार्यक्रम ( 11 ) , और ओलम्पिक medals in व्यक्तिगत कार्यक्रम लिये a पुरूष  ( 13 ) .
In winning eight gold medals at the 2008  बीजिंग खेल , फेल्प्स took the रिकार्ड लिये the सबसे first-place  finishes at any single Olympic Games .
Five of those  victories यहूद in  individual events , tying the single Games record .
In the 2012 Summer  ओलंपिक in लंदन , फेल्प्स जीती चार golds और दो चांदी medals  , making him the most successful athlete of the Games for the third Olympics in a row .
Phelps is the  long कोर्स संसार recordholder in the 100-meter तितली , 200-meter तितली और 400-meter व्यक्तिगत  medley as well as the former long course world recordholder in the 200-meter freestyle and 200-meter individual medley .
He has won a total of 71 medals in major international long-course competition , 57 gold , 11 silver , and  तीन कांस्य spanning the ओलंपिक , the संसार , और the पण प्रशांत championships  .
Phelps 's international titles and  record-breaking प्रदर्शन have अर्जित उसे the संसार तैराक of the साल पुरस्कार  seven times and American Swimmer of the Year Award nine times as well as the FINA Swimmer of the Year Award in 2012 .
His unprecedented  ओलम्पिक कामयाबी in 2008 अर्जित फेल्प्स खेल illustrated  magazine 's Sportsman of the Year award .
बाद the 2008 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक , फेल्प्स प्रारंभ  the Michael Phelps Foundation , which focuses on growing the sport of swimming and promoting healthier lifestyles .
He  expects to do further कार्य साथ  his foundation after the 2012 Olympics , which he has said will be his last .
Lenovo Group  सीमित ( ) is a चाइनीज बहुराष्ट्रीय कंप्यूटर हार्डवेयर और इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स  company with its headquarters in Beijing , China and Morrisville , North Carolina and its registered office in Hong Kong , China .
Its products include personal computers , tablet computers ,  मोबाईल फोन , workstations , सर्वर , इलेक्ट्रॉनिक भंडार डिवाइस , it प्रबन्धन  software and smart televisions .
Lenovo is the world 's second-largest PC  विक्रेता by 2012 ईकाई बिक्री  .
It  बाज़ार the थिंकपैड लकीर of कोपी कंप्यूटर और the  ThinkCentre line of desktops .
Lenovo has operations in more than 60 countries and sells its  उत्पाद in around 160 देशों  .
Lenovo was founded in Beijing in  1984 और incorporated in हांग काँग in 1988 अंतर्गत  its previous name , Legend .
Lenovo is listed on the Hong  काँग भण्डार एक्सचेंज और is a constituent of the हैंग  Seng China-Affiliated Corporations Index .
Slug is a common name for an  जाहिर shell-less स्थलीय  gastropod mollusk .
The word  `` स्लग '' is भी प्रायः प्रयुक्त as भाग of the आम नाम  of any gastropod mollusc that has no shell , has a very reduced shell , or has only a small internal shell .
( This is in contrast to the common name `` snail `` , which is  लागू to gastropods कि have a नतीजे शेल कि is विशाल पर्याप्त कि  the soft parts of the animal can retract fully into it . )
Slugs exist on land and in the sea , and  वहीँ is भी एक genus of freshwater slugs , acochlidium  .
The unadorned word `` slug '' is however applied primarily to land slugs , whereas  slugs इससे the समुद्र or इससे freshwater हैं प्रायः  referred to as `` sea slugs `` and `` freshwater slugs '' .
Land gastropods with a shell that is not quite vestigial ,  लकिन is too छोटी to retract into ( जैसे अनेक in the परिवार urocyclidae  ) , are known as semislugs .
the विभिन्न taxonomic परिवारों of slugs रूप  part of several quite different evolutionary lineages which also include snails .
Thus , for example , the various families of land slugs are not very closely related to one  another , despite a सतही समानता in the overall देह रूप .
The  shell-less कंडीशन रै arisen अनेक टाइम्स  independently during the evolutionary past , and thus the category `` slug '' is emphatically a polyphyletic one .
Slugs , like  सब अन्य gastropods , undergo torsion ( a 180° टेढ़ी  of the internal organs ) during development .
Internally , slug anatomy clearly shows the effects of this rotation , but externally the  लाशें of जमीन slugs appear to be अधिक or कम सममित , मगर लिये the positioning of the pneumostome  , which is on one side of the animal , normally the right hand side .
The soft , slimy bodies of slugs are prone to desiccation , so land-living slugs are confined to moist environments and  जरूर रिट्रीट to नम छुपाना स्थान जब the मौसम  is dry .
The subsequent information in this  आलेख applies to जमीन  slugs .

sic , cluj  , a commune in Romania

Segmented Integer Counter mode , a mode of  आपरेशन in क्रिप्टोग्राफी
Sepang  अंतरराष्ट्रीय सर्किट , a  high-end racetrack that hosts the Malaysian round of Formula 1

SIC  ( बेटे idées couleurs ) , an जल्दी twentieth-century  art magazine produced by French author Pierre Albert-Birot
Southeastern Illinois College , a two year Junior College in  harrisburg , इलिनोइस , संयुक्त  States
