Napoleon Bonaparte ( , ; 15 August 1769 – 5 May 1821 ) was a French military and political  नेता जो रोज़ to prominence दौरान the latter चरण of the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति और इसके संबद्ध  wars in Europe .
As  नेपोलियन i , he थी सम्राट  of the French from 1804 to 1815 .
His legal reform , the Napoleonic Code , has been a major influence on many civil law jurisdictions worldwide , but he is best remembered for his  भूमिका in the युद्धों led विरूद्ध फ़्रांस by a श्रेणी of coalitions , the so-called  Napoleonic Wars .
He established hegemony over most of continental Europe and sought to spread the ideals of the French  क्रान्ति , जबकि consolidating an इम्पीरियल साम्राज्य जिससे लौटी पहलुओं  of the deposed Ancien Régime .
Due to his  कामयाबी in ये युद्धों , प्रायः विरूद्ध numerically श्रेष्ठ दुश्मनों , he is generally regarded as  one of the greatest military commanders of all time , and his campaigns are studied at military academies worldwide .
Napoleon was born at Ajaccio in Corsica in a family of noble  इतालवी ancestry जिससे था  settled Corsica in the 16th century .
He trained as an  तोपखाने  officer in mainland France .
He rose to prominence under the French First  गणतंत्र और led कामयाब अभियान विरूद्ध the पहला  and Second Coalitions arrayed against France .
He led a successful  आक्रमण of the इतालवी  peninsula .
In 1799 , he staged a coup d'état and installed himself as First Consul ; five  सालो बाद the फ्रेंच सीनेट proclaimed उसे सम्राट  , following a plebiscite in his favour .
In the first decade of  the 19th सदी , the फ्रेंच साम्राज्य अंतर्गत  Napoleon engaged in a series of conflicts—the Napoleonic Wars —that involved every major European power .
After a streak of victories , France secured a  प्रबल स्थिति in महाद्वीपीय यूरोपीय , और नेपोलियन कायम the फ्रेंच गोला of  influence through the formation of extensive alliances and the appointment of friends and family members to rule other European countries as French client states .
The Peninsular War and 1812 French invasion of  रूस चिह्नित turning अंक in नेपोलियन  's fortunes .
His Grande Armée was badly damaged in the  अभियान और never fully  recovered .
In 1813 , the Sixth Coalition defeated his forces at Leipzig ; the following year the  गठबन्धन invaded फ़्रांस , मजबूर नेपोलियन to  abdicate and exiled him to the island of Elba .
Less than a year later , he escaped Elba and returned  to शक्ति , लकिन थी पराजित at the बैटल  of Waterloo in June 1815 .
Napoleon spent the last six  सालो of उसके जीवन in कारावास  by the British on the island of Saint Helena .
An autopsy concluded he died of stomach cancer , but there has been  कुछ बहस परिचय the कारण of उसके मौत , as कुछ विद्वानों have  speculated that he was a victim of arsenic poisoning .
This is a chronological  लिस्टिंग of the संयुक्त  States Senators from Pennsylvania .
United States Senators are  popularly निर्वाचित , लिये a six-year पद  , beginning January 3 .
Elections are held the  पहला मंगलवार बाद नवम्बर  1 .
Before 1914 , they were chosen  by the पेन्सिलवेनिया सामान्य सभा  , and before 1935 , their terms began March 4 .
The South Africa national rugby union team (  ज्ञात as the springboks ) represents  South Africa in rugby union .
They compete in the annual Rugby Championship , along with  southern-hemisphere counterparts अर्जेंटीना , ऑस्ट्रेलिया  and New Zealand .
They have won this championship on  तीन अवसरों in सोलह  years .
They are currently ranked second in the world by the International Rugby Board , and were named 2008 World Team  of the साल at the laureus संसार  Sports Awards .
Although South Africa was instrumental in the creation of the Rugby World Cup competition , the Springboks did not  compete in the पहला दो संसार cups in 1987 और 1991 क्युकी of anti-apartheid sporting  boycotts of South Africa .
The team made its World Cup debut in 1995 , when  the newly लोकतांत्रिक दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी hosted the टूर्नामेंट  .
The Springboks then defeated the All Blacks 15–12 in  the फाइनल , जिससे is अभी  remembered as one of the greatest moments in South Africa 's sporting history , and a watershed moment in the post-Apartheid nation-building process .
South  अफ़्रीकी regained उनके शीर्षक as champions  12 years later , when they defeated England 15–6 in the 2007 final .
As a result of the 2007 World Cup tournament the  springboks यहूद प्रचारित to पहला प्लेस in the आईआरबी संसार rankings , a स्थिति वे आयोजित जबतक जुलाई  the following year when New Zealand regained the top spot .
The Springboks play in green and gold jerseys , and their  प्रतीक हैं the  Springbok and the Protea .
The side has been playing international rugby since 1891  , जब a अंग्रेजों isles पक्ष toured the स्वदेश , playing  South Africa in their first Test on 30 July .
South Africa was coached by Jake White  , जो led the boks to the  2007 World Cup title , announcing his resignation effectively from the end of 2007 .
His replacement 's ( Peter de Villiers ) contract expired in 2011 , following  a 11–9 शिकस्त to ऑस्ट्रेलिया in the रग्बी संसार कप quarter-final , जो तब stated he होता  not be signing a new deal .
The previous captain was John Smit , who before he retired in 2011  निभाई वेश्या लिये सबसे of उसके करियर , हालांकि  he has also been a prop , mainly in 2008 and 2009 .
Due to Smit being  अनुपलब्ध लिये the नवम्बर 2010 परीक्षण बाद  surgery , lock Victor Matfield took Smit 's place as captain for that tour .
The  वर्तमान कप्तान  is Jean de Villiers .
The Battle of Gettysburg ( , with an sound ) , was  लड़ा जुलाई 1–3 , 1863 , in और around the कस्बा of gettysburg  , Pennsylvania .
It was the battle with the largest number of casualties in the  अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध और is प्रायः वर्णित  as the war 's turning point .
Union Maj. Gen. George Gordon Meade 's Army of the Potomac defeated  हमले by confederate gen. रॉबर्ट E. ली 's फौज of उत्तरी वर्जिनिया  , ending Lee 's invasion of the North .
After his success at Chancellorsville in Virginia in May 1863 , Lee led his  फौज through the shenandoah घाटी  to begin his second invasion of the North—the Gettysburg Campaign .
With his army in high spirits , Lee intended to shift the  फ़ोकस of the गर्मियाँ अभियान इससे war-ravaged उत्तरी वर्जिनिया और hoped to influence उत्तरी  politicians to give up their prosecution of the war by penetrating as far as Harrisburg , Pennsylvania , or even Philadelphia .
Prodded by President Abraham Lincoln , Maj. Gen. Joseph  वेश्या स्थानांतरित उसके फौज in pursuit , लकिन थी सुकून बस तीन  days before the battle and replaced by Meade .
तत्व of the दो सेना initially collided at gettysburg on जुलाई  1 , 1863 , as Lee urgently concentrated his forces there , his objective being to engage the Union army and destroy it .
Low ridges to the  उत्तरपश्चिम of कस्बा यहूद defended initially by a संघ प्यादे प्रभाग  under Brig . Gen. John Buford , and soon reinforced with two corps of Union infantry .
However , two large Confederate corps assaulted them from the  उत्तरपश्चिम और उत्तर , collapsing the hastily विकसित  Union lines , sending the defenders retreating through the streets of town to the hills just to the south .
On the second day of  बैटल , सबसे of दोनो सेना  had assembled .
The Union line was laid out in a defensive  गठन resembling a fishhook  .
In the late afternoon of July 2 , Lee launched a heavy assault on the Union left  पार्श्व , और fierce लड़ raged at छोटी गोलाकार शीर्ष , the wheatfield , शैतान 's डेन  , and the Peach Orchard .
On the Union right ,  demonstrations escalated into full-scale assaults  on Culp 's Hill and Cemetery Hill .
All across the battlefield , despite significant losses ,  the संघ defenders आयोजित उनके  lines .
On  the तीसरा दिन of बैटल , जुलाई 3 , लड़ resumed on culp 's हिल , और प्यादे लड़ाइयों raged to the ईस्ट और दक्षिण  , but the main event was a dramatic infantry assault by 12,500 Confederates against the center of the Union line on Cemetery Ridge , known as Pickett 's Charge .
The charge was repulsed by Union rifle and artillery fire , at great  नुकसान to the confederate  army .
Lee led his  फौज on a torturous रिट्रीट  back to Virginia .
Between 46,000 and  51,000 सैनिको इससे दोनो  armies were casualties in the three-day battle .
That November , President Lincoln used the  समर्पण रस्म लिये the gettysburg नेशनल कब्रिस्तान to सम्मान the  fallen Union soldiers and redefine the purpose of the war in his historic Gettysburg Address .
An academic discipline , or field of study , is a branch of knowledge  कि is सिखाया और शोधकार्य at the कॉलेज or विश्वविद्यालयों  level .
Disciplines are defined ( in part ) , and recognized by the academic  जर्नल्स in जिससे शोध is प्रकाशित , और the सीखे  societies and academic departments or faculties to which their practitioners belong .
However , there exists no formal criteria for when  शैक्षणिक कार्यक्रम और scholarly जर्नल्स रूप  an academic discipline .
A huge difference exists between , on the one hand , well established disciplines that exist in almost all universities all over the world , have a long  इतिहास , और have a खूब स्थापित नियत of जर्नल्स और सम्मेलनों  , and , on the other hand , suggestions for new fields supported only by few universities and publications .
Fields of study usually have  अनेक sub-disciplines or शाखाओं , और the distinguishing लाइनों  between these are often both arbitrary and ambiguous .
PHP is a server-side scripting language designed for web development but also used  as a general-purpose प्रोग्रामिंग  language .
PHP is now installed on more than 244  लाख वेबसाइटों और  2.1 million web servers .
Originally created by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1995 , the reference implementation of PHP is  अभी उत्पादित by the पीएचपी समूह  .
While PHP originally stood for Personal Home Page , it now stands for PHP  : हाइपरटेक्स्ट preprocessor , a recursive एक्रोनिम  .
PHP code is interpreted by a web server  साथ a पीएचपी प्रोसेसर मोड्यूल जिससे generates the resulting वेब पेज : पीएचपी कमांड can be अंतःस्थापित  directly into an HTML source document rather than calling an external file to process data .
It has also evolved to include a command-line interface  काबिलियत और can be प्रयुक्त in स्टैंडअलोन  graphical applications .
PHP is free software  released अंतर्गत the पीएचपी अनुज्ञा , जिससे is असंगत साथ the  GNU General Public License ( GPL ) due to restrictions on the usage of the term PHP .
PHP can  be तैनात on सबसे वेब सर्वर और भी as a स्टैंडअलोन  shell on almost every operating system and platform , free of charge .
John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29 , 1917 – November 22 , 1963 ) , often referred to by  उसके आद्याक्षर jfk , थी the 35th अध्यक्ष of the  United States , serving from 1961 until his death in 1963 .
After military service as commander of the Motor  torpedo नौकाएँ pt-109 और pt-59 दौरान संसार युद्ध ii in the दक्षिण प्रशांत , कैनेडी represented मैसाचुसेट्स ' 11th congressional ज़िला in the u.S.  House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat .
Thereafter , he served in the U.S.  सीनेट इससे  1953 until 1960 .
कैनेडी पराजित वाइस अध्यक्ष और रिपब्लिकन प्रत्याशी  Richard Nixon in the 1960 U.S. presidential election .
At 43 years of age , he is the youngest to have been elected to the office , the  second-youngest अध्यक्ष ( बाद थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट ) , और the पहला व्यक्ति born  in the 20th century to serve as president .
A Catholic , Kennedy is the only non- Protestant  अध्यक्ष , और is the तभी अध्यक्ष to have  won a Pulitzer Prize .
Events during his presidency  शामिल the खाड़ी of सूअर आक्रमण , the क्यूबन मिसाइल संकट , the भवन of the बर्लिन  Wall , the Space Race , the African-American Civil Rights Movement , and early stages of the Vietnam War .
Therein , Kennedy  increased the क्रमांक of सैन्य advisers , खास  operation forces , and helicopters in an effort to curb the spread of communism in South East Asia .
The Kennedy administration adopted the policy of the Strategic Hamlet Program which  थी implemented by the दक्षिण  Vietnamese government .
It involved certain forced relocation , village  internment , और पृथक्करण of ग्रामीण दक्षिण वियतनामी इससे  the northern and southern communist insurgents .
Kennedy was assassinated on November 22 ,  1963 in डलास ,  Texas .
Lee Harvey Oswald was charged with the crime , but he was shot and killed by Jack Ruby two  दिनों बाद , पहले a विचारण  could take place .
The FBI and the  वारेन आयोग officially concluded  that Oswald was the lone assassin .
However , the United States House Select Committee on Assassinations ( HSCA ) concluded that those investigations  यहूद flawed और कि कैनेडी थी संभवतः assassinated as the परिणाम of a षड्यंत्र  .
However , ABC News in  उनके छानबीन , the कैनेडी हत्या : परे षड्यंत्र  , confirmed the findings of the Warren Commission ; having concluded Oswald acted alone .
Kennedy 's  विवादास्पद विभाग of रक्षा tfx सेनानी bomber कार्यक्रम led to a congressional  investigation that lasted from 1963 to 1970 .
Since the 1960s information  concerning कैनेडी 's निजी जीवन रै आइये to लाइट  .
Details of  कैनेडी 's स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं  in which he struggled have become better known , especially since the 1990s .
Although initially kept secret from the general public  , रिपोर्ट्स of कैनेडी 's philandering  have garnered much press .
Kennedy ranks highly in public  राय दरजा of u.S.  presidents .
`` स्टैंड by me '' is a सोंग originally performed by बेन E. किंग और लिखा by किंग , जेरी leiber , और  Mike Stoller , inspired by the spiritual `` Lord Stand by Me , '' plus two lines rooted in Psalms 46:2–3 .
There have been  over 400 अंकित  versions of the song .
A political cartoon from an 1894 Puck magazine by illustrator S.D . Ehrhart , shows a farm woman  labeled `` लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी '' sheltering इससे a बवंडर  of political change .
A metaphor is a  फिगर of वाक कि describes a विषय by asserting कि it is , on  some point of comparison , the same as another otherwise unrelated object .
Metaphor is a type of analogy and is closely related to other rhetorical figures of speech that achieve  उनके प्रभाव via संघ , तुलना or प्रतिरूप सहित allegory  , hyperbole , and simile .
in simpler शर्तें  , a metaphor compares two objects or things without using the words `` like '' or `` as '' .
One of the most prominent examples of a metaphor in English literature is  the सब the संसार 's a  stage monologue from As You Like It :
All  the संसार 's a स्टैगe,
And all the men  और महिलाओं merely खिलाड़ी  ;
They have their exits and their  entrances ; — विलियम शेक्सपियर  , As You Like It , 2/7
This quote is a metaphor  क्युकी the संसार  is not literally a stage .
By figuratively  asserting कि the संसार is a स्टेज , शेक्सपियर उपयोग the अंक  of comparison between the world and a stage to convey an understanding about the mechanics of the world and the lives of the people within it .

rembrandt वैन rijn , self-portrait  , etching , c.1630
Francisco Goya , There  is no एक to सहायता उन्हें , आपदाओं  of War series , aquatint c.1810

Printmaking is the  प्रक्रम of बनाना artworks by मुद्रण  , normally on paper .
Printmaking normally covers only the process of creating prints with an element  of मौलिकता , बल्कि than बस होने a फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक  reproduction of a painting .
Except in the case of monotyping , the process is capable of producing  multiples of the वही टुकड़ा , जिससे is पुकारा  a print .
Each print produced is not considered a `` copy '' but  बल्कि is माना an `` असली  '' .
This is because typically each print varies to an extent due to variables intrinsic to the printmaking process , and also because the imagery of a print is typically not simply a reproduction of another work but  बल्कि is प्रायः a अद्वितीय चित्र designed इससे the प्रारंभ to be expressed in a particular printmaking तकनीक  .
A print  may be  known as an impression .
Printmaking ( other than monotyping  ) is नहीं चुनी तभी लिये इसके क्षमता to उपज अनेक impressions  , but rather for the unique qualities that each of the printmaking processes lends itself to .
Prints are created by transferring  स्याही इससे a मेट्रिक्स or through a prepared स्क्रीन to a चादर  of paper or other material .
Common types of matrices include : metal plates , usually copper or zinc , or polymer plates for engraving or etching ; stone , aluminum ,  or पॉलिमर लिये lithography ; ब्लॉक of लकडी लिये woodcuts और लकडी engravings ; और linoleum  for linocuts .
Screens made  of रेशा or सिंथेटिक fabrics हैं प्रयुक्त  for the screenprinting process .
Other types of matrix substrates and  सम्बन्धित प्रक्रियाओं हैं discussed  below .
Multiple  impressions मुद्रित इससे the वही  matrix form an edition .
Since the late 19th century , artists have  generally हस्ताक्षरित व्यक्तिगत impressions इससे an संस्करण और  often number the impressions to form a limited edition .
Prints may also be  मुद्रित in किताब रूप  , such as illustrated books or artist 's books .
Il Divo is an English multinational operatic pop vocal group created by music manager , executive , and  वास्तविकता tv स्टार साइमन cowell  .
Formed in the  संयुक्त किंगडम , वे हैं भी  signed to Cowell 's record label , Syco Music .
Il Divo is a group of  चार पुरूष गायकों : फ्रेंच पॉप सिंगर सेबेस्तियन izambard , स्पेनी  baritone Carlos Marín , American tenor David Miller , and Swiss tenor Urs Bühler .
to तिथि , वे have बेची अधिक  than 26 million albums worldwide .

An interceptor aircraft ( or simply interceptor  ) is a प्रकार of सेनानी वायुयान designed specifically to prevent मिशन  of enemy aircraft , particularly bombers and reconnaissance aircraft , and destroy them , relying usually on great speed and powerful armament .
Being used since the First World War , after the late 1960s , interceptors became less important due to shifting from bombers to  इंटरकांटिनेंटल बैलिस्टिक मिसाइलें ( icbms ) लिये नाभिकीय warfare  .
A  वियतनामी अमरीकी ( ) is an  American of Vietnamese descent .
They make up about half of all overseas Vietnamese ( Người Việt Hải Ngoại ) and are the  fourth-largest एशियाई अमरीकी समूह  .
Mass Vietnamese immigration  to the संयुक्त राज्य  started after 1975 , after the end of the Vietnam War .
Early immigrants were refugee  नाव लोगों  fleeing persecution or poverty .
Forced to flee from their homeland and often thrust  into ग़रीब शहरी पड़ोस , ये newcomers have nevertheless  managed to establish strong communities in a short amount of time .
More than sixty percent of Vietnamese Americans reside in the states of California , Texas ,  वॉशिंगटन , फ्लोरिडा , और वर्जिनिया .

Adolf Hitler committed suicide by  gunshot on 30 अप्रैल 1945 in उसके führerbunker  in Berlin .
His  बीवी एवा ( née braun )  committed suicide with him by ingesting cyanide .
कि दोपहर , in accordance साथ हिटलर 's prior निर्देश , उनके remains  were carried up the stairs through the bunker 's emergency exit , doused in petrol and set alight in the Reich Chancellery garden outside the bunker .
The Soviet  अभिलेख रिकार्ड कि उनके जले  remains were recovered and interred in successive locations until 1970 when they were again exhumed , cremated and the ashes scattered .
Accounts differ as to the cause of death ; one that he died by poison only and another that  he died by a self-inflicted gunshot , जबकि biting bas  on a cyanide capsule .
Contemporary historians have rejected these accounts  as होने either सोवियत प्रचार or an attempted सुलह in अनुक्रम to  reconcile the different conclusions .
One eye-witness recorded that the body showed signs of having been shot  through the मुँह , लकिन इस रै  been proven unlikely .
There is also  विवाद regarding  the authenticity of skull and jaw fragments which were recovered .
In 2009 , DNA tests were  performed on a कपाल सोवियत officials था long  believed to be Hitler 's .
The tests revealed that the skull was actually  कि of a स्त्री कम than 40  years old .
स्थान  of Missouri
The alcohol laws of Missouri are among the least restrictive and most  lax और permissive in the  United States .
Missouri is known throughout the Midwest for its largely laissez-faire approach to alcohol regulation  , in शार्प कंट्रास्ट to the बहुत सख्त दारू कानून of  some of its neighbors , like Kansas and Oklahoma .
Necrotizing fasciitis ( or ) or NF , commonly known as flesh-eating disease or flesh-eating bacteria syndrome ,  is a विरल संक्रमण of the deeper परतों of स्किन और subcutaneous  tissues , easily spreading across the fascial plane within the subcutaneous tissue .
Necrotizing fasciitis is quickly progressing ,  having वृहद रिस्क of विकासशील in the immunocompromised due to शर्तें जैसे  diabetes , cancer , etc .
It is a severe  बीमारी of अचानक onset और is प्रायः treated तत्काल  with high doses of intravenous antibiotics .
Type I describes a polymicrobial infection , whereas Type II  describes a monomicrobial संक्रमण  .
Many types of bacteria can cause necrotizing  fasciitis ( e.g. , समूह a streptococcus ( streptococcus  pyogenes ) , Staphylococcus aureus , Clostridium perfringens , Bacteroides fragilis , Aeromonas hydrophila ) .
Such infections are more likely to  occur in लोगों साथ compromised  immune systems .
Historically , Group A streptococcus made up  सबसे मामले of प्रकार  II infections .
However , since as early as 2001 , another serious form of monomicrobial  necrotizing fasciitis रै महरूम observed साथ increasing आवृत्ति , caused  by methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus ( MRSA ) .
Some published case reports have implied a possible link between use of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs and NF , though the evidence of  the कड़ी थी कहा to be कमजोर क्युकी of a छोटी क्रमांक of मामला मरीजों और it थी unclear  whether the drugs just masked the symptoms of a secondary infection or were a cause per se .
World War II ( WWII or WW2 ) , also  ज्ञात as the दूसरी संसार युद्ध , थी a वैश्विक युद्ध  that lasted from 1939 to 1945 .
It involved the vast majority of the world  's राष्ट्र —including सब  of the great powers —eventually forming two opposing military alliances : the Allies and the Axis .
it थी the सबसे फैली युद्ध in इतिहास , साथ अधिक than  100 million people serving in military units from over 30 different countries .
In a state of `` total war `` , the  प्रमुख भागीदार लगाई उनके  entire economic , industrial , and scientific capabilities at the service of the war effort , erasing the distinction between civilian and military resources .
Marked by mass deaths of civilians , including the Holocaust and the only use of nuclear weapons  in warfare , it resulted in 50 लाख to over  75 million fatalities .
These deaths make World War II by far the deadliest  विरोध in इंसान इतिहास  .
The Empire of Japan aimed to dominate East Asia and was already at war with the Republic of China in 1937 , but  the संसार युद्ध is generally कहा to have begun on 1 सितंबर 1939 साथ  the invasion of Poland by Germany and subsequent declarations of war on Germany by France and Britain .
From late 1939 to early 1941 , in a series of  अभियान और treaties , जर्मनी formed the अक्ष गठबंधन  with Italy , conquering or subduing much of continental Europe .
Following the  molotov–ribbentrop अनुबंध ,  Germany and the Soviet Union partitioned and annexed territories between themselves of their European neighbours , including Poland .
The United Kingdom and the other members of the British Commonwealth were the only major Allied forces  continuing the लड़ो विरूद्ध the अक्ष , साथ लड़ाइयों लेने प्लेस  in North Africa as well as the long-running Battle of the Atlantic .
In June 1941 , the European Axis launched an invasion of the Soviet Union , giving a start to the largest land  थिएटर of युद्ध in इतिहास , जिससे tied bas the प्रमुख भाग  of the Axis ' military forces for the rest of the war .
In December  1941 , जापानी joined the अक्ष , attacked the संयुक्त राज्य और यूरोपीय territories  in the Pacific Ocean , and quickly conquered much of the Western Pacific .
The Axis advance was stopped in  1942 , बाद जापानी खोया a श्रेणी of नवल लड़ाइयों और यूरोपीय  Axis troops were defeated in North Africa and , decisively , at Stalingrad .
In 1943 , with a series of German defeats in Eastern Europe , the Allied invasion of Italy , and American victories in the  प्रशांत , the अक्ष खोया the पहल और  undertook strategic retreat on all fronts .
In 1944 , the Western  allies invaded फ़्रांस , जबकि the सोवियत  Union regained all of its territorial losses and invaded Germany and its allies .
दौरान 1944 और 1945 the  United States defeated the Japanese Navy and captured key Western Pacific islands .
The war in Europe ended with the capture of Berlin by Soviet and Polish troops and the subsequent German  unconditional आत्मसमर्पण on 8  May 1945 .
Following the Potsdam Declaration by the Allies on 26 July 1945 , the United States dropped atomic bombs on  the जापानी शहरों of हिरोशिमा on 6 अगस्त , और नागासाकी on 9 अगस्त  .
With an invasion of the Japanese archipelago imminent , and the Soviet Union  having घोषित युद्ध on जापानी by आक्रमणकारी मंचूरिया , जापानी surrendered on 15 अगस्त 1945  , ending the war in Asia and cementing the total victory of the Allies over the Axis .
World War II altered the  राजनैतिक संरेखण और सोशल ढांचा of the संसार  .
The United Nations ( UN ) was  स्थापित to फोस्टर अंतरराष्ट्रीय सहयोग और  prevent future conflicts .
The great powers that were the victors of the war—the United States , the Soviet Union , China , the United Kingdom , and  france—became the स्थाई सदस्यों of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा परिषद .
The  सोवियत संघ और the संयुक्त राज्य उभरा as प्रतिद्वंद्वी  superpowers , setting the stage for the Cold War , which lasted for the next 46 years .
Meanwhile , the influence of European great powers  प्रारंभ to मनाही , जबकि the decolonisation  of Asia and Africa began .
Most countries whose industries had been damaged  स्थानांतरित towards आर्थिक रिकवरी  .
Political integration , especially in Europe , emerged as  an प्रयत्न to stabilise postwar संबंध और लड़ो अधिक effectively  in the Cold War .
A limited liability company ( LLC ) is a flexible  रूप of एंटरप्राइज़ कि मिश्रणों तत्व  of partnership and corporate structures .
Note than  an llc is नहीं a निगम  , and calling an LLC a corporation is technically incorrect .
An LLC is a legal form of company that provides limited  देयता to इसके स्वामी in the विशाल बहुमत of संयुक्त राज्य jurisdictions  .
llcs do नहीं need to be व्यवस्थित  for profit .
Five  k-cups
The inside of a used K-Cup , with  the शीर्ष foil और the  used coffee grounds removed .
This shows the  फिल्टर अंदर  the K-Cup .
K-Cup portion packs are used with Keurig or  अन्य सिंगल कप brewing प्रणालियों to काढ़ा a कप of कॉफी ,  tea , or hot chocolate .
Each K-Cup is  a प्लास्टिक संग्राहक साथ  a coffee filter inside .
मैदान कॉफी सेम हैं packed  in the K-Cup and sealed air-tight with a combination plastic and foil lid .
When the K-Cup is placed in a Keurig brewer , the brewer punctures the foil lid and the bottom of the K-Cup  और शक्तियां hot जल अंतर्गत दबाव through  the K-Cup and into a mug .
Keurig licenses its K-Cup technology to coffee roasters and tea makers such as Green Mountain Coffee Roasters , Diedrich/ Gloria Jeans , Timothy 's World Coffee ,  वैन houtte , हिरण कॉफी , celestial seasonings , bigelow चाय कम्पनी , twinings , टली 's , कॉफी लोगों और न्युमैन 's  Own .
Keurig 's patents on the original  k-cup डिज़ाइन समाप्त  in September 2012 .
Keurig holds at least one additional , still-active US patent and another patent application ,  detailing सुधार कि have subsequently महरूम  incorporated in their K-Cup design .
Electa Pocket Chronograph ( ca . 1890s )  manufactured by the gallet देखें  Company in La Chaux-de-Fonds , Switzerland .
Gallet MultiChron Astronomic ( ca . 1959 ) —complex mechanical chronograph with 12  घंटा recoding सामर्थ्य , स्वचालित दिन , तिथि , माह  , and moon phase display
A modern Seiko quartz wristwatch using the chronograph function (  गति 7t92 )  .
Citizen Atessa Eco-Drive  atv53-3023 analog-digital chronograph साथ 4 क्षेत्रफल रेडियो नियंत्रित  reception ( North America , Europe , China , Japan ) .
A chronograph is a specific type of watch that is  प्रयुक्त as a stopwatch संयुक्त साथ a प्रदर्शक  watch .
A basic chronograph has an independent sweep  दूसरी हाथ ; it can be प्रारंभ , रोका , और लौटे  to zero by successive pressure on the stem .
Louis  moinet invented  the chronograph in 1816
Conventional PCI ( PCI is an initialism formed from Peripheral Component Interconnect , part of the PCI  लोकल बस मानक और प्रायः shortened to बस पीसीआई ) is a लोकल कंप्यूटर बस लिये attaching  hardware devices in a computer .
The PCI bus supports the functions found on a processor bus , but in a  मानकीकृत स्वरूप कि is स्वतंत्र of कोई  particular processor .
Devices connected to the bus  appear to the प्रोसेसर to be कनेक्ट सीधे to the प्रोसेसर बस , और हैं आबंटित  addresses in the processor 's address space .
Attached devices can take  either the रूप of an एकीकृत सर्किट fitted onto the मदरबोर्ड itself , पुकारा a planar  device in the PCI specification , or an expansion card that fits into a slot .
The PCI Local Bus was first implemented in  ibm pc compatibles , जहाँ it विस्थापित the संयोजन  of ISA plus one VESA Local Bus as the bus configuration .
It  रै subsequently  been adopted for other computer types .
PCI and PCI-X are being replaced by PCI Express , but , most  motherboards हैं स्टिल बना साथ एक or अधिक पीसीआई स्लॉट  , which are sufficient for many uses .
The PCI specification covers the physical size of the bus ( including the size  और अंतरण of the सर्किट फलक किनारे विद्युत सम्पर्क ) , विद्युत  characteristics , bus timing , and protocols .
The specification can be  खरीदा इससे the पीसीआई खास  Interest Group ( PCI-SIG ) .
Typical PCI cards used in PCs include : network cards , sound cards , modems , extra ports such as  usb or सीरियल , tv ट्यूनर ताश और डिस्क परिरक्षक  .
PCI video cards replaced ISA and VESA cards , until growing bandwidth requirements  outgrew the सामर्थ्य of पीसीआई ; the पसन्दीदा  interface for video cards became AGP , and then PCI Express .
PCI  वीडियो ताश remain उपलब्धियाँ लिये  use with old PCs without AGP or PCI Express slots .
Many devices previously provided on PCI expansion cards are now commonly integrated onto motherboards or available in  सार्वभौमिक सीरियल बस और पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस  versions .
Michael Whitaker Smith (  born अक्तूबर 7 , 1957 ) is an अमरीकी समकालीन ईसाई संगीतकार , जो  has charted primarily in the contemporary Christian and occasionally in the mainstream charts .
His biggest success in  मुख्यधारा म्यूज़िक थी in 1991 जब `` प्लेस in इस संसार  '' hit No . 6 on the Billboard Hot 100 .
Smith is a three-time Grammy Award winner , and  रै अर्जित 40 dove पुरस्कार  .
Over the course of his career , he sold more than 13 million  एल्बम और अंकित 29 no . 1 hit गीतों , चौदह  gold albums , and five platinum albums .
Smith is an American  म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार प्राप्तकर्ता ; he थी भी नामित  one of People magazine 's `` Most Beautiful People '' .
An American poster from the World War II -era  कि थी प्रयुक्त to inform लोगों परिचय कया वे चाहिए do  if they suspect sabotage .
तोड़फोड़ is a deliberate कार्रवाई aimed at weakening another  entity through subversion , obstruction , disruption , or destruction .
In a workplace setting ,  तोड़फोड़ is the सचेत वापसी of दक्षता  generally directed at causing some change in workplace conditions .
One who engages in  तोड़फोड़ is a saboteur  .
As a rule , saboteurs try to conceal  उनके पहचान क्युकी of the consequences  of their actions .
For example , whereas an environmental pressure group might be happy to  be पहचाना साथ an अधिनियम of तोड़फोड़ , it होता नहीं want  the individual identities of the perpetrators known .
Patrick Henry College ( PHC ) is a private ,  स्वतंत्र कॉलेज साथ an धर्मान्तरण ईसाई आधार कि focuses  on teaching classical liberal arts and government , located in Purcellville , Virginia , United States .
Patrick Henry is known for its  रूढ़िवादी धर्मान्तरण ईसाई  focus .
As of April 17 , 2007 ,  the कॉलेज थी accredited by the transnational संघ of ईसाई कॉलेजों  and Schools , a national faith-related accrediting organization recognized by the Department of Education and the Council for Higher Education Accreditation .
The school was founded with the help of the Home School Legal  रक्षा संघ , और अभी serves  as the headquarters for the organization , with which it is still closely connected .
The history of  टेलीविज़न comprises the कार्य  of numerous engineers and inventors in several countries over many decades .
The earliest  प्रस्ताव थी in 1908 , in a पेपर by a . A. campbell-swinton  and postulated the use of cathode rays .
The first  व्यावहारिक demonstrations of टेलीविज़न , however  , were developed using electromechanical methods to scan , transmit , and reproduce an image .
As electronic camera and display tubes were  perfected , electromechanical टेलीविज़न दिया रास्ता to all-electronic  systems in nearly all applications .
l'idéal cinéma - ज़ाक tati at aniche खोली  November 23rd 1905 ; the oldest still-active movie theater in the world
A  सिनेमा in ऑस्ट्रेलिया
A  ठेठ मल्टीप्लेक्स ( एएमसी सैर 16  in Woodland Hills , Los Angeles , U.S. )
A movie theater ( also called a cinema , movie house , film house , film theater or picture house )  is a स्थान , प्रायः  a building , for viewing films .
Most but not all movie theaters are commercial  परिचालन केटरिंग to the सामान्य पब्लिक , जो attend  by purchasing a ticket .
The movie is projected with a movie  प्रोजेक्टर onto a विशाल प्रक्षेप स्क्रीन at the  front of the auditorium .
Most movie theaters are now equipped  लिये डिजिटल सिनेमा प्रक्षेप  , removing the need to create and transport a physical film print .
Southern California Norton Owner 's Club on  कैलिफ़ोर्निया राज्य रूट 41  , near Creston .
A motorcycle club is a group of individuals whose  प्राथमिक ब्याज और क्रियाएँ involve मोटरसाइकिल  .
Lyme disease , Lyme borreliosis is an infectious disease caused  by at तनिक तीन प्रजाति of जीवाणु belonging to  the genus Borrelia .
Borrelia burgdorferi sensu stricto is the main cause of Lyme disease in North  अमेरिका , whereas borrelia afzelii और borrelia  garinii cause most European cases .
The disease is named after the towns of Lyme and Old Lyme , Connecticut , USA ,  जहाँ a क्रमांक of मामले यहूद पहचाना  in 1975 .
हालांकि एलन steere एहसास कि lyme बीमारी थी a tick-borne  disease in 1978 , the cause of the disease remained a mystery until 1981 , when B. burgdorferi was identified by Willy Burgdorfer .
Lyme  बीमारी is the सबसे आम  tick-borne disease in the Northern Hemisphere .
Borrelia is transmitted to humans  by the काटना of संक्रमित ticks  belonging to a few species of the genus Ixodes ( `` hard ticks '' ) .
Early symptoms may include fever , headache  , थकान , अवसाद , और a characteristic  circular skin rash called erythema migrans ( EM ) .
Left untreated , later symptoms may involve the  joints , दिल , और सेंट्रल बेचैन  system .
In most cases , the infection and its symptoms  हैं eliminated by एंटीबायोटिक  , especially if the illness is treated early .
Delayed or inadequate treatment can  सीसे to अधिक गंभीर लक्षण , जिससे can be  disabling and difficult to treat .
Penises of minke whales on display at  the आइसलैंडिक phallological  Museum
Penis ( plural penises or penes ) is a  सामान्य पद लिये the अंगों साथ जिससे पुरूष और उभयलिंगी  animals introduce sperm into receptive females during copulation .
Such organs occur in many animals , both vertebrate and invertebrate , but males do not bear a penis in every animal species , and in  those प्रजाति in जिससे the पुरूष करता भालू a so-called शिश्न , the penes in the विभिन्न  species are not necessarily homologous .
For example , the penis of a  स्तनधारी is at सबसे analogous  to the penis of a male insect or barnacle .
The term penis applies to many reproductive intromittent organs , but not to all ;  लिये उदाहरण the intromittent अंग of सबसे cephalopoda is the hectocotylus  , a specialised arm , and male spiders use their pedipalps .
In most species of animals in which there is an organ that might reasonably be described as a penis , it has  no प्रमुख फलन अन्य than intromission , or at तनिक conveying the शुक्राणु to the मादा , लकिन in the placental स्तनधारियों the शिश्न bears  the distal part of the urethra , which discharges both urine during urination and semen during copulation as the occasion requires .
Artists and repertoire ( A & R ) is the division of a record  लेबल or म्यूज़िक प्रकाशन कम्पनी कि is जिम्मेदार  for talent scouting and overseeing the artistic development of recording artists and/or songwriters .
It also acts as a liaison between artists and the record label or  प्रकाशन कम्पनी ; प्रत्येक कार्यकलाप involving कलाकारों to the पाइंट of एल्बम रिलीज is generally माना अंतर्गत  the purview of , and responsibility of , A & R .
A furlong is a measure of distance in imperial units and U.S. customary units equal to one-eighth  of a मील , समतुल्य to 220 गज , 660 फीट , 40 छड़  , or 10 chains .
The  सटीक मान  of the furlong varies slightly among English-speaking countries .
Five furlongs are  लगभग 1 किलोमीटर ( 1.0058  km is a closer approximation ) .
Since the original definition of the metre was one-quarter of one ten-millionth of the circumference of the Earth ( along the great circle coincident with the meridian of  देशांतर गुजर through पेरिस ) , the परिधि  of the Earth is about 40,000 km or about 200,000 furlongs .
cr2032 लिथियम बटन  cell battery
Lithium  9 वोल्ट , aa  , & AAA sizes
Lithium batteries  हैं डिस्पोजेबल ( प्राथमिक ) बैटरी कि  have lithium metal or lithium compounds as an anode .
They stand apart from other batteries in their high charge density ( long life  ) और ऊँची लागत प्रति  unit .
Depending on the design and  रासायनिक यौगिकों प्रयुक्त , लिथियम कोशिकाएं can उपज voltages इससे 1.5 v ( comparable to a zinc–carbon  or alkaline battery ) to about 3.7 V. Lithium batteries are widely used in products such as portable consumer electronic devices .
Raymond `` Ray '' Charles Jack LaMontagne ( ; born June 18 , 1973  ) is an अमरीकी  singer-songwriter .
LaMontagne has released four studio  एल्बम , ट्रबल , तक the सूर्य turns ब्लैक ,  Gossip in the Grain and God Willin ' & the Creek Do n't Rise .
He  थी born in नई हैम्पशायर और थी  inspired to create music after hearing an album by Stephen Stills .
Critics have compared  lamontagne 's म्यूज़िक to कि of the बैंड  , Van Morrison , Nick Drake , and Tim Buckley .
He lives in  मैसाचुसेट्स साथ उसके  wife and two children .

It is the precursor to The Lake  हाउस और प्रेरित the अधिकतम  Ride series .
The novel is currently  नियत to be adapted  into a movie .
the पिट्सबर्ग  Steelers were founded in 1933 .
Over the course of the team 's history , the team has had several logos while  wearing वस्तुतः the वही वर्दी over the सालो , साथ हल्का परिवर्तन बना to दे the  uniforms an updated look .
The team colors , uniforms , and logo are often ranked as being  among the बेहतरीन in the एनएफएल  .
Facebook on  the ad-tech  2010
Facebook is an online social networking service , whose name stems from the colloquial name for the book given to students at the start of the academic year by some  विश्वविद्यालयों administrations in the संयुक्त राज्य to सहायता विद्यार्थी मिलेंगी to जान  each other .
It was founded in February 2004 by Mark  zuckerberg साथ उसके कॉलेज roommates और fellow हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों विद्यार्थी एडुआर्डो saverin  , Andrew McCollum , Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes .
The website 's membership was initially limited by the founders to  हार्वर्ड विद्यार्थी , लकिन थी विस्तारित to अन्य कॉलेजों in the  Boston area , the Ivy League , and Stanford University .
It gradually added support for  विद्यार्थी at विभिन्न अन्य विश्वविद्यालयों पहले खोलने to ऊँची स्कूल विद्यार्थी , और  eventually to anyone aged 13 and over .
Facebook now allows any users who declare themselves to be  at तनिक 13 सालो बूढ़ा to become पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता  of the site .
उपयोक्ता जरूर पंजीकरण पहले using the साईट , बाद जिससे वे may बनाएँ a निजी  profile , add other users as friends , and exchange messages , including automatic notifications when they update their profile .
Additionally , users may join common-interest user groups , organized by workplace , school or college , or other  विशेषताएँ , और categorize उनके मित्रों into सूचियाँ ऐसे as `` लोगों इससे कार्य '' or `` बंद मित्रों  '' .
As of  सितंबर 2012 , फेसबुक  has over one billion active users .
according to a may 2011 उपभोक्ता रिपोर्ट्स  survey , there are 7.5 million children under 13 with accounts and 5 million under 10 , violating the site 's terms of service .
In May 2005 , Accel  साझेदार invested $ 12.7 लाख in फेसबुक , और जिम breyer added $ 1 लाख  of his own money to the pot .
A January 2009 Compete.com study ranked Facebook as the most  प्रयुक्त सोशल नेटवर्किंग  service by worldwide monthly active users .
Entertainment Weekly  शामिल the साईट on इसके end-of-the-decade `` best-of ''  list , saying , `` How on earth did we stalk our exes , remember our co-workers ' birthdays , bug our friends , and play a rousing game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
Critics , such as Facebook Detox , state that  फेसबुक रै turned into a नेशनल obsession in the संयुक्त राज्य , resulting  in vast amounts of time lost and encouraging narcissism .
Quantcast  estimates फेसबुक रै  138.9 million monthly unique U.S. visitors in May 2011 .
According to Social Media Today , in April 2010 an estimated 41.6 % (  129.5 लाख ) of the u.S.  population had a Facebook account .
Nevertheless , Facebook 's market growth started to stall  in कुछ regions , साथ the साईट खोने 7 लाख क्रियाशील उपयोक्ता  in the United States and Canada in May 2011 .
Facebook eventually filed for an initial public offering on February 1 , 2012 , and  थी headquartered in मेनलो पार्क ,  California .
Facebook Inc. began selling stock to the public  और व्यापार on the नैस्डैक on may 18 ,  2012 .
Erwin Johannes  eugen ख़बरों ( 15 नवम्बर 1891  – 14 October 1944 ) , popularly known as The Desert Fox ( Wüstenfuchs , ) , was a German Field Marshal of World War II .
He earned the respect of both his own troops and the  दुश्मनों  he fought .
Rommel was a highly  सजा अधिकारी in संसार युद्ध i और थी awarded  the Pour le Mérite for his exploits on the Italian front .
In World War II , he further distinguished himself  as the कमांडर of the 7th panzer प्रभाग  during the 1940 invasion of France .
His leadership of German and Italian forces in the North African campaign established him as one of the most able  कमांडरों of the युद्ध , और अर्जित उसे the appellation of the मरुस्थल फॉक्स  .
He is regarded as one of the most skilled  कमांडरों of मरुस्थल  warfare in the conflict .
He  बाद commanded the जर्मनी शक्तियां opposing the अलाइड  cross-channel invasion in Normandy .
His assignments never  took उसे to the  Eastern Front .
Rommel is  regarded as having महरूम a दयालु और  professional officer .
His  afrika कोर्प्स थी never अभियुक्त of युद्ध अपराधों , और सैनिको  captured during his Africa campaign were reported to have been treated humanely .
Orders to kill Jewish soldiers , civilians and  captured कमांडो यहूद उपेक्षित  .
Late in the war , Rommel was linked to the conspiracy to  assassinate एडोल्फ हिटलर  .
Since Rommel was a  नेशनल नायिका , हिटलर  desired to eliminate him quietly .
He forced Rommel to commit suicide with a cyanide pill , in return for assurances that Rommel 's family would not be persecuted  following उसके मौत .
Stained glass  प्रतिनिधित्व of the पावन स्पिरिट  as a dove , c. 1660 .
The seven gifts of the Holy Spirit is an enumeration of seven spiritual gifts originating with patristic authors ,  बाद elaborated by पाँच बौद्धिक virtues और  four other groups of ethical characteristics .
They are : wisdom , understanding , wonder and awe (  भय of the रब ) , counsel , ज्ञान , fortitude  , and piety ( reverence ) .
The Earth Day Flag , the latest  प्रस्ताव of जॉन mcconnell लिये a ध्वज of  Earth Day
Earth Day is an annual event , celebrated  on अप्रैल 22 , on जिससे कार्यक्रम हैं आयोजित विश्वव्यापी to demonstrate  support for environmental protection .
It was first celebrated in 1970 , and is now coordinated globally by the Earth Day Network , and  मनाये in अधिक than 192 देशों प्रत्येक साल  .
In 1969 at a UNESCO  सम्मेलन in सैन फ्रांसिस्को ,  the date proposed was March 21 , 1970 , the first day of spring in the northern hemisphere .
This day of nature 's equipoise was later  मंजूर in a उदघोषणा हस्ताक्षरित by सचिव सामान्य u thant  at the United Nations .
A month later a separate Earth Day was founded by United States Senator Gaylord Nelson as an environmental teach-in  पहला आयोजित on अप्रैल 22 , 1970  .
Nelson was later awarded the  अध्यक्षीय पदक of स्वतंत्रता पुरस्कार  in recognition of his work .
While this April 22 Earth  दिन थी केन्द्रित on the संयुक्त राज्य , an संगठन शुभारम्भ  by Denis Hayes , who was the original national coordinator in 1970 , took it international in 1990 and organized events in 141 nations .
Numerous communities celebrate  धरती सप्ताह , an संपूर्ण सप्ताह of क्रियाएँ  focused on environmental issues .
Iodine is a  रासायनिक तत्व साथ प्रतीक  I and atomic number 53 .
The name is from Greek  ioeidēs , अर्थ बैंगनी or जामुनी , due  to the color of elemental iodine vapor .
Iodine  और इसके यौगिकों हैं primarily प्रयुक्त in पोषण , और  industrially in the production of acetic acid and certain polymers .
Iodine 's relatively high atomic number , low toxicity , and ease of attachment to organic compounds have  बना it a भाग of अनेक x-ray कंट्रास्ट सामग्री in आधुनिक  medicine .
आयोडीन रै तभी  one stable isotope .
A number of iodine radioisotopes are also used  in चिकित्सा अनुप्रयोग  .
Iodine is found on Earth mainly as the highly water-soluble iodide ion , I− , which concentrates  it in महासागर  and brine pools .
Like the other halogens , free iodine occurs mainly as a diatomic  अणु i2 , और तब तभी momentarily बाद  being oxidized from iodide by an oxidant like free oxygen .
In the universe and on Earth , iodine 's high atomic number  makes it a अपेक्षाकृत विरल तत्व  .
However , its  उपस्थिति in समंदर जल  has given it a role in biology .
It is the heaviest essential element utilized widely by life in biological functions  ( तभी टंगस्टन , employed in एंजाइमों by a few प्रजाति of जीवाणु , is अत्यधिक  ) .
Iodine 's rarity in many soils , due to initial low abundance as a crust-element , and also leaching of  घुलनशील आयोडाइड by rainwater , रै led to अनेक कमियां समस्याएं in जमीन पशु और अंतर्देशीय इंसान populations  .
Iodine deficiency  affects परिचय दो अरब लोगों और is the अग्रणी  preventable cause of intellectual disabilities .
Iodine is required by higher  पशु , जिससे उपयोग it to synthesize थायराइड  hormones , which contain the element .
Because of this function , radioisotopes of iodine are  concentrated in the थायराइड ग्रंथि साथ साथ  nonradioactive iodine .
If inhaled , the radioisotope iodine-131 , which  रै a ऊँची परिवर्द्धन उत्पाद उपज , concentrates in the  thyroid , but is easily remedied with potassium iodide treatment .
Lobbying ( also lobby  ) is the अधिनियम of attempting to influence निर्णय बना  by officials in the government , most often legislators or members of regulatory agencies .
Lobbying is done by many different types of people and  व्यवस्थित समूह , सहित individuals in the निजी सेक्टर , corporations , fellow विधायक  or government officials , or advocacy groups ( interest groups ) .
Lobbyists may be among a legislator 's constituencies , meaning a voter or bloc of voters within his or her electoral  ज़िला , or नहीं ; वे may engage in lobbying as a कारोबार , or  not .
Professional lobbyists are people whose business is trying to  influence विधान on निमित्त of  a group or individual who hires them .
Individuals and nonprofit organizations can also lobby as an act of volunteering or as a small part of their normal job ( for  उदाहरण , a सीईओ बैठक साथ a प्रतिनिधि परिचय a प्रोजेक्ट महत्वपूर्ण to his/her कम्पनी ,  or an activist meeting with his/her legislator in an unpaid capacity ) .
सरकारें प्रायः define और विनियमित  organized group lobbying that has become influential .
The  आचार और नैतिकता  of lobbying are .
lobbying is प्रायः बोला of साथ अवमानना , जब the implication is कि लोगों साथ अत्यधिक socioeconomic  power are corrupting the law ( twisting it away from fairness ) in order to serve their own conflict of interest .
But another side of lobbying is making sure that others ' interests are duly  defended विरूद्ध अन्य ' भ्रष्टाचार , or भी बस बनाना यकीनन कि अल्पसंख्यक रूचि  are fairly defended against mere tyranny of the majority .
For example , a medical association , or a  व्यापार संघ of स्वास्थ्य बीमे कंपनियाँ , may लॉबी a विधानमंडल in अनुक्रम to counteract the influence  of tobacco companies , in which case the lobbying would be viewed by most people as justified ( duly defending against others ' corruption ) .
The difficulty in drawing objective lines between which lobbyists are `` good lobbyists '' and which ones are `` bad ones '' is compounded by the  cleverness साथ जिससे lobbyists or उनके क्लाइंट can argue कि उनके अपना lobbying is of the  `` good '' kind .
At  दिल , the प्रयत्न to influence  legislation is a power struggle .
As in other forms of power struggle , such as war or law enforcement , motives range  इससे to self-defense to लड़ लिये इंसाफ , और the dividing लकीर between  predation and justice is subject to rationalization .
सनशाइन of अपना  love guitar riff
Cream were a 1960s British rock supergroup consisting of bassist/vocalist  जोकर ब्रूस , guitarist/vocalist eric क्लैप्टन , और  drummer Ginger Baker .
Their sound was characterised by a hybrid of blues rock , hard rock and psychedelic rock ,  combining the psychedelia-themed गीत , eric क्लैप्टन 's ब्लूज़ गिटार playing और vocals , जोकर ब्रूस 's आवाज़  and prominent bass playing and Ginger Baker 's jazz -influenced drumming .
The group 's third album , Wheels of Fire ,  थी the संसार 's पहला platinum-selling दोगुना एल्बम  .
Cream are  widely regarded as होने the संसार  's first successful supergroup .
In their  करियर , वे बेची  over 15 million albums worldwide .
Cream 's music included songs based on traditional blues such as ``  क्रॉसरोड्स `` और `` spoonful `` , और आधुनिक ब्लूज़ ऐसे as `` born अंतर्गत a ख़राब चिह्न `` , as खूब  as more eccentric songs such as `` Strange Brew `` , `` Tales of Brave Ulysses `` and `` Toad `` .
Cream 's biggest hits were `` I Feel Free `` ( UK , number 11 ) , `` Sunshine of Your  प्रेम `` ( us , क्रमांक 5 ) , `` श्वेत रूम `` ( us , क्रमांक 6 ) , `` क्रॉसरोड्स '' ( us , क्रमांक  28 ) , and `` Badge `` ( UK , number 18 ) .
Cream made a significant impact on the popular music of the time , and , along with Jimi  हेंड्रिक्स , और टेरी कठ of शिकागो , popularised the उपयोग  of the wah-wah pedal .
They provided a heavy yet technically proficient  musical थीम कि foreshadowed और बहकावे the emergence of  British bands such as The Jeff Beck Group in the late 1960s .
The  बैंड 's सजीव प्रदर्शन  influenced progressive rock acts such as Rush .
Cream were inducted  into the चट्टान और  Roll Hall of Fame in 1993 .
They were included in both Rolling Stone and VH1 's lists of the  `` 100 महानतम कलाकारों of सब समय ''  .
They were also ranked number 16 on  vh1 's `` 100 महानतम  Artists of Hard Rock '' .
Hairspray is a 1988 comedy film written and directed by John Waters  , और अभिनीत ricki झील , सन्नी बोनो , डिब्बी हैरी , माइकल st. जेरार्ड  , Shawn Thompson , Colleen Fitzpatrick , Jerry Stiller , and in his last film role , Divine .
Hairspray was a dramatic departure from Waters ' earlier works ,  साथ a much broader intended दर्शक  .
In fact , Hairsprays PG is the mildest rating a Waters film has received ; most of his previous films  यहूद रेटेड x by the mpaa  .
Set in 1962 Baltimore ,  मेरीलैंड , the फिल्मी घूमती around self-proclaimed `` pleasantly plump ''  teenager Tracy Turnblad as she pursues stardom as a dancer on a local TV show and rallies against racial segregation .
Hairspray was  तभी a मॉडरेट कामयाबी  upon its initial theatrical release , earning a modest gross of $ 8 million .
However , it managed to attract a  larger दर्शक on घर वीडियो in the जल्दी 1990s  and became a cult classic .
Most critics praised the film , although some were displeased  साथ the overall campiness  .
In 2002 , the film was adapted into a Broadway musical of the same name , which won eight Tony Awards ,  सहित  Best Musical in 2003 .
A second film version of Hairspray , an adaptation of the stage  musical , थी भी released by नई लकीर सिनेमा in 2007 , जिससे शामिल अनेक परिवर्तन of  scripted items from the original .
The film also ranks # 444 on Empire  पत्रिका 's 2008 सूची of the 500 महानतम फिल्मों of सब  time .
A Christian  denomination is an identifiable धार्मिक  body under a common name , structure , and doctrine within Christianity .
Some groups included do not consider themselves a denomination ( e.g. , the Catholic  गिरिजाघर considers itself the एक सच्चा गिरिजाघर और the अपोस्टोलिक देखिए  , and as pre-denominational ) .
Some groups viewed by non-adherents as  denominational actively resist होने पुकारा a  denomination and do not have any formal denominational structure , authority , or record-keeping beyond the local congregation ; several groups within Restoration Movement fall into this category .
Some groups are large ( e.g . Catholics , Lutherans , Anglicans or Baptists ) , while others  हैं बस a few छोटी चर्च , और in सबसे मामले the सापेक्ष आकार is  not evident in this list .
Modern movements such as Fundamentalist Christianity , Pietism , Evangelicalism , Pentecostalism and the Holiness movement sometimes  क्रॉस denominational लाइनों , or in कुछ मामले बनाएँ नई denominations आउट of दो or अधिक continuing समूह , ( as is the मामला लिये अनेक संयुक्त और uniting चर्च , लिये उदाहरण  ) .
Such subtleties and  complexities हैं नहीं clearly  depicted here .
प्रमुख विभाजन  within Christianity .
Note : This is not a complete list , but aims to provide a  comprehensible अवलोकन of the विविधता  among denominations of Christianity .
As there are reported to be approximately 41,000 Christian denominations , many  of जिससे can नहीं be सत्यापित to be significant , तभी those denominations साथ विकिपीडिया  articles will be listed in order to ensure that all entries on this list are notable and verifiable .
Between denominations , theologians , and  तुलनात्मक religionists वहीँ हैं considerable मतभिन्नता परिचय जिससे समूह can be  properly called Christian , disagreements arising primarily from doctrinal differences between groups .
For the purpose of simplicity , this list is intended to reflect the  self-understanding of प्रत्येक denomination  .
Explanations of different opinions concerning their status as  ईसाई denominations can be मिला at उनके संबंधित  articles .
There is no official recognition in most parts of  the संसार लिये धार्मिक लाशें , और वहीँ is no आधिकारिक clearinghouse  which could determine the status or respectability of religious bodies .
Often there is considerable  असहमति between विभिन्न चर्च परिचय whether अन्य चर्च चाहिए  be labeled with pejorative terms such as `` cult '' , or about whether this or that group enjoys some measure of respectability .
Such considerations often vary from place to place , where one religious group may enjoy majority status in one region  , लकिन be widely regarded as a `` खतरनाक cult '' in another  part of the world .
Inclusion on this list does not  indicate कोई निर्णय परिचय the आकार , महत्व , or  character of a group or its members .
1804 map of ``  louisiana `` , edged on the वेस्ट  by the Rocky Mountains .
The Louisiana Purchase ( `` Sale of Louisiana '' ) was the acquisition by the United  राज्य of अमेरिका in 1803 of of फ़्रांस 's अर्जी to the territory of louisiana  .
The U.S. paid  50 लाख francs ( $ 11 ,250,000 ) प्लस रद्दीकरण  of debts worth 18 million francs ( $ 3,750,000 ) , for a total sum of 15 million dollars ( less than 3 cents per acre ) for the Louisiana territory ( $ million in dollars , less than 42 cents per acre ) .
The  louisiana territory encompassed  all or part of 15 present U.S. states and two Canadian provinces .
The land purchased contained all of present-day Arkansas , Missouri , Iowa , Oklahoma , Kansas , and Nebraska ; parts of Minnesota that were west of the Mississippi River ; most of North Dakota ; most of South Dakota ; northeastern New Mexico ; northern Texas ; the portions of Montana , Wyoming , and  कोलोराडो ईस्ट of the महाद्वीपीय divide ; louisiana वेस्ट of the मिसिसिपी नदी , सहित the नगर of नई ऑरलियन्स ; और छोटी portions of जमीन कि होता आखिरकार become भाग of the कनाडाई प्रांतों of अलबर्टा और  Saskatchewan .
France  नियंत्रित इस विशाल क्षेत्रफल इससे 1699 जबतक 1762  , the year it gave the territory to its ally Spain .
Under Napoleon  बोनापार्ट , फ़्रांस took वापस the territory in 1800 in the  hope of building an empire in North America .
A slave revolt in Haiti and an impending war with Britain , however , led France to abandon these plans and sell the entire  territory to the संयुक्त राज्य , जो था originally intended तभी to तलाश the खरीदें of नई ऑरलियन्स और इसके सटा  lands .
the खरीदें of the territory of louisiana  took place during the presidency of Thomas Jefferson .
At the  समय , the खरीदें faced घरेलू  opposition because it was thought to be unconstitutional .
Although he agreed that the U.S. Constitution did not contain provisions for acquiring territory , Jefferson decided to go ahead with the  खरीदें वैसे in अनुक्रम to हटाएँ फ़्रांस 's उपस्थिति in the प्रदेश और to protect  both U.S. trade access to the port of New Orleans and free passage on the Mississippi River .
Ceremony at Place d'Armes , New Orleans marking  ट्रांसफ़र of louisiana to the संयुक्त राज्य , 10 कूच  1804 , as depicted by Thure de Thulstrup .
`` Cool Jerk '' is a  लोकप्रिय सोंग लिखा by डोनाल्ड storball  and originally performed by The Capitols .
Released in 1966 , it reached No . 2 on  the अमरीकी r & b चार्ट  and No . 7 on the pop chart .
The backing track for this song was actually recorded  ( secretly ) by the motown हाउस  band The Funk Brothers .
Per one of the Funk Brothers , the  सोंग थी originally to be पुकारा `` pimp  Jerk . ''
This was taken from watching  पड़ोस pimps , जो होता नृत्य in the  clubs , but were too `` cool '' to do the jerk like regular folks .
Their version  थी subsequently  named `` the Pimp Jerk . ''
The producer was afraid that a song with the  शब्द pimp in the शीर्षक होता be बैन or नहीं प्राप्त  much positive attention , and had the title changed to its current form .
The Go-Go 's , Todd Rundgren , Big  ट्रबल , इंसान यौन जवाब , the la de da 's , the सृष्टि ,  and The Coasters have covered the song .
Todd Rundgren did his version in an odd  समय हस्ताक्षर ( 7/4 ) , giving an obviously  jerky feel to the song .
The Go-Go 's covered the song for their 1982 album Vacation and  बाद re-recorded it लिये उनके 1990  album Greatest .
In the feature  फिल्मी घर अलोन 2 : खोया  in New York , Uncle Frank ( Gerry Bamman ) sings `` Cool Jerk '' in the shower .
A version of the song with different lyrics ( `` Do the Cool Whip '' ) is used  in कूल चाबुक commercials  .
a रिकॉर्डिंग of `` कूल झटका '' by रिकार्डो  Ray is featured in the feature film Donnie Brasco ( 1997 ) .
The song features in the film Standing in the Shadows of Motown ,  performed by the दुर्गंध भाइयो साथ सीसे vocals  by Bootsy Collins .
the सोंग is सुना briefly in the  animated feature , Madagascar 3 : Europe 's Most Wanted .
Despite this reason , it is listed  in कुछ विसंगतियाँ of  the film 's soundtrack .
A league is a unit of  लंबाई ( or , rarely  , area ) .
It was  long आम in यूरोपीय और लैटिन अमेरिका , लकिन it  is no longer an official unit in any nation .
The league originally referred to the distance a  व्यक्ति could चलना in an घंटा  .
चूंकि the मध्य आयु , अनेक मान have महरूम निर्दिष्ट  in several countries .
In the context of  nautical दूरियाँ , the 3 मील (  4.8 km ) distance corresponds to how far an observer of average height ( 5'9 '' or 1.78 m ) can see when standing at sea level .
Thus , a ship traveling one `` league '' has  पहुँचे कया थी  previously the farthest visible distance on the horizon .
The lack of a historical and global standard for the exact measure of a `` league '' can be accounted for  by the परिवर्तनीय उन्नयन of the निरीक्षक  ( i.e. , sightings from a ship 's deck vs. masthead ) .
The Irish state came into being  in 1922 as the आयरिश फ़्री राज्य , a डोमिनियन  of the British Commonwealth , having seceded from the United Kingdom under the Anglo-Irish Treaty .
It comprises 26 of Ireland  's 32 काउंटी  .
Since 1949 it has  existed as the गणतंत्र of  Ireland .
From its foundation , the Irish Free State was embroiled in a civil war between  राष्ट्रवादियों supporting the सन्धि और प्रतिद्वंद्वियों जो समर्थित  a republic .
The  pro-treaty पक्ष , संगठित  as Cumann na nGaedheal emerged victorious from the conflict and won subsequent elections .
They formed the government of the state until 1932 , when they  शांतिपूर्वक हात over शक्ति to the anti-treaty गुट in fianna fáil , जो  defeated them in an election .
The Irish state ,  despite इसके हिंसक beginnings , रै remained a उदार  democracy throughout its existence .
A new constitution in 1937 removed many of the  कड़ी साथ ब्रिटेन स्थापित अंतर्गत the सन्धि और  Ireland 's neutrality in the Second World War demonstrated its independence in foreign policy matters from Britain .
In 1948 Ireland formally  बाएँ the अंग्रेजों राष्ट्रमंडल  and adopted the title of `` Republic '' .
In the economic  गोला , the आयरिश राज्य  has had a mixed performance .
On independence , it was  एक of the wealthier देशों  in Europe per head of population .
However it also  inherited इससे अंग्रेजों नियम the समस्याएं of बेरोजगारी  , emigration , uneven geographical development and lack of a native industrial base .
For much of its  इतिहास , the राज्य struggled to rectify  these problems .
Particular peaks of  करणों यहूद अंकित दौरान the लेट 1930s ,  1950s and 1980s , when the Irish economy recorded little growth .
In the 1930s , Fianna Fáil governments attempted to create Irish domestic industries using  subsidies और सुरक्षात्मक  tarifs .
In the late 1950s , these policies were dropped in  पक्ष of फ़्री व्यापार साथ चयनित देशों और प्रोत्साहित of विदेशी निवेश  with low taxes .
This was  विस्तारित जब आयरलैंड डाला  the European Economic Community in 1972 .
In  the 1990s और 2000s , आयरलैंड अनुभवी an आर्थिक बूम ज्ञात  as the Celtic Tiger , in which the country 's GDP surpassed many of its European neighbours .
Immigration also  surpassed करणों , bringing the राज्य 's जनसांख्यिकी up to  over 4 million .
However , since 2008 , Ireland has experienced a severe crisis  in the बैंकिंग सेक्टर और साथ sovereign  debt .
The resultant economic slump has deepened the effect  of the संसार मंदी on  Ireland .
From 1937 to 1998 , the Irish constitution included a claim on Northern Ireland  as a भाग of the नेशनल territory .
However , the state also opposed  और प्रयुक्त इसके सुरक्षा शक्तियां विरूद्ध those हथियारबंद समूह - प्रधानतया  the Provisional Irish Republican Army , who tried to unite Ireland by force .
This occurred in  the 1950s , throughout the 1970s  and 1980s and has continued on a reduced scale .
Irish governments meanwhile tried to broker an agreement to the conflict  ज्ञात as the परेशानियों भीतर उत्तरी आयरलैंड इससे 1968 to the  late 1990s .
The British government  officially recognised the सही of the आयरिश सरकारी to be a पार्टी  to the Northern negotiations in the Anglo-Irish Agreement of 1985 .
In 1998 , as part of the  शुभ शुक्रवार अनुबंध , the आयरिश संविधान थी altered by referendum to हटाएँ the territorial अर्जी to उत्तरी आयरलैंड  and instead extend the right of Irish citizenship to all the people of the island should they wish to have it .
John  क्विंसी एडम्स ( जुलाई 11 , 1767february 23 , 1848 ) थी  the sixth President of the United States ( 1825–1829 ) .
He served as American  राजनयिक , सीनेटर , और congressional  representative .
He was a member of the Federalist ,  democratic-republican , नेशनल रिपब्लिकन ,  and later Anti-Masonic and Whig parties .
Adams was the son of former  अध्यक्ष जॉन एडम्स और  Abigail Adams .
As a diplomat , Adams  निभाई an महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in  negotiating many international treaties , most notably the Treaty of Ghent , which ended the War of 1812 .
As Secretary of  राज्य , he negotiated साथ the संयुक्त किंगडम over अमेरिका 's उत्तरी  border with Canada , negotiated with Spain the annexation of Florida , and authored the Monroe Doctrine .
इतिहासकारों सहमत he थी एक of the महानतम राजनयिकों  and secretaries of state in American history .
As president , he sought to modernize the  अमरीकी अर्थव्यवस्था और प्रचारित  education .
Adams  enacted a भाग of उसके कार्यसूची और  paid off much of the national debt .
He was stymied by a Congress controlled  by उसके दुश्मनों , और उसके  lack of patronage networks helped politicians eager to undercut him .
He lost his  1828 बोली लिये re-election to  Andrew Jackson .
In doing  so , he became the पहला अध्यक्ष  since his father to serve a single term .
Adams is best known as a diplomat who shaped America 's  विदेशी नीति in लकीर साथ उसके ardently राष्ट्रवादी प्रतिबद्धता to अमेरिका  's republican values .
More  recently होवे ( 2007 ) portrayed एडम्स  as the exemplar and moral leader in an era of modernization .
During Adams '  आजीवन , technological नवप्रवर्तनों और नई अर्थात् of संचार स्प्रेड संदेश  of religious revival , social reform , and party politics .
Goods ,  धन , और लोगों traveled अधिक  rapidly and efficiently than ever before .
Adams was elected a U.S. Representative from Massachusetts after  leaving दफ्तर , सेवारत लिये the पिछला 17 सालो of उसके जीवन साथ  far greater acclamation than he had achieved as president .
He is , so far , the only president later elected to the United  राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि ( हालांकि जॉन टायलर थी निर्वाचित to  the House of Representatives of the Confederate States just before his death in 1862 ) .
Animated by his growing revulsion  विरूद्ध गुलामी , एडम्स became a अग्रणी  opponent of the Slave Power .
He predicted that if a civil war were to break out , the president could abolish  गुलामी by using उसके युद्ध शक्तियां  .
Adams also predicted the Union 's dissolution over the slavery issue , but said that  if the दक्षिण became स्वतंत्र वहीँ होता be a श्रेणी  of bloody slave revolts .
Windows  अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर 9  ( IE9 ) is a version of the Internet Explorer web browser from Microsoft .
It was released to the public on  कूच 14 ,  2011 .
Microsoft has released Internet Explorer  9 as a प्रमुख out-of-band संस्करण कि is नहीं tied to the  release schedule of any particular version of Windows , unlike previous versions .
it is the पहला संस्करण चूंकि अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर 2 to नहीं be bundled साथ a खिड़कियाँ  operating system , although some OEMs have installed it with Windows 7 on their PCs , as well as new Windows 7 laptops .
The system requirements for Internet Explorer 9 are Windows 7 , Windows Server 2008 R2 , Windows Vista Service Pack  2 or खिड़कियाँ सर्वर 2008 sp2 साथ the मंच  Update .
Windows XP and  पहले हैं  not supported .
Internet Explorer 9 is the last version of Internet  एक्सप्लोरर to be समर्थित on खिड़कियाँ विस्टा  .
Both IA-32  और x64 builds हैं  available .
Internet Explorer 9 supports several CSS 3 properties , embedded  आईसीसी v2 or v4 रंग प्रोफ़ाइल support via खिड़कियाँ  Color System , and has improved JavaScript performance .
It is the last of the five major web  browsers to implement support लिये स्केलेबल वेक्टर ग्राफिक्स  ( SVG ) .
It also features hardware-accelerated graphics rendering  using direct2d , hardware-accelerated टेक्स्ट रेंडरिंग using directwrite , hardware-accelerated वीडियो रेंडरिंग  using Media Foundation , imaging support provided by Windows Imaging Component , and high fidelity printing powered by the XML Paper Specification ( XPS ) print pipeline .
Internet Explorer 9 also supports the  html5 वीडियो और ऑडियो  tags and the Web Open Font Format .
Alka-Seltzer is an effervescent antacid and pain reliever first marketed by  the dr . मील आयुर्विज्ञान कम्पनी  .
It was developed  by मौरिस treener , सिर  chemist at Miles , in Elkhart , Indiana .
alka-seltzer is marketed लिये राहत of नाबालिग aches ,  pains , inflammation , fever , headache , heartburn , sour stomach , indigestion , and hangovers , while neutralizing excess stomach acid .
It was  शुभारम्भ  in 1931 .
A spin-off of Alka-Seltzer made to relieve colds and flu ,  alka-seltzer प्लस , थी बाद introduced  .
A  short-lived antacid non-aspirin रूपांतर , alka-mints  , was introduced in 1994 and discontinued in 1997 .
Alka-Seltzer is  फिलहाल स्वामित्व by बायर  Schering Pharma AG , Germany .
The name `` Alka-Seltzer '' has been extended to incorporate an entire line of medications sold over the counter and taken by means of rapidly  dissolving टैबलेट कि रूप a कार्बोनेटेड समाधान in जल  .

A stalactite ( , ; from the Greek stalasso , ( σταλάσσω ) , `` to drip '' , and meaning ``  कि जिससे drips '' ) is a प्रकार of speleothem ( द्वितीयक खनिज  ) that hangs from the ceiling of limestone caves .
It is a type of  dripstone  .
The  सम्बन्धित गठन on the  floor of the cave is known as a stalagmite .
उपाधि abbreviations हैं प्रयुक्त as an वैकल्पिक रास्ता to बताएँ an अकादमिक  degree instead of spelling out the title in full , such as in reference books like Who 's Who and on business cards .
Many degrees have more  than एक संक्षिप्त  .
In the UK , it is not  generally the कस्टम to punctuate abbreviations लिये डिग्री साथ  full stops ( e.g . `` BSc '' rather than `` B.Sc . `` .
Race is a classification system used to  categorize इंसानो into विशाल और पृथक  populations or groups by anatomical , cultural , ethnic , genetic , geographical , historical , linguistic , religious , or social affiliation .
First used to  denote नेशनल संबद्धों , the पद  began to be used to relate to physical traits in the 17th century .
In the early 20th century the  पद थी प्रायः प्रयुक्त , in a taxonomic भाव  , to denote genetically differentiated human populations defined by phenotype .
While biologists sometimes use the concept of race to make distinctions among  फजी सेट of traits , अन्य in the वैज्ञानिक जातियाँ सुझाएँ कि the विचार of रेस प्रायः  is used in a naive or simplistic way , i.e . that among humans , race has no taxonomic significance : all living humans belong to the same species , Homo sapiens and subspecies , Homo sapiens sapiens .
Social conceptions and groupings of races vary over  समय , involving लोक taxonomies
that define of individuals based on  आभास traits  .
Scientists consider biological essentialism  obsolete , और generally discourage जातिगत स्पष्टीकरण लिये सामूहिक  differentiation in both physical and behavioral traits .
Since the second half of the 20th century the associations of race with the ideologies and theories that grew out of the work of  19th-century विज्ञानियों और physiologists रै led to the उपयोग of  the word race itself becoming problematic .
Although still used in general contexts ,  it is अभी प्रायः replaced by अन्य शब्द जिससे हैं कम अस्पष्ट और  emotionally charged , such as populations , people ( s ) , ethnic groups or communities depending on context .
Lucy Stone ( August 13 , 1818 – October 19 ,  1893 ) थी a prominent अमरीकी abolitionist और suffragist , और  a vocal advocate and organizer promoting rights for women .
In 1847 , Stone became  the पहला स्त्री इससे मैसाचुसेट्स to  earn a college degree .
She spoke out  लिये महिलाओं 's अधिकारों और विरूद्ध गुलामी  at a time when women were discouraged and prevented from public speaking .
Stone was the first recorded American woman to  retain उसके अपना पिछला नाम बाद  marriage .
Stone 's organizational activities for the  कारण of महिलाओं 's अधिकारों yielded ठोस  gains in the difficult political environment of the 19th century .
Stone helped initiate the first National Women  's अधिकारों सम्मेलन और वो समर्थित और sustained it  annually along with a number of other local , state and regional activist conventions .
Stone spoke in front of a number of legislative bodies to promote laws  giving अधिक अधिकारों to महिलाओं .
She assisted in  establishing the स्त्री 's नेशनल वफ़ादार लीग to सहायता pass the तेरहवीं amendment  and thereby abolish slavery , after which she helped form the largest group of like-minded women 's rights reformers , the politically moderate American Woman Suffrage Association , which worked for decades at the state level in favor of women 's right to vote .
Stone wrote extensively about a wide range of women 's rights ,  प्रकाशन और distributing भाषणों by herself और अन्य , और  convention proceedings .
In the long-running and influential Woman 's Journal , a weekly periodical that she established and  प्रचारित , स्टोन aired दोनो उसके अपना और differing दृश्य  about women 's rights .
Called `` the orator '' and `` the morning  स्टार of the स्त्री 's अधिकारों गति '' , स्टोन वितरित a वाक  which sparked Susan B. Anthony to take up the cause of women 's suffrage .
Elizabeth Cady Stanton wrote  कि `` लुसी स्टोन थी the पहला व्यक्ति by जिसको  the heart of the American public was deeply stirred on the woman question . ''
Together , Anthony , Stanton , and Stone have been called the  19th सदी `` triumvirate `` of महिलाओं 's suffrage  and feminism .
In finance , a bond is an instrument of indebtedness  of the बंध जारीकर्ता to the  holders .
It is a debt security , under  जिससे the जारीकर्ता owes the धारकों a कर्ज़ और , depending on the शर्तें of the  bond , is obliged to pay them interest ( the coupon ) or to repay the principal at a later date , termed the maturity .
Interest is usually payable at fixed intervals (  semiannual , सालाना , sometimes मासिक )  .
Very  प्रायः the बंध is परक्राम्य , i.e . the स्वामित्व  of the instrument can be transferred in the secondary market .
Thus a bond is a form of loan or IOU :  the होल्डर of the बंध is the lender ( creditor  ) , the issuer of the bond is the borrower ( debtor ) , and the coupon is the interest .
Bonds  provide the borrower साथ बाह्य निधि to  finance long-term investments , or , in the case of government bonds , to finance current expenditure .
Certificates of deposit ( CDs ) or short term commercial paper are considered  to be धन मार्केट यंत्र और नहीं bonds : the प्रमुख अंतर is  in the length of the term of the instrument .
Bonds and stocks are both securities , but the major difference between the two is that ( capital ) stockholders have an equity stake in the company  ( i.e . वे हैं स्वामी ) , whereas bondholders have a creditor हिस्सेदारी in the कम्पनी ( i.e . वे हैं lenders )  .
Another difference is that bonds usually have a defined term , or maturity , after  जिससे the बंध is redeemed , whereas स्टॉक्स may be बकाया  indefinitely .
An exception is an irredeemable bond , such as Consols  , जिससे is a perpetuity  , i.e . a bond with no maturity .
