A scale model is a physical model , a representation or copy of an object that is larger or smaller than the actual size of the object ,  जिससे seeks to maintain the सापेक्ष proportions ( the स्केल फ़ैक्टर ) of the शारीरिक आकार of the असली ऑब्जेक्ट  .
Very often the scale model is used as a guide to making the  ऑब्जेक्ट in पूरा आकार  .
Scale models  हैं निर्मित or एकत्रित  for many reasons .
The Zune HD was a portable media player in the Zune  उत्पाद परिवार released on सितंबर 15 , 2009  by Microsoft .
It was a direct competitor  साथ the ठहराना  iPod and iPhone series of mobile devices .
It was  initially released in 16  and 32 GB capacities .
A 64  gb संस्करण थी  released on April 9 , 2010 .
It utilized a touchscreen interface for navigation  और शामिल wi-fi लिये तुल्यकालन , अभिगम  to the Zune Marketplace and Web browsing .
The Zune HD utilized the  nvidia tegra apx 2600 चिप , allowing it to खेल 720p वीडियो through the वैकल्पिक  HDMI Zune dock on a high-definition television .
Otherwise , content would  be scaled bas to 480x272 पिक्सेल  on the player 's OLED touchscreen .
Old Sparky , the electric chair  प्रयुक्त at गाओ  Sing prison
Execution by electrocution , usually performed using an electric chair , is an execution  विधि originating in the संयुक्त राज्य in जिससे the condemned व्यक्ति is  strapped to a specially built wooden chair and electrocuted through electrodes placed on the body .
This execution method was created by employees of Thomas Edison during  the युद्ध of currents , और रै महरूम प्रयुक्त तभी in the संयुक्त राज्य और , लिये a काल of अनेक दशकों , in  the Philippines ( its first use there in 1924 under American occupation , last in 1976 ) .
Historically , once the condemned person was attached to the chair ,  विभिन्न चक्र ( differing in वोल्टेज और अवधि ) of प्रत्यावर्ती  current would be passed through the individual 's body , in order to cause fatal damage to the internal organs ( including the brain ) .
The first jolt of electric current  थी designed to कारण तात्कालिक  unconsciousness and brain death ; the second one was designed to cause fatal damage to the vital organs .
Death  थी अक्सर caused  by electrical overstimulation of the heart .
Although in the United States the electric chair has become a symbol of  the मौत दंड , इसके उपयोग is in मनाही due to the वृद्धि of lethal इंजेक्शन , जिससे is  widely believed to be a more humane method of execution .
Although some states still maintain electrocution as a method of  निष्पादन , आज it is तभी कायम as a  secondary method that may be chosen over lethal injection at the request of the prisoner .
As  of 2010 , electrocution is an वैकल्पिक रूप  of execution in Alabama , Florida , South Carolina and Virginia .
They allow  the कैदी  to choose lethal injection as an alternative method .
In the states of Kentucky and Tennessee , the electric chair has been retired except for those whose capital crimes were committed prior to  legislated तिथियाँ in 1998 ( केंटकी : कूच 31 , 1998 ; टेनेसी  : December 31 , 1998 ) and who chose electrocution .
In both states , inmates who do not choose electrocution or inmates who  वचनबद्ध उनके अपराधों बाद the designated तिथि हैं मारे  by lethal injection .
The electric chair  is an वैकल्पिक रूप of निष्पादन स्वीकृत लिये संभावित उपयोग in अरकंसास और ओक्लाहोमा  if other forms of execution are found unconstitutional in the state at the time of execution .
It is the sole method of execution in Vermont , where  देशद्रोह is the तभी  capital crime .
On February 8 , 2008 ,  the नेब्रास्का परम् अदालत  determined that execution by electric chair was a `` cruel and unusual punishment '' under the state 's constitution .
This brought executions of this type to an end in Nebraska , the only remaining state to retain  electrocution as इसके एकमात्र विधि of निष्पादन लिये  murder .
The Maryland House of Delegates is the lower house of the General Assembly , the state legislature of the American State  of मेरीलैंड , और is रचित of 141 delegates  elected from 47 districts .
The House of Delegates Chamber is located in the Maryland State House ( state  कैपिटल ) on राज्य वृत्त in annapolis , जिससे is the राज्य  capital .
The State House  भी घरों the मेरीलैंड राज्य सीनेट कक्ष और  the offices of the Governor and Lieutenant Governor of the State of Maryland .
Each Delegate has offices in Annapolis  , in the आसपास कैस्पर R. टेलर , jr. हाउस  Office Building .
The Liberation of Paris ( also known as the Battle  लिये पेरिस ) took प्लेस दौरान संसार युद्ध ii इससे 19 अगस्त 1944 जबतक the आत्मसमर्पण of the  occupying German garrison on 25 August .
The Liberation of Paris started with an uprising by the French  प्रतिरोध विरूद्ध the जर्मनी  garrison .
On 24 August , the French Forces of the Interior ( Forces françaises de l'intérieur , FFI ) received reinforcements from the  फ़्री फ्रेंच फौज of मुक्ति और इससे the u.S. तीसरा फौज अंतर्गत सामान्य patton  .
The capital region of France had been governed by Nazi Germany since the signing of the Second Compiègne Armistice in  जून 1940 , जब the जर्मनी फौज occupied उत्तरी और westernmost फ़्रांस , और जब the कठपुतली शासन of vichy फ़्रांस  was established in the town of Vichy in central France .
This battle marked  the मुक्ति of पेरिस  and the exile of the Vichy government to Sigmaringen in Germany .
However , there was still much heavy fighting to be done before France was liberated , including the campaign in southern France during  august-september ( in provence और extending into the southwestern प्रदेश of the vosges kyu ) , साथ the german-held seaports of पश्चिमी फ़्रांस ( ऐसे as at brest और dunkirk  ) , in Alsace and Lorraine in eastern France , and in northeastern France , such as along the Rhine and Moder Rivers .
The German Army and  ss लड़ा doggedly in ये क्षेत्रों  for the remainder of 1944 and into 1945 .
`` Feelin ' Alright ? '' also known as `` Feeling  alright '' is a सोंग लिखा by डेव मेसन of the अंग्रेज़ी  rock band Traffic from their eponymous 1968 album , Traffic .
The song was also a  hit सिंगल लिये अनेक performers : जो cocker  ( 1969 , # 69 , recharted in 1972 , US # 33 ) , Mongo Santamaría ( 1969 , # 95 ) and Grand Funk Railroad ( 1971 , US # 54 ) .
It has also been recorded by Three Dog Night ( 1969 ) , The 5th Dimension ( 1970 ) , Lou Rawls , Freddie King , Paul Weller , Lulu , Chairmen of the Board ( 1970 ) , Rare Earth , The Electric Concept Orchestra , Mother 's  finest ( 1973 ) , the ओहियो खिलाड़ी ( 1971 ) , डायना रॉस साथ the जैक्सन  5 ( 1971 ) , Maceo Parker , Gladys Knight & the Pips , Widespread Panic and The Black Crowes .
A Steel Drum version by Trinidad  आयल कम्पनी थी reissued on the dancefloor जैज़  compilation Blue Juice 2 .
It was also  प्रदर्शित in the 2000 फिल्मी  Duets , sung by Huey Lewis .
Both the original and the Joe Cocker cover were featured  in the फिल्म उड़ान  , starring Denzel Washington .
Devon Werkheiser ( born March 8,1991 ) is an American actor , voice actor , singer , songwriter and musician , best  ज्ञात लिये उसके अभिनीत भूमिका as ned bigby on the निकलोडियन sitcom ned 's declassified  School Survival Guide and for his role in the 2007 TV Movie Shredderman Rules , as the lead character Nolan Byrd .
Werkheiser also played Peter Parkes in the fourth  और फाइनल ऋतु of the एबीसी परिवार  show Greek .

An electronic health record ( EHR ) is an evolving concept  पारिभाषित as a व्यवस्थित संग्रहण of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  health information about individual patients or populations .
It is a record in digital format that is theoretically  सक्षम of होने साझा आरपार अलग  health care settings .
In some cases this sharing  can occur by रास्ता of network-connected enterprise-wide सूचना  systems and other information networks or exchanges .
EHRs may include a range of data ,  सहित जनसांख्यिकी , चिकित्सा इतिहास , दवा और allergies  , immunization status , laboratory test results , radiology images , vital signs , personal stats like age and weight , and billing information .
Loan origination is the process by which a borrower applies for a new loan , and a lender  प्रक्रियाओं कि अनुप्रयोग  .
Origination generally includes all the steps from  लेने a ऋण अनुप्रयोग up to disbursal of निधि ( or घटती  the application ) .
Loan servicing covers  सबकुछ  after disbursing the funds until the loan is fully paid off .
Loan  origination is a specialized संस्करण  of new account opening for financial services organizations .
Certain people and organizations  specialize in ऋण origination  .
Mortgage brokers and other mortgage originator  कंपनियाँ serve as a prominent  example .
There  हैं अनेक अलग प्रकार  of loans .
For more information on loan  प्रकार , देखिए the ऋण और उपभोक्ता  lending articles .
Steps involved in originating a loan vary  by ऋण प्रकार , विभिन्न kinds  of loan risk , regulator , lender policy , and other factors .
Top left : The Tennessee Valley Authority , part of  the नई सौदे , होने हस्ताक्षरित into  law in 1933 .
Top  सही : फ्रैंकलिन delano रूज़वेल्ट  , who was responsible for initiatives and programs collectively known as the New Deal .
Bottom : A  पब्लिक भित्ति इससे एक of the कलाकारों  employed by the New Deal .
the नई सौदे थी a श्रेणी of आर्थिक  programs enacted in the United States between 1933 and 1936 .
They involved presidential executive orders or laws passed by Congress during the first term  of अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट  .
The programs were in response to the Great Depression , and focused on what  इतिहासकारों कॉल the `` 3 rs '' : राहत  , Recovery , and Reform .
That is Relief for the  बेरोजगार और ग़रीब ; रिकवरी of the अर्थव्यवस्था to सामान्य स्तर  ; and Reform of the financial system to prevent a repeat depression .
The New Deal produced a political realignment , making the Democratic Party the majority ( as well as the party that held the White  हाउस लिये सात आउट of नौ अध्यक्षीय शर्तें इससे 1933 to 1969 ) , साथ इसके आधार in उदार विचार , the श्वेत  South , traditional Democrats , big city machines , and the newly empowered labor unions and ethnic minorities .
The Republicans were split , with conservatives opposing the  संपूर्ण नई सौदे as an दुश्मन of कारोबार और विकास , और उदारवादियों accepting  some of it and promising to make it more efficient .
The realignment crystallized into the New Deal Coalition that dominated most presidential  चुनावों into the 1960s , जबकि the विपक्ष रूढ़िवादी  Coalition largely controlled Congress from 1937 to 1963 .
By 1936 the term `` liberal '' typically was used for  समर्थक of the नई सौदे , और `` रूढ़िवादी  `` for its opponents .
From 1934 to 1938 , Roosevelt was assisted in his endeavours  by a “pro-spender” बहुमत in कॉंग्रेस ( drawn इससे two-party ,  competitive , non-machine , Progressive , and Left party districts ) .
As noted by Alexander Hicks , “Roosevelt , backed by rare , non-Southern Democrat  majorities — 270 non-southern डेमोक्रेट प्रतिनिधि और 71 non-southern डेमोक्रेट  senators — spelled Second New Deal reform.”
Many historians distinguish between a `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) and a `` Second New Deal '' ( 1935–38 ) , with the second one more liberal and more  विवादास्पद  .
The `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34  ) dealt साथ विविध समूह , इससे बैंकिंग और railroads to उद्योग और खेती , सब  of which demanded help for economic survival .
The Federal Emergency Relief Administration , for instance , provided $ 500 million for relief operations by states and cities , while the short-lived CWA ( Civil Works  प्रशासन ) दिया  localities money to operate make-work projects in 1933-34 .
The `` Second New Deal `` in 1935–38 included the Wagner Act to promote labor unions , the Works Progress Administration ( WPA ) relief program ( which made the federal government by far the  largest सिंगल नियोक्ता in the स्वदेश ) , the सोशल सुरक्षा अधिनियम , और  new programs to aid tenant farmers and migrant workers .
the फाइनल प्रमुख वस्तुएं of नई सौदे विधान यहूद the सृष्टि of the संयुक्त  States Housing Authority and Farm Security Administration , both in 1937 , and the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 , which set maximum hours and minimum wages for most categories of workers .
The economic downturn of  1937–38 , और the कड़वा  split between the AFL and CIO labor unions led to major Republican gains in Congress in 1938 .
Conservative Republicans and Democrats in  कॉंग्रेस joined in the अनौपचारिक  Conservative Coalition .
By  1942–43 वे shut bas राहत कार्यक्रम ऐसे as the wpa और  CCC and blocked major liberal proposals .
Roosevelt himself turned his  ध्यान to the युद्ध प्रयत्न , और  won reelection in 1940 and 1944 .
The Supreme Court declared the National Recovery Administration ( NRA ) and the first version of the Agricultural Adjustment Act ( AAA ) unconstitutional ,  however the aaa थी rewritten  and then upheld .
as the पहला रिपब्लिकन अध्यक्ष निर्वाचित  after FDR , Dwight D. Eisenhower ( 1953–61 ) left the New Deal largely intact , even expanding it in some areas .
In the 1960s , Lyndon B. Johnson 's Great Society used the New Deal as  प्रेरणा लिये a नाटकीय विस्तार of उदार  programs , which Republican Richard M. Nixon generally retained .
बाद 1974 , however  , the call for deregulation of the economy gained bipartisan support .
The New Deal regulation  of बैंकिंग ( glass–steagall अधिनियम ) थी  suspended in the 1990s .
Many New Deal programs remain active , with some still operating under the original names , including the  संघीय जमा बीमे निगम ( fdic ) , the संघीय क्रॉप बीमे निगम ( fcic ) , the  Federal Housing Administration ( FHA ) , and the Tennessee Valley Authority ( TVA ) .
The largest programs still in existence today are the  सोशल सुरक्षा प्रणाली और the प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज आयोग ( सेक )  .
A  स्त्री ( ) , pl :  women ( ) is a female human .
The  पद स्त्री is प्रायः सुरक्षित लिये an  adult , with the term girl being the usual term for a female child or adolescent .
however , the पद स्त्री is भी sometimes  used to identify a female human , regardless of age , as in phrases such as `` Women 's rights `` .
महिलाओं हैं typically सक्षम of giving  birth , though older women who have gone through menopause and some intersex women can not .
`` I Do n't Want to  मिस a बात '' is a सोंग  performed by American rock band Aerosmith for the 1998 film Armageddon .
Written by Diane Warren , the song debuted at number one on the  बिलबोर्ड hot 100 ( the पहला # 1 लिये the बैंड बाद 28  years together ) .
The  सोंग ठहरे at क्रमांक एक लिये चार सप्ताह  from September 5 to September 26 , 1998 .
The song also stayed at number 1 for several  सप्ताह in अनेक अन्य देशों  .
In the UK , the song peaked at number four , becoming Aerosmith 's highest charting song in the UK , where  it थी the 17th best-selling सिंगल of 1998 , और रै बेची  over a million copies .
Although not  प्रयुक्त by the बहुमत of the  world 's countries , daylight saving time is common in the Western world .
daylight छायांकन समय ( dst ) —also गर्मियाँ समय in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी — is  the practice of advancing clocks during the lighter months so that evenings have more daylight and mornings have less .
Typically clocks are adjusted forward one hour  निकट the प्रारंभ of वसन्त  and are adjusted backward in autumn .
The modern idea of daylight  छायांकन थी पहला प्रस्तावित in 1895 by जार्ज vernon हडसन और it थी  first implemented during the First World War .
Many countries have used it at various times  चूंकि तब  .
Much  of the संयुक्त राज्य प्रयुक्त dst in the 1950s और 1960s ,  and DST use expanded following the 1970s energy crisis and has been widely used in North America and Europe since then .
The  अभ्यास रै  been both praised and criticized .
Adding daylight to evenings benefits retailing , sports , and other activities that exploit sunlight after working hours ,  लकिन can कारण समस्याएं लिये संध्या entertainment  and other occupations tied to the sun .
Although an early goal of DST was to reduce evening usage of incandescent lighting ( formerly  a प्राथमिक उपयोग of विद्युत ) , आधुनिक हीटिंग और कूलिंग उपयोग पैटर्न  differ greatly , and research about how DST currently affects energy use is limited or contradictory .
DST clock shifts  उपस्थित अन्य चुनौतियां  .
They complicate timekeeping , and can disrupt meetings ,  सफर , बिलिंग , रिकार्ड keeping , चिकित्सा डिवाइस , भारी उपकरण  , and sleep patterns .
Software can often adjust computer clocks automatically , but  इस can be सीमित और error-prone  , particularly when DST dates are changed .
Floorplan of  the château  de Montargis
Montargis is a commune in the Loiret department  in north-central फ़्रांस  on the Loing river .
The town is  स्तिथ परिचय दक्षिण of पेरिस  and east of Orléans in the Gâtinais .
montargis is the दूसरी largest  city in the Loiret , after Orléans .
It is near a large forest ,  और contains लाइट उद्योग  and farming , including saffron .
Due to its numerous canals and bridges , Montargis sometimes  बिल्स itself as the `` वेनिस of the gâtinais  . ''
Though quite modern , it  retains a मध्यकालीन आकर्षण in इसके शहर  area .
In computer storage , a logical unit number , or LUN , is a number used to identify a logical unit , which is a device addressed  by the scsi प्रोटोकॉल or प्रोटोकॉल जिससे  encapsulate SCSI , such as Fibre Channel or iSCSI .
A LUN may be used with any device  जिससे supports read/write परिचालन , ऐसे as a टेप ड्राइव , लकिन is सबसे  often used to refer to a logical disk as created on a SAN .
Though not technically correct ,  the पद `` lun '' is प्रायः  also used to refer to the logical disk itself .
The Gospel According to Mark ( , , to euangelion kata Markon ) , commonly  shortened to the इन्जील of चिह्नित or बस चिह्नित , is the  second book of the New Testament .
This canonical account of the life of  यीशु of नासरत is  one of the three synoptic gospels .
It was thought to be an epitome , which accounts for its place as  the दूसरी इन्जील in the बाइबल  .
However , most contemporary scholars now  लिहाज़ it as the earliest of the canonical  gospels ( c 70 ) .
कि चिह्नित थी प्रयुक्त as a सोर्स लिये the  other synoptic gospels Gospel of Matthew and Gospel of Luke is widely held by many , although not all , New Testament scholars .
The Gospel of Mark  narrates the मंत्रालय of यीशु इससे  his baptism by John the Baptist to his death and resurrection .
It  focuses विशेषकर  on the last week of his life ( chapters 11–16 ) in Jerusalem .
Its swift narrative portrays  यीशु as a वीर man  of action , an exorcist , healer and miracle worker .
An  महत्वपूर्ण थीम of चिह्नित is  the Messianic Secret .
Jesus silences the demoniacs he heals , tries unsuccessfully to keep his messianic identity  रहस्य , और conceals उसके संदेश साथ parables  .
Meanwhile , the disciples fail to understand both the  implication of the चमत्कार of यीशु और the अर्थ  of the things he predicts about his arrest , death and resurrection .
Most scholars believe that the original text of the gospel ends at Mark 16:8 with the discovery of  यीशु ' खाली मकबरा और कि the following खाता of उसके क़यामत दिखावे  is a later addition .
According to tradition and some early  गिरिजाघर लेखक , the लेखक is चिह्नित the इंजीलवादी  , the companion of the apostle Peter .
The gospel , however , appears to rely on several underlying sources , varying in form and in theology , which tells  विरूद्ध the परंपरा कि the इन्जील  was based on Peter 's preaching .
The text is a compilation which may include eye-witness accounts as  खूब as ज्ञात अपोस्टोलिक preachings , और pre-existing लिखा  records that do not exist today but can be confirmed from 2nd-century commentators .
Some of the stories in  the इन्जील may have  been transmitted orally before being written down .
Various elements within the gospel suggest that  the लेखक लिखा in सीरियाई or फिलिस्तीन  for a non-Jewish Christian community .
The Lord of the  बजती is an एपिक ऊँची काल्पनिक अनोखा लिखा by अंग्रेज़ी  philologist and University of Oxford professor J. R. R. Tolkien .
The story began as a sequel to Tolkien 's 1937 children 's fantasy novel The Hobbit  , लकिन आखिरकार विकसित into a much larger  work .
It was written in stages between 1937 and 1949 ,  much of it दौरान संसार  War II .
It  is the दूसरी best-selling  novel ever written , with over 150 million copies sold .
The title of the novel  refers to the स्टोरी 's प्रमुख विपक्षी , the अंधेरा रब sauron , जो था in an पहले आयु निर्मित the एक रिंग to नियम the  other Rings of Power as the ultimate weapon in his campaign to conquer and rule all of Middle-earth .
From quiet beginnings in  the शायर , a होब्बिट जमीन नहीं नापसंद the अंग्रेज़ी countryside , the स्टोरी सीमाएँ आरपार north-west middle-earth , following the कोर्स of the युद्ध of the रिंग through the आँखें of इसके वर्ण , notably the hobbits frodo  Baggins , Samwise `` Sam '' Gamgee , Meriadoc `` Merry '' Brandybuck and Peregrin `` Pippin '' Took , but also the hobbits ' chief allies and travelling companions : Aragorn , a Human Ranger ; Boromir , a man from Gondor ; Gimli , a Dwarf warrior ; Legolas , an Elven prince ; and Gandalf , a Wizard .
The work was initially intended  by tolkien to be एक आवाज़ of a two-volume नियत , साथ the अन्य होने  The Silmarillion , but this idea was dismissed by his publisher .
It was decided for economic reasons to publish The Lord of the Rings as three volumes over the course of a  साल इससे 29 जुलाई 1954 to 20 अक्तूबर 1955 , यूँ बनाना the अभी परिचित  Lord of the Rings trilogy .
The three volumes  यहूद हकदार the फेलोशिप of the रिंग , the दो मीनारें  , and The Return of the King .
Structurally , the novel is divided internally  into छह किताबे , दो प्रति आवाज़ , साथ अनेक appendices of पृष्ठभूमि  material included at the end of the third volume .
The Lord of the Rings has since been reprinted numerous times and  अनूदित into अनेक भाषाएं  .
Tolkien  's कार्य रै महरूम the विषय  of extensive analysis of its themes and origins .
Although a major work in itself , the story was only the last movement of a larger epic  tolkien था worked on चूंकि 1917 , in a प्रक्रम he वर्णित  as mythopoeia .
Influences on this earlier work , and on the story of The Lord of the Rings , include  philology , mythology , धर्म और the लेखक 's distaste लिये the प्रभाव of industrialization , as खूब  as earlier fantasy works and Tolkien 's experiences in World War I .
The Lord of the  बजती in इसके फेरे is माना to have था a ग्रेट प्रभाव on आधुनिक काल्पनिक ; the प्रभाव of tolkien  's works is such that the use of the words `` Tolkienian '' and `` Tolkienesque '' have been recorded in the Oxford English Dictionary .
The enduring popularity of The Lord of the Rings has led to numerous references in popular culture , the  founding of अनेक समाजों by प्रशंसक of tolkien 's  works , and the publication of many books about Tolkien and his works .
The Lord of  the बजती रै प्रेरित , और continues to inspire ,  artwork , music , films and television , video games , and subsequent literature .
Award-winning adaptations of The Lord of the Rings have been made for  रेडियो , थिएटर , और फिल्मी  .
The following is  an एपीसोड सूची लिये the  Nickelodeon sitcom Drake & Josh .
The series debuted on  जनवरी 11 , 2004  .
A TV film Merry Christmas , Drake  & जोश थी बना अलावा इससे the  regular series on December 5 , 2008 .
There are a total of  60 एपीसोड यहूद उत्पादित spanning  four seasons .
Drake Bell , Josh Peck , and Miranda Cosgrove were the  तभी अभिनेताओं to appear  in all 60 episodes .
The San Francisco 49ers conduct training camp at the team 's  मुख्यालय और अभ्यास सुविधा in सांता क्लारा , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  in August 2010 .
The offense is wearing  रेड jerseys साथ the एक्सेप्शन of क्वार्टरबैक  Alex Smith , who is in a black jersey ; the defense in white .
in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग , प्रशिक्षण  camp refers to the time before the season commences .
During this time , teams will sometimes  congregate at an बाहर स्थान , प्रायः a विश्वविद्यालयों  , to conduct training camp for at least the first few weeks .
इस is समान  to baseball 's spring training .
Training camp is  प्रयुक्त in अनेक  different ways .
New players and coaches use it to  acclimate themselves to नई teammates  and systems .
For younger players , it serves as a  काल of मूल्यांकन ; लिये दिग्गजों  , it is time to round back into form .
Training camp is divided into several  अलग components  .
the पहला  is scrimmages .
These  हैं pseudo-games जहाँ टीमों चलाएं  nearly full games ' worth of plays .
sometimes , दो अभ्यास  sessions are held on the same day .
This concept is referred  to as  two-a-days .
Other parts of training camp include drills , meetings with coaches and other  खिलाड़ी at एक 's स्थिति , वज़न  training , and pre-season games .
The  latter हाफ of प्रशिक्षण शिविर लीड सीधे  into the exhibition season .
With NFL training camps  starting in late-july , the  biggest concern has been dehydration .
In 2001 , Minnesota Vikings player Korey Stringer died of a  चिकित्सा कंडीशन आधारित इससे निर्जलीकरण और heatstroke  .
The death of Stringer prompted the NFL to  बदलें उनके प्रशिक्षण नीतियों  .
At each practice , every  टोली जरूर have the टोली डॉक्टर और प्रशिक्षकों on the  field ; additionally , an ambulance must be present during practices .
साथ एनएफएल प्रशिक्षण शिविरों शुरूआत  in late July , severe weather can affect practice and exhibition games .
In 2002 , a Cleveland Browns exhibition game ended  due to बिजली निकट क्लीवलैंड भूरा स्टेडियम , और  severe storms have been known to disrupt training camps .
Fans are often able to visit their favorite team 's training camp to catch an early look at  the खिलाड़ी ; प्रवेश to practices is प्रायः फ़्री or substantially कम महंगी than a खेल टिकट  , making training camp trips a popular option for fans who can not attend many games due to financial or other reasons .
NFL teams often sell souvenirs and concessions at camp sites along with offering activities and events to  मेक प्रशिक्षण शिविर a अधिक fan-friendly अनुभव  .
in कम्प्यूटिंग , a संचिका प्रणाली ( or filesystem  ) is a type of data store which can be used to store , retrieve and update a set of files .
The term could refer to the abstract data structures used to define files , or to the actual software or  फर्मवेयर components कि implement the अमूर्त विचार  .
Some file systems are used on local data storage devices ;  अन्य provide संचिका अभिगम via a संजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( e.g  . NFS , SMB , or 9P clients ) .
Some file systems are `` virtual '' ,  in कि the `` फाइलें '' supplied हैं computed on निवेदन  ( e.g . procfs ) or are merely a mapping into a different file system used as a backing store .
The file system manages access to both the  सामग्री of फाइलें और the मेटाडेटा परिचय  those files .
It is responsible for arranging storage space ;  विश्वसनीयता , दक्षता , और ट्यूनिंग साथ लिहाज़ to the शारीरिक भंडार मीडियम  are important design considerations .
William Howard Taft ( September 15 , 1857 – March 8 , 1930 ) was the 27th President of  the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1909–1913 ) और बाद the दसवाँ मुख्य  Justice of the United States ( 1921–1930 ) .
He is the only person to have  परोसा in  both of these offices .
पहले बनने अध्यक्ष , taft , a रिपब्लिकन , थी  selected to serve on the Superior Court of Cincinnati in 1887 .
In 1890 , Taft was appointed Solicitor General of the  संयुक्त राज्य और in 1891 a न्यायधीश on the संयुक्त राज्य अदालत of  Appeals for the Sixth Circuit .
In 1900 , President  विलियम mckinley नियुक्त  Taft Governor-General of the Philippines .
In 1904 , President Theodore Roosevelt  नियुक्त taft सचिव of युद्ध in an प्रयत्न to दूल्हे taft ,  then his close political ally , into his handpicked presidential successor .
Taft assumed a prominent role in problem solving , assuming on some occasions the  भूमिका of एक्टिंग सचिव of राज्य , जबकि  declining repeated offers from Roosevelt to serve on the Supreme Court .
Riding a wave of popular support for fellow  रिपब्लिकन रूज़वेल्ट , taft जीती an आसान  victory in his 1908 bid for the presidency .
In his only term , Taft 's domestic agenda emphasized trust-busting ,  सिविल सेवा सुधार , strengthening the अंतरराज्यीय  Commerce Commission , improving the performance of the postal service , and passage of the Sixteenth Amendment .
Abroad , Taft sought to further the  आर्थिक विकास of राष्ट्र in लैटिन अमेरिका और एशिया through `` डालर कूटनीति `` , और दिखाया decisiveness और  restraint in response to revolution in Mexico .
The task-oriented Taft was oblivious to the political ramifications of his decisions , often alienated his own  कुंजी constituencies , और थी overwhelmingly पराजित in उसके बोली  for a second term in the presidential election of 1912 .
In surveys of presidential scholars ,  taft is प्रायः क्रमित निकट the मध्य of सूचियाँ  of all American Presidents .
After leaving office , Taft  खर्च उसके समय in academia , मध्यस्थता  , and the search for world peace through his self-founded League to Enforce Peace .
In 1921 , after the First World War ,  अध्यक्ष वारेन G. हार्डिंग नियुक्त  Taft Chief Justice of the United States .
Taft served in this capacity until  shortly पहले उसके मौत  in 1930 .
The Ten Commandments is a 1956 epic film produced  और निर्देशित by सेसिल B. demille कि dramatized  the biblical story of the Exodus , in which the Hebrew-born Moses , an adopted Egyptian prince , becomes the deliverer of the Hebrew slaves .
It starred Charlton Heston in  the सीसे भूमिका , yul brynner as उसके adoptive bhai , pharaoh rameses ii , ऐनी बैक्सटर as  Nefretiri , Edward G. Robinson as Dathan , Yvonne De Carlo as Sephora , Debra Paget as Lilia , and John Derek as Joshua .
The supporting  डाल शामिल सर सेड्रिक hardwicke as pharaoh सेती i , नीना foch as bithiah  , Martha Scott as Yoshebel , Judith Anderson as Memnet , Vincent Price as Baka , and John Carradine as Aaron .
The film was released by Paramount Pictures in VistaVision  on अक्तूबर 5 , 1956  .
The Ten  आयतें , जिससे demille narrated  , was the last film that he directed .
He  थी नियत to सीधा the 1958 रीमेक of उसके 1938 फिल्मी the buccaneer  , but his final illness forced him to relinquish the directing chores to his son-in-law , actor Anthony Quinn .
DeMille had also planned to film the life of Lord Baden  पावेल , the संस्थापक of the स्काउट गति , साथ दाउद niven ;  this project was never realized .
The Ten  आयतें is a आंशिक  remake of DeMille 's 1923 silent film .
कुछ of the डाल और क्रू  of the 1956 version worked on the original .
It has  चूंकि महरूम remade as a  television miniseries broadcast in April 2006 .
The Ten  आयतें is एक of the सबसे financially कामयाब films कभी  made , grossing over $ 65 million at the U.S. box office .
Adjusting for inflation , this makes it the sixth  highest-grossing फिल्मी domestically , साथ an समायोजित  total of $ 1,025,730,000 in 2012 .
The box office  जालस्थल `` the संख्याएँ ''  lists the domestic gross at $ 80 million .
In 1999 , The Ten Commandments was selected for preservation in the United States National Film Registry by the  पुस्तकालयों of कॉंग्रेस as होने `` culturally , historically , or aesthetically  significant '' .
In June 2008 , the American Film Institute revealed its `` Ten Top Ten `` —the best  टेन films in टेन अमरीकी फिल्मी genres—after polling  over 1,500 people from the creative community .
the टेन आयतें थी  listed as the tenth best film in the epic genre .
The film received seven Academy Award nominations including Best Picture , and won the Academy  पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन विज़ुअल  Effects .
चार्ल्टन हेस्टन थी मनोनीत लिये a सुनहरी  Globe Award for Best Motion Picture Actor in the drama category .
Yul Brynner won the National  फलक of पुनर्विलोकन पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता लिये उसके भूमिका  as Rameses , along with his other roles in The King and I and Anastasia .
Louisville ( , or ) is a major city  और the largest नगर in the u.S. राज्य of केंटकी  and the county seat of Jefferson County .
Since 2003 , the city 's borders have been with those of the  काउंटी क्युकी of a city-county विलय  .
The city 's total  संचित जनसांख्यिकी at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी थी 741,096 ( louisville 's संतुलन कुल , 602,011  , excludes semi-autonomous towns and is the population listed in most sources and national rankings ) .
As of 2010 , the Louisville metropolitan area (  एमएसए ) था a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,307,647 रैंकिंग  42nd nationally .
The metro area includes Louisville-Jefferson County and 12 surrounding counties  , आठ in केंटकी और चार in दक्षिणी इंडियाना  ( see Geography below ) .
The Louisville  संयुक्त सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल , having a जनसांख्यिकी of  1,451,564 , includes the MSA , Hardin County and Larue County in Kentucky , and Scott County , Indiana .
An important internal shipping port in the 19th century , Louisville today is best  ज्ञात as the स्थान of the केंटकी डर्बी , the पहला of तीन सालाना  thoroughbred horse races making up the Triple Crown .
A typical experimental setup for an  aldol प्रतिक्रिया  .
Both flasks are submerged in a dry ice/acetone cooling bath ( −78  °c ) the तापमान of जिससे is होने monitored by  a thermocouple ( the wire on the left ) .
A cooling bath , in laboratory chemistry ( often but not always organic chemistry ) practice , is a liquid mixture which is used to maintain low  temperatures , typically between 13 °c और −196  °C .
These low  temperatures हैं प्रयुक्त to collect liquids बाद आसवन  , to remove solvents using a rotary evaporator , or to perform a chemical reaction below room temperature ( see : kinetic control ) .
Cooling baths are generally one of two types : ( a ) a cold fluid ( particularly liquid nitrogen , water , or even air ) — but most commonly the term refers to ( b ) a mixture of 3 components : ( 1 ) a cooling agent ( such as dry ice or water ice ) ; ( b ) a liquid 'carrier ' ( such as liquid water , ethylene glycol , acetone ,  इत्यादि . ) , जिससे हस्तांतरण ऊष्मा between the नहाना और the पोत ; ; और ( c ) an योगात्मक to गुमसुम the melting-point  of the solid/liquid system .
( A familiar example  of इस is the उपयोग of an ice/rock-salt मिश्रण  to freeze ice cream .
The phase-change of ice into liquid water requires energy ,  'pulling ' ऊष्मा इससे  the system .
Adding salt lowers the temp at which this happens , meaning more energy has to be absorbed from the  पर्यावरण in अनुक्रम  to melt the ice .
This effectively makes the ice 'colder ' — it must 'pull ' more  ऊष्मा इससे इसके  environment to become liquid . )
Eating disorders are conditions defined by abnormal eating habits that may involve either insufficient  or excessive खाना सेवन to the detriment of an व्यक्तिगत 's शारीरिक  and mental health .
Bulimia nervosa and anorexia nervosa are the  सबसे आम विशिष्ट फ़ॉर्म in the संयुक्त किंगडम  .
Other types of eating disorders include binge eating  विकार और खाने  disorder not otherwise specified .
Bulimia nervosa  is a विकार characterized by binge खाने  and purging .
Purging can include self-induce vomiting ,  over-exercising , और the उपयोग of diuretics , enemas ,  and laxatives .
Anorexia nervosa is characterized by  चरम खाना प्रतिबंध to the  point of self-starvation and excessive weight loss .
Though primarily thought of as  affecting महिलाओं ( an अनुमानित 5–10 लाख होने  affected in the U.K. ) , eating disorders affect males as well .
An estimated 10 – 15 % of people with  खाने विकार हैं males ( गोर्गान , 1999  ) .
(  an अनुमानित 1 लाख  U.K. males being affected ) .
Although eating disorders are increasing all over the world among both men and women , there is evidence to suggest that it is women in the  पश्चिमी संसार जो हैं at the उच्चतम रिस्क of विकासशील उन्हें  and the degree of westernization increases the risk .
Nearly half of all Americans personally  जान किसी साथ an खाने विकार  .
The skill to comprehend the central processes of appetite has increased tremendously since leptin was  खोजा , और the कौशल to observe the कृत्यों of the दिमाग as खूब .
Interactions between motivational , homeostatic and self-regulatory  कंट्रोल प्रक्रियाओं हैं शामिल in खाने आचरण , जिससे is a कुंजी घटक in खाने विकार  .
The precise cause of eating disorders is not entirely understood , but there  is प्रमाण कि it may be linked to अन्य चिकित्सा  conditions and situations .
Cultural idealization of  thinness और youthfulness have contributed to खाने विकार affecting  diverse populations .
One study showed that girls with ADHD have a greater chance of getting an  खाने विकार than those  not affected by ADHD .
Another study suggested that women with PTSD , especially due to sexually related  आघात , हैं अधिक संभावित to develop एनोरेक्सिया नर्वोज़ा .
One study showed that foster girls are more  संभावित to develop bulimia  nervosa .
Some  सोचो कि पीर दबाव और idealized body-types  seen in the media are also a significant factor .
Some research show that for certain people there are genetic reasons why they may be  prone to विकासशील an खाने  disorder .
Recent  अध्ययन have मिला प्रमाण a सहसंबंध  between patients with bulimia nervosa and substance use disorders .
In addition , anxiety disorders and  व्यक्तित्व विकार हैं आम आवृत्ति  with clients of eating disorders .
While proper treatment can be highly effective for many suffering from specific types of eating  विकार , the consequences of खाने विकार can be कठोर , सहित मौत ( whether इससे सीधा चिकित्सा प्रभाव of अशांत खाने  habits or from comorbid conditions such as suicidal thinking ) .
गुलामी in the संयुक्त राज्य existed इससे the जल्दी सालो of the औपनिवेशिक  period ; it was firmly established by the time the United States sought independence from Great Britain in 1776 .
However , by 1804 , all states north of the Mason and Dixon Line had either abolished slavery  outright or passed कानून लिये the क्रमिक abolition of गुलामी  .
In 1787 Congress  निषिद्ध गुलामी in the  Northwest Territory .
But slavery gained new life  in the दक्षिण साथ the कपास उद्योग  after 1800 , and expanded into the Southwest .
The nation was polarized into slave and free states along  the mason-dixon लकीर , जिससे अलग पेन्सिलवेनिया  and Maryland .
the संयुक्त राज्य और ग्रेट ब्रिटेन दोनो निषिद्ध the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  slave trade in 1808 , but the domestic trade , with sales to the Deep South , expanded dramatically , and many captives were shipped by the coastwise slave trade .
Before  the 1840s , the दक्षिण थी vigorously defending  slavery and its expansion into the territories .
In the North some abolitionists denounced it as  गुनाहगार , और numerous anti-slavery शक्तियां अस्वीकृत it  as detrimental to the rights of free men .
After failed compromises and Abraham Lincoln 's election ,  in 1861 ग्यारह स्लेव राज्य broke दूर to रूप the confederate  States of America , leading to the American Civil War .
The  संघीय सरकारी in 1862  made abolition of slavery a war goal .
In January  1863 अध्यक्ष lincoln freed स्लेव  in the Confederacy through the Emancipation Proclamation .
After  the युद्ध , the तेरहवीं amendment , प्रभावी दिसम्बर 1865  , abolished slavery throughout the entire United States , including the Border states and the Indian territories .
From the 16th to the 19th centuries , an estimated 12 million  africans यहूद shipped as स्लेव to the americas .
See  गुलामी in the  Americas .
The great majority went to the sugar  बागानों of the वेस्ट इंडीज  or Brazil , where mortality was high .
About 645,000 were brought to  कया is अभी the संयुक्त राज्य  .
By the 1860 United States Census , the slave population in the American South  था grown to चार लाख  .
Of all 1,515,605 families in the 15 slave states , nearly 400,000 held slaves (  roughly एक in चार ) , amounting to 8 % of सब अमरीकी  families .
While some slaves worked as house  बन्दों और शहरी शिल्पकार , the ग्रेट बहुमत worked on बागानों  or large farms , cultivating lucrative cash crops , such as rice , tobacco , sugar and , after 1800 , chiefly cotton .
By 1860 most slaves  यहूद  held in the Deep South , where they served in work-gangs ; two-thirds worked in cotton .
In small operations ,  वे worked साथ उनके  owners .
In large plantations  वे यहूद निर्देशित  by white paid overseers .
Under the system that became chattel slavery ( ownership of a human being , and of his/her descendants ) , a racial element was fundamental :  स्लेव यहूद अश्वेतों of अफ़्रीकी descent और स्वामित्व , लगभग universally  , by whites of European descent .
In the 17th century , Virginia ,  followed by अन्य दक्षिणी colonies , enacted विधि कि children of स्लेव माताओं  were born into slavery .
Slaves could gain freedom only by running away ( which was difficult and illegal  to do ) , or by manumission by स्वामी , जिससे थी regulated by  states , and became increasingly difficult or prohibited .
In the earliest era of chattel slavery , the colonies also  व्यवस्थित कार्य by a प्रणाली of बंधुआ मजदूर ज्ञात  as indentured servitude .
This typically lasted for several years for both poor  europeans और africans alike , to अदा  off the costs of transport to the colonies .
They contracted  लिये ऐसे इंतजाम क्युकी of  poor economies in their home countries .
Between 1680 and 1700 , as fewer Europeans migrated to the colonies , planters  began to आयात अधिक africans as स्लेव  .
Recognizing the importance of slavery , the House of  burgesses in वर्जिनिया enacted a नई स्लेव कोड in 1705 ; it संयुक्त a किस्में of विधान और added नई  provisions enforcing white supremacy in the law .
Schematic  क्रॉस खण्ड of भाग of पत्ता , जाइलम दिखाया  as red circles at figure 8 .
Xylem is one of the two types of  हस्तांतरण ऊतक in vascular पौधे ( फ्लोएम is the  other ) .
The word xylem is derived from the Greek word ξύλον (  xylon ) , अर्थ `` लकडी '' ; the best-known  xylem tissue is wood , though it is found throughout the plant .
Its basic function is to transport water , but it  भी transports कुछ nutrients  through the plant .
This clock  प्रतिनिधित्व shows कुछ of the  major units of geological time and definitive events of Earth history .
The Hadean eon  represents the समय पहले चट्टान रिकार्ड  of life on Earth ; its upper boundary is now regarded as 4.0 Ga ( billion years ago ) .
अन्य subdivisions  reflect the evolution of life ; the Archean and Proterozoic are both eons , the Palaeozoic , Mesozoic and Cenozoic are eras of the Phanerozoic eon .
The two million year  quaternary काल , the समय  of recognizable humans , is too small to be visible at this scale .
The geologic time scale is a system of chronological measurement that relates  स्तरिकी to समय , और is प्रयुक्त by geologists , paleontologists , और अन्य धरती वैज्ञानिकों to  describe the timing and relationships between events that have occurred throughout Earth 's history .
The table of  भूगर्भिक समय spans प्रस्तुत यहाँ agrees साथ the तिथियाँ और नामकरण  set forth by the International Commission on Stratigraphy standard color codes of the International Commission on Stratigraphy .
Evidence from  radiometric डेटिंग indicates कि the  Earth is about 4.54 billion years old .
the भूविज्ञान or गहन समय of धरती 's पास्ट रै महरूम व्यवस्थित  into various units according to events which took place in each period .
Different spans of time on the GTS are usually delimited by changes in the composition of strata which correspond to them , indicating major  geological or paleontological कार्यक्रम , ऐसे as द्रव्यमान  extinctions .
For example , the boundary between the Cretaceous period and  the paleogene काल is पारिभाषित by the cretaceous–paleogene extinction इवेंट , जिससे  marked the demise of the dinosaurs and many other groups of life .
Older time spans which predate the  विश्वसनीय चट्टान रिकार्ड ( पहले the proterozoic इओन  ) are defined by absolute age .
The TI-82 is a graphing calculator made by  टेक्सास यंत्र  .
The TI-82 was  designed in 1993 as a stripped bas , अधिक उपयोक्ता दोस्ताना संस्करण  of the TI-85 , and as a replacement for the TI-81 .
It was the direct predecessor  of the ti-83  .
It shares with the TI-85  a 6 mhz zilog z80  microprocessor .
Like the TI-81 , the TI-82 features a  96x64 पिक्सेल प्रदर्शक , और the कोर विशेषता  set of the TI-81 with many new features .
The cast of  वर्ण of  The King of Fighters XI .
The King of Fighters fighting game  श्रेणी , उत्पादित by snk playmore , शामिल  a wide cast of characters , some of which are taken from other SNK games .
The story takes place in a fictional  ब्रह्मांड in जिससे an सालाना  series of 3-on-3 or 4-on-4 fighting tournaments are held .
The first game in the series introduces the initial main character of the series ,  kyo kusanagi , a यंग जापानी सेनानी जो is the वारिस to a शक्तिशाली समूह  of martial artists having pyrokinetic abilities .
Kyo fights against the Kusanagi clan 's  दुश्मनों , उसके प्रतिद्वंद्वी iori yagami , और the परमेश्वर orochi और इसके इंसान  followers , among others .
The first four games in the series revolve about these fights ,  जबकि the किंग of सेनानी '99 introduces a नई स्टोरी चाप , घूमती around k ' , a यंग man जो seeks to नष्ट the रहस्यमय nests संगठन  because they kidnapped him at an early age and stripped him of his past memories , so that they could force him to be a fighter under their control .
In The King of Fighters 2003 , a new  अक्षर नामित राख crimson  enters the tournament , to steal the powers of the clans who sealed the Orochi in the past for an unknown reason .
A new group of antagonists , known as Those From the Past , also appears in the series ; they want to obtain Orochi 's power for  the purpose of giving it to उनके अनजान निपुण  .
The plot and the characters  आए इससे the yamata no orochi  legend .
There are also several characters in the games that  हैं parodies or homages to अनेक  popular anime , manga , and films .
Merchandise based on the characters has also been  released , सहित कार्रवाई आंकड़े और keychains  .
The characters have garnered  तारीफ़ इससे अनेक वीडियो खेल publications लिये  the quality of their designs and movesets .
Comments focused  on the कमी of सुधार in कुछ  of the characters , but added that the roster is greatly diverse .
Whale Wars is a weekly American documentary-style reality television series that premiered on  नवम्बर 7 , 2008 on the एनिमल ग्रह केबल चैनल .
The program follows Paul Watson , founder of the Sea Shepherd  संरक्षण समाज , as he और the क्रू सवार उनके विभिन्न बरतन harass  Japanese whalers off the coast of Antarctica .
On January 5 , 2013 ,  एनिमल ग्रह नवीनीकृत the श्रेणी  for a sixth season .
The Harpy Eagle (  harpia harpyja ) is a neotropical  species of eagle .
It is sometimes known as the American Harpy Eagle to distinguish it from the Papuan Eagle  जिससे is sometimes ज्ञात as the नई  Guinea Harpy Eagle or Papuan Harpy Eagle .
It is the largest and most powerful raptor found  in the americas , और among  the largest extant species of eagles in the world .
It usually inhabits tropical lowland  rainforests in the  upper ( emergent ) canopy layer .
Destruction of its  प्राकृतिक आवास रै देखी it vanish  from many parts of its former range , and it is nearly extirpated in Central America .
Biological classification , or scientific  वर्गीकरण in जीवविज्ञान , is a विधि of वैज्ञानिक taxonomy प्रयुक्त to समूह और  categorize organisms into groups such as genus or species .
These groups are known as  taxa ( एकवचन : टैक्सोन  ) .
Modern biological classification has its root in the work of Carolus Linnaeus , who grouped  प्रजाति according to साझा शारीरिक विशेषताएँ  .
These groupings have since been revised to improve consistency with the Darwinian  principle of आम descent  .
With the introduction of the cladistic method in the late 20th  सदी , phylogenetic taxonomy in जिससे जीवों हैं grouped आधारित purely on inferred  evolutionary relatedness , ignoring morphological similarity , has become common in some areas of biology .
Molecular phylogenetics , which uses DNA sequences as data , has also driven many recent  revisions और is संभावित to continue  doing so .
Biological  वर्गीकरण belongs to the विज्ञान  of biological systematics .
लेनन 's हस्ताक्षर
John Winston Ono Lennon , ( born John Winston Lennon ; 9 October 1940 – 8 December 1980 ) was an English musician , singer and songwriter who rose to worldwide fame as a founder member  of the बीटल्स , एक of the सबसे commercially कामयाब और critically acclaimed  acts in the history of popular music .
With Paul McCartney , he formed one of the most celebrated songwriting  partnerships of the 20th सदी  .
Born and raised in Liverpool , as a teenager Lennon became involved in the  skiffle craze ; उसके पहला बैंड , the quarrymen  , evolved into the Beatles in 1960 .
As the group disintegrated towards the end of the decade , Lennon embarked on a solo career that produced the critically  acclaimed एल्बम जॉन lennon/plastic ओनो बैंड और imagine , और iconic गीतों ऐसे as `` दे सलाम a मौका `` और `` imagine  `` .
After his marriage to Yoko Ono in 1969 , he changed his  नाम to जॉन ओनो लेनन  .
Lennon disengaged himself from the music business in 1975 to devote time to  उठाने उसके शिशु बेटे शॉन , लकिन re-emerged साथ ओनो in 1980 साथ  the new album Double Fantasy .
He was  murdered तीन सप्ताह बाद  its release .
Lennon revealed a rebellious nature and  acerbic wit in उसके म्यूज़िक , लिखने , drawings , on फिल्मी और in साक्षात्कार  .
Controversial through his political and peace activism , he moved to New York City in 1971 ,  जहाँ उसके आलोचना of the वियतनाम युद्ध resulted in a lengthy attempt by रिचर्ड निक्सन 's प्रशासन to निर्वासन उसे , जबकि कुछ of उसके  songs were adopted as anthems by the anti-war movement .
As of 2012 , Lennon 's solo album sales in the United States exceed 14 million units  , और as लेखक , co-writer or यजमान , he is जिम्मेदार  for 25 number-one singles on the US Hot 100 chart .
In 2002 , a BBC  पोल on the 100 महानतम britons voted उसे आठवीं  , and in 2008 , Rolling Stone ranked him the fifth-greatest singer of all time .
He was posthumously inducted into  the songwriters हॉल of कीर्ति in 1987  and into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1994 .
Statue of  rip वैन winkle in  Irvington , New York , not far from `` Sunnyside `` , the home of Washington Irving
`` Rip Van Winkle '' is a short story by American author Washington Irving  प्रकाशित in 1819 , as खूब as the नाम of the स्टोरी  's fictional protagonist .
Written  जबकि इरविंग थी जीना in बर्मिंघम  , England , it was part of a collection entitled The Sketch Book of Geoffrey Crayon .
Although the story is set in New York 's  catskill kyu , इरविंग  later admitted , `` When I wrote the story , I had never been on the Catskills . ''
Throughout the fifty-five year history of  the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , अनेक significant रिकॉर्ड have महरूम  set .
This page only includes  the प्रतिस्पर्धी पुरस्कार जीती  by various artists .
This does not include the various special awards that are presented by the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences such as Lifetime  उपलब्धि पुरस्कार , trustees पुरस्कार  , Technical Awards or Legend Awards .
The page however  करता शामिल अन्य non-performance सम्बन्धित grammys ( ज्ञात as the  Craft & Production Fields ) that may have been presented to the artist ( s ) .
Pee-wee Herman is a comic fictional character  निर्मित और portrayed  by American comedian Paul Reubens .
He is best known for his two television  श्रेणी और फिल्मी श्रेणी दौरान the 1980s  .
The childlike Pee-wee Herman character developed as a  स्टेज अधिनियम कि जल्दी led to an एचबीओ खास in 1981  .
As the stage performance gained further  लोकप्रियता , reubens took the अक्षर to गति चित्र साथ pee-wee 's बिग एडवेंचर in 1985  , toning down the adult innuendo for the appeal of children .
This paved the way for Pee-wee  's playhouse , an एमी पुरस्कार जीतना children  's series that ran on CBS from 1986-1991 .
Another  फिल्मी , बिग शीर्ष pee-wee  , was released in 1988 .
Due to negative media attention following a scandal in 1991 , Reubens decided to shelve his alter ego during the  1990s , और तब धीरे resurrected it दौरान  the following decade .
It was  at कि समय कि  Reubens addressed plans to write a new Pee-wee film , Pee-wee 's Playhouse : The Movie .
In June 2007 , Reubens appeared as Pee-wee Herman for the first  समय चूंकि 1991 at स्पाइक tv 's  Guys ' Choice Awards .
That '70s Show is an American television period sitcom that centers on the lives of a group of  teenage मित्रों जीना in the fictional suburban कस्बा of पाइंट प्लेस , विस्कॉन्सिन  , from May 17 , 1976 , to December 31 , 1979 .
It  debuted on the फॉक्स टेलीविज़न संजाल , पहला airing on अगस्त 23 ,  1998 , running for eight consecutive seasons , and concluding with the 200th episode on May 18 , 2006 .
The main teenage cast members were Topher Grace , Mila Kunis , Ashton  कूचर , डैनी masterson , लौरा prepon , और wilmer  Valderrama .
The main adult cast  सदस्यों यहूद डेबरा jo rupp , kurtwood  Smith , Don Stark and , during the first three seasons , Tanya Roberts .
Kansas ( ) is a U.S. state  स्तिथ in the midwestern संयुक्त  States .
It  is नामित बाद the कान्सास नदी जिससे बहती through it ,  which in turn was named after the Kansa Native American tribe , which inhabited the area .
The  जनजाति 's नाम ( natively kką : ze ) is प्रायः कहा to औसत `` लोगों of the  wind '' or `` people of the south wind , '' although this was probably not the term 's original meaning .
Residents of  कान्सास हैं पुकारा ``  Kansans . ''
लिये हज़ारों of सालो कया is अभी  Kansas was home to numerous and diverse Native American tribes .
Tribes in the Eastern part of the state generally lived in villages  साथ the नदी घाटियों  .
Tribes in the  पश्चिमी भाग  of the state were semi- nomadic and hunted large herds of bison .
Kansas was first settled by European Americans in the 1830s , but the pace of settlement accelerated in the  1850s , in the midst of राजनैतिक युद्धों over the गुलामी समस्या .
When officially  खोली to उपनिवेश by the u.S. सरकारी in 1854 , abolitionist free-staters इससे  New England and pro-slavery settlers from neighboring Missouri rushed to the territory to determine if Kansas would become a free state or a slave state .
Thus , the area was a hotbed of violence and chaos in its early  दिनों as ये शक्तियां collided , और थी ज्ञात as  Bleeding Kansas .
The abolitionists eventually prevailed and on January 29  , 1861 , कान्सास डाला the संघ as a फ़्री राज्य  .
After the Civil  युद्ध , the जनसांख्यिकी of कान्सास grew rapidly , जब  waves of immigrants turned the prairie into farmland .
आज , कान्सास is एक of the सबसे उत्पादक agricultural राज्य , producing  high yields of wheat , sorghum and sunflowers .
Kansas is  the 15th सबसे extensive और the 33rd  most populous of the 50 United States .
Psychology is an academic  और लागू अनुशासन  that involves the scientific study of mental functions and behaviors .
Psychology has the immediate goal of understanding individuals and groups by both  establishing सामान्य सिद्धान्त और researching विशिष्ट मामले , और by  many accounts it ultimately aims to benefit society .
In this field , a professional or researcher is called  a मनोवैज्ञानिक और can be वर्गीकृत as a सोशल , behavioral  , or cognitive scientist .
Psychologists attempt to understand the role  of दिमागी कृत्यों in व्यक्तिगत और सोशल बर्ताव , जबकि भी exploring  the physiological and neurobiological processes that underlie certain cognitive functions and behaviors .
psychologists explore अवधारणाओं ऐसे as बोध  , cognition , attention , emotion , phenomenology , motivation , brain functioning , personality , behavior , and interpersonal relationships .
Psychologists of  विविध धारियाँ भी consider  the unconscious mind .
Psychologists employ empirical methods to infer causal and  correlational संबंध  between psychosocial variables .
In  जोड , or in विपक्ष , to employing  empirical and deductive methods , some—especially clinical and counseling psychologists—at times rely upon symbolic interpretation and other inductive techniques .
Psychology has been described as a `` hub  विज्ञान '' , साथ मनोवैज्ञानिक निष्कर्षों linking to शोध और perspectives इससे the सोशल sciences  , natural sciences , medicine , and the humanities , such as philosophy .
While psychological  ज्ञान is प्रायः लागू to the मूल्यांकन और उपचार of दिमागी स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं , it is भी  directed towards understanding and solving problems in many different spheres of human activity .
The  बहुमत of psychologists हैं शामिल in कुछ दयालु of therapeutic  role , practicing in clinical , counseling , or school settings .
Many do scientific research on a wide range of topics related to mental processes and behavior , and typically work in university psychology departments or  सिखा in अन्य अकादमिक जमावट ( e.g. ,  medical schools , hospitals ) .
Some are employed in industrial and organizational settings , or in other areas such as human development and aging , sports , health , and  the मीडिया , as खूब as in forensic छानबीन  and other aspects of law .
Thomas Jefferson ( April 13 , 1743 (  अप्रैल 2 , 1743 o.S. ) – जुलाई 4 , 1826 ) थी an अमरीकी founding  Father , the principal author of the Declaration of Independence ( 1776 ) and the third President of the United States ( 1801–1809 ) .
At the beginning of the American Revolution , he served in the Continental Congress ,  representing वर्जिनिया और तब परोसा as a wartime राज्यपाल of  Virginia ( 1779–1781 ) .
Just after the war  ended , इससे mid-1784 जेफरसन परोसा as a राजनयिक , stationed  in Paris .
In May 1785 , he became the United  राज्य मंत्री  to France .
जेफरसन थी the पहला  United States Secretary of State ( 1790–1793 ) serving under President George Washington .
With his close friend James Madison he organized the  democratic-republican पार्टी , और subsequently resigned इससे वॉशिंगटन 's कैबिनेट  .
Elected Vice President in  1796 , जब he आए in दूसरी to जॉन एडम्स of the federalists , जेफरसन opposed  Adams and with Madison secretly wrote the Kentucky and Virginia Resolutions , which attempted to nullify the Alien and Sedition Acts .
Elected president in what Jefferson called the Revolution of 1800 , he oversaw the purchase of the vast Louisiana Territory from France ( 1803 ) , and sent  the लुईस और क्लार्क expedition  ( 1804–1806 ) to explore the new west .
His second term was beset with troubles at home , such as the failed treason trial of his former  वाइस अध्यक्ष  Aaron Burr .
With escalating trouble with  ब्रिटेन जो थी चुनौतीपूर्ण अमरीकी neutrality और threatening शिपिंग at समुद्र , he आजमाया  economic warfare with his embargo laws which only damaged American trade .
In 1803 , President Jefferson initiated a process of Indian tribal removal and relocation to the Louisiana  territory वेस्ट of the मिसिसिपी नदी  , in order to open lands for eventual American settlers .
A leader in the Enlightenment , Jefferson was a polymath who  spoke पाँच भाषाएं धड़ल्ले और थी deeply दिलचस्पी in विज्ञान , आविष्कार , वास्तुकला , धर्म और दर्शनशास्त्र , रूचि  that led him to the founding of the University of Virginia after his presidency .
He designed his own  विशाल mansion on a 5,000 एकड़  plantation near Charlottesville , Virginia , which he named Monticello .
While not a notable orator , Jefferson was  a skilled लेखक और corresponded साथ अनेक influential लोगों  in America and Europe throughout his adult life .
Though  जेफरसन स्वामित्व अनेक स्लेव , he opposed  the institution all his life and consequently treated and took care of them very well and expected them to work no more than free farmers .
चूंकि 1802 इतिहासकारों और अन्य have महरूम विभाजित over the विवाद  of whether Jefferson was the father of one or more children belonging to Sally Hemings , a slave at Monticello . ''
Historians are  भी in असहमति साथ कैसा  much Jefferson was committed to the anti-slavery cause .
In 1807 ,  अध्यक्ष जेफरसन हस्ताक्षरित into विधि a विधेयक कि बैन  the importation of slaves into the United States .
After Martha Jefferson , his wife of eleven years , died in 1782 , Jefferson remained a widower for  the बाकी of उसके जीवन ; उनके विवाह उत्पादित छह children , of जिसको दो बच  to adulthood .
Though Jefferson  रै महरूम criticized by अनेक  modern day scholars over the issue of slavery , he remains rated as one of the greatest U.S. presidents .
`` Sun  नगर '' is a 1985 विरोध सोंग लिखा by स्टीवन वैन zandt , उत्पादित  by Van Zandt and Arthur Baker and recorded by Artists United Against Apartheid to convey opposition to the South African policy of apartheid .
The primary means of  कि विपक्ष is to घोषित कि सब the कलाकारों शामिल होता इंकार कोई और सब offers to perform at सूर्य नगर , a रिज़ॉर्ट जिससे थी  located in Bantustan of Bophuthatswana , one of a number of internationally unrecognized supposed `` independent '' states created by the South African government to forcibly relocate its black population .

Bill  रसेल जीती 11 championships  with the Boston Celtics .
इस is a सूची of एनबीए खिलाड़ी  with most championships won as a player .
The National Basketball  संघ ( एनबीए ) is a  major professional basketball league in North America .
It was founded in 1946 as  the बास्केट  Association of America ( BAA ) .
The league adopted  इसके वर्तमान नाम at the प्रारंभ of the जब  it merged with the National Basketball League ( NBL ) .
The NBA Finals is  the चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी लिये the  NBA and the conclusion of the sport 's postseason .
the जीतना टोली of the श्रेणी  receives the Larry O'Brien Championship Trophy .
Players from the winning team usually receive championship rings  इससे the टोली honoring उनके योगदान  .
However , in some rare occasion ,  the टीमों opted to दिया अन्य commemorative वस्तुएं  , such as wrist watches , instead of rings .
The number of championships won by NBA superstars is often used  as a मापन of उनके विशालता  .
Boston Celtics center  विधेयक रसेल holds the रिकार्ड लिये the सबसे एनबीए championships  won with 11 titles during his 13-year playing career .
He won his first championship  साथ the बोस्टन सेल्टिक्स in  his rookie year .
Afterwards , he went on to  जीत 10 championships in the अगला 12 सालो , सहित  eight consecutive championships from 1959 to 1966 .
He won  the पिछला दो championships in  1968 and 1969 as player-coach .
Russell 's teammate , Sam Jones , won 10 championships  इससे 1959 to 1969 , the दूसरी सबसे  in NBA history .
Four Celtics players , Tom Heinsohn , K. C. Jones , Satch Sanders and John  havlicek , जीती आठ championships  each .
Two other  सेल्टिक्स , जिम loscutoff  and Frank Ramsey , won seven championships each .

Jordan and Pippen are  सदस्यों of the शिकागो bulls टोली जो जीती तीन लगातार  championships twice in the 1990s .
Robert Horry and  जॉन salley हैं the तभी खिलाड़ी to have  won the championships with three different teams .
Horry won seven championships with the Houston Rockets , the Los Angeles Lakers and the San Antonio  स्पर्स , जबकि salley जीती चार championships साथ the डेट्रॉयट  Pistons , the Bulls and the Lakers .

Accuracy indicates proximity of measurement results to the true value , precision to  the repeatability , or reproducibility  of the measurement
In the  फ़ील्ड of विज्ञान , अभियान्त्रिकी , उद्योग ,  and statistics , the accuracy of a measurement system is the degree of closeness of measurements of a quantity to that quantity 's actual ( true ) value .
The  परिशुद्धता of a मापन प्रणाली , भी पुकारा reproducibility or  repeatability , is the degree to which repeated measurements under unchanged conditions show the same results .
हालांकि the दो शब्द reproducibility और repeatability  can be synonymous in colloquial use , they are deliberately contrasted in the context of the scientific method .
A measurement system can be accurate  लकिन नहीं precise , precise लकिन नहीं सटीक  , neither , or both .
For example , if an experiment contains a systematic error , then increasing  the नमूना आकार generally increases परिशुद्धता लकिन करता नहीं  improve accuracy .
The result would be a  सतत yet inaccurate स्ट्रिंग of परिणाम इससे  the flawed experiment .
Eliminating the systematic error improves accuracy but does  नहीं बदलें  precision .
A measurement  प्रणाली is designated  valid if it is both accurate and precise .
Related terms include bias ( non- random or  निर्देशित प्रभाव caused by a फ़ैक्टर or कारकों unrelated to the  independent variable ) and error ( random variability ) .
The terminology  is भी लागू to अप्रत्यक्ष measurements—that  is , values obtained by a computational procedure from observed data .
In addition to accuracy and precision , measurements  may भी have a मापन रेज़ोल्यूशन , जिससे is the  smallest change in the underlying physical quantity that produces a response in the measurement .
In the case of full reproducibility , such as when rounding a  क्रमांक to a representable फ्लोटिंग पाइंट क्रमांक , the शब्द परिशुद्धता रै  a meaning not related to reproducibility .
For example , in the IEEE  754-2008 मानक it अर्थात् the क्रमांक of बिट्स in the significand , so it is प्रयुक्त as a  measure for the relative accuracy with which an arbitrary number can be represented .
Fuck in its literal meaning refers to the  अधिनियम of यौन मैथुन  .
It is an English word  कि is प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a profanity  , either to denote disdain or as an intensifier .
The origin of  the शब्द is अस्पष्ट  .
It is usually considered to be first  attested to around 1475 , लकिन it may be  considerably older .
In modern usage , fuck and its derivatives ( such as fucker and fucking ) can be used in the  स्थिति of a संज्ञा , a क्रिया , an क्रियाशील  or an adverb .
There are many common phrases which make use of the word , as well as  a क्रमांक of यौगिकों incorporating it , ऐसे as motherfucker  .
Animated , color-coded map showing  the विभिन्न महाद्वीपों और  regions .
Depending on the convention and model ,  कुछ महाद्वीपों  may be consolidated or subdivided : for example , Eurasia is most often subdivided into Europe and Asia ( red shades ) , while North and South America are sometimes recognized as one American continent ( green shades ) .
A  महाद्वीप is एक of  several very large landmasses on Earth .
They are generally identified by convention rather than any strict criteria , with up to seven regions commonly  regarded as continents—they हैं ( इससे largest  in size to smallest ) : Asia , Africa , North America , South America , Antarctica , Europe , and Australia .
In geology , continents are  वर्णित by अर्थात् of  tectonic plates .
Plate  विवर्तनिकी is the प्रक्रम और पढ़ाई  of the movement , collision and division of continents , earlier known as continental drift .

It stars Laurence Fishburne , Djimon Hounsou , Derek  ल्यूक , meagan शुभ , और larenz टेट और is लिखा और निर्देशित by reggie  Rock Bythewood .
It also features Lisa  bonet , ऑरलैंडो जोन्स  , Kid Rock and Vanessa Bell Calloway .
For the  स्टील पैंथर सोंग  , see Feel the Steel .
Community property is a marital property regime that originated in  सिविल विधि jurisdictions और is अभी भी  found in some common law jurisdictions .
The states of the United States that recognize community property are primarily in the West ; it was inherited from Mexico 's ganancial community system , which itself was  inherited इससे स्पेनी विधि ( a रोमन -derived सिविल विधि प्रणाली ) और ultimately इससे the visigoths  .
While under Spanish rule  louisiana अपनाया the ganancial जातियाँ प्रणाली of acquests और  gains , which replaced the traditional French community of movables and acquests in its civil law system .
Map of the United  राज्य साथ जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी राज्य highlighted  in red .
In addition to the highlighted states ,  अलास्का is a पृथक प्रॉपर्टी राज्य कि permits युगल  to opt into a community property arrangement .
In a community property jurisdiction , most property  acquired दौरान the विवाह ( मगर लिये उपहार or inheritances  ) —the community , or communio bonorum—is owned jointly by both spouses and is divided upon divorce , annulment or death .
Joint ownership is automatically presumed by law in the absence  of विशिष्ट प्रमाण कि होता पाइंट to  a contrary conclusion for a particular piece of property .
Division of  जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी may लो प्लेस by  item , by splitting all items or by value .
In some jurisdictions , such as California , a 50/50 division of community property is strictly mandated by  statute , अर्थ कि the फ़ोकस तब शिफ्ट to whether particular वस्तुएं हैं to  be classified as community or separate property .
in अन्य jurisdictions , ऐसे as टेक्सास , a तलाक अदालत may डिक्री an `` निष्पक्ष वितरण ``  of community property , which may result in an unequal division of such .
In non-community property states  प्रॉपर्टी may be विभाजित by  equitable distribution .
Generally speaking , the property that each partner brings into the marriage or receives by gift ,  bequest or मक्कारी दौरान विवाह is पुकारा पृथक प्रॉपर्टी ( i.e.  , not community property ) .
See  प्रभाग of प्रॉपर्टी  .
Division of community  debts may नहीं be the वही as प्रभाग  of community property .
For example , in  कैलिफ़ोर्निया , जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी is जरूरी to be विभाजित  `` equally '' while community debt is required to be divided `` equitably '' .
Property that is owned by one spouse before the marriage is the separate property of that spouse ,  जबतक the प्रॉपर्टी is `` transmuted '' into जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी  .
The rules for this vary  इससे क्षेत्राधिकार  to jurisdiction .
the ड्यूक और duchess  of Cambridge waving to the crowd at The Mall shortly after the wedding .
the विवाह of प्रिंस विलियम  , Duke of Cambridge , and Catherine Middleton took place on 29 April 2011 at Westminster Abbey in London .
The groom , Prince William , Duke of Cambridge  , is the ज्येष्ठ बेटे of चार्ल्स , प्रिंस of वेल्स , और is दूसरी in the लकीर  of succession to the British Throne and the thrones of fifteen other Commonwealth realms .
The bride ,  कैथरीन `` केट '' मिडलटन is the  eldest of three children of Michael and Carole Middleton of Bucklebury , Berkshire .
The Dean of Westminster , John Hall , presided at the service ; the Archbishop of Canterbury , Rowan Williams , conducted the marriage ; Richard Chartres , the Bishop of  लंदन , preached the उपदेश ; और a पढना थी दिए by the बहू  's brother , James .
William 's best  man थी उसके bhai , प्रिंस हैरी , जबकि  the bride 's sister , Pippa , was maid of honour .
The ceremony was attended by the bride 's and groom 's families , as well as many foreign  रॉयल्स , राजनयिकों , और the युगल  's chosen personal guests .
बाद the रस्म , the युगल बना the परंपरागत  appearance on the balcony of Buckingham Palace .
as प्रिंस विलियम थी नहीं the वारिस apparent to the सिंहासन  , the wedding was not a full state occasion and many details were left to the couple to decide , such as much of the guest list of about 1,900 .
प्रिंस विलियम  and Kate Middleton met in 2001 .
Their engagement on 20  अक्तूबर 2010 थी घोषित  on 16 November 2010 .
The build-up to the wedding and the occasion itself  आकर्षित much मीडिया ध्यान , होने compared in अनेक तरीके साथ the 1981 विवाह  of William 's parents .
The occasion was a public holiday in the United Kingdom and featured many ceremonial  पहलुओं , सहित उपयोग of the राज्य carriages  and roles for the Foot Guards and Household Cavalry .
Events were held around the Commonwealth to mark the wedding ; organisations and hotels held events across Canada , over 5,000 street  पार्टियों यहूद आयोजित throughout the संयुक्त किंगडम , और एक लाख लोगों lined  the route between Westminster Abbey and Buckingham Palace .
The  रस्म थी viewed सजीव by tens of लाखो अधिक  around the world , including 72 million on the YouTube Royal Channel .
In the United Kingdom ,  टेलीविज़न ऑडियंस peaked at 26.3 लाख दर्शक  , with a total of 36.7 million watching part of the coverage .
Vanessa Joy Lachey ( née Minnillo ; born November 9 , 1980 ) is an  अमरीकी टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व , टेलीविज़न मेजबान , फ़ैशन  model , and actress .
