A hand ( med . /  lat . : manus , pl . manūs ) is a prehensile , multi-  fingered extremity located at the end of an arm or forelimb of primates and humans , chimpanzees , monkeys , and lemurs .
A few other vertebrates such as the koala (  जिससे रै दो opposable thumbs on प्रत्येक `` हाथ '' और फिंगरप्रिंट remarkably  similar to human fingerprints ) are often described as having either `` hands '' or `` paws '' on their front limbs .
Hands are the main structures for physically manipulating the environment ,  प्रयुक्त लिये दोनो सकल मोटर कौशल ( ऐसे as grasping a विशाल ऑब्जेक्ट ) और ठीक मोटर कौशल ( ऐसे as picking  up a small pebble ) .
The fingertips contain some of the densest areas of nerve endings on the body , are the richest  सोर्स of tactile प्रतिक्रिया , और have the महानतम positioning काबिलियत of the देह ; यूँ  the sense of touch is intimately associated with hands .
Like other paired organs ( eyes , feet , legs ) , each hand is dominantly controlled by the opposing brain hemisphere , so that handedness , or the preferred hand choice for single-handed activities such as writing with a pencil , reflects individual  दिमाग कामकाज  .
Some evolutionary anatomists use the term hand to refer to the appendage of digits on the forelimb more generally — for example , in the  कॉन्टेक्स्ट of whether the तीन अंक of the बर्ड हाथ शामिल the वही समजात घाटा of दो अंक as in the डायनासोर  hand .
The human hand has 27 bones ,  नहीं सहित the sesamoid हड्डियों  which number varies between people .
14 of which are the  phalanges ( proximal  , intermediate and distal ) of the fingers .
The metacarpals are the bones that connects the  उंगलियाँ और the कलाई .
Each human hand  रै 5 metacarpals और 8  carpal bones .
Too Cool was a  पेशेवर कुश्ती टैग टोली और पूर्व गुट सबसे notably क्रियाशील  in World Wrestling Federation/Entertainment between 1998 and 2001 and for a short time in 2004 .
Basic digital  सचेतक क्लॉक बगैर  a radio .
The mark in the top-left of  the प्रदर्शक indicates कि the समय  is 4:00pm , not 4:00am .
A 1969 radio  सचेतक क्लॉक ( सोनी digimatic 8fc-59w  ) with an early mechanical-digital display .
A digital clock is a type of clock that displays the  समय डिजिटली , i.e . in numerals or अन्य प्रतीकों , as opposed to an एनालॉग क्लॉक  , where the time is indicated by the positions of rotating hands .
Digital clocks are often associated with electronic drives , but the `` digital '' description  refers तभी to the प्रदर्शक , नहीं to the ड्राइव यांत्रिकी .
( Both analog and digital clocks can  be चलित either mechanically or electronically , लकिन `` घटीयंत्र '' mechanisms साथ डिजिटल  displays are rare . )
The biggest  डिजिटल क्लॉक is the lichtzeitpegel ( `` लाइट समय स्तर  '' ) on the television tower Rheinturm Düsseldorf , Germany .
Family Guy creator  सेठ macfarlane भी provides the आवाज़ें of  Peter Griffin , Stewie Griffin , Brian Griffin , and Glenn Quagmire .
Family Guy is an American animated sitcom that features five  प्रमुख आवाज़ अभिनेताओं , और numerous नियमित डाल और पुनरावर्ती  guest stars .
The principal  आवाज़ डाल  consists of show creator Seth MacFarlane , Alex Borstein , Seth Green , Mila Kunis ( who replaced Lacey Chabert after the first season ) and Mike Henry and now , the new actor Beau Osborne .
Recurring voice actors include Patrick Warburton , Adam West , John G. Brennan , Nicole Sullivan and Jennifer Tilly  , और repeat अतिथि सितारों शामिल फिलिस diller , चार्ल्स durning , फटाफट limbaugh  , and Phil LaMarr .
Many cast members provide  आवाज़ें लिये अनेक  characters .
The voice actors , in portraying the various character personalities on the  दिखाएँ , चित्रण प्रेरणा इससे हस्तियाँ और पॉप  culture .
Family Guy characters have been played  by अधिक than एक कर्ता , बाद सदस्यों of the दिखाएँ बाएँ the  series or had conflicting obligations .
Kunis was nominated for an Annie Award for voicing Meg Griffin  in the ऋतु 5 एपीसोड `` मुश्किल विधिक `` और macfarlane रै भी जीती an एमी पुरस्कार लिये बकाया voice-over प्रदर्शन  and an Annie Award for Best Voice Acting in an Animated Television Production , though no other cast member has won an award for their work on the series .
The five sets of the board game Monopoly depicted here show the evolution of the game  's कलाकृति और डिजाइन in  the United States from 1935–2005 .
The history of  the फलक खेल एकाधिकार  can be traced back to the early 20th century .
The earliest known design was by the American , Elizabeth Magie , patented in 1904  लकिन मौजूदा as जल्दी as 1902 .
Magie 's original intent was to publish a board game to illustrate an economic principle ,  namely the georgist अवधारणा of a सिंगल  land value tax .
A  श्रेणी of फलक खेल यहूद विकसित इससे 1906 through  the 1930s that involved the buying and selling of land and the development of that land .
By 1934 , a board game had been  निर्मित much जैसे the संस्करण of एकाधिकार बेची by पार्कर भाइयो और इसके सम्बन्धित  companies through the rest of the 20th century , and into the 21st .
Several people , mostly in the Midwestern  संयुक्त राज्य और निकट  the East Coast , contributed to the game 's design and evolution .
By the 1970s , the idea that the game had been created solely by Charles Darrow had become popular folklore ; it  थी मुद्रित in the खेल 's निर्देश लिये अनेक सालो , in a 1974 किताब devoted to एकाधिकार , और थी cited  in a general book about toys even as recently as 2007 .
Even a guide  to परिवार खेल प्रकाशित लिये रीडर 's डाइजेस्ट in 2003 तभी दिया  credit to Darrow and Elizabeth Magie , erroneously stating that Magie 's original game was created in the 1800s , and not acknowledging any of the game 's development between Magie 's creation of the game , and the eventual publication by Parker Brothers .
Also in the 1970s , Professor Ralph Anspach , who had himself published a board game intended to illustrate the principles of both  monopolies और विश्वास busting , लड़ा पार्कर भाइयो और इसके तब जनक कम्पनी , सामान्य मिलों , over the trademarks  of the Monopoly board game .
Through the research of Anspach and others , much of the  जल्दी इतिहास of the खेल  was `` rediscovered '' .
Anspach confronted Maxine Brady , author of the 1974  किताब the एकाधिकार किताब : रणनीति और tactics of the संसार 's सबसे लोकप्रिय  Game over the actual history of the game on Barry Farber 's New York City talk show in 1975 .
Because of the lengthy court process , including appeals , the legal status  of पार्कर भाइयो ' trademarks on the खेल थी नहीं settled  until 1985 .
The game 's name remains a registered trademark of Parker  भाइयो , as do इसके विशिष्ट डिज़ाइन तत्व  .
At the conclusion of the court case , the game 's logo and graphic design  तत्व became भाग of a larger एकाधिकार ब्रांड , licensed by पार्कर  Brothers ' parent companies onto a variety of items through the present day .
Despite the `` rediscovery '' of the board game 's early history in the 1970s and 1980s , and several books and journal articles on the subject , Hasbro ( Parker Brothers  ' वर्तमान जनक कम्पनी ) किया नहीं acknowledge कोई of the खेल 's इतिहास पहले चार्ल्स darrow on इसके आधिकारिक एकाधिकार जालस्थल  as recently as June 2012 .
Nor did Hasbro acknowledge anyone other than Darrow in materials  प्रकाशित or प्रायोजित by उन्हें , at तनिक as recently  as 2006 .
International tournaments , first held in the early 1970s ,  continue to the उपस्थित , साथ the अगला संसार चैंपियनशिप  likely scheduled for 2013 .
Starting in 1985 , a new generation of spin-off board games  और कार्ड खेल appeared on दोनो पहलू of the अटलांटिक  Ocean .
In 1989 , the  पहला of अनेक वीडियो खेल  and computer game editions was published .
Since 1994 , many official variants of the game , based on locations other  than अटलांटिक नगर , नई जर्सी ( the आधिकारिक u.S. सेटिंग ) or लंदन ( the आधिकारिक राष्ट्रमंडल  setting , excepting Canada ) , have been published by Hasbro or its licensees .
In 2008 , Hasbro permanently changed the color scheme and some of the  gameplay of the मानक u.s . संस्करण of the खेल to मैच the uk संस्करण , हालांकि the u.S. मानक संस्करण maintains the अटलांटिक  City property names .
Hasbro also modified the official logo to give the `` Mr . Monopoly '' character a 3-D  computer-generated dekh , जिससे रै चूंकि महरूम अपनाया by licensees usaopoly , जीतना चालें और  Winning Solutions .
And Hasbro has also been including the Speed Die , introduced in 2006 's Monopoly : The Mega Edition by Winning Moves Games , in versions produced directly by  हास्ब्रो ( ऐसे as the 2009 चैंपियनशिप  Edition ) .
In baseball , a sacrifice fly is  a batted बॉल कि  satisfies four criteria:
There are fewer than  दो outs जब the  ball is hit .
The ball is hit to the outfield ( fair or foul ) ,  or to infield  foul territory .
The batter is put out because an outfielder ( or an infielder running in the outfield , or foul territory ) catches the ball on the fly ( alternatively if the batter would have  महरूम आउट if नहीं लिये an गलती or if the outfielder बूंदें the बॉल और another  runner is put out ) .
A runner who is already  on आधार स्कोर on the  play .
It is called a `` sacrifice '' fly because the batter presumably intends to cause a teammate to  स्कोर a चलाएं , जबकि sacrificing उसके अपना क्षमता  to do so .
Minnesota ( ) is a U.S. state  स्तिथ in the midwestern संयुक्त  States .
Minnesota was carved out of the  पूर्वी हाफ of the मिनेसोटा territory  and admitted to the Union as the 32nd state on May 11 , 1858 .
Known as the `` Land of 10,000 Lakes '' , the state 's name  आता इससे a डकोटा शब्द लिये `` sky-tinted  water '' .
Those waters , together with forests , parks , and wilderness areas , offer residents and tourists a variety of  बाहरी recreational अवसर  .
Minnesota is the 12th most extensive and  the 21st सबसे populous of the  U.S. states .
Nearly 60 % of its residents live in the Minneapolis–Saint Paul metropolitan area ( known  as the `` जुड़वा शहरों '' ) , the बीच of परिवहन , कारोबार , उद्योग  , education , government and home to an internationally known arts community .
the शेष of the राज्य consists of पश्चिमी prairies अभी दिए over  to intensive agriculture ; deciduous forests in the southeast , now cleared , farmed and settled ; and the less populated North Woods , used for mining , forestry , and recreation .
Minnesota is known for its relatively mixed  सोशल और राजनैतिक orientations ,  and has a high rate of civic participation and voter turnout .
Minnesota ranks among the healthiest  राज्य , और रै a अत्यधिक साक्षर जनसांख्यिकी  .
The large majority of  निवासियों हैं of scandinavian  and German descent .
The state is known as a center  of scandinavian अमरीकी  culture .
Ethnic diversity has increased in  हाल दशकों .
Substantial influxes of Asian , African , and Latin American immigrants have joined the descendants of European  settlers और the  original Native American inhabitants .
अनुदान हैं non-repayable निधि by एक पार्टी ( ग्रान्ट makers ) , प्रायः a सरकारी विभाग  , corporation , foundation or trust , to a , often ( but not always ) a nonprofit entity , educational institution , business or an individual .
In order to receive a grant , some form of `` Grant  लिखने '' प्रायः referred to as either a प्रस्ताव  or an application is usually required .
Most grants are made to fund a specific project and  आवश्यकता कुछ स्तर of अनुपालन  and reporting .
The grant writing process  involves an आवेदक submitting a प्रस्ताव ( or सबमिशन ) to a संभावित  funder , either on the applicant 's own initiative or in response to a Request for Proposal from the funder .
Other grants can be given to  individuals , ऐसे as पीड़ितों of प्राकृतिक  disasters or individuals who seek to open a small business .
Sometimes grant makers require grant seekers to have some form of tax-exempt  औकात , be a पंजीकृत nonprofit  organization or a local government .
For example , tiered funding for a freeway are very large grants  negotiated at सरकारी नीति स्तर  .
However smaller  अनुदान may be provided  by a government agency ( e.g . municipal government ) .
Project-related funding involving governments ,  कारोबार , समुदायों , और individuals is प्रायः  arranged by application either in writing or online .
Naturally occurring cobalt ( Co ) is composed of 1 stable isotope , 59Co . 28 radioisotopes have been characterized with the most  stable होने 60co साथ a half-life of 5.2714 सालो , 57co साथ a half-life of 271.79 दिनों , 56co साथ a half-life  of 77.27 days , and 58Co with a half-life of 70.86 days .
All of the remaining  रेडियोसक्रिय isotopes have half-lives कि हैं कम than  18 hours and the majority of these have half-lives that are less than 1 second .
This element also has 11  मेटा राज्य , सब of जिससे have half-lives  less than 15 minutes .
The isotopes of cobalt  दायरा in परमाणु वज़न  from 47Co to 75Co .
The primary decay mode for isotopes with atomic mass unit values less than that of the most abundant stable isotope  , 59co , is इलेक्ट्रॉन कैप्चर और the प्राथमिक विधि of क्षय लिये those of वृहद than 59 परमाणु  mass units is beta decay .
The primary decay products  पहले 59co हैं आयरन isotopes और the प्राथमिक  products after are nickel isotopes .
Standard atomic mass :  58.933195 ( 5 ) u
Who  स्थानांतरित my  Cheese ?
An Amazing Way to Deal with Change in Your Work and in Your  जीवन , प्रकाशित in 1998 , is a प्रेरक किताब by स्पेंसर  Johnson written in the style of a parable or business fable .
It describes change in one 's work  और जीवन , और चार ठेठ प्रतिक्रियाएँ to कहा बदलें by दो चूहे  and two `` littlepeople '' , during their hunt for cheese .
A New York Times business bestseller since release , Who  स्थानांतरित my चीज ?
remained on the list for almost five years and spent over 200 weeks on  प्रकाशक साप्ताहिक 's सजिल्द nonfiction सूची  .
It has  बेची अधिक than 26 लाख  copies worldwide in 37 languages and remains to be one of the best-selling business books .
Nikita  sergeyevich khrushchev ( – सितंबर 11 , 1971 )  led the Soviet Union during part of the Cold War .
He served as First Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union  इससे 1953 to 1964 , और as अध्यक्ष of the परिषद of मंत्रियों  , or Premier , from 1958 to 1964 .
Khrushchev was responsible for the partial de-Stalinization of the Soviet Union , for backing the  प्रगति of the जल्दी सोवियत स्पेस कार्यक्रम , और लिये अनेक अपेक्षाकृत उदार  reforms in areas of domestic policy .
Khrushchev 's party colleagues removed him  इससे शक्ति in 1964 , replacing  him with Leonid Brezhnev as First Secretary and Alexei Kosygin as Premier .
Khrushchev was born in the Russian village of Kalinovka in 1894 ,  बंद to the present-day किनारा between रूस  and Ukraine .
He was employed as a metalworker in his youth ,  और दौरान the रूसी सिविल युद्ध थी a राजनैतिक  commissar .
With the help of Lazar  kaganovich , he worked  his way up the Soviet hierarchy .
He supported Joseph Stalin 's purges , and approved  हज़ारों of रखवाले  .
In  1939 , स्टालिन भेजा उसे  to govern Ukraine , and he continued the purges there .
During what was known in the Soviet Union as the Great  patriotic युद्ध ( पूर्वी सामने of संसार युद्ध ii ) , khrushchev थी again a  commissar , serving as an intermediary between Stalin and his generals .
Khrushchev was present at the bloody defense of  stalingrad , a फैक्ट he took ग्रेट  pride in throughout his life .
After the war , he returned to  युक्त पहले होने recalled to मास्को  as one of Stalin 's close advisers .
In the power struggle triggered by Stalin 's death  in 1953 , khrushchev , बाद अनेक  years , emerged victorious .
On February 25 , 1956 , at the 20th Party Congress ,  he वितरित the `` रहस्य वाक , '' denouncing स्टालिन  's purges and ushering in a less repressive era in the Soviet Union .
His domestic policies , aimed at bettering  the जीवनदान of ordinary नागरिकों , यहूद प्रायः अप्रभावी  , especially in the area of agriculture .
Hoping eventually to rely on  मिसाइलें लिये नेशनल रक्षा , khrushchev  ordered major cuts in conventional forces .
Despite the cuts , Khrushchev 's rule  देखी the tensest सालो of the  Cold War , culminating in the Cuban Missile Crisis .
Some of Khrushchev 's policies were seen as erratic , particularly by his  उभरते विरोधियों , जो चुपचाप रोज़ in शक्ति और अपदस्थ उसे in अक्तूबर 1964  .
He did not suffer the deadly fate of some previous losers of Soviet power struggles , but was pensioned off with an  अपार्टमेंट in मास्को और a dacha in the countryside  .
His lengthy memoirs were  smuggled to the वेस्ट और प्रकाशित  in part in 1970 .
Khrushchev died  in 1971 of दिल  disease .
Upper gastrointestinal (  gi ) bleeding refers to hemorrhage  in the upper gastrointestinal tract .
The anatomic cut-off for upper GI bleeding is the ligament of Treitz , which  connects the चौथी portion of the  duodenum to the diaphragm near the splenic flexure of the colon .
Upper  gi bleeds हैं माना चिकित्सा  emergencies , and require admission to hospital for urgent diagnosis and management .
due to अग्रिम in medications  and endoscopy , upper GI hemorrhage is now usually treated without surgery .
World  जनसांख्यिकी estimates इससे 1800 to 2100 , आधारित on un 2010 projections  ( red , orange , green ) and US Census Bureau historical estimates ( black ) .
Actual  अंकित जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़े  are in blue .
According to the highest estimate , the world population may rise  to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according to the न्यूनतम अनुमान , it may  decline to 6 billion .
the संसार जनसांख्यिकी is the कुल  number of living humans on Earth .
As of today , it is estimated to number  अरब by the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी  Bureau ( USCB ) .
The  uscb estimates कि the संसार जनसांख्यिकी  exceeded 7 billion on March 12 , 2012 .
According to a separate estimate by the United  राष्ट्र जनसांख्यिकी निधि , it पहुँचे  this milestone on October 31 , 2011 .
The world population has experienced continuous growth since the end of the  ग्रेट अकाल और the ब्लैक मौत in 1350 , जब it stood at around  370 million .
The highest rates of growth – global population increases above 1.8 % per year – were seen briefly during the  1950s , और लिये a longer काल दौरान the 1960s और  1970s .
The growth  रेट peaked at 2.2 % in 1963 , और  had declined to 1.1 % by 2011 .
Total annual births were  उच्चतम in the लेट 1980s at परिचय 138 लाख , और हैं अभी अपेक्षित  to remain essentially constant at their 2011 level of 134 million , while deaths number 56 million per year , and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040 .
Current projections  दिखाएँ a जारी बढ़ाएँ in जनसांख्यिकी in the निकट भविष्य ( लकिन a स्थिर मनाही  in the population growth rate ) , with the global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050 .
Various longer-term estimates predict further growth , stagnation , or even overall decline in  the वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी by 2150  .
Some analysts have  questioned the स्थिरता of further संसार जनसांख्यिकी  growth , citing the growing pressures on the environment , global food supplies , and energy resources .
Philips Lumileds Lighting Company is the manufacturer of a wide range of  high-power/high-efficiency light-emitting diodes ( leds  ) .
It is a  अभी a fully स्वामित्व प्रभाग  of Philips Lighting .
Knuckle mnemonic for the number of days in each  माह of the gregorian पंचांग  .
प्रत्येक projecting knuckle  represents a 31-day month .
A mnemonic ( , with a silent `` m '' ) , or mnemonic device  , is कोई सीखना तकनीक  that aids information retention .
Mnemonics aim to translate information into a form  कि the इंसान दिमाग can retain  better than its original form .
Even the process of applying  इस परिवर्तन might already सहायता the ट्रांसफ़र of सूचना  to long-term memory .
Commonly encountered mnemonics are often for lists and in auditory form , such as short poems , acronyms , or memorable phrases , but mnemonics can also be for  अन्य प्रकार of सूचना और in विज़ुअल or kinesthetic  forms .
Their use is based on the observation that the human mind more easily remembers spatial , personal , surprising , physical ,  यौन , humorous , or वरना 'relatable ' सूचना , बल्कि than अधिक अमूर्त or  impersonal forms of information .
The word  mnemonic is निकला इससे the प्राचीन यूनानी शब्द μνημονικός ( mnēmonikos ) , अर्थ `` of  memory '' and is related to Mnemosyne ( `` remembrance '' ) , the name of the goddess of memory in Greek mythology .
Both of these words  हैं निकला इससे  μνήμη ( mnēmē ) , `` remembrance , memory '' .
Mnemonics in antiquity were most often  माना in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of  what is today known as the Art of memory .
Ancient Greeks and Romans distinguished between two types of  मेमोरी : the 'natural ' मेमोरी और the 'artificial ' मेमोरी .
The former is inborn , and is the one that  everyone उपयोग automatically  and without thinking .
The artificial memory in contrast has to be trained  और विकसित through the सीखना  and practicing of a variety of mnemonic techniques .
Mnemonic systems are special techniques or strategies consciously used  to improve मेमोरी , it helps employ सूचना already भंडारित  in long-term memory to make memorization an easier task .
President Bush signing the No Child Left  पीछे अधिनियम at हैमिल्टन h.s  . in Hamilton , Ohio .
The No Child Left Behind Act of 2001 ( NCLB ) is a United States Act of Congress that is a reauthorization of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act , which included Title I , the government 's  फ्लैगशिप सहायता कार्यक्रम लिये सुविधाहीन विद्यार्थी .
NCLB supports standards-based education reform based on the premise that  सेटिंग ऊँची मानकों और establishing measurable लक्ष्य can  improve individual outcomes in education .
The Act requires states to develop  आकलन in मौलिक कौशल  .
States must give these assessments  to सब विद्यार्थी at चुनें ग्रेड स्तर  in order to receive federal school funding .
The Act does  नहीं assert a नेशनल उपलब्धि  standard ; standards are set by each individual state .
NCLB expanded the federal role in public education through  सालाना परीक्षण ,  annual academic progress , report cards , teacher qualifications , and funding changes .
The bill passed in the U.S.  कॉंग्रेस साथ  bipartisan support .
Dodge B Series utility circa 1950 ,  चलित by  Albert Namatjira
A pickup truck or pick-up , often simply  referred to as a पिकअप , is a लाइट मोटर  vehicle with an open-top , rear cargo area ( bed ) .
In North America , the term pickup is used for light  ट्रक साथ a हल्का ड्यूटी chassis और फैक्टरी  built , integrated bed , as well as for coupé utility vehicles , often based on a personal car chassis , but also often on a special dedicated chassi for such use .
Some countries have their own terms  समान to पिकअप , ऐसे as ute in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई जीलैंड , or bakkie  in South Africa .
Large pickup trucks are somewhat rare in Europe , where vans and  लाइट lorries हैं commonly प्रयुक्त  for similar roles .
This  15th-century चित्रण of शारलेमेन और पोप एड्रियन i shows  a well-bred medieval horse with arched neck , refined head and elegant gait .
Horses in the Middle Ages differed in size , build and breed from the  आधुनिक घोड़ा , और यहूद  , on average , smaller .
They were also more central  to समाज than उनके आधुनिक counterparts , होने अनिवार्य  for war , agriculture , and transport .
Consequently , specific types of horse developed , many of which have no  आधुनिक समतुल्य  .
While an understanding of modern horse breeds and equestrianism is vital for any  विश्लेषण of the मध्यकालीन घोड़ा , शोधकर्ताओं भी need to consider  documentary ( both written and pictorial ) and archaeological evidence .
Horses in the Middle Ages were rarely differentiated by breed , but  बल्कि by उपयोग .
This led them to be described , for example , as `` chargers  `` ( युद्ध घोड़े ) , `` palfreys  `` ( riding horses ) , cart horses or packhorses .
Reference is also given to their place of origin , such as `` Spanish  घोड़े , '' लकिन whether  this referred to one breed or several is unknown .
Another difficulty arising during any study of medieval documents or literature is  the लचीलापन of the मध्यकालीन भाषाएं , जहाँ अनेक शब्द  can be used for one thing ( or , conversely , several objects are referred to by one word ) .
Words such  as ' courser ' और 'चार्जr ' हैं प्रयुक्त interchangeably ( भी भीतर एक  document ) , and where one epic may speak disparagingly of a rouncey , another praises its skill and swiftness .
Significant technological advances in equestrian equipment , often  introduced इससे अन्य संस्कृतियों , अनुमत लिये significant  changes in both warfare and agriculture .
In particular , improved designs for the solid-treed saddle as well as the  आगमन of the रकाब , नाल और घोड़ा कॉलर यहूद  significant advances in medieval society .
Consequently , the assumptions and theories developed by  इतिहासकारों हैं नहीं निर्णायक , और बहस स्टिल rages on अनेक मुद्दे  , such as the breeding or size of the horse , and a number of sources must be consulted in order to understand the breadth of the subject .
the म्यूज़िक man is a musical  with book , music , and lyrics by Meredith Willson , based on a story by Willson and Franklin Lacey .
The plot concerns  कॉन man हेरोल्ड हिल , जो मुद्राएँ as a लड़कों ' बैंड आयोजक और नेता और बिकता बैंड  instruments and uniforms to naive townsfolk before skipping town with the cash .
In River City , Iowa , prim librarian and piano teacher Marian Paroo  sees through उसे , लकिन जब हिल helps उसके younger  brother overcome his fear of social interactions due to his lisp , Marian begins to fall in love with Harold .
Harold ,  in फेरे गिरना लिये marian ,  risks being caught to win her .
In 1957 , the show became a hit on Broadway ,  जीतना पाँच टोनी पुरस्कार , सहित  Best Musical , and running for 1,375 performances .
The cast album won the first Grammy Award for `` Best Original Cast Album '' and was number one on  the बिलबोर्ड चार्ट लिये 245 सप्ताह  .
The show 's success led to revivals and a popular 1962 film adaptation and a  2003 टेलीविज़न रीमेक  .
It  अक्सर is उत्पादित  by both professional and amateur theater companies .
Surveyor  's व्हील
A surveyor 's wheel  , भी पुकारा a clickwheel , hodometer , waywiser , trundle व्हील ,  measuring wheel , or perambulator is a device for measuring distance .
largest non-polar  deserts
Sand dunes in the Rub '  al खली ( `` खाली क्वार्टर  '' ) of Saudi Arabia .
Makhtesh Ramon ,  negev मरुस्थल , इसराईल
A desert is a landscape or region  of जमीन कि is बहुत शुष्क क्युकी of कम वर्षा amounts ( वर्षण ) , प्रायः रै  little coverage by plants , and in which streams dry up unless they are supplied by water from outside areas .
Deserts can also be described as areas where more water is lost by  evapotranspiration than जलप्रपात as वर्षण  .
मरुस्थल पौधे जरूर  have special adaptations to survive with this little water .
रेगिस्तान generally प्राप्त  less than 25 cm of rain ( precipitation ) each year .
Semideserts or steppes  हैं regions जिससे प्राप्त  between and .
In the Köppen climate classification system ,  रेगिस्तान हैं classed as bwh ( hot मरुस्थल ) or  BWk ( temperate desert ) .
In the Thornthwaite climate classification system , deserts would be  वर्गीकृत as arid megathermal  climates .
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in Europe that  began on 28 जुलाई 1914 और lasted  until 11 November 1918 .
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from its  occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939 , और  the First World War or World War I thereafter .
It involved all the world 's great powers , which were assembled in two opposing  alliances : the allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम , फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां  ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany , Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but , as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy did not enter into the war ) .
These alliances were both  reorganised और विस्तारित as अधिक राष्ट्र  entered the war : Italy , Japan and the United States joined the Allies , and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
ultimately , अधिक than 70 लाख सैन्य कर्मियों  , including 60 million Europeans , were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history .
More  than 9 लाख combatants यहूद मारे , largely क्युकी of technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases  in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility .
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history , subsequently paving the way for various political changes , such as  revolutions  in many of the nations involved .
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of  साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी नीतियों of the  great powers of Europe .
More immediately , the assassination  of archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया , the वारिस to the सिंहासन of austria-hungary , on 28 जून 1914  by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia .
अनेक alliances  formed over the previous decades were invoked .
Within weeks  , the प्रमुख शक्तियां यहूद at युद्ध और , via  their colonies , the conflict soon spread around the world .
On 28 July , the Austro-Hungarians  fired the पहला गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as तैयारी  for the invasion of Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans  invaded न्यूट्रल बेल्जियम और ध्वज  on the way to France , providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany .
बाद the जर्मनी  march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench line that changed little until 1917 .
On the  पूर्वी सामने , the रूसी फौज थी  successful against the Austro-Hungarians , but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans .
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the war , opening up fronts in the Caucasus ,  मेसोपोटामिया और the sinai .
Italy  और बुल्गारिया गई to युद्ध in 1915  and Romania in 1916 .
In Russia ,  the त्सार 's सरकारी collapsed in कूच 1917 और a subsequent  revolution in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers .
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front , the Allies drove back  the germans in a श्रेणी of कामयाब offensives और अमरीकी शक्तियां began प्रवेश the trenches  .
Germany , which had its own  ट्रबल साथ क्रांतिकारियों  , agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918 .
The war ended in victory for  the allies .
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts , as the  भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और आर्थिक संसाधन to लड़ो  a total war .
By the end of the war , four major imperial powers—the German  , रूसी , austro-hungarian और उस्मानी empires—ceased to मौजूद  .
The  successor राज्य of the पूर्व  two lost a great amount of territory , while the latter two were dismantled entirely .
The map of  सेंट्रल यूरोपीय  was redrawn into several smaller states .
The League of Nations was formed in the  आशा of preventing another ऐसे  conflict .
The European nationalism spawned by  the युद्ध और the ब्रेकअप of empires , the परखना  of Germany 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II .
`` Girls Just Want to Have Fun '' is a 1979  सोंग originally लिखा by रॉबर्ट जोखिम और बना प्रसिद्ध by सिंगर  Cyndi Lauper .
It was the first major single released by Lauper as a solo  कलाकार और the lead-off सिंगल इससे उसके डेब्यू एल्बम  She 's So Unusual .
lauper’s संस्करण gained मान्यता  as a feminist anthem and promoted by an award-winning video .
It has been covered on either an album or in  सजीव कॉन्सर्ट by over 30 अन्य  artists .
The single was Lauper  's भेदन hit , reaching  # 2 on the Billboard Hot 100 and becoming a worldwide hit throughout late 1983 and early 1984 .
It remains one of  lauper 's हस्ताक्षर गीतों और थी  a widely popular song during the era of its release , the 1980s .
The `` Rolling Stone & MTV : '100 Greatest  पॉप गीतों ' : 1-50 '' , `` रोलिंग स्टोन : `` the 100 शीर्ष म्यूज़िक वीडियो '' '' और the `` vh1 : 100 महानतम वीडियो '' सूचियाँ क्रमित  the song at # 22 , # 39 and # 45 , respectively .
The song received a Grammy Award nomination for Record of the Year and Best Female Pop  गायन प्रदर्शन  .
View of defibrillator electrode  स्थिति और अवस्थिति  .
Defibrillation is a common treatment for life-threatening cardiac  dysrhythmias , ventricular fibrillation , और pulseless ventricular  tachycardia .
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of electrical energy to the  प्रभावित दिल साथ a यंत्र पुकारा a defibrillator  .
This depolarizes a critical mass  of the दिल मांसपेशी , terminates the dysrhythmia , और allows सामान्य sinus लय to be reestablished  by the body 's natural pacemaker , in the sinoatrial node of the heart .
defibrillators can be बाह्य ,  transvenous , or implanted , depending on the type of device used or needed .
Some external units , known as automated external defibrillators (  aeds ) , automate the निदान of treatable लय , अर्थ कि lay responders or bystanders  are able to use them successfully with little , or in some cases no training at all .
The Cato Institute is an American libertarian  सोचो टैंक headquartered in वॉशिंगटन ,  D.C .
It was founded as the Charles Koch Foundation in 1974 by Murray  rothbard , ed क्रेन और चार्ल्स  Koch , chairman of the board and chief executive officer of the conglomerate Koch Industries , Inc. .
In  जुलाई 1976 , the नाम  was changed to the Cato Institute .
According to the 2011 Global Go To Think Tank Index , Cato is the 6th most influential US based think tank ,  रैंकिंग 3rd in आर्थिक नीति और 2nd in सोशल नीति  .
The Institute 's stated mission is `` to increase the  समझना of पब्लिक नीतियों आधारित on the सिद्धान्त  of limited government , free markets , individual liberty , and peace .
The Institute will  उपयोग the सबसे प्रभावी अर्थात् to originate , एडवोकेट , प्रचार , और  disseminate applicable policy proposals that create free , open , and civil societies in the United States and throughout the world . ''
Cato  विद्वानों यहूद नाजुक of जार्ज W. बुश 's रिपब्लिकन प्रशासन ( 2001–2009 ) on अनेक मुद्दे , सहित  the Iraq War , civil liberties , education , agriculture , energy policy , and excessive government spending .
On other issues , they supported Bush administration  पहलों , सबसे notably स्वास्थ्य परवाह , सोशल सुरक्षा , वैश्विक वार्मिंग ,  tax policy , and immigration .
During the  2008 u.S. अध्यक्षीय चुनाव , केटो  scholars criticized both major-party candidates , John McCain and Barack Obama .
Cato has criticized President Obama 's stances on policy issues since his inauguration , such as fiscal stimulus , healthcare reform , foreign policy , and the War on  दवाएँ , जबकि supporting उसके stance on the repeal of do n't पूछो , do n't बताना और  liberal immigration policy .
Dracula is an  1897 गोथिक हॉरर अनोखा  by Irish author Bram Stoker .
Famous for introducing the character of the vampire Count Dracula , the novel tells the story of Dracula 's attempt to relocate from  transylvania to इंग्लैण्ड , और the बैटल between ड्रैकुला और a छोटी समूह of मेन  and women led by Professor Abraham Van Helsing .
Dracula has been assigned to many  साहित्यिक जाति सहित पिशाच साहित्य , हॉरर  fiction , the gothic novel and invasion literature .
The novel touches on themes such as  the भूमिका of महिलाओं in विक्टोरियन संस्कृति , यौन  conventions , immigration , colonialism , and post-colonialism .
Although Stoker did not invent the vampire , he defined its modern  रूप , और the अनोखा रै शाखित numerous नाट्य  , film and television interpretations .
Quidditch is a  प्रतिस्पर्धी खेल in the wizarding संसार of the हैरी कुम्हार  universe , and is from the series of children 's novels and movies .
It is an extremely  अशिष्ट लकिन बहुत लोकप्रिय semi-contact खेल ,  played by wizards and witches .
Matches are played  between दो टीमों of सात खिलाड़ी सवारी  flying broomsticks , using four balls and six elevated ring-shaped goals , three on each side of the Quidditch pitch ( field ) .
In the Harry Potter universe ,  quidditch holds a fervent following समान to the स्थिति कि संघ  football holds as a globally popular sport .
The sport is monumental  throughout the wizarding संसार  .
Harry plays an important position for his house team  at हॉग्वार्ट्स : he is the seeker  and becomes the captain in his sixth year there .
Regional and international competitions are mentioned  throughout the श्रेणी  .
In Goblet of Fire , Quidditch at  हॉग्वार्ट्स is रद्द लिये the tri-wizard टूर्नामेंट , लकिन  Harry and the Weasleys attend the Quidditch World Cup .
In addition , Harry uses his  quidditch कौशल to कैप्चर a सुनहरी अंडा इससे a ड्रैगन पुकारा the हंगेरियाई horntail ( in the पहला कार्य of the tri-wizard टूर्नामेंट ) , to कैप्चर a उड़ती कुंजी in पारस 's स्टोन , और on दो कुंजी  occasions in Deathly Hallows — getting hold of Ravenclaw 's Diadem , and during the final fight with Voldemort — the `` unerring skill of the Seeker '' is useful to him in snatching the Elder Wand out of the air .
Harry Potter has owned two broomsticks , the Nimbus 2000 and the  firebolt , दोनो of जिससे हैं नष्ट  by the series ' end .
The game has been  अपनाया in the रियल संसार in the रूप  of Muggle Quidditch .
The United States Congress is the bicameral legislature of the federal government of the United States consisting of two houses : the lower house known as the  हाउस of प्रतिनिधि और the अपर हाउस ज्ञात as the  Senate .
Congress meets in the  कैपिटल in वॉशिंगटन  , D.C .
Both  प्रतिनिधि और सीनेटरों  are chosen through direct election .
Congress has a total of 535 voting members : 435 members in the House of  प्रतिनिधि और 100 सदस्यों in the सीनेट  .
सदस्यों of the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  serve two-year terms representing the people of a district .
Congressional districts are apportioned to  राज्य by जनसांख्यिकी using the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी परिणाम , प्रत्येक राज्य in the  union having at least one representative in the House of Representatives .
Regardless of population , each of the 50 states has two senators  ; the 100 सीनेटरों प्रत्येक  serve a six-year term .
The terms are staggered so every two years approximately  one-third of the सीनेट is up लिये चुनाव  .
प्रत्येक लड़खड़ाते समूह  of one-third of the senators are called 'classes ' .
No  राज्य of the संयुक्त राज्य रै  two senators from the same class .
सबसे incumbents तलाश re-election , और उनके ऐतिहासिक  likelihood of winning subsequent elections exceeds 90 percent .
In August 2012 , a Gallup poll reported that Congress’s  स्वीकृति दरजा amongst अमेरिकी थी at 10 % , मिलान a 38-year कम  reached in November 2011 .
`` A Little More Country Than That '' is the title of a song written by Joey + Rory 's Rory Lee Feek , Wynn Varble , and Don  poythress , और अंकित by अमरीकी देश कलाकार ईस्टन  Corbin .
It was released in August 2009 as Corbin 's debut  सिंगल और is शामिल on उसके self-titled डेब्यू  album .
In April  2010 , the सोंग पहुँचे क्रमांक एक on the देश म्यूज़िक चार्ट  , making Corbin the first male solo artist in seven years to send a debut single to Number One .
It has been  certified सुनहरा by  the RIAA .
The BlackBerry is a line of wireless handheld  डिवाइस और सेवाएं designed और marketed  by Research In Motion Limited ( RIM ) operating as BlackBerry .
The first BlackBerry device , an email pager , was released  in 1999 ; the सबसे हाल ब्लैकबेरी डिवाइस , the z10 और q10 , यहूद  announced on January 30 , 2013 .
The user interface varies by model ; most  विशेषता a शारीरिक क्वर्टी कुंजीपटल  , while newer generations have relied on a multi-touch screen and virtual keyboard .
A BlackBerry can shoot video , take photos , play music , and  perform ऑनलाइन कृत्यों  such as web-browsing and emailing .
They can also send and receive push email  और तत्काल संदेश जबकि maintaining a ऊँची स्तर of सुरक्षा through on-device संदेश  encryption , and are designed to function as personal digital assistants .
BlackBerry devices support a large variety of instant messaging  सुविधाएँ , साथ the सबसे लोकप्रिय होने the मालिकाना  BlackBerry Messenger service .
the ब्लैकबेरी playbook  is a tablet computer offered by the company .
The 100 millionth BlackBerry smartphone was shipped in June quarter  of 2010 और the 200 millionth  smartphone was shipped in September quarter of 2012 .
BlackBerry accounts for 3 % of mobile device sales worldwide in 2011 , making its manufacturer the sixth most popular device  मेकर ( 25 % of मोबाईल यंत्र बिक्री हैं स्मार्टफ़ोन  ) .
The consumer BlackBerry Internet  सेवा is उपलब्धियाँ in 91 देशों विश्वव्यापी on over 500  mobile service operators using various mobile technologies .
As  of सितंबर 2012 , वहीँ  were eighty million subscribers worldwide to BlackBerry .
In 2011 the Caribbean and Latin America had the highest penetrations of BlackBerry  स्मार्टफ़ोन विश्वव्यापी , साथ up to परिचय 45 प्रति cent in the प्रदेश  having a RIM device .
BlackBerry , iPhone ,  एंड्रॉइड , और खिड़कियाँ फोन  are considered the four major smartphone brands .
BlackBerry is widely referred to as ``  crackberry '' in the संयुक्त राज्य , जिससे alludes  to its excessive use by its owners and is a reference to the addictiveness of crack cocaine .
Use of the term CrackBerry became so widespread that in November 2006  वेबस्टर 's नई संसार कॉलेज शब्दकोष नामित  `` crackberry '' the `` New Word of the Year . ''
An example of a  माँग वक्र shifting  .
The shift from D1 To D2 means an increase in  माँग साथ consequences  for the other variables
In economics , the demand curve is the graph  depicting the संबंध between the दाम of a निश्चित कमोडिटी और  the amount of it that consumers are willing and able to purchase at that given price .
It is a  ग्राफिक प्रतिनिधित्व  of a demand schedule .
the माँग वक्र लिये सब उपभोक्ता साथ फ़ॉलो  from the demand curve of every individual consumer : the individual demands at each price are added together .
Demand curves are used to estimate behaviors in competitive markets , and are often combined with supply curves to estimate the equilibrium price ( the price at which sellers together are willing to sell the same amount as buyers together are willing to buy , also known as market clearing price ) and the  संतुलन मात्रा ( the राशि of कि शुभ or सेवा कि होगा be उत्पादित और खरीदा बगैर surplus/excess सप्लाई or shortage/excess माँग ) of कि मार्केट  .
In a monopolistic market , the demand curve facing  the monopolist is  simply the market demand curve .
historia
by nikolaos  Gysis ( 1892 )
History ( from  यूनानी - historia , अर्थ `` पूछताछ , ज्ञान acquired  by investigation '' ) is an umbrella term that relates to past events as well as the discovery , collection , organization , and presentation of information about these events .
The term  शामिल लौकिक , भूगर्भिक , और सशुल्क  history , but is often generically implied to mean human history .
विद्वानों जो लिखें परिचय  history are called historians .
History can also refer to the academic discipline which uses a  कथा to जाँचें और analyse a अनुक्रम of पास्ट कार्यक्रम , और objectively  determine the patterns of cause and effect that determine them .
Historians sometimes debate the nature of history and its usefulness by discussing the study of the discipline as an end in  itself और as a रास्ता of providing ``  perspective '' on the problems of the present .
Stories common to a particular culture , but not supported by external sources ( such as the tales surrounding King Arthur ) are usually classified as cultural heritage or legends , because they  do नहीं support the `` disinterested छानबीन '' जरूरी of the अनुशासन of इतिहास  .
Events  occurring prior to लिखा रिकार्ड  are considered prehistory .
Herodotus , a 5th century B.C . Greek historian is  माना भीतर the पश्चिमी परंपरा to be the `` पिता of इतिहास '' , और , साथ साथ  his contemporary Thucydides , helped form the foundations for the modern study of human history .
Their work continues to be read today and the divide between the  culture-focused हिरोडोटस और the military-focused thucydides remains a पाइंट of contention  or approach in modern historical writing .
In the Eastern tradition , a state chronicle the Spring and  पतझड़ annals थी ज्ञात to be compiled इससे as जल्दी as  722 BCE although only 2nd century BCE texts survived .
Ancient influences have helped spawn variant interpretations of the nature  of इतिहास जिससे have विकसित over the सदियां और continue to बदलें  today .
The modern study of history is wide-ranging , and includes the study  of विशिष्ट regions और the पढ़ाई of निश्चित topical or thematical तत्व  of historical investigation .
Often history  is सिखाया as भाग of प्राथमिक और द्वितीयक शिक्षा  , and the academic study of history is a major discipline in University studies .
Malcolm X ( ; May 19 , 1925February 21 , 1965 ) , born Malcolm Little and also known as El-Hajj Malik El-Shabazz ( ) , was an African-American Muslim  मंत्री और इंसान अधिकारों activist  .
To his admirers , he  थी a साहसी एडवोकेट लिये the अधिकारों  of blacks , a man who indicted white America in the harshest terms for its crimes against black Americans .
Detractors accused him of preaching racism , black  सर्वोच्चता , और  violence .
He has been called one of the greatest  और सबसे influential अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी  in history .
Malcolm X 's  पिता died—killed by श्वेत supremacists , it थी rumored—when  he was young , and at least one of his uncles was lynched .
When he was 13 , his mother was placed in a  दिमागी हॉस्पिटल , और he थी लगाई in  a series of foster homes .
In 1946 , at  आयु 20 , he गई to थाना लिये तोड़कर  and entering .
In prison  , मैल्कम x became a सदस्य of the स्वदेश  of Islam ; after his parole in 1952 , he quickly rose to become one of its leaders .
For a dozen years , Malcolm X was the public face of the  विवादास्पद समूह , लकिन मोहभंग साथ स्वदेश  of Islam head Elijah Muhammad led him to leave the Nation in March 1964 .
बाद a काल of सफर in अफ़्रीकी और the मध्य ईस्ट , he लौटे  to the United States , where he founded Muslim Mosque , Inc. and the Organization of Afro-American Unity .
in फ़रवरी 1965 , कम than a  year after leaving the Nation of Islam , he was assassinated by three members of the group .
Malcolm X 's expressed  मान्यताओं बदला substantially  over time .
As a spokesman for the Nation of Islam he taught black supremacy and advocated separation  of ब्लैक और श्वेत अमेरिकी —in कंट्रास्ट  to the civil rights movement 's emphasis on integration .
After breaking with the Nation of Islam in 1964—saying of his association  साथ it , `` i किया अनेक बाते as a [ ब्लैक ] मुस्लिम कि i 'm sorry  for now .
I was a zombie then ... pointed in a certain  दिशा और बताई to कूच '' —and बनने a सुन्नी मुस्लिम , he disavowed जातिवाद और expressed willingness  to work with civil rights leaders , he continued to emphasize Pan-Africanism , black self-determination , and self-defense .
हेनरी merritt `` हांक '' paulson , jr. ( born कूच 28 , 1946 ) is an  American banker who served as the 74th United States Secretary of the Treasury .
He had served as the Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Goldman Sachs , and is now chairman of the Paulson Institute , which he founded in 2011 to  प्रचार चिरस्थायी आर्थिक विकास और a क्लीनर पर्यावरण around the संसार  , with an initial focus on the United States and China .
A virtual machine ( VM )  is a तन्त्र implemented abstraction  of the underlying hardware , which is presented to the application layer of the system .
Virtual machines may be based on specifications  of a काल्पनिक कंप्यूटर or emulate the कंप्यूटर वास्तुकला और कृत्यों of a रियल  world computer .
Spiders ( order Araneae ) are air-breathing arthropods  कि have आठ टाँगे  and chelicerae with fangs that inject venom .
They are the largest order of  arachnids और रैंक सातवाँ in कुल  species diversity among all other groups of organisms .
Spiders are found worldwide on every  महाद्वीप मगर लिये अंटार्कटिक , और have  become established in nearly every habitat with the exception of air and sea colonization .
As of 2008 ,  at तनिक 43,678 मकड़ी प्रजाति , और 109 परिवारों have महरूम  recorded by taxonomists ; however , there has been confusion within the scientific community as to how all these families should be classified , as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications that have been proposed since 1900 .
Anatomically , spiders differ from other arthropods in that the usual body  खण्ड हैं fused into दो tagmata , the cephalothorax  and abdomen , and joined by a small , cylindrical pedicel .
Unlike insects , spiders  do नहीं have antennae  .
In all except the most primitive group , the Mesothelae , spiders have the most  centralized बेचैन प्रणालियों of सब arthropods , as सब उनके  ganglia are fused into one mass in the cephalothorax .
Unlike most arthropods , spiders have no extensor muscles in their limbs and instead extend  उन्हें by हाइड्रोलिक दबाव  .
Their abdomens bear appendages that have been modified into  spinnerets कि extrude रेशा इससे up to  six types of silk glands within their abdomen .
Spider webs vary widely  in आकार , आकार और  the amount of sticky thread used .
It now appears that the spiral orb web may be one of the earliest forms ,  और मकड़ियों कि उपज उलझे cobwebs हैं अधिक  abundant and diverse than orb-web spiders .
Spider-like  arachnids साथ silk-producing spigots  appeared in the Devonian period about , but these animals apparently lacked spinnerets .
True spiders have been found in Carboniferous rocks from ,  और हैं बहुत समान to the सबसे आदिम  surviving order , the Mesothelae .
The main groups of modern spiders ,  mygalomorphae और araneomorphae , पहला  appeared in the Triassic period , before .
A herbivorous species , Bagheera kiplingi , was described in 2008 , but all other known species are predators , mostly preying on insects and on other  मकड़ियों , हालांकि a few विशाल प्रजाति भी लो पक्षियों और lizards .
Spiders use a wide range of strategies to capture prey :  trapping it in स्टिकी webs , lassoing it साथ स्टिकी bolas , mimicking the शिकार  to avoid detection , or running it down .
Most detect prey mainly by sensing vibrations , but the active  hunters have अधि दृष्टि , और hunters of the genus portia दिखाएँ लक्षण of प्रज्ञा in उनके  choice of tactics and ability to develop new ones .
Spiders ' guts are too narrow to take solids , and they liquidize  उनके खाना by बाढ़ it साथ digestive एंजाइमों और पीस it साथ the bases  of their pedipalps , as they do not have true jaws .
Male spiders identify themselves by a variety of  जटिल प्रेमालाप संस्कार to avoid होने  eaten by the females .
Males of most species survive a few  matings , सीमित मुख्यतः by उनके  short life spans .
Females weave silk egg-cases , each  of जिससे may contain सैंकड़ों  of eggs .
Females of many  प्रजाति परवाह लिये उनके  young , for example by carrying them around or by sharing food with them .
A minority of species are social , building communal webs  कि may हाउस anywhere इससे a few  to 50,000 individuals .
Social behavior ranges from precarious toleration , as in the widow spiders , to  co-operative शिकार  and food-sharing .
Although  सबसे मकड़ियों सजीव लिये at सबसे दो सालो  , tarantulas and other mygalomorph spiders can live up to 25 years in captivity .
While the venom of a few species is  खतरनाक to इंसानो , वैज्ञानिकों हैं अभी  researching the use of spider venom in medicine and as non-polluting pesticides .
Spider silk provides a combination of lightness , strength and elasticity that is superior to that of synthetic  सामग्री , और मकड़ी रेशा जीनों have महरूम inserted into स्तनधारियों और पौधे to  see if these can be used as silk factories .
As a result of their wide range of behaviors , spiders have become common  प्रतीकों in आर्ट और mythology symbolizing विभिन्न combinations  of patience , cruelty and creative powers .
Donna Marie Pinciotti ( Born February 13 , 1960 ) is a fictional character and  एक of the दो मादा लीड in the फॉक्स sitcom कि '70s दिखाएँ  , appearing in all eight seasons .
Portrayed by Laura Prepon , Donna  is the प्रेम ब्याज to eric forman  .
US  काउंटी household  median income 2009 .
Median  us household  income , 2001-2011
Household income is a measure commonly used by the United  राज्य सरकारी और निजी संस्थानों  .
Each  household is measured by the  income of every resident over the age of 15 .
Income  शामिल मजदूरी और salaries , बेरोजगारी बीमे , विकलांगता भुगतान , चाइल्ड support  payments received , regular rental receipts , as well as any personal business , investment , or other kinds of income received routinely .
While  inflation-adjusted ( `` रियल '' ) household आय था महरूम increasing लगभग  every year from 1945 to 1999 , it has since been flat and even decreased recently .
U.S. median  household आय गिरी इससे $ 51,144 in 2010 to $  50,502 in 2011 .
Extreme poverty in the United States , meaning households living on less than $ 2 per day before government benefits , doubled  इससे 1996 to 1.5 लाख households in 2011 , सहित 2.8  million children .
The residents of the  household do नहीं have to be सम्बन्धित to the सिर of the  household for their earnings to be considered part of the household 's income .
As households tend to share a similar economic  कॉन्टेक्स्ट , the उपयोग of household  income remains among the most widely accepted measures of income .
That the size of a household is not commonly taken into account in such measures may distort any analysis of fluctuations  भीतर or among the household आय श्रेणी , और may रेंडर सीधा comparisons between  quintiles difficult or even impossible .
a पंजीकृत एजेंट , भी ज्ञात as a निवासी एजेंट or statutory एजेंट , in संयुक्त राज्य कारोबार विधि  , is a business or individual designated to receive service of process ( SOP ) when a business entity is a party in a legal action such as a lawsuit or summons .
The  पंजीकृत एजेंट 's पता may  also be where the state will send the paperwork for the yearly renewal of the business entity 's charter .
The registered agent for a business entity may be an individual member of the company , or ( more  प्रायः ) a तीसरा पार्टी , ऐसे as the संगठन 's  lawyer or a service company .
Failure to  properly maintain a पंजीकृत एजेंट can affect  a company negatively .

`` Life , Liberty , and the pursuit of Happiness '' is a well-known phrase in the United States  घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता  .
The phrase is meant to exemplify the `` unalienable rights ''  साथ जिससे सब इंसान beings हैं endowed by उनके निर्माता  for their protection of which they institute governments .
Fencing , is typically  विभाजित into ओलम्पिक तलवारबाजी , शास्त्रीय  fencing and historical fencing , .
The  खेल of तलवारबाजी ( commonly  called olympic fencing or competitive fencing ) is divided into three weapon categories : foil , sabre and épée .
Classical fencing uses the  वही तीन हथियार , लकिन  approaches fencing as a martial art .
Competitive Fencing is one of  पाँच खेल जिससे रै महरूम प्रदर्शित at प्रत्येक एक of the आधुनिक ओलम्पिक खेल , the अन्य चार  being Athletics , Cycling , Swimming , and Gymnastics .
The quadriceps femoris ( Latin for `` four-headed muscle of the femur `` ) , also called simply the quadriceps , quadriceps extensor , quads , is a large  मांसपेशी समूह कि शामिल the चार प्रचलित  muscles on the front of the thigh .
It is  the ग्रेट extensor मांसपेशी of  the knee , forming a large fleshy mass which covers the front and sides of the femur .
the उचित लैटिन बहुवचन  form of the adjective quadriceps would be quadricipites .
In modern English  उपयोग , quadriceps is प्रयुक्त in दोनो एकवचन  and plural .
The  एकवचन रूप quadricep  , produced by hypercorrection , is frequently used .
RMS Titanic was a  अंग्रेजों यात्री लाइनर कि sank in the उत्तर अटलांटिक समंदर on  15 April 1912 after colliding with an iceberg during her maiden voyage from Southampton , UK to New York City , US .
The sinking of Titanic caused the deaths of 1,502  लोगों in एक of the deadliest peacetime मेरीटाइम आपदाओं  in modern history .
The RMS Titanic was the largest ship afloat at the  समय of उसके maiden  voyage .
She  थी the दूसरी of तीन ओलम्पिक क्लास समंदर liners संचालित by the श्वेत स्टार लकीर , और वो थी निर्मित  by the Harland and Wolff shipyard in Belfast with Thomas Andrews , who perished with the ship , as her naval architect .
On her maiden voyage ,  वो carried 2,224  passengers and crew .
Under the command of Edward  स्मिथ , उसके यात्री शामिल कुछ of the wealthiest लोगों in the संसार , as खूब as सैंकड़ों  of emigrants from Great Britain and Ireland , Scandinavia and elsewhere throughout Europe seeking a new life in North America .
The ship was designed to be  the पिछला शब्द in सुकून और लक्ज़री , साथ an on-board gymnasium  , swimming pool , libraries , high-class restaurants and opulent cabins .
She also had a powerful wireless telegraph provided  लिये the convenience of यात्री as खूब as  for operational use .
Though she had advanced safety features such as watertight compartments and remotely activated  watertight द्वार , वो lacked पर्याप्त lifeboats to  accommodate all of those aboard .
Because of outdated  मेरीटाइम सुरक्षा regulations , वो carried तभी पर्याप्त lifeboats  for 1,178 people—slightly more than half of the number travelling on the maiden voyage , and one-third her total passenger and crew capacity .
After leaving Southampton on 10  अप्रैल 1912 , टाइटैनिक पुकारा  at Cherbourg in France and Queenstown ( now Cobh ) in Ireland before heading westwards towards New York .
On 14 April 1912 , four days into the crossing and about 375 miles  ( 600 km ) दक्षिण of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड , वो hit an हिमशैल  at 11:40 pm ship 's time .
The glancing collision  caused titanics हल प्लेटों to बकल inwards साथ उसके स्टारबोर्ड पक्ष और खोली पाँच of उसके सोलह  watertight compartments to the sea ; the ship gradually filled with water .
Meanwhile , passengers and some crew members were evacuated in lifeboats ,  अनेक of जिससे यहूद शुभारम्भ तभी partly  loaded .
A  अनुपातहीन क्रमांक of मेन यहूद बाएँ सवार  because of a `` women and children first `` protocol followed by some of the officers loading the lifeboats .
By 2:20 AM , she broke apart and  foundered , साथ खूब over  one thousand people still aboard .
Just under two hours after the Titanic foundered , the  cunard लाइनर rms carpathia arrived on the  scene of the sinking , where she brought aboard an estimated 705 survivors .
The  विपत्ति थी greeted साथ विश्वव्यापी शॉक और आक्रोश at the विशाल  loss of life and the regulatory and operational failures that had led to it .
Public inquiries in Britain and the United States led to major improvements  in मेरीटाइम सुरक्षा  .
One of their most important legacies was the establishment in 1914 of the International Convention for the Safety of Life at  समुद्र ( solas ) , जिससे स्टिल governs मेरीटाइम  safety today .
Additionally , several new wireless regulations  यहूद passed around the संसार in an प्रयत्न to सीख इससे the अनेक missteps in बेतार संचार --  -which could have saved many more passengers .
Many of the survivors lost  सब of उनके धन और possessions और यहूद बाएँ  destitute ; many families , particularly those of crew members from Southampton , lost their primary bread-winners .
They were helped by an outpouring of  पब्लिक सहानुभूति और charitable  donations .
Some of the male survivors were accused of cowardice for leaving the ship while people were still on board ; the White  स्टार लकीर 's अध्यक्ष , J. ब्रूस ismay , faced  social ostracism for the rest of his life .
The wreck  of the टाइटैनिक remains on the समुद्रतल  , split in two and gradually disintegrating at a depth of .
चूंकि इसके डिस्कवरी in 1985 , हज़ारों  of artefacts have been recovered and put on display at museums around the world .
टाइटैनिक रै become एक of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध जहाजों in  history , her memory kept alive by numerous books , folk songs , films , exhibits , and memorials .
The human leg is the  संपूर्ण निम्नतर extremity or limb of the इंसान देह , सहित the पैर , जांघ और भी the हिप or gluteal प्रदेश ;  however , the precise definition in human anatomy refers only to the section of the lower limb extending from the knee to the ankle .
Legs are used for standing ,  चलना , कूद , कार्यशील , kicking , और समान क्रियाएँ  , and constitute a significant portion of a person 's mass .
This article is about the demographic features of the population of Turkey , including  जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व , नस्ल , शिक्षा स्तर , स्वास्थ्य of the populace , आर्थिक  status , religious affiliations and other aspects of the population .
As of 2010 , the population of Turkey is estimated  to be 73.7 लाख साथ a विकास रेट  of 1.21 % per annum ( 2009 figure ) .
The  जनसांख्यिकी is अपेक्षाकृत यंग साथ 26.6 %  falling in the 0-14 age bracket .
According to the OECD/World Bank population statistics in Turkey the  जनसांख्यिकी विकास इससे 1990 to 2008 थी  16 million or 29 % .

A  full-size car is a विपणन पद प्रयुक्त in उत्तर  America for an automobile larger than a mid-size car .
In the United States , the EPA uses  the पद `` विशाल car '' to denote full-size गाड़ियाँ  .
Joel Grey  ( born अप्रैल 11 , 1932 ) is an  American stage and screen actor , singer , and dancer , known for his role as the Master of Ceremonies in both the stage and film adaptation of the Kander & Ebb musical Cabaret .
He has won the Academy Award , Tony  पुरस्कार और सुनहरी ग्लोब  Award .

in  1973 , the जादूगर in  the musical Wicked .
