James  मैडिसन , jr. ( कूच 16 , 1751 ( o.s . कूच  5 ) – June 28 , 1836 ) was an American statesman and political theorist , the fourth President of the United States ( 1809–1817 ) .
He is hailed as the “Father of the Constitution” for being instrumental in the  drafting of the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान और as  the key champion and author of the United States Bill of Rights .
He served  as a राजनेता much  of his adult life .
After the constitution had been drafted , Madison became  एक of the नेताओ in the  movement to ratify it .
His  सहयोग साथ सिकंदर हैमिल्टन और  John Jay produced the Federalist Papers ( 1788 ) .
Circulated only in New York at the time , they  होता बाद be माना among the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण polemics in support  of the Constitution .
He was also a delegate to the Virginia constitutional ratifying convention ,  और थी इंस्ट्रूमेंटल to the कामयाब अनुसमर्थन  effort in Virginia .
Like most of his contemporaries ,  मैडिसन बदला उसके  political views during his life .
During the drafting and ratification of the constitution , he  favored a दमदार नेशनल सरकारी , हालांकि बाद he grew to एहसान stronger राज्य  governments , before settling between the two extremes late in his life .
In 1789 , Madison became a leader in the  नई हाउस of प्रतिनिधि , drafting  many basic laws .
He is notable for drafting the first ten amendments to the Constitution , and thus is known as the `` Father of the  विधेयक of अधिकारों `` .
Madison worked  closely साथ अध्यक्ष जार्ज  Washington to organize the new federal government .
तोड़कर साथ हैमिल्टन और कया became the federalist पार्टी in 1791 ,  Madison and Thomas Jefferson organized what they called the Republican Party ( later called by historians the Democratic-Republican Party )
As Jefferson’s Secretary of State ( 1801–1809 ) , Madison supervised the Louisiana Purchase  , जिससे doubled the nation’s  size .
After his election to the presidency , he presided  over नवीनीकृत समृद्धि लिये अनेक सालो  .
As president (  1809–17 ) , बाद the  failure of diplomatic protests and a trade embargo against Great Britain , he led the nation into the War of 1812 .
He was responding to  अंग्रेजों encroachments on अमरीकी सम्मान और अधिकारों ; in जोड  , he wanted to end the influence of the British among their Indian allies , whose resistance blocked United States settlement in the Midwest around the Great Lakes .
Madison found the war to be an  प्रशासनिक दुःस्वप्न , as the संयुक्त राज्य था neither a दमदार  army nor financial system ; as a result , he afterward supported a stronger national government and a strong military , as well as the national bank , which he had long opposed .
Like other Virginia statesmen in the slave  समाज , he थी a slaveholder जो inherited उसके वृक्षारोपण ज्ञात  as Montpelier , and owned hundreds of slaves during his lifetime to cultivate tobacco and other crops .
Madison supported the three-fifths compromise  कि अनुमत three-fifths of the enumerated  population of slaves to be counted for representation .
`` Roman 's Revenge '' is a song performed by American rapper Nicki Minaj from her  डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम गुलाबी शुक्रवार  .
It was written by Minaj and rapper Eminem ,  जो is भी प्रदर्शित in the सोंग , और  was produced by Swizz Beatz .
It was released  exclusively on अक्तूबर 30 , 2010 through  the US iTunes Store , as a promotional release preceding the album 's release .
The song initiated a feud between Lil ' Kim and Minaj , where many people felt the song was directed at Lil ' Kim and  regarded around उसके जज्बात towards minaj  's rise to fame .
The song references Minaj 's  alter-ego , रोमन zolanski , और  Eminem 's alter-ego , Slim Shady .
The song garnered very positive reviews from critics ,  सबसे of जिससे praised the  song as a stand-out track on the album .
An official  रिमिक्स featuring minaj 's mentor , लील वेन  , was released to the US iTunes Store on January 19 , 2011 .
The instrumental was used in the song 'Firing  स्क्वाड ' by नाल  G.A.N.G .
Hydraulic  द्रव होने poured  .
Hydraulic fluids ,  भी पुकारा हाइड्रोलिक liquids ,  are the medium by which power is transferred in hydraulic machinery .
Common  हाइड्रोलिक fluids हैं आधारित  on mineral oil or water .
Examples of equipment that might use hydraulic fluids include excavators and backhoes , hydraulic brakes , power steering systems , transmissions , garbage trucks ,  वायुयान उड़ान कंट्रोल प्रणालियों , lifts ,  and industrial machinery .
Hydraulic systems like the  ones उल्लेखित ऊपर होगा कार्य सबसे efficiently if  the hydraulic fluid used has no compressibility
महिंद्रा ट्रैक्टर
Mahindra Tractors , the farm equipment division of  महिंद्रा & महिंद्रा , builds और स्त्रोत tractors कि  are sold worldwide across six continents .
Mahindra is also  among the शीर्ष तीन ट्रैक्टर निर्माताओं  in the world .
Mahindra has a huge consumer base in India , China and  अमेरिका और a growing आधार in  Australia .
The company builds more tractors in India than any other  निर्माता , और रै the क्षमता to निर्माण 150,000 tractors  a year .
In 1963 , M & M formed a joint venture with  अंतरराष्ट्रीय harvester to manufacture tractors carrying the महिंद्रा  nameplate for the Indian market .
Armed with engineering , tooling and manufacturing know-how gained from  इस संबंध , m & m विकसित  its first tractor , the B-275 .
Mahindra Tractors with sales of nearly 85,000 units  annually is एक of the largest ट्रैक्टर कंपनियाँ  in the world , and is number one in sales in India - the largest tractor market in the world .
To expand into the  growing ट्रैक्टर मार्केट in चीन ,  Mahindra acquired majority stake in Jiangling .
To raise awareness about Mahindra in the US , Mahindra USA  घोषित इसके नई प्रायोजन in the nascar देशभर श्रेणी साथ r3 मोटरस्पोर्ट , जिससे is participating  with a # 23 Mahindra Tractors Chevrolet .
The car will be driven by Robert Richardson , Jr.  महिंद्रा यूएसए , inc. घोषित a 17-race प्राथमिक और 18-race संबद्ध  sponsorship for the 2009 NASCAR Nationwide Series .
With this sponsorship , Mahindra was  the पहला भारतीय कम्पनी  to sponsor a car in NASCAR .
In 2008 , Mahindra was a  प्रायोजक of the मैकडोनाल्ड मोटरस्पोर्ट टोली  which ran the # 81 car in the NASCAR Nationwide Series .
The POWER6 is a microprocessor developed by IBM  कि implemented the शक्ति  ISA v.2.03 .
When it  became उपलब्धियाँ in प्रणालियों  in 2007 , it succeeded the POWER5+ as IBM 's flagship Power microprocessor .
It is part of the eCLipz project , said to have a goal of  converging ibm 's सर्वर हार्डवेयर जहाँ व्यावहारिक ( hence  `` ipz '' in the acronym : iSeries , pSeries , and zSeries ) .
The American middle class is a social  क्लास in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
While the concept is typically ambiguous in popular opinion and common language use ,  समकालीन सोशल वैज्ञानिकों  have put forward several , more or less congruent , theories on the American middle class .
Depending on class model used , the middle class may constitute  anywhere इससे 25 % to 66 % of households  .
One of the first major  अध्ययन of the मध्य क्लास in अमेरिका  was White Collar : The American Middle Classes , published in 1951 by sociologist C. Wright Wright_Mills Mills Wright_Mills .
Later sociologists such as Dennis  गिल्बर्ट of हैमिल्टन कॉलेज commonly divide the  middle class into two sub-groups .
Constituting roughly 15 % to 20 % of households is the upper or professional middle class consisting of highly educated  , वेतनभोगी पेशेवर और प्रबंधक  .
constituting roughly एक तीसरा  of households is the lower middle class consisting mostly of semi-professionals , skilled craftsmen and lower-level management .
Middle-class persons commonly have a comfortable  मानक of जीना , significant आर्थिक सुरक्षा , considerable कार्य  autonomy and rely on their expertise to sustain themselves .
सदस्यों of the मध्य क्लास belong  to diverse groups which overlap with each other .
Overall , middle-class persons , especially  upper-middle-class individuals , हैं characterized by conceptualizing  , creating and consulting .
यूँ , कॉलेज शिक्षा is एक of  the main indicators of middle-class status .
Largely attributed to the nature of middle-class occupations , middle class  मान tend to emphasize स्वतंत्रता , adherence to मूलभूत  standards , valuing innovation and respecting non-conformity .
Politically more  क्रियाशील than अन्य जनसांख्यिकी , कॉलेज शिक्षित मध्य  class professionals are split between the two major parties .
Income varies considerably from near the national  मध्य to खूब in excess of $ 100,000  .
Household income figures , however , do not always reflect class status and standard of living , as they are largely influenced by  the क्रमांक of आय earners और असफल to recognize household  size .
It is therefore  संभावित लिये a विशाल , dual-earner , निम्नतर मध्य क्लास  household to out-earn a small , one-earner , upper middle class household .
The middle classes are very influential , as they  encompass the बहुमत of मतदाता , लेखक , शिक्षक , पत्रकारों  , and editors .
Most societal trends in the US originate  भीतर the मध्य वर्ग  .
The following is a list of  शनिवार रात्रि सजीव डाल सदस्यों  , past and present .
The cast  सदस्यों of शनिवार  Night Live were originally referred to as the `` Not Ready For Prime Time Players '' .
The original  डाल ( l to r ) : laraine न्युमैन , जॉन  Belushi , Jane Curtin , Gilda Radner , Dan Aykroyd , Garrett Morris , and Chevy Chase
Ruins from the 1906 San Francisco earthquake , remembered as one of the  worst प्राकृतिक आपदाओं in संयुक्त राज्य इतिहास
A disaster is a  प्राकृतिक or man-made ( or technological ) जोखिम resulting in an इवेंट of substantial  extent causing significant physical damage or destruction , loss of life , or drastic change to the environment .
A disaster can be ostensively defined as any tragic event stemming from events such as  भूकंप , floods , अनर्थकारी दुर्घटनाओं , फ़ायर  , or explosions .
It is a phenomenon that can cause damage to life and property and destroy the economic , social  और सांस्कृतिक  life of people .
In contemporary academia , disasters are seen as the  consequence of  inappropriately managed risk .
These risks are the product of  a संयोजन of  both hazard/s and vulnerability .
Hazards that strike in  क्षेत्रों साथ कम vulnerability होगा never become  disasters , as is the case in uninhabited regions .
Developing  देशों suffer the महानतम लागत जब a विपत्ति हिट्स – अधिक than 95 प्रतिशत of सब मौतों caused by आपदाओं  occur in developing countries , and losses due to natural disasters are 20 times greater ( as a percentage of GDP ) in developing countries than in industrialized countries .
In computing , booting ( also known as booting up ) is the initial set of operations that a  कंप्यूटर प्रणाली performs जब विद्युत शक्ति to the cpu is switched  on .
The process begins when a computer is turned on for the first time or is re-energized after being turned off , and  ends जब the कंप्यूटर is तैयार to perform इसके सामान्य परिचालन  .
On modern general purpose computers , this can take tens of seconds and typically involves performing a power-on self-test , locating and  initializing परिधीय डिवाइस , और तब ढूंढना , लदान और starting an ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली  .
Many  कंप्यूटर प्रणालियों भी allow ये  operations to be initiated by a software command without cycling power , in what is known as a soft reboot , though some of the initial operations might be skipped on a soft reboot .
A boot loader is a  कंप्यूटर कार्यक्रम कि loads the प्रमुख ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली or runtime पर्यावरण  for the computer after completion of the self-tests .
The computer term boot is short for bootstrap or  बूटस्ट्रैप लोड और गर्भाशयी इससे the phrase  to pull oneself up by one 's bootstraps .
The usage calls attention to the requirement that , if most software is loaded onto a computer by other software already running on  the कंप्यूटर , कुछ यांत्रिकी जरूर मौजूद to लोड आरंभिक तन्त्र onto  the computer .
जल्दी कंप्यूटर प्रयुक्त a किस्में of ad-hoc विधि  to get a small program into memory to solve this problem .
The invention of integrated circuit read-only memory ( ROM ) of various types solved this paradox by  allowing कंप्यूटर to be shipped साथ a प्रारंभ up कार्यक्रम  that could not be erased .
Growth in the capacity of ROM has  अनुमत कभी अधिक विस्तृत प्रारंभ  up procedures to be implemented .
On  सामान्य purpose कंप्यूटर , the बूट प्रक्रम begins  with the execution of an initial program stored in boot ROMs or read in another fashion .
In some older computers , the initial program might have been  the अनुप्रयोग to चलाएं , if no ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली थी प्रयुक्त  , or the operating system .
In other computers , the initial program is a boot loader that may then load into random-access memory ( RAM ) , from  nonvolatile द्वितीयक भंडार ( ऐसे as a मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव ) or , in कुछ पुरानी कंप्यूटर , इससे a मीडियम ऐसे as punched ताश , punched टेप , or चुम्बकीय  tape in older computers , the binary code of an operating system or runtime environment and then execute it .
If the boot loader is limited in its size and capabilities , it may , instead , load a larger and more capable secondary boot  लोडर , जिससे होता तब लोड the ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली or runtime  environment .
Some embedded systems do not require a noticeable boot  अनुक्रम to शुरू कामकाज और जब turned on may बस चलाएं operational  programs that are stored in ROM .
Firebird is an open source  एसक्यूएल रिलेशनल डेटाबेस प्रबन्धन प्रणाली कि  runs on Linux , Windows , and a variety of Unix .
The database forked from Borland 's open source  संस्करण of interbase in 2000 , लकिन  since Firebird 1.5 the code has been largely rewritten .
Outsourcing is the contracting out  of an आतंरिक कारोबार  process to a third-party organization .
The practice of contracting a business process  आउट to a तीसरा पार्टी बल्कि  than staffing it internally is common in the modern economy .
The term `` outsourcing '' became popular in  the संयुक्त राज्य निकट the फेरे  of the 21st century .
Outsourcing sometimes involves transferring employees and assets from one firm to another , but not  सदा  .
The  परिभाषा of आउटसोर्सिंग शामिल दोनो विदेशी और घरेलू contracting , और sometimes  includes offshoring , which means relocating a business function to another country .
वित्तीय बचत इससे निम्नतर अंतरराष्ट्रीय मजदूर  rates is a big motivation for outsourcing/offshoring .
The opposite of outsourcing is called insourcing , which entails bringing processes handled by  third-party firms in-house , और is sometimes संपन्नता  via vertical integration .
However , a business can provide a contract  सेवा to another कारोबार बगैर necessarily  insourcing that business process .
Human immunodeficiency virus (  hiv ) is a lentivirus ( धीरे replicating retrovirus ) कि कल्याणकारी acquired immunodeficiency  syndrome ( AIDS ) , a condition in humans in which progressive failure of the immune system allows life-threatening opportunistic infections and cancers to thrive .
Infection with HIV occurs by the transfer of blood  , वीर्य , vaginal द्रव  , pre-ejaculate , or breast milk .
भीतर ये bodily fluids , hiv is उपस्थित  as both free virus particles and virus within infected immune cells .
HIV infects vital cells in the human immune system such as helper T  कोशिकाएं ( specifically cd4 + t कोशिकाएं ) , macrophages , और dendritic  cells .
HIV infection leads to low levels of CD4+ T cells through a number of mechanisms including : apoptosis of uninfected bystander cells , direct viral killing of infected  कोशिकाएं , और हत्या of संक्रमित cd4+ t कोशिकाएं by cd8 cytotoxic lymphocytes कि  recognize infected cells .
When CD4+ T cell numbers decline below a critical level , cell-mediated immunity is  खोया , और the देह becomes progressively अधिक susceptible to opportunistic  infections .
the firepole in  a fire station in Toronto
A fireman 's pole ( also called a sliding pole or firepole ) is a wooden pole or a metal tube or  पाइप संस्थापित between floors in आग स्टेशन , allowing अग्निशमन responding to an सचेतक to जल्दी descend to the मैदान मंजिल  faster than by using a standard staircase .
The device was invented in the 1870s by David Kenyon , in Chicago ,  इलिनोइस , हालांकि it is प्रायः incorrectly credited to  the Boston Fire Department .
Mary Poppins is the title character of a series of children 's books  लिखा by P. L. ट्रेवर्स  .
Throughout the Mary Poppins series , which  lasted इससे 1934 to 1988 , मरियम shepard थी the  illustrator and acted as a second author .
The books  केन्द्र on a जादुई  English nanny , Mary Poppins .
She is blown by the East wind to Number Seventeen Cherry Tree Lane , London ,  और into the बैंको ' household to परवाह लिये उनके children  .
Encounters  साथ चिमनी sweeps , दुकानदारों और विभिन्न  adventures follow until Mary Poppins abruptly leaves , i.e. , `` pops-out '' .
The adventures take  प्लेस over a कुल of आठ  books .
However , only the first three books  विशेषता मरियम poppins arriving  and leaving .
The later five books recount previously  unrecorded adventures इससे उसके असली  three visits .
As P. L. Travers explains in her introduction to Mary Poppins in the Park , `` She can  नहीं forever arrive  and depart . ''
The books were adapted in 1964 into a  musical डिज़्नी फिल्मी  starring Julie Andrews and Dick Van Dyke .
In 2004 , Disney Theatrical produced a stage musical  अनुकूलन in the वेस्ट समाप्त थिएटर  .
The stage musical was transferred to Broadway in 2006 where it  भागा जबतक इसके closing  on March 3 , 2013 .
It  रै महरूम अत्यधिक  successful , as was the 1964 film .
The Last Song is a 2010 American coming of age teen romantic drama film  विकसित alongside निकोलस स्पार्क्स ' अनोखा by the वही नाम .
The film was directed by Julie Anne Robinson  in उसके विशेषता फिल्मी directorial  debut and co-written by Sparks and Jeff Van Wie .
The Last Song stars Miley Cyrus , Liam Hemsworth , and Greg Kinnear and follows a troubled teenager as she  reconnects साथ उसके estranged पिता और जलप्रपात in प्रेम दौरान a गर्मियाँ in a शांत दक्षिणी संयुक्त राज्य  beach town .
The film is  वितरित by touchstone तस्वीरें  .
Sparks was approached  to लिखें दोनो the फिल्मी 's पटकथा  and the novel .
स्पार्क्स समाप्त the पटकथा in जनवरी 2009 ,  prior to the completion of the novel , making The Last Song his first script to be optioned for film .
The setting , originally in North Carolina like the  अनोखा , स्थानांतरित to जॉर्जिया बाद the  states had campaigned for months to host production .
upon शुरूआत उत्पादन in  Tybee Island , Georgia and nearby Savannah , The Last Song became the first movie to be both shot and set in Tybee Island .
Filming lasted from June 15 to  अगस्त 18 , 2009 साथ much of it occurring on the द्वीप  's beach and pier .
The Last Song was originally  अनुसूचित लिये चौड़ी रिलीज on जनवरी 8 , 2010  , but was postponed to March 31 , 2010 .
लिखा simlish
simlish is a fictional भाषा  featured in EA Games ' Sim series of games .
It debuted in  simcopter , और रै महरूम विशेषकर prominent in  The Sims , The Sims 2 and The Sims 3 .
The Sims development team created the unique Simlish language by experimenting  साथ fractured यूक्रेनी , फ्रेंच , लैटिन , फ़िनिश , अंग्रेज़ी ,  Fijian , Cebuano , and Tagalog .
simlish can भी be सुना in  SimCity 4 , SimCity Societies and SimCity 2013 , but far less frequently .
Civilized Creatures in Spore can also be taught  to बोलो simlish  .
It is also featured to an extent  in  Firaxis Games ' Sid Meier 's SimGolf .
Designer Will Wright was  सचेत of the need लिये संवाद in the खेल , लकिन विचार कि using a रियल भाषा होता मेक it ध्वनि too दोहराए और  would also be too costly to hire translators for world languages .
Initially , inspired by the Native  अमरीकी कोड talkers of संसार युद्ध ii , सीम निर्माता होगा राइट और भाषा  expert Marc Gimbel suggested experimenting with the Navajo language to create Simlish .
However , they ultimately decided that Simlish worked best as a `` language  '' बना up of gibberish शब्द कि could n't be अनूदित , so  that its meaning would be left open to the imagination of the player .
Wright later commented that using `` nonsense language ''  turned आउट to be the सही  development choice , as people were capable of imagining it more realistically than a computer could simulate a real one .
the वास्तविक  sound of Simlish was created improvisationally by voice actors Stephen Kearin and Gerri Lawlor .
An example of Ultrasonic  परीक्षण ( ut ) on ब्लेड जड़ें  of a V2500 IAE aircraft engine .
Step 1 : The UT probe is placed on the root of the  ब्लेड to be inspected साथ the सहायता of a खास  borescope tool ( video probe ) .
कदम 2 : यंत्र जमावट  are input .
Step 3 : The probe is scanned  over the ब्लेड  root .
In this case ,  an indication ( शिखर in the आंकड़ा ) through the  red line ( or gate ) indicates a good blade ; an indication to the left of that range indicates a crack .
Principle of  अल्ट्रासोनिक परीक्षण  .
LEFT : A probe  भेजना a ध्वनि वेव into a परीक्षण  material .
There are two indications , one from the initial pulse of the probe , and the  दूसरी due to the वापस वॉल  echo .
RIGHT : A defect creates a third  indication और simultaneously reduces the आयाम of the वापस  wall indication .
The  गहराई of the defect  is determined by the ratio D/E
In ultrasonic testing ( UT )  , बहुत छोटी अल्ट्रासोनिक pulse-waves साथ बीच बारंबारता ranging इससे 0.1-15  MHz and occasionally up to 50 MHz are launched into materials to detect internal flaws or to characterize materials .
A common example is  अल्ट्रासोनिक मोटाई मापन , जिससे परीक्षण the मोटाई of the  test object , for example , to monitor pipework corrosion .
Ultrasonic testing is often performed on steel and other metals and alloys , though  it can भी be प्रयुक्त on कंक्रीट , लकडी और composites  , albeit with less resolution .
It is a form of  non-destructive परीक्षण प्रयुक्त in अनेक उद्योग सहित aerospace  , automotive and other transportation sectors .
The vas deferens ( plural : vasa deferentia ) , also called  ductus deferens ( लैटिन : `` carrying-away पोत '' ; बहुवचन : ductus  deferentes ) , is part of the male anatomy of many vertebrates ; they transport sperm from the epididymis in anticipation of ejaculation .
vascular ischemia of the toes  with characteristic cyanosis .
In medicine  , ischemia , भी spelled as ischaemia or ischæmia , ( ; इससे  Greek language ισχαιμία , ischaimía ; isch- root denoting a restriction or thinning or to make or grow thin/lean , haema blood ) is a restriction in blood supply to tissues , causing a shortage of oxygen and glucose needed for cellular metabolism ( to keep tissue alive ) .
Ischemia is generally  caused by समस्याएं साथ रक्त  vessels , with resultant damage to or dysfunction of tissue .
It also means local anemia in a given  भाग of a देह sometimes resulting इससे  congestion ( such as vasoconstriction , thrombosis or embolism ) .
Down syndrome ( DS ) or Down 's syndrome , also known as trisomy 21 , is a  जेनेटिक विकार caused by the उपस्थिति of सब or भाग of a तीसरा नक़ल of chromosome  21 .
Down syndrome is  the सबसे आम chromosome  abnormality in humans .
It is typically  संबद्ध साथ a विलंब in संज्ञानात्मक क्षमता ( दिमागी  retardation , or MR ) and physical growth , and a particular set of facial characteristics .
The average IQ of young adults with Down syndrome is  around 50 , whereas यंग वयस्कों बगैर the कंडीशन typically  have an IQ of 100 .
( MR  रै historically महरूम  defined as an IQ below 70 . )
A large  proportion of individuals साथ  Down syndrome have a severe degree of intellectual disability .
bas सिंड्रोम is नामित बाद जॉन langdon bas  , the British physician who described the syndrome in 1866 .
The condition was clinically described earlier by  जां etienne dominique esquirol  in 1838 and Edouard Seguin in 1844 .
Down syndrome was identified as a  chromosome 21 trisomy  by Dr. Jérôme Lejeune in 1959 .
Down syndrome can be  पहचाना in a baby at जनम or पहले जनम  by prenatal screening .
pregnancies साथ इस  diagnosis are often terminated .
The CDC estimates that about  एक of प्रत्येक 691 शिशु born  in the United States each year is born with Down syndrome .
Many children with Down syndrome are educated in regular school  वर्ग जबकि अन्य आवश्यकता specialised  educational facilities .
Some children graduate from high school , and , in the US , there  हैं increasing अवसर लिये participating  in post-secondary education .
Education and proper care has been  दिखाया to improve विशेषता of  life significantly .
Many adults with Down Syndrome are able to work at paid employment in the  जातियाँ , जबकि अन्य आवश्यकता a अधिक sheltered कार्य  environment .
Hot  flashes ( भी ज्ञात as hot flushes , or रात्रि sweats if वे happen at रात्रि ) हैं a  symptom which may have several other causes , but which is often caused by the changing hormone levels that are characteristic of menopause .
The Servicemen 's Readjustment Act of 1944 ( P.L . 78-346 , 58 Stat . 284m ) , known informally as the G.I . Bill , was a law that provided  a दायरा of लाभ लिये returning संसार युद्ध ii दिग्गजों ( commonly referred to as  G.I.s ) .
Benefits included low-cost mortgages , low-interest loans to start a business or farm , cash payments of tuition and living expenses to attend  कॉलेज , ऊँची स्कूल or वोकेशनल शिक्षा , as खूब as एक साल of बेरोजगारी मुआवजे  .
It was available to every veteran who had been on active duty during the war years for at  तनिक नब्बे दिनों और था  not been dishonorably discharged ; combat was not required .
By the end of the program in  1956 , roughly 2.2 लाख दिग्गजों था  used the G.I . Bill education benefits in order to attend colleges or universities , and an additional 6.6 million used these benefits for some kind of training program .
Since the original 1944 law , the term has  आइये to शामिल अन्य दिग्गज लाभ कार्यक्रम निर्मित to  assist veterans of subsequent wars as well as peacetime service .
Historians and economists consider the G.I . Bill a major political  success—especially in कंट्रास्ट to the उपचार of संसार युद्ध i veterans—and  a major contribution to America 's stock of human capital that sped long-term economic growth .
The Watergate scandal was a political scandal that occurred in the United States in the 1970s as a result of the June 17 , 1972 break-in at the  लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल कमेटी मुख्यालय at the वाटरगेट दफ्तर जटिल in वॉशिंगटन , d.C. , और the निक्सन प्रशासन 's attempted cover-up  of its involvement .
The scandal eventually led to the  इस्तीफा of रिचर्ड निक्सन , the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त  States , on August 9 , 1974 — the only resignation of a U.S. President .
The scandal also resulted in the  indictment , विचारण , conviction , और  incarceration of forty-three persons , dozens of whom were Nixon 's top administration officials .
The  affair began साथ the गिरफ़्तार of पाँच मेन  for breaking and entering into the Democratic National Committee ( DNC ) headquarters at the Watergate complex on June 17 , 1972 .
The Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) connected cash found on the  burglars to a slush निधि प्रयुक्त by the कमेटी लिये the re-election of the अध्यक्ष , the आधिकारिक संगठन  of Nixon 's campaign .
In  जुलाई 1973 , as प्रमाण आरोहित विरूद्ध the अध्यक्ष 's स्टाफ , सहित गवाही provided by पूर्व स्टाफ  members in an investigation conducted by the Senate Watergate Committee , it was revealed that President Nixon had a tape-recording system in his offices and he had recorded many conversations .
Recordings from these tapes implicated the president , revealing he had attempted to cover up the questionable ( and illegal ) goings-on that had taken place  दौरान उसके प्रशासन , दोनो पहले और बाद the break-in .
After a protracted series of bitter court battles , the U.S. Supreme Court  unanimously शासित कि the अध्यक्ष था to हाथ over the टेपों to सरकारी जांचकर्ताओं  ; he ultimately complied .
Facing near-certain  महाभियोग in the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि और a दमदार  possibility of a conviction in the Senate , Nixon resigned the presidency on August 9 , 1974 .
His successor ,  जेराल्ड घाट , तब जारी  a pardon to him .
Elizabeth Imogene Webber ( formerly Lansing and Spencer ) is a  fictional अक्षर on the एबीसी दिन साबुन ओपेरा सामान्य  Hospital .
Elizabeth is  the पोती  of Dr. Steve Hardy ( John Beradino ) , one of the originating core characters of the series .
Rebecca Herbst originated the character on August 1 , 1997  और रै महरूम the तभी अनुबंध  actress to play the role .
Elizabeth is part of two  supercouple pairings , भाग्यशाली  Spencer and Elizabeth Webber and Jason Morgan and Elizabeth Webber .
The United States presidency of Ronald Reagan , also  ज्ञात as the reagan प्रशासन , थी a रिपब्लिकन  administration headed by Ronald Reagan from January 20 , 1981 , to January 20 , 1989 .
Domestically , the administration favored reducing  सरकारी कार्यक्रम और introduced the  largest across-the-board tax cuts in American history .
The economic policies enacted in  1981 , ज्ञात as `` reaganomics ``  , were an example of supply-side economics .
Reagan aimed to encourage entrepreneurship and limit  the विकास of सोशल बिता , as खूब as the  reduction of regulation and inflation .
Economic growth saw a strong  रिकवरी in the 1980s , helping  Reagan to win a landslide re-election .
The national debt  increased significantly  , however .
Regarding foreign policy , the administration was  steadfastly anti-communist , कॉलिंग  the Soviet Union an `` evil empire `` and ending 1970s détente .
reagan त्वरित the विशाल buildup of the सैन्य प्रारंभ by उसके पूर्ववर्ती , सहित  an invasion of Grenada , the first major overseas action by U.S. troops since the end of the Vietnam War .
The `` Reagan Doctrine `` controversially granted aid  to अर्धसैनिक शक्तियां seeking to फेकने कम्युनिस्ट सरकारें , विशेषकर  in war-torn Central America and Afghanistan .
Reagan also promoted new  technologies ऐसे as मिसाइल रक्षा प्रणालियों in अनुक्रम to confront  the Soviets and their allies .
In  कूटनीति , reagan forged a दमदार गठबंधन साथ  UK Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher , and he met with Soviet General Secretary Mikhail Gorbachev four times , aiming to shrink the superpowers ' nuclear arsenals .
Reagan 's presidency has been termed the `` Reagan Revolution '' , or the Age of Reagan in recognition of the political  realignment दोनो भीतर और परे the u.S. in एहसान of उसके ब्रांड of कोसा और उसके आस्था in फ़्री  markets .
The Reagan administration worked toward the collapse of Soviet  साम्यवादी , और it किया पतन बस  as he left office .
Victory in the Cold War led to a unipolar  संसार साथ the u.S. as the संसार  's sole superpower .
While the  damaging iran-contra affair engulfed अनेक reagan aides दौरान उसके दूसरी पद , reagan खुद  left office with a 63 percent approval rating , one of the higher approval ratings of departing presidents .
After years of unstinting praise from the right , and unrelenting criticism from the left , historian David Henry finds that by 2009 a consensus had emerged among scholars that Reagan revived conservatism and turned the nation to the right by demonstrating a  `` pragmatic कोसा '' कि प्रचारित विचारधारा भीतर the constraints imposed by the विभाजित राजनैतिक  system .
Furthermore , says Henry  , the सर्वसम्मति viewpoint agrees कि he revived आस्था in the प्रेसिडेंसी  and American self-confidence , and contributed critically to ending the Cold War .
Crude death rate by country  ( 2006 )  .
Mortality rate is a  माप of the क्रमांक of मौतों ( in सामान्य , or due to a विशिष्ट  cause ) in a population .
Scaled  to the आकार  of that population , per unit of time .
Mortality rate is typically  expressed in इकाई of मौतों प्रति 1000 individuals  per year ; thus , a mortality rate of 9.5 ( out of 1000 ) in a population of 1,000 would mean 9.5 deaths per year in that entire population , or 0.95 % out of the total .
It is distinct  इससे morbidity रेट , जिससे refers to the क्रमांक of individuals in ग़रीब स्वास्थ्य  during a given time period ( the prevalence rate ) or the number of newly appearing cases of the disease per unit of time ( incidence rate ) .
The term `` mortality `` is also sometimes  inappropriately प्रयुक्त to refer to the क्रमांक of मौतों among a नियत of diagnosed  hospital cases for a disease or injury , rather than for the general population of a country or ethnic group .
This disease mortality  statistic is अधिक precisely  referred to as `` case fatality rate `` ( CFR ) .
एक distinguishes:
The crude death rate , the total  क्रमांक of मौतों प्रति साल प्रति  1000 people .
the  crude मौत रेट लिये the पूरे संसार is परिचय 8.37  per 1000 per year according to the current CIA World Factbook .
The perinatal mortality rate , the sum of neonatal deaths and fetal deaths (  stillbirths ) प्रति 1000 births  .
The maternal mortality ratio , the number of maternal deaths per 100,000 live  births in वही समय काल .
The maternal mortality rate , the number of maternal deaths per 1,000 women of reproductive age  in the जनसांख्यिकी ( generally पारिभाषित as 15–44 सालो  of age ) .
The  शिशु मृत्यु रेट , the क्रमांक of मौतों of children  less than 1 year old per 1000 live births .
The  चाइल्ड मृत्यु रेट , the क्रमांक of मौतों  of children less than 5 years old per 1000 live births .
The standardised mortality ratio ( SMR ) -  इस represents a आंशिक तुलना to the संख्याएँ of मौतों  that would have been expected if the population had been of a standard composition in terms of age , gender , etc .
The age-specific mortality rate ( ASMR ) - This  refers to the कुल क्रमांक of मौतों प्रति साल  per 1000 people of a given age ( e.g . age 62 last birthday ) .
In regard to the or failure of medical  उपचार  or procedures , one would also distinguish:
The  जल्दी मृत्यु रेट , the कुल क्रमांक of मौतों in the  early stages of an ongoing treatment , or in the period immediately following an treatment .
The late mortality rate , the total number of deaths in the late stages of an ongoing treatment , or a  significant लंबाई of समय बाद  an acute treatment .
Note that the crude death rate as defined above and  लागू to a पूरे जनसांख्यिकी can दे a भ्रामक छाप  .
The crude death rate depends on the age ( and gender ) specific mortality rates and the age  ( और लिंग ) वितरण of the जनसांख्यिकी  .
The number of deaths per 1000 people can be higher for developed nations than in less-developed countries , despite life expectancy being  उच्चतर in विकसित देशों due to मानकों of स्वास्थ्य  being better .
This happens because developed countries typically have a completely  अलग जनसांख्यिकी आयु वितरण  , with a much higher proportion of older people , due to both lower recent birth rates and lower mortality rates .
A more complete  चित्र of मृत्यु is दिए by a जीवन तालिका जिससे shows the  mortality rate separately for each age .
A life table is necessary to give  a शुभ अनुमान of जीवन प्रत्याशा  .
An otoacoustic  उत्सर्जन ( oae ) is a ध्वनि जिससे is उत्पन्न  from within the inner ear .
Having been predicted by Thomas Gold in 1948 , its existence was first demonstrated experimentally by David Kemp in 1978 and  otoacoustic emissions have चूंकि महरूम दिखाया to उठता by a क्रमांक of अलग सेल्यूलर mechanisms भीतर the भीतरी  ear .
Studies have shown that OAEs disappear after the inner ear has been damaged , so OAEs are often  प्रयुक्त in the प्रयोगशाला और the क्लिनिक as a माप of भीतरी कान स्वास्थ्य  .
Broadly speaking , there are two types of otoacoustic emissions :  spontaneous otoacoustic emissions ( soaes ) , जिससे can occur बगैर बाह्य उत्तेजनाओं  , and evoked otoacoustic emissions ( EOAEs ) , which require an evoking stimulus .
Hurricane Tomas was the  उन्नीसवीं नामित तूफ़ान और बारहवीं hurricane of  the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season .
Tomas developed from a tropical wave  ईस्ट of the  Windward Islands on October 29 .
Quickly intensifying into a hurricane , it moved through the Windward Islands and passed very  निकट संत लूसिया  .
After reaching Category 2 status on the Saffir-Simpson scale , Tomas quickly weakened to a  तीव्र तूफ़ान in the सेंट्रल caribbean समुद्र , due to दमदार हवा  shear and dry air .
Tomas  बाद regained  hurricane status as it reorganized near the Windward passage .
Throughout the hurricane 's path , 71 people are known to  have महरूम मारे , 14 of जिसको यहूद  in Saint Lucia .
Monetary losses throughout the Windward Islands were estimated at US $ 588  लाख , मुख्यतः in संत लूसिया  .
In the wake of the  तूफ़ान in हैती , बाढ़ intensified an  ongoing cholera outbreak indirectly causing more fatalities .
According to a report released in December 2010 , 55 people were killed  in क्यूबा और hispanola , हालांकि the वितरण of ये fatalities  are unknown .
overall क्षति इससे the  storm was at least $ 741 million .
Victoria Jackson ( born August 2 , 1959 ) is an American comedian , actress , satirist  , सिंगर और अंतरजाल ब्लॉगर बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a डाल सदस्य of the एनबीसी टेलीविज़न स्केच  comedy series Saturday Night Live ( SNL ) from 1986 to 1992 .
She has received attention as a vocal critic of President Barack Obama , and is an  क्रियाशील भागीदार in the चाय पार्टी गति  .
Postmodern literature is literature characterized by heavy reliance on techniques like fragmentation , paradox , and questionable narrators , and is often ( though not  exclusively ) पारिभाषित as a स्टाइल or ट्रेंड जिससे उभरा in the post–world  War II era .
Postmodern works are seen as a reaction against Enlightenment thinking and  modernist approaches to साहित्य  .
Postmodern literature , like postmodernism as a whole , tends to resist definition or  वर्गीकरण as a `` गति  '' .
Indeed , the convergence of postmodern  साहित्य साथ विभिन्न मोड्स of नाजुक सिद्धान्त , विशेषकर reader-response और deconstructionist  approaches , and the subversions of the implicit contract between author , text and reader by which its works are often characterised , have led to pre-modern fictions such as Cervantes ' Don Quixote ( 1605,1615 ) and Laurence Sterne 's eighteenth-century satire Tristram Shandy being retrospectively inducted into the fold .
While there is little consensus on the precise characteristics , scope , and importance of postmodern literature , as is  प्रायः the मामला साथ कलाकारी आंदोलनों , postmodern साहित्य  is commonly defined in relation to a precursor .
For example , a postmodern literary work tends not to conclude  साथ the neatly tied-up समाप्ति  as is often found in modernist literature , but often parodies it .
Postmodern authors  tend to celebrate मौका over शिल्प , और  further employ metafiction to undermine the writer 's authority .
Another characteristic of postmodern literature is the questioning of distinctions between high and low culture through the use  of pastiche , the संयोजन  of subjects and genres not previously deemed fit for literature .
Enigma is an  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक musical प्रोजेक्ट संस्थापित in जर्मनी by माइकल  Cretu , David Fairstein and Frank Peterson in 1990 .
The Romanian-born Cretu conceived the Enigma project while working in Germany , but  आधारित उसके रिकॉर्डिंग स्टुडियो a.r.t . studios in ibiza , स्पेन , इससे the जल्दी 1990s जबतक may 2009 , जहाँ  he has recorded all of Enigma 's studio releases to date .
Cretu is both the composer and  the निर्माता  of the project .
His former wife , pop singer Sandra ,  प्रायः provided vocals on पहेली ट्रैक्स  .
Jens  gad co-arranged और निभाई गिटार  on three of the Enigma albums .
Peter  कॉर्नेलियस भी contributed to  Enigma during the 1990s .
Seven studio  एल्बम have महरूम उत्पादित अंतर्गत the  name of the project .
Scooby-Doo  is an अमरीकी एनिमेटेड कार्टून मताधिकार , comprising अनेक  animated television series produced from 1969 to the present day .
The  असली श्रेणी , scooby-doo  , Where Are You !
, was  निर्मित लिये hanna-barbera  Productions by writers Joe Ruby and Ken Spears in 1969 .
This  शनिवार morning कार्टून श्रेणी प्रदर्शित चार teenagers— फ्रेड जोन्स , daphne ब्लेक , velma dinkley , और norville `` shaggy '' रोजर्स —  and their talking brown Great Dane dog named Scooby-Doo , who solve mysteries involving supposedly supernatural creatures through a series of antics and missteps .
Following the success of the original series , Hanna-Barbera and  इसके successor warner ब्रदर्स . एनिमेशन have उत्पादित numerous follow-up और spin-off  animated series and several related works , including television specials and telefilms , a line of direct-to-video films , and two Warner Bros. –produced theatrical feature films .
Some versions  of scooby-doo विशेषता अलग विसंगतियाँ on the दिखाएँ 's  supernatural theme , and include characters such as Scooby 's cousin Scooby-Dum and nephew Scrappy-Doo in addition to or instead of some of the original characters .
scooby-doo थी originally ब्रॉडकास्ट  on CBS from 1969 to 1976 , when it moved to ABC .
ABC aired the show  जबतक canceling it in 1986 , और प्रस्तुत a spin-off  featuring the characters as children , A Pup Named Scooby-Doo , from 1988 until 1991 .
Two new Scooby-Doo series ,  कया 's नई , scooby-doo  ?
and Shaggy and Scooby-Doo Get a a Clue ! ] ] , aired as part of Kids WB on The WB network  और इसके successor , the cw संजाल , इससे 2002 जबतक  2008 .
The most recent  scooby-doo श्रेणी , scooby-doo  !
रहस्य incorporated , aired  on Cartoon Network from 2010 to 2013 .
Repeats of the various Scooby-Doo series are broadcast frequently on  कार्टून संजाल और boomerang in the संयुक्त राज्य  and other countries .
Call of Duty is a  first-person और third-person शूटर  computer/ video game franchise .
The series  began on the pc , और बाद विस्तारित  to consoles and handhelds .
Several spin-off games have also  महरूम released  .
The earlier games in the series are set primarily in World War II  , इस शामिल : कॉल of ड्यूटी ,  Call of Duty 2 , and Call of Duty 3 .
Beginning with  आधुनिक warfare , जिससे is नियत in  modern times , the series has shifted focus away from World War II .
कॉल of ड्यूटी 4 : आधुनिक warfare ( released  November 2007 ) was followed by Call of Duty : World at War and Call of Duty : Modern Warfare 2 .
Black Ops ( released November 2010 ) takes place in the Cold War , while Modern Warfare 3 (  released नवम्बर 2011 ) takes प्लेस in the near-future सेटिंग  .
Black Ops 2 ( Released November  13 , 2012 ) takes प्लेस  in the year 2025 .
The Call of Duty games  हैं प्रकाशित और स्वामित्व by एक्टिविजन  with Aspyr Media publishing it for Apple OS X .
While the studio Infinity Ward  primarily स्टिल develops उन्हें , treyarch  has also developed several of the titles with the release of the studios ' games interlaced with each other .
Some games have been developed by Gray  पदार्थ इंटरैक्टिव , चिंगारी असीमित  , Amaze Entertainment , n-Space , Rebellion Developments , Ideaworks Game Studio , Sledgehammer Games and nStigate Games .
The games use a variety of engines , including the id Tech 3 ,  the treyarch ngl , और the iw 5.0  .
Other products in the franchise include a line of action figures designed by Plan-B Toys , a card game  निर्मित by अपर डेक , और a कॉमिक किताब mini-series प्रकाशित  by WildStorm .
As of November 11 , 2011 , the Call Of Duty series have  बेची over 100  million copies .
As of March 31 , 2012 there are 40 million monthly active players across all of the Call of Duty titles ,  साथ 10 लाख कॉल of ड्यूटी : elite उपयोक्ता  and 2 million paying annual members .
Over 1.6 billion hours of  ऑनलाइन gameplay have महरूम logged आधुनिक warfare  3 since its 2011 release .
The estate  कर in the संयुक्त राज्य is a कर imposed on the ट्रांसफ़र of the `` taxable एस्टेट  `` of a deceased person , whether such property is transferred via a will , according to the state laws of intestacy or otherwise made as an incident of the death of the owner , such as a transfer of property from an intestate estate or trust , or the payment of certain life insurance benefits or financial account sums to beneficiaries .
The estate tax is one part of the  एकीकृत तोहफा और एस्टेट कर प्रणाली  in the United States .
The other part of the system , the gift tax ,  imposes a कर on हस्तांतरण of प्रॉपर्टी दौरान a व्यक्ति 's जीवन  ; the gift tax prevents avoidance of the estate tax should a person want to give away his/her estate .
In addition to the federal government , many states also  थोपने an एस्टेट कर , साथ the राज्य संस्करण पुकारा either an एस्टेट  tax or an inheritance tax .
Opponents of the estate tax  कॉल it the `` मौत  tax '' .
If an asset is left to a spouse or a Federally  पहचाना दान , the कर प्रायः  does not apply .
In addition , up to $ 5,250,000 can be given by an  व्यक्तिगत , पहले and/or upon उनके मौत  , without incurring federal gift or estate taxes .
Gavin McGregor Rossdale ( born 30 October 1967 ) is an English actor and musician  , ज्ञात as the सीसे सिंगर और  rhythm guitarist of the rock band Bush .
Following Bush 's separation in 2002 , which lasted for  आठ सालो , he थी the सीसे सिंगर  and guitarist for Institute , and later began a solo career .
When performing solo , Gavin plays songs from  उसके extensive musical पुस्तकालयों  .
Rossdale has been ranked in the Top 100 Heavy Metal  vocalists by hit parader ( # 75 )  .
Raffaello Sanzio da Urbino ( April 6 or March 28 , 1483 –  अप्रैल 6 , 1520 ) , बेहतर ज्ञात बस as राफेल  , was an Italian painter and architect of the High Renaissance .
His work is admired for its clarity of form  और आसानी of संयोजन और लिये  its visual achievement of the Neoplatonic ideal of human grandeur .
Together with Michelangelo and Leonardo da  विंची , he फ़ॉर्म the परंपरागत ट्रिनिटी  of great masters of that period .
Raphael was  enormously उत्पादक , कार्यशील an unusually विशाल कार्यशाला , और  despite his death at 37 , a large body of his work remains .
Many of his works are found in the Vatican Palace , where the  frescoed राफेल कक्ष यहूद the सेंट्रल , और  the largest , work of his career .
The best known work is The School of Athens  in the वेटिकन stanza  della Segnatura .
After his early years in Rome much of his work was self-designed , but for the most part executed by the workshop  इससे उसके drawings , साथ considerable घाटा of विशेषता  .
He was  अत्यधिक influential  in his lifetime , though outside Rome his work was mostly known from his collaborative printmaking .
After his death , the influence of his great rival Michelangelo was more widespread until the 18th and 19th  सदियां , जब राफेल 's अधिक निर्मल और समन्वयात्मक qualities यहूद again regarded as the  highest models .
His career falls naturally into three phases and three styles , first described by Giorgio Vasari : his early years in Umbria , then a period of  परिचय चार सालो ( इससे 1504–1508 ) absorbing the कलाकारी परंपराओं of फ्लोरेंस , followed by उसके पिछला  hectic and triumphant twelve years in Rome , working for two Popes and their close associates .
Julia Fiona Roberts ( born  अक्तूबर 28 , 1967 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री  .
She became a Hollywood star after  headlining the रोमांटिक कॉमेडी pretty स्त्री ( 1990 )  , which grossed $ 464 million worldwide .
After receiving Golden Globe Awards and Academy Award  nominations लिये स्टील magnolias ( 1989 ) और pretty स्त्री , वो जीती  the Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance in Erin Brockovich ( 2000 ) .
Her films The Pelican Brief ( 1993 ) , My Best Friend 's Wedding ( 1997 ) , Mystic Pizza ( 1988 ) , Notting Hill ( 1999 ) , Runaway Bride ( 1999 ) , Ocean 's Eleven ( 2001 ) , Ocean 's Twelve ( 2004 ) , Charlie Wilson 's War ( 2007 ) , Valentine 's Day ( 2010 ) , Eat Pray  प्रेम ( 2010 ) , और दर्पण दर्पण ( 2012 ) have collectively brought बक्सा दफ्तर रसीदें of over  $ 2.6 billion , making her one of the most successful actresses in terms of box office receipts .
Roberts had become one of the highest-paid  अभिनेत्रियों in the संसार , टॉपिंग the हॉलीवुड पत्रकारों सालाना ``  power list '' of top-earning female stars from 2005 to 2006 .
Her fee for 1990 's Pretty Woman was $ 300,000 ; in 2003 , she was  सशुल्क an unprecedented $ 25 लाख लिये उसके भूमिका in mona  Lisa Smile ( 2003 ) .
As of 2010  , रॉबर्ट्स 's जाल लायक थी  estimated to be $ 140 million .
Roberts has been named one of People magazine 's `` 50 Most  खूबसूरत लोगों in the संसार  '' eleven times , tied with Halle Berry .
In 2011 , she was named one of the `` 100 Hottest Women of  all-time '' by मेन 's  Health .
In 2001 , Ladies Home Journal  क्रमित उसके as the 11th सबसे  powerful woman in the United States .
Mark Elliot Zuckerberg ( born May 14 ,  1984 ) is an अमरीकी कंप्यूटर  programmer and Internet entrepreneur .
He is best known as one of five co-founders of the  सोशल नेटवर्किंग जालस्थल फेसबुक  .
As of April 2013 , Zuckerberg is the chairman and chief executive of Facebook , Inc. and in 2013  उसके निजी माल थी अनुमानित to be us $ 13 .3 अरब  .
Together with his college roommates and fellow Harvard University students Eduardo Saverin , Andrew McCollum , Dustin Moskovitz and Chris  ह्यूजेस , zuckerberg शुभारम्भ फेसबुक इससे हार्वर्ड 's  dormitory rooms .
The group then introduced Facebook onto  अन्य campuses देशभर और स्थानांतरित to पालो आल्टो  , California , United States ( U.S. ) shortly afterwards .
In 2007 , at the age of  twenty-three सालो , zuckerberg became a अरबपति as a परिणाम of फेसबुक और the क्रमांक of फेसबुक  users worldwide reached a total of one billion in 2012 .
zuckerberg थी शामिल in विभिन्न विधिक विवादों कि यहूद initiated  by others in the group , who claimed a share of the company based upon their involvement during the development phase of Facebook .
Since 2010 , Zuckerberg has been named among the 100 wealthiest  और सबसे influential लोगों in the संसार by  Time magazine as a part of its Person of the Year accolade .
Zuckerberg was played by actor Jesse Eisenberg in the 2010  हॉलीवुड फिल्मी the सोशल संजाल  in which the rise of Facebook is portrayed .
The Mayflower was the ship that in 1620 transported 102 English  तीर्थयात्रियों , सहित a कोर समूह of separatists , to नई  England .
Their story is one of travail and survival in a harsh New  संसार पर्यावरण  .

Committee of Ways and Means is the chief tax -writing committee of the  संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  .
Members of the Ways and Means Committee are not allowed to serve on any other House Committees unless they apply for a waiver from their party  's congressional  leadership .
The  कमेटी रै क्षेत्राधिकार over सब कराधान , tariffs और अन्य revenue-raising  measures , as well as a number of other programs including:
सोशल सुरक्षा
बेरोजगारी  benefits
medicare
प्रवर्तन  of child support laws
Temporary Assistance for Needy  परिवारों , a संघीय welfare  program
फोस्टर परवाह  and adoption programs
The U.S. Constitution requires that all bills  regarding कराधान जरूर originate in the हाउस  of Representatives .
Since House procedure is that all bills regarding taxation must go through this committee  , the कमेटी is बहुत influential , as is इसके सीनेट बंटवारा  , the U.S. Senate Committee on Finance .
The Ways and Means Committee in the  111th कॉंग्रेस थी chaired by चार्ली rangel  , who had taken a leave of absence as chairman until House ethics violations were resolved .
However , his leave of  अनुपस्थिति as अध्यक्ष थी  ruled to be a resignation .
Pete Stark resigned as acting chairman , so Sander Levin held that  स्थिति जबतक the प्रारंभ of the 112th कॉंग्रेस  .
Dave Camp became the committee chair for the 112th  कॉंग्रेस , बाद the republicans जीती कंट्रोल of the हाउस  in the 2010 election .
The blue whale (  balaenoptera musculus ) is a समुद्री स्तनधारी belonging to the suborder of baleen  whales ( called Mysticeti ) .
At in  लंबाई और or अधिक in वज़न  , it is the largest known animal to have ever existed .
Long and  slender , the ब्लू व्हेल 's देह can be विभिन्न शेड्स  of bluish-grey dorsally and somewhat lighter underneath .
There are at least three distinct  subspecies : B. m. musculus of the उत्तर अटलांटिक  and North Pacific , B. m. intermedia of the Southern Ocean and B. m. brevicauda ( also known as the pygmy blue whale ) found in the Indian Ocean and South Pacific Ocean .
B. m. indica , found in the  भारतीय समंदर , may be  another subspecies .
As with  अन्य baleen whales , इसके आहार consists  almost exclusively of small crustaceans known as krill .
Blue whales were abundant in nearly all the oceans on Earth until the  शुरूआत of the बीसवीं सदी  .
For over a century , they were  hunted लगभग to extinction by whalers जबतक  protected by the international community in 1966 .
A 2002 report  अनुमानित वहीँ यहूद 5,000 to 12,000 ब्लू whales विश्वव्यापी  , located in at least five groups .
More recent  शोध into the सानो subspecies  suggests this may be an underestimate .
Before whaling , the largest population  थी in the अंटार्कटिक , क्रमांकन लगभग  239,000 ( range 202,000 to 311,000 ) .
There remain only much smaller ( around  2,000 ) एकाग्रता in प्रत्येक of the पूर्वी  North Pacific , Antarctic , and Indian Ocean groups .
There are two more groups in the  उत्तर अटलांटिक , और at तनिक दो in  the Southern Hemisphere .
The globe artichoke ( Cynara cardunculus  var . scolymus ) is a किस्में  of a species of thistle cultivated as a food .
The edible matter is buds that form within the flower  heads पहले the पुष्प आइये into खिलते  .
The  कलियों go दूर or बदलें to a coarse  , barely edible form when the flower blooms .
The uncultivated or  जंगली किस्में of the प्रजाति  is called a cardoon .
It is a  बारहमासी संयंत्र देशी to the भूमध्यसागरीय  region .
The United  राज्य एक hundred-dollar  bill ( $ 100 ) is a denomination of United States currency .
U.S. statesman , inventor  , और राजनयिक बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन is फिलहाल  featured on the obverse of the bill .
On the reverse of the banknote  is an चित्र of स्वतंत्रता  Hall .
The $ 100 bill is the largest denomination that has  महरूम मुद्रित चूंकि जुलाई 13 , 1969 , जब the denominations of $ 500 , $  1,000 , $ 5,000 , and $ 10,000 were retired .
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing  says the औसत जीवन of a $ 100 विधेयक in परिसंचरण is 90 महीने  ( 7.5 years ) before it is replaced due to wear and tear .
The bills are also commonly referred to as `` Benjamins '' , in reference to the  उपयोग of बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन 's पोर्ट्रेट on the denomination , or `` c-notes '' , आधारित on the  Roman numeral for 100 .
The bill is one of two denominations printed  आज कि करता नहीं विशेषता a अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त  States ; the other is the $ 10 bill , featuring Alexander Hamilton .
The time on the clock of Independence Hall on the reverse , according  to the u.S. ब्यूरो of नक्काशी  and Printing , shows approximately 4:10 .
One hundred hundred-dollar  बिल्स हैं वितरित by संघीय आरक्षित  Banks in mustard-colored straps ( $ 10,000 ) .
The Series 2009 $ 100 bill redesign was unveiled on April 21 , 2010 ,  और थी to be जारी to the पब्लिक on फ़रवरी 11 , 2011 , लकिन उत्पादन थी shut bas in दिसम्बर 2010  because as many as 30 % were unusable due to a manufacturing flaw .
A vertical crease in the paper reveals a  रिक्त स्पेस on the विधेयक जब  pulled out .
In their replacement , and continuing the high demand of  इस denomination , the श्रेणी 2006a थी शुभारम्भ retaining the  previous design ( 1996-generation ) .
On April 24  , 2013 , the संघीय आरक्षित घोषित the नई  $ 100 bill would enter circulation on October 8 , 2013 .
King David in robes of a  बीज़ान्टिन सम्राट  .
miniature इससे  the Paris Psalter .
David ( ; ISO 259-3 Dawid ; ' ; Strong 's : Daveed ) according to the Hebrew Bible  , थी the दूसरी किंग of the संयुक्त किंगडम of इसराईल , और according to the  New Testament Gospels of Matthew and Luke , an ancestor of Jesus .
His life is conventionally dated to c. 1040–970 BCE ,  उसके शासनकाल over यहूदा c. 1010–1002 bce , और उसके शासनकाल  over the United Kingdom of Israel c. 1002–970 BCE .
The Books of Samuel , 1 Kings , and 1 Chronicles  हैं the तभी स्त्रोत of सूचना on दाउद , हालांकि the tel डान stele ( दिनाँक c. 850–835 bce ) contains the phrase  ( bytdwd ) , read as `` House of David '' , which most scholars take as confirmation of the existence in the mid-9th century BCE of a Judean royal dynasty called the House of David .
He is depicted as a righteous  किंग , हालांकि नहीं बगैर त्रुटियां , as खूब as an acclaimed योद्धा , संगीतकार  , and poet , traditionally credited for composing many of the psalms contained in the Book of Psalms .
David is central  to यहूदी , ईसाई ,  and Islamic doctrine and culture .
biblical परंपरा maintains कि a  direct descendant of David will be the Messiah .
In  islam he is माना to be a नबी  and the king of a nation .
Kathmandu  ( ; ) is the पूंजी और largest शहरी  agglomerate of Nepal .
The agglomerate consists of  काठमांडू महानगर नगर  at its core , and its sister cities Patan , Kirtipur , Thimi , and Bhaktapur .
It also  शामिल the recently पहचाना शहरी क्षेत्रों of shankhapur  , Karyabinayak , and Champapur .
Banepa , Dhulikhel , and Panauti are satellite urban areas of Kathmandu located just  बाहर the काठमांडू घाटी  .
Kathmandu is also known informally as `` KTM '' or the  `` tri-city '' .
According to a census conducted in 2011 , Kathmandu  metropolis अलोन रै 975,453 निवासियों  ; and the agglomerate has a population of more than 2.5 million inhabitants .
The metropolitan city area is and has a population  घनत्व of 19,250  per km2 .
The city stands at an elevation of approximately in the  bowl-shaped काठमांडू घाटी of सेंट्रल  Nepal .
It is surrounded by four  प्रमुख kyu : shivapuri , phulchoki  , Nagarjun , and Chandragiri .
Kathmandu Valley is part of three districts (  काठमांडू , ललितपुर , और भक्तपुर ) , रै the उच्चतम  population density in the country , and is home to about a twelfth of Nepal 's population .
During Rana and Shah eras , the name `` Nepal '' referred only to the Kathmandu  घाटी ; it थी कया लोगों जो जिया बाहर the घाटी पुकारा  it .
During this period , British historians called the  घाटी itself `` नेपाल  Proper '' .
आज , काठमांडू is नहीं तभी the पूंजी of the संघीय  Democratic Republic of Nepal , but also the headquarters of the Central Development Region of Nepal .
The  सेंट्रल प्रदेश comprises तीन zones  : Bagmati , Narayani , and Janakpur .
Kathmandu is  स्तिथ in the bagmati  Zone .
काठमांडू is the  gateway to tourism in Nepal .
It is also the nerve center  of the देश 's अर्थव्यवस्था  .
It has the most advanced infrastructure of any urban area in  नेपाल , और इसके अर्थव्यवस्था is केन्द्रित on पर्यटन , जिससे accounted लिये  3.8 % of Nepal 's GDP in 1995–96 .
(  पर्यटन in काठमांडू अस्वीकृत thereafter दौरान  a period of political unrest , but since then has improved . )
The city has a rich  इतिहास , spanning nearly 2000 सालो  , as inferred from inscriptions found in the valley .
Religious and cultural festivities form a  प्रमुख भाग of the जीवनदान of लोगों residing  in Kathmandu .
Most of Kathmandu 's people follow Hinduism and  अनेक अन्य follow buddhism  .
There are people of other religious beliefs as well , giving  काठमांडू a कॉस्मोपॉलिटन  culture .
Nepali is the  सबसे commonly बोला भाषा  in the city .
नेपाल bhasa is the स्वदेशी  language spoken by the Newar people .
Hindi is widely  समझा और अंग्रेज़ी is समझा  by Kathmandu 's educated residents .
The city  's साक्षरता रेट  is 98 % .
Kathmandu 's sister cities ( Lalitpur Patan ) and Bhaktapur are integral to Kathmandu 's cultural heritage , tourism  उद्योग , और अर्थव्यवस्था ; इसलिए युनेस्को 's संसार विरासत साईट सूचियाँ सब तीन  cities ' monuments and attractions together under one heading , `` Kathmandu Valley- UNESCO World Heritage Site `` .
Field hockey , usually referred to simply as hockey , is a team sport of the hockey  परिवार जिससे is निभाई between दो टीमों of ग्यारह खिलाड़ी साथ हॉकी  sticks and a hard , solid plastic ball .
At the turn of the 21st century , the game is played globally , with particular popularity  throughout यूरोपीय , एशिया , महासागरीय , और दक्षिण अमेरिका – in जोड to होने  the national sport of Pakistan and India .
The term `` field hockey '' is used  primarily in कनाडा , the संयुक्त राज्य , और अन्य regions  of the world where the sport of ice hockey is more popular .
During play , goal keepers are the only players who are allowed to touch the ball with any part of their body ( with the exception of a player 's hand considered 'part of  the स्टिक ' ) , साथ इस तभी applying भीतर the शूटिंग वृत्त ( भी ज्ञात as the d , or शूटिंग चाप , or बस the वृत्त )  , while field players play the ball with the flat side of their stick .
The team that  स्कोर the  most goals by the end of the match wins .
If the  स्कोर is tied at the समाप्त of the खेल , either a चित्रण is घोषित or the खेल goes into अतिरिक्त समय and/or  a penalty shootout , depending on the competition 's format .
The governing body of hockey is the International Hockey  संघ ( fih ) , साथ मेन और महिलाओं होने represented internationally in प्रतियोगिताओं सहित the ओलम्पिक खेल , राष्ट्रमंडल खेल , हॉकी संसार कप , champions  Trophy and Junior Hockey World Cup , with many countries running extensive junior , senior , and masters ' club competitions .
The FIH is also  जिम्मेदार लिये organising the हॉकी नियम फलक  and developing the rules for the sport .
A popular variant of field hockey is indoor hockey  , जिससे differs in a क्रमांक  of respects while embodying the primary principles of hockey .
Indoor hockey is a 6-a-side  रूपांतर , साथ a फ़ील्ड जिससे is घटाया to लगभग  40m × 20m .
With many of the rules remaining the same , including obstruction and feet , there are several key variations - Players may not raise the ball unless shooting on  लक्ष्य , खिलाड़ी may नहीं hit the बॉल ( बजाय utilising pushes to ट्रांसफ़र the बॉल ) , और the sidelines हैं replaced साथ ठोस बाधाओं जिससे the बॉल  will rebound off .
Ethan `` Cane '' Ashby ( né  एटकिन्सन ) is a fictional अक्षर इससे the अमरीकी  CBS soap opera The Young and the Restless .
He is  portrayed by ऑस्ट्रेलियाई कर्ता डेनियल गोडार्ड , जो originally  auditioned for Brad Snyder on As the World Turns but was recommended for a role on The Young and the Restless instead .
The role was to be portrayed as an American , but Goddard 's  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई descent बहकावे  the character 's background .
Former head writer Lynn Marie Latham introduced him during the  एपीसोड airing on जनवरी 12 , 2007 as an ऑस्ट्रेलियाई बारटेंडर in ढूंढें of उसके परिवार , a डेब्यू कि  received a mixed response .
Latham created Cane as the son of Phillip Chancellor II ( Donnelly Rhodes ) and Jill Foster Abbott ( Jess Walton ) but the character 's  पृष्ठभूमि थी rewritten by मरिया एरिना घंटी in 2009 , reestablishing उसे as the बेटे of कोलिन  and Genevieve Atkinson ( Tristan Rogers and Genie Francis ) .
Though characterized as `` mysterious '' , Cane is `` loyal and  समर्पित '' , जबकि गोडार्ड वर्णित the अक्षर  as a `` typical Australian , working-class kind of guy '' .
He was the first member of the Atkinson family to appear on  the श्रेणी , followed by उसके अभिभावक और  identical twin brother .
Soon after his debut , he became a leading character  , a निर्णय praised by दर्शक  and critics .
The character has been involved with Amber Moore ( Adrienne Frantz ) ,  क्लो मिशेल ( एलिज़ाबेथ hendrickson ) और सबसे notably लिली सर्दियों ( christel  Khalil ) , a romance that garnered significant fan attention .
In 2009 , Cane and Lily were married ; Global  bc होता बाद कॉल लिली the  love of Cane 's life .
The pair had two children , Charlie  और mattie ashby  .
In 2011 , the actor was fired , and  cane थी शॉट to मौत onscreen  .
However , Goddard was  rehired जल्द बाद दर्शक campaigned लिये उसके वापसी , revealing कि cane  's identical twin brother was in fact the man who died .
This sacrificed his marriage to Lily , but  the युगल यहूद remarried on वेलेंटाइन  's Day in 2012 .
Goddard has been widely acclaimed for his portrayal ; Canyon News said that he  portrays the अक्षर honestly  , and is `` always dependable , on fire and exciting '' .
John  क्रिस्टोफर `` जॉनी '' डेप ii ( born जून 9  , 1963 ) is an American actor , film producer , and musician .
He has won the Golden Globe  पुरस्कार और स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड  award for Best Actor .
Depp rose to prominence on the 1980s  टेलीविज़न श्रेणी 21 जम्प गली ,  becoming a teen idol .
Dissatisfied with that status , Depp turned to film for  अधिक चुनौतीपूर्ण भूमिकाएँ ; he निभाई the शीर्षक अक्षर of the acclaimed एडवर्ड scissorhands ( 1990 ) और बाद मिला बक्सा दफ्तर कामयाबी  in films such as Sleepy Hollow ( 1999 ) , Charlie and the Chocolate Factory ( 2005 ) , Alice in Wonderland ( 2010 ) , Rango ( 2011 ) and the Pirates of the Caribbean film series ( 2003–present ) .
He has collaborated with director and friend Tim Burton in  आठ films ; the सबसे हाल  being Dark Shadows ( 2012 ) .
Depp has gained acclaim for his portrayals of such people as Ed Wood in Ed Wood , Joseph D.  pistone in donnie brasco , शिकारी S. थॉम्पसन in भय और loathing in लास वेगास , जार्ज जंग in उड़ा  , and the bank robber John Dillinger in Michael Mann 's Public Enemies .
Films featuring Depp have grossed over $ 3.1 billion  at the संयुक्त राज्य बक्सा दफ्तर  and over $ 7.6 billion worldwide .
He has been nominated for top awards many times , winning the Best Actor Awards  इससे the सुनहरी –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy ग्लोब्स –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy लिये स्वीनी टॉड : the राक्षस नाई of बेड़े  Street and from the Screen Actors Guild for Pirates of the Caribbean : The Curse of the Black Pearl .
He also has garnered a sex symbol status in  अमरीकी सिनेमा  , being twice named as the `` Sexiest Man Alive `` by People magazine in 2003 and 2009 .
He has been listed in the 2012  गिनीज किताब of संसार रिकॉर्ड as the उच्चतम सशुल्क  actor , with $ 75 million .
The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or W3 , commonly known as the web ) , is a  प्रणाली of interlinked हाइपरटेक्स्ट दस्तावेज़ पहुँचा  via the Internet .
With a web browser , one can view web pages that may contain text , images ,  वीडियो , और अन्य मल्टीमीडिया , और  navigate between them via hyperlinks .
Using concepts from his earlier hypertext systems like ENQUIRE , British  इंजीनियर , कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक और at कि समय कर्मचारी of the cern , सर टिम berners-lee , अभी निदेशक of the संसार चौड़ी वेब consortium ( w3c ) , लिखा  a proposal in March 1989 for what would eventually become the World Wide Web .
At CERN , a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and  स्विट्ज़रलैंड , berners-lee और belgian कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक रॉबर्ट cailliau प्रस्तावित in 1990 to उपयोग हाइपरटेक्स्ट `` to कड़ी और अभिगम  information of various kinds as a web of nodes in which the user can browse at will '' , and they publicly introduced the project in December of the same year .
Mark Travis John Sanchez ( born  नवम्बर 11 , 1986 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक  for the New York Jets of the National Football League ( NFL ) .
He was drafted in the first round of the 2009 NFL Draft as  the पांचवां overall चयन by the jets और the  second quarterback taken overall .
He played college football  at the विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिणी  California ( USC ) .
Sanchez grew  up in a well-disciplined और एथलेटिक  family .
In the eighth grade , he began to play  फ़ुटबॉल और सीख the intricacies of the क्वार्टरबैक स्थिति  , training with his father , Nick .
A well-regarded  prospect , सांचेज़ वचनबद्ध to दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया following उसके कामयाब ऊँची स्कूल  career in which he led his team to a championship title during his final season .
At USC , Sanchez was relegated as the backup quarterback during his first three years though he rose to prominence due  to उसके ब्रैड दिखावे on the फ़ील्ड in  2007 due to injuries suffered by starting quarterback John David Booty .
Sanchez also became popular within the  जातियाँ due to उसके mexican-american  heritage .
Named the starter in 2008 , Sanchez led USC to a 12–1 record and won the Rose Bowl against Penn State for  जिससे सांचेज़ थी awarded the सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी पुरस्कार  for his performance on offense .
Although  अनेक माना उसे  too inexperienced , Sanchez announced his intention to enter the 2009 NFL Draft .
He was selected by the Jets after they traded up with the Cleveland Browns , and was named the starting quarterback prior  to the प्रारंभ of the ऋतु .
Despite a subpar performance , Sanchez led the Jets to the AFC Championship Game , a losing effort  to the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस , बनने the चौथी रुकी क्वार्टरबैक in एनएफएल इतिहास  to win his first playoff game and the second to win two playoff games .
In his second season , Sanchez continued to develop and led the Jets to the playoffs and the team 's second consecutive AFC  चैंपियनशिप खेल जहाँ वे narrowly खोया  to the Pittsburgh Steelers , 24–19 .
With the win over the New England Patriots the week prior , Sanchez tied four other  quarterbacks लिये the दूसरी सबसे post-season सड़क victories by a क्वार्टरबैक  in NFL history .
In leading the Jets to two consecutive conference championships , Sanchez  joined क्वार्टरबैक बेन roethlisberger as the तभी दो quarterbacks in एनएफएल  history to reach the conference championship in their first two seasons in the league .
The next two seasons would  be a स्लोप लिये दोनो the टोली और सांचेज़  as they failed to reach the playoffs .
Fans and media critics  पुकारा लिये a struggling  Sanchez to be benched .
He eventually  थी replaced towards  the end of the 2012 season with Greg McElroy .
Paul Avery ( April 2 , 1934December 10 , 2000 )  थी an अमरीकी पुलिस रिपोर्टर , बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके कहानियां  on the infamous serial killer known as the Zodiac , and later for his work on the Patricia Hearst kidnapping .
A small  submersible ac sump पंप साथ  a garden hose connector
A sump  पंप is a पंप प्रयुक्त to हटाएँ जल कि रै संचित  in a water collecting sump basin , commonly found in the basement of homes .
The water may enter via the perimeter drains of a basement waterproofing system , funneling into the basin or because of rain or natural  मैदान जल , if the तहखाने is नीचे the जल तालिका  level .
Sump pumps are used where basement flooding happens  regularly और to उपाय dampness जहाँ the जल तालिका is ऊपर  the foundation of a home .
Sump pumps send water away from a house to any place  जहाँ it is no longer समस्यापूर्ण , ऐसे as a  municipal storm drain or a dry well .
Pumps may discharge to the sanitary  सीवर in पुरानी संस्थापना  .
Once considered acceptable , this practice may now violate the plumbing code or  नगरपालिका bylaws , क्युकी it can  overwhelm the municipal sewage treatment system .
municipalities urge homeowners to डिस्कनेक्ट और  reroute sump pump discharge away from sanitary sewers .
Fines may  be imposed  for noncompliance .
Many homeowners have inherited their sump pump  configurations और do नहीं एहसास  that the pump discharges to the sewer .
If the  निर्वहन is खिलाया to a  laundry sink in the basement , it 's likely going to the sewer .
Usually hardwired into a home 's electrical  प्रणाली , sump पंपों may have a बैटरी बैकअप  .
The home 's pressurized water supply powers some pumps , eliminating the need for electricity at the expense of using potable water , potentially making them  अधिक महंगी to operate than विद्युत पंपों और बनाना an अतिरिक्त  water disposal problem .
Since a sump basin may overflow if not constantly pumped , a backup system is important for cases when the main power is out for prolonged  अवधि  of time , as during a severe storm .
There  हैं generally दो प्रकार of sump  pumps — pedestal and submersible .
The pedestal  पंप 's मोटर is आरोहित ऊपर the sump , जहाँ  it is more easily serviced , but is also more conspicuous .
The pump impeller is driven by a long ,  लंबवत एक्सटेंशन शाफ्ट और the impeller is in a  scroll housing in the base of the pump .
The  submersible पंप is entirely आरोहित अंदर the sump , और  is specially sealed to prevent electrical short circuits .
Sump pump systems are also utilized  in औद्योगिक और वाणिज्यिक अनुप्रयोग to कंट्रोल  water table -related problems in surface soil .
An  आर्टेसियन aquifer or आवधिक ऊँची जल तालिका  situation can cause the ground to become unstable due to water saturation .
As long  as the पंप कृत्यों  , the surface soil will remain stable .
These sumps are typically ten feet in depth or more ; lined  साथ corrugated मेटल पाइप कि contains perforations or नाली  holes throughout .
They may include electronic control systems with visual and audible  सचेतक और हैं प्रायः covered to prevent मलबा और पशु इससे गिरना  in .
Bleeding Kansas , Bloody Kansas or the Border War , was a series of violent political confrontations involving anti-slavery  free-staters और pro-slavery `` किनारा ruffian `` तत्व , कि took प्लेस in the कान्सास territory और the  neighboring towns of Missouri between 1854 and 1861 .
At the heart of the conflict was the question of whether  कान्सास होता डालें the संघ as a फ़्री  state or slave state .
As such , Bleeding Kansas was a proxy war between  northerners और southerners over the समस्या  of slavery in the United States .
The term `` Bleeding Kansas '' was coined by  होरेस greeley of the नई यॉर्क ट्रिब्यून ; the कार्यक्रम it  encompasses directly presaged the American Civil War .
Congress had long  struggled to संतुलन the रूचि of  pro-slavery forces and anti-slavery forces .
The events later known as Bleeding Kansas  यहूद नियत into गति by the kansas–nebraska  Act of 1854 , which nullified the Missouri Compromise and instead implemented the concept of popular sovereignty .
An ostensibly democratic idea , popular sovereignty stated that the inhabitants of each territory or state should decide whether it  होता be a फ़्री or स्लेव राज्य ; however , इस resulted in आव्रजन en masse  to Kansas by activists from both sides .
At one point , Kansas had two separate governments , each with its own  संविधान , हालांकि तभी एक थी federally पहचाना  .
On January 29 , 1861 , Kansas was admitted to the Union as  a फ़्री राज्य , कम than तीन महीने पहले  the Battle of Fort Sumter which began the Civil War .
Benzene is an  सशुल्क रासायनिक यौगिक साथ  the molecular formula C6 H|Hydrogen|H6 .
Its molecule is composed of 6 carbon atoms joined in a ring ,  साथ 1 हाइड्रोजन अणु संलग्न to प्रत्येक  carbon atom .
Because its molecules contain only carbon  और हाइड्रोजन अणु , बेंजीन is classed as  a hydrocarbon .
Benzene is a  प्राकृतिक constituent of crude  oil , and is one of the most basic petrochemicals .
बेंजीन is an खुशबूदार हाइड्रोकार्बन और the दूसरी [ n ] -  annulene ( [ 6 ] -annulene ) , a cyclic hydrocarbon with a continuous pi bond .
It is sometimes abbreviated Ph –H . Benzene  is a colorless और अत्यधिक  flammable liquid with a sweet smell .
It is mainly used as a precursor to heavy chemicals , such as  ethylbenzene और cumene , जिससे हैं  produced on a billion kilogram scale .
Because it has a high octane number , it is an  महत्वपूर्ण घटक of गैसोलीन , composing a few प्रतिशत of इसके  mass .
Most non-industrial  अनुप्रयोग have महरूम सीमित by  benzene 's carcinogenicity .
giovanni virginio स्क्यापारेल्ली ( ; 14  March 1835 – 4 July 1910 ) was an Italian astronomer and science historian .
Wii homebrew refers to the reuse of Nintendo 's Wii  खेल कंसोल to चलाएं तन्त्र कि रै  not been authorized by Nintendo .
it achieves इस by defeating the वी  's copy protection and code signing measures .
In more general terms , Wii Homebrew refers to the use of the Wii 's hardware , accessories and  तन्त्र लिये उद्देश्य बाहर those intended by the निर्माता  .
Original efforts focused on using the Wii Remote as a  इंगित यंत्र on अन्य ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों , or कार्यशील web-based  games in the built-in web browser .
Subsequent developments in games exploits , such as the `` Twilight hack `` , ``  bannerbomb '' और इसके बाद अवतार `` letterbomb '' , `` तोड़ स्टेक '' , `` इंडियाना pwns '' , `` yu-gi-owned  '' , `` bathaxx '' , and `` Return of the Jodi '' , made installing the `` Homebrew Channel `` possible .
Hadley ( right ) discussing  the 2006 israel-lebanon  crisis with Bush and Rice .
Stephen John Hadley ( born February 13 , 1947 ) was the 21st U.S. Assistant to the President for National Security Affairs ( commonly  referred as नेशनल सुरक्षा सलाहकार ) , सेवारत अंतर्गत अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश  .
Take identical growing plants and give  उर्वरक to हाफ of उन्हें  .
If there are differences between the  निषेचित संयंत्र समूह और the unfertilized `` कंट्रोल '' समूह  , these differences may be due to the fertilizer .
A scientific control is an experiment or observation designed to minimize the effects of variables other than the  सिंगल स्वतंत्र परिवर्तनीय  .
This increases the reliability of the results ,  प्रायः through a तुलना between कंट्रोल माप  and the other measurements .
Scientific  नियंत्रण हैं a  part of the scientific method .
For example , during drug testing , scientists  होगा कोशिश to कंट्रोल दो समूह to रखना उन्हें as एकसमान  as possible , then allow one group to try the drug .
Another example might be testing plant  उर्वरक by giving it to तभी हाफ the पौधे in a गार्डन : the पौधे कि प्राप्त no उर्वरक  are the control group , because they establish the baseline level of growth that the fertilizer-treated plants will be compared against .
Without a control group , the experiment can not determine whether  the fertilizer-treated पौधे grow अधिक  than they would have if untreated .
Ideally , all variables in an  प्रयोग होगा be नियंत्रित ( accounted  for by the control measurements ) and none will be uncontrolled .
In such an experiment , if all the controls work as expected , it is possible to  conclude कि the प्रयोग is working as  intended and that the results of the experiment are due to the effect of the variable being tested .
That is ,  वैज्ञानिक नियंत्रण allow an अन्वेषक  to make a claim like `` Two situations were identical until factor X occurred .
चूंकि फ़ैक्टर x is the तभी अंतर between the दो  situations , the new outcome was caused by factor X . ''
