John Adams ( October 30 , 1735 ( O.S  . अक्तूबर 19 , 1735 ) – जुलाई 4 , 1826 ) थी  the second president of the United States ( 1797–1801 ) , having earlier served as the first vice president of the United States .
An  अमरीकी founding पिता , he थी  a statesman , diplomat , and a leading advocate of American independence from Great Britain .
Well educated , he was an Enlightenment  राजनैतिक theorist जो प्रचारित republicanism और लिखा prolifically परिचय उसके प्रायः  seminal ideas , both in published works and in letters to his wife and key adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers .
एडम्स आए to prominence in the जल्दी  stages of the American Revolution .
A lawyer and public figure in Boston , as a delegate from Massachusetts to the Continental  कॉंग्रेस , he निभाई a अग्रणी भूमिका in persuading  Congress to declare independence .
He assisted Thomas Jefferson in  drafting the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता in 1776 , और थी इसके  primary advocate in the Congress .
Later ,  as a राजनयिक in यूरोपीय , he helped negotiate the eventual  peace treaty with Great Britain , and was responsible for obtaining vital governmental loans from Amsterdam bankers .
A political theorist and  इतिहासकार , एडम्स largely लिखा the मैसाचुसेट्स संविधान  in 1780 , which together with his earlier Thoughts on Government , influenced American political thought .
One of his greatest roles was as a judge of character : in 1775 , he nominated George Washington to be commander-in-chief , and 25  सालो बाद मनोनीत जॉन मार्शल to be मुख्य इंसाफ of the  United States .
Adams ' revolutionary credentials  secured उसे दो शर्तें as जार्ज वॉशिंगटन  's vice president and his own election in 1796 as the second president .
During his one term , he encountered ferocious attacks by the Jeffersonian  republicans , as खूब as the प्रबल  faction in his own Federalist Party led by his bitter enemy Alexander Hamilton .
Adams signed the controversial  एलियन और राजद्रोह अधिनियमों , और निर्मित up the फौज और नेवी विशेषकर in  the face of an undeclared naval war ( called the `` Quasi-War `` ) with France , 1798–1800 .
The major accomplishment of his presidency was his peaceful  रेज़ोल्यूशन of the विरोध in the फेस of हैमिल्टन  's opposition .
In 1800 , Adams was  पराजित लिये re-election by थामस  Jefferson and retired to Massachusetts .
He later resumed his  दोस्ती  with Jefferson .
He and his wife , Abigail Adams , founded an accomplished family line of  राजनेता , राजनयिकों , और इतिहासकारों अभी referred to as the एडम्स राजनैतिक  family .
Adams was the  पिता of जॉन क्विंसी एडम्स , the  sixth President of the United States .
His achievements have received greater  मान्यता in आधुनिक टाइम्स , हालांकि उसके योगदान  were not initially as celebrated as those of other Founders .
Adams was the first U.S. president to reside  in the भवन कि आखिरकार became ज्ञात  as the White House .
A  वाट भाप इंजन  .
The steam engine ,  fuelled primarily by कोयले , propelled the औद्योगिक  Revolution in Great Britain and the world .
The Industrial Revolution was the transition to new manufacturing processes that occurred in the  काल इससे परिचय 1760 to कुछ समय between 1820 और 1840 .
This transition included going from hand  उत्पादन विधि to मशीने ,  new chemical manufacturing and iron production processes , improved efficiency of water power , the increasing use of steam power and development of machine tools .
The transition also included the change from wood  और अन्य bio-fuels to कोयले  .
The Industrial revolution began in Britain and  भीतर a few दशकों स्प्रेड to  Western Europe and the United States .
The Industrial Revolution marks a major turning point in  इतिहास ; लगभग प्रत्येक  aspect of daily life was influenced in some way .
Most notably , average income and population began to  प्रदर्शनी unprecedented  sustained growth .
In the words of Nobel Prize winner Robert E. Lucas , Jr. , `` For the first time in history , the living standards of the masses of ordinary people have begun to undergo sustained growth ...  nothing remotely जैसे इस आर्थिक बर्ताव is उल्लेखित by the शास्त्रीय अर्थशास्त्रियों , भी  as a theoretical possibility . ''
William  घंटी स्कॉट आयरन और कोयले  , 1855-60
The period of  समय covered by the औद्योगिक  Revolution varies with different historians .
Eric Hobsbawm held that it  'broke आउट ' in ब्रिटेन in the 1780s  and was not fully felt until the 1830s or 1840s , while T. S. Ashton held that it occurred roughly between 1760 and 1830 .
Some 20th-century historians such as John Clapham and Nicholas Crafts have argued that the process of economic and  सोशल बदलें took प्लेस धीरे और the पद क्रान्ति is a misnomer  .
This is still a subject  of बहस among इतिहासकारों  .
GDP per capita was broadly stable before the Industrial  क्रान्ति और the emergence of the आधुनिक  capitalist economy .
The Industrial Revolution began an era of per-capita economic  विकास in पूंजीवादी economies  .
Economic historians are in agreement that the onset of the Industrial Revolution is the most  महत्वपूर्ण इवेंट in the इतिहास of मानवता चूंकि the domestication of पशु  and plants .
The First Industrial Revolution evolved into the Second Industrial Revolution in the  परिवर्तन सालो between 1840 और 1870 , जब technological और आर्थिक प्रगति gained आवेग साथ the increasing  adoption of steam-powered boats , ships and railways , the large scale manufacture of machine tools and the increasing use of steam powered factories .
Juliet AnnMarie Huddy ( born September 27 , 1969 ) , is an American television news  रिपोर्टर , फिलहाल appearing on फॉक्स न्यूज चैनल  .
This  सूची बाँधने u.S. शहरों by  land area ( not including bodies of water ) .
Total areas ( including water ) are also given , but note that , when  क्रमित by कुल क्षेत्रफल , a क्रमांक of तटीय शहरों appear  disproportionately `` larger '' .
San Francisco is an extreme example ; water makes up nearly 80 %  of इसके कुल क्षेत्रफल of 232 वर्गाकार  miles ( 601 km2 ) .
Note also that in many cases a city may be geographically large primarily  क्युकी इसके नगरपालिका सरकारी रै मिलाया साथ the सरकारी  of the surrounding county .
In some cases the county no longer exists , while in others the arrangement has  formed a संचित city–county ( or city- बरो in अलास्का , or city-  parish in Louisiana ) .
These are shown in bold in the list below ( but not all  उदाहरण may be indicated  ) .
** These are independent cities ,  अर्थ वे हैं नहीं a  part of any county .
The large intestine  ( or bowel , कोलन ) is the पिछला भाग  of the digestive system in vertebrate animals .
Its function is to absorb water from the  बाकी indigestible खाना पदार्थ , और तब to pass  useless waste material from the body .
This article is primarily about  the इंसान आंत , हालांकि the सूचना  about its processes are directly applicable to most mammals .
The large  आंत consists of  the cecum , rectum and anal canal .
It starts in the right iliac region of the pelvis , just at or below the  सही कमर , जहाँ it is joined to the नीचे समाप्त of the छोटी  intestine .
From here  it continues up the उदर , तब आरपार the चौडाई of the  abdominal cavity , and then it turns down , continuing to its endpoint at the anus .
The large intestine  is परिचय long , जिससे is परिचय one-fifth  of the whole length of the intestinal canal .
In Terminologia Anatomica the large intestine  शामिल the cecum  , colon , rectum , and anal canal .
However , some  स्त्रोत exclude the गुदा  canal .
The Green Bay Packers are an  अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल  team based in Green Bay , Wisconsin .
They are members of the  उत्तर प्रभाग of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन  ( NFC ) in the National Football League ( NFL ) .
Green Bay is the  third-oldest मताधिकार in the एनएफएल , having  been organized and playing in 1919 .
The  पैकर्स हैं the तभी non-profit , community-owned  major league professional sports team in the United States .
The Packers are the last  vestige of `` छोटी कस्बा टीमों  '' that were once common in the NFL during the 1920s and 1930s .
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly ''  lambeau ( hence the नाम lambeau फ़ील्ड on जिससे the टोली plays ) और जार्ज  Whitney Calhoun , the Green Bay Packers can trace their lineage to other semi-professional teams in Green Bay dating back to 1896 .
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a semi-professional football team against  क्लब इससे around विस्कॉन्सिन और  the Midwest .
They joined the American Professional Football Association ( APFA  ) in 1921 , the forerunner to कया  is known today as the National Football League ( NFL ) .
Although Green Bay is the last  एनएफएल `` छोटी कस्बा ''  team , its local fan base and media extends into nearby Milwaukee ; the team also played selected home games there between 1933 and 1994 .
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than any other team in the NFL ) , including nine NFL championships prior to the Super Bowl era and four Super Bowl  victories —in 1967 ( सुपर कटोरी i ) , 1968 ( सुपर कटोरी ii ) , 1997 ( सुपर कटोरी xxxi ) और 2011 ( सुपर कटोरी xlv )  .
The Packers have long-standing , bitter rivalries with their NFC North ( formerly the NFC Central )  प्रतिद्वंद्वियों , the शिकागो bears , मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स  and the Detroit Lions .
the bears-packers फंसने is एक of the  oldest rivalries in NFL history , dating back to 1921 .
The  सैन फर्नांडो घाटी ( locally ज्ञात as `` the घाटी '' ) is  an urbanized valley located in the Los Angeles metropolitan area of southern California , United States , defined by the mountains of the Transverse Ranges circling it .
Home to 1.76  लाख लोगों , it झूठ उत्तर of the  larger and more populous Los Angeles Basin .
Nearly two  तिहाई of the घाटी  's land area is part of the City of Los Angeles .
The other incorporated cities in the valley are  ग्लेनडेल , burbank , सैन फर्नांडो , छुपा  Hills and Calabasas .

The exterior  of the वर्तमान संसार  of Coca-Cola at Pemberton Place .
The World of Coca-Cola , is a permanent exhibition  featuring the इतिहास of the coca-cola  Company .
Its well-known advertising as well as a host of  entertainment क्षेत्रों और आकर्षण , और is स्तिथ in अटलांटा , जॉर्जिया ( जहाँ the  company 's headquarters are located ) at Pemberton Place ( named in honor of John Pemberton , the inventor of Coca-Cola ) .
as  भाग of जॉर्जिया  's museums .
the जटिल स्तिथ आरपार बेकर गली इससे centennial  Olympic Park that is home to the Georgia Aquarium and future Center for Civil & Human Rights .
It  खोली to the पब्लिक on may 24 , 2007 , relocating  from and replacing the original exhibit .
Pretties is a 2005  विज्ञान fiction अनोखा और the दूसरी किताब of the  Uglies Trilogy written by Scott Westerfeld .
It is set  in a भविष्य dystopian संसार  in which everyone is turned `` Pretty '' by extreme cosmetic surgery upon reaching age 16 .
It tells the story of teenager Tally Youngblood who  विद्रोहियों विरूद्ध समाज 's enforced  conformity .
Susan Leigh Vaughan Smith ( born September 26 , 1971 ) is an  अमरीकी स्त्री sentenced to जीवन in थाना  for murdering her children .
Born in Union , South Carolina , and a former student of the University of South Carolina Union , she was convicted on July 22 , 1995 for  murdering उसके दो बेटे , 3-year-old माइकल डेनियल  Smith , born October 10 , 1991 , and 14-month-old Alexander Tyler Smith , born August 5 , 1993 .
The case gained worldwide attention shortly after it  विकसित , due to उसके claiming कि a  black man stole her car and kidnapped her sons .
She later claimed that  वो suffered इससे दिमागी स्वास्थ्य मुद्दे  that impaired her judgment .
According to the South Carolina Department of Corrections , Smith will be  योग्य लिये पैरोल on  November 4 , 2024 , after serving a minimum of thirty years .
She is incarcerated at South Carolina 's Leath  correctional संस्था , निकट greenwood  .
Mount McKinley ( also known as Denali  लिया इससे the इनुइट koyukon athabaskan भाषा अर्थ `` the ग्रेट एक '' ) is the  highest mountain peak in the United States and in North America with a summit elevation of above sea level .
At some , the base to peak rise is considered the largest of any mountain  situated entirely ऊपर समुद्र स्तर  .
measured by स्थलाकृतिक prominence , it is the तीसरा सबसे  prominent peak after Mount Everest and Aconcagua .
Located in the Alaska Range in the interior of US state of Alaska , it is the  centerpiece of denali नेशनल पार्क  and Preserve .
The first European to  दस्तावेज़ sighting the पहाड़ थी जार्ज वैंकूवर  in 1794 .
In 1903 , James Wickersham  अंकित the पहला attempt at चढ़ाई  McKinley which was unsuccessful .
in 1906 , फ्रेडरिक  Cook claimed the first ascent which was later proven to be false .
The first verifiable ascent to McKinley 's summit was achieved on June 7 , 1913 by climbers  हडसन stuck , हैरी karstens , वाल्टर  Harper , and Robert Tatum .
In 1951 , Bradford  washburn pioneered the वेस्ट buttress रूट  considered to be the safest and easiest route and therefore the most popular currently in use .
The Honda S600 is an  ऑटोमोबाइल manufactured by  Honda .
It was  शुभारम्भ in कूच  1964 .
Available as a roadster – bearing strong resemblance to the Honda S500 – and as a fastback coupé – introduced in March 1965  – the s600 थी the पहला होंडा उपलब्धियाँ in दो trim स्तर  .
During its production run up to 1966 , the model styling would remain pretty much the same , with the most notable changes coming to the front grille  , बम्पर , और headlights  .
Powered by a DOHC , water-cooled , four-cylinder inline engine with four carburetors , the engine  क्षमता थी increased to 606 cc इससे the s500  's 531 cc .
The engine produced at 8,500 rpm  और था a शीर्ष गति  of .
With the convertible weighing in at mere , the extra sheet metal of the coupe only  added to the overall वज़न  .
Suspension was  स्वतंत्र साथ sealed रोलर  chain drive to each rear wheel .
The S600 was  the पहला द्रव्यमान marketed  Honda car .
First offered only in  right-hand ड्राइव , it जल्द became उपलब्धियाँ  in left-hand drive to appeal to export markets .
There were a few pre-production S500s  manufactured in बाएँ हाथ ड्राइव , दो or तीन भी होने दिखाया in कुछ जल्दी  sales brochures .
Both the S600 roadster and coupé were available in standard trim and a special , upgraded package called the SM600 which included , among other items , special paint colors , exclusive badging , a  मानक रेडियो और स्पीकर , a खास एंटीना in the यात्री पक्ष सूर्य छज्जा , मानक  reversing lights , a standard cigarette lighter , a standard heater , better cushioned seats , and a detachable seat track for quick removal of the passenger seat .
Honda built 3,912 roadsters in 1964 , with  उत्पादन चढ़ाई to 7,261  convertibles and 1,519 coupes in 1965 .
Production dropped off in 1966 ( as they were shifting to  the s800 ) साथ तभी 111 roadsters और 281 coupes , giving  tallies of 11,284 convertibles and 1,800 coupes for the 3 year span .
Everybody Hates Chris is an American television period sitcom that depicts the teenage experiences of comedian Chris Rock ( who is also the narrator ) while growing  up in the bedford-stuyvesant पड़ोस of  Brooklyn , New York .
The show  is नियत between 1983 और 1987 ;  however , Rock himself was a teenager between 1978 and 1983 .
Rock grew up with a  लड़के नामित केनी montero , जिसको he रै प्रायः referred to  as the inspiration for a lot of the episodes .
in अनेक साक्षात्कार , चट्टान रै  described Kenny as the reason he got into comedy in the first place .
The show 's  शीर्षक parodies the सीबीएस  sitcom Everybody Loves Raymond .
Rock stated : `` Everybody Loves Raymond but  everybody hates क्रिस  ! `` .
The show 's lead actors are Tyler James  विलियम्स , टेरी क्रू , tichina अर्नाल्ड , tequan रिचमंड , imani  Hakim , and Vincent Martella .
In Fall 2008 , the The CW moved Everybody Hates Chris and  the खेल to the शुक्रवार रात्रि मौत  slot .
The fourth season of the series premiered Friday , October 3 ,  2008 , at 8:00pm eastern/7:00pm सेंट्रल  .
On May 21 , 2009 , The CW announced that it had  रद्द everybody hates क्रिस  .
Prior to this , executive producer Chris  चट्टान घोषित कि the समाप्त of ऋतु  4 matched up with his own past—dropping out of high school to become a comedian—and that it was time to end the show .
Pleural effusion is excess fluid that accumulates between  the दो pleural परतों , the fluid-filled स्पेस कि  surrounds the lungs .
Excessive amounts of such fluid can impair breathing by limiting the  विस्तार of the फेफड़े  during ventilation .
Beowulf ( ; in Old English or ) is the conventional title of an Old English heroic epic poem consisting  of 3182 alliterative long लाइनों , नियत in scandinavia , commonly cited as एक of the  most important works of Anglo-Saxon literature .
it survives in a सिंगल  manuscript known as the Nowell Codex .
Its  संयोजन by an बेनाम anglo-saxon कवि  is dated between the 8th and the early 11th century .
In 1731 , the manuscript was badly damaged by a fire that swept through a building housing a collection  of मध्यकालीन पांडुलिपियों समवेत by सर रॉबर्ट ब्रूस कपास  .
The poem fell into obscurity for decades , and its existence did not become widely known  again जबतक it थी मुद्रित in 1815 in an संस्करण prepared by the icelandic-danish विद्वान  Grímur Jónsson Thorkelin .
In the poem , Beowulf , a hero of the Geats  in scandinavia , आता to the सहायता of hroðgar , the किंग  of the Danes , whose mead hall ( in Heorot ) has been under attack by a monster known as Grendel .
After Beowulf slays him , Grendel 's  माँ हमले the हॉल  and is then also defeated .
Victorious , Beowulf goes home  to geatland in स्वीडन  and later becomes king of the Geats .
After a period of fifty years has passed ,  बियोवुल्फ़ defeats a ड्रैगन , लकिन  is fatally wounded in the battle .
After his death , his  सेवकों दफनाने उसे in a tumulus  , a burial mound , in Geatland .
Shem Ham and Japheth by  जेम्स tissot  1904 .
Shem ( ; Sēm ; Arabic : Sām ; Ge'ez : ሴም , Sēm ; `` renown ;  समृद्धि ; नाम '' ) थी एक of the बेटे of  Noah in the Hebrew Bible as well as in Islamic literature .
He is most popularly regarded as the eldest son , though some  परंपराओं लिहाज़ उसे as the दूसरी  son .
Genesis 10:21 refers to relative ages of Shem and his brother Japheth ,  लकिन साथ sufficient ambiguity to have yielded अलग  translations .
The verse is translated in the KJV as `` Unto Shem also , the father of all the children of Eber ,  the bhai of japheth the elder , भी  to him were children born . `` .
However , the New American Standard Bible  देता , `` भी to shem , the पिता of सब the children  of Eber , and the older brother of Japheth , children were born . ''
Genesis 11:10 records that Shem was still 100 years old at the birth of Arphaxad , ( but  nearly 101 - देखिए कालक्रम नोट , ) दो सालो बाद the बाढ़ , बनाना उसे मुश्किल 99 at the  time the flood began ; and that he lived for another 500 years after this , making his age at death 600 years .
The children of Shem were Elam , Asshur , Arphaxad , Lud ,  और aram , in जोड  to daughters .
Abraham , the patriarch of the Hebrews and Arabs ,  थी एक of the  descendants of Arphaxad .
Islamic  साहित्य describes shem as  one of the believing sons of Noah .
Some sources  भी पहचानो shem as a नबी in उसके अपना सही  and that he was the next prophet after his father .
In one Muslim legend , Shem was one of the people that God made  यीशु उठाएगा as a चिह्न to the children of इसराईल  .
The 1st century historian Flavius  josephus , among अनेक अन्य , recounted the परंपरा कि ये पाँच बेटे यहूद  the progenitors of the nations of Elam , Assyria , Chaldea , Lydia , and Syria , respectively .
Semitic is still a commonly used term for the Semitic languages , as a subset of the Afro-Asiatic  भाषाएं , denoting the आम भाषाई विरासत of अरबी , aramaic , अक्कादी , ethiopic , यहूदी और फ़ोनीशियाई भाषाएं  .
According to some Jewish traditions ( e.g. , B. Talmud Nedarim 32b ; Genesis Rabbah 46:7 ; Genesis Rabbah 56:10 ; Leviticus Rabbah 25:6 ; Numbers Rabbah  4:8 . ) , shem is believed to have महरूम melchizedek , किंग of सलेम जिसको अब्राहम is अंकित to have मिले बाद the बैटल of the  four kings .
In a few of the many extra-biblical sources  कि describe उसे ,  Shem is also credited with killing Nimrod , son of Cush .
Shem is mentioned in Genesis 5:32 , 6:10 ; 7:13 ; 9:18,23,26-27 ; 10 ; 11:10 ;  भी in 1 क्रॉनिकल्स 1:4  .
Geographic identifications of Flavius Josephus , c. 100 AD ;  japheth 's बेटे दिखाया in रेड , हैम 's बेटे in ब्लू  , Shem 's sons in green .
Go Daddy or Go Daddy Group Inc. is a  privately आयोजित कम्पनी कि is primarily an  internet domain registrar and web hosting company .
Go Daddy Group Inc. filed for an IPO in 2006 ,  लकिन बाद रद्द it , due to `` मार्केट  uncertainties '' .
In addition to domain registration and hosting Go  पापा भी बिकता e-business सम्बन्धित तन्त्र  and services .
On June 24 , 2011 , The Wall Street Journal reported that private-equity firms KKR and Silver Lake Partners , along  साथ a तीसरा निवेशकों , यहूद nearing a सौदे to ख़रीदे  the company for between $ 2–2.5 billion .
On July 1 , 2011 Go Daddy confirmed that KKR ,  चांदी झील साझेदार और प्रौद्योगिकी क्रॉसओवर ventures था बंद the सौदे .
Although the purchase price was not  officially घोषित it थी reported to be $  2.25 billion , for 65 % of the company .
, Bob Parsons had ceded the CEO role of Go Daddy to Warren Adelman , who had  महरूम साथ the कम्पनी लिये परिचय 10  years .

Andorra ( ; , ) , officially the Principality of Andorra ( ) , also  पुकारा the principality of the घाटियों of अंडोरा , ( ) , is a landlocked microstate in southwestern यूरोपीय , स्तिथ in the  eastern Pyrenees mountains and bordered by Spain and France .
It is the sixth  smallest स्वदेश in यूरोपीय , having an क्षेत्रफल of और an  estimated population of 85,000 in 2012 .
Its capital , Andorra la  वेला , is the उच्चतम पूंजी नगर in यूरोपीय  , at an elevation of above sea level .
The official language is Catalan ,  हालांकि स्पेनी , पुर्तगाली , और फ्रेंच हैं भी commonly  spoken .
Created under a charter in 988 , the  उपस्थित principality थी  formed in 1278 .
It is known as a  principality as it is a साम्राज्य headed  by two co-princes – the Bishop of Urgell and the President of France .
Andorra is a prosperous country mainly because of its tourism industry , which services an estimated 10.2 million  विज़िटर annually , और भी क्युकी of इसके  status as a tax haven .
It is not a member of the European Union , but the euro is the de  facto करेंसी .
The people of Andorra have the 4th highest human life expectancy in  the संसार  — 82 years at birth .
The  जार्ज वॉशिंगटन विश्वविद्यालयों ( gw  , GWU , or George Washington ) is a comprehensive private , coeducational research university located in Washington , D.C. .
It awards  प्रमाणपत्र , स्नातक  degrees , Masters degrees , and PhDs across several dozen disciplines .
The university was chartered by an Act of Congress on  फ़रवरी 9 , 1821 as the columbian कॉलेज in  the District of Columbia .
Kimberly  नोएल `` किम '' कार्दशियन ( born  October 21 , 1980 ) is an American socialite , television personality and occasional actress .
In 2007 , she gained notoriety as the subject of a sex tape that subsequently resulted in a court awarding  उसके $ 5 लाख ; बाद in कि वही साल , वो और उसके  family rose to prominence with their E !
reality television series Keeping Up with the Kardashians ,  और इसके subsequent spin-offs , सहित कोर्टनी  and Kim Take New York and Kourtney and Kim Take Miami .
In 2010 , Kardashian  थी the highest-earning वास्तविकता  star , with estimated earnings of $ 6 million .
With sisters Kourtney and Khloé ,  कार्दशियन co-owns the फ़ैशन बुटीक कड़ी  D-A-S-H .
She has been involved in the  उत्पादन of अनेक लाइनों of कपडे  and fragrances .
In August 2011 , Kardashian married basketball player Kris Humphries in a  widely publicized रस्म .
That October , Kardashian filed for divorce  following 72 दिनों of विवाह .
The move garnered significant backlash from the media ,  जो labeled it a `` publicity  stunt '' .
After 536 days , Kardashian  और humphries पहुँचे an अघोषित उपनिवेश at the लॉस एंजिल्स  Superior Court , finalizing the divorce in April 2013 .

Oahu ( ) or Oahu , known as `` The Gathering Place '' , is the  तीसरा largest of the हवाई आइलैंड्स और the सबसे  populous of the islands in the U.S. state of Hawaii .
The state capital , Honolulu  , is on oahu 's southeast  coast .
Including small close-in offshore islands such as Ford Island and the islands in  kaneohe खाड़ी और बंद the पूर्वी ( windward ) coast , it रै a कुल जमीन  area of , making it the 20th largest island in the United States .
In the greatest dimension ,  इस volcanic द्वीप is long  and across .
The  लंबाई of the  shoreline is .
The island is the result of two  पृथक शील्ड ज्वालामुखी : waianae और koolau , साथ a व्यापक `` घाटी ''  or saddle ( the central Oahu Plain ) between them .
The highest point is Mt  . ka'ala in the  Waianae Range , rising to above sea level .
The base currency  of the संयुक्त राज्य is the u.S. डालर , और is मुद्रित on  bills in denominations of $ 1 , $ 2 , $ 5 , $ 10 , $ 20 , $ 50 , and $ 100 .
At one time , however , U.S. currency  शामिल  five larger denominations .
Notes in the denominations of $ 500 , $ 1,000 , $ 5,000 , and $ 10,000 were printed for general use , and a $ 100,000  नोट थी मुद्रित लिये निश्चित आतंरिक ट्रांजेक्शन  .
British  होंडुरास थी a अंग्रेजों  colony in Central America .
In 1981 , the colony gained full  स्वतंत्रता , और is अभी the स्वतंत्र स्वदेश of बेलीज़  .
First colonised by Spaniards in the  17th सदी , the territory on the ईस्ट coast  of Central America , south of Mexico , became a British crown colony in 1862 .
In 1964 , it  became a self-governing  colony .
बेलीज़ became fully स्वतंत्र  from the United Kingdom in 1981 .
Belize was the last  महाद्वीपीय कब्ज़ा  of the United Kingdom in the Americas .
Spelt , also known as dinkel wheat , or hulled wheat ,  is an प्राचीन प्रजाति of गेहूं इससे the  fifth millennium BC .
Spelt was an important staple in parts of Europe from the  कांस्य आयु to मध्यकालीन टाइम्स ; it अभी survives as a relict क्रॉप  in Central Europe and northern Spain and has found a new market as a health food .
Spelt is  sometimes माना a subspecies of the closely सम्बन्धित प्रजाति  common wheat ( T. aestivum ) , in which case its botanical name is considered to be Triticum aestivum subsp . spelta .
It is a hexaploid wheat , which means it has  छह सेट of गुणसूत्रों  .
Sherlock Holmes ( or  ) is a fictional जासूस निर्मित by लेखक और  physician Sir Arthur Conan Doyle .
A London-based ``  परामर्श जासूस '' जिनकी abilities किनारा on the fantastic , holmes  is famous for his astute logical reasoning , his ability to adopt almost any disguise , and his use of forensic science skills to solve difficult cases .
Holmes , who first appeared in  प्रकाशन in 1887 , थी प्रदर्शित in चार novels  and 56 short stories .
The first novel , A Study in Scarlet , appeared in Beeton  's क्रिसमस सालाना in 1887 और the दूसरी  , The Sign of the Four , in Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine in 1890 .
The character grew tremendously in  लोकप्रियता साथ the पहला श्रेणी of छोटी कहानियां in the strand पत्रिका , शुरूआत  with A Scandal in Bohemia in 1891 ; further series of short stories and two novels published in serial form appeared between then and 1927 .
The stories cover a  काल इससे around  1880 up to 1914 .
All but four stories are narrated by Holmes 's  dost और biographer , dr. जॉन H. वाटसन ; दो हैं narrated by holmes खुद ( `` the blanched सिपाही `` और `` the शेर 's माने `` ) और दो अन्य हैं लिखा  in the third person ( `` The Mazarin Stone `` and `` His Last Bow `` ) .
In two stories (  `` the musgrave अनुष्ठान ``  and `` The Gloria Scott `` ) , Holmes tells Watson the main story from his memories , while Watson becomes the narrator of the frame story .
The first and fourth novels , A Study in Scarlet and The  घाटी of भय , प्रत्येक शामिल a long अंतराल of सर्वज्ञ narration recounting  events unknown to either Holmes or Watson .
The United States House of Representatives is one  of the दो घरों of the संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस  ( a bicameral legislature ) .
It is frequently referred  to as the  House .
The  अन्य हाउस is  the Senate .
The  संयोजन और शक्तियां of the हाउस हैं स्थापित in  Article One of the United States Constitution .
The major power of the House is to pass federal  विधान कि affects the संपूर्ण देश हालांकि इसके बिल्स जरूर भी be passed  by the Senate and further agreed to by the U.S. President before becoming law ( unless both the House and Senate re-pass the legislation with a two-thirds majority in each chamber ) .
The House has several exclusive powers : the power  to initiate आय बिल्स , to impeach officials , और to elect the u.S. अध्यक्ष  in case there is no majority in the Electoral College .
Each U.S. state is represented in the  हाउस in proportion to इसके  population but is entitled to at least one representative .
The most populous state , California ,  फिलहाल रै 53 प्रतिनिधि  .
The total number of voting  प्रतिनिधि is फिक्स्ड by विधि at 435  .
प्रत्येक प्रतिनिधि serves  for a two-year term .
The Speaker of the United States House of Representatives , who  presides over the कक्ष , is निर्वाचित by the सदस्यों of the हाउस ,  and is therefore traditionally the leader of the House Democratic Caucus or the House Republican Conference , whichever party has more voting members .
The House meets in the south wing of  the संयुक्त राज्य कैपिटल  .
jell-o is a ब्रांड नाम belonging to u.s.-based kraft भोजन लिये a क्रमांक of जिलेटिन  desserts , including fruit gels , puddings and no-bake cream pies .
The brand 's popularity has led to it being used as a generic  पद लिये जिलेटिन मिठाई आरपार the u.S.  and Canada .
Kennywood is an amusement park located in West Mifflin ,  पेन्सिलवेनिया , a उपनगरीय of पिट्सबर्ग  .
The park first opened in 1898 as a `` trolley park '' attraction at the end of  the mellon परिवार 's monongahela गली रेल  .
The park was purchased in 1906 by F. W.  henninger और एंड्रयू mcswigan और यूँ began  the Kennywood Entertainment company that has remained a closely held family business for over 100 years .
This traditional amusement park still has structures and rides dating back to its opening  और the जल्दी 1900s  .
Along with  rye playland पार्क , it is एक of तभी दो मनोरंजन  parks listed in the National Register of Historic Places .
Kennywood is owned  by kennywood entertainment कम्पनी , जिससे जबतक दिसम्बर 2007 थी a closely  held family business owned by the Henninger and McSwigan families .
Kennywood Entertainment is now operated by California-based Palace Entertainment , a subsidiary  of parques reunidos , an अंतरराष्ट्रीय मनोरंजन  park company based in Madrid , Spain .
Parque Reunidos is in turn  a subsidiary of candover  Investments , an investment fund based in the UK .
A Social Security card issued by the  रेलरोड रिटायरमेंट फलक in 1943 to a अभी  deceased person .
In the United States , a Social Security number ( SSN ) is a nine-digit number issued to U.S. citizens , permanent residents , and temporary (  working ) निवासियों अंतर्गत खण्ड 205 ( c ) ( 2 ) of the सोशल सुरक्षा अधिनियम , संहिताबद्ध as  .
The number is issued to an  व्यक्तिगत by the सोशल सुरक्षा प्रशासन , an स्वतंत्र  agency of the United States government .
Its primary purpose is to  track individuals  for Social Security purposes .
A Social Security number may be obtained by applying  on रूप ss-5  , `` Application for A Social Security Number Card '' .
Minimalism describes movements in various forms of art and design  , विशेषकर विज़ुअल आर्ट और म्यूज़िक , जहाँ the कार्य is नियत आउट to expose the essence or पहचान of a विषय through  eliminating all non-essential forms , features or concepts .
Minimalism is any design or style in  जिससे the सरलतम और fewest तत्व  are used to create the maximum effect .
As a specific movement in the arts it is identified with developments in post–World War II Western  आर्ट , सबसे strongly  with American visual arts in the 1960s and early 1970s .
Prominent artists associated with this movement include Donald Judd , John McCracken , Agnes Martin  , डान flavin , रॉबर्ट मॉरिस , ऐनी truitt  , and Frank Stella .
It is rooted in the reductive aspects of  modernism  , and is often interpreted as a reaction against Abstract expressionism and a bridge to Postminimal art practices .
The terms have expanded to encompass a movement in music which features repetition and iteration , as in the  रचनाएं of la मोंटे यंग , टेरी रिले , स्टीव reich , फिलिप कांच , और जॉन  Adams .
Minimalist  रचनाएं हैं sometimes ज्ञात  as systems music .
The term `` minimalist '' is often applied  colloquially to designate anything  that is spare or stripped to its essentials .
It has also been used to describe the plays and novels of Samuel Beckett , the films of Robert Bresson , the stories of  रेमंड carver , और भी  the automobile designs of Colin Chapman .
The word was first used in English in the early  20th सदी to describe the  Mensheviks .
In chemistry and physics , Dalton 's  विधि ( भी पुकारा डाल्टन 's विधि of आंशिक pressures )  states that the total pressure exerted by the mixture of non-reactive gases is equal to the sum of the partial pressures of individual gases .
This empirical law was observed by John  डाल्टन in 1801 और is सम्बन्धित to the  ideal gas laws .
Mathematically , the pressure of a mixture of gases  can be पारिभाषित as the संकलन
or
where  represent the आंशिक दबाव  of each component .
it is assumed कि the  gases do not react with each other
where is the mole fraction of the i-th  घटक in the कुल मिश्रण  of n components .
the संबंध नीचे provides a रास्ता to determine  the volume based concentration of any individual gaseous component
where is the  विशेषज्ञता of the i-th  component expressed in ppm .
Dalton 's  विधि is नहीं exactly  followed by real gases .
Those  deviations हैं considerably  large at high pressures .
In such conditions , the volume occupied  by the अणुओं can become significant compared to the फ़्री स्पेस  between them .
In particular , the short average  दूरियाँ between अणुओं उठाता the तीव्रता of intermolecular शक्तियां between गैस अणुओं पर्याप्त to substantially  change the pressure exerted by them .
Neither of those effects are  माना by the आदर्श गैस मॉडल  .

What  इस सूची शामिलs:
कॉलेजों और  universities within the United States

Enrollment is counted by the Integrated  post-secondary शिक्षा प्रणाली भीतर  the U.S. Department of Education .
Enrollment is the 12-month  unduplicated headcount , indicating the क्रमांक of अद्वितीय  students who attended the university during the year .
What this list does not  include:
Any indication of how many of the enrolled students are full or part time ( e.g. , some  विश्वविद्यालयों may have a ऊँची नामांकन , लकिन have सबसे विद्यार्थी नामांकित in तभी a  single class )
