`` Right Round '' is a  सोंग performed by अमरीकी rapper flo rida , released as the सीसे  single from his second studio album , R.O.O.T.S . ( 2009 ) .
The song  सुविधाएँ अतिथि  vocals from Kesha .
It was released to radio on  27 जनवरी 2009 और थी  digitally released on 10 February by Poe Boy Entertainment and Atlantic Records .
The song lyrically speaks of Flo  rida 's जाल बॉल रेफरी enthusiasm , जबकि  adapting the chorus of the 1984 Dead or Alive song `` You Spin Me Round ( Like a Record ) `` in its hook .
According to one of the song 's writers ,  the कोरस refers to  oral sex .
Kesha contributed  अतिथि vocals to the सोंग , लकिन in the संयुक्त राज्य  , during the run atop the chart , Kesha was uncredited .
The song received mostly negative reviews from critics , who  claimed it थी kitsch और  misogynistic .
However , it was a commercial success , reaching the top ten  of the चार्ट in उन्नीस  countries worldwide .
In the United States , it became Flo Rida 's second number-one single and broke the record for  first-week बिक्री जब it थी released to डिजिटल रिटेलर  .
The single 's accompanying music video was directed by Malcolm Jones and  मनोनीत लिये an एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक  Award .
The song  रै महरूम प्रयुक्त in अनेक फिल्मों , ऐसे as the hangover  , The Ugly Truth and the Telugu movie Pilla Zamindar .
In the movie Pitch Perfect , the  सोंग is performed by the a cappella  group the Treblemakers .
The Chief Justice of the United States is the head of the United States federal court system ( the judicial branch of the federal  सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य ) और the मुख्य न्यायधीश of the परम्  Court of the United States .
The Chief Justice is one of  नौ परम् अदालत justices ; the अन्य आठ हैं the संबद्ध  Justices of the Supreme Court of the United States .
From 1789  जबतक 1866 , the दफ्तर  was known as the Chief Justice of the Supreme Court .
The Chief Justice is the highest judicial officer in the country , and acts as a chief administrative officer for the federal courts and as  सिर of the न्यायिक सम्मेलन of the संयुक्त राज्य appoints  the director of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts .
The  मुख्य इंसाफ  also serves as a spokesperson for the judicial branch .
The Chief Justice  लीड the कारोबार of  the Supreme Court .
He presides over oral arguments before the  अदालत .
When the court renders an opinion , the Chief Justice—when in the  majority—decides जो writes  the court 's opinion .
The Chief Justice also has significant agenda-setting  शक्ति over the अदालत 's बैठक  .
In the case of an impeachment of a President of the United States , which has  occurred twice , the मुख्य इंसाफ presides over the विचारण  in the Senate .
In modern tradition , the Chief  इंसाफ रै the ceremonial  duty of administering the oath of office of the President of the United States .
The first Chief  इंसाफ थी जॉन jay  .
The 17th and current  मुख्य इंसाफ is जॉन G.  Roberts , Jr .
Caribou  निकट prudhoe खाड़ी  , 1973
Prudhoe Bay Oil Field is a large oil  फ़ील्ड on अलास्का 's  North Slope .
It is the largest oil field in both the United States and in North  अमेरिका , covering और originally containing  approximately of oil .
The amount of recoverable oil in the field is more than  दोगुना कि of the अगला largest  field in the United States , the East Texas oil field .
The field is operated by BP ; partners are ExxonMobil and  conocophillips  Alaska .
Labor unions are legally  पहचाना as प्रतिनिधि of मजदूर in अनेक उद्योग  in the United States .
Their activity today centers on collective bargaining over wages , benefits ,  और working शर्तें लिये उनके सदस्यता , और on representing उनके सदस्यों in विवादों  with management over violations of contract provisions .
Larger unions also typically engage in lobbying activities and  electioneering at the राज्य और संघीय स्तर  .
Most unions in America are aligned with one of two larger umbrella organizations  : the afl-cio निर्मित in 1955 , और the बदलें to जीत संघ जिससे विभाजित इससे  the AFL-CIO in 2005 .
Both advocate  नीतियों और विधान on निमित्त of मजदूर in the  United States and Canada , and take an active role in politics .
the afl-cio is विशेषकर चिंतित  with global trade issues .
In 2010 , the percentage of workers belonging to a union in the United States ( or total labor union `` density '' ) was 11.4 % ,  compared to 18.4 % in जर्मनी , 27.5 % in कनाडा , और  70 % in Finland .
संघ सदस्यता in the निजी  sector has fallen under 7 % — levels not seen since 1932 .
Unions allege that employer-incited opposition  रै contributed to इस मनाही in सदस्यता  .
The most prominent  संघ हैं among पब्लिक सेक्टर  employees such as teachers and police .
Members of unions are  disproportionately पुरानी , पुरूष और  residents of the Northeast , the Midwest , and California .
Union workers average 10-30 % higher pay than non-union in America after controlling for individual , job ,  और मजदूर मार्केट विशेषताएँ  .
Although much smaller compared to their peak membership in the 1950s , American unions remain a prominent political factor , both through mobilization of their own memberships and through coalitions with  like-minded activist संगठन around मुद्दे ऐसे as अप्रवासी अधिकारों , व्यापार नीति , स्वास्थ्य परवाह , और जीना मजदूरी  campaigns .
To fight alleged employer anti-union programs , unions are currently advocating new `` card check `` federal legislation that would require employers to bargain with a union if  अधिक than 50 % of मजदूर हस्ताक्षरित फ़ॉर्म , or `` ताश , '' stating  they wish to be represented by that union .
The current procedure  involves प्रतीक्षारत 45 to 90 दिनों लिये a federally पर्यवेक्षित  secret-ballot employee referendum on the subject .
The economist Joseph Stiglitz has asserted that , `` Strong unions  have helped to reduce असमानता , whereas weaker  unions have made it easier for CEOs , sometimes working with market forces that they have helped shape , to increase it . ''
The  मनाही in unionization चूंकि wwii in the संयुक्त राज्य  has been associated with a pronounced rise in income and wealth inequality .
A Christian Lacroix  फ़ैशन  boutique
A boutique is a small shopping  आउटलेट , विशेषकर एक कि  specializes in elite and fashionable items such as clothing and jewelry .
The word  is फ्रेंच लिये  `` shop '' , via Latin from Greek ἀποθήκη ( apothēkē ) , `` storehouse '' .
The term entered into everyday English use in the  लेट 1960s जब , लिये a ब्रैड काल , लंदन  was the centre of the fashion trade .
Carnaby Street and the Kings Road were  the फ़ोकस of much मीडिया ध्यान as  home to the most fashionable boutiques of the era .
Now the East of London has been regenerated and more Boutiques pop up in fashionable areas ,  ऐसे as मीनार सेतु सड़क  .
It can also refer to a specialised firm such as a boutique investment  बैंको or बुटीक  law firm .
The word is often used to describe a property in the independent section  of the होटल मार्केट ( ऐसे as the rockwell in लंदन ) in अनुक्रम  to distinguish themselves from larger chains ( such as Hilton Hotels ) .
In such cases the  establishments उद्देश्य to convey the विचार कि  the operation is elite and highly specialised .
In the strictest sense of the word , boutiques would be one-of-a-kind but more generally speaking , some  जंजीरों can be referred to as boutiques if वे specialize  in particular styles .
Recently , the term `` boutique '' has started being applied to normally-mass-market items that are  either niche or उत्पादित  in intentionally small numbers at very high prices .
इस may be referred to as  boutique manufacturing .
For example , before the release of the Wii , a Time Magazine article suggested that Nintendo could become a `` boutique video-game company '' , producing games for niche  ऑडियंस , बल्कि than trying to compete सीधे साथ microsoft  and Sony .
In the traditional luxury- watch industry Scalfaro International is considered as the  precursor in निर्माण और बिक्री of bespoke घड़ियाँ  .
The Swiss company uses a highly flexible boutique manufacturing site  , जिससे allows producing छोटी श्रेणी or भी अद्वितीय  timepieces .
Although some boutiques specialise in hand-made items and other truly one-of-a-kind items ,  अन्य बस उपज t-shirts , स्टिकर , और अन्य फ़ैशन accessories in artificially छोटी  runs and sell them at unusually high prices .
In the  जल्दी 1990s सेलिना प्रारंभ  manufacturing her own line of women 's clothing .
Opening two boutiques  labeled as `` सेलिना इत्यादि . बुटीक  & Salon '' One located in Corpus Christi and one located in San Antonio , Texas .
One was due to  खोलें in monterrey , मैक्सिको , in 1995  but due to her death it was not opened .
Around 1999 the San Antonio  स्थान बंद और the कॉर्पस  Christi location was closed in 2009 .
In late 1990s some European retail traders developed the idea of tailoring a shop towards a  जीवनशैली थीम , in the रूप of `` अवधारणा स्टोर्स '' , जिससे specialised in cross-selling बगैर using  separate departments .
One of the first concept stores was 10 Corso Como in Milan , Italy followed by Colette  in पेरिस और quartier 206 in बर्लिन  .
Several well-known American chains such as Urban Outfitters ,  d-a-s-h , और the गैप , ऑस्ट्रेलियाई कड़ी billabong और ,  though less common , Lord & Taylor adapted to the concept store trend after 2000 .
Navy Federal Credit Union (  or नेवी संघीय ) is a क्रेडिट संघ headquartered in  Vienna , Virginia , chartered and regulated under the authority of the National Credit Union Administration ( NCUA ) of the U.S. federal government .
Navy Federal is the largest  प्राकृतिक सदस्य ( or खुदरा ) क्रेडिट संघ in  the world , both in asset size and in membership .
As of  सितंबर 2012 , नेवी संघीय था over $  50 billion USD in assets , and over 4 million members .
Stevland Hardaway Morris ( born May 13 , 1950 as Stevland Hardaway Judkins ) , known by his stage name Stevie Wonder , is an  अमरीकी सिंगर , songwriter , और multi-instrumentalist , a चाइल्ड prodigy जो विकसित into एक of the सबसे रचनात्मक  musical figures of the late 20th century .
Blind since shortly after birth , Wonder signed with Motown 's Tamla label at the age  of ग्यारह , और continues to perform और रिकार्ड लिये motown to इस दिन  .
Among Wonder 's best known works  हैं singles ऐसे as `` अंधविश्वास `` , ``  Sir Duke `` , `` You Are the Sunshine of My Life `` and `` I Just Called to Say I Love You `` .
Well known albums also include Talking  किताब , innervisions और गीतों in the कुंजी  of Life .
He has recorded more than thirty U.S. top  टेन हिट्स और प्राप्त twenty-two ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , the सबसे  ever awarded to a male solo artist .
Wonder is also noted for his work as an activist for  राजनैतिक कल्याणकारी , सहित उसके 1980 अभियान to मेक  Martin Luther King , Jr. 's birthday a holiday in the United States .
In 2009 , Wonder was named a United  राष्ट्र मेसेंजर of सलाम  .
In 2008 ,  बिलबोर्ड पत्रिका released a सूची of the hot 100 all-time शीर्ष कलाकारों  to celebrate the US singles chart 's fiftieth anniversary , with Wonder at number five .
By popular vote , Stevie was inducted into The SoulMusic Hall of Fame  at soulmusic.com in दिसम्बर 2012  .
Psychosis ( from  the यूनानी ψυχή `` psyche '' , लिये mind/soul , और -ωσις `` -ओएसआईs '' , लिये असामान्य कंडीशन or derangement ) refers to an असामान्य  condition of the mind , and is a generic psychiatric term for a mental state often described as involving a `` loss of contact with reality `` .
लोगों कष्ट इससे मनस्ताप हैं  described as psychotic .
Psychosis is given to the more severe forms of psychiatric disorder , during which  मति और delusions , सकल उत्तेजना or बेहोशी और impaired इनसाइट  may occur .
the पद `` मनस्ताप '' is बहुत व्यापक और can औसत  anything from relatively normal aberrant experiences through to the complex and catatonic expressions of schizophrenia and bipolar type 1 disorder .
Moreover a wide variety of central nervous system diseases , from both external  substances और आतंरिक physiologic बीमारी , can उपज लक्षण  of psychosis .
This led many  पेशेवर to कह कि मनस्ताप is  not specific enough as a diagnostic term .
Despite this , `` psychosis '' is generally given to noticeable deficits in normal behavior ( negative signs ) and more commonly  to विविध प्रकार of मति or delusional मान्यताओं ( e.g . grandiosity  , delusions of persecution ) .
Someone exhibiting very obvious signs may  be वर्णित as `` frankly psychotic '' , whereas एक exhibiting बहुत हल्का  signs could be classified in the category of an `` attenuated psychotic risk syndrome '' .
An excess in dopaminergic signalling is traditionally linked to the positive  लक्षण of मनस्ताप , विशेषकर those of schizophrenia  .
This is thought to occur through a  यांत्रिकी of aberrant salience  of environmental stimuli .
Many antipsychotic drugs accordingly target the dopamine system ; meta-analyses of placebo-controlled trials of these drugs , however , show either no significant difference between drug and placebo , or a very small effect  आकार , suggesting कि the pathophysiology of मनस्ताप is much अधिक जटिल than  an overactive dopamine system .
People experiencing psychosis may  प्रदर्शनी कुछ व्यक्तित्व  changes and thought disorder .
Depending on its severity , this may be accompanied by unusual or bizarre behavior , as  खूब as परेशानी साथ सोशल बातचीत  and impairment in carrying out daily life activities .
General  grievous is a fictional  character in the Star Wars universe .
A recurring antagonist , he is the Supreme Commander of the Confederacy of Independent Systems , a political faction of planetary  प्रणालियों waging युद्ध on the गांगेय गणतंत्र  .
Trained in all seven forms  of lightsaber कॉम्बैट by गिनती dooku , he is a निष्ठुर और शक्तिशाली  warrior devoted to Jedi 's destruction during the Clone Wars .
His acts of wanton  आक्रामकता और ऊँची जेडी देह गिनती होता संकेत the आकाशगंगा  to give him the nickname the Knightslayer .
Though the notorious Jedi slayer was the being in the galaxy during the Clone Wars who had killed the most Jedi in single  कॉम्बैट , he किया नहीं संकोच to भागो इससे लड़ाइयों he knew he होता खोना  .
Statistics  खेल an महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in summarizing  baseball performance and evaluating players in the sport .
Since the flow of a baseball game has natural breaks to it , and normally players act individually rather  than performing in क्लस्टर , the खेल lends itself to आसान record-keeping और आंकडे  .
Statistics have been kept for professional baseball since the creation  of the नेशनल लीग और अमरीकी लीग , अभी  part of Major League Baseball .
Many statistics are also available from outside of Major League Baseball , from leagues such  as the नेशनल संघ of पेशेवर आधार बॉल खिलाड़ी  and the Negro Leagues .
Dorothea Lange 's Migrant Mother depicts destitute pea pickers in California , centering on Florence Owens Thompson , age 32 , a mother of  सात children , in nipomo , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , कूच 1936  .
USA annual real GDP from 1910–60 , with the years  of the ग्रेट अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted  .
The unemployment rate  in the us 1910–1960 ,  with the years of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted .
The Great Depression was a severe worldwide economic depression  in the दशक preceding संसार युद्ध  II .
The  समय of the ग्रेट अवसाद varied आरपार राष्ट्र , लकिन in सबसे  countries it started in 1930 and lasted until the late 1930s or middle 1940s .
It was the longest ,  सबसे फैली , और deepest  depression of the 20th century .
In the 21st century , the Great Depression is commonly  प्रयुक्त as an उदाहरण of कैसा दूर the संसार  's economy can decline .
The depression originated in the U.S. , after the  पतन in भण्डार कीमतें कि began around सितंबर 4 , 1929 , और became विश्वव्यापी न्यूज साथ the  stock market crash of October 29 , 1929 ( known as Black Tuesday ) .
The Great  अवसाद था विनाशकारी प्रभाव in देशों  rich and poor .
Personal income , tax  आय , profits और कीमतें dropped  , while international trade plunged by more than 50 % .
Unemployment in the U.S. rose to 25 % ,  और in कुछ देशों  rose as high as 33 % .
Cities all around the world were hit  मुश्किल , विशेषकर those निर्भर  on heavy industry .
Construction was virtually halted  in अनेक देशों  .
खेती और ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों suffered  as crop prices fell by approximately 60 % .
Facing plummeting  माँग साथ few वैकल्पिक स्त्रोत of कार्य , क्षेत्रों निर्भर on  primary sector industries such as cash cropping , mining and logging suffered the most .
Some economies started to recover by  the mid-1930s  .
In many  देशों , the ऋणात्मक प्रभाव of the ग्रेट अवसाद  lasted until the end of World War II .
A premature ventricular contraction ( PVC ) , also known as a premature ventricular  जटिल , ventricular असामयिक संकुचन ( or जटिल or देवालय ) ( vpc ) , ventricular  premature beat ( VPB ) , or ventricular extrasystole ( VES ) , is a relatively common event where the heartbeat is initiated by Purkinje fibres in the ventricles rather than by the sinoatrial node , the normal heartbeat initiator .
The electrical events of the heart detected by the  electrocardiogram allow a पीवीसी to be easily विशिष्ट  from a normal heart beat .
A  पीवीसी may be आभास as a `` छोड़ा ताल  `` or felt as palpitations in the chest .
In a normal heartbeat ,  the ventricles अनुबंध बाद the atria have helped to भरण उन्हें by contracting ; in इस  way the ventricles can pump a maximized amount of blood both to the lungs and to the rest of the body .
In a PVC , the ventricles contract first and before the  atria have optimally भर the ventricles साथ रक्त , जिससे अर्थात् कि  circulation is inefficient .
However , single beat PVC arrhythmias do not usually  पोज़ a खतरे और can be asymptomatic  in healthy individuals .
William Gary Busey ( born June 29 , 1944 ) , better known as Gary Busey , is  an अमरीकी फिल्मी और स्टेज कर्ता , और  artist .
He has appeared in a variety of films , including Lethal Weapon , Point Break , and  अंतर्गत घेरा , as खूब as अतिथि दिखावे on gunsmoke , वाकर , टेक्सास  Ranger , Law & Order , and Entourage .
He was nominated for an  अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता  in 1978 for his role in The Buddy Holly Story .
The  anti-counterfeiting व्यापार अनुबंध ( acta ) , is  a multinational treaty for the purpose of establishing international standards for intellectual property rights enforcement .
The agreement aims to establish an international legal framework for targeting counterfeit goods , generic medicines and copyright infringement on the Internet , and would create a new governing body outside existing forums  , ऐसे as the संसार व्यापार संगठन , the संसार बौद्धिक प्रॉपर्टी संगठन , or the संयुक्त राष्ट्र .
The agreement was signed in October  2011 by ऑस्ट्रेलिया , कनाडा , जापानी , मोरक्को  , New Zealand , Singapore , South Korea , and the United States .
In 2012 , Mexico , the European Union and 22 countries which are  सदस्य राज्य of the यूरोपीय संघ हस्ताक्षरित as खूब  .
One signatory ( Japan ) has ratified ( formally approved ) the agreement , which would come into force in  देशों कि ratified  it after ratification by six countries .
समर्थक have वर्णित the अनुबंध as a जवाब to ``  the increase in global trade of counterfeit goods and pirated copyright protected works '' .
Trades Unions representing workers in the music , film and TV industries and large intellectual property-based organizations such as the Motion Picture Association  of अमेरिका और फार्मास्युटिकल शोध और निर्माताओं of अमेरिका यहूद  active in the treaty 's development .
Opponents say the convention adversely affects fundamental  अधिकारों सहित स्वतंत्रता of अभिव्यक्ति  and privacy .
ACTA has also been criticised by Doctors Without Borders for endangering access  to दवाइयाँ in विकासशील देशों  .
The secret nature of negotiations has excluded civil society groups , developing countries and the general public  इससे the अनुबंध 's negotiation प्रक्रम और it रै महरूम वर्णित as नीति laundering by आलोचकों सहित the इलेक्ट्रॉनिक frontier न्यास  and the Entertainment Consumers Association .
The signature of the EU and many of its member states resulted in the  इस्तीफा in विरोध of the यूरोपीय पार्लियामेंट 's नियुक्त मुख्य अन्वेषक , rapporteur  Kader Arif , as well as widespread protests across Europe .
In 2012 the newly-appointed rapporteur , British MEP David Martin , recommended against the  सन्धि , stating : `` the  intended benefits of this international agreement are far outweighed by the potential threats to civil liberties '' .
On 4 July 2012 , the  यूरोपीय पार्लियामेंट अस्वीकृत the अनुबंध in plenary  session , with 478 voting against the treaty , 39 in favour and 165 MEPs abstaining .
FAW  semi-trailer  truck in China
ट्रैक्टर साथ पक्ष  dump trailer semi-trailer
A tractor with an  auto-transport semi-trailer  .
Semi-trailer truck  साथ स्लीपर पीछे  the cab .
A semi-trailer truck is an articulated vehicle that consists of a towing engine , known as a  ट्रैक्टर in the संयुक्त राज्य और  truck in many other places , attached to one or more semi-trailers to carry freight .
It is also known as a transport in Canada , prime mover in Australia , semi , tractor-trailer , truck and  ट्रेलर , ट्रांसफ़र ट्रक , 18-wheeler , mack ट्रक , बिग रिग in  the United States , or artic , short for articulated lorry , in Britain and Ireland .
A  semi-trailer करता नहीं ट्रेल completely पीछे the  towing vehicle , but is attached at a point that is just forward of the rear-most axle of the towing unit .
This is done so that a fraction of the weight of the trailer is  carried  by the prime mover .
This arrangement means that both  ट्रैक्टर और semi-trailer  will have a distinctly different design than a rigid truck and trailer .
The Pittsburgh  स्टीलर्स हैं a पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल टोली आधारित  in Pittsburgh , Pennsylvania .
The team currently belongs to the North Division of the American Football  सम्मेलन ( afc ) in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग  ( NFL ) .
Founded in , the Steelers are the  oldest मताधिकार in the  AFC .
Pittsburgh has won more Super Bowl titles ( six ) , won more AFC Championship Games ( eight ) and played in ( fifteen )  और hosted अधिक ( ग्यारह ) सम्मेलन चैंपियनशिप खेल than कोई  other AFC or NFC team .
the स्टीलर्स share the रिकार्ड  for most Super Bowl appearances with the Dallas Cowboys ( eight ) .
The Steelers won their  सबसे हाल चैंपियनशिप , सुपर कटोरी xliii ,  on February 1 , 2009 .
The Steelers were founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates on July 8 , 1933 , by Art Rooney , taking its original name from the baseball team of the  वही नाम , as थी आम अभ्यास लिये एनएफएल टीमों to do at  the time .
The  स्वामित्व of the  Steelers has remained within the Rooney family since its founding .
The current owner is Art 's son , Dan Rooney , who has given much control of  the मताधिकार to उसके बेटे आर्ट रूनी ii .
Long one of the NFL 's flagship teams , the Steelers  आनंद a विशाल , फैली fanbase nicknamed  Steeler Nation .
The Steelers currently play their home games at Heinz  फ़ील्ड on पिट्सबर्ग 's उत्तर पक्ष in the उत्तर shore पड़ोस , जिससे भी  hosts the University of Pittsburgh Panthers .
Built in 2001 ,  the स्टेडियम replaced तीन नदियाँ  Stadium which hosted the Steelers for 31 seasons .
Prior to Three Rivers , the Steelers had played their games in Pitt  स्टेडियम और फोर्ब्स फ़ील्ड  .
Three different  kinds of गेहूं  and rye flour
Flour  is a चूर्ण जिससे is बना by पीस  cereal grains , or other seeds or roots ( like Cassava ) .
It is the main  संघटक of ब्रैड , जिससे is a स्टेपल खाना लिये अनेक संस्कृतियों  , making the availability of adequate supplies of flour a major economic and political issue at various times throughout history .
Wheat flour is one of the most important foods in European , North American ,  मध्य पूर्वी , भारतीय और उत्तर अफ़्रीकी संस्कृतियों , और is the धमक संघटक in सबसे of उनके शैलियाँ of breads  and pastries .
While wheat is  the सबसे आम आधार लिये आटा , मकई आटा रै महरूम महत्वपूर्ण in  Mesoamerican cuisine since ancient times , and remains a staple throughout the Americas .
Rye flour is an important constituent of bread in much of  सेंट्रल यूरोपीय , और राइस can भी be प्रयुक्त in आटा , हालांकि  this is relatively uncommon .
Heart rate is the number of  heartbeats प्रति ईकाई of समय  , typically expressed as beats per minute ( bpm ) .
Heart rate can vary  as the देह 's need to अवशोषित ऑक्सीजन और excrete कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड परिवर्तन , ऐसे as दौरान शारीरिक  exercise , sleep , illness , or as a result of ingesting drugs :
Central nervous system  stimulants ऐसे as amphetamines  increase heart rate .
Central nervous system depressants or sedatives decreases the heart rate ( apart from some particularly strange ones  साथ बराबर अजीब प्रभाव , ऐसे as केटामाइन जिससे can कारण - amongst अनेक अन्य बाते - stimulant-like प्रभाव  such as tachycardia ) .
There are many ways in which the  दिल रेट speeds  up or slows down .
Most involve stimulant-like endorphins and hormones being released in the  दिमाग , अनेक of जिससे हैं those कि हैं 'forced'/'enticed ' आउट  by the ingestion and processing of drugs .
Due to individuals having a constant blood volume , one of the physiological  तरीके to उद्धार अधिक ऑक्सीजन to an अंग is to बढ़ाएँ दिल रेट to  permit blood to pass by the organ more often .
Normal resting heart  दरों दायरा इससे 60-100  bpm .
Bradycardia is defined as a resting  दिल रेट नीचे 60  bpm .
However , heart rates from 50 to 60 bpm  हैं आम among स्वस्थ लोगों और do नहीं necessarily आवश्यकता  special attention .
Tachycardia is defined as a resting heart rate above 100 bpm , though persistent rest rates between 80-100 bpm , mainly if they  हैं उपस्थित दौरान नींद , may be लक्षण of हाइपरथाइरॉयडिज़्म or रक्ताल्पता  ( see below ) .
Catherine II 's carved , painted and  gilded राजतिलक कोच  ( Hermitage Museum )
A carriage is a wheeled vehicle for people , usually  horse-drawn ; litters ( palanquins ) और सेडान कुर्सियां  are excluded , since they are wheelless vehicles .
the carriage is विशेषकर designed लिये निजी यात्री उपयोग और  for comfort or elegance , though some are also used to transport goods .
It may be light ,  smart और तेज़ or भारी , विशाल  and comfortable .
Carriages normally have suspension using leaf springs ,  अंडाकार स्रोतों ( in  the 19th century ) or leather strapping .
A public passenger vehicle would  नहीं प्रायः be पुकारा a carriage – शर्तें  for such include stagecoach , charabanc and omnibus .
Working vehicles such as the ( four-wheeled ) wagon and ( two-wheeled ) cart  share महत्वपूर्ण भाग of the इतिहास of the carriage , as is the तेज़ ( two-wheeled ) रथ  .
The 2004 Indian  समंदर भूकंप थी an undersea  megathrust earthquake that occurred at 00:58:53 UTC on Sunday , 26 December 2004 , with an epicentre off the west coast of Sumatra , Indonesia .
The quake itself is known by the scientific  जातियाँ as the sumatra–andaman  earthquake .
The resulting tsunami was given various names , including the 2004 Indian Ocean  सुनामी , दक्षिण एशियाई सुनामी , इंडोनेशियाई सुनामी , और the मुक्केबाज़ी दिन सुनामी  .
The earthquake was caused by subduction and  triggered a श्रेणी of विनाशकारी tsunamis साथ the coasts of सबसे landmasses bordering the भारतीय समंदर , हत्या over 230,000 लोगों in चौदह  countries , and inundating coastal communities with waves up to high .
It was one of the deadliest  प्राकृतिक आपदाओं in अंकित  history .
इंडोनेशिया थी the hardest-hit  country , followed by Sri Lanka , India , and Thailand .
साथ a परिमाण of mw 9.1–9.3  , it is the third largest earthquake ever recorded on a seismograph .
The earthquake had the longest duration of faulting ever  observed , between 8.3 और 10 मिनट्स  .
It  caused the संपूर्ण ग्रह to हिलना as  much as and triggered other earthquakes as far away as Alaska .
Its epicentre was between Simeulue and  मेनलैंड इंडोनेशिया  .
The plight of the affected people and  देशों prompted a विश्वव्यापी  humanitarian response .
In all , the worldwide  जातियाँ दान अधिक than  $ 14 billion ( 2004 US $ ) in humanitarian aid .
Steam rising  इससे the nesjavellir geothermal शक्ति  Station in Iceland .
Geothermal  उर्जा is थर्मल उर्जा  generated and stored in the Earth .
Thermal energy  is the उर्जा कि determines  the temperature of matter .
the geothermal उर्जा of the धरती 's क्रस्ट originates इससे the असली  formation of the planet ( 20 % ) and from radioactive decay of minerals ( 80 % ) .
The geothermal gradient , which is the difference in temperature between the core  of the ग्रह और इसके सतह , ड्राइव a निरन्तर conduction of थर्मल उर्जा  in the form of heat from the core to the surface .
The adjective geothermal originates from  the यूनानी जड़ें γη ( ge ) , अर्थ  earth , and θερμος ( thermos ) , meaning hot .
At the core of the Earth , thermal energy is created by radioactive decay  और temperatures may पहुँचें over 5000 °c ( 9,000  °F ) .
Heat  conducts इससे the  core to surrounding cooler rock .
The high temperature and pressure cause some rock to melt , creating magma convection upward since it  is हल्का than the ठोस  rock .
The  मैग्मा heats चट्टान और जल in the क्रस्ट  , sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ) .
From hot springs , geothermal energy has been used  लिये स्नान चूंकि paleolithic टाइम्स और लिये स्पेस हीटिंग  since ancient Roman times , but it is now better known for electricity generation .
Worldwide , about 10,715  megawatts ( mw ) of geothermal  power is online in 24 countries .
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal heating capacity is installed for district heating , space heating  , स्पा , औद्योगिक प्रक्रियाओं  , desalination and agricultural applications .
Geothermal power is cost effective , reliable , sustainable , and environmentally friendly  , लकिन रै historically महरूम सीमित to क्षेत्रों  near tectonic plate boundaries .
Recent technological advances have dramatically expanded the range and size of viable resources , especially for  अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as घर हीटिंग , खोलने a संभावित लिये  widespread exploitation .
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases trapped deep within the earth , but  ये emissions हैं much निम्नतर प्रति उर्जा ईकाई than those of चट्टान fuels  .
As a result , geothermal power has the potential to  सहायता mitigate वैश्विक वार्मिंग if widely  deployed in place of fossil fuels .
The Earth 's geothermal resources are theoretically more than adequate to supply humanity 's energy  needs , लकिन तभी a बहुत छोटी भिन्न  may be profitably exploited .
Drilling and  खोजी लिये गहन संसाधन  is very expensive .
Forecasts for the future  of geothermal शक्ति निर्भर on assumptions  about technology , energy prices , subsidies , and interest rates .
Pilot  कार्यक्रम जैसे eweb 's ग्राहक  opt in Green Power Program show that customers would be willing to pay a little more for a renewable energy source like geothermal .
But as a result of government assisted research and industry experience , the cost of  generating geothermal शक्ति रै decreased  by 25 % over the past two decades .
In  2001 , geothermal उर्जा  cost between two and ten cents per kwh .
The term cubic foot is an Imperial and US customary ( non- metric ) unit of volume , used in  the संयुक्त राज्य और the संयुक्त किंगडम  .
It is defined as  the  volume of a cube with sides of one foot ( 0.3048 m ) in length .
To  गणना घन फीट गुणा लंबाई  X width X height .
Hồ Chí Minh (  उत्तरी वियतनामी उच्चारण : , दक्षिणी वियतनामी उच्चारण  : ) ; 19 May 1890 – 2 September 1969 ) , born Nguyễn Sinh Cung and also known as Nguyễn Tất Thành and Nguyễn Ái Quốc , was a Vietnamese communist revolutionary leader who was prime minister ( 1945–1955 ) and president ( 1945–1969 ) of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam ( North Vietnam ) .
He was a key figure in the foundation of the Democratic  गणतंत्र of वियतनाम in 1945 , as खूब as the people’s  Army of Vietnam ( PAVN ) and the Việt Cộng ( NLF or VC ) during the Vietnam War .
He led the Việt Minh independence movement from 1941  onward , establishing the कम्युनिस्ट -नियमd लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of वियतनाम  in 1945 and defeating the French Union in 1954 at the battle of Điện Biên Phủ .
He officially stepped down from power in 1955  due to स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं , लकिन remained a अत्यधिक दृश्य figurehead और प्रेरणा  for those Vietnamese fighting for his cause—a united , communist Vietnam—until his death .
After the war , Saigon , capital of  the गणतंत्र of वियतनाम , थी renamed hồ  Chí Minh City .
All Roads Lead Home is  a विशेषता फिल्मी released  on September 26 , 2008 .
Directed by Dennis Fallon , it stars Peter Boyle ,  patton oswalt , जेसन लंदन , vivien cardone , वैनेसा शाखा  , Peter Coyote , Stephen Milton , and Allan Kayser .
The movie was  फिल्माया in और around कान्सास  City , Missouri .
The movie made its World  प्रीमियर जनवरी 27 at the सांता बारबरा अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Film Festival .
The film  रै भी recently महरूम  in several film festivals , and has received bad reviews .
Peter Boyle  died पहले the फिल्म  's release .
It  थी the पिछला  movie he appeared in .
Sales taxes in the United States are taxes  लगाई on the बिक्री or पट्टे of goods और सेवाएं  in the United States .
While no national general sales tax exists , the federal government levies several national  चयनात्मक बिक्री कर on the बिक्री or पट्टे of particular goods  and services .
Furthermore , forty-five states , the District of Columbia , and Guam impose general sales taxes that apply  to the बिक्री or पट्टे of सबसे goods और कुछ सेवाएं , और राज्य भी may लेवी चयनात्मक  sales taxes on the sale or lease of particular goods or services .
States may also delegate to local governments  the प्राधिकार to थोपने अतिरिक्त  general or selective sales taxes .
Sales tax  is गणना by multiplying  the purchase price by the applicable tax rate .
Tax rates  vary widely by क्षेत्राधिकार  and range from less than 1 % to over 10 % .
Sales tax  is एकत्रित by the विक्रेता  at the time of sale .
Use tax is self assessed by a buyer who  रै नहीं सशुल्क बिक्री कर on a taxable खरीदें  .
Unlike the value added tax , a sales tax is  imposed तभी एकबार , at  the retail level .
However , in cases where items are sold at retail more than once ,  ऐसे as प्रयुक्त गाड़ियाँ , the बिक्री  tax can be charged on the same item indefinitely .
The definition of retail sales  और कया goods और सेवाएं हैं taxable vary  among the states .
Nearly all jurisdictions provide numerous  श्रेणी of goods और सेवाएं कि  are exempt from sales tax , or taxed at reduced rates .
The purchase of goods for further  manufacture or लिये पुनर्विक्रय is uniformly  exempt from sales tax .
Most jurisdictions exempt food sold in grocery stores , prescription medications , and many  agricultural आपूर्तियाँ  .
Sales taxes , including  those imposed by लोकल सरकारें  , are generally administered at the state level .
States imposing sales tax require retail sellers to collect tax from customers , file  रिटर्न , और remit the कर  to the state .
Procedural rules  vary widely .
Sellers generally must collect tax from  in-state purchasers जबतक the क्रेता provides an exemption  certificate .
सबसे राज्य allow or आवश्यकता  electronic remittance .
A central processing unit (  cpu ) , भी referred to as a सेंट्रल प्रोसेसर ईकाई , is the हार्डवेयर भीतर  a computer that carries out the instructions of a computer program by performing the basic arithmetical , logical , and input/output operations of the system .
The term has been in use in the computer  उद्योग at तनिक चूंकि the  early 1960s .
The form , design , and implementation of CPUs have changed over  the कोर्स of उनके इतिहास , लकिन उनके आधारभूत आपरेशन  remains much the same .
A computer can have more than one CPU ;  इस is पुकारा multiprocessing  .
Some integrated circuits ( ICs ) can contain multiple  cpu on a सिंगल चिप ; those ics हैं पुकारा  multi-core processors .
Two typical components of a CPU are the arithmetic logic unit ( ALU ) , which performs arithmetic and logical operations , and the control unit ( CU ) , which extracts instructions from  मेमोरी और decodes और चलाता उन्हें , कॉलिंग on the alu जब जरुरी  .
Not all computational  प्रणालियों rely on a सेंट्रल प्रसंस्करण  unit .
An array processor or vector processor has  अनेक समानांतर कम्प्यूटिंग तत्व , साथ  no one unit considered the `` center '' .
In the distributed computing model , problems are solved by a  वितरित interconnected नियत of processors  .
rfid चिप अगला  to a grain of rice .
This chip contains a  radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड कुंडली कि modulates an बाह्य चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र  a coded identification number when queried by a reader device .
This small type is incorporated in consumer  उत्पाद , और implanted in पालतु , लिये पहचान  purposes .
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is the wireless non-contact use of radio-frequency electromagnetic fields to transfer data , for the purposes of  automatically identifying और ट्रैकिंग टैग संलग्न  to objects .
The  टैग contain electronically  stored information .
Some tags are powered and read at short  सीमाएँ ( a few मीटर ) via चुम्बकीय  fields ( electromagnetic induction ) .
Others use a local power source such as a battery , or else have no battery but collect energy from the interrogating EM field , and then act as a passive  transponder to emit microwaves or uhf रेडियो लहरें ( i.e. , इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण at ऊँची बारंबारता  ) .
Battery powered tags may operate at hundreds  of मीटर  .
Unlike a bar code , the tag does not necessarily need to  be भीतर लकीर of sight of the रीडर  , and may be embedded in the tracked object .
RFID tags are  प्रयुक्त in अनेक उद्योग  .
An RFID tag attached to an automobile during production can be used to  track इसके प्रगति through the सभा  line .
दवाएँ can be tracked  through warehouses .
पशुधन और पालतु may have टैग injected , allowing  positive identification of the animal .
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing , possessions , or even implanted within  लोगों , the सम्भावना of पढना personally-linked सूचना बगैर सहमति  has raised privacy concerns .
Overtime  is the राशि of समय किसी works परे  normal working hours .
Normal hours may  be संकल्पित in अनेक  ways:
by custom ( what is considered healthy or  उचित by समाज  ) ,
by practices of a given  व्यापार or profession,
by  legislation,
by agreement between employers and  मजदूर or उनके प्रतिनिधि  .
Most  राष्ट्र have ओवरटाइम मजदूर कानून  designed to dissuade or prevent employers from forcing their employees to work excessively long hours .
These laws may take into account other considerations than the humanitarian , such as preserving the  स्वास्थ्य of मजदूर so कि वे may continue  to be productive , or increasing the overall level of employment in the economy .
One common approach to  regulating ओवरटाइम is to आवश्यकता नियोक्ता  to pay workers at a higher hourly rate for overtime work .
Companies may choose to pay workers higher overtime pay even if not obliged to do so by law ,  विशेषकर if वे मानना कि वे फेस a पिछड़ा झुकने  supply curve of labour .
Overtime pay  दरों can कारण मजदूर to कार्य longer घंटों  than they would at a flat hourly rate .
ओवरटाइम  laws , attitudes toward overtime and hours of work vary greatly from country to country and between different economic sectors .
Visualization of  कड़ी between पृष्ठों on a विक using  a force-directed layout .
Force-directed graph drawing algorithms are a class of  algorithms लिये आरेखण  graphs in an aesthetically pleasing way .
Their purpose is to position the nodes of a graph in two-dimensional or three-dimensional space so that all the edges are of more or less equal length and there are as few crossing edges as possible , by assigning  शक्तियां among the नियत of किनारे और the नियत of नोड , आधारित on उनके सापेक्ष स्थितियाँ , और तब using ये शक्तियां either to सिमुलेट the  motion of the edges and nodes or to minimize their energy .
While graph drawing can be a difficult problem , force-directed algorithms , being  शारीरिक simulations , प्रायः आवश्यकता no खास  knowledge about graph theory such as planarity .
Purchasing power ( sometimes retroactively called  समायोजित लिये महंगाई ) is the राशि of goods  or services that can be purchased with a unit of currency .
For  उदाहरण , if तुम था लिया एक डालर to a स्टोर in the 1950s , तुम होता have महरूम समर्थ to  buy a greater number of items than you would today , indicating that you would have had a greater purchasing power in the 1950s .
करेंसी can be either a कमोडिटी धन , जैसे सुनहरा or चांदी , or fiat  currency , or free-floating market-valued currency like US dollars .
As Adam Smith noted , having money gives one the ability to `` command '' others ' labor , so purchasing power  to कुछ extent is शक्ति over अन्य लोगों , to the extent  that they are willing to trade their labor or goods for money or currency .
If one 's monetary income stays the  वही , लकिन the दाम स्तर increases , the खरीदना  power of that income falls .
Inflation does not always imply falling purchasing power of one 's money  आय चूंकि it may वृद्धि तेज़ than the दाम  level .
A  उच्चतर रियल आय अर्थात् a उच्चतर  purchasing power since real income refers to the income adjusted for inflation .
For a price index , its value in the base year is  प्रायः सामान्यीकृत to a मान of 100  .
the खरीदना शक्ति of a ईकाई of करेंसी , कह a डालर , in  a given year , expressed in dollars of the base year , is 100/P , where P is the price index in that year .
So , by definition the purchasing power of a  डालर decreases as the दाम स्तर उदय  .
The purchasing power in today 's money of an amount C of  धन , t सालो into the भविष्य , can be computed  with the formula for the present value :
जहाँ in इस मामला i is  an assumed future annual inflation rate .
Education in South Korea is viewed as being crucial for success and  प्रतियोगिता is नतीजतन बहुत heated और fierce .
A central administration oversees the process for the  शिक्षा of children इससे किंडरगार्टन  to the third and final year of high school .
Mathematics , science  , कोरियाई , अंग्रेज़ी  , and social studies are generally considered to be the most important subjects .
Normally physical education is not considered important as it is not recognised , by the generally  अकादमिक elitist दक्षिण कोरियाई populace , as शिक्षा  and therefore many schools lack high-quality gymnasiums and varsity athletics .
South Korea was the first  देश in the संसार to provide  high-speed internet access to all primary , junior , and high schools .
Although South Korean students often rank highly on international comparative assessments when compared to  विद्यार्थी of सबसे पश्चिमी शिक्षा प्रणालियों , the दक्षिण कोरियाई शिक्षा प्रणाली is criticised  for emphasising too much upon passive learning and memorisation .
The South Korean education system  is बल्कि notably सख्त और overly संरचित as compared  to its counterparts in most Western societies .
भी , the व्यापकता of  non-school for-profit private institutes such as academies or cram-schools ( Hagwon [ 학원 ] ) , which too emphasise on passive memorisation , as opposed to conceptual understanding , in students are criticised as a major social problem .
The My Lai Massacre ( , ; , , or ) was the Vietnam War mass  हत्या of between 347 और 504 निहत्थे नागरिकों in दक्षिण वियतनाम on  March 16 , 1968 , by United States Army soldiers of `` Charlie '' Company of 1st Battalion , 20th Infantry Regiment , 11th Brigade of the Americal Division .
पीड़ितों शामिल  women , men , children , and infants .
Some of  the महिलाओं यहूद gang-raped और उनके लाशें यहूद  later found to be mutilated and many women were allegedly raped prior to the killings .
While 26 U.S. soldiers were initially charged with criminal offenses for their actions at Mỹ  lai , तभी दूसरी लेफ्टिनेंट विलियम calley , a प्लाटून नेता in चार्ली कम्पनी , थी  convicted .
Found guilty of killing 22 villagers , he was originally given a life  वाक्य , लकिन तभी परोसा तीन और a हाफ  years under house arrest .
The massacre took place in the  hamlets of my lai और my khe of बेटे my गाँव  .
The event is also known as  the बेटे my नरसंहार , विशेषकर in the वियतनामी  state media .
The U.S.  सैन्य codeword लिये the  `` Viet Cong stronghold '' was `` Pinkville '' .
The incident prompted global outrage when it  became पब्लिक ज्ञान in 1969  .
The massacre also increased domestic  विपक्ष to the u.S. भागीदारी  in the Vietnam War .
Three U.S. servicemen who had tried to halt the massacre  और protect the wounded यहूद initially denounced  by several U.S . Congressmen as traitors .
They  प्राप्त नफ़रत मेल और मौत खतरे और मिला mutilated  animals on their doorsteps .
The three were  बाद widely praised  and decorated by the Army for their heroic actions .
the hijackers in the सितंबर  11 attacks were 19 men affiliated with al-Qaeda , and 15 of the 19 were citizens of Saudi Arabia .
अन्य यहूद  from Egypt , Lebanon , and the UAE .
The hijackers were organized into four teams , each led by a pilot-trained hijacker with  चार `` मांसपेशी hijackers '' जो यहूद प्रशिक्षित to सहायता subdue the पायलटों  , passengers , and crew .
The first hijackers to arrive in  the संयुक्त राज्य  were Khalid al-Mihdhar and Nawaf al-Hazmi , who settled in the San Diego area in January 2000 .
They were followed by three hijacker-pilots , Mohamed  atta , marwan al-shehhi  , and Ziad Jarrah early in the summer of 2000 to undertake flight training in south Florida .
The fourth hijacker-pilot , Hani  hanjour , arrived in सैन डिएगो  in December 2000 .
The rest of the `` muscle hijackers ''  arrived in the वसन्त और जल्दी गर्मियाँ of 2001  , just months before the September 11 attacks .
Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn  hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 जून 632 ) , भी transliterated as मुहम्मद ( ) , थी a धार्मिक  , political , and military leader from Mecca who unified Arabia into a single religious polity under Islam .
He is  believed by मुसलमान और bahá'ís  to be a messenger and prophet of God .
Muhammad is almost universally considered by  मुसलमान as the पिछला नबी भेजा by परमेश्वर लिये mankind  .
non-muslims लिहाज़ मुहम्मद  as the founder of Islam .
Muslims consider him to be the restorer of an unaltered original monotheistic faith of Adam ,  नूह , अब्राहम , मूसा , यीशु , और अन्य नबियों  .
Born in about 570 CE in the Arabian city of Mecca , he was orphaned  at an जल्दी आयु और brought up अंतर्गत the परवाह  of his uncle Abu Talib .
He later worked mostly as a merchant , as well as a shepherd , and was  पहला शादीशुदा by आयु  25 .
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a cave  in the surrounding kyu लिये अनेक नाइट्स of seclusion और दुआ , he बाद reported  that it was there , at age 40 , that he received his first revelation from God .
Three years after this event Muhammad  प्रारंभ उपदेश ये खुलासे सरेआम , proclaiming  that `` God is One `` , that complete `` surrender '' to Him ( lit .
islām ) is the only way ( dīn ) acceptable to God , and that he himself was a prophet and messenger of God , in  the वही रग as अन्य इस्लामी नबियों  .
मुहम्मद gained few अनुसरणकर्ता जल्दी on , और थी मिले साथ दुश्मनी  from some Meccan tribes ; he and his followers were treated harshly .
To escape persecution , Muhammad sent some of his  अनुसरणकर्ता to अबीसीनिया पहले he और उसके अनुसरणकर्ता in मक्का migrated to  Medina ( then known as Yathrib ) in the year 622 .
This event , the Hijra ,  marks the शुरूआत of the इस्लामी पंचांग , जिससे is भी  known as the Hijri Calendar .
In Medina , Muhammad united the  जनजातियों अंतर्गत the संविधान  of Medina .
After eight years of fighting with the  meccan जनजातियों , उसके अनुसरणकर्ता , जो by तब था grown to  10,000 , took control of Mecca in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca .
He destroyed the pagan idols in the  नगर और तब भेजा उसके अनुसरणकर्ता आउट to नष्ट सब  of the remaining pagan temples in Eastern Arabia .
In 632 , a few months after returning to Medina from The  विदाई यात्राएं , मुहम्मद  fell ill and died .
By  the समय of उसके मौत , सबसे of  the Arabian Peninsula had converted to Islam , and he had united Arabia into a single Muslim religious polity .
The revelations  ( or ayah , lit  .
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — which Muhammad reported receiving until his death – form the verses of the  कुरान , regarded by मुसलमान as the `` शब्द of परमेश्वर '' और around  which the religion is based .
Besides the Quran , Muhammad 's life ( sira ) and traditions (  सुन्नत ) हैं भी upheld by मुसलमान as the स्त्रोत  of sharia law .
They discuss Muhammad and other prophets of Islam with reverence , adding  the phrase सलाम be upon उसे whenever उनके names  are mentioned .
While conceptions of Muhammad in medieval  christendom और premodern टाइम्स यहूद largely ऋणात्मक , appraisals in आधुनिक इतिहास  have been far less so .
This is a list of tables of the verified  oldest लोगों in the संसार in ordinal  rank , such as oldest person or oldest man .
In these tables , a  supercentenarian is माना 'verified ' if उसके or उसके अर्जी रै महरूम  validated by an international body that specifically deals in longevity research , such as the Gerontology Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records .
The longest unambiguously documented human lifespan  is कि of jeanne calment of फ़्रांस ( 1875–1997  ) , who died at age 122 years , 164 days .
She met Vincent  वैन gogh जब वो थी  12 or 13 .
This led to news media  ध्यान in 1985 , बाद calment  turned 110 .
Subsequent investigation found  दस्तावेज़ीकरण लिये calment 's आयु , परे  any reasonable question , in the records of her native city , Arles , France .
अधिक प्रमाण of calment 's जीवनकाल रै महरूम उत्पादित than लिये कोई अन्य  supercentenarian ; her case serves as an archetype in the methodology for verifying the ages of the world 's oldest people .
The longest undisputed lifespan for male supercentenarians is  कि of jiroemon किमुरा , जो फिलहाल जीवनदान in जापानी और is आयु  as of .
Since the death of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United States ,  on 17 दिसम्बर 2012 , किमुरा , born 19 अप्रैल 1897 , is the oldest जीना व्यक्ति  in the world whose age can be documented .
He has also been the oldest living man since the death of  114-year बूढ़ा वाल्टर breuning on 14 अप्रैल 2011  .
Since the death of 115-year old Koto Okubo of Japan on 12 January 2013  , the oldest जीना स्त्री रै महरूम -year-old misao okawa , भी इससे  Japan , born on 5 March 1898 .
This is a timeline of the  african-american सिविल अधिकारों गति  .
The Civil Rights movement was a freedom struggle  by अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी in the  1950s and 1960s to gain equality .
The goals of the movement were freedom from discrimination , equal opportunity in employment ,  शिक्षा और आवास , the सही to vote और बराबर अभिगम to पब्लिक सुविधाएं  .
Heavy metal ( often  referred to as मेटल ) is a विधा of चट्टान म्यूज़िक कि विकसित  in the late 1960s and early 1970s , largely in the United Kingdom and in the United States .
With roots in blues rock and psychedelic rock , the bands that created heavy metal developed a thick , massive sound , characterized by highly amplified  distortion , विस्तारित गिटार solos , emphatic बीट्स , और overall  loudness .
Heavy  मेटल गीत और प्रदर्शन शैलियाँ हैं  generally associated with masculinity and machismo .
The first heavy metal bands such as Led Zeppelin , Deep Purple and Black Sabbath attracted large  ऑडियंस , हालांकि वे यहूद प्रायः derided by आलोचकों , a औकात आम throughout the  history of the genre .
In the mid-1970s Judas Priest helped spur the genre  's एवोल्यूशन by discarding much of इसके ब्लूज़  influence ; Motörhead introduced a punk rock sensibility and an increasing emphasis on speed .
Bands in  the नई वेव of अंग्रेजों भारी मेटल ऐसे  as Iron Maiden followed in a similar vein .
Before  the समाप्त of the दशक , भारी मेटल प्रशंसक became ज्ञात  as `` metalheads `` or `` headbangers `` .
During the 1980s , glam metal  became a वाणिज्यिक फ़ोर्स साथ समूह  like Mötley Crüe and Poison .
Underground scenes produced an array of more extreme , aggressive styles : thrash metal broke into the mainstream with bands such as Metallica , Megadeth , Slayer , and  एंथ्रेक्स , जबकि अन्य शैलियाँ of the सबसे चरम subgenres of मेटल  like death metal and black metal remain subcultural phenomena .
Since the mid-1990s ,  लोकप्रिय शैलियाँ ऐसे as nu मेटल , जिससे प्रायः incorporates तत्व of grunge और हिप हॉप ;  and metalcore , which blends extreme metal with hardcore punk , have further expanded the definition of the genre .
The far-right (  भी ज्ञात as the चरम सही ) refers to the  highest degree of rightism in right-wing politics .
Far right politics involves support of strong or complete social hierarchy in society  , और supports सर्वोच्चता of निश्चित  individuals or groups deemed to be innately superior or preferable who are to be more valued than those deemed to be innately inferior or undesirable .
The far right 's advocacy of  supremacism is आधारित on कया इसके adherents perceive as  innate characteristics of people that can not be changed .
This stands as a point of difference  साथ the centre-right 's आरोपण of behaviours  , such as laziness or decadence , as the primary sources of social inequalities .
The centre right—unlike the far right—claims that people can end their behavioural inferiority  through बदलना उनके आदतें और चुनाव  .
The original far right , which emerged in France after the French Revolution , refused to accept the French  गणतंत्र और समर्थित a counter-revolution to restore  the French monarchy and aristocracy .
The far right is commonly associated with persons or groups who hold extreme  राष्ट्रवादी , xenophobic , जातिवाद , धार्मिक fundamentalist  or reactionary views .
The most extreme-right movements have pursued oppression and genocide against  समूह of लोगों on the आधार of उनके कथित हीनता  .
Thomas Hobbes of Malmesbury ( 5 April 1588 – 4 December 1679 ) , in some older texts Thomas Hobbs of Malmsbury  , थी an अंग्रेज़ी पारस , बेहतरीन ज्ञात आज लिये उसके कार्य on राजनैतिक  philosophy .
His 1651 book Leviathan established the foundation for most of Western political  दर्शनशास्त्र इससे the परिप्रेक्ष्य of  social contract theory .
Hobbes was a champion of absolutism for the sovereign , but he also developed some of the fundamentals of European liberal thought : the right of the individual ; the natural equality of all men ;  the कृत्रिम अक्षर of the राजनैतिक अनुक्रम ( जिससे led to the बाद भेद between सिविल समाज और the राज्य  ) ; the view that all legitimate political power must be `` representative '' and based on the consent of the people ; and a liberal interpretation of law which leaves people free to do whatever the law does not explicitly forbid .
He was one of the founders of  आधुनिक राजनैतिक  philosophy .
His understanding of humans as being  पदार्थ और गति , obeying the वही शारीरिक कानून as अन्य पदार्थ और गति , remains influential ; और उसके खाता of इंसान प्रकृति as self-interested  cooperation , and of political communities as being based upon a `` social contract `` remains one of the major topics of political philosophy .
In  जोड to राजनैतिक दर्शनशास्त्र , hobbes भी contributed to a  diverse array of other fields , including history , geometry , the physics of gases , theology , ethics , and general philosophy .
Emotional intelligence ( EI ) is the ability to identify , assess , and control the emotions of oneself  , of अन्य , और of समूह  .
It can be divided into ability  ei और trait ei  .
Ability EI is usually measured using maximum performance tests and has stronger relationships with traditional intelligence  , whereas trait ei is प्रायः measured using self-report questionnaires और रै stronger संबंध साथ व्यक्तित्व  .
Criticisms have centered on whether EI is a real intelligence and whether it has incremental validity  over iq और the बिग पाँच व्यक्तित्व  traits .
Heredity is the passing of traits to offspring from  इसके अभिभावक or पूर्वज .
This is the process  by जिससे an औलाद कोशिका or सजीव acquires  or becomes predisposed to the characteristics of its parent cell or organism .
Through heredity , variations exhibited by  individuals can accumulate और कारण कुछ प्रजाति  to evolve .
The study of  आनुवंशिकता in जीवविज्ञान is पुकारा आनुवंशिकी , जिससे  includes the field of epigenetics .
For United States individual income tax , adjusted gross income  ( agi )  is total gross income minus specific reductions .
taxable आय is समायोजित सकल आय  minus allowances for personal exemptions and itemized deductions .
For  सबसे व्यक्तिगत कर उद्देश्य  , AGI is more relevant than gross income .
Gross income is  बिक्री दाम of goods  or property , minus cost of the property sold , plus other income .
It includes wages , interest , dividends , business income , rental  आय , और सब अन्य प्रकार  of income .
Adjusted gross income is  सकल आय कम deductions इससे a कारोबार or  rental activity and 21 other specific items .
Several deductions ( e.g . medical expenses and  विविध itemized  deductions ) are limited based on a percentage of AGI .
Certain phase outs , including those of lower tax rates and itemized deductions , are  आधारित on स्तर  of AGI .
Many states base state income  कर on agi साथ निश्चित deductions  .
``  आलसी नजर '' is the तीसरा सिंगल इससे  Silversun Pickups ' debut album Carnavas .
The band performed the song on the Late Show with David Letterman , The Tonight Show with Jay Leno ,  बाद साथ jools हॉलैंड , और पिछला कॉल  with Carson Daly .
the सोंग is a playable track  on Rock Band 2 and Guitar Hero : World Tour .
An alternate version of the song , with a  लंबाई of 7:27 , थी निभाई on xmu पहले the shorter  version was played on FM and other XM channels .
This version was featured on  उनके डेमो cd ( जिससे प्रदर्शित जल्दी  versions of four tracks ) .
A telephone prefix is the first set of digits of a telephone number ; in the North  अमरीकी क्रमांकन योजना देशों ( देश  code 1 ) , it is the first three digits of a seven-digit phone number .
In other countries both the prefix and the number  may have अलग lengths  .
It shows  जिससे एक्सचेंज  the remaining numbers refer to .
A full telephone number is usually made up of country code ( required for international calls only ) , area code ( required for calls between  टेलीफोन क्षेत्रों ) , उपसर्ग , और सदस्य क्रमांक  .
Some places restrict certain  prefixes to फैक्स संख्याएँ or कोशिका  phones only ; in other places such dedicated prefixes are not used .
As telephone technology advanced , the precise significance of the prefix  became धुंधला in अनेक स्थान ; 485 in लंदन , uk , थी एकबार the gulliver एक्सचेंज  , but now 44207485xxxx is just considered one of many number blocks served by the CLKEN Kentish Town exchange ; 4420770703xx is another .
metformin ( bp , सुनाया , ; originally  sold as Glucophage ) is an oral antidiabetic drug in the biguanide class .
It is the  first-line ड्रग of चुनाव लिये the उपचार of प्रकार 2 मधुमेह , in particular  , in overweight and obese people and those with normal kidney function .
Its use in gestational  मधुमेह रै महरूम सीमित by सुरक्षा  concerns .
It is also used in the treatment of polycystic ovary syndrome ,  और रै महरूम investigated लिये अन्य रोगों जहाँ इंसुलिन  resistance may be an important factor .
Metformin works by suppressing glucose  उत्पादन by the जिगर  .
Metformin is the  तभी antidiabetic ड्रग कि रै महरूम conclusively दिखाया  to prevent the cardiovascular complications of diabetes .
It helps reduce LDL cholesterol and  triglyceride स्तर , और is नहीं संबद्ध  with weight gain .
, metformin is one of only two oral antidiabetics in the World Health Organization Model List of Essential  दवाइयाँ ( the अन्य होने glibenclamide  ) .
When prescribed appropriately ,  metformin कल्याणकारी few प्रतिकूल प्रभाव ( the सबसे आम is जठरांत्र  upset ) and is associated with a low risk of hypoglycemia .
Lactic acidosis ( a buildup of lactate in the blood ) can be a serious  चिंता in overdose और जब it is विहित to लोगों साथ contraindications , लकिन वरना ,  there is no significant risk .
First  synthesized और मिला to reduce रक्त  sugar in the 1920s , metformin was forgotten for the next two decades as research shifted to insulin and other antidiabetic drugs .
Interest in  metformin थी rekindled in the लेट 1940s बाद अनेक रिपोर्ट्स कि it could reduce रक्त शुगर स्तर in लोगों , और in 1957 , फ्रेंच चिकित्सक  Jean Sterne published the first clinical trial of metformin as a treatment for diabetes .
It was introduced to the United Kingdom in 1958 , Canada in 1972 , and the  संयुक्त राज्य in 1995  .
Metformin is  अभी believed to be the सबसे widely विहित antidiabetic ड्रग in the संसार ; in the संयुक्त राज्य  alone , more than 48 million prescriptions were filled in 2010 for its generic formulations .
The Mount Rushmore National Memorial is a sculpture carved into the granite face of  माउंट rushmore निकट keystone , दक्षिण डकोटा , in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
Sculpted by Danish-American Gutzon Borglum and his son , Lincoln Borglum , Mount Rushmore features sculptures  of the heads of चार संयुक्त राज्य राष्ट्रपतियों : जार्ज वॉशिंगटन , थामस जेफरसन , थियोडोर  Roosevelt and Abraham Lincoln .
The entire memorial  कवर और is ऊपर  sea level .
The  tallest पहाड़  in the region is Harney Peak ( ) .
South Dakota historian Doane Robinson is credited with  conceiving the विचार of नक्काशी the likenesses of  famous people into the Black Hills region of South Dakota in order to promote tourism in the region .
Robinson 's initial idea  थी to sculpt the needles ; however , gutzon borglum अस्वीकृत the needles साईट क्युकी of the ग़रीब विशेषता  of the granite and strong opposition from environmentalists and Native American groups .
They settled on the Mount Rushmore location , which also has the  लाभ of facing southeast  for maximum sun exposure .
Robinson wanted it to feature western heroes like Lewis and Clark , Red Cloud and Buffalo Bill Cody but Borglum decided the  मूर्तिकला चाहिए have a अधिक नेशनल फ़ोकस , और chose the चार राष्ट्रपतियों जिनकी likenesses  would be carved into the mountain .
After securing federal funding , construction on the memorial began in 1927 , and the presidents ' faces  यहूद समाप्त between 1934 और  1939 .
Upon Gutzon Borglum 's death in March 1941 , his son Lincoln Borglum took  over निर्माण  .
Although the initial concept called for each president to be  चित्रित इससे सिर to कमर , कमी of funding मजबूर  construction to end in late October 1941 .
The U.S. National Park Service took control of the  मेमोरियल in 1933 , जबकि it थी स्टिल अंतर्गत  construction , and has managed the memorial to the present day .
It attracts nearly  तीन लाख लोगों  annually .
Charvet dress  कमीज़ इससे the 1930s , norsk folkemuseum  , Oslo .
A shirt , dress shirt , button-front ,  button-front कमीज़ , or  button-up shirt is a garment with a collar , a full-length opening at the front from the collar to the hem , and sleeves with cuffs .
Shirts are predominantly used by men , since  महिलाओं प्रायः पहनें blouses  .
The front opening is fastened using buttons or studs ,  और the cuffs बंद साथ बटन or  cuff links .
Shirts are normally made from woven cloth , and are often  accompanied by a जैकेट और टाई , लिये उदाहरण साथ  a suit or formalwear , but shirts are also worn more casually .
In British English , dress  कमीज़ अर्थात् specifically the अधिक औपचारिक  evening garment worn with black- or white- tie , also discussed below .
Some of these formal shirts have stiff fronts and detachable collars  संलग्न साथ कॉलर  studs .
The term `` button-down '' (  जिससे refers a प्रकार of कमीज़ जिससे  has a collar fastened down by buttons ) is sometimes used in error to apply to all shirts ( with or without buttoned down collars ) , being used as a synonym for `` button-up '' or `` button-front '' .
Administrative Professionals Day ( also known as  secretaries दिन or एडमिन दिन ) is an unofficial धर्मनिरपेक्ष अवकाश observed in अनेक देशों to recognize the कार्य of secretaries , प्रशासनिक  assistants , receptionists , and other administrative support professionals .
In North America , it is celebrated on the Wednesday of the last  पूरा सप्ताह of अप्रैल ( अप्रैल 24  in 2013 ) .
In France it is  मनाये on the तीसरा गुरुवार in अप्रैल  ( April 18 in 2013 ) .
In Australia it is celebrated on  the पहला शुक्रवार  in May

Nicolas  poussin ( ; 15 जून 1594 – 19 नवम्बर 1665 ) थी the अग्रणी चित्रकार of the शास्त्रीय  French Baroque style , although he spent most of his working life in Rome .
His  कार्य is characterized by स्पष्टता , लॉजिक , और  order , and favors line over color .
Until the 20th century he remained a major inspiration for such  classically उन्मुख कलाकारों as jacques-louis दाउद  , Jean-Auguste-Dominique Ingres and Paul Cézanne .
He worked in Rome for a circle of leading collectors there and elsewhere ,  मगर लिये a छोटी काल जब कार्डिनल रिचलू ordered उसे वापस  to France to serve as First Painter to the King .
Most of  उसके works हैं इतिहास paintings of धार्मिक or पौराणिक  subjects that very often have a large landscape element .
Jackie Keith Whitley ( July 1 , 1954Stambler , Irwin , and Grelun Landon ( 2000 ) . - Country Music : The Encyclopedia . - New York : St. Martin 's Press . - p.533 . - ISBN 978-0-312-26487-1.—Carlin , Richard ( 2003 ) . - Country Music :  a biographical शब्दकोष . - नई यॉर्क : routledge - p.427 . - isbn 978-0-415-93802-0.—larkin , कोलिन ( 1995 ) . - the गिनीज ज्ञानकोष of लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक . - नई यॉर्क : स्टॉकटन दबायें - p.4462 . - isbn 978-0-85112-662-3.—stanton , स्कॉट ( 2003 ) . - the tombstone पर्यटक : संगीतकारों . - नई यॉर्क : जेब किताबे . - p.395 . - isbn 978-0-7434-6330-0.—hicks , जोकर . - `` सिंगर कैथ whitley 's मेमोरी जिंदा through गीतों , प्रेम in घर कस्बा '' . - the केंटकी पोस्ट . - सितंबर 25 , 1991.— '' देश म्यूज़िक स्टार कैथ whitley मुर्दे at 33 '' . - lexington herald-leader .  - May 10 , 1989.——Hurst , Jack . - `` Whitley 's Last Days '' . - Chicago Tribune . - May 14 , 1989.— '' Alcohol Kills Country Singer Keith Whitley '' . - United Press International . - ( c/o The San Francisco Chronicle ) . - May 10 , 1989 . — May 9 , 1989 ) , known professionally as Keith Whitley , was an American country music singer .
Whitley 's brief career in  मुख्यधारा देश म्यूज़िक lasted इससे 1984 जबतक उसके मौत in 1989  , but he continues to influence an entire generation of singers and songwriters .
He charted 19 singles on the Billboard country charts , including five consecutive Number Ones : `` Do n't Close Your Eyes `` , `` When You Say Nothing at All ``  , `` i 'm no अजनबी to the बरसात `` , `` i अचरज do तुम  Think of Me `` and `` It Ai n't Nothin ' `` ( the last two posthumously ) .
statute of  Grand Duchy of Lithuania , written in Polish
A statute is a formal written enactment of a  विधान प्राधिकार कि governs  a state , city , or county .
Typically  , statutes कमांड or  prohibit something , or declare policy .
The word is often used to distinguish law made by legislative  लाशें इससे मामला विधि , decided by न्यायालयों , और regulations जारी by सरकारी  agencies .
Statutes are sometimes  referred to as विधान or `` ब्लैक  letter law . ''
As a source of law ,  statutes हैं माना प्राथमिक प्राधिकार  ( as opposed to secondary authority ) .
Ideally all  statutes जरूर be in सामंजस्य साथ  the fundamental law of the land ( constitutional ) .
This word  is प्रयुक्त in contradistinction to  the common law .
Statutes acquire their force from the time  of उनके ड्योढ़ी , however  unless otherwise provided .
Statutes are of several kinds  ; namely , पब्लिक or  private .
declaratory or remedial  .
Temporary or  perpetual  .
A temporary statute is one which is limited in its  अवधि at the समय of इसके enactment  .
It continues  in फ़ोर्स जबतक the समय of इसके limitation  has expired , unless sooner repealed .
A perpetual statute is one for the  फिराकर of जिससे वहीँ is no सीमित समय , हालांकि  it may not be expressly declared to be so .
If , however , a statute which did not itself contain any limitation is to be governed by another which is temporary only , the former  होगा भी be अस्थाई और निर्भर upon the अस्तित्व  of the latter .
पहले a statute becomes विधि in कुछ देशों  , it must be agreed upon by the highest executive in the government , and finally published as part of a code .
In many countries , statutes  हैं व्यवस्थित in topical इंतजाम ( or `` संहिताबद्ध  '' ) within publications called codes , such as the United States Code .
In many nations statutory law is distinguished  इससे और अधीनस्थ  to constitutional law .
The external iliac arteries are two major arteries which bifurcate off the common  iliac धमनियों अग्रवर्ती to the sacroiliac  joint of the pelvis .
They proceed anterior and inferior along the medial border  of the psoas प्रमुख मांसपेशियां  .
They exit the pelvic girdle posterior and inferior to the  वंक्षण स्नायु परिचय एक तीसरा laterally इससे the प्रविष्ट पाइंट of the वंक्षण स्नायु  on the pubic tubercle at which point they are referred to as the femoral arteries .
The external iliac artery is usually the artery used to attach the renal  धमनी to the प्राप्तकर्ता of a गुर्दा प्रत्यारोपण  .
Steam is a digital distribution , digital  अधिकारों प्रबन्धन , एकाधिक और संचार मंच  developed by Valve Corporation .
It is used to distribute games and  सम्बन्धित मीडिया ऑनलाइन , इससे छोटी स्वतंत्र डेवलपर  to larger software houses ; in October 2012 , Valve expanded the service to include non-gaming software .
Steam provides the user with  संस्थापना और स्वचालित प्रबन्धन of तन्त्र आरपार अनेक कंप्यूटर , जातियाँ  features such as friends lists and groups , cloud saving , and in-game voice and chat functionality .
The software provides a freely available application programming interface , Steamworks , that developers can take advantage of to integrate many of Steam 's functions within their software  उत्पाद , सहित नक़ल सुरक्षा , नेटवर्किंग और matchmaking  , in-game achievements and micro-transactions , and support for user-created content through Steam Workshop .
Though initially developed for use on Microsoft Windows , the client has expanded to include OS X and Linux versions , and clients with limited functionality on  the प्लेस्टेशन 3 कंसोल और लिये दोनो आईओएस और एंड्रॉइड मोबाईल डिवाइस  .
In addition to being a central hub for gaming software ,  वाल्व रै निर्मित a संस्करण of भाप साथ altered कार्यक्षमता to be प्रयुक्त in  schools for educational software , including a modified version of Portal 2 for teaching science and critical thinking lessons .
, there are nearly 2000 games  उपलब्धियाँ through भाप , और  54 million active user accounts .
As of  जनवरी 2013 , भाप रै देखी over  6.6 million concurrent players .
Steam has an  अनुमानित 50–70 % share of the डिजिटल वितरण  market for video games .
The Steam logo is a stylised left-side fly-crank and rod from the Walschaerts valve gear  of a भाप लोकोमोटिव .
Jerry Lewis ( born March 16 , 1926 ) is an American comedian , actor  , सिंगर , फिल्मी निर्माता , screenwriter और फिल्मी निदेशक  .
He is  ज्ञात लिये उसके slapstick ह्यूमर in फिल्मी  , television , stage and radio .
He was  originally युग्म up साथ डीन मार्टिन  in 1946 , forming the famed comedy team of Martin and Lewis .
In addition to the duo 's popular nightclub work , they starred in a successful series of comedy  films लिये सर्वोपरि तस्वीरें  .
लुईस is भी ज्ञात लिये उसके दान fund-raising  telethons and position as national chairman for the Muscular Dystrophy Association ( MDA ) .
Lewis has won  अनेक पुरस्कार लिये आजीवन उपलब्धियाँ इससे the अमरीकी कॉमेडी पुरस्कार , लॉस  Angeles Film Critics Association , and Venice Film Festival , and he has two stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
In 2005 , he received the Governors Award of the Academy of Television Arts & Sciences Board  of राज्यपालों , जिससे is the उच्चतम एमी पुरस्कार प्रस्तुत  .
On February 22 ,  2009 , the अकादमी of गति चित्र  Arts and Sciences awarded Lewis the Jean Hersholt Humanitarian Award .
The Rhine ( ; ; ) is a European river that runs from the Swiss canton of Grisons in the southeastern Swiss Alps through Germany and eventually flows into  the उत्तर समुद्र coast in the नीदरलैंड्स और is the बारहवीं  longest river in Europe , at about , with an average discharge of more than .
The Rhine and the Danube  formed सबसे of the उत्तरी अंतर्देशीय frontier of the रोमन  Empire and , since those days , the Rhine has been a vital and navigable waterway carrying trade and goods deep inland .
It has also served as a defensive feature and  रै महरूम the आधार लिये क्षेत्रीय और अंतरराष्ट्रीय  borders .
The many castles and prehistoric fortifications along the Rhine  गवाही to इसके महत्व as a  waterway .
River traffic could be stopped at these locations , usually for the purpose of  collecting tolls , by the राज्य कि नियंत्रित कि  portion of the river .
श्री ( सिंहली  )
Sri ( Devanagari : श्री , IAST ; Śrī ) , also  transliterated as sree or shri or श्री is a शब्द of संस्कृत उत्पत्ति , प्रयुक्त in the भारतीय उपमहाद्वीप as विनम्र रूप of पता समतुल्य to the अंग्रेज़ी  `` Mr. '' in written and spoken language , or as a title of veneration for deities ( usually translated as `` Holy '' ) .
Design of complex structures like the International Space  स्टेशन needs in-depth समझना of  Structural Analysis .
Civil engineering is a professional engineering discipline that deals with the design ,  निर्माण , और मेंटेनेंस of the शारीरिक और naturally निर्मित पर्यावरण , सहित works जैसे सड़कें , पुलों  , canals , dams , and buildings .
Civil engineering is the oldest engineering discipline after military  अभियान्त्रिकी , और it थी पारिभाषित to फर्क non-military  engineering from military engineering .
It  is traditionally टूटा into अनेक sub-disciplines सहित पर्यावरणीय अभियान्त्रिकी , भूतकनीकी अभियान्त्रिकी , भूभौतिकी  , geodesy , control engineering , structural engineering , biomechanics , nanotechnology , transportation engineering , earth science , atmospheric sciences , forensic engineering , municipal or urban engineering , water resources engineering , materials engineering , coastal engineering , surveying , and construction engineering .
Civil engineering takes place on all levels  : in the पब्लिक सेक्टर इससे नगरपालिका through to नेशनल सरकारें , और in the निजी सेक्टर इससे व्यक्तिगत  homeowners through to international companies .
कैथरीन dunham  in Tropical Revue

Katherine Dunham in Tropical Review Tropical Review ,  मार्टिन बेक थिएटर
