कैथरीन dunham  in Cumbia
Katherine Dunham (  जून 22 , 1909 – may 21 , 2006 ) थी an अमरीकी  dancer , choreographer , author , educator , and social activist .
Dunham had one  of the सबसे कामयाब नृत्य करियर in अमरीकी  and European theater of the 20th century , and directed her own dance company for many years .
She has been called the ``  matriarch और महारानी माँ of ब्लैक  dance '' .
During her heyday in the 1940s and 1950s , Dunham was renowned throughout Europe and Latin America and was widely popular in the  संयुक्त राज्य , जहाँ the वॉशिंगटन पोस्ट पुकारा उसके `` नर्तकी कैथरीन the  Great '' .
For almost thirty years she maintained the Katherine Dunham Dance Company , the only self-supported American black dance troupe at that time , and over her long career she  choreographed अधिक than नब्बे व्यक्तिगत  dances .
Dunham was an innovator in African-American modern dance as well as a leader in the field of  नृत्य मानवशास्त्र ,  or ethnochoreology .
Sphagnum is a genus of between 1510 and 3500 species of mosses , commonly  पुकारा peat मॉस due to इसके व्यापकता in गीला habitats जहाँ it contributes  to the formation of peat bogs and mires .
Sphagnum accumulations can store water , since both living and dead plants can hold large quantities of water inside their cells ; plants may  थाम इससे 16-26 टाइम्स as much जल as उनके शुष्क वज़न depending on the प्रजाति  .
The empty cells help  retain जल in drier शर्तें  .
Hence , as sphagnum moss grows , it can slowly spread into drier  शर्तें , forming larger peatlands , दोनो उठाया bogs और कंबल  bogs .
These peat accumulations then provide habitat for a wide array of  peatland पौधे , सहित sedges और ericaceous shrubs , as खूब as orchids  and carnivorous plants .
sphagnum और the peat formed इससे  it do not decay readily because of the phenolic compounds embedded in the moss 's cell walls .
In addition , bogs , like all wetlands , develop anaerobic soil conditions , which  produces धीमा अवायवीय क्षय बल्कि than एरोबिक सूक्ष्मजैविक  action .
Peat moss can  भी acidify इसके परिवेश by लेने  up cations , such as calcium and magnesium , and releasing hydrogen ions .
Under the  सही शर्तें ,  peat can accumulate to a depth of many meters .
Different species of  sphagnum have अलग सहिष्णुता  limits for flooding and pH , so any one peatland may have a number of different Sphagnum species .
Individual peat moss plants consist of a main stem , with tightly arranged clusters of branch  fascicles प्रायः consisting of दो or तीन spreading शाखाओं और दो to चार फांसी शाखाओं  .
The top of the plant , or  capitulum , रै कॉम्पैक्ट क्लस्टर  of young branches .
Along the stem are scattered leaves of  विभिन्न आकार , नामित स्टेम पत्ते  ; the shape varies according to species .
The leaves consist of two kinds of cells ; small , green , living  कोशिकाएं ( chlorophyllose कोशिकाएं ) , और विशाल , साफ , संरचनात्मक  , dead cells ( hyaline cells ) .
the latter have  the large water-holding capacity .
The earliest version of the Network Card  , जारी हस्तचालित बल्कि  than through an APTIS machine .
The first  aptis संस्करण  of the Network Card .
This was used from the start of the APTIS era in 1986/1987 until well into the  1990s , as स्टॉक्स था to be प्रयुक्त up despite the परिचय  of the new-look orange-banded version in 1991 .
The  परिचय of the weekday न्यूनतम किराया कंडीशन in 2002 resulted in a नाबालिग बदलें  : the red `` R '' shows that this is the `` Revised '' version of the railcard .
This version is  स्टिल in  use as of 2007 .
The Network Railcard is a discount card introduced in 1986 by  अंग्रेजों रेल , upon the सृष्टि of उनके संजाल southeast क्षेत्रफल around लंदन  , England .
The card  is intended to प्रोत्साहित अवकाश सफर by रेल by offering  discounts for adults and accompanying children on a wide range of off-peak fares .
The range of discounts available , and the  दाम of the कार्ड , have varied चूंकि  that time , but the card has always been valid for a year 's unlimited use .
It can be purchased by any person aged 16 or over from any staffed National Rail  स्टेशन or रेल नियुक्त सफर एजेंट , by completing an अनुप्रयोग  form - no photographic identification or other documentation is needed to buy or use the card .
It is one of a number of concessionary  किराया योजनाएं उपलब्धियाँ on the अंग्रेजों रेल  system .
The United Nations ( UN ;  फ्रेंच : संगठन देस राष्ट्र unies  , ONU ) is the world 's largest , foremost , and most prominent international organization .
The stated aims of the United Nations include promoting and facilitating cooperation in international law , international security , economic  विकास , सोशल प्रगति , इंसान अधिकारों , सिविल अधिकारों , सिविल लिबर्टीज , राजनैतिक freedoms  , democracy , and the achievement of lasting world peace .
The UN was founded in 1945 after World War II to replace the League  of राष्ट्र , to रोकें युद्धों between देशों ,  and to provide a platform for dialogue .
It contains multiple subsidiary organizations to  carry आउट इसके मिशन  .
At its founding , the UN  था 51 सदस्य राज्य ; as of 2011  , there are 193 .
From its  कार्यालयों around the संसार , the un और इसके specialized एजेंसियों  decide on substantive and administrative issues in regular meetings held throughout the year .
The organization has six principal organs : the General Assembly ( the main deliberative assembly ) ; the Security Council ( for deciding certain resolutions for peace and security ) ; the Economic and Social Council ( for assisting in promoting international economic and social cooperation and development ) ; the Secretariat ( for providing studies , information , and facilities needed  by the un ) ; the अंतरराष्ट्रीय अदालत of इंसाफ ( the प्राथमिक न्यायिक अंग ) ; और the संयुक्त राष्ट्र ट्रस्टीशिप परिषद  ( which is currently inactive ) .
Other prominent UN System agencies include the  संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन ( जो ) , the संसार  Food Programme ( WFP ) and United Nations Children 's Fund ( UNICEF ) .
The UN 's most prominent position is that of the office of Secretary-General  जिससे रै महरूम आयोजित by बैन ki-moon  of South Korea since 2007 .
The United Nations Headquarters resides in international  territory in नई यॉर्क नगर , साथ further प्रमुख  offices at Geneva , Nairobi , and Vienna .
The organization is financed from assessed and voluntary  योगदान इससे इसके सदस्य राज्य , और रै छह आधिकारिक भाषाएं : अरबी , चाइनीज , अंग्रेज़ी , फ्रेंच  , Russian , and Spanish .
दक्षिण बीच , भी nicknamed sobe , is a पड़ोस in the नगर of मियामी  Beach , Florida , United States , located due east of Miami city proper between Biscayne Bay and the Atlantic Ocean .
The area encompasses all of the barrier  आइलैंड्स of मियामी बीच  south of Indian Creek .
This area was the first section of Miami Beach to be developed , starting in the 1910s , thanks to the development efforts of Carl G. Fisher , the Lummus  भाइयो , और जॉन S. कॉलिन्स , the latter जिनकी निर्माण of the कॉलिन्स सेतु provided the पहला vital जमीन  link between mainland Miami and the beaches .
The area has gone through numerous artificial and natural changes over the years , including a booming regional economy , increased tourism , and the 1926 hurricane , which  नष्ट much of the क्षेत्रफल  .
As  of 2010 , परिचय 39,186  residents live in South Beach .
The United States presidential election of 1960 was the  44th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव , आयोजित on मंगलवार  , November 8 , 1960 .
The Republican Party nominated  लाज़िम vice-president रिचर्ड निक्सन , जबकि the लोकतांत्रिक  Party nominated John F. Kennedy , Senator from Massachusetts .
The incumbent President , Republican Dwight D. Eisenhower , was not  योग्य लिये re-election बाद सेवारत  the maximum two terms allowed by the Twenty-second Amendment .
Kennedy  थी निर्वाचित साथ a सीसे of 112,827 मत , or 0.17 % of the  popular vote , giving him a victory of 303 to 219 in the Electoral College , the closest since 1916 .
This was the first election in which  सब पचास of the वर्तमान संयुक्त राज्य  participated .
A number of factors explain why  the चुनाव थी so बंद  .
Kennedy gained since there was an economic recession which hurt the incumbent Republican , and he had the  लाभ of 17 लाख अधिक पंजीकृत डेमोक्रेट than republicans  .
Furthermore , the new votes that Kennedy gained among Catholics almost neutralized the new  मत निक्सन gained among protestants  .
Kennedy 's campaigning skills decisively  outmatched  Nixon 's .
In  the समाप्त , निक्सन 's जोर on उसके अनुभव carried छोटी वज़न , और he wasted उर्जा by  campaigning in all 50 states instead of concentrating on the swing states .
Kennedy used his large , well-funded  अभियान संगठन to जीत the नामांकन , सुरक्षित समर्थन  , and , with the aid of the last of the big-city bosses , to get out the vote in the big cities .
He relied on running mate Lyndon  B. जॉनसन to थाम the  South and used television effectively .
This election is notable as being the first time in U.S. history that two sitting U.S . Senators ( Kennedy and Johnson ) were elected as president and vice-president , a phenomenon that has been repeated once , by  बराक ओबामा और जो बिडेन in 2008 ( in दोनो मामले , the अध्यक्ष थी the younger , अधिक जूनियर सीनेटर  ) .
A poster for a c. 1884 American  उत्पादन of  Macbeth , starring Thomas W. Keene .
Depicted , counter clockwise from top-left ,  हैं : मैकबेथ और banquo मिलें the witches  ; just after the murder of Duncan ; Banquo 's ghost ; Macbeth duels Macduff ; and Macbeth .
Macbeth  is a खेल लिखा  by William Shakespeare .
It is considered one of his  darkest और सबसे शक्तिशाली tragedies  .
Set in Scotland , the play dramatizes the corroding psychological and political  प्रभाव उत्पादित जब इसके समर्थक , the स्कॉटिश रब मैकबेथ ,  chooses evil as the way to fulfill his ambition for power .
He commits regicide to become  किंग और तब furthers उसके moral  descent with a reign of murderous terror to stay in power , eventually plunging the country into civil war .
In the end  , he loses सबकुछ  that gives meaning and purpose to his life before losing his life itself .
The play is  believed to have महरूम लिखा between 1603 और 1607 , और  is most commonly dated 1606 .
The earliest account of a performance of what was probably Shakespeare 's play is April  1611 , जब साइमन forman अंकित देखकर ऐसे a खेल at the ग्लोब थिएटर  .
It was first published  in the folio of 1623 , संभवतः  from a prompt book .
It was most likely written during the reign of James I , who had been James VI of Scotland before he  succeeded to the  English throne in 1603 .
James was a patron of Shakespeare’s acting company , and of all the plays Shakespeare wrote during James’s reign  , मैकबेथ सबसे clearly reflects the  playwright’s relationship with the sovereign .
Macbeth is  shakespeare’s shortest त्रासदी , और tells the स्टोरी of a वीर स्कॉटिश सामान्य नामित मैकबेथ जो receives  a prophecy from a trio of witches that one day he will become King of Scotland .
Consumed by ambition and spurred to action by his wife , Macbeth murders  किंग डंकन और takes the सिंहासन  for himself .
His reign is racked with guilt and paranoia , and he soon becomes a tyrannical ruler as he is forced to  कमिट अधिक और अधिक हत्याएं to protect खुद इससे enmity और suspicion .
The bloodbath swiftly takes  मैकबेथ और महिला मैकबेथ into realms of arrogance , दीवानगी , और  death .
Shakespeare 's source for the tragedy is the account of King Macbeth of Scotland , Macduff , and Duncan in Holinshed 's Chronicles ( 1587 ) , a history of England ,  स्कॉटलैंड और आयरलैंड परिचित to शेक्सपियर और उसके contemporaries , हालांकि the कार्यक्रम in the खेल  differ extensively from the history of the real Macbeth .
In the backstage world of  थिएटर , कुछ मानना कि the खेल is शापित , और होगा  not mention its title aloud , referring to it instead as `` the Scottish play `` .
Over the  कोर्स of अनेक सदियां , the खेल रै  attracted some of the most renowned actors to the roles of Macbeth and Lady Macbeth .
It has been adapted to film , television , opera , novels  , कॉमिक किताबे , और अन्य मीडिया .
The Milton Hershey  स्कूल is a निजी परोपकारी ( pre-k through 12 ) बोर्डिंग स्कूल  in Hershey , Pennsylvania .
Originally named the Hershey Industrial School , the institution was founded and funded by chocolate industrialist Milton  snavely hershey और उसके बीवी , कैथरीन स्वीनी hershey  .
The school was originally established for impoverished , healthy , Caucasian , male  अनाथ , जबकि आज it serves विद्यार्थी of  various backgrounds .
The Milton Hershey School Trust , which funds the school , owns controlling interest in The Hershey Company  और owns the hershey entertainment और रिसॉर्ट कम्पनी ( herco ) जिससे  oversees many of the area hotels along with a theme park called Hersheypark .
With over six  अरब डॉलर in एसेट , the मिल्टन  Hershey School is one of the wealthiest schools in the world .
the स्कूल  is overseen by a Board of Managers .
The school currently serves 1,818 students  , और योजनाएँ to grow to 2,100 विद्यार्थी  by 2013 .
a सदस्य of कोर : गठबन्धन लिये आवासीय शिक्षा  , it is the largest residential education program in the US .

The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the  कॉंग्रेस of the संयुक्त राज्य as शीर्षक ii of  the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 .
The CSA is the  संघीय u.S.  drug policy under which the manufacture , importation , possession , use and distribution of certain substances is regulated .
The Act also served as the national  implementing विधान लिये the सिंगल सम्मेलन  on Narcotic Drugs .
The legislation created five Schedules (  classifications ) , साथ varying योग्यता लिये a पदार्थ  to be included in each .
Two federal agencies , the Drug Enforcement Administration and the  खाना और ड्रग प्रशासन , determine जिससे substances हैं added to or removed इससे the विभिन्न schedules , हालांकि the statute passed by कॉंग्रेस निर्मित the आरंभिक लिस्टिंग , और कॉंग्रेस रै sometimes अनुसूचित अन्य substances through विधान  such as the Hillory J. Farias and Samantha Reid Date-Rape Prevention Act of 2000 , which placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I . Classification decisions are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ) , currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States , and international treaties .
Second-language acquisition or second-language  सीखना is the प्रक्रम by जिससे लोगों सीख a दूसरी  language .
second-language अधिग्रहण ( प्रायः abbreviated  to SLA ) also refers to the scientific discipline devoted to studying that process .
Second language refers to any language learned in addition to a person 's first language ; although the concept is named  second-language अधिग्रहण , it can भी चरितार्थ the सीखना of तीसरा  , fourth , or subsequent languages .
Second-language  अधिग्रहण refers to कया learners  do ; it does not refer to practices in language teaching .
the अकादमिक अनुशासन of second-language  acquisition is a subdiscipline of applied linguistics .
It is  broad-based और  relatively new .
As well as the various branches of  भाषाविज्ञान , second-language अधिग्रहण is भी  closely related to psychology , cognitive psychology , and education .
To separate the academic discipline from the learning process itself , the  शर्तें second-language अधिग्रहण शोध , second-language अध्ययन , और second-language  acquisition studies are also used .
SLA research began as an interdisciplinary field , and  क्युकी of इस it is मुश्किल to पहचानो a precise starting  date .
However , it does appear to have  विकसित a ग्रेट सौदे चूंकि the mid-1960s  .
The term acquisition was originally used to  emphasize the अवचेतन प्रकृति of the  learning process , but in recent years learning and acquisition have become largely synonymous .
second-language अधिग्रहण can चरितार्थ विरासत भाषा  learning , but it does not usually incorporate bilingualism .
Most SLA researchers see bilingualism as being the end result of learning a language , not the process itself , and  देखिए the पद as referring to native-like fluency  .
Writers in fields such as education and psychology , however  , प्रायः उपयोग bilingualism loosely to refer  to all forms of multilingualism .
Second-language acquisition is also not to be contrasted with the acquisition of a foreign language ; rather , the learning of  दूसरी भाषाएं और the सीखना of विदेशी भाषाएं involve the  same fundamental processes in different situations..
There has been much debate  परिचय exactly कैसा भाषा is सीखे  , and many issues are still unresolved .
There are many theories of  second-language अधिग्रहण , लकिन none हैं स्वीकृत as  a complete explanation by all SLA researchers .
Due to the interdisciplinary nature of the field of  second-language अधिग्रहण , इस is नहीं अपेक्षित  to happen in the foreseeable future .
Forbes list of billionaires is an annual ranking  of the संसार 's wealthiest लोगों , compiled और प्रकाशित by फोर्ब्स , an  American national business magazine .
The total net  लायक of प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत  on the list is estimated , in United States dollars , based on their assets and accounting for debt .
The list  तभी represents प्रत्येक व्यक्ति 's valuation  on a single day , due to daily fluctuations among exchange rates and stock valuations .
The United States Secret Service is a U.S. federal law  प्रवर्तन एजेंसी कि is भाग of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग  of Homeland Security .
The sworn members are divided among the  खास एजेंटों और the uniformed प्रभाग  .
Until March 1  , 2003 , the सेवा थी भाग of the संयुक्त  States Department of the Treasury .
The U.S.  रहस्य सेवा रै दो पृथक  areas of responsibility:
Financial Crimes , covering missions such as prevention and investigation of counterfeiting of U.S.  करेंसी और u.S. राजकोष प्रतिभूति , और छानबीन of प्रमुख  fraud .
Protection , which entails ensuring the safety of current and former national leaders and their families , such as the President , past presidents , vice  राष्ट्रपतियों , अध्यक्षीय उम्मीदवार , visiting heads of राज्य ,  and foreign embassies ( per an agreement with the U.S. State Department 's Bureau of Diplomatic Security ( DS ) Office of Foreign Missions ( OFM ) , etc . )
The Secret Service 's initial responsibility was to investigate  counterfeiting of u.S. करेंसी , जिससे थी अनियंत्रित following the  U.S. Civil War .
The agency then evolved  into the संयुक्त राज्य ' पहला घरेलू प्रज्ञा  and counterintelligence agency .
Many of the agency 's missions were later taken over by subsequent agencies such as the Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) , Bureau of Alcohol , Tobacco , Firearms and  विस्फोटक ( atf ) , आव्रजन और कस्टम प्रवर्तन ( बर्फ ) , और आतंरिक  Revenue Service ( IRS ) .
`` Me and Bobby McGee '' is a song  लिखा by क्रिस kristofferson और फ्रेड फोस्टर , originally  performed by Roger Miller .
Others performed the song later , including Kristofferson himself , and Janis Joplin who topped the U.S. singles chart with the song in 1971 after her death ,  बनाना the सोंग the दूसरी posthumous number-one सिंगल in u.S. चार्ट इतिहास बाद `` ( sittin ' on ) the  Dock of the Bay `` by Otis Redding .
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30 , 1882 – April 12 , 1945 ) , also known by his initials  , fdr , थी the 32nd अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1933–1945 ) और a सेंट्रल फिगर in संसार कार्यक्रम दौरान the mid-20th सदी , अग्रणी the संयुक्त राज्य  during a time of worldwide economic depression and total war .
A dominant leader of the Democratic  पार्टी और the तभी अमरीकी अध्यक्ष निर्वाचित  to more than two terms , he built a New Deal Coalition that realigned American politics after 1932 , as his domestic policies defined American liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century .
With the bouncy  लोकप्रिय सोंग `` प्रसन्न दिनों हैं यहाँ  Again `` as his campaign theme , FDR defeated incumbent Republican Herbert Hoover in November 1932 , at the depth of the Great Depression .
Energized by his personal  विजय over पोलियो , fdr 's unfailing आशावाद  and activism contributed to a renewal of the national spirit .
He worked  closely साथ अंग्रेजों प्रधान मंत्री विंस्टन चर्चिल और सोवियत सामान्य सचिव जोसेफ स्टालिन in अग्रणी  the Allies against Germany and Japan in World War II , and restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy .
in उसके पहला सौ दिनों in दफ्तर , जिससे began कूच 4 , 1933 , रूज़वेल्ट  spearheaded major legislation and issued a profusion of executive orders that instituted the New Deal —a variety of programs designed to produce relief ( government jobs for the unemployed ) , recovery ( economic growth ) , and reform ( through regulation of Wall Street , banks and transportation ) .
The economy improved rapidly  इससे 1933 to 1937 , लकिन तब relapsed into  a deep recession .
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his packing the Supreme Court or passing any  considerable विधान ; it abolished अनेक of the राहत कार्यक्रम जब बेरोजगारी diminished दौरान  World War II .
Most of the regulations on  कारोबार यहूद ended परिचय 1975–85 , मगर लिये the विनियमन of वॉल गली  by the Securities and Exchange Commission , which still exists .
Along with several  छोटी कार्यक्रम , प्रमुख surviving कार्यक्रम शामिल the संघीय जमा  Insurance Corporation , which was created in 1933 , and Social Security , which Congress passed in 1935 .
As World War II loomed after 1938 , with the Japanese invasion of China and the aggression of Nazi Germany , FDR  दिया दमदार राजनयिक  and financial support to China and Great Britain , while remaining officially neutral .
His goal was to make America the ``  आर्सेनल of लोकतंत्र `` जिससे  would supply munitions to the Allies .
In March 1941 , Roosevelt , with Congressional approval , provided Lend-Lease  सहायता to the देशों लड़ विरूद्ध  Nazi Germany with Britain .
With very strong  नेशनल support , he बना युद्ध on जापानी और जर्मनी बाद the जापानी आक्रमण on पर्ल हार्बर on दिसम्बर  7 , 1941 , calling it a `` date which will live in infamy `` .
He supervised the mobilization of the U.S.  अर्थव्यवस्था to support the अलाइड  war effort .
As an active military leader , Roosevelt implemented an overall war strategy on two fronts that ended in the defeat of the Axis  शक्तियां और the विकास of the संसार  's first atom bomb .
In 1942 Roosevelt  ordered the internment  of 100,000 Japanese American civilians .
Unemployment dropped to 2 % , relief programs largely ended , and the industrial economy grew rapidly to new heights as  लाखो of लोगों स्थानांतरित to नई कार्य in युद्ध centers , और 16 लाख मेन और 300,000 महिलाओं यहूद  drafted or volunteered for military service .
Roosevelt dominated the American political scene not only  दौरान the बारह सालो of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी , लकिन  also for decades afterward .
He orchestrated the realignment of voters that created  the पांचवां पार्टी प्रणाली  .
FDR 's New  सौदे गठबन्धन संयुक्त मजदूर संघ , बिग नगर मशीने  , white ethnics , African Americans and rural white Southerners .
He also  बहकावे the बाद सृष्टि  of the United Nations and Bretton Woods .
Roosevelt is consistently rated by scholars as one of the top three U.S. Presidents ,  साथ साथ अब्राहम lincoln और जार्ज  Washington .
A liberal Democrat , Roosevelt defined his ideological position as ``  a छोटी बाएँ of बीच . ''
Mara Salvatrucha ( commonly abbreviated as MS , Mara , and  ms-13 ) is a transnational दण्ड गिरोह कि originated in लॉस  Angeles and has spread to other parts of the United States , Canada , Mexico , and Central America .
The majority of the gang is ethnically composed of  सेंट्रल अमेरिकी और क्रियाशील in शहरी  and suburban areas .
In the U.S. , the MS-13 has an especially heavy presence in  लॉस एंजिल्स काउंटी और the सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल in उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया ; the वॉशिंगटन , d.C. महानगर क्षेत्रों of फेयरफैक्स काउंटी , वर्जिनिया , मोंटगोमरी काउंटी , मेरीलैंड  , and Prince George 's County , Maryland ; Long Island , New York ; the Boston , Massachusetts area ; Charlotte , North Carolina ; and Houston , Texas .
There is also a  उपस्थिति of ms-13  in Toronto , Ontario , Canada .
Members of MS distinguish themselves by tattoos covering the body and also  प्रायः the फेस , as खूब as the उपयोग of उनके अपना  sign language .
They are notorious for their use of violence and a subcultural moral code that predominantly consists of merciless  बदला और बेदर्द  retributions .
This cruelty of the distinguished  सदस्यों of the `` maras '' or `` mareros '' अर्जित उन्हें a पाथ to be recruited by the sinaloa  Cartel battling against Los Zetas in an ongoing drug war south of the United States border .
Their wide-ranging activities have drawn the attention of the FBI and Immigration and Customs Enforcement , who  have initiated wide-scale छापे विरूद्ध ज्ञात और suspected गिरोह सदस्यों  – netting hundreds of arrests across the country .
Bones is an American crime comedy-drama television  श्रेणी कि premiered on the फॉक्स संजाल in the  United States on September 13 , 2005 .
The show is based on forensic anthropology and forensic  पुरातत्व , साथ प्रत्येक एपीसोड focusing on an एफबीआई मामला संचिका concerning the रहस्य पीछे इंसान remains  brought by FBI Special Agent Seeley Booth ( David Boreanaz ) to the forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance `` Bones '' Brennan ( Emily Deschanel ) .
The rest of the main cast includes  michaela conlin , T. J. thyne , eric millegan , tamara टेलर  , Jonathan Adams , and John Francis Daley .
Created by Hart Hanson , the series is  बहुत loosely आधारित on the जीवन  and writings of novelist and forensic anthropologist Kathy Reichs , who also produces the show .
Its title character , Temperance  ब्रेनन , is नामित बाद  the protagonist of Reichs ' crime novel series .
Conversely , Dr. Brennan writes successful mystery novels based  around a fictional ( in the हड्डियों ब्रह्मांड ) forensic  anthropologist named Kathy Reichs .
Bones is a joint production  by जोसेफसन entertainment , दूर फ़ील्ड  Productions and 20th Century Fox Television .
The series has completed airing its eighth season and has been renewed for a ninth  ऋतु .
Super Bowl XXV was an American football game between the American Football Conference ( AFC ) champion Buffalo Bills and the National  फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) चैंपियन नई यॉर्क दिग्गज to decide the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ) चैंपियन  for the 1990 season .
The Giants defeated the Bills by the  स्कोर of 20–19 , जीतना उनके दूसरी कभी  Super Bowl .
It is the only  सुपर कटोरी decided by  one point .
The game was held  at tampa स्टेडियम in tampa , फ्लोरिडा  , on January 27 , 1991 , during the height of the Gulf War .
It was thus  निभाई अंतर्गत much patriotic fervor  .
The proceedings included a  rousing rendition of `` the star-spangled  Banner `` by Whitney Houston during the pregame ceremonies .
The Bills and their explosive no-huddle offense were making their first Super Bowl appearance after finishing  the नियमित ऋतु साथ a 13-3 रिकार्ड , और अग्रणी the लीग in  total points scored with 428 .
In advancing to their second Super Bowl , the Giants also posted a  13-3 नियमित ऋतु रिकार्ड , लकिन साथ a ball-control ठोकर और a  defense that allowed a league low 211 points .
The game is best remembered for Bills placekicker Scott Norwood 's last-second field goal attempt which went wide right  of the uprights , अग्रणी to a दिग्गज विजय , और starting a four-game खोने streak in the सुपर कटोरी लिये  the Bills .
The Giants  नियत a सुपर कटोरी रिकार्ड पकड़कर कब्ज़ा of  the ball for 40 minutes and 33 seconds .
New York also overcame a 12-3 second-quarter deficit , and made a 75-yard  touchdown ड्राइव कि खपत  a Super Bowl record 9:29 off the clock .
Giants running back  ottis एंडरसन , जो carried the बॉल 21 टाइम्स लिये 102 गज  and one touchdown , was named Super Bowl MVP .
He was the first awardee to receive the newly  नामित `` पीट rozelle ट्रॉफी '' ( नामित लिये  the former commissioner ) .
Anderson  भी अंकित  one reception for seven yards .
Malcolm X ( ; May 19 , 1925February 21 , 1965 ) , born Malcolm  छोटी और भी ज्ञात as el-hajj malik el-shabazz ( ) , थी an african-american मुस्लिम मंत्री और इंसान  rights activist .
To his admirers , he was a courageous advocate for the rights of blacks , a man who indicted white America in the harshest terms for its crimes  विरूद्ध ब्लैक अमेरिकी .
Detractors accused him of preaching  जातिवाद , ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता  , and violence .
He has been called one of the greatest and  सबसे influential अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी in इतिहास  .
Malcolm X 's father died—killed by white supremacists , it was rumored—when he was  यंग , और at तनिक एक of उसके uncles थी  lynched .
When he was 13 , his mother was placed  in a दिमागी हॉस्पिटल , और  he was placed in a series of foster homes .
In 1946  , at आयु 20 , he गई to थाना लिये  breaking and entering .
In prison , Malcolm X became a member of the Nation of Islam ; after his parole in 1952  , he जल्दी रोज़ to become एक of इसके  leaders .
For a dozen years , Malcolm X was the public face of the controversial group ,  लकिन मोहभंग साथ स्वदेश of islam  head Elijah Muhammad led him to leave the Nation in March 1964 .
After a period  of सफर in अफ़्रीकी और the मध्य ईस्ट , he लौटे  to the United States , where he founded Muslim Mosque , Inc. and the Organization of Afro-American Unity .
In February 1965 , less than a year after leaving the  स्वदेश of islam , he थी assassinated by तीन  members of the group .
Malcolm X 's  expressed मान्यताओं बदला  substantially over time .
As a spokesman for the Nation of Islam he taught black supremacy and  advocated विरह of ब्लैक और श्वेत अमेरिकी —in कंट्रास्ट to  the civil rights movement 's emphasis on integration .
After breaking with the Nation of Islam in 1964—saying of his association  साथ it , `` i किया अनेक बाते  as a [ Black ] Muslim that I 'm sorry for now .
i थी a प्रेत तब ... pointed in a निश्चित दिशा और बताई to कूच '' —and बनने a सुन्नी मुस्लिम , he  disavowed racism and expressed willingness to work with civil rights leaders , he continued to emphasize Pan-Africanism , black self-determination , and self-defense .
The third season of 90210 , an American television  श्रेणी , premiered on सोमवार सितंबर  13 , 2010 .
The CW officially renewed the show for a  तीसरा ऋतु on फ़रवरी 16 , 2010 .
With the reveal of the networks  पतन 2010 अनुसूची , वे घोषित उनके निर्णय to मूव  90210 to Monday nights at 8:00 pm , as a lead-in to Gossip Girl .
It premiered on September 13 , 2010 and was  मिले साथ generally धनात्मक  reviews from critics .
The season  चयन up at the समाप्त of  summer and focuses on the students senior year of high school .
It follows Adrianna 's rise to fame , a new relationship between Silver and  navid और a उलझन टेडी जो decides to खुलासा  to his family and friends he is gay .
It also deals with  the aftermath of नाओमी क्लार्क  's assault .
Regular cast members for the season included Shenae Grimes , Tristan Wilds , AnnaLynne McCord , Ryan  eggold , जेसिका stroup , माइकल steger , जेसिका lowndes , मैट lanter , गिलियन zinser , ट्रेवर डोनोवन और लोरी loughlin  .
Rebecca  sinclair जारी उसके भूमिका  as executive producer for the season .
The  ऋतु premiered to 1.96 लाख  viewers and a 0.9 rating in the adults 18–49 demographic .
christmas-themed एपीसोड `` अवकाश दीवानगी '' , hit ऋतु highs in सब कुंजी demos साथ  2.1 in The CW 's target demo of women 18–34 , a 1.4 in adults 18–34 and a 1.1 in adults 18–49 .
It was also the most  देखी एपीसोड in over a साल साथ  2.2 million viewers tuning in .
The season finale  aired on may 16 , 2011  .
The season averaged 1.75 million live viewers  और a 0.9 वयस्कों  18–49 rating .
It was released on  dvd in the संयुक्त राज्य on  August 30 , 2011 .
Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch of 16 sovereign  राज्य , ज्ञात as the राष्ट्रमंडल  realms , and their territories and dependencies , and head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations .
She is Supreme Governor of the Church of England and , in some of her realms , carries  the शीर्षक of defender of the आस्था as भाग of उसके पूरा शीर्षक  .
On her accession on 6 February 1952 , Elizabeth  became सिर of the राष्ट्रमंडल और महारानी regnant of सात स्वतंत्र राष्ट्रमंडल  countries : the United Kingdom , Canada , Australia , New Zealand , South Africa , Pakistan and Ceylon .
From 1956 to 1992  , the क्रमांक of उसके realms varied as  territories gained independence and some realms became republics .
At present , in addition to the first four aforementioned  देशों , एलिज़ाबेथ is महारानी of जमैका , बारबाडोस , the बहामा , हरा , पापुआ नई गिनी , the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स , तुवालू , संत लूसिया , संत विंसेंट और the grenadines , बेलीज़ ,  Antigua and Barbuda and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Her reign of years is currently the second longest for a  अंग्रेजों monarch ; तभी महारानी विक्टोरिया रै reigned longer at over  63 years .
Elizabeth  थी born in लंदन और शिक्षित  privately at home .
उसके पिता acceded to the सिंहासन as जार्ज vi in 1936 on the abdication  of his brother Edward VIII , from which time she was the heir presumptive .
She began to undertake public duties during  the दूसरी संसार युद्ध , in जिससे वो परोसा in the auxiliary territorial  Service .
In 1947 , she married Prince Philip , Duke of Edinburgh ,  साथ जिसको वो रै चार children : चार्ल्स  , Anne , Andrew , and Edward .
Her coronation service  took प्लेस in 1953 और थी  the first to be televised .
The Queen 's many historic visits and meetings include a  राज्य विज़िट to the गणतंत्र of आयरलैंड और reciprocal विज़िट  to and from the Pope .
The Queen has seen major constitutional  परिवर्तन in उसके realms , ऐसे  as devolution in the United Kingdom and the patriation of the Canadian constitution .
Times of personal significance have included the births and marriages of her children , the births of her grandchildren , the investiture of the Prince of  वेल्स , और the जश्न of माइलस्टोन ऐसे as उसके चांदी , सुनहरी , और डायमंड jubilees in 1977 , 2002 , और 2012 , क्रमशः .
Major events in the Queen 's reign have included the Troubles in Northern  आयरलैंड , the falklands युद्ध , युद्धों साथ इराकी और the युद्ध  in Afghanistan .
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include the death of her father at 56 , the assassination  of प्रिंस फिलिप 's ताऊ , रब माउंटबेटन , the विश्लेषण of उसके children 's विवाह in 1992 ( a साल deemed उसके annus horribilis ) , the  death in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law , Diana , Princess of Wales , and the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002 .
The Queen has occasionally faced severe press  आलोचना of the royal परिवार और रिपब्लिकन sentiments , लकिन support लिये the साम्राज्य  and her personal popularity remain high .
The 2010  संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट चुनाव in फ्लोरिडा took प्लेस on नवम्बर 2 , 2010 साथ साथ अन्य चुनावों to the संयुक्त  States Senate in other states as well as all elections to the United States House of Representatives and various state and local elections .
Republican Marco  rubio , पूर्व स्पीकर of the फ्लोरिडा हाउस of प्रतिनिधि , पराजित स्वतंत्र  Charlie Crist and Democrat Kendrick Meek in a three-way race .
One  पद सीनेटर mel मार्टिनेज थी  elected in a very close race against Democrat Betty Castor in 2004 with 49 % of the vote .
Martinez  घोषित on दिसम्बर 2 , 2008 कि he होता नहीं तलाश re-election to the सीनेट  , and would resign prior to the end of his term .
In August 2009 , Governor  चार्ली crist घोषित कि he होता  appoint his former Chief of Staff , George LeMieux , a Republican , to the Senate seat being vacated by Martinez .
Governor Crist publicly announced  he थी कार्यशील लिये the सीट  in mid-2009 .
At the time he received many Republican endorsements , such as the National Republican Senatorial Committee , Martinez ,  और the 2008 रिपब्लिकन अध्यक्षीय nominee जॉन मैक्केन  .
His support of the  अमरीकी रिकवरी और reinvestment अधिनियम  of 2009 hurt his popularity among conservatives , and candidate Marco Rubio surged .
In April 2010 Crist announced he would drop out of  the रिपब्लिकन प्राथमिक और चलाएं as  an independent .
The National Republican Senatorial Committee withdrew its endorsement  of crist और मांगे a refund of इसके अभियान निधि कि it  provided for the Crist campaign .
कांग्रेसी kendrick नम्र  was the first Democrat to declare his intention to run .
सिकंदर snitker थी the पहला सदस्य of the  Libertarian Party on the ballot for senator in Florida 's history .
उपग्रह दृश्य of  Doha
Doha ( , ' or ' , literally : `` the big  पेड़ '' ) is the पूंजी  city of the state of Qatar .
स्तिथ on the coast  of the Persian Gulf ,
it had a population of 998,651 in 2008 , and is also one of  the  municipalities of Qatar .
Doha is Qatar 's largest city , with over 60 % of the nation 's  जनसांख्यिकी residing in दोहा or इसके surrounding  suburbs , and is also the economic centre of the country .
Doha also  serves as the सीट of सरकारी of क़तर , जिससे  is ruled by Sheikh Hamad bin Khalifa Al Thani .
Doha is home to the Education City  , an क्षेत्रफल devoted to शोध  and education .
Doha was the  साईट of the पहला ministerial-level बैठक of  the Doha Development Round of World Trade Organization negotiations .
The city of Doha held the 2006 Asian  खेल , जिससे थी the largest एशियाई खेल कभी  held .
Doha also hosted the 2011 Pan Arab  खेल और सबसे of the  games at the 2011 AFC Asian Cup .
Doha hosted the UNFCCC Climate Negotiations ( COP 18 ) December 2012 and  होगा मेजबान a विशाल क्रमांक of the venues लिये the  2022 FIFA World Cup .
The  संसार पेट्रोलियम परिषद आयोजित the  20th World Petroleum Conference in Doha in December 2011 .
Paranasal sinuses are a group of four paired air-filled spaces that surround the nasal cavity ( maxillary sinuses  ) , ऊपर the आँखें ( frontal साइनस ) , between the आँखें ( ethmoid साइनस  ) , and behind the ethmoids ( sphenoid sinuses ) .
The sinuses are named  लिये the फेशियल हड्डियों in जिससे  they are located .
Lean manufacturing , lean enterprise , or lean production , often simply , `` Lean ,  '' is a उत्पादन अभ्यास कि considers the व्यय of संसाधन लिये  any goal other than the creation of value for the end customer to be wasteful , and thus a target for elimination .
Working from  the परिप्रेक्ष्य of the ग्राहक जो consumes  a product or service , `` value '' is defined as any action or process that a customer would be willing to pay for .
essentially , झुकना is केन्द्रित  on preserving value with less work .
Lean manufacturing is a  प्रबन्धन दर्शनशास्त्र निकला ज़्यादातर इससे the टोयोटा उत्पादन प्रणाली ( tps ) ( hence the पद  Toyotism is also prevalent ) and identified as `` Lean '' only in the 1990s .
TPS is renowned for its focus on reduction of the original Toyota seven  wastes to improve overall ग्राहक मान , लकिन वहीँ हैं varying perspectives  on how this is best achieved .
The steady growth of Toyota , from a small company to the world 's largest automaker ,  रै केन्द्रित ध्यान on कैसा it रै  achieved this success .
icarly  logo
iCarly is an American sitcom that  airs on निकलोडियन , जिससे  premiered on September 8 , 2007 .
Nickelodeon promoted many episodes so far  ऐसे as `` ido '' , `` ihire an idiot '' , `` ipity the nevel '' , `` idate sam &  Freddie '' , etc . as specials , despite their being regular episodes .
Every  एपीसोड शीर्षक begins साथ a निम्नतर मामला  i which represents the internet , as in `` iCarly '' .
The  दिखाएँ थी मनोनीत लिये  an Emmy award for Outstanding Children 's Program in 2009 .
The series starring Miranda Cosgrove as Carly  शे , a 13-year-old जो becomes  an Internet star .
The series ended on November 23 ,  2012 साथ the  one-hour special episode `` iGoodbye '' .
A total of 7  सीज़न और 109 एपीसोड  were broadcast .
The largest audience of the series was  11.2 लाख दर्शक , साथ the खास  episode `` iSaved Your Life '' premiered in January 2010 .
When Carly ( Miranda Cosgrove ) and her sassy best friend Sam ( Jennette McCurdy ) act funny at a school talent show audition  , tech-savvy फ्रेडी ( नाथन kress ) टेपों it और पोस्ट it ऑनलाइन बगैर  telling them .
After seeing the girls ' strong chemistry and banter ,  the ऑनलाइन दर्शक clamors लिये अधिक  and the iCarly webcast is born .
While grappling with  ठेठ मुद्दे of किशोरावस्था , कार्ली , sam , और फ्रेडी ढूँढें आउट कि वे have भी  become online celebrities as their show – which features talent contests , recipes , problem-solving , and random dancing – garners international accolades .
Carly lives in Seattle , Washington with her 26-year-old brother and guardian Spencer ( Jerry Trainor ) and produces the  दिखाएँ in a makeshift third-floor स्टुडियो मचान in उनके अपार्टमेंट  .
Their mother has never been seen or mentioned , but their father , Steven Shay ( David Chisum ) , is a U.S. Air Force  अधिकारी temporarily stationed on a पनडुब्बी , और is प्रायः उल्लेखित लकिन is  only seen in person during the series finale episode , `` iGoodbye '' .
Westlife were an Irish boy band which formed in 1998  और disbanded in 2012  .
Originally signed by Simon Cowell and  प्रबंधित by लुई वाल्श , the समूह 's फाइनल line-up consisted  of Nicky Byrne , Kian Egan , Mark Feehily and Shane Filan .
Brian McFadden was a member from  1998 जबतक उसके प्रस्थान in 2004  .
Westlife sold over 50 million  रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी , a कुल कि शामिल  studio albums , singles , video releases , and compilation albums .
The group accumulated 14 number-one singles in  the संयुक्त किंगडम ( the third-highest in uk इतिहास ) , tying साथ चट्टान रिचर्ड और  ranking just behind The Beatles and Elvis Presley .
They achieved  a कुल of 26 शीर्ष  ten singles over their 14-year career .
By 2010 ,  westlife थी सूचीबद्ध in the गिनीज संसार रिकॉर्ड  , as the UK 's top-selling album group of the 21st century .
They also won The Record of the Year ( the only music award based on public votes in the UK ) a record-breaking four times and in 2012 , the Official Charts  कम्पनी सूचीबद्ध westlife 34th amongst the biggest-selling singles कलाकारों in अंग्रेजों  music history .
Despite their European and Asian success , Westlife never managed to break into the U.S. market ,  achieving तभी एक hit सिंगल in 2000 : `` कसम it again  `` .
In October  2011 , westlife घोषित उनके इरादे to विभाजित  in 2012 , following their Greatest Hits Tour and the release of their Greatest Hits album .
The boyband 's final concerts were held on 22 and 23  जून 2012 at croke पार्क स्टेडियम in डबलिन  .
The first farewell concert , offering 85,000 tickets , sold out in a  record-breaking 5 मिनट्स और the latter screened सजीव in cinemas विश्वव्यापी  .
Vitamin A is a group of  nutritionally असंतृप्त hydrocarbons , जिससे  include retinol , retinal , retinoic acid and several provitamin A carotenoids among which beta-carotene is the most important .
Vitamin A has multiple  कृत्यों , it is महत्वपूर्ण लिये विकास और विकास  , for the maintenance of the immune system and good vision .
Vitamin A is needed by the retina of the eye in the form of retinal , which combines with protein  opsin to रूप rhodopsin the light-absorbing अणु , कि is जरुरी लिये दोनो  low-light ( scotopic vision ) and color vision .
Vitamin A also  कृत्यों in a बहुत अलग भूमिका as an irreversibly oxidized  form of retinol known as retinoic acid , which is an important hormone-like growth factor for epithelial and other cells .
In foods of animal origin , the major form of vitamin A is  an ester , primarily retinyl palmitate  , which is converted to retinol ( chemically an alcohol ) in the small intestine .
The retinol form functions as  a भंडार रूप of the विटामिन , और can be परिवर्तित  to and from its visually active aldehyde form , retinal .
The associated acid (  retinoic एसिड ) , a metabolite कि can be irreversibly  synthesized from vitamin A , has only partial vitamin A activity , and does not function in the retina for the visual cycle .
retinoic एसिड is प्रयुक्त लिये  growth and cellular differentiation .
All forms of vitamin A have a beta-ionone  रिंग to जिससे an isoprenoid कड़ी  is attached , called a retinyl group .
Both structural features are  अनिवार्य लिये विटामिन  activity .
The orange pigment of carrots – beta-carotene – can be represented as two  कनेक्ट retinyl समूह , जिससे हैं प्रयुक्त in the देह to योगदान  to vitamin A levels .
alpha-carotene और gamma-carotene  also have a single retinyl group , which give them some vitamin activity .
none of the  other carotenes have vitamin activity .
The carotenoid beta- cryptoxanthin possesses an ionone group and  रै विटामिन कार्यकलाप in इंसानो  .
विटामिन a can be  found in two principal forms in foods :
Retinol , the form of vitamin A absorbed  जब खाने एनिमल खाना  sources , is a yellow , fat-soluble substance .
Since the pure  दारू रूप is अस्थिर , the विटामिन  is found in tissues in a form of retinyl ester .
It is also commercially produced and  administered as esters ऐसे as retinyl एसीटेट or palmitate  .
The carotenes alpha-carotene ,  beta-carotene , gamma-carotene ; और the xanthophyll beta-cryptoxanthin ( सब of जिससे contain beta-ionone बजती ) , लकिन  no other carotenoids , function as provitamin A in herbivores and omnivore animals , which possess the enzyme ( 15-15'-dioxygenase ) which cleaves beta-carotene in the intestinal mucosa and converts it retinol .
In general , carnivores are poor converters of ionine-containing carotenoids , and pure carnivores such as cats and ferrets lack 15-15'-dioxygenase and can not convert any carotenoids to  retinal ( resulting in none of the carotenoids होने  forms of vitamin A for these species ) .
Selena Marie Gomez ( born July 22 ,  1992 ) is an अमरीकी सिंगर और अभिनेत्री .
She made  उसके डेब्यू as  a child actress in Barney & Friends .
In 2007 , Gomez came to  prominence as a अभिनीत डाल सदस्य in the टेलीविज़न श्रेणी  Wizards of Waverly Place .
वो हस्ताक्षरित to हॉलीवुड रिकॉर्ड the following  year , and became the founder and lead singer of the pop band Selena Gomez & the Scene .
Their studio albums Kiss & Tell ( 2009 ) , A Year Without Rain ( 2010 ) , and When the Sun Goes Down ( 2011 ) were certified Gold by the Recording Industry Association of America ( RIAA  ) और have शाखित platinum-certified singles `` naturally `` , ``  Who Says `` , and `` Love You like a Love Song `` .
After the  रिलीज of टेलीविज़न films और उनके accompanying soundtracks , गोमेज़ बना उसके नाट्य  film debut in Ramona and Beezus in 2010 and starred in Monte Carlo in 2011 .
Upon the conclusion of Wizards of Waverly Place and the hiatus of Selena Gomez  & the झाँकी in 2012 , वो केन्द्रित on उसके फिल्मी करियर , सेवारत as a आवाज़ अभिनेत्री  in Hotel Transylvania and starring in Spring Breakers the following year .
उसके डेब्यू सोलो एल्बम is tentatively अनुसूचित  to be released in summer 2013 , and is preceded by its lead single `` Come & Get It `` .
Outside of her  कार्य in the entertainment उद्योग , गोमेज़ is शामिल  in philanthropic activities through charity work and various social and environmental causes .
Tracie Monique Spencer ( born July 12 , 1976 )  is an अमरीकी r & b और पॉप singer-songwriter  , actress , and model .
Sacramento is the capital city of the U.S. state of California and the seat of  सरकारी of sacramento  County .
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento River and the American River in the  उत्तरी portion of कैलिफ़ोर्निया 's expansive  Central Valley .
With an estimated 2011 population of 477,891 , it is the sixth-largest city  in कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the 35th largest नगर in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
Sacramento is the core cultural and economic center of the Sacramento  महानगर क्षेत्रफल जिससे शामिल सात काउंटी साथ an अनुमानित 2009  population of 2,527,123 .
Its metropolitan area is the fourth largest in California after the Greater  लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल , सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल , और the सैन डिएगो महानगर क्षेत्रफल ,  as well as the 25th largest in the United States .
Sacramento was cited by Time magazine as America  's सबसे ethnically और racially  integrated city in 2002 .
Sacramento became a city through  the प्रयत्न of the स्विस अप्रवासी  John Sutter , Sr. , his son John Sutter , Jr. , and James W. Marshall .
Sacramento grew quickly thanks to the protection of Sutter 's Fort ,  जिससे थी स्थापित by  Sutter in 1839 .
During the California Gold Rush , Sacramento was a major distribution point , a commercial and agricultural center , and a terminus for wagon trains , stagecoaches ,  riverboats , the टेलीग्राफ , the टट्टू एक्स्प्रेस , और the पहला transcontinental रेलरोड  .
California State University , Sacramento , more commonly known as Sacramento State or Sac State , is the largest  लोकल विश्वविद्यालयों  .
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of the California  राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों प्रणाली  .
Drexel University  sacramento is स्तिथ in शहर  , Sacramento .
University of  the प्रशांत 's mcgeorge  School of Law is located in the Oak Park neighborhood .
In addition , the University of California ,  डेविस is स्तिथ in आसपास डेविस , वेस्ट of the  capital .
The UC Davis Medical Center  , a world-renowned शोध हॉस्पिटल  , is located in the city of Sacramento .
Memorial Day is a United States federal  अवकाश जिससे occurs प्रत्येक साल on the फाइनल  Monday of May .
Memorial Day is a  दिन of remembering the मेन  and women who died while serving in the United States Armed Forces .
formerly ज्ञात as सजावट दिन , it originated  after the American Civil War to commemorate the Union and Confederate soldiers who died in the Civil War .
By the 20th century  मेमोरियल दिन था महरूम विस्तारित to सम्मान सब अमेरिकी  who have died in all wars .
It  typically marks the प्रारंभ of the गर्मियाँ  vacation season , while Labor Day marks its end .
Many people visit cemeteries and  memorials , विशेषकर to सम्मान those  who have died in military service .
Many volunteers place an American flag on  प्रत्येक संगीन in नेशनल कब्रिस्तान  .
By the early 20th century , Memorial Day was an occasion for more  सामान्य expressions of मेमोरी , as लोगों visited the क़ब्रों  of their deceased relatives in church cemeteries , whether they had served in the military or not .
It also became a long weekend increasingly devoted to shopping , family gatherings  , आतिशबाजी , यात्राएँ to the बीच , और नेशनल मीडिया  events .
Annual Decoration Days for particular cemeteries are held on a Sunday in late  वसन्त or जल्दी गर्मियाँ in कुछ ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों of the अमरीकी दक्षिण  , notably in the mountains .
In cases involving a family  graveyard जहाँ रिमोट पूर्वजो as खूब as those जो यहूद मृतक अधिक recently हैं दफ्न  , this may take on the character of an extended family reunion to which some people travel hundreds of miles .
People gather on the designated day and put  पुष्प on क़ब्रों और  renew contacts with kinfolk and others .
There often is a  धार्मिक सेवा और a `` डिनर on the मैदान , '' the परंपरागत  term for a potluck meal in which people used to spread the dishes out on sheets or tablecloths on the grass .
It is  believed कि इस अभ्यास began पहले the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध  and thus may reflect the real origin of the `` memorial day '' idea .
Memorial Day is not to be confused with Veterans Day ; Memorial Day is a day of  remembering the मेन और महिलाओं जो died जबकि सेवारत , जबकि दिग्गजों दिन मनाता  the service of all U.S. military veterans , living or dead .
Mt . Zion  गिरिजाघर राज्य इतिहास मार्कर  near Philadelphia , Mississippi .
Freedom  गर्मियाँ ( भी ज्ञात as the मिसिसिपी गर्मियाँ प्रोजेक्ट ) थी a अभियान in the संयुक्त राज्य शुभारम्भ in  June 1964 to attempt to register as many African American voters as possible in Mississippi , which had historically excluded most blacks from voting .
The project also set up dozens of Freedom Schools , Freedom Houses , and community centers in small  कस्बों throughout मिसिसिपी to सहायता the लोकल ब्लैक  population .
The  प्रोजेक्ट थी व्यवस्थित by the परिषद of federated संगठन ( cofo ) ,  a coalition of the Mississippi branches of the four major civil rights organizations ( SNCC , CORE , NAACP and SCLC ) .
Most of the impetus , leadership , and  financing लिये the गर्मियाँ प्रोजेक्ट आए इससे the  SNCC .
Robert Parris  मूसा , sncc फ़ील्ड सचिव और  co-director of COFO , directed the summer project .
Blues is the name given to  दोनो a musical रूप और a म्यूज़िक विधा कि originated in समुदायों of primarily the `` गहन दक्षिण ``  of the United States around the end of the 19th century from spirituals , work songs , field hollers , shouts and chants , and rhymed simple narrative ballads .
The blues form , ubiquitous in jazz , rhythm and blues , and rock and roll is  characterized by विशिष्ट कॉर्ड progressions , of जिससे the twelve-bar ब्लूज़  chord progression is the most common .
The blue notes that , for expressive purposes  हैं सुंग or निभाई flattened or धीरे झुकी ( नाबालिग 3rd to प्रमुख 3rd ) in संबंध  to the pitch of the major scale , are also an important part of the sound .
The blues genre is based on the blues form but  possesses अन्य विशेषताएँ ऐसे as विशिष्ट गीत  , bass lines , and instruments .
Blues can be subdivided into several subgenres ranging from country to  शहरी ब्लूज़ कि यहूद अधिक or कम लोकप्रिय दौरान अलग  periods of the 20th century .
Best known are the Delta , Piedmont , Jump  , और शिकागो ब्लूज़ शैलियाँ  .
World War II marked the transition from acoustic to electric blues and the  प्रगतिशील खोलने of ब्लूज़ म्यूज़िक to a wider दर्शक , विशेषकर  white listeners .
In the 1960s  और 1970s , a संकर रूप पुकारा  blues-rock evolved .
The term `` the blues '' refers to the `` blue devils '' , meaning  वेदना और उदासी ; an जल्दी उपयोग of the पद in इस भाव is मिला in जार्ज colman 's one-act  farce Blue Devils ( 1798 ) .
Though the use of the phrase in African-American music may be older , it has been attested to since 1912 ,  जब हार्ट wand 's `` डलास ब्लूज़ `` became the पहला स्वत्वाधिकार  blues composition .
in गीत the phrase is प्रायः  used to describe a depressed mood .
A quarter dollar , commonly shortened to  क्वार्टर , is a सिक्का लायक 1⁄4 of a संयुक्त  States dollar or 25 cents .
the क्वार्टर रै महरूम उत्पादित  since 1796 .
The choice of 25¢ as a denomination , as opposed to 20¢ which is more common in  अन्य भाग of the संसार  , originated with the practice of dividing Spanish Milled Dollars into eight wedge shaped segments ( cf. `` pieces of eight `` ) .
At one time `` two bits `` , i.e . two wedges , each wedge an  आठवीं , यूँ a क्वार्टर of the स्पेनी रियल  , was a common nickname for a quarter .
Day of the Dead ( ) is a Mexican holiday  मनाये throughout मैक्सिको और around the संसार in अन्य संस्कृतियों  .
The holiday focuses on gatherings of family and friends to pray  लिये और याद मित्रों और परिवार  members who have died .
It is  विशेषकर मनाये in मैक्सिको , जहाँ it is  a national holiday , and all banks are closed .
The celebration takes place on  नवम्बर 1 और 2 , in कनेक्शन साथ  the Catholic holidays of All Saints ' Day and All Souls ' Day .
Traditions connected with the holiday include building private  altars honoring the मृतक using शुगर skulls  , marigolds , and the favorite foods and beverages of the departed and visiting graves with these as gifts .
They also leave  possessions of the  deceased .
Scholars  ट्रेस the origins of the आधुनिक  Mexican holiday to indigenous observances dating back hundreds of years and to an Aztec festival dedicated to the goddess Mictecacihuatl .
The holiday has spread throughout the world : In Brazil , Dia de Finados is a public holiday that many  brazilians celebrate by visiting कब्रिस्तान और चर्च  .
In  स्पेन , वहीँ हैं त्यौहार और  parades , and , at the end of the day , people gather at cemeteries and pray for their dead loved ones .
Similar observances occur elsewhere in Europe , and  similarly प्रसंग जश्न  appear in many Asian and African cultures .
ANITA  mk viii  .
The ANITA Mark VII and ANITA Mark VIII calculators  यहूद शुभारम्भ simultaneously  in late 1961 as the world 's first all- electronic desktop calculators .
Designed and  निर्मित by the घंटी  Punch Co .
in Britain , and marketed through its Sumlock  comptometer प्रभाग , वे प्रयुक्त वैक्यूम tubes और  cold-cathode switching tubes in their logic circuits and nixie tubes for their numerical displays .
They were the first of a series of  डेस्कटॉप और hand-held इलेक्ट्रॉनिक calculators कि the कम्पनी  was to develop and sell under the ANITA name into the mid-1970s .
George Washington ( – ,  1799 ) थी the पहला अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1789–1797 ) , the commander-in-chief  of the Continental Army during the American Revolutionary War , and one of the Founding Fathers of the United States .
He  presided over the सम्मेलन कि drafted the संविधान , जिससे replaced the  Articles of Confederation and established the position of President .
वॉशिंगटन थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष as the सर्वसम्मत  choice of the 69 electors in 1788 , and he served two terms in office .
He oversaw the creation of a strong , well-financed national government that maintained neutrality in the wars  raging in यूरोपीय , suppressed विद्रोह , और जीती स्वीकृति among अमेरिकी of सब  types .
His leadership style  स्थापित अनेक फ़ॉर्म और संस्कार of सरकारी  that have been used since , such as using a cabinet system and delivering an inaugural address .
Further , the peaceful transition from his  प्रेसिडेंसी to the प्रेसिडेंसी of जॉन  Adams established a tradition that continues into the 21st century .
Washington was hailed as ``  पिता of उसके देश ``  even during his lifetime .
Washington was born into the provincial gentry of Colonial Virginia ;  उसके धनवान planter  family owned tobacco plantations and slaves .
After both his father and older brother died  जब he थी यंग , वॉशिंगटन became personally और professionally  attached to the powerful William Fairfax , who promoted his career as a surveyor and soldier .
Washington quickly became a senior officer in the  औपनिवेशिक शक्तियां दौरान the पहला चरण of the फ्रेंच  and Indian War .
Chosen by the Second  महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस in 1775 to be commander-in-chief of the महाद्वीपीय फौज in the अमरीकी  Revolution , Washington managed to force the British out of Boston in 1776 , but was defeated and almost captured later that year when he lost New York City .
बाद क्रासिंग the डेलावेयर नदी in the मुर्दे of शीत , he पराजित  the British in two battles , retook New Jersey and restored momentum to the Patriot cause .
Because of his strategy , Revolutionary forces  captured दो प्रमुख अंग्रेजों सेना at साराटोगा in  1777 and Yorktown in 1781 .
Historians laud Washington for his selection and supervision of his generals , encouragement of morale and ability to hold together the army , coordination with the state  राज्यपालों और राज्य मिलिशिया इकाई , संबंध साथ कॉंग्रेस और ध्यान to आपूर्तियाँ , लोजिस्टिक्स  , and training .
In  बैटल , however , वॉशिंगटन  was repeatedly outmaneuvered by British generals with larger armies .
After victory had been finalized in 1783 , Washington  resigned as commander-in-chief बल्कि than seize शक्ति , proving उसके विपक्ष  to dictatorship and his commitment to American republicanism .
Dissatisfied with the weaknesses of the Articles of  कनफेडरेशन , in 1787 वॉशिंगटन presided over the संवैधानिक  Convention that drafted the United States Constitution .
Elected unanimously as the first President of the United  राज्य in 1789 , he attempted to लाओ प्रतिद्वंद्वी गिरोहों  together to unify the nation .
He supported Alexander Hamilton 's programs to pay off all state and national debt ,  to implement an प्रभावी कर प्रणाली  and to create a national bank ( despite opposition from Thomas Jefferson ) .
Washington proclaimed the United  राज्य न्यूट्रल in the युद्धों raging in यूरोपीय  after 1793 .
He avoided war with Great Britain and guaranteed a decade of peace and profitable trade by securing  the jay सन्धि in 1795 , despite तीव्र  opposition from the Jeffersonians .
Although  never officially  joining the Federalist Party , he supported its programs .
Washington 's Farewell Address was an influential primer on republican virtue and a warning  विरूद्ध partisanship , sectionalism  , and involvement in foreign wars .
He retired  इससे the प्रेसिडेंसी in 1797 और लौटे to उसके  home , Mount Vernon , and his domestic life where he managed a variety of enterprises .
He freed all his  स्लेव by उसके फाइनल  will .
Washington had a vision of a great and powerful nation that  होता be निर्मित on रिपब्लिकन लाइनों using संघीय  power .
He sought to use the national government to preserve liberty , improve  अवसंरचना , खोलें the पश्चिमी lands , प्रचार कॉमर्स , मिला a स्थाई पूंजी  , reduce regional tensions and promote a spirit of American nationalism .
At his death , Washington was eulogized as ``  पहला in युद्ध , पहला in सलाम , और पहला in the दिल  of his countrymen '' by Henry Lee .
The Federalists made him the symbol of their party but for many years ,  the jeffersonians जारी to अविश्वास उसके influence और विलम्बित  building the Washington Monument .
As the leader of the first successful  क्रान्ति विरूद्ध a औपनिवेशिक साम्राज्य in संसार इतिहास , वॉशिंगटन became  an international icon for liberation and nationalism , especially in France and Latin America .
Fiscal Year 2012  u.S. संघीय बिता  – Cash or Budget Basis .
Fiscal Year 2012 U.S.  संघीय रसीदें  .
The Budget of the United  राज्य सरकारी प्रायः begins as the अध्यक्ष  's proposal to the U.S. Congress which recommends funding levels for the next fiscal year , beginning October 1 .
However , Congress is the body required by law  to pass a बजट annually और to submit the बजट passed  by both houses to the President for signature .
Congressional  निर्णय हैं governed by नियम और विधान regarding  the federal budget process .
बजट समितियों नियत बिता हद लिये the हाउस और सीनेट समितियों  and for Appropriations subcommittees , which then approve individual appropriations bills to allocate funding to various federal programs .
If Congress fails to pass an  सालाना बजट ( as रै महरूम the मामला चूंकि 2009 )  , a series of Appropriations bills must be passed as `` stop gap '' measures .
After Congress approves an appropriations bill , it is  भेजा to the अध्यक्ष , जो may चिह्न  it into law , or may veto it ( as he would a budget when passed by the Congress ) .
A vetoed bill is sent back to Congress  , जिससे can pass it into विधि साथ a two-thirds  majority in each chamber .
Congress may also  combine सब or कुछ appropriations बिल्स  into an omnibus reconciliation bill .
In addition , the president may  निवेदन और the कॉंग्रेस may pass supplemental appropriations  bills or emergency supplemental appropriations bills .
Several government agencies  provide बजट आंकड़ा और  analysis .
These include the Government Accountability Office ( GAO  ) , congressional बजट दफ्तर , the दफ्तर of प्रबन्धन और  Budget ( OMB ) and the U.S. Treasury Department .
These agencies have  reported कि the संघीय सरकारी  is facing a series of important financing challenges .
In the short-run , tax revenues have declined significantly  due to a कठोर मंदी और कर नीति चुनाव , जबकि expenditures have  expanded for wars , unemployment insurance and other safety net spending .
In the long-run , expenditures related to  healthcare कार्यक्रम ऐसे as medicare और medicaid  are projected to grow faster than the economy overall as the population matures .
New Guinea ( also , Tok Pisin : Niugini , Dutch : Nieuw Guinea , and ; historically : Papua ) is the  संसार 's दूसरी largest द्वीप , बाद ग्रीनलैंड , covering a जमीन  area of 786,000 km2 .
Located in the southwest Pacific Ocean ,  it झूठ geographically to the ईस्ट of the मलय द्वीपसमूह , साथ जिससे  it is sometimes included as part of a greater Indo-Australian Archipelago .
geologically it is a भाग of  the same tectonic plate as Australia .
When world  समुद्र स्तर यहूद कम , the दो  shared shorelines ( which now lie 100 to 140 metres below sea level ) , combining with lands now inundated into the tectonic continent of Sahul , also known as Greater Australia .
The two landmasses became  अलग जब the क्षेत्रफल अभी ज्ञात as the टोरेस  Strait flooded after the end of the last glacial period .
Anthropologically  , नई गिनी  is considered part of Melanesia .
Politically , the western half of the island comprises two Indonesian  प्रांतों : पापुआ और वेस्ट पापुआ  .
The eastern half forms the  मेनलैंड of the देश  of Papua New Guinea .
The island has a population of  परिचय 7.5 लाख , साथ a  very low population density of only 8 inh/km2 .
New Guinea is differentiated from its drier , flatter , and less  fertile दक्षिणी बंटवारा , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , by इसके much उच्चतर वर्षा और इसके क्रियाशील volcanic  geology , with its highest point , Puncak Jaya , reaching an elevation of 4,884 m ( 16,023 ft ) .
Yet the two land  masses share a समान एनिमल fauna , साथ marsupials , सहित  wallabies and possums , and the egg-laying monotreme , the spiny anteater , or echidna .
Other than bats and some two dozen indigenous rodent  genera , वहीँ हैं no pre-human  indigenous placental mammals .
Pigs , several additional species  of चूहे , और the पूर्वज of the नई गिनी  Singing Dog were introduced with human colonization .
The human presence on the island  तिथियाँ वापस at तनिक 40,000 सालो to the oldest इंसान migrations  out of Africa .
Research indicates that the highlands were an  जल्दी और स्वतंत्र बीच of कृषि , साथ प्रमाण  of irrigation going back at least 10,000 years .
Because of the time depth of its inhabitation and its highly fractured landscape , an unusually high number of languages are  बोला on the द्वीप , साथ कुछ 1,000 भाषाएं ( a फिगर उच्चतर than कि of सबसे महाद्वीपों ) having  been catalogued out of an estimated world-wide pre-Columbian total of 6,000 human dialects .
Most are classified as Papuan languages , a generally accepted geographical term  जिससे a अल्पसंख्यक of लेखक थाम to be a जेनेटिक  one .
A number  of ऑस्ट्रोनीशियाई भाषाएं हैं  spoken on the coast and on offshore islands .
In the 16th  सदी स्पेनी explorers खोजा  the island and called it Nueva Guinea .
In recent history western New Guinea was  शामिल in the डच ईस्ट  Indies colony .
The Germans annexed the northern coast of the eastern half of the  द्वीप as जर्मनी नई गिनी in उनके pre–world युद्ध i प्रयत्न to स्थापित themselves  as a colonial power , whilst the south eastern portion was reluctantly claimed by Britain .
Following the Treaty of Versailles , the German portion was awarded to Australia ( which was already governing the British claim , named the  territory of पापुआ ) as a लीग of राष्ट्र जनादेश  .
The eastern half of the island  थी granted स्वतंत्रता इससे ऑस्ट्रेलिया as पापुआ  New Guinea in 1975 .
The western half  gained स्वतंत्रता इससे the डच in 1961 , लकिन became  part of Indonesia soon afterwards in controversial circumstances .
`` The Van Buren Boys '' is the 148th episode  of the sitcom seinfeld , और नाम of a fictional  New York street gang .
Their sign is crossing the hands ,  साथ एक हाथ साथ सब the उंगलियाँ 'up  ' and spread out .
The other hand has all but the thumb and  सूचक उंगली up , लिये a कुल of आठ  ( 8 ) .
The gang is named for the 8th President of the United States , Martin Van Buren (  जो थी the पहला अध्यक्ष इससे नई  York ) .
This was the 14th  एपीसोड लिये the 8th ऋतु  .
It  aired on फ़रवरी  6 , 1997 .
bevo चिह्न
Bevo  थी a non-alcoholic  malt beverage , or near beer , brewed in the United States by the Anheuser-Busch company beginning in the early 20th century .
Bevo enjoyed its  महानतम कामयाबी दौरान the समय of निषेध  , when beer , wine and distilled liquors , were made illegal for thirteen years .
The Anheuser-Busch company started brewing Bevo when alcoholic beverages were  निषिद्ध in 1916 by the संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद शक्तियां  .
उत्पादन रोज़ greatly साथ नेशनल निषेध  in 1919 , and Bevo was by far the most popular of the many `` cereal beverages '' or `` near beers '' of the time .
at the शिखर of इसके लोकप्रियता  in the early 1920s , more than five million cases of Bevo were sold annually .
Renard  साथ a मग of bevo ,  depicted in terra cotta on the interior walls of the Bevo building , St. Louis
Labels on the  बोतलों billed  it as `` Bevo the Beverage '' .
The name `` Bevo '' was coined from  the शब्द `` पेय '' और the स्लावी भाषा शब्द लिये बियर `` pivo  '' , and was pronounced `` Bee-vo '' .
Some Bevo advertising featured the character `` Renard the Fox `` ( based on the protagonist of a medieval  फ्रेंच folk-tale ) , और promotional मग साथ इस अक्षर  were manufactured .
In 1930 Anheuser-Busch built a series of boat-bodied cars in its St. Louis shops called  the `` bevo नौकाएँ '' जिससे यहूद प्रयुक्त लिये प्रमोशन  .
Seven are believed to have been  निर्मित on pierce-arrow 8-cylinder chassis  while one surviving example was based upon 1930 Cadillac 353 V8 .
Billboard  विज्ञापन bevo in trenton  , New Jersey , 1917
A contemporary advertisement read ``  कूलिंग और invigorating ,  Bevo the Beverage .
Order  by the मामला इससे अपना पंसारी  , druggist , or dealer . ''
The paper label on the back of the bottle read ``  the all-year-round नरम पेय .
Appetizing -  healthful - पौष्टिक  - Refreshing .
Milk or water  may contain  bacteria .
BEVO  never करता  . ''
Bevo became part of the popular culture of the  समय , और is उल्लेखित in विभिन्न लोकप्रिय गीतों  and Vaudeville skits of the era .
This led to secondary slang uses of the word ; for example , in  अमरीकी सैन्य कठबोली a यंग और अनुभवहीन  officer was called a `` Bevo '' .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों of टेक्सास नामित इसके शुभंकर  `` Bevo '' , a name which has stuck to this day .
Irving Berlin included a paean to the drink , `` You Ca n't  रहो up on bevo '' , in उसके 1917 फौज revue  , Yip Yip Yaphank .
In  the लेट 1920s smuggled बूटलेग  beer and liquor as well as `` homebrew `` , cut into Bevo 's marketshare .
With sales  flattening to 100,000 मामले  by 1929 , Anheuser-Busch stopped production .
The Bevo Mill , St.  लुई , in 2008
The Bevo building , with the Renard character  prominently प्रदर्शित at the किनारे , स्टिल operates as a bottling सुविधा at  their main brewery in St. Louis , Missouri .
The landmark  bevo मिल , constructed by अगस्त  Anheuser Busch , Sr. in 1917 .
it थी बंद in 2009 ,  but it reopened in October 2009 under new owners .
Bevo is also mentioned in the short  स्टोरी `` the हत्यारे `` by  Ernest Hemingway ; as well as in Babbitt by Sinclair Lewis .
Mylanta is an over the counter medication used for  the उपचार of एसिड reflux , heartburn , और gastroesophageal reflux बीमारी  ( also known as GERD ) .
foremilk और hindmilk नमूने  of human breast milk
A glass of  pasteurized गाय मिल्क
मिल्क is a श्वेत द्रव उत्पादित  by the mammary glands of mammals .
It is  the प्राथमिक सोर्स of पोषण  for young mammals before they are able to digest other types of food .
Early- lactation milk contains colostrum , which carries the mother 's  antibodies to the baby और can reduce the रिस्क of  many diseases in the baby .
It  भी contains  many other nutrients .
As an agricultural product , milk is  निकाली इससे स्तनधारियों और प्रयुक्त as खाना लिये इंसानो  .
Worldwide , dairy farms produced  परिचय 730 लाख टन of मिल्क  in 2011 .
India is  the संसार 's largest निर्माता और  consumer of milk , yet neither exports nor imports milk .
New Zealand , the European Union 's 27 member states , Australia , and the United  राज्य हैं the संसार 's largest निर्यातक of मिल्क और मिल्क उत्पाद  .
चीन और रूस हैं the संसार 's largest importers  of milk and milk products .
throughout the  world , there are more than 6 billion consumers of milk and milk products .
Over 750  लाख लोगों सजीव भीतर  dairy farming households .
Milk  is a कुंजी योगदानकर्ता to improving  nutrition and food security particularly in developing countries .
Improvements in livestock and  दुग्ध प्रौद्योगिकी प्रस्ताव significant  promise in reducing poverty and malnutrition in the world .
Motorcycle speedway , usually  referred to as स्पीडवे , is a मोटरसाइकिल खेल  involving four and sometimes up to six riders competing over four anti-clockwise laps of an oval circuit .
Speedway motorcycles use only one gear and have no brakes and racing takes place on a flat oval track usually  consisting of मैल or loosely packed shale  .
प्रतिस्पर्धी उपयोग इस सतह to स्लाइड उनके मशीने  sideways , powersliding or broadsiding into the bends .
On the  सीधा भाग of the track  the motorcycles reach speeds of up .
The exact origins of the  खेल हैं अनजान लकिन वहीँ is प्रमाण of a प्रकार of स्पीडवे रेसिंग होने practised in the यूएसए  before the First World War and in Australia in the late 1910s and early 1920s .
वहीँ हैं अभी दोनो घरेलू और अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतियोगिताओं in a क्रमांक  of countries including the Speedway World Cup whilst the highest overall scoring individual in the Speedway Grand Prix events is pronounced the world champion .
Speedway is  लोकप्रिय in सेंट्रल और उत्तरी यूरोपीय  and to a lesser extent in Australia and North America .
A variant of track racing , speedway is administered internationally by the Fédération  internationale de  Motocyclisme ( FIM ) .
Domestic speedway  कार्यक्रम हैं regulated  by FIM affiliated national motor sport federations .
Vitamin D is a group of  fat-soluble secosteroids जिम्मेदार लिये intestinal अवशोषण  of calcium and phosphate .
In humans , the  सबसे महत्वपूर्ण सम्बन्धित यौगिकों  of vitamin D are vitamin D2 and vitamin D3 .
Cholecalciferol (  विटामिन d3 ) और ergocalciferol ( विटामिन  D2 ) are unique as they constitute what we know as vitamin D and can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements .
The body can also synthesize vitamin D ( from cholesterol ) when sun  एक्सपोज़र is पर्याप्त ( hence इसके उपनाम  , the `` sunshine vitamin '' ) .
Although vitamin D is commonly called a  विटामिन , it is नहीं दरअसल an अनिवार्य dietary विटामिन in the सख्त  sense , as it can be synthesized in adequate amounts by most mammals exposed to sunlight .
( Cats and dogs can not  synthesize विटामिन d efficiently  and must receive it in their diet . )
An organic chemical compound ( or  सम्बन्धित नियत of यौगिकों ) is तभी scientifically पुकारा a विटामिन जब it can नहीं be synthesized  in sufficient quantities by an organism , and must be obtained from their diet .
However , as with other compounds commonly called vitamins , vitamin D was discovered in an effort to find the  dietary पदार्थ कि थी lacking in a बीमारी , namely  , rickets , the childhood form of osteomalacia .
Additionally , like other compounds called vitamins , in  the विकसित संसार विटामिन d is  added to staple foods , such as milk , to avoid disease due to deficiency .
उपायों of सीरम स्तर प्रतिबिंबित endogenous संश्लेषण इससे एक्सपोज़र to धूप as खूब  as intake from the diet , and it is believed that synthesis may contribute generally to the maintenance of adequate serum concentrations .
The evidence indicates that the synthesis of vitamin D from sun exposure works in a feedback loop that prevents toxicity but , because of  अनिश्चितता परिचय the कर्कट रिस्क इससे धूप , no सुझाव हैं जारी by the संस्थान of आयुर्विज्ञान , यूएसए , लिये the राशि  of sun exposure required to meet vitamin D requirements .
Accordingly , the Dietary Reference Intakes for vitamin D assume that no  संश्लेषण occurs और कि सब of a व्यक्ति 's  vitamin D is from their diet , although that will rarely occur in practice .
In the liver vitamin D  is परिवर्तित to calcidiol , जिससे is भी ज्ञात as calcifediol ( इन ) , 25-hydroxycholecalciferol , or 25-hydroxyvitamin  D—abbreviated 25 ( OH ) D ; and which is the specific vitamin D metabolite that is measured in serum to determine a person 's vitamin D status .
Part of the calcidiol is converted by the kidneys to calcitriol , the biologically active form of vitamin D. Calcitriol  circulates as a हार्मोन in the रक्त , regulating the विशेषज्ञता of कैल्सियम और फास्फेट in the bloodstream  and promoting the healthy growth and remodeling of bone .
Calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol outside of the kidneys for other purposes , such as the proliferation , differentiation and apoptosis of cells ;  calcitriol भी affects neuromuscular  function and inflammation .
Beyond its use to prevent osteomalacia or rickets , the evidence for other health effects of vitamin  d supplementation in the सामान्य जनसांख्यिकी is असंगत .
The best evidence of benefit is for bone health and a  घटी in मृत्यु in बुजुर्ग महिलाओं .
The Duramax is a General Motors diesel engine family for  light- और मीडियम ड्यूटी ट्रक , designed by  Isuzu .
The 6.6-liter Duramax is produced by DMAX , a joint venture between GM  और isuzu in moraine  , Ohio .
This engine was initially installed in 2001 model year Chevy and GMC trucks  और रै महरूम an विकल्प चूंकि तब in pickups , वैन ,  and medium-duty trucks .
In 2006 , production at Moraine was reportedly limited to  लगभग 200,000 इंजन प्रति साल  .
On May 9 , 2007 , DMAX  घोषित the उत्पादन of the 1,000,000th duramax  V-8 diesel at its Moraine facility .

is also  a परंपरागत लिखा संक्षिप्त  for Baltimore , Maryland .
