Balto ( 1919 – March 14 , 1933 ) was a Siberian Husky sled dog who led his team on the final leg of the 1925 serum run to Nome , in which diphtheria antitoxin was  transported इससे anchorage , अलास्का , to nenana , अलास्का , by ट्रैन और तब to nome by श्वान sled to कॉम्बैट  an outbreak of the disease .
The run  is commemorated by  the annual Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race .
Balto was named after the Sami  एक्सप्लोरर सैमुएल balto  .
Balto died at the  आयु of 14  .
Professor Stephen Hawking , known  लिये होने a सैद्धांतिक physicist , रै appeared  in many works of popular culture .
The Nissan Maxima is a mid-size /  entry-level लक्ज़री car manufactured by  Nissan , marketed as the `` four-door sports car '' .
The origins of the Maxima began in July 1976 as the Datsun 810 , an upscale six-cylinder version of the Bluebird , and was spun into its own  लकीर in 1981 , having महरूम बना लगातार चूंकि तब  .
The `` Maxima '' name was applied  धीरे , शुरूआत in 1981  .
Most pre-2004 Maximas were built in Oppama , Japan , until the current  उत्तर अमरीकी maximas प्रारंभ होने समवेत in smyrna , टेनेसी  .
The ``  उच्चिष्ट '' रै  also been applied to Cefiros and Laurels in various markets .
propolis as छत्ता  sealing
Propolis is a resinous mixture that honey bees  collect इससे पेड़ कलियों , sap बहती , or अन्य वनस्पति स्त्रोत  .
It  is प्रयुक्त as  a sealant for unwanted open spaces in the hive .
Propolis is used for small gaps (  लगभग or कम ) , जबकि  larger spaces are usually filled with beeswax .
Its color varies depending on its botanical  सोर्स , the सबसे आम होने अंधेरा  brown .
Propolis is sticky at and above room  तापमान  , .
At lower temperatures , it  becomes मुश्किल और बहुत भंगुर  .
Steven Tyler ( born Steven  विक्टर tallarico  ; March 26 , 1948 ) is an American singer , songwriter , and multi-instrumentalist , best known as the frontman and lead singer of the Boston -based rock band Aerosmith , in which he also plays the harmonica , and occasional piano and percussion .
He is known as the `` Demon  of screamin ' '' due to उसके ऊँची चिल्लाती  and his wide vocal range .
he is भी ज्ञात लिये  his on-stage acrobatics .
During his high-energy performances , he usually dresses in bright , colorful outfits with  उसके ट्रेडमार्क स्कार्फ फांसी इससे उसके  microphone stand .
In the 1970s , Tyler rose to prominence as the frontman of Aerosmith ,  जिससे released ऐसे पड़ाव मुश्किल चट्टान  albums as Toys in the Attic and Rocks .
In the  लेट 1970s और जल्दी 1980s , टायलर था a  heavy drug and alcohol addiction , and the band 's popularity waned .
He completed drug rehabilitation in 1986 and subsequently maintained sobriety for over 20 years , but had a relapse with prescription painkillers in the late 2000s , for  जिससे he सफलतापूर्वक प्राप्त उपचार in 2009 .
After Aerosmith launched a remarkable comeback in the late 1980s and early  1990s साथ the एल्बम स्थाई अवकाश ,  Pump , and Get a Grip , Tyler became a household name and has remained a relevant rock icon .
As a result , he has since embarked on several solo endeavors including guest appearances on other artists ' music , film and TV  भूमिकाएँ ( सहित as a न्यायधीश on अमरीकी आइडल ) , authoring a bestselling किताब  , and solo work ( including a Top 40 hit single in 2011 ) .
However , he has continued to  रिकार्ड म्यूज़िक और perform साथ एरोस्मिथ  , after more than 43 years in the band .
The band 's latest album ,  म्यूज़िक इससे another आयाम  !
, was released on  नवम्बर 6 , 2012  .
Tyler is included among  रोलिंग पत्थरों 100 महानतम  Singers .
He was also ranked 3rd on Hit Parader  's शीर्ष 100 मेटल vocalists  of All Time .
In 2001 he was inducted  into the चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल of कीर्ति साथ एरोस्मिथ  , and he was the presenter when AC/DC was inducted into the Hall of Fame in 2003 .
In 2013 , Tyler and his songwriting partner Joe Perry will be recipients of the ASCAP Founders Award  और होगा भी be inducted  into the Songwriters Hall of Fame .
The liver  produces यूरिया in the यूरिया साईकिल  as a waste product of the digestion of protein .
Normal human adult blood should contain between 7 to  21 mg of यूरिया नाइट्रोजन  per 100 ml ( 7–21 mg/ dL ) of blood .
Individual laboratories may have  अलग सन्दर्भ सीमाएँ  , and this is because the procedure may vary .
Wayne Fontes ( born February 2 , 1940 ) is a former  अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल कोच और कॉलेज और पेशेवर  football player who was the head coach of the NFL 's Detroit Lions from 1988 to 1996 .
His 67 wins  और 71 नुकसान हैं प्रत्येक the  most for a head coach in team history .
The Jews ( ISO 259-3  israeli उच्चारण ) , भी ज्ञात as the यहूदी  people , are a nation and an ethnoreligious group , originating in the Israelites or Hebrews of the Ancient Near East .
The Jewish ethnicity , nationality , and religion are strongly interrelated  , as judaism is the परंपरागत आस्था of the यहूदी  nation .
Converts to Judaism ,  जिनकी औकात as यहूदियों भीतर the यहूदी ethnos is बराबर  to those born into it , have been absorbed into the Jewish people throughout the millennia .
In Jewish  परंपरा , यहूदी ancestry is  traced to the Biblical patriarchs Abraham , Isaac and Jacob in the second millennium BCE .
The modern State of Israel was established as a  यहूदी nation-state , और defines itself as ऐसे in इसके  Basic Laws .
Its Law of  वापसी अनुदान the सही  of citizenship to any Jew who requests it .
Israel is the only country where  यहूदियों हैं a बहुमत of the  population .
Jews also enjoyed political autonomy  twice पहले  in ancient history .
The first of  ये अवधि lasted इससे 1350 to 586 bce , और encompassed the अवधि of the न्यायाधीशों , the संयुक्त  Monarchy , and the Divided Monarchy of the Kingdoms of Israel and Judah , ending with the destruction of the First Temple .
The second was the period of  the hasmonean किंगडम spanning  from 140 to 37 BCE .
Since the destruction of the  पहला टेम्पल , सबसे यहूदियों  have lived in diaspora .
A minority in every country in which they live ( except  इसराईल ) , वे have अक्सर अनुभवी persecution throughout इतिहास , resulting  in a population that has fluctuated both in numbers and distribution over the centuries .
The world Jewish population reached a peak of 15  लाख prior to the दूसरी संसार युद्ध , लकिन छह लाख  Jews were killed in the Holocaust .
Since then the population has risen again and , was estimated at 13.4 million by the North American Jewish Data Bank ,  or कम than 0.2 % of the कुल संसार जनसांख्यिकी ( roughly एक in प्रत्येक 514 लोगों  ) .
According to this report , about 42.5 % of all Jews reside in Israel ( 5.7 million )  , और 39.3 % in the संयुक्त राज्य ( 5.3 लाख ) , साथ सबसे of the शेष  living in Europe ( 1.5 million ) and Canada ( 0.4 million ) .
ये संख्याएँ शामिल सब those जो consider  themselves Jews , whether or not they are affiliated with a Jewish organization .
The total world  यहूदी जनसांख्यिकी , however , is मुश्किल  to measure .
In addition to issues with census methodology , there are halakhic  विवादों regarding जो is a jew और धर्मनिरपेक्ष , राजनैतिक  , and ancestral identification factors that may affect the figure considerably .
Corpus  christi बारात  .

The Feast of Corpus  christi ( लैटिन लिये देह of मसीह ) , भी ज्ञात as कॉर्पस domini , is a लैटिन रीति liturgical  solemnity celebrating the tradition and belief in the body and blood of Jesus Christ and his Real Presence in the Eucharist .
It emphasizes  the आनन्द of the संस्था of the eucharist ,  which was observed on Holy Thursday in the somber atmosphere of the nearness of Good Friday .
In the present Roman Missal , the feast is designated the  solemnity of the सबसे पावन देह और  Blood of Christ .
It is also celebrated in some Anglican , Lutheran , and Old Catholic Churches that hold similar  मान्यताओं regarding the रियल उपस्थिति .
The feast is liturgically  मनाये on the गुरुवार बाद ट्रिनिटी संडे or , `` जहाँ the solemnity of the सबसे पावन देह और रक्त  of Christ is not a Holy Day of Obligation , it is assigned to the Sunday after the Most Holy Trinity as its proper day '' .
At the end of Holy Mass , there is often a procession of the Blessed Sacrament ,  generally प्रदर्शित in a  monstrance .
The procession is followed by Benediction of the  धन्य sacrament  .
A notable Eucharistic procession is that  presided over by the पोप प्रत्येक साल in रोम , जहाँ it begins at the archbasilica of st. जॉन lateran  and makes its way to the Basilica of Saint Mary Major , where it concludes with Benediction .
C-reactive protein ( CRP ) is a protein found in the blood , the  स्तर of जिससे वृद्धि in जवाब to सूजन ( i.e . c-reactive  protein is an acute-phase protein ) .
Its physiological role is to bind to phosphocholine expressed on the surface of dead or dying cells ( and some types of bacteria ) in  अनुक्रम to activate the पूरक प्रणाली via the  C1Q complex .
CRP is synthesized by the liver in response to  कारकों released by macrophages  and fat cells ( adipocytes ) .
It is a member of the  pentraxin परिवार of  proteins .
It is not related  to c-peptide or प्रोटीन  C .
c-reactive प्रोटीन थी the पहला  pattern recognition receptor ( PRR ) to be identified .
The start of the systematic European colonization of the Americas is typically dated to 1492 , when a Spanish expedition headed by Christopher  कोलंबस sailed लिये इण्डिया to खोलें व्यापार लकिन inadvertently खोजा the americas  .
यूरोपीय conquest , large-scale खोजी  and colonization soon followed .
Seeing that Europe was preoccupied with many internal wars and was slowly recovering from the many deaths that  the bubonic प्लेग caused , the रैपिड विस्तार at जिससे it grew in माल  and power was unforeseeable in the early 1400s .
The first  रिझाने occurred साथ the caribbean coasts on the आइलैंड्स of हिस्पानिओला  , Puerto Rico and Cuba , and after 1500 extended into the interiors of both North and South America .
In 1497 , sailing from the north on behalf of England , John Cabot landed on the North American  coast , और a साल बाद , कोलंबस 's तीसरा voyage पहुँचे the दक्षिण अमरीकी  coast .
France founded colonies in much of eastern North America , on a  क्रमांक of caribbean आइलैंड्स , और  in South America .
पुर्तगाल colonized  Brazil .
Eventually , the entire Western Hemisphere came under the control of European governments , leading to profound changes  to इसके लैंडस्केप , जनसांख्यिकी , और संयंत्र  and animal life .
In the 19th century alone  over 50 लाख लोगों बाएँ  Europe for the Americas .
The post-1492 era is  ज्ञात as the काल of the  Columbian Exchange .
Keith Richards ( born 18 December 1943 ) is an English musician ,  singer-songwriter और संस्थापक सदस्य of the अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान बैंड  the Rolling Stones .
Rolling Stone  पत्रिका कहा रिचर्ड्स था निर्मित `` चट्टान 's महानतम सिंगल देह  of riffs '' , ranking him 4th on its list of 100 best guitarists .
Fourteen  गीतों रिचर्ड्स लिखा साथ the रोलिंग  Stones ' lead vocalist Mick Jagger are listed among Rolling Stone magazine 's `` 500 Greatest Songs of All Time `` .
Richards ' notoriety for illicit drug use stems in part from several drug busts during the late 1960s and 1970s and his candour regarding  उसके व्यसन to और eventual abstinence  from heroin .
टेस्टोस्टेरोन is a स्टेरॉयड हार्मोन इससे the androgen समूह  and is found in mammals , reptiles , birds , and other vertebrates .
In mammals , testosterone is primarily secreted in the testicles of  males और the अंडाशय of महिलाओं , हालांकि छोटी  amounts are also secreted by the adrenal glands .
It is  the प्रिंसिपल पुरूष sex हार्मोन  and an anabolic steroid .
In men , testosterone plays a key role in the development of male reproductive tissues such as the testis and prostate as well as promoting  द्वितीयक यौन विशेषताएँ ऐसे as increased मांसपेशी , अस्थि द्रव्यमान , और the  growth of body hair .
In addition ,  टेस्टोस्टेरोन is अनिवार्य लिये स्वास्थ्य  and well-being as well as the prevention of osteoporosis .
On average , in adult human males , the plasma concentration of testosterone is about 7–8 times as great as the concentration in adult human females ' plasma , but as the  metabolic खपत of टेस्टोस्टेरोन in males is वृहद , the रोज़ उत्पादन is परिचय 20  times greater in men .
महिलाओं भी हैं अधिक  sensitive to the hormone .
Testosterone is observed  in सबसे vertebrates  .
Fish  मेक a थोड़ा अलग  form called 11-ketotestosterone .
Its counterpart  in कीट is ecdysone  .
These ubiquitous  steroids सुझाएँ कि sex हार्मोन have an प्राचीन  evolutionary history .
Cluster sampling is a sampling  तकनीक प्रयुक्त जब `` प्राकृतिक '' लकिन अपेक्षाकृत  homogeneous groupings are evident in a statistical population .
It is often used  in विपणन शोध  .
In this  तकनीक , the कुल जनसांख्यिकी is विभाजित  into these groups ( or clusters ) and a simple random sample of the groups is selected .
Then the required information is collected from a simple random sample of the  तत्व भीतर प्रत्येक चयनित समूह  .
This may be done for every element in these  समूह or a subsample of तत्व may be चयनित भीतर  each of these groups .
A common motivation for cluster sampling  is to reduce the कुल क्रमांक of साक्षात्कार और  costs given the desired accuracy .
assuming a फिक्स्ड नमूना आकार , the तकनीक  gives more accurate results when most of the variation in the population is within the groups , not between them .
Jamestown is a town in Guilford County  , उत्तर कैरोलिना , संयुक्त राज्य , और is a उपनगरीय of the आसपास  cities of Greensboro and High Point .
The population was  3,382 at the 2010  census .
Natalie Portman ( born Natalie Hershlag ; ; June 9 , 1981 ) is an actress and  मॉडल साथ डुअल अमरीकी और israeli नागरिकता .
Her first role was as an  अनाथ लिया in by a हिटमैन in the 1994 कार्रवाई फिल्मी , लकिन मुख्यधारा कामयाबी आए  when she was cast as Padmé Amidala in the Star Wars prequel trilogy ( released in 1999 , 2002 and 2005 ) .
In 1999 , she enrolled at Harvard University to study psychology while  स्टिल working as  an actress .
She completed her  स्नातक 's उपाधि  in 2003 .
In 2001 , Portman opened in New York City 's Public Theater production of  एंटोन चेखव  's The Seagull .
In 2005 , Portman received a nomination for  the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री और  won the Golden Globe Award for Best Supporting Actress - Motion Picture for the drama Closer .
वो जीती a नक्षत्र पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन मादा प्रदर्शन और  a Saturn Award for Best Actress for her starring role in V for Vendetta ( 2006 ) .
वो निभाई अग्रणी भूमिकाएँ in the  historical dramas Goya 's Ghosts ( 2006 ) and The Other Boleyn Girl ( 2008 ) .
In May 2008 ,  वो परोसा as the youngest सदस्य of the 61st  Annual Cannes Film Festival jury .
Portman 's directorial debut , Eve , opened the 65th Venice International Film  पर्व 's शॉर्ट्स प्रतियोगिता  in 2008 .
Portman directed a  खण्ड of the सामूहिक फिल्मी  New York , I Love You .
In 2011 , Portman won the Academy Award , the Golden Globe Award  , the bafta पुरस्कार , the स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार , और the स्वतंत्र  Spirit Award for her lead performance as Nina Sayers in Black Swan .
Copper  is a रासायनिक तत्व साथ the प्रतीक  Cu ( from ) and atomic number 29 .
It is a ductile metal with very high  थर्मल और विद्युत चालकता  .
Pure  तांबे is नरम और malleable ; a freshly उजागर  surface has a reddish-orange color .
It is used as a conductor of heat and electricity , a building material  , और a constituent of विभिन्न मेटल alloys  .
The metal and its alloys  have महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये हज़ारों  of years .
In the Roman era , copper was principally mined on Cyprus , hence the origin of the name  of the मेटल as сyprium ( मेटल  of Cyprus ) , later shortened to сuprum .
Its compounds are commonly encountered as copper ( II ) salts , which often impart blue or green colors to  खनिज ऐसे as azurite और फ़िरोज़ा और have महरूम widely प्रयुक्त historically as pigments  .
Architectural  structures निर्मित साथ तांबे  corrode to give green verdigris ( or patina ) .
Decorative art prominently features  तांबे , दोनो by itself और as  part of pigments .
Copper is essential to all living organisms as a  ट्रेस dietary खनिज क्युकी it is a कुंजी constituent of the respiratory  enzyme complex cytochrome c oxidase .
In molluscs and crustacea copper is a constituent of the blood pigment hemocyanin , which  is replaced by the iron-complexed हीमोग्लोबिन in मछली और  other vertebrates .
The main  क्षेत्रों जहाँ तांबे is मिला in vertebrates  are liver , muscle and bone .
In sufficient  विशेषज्ञता , तांबे यौगिकों हैं जहरीला to उच्चतर  organisms and are used as bacteriostatic substances , fungicides , and wood preservatives .
The major  पेशेवर खेल लीग , or बस प्रमुख लीग  , in the United States and Canada are the highest professional competitions of team sports in the two countries .
Although individual sports  ऐसे as गोल्फ़ , टेनिस , और स्वचालित रेसिंग हैं भी बहुत  popular , the term is usually limited to team sports .
The term `` major league '' was  पहला प्रयुक्त in 1921 in सन्दर्भ to प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल ( एमएलबी  ) , the top level of professional American baseball .
Today , the major northern North America professional team  खेल लीग हैं प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल ( एमएलबी ) , the नेशनल बास्केट संघ ( एनबीए ) , the नेशनल  Football League ( NFL ) , and the National Hockey League ( NHL ) .
Other notable leagues include Major League Soccer ( MLS ) , the Canadian Football League ( CFL ) , the Arena Football  लीग , प्रमुख लीग lacrosse , the नेशनल lacrosse लीग और the महिलाओं 's नेशनल बास्केट संघ  .
The NFL , MLB , NBA , and NHL are  commonly referred  to as the Big Four .
Each of these is the richest  पेशेवर क्लबों प्रतियोगिता  in its sport worldwide .
The best players can become cultural icons in  दोनो देशों और elsewhere in the संसार , क्युकी the लीग  enjoy a significant place in popular culture in the US and Canada .
The NFL  रै 32 टीमों , और the  others have 30 each .
The vast majority of major league teams are concentrated in the most  populous महानगर  areas of the United States .
Baseball , football , hockey , and soccer  have था पेशेवर लीग लिये over 100 सालो ;  early leagues such as the National Association , Ohio League , and National Hockey Association formed the basis of the modern MLB , NFL and NHL respectively .
Soccer was first professionalized  in 1894 , लकिन लीग suffered greatly  from lack of sustainability and seldom lasted more than a decade .
Soccer 's greatest successes were in the form of the American  सॉकर लीग ( 1921-1933 ) , the असली उत्तर अमरीकी सॉकर लीग ( 1968-1984 ) , the नेशनल पेशेवर  Soccer League ( 1984-2001 ) and , currently , Major League Soccer ( 1996-present ) .
Basketball is a relatively new  विकास ; the एनबीए विकसित इससे the नेशनल बास्केट  League and its splinter group the Basketball Association of America , taking on its current form in 1949 .
Every major league averages 15,000 fans in attendance per  खेल or उच्चतर as  of 2011 .
Meridian Altitude is an  खगोलीय नेविगेशन विधि of calculating  an observer 's latitude .
Earned value management ( EVM ) , or Earned value project/performance management ( EVPM ) is a project management  तकनीक लिये measuring प्रोजेक्ट प्रदर्शन और प्रगति in an उद्देश्य  manner .
Because EVM has  the क्षमता to combine  measurements of :
पैमाना
अनुसूची
and  cost,
in  a  single integrated system , Earned Value Management is able to provide accurate forecasts of project performance problems , which is an important contribution for project management .
Early  evm शोध दिखाया कि the क्षेत्रों of नियोजन और कंट्रोल  are significantly impacted by its use ; and similarly , using the methodology improves both scope definition as well as the analysis of overall project performance .
अधिक हाल शोध अध्ययन have दिखाया कि the सिद्धान्त  of EVM are positive predictors of project success .
Popularity of EVM has grown significantly in recent years beyond government contracting , in which  सेक्टर इसके महत्व continues to वृद्धि ( e.g.  , recent new DFAR rules ) , in part because EVM can also surface in and help substantiate contract disputes .
Colorful  वसन्त  garden flowers
Spring is one of the  चार conventional शीतोष्ण सीज़न  , following winter and preceding summer .
There are various technical definitions of  वसन्त , लकिन लोकल उपयोग of the पद varies according to लोकल जलवायु , संस्कृतियों और कस्टम  .
When it is spring in the northern hemisphere , it will be  पतझड़ in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध  .
At the spring equinox , days are close to 12 hours long  साथ दिन लंबाई increasing  as the season progresses .
Spring and `` springtime '' refer to the season , and also to ideas of rebirth , rejuvenation , renewal , resurrection , and regrowth , with festivals such as Carnival ,  ईस्टर और holi होने मनाये at इस  time .
Jamestown was a  उपनिवेश in the उपनिवेश of वर्जिनिया ,  the first permanent English settlement in the Americas .
Established by the Virginia Company of  लंदन as `` जेम्स फोर्ट '' on may 14 , 1607 ( o.s . , may  24 , 1607 N.S . ) , it followed several earlier failed attempts , including the Lost Colony of Roanoke .
Jamestown served as the capital of the colony  लिये 83 सालो , इससे 1616  until 1699 .
The settlement was located within  the territory of a राजनैतिक एंटिटी ज्ञात as tsenacommacah , the राज्य of the powhatan  Confederacy , with around 14,000 native inhabitants , and specifically was in part of the subdivision known as the Paspahegh tribe .
The natives initially welcomed the colonists with dancing , feasting and tobacco  ceremonies , और वे provided निर्णायक प्रावधानों और support लिये the अस्तित्व of the colonists , जो यहूद  not agriculturally inclined , although relations with the newcomers also soured fairly early on , leading to the total annihilation of the Paspahegh in warfare within 3 years .
Within a year of Jamestown 's founding , the Virginia Company  brought पॉलिश और डच colonists  to help improve the settlement .
In 1619 , the first documented Africans were brought to Jamestown , though the modern conception of slavery in the future United  राज्य किया नहीं शुरू in वर्जिनिया जबतक 1660  .
When the colony was subdivided  into the असली आठ  shires of Virginia in 1634 , the town became located in the eponymous James City Shire .
The London Company 's second settlement , Bermuda , claims to be the site of the oldest town in the English New World , as St. George 's , Bermuda was officially established ( as New London ) in 1612 , whereas James Fort , in Virginia , was not  to be परिवर्तित into जेम्स  towne until 1619 , and further did not survive into the present day .
In 1699 , the capital was relocated from Jamestown to what is today Williamsburg ,  बाद जिससे jamestown ceased to मौजूद as a उपनिवेश , मौजूदा आज तभी as an  archaeological site .
आज , jamestown is एक of तीन स्थितियाँ comprising  the Historic Triangle of Colonial Virginia , along with Williamsburg and Yorktown , with two primary heritage sites .
ऐतिहासिक jamestowne , the पुरातत्व साईट on jamestown द्वीप , is a सहकारी प्रयत्न  by Jamestown National Historic Site ( part of Colonial National Historical Park ) , and Preservation Virginia .
The Jamestown Settlement , a living history  interpretive साईट , is संचालित by the jamestown yorktown न्यास in  conjunction with the Commonwealth of Virginia .
James Christopher Frey ( born  सितंबर 12  , 1969 ) is an American writer .
His  किताबे a लाख छोटी टुकड़े ( 2003 ) और  My Friend Leonard ( 2005 ) , as well as Bright Shiny Morning ( 2008 ) , were bestsellers .
He was the  विषय of a कांड जब जांचकर्ताओं खोजा कि थाना समय और the extent of निश्चित  injuries were exaggerated in A Million Little Pieces , a purportedly autobiographical account of the author 's struggle with addiction .
Deere & Company , most commonly known by  इसके नाम जॉन deere , is an अमरीकी निगम आधारित in moline , इलिनोइस , और एक of  the largest manufacturers of agricultural machinery in the world .
In 2012 , it was listed as 97th in the  सौभाग्य 500 अमेरिका 's रैंकिंग और 190th in the सौभाग्य  500 Global ranking .
Deere and Company agricultural products , sold under the John Deere name ,  शामिल tractors , combine हार्वेस्टर , कपास हार्वेस्टर , balers  , planters / seeders , sprayers , and UTVs .
The company is also a manufacturer of construction equipment and forestry equipment , as well as a supplier of diesel engines and drivetrains  ( axles , ट्रांसमिशन , gearboxes ) प्रयुक्त in  heavy equipment .
Additionally , John Deere manufactures equipment used in lawn , grounds , and turf  परवाह , ऐसे as walk-behind लॉन mowers , zero-turn लॉन  mowers , lawn tractors , and snowthrowers .
To support the core businesses , John  deere भी provides वित्तीय  services and other related activities .
The company 's slogan  is `` nothing रनों जैसे a deere '' और रै a चित्र  of a leaping deer as a logo , a word play pun on `` nothing runs like a deer '' .
Carl Westby coined the phrase `` Nothing Runs Like a  deere '' लिये a विपणन अभियान to बेचें snowmobiles  .
The company 's products are also identifiable by its distinctive  शेड of ग्रीन पेंट , प्रायः augmented by पीला trim  .
The United States ten-dollar bill ( $ 10 ) is a  denomination of संयुक्त राज्य करेंसी .
The first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ) , Alexander  हैमिल्टन , is फिलहाल प्रदर्शित on the obverse of the विधेयक , जबकि the u.S. राजकोष भवन  is featured on the reverse .
( Hamilton is one of two  non-presidents प्रदर्शित on फिलहाल  issued U.S. bills .
The other is Benjamin Franklin ,  on the $ 100 विधेयक  .
हैमिल्टन is एक of तभी चार लोगों प्रदर्शित on u.S. पेपर करेंसी (  1861 to the present ) who was not born in the continental United States , as he was from the West Indies .
The  अन्य हैं : अल्बर्ट gallatin , स्विट्ज़रलैंड ( $ 500 1862/63 विधिक टेंडर ) ; जार्ज  Meade , Spain ( $ 1,000 1890/91 Treasury Note ) ; and Robert Morris , England ( $ 1,000 1862/63 Legal Tender ; $ 10 1878/80 Silver Certificate ) .
In addition , Kamehameha I , appears  on the 2008 हवाई राज्य  quarter . )
All $ 10 bills issued today are  संघीय आरक्षित टीप  .
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the  औसत जीवन of a $ 10 विधेयक in  circulation is 18 months before it is replaced due to wear .
Approximately 6 % of all US  banknotes मुद्रित in 2009 यहूद  $ 10 bills .
टेन डालर बिल्स हैं  delivered by Federal Reserve Banks in yellow straps .
The source of  the फेस on the $ 10 विधेयक is जॉन trumbull ’s 1805 पोर्ट्रेट of  Hamilton that belongs to the portrait collection of New York City Hall .
The $ 10 bill is the only U.S. paper currency in circulation in which the portrait faces to the left ( the $  100,000 विधेयक प्रदर्शित a पोर्ट्रेट of वुडरो विल्सन facing to the बाएँ , लकिन थी प्रयुक्त तभी  for intra-government transactions ) .
Andy Samuel Griffith ( June 1 , 1926 – July 3 , 2012 ) was an American  कर्ता , टेलीविज़न निर्माता , ग्रैमी पुरस्कार -winning  Southern-gospel singer , and writer .
He was a Tony Award  nominee लिये दो भूमिकाएँ , और gained prominence in the अभिनीत भूमिका in निदेशक एलिया कज़न 's फिल्मी a फेस in the भीड ( 1957  ) before he became better known for his television roles , playing the lead characters in the 1960–1968 situation comedy The Andy Griffith Show and in the 1986–1995 legal drama Matlock .
Theresa Penelope `` Terri '' Irwin , ( née Raines ; born July 20 , 1964 ) is an Australian -based , American -born naturalist  , लेखक , the विधवा of ऑस्ट्रेलियाई naturalist स्टीव इरविन और मालिक of ऑस्ट्रेलिया  Zoo at Beerwah , Queensland , Australia .
She co-starred with her husband on The Crocodile Hunter , their unconventional  टेलीविज़न प्रकृति वृत्तचित्र श्रेणी साथ साथ इसके spin-off श्रेणी ,  Croc Files and The Crocodile Hunter Diaries .
She has lived in Australia since 1992  , जब वो शादीशुदा  Steve Irwin .
Andreas Cellarius 's illustration of the  copernican प्रणाली , इससे the harmonia macrocosmica  ( 1660 ) .
Heliocentrism , or heliocentricism , is the astronomical model in which the Earth and planets revolve  around a अपेक्षाकृत stationary सूर्य at the बीच of the सौर  System .
The word comes from the  यूनानी ( helios `` सूर्य '' और kentron  `` center '' ) .
Historically , heliocentrism was opposed  to geocentrism , जिससे लगाई  the Earth at the center .
The notion that the Earth revolves around the Sun had been proposed as  जल्दी as the 3rd सदी bc by aristarchus of samos , लकिन aristarchus 's heliocentrism  attracted little attention until Copernicus revived and elaborated it .
Lucio Russo , however , argues that this is a misleading impression resulting from the loss  of वैज्ञानिक works of the hellenistic era  .
Using  अप्रत्यक्ष प्रमाण he  argues that a heliocentric view was expounded in Hipparchus 's work on gravity .
It was not until the 16th century that a fully predictive mathematical model of a heliocentric  प्रणाली थी प्रस्तुत , by the पुनर्जागरण गणितज्ञ , astronomer  , and Catholic cleric Nicolaus Copernicus of Poland , leading to the Copernican Revolution .
in the following सदी , योहानेस कॅप्लर elaborated upon और विस्तारित  this model to include elliptical orbits , and supporting observations made using a telescope were presented by Galileo Galilei .
With the observations of William Herschel , Friedrich Bessel , and others , astronomers realized that the sun was not the center of the universe  और by the 1920s एडविन हबल था दिखाया कि it थी भाग of a आकाशगंगा ( the मिल्की रास्ता ) कि थी तभी एक of अनेक अरबों  .
Norah Jones ( born Geetali Norah  जोन्स शंकर ; कूच 30 , 1979 ) is an अमरीकी  singer-songwriter , pianist , and actress .
She is the daughter of  भारतीय सितार खिलाड़ी रवि  Shankar and Sue Jones .
She is also Anoushka Shankar 's  half-sister .
In 2002 , she launched her solo music career with the release of the commercially successful and  critically acclaimed एल्बम आइये दूर साथ me , a संलयन  of country music and pop with elements of jazz which was certified diamond album , selling over 26 million copies .
The record earned Jones five Grammy Awards  , सहित the एल्बम of the साल , रिकार्ड of the  Year , and Best New Artist .
Her subsequent studio albums , Feels Like Home , released in 2004 , Not Too Late , released  in 2007 , the वही साल वो बना उसके फिल्मी डेब्यू in my ब्लूबेरी नाइट्स , और उसके 2009 रिलीज the पतन  all gained Platinum status , selling over a million copies and were generally well received by critics .
Jones ' fifth studio album , Little Broken Hearts ,  थी released on अप्रैल 27  , 2012 .
Jones has won nine Grammy Awards and was 60th on Billboard  पत्रिका 's कलाकारों of  the 2000–2009 decade chart .
Throughout her career , Jones has won  numerous पुरस्कार और रै बेची अधिक than 50 लाख  albums worldwide .
बिलबोर्ड नामित उसके the  top jazz artist of the 2000–2009 decade .
Not  to be उलझन साथ  Dimension of a physical quantity .
For other uses , see  आयाम ( बहुविकल्पी  ) .
From left to right , the  वर्गाकार , the घन  , and the tesseract .
The square is bounded by 1-dimensional lines , the cube by 2-dimensional areas , and  the tesseract  by 3-dimensional volumes .
A projection  of the घन is दिए  since it is viewed on a two-dimensional screen .
The same applies to the tesseract , which  additionally can तभी be दिखाया as a प्रक्षेप  even in three-dimensional space .
A diagram showing  the पहला चार  spatial dimensions .
In physics and mathematics , the dimension of a space or object is informally defined  as the न्यूनतम क्रमांक of निर्देशांक  needed to specify any point within it .
Thus a line has a dimension of one because  तभी एक निर्देशांक is needed to बताएँ a पाइंट on  it ( for example , the point at 5 on a number line ) .
A surface such as a plane or the surface of a cylinder or sphere has a dimension of two because two  निर्देशांक हैं needed to बताएँ a पाइंट on it ( लिये उदाहरण , to locate a पाइंट  on the surface of a sphere you need both its latitude and its longitude ) .
The inside of a cube , a cylinder or a sphere is  three-dimensional क्युकी तीन निर्देशांक हैं needed  to locate a point within these spaces .
In physical terms , dimension refers to  the constituent ढांचा of सब स्पेस ( आवाज़ ) और इसके स्थिति  in time ( perceived as a scalar dimension along the t-axis ) , as well as the spatial constitution of objects within—structures that correlate with both particle and field conceptions , interact according to relative properties of mass —and are fundamentally mathematical in description .
These , or other axes , may be referenced  to uniquely पहचानो a पाइंट or ढांचा in इसके रवैया और  relationship to other objects and occurrences .
Physical theories that incorporate time , such as general relativity , are said to work in  4-dimensional `` spacetime `` , ( पारिभाषित as a मिन्कोवस्की  space ) .
Modern  theories tend to be `` higher-dimensional ''  including quantum field and string theories .
The state-space of  क्वांटम यांत्रिकी is an infinite-dimensional  function space .
The concept of  आयाम is नहीं प्रतिबंधित  to physical objects .
High-dimensional spaces occur in  गणित और the sciences लिये अनेक कारण , अक्सर as विन्यास स्पेसेस  such as in Lagrangian or Hamiltonian mechanics ; these are abstract spaces , independent of the physical space we live in .
Fontana ( ) is a  नगर of 200,762 निवासियों in सैन bernardino  County , California .
Founded in 1913 , it  remained essentially ग्रामीण जबतक संसार युद्ध  II , when entrepreneur Henry J. Kaiser built a large steel mill in the area .
It is now a regional hub of the trucking industry , with Interstate 10 and State Route 210 transecting the city from east to west , and  अंतरराज्यीय 15 गुजर diagonally through इसके northwestern quadrant  .
It is home to the largest of the San Bernardino County  प्रणाली पुस्तकालयों , a संवर ऐतिहासिक थिएटर  , a municipal park , and the Auto Club Speedway on the site of the Kaiser Steel Mill .
Fontana also  होस्ट the fontana  Days Half Marathon and 5K run .
This race is the fastest  half-marathon कोर्स in the संसार  .
The U.S. 2012 Census reported  कि fontana 's जनसांख्यिकी थी 200,762 in 2012 , बनाना it the  second most populous city in San Bernardino county county and 14th in the state .
Cowboys Stadium is  a स्टेडियम साथ a retractable  roof in Arlington , Texas .
It serves as the home of the  नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग 's डलास  Cowboys .
It replaced the partially covered Texas Stadium ,  जिससे खोली in 1971 , और परोसा as the  Cowboys ' home through the 2008 season .
It was  समाप्त on  May 27 , 2009 .
The stadium seats  85,000 , बनाना it the तीसरा largest  stadium in the NFL by seating capacity .
The maximum  क्षमता of the स्टेडियम  , including standing room , is 105,000 .
The Party Pass ( open areas ) sections are behind seats in each end  मण्डल और on a श्रेणी of छह elevated प्लेटफ़ॉर्म कनेक्ट  by stairways .
It has the world 's largest  column-free आंतरिक और the चौथी largest ऊँची  definition video screen , which hangs from 20 yard line to 20 yard line .
The facility can also be used for a variety of other activities outside of its main purpose ( professional football ) such as concerts , basketball  खेल , मुक्केबाज़ी मिलान , कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल और ऊँची स्कूल फ़ुटबॉल प्रतियोगिताओं , सॉकर मिलान  , and motocross races .
कनाडाई इतिहासकारों जबतक the 1980s  tended to focus on economic history , including labour history .
In part this is because Canada has had far  कम राजनैतिक or सैन्य विरोध than  other societies .
This was  विशेषकर सच्चा in the पहला हाफ of the बीसवीं  century when economic history was overwhelmingly dominant .
Many of the most prominent English Canadian historians  इससे इस काल यहूद आर्थिक  historians , such as Harold Innis , Donald Creighton and Arthur R. M. Lower
Scholars of Canadian history were heirs to the traditions that developed in Europe  और the संयुक्त राज्य , लकिन frameworks  that worked well elsewhere often failed in Canada .
the heavily मार्क्सवादी बहकावे  economic history that dominates Europe has little relevance to most of Canadian history .
A focus on  क्लास , शहरी क्षेत्रों , और उद्योग  fails to address Canada 's rural and resource based economy .
similarly , the monetarist स्कूल कि is  dominant in the United States also has been difficult to transfer north of the border .
The study of economic history in Canada became highly focused on  आर्थिक भूगोल , और लिये अनेक सालो the प्रबल  school of thought has been the staples thesis .
This school of thought bases the study of the  कनाडाई अर्थव्यवस्था on the पढ़ाई of प्राकृतिक संसाधन  .
इस दृष्टिकोण रै चूंकि भी become प्रयुक्त बाहर  of Canada in Australia and in many developing nations .
Before the arrival of Europeans , the First Nations  of कया होता become कनाडा था a विशाल  and vibrant trade network .
Furs , tools  , सजावटी वस्तुएं , और अन्य goods  were often transported thousands of kilometres , mostly by canoe throughout the many rivers and lakes of the region .
The early European history of the Canadian economy is usually studied through the staples thesis which argues the  कनाडाई अर्थव्यवस्था विकसित through the शोषण of a श्रेणी of स्टेपल्स कि होता be exported  to Europe .
Carbon-14 , 14C , or radiocarbon , is a radioactive  समस्थानिक of कार्बन साथ a केंद्रक containing 6 protons और 8 neutrons  .
Its presence in organic  सामग्री is the आधार of the radiocarbon डेटिंग विधि pioneered by willard लिब्बी  and colleagues ( 1949 ) to date archaeological , geological and hydrogeological samples .
Carbon-14 was  खोजा on 27 फ़रवरी 1940 , by मार्टिन कामेन और sam रूबेन at  the University of California Radiation Laboratory in Berkeley , although its existence had been suggested by Franz Kurie in 1934 .
There are three naturally occurring isotopes of carbon on Earth : 99 % of the carbon is carbon-12 , 1 % is carbon-13 , and carbon-14 occurs in trace  amounts , i.e. , बनाना up परिचय 1 भाग प्रति खरब ( 0.0000000001  % ) of the carbon in the atmosphere .
The half-life  of carbon-14 is 5,730±40  years .
Carbon-14 decays  into nitrogen-14 through  beta decay .
The primary natural source of carbon-14 on Earth is cosmic ray action upon nitrogen in the atmosphere , and it  is इसलिए a cosmogenic  nuclide .
However , open-air  नाभिकीय परीक्षण between 1955–1980  contributed to this pool .
The different isotopes of carbon do not  differ appreciably in उनके रासायनिक  properties .
This is used in chemical and biological research , in a technique called carbon labeling : carbon-14 atoms can be used to replace nonradioactive carbon , in  अनुक्रम to ट्रेस रासायनिक और biochemical प्रतिक्रियाएँ involving कार्बन अणु इससे कोई दिए सशुल्क  compound .
Lightning is a highly visible form of  उर्जा ट्रांसफ़र
Lightning strikes are  विद्युत discharges on a विशाल स्केल  between the atmosphere and an earth-bound object .
They mostly  originate in thunderclouds और terminate on  the ground , called Cloud to Ground ( CG ) lightning .
However , they may also be initiated  इससे a बहुत लम्बा grounded ऑब्जेक्ट और पहुँचें  into the clouds .
Although `` a lightning strike '' is commonly used to describe all lightning , it is rather erroneous and a misnomer , as only about 25 % of all lightning events worldwide are CG , the  विशाल बल्क of बिजली कार्यक्रम हैं intracloud ( ic ) or बादल  to Cloud ( CC ) , where discharge only occurs high in the atmosphere .
The scientific name for the complete process of a single lightning event is a and it  is a बहुत जटिल , अनेक stepped बातचीत , जिससे is नहीं completely  understood .
Most  cg flashes तभी `` स्ट्राइक  '' one physical location , referred to as a termination .
The primary conducting  चैनल , the उज्जवल coursing लाइट तुम may देखिए और कॉल a `` स्ट्राइक '' , is तभी  about 1 inch in diameter , although to our eyes it looks much larger .
They are miles long ,  upwards of tens of मील  .
And the entire flash , lasts only a few  भिन्नों of a दूसरी , सबसे  of which is not visible to human eyes .
Thunder is always produced  by बिजली  .
Just like lightning , that deceives our eyes , usually  looking larger or करीब than it वाकई is , the धरती 's माहौल और हमारी दिमाग 's बोध of the  outside world , ultimately determines whether it is `` heard '' or not .
Lightning can not happen in a  वैक्यूम विहीन of ions , nor can  thunder occur without molecules to vibrate .
थंडर is a शारीरिक निरपेक्ष  for every single flash of lightning .
Contrary to popular belief , a lightning strike itself  is प्रायः नहीं जिम्मेदार  for multiple deaths or injuries from a single event .
It would be impossible given the natural tendencies of  a फ्लैश , जबतक लोगों or पशु यहूद stacked on  top of each other , or they were somehow arranged vertically and part of the flash channel .
When lightning ignites an available fuel source  और an विस्फोट occurs , it is the शॉक वेव or आग causing  the injuries , not the strike itself .
Ground Currents , also called step potential , of an earth termination is what truly causes  सबसे चोटों or मौत  to humans and animals .
The  निकट instantaneous फटाफट of सतह आरोप , induced by the  overhead thundercloud itself , race to the strike point from hundreds to thousands of feet away during discharge .
इस वर्तमान , caused दौरान प्रत्येक स्ट्रोक , takes  the path of least resistance , which may be ion rich human or animal legs , over poorly conducting earth .
This is why it is best to  crouch , साथ फीट बंद साथ , if कभी caught  in the open during a thunderstorm .
दुर्भाग्यवश , सबसे रिपोर्ट्स do नहीं चित्रण a भेद between the रियल कारण of चोट or मौत  , be it the strike itself , a resulting explosion or fire , or usually responsible step potential .
Peter F. Kilmartin (  born 1962 ) is the वर्तमान  Attorney General of Rhode Island .
Kilmartin is also a retired police captain and a  पूर्व सदस्य of the rhode  Island House of Representatives .
A couple  following उनके विवाह  in the Manti Utah Temple .
Sealing is an ordinance ( ritual )  performed in latter दिन  Saints temples by a person holding the sealing authority .
The purpose of this  अध्यादेश is to मुहर परिचित संबंध  , making possible the existence of family relationships throughout eternity .
LDS teachings place great  महत्व on the  specific authority required to perform these sealings .
Church  doctrine सिखाती  that this authority , called the Priesthood , corresponds to that given to Saint Peter in .
sealings हैं typically performed  as marriages or as sealing of children to parents .
They were performed prior to the  मौत of जोसेफ स्मिथ , jr. ( the प्रमुख संस्थापक of the latter दिन  Saint movement ) , and are currently performed in The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints .
हालांकि कुछ अन्य denominations , ऐसे as the जातियाँ of मसीह , दृश्य  sealing as an artifact of Smith 's practice of plural marriage , some do still perform them .
The 2000s , pronounced `` two thousands  '' , थी a दशक कि began on जनवरी  1 , 2000 , and ended on December 31 , 2009 .
Globalization , which had accelerated after the  जल्दी 1990s पतन of साम्यवादी , जारी  to be a force in the 2000s .
The growth of the Internet was one of the prime contributors to globalization during the decade , making it possible for people to interact with other people , express ideas , introduce others to different cultures and backgrounds , use goods and services  , बेचें और ख़रीदे ऑनलाइन , शोध और सीख परिचय बाते , साथ साथ experiencing the संसार बगैर having  to leave home .
The institutions , linkages and technologies that emerged or were  redefined पहले होता subsequently in इस दशक  benefit many countries , in particular China and India .
However , in other parts of the world such progress failed to address ongoing struggles with modernity ,  सबसे notably characterized by the वृद्धि of al-qaeda  and other Islamist groups .
The September 11 attacks in 2001 led to the United States ,  संयुक्त किंगडम , स्पेन , कनाडा और अन्य राष्ट्र आक्रमणकारी अफगानिस्तान , as खूब as implementing  various anti-terrorist measures at home and abroad in what was known as the War on Terror .
The European Union saw further integration and expansion  throughout much of यूरोपीय  .
The economic growth of the 2000s had considerable environmental consequences , raised  माँग लिये घटाते उर्जा संसाधन , और थी स्टिल दिखाया to be vulnerable  as demonstrated during the Global Financial Crisis of the late 2000s .
The Gunfight at the  o.k . corral थी a gunfight कि took प्लेस at परिचय 3:00 p.m. on बुधवार , अक्तूबर  26 , 1881 , in Tombstone , Arizona Territory , and is generally regarded as the most famous gunfight in the history of the American Old West .
The gunfight , believed to have lasted only about thirty seconds , was fought  between the गैरकानूनी cowboys बिली claiborne , आइक और बिली clanton , और tom और फ़्रैंक mclaury , और the opposing कस्बा मार्शल वर्जिल earp  and his brothers Assistant Town Marshal Morgan and temporary lawman Wyatt , aided by Doc Holliday designated as a temporary marshal by Virgil .
Ike Clanton and Billy  claiborne भागा इससे the लड़ो unharmed , लकिन आइक  's brother Billy Clanton was killed , along with both McLaurys .
lawmen वर्जिल और  Morgan Earp and Doc Holliday were wounded .
Only Wyatt Earp came  through the लड़ो unharmed  .
The fight has come to represent a time  in अमरीकी इतिहास जब the frontier थी खोलें दायरा लिये outlaws opposed  by law enforcement that was spread thin over vast territories , leaving some areas unprotected .
The gunfight was not well known to the American public until 1931 when author Stuart Lake published what has since been determined to be a largely fictionalized  जीवनी , व्याट earp : frontier मार्शल , दो सालो बाद earp 's मौत  .
Lake retold his story in a 1946 book that director  जॉन घाट विकसित into the फिल्म  My Darling Clementine .
After the movie Gunfight at the O.K .  corral थी released in 1957 , the गोलीबारी  came to be known by that name .
Since then , the conflict has been  portrayed साथ varying डिग्री of सटीकता  in numerous Western films and books .
Despite its name , the gunfight actually occurred in a narrow lot six doors west of the rear entrance to the O.K . Corral  on fremont गली , और भी  in the street .
The two opposing parties were  initially तभी परिचय अलावा  .
About thirty shots were fired in  तीस सेकेंड  .
Ike Clanton filed murder charges against the Earps and Doc Holliday  लकिन वे यहूद आखिरकार exonerated by a लोकल न्यायधीश बाद a 30-day प्रारंभिक सुनना  and then again by a local grand jury .
On December 28 , 1881 , Virgil Earp was maimed in an assassination attempt by the outlaw Cowboys ,  और on कूच 18 , 1882 , वे assassinated मॉर्गन  Earp .
The suspects furnished solid alibis , and newly appointed Deputy U.S . Marshal Wyatt Earp took matters into his own hands during  the earp वेंडेट्टा सवारी  , ironically pursued by county Sheriff Johnny Behan with warrants for the Earp 's arrest .
hdmi ( high-definition मल्टीमीडिया इंटरफ़ेस ) is a कॉम्पैक्ट audio/video इंटरफ़ेस लिये transferring uncompressed वीडियो  data and compressed/uncompressed digital audio data from a HDMI-compliant device ( `` the source device '' ) to a compatible computer monitor , video projector , digital television , or digital audio device .
HDMI is a digital  बदलना लिये मौजूदा एनालॉग  video standards .
There are a number of HDMI-standard cable connectors available , each of which can be used for any uncompressed TV or PC video format , including  मानक , उन्नत , ऊँची परिभाषा , और 3d वीडियो सिग्नल ; up to 8 चैनल्स of संपीडित or uncompressed डिजिटल ऑडियो ; a cec ( उपभोक्ता  Electronics Control ) connection ; and an Ethernet data connection .
hdmi implements the eia/cea-861 मानकों , जिससे  define video formats and waveforms , transport of compressed , uncompressed , and LPCM audio , auxiliary data , and implementations of the VESA EDID .
The CEC allows HDMI devices to control each  अन्य जब जरुरी और allows the उपयोक्ता to operate अनेक डिवाइस  with one remote control handset .
Because HDMI is electrically compatible with  the cea-861 सिग्नल प्रयुक्त by डिजिटल विज़ुअल इंटरफ़ेस ( dvi ) , no सिग्नल परिवर्तन is जरुरी ,  nor is there a loss of video quality when a DVI-to-HDMI adapter is used .
As an uncompressed CEA-861 connection , HDMI is independent of the various digital  टेलीविज़न मानकों प्रयुक्त by व्यक्तिगत डिवाइस , ऐसे as atsc और dvb , as ये हैं encapsulations of संपीडित एमपीईजी  video streams ( which can be decoded and output as an uncompressed video stream on HDMI ) .
Production of consumer HDMI products started  in लेट 2003 .
In Europe either DVI-HDCP or HDMI is included in the HD ready in-store labeling  specification लिये tv सेट लिये hdtv , प्रतिपादित by eicta  with SES Astra in 2005 .
HDMI  began to appear on उपभोक्ता hdtv  camcorders and digital still cameras in 2006 .
As of January 8 ,  2013 , जिससे is टेन सालो बाद the रिलीज of the पहला hdmi specification  , over 3 billion HDMI devices have shipped since the launch of the HDMI standard .
Bree Van  de kamp ( née मेसन ; भी ज्ञात in the श्रेणी  as Bree Hodge and Bree Weston ) is a fictional character and one of the four protagonists on the ABC television series Desperate Housewives .
She is played by actress Marcia Cross , who has received multiple awards and nominations for her  portrayal , सहित an एमी पुरस्कार नामांकन , तीन सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार nominations , और दो  Screen Actors Guild Awards .
Cross 's portrayal  of ब्री रै महरूम widely praised by आलोचकों  and fans .
Cross originally auditioned for the role of Mary Alice Young  , लकिन श्रेणी निर्माता मार्क चेरी विचार  she was better suited for the role of Bree .
Dana Delany , who eventually was cast as Katherine Mayfair , was originally chosen for the  भूमिका लकिन turned it bas , saying it थी too समान  to her role in Pasadena .
Bree 's main struggle throughout the series has been her attempts to maintain a  पूर्ण जीवन despite विभिन्न बाधाएं ऐसे as widowhood  , divorce , and alcoholism hindering her .
She has been married  तीन टाइम्स ; to रेक्स वैन de kamp ( स्टीवन culp ) , orson  Hodge ( Kyle MacLachlan ) and Trip Weston ( Scott Bakula ) .

Algoma is a  नगर in kewaunee काउंटी in  the U.S. state of Wisconsin .
The population was 3,167  at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  .
Algoma is part of the Green  खाड़ी महानगर सांख्यिकीय  Area .
The Hangover Part II is a 2011 American comedy film produced by Legendary  तस्वीरें और वितरित by  Warner Bros. Pictures .
It is the sequel to 2009  's the hangover और  the second film in The Hangover franchise .
Todd Phillips directed the film in addition to co-authoring the  स्क्रिप्ट साथ क्रेग mazin , और scot  Armstrong .
the फिल्मी सितारों ब्राडली कूपर , ed helms , zach galifianakis  , Ken Jeong , Jeffrey Tambor , Justin Bartha and Paul Giamatti .
The Hangover Part II  tells the स्टोरी of फिल , stu , एलन  , and Doug as they travel to Thailand for Stu 's wedding .
बाद the स्नातक पार्टी in लास वेगास  , Stu takes no chances and opts for a safe , subdued pre-wedding brunch .
However , things do not go as planned ,  resulting in another ख़राब hangover साथ no यादें  of the previous night .
विकास of the hangover भाग ii  began in April 2009 , two months before The Hangover was released .
The principal actors were cast in March 2010 to reprise  उनके भूमिकाएँ इससे the पहला फिल्मी  .
Production began in October  2010 , in ओंटारियो , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , पहले  moving on location in Thailand .
The film was released on May 26 , 2011 and , despite receiving mostly negative reviews from critics , it became the highest-grossing R-rated comedy  दौरान इसके नाट्य चलाएं .
A third film  is नियत लिये on may  24 , 2013 .

The English Renaissance  थी a सांस्कृतिक और कलाकारी गति in  England dating from the late 15th and early 16th centuries to the early 17th century .
It is associated with the pan-European Renaissance  कि is प्रायः regarded as  beginning in Italy in the late 14th century .
Like most of northern Europe , England saw little of these developments until  अधिक than a सदी बाद .
The beginning of the English Renaissance is often taken , as a convenience , to  be 1485 , जब the बैटल of bosworth फ़ील्ड ended the युद्धों of the  Roses and inaugurated the Tudor Dynasty .
Renaissance style and ideas , however , were slow in penetrating  इंग्लैण्ड , और the elizabethan era in the दूसरी हाफ of the 16th सदी is  usually regarded as the height of the English Renaissance .
Elizabeth Ann Bloomer Warren `` Betty '' Ford ( April 8 , 1918 – July 8 , 2011 ) , was First Lady of the United  राज्य इससे 1974 to 1977 दौरान the प्रेसिडेंसी of  her husband Gerald Ford .
As First Lady , she was active in social policy and created precedents  as a नीतियां क्रियाशील अध्यक्षीय  wife .
Throughout her  husband 's पद in दफ्तर , वो कायम  high approval ratings despite opposition from some conservative Republicans who objected to her more moderate and liberal positions on social issues .
Ford was noted for raising breast cancer awareness following  उसके 1974 mastectomy और थी a passionate  supporter of , and activist for , the Equal Rights Amendment ( ERA ) .
Pro-choice on abortion and a leader in the Women 's Movement , she  gained कीर्ति as एक of the सबसे निष्कपट पहला महिलाओं in इतिहास , commenting on प्रत्येक hot-button समस्या of the समय , सहित  feminism , equal pay , the ERA , sex , drugs , abortion , and gun control .
She also raised awareness of addiction when she  घोषित उसके long-running बैटल साथ alcoholism  in the 1970s .
Following her White House years , she  जारी to लॉबी लिये the era और remained  active in the feminist movement .
She was the founder , and served as the first chair of the board of directors , of the Betty Ford Center for substance abuse and addiction and is a recipient of the Congressional Gold Medal (  co-presentation साथ उसके husband , जेराल्ड R. घाट , अक्तूबर 21 , 1998 ) और the अध्यक्षीय पदक of स्वतंत्रता ( अलोन , प्रस्तुत 1991 , by जार्ज H. W. बुश )  .
Platelet endothelial cell adhesion molecule ( PECAM-1 ) also known as  क्लस्टर of differentiation 31 ( cd31 )  is a protein that in human is encoded by the PECAM1 gene found on chromosome 17 .
PECAM-1 plays a key role in removing aged  neutrophils इससे the देह  .

The Miss Florida USA competition is the pageant that selects the representative for the state  फ्लोरिडा in the मिस यूएसए pageant  .
While Florida has been successful in terms of  runners-up , finalists और semi-finalists , the राज्य रै never जीती the मिस यूएसए pageant  , although Cheryl Patton became Miss USA after Sylvia Hitchcock won Miss Universe .
Florida 's best  परिणाम यहूद दौरान the mid-1960s  to mid-1970s .
Their  सबसे हाल फाइनलिस्ट  was Lissette Garcia who placed in the top 16 in 2011 .
दो पूर्व मिस फ्लोरिडा टीन यूएसए titleholders  have won this competition , and three titleholders have also competed at Miss America .
The  वर्तमान titleholder is मिशेल  Aguirre of Hialeah .
Anglo-Saxon England refers to the period of the history of the part of Britain that became known as  इंग्लैण्ड , स्थायी इससे the समाप्त of रोमन occupation और स्थापना of anglo-saxon kingdoms  in the 5th century until the Norman conquest of England in 1066 by William the Conqueror .
Anglo-Saxon is a general term referring  to the germanic peoples जो आए to ब्रिटेन दौरान the 5th और 6th  centuries , including Angles , Saxons , Frisii , and Jutes .
The term also refers to the language spoken at the time in England , which is now called Old English , and to the culture of  the era , जिससे रै long आकर्षित लोकप्रिय और scholarly  attention .
Until the 9th century Anglo-Saxon England was  वर्चस्व by the heptarchy  , the kingdoms of Northumbria , Mercia , East Anglia , Essex , Kent , Sussex , and Wessex .
In terms of religion the kingdoms followed Anglo-Saxon paganism during  the जल्दी काल , लकिन परिवर्तित to christianity  during the 7th century .
Paganism had a  फाइनल stronghold in a काल of mercian आधिपत्य दौरान the 640s  , ending with the death of Penda of Mercia in 655 .
Facing the threat of Viking invasions , the House of Wessex became dominant  दौरान the 9th सदी , अंतर्गत the नियम  of Alfred the Great .
During the 10th century , the individual kingdoms unified under the rule of Wessex into  the किंगडम of इंग्लैण्ड , जिससे stood opposed to the danelaw , the viking  kingdoms established from the 9th century in the north and east of England .
The Kingdom of England fell in the Viking invasion from Denmark in  1013 और थी शासित by the हाउस of डेनमार्क जबतक 1042 , जब the  Anglo-Saxon House of Wessex was restored .
The last Anglo-Saxon king ,  हेरोल्ड godwinson ,  was killed in 1066 at the Battle of Hastings .

Smoked salmon is a preparation of salmon , typically a  fillet कि रै महरूम  cured and hot or cold smoked .
Due to its  मध्यम ऊँची दाम , स्मोक्ड सामन  is considered a delicacy .
Although the term lox is sometimes applied to smoked salmon  , वे हैं अलग उत्पाद  .
View of defibrillator  एलेक्ट्रोड स्थिति और  placement .
Defibrillation is a common treatment for  life-threatening हृदय dysrhythmias , ventricular fibrillation , और pulseless  ventricular tachycardia .
defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic खुराक of विद्युत  energy to the affected heart with a device called a defibrillator .
This depolarizes a critical mass of the heart  मांसपेशी , terminates the dysrhythmia , और allows सामान्य sinus लय to be reestablished by the देह  's natural pacemaker , in the sinoatrial node of the heart .
Defibrillators can be external , transvenous , or implanted , depending on the type of  यंत्र प्रयुक्त or  needed .
Some external units , known as automated external defibrillators ( AEDs ) , automate the diagnosis of treatable rhythms ,  अर्थ कि lay responders or bystanders हैं समर्थ to  use them successfully with little , or in some cases no training at all .
Gabrielle `` Coco '' Bonheur Chanel ( August 19  , 1883 – जनवरी 10 ,  1971 ) was a French fashion designer and founder of the Chanel brand .
She was the only fashion  पंक्तियां to appear on समय पत्रिका  's list of the 100 most influential people of the 20th century .
Along with Paul  poiret , चैनल थी credited साथ liberating महिलाओं  from the constraints of the `` corseted silhouette '' and popularizing the acceptance of a sportive , casual chic as the feminine standard in the post- World War I era .
A prolific fashion creator , Chanel 's  influence विस्तारित परे  couture clothing .
Her design  aesthetic थी एहसास in आभूषण ,  handbags , and fragrance .
Her signature scent  , चैनल no . 5 , रै become  an iconic product .
Chanel was known for her  lifelong determination , महत्वाकांक्षा और उर्जा जिससे  she applied to her professional and social life .
She achieved both success as a  businesswoman और सोशल prominence धन्यवाद  to the connections she made through her work .
These included many artists  और craftspeople to जिसको वो  became a patron .
However , Chanel 's highly competitive , opportunistic personality led her  to मेक questionable जीवन  choices which have generated controversy around her reputation , particularly her behaviour during the German occupation of France in World War II .

a gristmill (  also : grist mill , corn mill or flour mill ) grinds grain into flour .
The term can refer to both the grinding mechanism and the  भवन कि holds it .
Romania ( ; dated spellings Roumania and Rumania ; ) is a country located at the intersection of  सेंट्रल और southeastern यूरोपीय , bordering on  the Black Sea .
Romania shares a border with Hungary  और सर्बिया to the वेस्ट , युक्त और moldova to the  northeast and east , and Bulgaria to the south .
At , Romania is the eighth largest country  of the यूरोपीय संघ by क्षेत्रफल , और रै the सातवाँ largest  population of the European Union with more than 19 million people .
Its capital and  biggest नगर is बुखारेस्ट , the 11th  largest city in the EU .
The  संयुक्त principalities उभरा  when the territories of Moldavia and Wallachia were united under Prince Alexander Ioan Cuza in 1859 .
In 1866 Prince Karl of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen was called to the throne as the Ruling Prince of the Romanian  principate और in 1881 he थी आखिरकार पहनाया as किंग कैरोल i the पहला  monarch of the Kingdom of Romania .
Independence from the Ottoman Empire was declared on 9 May 1877 ,  और थी internationally  recognized the following year .
At the  समाप्त of संसार युद्ध i , transylvania , bukovina  and Bessarabia united with the Kingdom of Romania .
World War II gave cause to the rise of a military dictatorship in  रोमानिया अंतर्गत फासिस्ट सामान्य  Ion Antonescu , who chose to fight on the side of the Axis powers from 1941 to 1944 .
बाद उसके हटाना , रोमानिया  switched sides in 1944 and joined the Allies .
By the end of the war , some formerly Romanian  northeastern territories यहूद occupied by the  Soviet Union , with Red Army units stationed on Romanian soil .
In  1947 रोमानिया forcibly became a लोगों  's Republic ( 1947-1965 ) and a member of the Warsaw Pact .
In 1965 Nicolae Ceauşescu  became सामान्य सचिव of the रोमानियाई कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी , और the हर्ष austerity  measures , political repression , and cult of personality he implemented led to the Socialist Republic of Romania ( 1965-1989 ) becoming the most Stalinist police state in the Eastern bloc .
Eventually his authoritarian  सरकारी थी toppled in दिसम्बर 1989 दौरान the रोमानियाई क्रान्ति  of 1989 .
With the fall of the Iron Curtain , Romania  began इसके परिवर्तन towards लोकतंत्र और a पूंजीवादी मार्केट  economy .
After a decade of  post-revolution आर्थिक समस्याएं और living-standards  decline , extensive reforms fostered economic recovery .
As of 2010 , Romania is an  upper-middle-income देश साथ a ऊँची इंसान विकास  index .
Romania joined NATO on 29 March 2004 ,  और the यूरोपीय संघ on 1 जनवरी  2007 .
It is also a member of the : Latin Union , Francophonie ,  osce , wto , bsec , संयुक्त राष्ट्र , इत्यादि .
Today , Romania is a unitary  semi-presidential गणतंत्र , in जिससे the कार्यपालिका शाखा  consists of the President and the Government .
`` प्राचीन  '' redirects here .
For  अन्य उपयोग , देखिए प्राचीनता  ( disambiguation ) .
The times before writing belong either to  protohistory or to प्रागितिहास  .

Ancient history is the study of the written  पास्ट इससे the शुरूआत of अंकित इंसान इतिहास  to the Early Middle Ages .
The span of recorded history is roughly 5,000 years , with Cuneiform script , the oldest discovered form of coherent  लिखने , इससे the protoliterate काल around the 30th सदी  BC .
This is the beginning of history , as opposed to prehistory ,  according to the परिभाषा प्रयुक्त  by most historians .
The term  शास्त्रीय प्राचीनता is प्रायः  used to refer to history in the Old World from the beginning of recorded Greek history in 776 BC ( First Olympiad ) .
This roughly coincides with the traditional date of the founding of Rome in 753 BC , the beginning of  the इतिहास of प्राचीन रोम , और the शुरूआत of the  Archaic period in Ancient Greece .
Although the ending date of ancient history is disputed , some Western  विद्वानों उपयोग the पतन of the पश्चिमी रोमन साम्राज्य in 476 ad , the closure of the platonic अकादमी in 529 ad , the मौत of the सम्राट जुस्तिनियन  I , the coming of Islam or the rise of Charlemagne as the end of ancient and Classical European history .
In India , the period  शामिल the जल्दी काल of the मध्य kingdoms ,  and , in China , the time up to the Qin Dynasty is included .
Methylcobalamin ( shown ) is a form of  विटामिन b12 .
Physically it resembles the other forms of vitamin B12 , occurring as dark red  crystals कि freely रूप cherry-colored पारदर्शी समाधान  in water .
Vitamin B12 , vitamin B12 or  विटामिन b-12 , भी पुकारा cobalamin , is a water-soluble विटामिन साथ a कुंजी  role in the normal functioning of the brain and nervous system , and for the formation of blood .
It is one of the  आठ b विटामिन  .
It is normally involved in the metabolism of every cell of the human body , especially  affecting डीएनए संश्लेषण और विनियमन , लकिन भी वसीय एसिड संश्लेषण  and energy production .
Neither fungi , plants  , nor पशु  are capable of producing vitamin B12 .
Only bacteria and archaea have the enzymes required for its synthesis , although  अनेक भोजन हैं a प्राकृतिक सोर्स of b12 क्युकी  of bacterial symbiosis .
The  विटामिन is the largest और सबसे structurally जटिल विटामिन और  can be produced industrially only through bacterial fermentation-synthesis .
Vitamin B12 consists of a class  of chemically सम्बन्धित यौगिकों ( vitamers ) , सब  of which have vitamin activity .
It  contains the biochemically विरल  element cobalt .
जैवसंश्लेषण of the मौलिक ढांचा of the विटामिन is संपन्नता तभी by जीवाणु ( जिससे प्रायः उपज  hydroxocobalamin ) , but conversion between different forms of the vitamin can be accomplished in the human body .
A common semi-synthetic form of the vitamin , cyanocobalamin , does not occur in nature , but is produced from bacterial hydroxocobalamin and  तब प्रयुक्त in अनेक दवाएँ और पूरक , और  as a food additive , because of its stability and lower production cost .
In the body it is converted to the human physiological forms methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin , leaving behind the cyanide ,  albeit in minimal विशेषज्ञता  .
More recently ,  hydroxocobalamin , methylcobalamin , और  adenosylcobalamin can be found in more expensive pharmacological products and food supplements .
The extra utility of these  is फिलहाल debated  .
Vitamin B12 was discovered from its relationship to the  बीमारी घातक रक्ताल्पता , जिससे is an असंक्राम्य बीमारी in  which parietal cells of the stomach responsible for secreting intrinsic factor are destroyed .
Intrinsic factor is crucial for the  सामान्य अवशोषण of b12 , so a कमी of मूलभूत फ़ैक्टर , as देखी  in pernicious anemia , causes a vitamin B12 deficiency .
Many other subtler kinds  of विटामिन b12 कमियां और उनके  biochemical effects have since been elucidated .
The Roman Empire ( ) was the post- Republican period of the ancient Roman civilization , characterised by  an निरंकुश रूप of सरकारी और विशाल territorial holdings around the  Mediterranean in Europe , Africa , and Asia .
The 500-year-old Roman Republic , which preceded it  , था महरूम destabilized through a श्रेणी  of civil wars .
Several events marked the transition from Republic to Empire , including Julius Caesar 's appointment as perpetual dictator ( 44 BC ) ; the Battle of Actium ( 31 BC  ) ; और the granting of the honorific augustus  to Octavian by the Roman Senate ( 27 BC ) .
The first two centuries of the Empire were a period of unprecedented stability and prosperity known as  the pax romana (  `` Roman Peace '' ) .
It reached its greatest  expanse दौरान the शासनकाल of  Trajan ( 98–117 AD ) .
In the 3rd century , the Empire underwent a crisis that threatened its existence  , लकिन थी reunified और stabilized अंतर्गत  the emperors Aurelian and Diocletian .
Christians rose to power in the 4th century , during which  समय a प्रणाली of डुअल नियम थी विकसित in the लैटिन वेस्ट और  Greek East .
After the collapse of central government in the West in the 5th century  , the पूर्वी हाफ जारी as कया होता बाद  be known as the Byzantine Empire .
Because of the Empire 's vast extent and long endurance , the  संस्थानों और संस्कृति of रोम था a profound और स्थायी influence on the विकास of भाषा , धर्म , वास्तुकला , दर्शनशास्त्र , विधि , और फ़ॉर्म of सरकारी  in the territory it governed , particularly Europe , and by means of European expansionism throughout the modern world .
Total body surface area ( TBSA  ) is an मूल्यांकन माप of  burns of the skin .
in वयस्कों , the `` नियम of nines '' is  used to determine the total percentage of area burned for each major section of the body .
In some cases , the burns may cover more  than एक देह भाग , or may नहीं fully कवर  such a part ; in these cases , burns are measured by using the casualty 's palm as a reference point for 1 % of the body .
For children and infants , the  lund-browder चार्ट is प्रयुक्त to assess  the burned body surface area .
Different  percentages हैं प्रयुक्त क्युकी the अनुपात of the संयुक्त सतह  area of the head and neck to the surface area of the limbs is typically larger in children than that of an adult .
Typical values for common  समूह of इंसानो follow .
(  due to rounding , मान may  not add to 100 % . )
World infant mortality  दरों by पाँच सालो averages  in 2008 .
इस is a सूची of देशों  by infant mortality rate .
Jonah Kirsten Sorrentino (  born जून 26 , 1975 ) , बेहतर  known by his stage name KJ-52 , is a Christian rapper from Tampa , Florida .
The `` KJ '' part of his name refers to his old rap alias , `` King J.  मैक , '' a नाम जिससे he बाद वर्णित in एक of उसके  podcasts as `` horribly cheesy . ''
`` 52 '' , which is pronounced `` five two '' , not `` fifty-two '' , is a reference to the Biblical story of Jesus feeding the  multitude साथ पाँच loaves और दो मछली , जिससे is भी सुंग परिचय in उसके सोंग `` धक्का up '' इससे the yearbook और in the `` kj पाँच दो '' on it 's सुनाया  'Five Two .
He was awarded the Rap/Hip Hop Recorded Song of the Year for  `` never dekh दूर '' और rap/hip हॉप एल्बम of the साल at the जीएमए  Dove Awards of 2007 .
On July 28 , 2009 , KJ-52 released `` End of My Rope '' , which is  the पहला सिंगल  for his album Five-Two Television .
His song `` Dear Slim '' is based  on एमिनेम 's सोंग `` स्टेन `` और is a sort of निजी  message from KJ-52 to Eminem .
The degree symbol ( ° ) is a typographical symbol that is used , among  अन्य बाते , to represent डिग्री of चाप ( e.g . in भौगोलिक निर्देशांक प्रणालियों  ) , hours ( in the medical field ) , or degrees of temperature .
The  प्रतीक consists of a छोटी  raised circle , historically a zero glyph .
In Unicode  it is एनकोडेड  at .
This is a list of roots , suffixes , and prefixes used in medical terminology , their  meanings  , and their etymology .
There are a few rules when  using चिकित्सा  roots .
Firstly , prefixes and suffixes ,  primarily in यूनानी  , but also in Latin , have a droppable -o- .
As a general rule , this -o- almost always acts as a  joint-stem to कनेक्ट दो consonantal जड़ें , e.g . arthr- + -o- + logy  = arthrology .
But generally , the -o- is dropped when connecting to a vowel-stem ;  e.g . arthr- + itis = गठिया , बजाय  of arthr-o-itis .
Secondly , medical  जड़ें generally go साथ according to भाषा : यूनानी  prefixes go with Greek suffixes and Latin prefixes with Latin suffixes .
Although  अंतरराष्ट्रीय वैज्ञानिक शब्दावली is नहीं कठोर परिचय segregating  combining forms of different languages , it is advisable when coining new words not to mix different lingual roots .
Stomach cancer , or gastric cancer  , refers to कर्कट  arising from any part of the stomach .
पेट कर्कट कल्याणकारी  about 800,000 deaths worldwide per year .
prognosis is ग़रीब ( 5-year अस्तित्व < 5 to 15  % ) because most patients present with advanced disease .
Sara Lynn Evans ( born February 5 , 1971 ) is  an अमरीकी देश  singer and songwriter .
For her entire  करियर , वो रै महरूम हस्ताक्षरित  to RCA Records Nashville .
Evans ' debut , Three Chords and the  सच्चाई , किया नहीं उपज a शीर्ष 40 hit  on the Hot Country Songs charts .
She followed this up with No Place That Far ( 1998  ) , born to मक्खी ( 2000 ) ,  Restless ( 2003 ) and Real Fine Place ( 2005 ) .
No Place That Far received a gold certification from the Recording Industry Association of America ( RIAA  ) , जबकि the अन्य तीन एल्बम सब यहूद  certified platinum .
These discs include the number 1 singles `` No  प्लेस कि दूर `` , `` born to मक्खी `` , `` suds in the बाल्टी `` और `` a रियल ठीक प्लेस to प्रारंभ  `` , plus the top 10 hits `` I Could Not Ask for More `` ( a cover of the Edwin McCain song ) , `` I Keep Looking `` , `` Perfect `` and `` Cheatin ' `` .
Her 2007 Greatest Hits included the top 15 hits  `` तुम 'll सदा be my baby  `` and `` As If `` .
Stronger ( 2011 ) included her fifth number 1 hit , `` A Little Bit Stronger `` , which  थी co-written by हिलेरी स्कॉट of महिला  Antebellum .
Evans has also won one award each  इससे बिलबोर्ड , the अकादमी of देश  Music , Country Music Association , Broadcast Music Incorporated ( BMI ) and a Dove Award .
The world 's  प्रिंसिपल धर्मों और आध्यात्मिक परंपराओं may be वर्गीकृत  into a small number of major groups , although this is by no means a uniform practice .
This  सिद्धान्त began in the 18th सदी  with the goal of recognizing the relative levels of civility in societies .
