The Berlin blockade ( 24 June  1948 – 12 may 1949 ) थी एक of the पहला  major international crises of the Cold War .
During the multinational occupation of post–World War II Germany , the Soviet Union blocked the Western Allies ' railway , road ,  और कनाल अभिगम to the सेक्टर of बर्लिन  under Allied control .
Their aim was to force the western powers to allow the Soviet zone to start supplying Berlin with food and fuel , thereby giving the  soviets व्यावहारिक कंट्रोल over the  entire city .
In response ,  the पश्चिमी allies व्यवस्थित the बर्लिन  airlift to carry supplies to the people in West Berlin .
Aircrews from the United States Air Force , the British Royal Air  फ़ोर्स , the royal ऑस्ट्रेलियाई एयर फ़ोर्स , the royal कनाडाई एयर फ़ोर्स , the royal नई जीलैंड एयर फ़ोर्स , और the दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी एयर फ़ोर्स  flew over 200,000 flights in one year , providing up to 4700 tons of daily necessities such as fuel and food to the Berliners .
By the  वसन्त of 1949 , the प्रयत्न थी clearly succeeding और , by अप्रैल ,  the airlift was delivering more cargo than had previously been transported into the city by rail .
The success of the Berlin Airlift brought embarrassment to the  soviets जो था refused to मानना it could  make a difference .
The  नाकेबंदी थी lifted in may 1949  and resulted in the creation of two separate German states .
The Federal Republic of Germany ( West Germany ) and the German  लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र ( ईस्ट जर्मनी ) विभाजित  up Berlin .
In  स्मरण of the एयरलिफ्ट , तीन एयरपोर्ट  in the former western zones of the city served as the primary gateways to Germany for another fifty years .
The euro sign ; logotype  और हस्तलिखित  .
The euro sign is the  करेंसी चिह्न प्रयुक्त लिये the यूरोपियन , the आधिकारिक  currency of the Eurozone in the European Union ( EU ) .
The design was presented to the  पब्लिक by the यूरोपीय  Commission on 12 December 1996 .
The international three-letter code ( according to ISO  मानक आईएसओ 4217 ) लिये the यूरोपियन is  EUR .
in युनिकोड  it is encoded at .
In English , the  चिह्न precedes  the value .
In some styleguides , but  नहीं अन्य , the यूरोपियन चिह्न  is unspaced .
Mate ( , ; sometimes also spelled maté ) , also known as chimarrão ( ) or cimarrón ( ) , is a traditional South American infused drink , particularly in Argentina  , उरुग्वे , पैराग्वे और the दक्षिणी राज्य of ब्राज़ील और to a lesser उपाधि in दक्षिण of चिली , the bolivian chaco  , Syria and Lebanon .
It is prepared from steeping dried leaves of yerba mate ( llex paraguariensis ,  ज्ञात in पुर्तगाली as erva-mate  ) in hot water .
Mate is served  साथ a मेटल स्ट्रॉ इससे a  shared hollow calabash gourd .
the स्ट्रॉ is पुकारा a bombilla in कुछ लैटिन  American countries , a bomba in Portuguese , and a bombija or , more generally , a masassa ( type of straw ) in Arabic .
The  स्ट्रॉ is traditionally  made of silver .
Modern , commercially available straws are typically made of nickel silver ,  पुकारा alpaca ; बेदाग स्टील , or hollow-stemmed  cane .
The gourd is known as a mate or a guampa ; while in Brazil , it has the specific  नाम of cuia , or भी cabaça ( the नाम लिये indigenous-influenced  calabash gourds in other regions of Brazil , still used for general food and drink in remote regions ) .
भी if the जल is supplied इससे a आधुनिक thermos  , the infusion is traditionally drunk from mates or cuias .
As with other brewed herbs , yerba mate leaves are dried , chopped , and  मैदान into a powdery मिश्रण पुकारा yerba  .
The  bombilla अधिनियमों as दोनो  a straw and a sieve .
The submerged end is flared , with small holes or slots that allow the brewed  द्रव in , लकिन ब्लाक the चंकी पदार्थ कि makes up much of the  mixture .
A modern bombilla design uses a straight tube  साथ छेद , or वसन्त स्लीव to अधिनियम  as a sieve .
`` Tea-bag '' type infusions of mate ( mate cocido ) have been on the market in Argentina , Paraguay and Uruguay for many years under such trade names as `` Taragüí Vitality '' in Argentina , ``  pajarito '' और `` kurupí '' in पैराग्वे , और in ब्राज़ील अंतर्गत the नाम  `` Mate Leão '' .
This is considered  a completely अलग  drink .
It is never drunk from cuias  or पुकारा chimarrão , nor is it संबद्ध  with the gaucho/gaúcho culture .
The  ऑटोमोटिव उद्योग is a पद कि कवर a चौड़ी दायरा of कंपनियाँ  and organisations involved in the design , development , manufacture , marketing , and selling of motor vehicles , towed vehicles , motorcycles and mopeds .
It is one of the world 's most  महत्वपूर्ण आर्थिक सेक्टर  by revenue .
The term automotive industry usually does not include industries dedicated to the maintenance of  ऑटोमोबाइल following डिलीवरी to the end-user  , such as repair shops and motor fuel filling stations .
The term automotive was created from Greek autos ( self ) , and Latin motivus ( of  गति ) to represent कोई रूप of self-powered  vehicle .
This term was  प्रस्तावित by sae सदस्य  Elmer Sperry .
David Michael `` Dave '' Bautista , Jr. ( born January 18 , 1969 ) , is an American mixed martial artist , bodybuilder , actor , and  पूर्व पेशेवर पहलवान बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके समय in संसार कुश्ती entertainment  competing under the ring name Batista .
In WWE , he became a six-time world champion , winning the World Heavyweight Championship four times ,  और the डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई चैंपियनशिप  two times .
He is the  longest-reigning संसार  Heavyweight Champion in WWE history .
In addition to these championships , Batista has won the  संसार टैग टोली चैंपियनशिप तीन टाइम्स ( twice साथ ric फ्लेयर और एकबार साथ जॉन सीना ) और  the WWE Tag Team Championship once ( with Rey Mysterio ) .
Batista was also the winner of the 2005 Royal Rumble match and went on to headline  रेसलमेनिया 21 , एक of the शीर्ष पाँच highest-grossing  pay-per-view events in pro wrestling history .
After trying out  at संसार चैंपियनशिप कुश्ती 's  Power Plant , Batista signed a contract with the WWF in 2000 and was sent to its developmental territory , Ohio Valley Wrestling ( OVW ) , where he won the OVW Heavyweight Championship .
In August 2012 , Bautista signed a contract  साथ क्लासिक entertainment & खेल to लड़ो  in mixed martial arts .
He won his MMA debut on  अक्तूबर 6 , 2012 , defeating विंस lucero  via TKO in the first round .
Henry T. Thomas Sampson , Jr. ( born in Jackson ,  मिसिसिपी in 1934 ) is an african-american आविष्कारक  .
He  ग्रैजुएट इससे ऊँची स्कूल  in 1951 from Lanier High School in Jackson , Mississippi .
He then attended Morehouse College for a couple of years before  transferring to purdue विश्वविद्यालयों जहाँ he became a  member of the Omega Psi Phi fraternity .
He received a Bachelor 's degree in science  इससे purdue विश्वविद्यालयों in  1956 .
He  ग्रैजुएट साथ an ms उपाधि in अभियान्त्रिकी इससे  the University of California , Los Angeles in 1961 .
Sampson also received his MS in Nuclear Engineering  इससे the विश्वविद्यालयों of इलिनोइस urbana-champaign  in 1965 , and his PhD in 1967 .
He is the  पहला अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी to earn a ph.d.in  Nuclear Engineering in the United States .
Some of his accomplishments include being a member of the United States Navy between the years 1962 and 1964 and earning an Atomic  उर्जा आयोग सम्मान between 1964  and 1967 .
Later he was awarded  the ब्लैक चित्र पुरस्कार इससे aerospace  Corporation in 1982 .
He was awarded the Blacks in Engineering , Applied Science Award ,  और पुरस्कार लिये शिक्षा , by the  Los Angeles Council of Black Professional Engineers in 1983 .
In June 2007 , Sampson was  शादीशुदा to लौरा howzell यंग in st.  Thomas , U.S. Virgin Islands .
Young-Sampson is a professor in the College of Education at California State  विश्वविद्यालयों सैन bernardino  .
Robert Lane Gibbs ( born March 29 , 1971 ) is  a वरिष्ठ अभियान adviser लिये us अध्यक्ष  Barack Obama .
Previously , he was  the 28th श्वेत  House Press Secretary .
Gibbs was the communications  निदेशक लिये then- u.s . सीनेटर ओबामा  and his 2008 presidential campaign .
Gibbs , who has worked with Obama since 2004 , was press secretary of John Kerry 's 2004 presidential campaign and has  previously specialized in सीनेट अभियान , having परोसा as संचार निदेशक लिये the लोकतांत्रिक  Senatorial Campaign Committee and for four individual Senate campaigns , including those of Obama in 2004 and Fritz Hollings in 1998 .
गिब्स थी भी the दबायें  secretary of Representative Bob Etheridge .
On  नवम्बर 22 , 2008 , गिब्स थी घोषित as the  press secretary of the Obama administration .
He assumed the role of press  सचिव on जनवरी 20 , 2009 , और  gave his first official briefing on January 22 .
On January 5 , 2011 , Gibbs announced that he would leave the White House to  become an बाहर adviser to the  administration .
He left on  फ़रवरी 11 , 2011  .
On February 12 , 2013 , it was  घोषित कि गिब्स था महरूम नियुक्त as  a contributor for cable-news channel MSNBC .
His first appearance was  on the वही रात्रि  prior to the 2013 State Of The Union Address .
अरमांडो pérez ( born जनवरी 15 ,  1981 ) , better known by his stage name Pitbull , is an American rapper , songwriter , and record producer .
His first  अंकित प्रदर्शन थी इससे the लील  Jon album Kings of Crunk in 2002 .
In  2004 , he released उसके डेब्यू एल्बम titled m.i.a.m.i  . ( short for Money Is A Major Issue ) under TVT Records .
Since then , he has released three other albums under the label  : el mariel in 2006 , the boatlift in 2007 , और  Planet Pit in 2011 .
He released  rebelution in 2009 , जिससे  included singles `` I Know You Want Me ( Calle Ocho ) `` and `` Krazy `` .
The latter peaked at No . 30 on the Hot 100 and No . 11 on the Hot Rap Tracks charts while `` I Know You Want Me '' peaked at No . 2 on the Hot 100 and peaked  भीतर the शीर्ष टेन धब्बे of चार्ट in the uk , कनाडा  , Italy , and the Netherlands .
The song reached No  . 1 in फ़्रांस और the यूरोपीय hot 100 on the सप्ताह समाप्ति  August 29 , 2009 according to Billboard magazine .
he बाद हस्ताक्षरित साथ पोलो grounds म्यूज़िक  through Sony Music and created his own label Mr. 305 Inc .
another सिंगल इससे rebelution  was `` Hotel Room Service `` , which peaked at No . 8 on the Hot 100 .
Rebelution went on to sell over  7.5 लाख विश्वव्यापी डिजिटल singles  and albums combined .
Nevertheless , he dropped a smash called `` Give Me Everything '' which reached # 1  विश्वव्यापी , और प्रदर्शित  artists Ne-yo , Nayer , and Afrojack .
He has also performed as a featured artist in the remixes of many other hit songs , like Tik Tok , Scream & Shout , Lo Hecho Esta Hecho , Bad , Papi , Diamonds ,  कैसा कम , tonight ( i 'm lovin ' तुम ) , वीडियो फोन , over to तुम अभी और bumpy सवारी  .
Pérez is also the host of  उसके अपना spanish-language कार्यक्रम on the केबल  channel Mun2 titled La Esquina ( Spanish for The Corner ) .
In 2005 Pérez and rapper Sean 'Diddy ' Combs co-founded Bad Boy Latino  , a subsidiary of combs ' ख़राब लड़के रिकॉर्ड  label .
It primarily focuses on Latin hip hop , Latin soul , Latin pop and other Tropical music ,  और रै कार्यालयों in नई यॉर्क और  Miami , Florida .
Along with co-founding it , Pérez  फिलहाल heads the a  & R division of the label .
Pérez has become a product endorser , representing alongside Drake , Rihanna , and Trey Songz the “So Kodak” campaign for the Kodak brand and embarking on a partnership with the soft drink giant Dr Pepper as  भाग of the अभियान “ विदा 23 ” लिये जिससे he अंकित the सोंग specifically प्रदर्शित on  his album Armando .
Pitbull also announced he has  become the प्रवक्ता लिये voli  Vodka , in which he holds a majority equity stake , and Budweiser has chosen Pitbull to promote its Bud Light line of beer .
The commercials  फिलहाल हाइलाइट pitbull नाचना और gyrating  on stage holding up a bottle of Bud Light .
Pitbull has also purchased an equity stake in Miami  subs पिज़्ज़ा और ग्रिल  .
Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' Evening `` ) , also known as All  hallows ' संध्या , is a वार्षिक जश्न observed in a क्रमांक of देशों on अक्तूबर 31 , the संध्या of the पश्चिमी ईसाई  feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas .
According to many  विद्वानों , सब hallows ' संध्या is a christianised feast originally बहकावे by पश्चिमी यूरोपीय  harvest festivals , and festivals of the dead with possible pagan roots , particularly the Celtic Samhain .
Other scholars maintain that it  originated independently of samhain और रै solely ईसाई  roots .
Typical festive Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ) , attending costume parties , carving pumpkins into  jack-o'-lanterns , lighting bonfires , ठहराना bobbing , visiting haunted आकर्षण , playing pranks , telling डरावने कहानियां , और watching हॉरर films  .
Freedom  of वाक is the राजनैतिक सही to communicate एक 's राय  and ideas using one 's body and property to anyone who is willing to receive them .
The term freedom of expression is  sometimes प्रयुक्त synonymously , लकिन शामिल कोई अधिनियम  of seeking , receiving and imparting information or ideas , regardless of the medium used .
In practice , the right to freedom of speech is not  निरपेक्ष in कोई देश और the सही is commonly विषय to सीमाएं , as साथ  libel , slander , obscenity , sedition ( including , for example inciting ethnic hatred ) , copyright violation , revelation of information that is classified or otherwise .
The right to freedom of  अभिव्यक्ति is पहचाना as a इंसान सही अंतर्गत आलेख 19 of the सार्वभौमिक घोषणा of इंसान अधिकारों और पहचाना in अंतरराष्ट्रीय  human rights law in the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights ( ICCPR ) .
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without interference '' and `` everyone shall have the right to freedom of expression ; this right shall include freedom to seek , receive  और impart सूचना और विचार of सब kinds , regardless of frontiers , either orally , in लिखने  or in print , in the form of art , or through any other media of his choice '' .
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` special duties and responsibilities `` and may `` therefore be subject to certain  प्रतिबंध '' जब जरुरी `` [ f ] or आदर of the अधिकारों or प्रतिष्ठा of अन्य '' or `` [ f ] or the सुरक्षा  of national security or of public order ( order public ) , or of public health or morals '' .
स्वतंत्रता of वाक may be legally curtailed in कुछ धार्मिक विधिक प्रणालियों और in धर्मनिरपेक्ष  jurisdictions where it is found to cause religious offense , such as the British Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006 .
Sydney Harbour from the air , showing the Opera House , the CBD , Circular Quay , the  सेतु , the parramatta नदी ,  North Sydney and Kirribilli in the foreground
The Sydney Harbour Bridge is a steel through arch bridge across Sydney  harbour कि carries रेल , vehicular , सायकिल और पैदल  traffic between the Sydney central business district ( CBD ) and the North Shore .
The dramatic  दृश्य of the सेतु , the harbour  , and the nearby Sydney Opera House is an iconic image of Sydney , New South Wales , and Australia .
The bridge is  nicknamed `` the coathanger  '' because of its arch-based design .
Under the directions of Dr J.J.C . Bradfield of the NSW Department of Public Works , the  सेतु थी designed और निर्मित by अंग्रेजों कड़ dorman long और co ltd of middlesbrough  and opened in 1932 .
The bridge 's design was  बहकावे by the नरक फाटक सेतु in  New York .
It was  the संसार 's widest long-span सेतु , at 48.8  meters ( 160 feet ) wide , until construction of the new Port Mann Bridge in Vancouver .
It is also the fifth longest spanning-arch  सेतु in the संसार , और it is the tallest स्टील मेहराब सेतु ,  measuring from top to water level .
Until 1967  the harbour सेतु थी सिडनी  's tallest structure .
The  हवाई हॉटस्पॉट is a volcanic हॉटस्पॉट स्तिथ निकट the namesake  Hawaiian Islands , in the northern Pacific Ocean .
One of the most well-known and  heavily पढ़ाई हॉटस्पॉट in the संसार , the हवाई plume is जिम्मेदार  for the creation of the Hawaiian – Emperor seamount chain , an over 5,800 kilometres ( 3,600 mi ) long chain of volcanoes , four of which are active , two of which are dormant , and more than 123 of which are extinct , many having since been ground beneath the waves by erosion as seamounts and atolls .
The chain extends from south of the  द्वीप of हवाई to the किनारे of the aleutian  Trench , near the eastern edge of Russia .
While most volcanoes are created by geological activity at tectonic plate boundaries , the Hawaii hotspot is located far from nearby plate boundaries ; the classic hotspot  सिद्धान्त , पहला प्रस्तावित in 1963 by जॉन tuzo विल्सन , proposes कि a सिंगल , फिक्स्ड mantle plume builds ज्वालामुखी  that then , cut off from their source by the movement of the Pacific Plate , become increasingly inactive and eventually erode below sea level over millions of years .
According to this theory , the  nearly 60° बेंड separating the सम्राट और हवाई  segments of the chain was caused by a sudden shift in the movement of the Pacific Plate .
In 2003 , fresh investigations of this irregularity led to the proposal of a mobile  हॉटस्पॉट सिद्धान्त , suggesting कि हॉटस्पॉट हैं मोबाईल , नहीं  fixed , and that the 47 million year old bend was caused by a shift in the hotspot 's motion rather than the plate 's .
Ancient Hawaiians were  the पहला to recognize the increasing आयु और weathered राज्य of  the volcanoes to the north as they progressed on fishing expeditions along the islands .
The volatile state of the Hawaiian volcanoes and their constant battle with the sea was a major element  in हवाई mythology , समाविष्ट in pele , the देवता of ज्वालामुखी  .
After the  आगमन of europeans on the द्वीप , in 1880-1881 जेम्स ड्वाइट दाना निर्देशित the पहला औपचारिक geological पढ़ाई of the हॉटस्पॉट  's volcanics , confirming the relationship long observed by the natives .
1912 marked the founding of the Hawaiian Volcano  वेधशाला by volcanologist थामस jaggar , initiating  continuous scientific observation of the islands .
In the 1970s , a mapping project was initiated to gain more  सूचना परिचय the जटिल भूविज्ञान of हवाई 's seafloor  .
The hotspot has since been tomographically imaged , showing it to be wide and up to deep , and olivine and garnet -based  अध्ययन have दिखाया इसके मैग्मा कक्ष is  approximately .
In its at least 85 million years of activity the hotspot  रै उत्पादित an अनुमानित of चट्टान  .
The chain 's rate of drift has slowly increased over time , causing the amount of time each individual volcano is active to decrease , from 18 million years for the 76 million year old Detroit Seamount , to just under  900,000 लिये the एक लाख year-old kohala ; on the अन्य हाथ , eruptive आवाज़ रै increased इससे प्रति साल  to about .
Overall , this has caused a trend towards more active but quickly-silenced , closely spaced volcanoes—whereas volcanoes on the near side of the hotspot overlap each other ( forming such  superstructures as हवाई द्वीप और the प्राचीन मावी नुई ) , the oldest of the सम्राट  seamounts are spaced as far as apart .
David Palmer , director of the show , announced that the season 4  finale is the श्रेणी finale क्युकी निकलोडियन रद्द  the show .
Petitions are  होने हस्ताक्षरित to लाओ  the show for a fifth season .
The show airs on Treehouse TV  कनाडा और उपनाम jr. ( formerly  Noggin ) .
Eddie and the Cruisers is a  1983 अमरीकी फिल्मी निर्देशित by मार्टिन  Davidson with the screenplay written by the director and Arlene Davidson , based on the novel by P. F. Kluge .
It was marketed  साथ the टैगलाइन `` विद्रोही  .
रॉकर .
प्रेमी  .
आइडल  .
vanished  . ''
Osteonecrosis of the jaw (  onj ) is a कठोर अस्थि बीमारी  that affects the maxilla and the mandible .
Various forms of ONJ have been  वर्णित over the पिछला 160 सालो , और a  number of causes have been suggested in the literature .
Osteonecrosis of the jaws  संबद्ध साथ bisphosphonate चिकित्सा , जरूरी by कुछ कर्कट उपचार regimens  , has been identified and defined as a pathological entity since 2003 .
the संभावित रिस्क इससे निम्नतर मौखिक doses of bisphosphonates  , taken by patients to prevent or treat osteoporosis , remains uncertain .
Various treatment options have been explored , however  कठोर मामले of onj स्टिल आवश्यकता सर्जिकल हटाना  of the affected bone .
A  thorough इतिहास और assessement of pre-existing प्रणालीगत समस्याएं और संभावित  sites of dental infection are required to help prevent the condition , especially if bisphosphonate therapy is considered .
The Boston Red Sox are a professional baseball team based in  बोस्टन , मैसाचुसेट्स , और a सदस्य of प्रमुख लीग  Baseball 's American League Eastern Division .
Founded in as one of the American League 's eight charter franchises , the Red Sox  's घर ballpark रै महरूम fenway पार्क चूंकि .
The `` Red Sox '' name was chosen by the team owner , John I. Taylor , around , following  पिछला बोस्टन टीमों कि था महरूम ज्ञात as the `` रेड stockings  `` .
They have played in 11  संसार श्रेणी , जीतना  7 .
Boston was a dominant team in the new  लीग , defeating the पिट्सबर्ग pirates  in the first World Series in and winning four more championships by .
However , they then went into one of the longest championship droughts in baseball history , called by some the `` Curse of the Bambino `` after  इसके कथित शुरूआत साथ the रेड sox 's बिक्री of बेब रुथ to the प्रतिद्वंद्वी यांकीज़ दो सालो  after their world championship in 1918 , an 86-year wait before the team 's sixth World Championship in .
However , the team 's history during that period was hardly one of  futility , लकिन थी बल्कि punctuated साथ कुछ of the सबसे यादगार पल in संसार श्रेणी इतिहास  , including Enos Slaughter 's `` mad dash `` in , the `` Impossible Dream `` of , Carlton Fisk 's home run in , and Bill Buckner 's error in .
Red Sox history has also been marked by the team 's intense rivalry with the New York Yankees ,  arguably the fiercest और सबसे ऐतिहासिक in उत्तर  American professional sports .
The Boston Red Sox are owned by  fenway खेल समूह , जो भी अपना लिवरपूल  Football Club of the Premier League in England .
The Red Sox are consistently one  of the शीर्ष एमएलबी टीमों in औसत सड़क उपस्थिति , जबकि  the small capacity of Fenway Park prevents them from leading in overall attendance .
From May 15 , 2003 to April 10 , 2013 , the Red Sox sold out  प्रत्येक घर game-a कुल of 820 खेल ( 794 नियमित ऋतु ) लिये  a major professional sports record that lasted almost a decade .
mince पाई भर  with mincemeat
Mincemeat is a mixture  of कटा सूखी फल , आसुत  spirits and spices , and sometimes beef suet , beef , or venison .
Originally , mincemeat  सदा contained मांस  .
Many modern recipes contain beef suet ,  हालांकि सब्ज़ी shortening  is sometimes used in its place .
विसंगतियाँ of mincemeat हैं मिला in ऑस्ट्रेलिया , ब्रिटनी  , Canada , northern Europe , Ireland , South Africa , the United Kingdom and the United States .
In  कुछ देशों the पद mincemeat  refers to minced or ground meat .
Diana , Princess of Wales ( Diana Frances ; née Spencer ; 1 July 1961 – 31 August 1997 ) was the first wife of Charles ,  प्रिंस of वेल्स , the ज्येष्ठ बेटे और वारिस apparent of महारानी  Elizabeth II .
She was well known for her  fund-raising कार्य लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय धर्मार्थ और as  an eminent celebrity of the late 20th century .
Her wedding to the Prince of Wales on 29 July 1981 was held at St Paul 's Cathedral and seen by a  वैश्विक टेलीविज़न दर्शक of over  750 million .
While married she bore the  शीर्षक राजकुमारी of वेल्स , duchess  of Cornwall , Duchess of Rothesay , Countess of Chester and Baroness of Renfrew .
The marriage produced two sons , the princes William and Harry , who became  दूसरी और तीसरा in लकीर to  the British throne .
Diana was born into an  वैभवशाली अंग्रेज़ी  family with royal ancestry .
She was the fourth child of John  स्पेंसर , 8th अर्ल स्पेंसर और उसके बीवी frances , बेटी  of Maurice Roche , 4th Baron Fermoy .
She became a public  फिगर साथ the घोषणा  of her engagement .
She also  प्राप्त मान्यता लिये उसके दान कार्य और लिये उसके support  of the International Campaign to Ban Landmines .
From 1989 , she was the president of the Great Ormond  गली हॉस्पिटल लिये children  , in addition to dozens of other charities .
डायना remained the ऑब्जेक्ट  of worldwide media scrutiny during and after her marriage , which ended in divorce on 28 August 1996 .
Media attention and public mourning were considerable following her  मौत in a car क्रैश in  Paris on 31 August 1997 .
Argentina , officially the Argentine Republic ( ) ,  is the दूसरी largest देश  in both South America and the Latin America region .
The country is a federation of 23  प्रांतों और the autonomous नगर of buenos आयर्स  , its capital and largest city .
It is the eighth  -largest देश in the संसार by जमीन क्षेत्रफल और the largest among spanish-speaking  nations by geographical area of 2,780,400 km2 and is the fourth by population , with over 41 million people .
Argentina is a founding member of the United Nations , Mercosur ,  the संघ of दक्षिण अमरीकी राष्ट्र , the संगठन of ibero-american राज्य , the संसार बैंको समूह और  the World Trade Organization , and is one of the G-15 and G-20 major economies .
Argentina is located in South America , bordered by Chile  to the वेस्ट और दक्षिण , बोलीविया  and Paraguay to the north and Brazil and Uruguay to the northeast .
Argentina claims sovereignty over part of Antarctica , the  फ़ॉकलैंड आइलैंड्स ( ) और  South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands .
Argentina  is the successor राज्य of the viceroyalty of the río  de la Plata , an overseas colony of the Spanish Empire .
Argentina declared independence during the Argentine War of Independence , which was  followed by the अर्जेंटाइन सिविल युद्धों दौरान सबसे of the  19th century .
The country faced several military coups and political instability during the 20th century , along with  आवधिक आर्थिक संकट कि continue to इस  day .
A recognized Southern Cone power , and middle power , Argentina is Latin  अमेरिका 's third-largest अर्थव्यवस्था , साथ a `` बहुत ऊँची  '' rating on the Human development index .
Within Latin America , Argentina has the fifth highest nominal GDP per capita and the  उच्चतम in खरीदना  power terms .
The Legatum Institute have argued that the country has a `` foundation for  भविष्य विकास due to इसके मार्केट आकार , स्तर  of foreign direct investment , and percentage of high-tech exports as share of total manufactured goods '' , and it is classed by investors as middle emerging economy .
Argentina is the Latin American country with  the सबसे नोबेल पुरस्कार , लिये a कुल of पाँच  , all obtained during the second half of the twentieth century .
The country has three Nobel prizes in science and  दो of सलाम  .
The most important aspects of science and technology in Argentina are concerned with medicine , nuclear  भौतिकी , जैवप्रौद्योगिकी , nanotechnology , स्पेस और प्रक्षेपास्त्र प्रौद्योगिकी  and several fields related to the country 's Main Economic Activities .
The country also has  the आचमन प्रदर्शनी बीच of विज्ञान , प्रौद्योगिकी  , industry and art that are Latin America 's largest .
Hickory is a city in Catawba County , with parts also in  बुर्के काउंटी और काल्डवेल  County .
The  नगर 's 2010 अनुमानित  population is 40,010 .
hickory is the प्रिंसिपल  city in the Hickory-Lenoir-Morganton MSA , in which the population at the 2010 Census was 365,497 .
Polyethylene terephthalate ( sometimes written poly ( ethylene terephthalate ) ) , commonly abbreviated PET , PETE , or the obsolete PETP or  pet-p , is a thermoplastic पॉलिमर राल of the पॉलिएस्टर परिवार और is प्रयुक्त in सिंथेटिक मछली ; पेय  , food and other liquid containers ; thermoforming applications ; and engineering resins often in combination with glass fiber .
The term polyethylene  terephthalate is a सोर्स of भ्रम  because this substance , PET , does not contain polyethylene .
Thus , the alternate form , poly ( ethylene terephthalate ) ,  is प्रायः प्रयुक्त in scholarly जर्नल्स लिये  the sake of accuracy and clarity .
Depending on its processing and thermal history , polyethylene terephthalate may exist both as an  amorphous ( पारदर्शी ) और as a semi-crystalline पॉलिमर  .
The semicrystalline material might appear transparent ( particle size < 500 nm ) or opaque and white ( particle size up to a few microns )  depending on इसके क्रिस्टल ढांचा और कण आकार .
Its monomer ( bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate )  can be synthesized by the esterification प्रतिक्रिया between terephthalic एसिड और  ethylene glycol with water as a byproduct , or by transesterification reaction between ethylene glycol and dimethyl terephthalate with methanol as a byproduct .
Polymerization is through a polycondensation  प्रतिक्रिया of the monomers ( किया तत्काल बाद  esterification/transesterification ) with water as the byproduct .
The majority of the world 's PET production is for synthetic fibers ( in  excess of 60 % ) , साथ बोतल उत्पादन हिसाब  for around 30 % of global demand .
In the context of textile  अनुप्रयोग , पालतु is referred to by इसके आम नाम , `` पॉलिएस्टर  , '' whereas the acronym `` PET '' is generally used in relation to packaging .
Polyester makes up about 18 % of world polymer production and is the  third-most-produced पॉलिमर ; polyethylene ( pe ) और polypropylene ( pp ) हैं  first and second , respectively .
पालतु consists of polymerized इकाई of  the monomer ethylene terephthalate , with repeating C10H8O4 units .
PET is commonly recycled , and has the  क्रमांक `` 1 '' as  its recycling symbol .
louisiana थी admitted to the संघ on अप्रैल  30 , 1812 , and elects senators to Classes 2 and Class 3 .

Black pudding , blood pudding or blood  सॉसेज is a प्रकार of सॉसेज बना by कुकिंग रक्त or सूखी  blood with a filler until it is thick enough to congeal when cooled .
The dish exists in various cultures  इससे एशिया to यूरोपीय  and the Americas .
Pig ,  चौपायों , शीप , बतख , और बकरी रक्त can be प्रयुक्त  depending on different countries .
In Europe and the Americas ,  ठेठ fillers शामिल  meat , fat , suet , bread , cornmeal , sweet potato , onion , chestnuts , barley , and oatmeal .
In Spain  , पुर्तगाल और  Asia , potato is often replaced by rice .
Stakeholder  may refer  to:
Stakeholder ( corporate ) , a person , group , organization , member or system who affects  or can be प्रभावित by an संगठन  's actions
Stakeholder ,  an एंटिटी कि can be प्रभावित by the  results of that in which they are said to be stakeholders , i.e. , that in which they have a stake .
Project stakeholder , a person , group or organization  साथ an ब्याज in a प्रोजेक्ट
Stakeholder theory , a theory that identifies and models the  समूह जिससे हैं हितधारकों  of a corporation or project
Stakeholder  विश्लेषण , the प्रक्रम of identifying  those affected by a project or event
Stakeholder ( law ) , a third party who temporarily holds money or  प्रॉपर्टी जबकि इसके मालिक is स्टिल होने  determined
Jack Smight ( March 9 , 1925 - September 1 , 2003 ) was an American  थिएटर और फिल्मी निदेशक .
Smight was born in Minneapolis ,  मिनेसोटा और गई to  school with future actor Peter Graves .
His film credits include The Traveling Executioner , Rabbit , Run , Loving Couples , Midway , Harper , Airport 1975  , फटकार alley और the एमी पुरस्कार -winning एडी , as खूब as अनेक एपीसोड of टेलीविज़न श्रेणी ऐसे as the गोधूलि  Zone and The Alfred Hitchcock Hour .
He also directed the 1960 Broadway play  the 49th cousin और रचित the म्यूज़िक लिये the फिल्मी adaption of  Roll of Thunder Hear My Cry .
smight died इससे कर्कट  in Los Angeles , California .
Dmitri Ivanovich Mendeleev ( ; 8  फ़रवरी 1834 – 2 फ़रवरी 1907 o.s .  27 January 1834 – 20 January 1907 ) was a Russian chemist and inventor .
He formulated the Periodic Law , created his own version of the  आवधिक तालिका of तत्व , और प्रयुक्त it to सही the गुण of कुछ already खोजा तत्व  and also to predict the properties of elements yet to be discovered !
Modesto ( Spanish for `` modest '' ) , officially the City of Modesto , is the county seat  और largest नगर of stanislaus काउंटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , United States .
With a population of  लगभग 201,165 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी , modesto  ranks as the 18th largest city in the state of California .
the modesto जनसांख्यिकी काउंटी प्रभाग  , which includes the cities of Ceres and Riverbank , has a population of 312,842 as of 2010 .
Modesto is located in the central valley area of Northern California , 90 miles north of Fresno , 92 miles east of San Francisco ,  68 मील दक्षिण of the राज्य पूंजी of sacramento , 66 मील वेस्ट of yosemite नेशनल पार्क , और 24 मील दक्षिण of स्टॉकटन  .
Modesto , a 29-time Tree City USA honoree , is surrounded by rich farmland ,  lending to a रैंकिंग लिये the काउंटी as  6th among all California counties in farm production .
Led  by मिल्क , बादाम , मुर्गियों , अखरोट , और मकई साइलेज , the काउंटी  grossed nearly $ 3.1 billion in agricultural production in 2011 .
Modesto was  immortalized in the 1973 जार्ज लुकास फिल्मी  American Graffiti .
The award winning film captured the  स्पिरिट of `` cruising '' और दोस्ती on 10th और 11th गलियों in 1962 और led to the पुनरुद्धार of  1950 's nostalgia that included the TV show Happy Days and the other spin-offs .
Ron Howard ,  हैरिसन  Ford and Richard Dreyfuss starred in the film .
The soundtrack was a  विशाल कामयाबी  .
Director  जार्ज लुकास is a देशी of modesto  , graduating from Downey High School in 1962 .
The Gallup-Healthways Well-Being  अनुक्रमणिका लिये 2011 , जिससे साक्षात्कार 1,000 भागीदार रोज़ और asks individuals  to assess their jobs , finances , physical health , emotional state of mind and communities , ranked Modesto 126 out of the 190 cities surveyed .
In December 2009 ,  फोर्ब्स क्रमित modesto 48th आउट of 100 among  `` Best Bang-for-the-Buck Cities '' .
In this ranking , Modesto ranked 8th in housing affordability  और सफर समय लकिन भी क्रमित 86th in जॉब भविष्यवाणी  growth and 99th in foreclosures .
Independence Day , commonly known as the Fourth of July , is a federal holiday in the United States  commemorating the अपनाना of the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता on जुलाई 4  , 1776 , declaring independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain .
Independence Day is commonly associated with fireworks , parades , barbecues , carnivals , fairs , picnics , concerts , baseball games , family reunions , and political speeches and ceremonies , in addition to various other public and private  कार्यक्रम celebrating the इतिहास , सरकारी , और परंपराओं of the संयुक्त राज्य  .
Independence Day is the national day  of the संयुक्त राज्य  .
A gender symbol  denotes the sex of an सजीव  or characterizes an agent by gender .
The two standard gender symbols denoting male ♂ and female ♀ are derived from  astrological प्रतीकों , denoting the शास्त्रीय ग्रह मंगल और शुक्र  , respectively .
These symbols have been in use since the  पुनर्जागरण भी denoting तत्व in alchemy , specifically the धातुओं  iron and copper .
They were first used to denote the effective  लिंग of पौधे ( i.e . sex of व्यक्तिगत in a दिए crossbreed , चूंकि सबसे पौधे  are hermaphroditic ) by Carolus Linnaeus in 1751 .
A leasehold estate is an ownership of a temporary  सही to थाम जमीन or प्रॉपर्टी in जिससे  a lessee or a tenant holds rights of real property by some form of title from a lessor or landlord .
Although a tenant does hold rights to  रियल प्रॉपर्टी , a leasehold एस्टेट is typically माना  personal property .
Leasehold is a form of land tenure or property tenure where one party buys the right to  occupy जमीन or a भवन लिये a दिए लंबाई  of time .
As lease is a legal estate , leasehold  एस्टेट can be खरीदा और  sold on the open market .
A leasehold thus differs from a freehold or fee simple where the ownership of a property is purchased outright and thereafter held for an indeterminate length of time , and  भी differs इससे a tenancy जहाँ a प्रॉपर्टी is let ( rented ) on a आवधिक आधार ऐसे  as weekly or monthly .
Until the end of the lease period ( often measured in decades or centuries ; a 99 year lease  is काफी आम ) the leaseholder रै the सही to remain in occupation as an assured  tenant paying an agreed rent to the owner .
Terms of the  अनुबंध हैं contained in a पट्टे , जिससे  has elements of contract and property law intertwined .
The term estate for  सालो may occasionally be प्रयुक्त  .
This refers to a leasehold estate  लिये कोई विशिष्ट काल of समय  ( the word `` years '' is misleading ) .
An estate for years is not  automatically  renewed .
colloquially , `` पट्टे '' और `` पट्टे `` हैं प्रायः a formalization of a longer  , specific period as compared with a `` rental '' that created a tenancy at will , terminable or renewable at the end of a short period .
Olivia ( also known as  स्वागत to the संसार of the सुअर ओलिविया ) is a british-american children 's एनिमेटेड  television series produced by media company Chorion and based on Ian Falconer 's books .
it is देखी on उपनाम  Jr. in the US , Milkshake !
, Nick Jr. in the UK and Ireland , and Disney Junior in Latin America  और ब्राज़ील , treehouse  TV in Canada .
The show has won  a चांदी अभिभावक ' चुनाव  Award for its positive story lines and characters .
Location of Panama  between प्रशांत ( नीचे ) और caribbean  ( top ) , with canal at top center
The Panama Canal ( ) is a ship canal in Panama that connects the Atlantic Ocean ( via the  caribbean समुद्र ) to the प्रशांत समंदर  .
The canal  कटौती आरपार the isthmus of पनामा  and is a key conduit for international maritime trade .
There are locks at each end to lift ships up to  gatun झील ( ऊपर sea-level  ) .
Gatun Lake was created to  reduce the राशि of कार्य  required for the canal .
The  वर्तमान ताले  are wide .
A third ,  wider लेन  of locks is being built .
France began work on the  कनाल in 1881 , लकिन था to रोकें  because of engineering problems and high mortality due to disease .
The United States ( US ) later took  over  the project and took a decade to complete the canal in 1914 , enabling ships to avoid the lengthy Cape Horn route around the southernmost tip of South America ( via the Drake Passage ) or to navigate the Strait of Magellan .
One of the largest and most difficult engineering projects ever undertaken , the Panama Canal shortcut made it possible for  जहाजों to सफर between the अटलांटिक और  Pacific Oceans in half the time previously required .
The shorter , faster , safer route  to the us वेस्ट coast और to राष्ट्र in और साथ the प्रशांत समंदर  allowed those places to become more integrated with the world economy .
दौरान इस समय , स्वामित्व of the territory  that is now the Panama Canal was first Colombian , then French , and then American ; the United States completed the construction .
The canal was taken over in 1999 by  the panamanian सरकारी  , as long planned .
Annual traffic has risen from about 1,000 ships when the canal opened in 1914 , to 14,702 vessels in 2008 , the latter  measuring a कुल of 309.6 लाख पनामा canal/universal मापन  System ( PC/UMS ) tons .
By 2008 , more than 815,000 vessels had passed  through the कनाल , अनेक of उन्हें much larger than the असली planners could have envisioned ; the largest जहाजों  that can transit the canal today are called Panamax .
The American Society of Civil Engineers has named the  पनामा कनाल एक of the सात चमत्कार of  the modern world .
Benjamin Franklin ( April 17 , 1790 ) was one of the Founding  fathers of the संयुक्त राज्य  .
A noted polymath , Franklin was  a अग्रणी लेखक , मुद्रक , राजनैतिक theorist , राजनेता  , postmaster , scientist , musician , inventor , satirist , civic activist , statesman , and diplomat .
As a scientist , he was a major figure in the American Enlightenment and  the इतिहास of भौतिकी लिये उसके discoveries और theories regarding  electricity .
He  invented the बिजली  rod , bifocals , the Franklin stove , a carriage odometer , and the glass 'armonica ' .
He facilitated many civic  संगठन , सहित a  fire department and a university .
Franklin  अर्जित the शीर्षक of `` the पहला अमरीकी '' लिये उसके जल्दी और indefatigable campaigning लिये औपनिवेशिक एकता ; as an लेखक और प्रवक्ता  in London for several colonies , then as the first United States Ambassador to France , he exemplified the emerging American nation .
Franklin was foundational in defining the American ethos as a marriage of the practical values of thrift , hard work , education , community spirit , self-governing institutions , and opposition to authoritarianism both political  और धार्मिक , साथ the वैज्ञानिक और सहिष्णु मान of the आत्मज्ञान .
In the words of historian Henry Steele Commager , `` In a Franklin could be merged the virtues of Puritanism without its defects ,  the illumination of the आत्मज्ञान  without its heat . ''
To Walter Isaacson , this makes Franklin `` the most accomplished American of his age and the most  influential in inventing the प्रकार of समाज  America would become . ''
Franklin , always proud of his working class roots , became a successful newspaper editor  और मुद्रक in फिलाडेल्फिया , the अग्रणी  city in the colonies .
He was also partners with William Goddard and  जोसेफ गैलोवे the तीन of जिसको प्रकाशित the पेन्सिलवेनिया वृत्तान्त  , a newspaper that was known for its revolutionary sentiments and criticisms of the British monarchy in the American colonies .
He became wealthy publishing Poor Richard  's almanack और the पेन्सिलवेनिया  Gazette .
Franklin gained international renown as a scientist for his  प्रसिद्ध प्रयोग in विद्युत और लिये उसके  many inventions , especially the lightning rod .
He played a major role in establishing the University of  पेन्सिलवेनिया और थी निर्वाचित the पहला अध्यक्ष of the अमरीकी  Philosophical Society .
Franklin became a national hero in America when  he पथप्रदर्शन the  effort to have Parliament repeal the unpopular Stamp Act .
An  संपन्नता राजनयिक , he थी widely admired among the फ्रेंच  as American minister to Paris and was a major figure in the development of positive Franco-American relations .
For many years he was  the अंग्रेजों postmaster लिये the  colonies , which enabled him to set up the first national communications network .
He was active in community  अफेयर्स , औपनिवेशिक और राज्य राजनीती , as खूब  as national and international affairs .
From 1785 to 1788  , he परोसा as राज्यपाल  of Pennsylvania .
Toward the end of his  जीवन , he freed उसके स्लेव और became एक  of the most prominent abolitionists .
His colorful life and legacy of scientific and political achievement , and  औकात as एक of अमेरिका 's सबसे influential founding fathers , have देखी फ्रैंकलिन सम्मानित on coinage और धन  ; warships ; the names of many towns , counties , educational institutions , namesakes , and companies ; and more than two centuries after his death , countless cultural references .
Criminal Minds is an American police  प्रक्रियात्मक टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम कि premiered  September 22 , 2005 , on CBS .
The series follows a team of profilers from the FBI 's Behavioral  विश्लेषण ईकाई ( bau ) आधारित in क्वांटिको , वर्जिनिया  .
The BAU is part of the FBI National Center for the  विश्लेषण of हिंसक अपराधों  .
The show differs from many procedural  dramas by focusing on प्रोफाइलिंग the दण्ड , बल्कि  than the crime itself .
The show is produced by The Mark Gordon  कम्पनी in संघ साथ सीबीएस टेलीविज़न studios ( originally सर्वोपरि संजाल टेलीविज़न  then CBS Paramount Network Television ) and ABC Studios ( originally Touchstone Television ) .
CBS  घोषित in अक्तूबर 2009  that Legacy Interactive would develop a video game based on the show .
the खेल होता आवश्यकता खिलाड़ी to जाँचें  crime scenes for clues to help solve murder mysteries .
The interactive puzzle game was released in  2012 , लकिन किया नहीं विशेषता कोई of the आवाज़ें of the दिखाएँ 's डाल , nor थी the डाल शामिल  with the project .
On March 14 , 2012 , CBS renewed Criminal Minds for an  आठवीं ऋतु , जिससे premiered on सितंबर  26 , 2012 .
``  heart-shaped बक्सा '' is a सोंग by the अमरीकी  grunge band Nirvana , written by vocalist and guitarist Kurt Cobain .
The song was  released as the पहला सिंगल इससे the  group 's third and final studio album , In Utero , in 1993 .
It was one of two songs from  the एल्बम मिश्रित by स्कॉट litt  in order to augment the original production by producer Steve Albini .
While Nirvana 's label DGC Records did not release a physical single  लिये बिक्री in the संयुक्त राज्य , `` heart-shaped बक्सा  '' received much American radio airplay , reaching number one on the Billboard Modern Rock Tracks chart .
The international release of the  सिंगल पहुँचे क्रमांक पाँच on the uk singles  Chart .
The  सोंग 's म्यूज़िक वीडियो ,  directed by Anton Corbijn , garnered critical plaudits .
The orbital speed of a body , generally a planet , a natural satellite , an artificial satellite , or a multiple star , is the speed at which it  orbits around the barycenter of a प्रणाली , प्रायः around a अधिक विशाल देह  .
It can be used to refer to either the mean orbital speed , the average speed as it  completes an कक्षा , or instantaneous कक्षीय गति ,  the speed at a particular point in its orbit .
The orbital speed at any position in the orbit can be computed from the distance to the central body at that position , and the specific  कक्षीय उर्जा , जिससे is स्वतंत्र of स्थिति : the गतिज उर्जा  is the total energy minus the potential energy .
भूरा राजमहल आंतरिक  and Atrium
Brown  राजमहल होटल is the second-oldest ऑपरेटिंग होटल  in Denver , Colorado and is one of the first atrium-style hotel ever built .
It is now  संचालित by कोरम  Hotels and Resorts .
It was built in 1892 , one year later than  the ऑक्सफोर्ड होटल  .
It was named for its original owner , Henry C. Brown , and was  designed साथ इसके विषम triangular आकार by  architect Frank Edbrooke .
The hotel is located at 321 17th St , Denver , CO between  17th गली , ब्रॉडवे और tremont street/pl in शहर डेनवर पीछे the गणतंत्र  Plaza .
The main entrance  द्वार is on tremont गली  .
DVD-Video is a consumer video format used to store digital video on DVD discs , and is  फिलहाल the प्रबल उपभोक्ता वीडियो स्वरूप in एशिया , उत्तर  America , Europe , and Australia .
Discs using the DVD-Video  specification आवश्यकता a dvd ड्राइव और an h.262/mpeg-2 भाग  2 decoder ( e.g. , a DVD player , or a computer DVD drive with a software DVD player ) .
Commercial DVD movies are encoded using a combination  of h.262/mpeg-2 भाग 2 संपीडित वीडियो और ऑडियो of varying स्वरुप ( प्रायः  multi-channel formats as described below ) .
typically , the आंकड़ा रेट लिये dvd फिल्मों सीमाएँ इससे  3 Mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s , and the bit rate is usually adaptive .
It was first  उपलब्धियाँ लिये  retail around 1997 .
The DVD-Video specification was created by DVD Forum and can be obtained from DVD  format/logo लाइसेंसिंग निगम लिये a शुल्क of $ 5,000  .
The specification is not  सरेआम उपलब्धियाँ , क्युकी प्रत्येक सदस्य जरूर चिह्न a non-disclosure  agreement .
Certain information in the DVD  किताब is मालिकाना और गोपनीय  .
The nautical  मील ( प्रतीक m , nm or nmi ) is a ईकाई of लंबाई  that is about one minute of arc of latitude measured along any meridian , or about one minute of arc of longitude at the equator .
By  अंतरराष्ट्रीय अनुबंध it रै महरूम नियत at  1,852 metres exactly ( about 6,076 feet ) .
It is a non- SI unit ( although accepted for use in the International System of Units by the BIPM ) used especially by navigators  in the शिपिंग और विमानन उद्योग , और  also in polar exploration .
It is commonly  प्रयुक्त in अंतरराष्ट्रीय विधि और  treaties , especially regarding the limits of territorial waters .
It developed from the sea mile and the related  भौगोलिक मील .
The nautical mile remains in use by sea  और एयर navigators विश्वव्यापी क्युकी of  its convenience when working with charts .
Most nautical charts use the Mercator projection whose scale varies by about a  फ़ैक्टर of छह इससे the equator to 80° अक्षांश  , so charts covering large areas can not use a single linear scale .
The nautical mile is nearly equal to a minute of latitude on a chart , so a distance measured with a chart divider can be  roughly परिवर्तित to nautical मील using  the chart 's latitude scale .
shippensburg is a बरो in कम्बरलैंड  and Franklin counties in the U.S. state of Pennsylvania .
Settled in  1730 , shippensburg झूठ in the कम्बरलैंड घाटी , 41 मील ( 66 km ) west-southwest  of Harrisburg , and is part of the Harrisburg– Carlisle Metropolitan Statistical Area .
In 1900 , 3,228 people lived there ;  in 1910 , 3,457 ; और in 1940 , 5,244  people lived there .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 5,492  at the 2010 census .
shippensburg थी incorporated as a  borough on January 21 , 1819 .
In the past , there were furniture factories , engine and pump works , and other  औद्योगिक works स्तिथ भीतर  the town .
Shippensburg is also the home of The Beistle Company , the oldest and largest manufacturer of  सजावट और पार्टी goods , जिससे बिकता इसके distinctive मधुकोश पेपर सजावट  worldwide .
It is also the location of  pague और fegan , the oldest लगातार  operated hardware store in Pennsylvania .
In May 2012 ,  वोल्वो निर्माण उपकरण began  a $ 100 million expansion project to bring its American headquarters to Shippensburg .
Shippensburg is also home to Shippensburg University of Pennsylvania ,  एक of 14 विश्वविद्यालयों of the पेन्सिलवेनिया राज्य प्रणाली of उच्चतर  Education .
Yearly the last full  सप्ताह of जुलाई , the shippensburg जातियाँ  Fair is held .
Begun in 1958 , the fair  बिल्स itself as पेन्सिलवेनिया 's largest bi-county  fair .
The fair includes agricultural exhibits , a craft show ,  खाना विक्रेता , और कार्निवल  rides amongst other things .
Every summer on the last Saturday of August , Shippensburg holds the Corn  पर्व , an इवेंट कि brings क्षेत्रीय शिल्पकार और विक्रेता  to operate stands downtown .
The downtown is closed to traffic  लिये at तनिक 5 ब्लॉक  for most of the day .
Average attendance at the festival  is अनुमानित at 60,000  - 70,000 each year .
Black hairy tongue ( BHT , also termed lingua villosa  nigra ) refers to a कंडीशन of the जीभ जहाँ  the filiform papillae elongate with black or brown discoloration , giving a black and hairy appearance .
The appearance may be alarming , but it  is a हानिरहित कंडीशन  .
Predisposing factors include smoking ,  xerostomia ( शुष्क मुँह ) , नरम आहार , ग़रीब मौखिक hygiene और  certain medications .
Management is by improving  मौखिक hygiene , विशेषकर  scraping or brushing the tongue .
The  आईईईई 1394 इंटरफ़ेस is a सीरियल बस इंटरफ़ेस  standard for high-speed communications and isochronous real-time data transfer .
It was developed  in the लेट 1980s और जल्दी 1990s  by Apple , who called it FireWire .
The 1394  इंटरफ़ेस is comparable to usb , और  often those two technologies are considered together , though USB has more market share .
Apple first included FireWire in some of its  1999 मॉडल , और सबसे ठहराना कंप्यूटर चूंकि the साल 2000 have शामिल firewire पोर्ट  , though , as of 2013 , nothing beyond the 800 version ( IEEE-1394b ) .
The interface is also known by the brand  i.link ( सोनी ) , और लिंक्स ( टेक्सास  Instruments ) .
IEEE 1394 replaced parallel SCSI in many  अनुप्रयोग , क्युकी of निम्नतर  implementation costs and a simplified , more adaptable cabling system .
The 1394 standard  भी defines a backplane इंटरफ़ेस  , though this is not as widely used .
IEEE 1394 is the High-Definition Audio-Video Network  गठबंधन ( हाना ) मानक कनेक्शन इंटरफ़ेस लिये a/v ( audio/visual  ) component communication and control .
FireWire is also available in wireless , fiber  ऑप्टिक , और समाक्षीय संस्करण using  the isochronous protocols .
स्टीफन `` स्टीवी '' रे vaughan ( अक्तूबर 3 , 1954 – अगस्त  27 , 1990 ) was an American guitarist , singer-songwriter , and record producer .
Often  referred to by उसके आद्याक्षर srv  , Vaughan is best known as a founding member and leader of Double Trouble .
Together with drummer Chris  layton और bassist टॉमी शैनन , वे ignited  the blues revival of the 1980s .
With a career spanning seven years , Vaughan and  दोगुना ट्रबल consistently बेची आउट कॉन्सर्ट जबकि उनके  albums frequently went gold .
He was born and  उठाया in डलास , टेक्सास , और लिये a  short period of time lived in Graham , Texas .
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan , Vaughan started playing  the गिटार at आयु सात और formed  several bands that occasionally performed in local nightclubs .
At age 17 , he dropped out of high  स्कूल और स्थानांतरित to ऑस्टिन to further  pursue his musical career , joining groups such as Krackerjack , the Nightcrawlers , and the Cobras .
In 1977 , he formed Triple Threat Revue , a band that eventually  विकसित into दोगुना ट्रबल और regularly  performed around Austin .
In 1982 , Vaughan and Double Trouble performed at the  montreux जैज़ पर्व in स्विट्ज़रलैंड , catching  the attention of musicians David Bowie and Jackson Browne .
Bowie asked Vaughan to  खेल on उसके आगामी स्टुडियो एल्बम let 's नृत्य , जबकि browne offered the बैंड  free use of his personal studio in Los Angeles to record an album .
In March 1983 , Vaughan and Double Trouble were signed to Epic Records by veteran record producer John  हैमंड sr. और released उनके डेब्यू एल्बम , टेक्सास  Flood in June of that year .
After  कामयाब touring , the समूह released the एल्बम , could n't स्टैंड  the Weather ( 1984 ) and Soul to Soul ( 1985 ) , the latter of which featured new keyboardist Reese Wynans .
Although his career had progressed  सफलतापूर्वक , vaughan checked into a पुनर्वास हॉस्पिटल in  Atlanta , Georgia to give up a cocaine and alcohol habit and returned to touring with the band .
In June 1989 , In  कदम थी released और  earned them a Grammy Award for Best Contemporary Blues Performance .
On  अगस्त 27 , 1990 , vaughan थी मारे  in a helicopter crash following a performance in East Troy , Wisconsin .
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet intense style  थी निकला इससे a किस्में of musical जाति  .
He was influenced  by ब्लूज़ संगीतकारों सहित अल्बर्ट किंग , फ्रेडी किंग , ओटिस फटाफट , और muddy waters ,  and rock guitarists such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack .
His  गिटार playing reflected the  classic blues and pentatonic scales .
He has received wide critical  मान्यता लिये उसके गिटार playing , रैंकिंग at # 6 on रोलिंग पत्थरों सूची  of `` 100 Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011 .
He was  मरणोपरांत inducted into the ब्लूज़ हॉल of कीर्ति in 2000  and a memorial statue was erected in Austin 's Auditorium Shores park .
Stevie Ray Vaughan is widely considered to be one of the greatest  संगीतकारों to आइये इससे the राज्य  of Texas .
GigE  redirects  here .
For the camera  प्रोटोकॉल , देखिए  GigE vision .
In computer networking ,  gigabit ईथरनेट ( gbe or 1 gige ) is a पद describing विभिन्न technologies लिये transmitting  Ethernet frames at a rate of a gigabit per second ( 1,000,000,000 bits per second ) , as defined by the IEEE 802.3-2008 standard .
It came into use beginning in 1999 , gradually  supplanting तेज़ ईथरनेट in तार लोकल संजाल ,  where it performed considerably faster .
The cables and equipment are very similar  to पिछला मानकों और यहूद  very common and economical by 2010 .
Half-duplex gigabit links connected  through hubs हैं अनुमत by the specification  , but full-duplex usage with switches is much more common .
Intel  pro/1000 gt पीसीआई  network interface card
The main components of a  stamp:
1 .  चित्र
2 .  perforations
3 .  denomination
4  . देश  name
A postage stamp  is a छोटी टुकड़ा of पेपर  that is purchased and displayed on an item of mail as evidence of payment of postage .
Typically , stamps are made from special paper  , साथ a नेशनल नामांकन और denomination ( दाम )  on the face , and a gum adhesive on the reverse side .
Postage stamps are purchased from a postal administration or other authorized vendor and are  प्रयुक्त to अदा लिये the लागत शामिल in चलती मेल as खूब as अन्य कारोबार necessities ऐसे as बीमे और पंजीकरण  .
the stamp’s आकार is प्रायः कि of a छोटी आयताकार of varying  proportions , though triangles or other shapes are occasionally used .
The stamp is affixed to an  लिफाफा or अन्य डाक कवर ( i.e. , पैकेट , बक्सा , mailing  cylinder ) that the customer wishes to send .
The item is then processed by the postal system , where a  postmark , sometimes ज्ञात as a रद्दीकरण  mark , is usually applied over the stamp and cover ; this procedure marks the stamp as used , which prevents its reuse .
The postmark indicates the date and  पाइंट of उत्पत्ति of the mailing  .
The mailed item is then  वितरित to the पता  that the customer has applied to the envelope or cover .
Postage stamps  have facilitated the डिलीवरी of  mail since the 1840s .
Before this time , ink and hand-stamps ( hence the word 'stamp ' ) ,  प्रायः बना इससे लकडी or कॉर्क , यहूद प्रायः  used to frank the mail and confirm the payment of postage .
The first  चिपकने postage स्टैम्प , commonly referred to  as the Penny Black , was issued in the United Kingdom in 1840 .
The invention of the stamp was a part of the attempt to reform and improve the postal system in the United Kingdom of Great  ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड , जिससे in the जल्दी 19th सदी  was in disarray and rife with corruption .
There are varying accounts of the  आविष्कारक or आविष्कारक of the  stamp .
Before the introduction  of postage stamps , मेल in the uk थी सशुल्क लिये by the प्राप्तकर्ता , a प्रणाली कि थी संबद्ध साथ an irresolvable प्रॉब्लम : the लागत of delivering  mail were not recoverable by the postal service when recipients were unable or unwilling to pay for delivered items , and senders had no incentive to restrict the number , size , or weight of items sent , whether or not they would ultimately be paid for .
The postage stamp resolved this issue in a simple and elegant manner , with  the अतिरिक्त लाभ of रूम लिये an तत्व of सौंदर्य to be  introduced .
Later related inventions include postal stationery such as  prepaid-postage लिफाफे  , post cards , lettercards , aerogrammes and wrappers , postage meters , and , more recently , specialty boxes and envelopes provided free to the customer by the U.S. postal service for priority or express mailing .
The postage stamp afforded  convenience लिये दोनो the मेलर और डाक officials , अधिक efficiently  recovered costs for the postal service , and ultimately resulted in a better , faster postal system .
With the  conveniences stamps  offered , their use resulted in greatly increased mailings during the 19th and 20th centuries .
Postage stamps during this era were the most popular way of paying for mail , but by the end  of the 20th सदी यहूद rapidly होने आत by the उपयोग of metered postage और बल्क mailing  by businesses . )
The same result with respect to communications by private parties occurred over the  पिछला दशक of the 20th सदी और the पहला दशक of the 21st due to घटती लागत of long  distance telephone communications and the development and explosive spread of electronic mailing ( `` e-mail '' via the Internet ) and bill paying systems had .
As postage stamps with their  engraved imagery began to appear on a फैली  basis , historians and collectors began to take notice .
The study of postage stamps and their use is referred  to as philately  .
Stamp collecting can be  दोनो a शौक और a रूप of ऐतिहासिक पढ़ाई और सन्दर्भ , as government-issued postage stamps और उनके mailing  systems have always been involved with the history of nations .
The University of Alabama at Birmingham (  uab ) is a पब्लिक विश्वविद्यालयों in बर्मिंघम in the u.S.  state of Alabama .
Developing from an extension  बीच स्थापित in 1936 , the संस्था became an autonomous संस्था  in 1969 and is today one of three institutions in the University of Alabama System .
UAB  offers over 140 कार्यक्रम of पढ़ाई in 12 अकादमिक विभाजन  leading to bachelor 's , master 's , doctoral , and professional degrees in the social and behavioral sciences , the liberal arts , business , education , engineering , and health-related fields such as medicine , dentistry , optometry , nursing , and public health .
The school is highly renowned  लिये इसके चिकित्सा शोध और प्राकृतिक sciences कार्यक्रम  .
The UAB  स्वास्थ्य प्रणाली , एक of the largest अकादमिक  medical centers in the United States , is affiliated with the university .
UAB Hospital sponsors residency programs in  विभिन्न चिकित्सा specialties , सहित आतंरिक  medicine , neurology , surgery , radiology , and anesthesiology .
UAB Hospital  is the तभी acs सत्यापित स्तर i  trauma center in Alabama , as rated by the American College of Surgeons Trauma Program .
UAB is the state 's largest employer , with  अधिक than 18,000  faculty and staff and over 53,000 jobs at the university and in the health system .
An estimated 10 percent of the jobs in the Birmingham-Hoover Metropolitan Area and 1 in  33 कार्य in the राज्य of अलबामा हैं सीधे or  indirectly related to UAB .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों 's overall सालाना आर्थिक प्रभाव  was estimated to be $ 4.6 billion in 2010 .
In  the पतन of 2012 , the विश्वविद्यालयों of अलबामा at बर्मिंघम  enrolled 17,999 students from more than 110 countries , including 1,605 freshmen .
There are plans to commence with an `` aggressive '' growth in  नामांकन at  UAB .
The current UAB President  is dr. रे L. watts  .
Tofu , also called bean curd , is a food made by coagulating soy juice and then pressing  the resulting curds  into soft white blocks .
It is a component in  अनेक ईस्ट एशियाई और southeast  Asian cuisines .
There are many different varieties of tofu ,  सहित भैस टोफू और टोफू कि रै महरूम  processed in some way .
Tofu has a subtle flavor and can be used in  savory और मीठी बर्तन  .
It is  प्रायः seasoned or  marinated to suit the dish .
Tofu originated  in प्राचीन चीन  some 2,000 years ago .
Chinese legend ascribes its  आविष्कार to प्रिंस लियू an ( चाइनीज  : 劉安 Liú Ān , 179–122 BC ) .
Tofu and  इसके उत्पादन तकनीक यहूद introduced into कोरियाई  and then Japan during the Nara period .
It spread into  अन्य भाग of ईस्ट  Asia as well .
This spread likely  coincided साथ the स्प्रेड of buddhism क्युकी  it is an important source of protein in the vegetarian diet of East Asian Buddhism .
Li Shizhen in the  मिंग राजवंश वर्णित a विधि  of making tofu in Bencao Gangmu .
Tofu has a  कम कैलोरी गिनती , अपेक्षाकृत विशाल amounts  of protein , and little fat .
It is high in iron and  depending on the coagulant  used in manufacturing , may also be high in calcium and/or magnesium .
Bubbles ( born 1983 ) is a common chimpanzee , known for being the one-time pet of  अमरीकी रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार माइकल जैक्सन , जो खरीदा the primate इससे a टेक्सास  research facility in the early 1980s .
The animal was a frequent travel companion to the singer , whose attachment to the animal led to  मीडिया mockery और , among अन्य कारकों , to a पब्लिक बोध of जैक्सन  as an eccentric .
During the Bad World Tour , for example ,  जैक्सन brought बुलबुले  with him to Japan , where they both drank tea with the mayor of Osaka .
Bubbles was initially kept at the  जैक्सन परिवार 's घर in encino , लॉस एंजिल्स , लकिन थी  moved to Neverland Ranch in 1988 .
There , he slept in a crib in Jackson 's bedroom , used the  सिंगर 's प्रसाधन , और ate कैंडी in the neverland  movie theater .
In 2003 the public learned that , like all captive chimpanzees ,  बुलबुले था matured into a विशाल और  aggressive adult chimp unsuitable as a companion animal .
He was sent to a California animal trainer  , जहाँ he थी reported to have  attempted suicide .
When the trainer shut down his operation in 2004 , Bubbles was  स्थानांतरित to the बीच लिये ग्रेट apes , a अभयारण्य in wauchula , फ्लोरिडा  , where he has lived since 2005 .
Muse are an  अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान बैंड इससे teignmouth  , Devon , which formed in 1994 .
The band consists of school friends Matthew Bellamy ( lead vocals , lead guitar , piano , keyboards , keytar ) ,  क्रिस्टोफर wolstenholme ( बास , vocals , keyboards , लय गिटार , हार्मोनिका ) और डोमिनिक हावर्ड  ( drums , percussion , synthesisers , sampling ) .
Since the release of their 2006 album  ब्लैक छेद और खुलासे , keyboardist और percussionist  Morgan Nicholls has performed live with the band .
Muse are known for their energetic and extravagant live  प्रदर्शन और उनके संलयन of अनेक म्यूज़िक जाति , सहित स्पेस चट्टान  , progressive rock , alternative rock , heavy metal , classical music and electronica .
Muse have released six studio albums :  showbiz ( 1999 ) , उत्पत्ति of सममिति ( 2001 ) , absolution  ( 2003 ) , Black Holes and Revelations ( 2006 ) , The Resistance ( 2009 ) and The 2nd Law ( 2012 ) .
They have  भी जारी तीन सजीव एल्बम , hullabaloo साउंडट्रैक ( 2002 ) , जिससे is भी a संकलन  of B-sides , Absolution Tour ( 2005 ) , and HAARP ( 2008 ) , which documents the band 's performances at Wembley Stadium in 2007 .
Black Holes and Revelations earned the band a Mercury Prize nomination and a third place finish in the NME  एल्बम of the साल सूची लिये 2006  .
Muse have also won a collection of music awards  throughout उनके इतिहास , सहित पाँच एमटीवी यूरोपीय म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार , छह q पुरस्कार , आठ nme पुरस्कार , दो ब्रिट पुरस्कार  —winning `` Best British Live Act '' twice , an MTV Video Music Award , four Kerrang !
पुरस्कार और an  American Music Award .
They were also nominated for  पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , of जिससे वे जीती बेहतरीन  Rock Album , for their fifth studio album The Resistance ( 2009 ) .
Muse have  बेची over 15 लाख एल्बम  worldwide .
Bloemfontein ( , ; Dutch for ``  फव्वारा of पुष्प '' ) is the पूंजी नगर of the फ़्री राज्य प्रांत of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी ; और , as  the judicial capital of the nation , one of South Africa 's three national capitals – the other two being Cape Town , the legislative capital , and Pretoria , the administrative capital .
Bloemfontein is popularly and  poetically ज्ञात as `` the नगर of गुलाब `` ,  owing to the abundance of these flowers and the annual rose festival held there .
The  नगर 's sesotho नाम is mangaung , अर्थ `` प्लेस of cheetahs  `` and it has been included in the Mangaung Local Municipality since 2000 .
bloemfontein is situated on शुष्क  grassland at , at an altitude of above sea level .
The  नगर is घर to 369,568 निवासियों , जबकि the  Mangaung Local Municipality has a population of 645,455 .
Where  do we आइये  From ?
What  हैं we  ?
Where Are We  going  ?
One of Post-Impressionist Paul  gauguin 's सबसे प्रसिद्ध paintings  .
The meaning of life is a philosophical question concerning the  significance of जीवन or अस्तित्व in सामान्य  .
It can also be expressed in different forms , such as `` Why are we here ? `` , ``  कया is जीवन सब परिचय ? `` , और `` कया is the purpose  of existence ? ''
It has been the subject of much philosophical ,  वैज्ञानिक , और theological अटकलें  throughout history .
There have been a large number of proposed answers to these  सवाल इससे अनेक अलग सांस्कृतिक और वैचारिक  backgrounds .
The meaning of life is in the  philosophical और धार्मिक conceptions of अस्तित्व , सोशल ties , चेतना , और सुख , और सीमायें  on many other issues , such as symbolic meaning , ontology , value , purpose , ethics , good and evil , free will , the existence of one or multiple Gods , conceptions of God , the soul , and the afterlife .
Scientific contributions focus primarily on describing related empirical facts about the universe ,  exploring the कॉन्टेक्स्ट और पैरामीटर्स concerning  the 'how ' of life .
Science also studies and can provide  सुझाव लिये the pursuit of well-being  and a related conception of morality .
An  वैकल्पिक , humanistic दृष्टिकोण मुद्राएँ the  question `` What is the meaning of my life ? ''
The value of  the सवाल pertaining to the purpose of जीवन may coincide साथ the उपलब्धि  of ultimate reality , or a feeling of oneness , or even a feeling of sacredness .
Family Guy creator Seth MacFarlane also provides  the आवाज़ें of पीटर griffin , stewie griffin  , Brian Griffin , and Glenn Quagmire .
Family Guy is an American animated sitcom that features five main  आवाज़ अभिनेताओं , और numerous नियमित डाल और पुनरावर्ती  guest stars .
The principal voice cast consists of show creator Seth MacFarlane , Alex Borstein , Seth Green ,  mila kunis ( जो replaced लेसी chabert बाद  the first season ) and Mike Henry and now , the new actor Beau Osborne .
Recurring voice actors include Patrick Warburton , Adam West  , जॉन G. ब्रेनन , निकोल सुलीवान और जेनिफर tilly , और repeat  guest stars include Phyllis Diller , Charles Durning , Rush Limbaugh , and Phil LaMarr .
Many cast members  provide आवाज़ें  for multiple characters .
The voice actors , in  portraying the विभिन्न अक्षर personalities  on the show , draw inspiration from celebrities and pop culture .
Family Guy characters  have महरूम निभाई by अधिक than एक कर्ता , बाद  members of the show left the series or had conflicting obligations .
Kunis was nominated  लिये an एनी पुरस्कार लिये voicing मेग griffin in the ऋतु 5 एपीसोड `` मुश्किल विधिक `` और macfarlane  has also won an Emmy Award for Outstanding Voice-Over Performance and an Annie Award for Best Voice Acting in an Animated Television Production , though no other cast member has won an award for their work on the series .
