`` The Princess and the Pea '' ( ; literal translation : `` The Princess on the Pea '' ) is a literary fairy tale by Hans Christian  andersen परिचय a यंग स्त्री जिनकी royal पहचान is स्थापित by  a test of her physical sensitivity .
the टेल थी पहला प्रकाशित साथ तीन  others by Andersen in an inexpensive booklet on 8 May 1835 in Copenhagen by C.A . Reitzel .
Andersen had heard the story as a child , and  it संभावित रै इसके सोर्स in लोक सामग्री , संभवतः originating  from Sweden as it is unknown in the Danish oral tradition .
Neither `` The Princess and the Pea '' nor  andersen 's अन्य किस्से of 1835 यहूद खूब प्राप्त by डैनिश आलोचकों ,  who disliked their casual , chatty style , and their lack of morals .
In  1959 `` the राजकुमारी और the मटर '' थी adapted to the musical  stage in a production called Once Upon a Mattress starring Carol Burnett .
जर्मनी अमेरिकी ( ) हैं नागरिकों of the संयुक्त  States who were either born in Germany or are of German ancestry .
They comprise about 50  लाख लोगों , बनाना उन्हें the largest ancestry समूह ahead  of Irish Americans , African Americans and English Americans .
They comprise  परिचय 1/3 of the जर्मनी diaspora  all over the world .
None of the German  राज्य था नई संसार colonies  .
Not until the 1670s did the first significant groups of German immigrants arrive in the British colonies ,  settling primarily in नई यॉर्क और पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
Immigration continued in very large numbers during the 19th century  , साथ कुछ आठ लाख आमद  from Germany .
वे यहूद खींचा by the आकर्षण of जमीन और  religious freedom , and pushed out of Europe by shortages of land and religious or political oppression .
Many arrived seeking religious or political freedom ,  अन्य लिये आर्थिक अवसर  greater than those in Europe , and others simply for the chance to start fresh in the New World .
The arrivals before 1850 were mostly farmers who sought out the most  उत्पादक जमीन , जहाँ उनके intensive खेती तकनीकों  would pay off .
After 1840 , many came to cities , where ``  germania '' —german-speaking districts—soon  emerged .
जर्मनी अमेरिकी स्थापित the पहला kindergartens  in the United States , introduced the Christmas tree tradition , and originated popular American foods such as hot dogs and hamburgers .
German American celebrations are held throughout the country , one of the most well-known being the  german-american steuben परेड in नई यॉर्क नगर , आयोजित प्रत्येक  third Saturday in September .
There are also major annual events in Chicago , Cincinnati , Milwaukee ,  पिट्सबर्ग , st. लुई और अन्य शहरों  .
Like many other immigrants that came to the United States , an  overwhelming क्रमांक of लोगों of जर्मनी or आंशिक जर्मनी descent have essentially  become Americanized .
The Preamble to the United States Constitution is  a ब्रैड परिचयात्मक बयान of the संविधान  's fundamental purposes and guiding principles .
It states in general terms , and courts have referred to it as  विश्वसनीय प्रमाण of , the founding fathers ' इरादों regarding the संविधान 's अर्थ और कया वे hoped the संविधान  would achieve as it pertains to all of the people of the United States .
As the phrase , ``  we the लोगों '' suggests कि the नई सरकारी originates इससे the लोगों of the संयुक्त राज्य और it सेट into  motion a question as it pertains to that vast population concerning the individual rights and equality among all people ; this can be seen most broadly in the divide between republicanism and social democracy .
The history of the Internet began with the  विकास of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कंप्यूटर in the  1950s .
The public was first introduced to the concepts that would lead to the  अंतरजाल जब a संदेश थी भेजा over the arpanet इससे कंप्यूटर विज्ञान प्राध्यापक लियोनार्ड kleinrock 's प्रयोगशाला at विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया , लॉस एंजिल्स ( ucla  ) , after the second piece of network equipment was installed at Stanford Research Institute ( SRI ) .
Packet switched networks such as ARPANET , Mark I at NPL in the UK , CYCLADES , Merit  संजाल , tymnet , और telenet , यहूद विकसित in the लेट 1960s  and early 1970s using a variety of protocols .
The ARPANET in particular led to the development of protocols for  internetworking , in जिससे अनेक पृथक संजाल could be joined साथ into  a network of networks .
In 1982 , the Internet protocol suite ( TCP/IP ) was standardized , and consequently , the  अवधारणा of a world-wide संजाल  of interconnected TCP/IP networks , called the Internet , was introduced .
Access to the ARPANET was expanded in 1981 when the National Science Foundation ( NSF ) developed the Computer Science Network ( CSNET ) and again in 1986 when NSFNET provided  अभिगम to महासंगणक साइट in the संयुक्त राज्य इससे शोध और  education organizations .
Commercial Internet service providers ( ISPs ) began to emerge  in the लेट 1980s और  early 1990s .
The ARPANET was  decommissioned  in 1990 .
The Internet was commercialized in 1995  जब nsfnet थी decommissioned , निकालना  the last restrictions on the use of the Internet to carry commercial traffic .
Since the mid-1990s , the Internet has had a  क्रांतिकारी प्रभाव on संस्कृति और कॉमर्स , सहित the वृद्धि of near-instant संचार by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  mail , instant messaging , Voice over Internet Protocol ( VoIP ) `` phone calls '' , two-way interactive video calls , and the World Wide Web with its discussion forums , blogs , social networking , and online shopping sites .
The research and education community continues to develop  और उपयोग उन्नत संजाल ऐसे as nsf 's बहुत ऊँची गति रीढ़ संजाल सेवा ( vbns  ) , Internet2 , and National LambdaRail .
Increasing amounts of data are transmitted at higher and higher  speeds over रेशा ऑप्टिक संजाल  operating at 1-Gbit/s , 10-Gbit/s , or more .
The Internet 's takeover over the global  संचार लैंडस्केप थी लगभग तत्काल in ऐतिहासिक शर्तें : it तभी communicated 1 % of the सूचना बहती  through two-way telecommunications networks in the year 1993 , already 51 % by 2000 , and more than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007 .
Today the Internet continues to grow , driven by ever greater amounts of online  सूचना , कॉमर्स , entertainment , और सोशल नेटवर्किंग  .
Southwest Airlines Co. ( ) is a major U.S. airline  और the संसार 's largest low-cost वाहक , headquartered  in Dallas , Texas .
It was  स्थापित in 1967 और अपनाया  its current name in 1971 .
The airline  रै अधिक than 46,000 कर्मचारी और operates अधिक  than 3,400 flights per day .
As of June 5 ,  2011 , it carries the सबसे  domestic passengers of any U.S. airline .
As of April 2013 , Southwest Airlines has scheduled service  to 84 गंतव्यों in 41 राज्य और  Puerto Rico .
Southwest  एयरलाइंस रै solely संचालित बोइंग 737s ,  except for a few years in the 1970s and 1980s , when it operated Boeing 727s .
As of August 2012 , Southwest is the largest operator of the 737  विश्वव्यापी साथ over 550 in सेवा , प्रत्येक ऑपरेटिंग an औसत of छह फ़्लाइट  per day .
in may 2011 , the एयरलाइन acquired airtran एयरवेज़  , with integration of the carriers expected to be complete by 2014 .
On March 1 , 2012 , the company was issued a  सिंगल ऑपरेटिंग प्रमाणपत्र , technically बनने  one airline .
Rolling Rock is a 4.6 % abv pale lager launched in 1939 by  the latrobe brewing  Company .
Although founded as a local beer in Western  पेन्सिलवेनिया , it थी marketed aggressively और आखिरकार became a  national product .
The brand  थी बेची to anheuser-busch of st. लुई  , Missouri , in mid 2006 , which transferred brewing operations to New Jersey .
Benedict XVI ( , , ; born Joseph Aloisius Ratzinger on  16 अप्रैल 1927 ) is पोप emeritus  of the Catholic Church .
He  परोसा as पोप इससे 2005  to 2013 .
In that position , he was both the leader of the  कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर और sovereign  of the Vatican City State .
Benedict was elected on 19 April 2005 in a papal conclave , celebrated his Papal Inauguration Mass on  24 अप्रैल 2005 , और took कब्ज़ा of उसके गिरजाघर , the archbasilica of st. जॉन lateran  , on 7 May 2005 .
Ordained as a priest in 1951 in his native  बायर्न , ratzinger स्थापित खुद as a अत्यधिक regarded विश्वविद्यालयों theologian by the लेट 1950s  and was appointed a full professor in 1958 .
After a long career as an academic , serving as a professor of theology at several German universities—the last being the University of Regensburg , where he served as Vice President of the university in 1976  और 1977—he थी नियुक्त archbishop of म्यूनिख और freising और कार्डिनल by पोप पॉल vi in  1977 , an unusual promotion for someone with little pastoral experience .
In 1981 , he settled in  रोम जब he became prefect of the सभा लिये the doctrine  of the Faith , one of the most important dicasteries of the Roman Curia .
From  2002 जबतक उसके चुनाव as पोप , he थी  also Dean of the College of Cardinals , and as such , the primus inter pares among the cardinals .
Prior to becoming pope , he was `` a major figure on the Vatican stage for a quarter of a century '' as `` one of the most respected , influential and controversial members of the  कॉलेज of कार्डिनल्स '' ; he था an influence `` दूसरी to none जब  it came to setting church priorities and directions '' as one of Pope John Paul II 's closest confidants .
He was originally a liberal theologian , but  अपनाया रूढ़िवादी दृश्य बाद 1968  .
His prolific writings defend  परंपरागत कैथोलिक doctrine  and values .
During his papacy , Benedict XVI advocated a return to  आधारभूत ईसाई मान to काउंटर the increased  secularisation of many Western countries .
He views relativism  's denial of उद्देश्य सच्चाई , और the denial of  moral truths in particular , as the central problem of the 21st century .
He  सिखाया the महत्व of दोनो the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर  and an understanding of God 's redemptive love .
Pope  बेनेडिक्ट भी revived a क्रमांक  of traditions including elevating the Tridentine Mass to a more prominent position .
He renewed the relationship between the Catholic Church and art , viewing the use of beauty as a path to the sacred  , प्रचारित the उपयोग of लैटिन , और reintroduced परंपरागत papal garments , लिये जिससे  reason he was called `` the pope of aesthetics '' .
He has  महरूम वर्णित as `` the प्रमुख बौद्धिक  force in the Church '' since the mid-1980s .
Several of Pope  बेनेडिक्ट 's विद्यार्थी इससे उसके अकादमिक करियर  are also prominent churchmen today and confidantes of him , notably Christoph Schönborn .
On 11 February 2013 , Pope Benedict announced his resignation in a speech in  लैटिन पहले the कार्डिनल्स , citing a `` कमी of शक्ति of दिमाग और देह '' due  to his advanced age .
His resignation  became प्रभावी  on 28 February 2013 .
He is the first pope to resign since Pope Gregory XII in 1415 , and the  पहला to do so on उसके अपना पहल  since Pope Celestine V in 1294 .
As pope  emeritus , बेनेडिक्ट retains the स्टाइल of उसके पवित्रता , और the शीर्षक of पोप  , and will continue to dress in the papal colour of white .
He  थी succeeded by पोप फ्रांसिस on 13 कूच 2013 ,  and he moved into the newly renovated Mater Ecclesiae monastery for his retirement on 2 May 2013..
Pocket stereoscope  साथ असली  test image .
Used by military to examine stereoscopic pairs of  aerial छायाचित्र  .
View of  बोस्टन , c. 1860 ; an जल्दी stereoscopic  card for viewing a scene from nature
Kaiser-Panorama consisted of a multi-station  देखने apparatus और सेट of स्टीरियो  slides .
patented by A. fuhrmann  around 1890 .
Company of  महिलाओं watching stereoscopic छायाचित्र  , painting by Jacob Spoel , before 1868 .
A very early depiction  of लोगों using  a stereoscope .
Stereoscopy ( also called stereoscopics or 3D imaging ) is a technique for creating or enhancing the illusion of depth in  an चित्र by अर्थात् of stereopsis लिये binocular  vision .
The word  stereoscopy गर्भाशयी इससे the यूनानी `` στερεός '' ( stereos ) , `` कड़ , ठोस '' + ``  σκοπέω '' ( skopeō ) , `` to look '' , `` to see '' .
Most stereoscopic  विधि उपस्थित दो ऑफसेट बिंब separately to the बाएँ और  right eye of the viewer .
These two-dimensional  बिंब हैं तब संयुक्त in  the brain to give the perception of 3D depth .
This technique is distinguished from 3D displays that display an image in three full dimensions , allowing the  निरीक्षक to बढ़ाएँ सूचना परिचय the 3-dimensional वस्तुएँ होने प्रदर्शित by  head and eye movements .
John  एडम्स ( अक्तूबर 30 , 1735 ( o.s . अक्तूबर 19 , 1735 ) – जुलाई 4 , 1826 ) थी the दूसरी अध्यक्ष of the  United States ( 1797–1801 ) , having earlier served as the first vice president of the United States .
An American Founding Father , he was a statesman , diplomat , and a  अग्रणी एडवोकेट of अमरीकी स्वतंत्रता इससे ग्रेट  Britain .
Well educated , he was an Enlightenment political theorist who promoted  republicanism और लिखा prolifically परिचय उसके प्रायः seminal विचार , दोनो in प्रकाशित works और in अक्षर  to his wife and key adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers .
Adams came to  prominence in the जल्दी चरण  of the American Revolution .
A lawyer and public figure in Boston , as a delegate from Massachusetts  to the महाद्वीपीय  Congress , he played a leading role in persuading Congress to declare independence .
He assisted Thomas  जेफरसन in drafting the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता  in 1776 , and was its primary advocate in the Congress .
Later , as a diplomat in Europe , he helped negotiate the eventual  सलाम सन्धि साथ ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , और थी जिम्मेदार  for obtaining vital governmental loans from Amsterdam bankers .
A political theorist and historian , Adams largely wrote the  मैसाचुसेट्स संविधान in 1780 , जिससे साथ साथ उसके पहले विचार on  Government , influenced American political thought .
One of his greatest roles was as a judge of character : in 1775 ,  he मनोनीत जार्ज वॉशिंगटन to be commander-in-chief  , and 25 years later nominated John Marshall to be Chief Justice of the United States .
Adams ' revolutionary credentials secured  उसे दो शर्तें as जार्ज वॉशिंगटन 's वाइस अध्यक्ष और उसके अपना चुनाव in  1796 as the second president .
During his one term , he encountered ferocious attacks by the Jeffersonian Republicans , as  खूब as the प्रबल गुट in उसके अपना federalist पार्टी led by उसके कड़वा  enemy Alexander Hamilton .
Adams signed the controversial Alien and  राजद्रोह अधिनियमों , और निर्मित up the फौज और नेवी विशेषकर in the फेस of an undeclared  naval war ( called the `` Quasi-War `` ) with France , 1798–1800 .
The major accomplishment of his presidency was his peaceful resolution of the conflict  in the फेस of हैमिल्टन 's विपक्ष  .
In 1800  , एडम्स थी पराजित लिये re-election  by Thomas Jefferson and retired to Massachusetts .
He later  resumed उसके  friendship with Jefferson .
He and his wife , Abigail Adams ,  संस्थापित an संपन्नता परिवार लकीर of राजनेता  , diplomats , and historians now referred to as the Adams political family .
Adams was the father of John Quincy Adams , the sixth  अध्यक्ष of the  United States .
His achievements have received greater recognition in modern times ,  हालांकि उसके योगदान यहूद नहीं initially as मनाये as those  of other Founders .
Adams was the first  u.S. अध्यक्ष to reside in the भवन  that eventually became known as the White House .
The United States ten-dollar bill ( $ 10 ) is a  denomination of संयुक्त राज्य  currency .
the पहला u.S. सचिव of the राजकोष ( 1789–95 )  , Alexander Hamilton , is currently featured on the obverse of the bill , while the U.S. Treasury Building is featured on the reverse .
( Hamilton is one of two  non-presidents प्रदर्शित on फिलहाल जारी  U.S. bills .
The  अन्य is बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन  , on the $ 100 bill .
हैमिल्टन is एक of तभी चार लोगों प्रदर्शित on u.S. पेपर करेंसी ( 1861 to  the present ) who was not born in the continental United States , as he was from the West Indies .
The others are : Albert Gallatin , Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender ) ; George Meade , Spain ( $ 1,000 1890/91 Treasury Note ) ; and Robert Morris , England ( $  1,000 1862/63 विधिक टेंडर ;  $ 10 1878/80 Silver Certificate ) .
In  जोड , kamehameha  I , appears on the 2008 Hawaii state quarter . )
All $ 10  बिल्स जारी आज  are Federal Reserve Notes .
the ब्यूरो of नक्काशी और मुद्रण says the औसत जीवन  of a $ 10 bill in circulation is 18 months before it is replaced due to wear .
लगभग 6 % of सब  US banknotes printed in 2009 were $ 10 bills .
Ten dollar bills are  वितरित by  Federal Reserve Banks in yellow straps .
The source of the face on the $ 10 bill is John  trumbull ’s 1805 पोर्ट्रेट of हैमिल्टन कि belongs to the  portrait collection of New York City Hall .
The $ 10 bill is the only U.S. paper currency in circulation in which the portrait faces to the left ( the $ 100,000 bill  प्रदर्शित a पोर्ट्रेट of वुडरो विल्सन facing to the बाएँ , लकिन  was used only for intra-government transactions ) .
A  सवार on a यामाहा waverunner  XL performing a high-speed turn .
A  jetboat is a नाव propelled by a  jet of water ejected from the back of the craft .
Unlike a powerboat or motorboat that uses a propeller in the water below or behind  the नाव , a jetboat draws the जल इससे अंतर्गत the नाव into a पंप अंदर the नाव ,  then expels it through a nozzle at the stern .
Jetboats were  originally designed by सर विलियम हैमिल्टन ( जो विकसित a waterjet in 1954 ) लिये आपरेशन in the fast-flowing और  shallow rivers of New Zealand , specifically to overcome the problem of propellers striking rocks in such waters .
Previous attempts at waterjet propulsion had very  छोटी lifetimes , generally due to the अकुशल डिज़ाइन of the इकाई  and the fact that they offered few advantages over conventional propellers .
Unlike these previous waterjet developments , such as Campini 's and the Hanley Hydrojet , Hamilton had a specific need for a propulsion system to  operate in very-shallow जल , और the waterjet proved  to be the ideal solution .
From this , the popularity of the  जेट ईकाई और jetboat increased rapidly  .
Through further developments , it was found the waterjet offered several other advantages over  propellers लिये a चौड़ी दायरा of पोत प्रकार , और as ऐसे , waterjets हैं प्रयुक्त widely  today for many high-speed vessels , including passenger ferries , rescue craft , patrol boats and offshore supply vessels .
Jetboats are highly maneuverable  , और अनेक can , इससे पूरा गति , be reversed और brought to  a stop within little more than their own length , in a maneuver known as a `` crash stop '' .
The well known Hamilton turn or `` jet spin '' is a  high-speed maneuvre जहाँ the नाव 's इंजन throttle is काटें ,  the steering is turned sharply and the throttle opened again , causing the boat to spin quickly around with a large spray of water .
There is no engineering limit to the size of jetboats , though  the वैध of उनके उपयोग depends a लॉट on the प्रकार  of application .
Classic prop-drives are generally more efficient and economical at  कम speeds , up to परिचय , लकिन as नाव गति increases परे इस , the अतिरिक्त हल प्रतिरोध उत्पन्न by struts , rudders , shafts ( इत्यादि . ) अर्थात् waterjets  are more efficient in the 20-50 knot range ( up to ) .
Also , in situations with very large propellers turning at slow speeds ( such as tug boats ) , the  समतुल्य आकार waterjet होता be too बिग to be व्यावहारिक  .
For these reasons , the vast majority of waterjet units are installed in  high-speed बरतन और in particular परिस्थितियों जहाँ उथले draught , maneuverability  , and load flexibility are main concerns .
The biggest  jet-driven बरतन हैं मिला in सैन्य  use or the high-speed passenger/car ferry industry .
दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी 's s ( लगभग  long ) are the biggest jet-propelled vessels so far .
Even these German-built  बरतन हैं सक्षम of  performing `` crash stops '' .
uveitis is broadly पारिभाषित as सूजन  of the uvea .
The uvea  consists of the मध्य , pigmented  , vascular structures of the eye and includes the iris , ciliary body , and choroid .
Uveitis requires an urgent referral and thorough examination by an  ophthalmologist or optometrist साथ साथ तात्कालिक उपचार  to control the inflammation .

Murphy is a fictional character  on the comedy-drama टेलीविज़न  series Entourage .
He is played by Kevin  connolly  .
The Shining is a 1980  मनोवैज्ञानिक हॉरर फिल्मी उत्पादित और निर्देशित by स्टेनली kubrick , co-written साथ उपन्यासकार डायने जॉनसन , और अभिनीत जोकर निकोल्सन  , Shelley Duvall , Scatman Crothers , and Danny Lloyd .
The  फिल्मी is आधारित on the स्टीफन  King novel The Shining .
A writer , Jack Torrance , takes a job as an  off-season कार्यवाहक at an पृथक होटल  .
His young son possesses psychic  abilities और is समर्थ to देखिए बाते  from the past and future , such as the ghosts who inhabit the hotel .
Soon after settling in , the family is trapped in the hotel by a snowstorm , and Jack gradually becomes influenced by a supernatural presence ; he  उतरता into दीवानगी और कोशिशें to हत्या उसके बीवी और बेटे  .
Unlike  पिछला kubrick films , जिससे विकसित an दर्शक धीरे by भवन  on word-of-mouth , The Shining was released as a mass-market film , opening at first in just two cities on Memorial Day , then nationwide a month later .
Although initial response  to the फिल्मी थी मिश्रित , बाद नाजुक मूल्यांकन थी अधिक अनुकूल  and it is now viewed as a classic of the horror genre .
Film director Martin Scorsese , writing in  the रोज़ जानवर , क्रमित it as एक of the 11 scariest हॉरर फिल्मों of सब  time .
Film  आलोचकों , फिल्मी विद्यार्थी , और kubrick 's निर्माता , जन harlan  , have remarked on the enormous influence the film has had on popular culture .
The initial European release of The Shining was 25 minutes  shorter than the अमरीकी संस्करण , हासिल by निकालना सबसे of the दृश्यों लेने प्लेस  outside the environs of the hotel .
Patio  कोला बोतल
Patio Diet Cola was a brand of diet soda  introduced by पेप्सी in 1963  .
It was created  in जवाब to आहार रीति कोला  , which was the first diet cola on the market .
Fitness promoter  डिब्बी ड्रेक थी  Patio Diet Cola 's spokesperson .
In 1964 , Patio released  नारंगी , अंगूर , और रूट बियर  flavors .
This flavor line was not meant  to compete साथ ब्रांड्स  like Orange Crush , but rather fill out the line .
आँगन sodas यहूद उपलब्धियाँ in the  cold-bottle market : grocery and mom-and-pop stores .
Advertising for Patio was comparatively scarce ; at the time , bottlers were  regionally franchised ,  and related advertising was necessarily local .
In 1964 ,  आँगन आहार  cola became Diet Pepsi .
The newly branded diet soda was advertised  alongside पेप्सी साथ the टैगलाइन `` पेप्सी either  way '' , which replaced the slogan `` Dances with flavor '' .
the छोटी  life span of Patio Diet cola makes it a great addition for bottle collectors .
Most of  the बाकी आँगन लकीर of जायका  were phased out by the early 1970s , while a few survived until the mid 70s
Infrastructure is basic physical and  organizational structures needed लिये the आपरेशन of a समाज or एंटरप्राइज़ , or the सेवाएं और  facilities necessary for an economy to function .
It can be generally defined as the set of interconnected structural  तत्व कि provide फ्रेमवर्क supporting  an entire structure of development .
It is an important  पद लिये judging a देश  or region 's development .
The term typically refers to the technical structures that support a society , such as  सड़कें , पुलों , जल सप्लाई , sewers , विद्युत ग्रिड , दूरसंचार , और so forth , और can be पारिभाषित as `` the शारीरिक components of interrelated प्रणालियों providing commodities  and services essential to enable , sustain , or enhance societal living conditions . ''
Viewed functionally , infrastructure facilitates the production of goods and services , and also the distribution of finished products to markets , as well as basic social  सेवाएं ऐसे as स्कूलों और अस्पताल ; लिये उदाहरण , सड़कें enable the  transport of raw materials to a factory .
In military  parlance , the पद refers to the इमारतें और स्थाई संस्थापना  necessary for the support , redeployment , and operation of military forces .
To make it simple , infrastructure  is anything कि is needed  everyday , an everyday item .
A  आलेखीय प्रतिनिधित्व  of the ideal human karyotype
mitochondrial  DNA .
Human genetic variation is the genetic differences  दोनो भीतर और among  populations .
There may be multiple  विसंगतियाँ of कोई दिए जीन in the  human population ( genes ) , leading to polymorphism .
Many genes are  नहीं बहुरूपी , अर्थ  that only a single allele is present in the population : the gene is then said to be fixed .
no दो इंसानो  are genetically identical .
Even monozygotic twins , who develop from one zygote , have infrequent  जेनेटिक मतभेद  due to mutations occurring during development and gene copy number variation .
मतभेद between individuals , भी  closely related individuals , are the key to techniques such as genetic fingerprinting .
Alleles occur at different frequencies in different human populations , with  populations कि हैं अधिक geographically  and ancestrally remote tending to differ more .
Causes of differences between  individuals शामिल the एक्सचेंज of जीनों  during meiosis and various mutational events .
There are  at तनिक दो कारण क्यों जेनेटिक  variation exists between populations .
Natural selection may confer an adaptive advantage to individuals in a specific environment if an allele  provides a प्रतिस्पर्धी लाभ  .
Alleles under selection are likely to occur only in those geographic  regions जहाँ वे confer an लाभ  .
The second main cause  of जेनेटिक विभिन्नता is due to the ऊँची  degree of neutrality of most mutations .
सबसे mutations do नहीं appear  to have any selective effect one way or the other on the organism .
The main cause is genetic drift , this is the  प्रभाव of यादृच्छिक परिवर्तन  in the gene pool .
In humans , founder effect and past small population size ( increasing the likelihood of  जेनेटिक बहाव ) may have था an महत्वपूर्ण influence in न्यूट्रल मतभेद between  populations .
The theory that  इंसानो recently migrated आउट of  Africa supports this .
The study of human genetic variation has both evolutionary significance and medical  अनुप्रयोग .
It can help scientists understand ancient  इंसान जनसांख्यिकी migrations  as well as how different human groups are biologically related to one another .
For medicine , study of human genetic variation may be important because some disease-causing alleles occur  अधिक प्रायः in लोगों इससे विशिष्ट भौगोलिक  regions .
New findings show that each human has on  औसत 60 नई mutations  compared to their parents .
Apart from mutations , many genes that may have aided humans in  प्राचीन टाइम्स प्लेग इंसानो  today .
For example , it is suspected that genes that allow humans to more efficiently  प्रक्रम खाना हैं those कि मेक लोगों susceptible to मोटापा और  diabetes today .
Tea Party protesters on the West Lawn of the U.S. Capitol and the  नेशनल मॉल at the करदाताओं  March on Washington on September 12 , 2009 .
The Tea Party movement is an American political movement that advocates strict adherence to  the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान , reducing u.S. सरकारी बिता और कर , और कटौती of the u.S. नेशनल  debt and federal budget deficit .
the गति रै महरूम पुकारा partly  conservative , partly libertarian , and partly populist .
The movement has sponsored protests and supported  राजनैतिक उम्मीदवार चूंकि 2009  .
The name of the movement is derived from the  बोस्टन चाय पार्टी of 1773 , an iconic इवेंट in  American history .
Anti-tax protesters in the United States have often referred to the original  बोस्टन चाय पार्टी लिये प्रेरणा  .
सन्दर्भ to the बोस्टन चाय पार्टी यहूद  part of Tax Day protests held throughout the 1990s and earlier .
By 2001 , a  कस्टम था विकसित among कुछ रूढ़िवादी कार्यकर्ताओं  of mailing tea bags to legislators and other officials as a symbolic act .
The currencies of Puerto Rico  closely follow the ऐतिहासिक विकास  of Puerto Rico .
As a colony of Spain and the  संयुक्त राज्य , प्यूर्टो रीको थी granted  the use of both foreign and provincial currencies .
Following the Spanish colonization in 1502 , Puerto  रीको became an महत्वपूर्ण बंदरगाहों , साथ  its own supply of gold .
however , as the खनिज reserves  ran empty within the century , the archipelago 's economy suffered .
The Spanish Crown issued the Situado Mexicano , which meant that a semi-regular shipment of gold from the Viceroyalty of New  स्पेन होता be भेजा to the द्वीप , as a रास्ता to provide आर्थिक support  .
Between 1636 and 1637 , Philip IV of Spain imposed  a कर जिससे था to be सशुल्क using a आय  stamp .
Inspired by this , Puerto Rico began producing banknotes in 1766 , becoming the first colony to print 8-  रियल banknotes in the स्पेनी साम्राज्य और जिससे in the स्पेनी सरकारी 's स्वीकृति of subsequent  issues .
The situado was discontinued during the 19th century , creating an economic  संकट , as a परिणाम of मैक्सिको gaining इसके स्वतंत्रता  from Spain .
साल्वाडोर meléndez bruna , the औपनिवेशिक राज्यपाल in दफ्तर  , ordered the issue of provincial banknotes , creating the Puerto Rican peso .
However , printing of these  banknotes ceased बाद 1815  .
During the following  दशकों , विदेशी सिक्के became  the widespread currency .
In the  1860s और 1870s  , banknotes reemerged .
On  फ़रवरी 1 , 1890 , the banco español  de Puerto Rico was inaugurated and began issuing banknotes .
The  बैंको designed चार श्रेणी  and placed three in circulation under Spanish rule .
In 1895 , a Royal Decree  ordered the उत्पादन of प्रांतीय  peso coins .
On August 13 , 1898 , the Spanish-American War  ended साथ स्पेन ceding प्यूर्टो  Rico to the United States .
The Banco Español de Puerto Rico was renamed Bank of Porto Rico and  जारी बिल्स समतुल्य to the संयुक्त राज्य  dollar , creating the Puerto Rican dollar .
In 1902 , the First National Bank of Porto  रीको जारी banknotes in a समानांतर  manner .
Two  अधिक श्रेणी यहूद  issued until 1913 .
After Puerto Rico 's  अर्थव्यवस्था और मौद्रिक प्रणाली  was fully integrated into the United States ' economic and monetary system , the Puerto Rican dollars were redeemed for those issued by the United States Treasury .
The peso and dollar have been followed by other contemporary issues , including commemorative  banknotes , निजी करेंसी , और a क्वार्टर सिक्का designed साथ फोर्ट सैन फेलिप डेल morro  in the face .
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase as pepsi , formerly stylized in uppercase as PEPSI ) is a  कार्बोनेटेड नरम पेय कि is उत्पादित और manufactured by पेप्सिको  .
Created and developed  in 1893 और introduced as ब्रैड 's पेय , it थी renamed as  Pepsi-Cola on August 28 , 1898 , then to Pepsi in 1961 .
The  किताब of ezekiel is the तीसरा of the latter नबियों in the यहूदी  Bible , following the books of Isaiah and Jeremiah and preceding the Book of the Twelve .
( The order is somewhat different in  the ईसाई बूढ़ा वसीयत ) .
It derives its name from , and records the  visions of , the 6th सदी bc पुजारी और नबी ezekiel  .
According to the book , the prophet , exiled in  बाबुल , अनुभवी a श्रेणी of सात visions दौरान the 22 सालो  from 593 to 571 BC , a period which spans the final destruction of Jerusalem in 586 .
The visions , and the book , are structured around three themes : ( 1 ) judgment on Israel ( chapters 1-24 ) ; ( 2 )  निर्णय on the राष्ट्र ( अध्याय 25-32 ) ; और भविष्य आशीर्वाद लिये  Israel ( chapters 33-48 ) .
New Orleans (  or , locally or ; ) is a प्रमुख संयुक्त राज्य  port and the largest city and metropolitan area in the state of Louisiana .
The  जनसांख्यिकी of  the city was 343,829 as of the 2010 U.S. Census .
The New  ऑरलियन्स महानगर क्षेत्रफल ( नई orleans–metairie–kenner महानगर सांख्यिकीय  Area ) had a population of 1,167,764 in 2010 and was the 46th largest in the United States .
The  नई orleans–metairie–bogalusa संयुक्त सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल  , a larger trading area , had a 2010 population of 1,214,932 .
The city is named after Orléans , a city located on the  loire नदी in केन्द्र , फ़्रांस , और is खूब  known for its distinct French Creole architecture , as well as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage .
New  ऑरलियन्स is भी प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके भोजन , म्यूज़िक ( विशेषकर as the जन्मस्थान  of jazz ) , and its annual celebrations and festivals , most notably Mardi Gras .
The city is often referred to as  the `` सबसे अद्वितीय '' in अमेरिका  .
New  ऑरलियन्स is स्तिथ in southeastern  Louisiana , straddling the Mississippi River .
the नगर और ऑरलियन्स  Parish ( ) are .
The city and parish are bounded by the parishes of St. Tammany to the north , St. Bernard to the east , Plaquemines  to the दक्षिण और जेफरसन to the  south and west .
Lake Pontchartrain , part  of जिससे is शामिल in  the city limits , lies to the north and Lake Borgne lies to the east .
The National  जनम कंट्रोल लीग थी a जनम  control organization in the United States .
It was founded in March 1915 by Mary  dennett , क्लारा gruening stillman और  Jessie Ashley .
Its main purpose was to overturn the  कानून जिससे बैन contraceptives  from the U.S. mails .
Campaigns were mounted in  नई यॉर्क , लकिन in 1919 the लीग थी disbanded  and reformed into the Voluntary Parenthood League .
Cancer , known medically as a malignant neoplasm  , is a व्यापक समूह of विभिन्न रोगों , सब involving  unregulated cell growth .
In cancer , cells divide  और grow uncontrollably , forming malignant  tumors , and invade nearby parts of the body .
the कर्कट may भी स्प्रेड to अधिक दूर भाग  of the body through the lymphatic system or bloodstream .
Not  सब tumors हैं  cancerous .
benign tumors do नहीं grow uncontrollably , do नहीं invade  neighboring tissues , and do not spread throughout the body .
There are over 200  अलग ज्ञात cancers  that afflict humans .
determining कया कल्याणकारी  cancer is complex .
Many things are known to increase the  रिस्क of कर्कट , सहित तम्बाकू उपयोग , निश्चित infections , विकिरण , कमी of  physical activity , obesity , and environmental pollutants .
These can directly damage genes or  combine साथ मौजूदा जेनेटिक त्रुटियां  within cells to cause the disease .
Approximately  पाँच to टेन प्रतिशत of cancers  are entirely hereditary .
Cancer can be detected in a  क्रमांक of तरीके , सहित the उपस्थिति of निश्चित लक्षण और  symptoms , screening tests , or medical imaging .
Once a possible cancer is  detected it is diagnosed  by microscopic examination of a tissue sample .
Cancer is  प्रायः treated साथ कीमोथेरेपी  , radiation therapy and surgery .
The chances of surviving the disease vary greatly by the type and  स्थान of the कर्कट और the extent of बीमारी at  the start of treatment .
While cancer can affect people of all ages , and a few types of cancer are more common in children ,  the रिस्क of विकासशील कर्कट generally increases साथ  age .
In 2007 , cancer caused  परिचय 13 % of सब इंसान मौतों विश्वव्यापी  ( 7.9 million ) .
Rates are rising as more people live to an old age and as mass lifestyle  परिवर्तन occur in the विकासशील संसार  .

Skiing is a recreational activity and competitive sport in which the participant attaches long runners or skis  to बूट or जूते on the फीट और उपयोग उन्हें to सफर on शीर्ष of हिम  .
Aside from recreation and competition , skiing has been used for military purposes  और भी यात्राएं in क्षेत्रों कि अनुभव  heavy snowfall .
Many types of  प्रतिस्पर्धी स्कीइंग कार्यक्रम हैं पहचाना by the  International Olympic Committee , and the International Ski Federation .
John Maynard Keynes , 1st Baron Keynes , CB , FBA ( ; 5 June 1883 – 21 April 1946 ) was a British economist whose ideas have  fundamentally प्रभावित the सिद्धान्त और अभ्यास of आधुनिक macroeconomics , और सूचित the आर्थिक नीतियों  of governments .
He built on and greatly refined earlier  कार्य on the कल्याणकारी of कारोबार चक्र , और  is widely considered to be one of the founders of modern macroeconomics and the most influential economist of the 20th century .
His  विचार हैं the आधार लिये the स्कूल of विचार  known as Keynesian economics , as well as its various offshoots .
In many ways , subsequent developments in 20th century economics can be  viewed as either भवन on keynes '  ideas or reacting against them .
In the 1930s , Keynes spearheaded a revolution in economic thinking , overturning the older ideas of neoclassical economics  कि आयोजित कि फ़्री बाज़ार होता , in the  short to medium term , automatically provide full employment , as long as workers were flexible in their wage demands .
Keynes instead argued that aggregate demand  संकल्पित the overall स्तर of आर्थिक कार्यकलाप , और कि अपर्याप्त कुल माँग could सीसे  to prolonged periods of high unemployment .
He advocated the use of fiscal and monetary measures to mitigate  the प्रतिकूल प्रभाव of आर्थिक  recessions and depressions .
Following the outbreak of the Second World War , Keynes 's  विचार concerning आर्थिक नीति यहूद अपनाया by अग्रणी  Western economies .
In 1942 , Keynes was awarded a  खानदानी peerage as सामन्त keynes of tilton in the काउंटी  of Sussex .
Keynes died in 1946 , but during the 1950s and 1960s the success of Keynesian  अर्थशास्त्र resulted in लगभग सब पूंजीवादी सरकारें adopting  its policy recommendations .
Keynes 's influence waned in the 1970s , partly as a result of  समस्याएं कि began to पहुँचकर the anglo-american economies इससे the प्रारंभ of the दशक , और  partly because of critiques from Milton Friedman and other economists who were pessimistic about the ability of governments to regulate the business cycle with fiscal policy .
However , the advent of the global  वित्तीय संकट in 2007 caused a  resurgence in Keynesian thought .
Keynesian economics provided the theoretical underpinning for economic policies undertaken in response to the crisis by Presidents George W. Bush and Barack Obama of  the संयुक्त राज्य , प्रधान मंत्री गॉर्डन भूरा of the संयुक्त किंगडम , और अन्य heads of  governments .
In 1999 , Time magazine included Keynes in their list of the 100 most important  और influential लोगों of the 20th सदी , commenting कि : `` उसके कट्टरपंथी विचार कि सरकारें चाहिए खर्च  money they do n't have may have saved capitalism . ''
In addition to  होने an अर्थशास्त्री , keynes थी भी a सिविल नौकर , a निदेशक of  the British Eugenics Society , a director of the Bank of England , a patron of the arts and an art collector , a part of the Bloomsbury Group of intellectuals , an advisor to several charitable trusts , a writer , a philosopher , a private investor , and a farmer .
This 1768 parchment ( 612×502 mm ) by Jekuthiel Sofer  emulated the 1675 टेन आयतें at the  Amsterdam Esnoga synagogue .
The Ten Commandments , also known as the Decalogue ,  हैं a नियत of biblical कानून relating to आचार और इबादत , जिससे  play a fundamental role in Judaism , Islam and Christianity .
They include instructions to worship only God , to keep the sabbath  पावन और prohibitions विरूद्ध idolatry , इनकार  , murder , theft , deception and adultery .
Different groups follow slightly different traditions for  interpreting और क्रमांकन उन्हें .
The Ten Commandments appear  twice in the यहूदी बाइबल , in the किताबे  of Exodus and Deuteronomy .
According to the story in Exodus , God  inscribed उन्हें on दो स्टोन टैबलेट  , which he gave to Moses on Mount Sinai .
Modern  स्कॉलरशिप रै मिला संभावित प्रभाव  in Hittite and Mesopotamian laws and treaties , but is divided over exactly when the Ten Commandments were written and who wrote them .
The discography of the English alternative rock band The Smiths consists of four  स्टुडियो एल्बम , एक विस्तारित खेल ( ep ) , एक सजीव एल्बम  , ten compilation albums , twenty singles , one video album and fourteen music videos on the Rough Trade , Sire and WEA record labels .
The  बैंड थी formed in 1982 in मैनचेस्टर by vocalist morrissey  , guitarist Johnny Marr , bass player Andy Rourke and drummer Mike Joyce .
Despite being championed by  बीबीसी रेडियो 1 डिस्क jockey जॉन छिलके , the बैंड  's debut single , `` Hand in Glove `` ( May 1983 ) , failed to chart .
Its follow-up , `` This Charming Man `` ( October 1983 ) , met with critical  acclaim और पहुँचे क्रमांक twenty-five  on the UK Singles Chart .
The Smiths ' cult status was  followed by मुख्यधारा कामयाबी in 1984 , as वे पहुँचे क्रमांक बारह in the uk साथ the `` कया अंतर करता  It Make ? `` single and reached number two on the UK Albums Chart with their debut album , The Smiths ( 1984 ) .
Their next three singles all reached the top twenty of  the चार्ट in the uk , helping to consolidate  their previous chart success .
The next studio album , Meat Is Murder ( 1985 ) , reached the top of the British  चार्ट ; however , the तभी सिंगल to be released इससे the एल्बम , ``  That Joke Is n't Funny Anymore `` ( 1985 ) , failed to break the UK Top 40 .
Returning to form , The Smiths ' next six singles all reached the higher than number  तीस in the uk और उनके तीसरा एल्बम , the महारानी is मुर्दे  ( 1986 ) , reached number two in the UK .
Despite the band 's chart success , Marr left the group in  अगस्त 1987 due to a strained संबंध साथ  Morrissey .
Failing to find a replacement  , the smiths disbanded by the समय उनके फाइनल स्टुडियो एल्बम ,  Strangeways , Here We Come , was released in September that year .
Strangeways , Here We Come reached number two in the UK and became the  बैंड 's highest-charting रिलीज in the संयुक्त राज्य  when it reached number fifty-five on the Billboard 200 .
In early 1992 , WEA acquired the entire back catalogue of The Smiths and produced two compilations – Best  ... i और ... बेहतरीन ii – the पहला of जिससे पहुँचे the शीर्ष of the uk एल्बम चार्ट  .
WEA released two further singles compilations in 1995 and 2001 , with a further compilation ,  the ध्वनि of the smiths , released in नवम्बर 2008  .
Gone with the Wind is a novel  लिखा by मार्गरेट मिशेल , पहला प्रकाशित  in 1936 .
It is  प्रायः लगाई in  the literary sub-genre of the historical romance novel .
However , it has been argued the  अनोखा is a `` निकट मिस '' और करता नहीं contain सब of the तत्व of the रोमांस  genre , making it simply a historical novel .
The story is set in Clayton County , Georgia , and Atlanta  दौरान the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध और पुनर्निर्माण  .
It depicts the experiences of Scarlett O'Hara  , the बिगड़े बेटी of a well-to-do वृक्षारोपण मालिक , जो जरूर  use every means at her disposal to come out of the poverty she finds herself in after Sherman 's `` March to the Sea '' .
Margaret Mitchell began writing Gone with the  हवा in 1926 to pass the  time while recovering from an auto-crash injury that refused to heal .
In April 1935 ,  हेरोल्ड लैथम of macmillan  , an editor who was looking for new fiction , read what she had written and saw that it could be a best-seller .
बाद लैथम सहमत to प्रकाशित the किताब , मिशेल worked लिये another छह  months checking the historical references , and rewrote the opening chapter several times .
Mitchell and her husband John Marsh , a copy editor by  व्यापार , संपादित the फाइनल संस्करण  of the novel .
Mitchell wrote the book 's final moments  पहला , और तब लिखा the कार्यक्रम कि led  up to it .
As to what became of her lovers , Rhett and Scarlett , after the novel ended  , मिशेल किया नहीं जान , और कहा , `` लिये सब i जान , रहेट may have  found someone else who was less difficult . ''
Mitchell received the Pulitzer Prize for Fiction  लिये the किताब  in 1937 .
the किताब थी adapted  into a 1939 American film .
Gone with the Wind is the only  अनोखा by मिशेल प्रकाशित  during her lifetime .
endodontics ( इससे the यूनानी endo `` अंदर '' ; और odons `` दाँत '' ) is एक of the दंत specialties  recognized by the American Dental Association , Royal College of Dentists of Canada , and Royal Australasian College of Dental Surgeons , and deals with the tooth pulp and the tissues surrounding the root of a tooth .
Endodontists perform a variety of procedures including endodontic therapy ( commonly known as `` root canal therapy '' ) , endodontic retreatment ,  सर्जरी , treating cracked दांत , और  treating dental trauma .
Root  कनाल चिकित्सा is एक  of the most common procedures .
If the pulp ( containing nerves , arterioles , venules , lymphatic tissue , and fibrous tissue ) becomes diseased or injured , endodontic treatment  is जरूरी to सहेजें the दाँत  .
Serial Attached SCSI ( SAS ) is a point-to-point serial protocol that  चालें आंकड़ा to और इससे कंप्यूटर भंडार डिवाइस ऐसे  as hard drives and tape drives .
SAS replaces the older Parallel SCSI (  सुनाया `` scuzzy '' ) बस  technology that first appeared in the mid-1980s .
SAS , like its predecessor ,  उपयोग the मानक scsi  command set .
SAS offers  पिछड़ा संगतता साथ second-generation  SATA drives .
SATA 3 Gbit/s drives may be  कनेक्ट to sas backplanes , लकिन sas ड्राइव can नहीं कनेक्ट to  SATA backplanes .
The T10 technical committee  of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय कमेटी लिये सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी मानकों ( incits ) develops  and maintains the SAS protocol ; the SCSI Trade Association ( SCSITA ) promotes the technology .
भाग of the संवैधानिक प्रावधान  as it appeared in 1787
Status as a natural-born citizen of the United States is  एक of the पात्रता आवश्यकताएँ स्थापित in the संयुक्त  States Constitution for election to the office of President or Vice President .
This  आवश्यकता थी intended to protect  the nation from foreign influence .
The Constitution  करता नहीं define the phrase natural-born नागरिक  , and various opinions have been offered over time regarding its precise meaning .
A 2011  congressional शोध सेवा  report stated
The natural-born-citizen clause has been mentioned in passing in several decisions of the  संयुक्त राज्य परम् अदालत और निम्नतर न्यायालयों dealing साथ the सवाल of पात्रता लिये नागरिकता by  birth , but the Supreme Court has never directly addressed the question of a specific presidential or vice-presidential candidate 's eligibility as a natural-born citizen .
Kurtis Eugene  `` कर्ट '' warner ( born जून  22 , 1971 ) is a former American football player .
He played quarterback for three  नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ) टीमों : the st. लुई मेढ़ों  , the New York Giants , and the Arizona Cardinals .
He was  originally हस्ताक्षरित by the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स as an  undrafted free agent in 1994 after playing college football at Northern Iowa .
Warner would go on to be considered the best undrafted player of all  समय , following a 12-year करियर regarded as एक of the  greatest stories in NFL history .
Warner first attained stardom while playing  लिये the st. लुई मेढ़ों इससे 1998 to 2003 , जहाँ he जीती दो  NFL MVP awards in 1999 and 2001 as well as the Super Bowl MVP award in Super Bowl XXXIV .
He led the 2008 Arizona  कार्डिनल्स to सुपर कटोरी xliii ( the  franchise 's first Super Bowl berth ) , and owns the three highest single-game passing yardage totals in Super Bowl history .
Warner currently holds the seventh-highest career passer rating of all-time ( 93.7 ) , and the third-highest career completion  प्रतिशत in एनएफएल इतिहास साथ  65.5 % .
In 13 career playoff games , Warner ranks first all-time in completion  प्रतिशत ( 66.5 % ) , गज प्रति attempt ( 8.55 ) ,  and second in passer rating ( 102.8 ) .
He also  holds the उच्चतम पूर्णता प्रतिशत लिये a सिंगल खेल दौरान the नियमित ऋतु  , at 92.3 percent ( 24/26 ) , on September 20 , 2009 , against the Jacksonville Jaguars .
He announced his retirement on  जनवरी 29 , 2010. < संदर्भ name='cnn  2010-01-29 ' >
Janet  काय ruthven hagan ( ; born may 26 , 1953 ) is the  junior United States Senator from North Carolina , in office since January 2009 .
Previously she  परोसा in the उत्तर कैरोलिना सीनेट  from 1999 to 2009 .
She is a member of the  लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी और is viewed as  a moderate member of her party .
When Hagan defeated Republican  लाज़िम एलिज़ाबेथ dole in the 2008 संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट  election , she became the first woman to defeat an incumbent woman in a Senate election .
The Heisman  मेमोरियल ट्रॉफी पुरस्कार ( प्रायः ज्ञात colloquially  as the Heisman Trophy or the Heisman ) , is awarded annually to the player deemed the most outstanding player in collegiate football .
It was created in 1935 as the Downtown Athletic Club  ट्रॉफी और renamed in 1936 following the मौत of the क्लबों 's एथलेटिक निदेशक , जॉन heisman ( पूर्व भूरा विश्वविद्यालयों और विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया  player ; head football coach at Oberlin College , Auburn University , Clemson University , Rice University , and the University of Pennsylvania ; and football , basketball , and baseball head coach and athletic director at Georgia Tech ) .
The award is presented by the  heisman ट्रॉफी विश्वास in जल्दी दिसम्बर  before the postseason bowl games .
It is the oldest of several overall awards in college football , including the Maxwell Award ,  वाल्टर शिविर पुरस्कार , और the ap खिलाड़ी of the साल  .
The Heisman and the AP Player of the Year are the only awards to honor the most  बकाया खिलाड़ी , जबकि the मैक्सवेल पुरस्कार और वाल्टर शिविर  Award recognize the best player , and the Archie Griffin Award recognizes the most valuable player .
The United Nations Command ( UNC ) is the unified command structure for the multinational military forces supporting the Republic of Korea (  दक्षिण कोरियाई or rok ) दौरान और बाद the कोरियाई युद्ध  .
After troops of the Democratic People 's Republic of Korea ( North  कोरियाई or dprk ) invaded दक्षिण कोरियाई on जून 25 , 1950  , the United Nations Security Council adopted Resolution 82 calling on North Korea to cease hostilities and withdraw to the 38th parallel .
On June 27 , 1950 , it adopted Resolution 83 ,  recommending कि सदस्यों of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र provide सहायता to the गणतंत्र  of Korea `` to repel the armed attack and to restore international peace and security to the area '' .
Security  परिषद रेज़ोल्यूशन 84 , अपनाया on जुलाई 7 , 1950 , अनुशंसित कि सदस्यों providing सैन्य शक्तियां और अन्य सहायता  to South Korea `` make such forces and other assistance available to a unified command under the United States of America '' .
हालांकि the रिज़ॉल्यूशन सुझाया the शक्तियां अंतर्गत  the UNC were `` United Nations forces '' , and United Nations itself could be considered a belligerent , in practice the United Nations exercised no control over the combat forces , which were controlled by the United States .
Most observers concluded that the forces under the UNC were not in law United Nations  सैनिकों , और the अधिनियमों of the unc यहूद नहीं the अधिनियमों of the संयुक्त  Nations .
The UNC can be regarded as an  गठबंधन of नेशनल सेना , ऑपरेटिंग अंतर्गत the सामूहिक सही  of self-defense .
On August 29 , 1950 , the British Commonwealth 's 27th Infantry  ब्रिगेड arrived at बुसान to जुड़ें the unc , जिससे जबतक  then included only ROK and U.S. forces .
The 27th  ब्रिगेड स्थानांतरित into the naktong  River line west of Daegu .
Troop units from other countries  of the un followed in रैपिड उत्तराधिकार ; ऑस्ट्रेलिया , belgian  United Nations Command , Canada , Colombia , Ethiopia , France , Greece , Luxembourg , the Netherlands , New Zealand , the Philippines , Thailand and Turkey .
The Union of South Africa provided air units which  लड़ा alongside the एयर शक्तियां of अन्य सदस्य  nations .
Denmark ,  इण्डिया , नार्वे , और स्वीडन provided  medical units .
Italy provided a hospital , even  हालांकि it थी नहीं a un सदस्य  .
The United Nations Command and the  chinese-north कोरियाई कमांड हस्ताक्षरित the कोरियाई armistice अनुबंध on 27 जुलाई  1953 , ending the heavy fighting .
the armistice अनुबंध स्थापित the सैन्य armistice  Commission ( MAC ) , consisting of representatives of the two signatories , to supervise the implementation of the armistice terms .
The North  korean-chinese मैक रै महरूम replaced by  Panmumjon Representatives under exclusive North Korean management .
Regular meetings have been stopped , although duty officers of Joint Security Area , commonly known as the Truce Village of  panmunjom , इससे प्रत्येक पक्ष मिलें regularly  .
Lincoln Heights is an American family drama television series about Eddie Sutton ,  a मिशन विस्टा पुलिस अधिकारी जो चालें उसके परिवार वापस to उसके बूढ़ा पड़ोस , lincoln हाइट्स  , to start a new life and to help out his old neighborhood .
It is a dangerous place to raise a family , and through the many  ट्रायल the परिवार goes through , वे जल्द सीख  that settling in is not as easy as it seems .
While Officer  सटन struggles to cope साथ प्रत्येक दिन जीवन as a गली cop in लॉस एंजिल्स , उसके बच्चे कोशिश  to fit in at their new schools and with their new neighbors .
The show premiered January 8 , 2007 on the ABC Family network with 13 episodes ordered  लिये the पहला ऋतु  .
it थी स्वीकृत लिये a दूसरी ऋतु  , which premiered September 4 , 2007 .
Vanessa Hudgens ' song , Say  ok था महरूम प्रयुक्त in a वाणिज्यिक to प्रचार  the second season .
To promote the third season , they showed clips of Cassie and Charles 's relationship to the song , Crush by  the अमरीकी आइडल 's सातवाँ  season runner-up , David Archuleta .

The show 's theme song was written and performed by bassist Stanley Clarke and  singer-songwriter blaire reinhard .
On January 29 , 2010 ,  एबीसी परिवार घोषित the रद्दीकरण  of the series after four seasons .
A Christian denomination is an  identifiable धार्मिक देह  under a common name , structure , and doctrine within Christianity .
In the Orthodox tradition , churches are divided often along  जातीय और भाषाई लाइनों , into पृथक  churches and traditions .
Technically , divisions between one group and  another हैं पारिभाषित by doctrine  and church authority .
Issues  ऐसे as the प्रकृति of यीशु , the प्राधिकार of अपोस्टोलिक  succession , eschatology , and papal primacy separate one denomination from another .
The Roman Catholic Church is the largest denomination with over 1.1 billion members , over half of all Christians worldwide , making it the largest denomination for any religion worldwide (  हालांकि the गिरिजाघर करता नहीं दृश्य itself as a denomination , लकिन as the असली pre-denominational गिरिजाघर  ) .
Protestant denominations comprise roughly 38–39 % of Christians worldwide , and  साथ the catholics , protestants , anglicans , और अन्य closely  related denominations comprise Western Christianity .
the पूर्वी परंपरागत गिरिजाघर , प्राच्य परंपरागत चर्च  and the Assyrian Church of the East are considered Eastern Christian denominations .
Western  ईसाई denominations जीतना  in Western Europe and its former colonies .
Eastern Christian  denominations हैं represented ज़्यादातर in पूर्वी  Europe , the Middle East and North Africa .
Christians have various doctrines about the Church , the body of faithful that they believe  थी स्थापित by यीशु मसीह , और कैसा the  divine church corresponds to Christian denominations .
Both the Catholics and the Eastern Orthodox consider each of  themselves solely to faithfully represent the एक पावन कैथोलिक  and Apostolic Church to the exclusion of the other .
Protestants separated from the Catholic Church because of theologies and practices that they  माना to be in उल्लंघन of उनके  interpretation .
Generally , members of the various denominations acknowledge each other as Christians , at least to the extent that they have mutually recognized baptisms and acknowledge historically orthodox  दृश्य सहित the देवत्व of यीशु और doctrines of सिन और मोक्ष , भी हालांकि doctrinal और ecclesiological बाधाएं रोकते पूरा नियाज़ between  churches .
Since the reforms surrounding Vatican II , the Catholic Church has referred to Protestant communities as `` denominations '' , while reserving the term ``  गिरिजाघर '' लिये अपोस्टोलिक चर्च , सहित the पूर्वी परंपरागत ( देखिए subsistit in  and branch theory ) .
There are however some  non-denominational ईसाइयों जो do नहीं follow  any particular branch .
The panda (  ailuropoda  melanoleuca , lit .
`` black and white cat-foot '' ) , also known as the giant panda to distinguish it from the unrelated red panda , is a bear  देशी to central-western और दक्षिण पश्चिमी चीन .
It is easily  पहचाना by the विशाल , distinctive  black patches around its eyes , over the ears , and across its round body .
Though it belongs  to the अनुक्रम carnivora  , the panda 's diet is 99 % bamboo .
pandas in the जंगली होगा occasionally खा अन्य  grasses , wild tubers , or even meat in the form of birds , rodents or carrion .
In captivity  , वे may प्राप्त मधु , अंडे , मछली , yams  , shrub leaves , oranges , or bananas along with specially prepared food .
The giant panda lives in a few mountain ranges  in सेंट्रल चीन , मुख्यतः  in Sichuan province , but also in the Shaanxi and Gansu provinces .
As a result of farming , deforestation and other development , the  पांडा रै महरूम चलित आउट of the lowland  areas where it once lived .
The panda is  a संरक्षण reliant  endangered species .
A 2007 report shows 239 pandas living in captivity  अंदर चीन और another 27 बाहर the देश  .
Wild population estimates vary ; one estimate  shows कि वहीँ हैं परिचय 1,590 individuals जीना in the जंगली  , while a 2006 study via DNA analysis estimated that this figure could be as high as 2,000 to 3,000 .
Some  रिपोर्ट्स भी दिखाएँ कि the क्रमांक  of pandas in the wild is on the rise .
However , the IUCN does not believe there is enough certainty  yet to reclassify the प्रजाति इससे endangered to  Vulnerable .
While the dragon has often served as China 's national emblem ,  internationally the पांडा appears  at least as commonly .
As such , it is becoming widely used within China in  अंतरराष्ट्रीय contexts , लिये उदाहरण the  five Fuwa mascots of the Beijing Olympics .
The Kite Runner is a 2007 American drama film directed by Marc Forster based  on the अनोखा of the वही नाम  by Khaled Hosseini .
It tells the story of Amir , a well-to-do boy from the Wazir Akbar Khan district of Kabul , who is  tormented by the guilt of abandoning उसके dost हसन , the बेटे of उसके पिता  's Hazara servant .
The story is set against a  backdrop of उग्र  events , from the fall of the monarchy in Afghanistan through the Soviet military intervention , the mass exodus of Afghan refugees to Pakistan and the United States , and the Taliban regime .
Though  सबसे of the फिल्मी is नियत in अफगानिस्तान , ये भाग यहूद ज़्यादातर शॉट in  Kashgar , China , due to the dangers of filming in Afghanistan at the time .
The majority of the film 's  संवाद is in जमींदारी , साथ the शेष  spoken in English .
The child actors  हैं देशी अध्यक्षों , लकिन अनेक वयस्क  actors had to learn Dari .
Filming wrapped up on December 21 , 2006 , and the film was  अपेक्षित to be released on नवम्बर 2  , 2007 .
However , after concern for the safety of the young actors in the film due to fears of violent reprisals to the sexual nature of some  दृश्यों in जिससे वे appear , इसके रिलीज तिथि थी धकेल वापस छह सप्ताह to  December 14 , 2007 .
the पतंग धावक थी released  on DVD on March 25 , 2008 .
A HD DVD release was announced for the same date , but  थी रद्द following the स्वरूप  's demise .
The film  थी मनोनीत लिये the सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार  for Best Foreign Language Film in 2007 .
The film 's  स्कोर by अल्बर्टो इग्लेसियस थी मनोनीत  for Best Original Score at the Golden Globes and the Academy Awards .
The legality of  कैनबिस varies इससे देश to  country .
Possession of cannabis is illegal in most  देशों और रै महरूम चूंकि the  beginning of widespread cannabis prohibition in the late 1930s .
However , many countries have decriminalized the  कब्ज़ा of छोटी quantities of कैनबिस , विशेषकर  in North America , South America and Europe .
Furthermore , possession is legal or effectively legal in the Netherlands , North Korea and would be in the U.S. states of Colorado and  वॉशिंगटन if it यहूद नहीं लिये संघीय विधि , जिससे governs व्यक्तियों in सब राज्य  .
The medicinal use of cannabis is legal in a number of countries  , सहित कनाडा , the  Czech Republic and Israel .
While federal law in the United States bans all sale and possession of cannabis , enforcement varies widely at the state level and some states have  स्थापित औषधीय मारिजुआना कार्यक्रम in कि खण्डन संघीय विधि ; दो राज्य ( कोलोराडो और वॉशिंगटन ) have repealed  their laws prohibiting the recreational use of cannabis and replaced them with a regulatory regime , also contrary to federal statute .
Some countries have  कानून कि हैं नहीं as vigorously prosecuted as अन्य लकिन , अलावा  from the countries that offer access to medical marijuana , most countries have various penalties ranging from lenient to very severe .
Some infractions are taken more seriously in some countries than others in regard to the cultivation , use , possession  or ट्रांसफ़र of कैनबिस लिये recreational उपयोग  .
A few jurisdictions have lessened penalties for possession of small quantities of cannabis , making it  दंडनीय by confiscation और a ठीक  , rather than imprisonment .
Some jurisdictions/ drug courts use  अनिवार्य उपचार कार्यक्रम लिये यंग or बारंबार उपयोक्ता , साथ स्वतंत्रता  from narcotic drugs as the goal and a few jurisdictions permit cannabis use for medicinal purposes .
There are also changes in a more restrictive  दिशा as in  Canada .
Drug tests to detect  कैनबिस हैं increasingly आम in अनेक देशों और have  resulted in jail sentences and people losing their jobs .
however , सरल कब्ज़ा can carry long कारावास वाक्य in कुछ देशों , विशेषकर in भाग of  East Asia and Southeast Asia where the sale of cannabis may lead to a sentence of life in prison or even execution .
Loxahatchee is a community  स्तिथ in ताड़ बीच काउंटी , फ्लोरिडा  , United States .
It  is स्तिथ in the क्षेत्रों उत्तर of वेलिंगटन और वेस्ट  and northwest of Royal Palm Beach , Florida and approximately west of West Palm Beach .
Loxahatchee is also the name of the Post  दफ्तर कि serves इस क्षेत्रफल , जिससे is अंतर्गत  the zip code of 33470 .
The name Loxahatchee  अर्थात् `` कछुआ  river . ''
Loxahatchee is located within the Indian Trails  सुधार ज़िला और the loxahatchee groves जल  Control District .
Lion Country Safari , a drive-through  safari पार्क , is स्तिथ in loxahatchee  .
In 2006 , the state of Florida approved incorporation of part of Loxahatchee as  the कस्बा of loxahatchee groves to become the 38th नगरपालिका  in Palm Beach County .
The main reason for  incorporating थी to बेहतर protect the क्षेत्रफल इससे बुवाई विकास  and to preserve the rural character of the neighborhood .
Perhaps the most rural area  भीतर a बंद निकटता to वेस्ट ताड़ बीच , साथ लॉट  sizes range from 1-20 acres .
Along  साथ the acreage , it is notable लिये ढीला  land restrictions and the native and exotic animal presence is quite notable .
Seminole Ridge High  स्कूल serves the  area .
The Canadian Citizenship Test is a test , administered by Citizenship and Immigration Canada ( CIC ) , that is required  लिये सब आवेदकों लिये कनाडाई नागरिकता जो हैं aged between 18 और 54 और जो मिलें the मौलिक आवश्यकताएँ लिये नागरिकता  .
The test is available in  दोनो फ्रेंच और अंग्रेज़ी , the आधिकारिक  languages of Canada .
Renaissance Cruises , originally founded in 1989 owned by Fearnley & Eger Rederi in Oslo - Norway , later purchased by Edward Rudner  ( संस्थापक of alamo car rental ) as the कम्पनी faltered दौरान the गल्फ युद्ध  .
They operated year-round cruise itineraries to the  भूमध्यसागरीय , the यूनानी isles , tahiti और the  South Pacific , Northern Europe and Scandinavia .
The company ceased operations on 25 September 2001 and accommodated up  to 220,000 अतिथि in  2000 .
While the company had been in poor  वित्तीय स्वास्थ्य लिये काफी कुछ समय , the आर्थिक मनाही resulting इससे the सितंबर  11th terrorist attacks are credited with the demise of this cruise line .
The  बेड़े is सूचीबद्ध अंतर्गत सूची of  cruise ships .
It was headquartered in Fort  lauderdale , फ्लोरिडा  .
Epithelium is one of the four basic types of  एनिमल ऊतक , साथ साथ संयोजी  tissue , muscle tissue and nervous tissue .
Epithelial tissues line the cavities and surfaces of  structures throughout the देह , और  also form many glands .
Functions of epithelial cells include secretion ,  चयनात्मक अवशोषण , सुरक्षा , transcellular  transport and detection of sensation .
In Greek  `` ἐπί '' ( `` epi '' ) अर्थात् `` on ''  or `` upon '' , and `` θηλή '' ( `` thēlē '' ) means `` nipple '' .
Epithelial layers are avascular , so they must receive  nourishment via diffusion of substances इससे the underlying  connective tissue , through the basement membrane .
Epithelia can also be  व्यवस्थित into क्लस्टर of कोशिकाएं कि  function as exocrine and endocrine glands .
Kent E.  hovind ( born जनवरी 15 ,  1953 ) is an American young Earth creationist .
Hovind has spoken on creation science and has aimed to convince listeners to reject theories of evolution , geophysics  , और cosmology in एहसान of उसके निर्वचन of the  Genesis creation narrative from the Bible .
Hovind 's views are  contradicted by वैज्ञानिक प्रमाण और कुछ of उसके विचार have भी महरूम criticized  by young Earth creationist organizations such as Answers in Genesis .
hovind स्थापित the सृष्टि विज्ञान इंजीलवाद in 1991 , और अक्सर  spoke on young Earth creationism at seminars at private schools and churches , debates , and on radio and television broadcasts .
Since January 2007 , Hovind has been serving a ten-year prison sentence after being convicted of 58  संघीय रिश्तो , सहित 12 कर offenses , एक गिनती of obstructing संघीय एजेंटों  , and 45 counts of structuring cash transactions .
he is incarcerated  at the Federal Correctional Institution at Berlin , New Hampshire .
Bride with Bindi  सजा माथे
A bindi ( , from Sanskrit bindu , meaning `` a drop , small particle , dot '' ) , or a pottu/bottu ( in Tamil , Telugu , and Malayalam ) is  a माथे सजावट worn in दक्षिण एशिया ( विशेषकर इण्डिया , बांग्लादेश , नेपाल , श्री लंका  and Mauritius ) and Southeast Asia .
Traditionally it is a bright dot of red color applied in the center of the forehead close to the eyebrows , but it can  भी consist of a चिह्न or टुकड़ा of आभूषण worn at इस स्थान  .
The New York gubernatorial election of 2010 was held on Tuesday , November 2 , 2010 , to elect the  राज्यपाल of नई यॉर्क , to serve a four-year पद कि began in जनवरी  2011 .
Incumbent Democratic Governor David Paterson , elected as Lieutenant  राज्यपाल in 2006 as the कार्यशील mate of पूर्व राज्यपाल एलियट स्पिट्जर  , chose not to run for a full-term .
On November 2 ,  नई यॉर्क attorney सामान्य और डेमोक्रेट  Andrew Cuomo defeated Republican Carl Paladino .
Green Party candidate Howie Hawkins received over 57,000 votes , allowing the New York Green Party to  be सूचीबद्ध on the बैलट लिये the अगला 4  years .
The main cast of Dragon Ball at  the समाप्त of the  manga .
The Dragon Ball manga and anime  श्रेणी सुविधाएँ an extensive डाल of वर्ण निर्मित  by Akira Toriyama .
The series takes place in a fictional universe , the same as Toriyama 's previous series Dr. Slump , and follows the adventures of martial artist Son Goku from childhood to  adulthood as he खोज लिये the सात spheres ज्ञात as the ड्रैगन गेंदें , प्रयुक्त to  summon a wish-granting dragon .
During the course of the story , he encounters allies such as Bulma , Yamcha , Kuririn and Trunks , rivals such as  tenshinhan , piccolo और vegeta , और दुश्मनों  such as Freeza and Cell .
While many of the characters are humans with superhuman strength and/or  अलौकिक abilities , the डाल भी शामिल anthropomorphic  animals and later , extraterrestrial lifeforms .
The series also includes depictions of the  आफ्टरलाइफ , साथ अनेक वर्ण होने देवताओं कि govern  the universe .

The Comanche are a Plains  भारतीय जनजाति जिनकी ऐतिहासिक territory , ज्ञात as comancheria , consisted of उपस्थित दिन  eastern New Mexico , southern Colorado , northeastern Arizona , southern Kansas , all of Oklahoma , and most of northwest Texas .
The Comanche people are enrolled  in the federally  recognized Comanche Nation , in Oklahoma .
Historically ,  the comanches यहूद hunter-gatherers  with a horse culture .
There may have been as many as  45,000 comanches in the लेट  18th century .
Today  , the comanche स्वदेश comanche जनजातीय नामांकन संख्याएँ 15,191  with approximately 7,763 members residing in the Lawton – Fort Sill and surrounding areas of Southwest Oklahoma .
The Comanche Nation Homecoming  powwow is आयोजित annually in walters , ओक्लाहोमा in  mid-July .
The Comanche spoke the Comanche language , a Numic language of the Uto-Aztecan family , sometimes  वर्गीकृत as a shoshone dialect ; however , तभी परिचय 1  % of Comanches speak it today .
Ethan Frome is a novel published in 1911 by the Pulitzer Prize  -winning अमरीकी लेखक एडिथ व्हार्टन  .
It is set in the fictitious  कस्बा of starkfield  , Massachusetts .
The novel was adapted into a  फिल्मी , ethan frome  , in 1993 .
Times Square Studios ( TSS ) is an American  टेलीविज़न स्टुडियो स्तिथ in the टाइम्स वर्गाकार  neighborhood of the Manhattan borough of New York City , New York .
The studio is best known as the  उत्पादन घर of एबीसी न्यूज ' शुभ morning  America ( GMA ) , a morning news and talk program and segments for GMA on ABC News Now .

Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold  in स्टोर्स , रेस्तरां  , and vending machines in every country except Cuba and North Korea .
It is produced by The Coca-Cola Company of  अटलांटा , जॉर्जिया , और is प्रायः referred to बस as कोक ( a पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क  of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March 27 , 1944 ) .
Originally intended as  a पेटेंट आयुर्विज्ञान जब it थी invented in the लेट 19th सदी by जॉन pemberton , coca-cola थी खरीदा आउट by बिजनेसमैन asa  Griggs Candler , whose marketing tactics led Coke to its dominance of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century .
The company produces concentrate , which is  तब बेची to licensed coca-cola bottlers throughout the संसार  .
The bottlers , who hold territorially exclusive contracts with the company , produce finished product in cans and bottles from the concentrate in combination  साथ filtered जल और  sweeteners .
The bottlers then sell , distribute and merchandise  coca-cola to खुदरा स्टोर्स  and vending machines .
Such bottlers  शामिल coca-cola उद्यमों , जिससे is the largest सिंगल coca-cola  bottler in North America and western Europe .
The Coca-Cola  कम्पनी भी बिकता concentrate लिये सोडा स्रोतों  to major restaurants and food service distributors .
The Coca-Cola Company has , on occasion  , introduced अन्य कोला पेय  under the Coke brand name .
The most common of these is Diet Coke , with others including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola , Diet Coke  caffeine-free , coca-cola चेरी , coca-cola शून्य , coca-cola वैनिला , और खास संस्करण साथ नीबू , लाइम or कॉफी  .
Based on Interbrand 's best  वैश्विक ब्रांड 2011 , coca-cola थी the  world 's most valuable brand .
Types  of bar-lines
In musical  संकेतन , a बार ( or माप ) is a खण्ड of समय पारिभाषित  by a given number of beats , each of which are assigned a particular note value .
Dividing music into bars  provides नियमित सन्दर्भ अंक to pin  point locations within a piece of music .
It also makes written music easier  to follow , चूंकि प्रत्येक बार of स्टाफ प्रतीकों  can be read and played as a batch .
Typically , a piece consists of several bars of the same length , and in modern musical notation the number of beats in each bar is  निर्दिष्ट at the शुरूआत of the स्कोर by the शीर्ष क्रमांक of a समय हस्ताक्षर ( ऐसे as 3/4 ) , जबकि the नीचे क्रमांक  indicates the note value of the beat ( the beat has a quarter note value in the 3/4 example ) .
The word bar is more common in British English , and  the शब्द माप is अधिक आम in अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी , हालांकि  musicians generally understand both usages .
In American English  , हालांकि the शब्द बार और माप हैं प्रायः  used interchangeably the correct use of the word 'bar ' refers only to the vertical line itself , while the word 'measure ' refers to the beats contained between bars .
In international usage , it is equally  सही to बोलो of बार संख्याएँ और माप संख्याएँ , e.g  . ‘bars 9–16’ or ‘mm . 9–16’ .
Along the same lines , it is  हिकमत to आरक्षित the abbreviated  form ‘bb .
3–4’ etc  . लिये बीट्स तभी ; बार चाहिए  be referred to by name in full .
The first metrically complete measure within a piece of  म्यूज़िक is पुकारा ‘bar 1’ or ‘m  . 1’ .
When the piece begins with an anacrusis ( an incomplete measure at the head of a piece  of म्यूज़िक ) , ‘bar 1’ or ‘m . 1’ is the following  measure .
The 19.9 MW  gemasolar सौर संयंत्र in स्पेन  features 15 hours of storage and can supply power 24 hours a day .
Solar energy , radiant light and heat  इससे the सूर्य , रै महरूम harnessed by  humans since ancient times using a range of ever-evolving technologies .
Solar energy technologies include solar heating , solar photovoltaics , solar thermal electricity , solar architecture and artificial photosynthesis , which can make considerable contributions to solving  कुछ of the सबसे तात्कालिक उर्जा समस्याएं the संसार  now faces .
Solar  technologies हैं broadly characterized  as either passive solar or active solar depending on the way they capture , convert and distribute solar energy .
Active solar techniques  शामिल the उपयोग of photovoltaic  panels and solar thermal collectors to harness the energy .
Passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun , selecting materials with favorable  थर्मल द्रव्यमान or लाइट dispersing गुण  , and designing spaces that naturally circulate air .
In 2011 , the International Energy Agency said that `` the development of affordable ,  inexhaustible और साफ सौर उर्जा technologies होगा have विशाल longer-term  benefits .
It will increase countries’ energy security  through रिलायंस on an स्वदेशी , inexhaustible और ज़्यादातर import-independent संसाधन , बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता , reduce प्रदूषण  , lower the costs of mitigating climate change , and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise .
These  लाभ  are global .
Hence the additional costs  of the प्रोत्साहन लिये जल्दी deployment चाहिए be माना सीखना  investments ; they must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared '' .
प्राथमिक परवाह  may be provided in community health centres .
Primary care is  the स्वास्थ्य परवाह दिए by a स्वास्थ्य  care provider .
Typically this provider acts as the principal point of consultation for patients  भीतर a स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रणाली और निर्देशांक अन्य specialists कि the रोगी  may need .
Such a professional can be a primary care physician , such as a general practitioner or family physician , or depending on the locality , health system organization , and patient 's discretion , they may see a pharmacist , a physician  सहायक , a नर्स practitioner , a नर्स ( ऐसे as in the संयुक्त किंगडम ) , a नैदानिक अधिकारी ( ऐसे as in भाग of अफ़्रीकी ) , or an आयुर्वेदिक or अन्य  traditional medicine professional ( such as in parts of Asia ) .
Depending on the nature of the health condition , patients may  तब be referred लिये द्वितीयक or tertiary  care .
`` Ocean Avenue '' is a  सोंग अंकित by अमरीकी पॉप पंक  group Yellowcard .
it थी released in फ़रवरी 2004 as the दूसरी  single from Ocean Avenue and the third track .
It is known for  bringing उन्हें into the मुख्यधारा  , as it received numerous spins on MTV and increasing radio airplay .
Ocean Avenue is a street  in jacksonville , फ्लोरिडा , the बैंड 's stomping grounds  near their high school , Douglas Anderson School of the Arts , and another street mentioned in the song , Cherry Street .
The name of Ocean  एवेन्यू in jacksonville is दरअसल  Beach Boulevard .
They left their original base  पीछे जब वे स्थानांतरित to  Los Angeles .
The song was  प्रदर्शित on the much म्यूज़िक  compilation album Big Shiny Tunes 9 .
A psychiatrist is a  चिकित्सक जो specializes  in psychiatry .
A  मनोचिकित्सक specializes in the उपचार  of mental disorders .
Psychiatrists are authorized  to prescribe आयुर्विज्ञान , conduct शारीरिक examinations , अनुक्रम और interpret प्रयोगशाला परीक्षण , उपयोग मनोचिकित्सा और may अनुक्रम दिमाग  imaging studies such as computed tomography ( CT/CAT Scan ) , magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) , and positron emission tomography ( PET ) scanning .
Within the framework of the World Health Organization 's ( WHO ) definition  of स्वास्थ्य as a राज्य of पूरा शारीरिक , दिमागी और सोशल  well-being , and not merely the absence of disease or infirmity , reproductive health , or sexual health/hygiene , addresses the reproductive processes , functions and system at all stages of life .
Reproductive health , therefore , implies that people are able to have a  जिम्मेदार , संतोषजनक और safer sex जीवन और कि वे have the काबिलियत to reproduce  and the freedom to decide if , when and how often to do so .
One interpretation of this implies that men and women ought to be informed of and to have access to safe , effective , affordable and acceptable methods of birth control ; also access to appropriate health care services of sexual , reproductive medicine  और क्रियान्वयन of स्वास्थ्य शिक्षा कार्यक्रम to तनाव the महत्व of महिलाओं to go सकुशल through गर्भावस्था और प्रसव  could provide couples with the best chance of having a healthy infant .
On the  अन्य हाथ individuals do फेस  inequalities in reproductive health services .
Inequalities vary based on socioeconomic  औकात , शिक्षा स्तर , आयु , नस्ल , धर्म , और संसाधन  available in their environment .
It is possible for example , that low income individuals lack the resources for appropriate health services and the knowledge to know what is appropriate  लिये maintaining reproductive स्वास्थ्य  .
According to the WHO , `` Reproductive and  यौन ill-health खाते लिये 20 % of the वैश्विक बोझ  of ill-health for women , and 14 % for men . ''
Reproductive health is a part of Sexual and  reproductive स्वास्थ्य और अधिकारों  .
