Core 2 is a brand encompassing a range  of इंटेल 's उपभोक्ता 64-bit x86-64 single- ,  dual- , and quad-core microprocessors based on the Core microarchitecture .
The single- and dual-core models are single- die , whereas the  quad-core मॉडल comprise दो मरता  , each containing two cores , packaged in a multi-chip module .
The introduction of Core 2 relegated  the pentium ब्रांड to the mid-range मार्केट , और reunified लैपटॉप  and desktop CPU lines , which previously had been divided into the Pentium 4 , Pentium D , and Pentium M brands .
The Core 2 brand was introduced on 27 July 2006 , comprising the Solo (  single-core ) , duo ( dual-core ) , क्वाड ( quad-core ) , और in 2007 , the चरम  ( dual- or quad-core CPUs for enthusiasts ) subbrands .
Intel Core 2 processors with vPro technology ( designed for businesses )  शामिल the dual-core और quad-core शाखाओं  .
The Super Bowl is the annual championship game of the National Football League ( NFL ) , the highest level of professional American football in the United States , culminating  a ऋतु कि  begins in the late summer of the previous calendar year .
The  सुपर कटोरी उपयोग रोमन numerals to  identify each game , rather than the year in which it is held .
For example , Super Bowl I was played on January 15 , 1967 , following the 1966 regular season ,  जबकि सुपर कटोरी xlvii थी निभाई on फ़रवरी 3 , 2013  , following the 2012 season .
The game was created as part of a merger agreement between the NFL and its then-rival  लीग , the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( afl  ) .
It was  सहमत कि the दो लीग ' चैंपियन टीमों होता खेल  in an AFL–NFL World Championship Game until the merger was to officially begin in 1970 .
After the merger , each league was  redesignated as a `` सम्मेलन `` , और the खेल थी तब निभाई  between the conference champions .
Currently , the  नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) लीड the श्रेणी साथ  25 wins to 22 wins for the American Football Conference ( AFC ) .
The day  on जिससे the सुपर कटोरी is निभाई , अभी माना by कुछ a de  facto American national holiday , is called `` Super Bowl Sunday `` .
It is the second-largest day for U.S.  खाना खपत , बाद थैंक्सगिविंग  Day .
In addition , the Super Bowl has frequently been the most watched American  टेलीविज़न ब्रॉडकास्ट of the साल  .
Super Bowl XLV , played in 2011 , became the most-watched American television program in history , drawing an average  दर्शक of 111 लाख दर्शक और लेने over the स्पॉट आयोजित by the पिछला साल 's सुपर कटोरी , जिससे itself था  taken over the # 1 spot held for twenty-eight years by the final episode of M*A*S*H .
The Super Bowl is also among the most watched sporting events in the world , almost all being North American audiences , and is  दूसरी to संघ फ़ुटबॉल ’s यूईएफए champions लीग फाइनल as the  most watched annual sporting event worldwide .
Because of its high viewership , commercial airtime during the Super  कटोरी ब्रॉडकास्ट is the सबसे महंगी of the  year .
Due to the high cost of  निवेश in विज्ञापन on the सुपर कटोरी ,  companies regularly develop their most expensive advertisements for this broadcast .
as a परिणाम , watching और discussing  the broadcast 's commercials has become a significant aspect of the event .
in जोड , अनेक लोकप्रिय गायकों  and musicians have performed during the event 's pre-game and halftime ceremonies because of the exposure .
Fiona is a  feminine दिए  name .
The name Fiona was invented , and first used , by the Scottish poet James Macpherson ( 1736–96 ) , author  of the ossian कविताएं , जिससे he claimed यहूद अनुवाद इससे  ancient Gaelic sources ( sources , when challenged , he never produced ) .
The name was subsequently used as a pseudonym by William Sharp ( 1855–1905 ) , who authored several  रोमांटिक works अंतर्गत the नाम ``  Fiona Macleod '' .
The name has since become  लोकप्रिय in इंग्लैण्ड , स्कॉटलैंड  and Ireland .
The name is considered to be a Latinised form of the  गैलिक शब्द fionn , अर्थ ``  white '' , `` fair '' .
The name Fiona is also sometimes used as an Anglicisation of  the irish-language नाम fíona , हालांकि ये names  are otherwise unrelated ( as Fíona is derived from an element meaning `` vine '' ) .
There is also a modern  tendency to equate the प्रामाणिक स्कॉटिश गैलिक feminine  name Fionnghal with Fiona .
The name Fiona is rising in popularity particularly  in जर्मनी -speaking देशों  .
Fiona was the 49th most popular  नाम लिये baby लड़कियों born in 2008  in Germany .
Fiona was tied for third place in the ranking of most popular names for baby girls born in the tiny principality  of liechtenstein in 2008  .
The name was the 347th most popular name for girls born in the United States in 2008 , where it has ranked  among the शीर्ष 1,000 सबसे लोकप्रिय names लिये लड़कियों चूंकि 1990 और among the शीर्ष 500 चूंकि 1999 .
The name Fiona has been particularly popular  लिये लड़कियों of एशियाई or प्रशांत islander descent in नई यॉर्क नगर , जहाँ फिओना  ranked as the ninth most popular name for girls from those groups in 2007 .
Many languages are used , or  historically have महरूम प्रयुक्त in the  United States .
The most  commonly प्रयुक्त भाषा  is English .
There are also many languages indigenous to North America or to U.S. states or  holdings in the प्रशांत  region .
Languages brought to the country by colonists or immigrants from Europe , Asia , or other parts of the world make up a large portion of the languages currently used ; several  भाषाएं , सहित creoles और चिह्न भाषाएं , have भी विकसित  in the United States .
Approximately 337 languages  हैं बोला or हस्ताक्षरित by the जनसांख्यिकी , of जिससे 176 हैं स्वदेशी  to the area .
Fifty-two languages  formerly बोला in the देश 's territory  are now extinct .
The variety of English spoken  in the संयुक्त राज्य is ज्ञात  as American English .
English is the de facto national language of the United States , with 80 % of the population  claiming it as a माँ जीभ , और कुछ 95 % claiming to बोलो it `` खूब  '' or `` very well '' .
However , no official language  exists at the संघीय स्तर  .
There have been several proposals to make  अंग्रेज़ी the नेशनल भाषा in amendments to आव्रजन  reform bills , but none of these bills has become law with the amendment intact .
The situation is quite varied at the state and territorial levels , with some states mirroring the federal policy of adopting no official  भाषा in a de jure क्षमता , अन्य adopting अंग्रेज़ी अलोन , अन्य officially adopting अंग्रेज़ी as खूब as लोकल भाषाएं  , and still others adopting a policy of de facto bilingualism .
Spanish is the second most common language in the  देश , और is बोला by over 12 % of the  population .
The  संयुक्त राज्य holds the संसार 's पांचवां largest spanish-speaking जनसांख्यिकी , outnumbered  only by Mexico , Spain , Colombia , and Argentina .
Throughout the Southwestern United States , long-established Spanish-speaking  समुदायों coexist साथ विशाल संख्याएँ of अधिक हाल hispanophone  immigrants .
Although many new Latin American immigrants are less than fluent in English , nearly all second-generation Hispanic Americans  बोलो अंग्रेज़ी धड़ल्ले , जबकि तभी परिचय हाफ स्टिल बोलो स्पेनी  .
According to the 2000 US census , people of German ancestry make up the largest single ethnic group  in the संयुक्त राज्य , और the जर्मनी भाषा बाँधने  fifth .
Italian , Polish , and French are still  widely बोला among populations descending इससे आप्रवासियों इससे  those countries in the early 20th century , but the use of these languages is dwindling as the older generations die .
Russian is also  बोला by अप्रवासी populations  .
Tagalog and Vietnamese have over one million speakers each in the United  राज्य , लगभग entirely भीतर हाल  immigrant populations .
दोनो भाषाएं , साथ साथ the किस्में of the चाइनीज भाषा , जापानी  , and Korean , are now used in elections in Alaska , California , Hawaii , Illinois , New York , Texas , and Washington .
Native American languages are spoken in  छोटी pockets of the देश  , but these populations are decreasing , and the languages are almost never widely used outside of reservations .
Hawaiian , although having few native  अध्यक्षों , is an आधिकारिक भाषा साथ साथ अंग्रेज़ी  at the state level in Hawaii .
The state  सरकारी of louisiana offers सेवाएं  and documents in French , as does New Mexico in Spanish .
Besides  अंग्रेज़ी , स्पेनी , फ्रेंच , जर्मनी , navajo और अन्य देशी अमरीकी भाषाएं , सब अन्य भाषाएं हैं प्रायः  learned from immigrant ancestors that came after the time of independence or learned through some form of education .
1990 's  pontiac ग्रैंड am  Sedan fender and quarter panel
On an automobile , a quarter panel ( or rear  wing as it is ज्ञात in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी ) is प्रायः माना the देह फलक जिससे goes between the पश्च द्वार और the ट्रंक और typically wraps around the  wheel well ; however , the similar front section Fender ( vehicle ) , between the door and the hood , is sometimes incorrectly referred to as a quarter panel .
The quarter panel is typically made of Sheet  मेटल , लकिन is sometimes बना of fiberglass or fiber-reinforced  plastic ; although , this varies with different makes and models .
A quarter panel is typically a  welded on घटक of the uni-body ढांचा or  Monocoque .
Replacement of a sheet metal quarter panel typically  requires it to be काटें बंद the गाडी और a बदलना भाग to be welded ( or  sometimes bonded ) to the Vehicle .
Due to this high amount of specialized labor , a quarter panel may often be repaired rather than replaced by hammering out the  क्षति , और a देह फिलर sometimes referred to as bondo to be लागू to finalize  the original surface .
shropshire ( or ; alternatively  Salop ; abbreviated , in print only , Shrops ) is a county in the West Midlands region of England .
It borders Wales to the  वेस्ट , चेशायर to the उत्तर , staffordshire  to the east , Worcestershire to the south-east and Herefordshire to the south .
A unitary authority ( Shropshire Council ) was created on 1 April 2009 , taking over from the previous county council and 5 district  councils , और कवर सबसे of the काउंटी  .
The borough of Telford and  wrekin  has been a separate unitary authority since 1998 but continues to be included in the ceremonial county .
The county 's population and economy is centred on  पाँच कस्बों : the काउंटी कस्बा of shrewsbury , जिससे is culturally और historically महत्वपूर्ण और is स्तिथ in the केन्द्र of  the county ; Telford , a new town in the east which was constructed around a number of older towns , most notably Wellington , Dawley and Madeley , which is today the most populous ; and Oswestry in the north-west , Bridgnorth just to the south of Telford , and Ludlow in the south .
The county has many further market towns , including  whitchurch in the उत्तर , न्यूपोर्ट बस to the north-east  of Telford , and Market Drayton in the north-east of the county .
The Ironbridge Gorge area is a UNESCO World Heritage Site ,  covering ironbridge  , Coalbrookdale and a part of Madeley .
There are , additionally , other notable historic industrial sites located around the county , such as  at shrewsbury , broseley , snailbeach और highley as खूब as  the Shropshire Union Canal .
The Shropshire Hills Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty covers about a  क्वार्टर of the काउंटी  , mainly in the south .
Shropshire is one of England 's most rural and sparsely populated counties , with the population density of  the shropshire परिषद क्षेत्रफल होने बस 91/km2 ( 337/sq  mi ) .
The Wrekin is one of the most famous natural landmarks in the county ,  हालांकि the उच्चतम पहाड़ियाँ हैं the clee पहाड़ियाँ , stiperstones  and the Long Mynd .
Wenlock Edge is another  significant भौगोलिक और geological  landmark .
In the low-lying northwest of the county  ( और अतिव्यापी the किनारा साथ वेल्स ) is  the Fenn 's , Whixall and Bettisfield Mosses National Nature Reserve , one of the most important and best preserved bogs in Britain .
The River Severn , Great Britain 's longest river , runs through the  काउंटी , exiting into वॉस्टरशायर via  the Severn Valley .
shropshire is landlocked , और  with an area of , is England 's largest inland county .
The  काउंटी पुष्प is the  round-leaved sundew .
For Eurostat purposes , the  काउंटी ( कम the एकात्मक ज़िला of telford और  Wrekin ) is a NUTS 3 region ( code UKG22 ) .
The two Shropshire unitary areas ( covering all of the ceremonial county ) ,  साथ साथ the अधिकारियों covering the ceremonial काउंटी of staffordshire  , comprise the `` Shropshire and Staffordshire '' NUTS 2 region .

The American sitcom The Big Bang  सिद्धान्त , निर्मित और कार्यपालिका उत्पादित by  Chuck Lorre and Bill Prady , premiered on CBS on September 24 , 2007 .
The show centers on five  वर्ण : roommates शेल्डन कूपर और लियोनार्ड hofstadter , दो caltech physicists ; पैनी , a वेट्रेस और aspiring  actress who lives across the hall ; and Leonard and Sheldon 's friends and co-workers aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz , and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali .
Over time , several supporting characters have been promoted to starring roles : Leslie Winkle ( season 1 recurring ; season 2 regular ; season 3 guest ) , a physicist colleague , and , at different times , a lover of both Leonard and Howard  ; bernadette rostenkowski-wolowitz ( ऋतु 3 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ) , a microbiologist , हावर्ड 's fiancée और subsequent बीवी , और पूर्व part-time वेट्रेस alongside  Penny ; neuroscientist Amy Farrah Fowler ( season 3 guest ; season 4 recurring ; season 4-present regular ) , who joins the group after being matched to Sheldon on a dating website ; and comic book store-owner , Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ) , who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space .
The show also  सुविधाएँ numerous supporting वर्ण , प्रत्येक of जिसको plays  a prominent role in a small group of episodes .
The A-Team is an American action-adventure  टेलीविज़न श्रेणी , कार्यशील इससे 1983 to 1987 , परिचय a fictional समूह of ex– संयुक्त राज्य फौज खास  Forces personnel who work as soldiers of fortune , while on the run from the Army after being branded as war criminals for a `` crime they did n't commit `` .

Wat  phra kaew , बैंकॉक  , Thailand
There is no official state religion in the Thai constitution ,  जिससे guarantees धार्मिक स्वतंत्रता लिये सब थाई नागरिकों , हालांकि the किंग is  required by law to be Buddhist .
According to the last census  ( 2000 ) 94.6 % of thais हैं  Buddhists of the Theravada tradition .
Muslims are  the दूसरी largest धार्मिक समूह  in Thailand at 4.6 % .
Thailand 's southernmost  प्रांतों - pattani , yala , narathiwat और भाग of songkhla  Chumphon have dominant Muslim populations , consisting of both ethnic Thai and Malay .
the दक्षिणी  tip of Thailand is mostly ethnic Malays .
Christians , mainly Catholics ,  represent 0.7 % of the जनसांख्यिकी  .
A small but influential community of  सिखों in थाईलैंड और कुछ हिन्दुओं भी सजीव in the देश  's cities , and are heavily engaged in retail commerce .
There is also a small Jewish  जातियाँ in थाईलैंड , डेटिंग  back to the 17th century .
Since 2001 , Muslim activists , generally  वर्णित by the थाई सरकारी as आतंकवादी or separatists , have rallied विरूद्ध the सेंट्रल सरकारी  because of alleged corruption and ethnic bias on the part of officials .
Thailand 's Department of Religion , currently under the Ministry of Culture , is formally responsible for the registration of religious groups in Thailand URL_http which hold properties  through legally स्थापित मूलाधार  .
It has oversight , along with the Immigration Police , over the work permits of missionaries who are ``  प्रवासी धार्मिक मजदूर ''  of all religions .
A value  added कर ( vat ) is a रूप of खपत  tax .
From the perspective of the buyer , it is  a कर on the खरीदें  price .
From that of the seller , it is a tax only on the value added  to a उत्पाद , सामग्री , or सेवा , इससे an हिसाब पाइंट of दृश्य ,  by this stage of its manufacture or distribution .
The manufacturer remits to the government the difference between these two amounts , and retains the rest  लिये themselves to ऑफसेट the कर वे था previously  paid on the inputs .
The value added to a product by or with a business is the sale price  चार्ज to इसके ग्राहक , ऋण the लागत of सामग्री और अन्य taxable  inputs .
A VAT is like a sales tax in  कि ultimately तभी the समाप्त  consumer is taxed .
It differs from the sales tax in that , with the latter , the tax is collected  और remitted to the सरकारी तभी एकबार , at the पाइंट of खरीदें  by the end consumer .
With  the vat , संग्रहण , remittances to the सरकारी , और क्रेडिट लिये कर  already paid occur each time a business in the supply chain purchases products .
A  रेफरी कॉलिंग a high-sticking  penaltyHigh
-sticking is the name of two infractions in the sport of ice hockey that  may occur जब a खिलाड़ी intentionally or inadvertently plays साथ उसके or उसके स्टिक ऊपर the ऊँचाई  of the shoulders or above the cross bar of a hockey goal .
This  can परिणाम in a stoppage  of play or in a penalty .
in the नियम of the नेशनल  Hockey League , high-sticking is defined as a penalty in Rule 60 and as a non-penalty foul in Rule 80 .
A stoppage in play results  if a ऊँची स्टिक आता in सम्पर्क साथ the पक  and the team who touched it regains control of the puck .
However  , खेल प्रायः continues if a खिलाड़ी  touches the puck with a high stick and the opposing team gains control of the puck .
If the puck  goes into the opposing जाल बाद coming into  contact with a high stick , the goal is disallowed .
The level at which a stick is  माना too ऊँची लिये a लक्ष्य is the crossbar  of the net .
However , if a player knocks the  पक into उसके अपना जाल साथ a ऊँची  stick , the goal is allowed .
A penalty is assessed if  a खिलाड़ी हमलों another खिलाड़ी  with a high stick .
The  खिलाड़ी is दिए a नाबालिग दंड जबतक उसके  high stick caused an injury , in which case the referee has the option to assess a double-minor , major or match penalty .
It is the referee 's discretion which penalty to assess : the rule calls for a double minor for an accidental injury , or a match penalty for a deliberate attempt  to injure ( whether the विपक्ष खिलाड़ी थी दरअसल घायल )  .
Injury is usually  decided by the ऊँची स्टिक causing bleeding , लकिन the उपस्थिति of  blood does not automatically mean an extra penalty is awarded .
Some referees have been known to award an extra penalty without the presence of blood if the  रेफरी determines कि the चोट sustained थी sufficient  to warrant a double-minor penalty .
ठेठ आधुनिक मेमोरी कार्ड रीडर , संगत  with many common formats
A memory card reader is a device , typically having a USB interface , for accessing the data on a memory card such as a  compactflash ( cf ) , सुरक्षित डिजिटल ( sd ) or multimediacard  ( MMC ) .
Most card  पाठक भी प्रस्ताव लिखें काबिलियत  , and together with the card , this can function as a pen drive .
कुछ मुद्रक और निजी  computers have a built-in card reader .
A multi card reader is used for communication with more  than एक प्रकार of फ्लैश मेमोरी  card .
Multi card readers do not have built-in memory capacity , but  हैं समर्थ to accept अनेक प्रकार और शैलियाँ  of memory cards .
The number of compatible memory cards varies from  रीडर to रीडर और can शामिल अधिक than  20 different types .
The number of different memory cards that a multi card reader can accept is expressed as  x-in-1 , साथ x होने a फिगर of मेरिट indicating the क्रमांक of मेमोरी ताश स्वीकृत , ऐसे  as 35-in-1 .
There are three categories of card readers sorted by the type and quantity of the card slots : single card reader ( e.g . 1x SD-only  ) , मल्टी कार्ड रीडर ( e.g . 9-in-1 ) और श्रेणी कार्ड रीडर ( e.g . 4x sd तभी ) .
Some kinds of memory cards with their own USB functions  do नहीं need the कार्ड रीडर , ऐसे as the बुद्धिमान स्टिक मेमोरी कार्ड  , which can plug directly into a USB slot .
The USB device  क्लास प्रयुक्त is  0x08 .
Bullying is detrimental to  विद्यार्थी ' well-being और  development .
धमकाना is the उपयोग of फ़ोर्स  or coercion to abuse or intimidate others .
The  बर्ताव can be habitual और involve an असंतुलन  of social or physical power .
It can include verbal harassment or threat , physical assault or coercion and may be directed repeatedly towards particular victims ,  शायद on grounds of रेस , धर्म , लिंग , कामुकता ,  or ability .
If bullying is done by a  समूह , it is पुकारा mobbing  .
The victim of bullying is sometimes  referred to as a `` निशाना  '' .
Bullying can be defined  in अनेक अलग  ways .
the uk फिलहाल रै no विधिक परिभाषा of  bullying , while some U.S. states have laws against it .
Bullying consists of three basic  प्रकार of गाली – emotional , मौखिक  , and physical .
It typically involves subtle methods  of coercion ऐसे as  intimidation .
Bullying ranges from simple one-on-one bullying to more complex bullying in which the bully may have one or more `` lieutenants '' who may  seem to be willing to assist the प्राथमिक बुली in उसके or उसके धमकाना क्रियाएँ .
Bullying in school and the  कार्यस्थल is भी referred to  as peer abuse .
रॉबर्ट W. फुलर रै analyzed  bullying in the context of rankism .
A bullying culture can develop in  कोई कॉन्टेक्स्ट in जिससे इंसान beings  interact with each other .
This includes school ,  गिरिजाघर , परिवार , the कार्यस्थल ,  home , and neighborhoods .
Happy slapping in the Instituto Regional Federico  errázuriz , सांता क्रूज़ , चिली
Laura Bush and Rae Leigh Bradbury ( formerly missing ) on April 4 , 2007 , in Austin , Texas , after the 8-year-old introduced Mrs. Bush during announcement of the  भविष्य खोलने of the टेक्सास क्षेत्रीय दफ्तर of the नेशनल बीच लिये लापता और शोषित children  .
Rae  leigh थी the पहला चाइल्ड in the u.S. to be बरामद  as a result of an AMBER Alert when she was 8 weeks old in November 1998 .
An AMBER  चेतावनी or a चाइल्ड abduction आपात ( वही कोड  : CAE ) is a child abduction alert system originating in 1996 , now employed in 9 countries .
AMBER is  officially a backronym लिये अमेरिका 's लापता  : Broadcasting Emergency Response , named for Amber Hagerman , a 9-year-old abducted and murdered in Arlington , Texas in 1996 .
Alternate regional alert names were once used ; in Georgia , `` Levi 's Call '' ( named after Levi Frady ) ; in Hawaii , `` Maile Amber Alert '' ( after Maile Gilbert ) ;  और अरकंसास , `` मॉर्गन उपनाम एम्बर  Alert '' ( in memory of Morgan Chauntel Nick ) .
AMBER Alerts are distributed via commercial radio stations , Internet radio , satellite radio , television stations , and cable  tv by the आपात चेतावनी प्रणाली और noaa मौसम रेडियो ( जहाँ वे हैं termed `` चाइल्ड abduction  Emergency '' or `` Amber Alerts '' ) .
The alerts are also issued via e-mail , electronic traffic-condition signs , the  led billboards जिससे हैं स्तिथ बाहर of नए walgreens स्थितियाँ , साथ साथ the led/lcd लक्षण of बिलबोर्ड  companies such as Clear Channel Outdoor , CBS Outdoor and Lamar , or through wireless device SMS text messages .
AMBER Alert has also teamed up with Google  और फेसबुक to रिले सूचना regarding an एम्बर चेतावनी  to an ever growing demographic .
Those interested in subscribing  to प्राप्त एम्बर चेतावनियाँ in उनके क्षेत्रफल via sms संदेश can विज़िट  Wireless Amber Alerts , which are offered by law as free messages .
in कुछ राज्य , the प्रदर्शक  scrollboards in front of lottery terminals are also used .
The decision to  घोषित an एम्बर चेतावनी is बना by प्रत्येक पुलिस संगठन  ( in many cases , the state police or highway patrol ) which investigates each of the abductions .
Public  सूचना in an एम्बर चेतावनी प्रायः consists of the नाम और वर्णन  of the abductee , a description of the suspected abductor , and a description and license plate number of the abductor 's vehicle , if available .
Monica Samille Lewinsky (  born जुलाई 23 , 1973 ) is an अमरीकी स्त्री साथ जिसको संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्ष विधेयक  Clinton admitted to having had an `` improper relationship '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996 .
The affair and its repercussions (  जिससे शामिल क्लिंटन 's महाभियोग  ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal .
House of Night is a series of vampire -themed fantasy novels by American  लेखक P. C. डाल और उसके बेटी kristin डाल  .
It follows the adventures of Zoey Redbird , a sixteen-year-old girl who has just  become a `` fledgling vampyre '' और is जरूरी to attend the हाउस of रात्रि बोर्डिंग स्कूल in तुलसा , ओक्लाहोमा  .
The series has been on the New York Times Best Seller list for 63 weeks and there are over seven million copies  in छपाई in उत्तर अमेरिका अलोन  .
The sixth novel , Tempted ,  जिससे गई on बिक्री on अक्तूबर 27 , 2009 साथ a पहला  printing of a million copies , entered the USA Today bestseller list that week at # 1 .
In January , 2010 ,  gezeichnet , a जर्मनी अनुवाद of चिह्नित  , reached the # 1 spot on the Der Spiegel bestseller list .
the श्रेणी रै so दूर बेची  more than ten million books in 39 countries .
Burned was released on April 27 ,  2010 , और जैसे इम्तिहान , it  entered the USA Today bestseller list that week at # 1 .
Awakened , released in January , 2011 ,  भी डाला the  list at # 1 .
The series , which is published by St  मार्टिन 's दबायें is नियोजित  to include twelve books .
In 2008 , plans for a film  अनुकूलन यहूद  also announced .
The tenth book in  the श्रेणी , छुपा , थी released  on October 16 , 2012 .
The second book in the  novellas ( जिससे दे पृष्ठभूमि on supporting वर्ण  ) , Lenobia 's Vow , was released January 31 , 2012 .
Book eleven is currently called Revealed , and the Casts have announced that two  अधिक novellas , neferet’s अभिशाप , नियोजित to be released फ़रवरी 19 , 2013 , और a प्रीक्वेल अनोखा परिचय  Kalona , are to be released to coincide with the eleventh and twelfth books .
In Greek mythology , the Trojan War was waged against the city of Troy by the Achaeans ( Greeks ) after Paris of  ट्रॉय took हेलेन इससे उसके husband menelaus किंग of स्पार्टा  .
The war is one of  the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण कार्यक्रम in यूनानी mythology और रै महरूम narrated  through many works of Greek literature , most notably through Homer 's Iliad and the Odyssey .
The Iliad relates a part of the last year  of the घेरा of ट्रॉय ; the ओडिसी describes odysseus  's journey home .
Other  भाग of the युद्ध हैं contained  in a cycle of epic poems , which have survived through fragments .
Episodes from the war provided material for Greek tragedy  और अन्य works of यूनानी साहित्य  , and for Roman poets including Virgil and Ovid .
The war originated from a quarrel between the goddesses Athena , Hera , and Aphrodite  , बाद eris , the देवी of संघर्ष और अनबन , दिया उन्हें a सुनहरी ठहराना , sometimes ज्ञात as the ठहराना  of Discord , marked `` for the fairest '' .
Zeus sent the goddesses to Paris , who judged that Aphrodite ,  as the `` fairest '' , चाहिए प्राप्त the  apple .
In exchange , Aphrodite  बना हेलेन , the सबसे खूबसूरत of सब  women and wife of Menelaus , fall in love with Paris , who took her to Troy .
Agamemnon , king of  mycenae और the bhai of हेलेन 's husband  Menelaus , led an expedition of Achaean troops to Troy and besieged the city for ten years because of Paris ' insult .
After the deaths of many heroes , including the Achaeans Achilles and Ajax , and the Trojans Hector  और पेरिस , the नगर गिरी to the ruse of the trojan  Horse .
The Achaeans slaughtered the Trojans ( except for some of the women and children whom they kept or sold as  स्लेव ) और desecrated the मंदिरों , यूँ कमाई the देवताओं  ' wrath .
Few of  the achaeans लौटे सकुशल  to their homes and many founded colonies in distant shores .
The Romans later traced their origin to Aeneas ,  एक of the ट्रोजन्स , जो  was said to have led the surviving Trojans to modern-day Italy .
The  प्राचीन यूनानियों विचार कि the trojan युद्ध थी a ऐतिहासिक  event that had taken place in the 13th or 12th century BC , and believed that Troy was located in modern-day Turkey near the Dardanelles .
By modern times , both the war  और the नगर यहूद widely believed to be non-historical  .
In 1868 , however , the German archaeologist Heinrich Schliemann met Frank Calvert , who convinced Schliemann that Troy was at Hissarlik and  schliemann took over calvert 's excavations on प्रॉपर्टी belonging to calvert ; इस अर्जी is अभी स्वीकृत by सबसे विद्वानों  .
whether वहीँ is कोई ऐतिहासिक  reality behind the Trojan War is an open question .
Many scholars believe that there is a  ऐतिहासिक कोर to the टेल , हालांकि इस may बस औसत कि the homeric कहानियां हैं  a fusion of various tales of sieges and expeditions by Mycenaean Greeks during the Bronze Age .
Those who believe that the stories of the Trojan War are derived from a  विशिष्ट ऐतिहासिक विरोध प्रायः तिथि it to the 12th or 11th सदियां bc , प्रायः preferring  the dates given by Eratosthenes , 1194–1184 BC , which roughly corresponds with archaeological evidence of a catastrophic burning of Troy VIIa .
Anarchists have  employed निश्चित प्रतीकों लिये उनके कारण , सहित सबसे prominently the  circle-A and the black flag , although anarchists have historically largely denied the importance of symbols to political movement .
Since the  पुनरुद्धार of अराजकतावाद around the प्रारंभ of the 21st-century संयुक्त साथ the  rise of the anti-globalization movement , anarchist cultural symbols are widely present .
The greater palatine canal ( or pterygopalatine canal ) is a passage in the skull that  transmits the वृहद palatine धमनी , रग , और तंत्रिका between the pterygopalatine  fossa and the oral cavity .
Surface temperature of Antarctica in winter and summer from  the यूरोपीय केन्द्र लिये medium-range मौसम  Forecasts
The climate of Antarctica is the  coldest on the पूरे of  Earth .
Antarctica has the lowest naturally occurring temperature ever recorded on the ground on  धरती : −89.2 °c ( −128.6 °f ) at वोस्तोक  Station .
It is also extremely dry ( technically a desert ) , averaging 166 mm ( 6.5  in ) of वर्षण प्रति  year .
Even so , on most parts of the continent the  हिम rarely melts और is आखिरकार  compressed to become the glacial ice that makes up the ice sheet .
Weather fronts rarely penetrate far  into the महाद्वीप  .
Most of Antarctica has an ice cap  जलवायु ( köppen ef ) साथ बहुत ठंडा , generally अत्यधिक शुष्क मौसम throughout  the year and no month averaging above 0 °C ( 32 °F ) .
कुछ फ्रिंज तटीय क्षेत्रों have a टुण्ड्रा जलवायु  ( Köppen ET ) with a short summer averaging above freezing , and much higher precipitation .
Current head  कोच माइक tomlin  , during the 2007 season
The  पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स मताधिकार रै था 16 सिर  coaches throughout its history .
Founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates in , the name was changed to the Steelers prior to the season  to celebrate the नगर 's विरासत of producing  steel .
Joe  बच परोसा दो पृथक  terms as head coach and Walt Kiesling served three separate terms .
During the and seasons , due to the amount of players who fought in World  युद्ध ii , the स्टीलर्स संयुक्त उनके टोली साथ फिलाडेल्फिया  and Chicago , respectively .
During these seasons , Steelers ' coach Walt Kiesling shared coaching duties with Greasy  neale और फिल हैंडलर , जो have नहीं महरूम शामिल  within this list .
struggling लिये much of the मताधिकार 's जल्दी सालो , the टोली 's  first season with more wins than losses was coached by Jock Sutherland in .
In , under Sutherland , the Steelers  निभाई उनके पहला playoff खेल विरूद्ध  the Philadelphia Eagles .
Ten of the 16 head coaches spent their entire  पेशेवर कोचिंग करियर साथ the मताधिकार , सहित जॉन mcnally ,  Walt Kiesling and Chuck Noll , who have also been voted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame .
One of only four  मेन to कोच the वही  team for 23 years , Chuck Noll retired in .
Noll is also the only coach in  नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग इतिहास  to win four Super Bowls .
विधेयक cowher , noll 's बदलना , coached  the Steelers to their fifth Super Bowl victory , in 2005 .
The Steelers sixth Super Bowl win came in Super Bowl XLIII ,  जबकि सिर coached by माइक tomlin ,  the team 's current head coach .
In criminal law ,  धोखाधड़ी is जानबूझकर deception बना लिये निजी  gain or to damage another individual ; the related adjective is fraudulent , and verb is defraud .
Fraud is a crime  और a सिविल विधि उल्लंघन , हालांकि the विशिष्ट  criminal law definition varies by legal jurisdiction .
Defrauding  लोगों or entities of धन or  valuables is a common purpose of fraud .
A hoax also involves deception , but  बगैर the इरादे of लाभ or of damaging  or depriving the victim .
Fraud is a defense in a civil action for breach of contract  or विशिष्ट प्रदर्शन of a अनुबंध  .
Fraud is a basis  लिये निष्पक्ष क्षेत्राधिकार  .
Passover , or Pesach ( from : in Hebrew , Yiddish ) , Tiberian : , Modern Hebrew :  /ˈpesaχ/ pesah , pesakh , यहूदी : peysekh , paysakh  , Paysokh ) is an important Biblically -derived Jewish festival .
Historically , together with Shavuot ( `` Pentecost '' ) and Sukkot ( `` Tabernacles '' ) , Passover is one of the three pilgrimage festivals ( Shalosh Regalim ) during which the entire  जनसांख्यिकी of the किंगडम of यहूदा बना a यात्राएं to the टेम्पल in जेरूसलम  .
Samaritans still make this pilgrimage to Mount Gerizim , but  तभी मेन participate in पब्लिक  worship .
Passover  commences on the 15th of the यहूदी माह of nisan  and lasts for either seven days ( in Israel ) or eight days ( in the diaspora ) .
In Judaism , a  दिन commences at संध्या और lasts  until the following dusk , thus the first day of Passover only begins after dusk of the 14th of Nisan and ends at dusk of the 15th day of the month of Nisan .
The rituals unique to the  passover जश्न commence साथ  the Passover Seder when the 15th of Nisan has begun .
In the  उत्तरी गोलार्ध passover takes प्लेस in  spring as the Torah prescribes it : `` in the month of [ the ] spring '' ( בחדש האביב ) .
It is one of the most widely  observed यहूदी छुट्टियाँ  .
The Jewish people celebrate Passover as a commemoration  of उनके मुक्ति over 3,300 सालो पहले by परमेश्वर इससे गुलामी in प्राचीन मिश्र कि थी  ruled by the Pharaohs , and their birth as a nation under the leadership of Moses .
It commemorates the story of the Exodus as described in the Hebrew Bible  विशेषकर in the किताब of exodus , in जिससे the israelites यहूद  freed from slavery in Egypt .
In the narrative of the Exodus , the Bible tells that God helped the Children of Israel escape from their slavery in Egypt by inflicting ten plagues upon the ancient Egyptians before the Pharaoh would release his Israelite slaves ; the tenth  और worst of the plagues थी the मौत of the  Egyptian first-born .
The Israelites were  instructed to चिह्नित the doorposts of उनके घरों साथ  the blood of a slaughtered spring lamb and , upon seeing this , the spirit of the Lord knew to pass over the first-born in these homes , hence the name of the holiday .
There is some debate over where the term is  दरअसल निकला इससे  .
When the Pharaoh freed the  israelites , it is कहा कि वे बाएँ  in such a hurry that they could not wait for bread dough to rise ( leaven ) .
In commemoration , for the  अवधि of passover no leavened ब्रैड is खाया , लिये  which reason it is called `` The Festival of the Unleavened Bread '' .
Thus Matzo ( flat unleavened bread )  is खाया दौरान passover  and it is a symbol of the holiday .
Halley 's Comet or Comet Halley ( or ) , officially designated 1P/Halley , is the  best-known of the short-period धूमकेतुओं और is दृश्य इससे धरती प्रत्येक 75–76 सालो  .
Halley is the only short-period  धूमकेतु कि is clearly दृश्य to the नग्न नजर इससे  Earth , and thus the only naked-eye comet that might appear twice in a human lifetime .
Other naked-eye comets may be brighter and more  spectacular , लकिन होगा appear तभी एकबार in  thousands of years .
Halley 's  रिटर्न to the भीतरी सौर  System have been observed and recorded by astronomers since at least 240 BCE .
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were made by  चाइनीज , babylonian , और मध्यकालीन यूरोपीय  chroniclers , but were not recognized as reappearances of the same object at the time .
The comet 's  periodicity थी पहला संकल्पित in 1705 by अंग्रेज़ी  astronomer Edmond Halley , after whom it is now named .
Halley 's Comet last  appeared in the भीतरी सौर प्रणाली in 1986 और  will next appear in mid-2061 .
During  इसके 1986 apparition , हैली became the पहला धूमकेतु to be observed  in detail by spacecraft , providing the first observational data on the structure of a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma and tail formation .
These observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses about comet construction , particularly Fred Whipple 's `` dirty snowball '' model ,  जिससे correctly पूर्वानुमानित कि हैली होता be रचित of a मिश्रण of volatile ices – ऐसे as जल , कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड  and ammonia – and dust .
The missions also provided data which substantially reformed  और reconfigured ये विचार ; लिये उदाहरण  it is now understood that Halley 's surface is largely composed of dusty , non-volatile materials , and that only a small portion of it is icy .
anti-communism is विपक्ष  to communism .
Organized anti-communism developed in reaction to the rise of communism , especially after the 1917  अक्तूबर क्रान्ति in रूस और reaching वैश्विक आयाम  during the Cold War .
Most anti-communists reject the concept of  ऐतिहासिक भौतिकवाद ,  which is a central idea in Marxism .
Anti-communists reject  the मार्क्सवादी विश्वास कि पूंजीवाद होगा be followed  by socialism and communism , just as feudalism was followed by capitalism .
Anti-communists question the validity of the Marxist claim that the socialist state will ``  wither दूर '' जब it becomes अनावश्यक  in a true communist society .
Anti-communists argue that the repression in the early years of Bolshevik rule , while not as extreme as that during Joseph Stalin 's rule , was still severe by reasonable standards , citing examples such as  फेलिक्स dzerzhinsky 's रहस्य पुलिस , जिससे eliminated numerous राजनैतिक प्रतिद्वंद्वियों by extrajudicial executions , और the क्रूर  crushing of the Kronstadt rebellion and Tambov rebellion .
Some anti-communists refer to both Communism and fascism as totalitarianism ,  देखकर समानता between the क्रियाएँ of कम्युनिस्ट और फासिस्ट सरकारें  .
इतिहासकार रॉबर्ट conquest रै argued कि साम्यवादी थी  responsible for tens of millions of deaths during the 20th century .
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों argue कि कम्युनिस्ट पार्टियों कि have आइये to  power have tended to be rigidly intolerant of political opposition .
These opponents claim that most Communist countries have shown no signs of  advancing इससे मार्क्स 's समाजवादी स्टेज of अर्थव्यवस्था to an  ideal communist stage .
Rather ,  कम्युनिस्ट सरकारें have महरूम अभियुक्त of बनाना a नई सत्ताधारी क्लास ( a nomenklatura  ) , with powers and privileges greater than those previously enjoyed by the upper classes in the non- communist regimes .
Gil Heron ( 9 April 1922 – 27  नवम्बर 2008 ) थी a jamaican  professional footballer .
He was the first black player to play for Scottish club  सेल्टिक , और थी the पिता of कवि  and musician Gil Scott-Heron .
He died in  डेट्रॉयट of a दिल  attack on 27 November 2008 .
The soybean ( US ) or soya bean  ( uk ) ( glycine अधिकतम ) is a प्रजाति of legume देशी to  East Asia , widely grown for its edible bean which has numerous uses .
The plant is classed  as an oilseed बल्कि than a पल्स by the un खाना और agricultural  Organization ( FAO ) .
Fat-free  ( defatted ) सोयाबीन भोजन is a significant और सस्ती सोर्स  of protein for animal feeds and many prepackaged meals ; soy vegetable oil is another product of processing the soybean crop .
For example , soybean products such as textured vegetable protein ( TVP ) are ingredients in  अनेक मांस और दुग्ध analogues  .
Soybeans  उपज significantly अधिक  protein per acre than most other uses of land .
परंपरागत nonfermented खाना  uses of soybeans include soy milk , and from the latter tofu and tofu skin .
Fermented foods include soy  सॉस , fermented सेम paste , natto  , and tempeh , among others .
The oil is used in  अनेक औद्योगिक अनुप्रयोग  .
the प्रमुख निर्माता  of soy are the United States ( 35 % ) , Brazil ( 27 % ) , Argentina ( 19 % ) , China ( 6 % ) and India ( 4 % ) .
The beans  contain significant amounts of phytic  acid , alpha-linolenic acid , and isoflavones .
Harrison Ford ( born July 13 , 1942  ) is an अमरीकी  film actor and producer .
He is famous for his performances as Han Solo in the original Star Wars trilogy and  the शीर्षक अक्षर of the इंडियाना जोन्स  film series .
Ford is also known for his roles as Rick Deckard in Blade Runner  , जॉन किताब in गवाह और जोकर रयान in patriot खेल और साफ  and Present Danger .
His career has spanned six decades and  शामिल भूमिकाएँ in अनेक हॉलीवुड blockbusters , सहित presumed निर्दोष ,  The Fugitive , Air Force One , and What Lies Beneath .
At one  पाइंट , चार of the शीर्ष छह box-office हिट्स  of all time included one of his roles .
Five of his films have been inducted  into the नेशनल फिल्मी रजिस्ट्री  .
In 1997 , Ford was  क्रमित no . 1 in साम्राज्य `` the  Top 100 Movie Stars of All Time '' list .
, the United States domestic box office grosses of Ford 's films total over US $ 3.5 billion ,  साथ विश्वव्यापी grosses surpassing $ 6 अरब , बनाना घाट the तीसरा  highest grossing U.S. domestic box-office star .
Ford  is the husband of अभिनेत्री  Calista Flockhart .
A  ट्यूब of chapstick
ChapStick is a brand name for lip balm manufactured by  फाइजर उपभोक्ता healthcare और प्रयुक्त  in many countries worldwide .
It  is intended to सहायता दावत और  prevent chapped lips ; hence the name .
Many  किस्में भी शामिल सनस्क्रीन  in order to prevent sunburn .
Due to  इसके लोकप्रियता  , the term has become a genericized trademark .
It popularly refers to any lip  बाम contained in a lipstick-style ट्यूब और लागू in the वही  manner as lipstick .
However , the term is still a registered  ट्रेडमार्क , साथ अधिकारों exclusively स्वामित्व  by Pfizer .
In Sweden and in the United Kingdom , the product 's main competitor is Lypsyl , made by Novartis Consumer Health ,  जिससे is वितरित in समान पैकेजिंग to chapstick  .
George Berkeley ( ; 12 March 168514 January 1753 ) , also known as Bishop Berkeley ( Bishop of Cloyne  ) , थी an anglo-irish पारस जिनकी प्राथमिक उपलब्धि थी the उन्नति of a सिद्धान्त he पुकारा `` immaterialism '' ( बाद referred  to as `` subjective idealism `` by others ) .
This theory denies the existence of material substance and instead contends that familiar objects like tables and chairs are only ideas in the minds of  perceivers , और as a परिणाम can नहीं  exist without being perceived .
Thus , as  बर्कली famously put it , लिये शारीरिक वस्तुएँ `` esse  est percipi '' ( `` to be is to be perceived `` ) .
Berkeley is also known for his critique of abstraction , an important premise  in उसके तर्क लिये immaterialism  .
In 1709 , Berkeley published his  पहला प्रमुख कार्य , , in जिससे he discussed the  limitations of human vision and advanced the theory that the proper objects of sight are not material objects , but light and colour .
This foreshadowed his chief philosophical work A Treatise Concerning the  सिद्धान्त of इंसान ज्ञान in 1710 जिससे , बाद इसके ग़रीब रिसेप्शन , he rewrote in संवाद  form and published under the title Three Dialogues between Hylas and Philonous in 1713 .
In this book , Berkeley 's views were represented by Philonous ( Greek : 'lover of mind ' ) , while Hylas ( Greek  : 'मैटr ' ) embodies the आयरिश thinker’s प्रतिद्वंद्वियों , in particular जॉन  Locke .
Berkeley argued against Sir Isaac Newton 's doctrine of absolute space , time and  गति in de मोटू ( on  Motion ) , published 1721 .
His arguments were  a precursor to the दृश्य  of Mach and Einstein .
In 1732 , he published Alciphron , a Christian apologetic against the free-thinkers  , और in 1734 , he प्रकाशित the विश्लेषक , an empiricist  critique of the foundations of infinitesimal calculus , which was influential in the development of mathematics .
His last major philosophical work , Siris ( 1744  ) , begins by वकालत the औषधीय उपयोग of तारकोल जल  , and then continues to discuss a wide range of topics including science , philosophy , and theology .
Interest in Berkeley 's work increased after World  युद्ध ii , क्युकी he tackled अनेक of the मुद्दे of सर्वोपरि  interest to philosophy in the 20th century such as the problems of perception , the difference between primary and secondary qualities , and the importance of language .
Qingdao ( ) , historically known as Tsingtao , is a major city in eastern Shandong  प्रांत , पूर्वी चीन , साथ a जनसांख्यिकी  of over 8.715 million ( 2010 census ) .
Its built up area , made of 6 urban  जिले और 4 county-level शहरों ,  is home to about 4,896,000 inhabitants in 2010 .
It borders Yantai to the northeast , Weifang to the  वेस्ट और rizhao to the दक्षिणपश्चिम  .
Qīng ( ) in Chinese  अर्थात् `` ग्रीन '' or `` रसीले ''  , while dǎo ( ) means `` island '' .
Qingdao is  administered at the sub-provincial  level .
Lying across the Shandong Peninsula while looking out to the Yellow  समुद्र , चिंगदाओ is a प्रमुख seaport , नवल आधार  , and industrial centre .
It is also the site of  the tsingtao  Brewery .
The world 's longest  समुद्र सेतु , the चिंगदाओ haiwan सेतु , कड़ी the प्रमुख शहरी क्षेत्रफल of  Qingdao with Huangdao district , straddling the Jiaozhou Bay sea areas .
Qingdao is named  चीन 's सबसे livable नगर  .
Mimivirus is a viral genus containing a single identified species named Acanthamoeba polyphaga mimivirus ( APMV ) , or is a group of phylogenetically related large viruses ( designated  प्रायः mimin ) .
In  colloquial वाक , apmv is अधिक commonly  referred to as just `` mimivirus '' .
Until October 2011 , when a larger virus Megavirus  chilensis  was described , it had the largest capsid diameter of all known viruses .
mimivirus रै a विशाल और जटिल  genome compared with most other viruses .
Mimivirus , short for ``  mimicking microbe '' , is so  called to reflect its large size and apparent Gram-staining properties .
The Mexican War of Independence ( 1810–1821 ) was an armed conflict between the  लोगों of मैक्सिको और the स्पेनी औपनिवेशिक अधिकारियों जिससे प्रारंभ on सितंबर  16 , 1810 .
The movement , which became known as the Mexican War of Independence , was led by Mexican-born Spaniards , Mestizos and Amerindians  जो sought स्वतंत्रता  from Spain .
It  प्रारंभ as an आदर्शवादी peasants  ' rebellion against their colonial masters , but ended as an unlikely alliance between Mexican ex-royalists and Mexican guerrilla insurgents .
crohn 's बीमारी , भी ज्ञात as crohn सिंड्रोम और क्षेत्रीय enteritis , is a प्रकार of जलन bowel बीमारी  that may affect any part of the gastrointestinal tract from mouth to anus , causing a wide variety of symptoms .
It primarily causes abdominal pain , diarrhea ( which may be bloody if inflammation is at its worst ) , vomiting ( can be continuous ) , or weight loss , but may also cause complications outside the gastrointestinal tract  ऐसे as स्किन rashes , गठिया , सूजन of the नजर , थकान , और  lack of concentration .
Crohn 's disease is caused by  interactions between पर्यावरणीय , immunological  and bacterial factors in genetically susceptible individuals .
This results in a chronic inflammatory disorder  , in जिससे the देह 's प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली हमले  the gastrointestinal tract possibly directed at microbial antigens .
Crohn 's disease has wrongly been described as an  असंक्राम्य बीमारी in the पास्ट ; हाल जांचकर्ताओं  have described it as an immune deficiency state .
There is a genetic association with Crohn 's disease , primarily with variations  of the nod2 जीन और इसके प्रोटीन , जिससे  senses bacterial cell walls .
Siblings of affected individuals are  at उच्चतर रिस्क .
Males and females  हैं बराबर प्रभावित  .
Smokers are two times more likely to develop  crohn 's बीमारी than nonsmokers  .
Crohn 's disease affects between 400,000  और 600,000 लोगों in  North America .
Prevalence  estimates लिये उत्तरी यूरोपीय have ranged इससे  27–48 per 100,000 .
Crohn 's disease tends to  उपस्थित initially in the किशोर  and twenties , with another peak incidence in the fifties to seventies , although the disease can occur at any age .
There is no known pharmaceutical or  सर्जिकल इलाज़ लिये crohn 's बीमारी  .
Treatment options are restricted to  controlling लक्षण  , maintaining remission , and preventing relapse .
The disease was named after gastroenterologist  burrill बर्नार्ड crohn , जो , in 1932 , साथ साथ दो अन्य सहयोगियों at माउंट sinai हॉस्पिटल  in New York , described a series of patients with inflammation of the terminal ileum , the area most commonly affected by the illness .
This is an incomplete list of the tallest  इमारतें और structures by  country .
The list directly  शामिल the tallest इमारतें और structures  for each country , and where appropriate , it also points to more detailed country-specific lists .
Rough and  तैयार is a census-designated प्लेस in नेवाडा  County , California , United States .
It is located west of  ग्रास घाटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , लगभग  62 miles ( 100 km ) from Sacramento .
The population was 963  at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  .
YouTube is a video-sharing website , created by  तीन पूर्व paypal कर्मचारी in फ़रवरी 2005  , on which users can upload , view and share videos .
The company is based in San Bruno , California , and uses Adobe Flash Video and HTML5 technology to display a wide variety of user-generated video content , including  फिल्म क्लिप्स , tv क्लिप्स , और म्यूज़िक वीडियो , as खूब as amateur सामग्री ऐसे as वीडियो blogging , छोटी असली वीडियो , और शैक्षणिक वीडियो  .
Most of the content on YouTube has been uploaded by individuals , although media  corporations सहित सीबीएस , the बीबीसी , vevo , hulu , और अन्य संगठन प्रस्ताव कुछ  of their material via the site , as part of the YouTube partnership program .
Unregistered  उपयोक्ता can देखें वीडियो , जबकि पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता can अपलोड an  unlimited number of videos .
Videos considered to contain potentially  अप्रिय सामग्री हैं उपलब्धियाँ तभी to पंजीकृत  users at least 18 years old .
In November 2006 , YouTube , LLC was bought by Google for US $ 1.65  अरब , और operates as a subsidiary of google  .
Sister Act is a musical  लिखा by cheri steinkellner और विधेयक steinkellner साथ अतिरिक्त  book material by Douglas Carter Beane , with lyrics by Glenn Slater and music by Alan Menken .
It  is आधारित on the hit  1992 film comedy of the same name .
The 2009  वेस्ट समाप्त उत्पादन  was produced by Stage Entertainment , Whoopi Goldberg , and Michael Reno for Sis Acts LLC .
Goldberg is  भी a निर्माता of the  2011 Broadway adaptation .
Microsoft DirectX is a collection of application programming interfaces ( APIs  ) लिये हैंडलिंग कार्य सम्बन्धित to मल्टीमीडिया , विशेषकर  game programming and video , on Microsoft platforms .
Originally , the names of  ये api सब began साथ सीधा , ऐसे  as Direct3D , DirectDraw , DirectMusic , DirectPlay , DirectSound , and so forth .
The name  डाइरेक्टएक्स थी coined as आशुलिपि पद लिये सब of ये api ( the  X standing in for the particular API names ) and soon became the name of the collection .
When Microsoft  बाद नियत आउट to develop a गेमिंग कंसोल , the x थी प्रयुक्त as the  basis of the name Xbox to indicate that the console was based on DirectX technology .
The X initial has been carried forward in the naming of APIs designed for the Xbox such as XInput and the Cross-platform Audio  सृष्टि औजार ( xact ) , जबकि the डाइरेक्टएक्स पैटर्न रै महरूम जारी  for Windows APIs such as Direct2D and DirectWrite .
Direct3D ( the 3D graphics API within DirectX ) is widely  प्रयुक्त in the विकास of वीडियो खेल लिये microsoft खिड़कियाँ , microsoft एक्सबॉक्स  , Microsoft Xbox 360 and some Sega Dreamcast games .
Direct3D is also used by other software applications for  कल्पना और ग्राफिक्स कार्य ऐसे as cad/cam  engineering .
As Direct3D is the most widely publicized component of  डाइरेक्टएक्स , it is आम to देखिए the names `` डाइरेक्टएक्स '' और `` direct3d  '' used interchangeably .
The DirectX software development kit ( SDK ) consists of runtime  पुस्तकालयों in redistributable शब्दकोष रूप , साथ साथ accompanying दस्तावेज़ीकरण  and headers for use in coding .
Originally , the runtimes  यहूद तभी संस्थापित by खेल  or explicitly by the user .
Windows 95 did not  लॉन्च साथ डाइरेक्टएक्स , लकिन डाइरेक्टएक्स थी  included with Windows 95 OEM Service Release 2 .
Windows 98 and Windows NT 4.0 both shipped with DirectX  , as रै प्रत्येक संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ released  since .
The SDK is  उपलब्धियाँ as a फ़्री  download .
While the runtimes are proprietary , closed-source software  , सोर्स कोड is provided लिये सबसे of the sdk  samples .
Starting with the release of Windows 8 Developer  पूर्वावलोकन , डाइरेक्टएक्स sdk रै महरूम एकीकृत into खिड़कियाँ  SDK .
Direct3D 9Ex , Direct3D 10 , and Direct3D 11 are only available for Windows Vista and newer because each of these new versions was  निर्मित to निर्भर upon the नई खिड़कियाँ प्रदर्शक ड्राइवर मॉडल कि थी  introduced for Windows Vista .
The new Vista/WDDM graphics architecture includes a new video memory manager  supporting आभासीकरण of ग्राफिक्स हार्डवेयर लिये विभिन्न अनुप्रयोग  and services like the Desktop Window Manager .
quetzaltenango , भी commonly ज्ञात by इसके स्वदेशी  name , Xelajú , or more commonly , Xela , is the second largest city of Guatemala .
It is both  the पूंजी of quetzaltenango विभाग  and the municipal seat of Quetzaltenango municipality .
It has  an अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी  of 224,703 .
The population is about 61 %  स्वदेशी or amerindian , 34 % मेस्टिज़ो or  ladino and 5 % European .
Quetzaltenango is located in a mountain valley  at an उन्नयन of 2,330 मीटर (  7,655 ft ) above sea level at its lowest part .
It may reach above 2,400 meters  भीतर the नगर  .
The  नगरपालिका of quetzaltenango consists  of an area of .
municipalities abutting the नगरपालिका of quetzaltenango शामिल : salcajá , cantel , almolonga , zunil ,  El Palmar , Concepción Chiquirichapa , San Mateo , La Esperanza , Olintepeque , and San Andrés Xecul .
All these municipalities are part of the Department of Quetzaltenango , except San Andrés Xecul which is a  भाग of the विभाग of totonicapán  .
The Epic of Gilgamesh , an epic poem from Mesopotamia , is  amongst the earliest  surviving works of literature .
The literary history of Gilgamesh begins with five independent Sumerian poems about  'bilgamesh ' ( sumerian लिये gilgamesh ) , किंग of uruk  .
Four of these were  प्रयुक्त as सोर्स सामग्री  for a combined epic in Akkadian .
This first combined epic , known as the `` Old Babylonian  '' संस्करण , तिथियाँ to the 18th  century BC and is titled after its incipit , Shūtur eli sharrī ( `` Surpassing All Other Kings '' ) .
Only a few fragments of it  have बच  .
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates from the 13th to the  10th सदियां bc और bears the incipit शा naqba īmuru  ( `` He who Saw the Deep '' ) .
Fragments of approximately two thirds of this longer , twelve-tablet  संस्करण have महरूम बरामद .
Some of  the बेहतरीन नक़ल यहूद खोजा  in the library ruins of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal .
The story centers on a friendship between  gilgamesh और enkidu .
Enkidu is a wild man created by the gods as Gilgamesh 's equal to distract him from oppressing  the लोगों of  Uruk .
Together , they journey to the Cedar Mountain  to शिकस्त humbaba , इसके monstrous  guardian .
Later they kill the Bull of Heaven , which the goddess  इश्तार भेजना to सजा gilgamesh लिये spurning उसके अग्रिम  .
As a  दंड लिये ये क्रियाएँ , the देवताओं  sentence Enkidu to death .
The second half of the epic focuses on  gilgamesh 's तकलीफ at enkidu 's मौत  , and his quest for immortality .
In order to learn the secret  of अनन्त जीवन , gilgamesh  undertakes a long and perilous journey .
He learns  कि `` the जीवन  that you are seeking you will never find .
When the gods created man they allotted to him death , but life  वे retained in उनके अपना keeping  . ''
This quote was originally attributed to Siduri in the Old Babylonian version of the epic , and then  attributed to the अमर बाढ़ नायिका utnapishtim  in the Akkadian version of the epic .
Nevertheless , Gilgamesh 's fame lived on after  उसके मौत , क्युकी of उसके ग्रेट भवन प्रोजेक्ट , और उसके  account of what Utnapishtim told him happened during the flood .
The story has been translated into many different  भाषाएं , और gilgamesh रै चूंकि become adapted  in works of popular fiction .
There are numerous debates over who  निर्मित the पहला वीडियो खेल , साथ the जवाब  depending largely on how video games are defined .
The evolution of  वीडियो खेल represents a उलझे वेब of अनेक अलग उद्योग  , including scientific , computer , arcade , and consumer electronics .
the `` वीडियो '' in `` वीडियो खेल `` traditionally  refers to a raster display device .
With the popular catch phrase use of the term `` video game  '' , the पद अभी implies सब प्रदर्शक प्रकार  , formats , and platforms .
Historians have also  sought to बायपास the समस्या by बजाय  using the more specific `` digital games '' descriptive .
This term leaves out  the पहले  analog-based computer games .

The exception are the ones specifying  शिपमेंट , जिससे have निम्नतर पूर्वता  than others listing sales .
मताधिकार बिक्री शामिल विस्तार पैक  even though they are not considered full video games .

the बिक्री आंकड़े दिए नीचे do  not include arcade game sales , which can be found at List of highest-grossing arcade video games .

This does not  necessarily लागू लिये श्रेणी कि हैं नहीं वीडियो game-based  .
Dorothy  ऐन विलिस रिचर्ड्स ( सितंबर 1 , 1933 – सितंबर 13 , 2006  ) was an American politician and the 45th Governor of Texas .
She first came to national attention as the state treasurer of Texas ,  जब वो वितरित the keynote पता  at the 1988 Democratic National Convention .
Richards served as  the 45th राज्यपाल of टेक्सास इससे 1991  to 1995 and was defeated for re-election in 1994 by George W. Bush .
Ann Richards was the second  मादा राज्यपाल  of Texas .
Data Execution Prevention ( DEP  ) is a सुरक्षा विशेषता शामिल in आधुनिक  operating systems .
It is known to be  उपलब्धियाँ in लिनक्स , मैक os x , आईओएस , microsoft खिड़कियाँ और एंड्रॉइड ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों और is intended to prevent  an application or service from executing code from a non-executable memory region .
इस helps prevent निश्चित कारनामे  that store code via a buffer overflow , for example .
DEP runs in two  मोड्स : hardware-enforced dep लिये cpu कि can चिह्नित मेमोरी पृष्ठों as nonexecutable  , and software-enforced DEP with limited protection for CPUs that do not have hardware support .
Software-enforced DEP does not protect against execution of code in data pages  , लकिन बजाय counters seh मिटाकर  , another type of attack .
DEP was introduced on Linux in 2004 ( kernel 2.6.8 ) , on Windows in 2004 with Windows XP Service Pack 2 , while Apple  introduced dep जब वे स्थानांतरित to x86 in  2006 .
उदाहरण उदाहरण  of two common futanari variants
, is the  जापानी शब्द लिये hermaphroditism , जिससे is भी प्रयुक्त  in a broader sense for androgyny .
Beyond Japan the term is used to describe a commonly pornographic genre of computer games ,  कॉमिक्स और एनिमेशन , जिससे शामिल वर्ण कि दिखाएँ दोनो  primary sexual characteristics .
But in today 's language it refers almost exclusively for characters who have  an overall feminine रूप .
In that case the term is also often abbreviated as futa ( s ) , which is occasionally also  प्रयुक्त as पद लिये the works itself  .
Early CAPTCHAs such as these ,  उत्पन्न by the ez-gimpy कार्यक्रम  , were used on Yahoo !
A  आधुनिक captcha , बल्कि than attempting to बनाएँ a distorted पृष्ठभूमि और ऊँची स्तर of  warping on the text , might focus on making segmentation difficult by adding an angled line .
Another way to make segmentation difficult is to crowd symbols  साथ , as in याहू ! 's वर्तमान captcha स्वरूप  .
Some CAPTCHAs try to utilize the ability of  लोगों to देखिए three-dimensional  objects .
On this image , symbols are drawn with lines of  अलग मोटाई to मेक an  effect of extrusion .
A CAPTCHA ( ) is a type of challenge-response test used in computing as an attempt  to ensure कि the जवाब is उत्पन्न by a इंसान  being .
The process usually involves a computer asking a user to  पूरा a सरल परीक्षण जिससे the कंप्यूटर is समर्थ to  grade .
These tests are designed to be easy for a computer to generate  लकिन मुश्किल लिये a कंप्यूटर to solve , लकिन again आसान  for a human .
If a  सही समाधान is प्राप्त , it can be  presumed to have been entered by a human .
A common type of CAPTCHA requires the user to type letters and/or digits from a  distorted चित्र कि appears on the स्क्रीन  .
Such tests are commonly used to prevent unwanted internet bots from accessing websites , since a  सामान्य इंसान can easily पढ़ा a captcha  , while the bot can not process the image letters and therefore , can not answer properly , or at all .
Although most CAPTCHAs are letter pictures randomly generated , many of them have become difficult even for a human to read , so picture CAPTCHAs were  निर्मित in जिससे a इंसान is दिखाया a सरल परीक्षण to दिखाएँ a चित्र of a निश्चित एनिमल ( दिए few एनिमल तस्वीरें ) , जिससे is सरल लिये a इंसान होने to प्रक्रम  , and therefore easy to pick , while a bot can not process and solve the question because although it can analyze the picture , it can not easily guess the animal .
The term `` CAPTCHA '' was coined in 2000 by Luis von Ahn , Manuel Blum , Nicholas J. Hopper ,  और जॉन langford ( सब of कार्नेगी mellon विश्वविद्यालयों )  .
It is an acronym based on the  शब्द `` कैप्चर '' और खड़ा लिये `` completely  Automated Public Turing test to tell Computers and Humans Apart '' .
Carnegie Mellon University  attempted to ट्रेडमार्क the पद on 15 अक्तूबर 2004  , but the trademark application was abandoned on 21 April 2008 .
A CAPTCHA is sometimes  वर्णित as a रिवर्स turing परीक्षण , क्युकी it is administered by a यंत्र और targeted  at a human , in contrast to the standard Turing test that is typically administered by a human and targeted at a machine .
Jacques-Yves Cousteau ( ; commonly known in English as  ज़ाक cousteau ; 11 जून 1910 – 25 जून 1997 ) थी a फ्रेंच नवल अधिकारी , एक्सप्लोरर , conservationist , फिल्मकार , innovator ,  scientist , photographer , author and researcher who studied the sea and all forms of life in water .
He co-developed the Aqua-Lung ,  pioneered समुद्री संरक्षण और थी a सदस्य  of the Académie française .
KFC ( Kentucky Fried Chicken ) is a fast food restaurant chain headquartered  in louisville , केंटकी , संयुक्त राज्य  , which specializes in fried chicken .
An `` American icon '' , it is the world 's second largest restaurant chain overall (  as measured by बिक्री ) बाद मैकडोनाल्ड 's , साथ over  18,000 outlets in 120 countries and territories .
The  कम्पनी is a subsidiary  of Yum !
Brands , a  रेस्तरां कम्पनी जिससे भी  owns Pizza Hut and Taco Bell .
KFC was founded  by harland सैंडर्स  , who began selling fried chicken from his roadside restaurant in Corbin , Kentucky during the Great Depression .
Sanders was one of the first people to see the potential of the  रेस्तरां फ़्रेंचाइज़िंग अवधारणा , साथ the पहला ``  Kentucky Fried Chicken '' franchise opening in Utah in 1952 .
The franchise popularized chicken in the fast food industry , thereby diversifying the market  और चुनौतीपूर्ण the दबदबा of the  hamburger .
Marketing himself as `` Colonel Sanders '' , he became a legendary figure of American cultural  इतिहास , और उसके चित्र is स्टिल prominently प्रयुक्त in केएफसी ब्रांडिंग  .
The company  's रैपिड विस्तार  saw it grow too large for Sanders to manage , and in 1964 he sold the company to a group of investors led by John Y . Brown , Jr. and Jack Massey .
KFC was one of the first fast food chains to expand internationally ,  खोलने आउटलेट in इंग्लैण्ड , मैक्सिको और प्यूर्टो  Rico by the mid-1960s .
Throughout the 1970s and 1980s , KFC experienced mixed  सौभाग्य domestically , as it गई  through a series of corporate owners who had little or no experience in the restaurant business .
In the  जल्दी 1970s , केएफसी थी बेची to the आत्माओं  firm Heublein , who were taken over by the R.J. Reynolds food and tobacco conglomerate , who sold the chain to PepsiCo .
the कड़ी जारी to विस्तार विदेशी  however , and in 1987 KFC became the first Western restaurant chain to open in China .
The chain has since expanded rapidly in China ,  और the देश is अभी the कम्पनी 's सबसे  profitable market .
PepsiCo spun off its restaurants division as Tricon  वैश्विक रेस्तरां , जिससे बाद बदला इसके नाम to  Yum !
ब्रांड्स .
KFC primarily sells fried chicken pieces and  विसंगतियाँ ऐसे as मुर्गा सैंडविच और wraps , सलाद  and side dishes such as French fries and coleslaw , desserts and soft drinks , often supplied by PepsiCo .
Its most famous product is pressure  fried मुर्गा टुकड़े ,  seasoned with Sanders ' `` Original Recipe '' of 11 herbs and spices .
The exact nature of these ingredients is unknown , and  represents a notable  trade secret .
larger portions of fried मुर्गा हैं परोसा in a distinctive गत्ता `` बाल्टी  '' , which has become a signature of the chain since being introduced by franchisee Pete Harman .
KFC is famous for the slogan  `` उंगली lickin ' शुभ '' , जिससे रै चूंकि महरूम  replaced by `` Nobody does chicken like KFC '' and `` So good '' .
Cnidaria ( with a silent c ) or Coelenterata is a phylum  containing over 10,000 प्रजाति of पशु मिला exclusively in जलीय  and mostly marine environments .
Their distinguishing  विशेषता is cnidocytes , specialized कोशिकाएं कि वे उपयोग मुख्यतः  for capturing prey .
Their bodies consist of mesoglea , a non-living jelly-like substance ,  sandwiched between दो परतों of epithelium  that are mostly one cell thick .
They have two basic body forms : swimming medusae and sessile  polyps , दोनो of जिससे हैं radially सममित साथ mouths घिरी by  tentacles that bear cnidocytes .
Both forms  have a सिंगल orifice और देह  cavity that are used for digestion and respiration .
Many cnidarian species produce  colonies कि हैं सिंगल जीवों  composed of medusa-like or polyp-like zooids , or both .
Cnidarians ' activities are coordinated by a  विकेन्द्रित तंत्रिका जाल और सरल receptors  .
Several  free-swimming cubozoa और scyphozoa possess balance-sensing  statocysts , and some have simple eyes .
Not all  cnidarians reproduce  sexually .
Many have complex lifecycles with  अलैंगिक polyp चरण और यौन medusae ,  but some omit either the polyp or the medusa stage .
Cnidarians were for a long time  grouped साथ ctenophores in the phylum coelenterata  , but increasing awareness of their differences caused them to be placed in separate phyla .
Cnidarians are classified into four main groups : the almost wholly sessile Anthozoa ( sea anemones , corals , sea pens ) ; swimming Scyphozoa ( jellyfish ) ; Cubozoa ( box jellies ) ; and Hydrozoa , a diverse group  कि शामिल सब the freshwater cnidarians as खूब as अनेक समुद्री फ़ॉर्म , और रै दोनो स्थानबद्ध  members such as Hydra and colonial swimmers such as the Portuguese Man o ' War .
staurozoa have recently महरूम recognised as a क्लास in उनके अपना सही बल्कि than a sub-group  of Scyphozoa , and there is debate about whether Myxozoa and Polypodiozoa are cnidarians or closer to bilaterians ( more complex animals ) .
सबसे cnidarians शिकार on जीवों ranging in आकार इससे प्लवक to पशु अनेक टाइम्स  larger than themselves , but many obtain much of their nutrition from endosymbiotic algae , and a few are parasites .
Many are preyed upon by other animals  सहित starfish , समुद्र slugs ,  fish and turtles .
Coral reefs , whose polyps are rich  in endosymbiotic शैवाल , support कुछ of the संसार 's सबसे  productive ecosystems , and protect vegetation in tidal zones and on shorelines from strong currents and tides .
While corals are almost entirely restricted to warm ,  उथले समुद्री waters , अन्य cnidarians सजीव in the गहराइयों ,  in polar seas and in freshwater .
Fossil cnidarians have been found in rocks formed  परिचय , और अन्य जीवाश्मों  show that corals may have been present shortly before and diversified a few million years later .
Fossils  of cnidarians कि  do not build mineralized structures are very rare .
Scientists currently think that cnidarians , ctenophores and bilaterians are more closely  सम्बन्धित to calcareous sponges than ये हैं to अन्य sponges , और कि anthozoans हैं the विकासवादी `` aunts '' or `` बहनों '' of अन्य cnidarians  , and the most closely related to bilaterians .
Recent analyses have  concluded कि cnidarians , हालांकि माना अधिक `` आदिम  '' than bilaterians , have a wider range of genes .

The Aztec people  यहूद निश्चित जातीय समूह of सेंट्रल मैक्सिको , विशेषकर  those groups who spoke the Nahuatl language and who dominated large parts of Mesoamerica from the 14th to 16th centuries .
The Nahuatl words aztecatl ( singular ) and aztecah ( plural ) mean `` people from  aztlan `` , a पौराणिक प्लेस लिये the nahuatl-speaking संस्कृति of the समय  , and later adopted as the word to define the Mexica people .
Often the term `` Aztec '' refers exclusively to the  mexica लोगों of tenochtitlan ( अभी the स्थान of मैक्सिको नगर ) , situated  on an island in Lake Texcoco , who referred to themselves as Mexica Tenochca or Cōlhuah Mexica .
Sometimes the term also includes the inhabitants of Tenochtitlan 's  दो प्रिंसिपल अलाइड city-states , the acolhuas of texcoco और the tepanecs of tlacopan , जो साथ साथ the  Mexica formed the Aztec Triple Alliance which controlled what is often known as `` the Aztec Empire '' .
In other contexts , Aztec may refer to  सब the विभिन्न नगर राज्य और उनके peoples , जो साझा विशाल भाग of उनके जातीय इतिहास  and cultural traits with the Mexica , Acolhua and Tepanecs , and who often also used the Nahuatl language as a lingua franca .
In this meaning it is possible  to बात परिचय an एज़टेक सभ्यता सहित सब the particular सांस्कृतिक पैटर्न  common for most of the peoples inhabiting Central Mexico in the late postclassic period .
From the  13th सदी , the घाटी of मैक्सिको थी the दिल of एज़टेक सभ्यता : यहाँ  the capital of the Aztec Triple Alliance , the city of Tenochtitlan , was built upon raised islets in Lake Texcoco .
The Triple Alliance  formed a उपनदी साम्राज्य expanding इसके राजनैतिक आधिपत्य दूर परे  the Valley of Mexico , conquering other city states throughout Mesoamerica .
At its pinnacle , Aztec  संस्कृति था समृद्ध और जटिल पौराणिक और धार्मिक परंपराओं , as खूब as reaching उल्लेखनीय  architectural and artistic accomplishments .
In 1521 Hernán  cortés , साथ साथ a विशाल क्रमांक of नावातल बोलना स्वदेशी allies , conquered  Tenochtitlan and defeated the Aztec Triple Alliance under the leadership of Hueyi Tlatoani Moctezuma II .
Subsequently the Spanish founded the new settlement of Mexico City  on the साईट of the ruined एज़टेक पूंजी , इससे जहाँ वे proceeded  with the process of colonizing Central America .
Aztec culture and  इतिहास is primarily ज्ञात through पुरातत्व प्रमाण मिला in excavations ऐसे as कि of the प्रसिद्ध templo महापौर in मैक्सिको नगर ; इससे स्वदेशी छाल पेपर codices ; इससे eyewitness खाते by स्पेनी conquistadors ऐसे as hernán cortés और बर्नल  Díaz del Castillo ; and especially from 16th and 17th century descriptions of Aztec culture and history written by Spanish clergymen and literate Aztecs in the Spanish or Nahuatl language , such as the famous Florentine Codex compiled by the Franciscan monk Bernardino de Sahagún with the help of indigenous Aztec informants .
Anderson Hays Cooper ( born June 3 ,  1967 ) is an अमरीकी पत्रकार , लेखक , और टेलीविज़न  personality .
He is the primary anchor of the  सीएनएन न्यूज दिखाएँ एंडरसन  Cooper 360° .
The program is normally broadcast live from a New York City  स्टुडियो ; however , कूपर प्रायः प्रसारण सजीव on स्थान  for breaking news stories .
As of September  2011 , he भी serves as मेजबान of उसके अपना eponymous syndicated  daytime talk show , Anderson Live , which will be cancelled at the end of the second season .
A plot of a normal distribution ( or bell-shaped curve ) where each band has a width of 1  मानक विचलन – देखिए भी : 68-95-99.7  rule
संचयी संभाव्यता of a  normal distribution with expected value 0 and standard deviation 1 .
In statistics and probability  सिद्धान्त , मानक विचलन ( represented by the प्रतीक सिग्मा , σ ) shows कैसा much विभिन्नता or  dispersion exists from the average ( mean ) , or expected value .
A low standard deviation indicates that the data points tend to be very close to  the औसत ; ऊँची मानक विचलन indicates कि the आंकड़ा अंक  are spread out over a large range of values .
The  मानक विचलन of a यादृच्छिक परिवर्तनीय , सांख्यिकीय जनसांख्यिकी  , data set , or probability distribution is the square root of its variance .
It is algebraically simpler though  practically कम मजबूत than the औसत  absolute deviation .
A useful property of  मानक विचलन is कि , नापसंद variance  , it is expressed in the same units as the data .
Note , however , that for measurements with percentage as unit , the standard  विचलन होगा have प्रतिशत अंक  as unit .
In addition to expressing the variability of a population ,  मानक विचलन is commonly प्रयुक्त to  measure confidence in statistical conclusions .
For example , the margin of error in polling data is  संकल्पित by calculating the अपेक्षित मानक विचलन in the  results if the same poll were to be conducted multiple times .
The reported  हाशिया of गलती is typically परिचय twice the मानक विचलन  ­– the radius of a 95 percent confidence interval .
In science , researchers commonly report the standard deviation of experimental data , and only effects that fall far outside the range of standard deviation are considered  statistically significant – सामान्य यादृच्छिक गलती or विभिन्नता in the माप is in इस रास्ता विशिष्ट इससे causal  variation .
Standard deviation  is भी महत्वपूर्ण in वित्त , जहाँ the मानक विचलन on the  rate of return on an investment is a measure of the volatility of the investment .
When only a sample of data from a population is available , the  मानक विचलन of the जनसांख्यिकी can be अनुमानित by a परिवर्धित  quantity called the `` sample standard deviation '' .
When the sample is the entire population , its  unmodified मानक  deviation is called the `` population standard deviation '' .
Ulluco ( u : ju :  kɔ : ) ( ullucus tuberosus  ) is a plant grown primarily as a root vegetable , secondarily as a leaf vegetable .
The ulluco is one of the most widely  grown और economically महत्वपूर्ण रूट फसलों in the andean प्रदेश of दक्षिण  America , second only to the potato .
It is known there with  the आम नाम of पापा लिसा , लकिन भी by the क्षेत्रीय  names melloco ( Ecuador ) , olluco ( Peru ) , chugua ( Colombia ) or ruba ( Venezuela ) , among others .
The leaf and the tuber are edible , similar to spinach and  the आलू , क्रमशः  .
They are known to contain  ऊँची स्तर  of protein , calcium , and carotene .
Papalisa were used by the Incas prior  to आगमन of europeans in दक्षिण  America .
Ulluco tubers are  marketed as `` धरती  Gems '' in New Zealand , by Halfords Exotic Produce .

An April 24 ,  1851 पोस्टर चेतावनी the `` रंगीन लोगों of बोस्टन  '' about policemen acting as slave catchers .
The Fugitive Slave Law or Fugitive Slave Act was passed by the United States Congress on September 18 , 1850 , as part  of the सुलह of 1850 between दक्षिणी slave-holding  interests and Northern Free-Soilers .
This was one of the most controversial acts of the 1850 compromise and  heightened उत्तरी fears of a `` स्लेव शक्ति  conspiracy '' .
It declared that all runaway slaves were  , upon कैप्चर , to be लौटे  to their masters .
Abolitionists nicknamed it the `` Bloodhound Law  '' लिये the कुत्तो कि यहूद प्रयुक्त  to track down runaway slaves .
Frank  जोसेफ pallone , jr. ( born अक्तूबर  30 , 1951 ) is the U.S. Representative for , serving since 1993 .
He is a member  of the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी  .
He previously represented the  3rd ज़िला इससे 1988 to  1993 .
Trin-i-tee 5:7 is  a इन्जील duo इससे नई ऑरलियन्स  , Louisiana in the United States .
The group was marketed as a  इन्जील वैकल्पिक to r & b लड़की  groups such as Destiny 's Child and TLC .
trin-i-tee 5:7 रै  sold over 2.5 million albums .
In 1998 , the group released  उनके पहला एल्बम हकदार trin-i-tee 5:7  which debut at # 1 on the Top Gospel charts .
The album  प्रदर्शित the गीतों ``  God 's Grace '' and the cover song `` Oh !
Mary Do n't  तुम रोते ''  .
The album later  became certified  gold .
In  1999 ,  Terri Brown left the group and was later replaced by singer Adrian Anderson .
During that year , the  समूह अंकित और released  their second album , Spiritual Love .
The album became the group 's second # 1  एल्बम on the शीर्ष इन्जील चार्ट  .
The album contained the singles ``  put अपना हैंड्स '' और ``  My Body '' .
In 2002 , the group released  उनके तीसरा एल्बम the चुंबन जिससे debuted  at # 2 on the Top Gospel charts .
In 2007 , the group left  gospocentric रिकॉर्ड और हस्ताक्षरित a रिकार्ड  deal with Spirit Rising Music .
In late 2007 ,  trin-i-tee 5:7 released उनके पांचवां एल्बम t57  , which featured the top ten gospel single `` Listen '' .
T57 charted # 2 on the Top Gospel Albums , # 5 on the Top  ईसाई चार्ट , और # 12 on the शीर्ष r & b चार्ट  .
The United States federal earned income tax credit  or अर्जित आय क्रेडिट ( eitc or eic ) is a refundable कर क्रेडिट लिये low- और medium-income  individuals and couples , primarily for those who have qualifying children .
When the  क्रेडिट exceeds the राशि of कर owed  , it results in a tax refund to those who claim the credit .
This credit is provided to offset the burden of social security taxes and  भी to प्रचार an प्रोत्साहन  to work .
In order for a person or couple to claim one or more persons as their qualifying child ( ren ) , the age , relationship , and shared residency requirements must  be मिले , as खूब as कुछ अन्य आवश्यकताएँ  .
U.S. tax forms 1040EZ ,  1040a , or 1040 can be प्रयुक्त to अर्जी eic  without qualifying children .
To claim the credit with qualifying children  , 1040a or 1040  must be used , as well as attaching Schedule EIC .
EIC phases in slowly , has a medium-length plateau , and then  phases आउट अधिक धीरे than it phased  in .
Since the credit phases out at 21 % ( for two children and for three or more qualilfying  children ) or 16 % ( लिये एक qualifying चाइल्ड ) , it is सदा अस्तबलों to have एक अधिक डालर of वास्तविक सैलरी or मजदूरी ( हालांकि technically , चूंकि the eic तालिका चालें  by fifty dollar increments , it 's always preferable to have an extra fifty-dollar increment of salary or wages ) .
For tax year 2011 ,  the अधिकतम eic लिये a सिंगल व्यक्ति or युगल दाखिल  without qualifying children was $ 464 .
the अधिकतम eic साथ एक qualifying चाइल्ड थी $ 3,094 , साथ  two children was $ 5,112 , and with three or more qualifying children was $ 5,751 .
These amounts are  indexed annually  for inflation .
The earned  आय कर क्रेडिट रै महरूम भाग of राजनैतिक debates in the संयुक्त राज्य  regarding whether raising the minimum wage or increasing EIC will better address a seeming shortage of good-paying jobs .
The following is a list of halftime shows  आयोजित at the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग  's championship game , the Super Bowl .
While halftime shows are a tradition  दौरान फ़ुटबॉल खेल at सब स्तर of प्रतियोगिता , the सुपर कटोरी मध्यांतर दिखाएँ represents a आधारभूत कड़ी  to pop culture , which helps broaden the television audience and nationwide interest .
In most years since the mid-1980s , the halftime show of the Super Bowl has  प्रदर्शित लोकप्रिय रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकारों और  other well-known celebrities .
It has measurably increased television  दर्शक दौरान और  after the halftime show .
The performance is regarded one of the most-watched events in American television annually with over 100  लाख दर्शक in the संयुक्त राज्य अलोन  .
Musical genres over the years have represented a broad  दायरा of म्यूज़िक प्रकार , सहित पॉप , चट्टान , क्लासिक चट्टान  , country , hip hop , rap , blues , and soul .
in कुछ सालो , छोटी skits  or drama scenes are acted out on a stage .
The performance group Up with  लोगों रै performed at the सबसे सुपर कटोरी मध्यांतर  shows , starring in four during the 1970s and 1980s .
According to Nielsen ratings , Super Bowl XLVI halftime show headlined by Madonna in 2012 remains the most-watched  मध्यांतर दिखाएँ in इतिहास , साथ 114 लाख दर्शक  or about 3 million more than the actual game .
Beyonce 's 2013  मध्यांतर दिखाएँ प्रदर्शन  was the second most viewed show in history .
