It is listed on the Guinness World  रिकॉर्ड as the largest tv  audience for a Super Bowl half-time performance .
अंतरराष्ट्रीय मेन 's दिन ( imd ) is an सालाना अंतरराष्ट्रीय  event celebrated on 19th November .
Inaugurated in 1999 in Trinidad and Tobago , the day and its  कार्यक्रम ढूँढें support इससे a किस्में of individuals और समूह in ऑस्ट्रेलिया , the caribbean  , North America , Asia , Europe and Africa .
Speaking on behalf of UNESCO , Director of Women and Culture of Peace Ingeborg Breines said of  imd , `` इस is an बेहतरीन विचार और होता दे कुछ लिंग  balance . ''
She added that UNESCO  थी looking आगे  to cooperating with the organizers .
the उद्देश्य of celebrating an अंतरराष्ट्रीय मेन  's Day include focusing on men 's and boys ' health , improving gender relations , promoting gender equality , and highlighting positive male role models .
It is an occasion to highlight discrimination against men and boys and to celebrate their achievements and contributions  , in particular लिये उनके योगदान to जातियाँ  , family , marriage , and child care .
The broader and  परम उद्देश्य of the इवेंट is to प्रचार  basic humanitarian values .
International Men 's Day is celebrated in over 60 countries , including Trinidad and Tobago , Jamaica , Australia , India , China , United States , Romania , Singapore  , माल्टा , संयुक्त किंगडम , दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी , तंजानिया , ज़िम्बाब्वे , बोत्सवाना , australia , बुरुंडी , हंगेरियाई , आयरलैंड , आइल of man , घाना  , Canada , Denmark , Norway , Austria , Bosnia and Herzegovina , Ukraine , France , Italy , Pakistan , Cuba , Antigua and Barbuda , St. Kitts and Nevis , St. Lucia , Grenada and Cayman Islands , on 19 November , and global support for the celebration is broad .
Valley Village  parkvalley
Village is a district in the  सैन फर्नांडो घाटी प्रदेश of लॉस  Angeles , California .
the मध्य आयु of इसके जनसांख्यिकी , at 36 , is ``  old for the city of Los Angeles . '' and its average household size of two people is low , compared to other parts of the city .
Developmental psychology is the scientific study of  परिवर्तन कि occur in इंसान beings over  the course of their life span .
Originally concerned with  infants और children , the फ़ील्ड रै विस्तारित to शामिल  adolescence , adult development , aging , and the entire life span .
This field examines change across a broad range of topics including motor skills and other psycho-physiological processes ; cognitive development  involving क्षेत्रों ऐसे as प्रॉब्लम  solving , moral understanding , and conceptual understanding ; language acquisition ; social , personality , and emotional development ; and self-concept and identity formation .
Developmental psychology includes issues such as the extent to which development occurs through the gradual accumulation  of ज्ञान बनाम stage-like विकास , or the extent to जिससे children हैं born साथ स्वाभाविक दिमागी  structures versus learning through experience .
Many researchers  हैं दिलचस्पी in the बातचीत  between personal characteristics , the individual 's behavior , and environmental factors including social context , and their impact on development ; others take a more narrowly-focused approach .
Developmental psychology informs several applied fields , including : educational  मनोविज्ञान , चाइल्ड psychopathology , और forensic  developmental psychology .
Developmental psychology complements several other basic research fields in psychology including social psychology , cognitive  मनोविज्ञान , ecological मनोविज्ञान , और तुलनात्मक मनोविज्ञान  .
Joseph Michael `` Joey '' Stivic is a fictional  अक्षर जो पहला appeared on the 1970s अमरीकी  sitcom All in the Family .
Joey Stivic was the son and only child of  माइक stivic ( निभाई by रोब reiner ) और ग्लोरिया stivic ( निभाई  by Sally Struthers ) , and the grandson of Archie Bunker ( Carroll O'Connor ) and Edith Bunker ( Jean Stapleton ) .
The character first appeared as a newborn baby in a two-part episode of All in the Family  जिससे aired in दिसम्बर  1975 .
After many appearances on All in the Family until Reiner and Struthers left the series in 1978 ( by that time , Joey had been played most often by alternating twins Jason and Justin Draeger ) , the Joey Stivic character next appeared on the All in the Family spin-off series ( some call it a continuation of the  असली ) आर्ची बंकर 's प्लेस in a अतिथि रूप in the नवम्बर 1979 एपीसोड `` थैंक्सगिविंग पुनर्मिलन .  ''
In this instance , the  अक्षर थी निभाई by चाइल्ड कर्ता  Dick Billingsley and was appropriately pre-school age .
With Gloria now  अलग इससे माइक , वो लौटे to आर्ची बंकर 's प्लेस  with Joey in the February 1982 episode `` Gloria Comes Home . ''
In this episode ,  जॉय थी निभाई  by Christopher Johnston .
Joey Stivic was a  नियमित अक्षर on the सब in the परिवार  spin-off series Gloria in 1982 and 1983 .
On this series , in which the now-divorced Gloria Bunker  अक्षर था स्थानांतरित to upstate नई यॉर्क in अनुक्रम to कार्य as an सहायक veterinarian  , the part of Joey Stivic was played by ten-year-old actor Christian Jacobs .
After Gloria was canceled in 1983 , Joey Stivic disappeared  इससे प्रधान समय टेलीविज़न लिये 11 सालो , जबतक the अक्षर बना एक पिछला रूप on 704 hauser , a short-lived  1994 series about a black family who had moved into the old Bunker home , years after Bunker had sold it .
In this  रूप , the जॉय stivic अक्षर थी निभाई  by Casey Siemaszko , an actor born in 1961 ( 14 years before Joey Stivic 's fictional birth ) .
In 1976 the Ideal Toy Company released a 14-inch ``  जॉय stivic गुड़िया '' ( पुकारा `` आर्ची बंकर 's पोता  '' ) which was billed as the `` first anatomically correct male doll . ''
The doll inspired mild controversy at  the समय , और is a collectors  ' item today .
The 2011  रोज़ कटोरी थी  the 97th edition of the annual bowl game played on January 1 , 2011 , as part of the 2010 college football season .
Played in Pasadena , California , the TCU Horned Frogs of the Mountain West Conference defeated the  विस्कॉन्सिन badgers of the बिग टेन सम्मेलन by a  score of 21 – 19 .
the pasadena टूर्नामेंट  of Roses Association was the organizer of the game .
Vizio Inc. was the  कॉरपोरेट प्रायोजक और the खेल थी officially नामित  `` The Rose Bowl Game presented by Vizio '' .
This game marked the first time a team from a non-Automatic Qualifying Conference  निभाई in , और जीती , the रोज़ कटोरी in इसके 97 सालो .
The contest was broadcast on cable television station ESPN  साथ a रेडियो ब्रॉडकास्ट on ईएसपीएन रेडियो और xm उपग्रह  Radio and ESPN3 streaming video over the internet .
Coverage  began at 1:30 pm ( pst ) साथ  kickoff at 2:10 PM ( PST ) .
This marked the first time  कि the खेल थी नहीं ब्रॉडकास्ट nationally `` over-the-air ''  ( terrestrial television ) since the games prior to the 1952 Rose Bowl , which was the first nationally televised college football game .
The Rose Bowl Game , themed Building Dreams , Friendships , & Memories , was a contractual sell-out , with 64,500  टिकटें आबंटित to the participating टीमों  and conferences .
Ticket prices for all  सीटे in the  Rose Bowl are listed at $ 145 .
The remaining  टिकटें गई to the टूर्नामेंट of गुलाब सदस्यों  , sponsors , City of Pasadena residents , and the general public .
The Rose Bowl  स्टेडियम क्षमता is सूचीबद्ध at  approximately 91,000 .
The Declaration of Independence is a statement adopted by the Continental Congress on July 4  , 1776 , जिससे घोषित कि the तेरह अमरीकी colonies , तब at युद्ध साथ ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , regarded  themselves as independent states , and no longer a part of the British Empire .
Instead they now formed  a नई nation—the संयुक्त राज्य of  America .
John Adams was a leader in  pushing लिये स्वतंत्रता , जिससे थी unanimously  approved on July 2 .
A committee had already drafted the formal declaration , to be ready when  कॉंग्रेस voted on स्वतंत्रता  .
Adams persuaded the committee to  चुनें थामस जेफरसन to लिखें the असली ड्राफ्ट of  the document , which congress would edit to produce the final version .
The  घोषणा थी ultimately a औपचारिक स्पष्टीकरण of क्यों कॉंग्रेस था voted on जुलाई 2 to घोषित  independence from Great Britain , more than a year after the outbreak of the American Revolutionary War .
The national birthday , the  स्वतंत्रता दिन is मनाये on जुलाई 4 ,  although Adams wanted July 2 .
बाद ratifying  the text on July 4 , Congress issued the Declaration of Independence in several forms .
It was initially published as the printed Dunlap broadside that was  widely वितरित और पढ़ा to the  public .
The most famous version of the Declaration , a signed copy that is popularly regarded  as the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता , is प्रदर्शित at the नेशनल अभिलेख in वॉशिंगटन  , D.C .
Although the wording of the Declaration was approved on July 4 , the date of  इसके हस्ताक्षर  was August 2 .
The original July 4 United States Declaration of Independence manuscript was lost while  सब अन्य नक़ल have महरूम निकला इससे इस असली  document .
The sources and interpretation of the Declaration have  महरूम the विषय of much scholarly  inquiry .
The Declaration justified the independence of the United States by listing colonial  grievances विरूद्ध किंग जार्ज iii , और by asserting निश्चित प्राकृतिक और विधिक  rights , including a right of revolution .
Having served its original  purpose in announcing स्वतंत्रता , the टेक्स्ट of the  Declaration was initially ignored after the American Revolution .
Since then ,  it रै आइये to be माना a प्रमुख बयान on इंसान अधिकारों  , particularly its second sentence:
We hold  ये सच्चाई to be self-evident , कि सब मेन हैं निर्मित बराबर , कि वे हैं endowed by  their Creator with certain unalienable Rights , that among these are Life , Liberty and the pursuit of Happiness .
This has been called `` one of the best-known sentences in the English language '' , containing `` the  सबसे potent और consequential शब्द in अमरीकी इतिहास  . ''
The passage  आए to represent a moral मानक  to which the United States should strive .
This view was notably promoted by Abraham Lincoln , who considered the Declaration to be the foundation of his political philosophy , and argued that the  घोषणा is a बयान of सिद्धान्त through जिससे the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान  should be interpreted .
It has inspired work for the  अधिकारों of अधिकारहीन लोगों  throughout the world .
chitty chitty बंग बंग is a 1968  British musical film loosely based on Ian Fleming 's novel .
The film 's script is by Roald Dahl and  केन ह्यूजेस और इसके गीतों by the शरमन  Brothers .
It stars  लंड वैन dyke as caractacus  Potts and Sally Ann Howes as Truly Scrumptious .
The film was directed by Ken Hughes and produced by Albert R.  ब्रोकोली ( co-producer of the जेम्स बंध श्रेणी  of films , also based on Fleming 's novels ) .
जॉन stears पर्यवेक्षित  the special effects .
Irwin Kostal  पर्यवेक्षित और conducted the म्यूज़िक , जबकि the  musical numbers were staged by Marc Breaux and Dee Dee Wood .
A region is arid when it is  characterized by a कठोर कमी of उपलब्धियाँ जल , to the extent of hindering  or preventing the growth and development of plant and animal life .
Environments subject to arid climates  tend to कमी वनस्पति और हैं पुकारा  xeric or desertic .
Most ``  arid '' climates घेर the equator ; ये स्थान शामिल सबसे of  Africa and parts of South America and Central America .
Cancer ( ♋ ) is an astrological sign , which is  संबद्ध साथ the नक्षत्र  Cancer .
It spans the 90-120th degree of the zodiac , between 90 and  125.25 उपाधि of celestial देशांतर , जिससे the सूर्य  transits this area on average between June 22 to July 22 each year .
And under the  sidereal zodiac , it is फिलहाल  from July 21 to August 9 .
The United States  अध्यक्षीय चुनाव of 1960 थी the 44th quadrennial  presidential election , held on Tuesday , November 8 , 1960 .
The  रिपब्लिकन पार्टी मनोनीत लाज़िम vice-president रिचर्ड निक्सन ,  while the Democratic Party nominated John F. Kennedy , Senator from Massachusetts .
The incumbent President , Republican Dwight D. Eisenhower , was not eligible for re-election after serving the  अधिकतम दो शर्तें अनुमत by the twenty-second amendment  .
Kennedy was elected with a lead of 112,827 votes , or 0.17 % of the popular vote , giving him a victory  of 303 to 219 in the चुनावी कॉलेज , the closest चूंकि  1916 .
This was the first election  in जिससे सब पचास of the वर्तमान संयुक्त  States participated .
A  क्रमांक of कारकों बताइये  why the election was so close .
Kennedy gained since there was  an आर्थिक मंदी जिससे ठेस the लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन , और he था the लाभ of 17 लाख  more registered Democrats than Republicans .
Furthermore ,  the नई मत कि कैनेडी gained among catholics  almost neutralized the new votes Nixon gained among Protestants .
कैनेडी 's  campaigning skills decisively outmatched Nixon 's .
In the end , Nixon 's emphasis on his experience carried little weight , and he wasted  उर्जा by campaigning in सब 50 राज्य  instead of concentrating on the swing states .
Kennedy used his large , well-funded campaign organization  to जीत the नामांकन , सुरक्षित समर्थन  , and , with the aid of the last of the big-city bosses , to get out the vote in the big cities .
He  relied on कार्यशील mate lyndon  B. Johnson to hold the South and used television effectively .
This election is notable as being the first time in U.S. history that two sitting U.S .  सीनेटरों ( कैनेडी और जॉनसन ) यहूद निर्वाचित as अध्यक्ष और  vice-president , a phenomenon that has been repeated once , by Barack Obama and Joe Biden in 2008 ( in both cases , the president was the younger , more junior senator ) .
Sherwood is a city in  वॉशिंगटन काउंटी , ऑरेगॉन , संयुक्त राज्य  .
Located in the southeast corner of the county , it is  a आवासीय जातियाँ in the tualatin घाटी  southwest of Portland .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 11,791 at the 2000  census .
According to the 2010 census , the  जनसांख्यिकी थी 18,205 निवासियों  .
indirectly नामित लिये the शेरवुड  Forest in England , it was first incorporated in 1893 as a town .
the यूएसए patriot अधिनियम of 2001 is an अधिनियम of  the U.S. Congress that was signed into law by President George W. Bush on October 26 , 2001 .
The title of the act is a ten letter acronym ( USA PATRIOT ) that stands for Uniting (  और ) strengthening अमेरिका ( by ) providing उचित टूल्स जरूरी ( to ) इंटरफेस  ( and ) Obstruct Terrorism Act of 2001 .
The act , as a response to the terrorist attacks of September 11th , significantly reduced restrictions in law enforcement agencies ' gathering of intelligence within the United States ; expanded the Secretary of the Treasury’s authority to regulate financial transactions , particularly those involving foreign individuals and  entities ; और broadened the discretion of विधि प्रवर्तन और आव्रजन अधिकारियों in निमाड़ और deporting आप्रवासियों suspected  of terrorism-related acts .
The act also expanded the definition of terrorism to include domestic terrorism , thus enlarging the number  of क्रियाएँ to जिससे the यूएसए patriot act’s विस्तारित विधि प्रवर्तन  powers can be applied .
On May 26 , 2011 , President Barack Obama used an Autopen to sign the PATRIOT Sunsets Extension Act of 2011 , a four-year extension of three key provisions in the USA PATRIOT Act while he was  in फ़्रांस : roving wiretaps , खोज of कारोबार रिकॉर्ड ( the `` पुस्तकालयों रिकॉर्ड प्रावधान `` ) , और conducting निगरानी of `` लोन भेड़ियों '' — individuals suspected of terrorist-related क्रियाएँ  not linked to terrorist groups .
Republican  नेताओ questioned if the उपयोग of the autopen मिले the संवैधानिक  requirements for signing a bill into law .
A house  in महारानी ऐनी स्टाइल  at 223 Avenue A .
Snohomish  is a नगर in snohomish  County , Washington , United States .
The population was 9,098 at the  2010 जनसांख्यिकी  .
The mayor of  snohomish is karen guzak , और  the City Manager is Larry Bauman .
Snohomish prides itself for  इसके ऐतिहासिक शहर , और थी एकबार ज्ञात लिये इसके अनेक पुरातन  shops when it was known as the `` Antique Capital of the Northwest . ''
The historic business and residential center of the town constitutes the Snohomish Historic  ज़िला , जिससे is सूचीबद्ध on the नेशनल पंजीकरण of ऐतिहासिक  Places .
Many houses bear  प्लाक साथ the साल the हाउस थी निर्मित और the नाम  of the family or individual who originally occupied it .
Once every year , the city gives  टुर of the ऐतिहासिक घरों ; एक of उन्हें , the blackman हाउस  , is a year-round museum .
A general aviation airfield ,  घनघोर एयरफील्ड , is कम than एक  mile southwest of Downtown Snohomish .
Dave Matthews Band ( DMB ) is an American rock  बैंड कि थी formed in charlottesville , वर्जिनिया  , United States , in 1991 .
The founding members were singer-songwriter and guitarist Dave Matthews , bassist Stefan  lessard , वादक /backing vocalist कार्टर beauford और saxophonist leroi  Moore .
Boyd  tinsley थी added  to the band as a violinist soon after the band was formed .
Moore  died एकाएक in अगस्त 2008 due  to complications from injuries sustained in an ATV accident .
GRAMMY Award -winner Jeff Coffin of Béla Fleck and the Flecktones has since filled Moore 's  स्पॉट as the बैंड 's saxophonist  .
Rashawn Ross and Tim Reynolds have also  become full-time touring सदस्यों  of the band .
The band 's 2009 album Big Whiskey and the GrooGrux King ( the first album since Moore 's death )  debuted at क्रमांक एक on the बिलबोर्ड 200 , कमाई the बैंड उनके पांचवां लगातार number-one debut— बनाना उन्हें the दूसरी  band behind Metallica to do so .
Their most recent  एल्बम , दूर इससे the संसार , थी released in  2012 , and also debuted at number one on the Billboard chart .
As of 2010 , the Dave Matthews Band has sold over 30  लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी  .
The band is known for their annual summer-long tours of the United States and Europe , featuring  lengthy improvisational renditions of उनके गीतों , accompanied by an विस्तृत वीडियो  and lighting show .
This portion of the  दौरे रै become a स्टैम्प of dmb और रै grown साथ  the band since Fenton Williams began working with them in the early 1990s .
After twenty consecutive years of touring the band announced  कि it होता लो the गर्मियाँ of 2011  off .
Dave  matthews बैंड रै जीती एक ग्रैमी  Award , and was awarded the NAACP Chairman 's Award .
According to  जूलियन बंध , ``  they sell out the largest arenas on Earth , but frequently give their music away . ''
Transcendental Wild Oats : A Chapter  इससे an अलिखित रोमांस is a गद्य व्यंग्य लिखा  by Louisa May Alcott , about her family 's involvement with the Transcendentalist community Fruitlands in the early 1840s .
The work was first published in a New  यॉर्क समाचारपत्र  in 1873 , and reprinted in 1874 , 1876 , and 1915 and after .
In her account , Alcott provides the real  लोगों शामिल साथ पतला pseudonymous  disguises .
Her father Amos Bronson Alcott is `` Abel Lamb , '' while his partner and community co-founder Charles Lane is `` Timon Lion ; '' Abigail  may alcott , louisa 's माँ और bronson 's बीवी , is `` सिस्टर  Hope . ''
Alcott depicts her father as dominated by his  अधिक forceful संगी , और दोनो मेन as लापरवाह  and impractical dreamers .
the मेन of the जातियाँ खर्च उनके समय  in pointless debates while Sister Hope works from dawn to dusk to maintain their existence .
A crisis arises at  कटाई समय , जब the अनाज क्रॉप is  threatened by an approaching storm .
In Alcott  's शब्द , `` परिचय the समय the अनाज थी तैयार to हाउस  , some call of the Oversoul wafted all the men away . ''
Sister Hope organizes the only available  सहायता , तीन छोटी लड़कियों  and a boy , and manages to save the crop .
The little community collapses as soon as the weather turns cold , when it becomes clear that their provisions are  too meager to पिछला the coming शीत  .
Timon Lion and his son abscond to join the Shakers  — हालांकि timon is अप्रसन्न to सीख कि जीवन among उन्हें is `` सब  work and no play . ''
Abel is crushed by the failure of the enterprise ; after days of  despair he begins to खा again तभी जब he realizes  that his family needs him .
Sister Hope finds a way for  उन्हें to subsist और persevere .
Alcott 's view of male arrogance and female exploitation in  इस टुकड़ा is paralleled in उसके अनोखा  , published in the same year as `` Transcendental Wild Oats . ''
`` Transcendental Wild Oats '' has been reprinted  in अनेक आधुनिक संस्करण  .
Mount of  the पावन क्रॉस is the northernmost 14,000-foot पहाड़ in  the Sawatch Range , part of the Rocky Mountains in Colorado .
It is located in the Holy Cross Wilderness near the ghost town of Holy  क्रॉस नगर और in त्रिभुज  County .
It was named for the distinctive cross-shaped  snowfield on the पूर्वोत्तर फेस  .
Under USDA Forest  सेवा प्रशासन , the पहाड़ थी proclaimed ``  Holy Cross National Monument '' by Herbert Hoover on May 11 , 1929 .
The  स्मारक थी transferred to the  National Park Service in 1933 .
In 1950 , it  थी लौटे to the वन सेवा और खोया इसके नेशनल स्मारक status—the  number of visitors to the mountain and the nearby `` Pilgrim 's Hut '' had waned , and the expense of full-time staff could not be justified .
This mountain has been the subject of  चित्रकार , फ़ोटोग्राफ़र और भी a कविता by हेनरी वाड्सवर्थ लांगफेलो  , ( The Cross of Snow ) .
the पहला सरेआम  available photograph was published in National Geographic magazine .
Thomas Moran depicted the mountain in an oil painting , which  अभी is भाग of the संग्रहण of the संग्रहालय  of the American West , part of the Autry National Center in Los Angeles , California .
It is still  much photographed लकिन  it is not as well known today as it was in the past .
Nearby features include Bowl of  आंसू झील , सीधे अंतर्गत the ईस्ट फेस of the शिखर , tuhare  Lakes , in a cirque that lies south of a significant subpeak , and several other lakes .
notable स्थितियाँ भीतर शामिल the dotsero  volcano ( near Interstate 70 ) , Vail and Aspen .
US 24 runs near the peak  through gilman  .
photochrom छपाई of माउंट  of the Holy Cross c. 1900 .
This image is a reversed view of the  पहाड़ compared to कैसा it  actually appears .
The first recorded ascent of Holy Cross was in 1873 , by F. V. Hayden and  फ़ोटोग्राफ़र W. H. जैक्सन दौरान एक of hayden 's भौगोलिक सर्वेक्षण  .
However , the peak may well have been ascended previously by miners  or अमरीकी इंडियंस  .
The first winter ascent of the peak was made in 1943 by Russel Keene and Howard  freedman of the 10th पहाड़ प्रभाग , तब stationed at शिविर hale  .
Holy  क्रॉस can be climbed by at तनिक चार अलग रूट , साथ the easiest और सबसे आम  route being the North Ridge , which involves of vertical gain over and is rated YDS Class 2 for moderate scrambling .
The  क्रॉस couloir रूट फ़ॉर्म the लंबवत portion  of the famous cross feature , and provides an advanced snow climb or extreme ski descent .
Mount of  the पावन क्रॉस रै  a history of endangering the lives of many hikers .
Primarily , the hikers who require rescue are  unfamiliar साथ the risks of प्रवेश wilderness क्षेत्रों और do नहीं लाओ पर्याप्त उपकरण और  supplies to respond to emergency conditions .
Although the summit on Mount of the Holy Cross is frequently reached on a long day hike , unprepared hikers are frequently stranded or lost due  to बदलना पर्यावरणीय शर्तें और भ्रम regarding the surrounding  landscape , especially on the descent of North Ridge .
Thorough research and reasonable  नियोजन चाहिए prevent  most tragedies .
माउंट of the पावन क्रॉस is accessible  from Tigiwon Road , south of Minturn , Colorado .
The Half Moon Pass Trail is the standard route to the summit of Mount of  the पावन क्रॉस via the उत्तर  Ridge .
Following the  पतन क्रीक ट्रेल to an ascent of  Notch Mountain Trail provides the best view of the Holy Cross snow feature from Notch Mountain Ridge .
The GSM logo  is प्रयुक्त to पहचानो  compatible handsets and equipment
GSM ( Global  प्रणाली लिये मोबाईल संचार , originally ' ) , is a मानक नियत विकसित by the यूरोपीय दूरसंचार  Standards Institute ( ETSI ) to describe protocols for second generation ( 2G ) digital cellular networks used by mobile phones .
It became  the de facto वैश्विक मानक लिये मोबाईल  communications with over 80 % market share .
The GSM  मानक थी विकसित as a  replacement for first generation ( 1G ) analog cellular networks , and originally described a digital , circuit switched network optimized for full duplex voice telephony .
This was expanded over time to include data  संचार , पहला by सर्किट switched हस्तांतरण , तब पैकेट आंकड़ा हस्तांतरण via gprs ( सामान्य पैकेट रेडियो सेवाएं  ) and EDGE ( Enhanced Data rates for GSM Evolution or EGPRS ) .
Further  सुधार यहूद बना जब the 3gpp विकसित तीसरा पीढी  ( 3G ) UMTS standards followed by fourth generation ( 4G ) LTE Advanced standards .
`` GSM '' is a trademark owned by  the जीएसएम संघ  .
President Franklin  D. रूज़वेल्ट लक्षण the lend-lease  bill to give aid to Britain and China ( 1941 )
The Lend  पट्टे अधिनियम थी an अधिनियम जहाँ the  United States had supported its allies .
Lend-Lease ( ) was the law that started a program under which the United States of America supplied the  संयुक्त किंगडम , the ussr  , Republic of China , Free France , and other Allied nations with materiel between 1941 and 1945 .
It was signed into  विधि on कूच 11 , 1941  , a year and a half after the outbreak of World War II in Europe in September 1939 .
This was  नौ महीने पहले the u.S. डाला  the war in December 1941 .
Formally titled An Act to Further Promote the Defense of the United States  , the अधिनियम effectively ended the संयुक्त राज्य '  pretense of neutrality .
A total of $ 50 .1 billion (  समतुल्य to $ आज ) लायक of आपूर्तियाँ यहूद shipped : $ 31.4 अरब to ब्रिटेन  , $ 11.3 billion to the Soviet Union , $ 3.2 billion to France , $ 1.6 billion to China , and smaller sums to other Allies .
Reverse Lend-Lease  comprised सेवाएं ऐसे as किराया on एयर bases कि  went to the U.S. , and totaled $ 7.8 billion ; of this , $ 6.8 billion came from the British and the Commonwealth .
The terms of the  अनुबंध provided कि the materiel थी to be  used until time for their return or destruction .
Supplies after the termination date were sold to Britain at a large discount  लिये £1 .075 अरब using long-term लोन  from the United States .
कनाडा संचालित a समान कार्यक्रम  that sent $ 4.7 billion in supplies to the United Kingdom and the Soviet Union .
The  संयुक्त राज्य किया नहीं चार्ज लिये सहायता supplied  under this legislation .
This program was a decisive step away from non-interventionist policy , which  था वर्चस्व संयुक्त राज्य विदेशी संबंध चूंकि the समाप्त of  World War I , towards international involvement .
The Jerusalem artichoke ( Helianthus tuberosus ) , also called sunroot , sunchoke , earth apple or topinambour , is a species of sunflower native to  पूर्वी उत्तर अमेरिका , और मिला इससे पूर्वी कनाडा और maine वेस्ट to उत्तर डकोटा , और दक्षिण to उत्तरी फ्लोरिडा और  Texas .
It is  भी cultivated widely आरपार the शीतोष्ण मण्डल  for its tuber , which is used as a root vegetable .
Castillo  सैन फेलिप डेल morro भी ज्ञात as फोर्ट सैन फेलिप डेल  Morro or Morro Castle , is a 16th-century citadel located in San Juan , Puerto Rico .
Stonehenge  is a प्रागैतिहासिक  monument in Wiltshire , England , about west of Amesbury and north of Salisbury .
One of the most famous sites in the  संसार , stonehenge is the  remains of a ring of standing stones set within earthworks .
It  is in the मध्य of the सबसे घना  complex of Neolithic and Bronze Age monuments in England , including several hundred burial mounds .
archaeologists मानना it थी निर्मित  anywhere from 3000 BC to 2000 BC .
Radiocarbon dating in 2008 suggested that the first stones were raised between 2400 and 2200 BC , whilst  another सिद्धान्त suggests कि bluestones may have महरूम उठाया at the साईट as जल्दी as 3000  BC .
The surrounding circular  धरती बैंको और खाई , जिससे constitute  the earliest phase of the monument , have been dated to about 3100 BC .
The site and its surroundings were added to the UNESCO 's  सूची of संसार विरासत साइट in 1986 in a co-listing  with Avebury Henge .
It is a national legally protected  अनुसूचित प्राचीन  Monument .
Stonehenge is owned by the Crown and managed by English Heritage ,  जबकि the surrounding जमीन  is owned by the National Trust .
Archaeological evidence found by the Stonehenge Riverside Project in 2008 indicates  कि stonehenge could have महरूम a दफ़न मैदान  from its earliest beginnings .
The dating of cremated remains found on the site indicate that deposits contain human bone from as early  as 3000 bc , जब the खाई और बैंको यहूद  first dug .
Such  जमा जारी at stonehenge  for at least another 500 years .
The site is a  प्लेस of धार्मिक  significance and pilgrimage in Neo-Druidry .
The NCAA Women 's Division I Championship is an annual college basketball  टूर्नामेंट लिये  women .
Held each April , the Women  's चैंपियनशिप थी उदघाटन  in the 1981–82 season .
The NCAA tournament was preceded by the AIAW  महिलाओं 's बास्केट टूर्नामेंट , जिससे  was held annually from 1972 to 1982 .
बास्केट थी एक of बारह महिलाओं 's खेल added to the ncaa चैंपियनशिप कार्यक्रम लिये the 1981-82 स्कूल साल , as the ncaa  engaged in battle with the Association for Intercollegiate Athletics for Women for sole governance of women 's collegiate sports .
The AIAW continued to conduct its established championship program in the same twelve ( and other ) sports ; however , after a year of  डुअल महिलाओं 's championships , the ncaa prevailed , जबकि the aiaw disbanded  .
Attendance and interest in the Women 's Division I Championship have grown over the years , especially since 2003 , when the final  चैंपियनशिप खेल थी स्थानांतरित to the मंगलवार following the सोमवार मेन 's चैंपियनशिप  game .
The women 's  चैंपियनशिप खेल is अभी the फाइनल overall खेल of the कॉलेज  basketball season .
Before that , the Women 's  फाइनल चार थी प्रायः निभाई on the शुक्रवार पहले  the Men 's Final Four or the hours before the men played on the final Saturday of the tournament .
The final was usually  निभाई the संडे दोपहर following  the Men 's Final Four .
The tournament  कोष्ठक is बना up of champions इससे  each Division I conference , which receive automatic bids .
The remaining slots  हैं at-large बोलियों , साथ टीमों चुनी by an ncaa  selection committee .
The selection process and tournament seedings are based on several factors , including team rankings , win-loss records and Ratings Percentage  अनुक्रमणिका ( rpi ) आंकड़ा  .
Unlike the men 's tournament , there are only 32  at-large बोलियों ( as of the अगला टूर्नामेंट in  2014 ) , and no play-in game .
The women 's  टूर्नामेंट , जैसे the मेन 's , is मंचन in a सिंगल विलोपन स्वरूप ,  and is part of the media and public frenzy known colloquially as March Madness or The Big Dance .
सब 63 खेल have  been broadcast on television since 2003 on ESPN and ESPN2 .
Similar to the pre-2011 men 's  टूर्नामेंट कवरेज on सीबीएस , लोकल टीमों हैं दिखाया on प्रत्येक चैनल जब  available , with `` whip-around '' coverage designed to showcase the most competitive contests in the rest of the country .
the rosetta स्टोन  in the British Museum
The Rosetta Stone is an ancient Egyptian granodiorite stele inscribed with a decree  जारी at मेम्फिस in 196 bc on  behalf of King Ptolemy V .
The decree appears in three scripts : the upper  टेक्स्ट is प्राचीन मिश्र चित्रलिपि , the मध्य  portion Demotic script , and the lowest Ancient Greek .
Because it presents essentially the same text in all three scripts ( with some minor  मतभेद between उन्हें ) , it provided the कुंजी to the  modern understanding of Egyptian hieroglyphs .
Originally displayed  भीतर a टेम्पल , the स्टोन थी संभवतः स्थानांतरित दौरान the जल्दी ईसाई or मध्यकालीन काल और आखिरकार  used as building material in the construction of Fort Julien near the town of Rashid ( Rosetta ) in the Nile Delta .
It was rediscovered there in 1799 by a  सिपाही , pierre-françois bouchard , of the  French expedition to Egypt .
As the first Ancient Egyptian bilingual text recovered  in आधुनिक टाइम्स , the rosetta स्टोन aroused फैली पब्लिक  interest with its potential to decipher this hitherto untranslated ancient language .
lithographic नक़ल और प्लास्टर casts  began circulating among European museums and scholars .
Meanwhile , British  सैनिकों पराजित the फ्रेंच in मिश्र in 1801  , and the original stone came into British possession under the Capitulation of Alexandria .
Transported to London , it has been on  पब्लिक प्रदर्शक  at the British Museum since 1802 .
It is the  most-visited ऑब्जेक्ट in  the British Museum .
Ever since its rediscovery , the stone has been the focus of nationalist rivalries , including its transfer from French to British possession during the Napoleonic Wars , a long-running dispute over the  सापेक्ष मान of यंग 's और champollion 's योगदान to the decipherment , और चूंकि  2003 , demands for the stone 's return to Egypt .
Study of the decree  थी already अंतर्गत रास्ता as the पहला पूरा  translation of the Greek text appeared in 1803 .
It was 20 years , however , before the  लिप्यन्तरण of the मिश्र स्क्रिप्ट थी घोषित by jean-françois champollion in पेरिस in 1822 ; it  took longer still before scholars were able to read Ancient Egyptian inscriptions and literature confidently .
Major advances in the decoding were :  मान्यता कि the स्टोन offered तीन संस्करण of the वही टेक्स्ट ( 1799 ) ; कि the demotic टेक्स्ट प्रयुक्त ध्वन्यात्मक वर्ण  to spell foreign names ( 1802 ) ; that the hieroglyphic text did so as well , and had pervasive similarities to the demotic ( Thomas Young , 1814 ) ; and that , in addition to being used for foreign names , phonetic characters were also used to spell native Egyptian words ( Champollion , 1822–1824 ) .
Two other fragmentary copies of the same decree were  खोजा बाद , और अनेक समान मिश्र दुभाषिया or trilingual inscriptions हैं  now known , including two slightly earlier Ptolemaic decrees ( the Decree of Canopus in 238 BC , and the Memphis decree of Ptolemy IV , ca . 218 BC ) .
The Rosetta Stone is therefore no longer unique , but it  थी the अनिवार्य कुंजी to आधुनिक समझना of प्राचीन  Egyptian literature and civilization .
The term Rosetta Stone is now used in other contexts as the  नाम लिये the अनिवार्य सुराग to a नई फ़ील्ड of ज्ञान  .
Poison dart frog ( also  dart-poison मेंढक , ज़हर मेंढक or formerly ज़हर तीर मेंढक ) is the आम नाम of a समूह  of frogs in the family Dendrobatidae which are native to Central and South America .
These species are  diurnal और प्रायः have  brightly colored bodies .
Although all wild dendrobatids  हैं at तनिक somewhat विषाक्त , स्तर of toxicity  vary considerably from one species to the next and from one population to another .
Many species are  threatened  .
These amphibians are often called `` dart frogs ''  due to the amerindians ' स्वदेशी उपयोग of उनके to ज़हर  the tips of blowdarts .
However , of over 175 species , only four have been documented as being used for this purpose ( curare  पौधे हैं अधिक commonly प्रयुक्त ) , सब of जिससे आइये इससे the phyllobates  genus , which is characterized by the relatively large size and high levels of toxicity of its members .
Cajeta is a Mexican confection  of thickened सिरप प्रायः बना of sweetened caramelised  milk .
According to chef Rick Bayless , the name for cajeta came from the Spanish phrase al punto de cajeta , which means `` a liquid thickened to the  पाइंट at जिससे a चमचा drawn through the द्रव reveals the नीचे  of the pot in which it is being cooked '' .
Another hypothesis  is कि it takes इसके नाम  from the small wooden boxes in which it was traditionally packed .
Mexican cajeta is considered a specialty of the city of Celaya in the state of Guanajuato , although it is also  उत्पादित साथ the परंपरागत विधि in अनेक  towns of the state of Jalisco , such as Mazamitla , Sayula , and Atotonilco el Alto .
Cajeta is made by simmering goat 's milk , or occasionally a sweetened liquid ,  stirring अक्सर , जबतक it becomes बहुत  viscous due to evaporation of water , and caramelized .
While goat milk is the  सबसे usual आधार , अन्य liquids  or juices may be used .
In Celaya , and eventually the rest of Mexico , the confection of half goat 's milk and half cow 's milk became known  by the नाम cajeta , लकिन elsewhere , the मिल्क कैंडी became ज्ञात as leche  quemada , dulce de leche , etc .
It has cousins in the many Indian milk-based sweets like pera and the milk fudge burfi , and in the opera fudge of the U.S. Cajeta  is खाया on इसके अपना as a मीठी , as a स्प्रेड or भरना लिये breads और pastries , ऐसे as churros , और  as a topping for ice cream .
Certain liquors are added to special recipes  पुकारा cajeta envinada  .
In  जोड , cajeta envinada especial  is enriched with raisins , almonds , pecans or nuts .
Often it is used as  a टॉपिंग लिये crêpes , as a मीठी सॉस boiled और  softened down with milk to soak the crepes , resulting in a tasty dessert .
In Mexico many brands make cajeta but  the सबसे आम ब्रांड  is Coronado .
It is also very common to place  cajeta between obleas  to make a traditional Mexican dessert .
Prince William , Duke of Cambridge ( William Arthur Philip Louis ; born 21 June 1982 ) ,  is the elder बेटे of चार्ल्स , प्रिंस of वेल्स , और डायना , राजकुमारी of  Wales , and third-eldest grandchild of Queen Elizabeth II and Prince Philip , Duke of Edinburgh .
He is second in the line of succession , behind his father , to the thrones of sixteen independent  sovereign राज्य ज्ञात as the राष्ट्रमंडल realms : the संयुक्त किंगडम , कनाडा , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , नई जीलैंड , जमैका , बारबाडोस , the बहामा , हरा , पापुआ नई गिनी  , the Solomon Islands , Tuvalu , Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent and the Grenadines , Belize , Antigua and Barbuda , and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Prince William was educated at four schools in the  संयुक्त किंगडम और प्राप्त a उपाधि इससे the विश्वविद्यालयों  of St Andrews .
He spent  भाग of a गैप साल in चिली , बेलीज़ , तंजानिया  , and Kenya where he has lived and holidayed several times .
प्रिंस विलियम रै भी लिया kiswahili  studies at universities in Kenya and Tanzania .
He was commissioned as a Lieutenant in the Blues and Royals Regiment of the Household Cavalry —serving with his brother Prince  हैरी —and , दो सालो बाद , अर्जित उसके  wings by completing pilot training at Royal Air Force College Cranwell .
In 2009 , he transferred to the Royal Air Force , was promoted to Flight  लेफ्टिनेंट और underwent हेलीकाप्टर उड़ती प्रशिक्षण in अनुक्रम to become a full-time  pilot with the Search and Rescue Force .
in 2010 , he समाप्त उसके सामान्य और special-to-type हेलीकाप्टर  training and went on to RAF Valley on No . 22 Squadron performing co-pilot duties on board a Sea King search and rescue helicopter .
Prince William married his longtime girlfriend , Catherine Middleton , on  29 अप्रैल 2011 at वेस्टमिंस्टर ऐबी  .
Hours prior to his wedding ,  प्रिंस विलियम थी निर्मित ड्यूक of कैम्ब्रिज  , Earl of Strathearn , and Baron Carrickfergus .
Mali is  a बहुभाषी  country .
The languages spoken there reflect ancient  उपनिवेश पैटर्न  , migrations , and its long history .
ऍथनोलॉग रिश्तो  50 languages .
Of these , French is  the आधिकारिक भाषा और bambara is the  most widely spoken .
Altogether 13 of the indigenous languages of Mali have the legal status  of नेशनल भाषा  .
Sign in  फ्रेंच , at a स्मारक  in Bamako .
{ {  infobox अवकाश
चाइनीज नई साल
9 – 12  फ़रवरी ( वियतनाम  )
Rogers Building , the headquarters  of रोजर्स संचार
Rogers Communications Inc. is a diversified public Canadian  संचार और मीडिया कम्पनी  .
It is particularly in the field of wireless communications , cable television , telephone ,  और अंतरजाल कनेक्टिविटी साथ significant अतिरिक्त दूरसंचार  and mass media assets .
The  कम्पनी is headquartered  in the Rogers Building in Toronto , Ontario .
The company claims the heritage of the Rogers Vacuum Tube Company , founded in  1925 by एडवर्ड रोजर्स , जिससे प्रारंभ the cfrb रेडियो स्टेशन in टोरंटो , जिससे थी  later acquired by outside interests .
The  उपस्थित एंटरप्राइज़ तिथियाँ to 1960 , जब रोजर्स ' बेटे  , Ted Rogers , founded Rogers Radio Broadcasting Ltd .
That company acquired CHFI that year , as well as Aldred-Rogers Broadcasting , a  साझेदारी साथ जोएल aldred जिससे helped लॉन्च cfto  in 1961 .
Rogers later bought out  aldred और प्रारंभ the वर्तमान केबल और बेतार परिचालन  , known as Rogers Cablesystems Ltd .
The chief competitor to the company is Bell Canada , which has a similarly extensive portfolio of radio and  टेलीविज़न मीडिया एसेट , as खूब as बेतार , टेलीविज़न वितरण , और टेलीफोन सेवाएं , विशेषकर in पूर्वी और सेंट्रल कनाडा ; the दो  companies are often seen as having a duopoly on communications services in their regions .
However , the company also  competes nationally साथ telus लिये बेतार सेवाएं , और primarily  indirectly with Shaw Communications for television service .
the कम्पनी भी competes साथ a क्रमांक of अन्य  media companies in the broadcasting industry .
The Internet is a global system of interconnected computer networks that use the  मानक अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल सुइट ( tcp/ip ) to serve अरबों of उपयोक्ता  worldwide .
It is a network of networks that consists of millions of private  , पब्लिक , अकादमिक , कारोबार  , and government networks , of local to global scope , that are linked by a broad array of electronic , wireless and optical networking technologies .
The  अंतरजाल carries an extensive दायरा of सूचना संसाधन और सेवाएं ,  such as the inter-linked hypertext documents of the World Wide Web ( WWW ) and the infrastructure to support email .
Most traditional communications media including telephone , music , film , and television are being reshaped or redefined by the Internet , giving birth to new  सेवाएं ऐसे as आवाज़ over अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( voip ) और अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल टेलीविज़न  ( IPTV ) .
Newspaper , book and other  छपाई प्रकाशन हैं adapting to वेब साईट प्रौद्योगिकी  , or are reshaped into blogging and web feeds .
The  अंतरजाल रै सक्रिय और त्वरित नई फ़ॉर्म of इंसान interactions  through instant messaging , Internet forums , and social networking .
Online  खरीदारी रै boomed  both for major retail outlets and small artisans and traders .
Business-to-business and  वित्तीय सेवाएं on the अंतरजाल affect सप्लाई  chains across entire industries .
The origins of the  अंतरजाल पहुँचें वापस to शोध commissioned by the संयुक्त राज्य सरकारी  in the 1960s to build robust , fault-tolerant communication via computer networks .
The funding of a new U.S. backbone by the National  विज्ञान न्यास in the 1980s , as खूब as निजी funding  for other commercial backbones , led to worldwide participation in the development of new networking technologies , and the merger of many networks .
The  व्यावसायीकरण of कया थी by the 1990s an अंतरराष्ट्रीय  network resulted in its popularization and incorporation into virtually every aspect of modern human life .
, more than 2.4 billion people—over a third of the world 's human population —have used the services of the Internet ; approximately 100 times more people  than यहूद using it in 1995 , जब it थी ज़्यादातर प्रयुक्त by tech-savvy मध्य और अपर क्लास लोगों in the  United States and several other countries .
The Internet has no centralized  शासन in either technological क्रियान्वयन or नीतियों लिये अभिगम  and usage ; each constituent network sets its own policies .
Only the  overreaching परिभाषाएं of the दो प्रिंसिपल नाम स्पेसेस in the अंतरजाल , the अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल पता स्पेस  and the Domain Name System , are directed by a maintainer organization , the Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers ( ICANN ) .
The technical underpinning and  मानकीकरण of the कोर प्रोटोकॉल ( ipv4 और ipv6 ) is an कार्यकलाप of the अंतरजाल अभियान्त्रिकी कार्य फ़ोर्स ( ietf ) , a non-profit संगठन  of loosely affiliated international participants that anyone may associate with by contributing technical expertise .
The 2006 Winter Olympics , officially known  as the xx ओलम्पिक शीत खेल , थी a शीत multi-sport  event which was celebrated in Turin , Italy from February 10 , 2006 , through February 26 , 2006 .
This marked the second time Italy hosted the Olympic Winter  खेल , the पहला होने the सात ओलम्पिक शीत खेल  in Cortina d'Ampezzo in 1956 .
Italy also hosted the Games of  the xvii ओलंपियाड in  Rome in 1960 .
Turin was  चयनित  as the host city for the 2006 games in 1999 .
The official logo displayed the name ``  टोरिनो '' , the इतालवी नाम of the नगर ; the नगर is ज्ञात as  `` Turin '' in both English and the local traditional language , Piedmontese .
The Olympic  mascots of टोरिनो 2006 यहूद neve  ( `` snow '' in Italian ) , a female snowball , and Gliz , a male ice cube .
the आधिकारिक  motto of the XX Olympic Winter Games was `` Passion lives here '' .
`` Help ! '' is a song by the Beatles that served as the title song  लिये दोनो the 1965 फिल्मी और इसके साउंडट्रैक  album .
It was also released as a  सिंगल , और थी क्रमांक एक लिये  three weeks in both the United States and the United Kingdom .
``  सहायता ! '' थी लिखा primarily  by John Lennon , but credited to Lennon–McCartney .
दौरान an इंटरव्यू साथ  Playboy in 1984 , Paul McCartney stated that the title was `` out of desperation '' .
Poster  लिये  the 2005 exhibition
Siegfried   Bing ( 26 February 1838 – 6 September 1905 ) , who usually gave his name as S. Bing , and was thus often referenced erroneously as `` Samuel Bing '' ( Samuel Otto Bing , 1850–1905 , was his brother ) was a German art dealer who lived in Paris as an adult , and who helped introduce Japanese art and artworks to the West and was a factor in the development of the Art Nouveau style during the late nineteenth century .
Comparison of male and female life expectancy at birth  लिये देशों और territories as पारिभाषित in the 2011 सीआईए factbook  , with selected bubbles labelled .
The  बिंदीदार लकीर corresponds to बराबर  female and male life expectancy .
The apparent 3D volumes of the bubbles are  linearly आंशिक to उनके  population .
This  is a सूची of देशों  by life expectancy at birth .
Kennewick is a city in Benton County in the southeastern  भाग of the u.S. राज्य of वॉशिंगटन , निकट the  Hanford nuclear site .
It is the most populous of the  तीन शहरों collectively referred to  as the Tri-Cities ( the others being Pasco and Richland ) .
Kennewick is located along the  दक्षिणपश्चिम बैंको of the कोलंबिया नदी ,  opposite Pasco and just south of the confluence of the Columbia and Yakima rivers .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी  73,917 at the 2010 census .
April 1 , 2012 estimates from the Washington State Office  of वित्तीय प्रबन्धन put the नगर 's जनसांख्यिकी at 75,160  .
The nearest commercial airport  is the tri-cities विमानक्षेत्र in pasco ,  a regional commercial and private airport .
Forbes magazine named Kennewick the # 2 area in the United States for job growth , while  आसपास yakima थी  named # 1 .
The article cites  the क्रमांक of वैज्ञानिकों employed by the प्रशांत उत्तरपश्चिम नेशनल प्रयोगशाला  and area farmland for this outlook .
The prothrombin time ( PT ) and  इसके निकला उपायों of prothrombin अनुपात ( pr ) और अंतरराष्ट्रीय  normalized ratio ( INR ) are measures of the extrinsic pathway of coagulation .
This test is also called  `` protime inr '' और ``  PT/INR '' .
They are used to determine the clotting tendency of blood , in the measure  of warfarin dosage , जिगर  damage , and vitamin K status .
PT measures factors I (  फाइब्रिनोजेन ) , ii (  prothrombin ) , V , VII , and X .
It is used in conjunction with the activated partial  thromboplastin समय ( aptt ) जिससे उपायों the मूलभूत  pathway .
`` I 'm in the Mood for Love ''  is a लोकप्रिय  song .
The  म्यूज़िक थी लिखा  by Jimmy McHugh , the lyrics by Dorothy Fields .
The song was  प्रकाशित in 1935  .
It was introduced by Frances Langford in the movie Every  रात्रि at आठ released कि साल .
The song was featured in the 1936  हमारी गिरोह ( छोटी दुष्टों ) छोटी , the पिंच सिंगर , सुंग  by Carl `` Alfalfa '' Switzer , and in the 1936 film Palm Springs .
It is often known to be  switzer 's हस्ताक्षर  song .
James Moody 's saxophone solo on a 1952  रिकॉर्डिंग of इस सोंग प्रेरित the सोंग `` मूडी 's मनोदशा  for Love `` .
Hip hop artist  प्रिंस पॉल sampled the  song as the basis for the track `` Mood for Love '' on his album A Prince Among Thieves ( 1999 ) , with Don Newkirk singing its original lyrics .
The  सोंग 's शीर्षक प्रेरित the अंग्रेज़ी  title of Wong Kar Wai 's movie In the Mood for Love .
Cross-cultural psychology is  the वैज्ञानिक पढ़ाई of इंसान बर्ताव और दिमागी प्रक्रियाओं ,  including both their variability and invariance , under diverse cultural conditions .
Through expanding research methodologies to recognize  सांस्कृतिक variance in बर्ताव , भाषा , और अर्थ it seeks to  extend and develop psychology .
Since psychology as an academic discipline was developed largely in North America , some psychologists became concerned that constructs accepted as universal were not as invariant as  previously assumed , विशेषकर चूंकि अनेक कोशिशें to replicate notable प्रयोग in अन्य संस्कृतियों था varying  success .
Since there are questions as to whether theories dealing with central themes , such as affect , cognition ,  conceptions of the स्वः , और मुद्दे ऐसे as psychopathology , चिंता , और अवसाद , may कमी बाह्य वैध जब `` exported '' to अन्य सांस्कृतिक contexts  , cross-cultural psychology re-examines them using methodologies designed to factor in cultural differences so as to account for cultural variance .
Although some critics have pointed to methodological flaws in cross-cultural psychological research and claim that serious shortcomings in the theoretical and methodological bases used impede rather than  सहायता the वैज्ञानिक ढूंढें लिये सार्वभौमिक सिद्धान्त in मनोविज्ञान , cross-cultural psychologists हैं turning अधिक to the पढ़ाई of कैसा मतभेद ( variance ) occur , बल्कि than searching लिये universals in the स्टाइल of भौतिकी or  chemistry .
In 1972 the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ of cross-cultural  Psychology ( IACCP ) was established .
This branch of psychology has continued to expand as there has been an  increasing लोकप्रियता of incorporating संस्कृति  and diversity into studies .
Cross-cultural psychology is differentiated  इससे सांस्कृतिक मनोविज्ञान .
The latter is the branch of psychology that holds that human behavior is significantly influenced by cultural differences , meaning that psychological phenomena can only be  compared साथ प्रत्येक अन्य आरपार संस्कृतियों to a बहुत सीमित  extent .
In  कंट्रास्ट , cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान शामिल a ढूंढें  for possible universals in behavior and mental processes .
Walter J. Lonner , writing for Eye on Psi Chi , has  stated कि `` cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान can be विचार of as a प्रकार शोध methodology , बल्कि than an entirely  separate field within psychology ( 2000 ) . ''
`` Judas '' is a song by  अमरीकी रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार महिला गागा , इससे  her second studio album Born This Way ( 2011 ) .
It was released by  interscope रिकॉर्ड on अप्रैल  15 , 2011 , four days ahead of its scheduled release .
Written and produced by Lady Gaga and  redone , `` यहूदा '' is a नृत्य और इलेक्ट्रो हाउस सोंग परिचय a स्त्री in  love with a man who betrayed her .
It embodies the incidents that have haunted Gaga in the past , and its core meaning  refers to the ऋणात्मक भाग  of her life that she ca n't escape .
Gaga has further explained that the song was also about honoring  एक 's भीतरी अंधेरा in अनुक्रम to लाओ oneself  into the light .
The  कलाकृति लिये the सिंगल थी  designed by Gaga in Microsoft Word .
In spite of a polarizing impact on several religious groups , the song was generally well received by critics , who likened the song to `` Bad  रोमांस `` साथ कुछ noting it चाहिए have महरूम the एल्बम 's सीसे सिंगल  .
The song has a similar sound to Gaga 's previous RedOne-produced tracks ,  सहित `` पोकर फेस  `` , `` LoveGame `` , `` Bad Romance '' , and `` Alejandro `` .
It contains  तीन पृथक hooks और a  house -influenced break down .
Gaga explained that the  लाइनों बोला दौरान the विश्लेषण बात परिचय उसके as परे मोचन  , regarding the traditional views of what a woman should be .
``  यहूदा '' initially था a दमदार बिक्री खोलने ,  but was less successful commercially in comparison to Gaga 's previous singles .
The song reached the top ten of the charts in most major music markets , and also  पहुँचे the शीर्ष of the चार्ट in दक्षिण  Korea .
A music video for the song was filmed in April 2011 , co-directed  by गागा और laurieann गिब्सन और co-starring नॉर्मन  Reedus .
It has a Biblical storyline where Reedus  निभाई यहूदा इस्कैरियट और गागा निभाई मरियम  Magdalene .
The video  portrays उन्हें as आधुनिक दिन प्रचारकों  going to Jerusalem .
It included the Biblical story of Judas betraying Jesus , and  ended साथ गागा as magdalene getting  stoned to death .
Before its release , the Catholic League condemned Gaga for the  कथित उपयोग of धार्मिक imagery और उसके भूमिका in the वीडियो  .
However , critics generally praised the video ,  नहीं ढूंढना कोई अप्रिय सामग्री  .
The video  थी मनोनीत लिये दो पुरस्कार  at the 2011 MTV Video Music Awards .
Gaga has performed `` Judas '' on a number of  टेलीविज़न shows , सहित the ग्राहम नॉर्टन दिखाएँ , शनिवार रात्रि सजीव , शुभ morning  Americas `` Summer Concert Series '' , the French X Factor as well as on The Ellen DeGeneres Show .
H.264/MPEG-4 Part 10 or AVC ( Advanced Video Coding ) is a standard for video compression , and is currently one of the most commonly used formats for the  रिकॉर्डिंग , संपीडन , और वितरण of ऊँची परिभाषा  video .
The final drafting  कार्य on the पहला संस्करण  of the standard was completed in May 2003 .
H.264/MPEG-4 AVC is a  block-oriented motion-compensation  -based codec standard developed by the ITU-T Video Coding Experts Group ( VCEG ) together with the ISO/IEC JTC1 Moving Picture Experts Group ( MPEG ) .
The project partnership  प्रयत्न is ज्ञात as the संयुक्त वीडियो टोली  ( JVT ) .
The ITU-T H.264 standard and the ISO/IEC MPEG-4 AVC  मानक ( formally , iso/iec 14496-10 – mpeg-4 भाग 10 , उन्नत वीडियो कोडिंग ) हैं jointly  maintained so that they have identical technical content .
H.264 is perhaps best known as being  एक of the कोडेक मानकों लिये blu-ray discs ; सब blu-ray डिस्क खिलाड़ी जरूर be समर्थ to डिकोड  H.264 .
It is also widely used by streaming internet sources , such as  वीडियो इससे vimeo , youtube , और the itunes स्टोर , वेब तन्त्र ऐसे as the adobe फ्लैश  Player and Microsoft Silverlight , and also various HDTV broadcasts over terrestrial ( ATSC , ISDB-T , DVB-T or DVB-T2 ) , cable ( DVB-C ) and satellite ( DVB-S and DVB-S2 ) .
non-binding मध्यस्थता is a प्रकार of मध्यस्थता in जिससे the arbitrator makes a determination  of the rights of the parties to the dispute , but this determination is not binding upon them , and no enforceable arbitration award is issued .
The `` award '' is in effect an advisory opinion of the  arbitrator 's दृश्य  of the respective merits of the parties cases .
Non-binding arbitration is used in  कनेक्शन साथ कोशिशें to पहुँचें a negotiated  settlement .
The  भूमिका of an arbitrator in non-binding मध्यस्थता is ,  on the surface , similar to that of a mediator in a mediation .
However , the principal distinction is that whereas a mediator will try to help the parties find a middle ground to compromise at , the arbitrator remains totally removed from the settlement process and will only give a  determination of देयता और , if उचित , an indication of the क्वांटम of क्षतिपूर्ति देय  .
Subsequent to a non-binding arbitration , the parties remain free to pursue their claims either through the courts , or by way of a binding arbitration , although  in अभ्यास a उपनिवेश  is the most common outcome .
The award and reasoning in a  non-binding मध्यस्थता is लगभग invariably inadmissible  in any subsequent action in the courts or in another arbitration tribunal .
Non-binding  मध्यस्थता is utilised ज़्यादातर in  the United States and Canada .
It is largely unknown in Europe , although in the United Kingdom there is a practice of parties who are seeking a settlement to jointly  instruct a महारानी 's counsel लिये an राय on the merits और संभावित क्वांटम of a अर्जी , और तब to negotiate on the आधार of the  views expressed in that opinion .
Augustine Volcano is a Lava Dome Complex on Augustine Island in southwestern Cook Inlet in the Kenai  प्रायद्वीप बरो of southcentral तटीय अलास्का  , southwest of Anchorage .
The Alaska Volcano Observatory currently rates Mount Augustine as Level of  चिंता रंग कोड ग्रीन लिये विमानन और the ज्वालामुखी चेतावनी स्तर is at सामान्य  .
Augustine Island has a land area of , while West Island ,  बस बंद अगस्टाइन 's पश्चिमी shores , रै  .
The island  is बना  up mainly of past eruption deposits .
Scientists have  महरूम समर्थ to discern  that past dome collapse has resulted in large avalanches .
A map  of बेलीज़  .
The country of Belize has roughly 386 km  of तटरेखा , और रै अनेक मूँगा reefs , cays  , and islands in the Caribbean Sea .
Most  of ये रूप  the Belize Barrier Reef , the longest in the western hemisphere stemming approximately .
The  रीफ और इसके आइलैंड्स have महरूम a युनेस्को  World Heritage Site since 1996 .
The  following is a सूची of oceanic आइलैंड्स of बेलीज़ , arranged  according to region but all of which are in the Caribbean Sea .
Most of  the आइलैंड्स variate in स्पेलिंग between  `` cay '' and `` caye '' , and also use the Spanish `` cayo '' .
River islands have not  महरूम सूचीबद्ध  .
Drive Letter Access ( DLA ) is a discontinued commercial packet  लिखने अनुप्रयोग लिये the microsoft खिड़कियाँ  operating system that allows optical disc data storage devices to be used in a manner similar to floppy disks .
DLA is  a पैकेट लिखने प्रौद्योगिकी  for CD and DVD media that uses the UDF file system .
DLA is not compatible with Windows Vista and  नए , हालांकि a पैच exists to फिक्स इस समस्या  under Windows Vista .
roxio बर्न थी introduced  on April 30 , 2009 .
As a  बदलना लिये dla , it remedies संगतता  issues Internet Explorer 8 .
Alpha Rex  emmanuel humbard  ( August 13 , 1919 – September 21 , 2007 ) was a well-known American television evangelist whose Cathedral of Tomorrow show was shown on over 600 stations at the peak of its popularity .
Limitless is a 2011 American thriller film directed by Neil Burger and starring  ब्राडली कूपर , abbie cornish , और  Robert De Niro .
It is  आधारित on the 2001 अनोखा  The Dark Fields by Alan Glynn with the screenplay by Leslie Dixon .
Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States , situated in the northwest extremity of the North American  महाद्वीप , साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary साथ कनाडा to the ईस्ट , the आर्कटिक समंदर to the उत्तर , और the प्रशांत  Ocean to the west and south , with Russia further west across the Bering Strait .
Alaska is the largest state in the United States by area , the 4th least  populous और the तनिक densely आबादी of the 50 संयुक्त राज्य  .
Approximately  हाफ of अलास्का  's 731,449 residents live within the Anchorage metropolitan area .
Alaska 's economy is dominated by the oil , natural  गैस , और फ़िशिंग उद्योग ; it रै  these resources in abundance .
Alaska was purchased from Russia on March 30 , 1867 ,  लिये $ 7.2 लाख ( $ समायोजित लिये महंगाई ) at  approximately two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ) .
The land went through  अनेक प्रशासनिक परिवर्तन पहले बनने an व्यवस्थित  ( or incorporated ) territory on May 11 , 1912 , and the 49th state of the U.S. on January 3 , 1959 .
The name `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already  introduced in the रूसी औपनिवेशिक काल , जब it थी प्रयुक्त तभी लिये the प्रायद्वीप और is निकला इससे the aleut alaxsxaq  , meaning `` the mainland '' or , more literally , `` the object towards which the action of the sea is directed '' .
It is  भी ज्ञात as alyeska , the `` ग्रेट  land '' , an Aleut word derived from the same root .
Nelson Mandela Metropolitan University ( NMMU ) is a South African  tertiary शिक्षा संस्था साथ इसके प्रमुख प्रशासन in  the coastal city of Port Elizabeth .
A merging of three institutions founded NMMU in  जनवरी 2005 लकिन इसके इतिहास तिथियाँ वापस to 1882 साथ the न्यास  of Port Elizabeth Art School .
The University draws  अंतरराष्ट्रीय विद्यार्थी  from all over the world .
There are over 3000 international students and include students from the United States ,  फ़्रांस , चीन , जर्मनी , बेल्जियम , डेनमार्क , फिनलैंड , नीदरलैंड्स , नार्वे , स्वीडन , संयुक्त किंगडम और अनेक अन्य  countries .
NMMU is a comprehensive university offering professional and  वोकेशनल प्रशिक्षण  .
The University has six campuses - five in  बंदरगाहों एलिज़ाबेथ और एक  in George .
The main campus is the  दक्षिण कैम्पस  .
विद्यार्थी at nmmu can पढ़ाई towards diplomas  and degrees up to and including doctoral level qualifications .
A number of courses include  कार्यस्थल अनुभव as भाग of the curriculum  .
CoverGirl is an American cosmetics brand  संस्थापित in मेरीलैंड , by the noxzema रासायनिक  Company ( later called Noxell ) and acquired by Procter & Gamble in 1989 .
The Noxell Company advertised this cosmetics line by allowing `` cover girls ''  , फ़ैशन मॉडल जो appear on the सामने कवर of महिलाओं 's मैगज़ीन , to  wear its products .
CoverGirl makes up for lack of direct individual customer service by providing a wide variety  of कॉस्मेटिक्स उपलब्धियाँ at उचित  prices .
On the Origin of  प्रजाति , प्रकाशित on 24 नवम्बर 1859 , is a कार्य of वैज्ञानिक साहित्य  by Charles Darwin which is considered to be the foundation of evolutionary biology .
Its full title was On  the उत्पत्ति of प्रजाति by अर्थात् of प्राकृतिक  Selection , or the Preservation of Favoured Races in the Struggle for Life .
For  the छठे संस्करण of 1872 , the छोटी  title was changed to The Origin of Species .
डार्विन 's किताब introduced the वैज्ञानिक सिद्धान्त कि populations  evolve over the course of generations through a process of natural selection .
It  प्रस्तुत a देह of प्रमाण कि the  diversity of life arose by common descent through a branching pattern of evolution .
Darwin included evidence that he  था gathered on the beagle expedition  in the 1830s and his subsequent findings from research , correspondence , and experimentation .
Various  विकासवादी विचार था already महरूम प्रस्तावित  to explain new findings in biology .
There was growing  support लिये ऐसे विचार among dissident anatomists और the सामान्य पब्लिक  , but during the first half of the 19th century the English scientific establishment was closely tied to the Church of England , while science was part of natural theology .
Ideas about the transmutation of species were controversial as they conflicted with the beliefs that species were  अपरिवर्तनशील भाग of a designed पदानुक्रम और कि इंसानो यहूद अद्वितीय , unrelated to अन्य पशु  .
The political and  theological implications यहूद पडती debated , लकिन transmutation थी नहीं  accepted by the scientific mainstream .
The book was written for non-specialist  पाठक और आकर्षित फैली ब्याज  upon its publication .
As  डार्विन थी an प्रतिष्ठित वैज्ञानिक , उसके निष्कर्षों यहूद लिया seriously  and the evidence he presented generated scientific , philosophical , and religious discussion .
The debate over the book contributed to the campaign by T.H . Huxley and his fellow members of the X Club  to secularise विज्ञान by promoting  scientific naturalism .
Within two decades there was widespread scientific agreement that evolution , with a branching pattern of common descent , had  occurred , लकिन वैज्ञानिकों यहूद slow to दे प्राकृतिक चयन the significance कि  Darwin thought appropriate .
During the `` eclipse of Darwinism `` from the 1880s to the 1930s , various other  mechanisms of एवोल्यूशन यहूद  given more credit .
With the development of the modern evolutionary synthesis in the 1930s and 1940s , Darwin 's concept of  विकासवादी अनुकूलन through प्राकृतिक चयन became सेंट्रल to आधुनिक विकासवादी सिद्धान्त , अभी the unifying अवधारणा  of the life sciences .
Charles Dillon `` Casey '' Stengel ( ; July 30 , 1890 – September 29 , 1975 ) , nicknamed `` The  बूढ़ा perfessor '' , थी an अमरीकी प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल outfielder और मैनेजर  .
He was elected to the  बेसबॉल हॉल of कीर्ति  in .
Stengel was born in Kansas City , Missouri , and originally nicknamed  `` डच '' , a आम उपनाम at कि समय  for Americans of German ancestry .
After his  प्रमुख लीग करियर began , he acquired the उपनाम `` केसी '' , जिससे originally  came from the initials of his hometown ( `` K. C. '' ) , which evolved into `` Casey '' , influenced by the wide popularity of the poem Casey at the Bat .
In the 1950s , sportswriters dubbed him with yet another nickname , `` The Old Professor '' ( or `` Perfessor  '' ) , लिये उसके शार्प wit और उसके क्षमता to बात at लंबाई on anything बेसबॉल  -related .
Although his baseball career spanned a number  of टीमों और शहरों , he is primarily संबद्ध  with clubs in New York City .
Between playing and managing , he is the only man to have worn four of New York 's  प्रमुख लीग क्लब '  uniforms .
He was  the पहला of चार मेन ( through the ऋतु ) to मैनेज  both the New York Yankees and New York Mets ; Yogi Berra , Dallas Green , and Joe Torre are the others .
जैसे टोरेस , he भी  managed the Braves and the Dodgers .
He ended his baseball career as the beloved manager for the then  विस्तार नई यॉर्क मेट्स , जिससे जीती over the दिल of नई यॉर्क partly due to the अद्वितीय अक्षर  of their veteran leader .
June ( ) is the sixth month of the  साल in the जूलियन और gregorian पंचांग और  one of the four months with a length of 30 days .
Ovid provides two  etymologies लिये जून 's नाम in उसके कविता  concerning the months entitled the Fasti .
The first is that the  माह is नामित बाद the रोमन देवी  Juno , wife of Jupiter and equivalent to the Greek goddess Hera ; the second is that the name comes from the Latin word iuniores , meaning `` younger ones , '' as opposed to maiores ( `` elders '' ) for which the preceding month May may be named ( Fasti VI.1–88 ) .
See :  महीने in विभिन्न पंचांग भी पुकारा the ऋतु of the जून  is the month with the longest daylight hours of the year in the Northern Hemisphere and the shortest daylight hours of the year in the Southern Hemisphere .
June in the Northern Hemisphere is the seasonal equivalent to December in  the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध और  vice versa .
In the Northern hemisphere , the beginning of the  meteorological गर्मियाँ is  1 June .
In the Southern hemisphere , the  शुरूआत of the meteorological शीत  is 1 June .
At the start of June , the sun rises in the  नक्षत्र of वृष ; at the समाप्त of  June , the sun rises in the constellation of Gemini .
However , due to the precession of the equinoxes , June begins with the sun in the astrological  चिह्न of मिथुन , और ends साथ the सूर्य in the astrological  sign of Cancer .
June is known for the large  क्रमांक of विवाह कि occur  over the course of the month .
According to one etymology , June is  नामित बाद juno ( hera )  .
Juno was the goddess of marriage and a married couple 's  household , so कुछ consider it  good luck to be married in this month .
According to  another etymology provided by the रोमन कवि ओविड , जून  is named for the iuniores , latin for `` young people '' ( Fasti VI.88 ) and that the month of May is named for the maiores , Latin for `` elders '' .
in आइसलैंड , लोकगीत says कि if तुम bathe नग्न in the morning ओस on  the morning of June 24 , you are supposed to keep aging at bay for longer .
A constitution is a set of fundamental principles  or स्थापित precedents according to जिससे  a state or other organization is governed .
These rules together make up , i.e . constitute  , कया the एंटिटी is .
When these principles  हैं लिखा bas into a सिंगल दस्तावेज़ or नियत of विधिक दस्तावेज़ , those दस्तावेज़ may be कहा to embody a लिखा  constitution ; if they are written down in a single comprehensive document , it is said to embody a codified constitution .
Constitutions concern different levels  of संगठन , इससे sovereign राज्य to कंपनियाँ और  unincorporated associations .
A treaty which  establishes an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन is भी  its constitution , in that it would define how that organization is constituted .
Within states , whether sovereign or federated , a constitution defines the principles upon which the  राज्य is आधारित , the कार्यविधि in जिससे कानून हैं  made and by whom .
कुछ constitutions , विशेषकर संहिताबद्ध constitutions , भी  act as limiters of state power , by establishing lines which a state 's rulers can not cross , such as fundamental rights .
George Washington at Constitutional  सम्मेलन of 1787 , हस्ताक्षर of  U.S. Constitution .
The Constitution of India is the longest written constitution of any sovereign country in the world , containing 448 articles , 12 schedules and 100 amendments , with 117,369 words in its English language version ,  जबकि the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान is the shortest लिखा संविधान , at 7 आलेख और 27 amendments .
Ron Diftler ( left ) , NASA Robonaut manager  assisting in a robonaut familiarization  training session in the Space Environment Simulation Laboratory at NASA 's Johnson Space Center .
Engineering management is a  specialized रूप of प्रबन्धन कि is चिंतित साथ  the application of engineering principles to business practice .
Engineering management is a career that brings together the technological problem-solving savvy of engineering and the organizational , administrative , and planning abilities of management in  अनुक्रम to oversee जटिल उद्यमों इससे धारणा  to completion .
Example areas of engineering are product development , manufacturing , construction , design engineering , industrial engineering , technology ,  उत्पादन , or कोई अन्य फ़ील्ड कि employs कर्मियों जो perform an अभियान्त्रिकी  function .
Successful engineering managers  typically आवश्यकता प्रशिक्षण और अनुभव in कारोबार  and engineering .
Technically inept managers tend to be  वंचित of support by उनके तकनीकी टोली , और non-commercial प्रबंधक  tend to lack commercial acumen to deliver in a market economy .
Largely , engineering managers manage engineers who  हैं चलित by non-entrepreneurial सोच , यूँ  require the necessary people skills to coach , mentor and motivate technical professionals .
Engineering professionals joining manufacturing companies sometimes become engineering  प्रबंधक by डिफॉल्ट बाद a काल  of time .
They are required to learn how to manage once they are on the job , though this is  प्रायः an अप्रभावी रास्ता to develop managerial abilities  .
In an insurance policy , the deductible is  the राशि of खर्च कि जरूर be सशुल्क आउट of जेब पहले an insurer होगा अदा कोई खर्च  .
In general usage , the term deductible may be used to describe one  of अनेक प्रकार of clauses ( देखिए नीचे ) कि हैं प्रयुक्त by बीमे कंपनियाँ  as a threshold for policy payments .
deductibles हैं typically प्रयुक्त to deter the विशाल क्रमांक of  trivial claims that a consumer can be reasonably expected to bear the cost of .
By restricting its coverage to events that are significant enough to incur large costs , the insurance  कड़ expects to अदा आउट थोड़ा  smaller amounts much less frequently , incurring much higher savings .
As a result , insurance  प्रीमियम हैं  typically cheaper when they involve higher deductibles .
Deductibles are  सामान्यतः provided as clauses in an बीमे नीति कि dictate कैसा much of an insurance-covered  expense is borne by the policyholder .
वे हैं सामान्यतः कोटेड  as a fixed quantity and is a part of most policies covering losses to the policy holder .
The insurer then becomes liable for claimable expenses that exceed this amount ( subject to  the अधिकतम योग claimable indicated in the अनुबंध  ) .
Depending on the  नीति , the deductible  may apply per covered incident , or per year .
For policies where  incidences हैं नहीं आसान to delimit  ( for example health insurance ) , the deductible is typically applied per year .
Several deductibles can be  नियत by the insurer आधारित on the  cause of the claim .
For example , a single  आवास बीमे नीति may contain  multiple deductible amounts for loss or damage arising from theft , fire , natural calamities , evacuation etc .
There are also deductible reimbursement programs that  reimburse a deductible in the इवेंट of an स्वचालित , घर  , boat/yacht or health insurance claim .
An invoice or bill is a commercial  दस्तावेज़ जारी by a विक्रेता to a खरीदार , indicating the उत्पाद , quantities  , and agreed prices for products or services the seller has provided the buyer .
An  चालान indicates  the sale transaction only .
Payment terms are independent of the invoice and are  negotiated by the खरीदार और the विक्रेता  .
Payment terms are usually  शामिल on the चालान  .
The buyer could have already paid for the products  or सेवाएं सूचीबद्ध on the चालान  .
Buyer can also have a maximum  क्रमांक of दिनों in जिससे to अदा लिये  these goods and is sometimes offered a discount if paid before the due date .
In the rental industry , an invoice must include a specific reference to the duration of the time being  billed , so in जोड to मात्रा , दाम और छूट the  invoicing amount is also based on duration .
generally प्रत्येक लकीर of a rental  invoice will refer to the actual hours , days , weeks , months , etc. , being billed .
From the  पाइंट of दृश्य of a विक्रेता , an  invoice is a sales invoice .
From the point of view of a buyer  , an चालान is a खरीदें  invoice .
The document indicates the  खरीदार और विक्रेता , लकिन the पद चालान  indicates money is owed or owing .
In English , the context of the term invoice is usually used to clarify its meaning , such as `` We  भेजा उन्हें an चालान '' ( वे owe us धन ) or `` we प्राप्त an चालान  from them '' ( we owe them money ) .
The right main bronchus ( or right primary bronchus  , or सही प्रिंसिपल bronchus ) is a bronchus of the  respiratory system .
It is wider , shorter , and more  लंबवत in दिशा  than the left .
It is about 2.5 cm long , and enters the right lung  nearly विपरीत the पांचवां thoracic  vertebra .
The azygos vein arches over it from behind ; and the  सही pulmonary धमनी झूठ at पहला नीचे और तब in  front of it .
About 2 cm from its  शुरुआत it देता बंद a शाखा  to the upper lobe of the right lung .
This is termed the eparterial branch of the bronchus , because it arises  ऊपर the सही pulmonary धमनी  .
The bronchus now passes below the artery  , और is ज्ञात as the hyparterial शाखा ; it  divides into two branches for the middle and lower lobes .
If a foreign body in the airway passes through the trachea , it will most likely enter the right main  bronchus बजाय of the बाएँ , due to the straighter संरेखण of the सही bronchus  to the trachea .
Squash is a racquet sport played by two ( singles ) or four players ( doubles  ) in a four-walled अदालत साथ a छोटी ,  hollow rubber ball .
The players must  वैकल्पिक in striking the बॉल साथ उनके racquet और  hit the ball onto the playable surfaces of the four walls of the court .
The game was formerly called squash racquets , a  सन्दर्भ to the `` squashable '' नरम बॉल प्रयुक्त in the खेल ( compared  with the fatter ball used in its parent game racquets or rackets ) .
स्क्वैश is पहचाना by the ioc और समर्थक  are lobbying for its incorporation in a future Olympic program .
In  2003 , फोर्ब्स रेटेड स्क्वैश  as the number one healthiest sport to play .
Residual oil is oil  मिला in कम एकाग्रता  naturally or in exhausted oil fields .
प्रायः मिश्रित साथ जल  , it can not be recovered by conventional techniques .
However , it can be recovered using carbon dioxide-enhanced oil recovery ( CO2  eor ) जिससे involves injecting कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड into the  well reducing viscosity and enhancing flow of the oil .
The technique is not new but has not been used extensively  on अवशेष आयल zones , low-grade जमा of पेट्रोलियम ऐसे as the 38 वर्गाकार  miles in the Permian Basin of Texas leased by Elliott Roosevelt Jr .
The technique is  सीमित by उपलब्धता of  carbon dioxide .
It does not result in  sequestration of the कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड  but the gas is recycled as much as possible .
United States reserves of residual oil are  अनुमानित to be 100 अरब  barrels .
