The Great Chicago Fire was a conflagration that burned  इससे संडे , अक्तूबर 8 , to जल्दी मंगलवार , अक्तूबर 10 ,  1871 , killing hundreds and destroying about in Chicago , Illinois .
Though the fire was  एक of the largest u.S. आपदाओं of the 19th सदी , the पुनर्निर्माण  that began helped develop Chicago as one of the most populous and economically important American cities .
Henry VIII ( 28 June  1491 – 28 जनवरी 1547 ) थी किंग  of England from 21 April 1509 until his death .
He was lord , and later king , of Ireland , as well as continuing the  नाममात्र अर्जी by the अंग्रेज़ी monarchs to the किंगडम  of France .
Henry was the second monarch of  the ट्यूडर राजवंश  , succeeding his father , Henry VII .
Besides his six marriages , Henry VIII is known  लिये उसके भूमिका in the विरह of  the Church of England from the Roman Catholic Church .
Henry 's struggles with Rome led to the separation of the Church of England  इससे papal प्राधिकार , the विच्छेद of the monasteries ,  and his own establishment as the Supreme Head of the Church of England .
Yet he remained a believer in core Catholic theological  शिक्षाओं , भी बाद  his excommunication from the Roman Catholic Church .
Henry oversaw the legal union of England and Wales with the Laws  in वेल्स अधिनियमों 1535 और  1542 .
In 1513 ,  the नई किंग अलाइड साथ the पावन रोमन सम्राट , maximillian i , और  invaded France in 1513 with a large , well-equipped army , but achieved little at a considerable financial cost .
Maximillian , for his part , used the English invasion to his own ends , and this  prejudiced इंग्लैण्ड 's क्षमता to शिकस्त the फ्रेंच  .
This foray  होता prove the प्रारंभ of an obsession  for Henry , who invaded again in 1544 .
This time , Henry 's forces captured  the महत्वपूर्ण नगर of boulogne , लकिन again the पावन  Roman Emperor , Charles V , supported Henry only as long as he needed to and England , strained by the enormous cost of the war , ransomed the city back for peace .
His contemporaries considered Henry in  उसके प्रधान to be an आकर्षक , शिक्षित और संपन्नता किंग  , and he has been described as `` one of the most charismatic rulers to sit on the English throne '' .
Besides ruling with absolute power , he also  सगाई खुद as an लेखक और  composer .
His desire  to provide इंग्लैण्ड साथ a पुरूष वारिस – जिससे stemmed partly इससे निजी वैनिटी और partly क्युकी he believed a बेटी  would be unable to consolidate the Tudor dynasty and the fragile peace that existed following the Wars of the Roses – led to the two things for which Henry is most remembered : his six marriages and the English Reformation .
हेनरी became रुग्ण मोटे  and his health suffered , contributing to his death in 1547 .
He is  अक्सर characterised in उसके बाद जीवन as  a lustful , egotistical , harsh , and insecure king .
La Reina del Sur ( The Queen of the South ) is a Spanish-language  telenovela उत्पादित by the संयुक्त राज्य टेलीविज़न संजाल telemundo , in संयोजन  with the Antena 3 network and RTI Producciones .
Based on a novel of the same  नाम by स्पेनी लेखक arturo pérez-reverte , the नाटक depicts  the rise of Teresa Mendoza ( Kate del Castillo ) , a young woman from Mexico who becomes the most powerful drug trafficker in southern Spain .
Patricio Wills , the  अध्यक्ष of telemundo टेलीविज़न studios  , was the executive producer .
हालांकि la reina डेल सूर थी मनोनीत लिये novela  of the Year , Favorite Lead Actress , and Best Bad Luck Video , it won no awards .
With a $ 10  लाख बजट , la reina डेल सूर थी the  most expensive telenovela ever produced by Telemundo .
The program 's premiere on February 28  , 2011 , थी the संजाल 's उच्चतम  rated premiere for a telenovela to date .
The program frequently  वर्चस्व इसके समय स्लॉट , भी over  English language programming on other major U.S. networks .
La Reina del Sur completed its 63  एपीसोड चलाएं on telemundo और इसके 13  episode run on Antena 3 simultaneously on May 30 , 2011 .
the फाइनल एपीसोड थी the उच्चतम रेटेड ब्रॉडकास्ट in telemundo 's 19-year इतिहास ( 4.2 लाख  viewers ) , and beat all of the English language U.S. television networks to earn the number one slot in the 18-49 adult demographic .
The program 's success spurred Telemundo to  लॉन्च इसके पहला अभियान  to gain the series an Emmy Award nomination .
A one-night special featuring several cast members aired on May 31 , 2011 , and marked the  telemundo डेब्यू of विख्यात latina टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व क्रिस्टीना saralegui  .
La Reina del Sur  is ब्रॉडकास्ट in अनेक अन्य बाज़ार , सहित सर्बिया , कोलंबिया  , Chile , Cyprus , Nicaragua , Costa Rica , Mexico , Albania , Hungary , Slovenia , Croatia , Romania , ( among others ) .
An  उदाहरण  of rack mounted servers
A web hosting service is a type of Internet  होस्टिंग सेवा कि allows individuals और संगठन  to make their website accessible via the World Wide Web .
Web hosts are companies that provide space on a server owned  or leased लिये उपयोग by क्लाइंट , as खूब as providing  Internet connectivity , typically in a data center .
Web  होस्ट can भी provide आंकड़ा बीच स्पेस और कनेक्टिविटी  to the Internet for other servers located in their data center , called colocation , also known as Housing in Latin America or France .
The  पैमाना of वेब होस्टिंग सेवाएं  varies greatly .
The most basic is web page and small-scale file hosting , where files can be uploaded via  संचिका ट्रांसफ़र प्रोटोकॉल ( एफटीपी ) or  a Web interface .
The files are usually delivered to the Web `` as is '' or with  minimal प्रसंस्करण  .
अनेक अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाताओं ( isps  ) offer this service free to subscribers .
Individuals and  संगठन may भी obtain वेब पेज होस्टिंग  from alternative service providers .
Personal web site hosting is  typically फ़्री ,  advertisement-sponsored , or inexpensive .
Business web site  होस्टिंग प्रायः रै a उच्चतर व्यय  depending upon the size and type of the website .
Single page hosting is generally  sufficient लिये निजी वेब पृष्ठों  .
A  जटिल साईट काल्स लिये a अधिक व्यापक पैकेज कि provides डेटाबेस support और  application development platforms ( e.g . PHP , Java , Ruby on Rails , ColdFusion , or ASP.NET ) .
These facilities allow customers to write or install scripts for applications  जैसे forums और सामग्री प्रबन्धन  .
भी , सुरक्षित sockets  Layer ( SSL ) is typically used for e-commerce .
The host may also provide an interface or control panel for managing the Web server and  installing स्क्रिप्ट , as खूब as अन्य मौड्यूल और सेवा अनुप्रयोग जैसे  e-mail .
Some hosts specialize in certain software or  सेवाएं ( e.g . e-commerce ) , जिससे हैं commonly प्रयुक्त  by larger companies that outsource network infrastructure .
Madden NFL ( known as John Madden Football before 1993 ) is an  अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल वीडियो खेल श्रेणी विकसित by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कला  Tiburon for EA Sports .
The  खेल श्रेणी is नामित बाद प्रो फ़ुटबॉल हॉल of famer जॉन मैडेन ,  a well-known former Super Bowl –winning coach of the Oakland Raiders and color commentator .
The series is the  बेहतरीन selling ea खेल  series .
the खेल have consistently  been a best seller , and has even spawned TV shows where players compete .
Among the game 's realistic features include  sophisticated playbooks और खिलाड़ी आंकडे , और आवाज़ commentary कि allows  players to hear the game as if it were a real TV broadcast .
The Madden NFL series has been  nicknamed the एनएफएल 's 33rd मताधिकार  .
The series was originally conceived by Electronic Arts founder Trip Hawkins ,  जो तब approached मैडेन in 1984 लिये उसके समर्थन  and expertise .
Due to Madden 's insistence  कि the खेल be as यथार्थवादी as संभावित , the  first version of John Madden Football was not released until 1988 .
The second version of the game was released in  1990 , साथ सालाना संस्करण चूंकि  then .
The series ' name was changed to Madden NFL in 1993 after EA acquired the rights to use  एनएफएल टीमों और  players .
Despite Madden 's retirement as a broadcaster in 2009  , he continues to lend उसके नाम और provide विशेषज्ञता  for the game .
Cindy Lee  मिलर sheehan ( born जुलाई 10 , 1957 ) is an अमरीकी antiwar activist जिनकी  son , U.S. Army Specialist Casey Sheehan , was killed by enemy action during the Iraq War .
She attracted national and international media attention in August 2005 for her extended antiwar protest at a makeshift  शिविर बाहर अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश 's टेक्सास ranch —a स्टैंड कि  drew both passionate support and angry criticism .
Sheehan ran  unsuccessfully लिये कॉंग्रेस in  2008 .
She is a vocal critic of President  बराक ओबामा 's विदेशी  policy .
Her memoir  , सलाम माँ : a माँ 's यात्रा  Through Heartache to Activism , was published in 2006 .
Sheehan was the 2012 vice-presidential nominee  of the सलाम और स्वतंत्रता पार्टी  .
Wyclef Jeanelle Jean ( ; ; born  अक्तूबर 17 , 1969 ) wyclef  Dumped From Haiti 's Presidential Ballot – TIME , Aug 21 , 2010 .
`` Before he announced on August 5 that he was  कार्यशील लिये अध्यक्ष of हैती , wyclef जां थी स्टिल लिस्टिंग  his age as only 37 years old .
But after declaring himself a presidential candidate , the Haitian-American-Irish hip-hop star also decided to come clean and confirm that he was really 40 . '' is  a  three-time Grammy Award -winning Haitian-American rapper , singer-songwriter , musician , record producer , and politician .
At age nine , Jean moved to the  संयुक्त राज्य साथ उसके परिवार और रै खर्च much of उसके जीवन  in the country .
He first received fame as a  सदस्य of the acclaimed नई जर्सी  hip hop group the Fugees .
On August 5 ,  2010 , जां दायर लिये उम्मीदवारी in the 2010 haitian अध्यक्षीय चुनाव , हालांकि the  Electoral Commission subsequently ruled him ineligible to stand as he had not met the requirement to have been resident in Haiti for five years .
Wyclef Jean to appeal  विरूद्ध हैती चुनाव सत्ताधारी  – BBC News , Aug 22 , 2010 .
Haiti 's electoral commission said that Mr Jean was ineligible  to स्टैंड as the haitian संविधान requires उम्मीदवार  to have lived in the country for five years prior to an election .
The  40-year-old सिंगर जीवनदान in  the US .
Jean 's efforts at earthquake relief , highly publicized in  2010 throughout हैती और the संयुक्त राज्य , यहूद channeled through  his charitable organization , Yéle Haiti .
the दान , जिससे performed a किस्में  of charitable works in Haiti between 2005 and 2010 , effectively closed in 2012 .
In law , a set-off is a statutory defense to the whole or to a  portion of a अभियोक्ता 's  claim .
It had no existence under the English common law , being  निर्मित by 2 जियो . ii c. 22 लिये the राहत of insolvent कर्जदार , हालांकि set-off  was recognized in equity .
Such a defense could  be pleaded तभी in आदर of परस्पर debts of a definite अक्षर , और किया नहीं लागू  to cases in which damages were claimed , nor to equitable claims or demands .
By the rules of the Supreme Court ( O. XIX  . r. 3 ) a प्रतिवादी in an कार्रवाई may नियत बंद or नियत up कोई सही or अर्जी by रास्ता of counterclaim विरूद्ध the दावा of a अभियोक्ता  , and such set-off or counterclaim has the same effect as a statement of claim in a cross-action .
The legal defense of set-off ( above ) was originally introduced to prevent the unfair situation whereby a person  ( `` पार्टी a '' ) जो owed धन to another ( `` पार्टी b '' ) could be भेजा to कर्जदार थाना , despite  the fact that Party B also owed money to Party A .
The law thus allows both parties to defer payment until their  संबंधित दावा have महरूम सुना in  court .
Upon judgment , both claims are extinguished and replaced by a single net sum owing ( e.g . If Party A owes Party B 100 and Party B  owes पार्टी a 105 , the दो रकम हैं नियत बंद और replaced  with a single obligation of 5 from Party B to Party A ) .
Set-off can also be incorporated by  contractual अनुबंध so कि , जहाँ a पार्टी मूलभूत ,  the mutual amounts owing are automatically set off and extinguished .
In certain  jurisdictions ( सहित the uk ) , set-off takes  place automatically upon the insolvency of a company .
This means that , for each party which is both a creditor and  debtor of the insolvent कम्पनी , परस्पर debts हैं set-off  against each other , and then either the bankrupt 's creditor can claim the balance in the bankruptcy or the trustee in bankruptcy can ask for the balance remaining to be paid , depending on which side owed the most .
This has been criticized as an undeclared  सुरक्षा ब्याज कि  violates the principle of pari passu .
The alternative , where a creditor has to pay all its debts , but receive  तभी a सीमित portion of the leftover moneys कि अन्य  unsecured creditors get , poses the danger of 'knock-on ' insolvencies .
The right to  नियत बंद is विशेषकर महत्वपूर्ण जब रिपोर्टिंग a बैंको  's exposures to regulatory authorities .
The situation where a bank has to report that it has lent a large sum to a borrower ( and is therefore exposed , because there is a risk that the borrower might default thereby leading to the loss of the bank 's or its depositors ' money ) is thus replaced ( where the bank has taken  सुरक्षा over साझा or प्रतिभूति of the borrower ) साथ an एक्सपोज़र of the धन lent ऋण the मान of the सुरक्षा  taken .
Jennifer Joanna Aniston ( born February 11 , 1969 ) is  an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री , फिल्मी निदेशक , और निर्माता  .
Aniston gained  विश्वव्यापी मान्यता in the 1990s लिये  portraying Rachel Green on the television sitcom Friends , a role which earned her an Emmy Award , a Golden Globe Award , and a Screen Actors Guild Award .
Aniston has also  enjoyed a कामयाब  Hollywood film career .
She gained critical acclaim for her performances in the independent  films वो 's the एक ( 1996 ) , दफ्तर स्पेस ( 1999 ) ,  The Good Girl ( 2002 ) and Friends with Money ( 2006 ) .
She has had her greatest commercial successes with the films Bruce Almighty ( 2003 ) , The Break-Up ( 2006 ) , Marley &  me ( 2008 ) , बस go साथ it ( 2011 ) और भयानक  Bosses ( 2011 ) .
Aniston received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame on  फ़रवरी 22 ,  2012 .
A white Bengal tiger  at the ह्यूस्टन एक्वेरियम
(  वीडियो  )
A  श्वेत बाघ  at Tobu Zoo , in Saitama , Japan .
the श्वेत बाघ is a recessive म्यूटेंट of the बंगाल बाघ , जिससे  was reported in the wild from time to time in Assam , Bengal , Bihar and especially from the former State of Rewa .
Conventional PCI ( PCI is an initialism formed from Peripheral  घटक इंटरकनेक्ट , भाग of the पीसीआई लोकल बस मानक और प्रायः  shortened to just PCI ) is a local computer bus for attaching hardware devices in a computer .
The PCI bus supports the functions  मिला on a प्रोसेसर बस , लकिन in a  standardized format that is independent of any particular processor .
Devices connected to the bus appear to  the प्रोसेसर to be कनेक्ट सीधे to the प्रोसेसर  bus , and are assigned addresses in the processor 's address space .
Attached  डिवाइस can लो either the रूप of an एकीकृत सर्किट fitted onto  the motherboard itself , called a planar device in the PCI specification , or an expansion card that fits into a slot .
The PCI Local Bus was first implemented in IBM PC compatibles , where it displaced  the संयोजन of isa प्लस एक vesa लोकल बस as the बस  configuration .
It  रै subsequently महरूम  adopted for other computer types .
PCI and PCI-X are being replaced by PCI Express  , लकिन , सबसे motherboards हैं स्टिल बना साथ एक or अधिक पीसीआई स्लॉट  , which are sufficient for many uses .
The  पीसीआई specification कवर the शारीरिक आकार of the बस ( सहित  the size and spacing of the circuit board edge electrical contacts ) , electrical characteristics , bus timing , and protocols .
The specification can be purchased from  the पीसीआई खास ब्याज समूह ( pci-sig  ) .
Typical PCI cards used in PCs include :  संजाल ताश , ध्वनि ताश , modems , अतिरिक्त पोर्ट ऐसे as usb or सीरियल , tv ट्यूनर ताश  and disk controllers .
PCI video cards replaced ISA and VESA cards , until  growing बैंडविड्थ आवश्यकताएँ outgrew the सामर्थ्य of पीसीआई ; the पसन्दीदा  interface for video cards became AGP , and then PCI Express .
PCI video cards remain available for use  साथ बूढ़ा pcs बगैर अगप  or PCI Express slots .
Many devices previously provided on PCI expansion cards are now commonly integrated onto  motherboards or उपलब्धियाँ in सार्वभौमिक सीरियल बस और पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस संस्करण  .
Caffeine is a bitter ,  श्वेत crystalline xanthine  alkaloid that acts as a stimulant drug .
Caffeine is found in varying quantities in the seeds ,  पत्ते , और फल of कुछ पौधे , जहाँ it अधिनियमों as a प्राकृतिक कीटनाशक कि paralyzes और  kills certain insects feeding on the plants , as well as enhancing the reward memory of pollinators .
It is most commonly consumed by humans in infusions extracted from the seed of the coffee plant and the leaves of the tea bush , as well as from various  भोजन और पेय containing उत्पाद निकला इससे the कोला नट  .
Other sources include yerba maté , guarana berries , guayusa ,  और the yaupon  holly .
In humans , caffeine acts as a central nervous  प्रणाली उत्तेजक  , temporarily warding off drowsiness and restoring alertness .
It is the world 's most widely consumed psychoactive drug , but unlike many other psychoactive substances ,  it is विधिक और unregulated in nearly सब भाग of the संसार  .
Beverages containing caffeine  , ऐसे as कॉफी , चाय , नरम पेय  , and energy drinks , enjoy great popularity .
In North America , 90 % of  वयस्कों consume कैफीन  daily .
Part  of the कारण कैफीन is वर्गीकृत by the खाना और ड्रग प्रशासन as ग्रा ( generally  recognized as safe ) is that toxic doses ( over 10 grams ) are much higher than typically used doses ( less than 500 milligrams ) .
Ordinary consumption can have low health risks , even when  carried on लिये सालो – वहीँ may be a modest सुरक्षात्मक प्रभाव  against some diseases , including Parkinsons Disease , and certain types of cancer .
कैफीन can have दोनो धनात्मक और  negative effects on anxiety disorders .
Some people experience sleep disruption if they consume caffeine , especially during the evening hours , but others show  छोटी disturbance और the प्रभाव of कैफीन on नींद is  highly variable .
Evidence  of a रिस्क to गर्भावस्था is equivocal  , but some authorities have concluded that prudent advice is for pregnant women to limit consumption to the equivalent of two cups of coffee per day or less .
The American Congress of  obstetricians और स्त्रीरोग  ( ACOG ) concluded in 2010 that caffeine consumption is safe up to 200 mg per day in pregnant women .
Caffeine has pressor and mild diuretic  प्रभाव जब administered to लोगों जो हैं नहीं प्रयुक्त to it , लकिन नियमित उपयोक्ता develop a सहिष्णुता to इस प्रभाव  , and studies have generally failed to support the common notion that ordinary consumption contributes significantly to dehydration .
With heavy use , tolerance develops rapidly to autonomic  प्रभाव ऐसे as elevated दिल रेट और मांसपेशी twitching  , but not to the cognitive or arousal effects of caffeine .
The degree to which caffeine can produce clinically  significant शारीरिक और दिमागी dependence remains a विषय of विवाद  in the medical literature .

A  longboard is a longer रूपांतर  of a skateboard .
It is commonly used for cruising , downhill racing , slalom  रेसिंग , स्लाइडिंग , and/or हस्तांतरण  .

The Coast Ranges of California span from Humboldt County ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया दक्षिण to सांता  Barbara County .
The other three coastal California mountain ranges are the Transverse  सीमाएँ , प्रायद्वीपीय सीमाएँ  and the Klamath Mountains .
Physiographically , they are a section of the larger  प्रशांत किनारा प्रांत , जिससे in फेरे हैं भाग  of the larger Pacific Mountain System physiographic division .
UNESCO has included the `` California Coast  सीमाएँ जीवमंडल आरक्षित `` in इसके man और the जीवमंडल  Programme of World Network of Biosphere Reserves since 1983 .

World  मैप of यात्री  cars per 1000 people
An automobile , autocar ,  मोटर car or car is a wheeled मोटर गाडी प्रयुक्त लिये transporting  passengers , which also carries its own engine or motor .
Most  परिभाषाएं of the पद बताएँ कि ऑटोमोबाइल हैं designed to चलाएं primarily  on roads , to have seating for one to eight people , to typically have four wheels , and to be constructed principally for the transport of people rather than goods .
The term motorcar has also been used in the context of electrified rail systems to denote a car which functions as a small locomotive  लकिन भी provides स्पेस लिये यात्री  and baggage .
These locomotive cars were  प्रायः प्रयुक्त on suburban रूट by दोनो interurban और intercity  railroad systems .
it थी अनुमानित  in 2010 that the number of automobiles had risen to over 1 billion vehicles , up from the 500 million of 1986 .
The numbers are increasing rapidly  , विशेषकर  in China and India .
John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29 , 1917 – November 22 , 1963 ) , often  referred to by उसके आद्याक्षर jfk , थी the 35th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ,  serving from 1961 until his death in 1963 .
After military service as commander of the Motor  torpedo नौकाएँ pt-109 और pt-59 दौरान  World War II in the South Pacific , Kennedy represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat .
thereafter , he परोसा in the u.S.  Senate from 1953 until 1960 .
Kennedy defeated Vice President and Republican  प्रत्याशी रिचर्ड निक्सन in  the 1960 U.S. presidential election .
At 43 years of age , he is the youngest to  have महरूम निर्वाचित to the दफ्तर , the second-youngest अध्यक्ष  ( after Theodore Roosevelt ) , and the first person born in the 20th century to serve as president .
A Catholic , Kennedy is  the तभी non- प्रोटोस्टेंट अध्यक्ष  , and is the only president to have won a Pulitzer Prize .
Events during his presidency included the Bay of Pigs Invasion , the Cuban Missile Crisis , the building of the Berlin Wall , the Space Race , the  african-american सिविल अधिकारों गति , और जल्दी चरण of the  Vietnam War .
Therein , Kennedy increased the number of military advisers , special operation forces , and helicopters in an  प्रयत्न to कोर the स्प्रेड of साम्यवादी in दक्षिण ईस्ट एशिया .
The Kennedy  प्रशासन अपनाया the नीति of  the Strategic Hamlet Program which was implemented by the South Vietnamese government .
It involved  निश्चित मजबूर relocation , गाँव internment , और पृथक्करण  of rural South Vietnamese from the northern and southern communist insurgents .
Kennedy was assassinated on  नवम्बर 22 ,  1963 in Dallas , Texas .
Lee Harvey Oswald was charged with  the अपराधों , लकिन he थी शॉट और मारे by जोकर माणिक्य दो दिनों  later , before a trial could take place .
The FBI and the Warren Commission  officially concluded कि ओसवाल्ड थी the लोन  assassin .
However , the United States House Select Committee on Assassinations ( HSCA ) concluded  कि those investigations यहूद flawed  and that Kennedy was probably assassinated as the result of a conspiracy .
However , ABC News in their investigation , The Kennedy Assassination : Beyond Conspiracy ,  पुष्टि the निष्कर्षों of the वारेन आयोग ; having concluded  Oswald acted alone .
Kennedy 's controversial  विभाग of रक्षा tfx सेनानी bomber कार्यक्रम led to a congressional  investigation that lasted from 1963 to 1970 .
Since the 1960s information  concerning कैनेडी 's निजी  life has come to light .
Details of Kennedy 's health problems in which  he struggled have become बेहतर ज्ञात , विशेषकर चूंकि  the 1990s .
Although initially kept secret from the general  पब्लिक , रिपोर्ट्स of कैनेडी 's philandering have  garnered much press .
Kennedy ranks highly in public  राय दरजा of u.S.  presidents .
A Siemens MXL fire alarm control panel ( top ) and  ग्राफिक annunciator ( नीचे  ) for Potomac Hall , at James Madison University .
A Vigilant  vm-1 आग सचेतक कंट्रोल ईकाई ( facu  ) / autonomous control unit ( ACU ) with integrated voice evacuation and fire fighter telephone system .
manufactured by एडवर्ड्स  , A UTC F & S Company
A Fire Alarm Control Panel (  facp ) , or आग सचेतक कंट्रोल ईकाई ( facu ) , is the  controlling component of a Fire Alarm System .
The panel receives information from environmental sensors designed to detect changes associated with fire , monitors their  operational अखंडता और provides लिये स्वचालित कंट्रोल of उपकरण , और हस्तांतरण of सूचना जरुरी  to prepare the facility for fire based on a predetermined sequence .
The panel may also supply electrical  उर्जा to operate कोई संबद्ध सेंसर  , control , transmitter , or relay .
There are four basic  प्रकार of panels : coded panels , conventional  panels , addressable panels , and multiplex systems .
This is a list of the first music videos broadcast on MTV 's  पहला दिन , अगस्त 1 ,  1981 .
MTV 's first day on the air was rebroadcast on VH1  क्लासिक in 2006 और अपलोड onto youtube in 2010 ( हालांकि तभी the  first four hours were authentic ; the rest were edited VH1 rebroadcasts ) .
Bandaranaike International Airport ( BIA ) ( also known as Katunayake International  विमानक्षेत्र और कोलोन अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र ) is एक of the दो अंतरराष्ट्रीय  airports serving the city of Colombo , the other is Ratmalana International Airport .
Mattala Rajapaksa International Airport located in southern  नगर of hambantota is the अन्य अंतरराष्ट्रीय  airport in Sri Lanka .
Bandaranaike International  विमानक्षेत्र is स्तिथ in katunayake , 22 मील ( 35  km ) north of Colombo .
It is  administered by विमानक्षेत्र और विमानन सेवाएं  ( Sri Lanka ) Ltd .
It is the hub of SriLankan Airlines , the  नेशनल वाहक of श्री लंका , और mihin  Lanka , the budget airline of Sri Lanka .
Black Swan is a 2010 American psychological thriller and horror  फिल्मी निर्देशित by डैरेन aronofsky और अभिनीत  Natalie Portman , Vincent Cassel , and Mila Kunis .
The plot revolves around a  उत्पादन of tchaikovsky 's swan झील बैले  by a prestigious New York City company .
The production requires a ballerina to play the innocent and fragile White Swan , for which the committed dancer Nina ( Portman ) is a  पूर्ण अनुरूप , as खूब as the अंधेरा और कामुक ब्लैक swan ,  which are qualities embodied by the new arrival Lily ( Kunis ) .
Nina is overwhelmed by a feeling of immense pressure  जब वो पाता herself स्पर्धा लिये the भाग , causing उसके to खोना  her tenuous grip on reality and descend into a living nightmare .
Aronofsky conceived the premise  by connecting उसके viewings of a उत्पादन of swan झील साथ  an unrealized screenplay about understudies and the notion of being haunted by a double , similar to the folklore surrounding doppelgängers .
Aronofsky cites Fyodor Dostoyevsky 's `` The  दोगुना `` as another  inspiration for the film .
The director also considered Black Swan a  साथी टुकड़ा to उसके 2008 फिल्मी the पहलवान , साथ दोनो  films involving demanding performances for different kinds of art .
He and Portman first  discussed the प्रोजेक्ट in 2000 , और बाद a ब्रैड अनुलग्नक to सार्वभौमिक studios , ब्लैक swan  was produced in New York City in 2009 by Fox Searchlight Pictures .
पोर्टमैन और kunis प्रशिक्षित in बैले लिये अनेक महीने prior to फिल्मांकन , और notable आंकड़े इससे  the ballet world helped with film production to shape the ballet presentation .
The film premiered as the opening  फिल्मी लिये the 67th वेनिस अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Film Festival on September 1 , 2010 .
It had a limited release in the United States  starting दिसम्बर  3 , 2010 and opened nationwide on December 17 .
Black Swan received critical praise upon its  रिलीज , विशेषकर लिये पोर्टमैन 's प्रदर्शन और aronofsky 's दिशा , और थी a significant बक्सा दफ्तर कामयाबी  , grossing $ 329 million worldwide .
The film received five Academy  पुरस्कार nominations और पोर्टमैन जीती the  Best Actress award for the film , as well as many other Best Actress awards in several guilds and festivals , while Aronofsky was nominated for Best Director .
In addition , the film itself  प्राप्त a नामांकन  for Best Picture .
The world’s first ice-calorimeter , used in the winter of 1782-83 , by Antoine Lavoisier and Pierre-Simon Laplace , to determine the heat  शामिल in विभिन्न रासायनिक परिवर्तन ; calculations जिससे यहूद आधारित on जोसेफ ब्लैक ’s prior डिस्कवरी of  latent heat .
These  प्रयोग चिह्नित the न्यास  of thermochemistry .
A calorimeter ( from Latin calor , meaning heat ) is an object  प्रयुक्त लिये कैलोरीमिति , or the प्रक्रम of measuring the ऊष्मा of रासायनिक  reactions or physical changes as well as heat capacity .
Differential  स्कैनिंग calorimeters , समतापी  microcalorimeters , titration calorimeters and accelerated rate calorimeters are among the most common types .
A simple calorimeter just consists of a thermometer attached to a  मेटल संग्राहक पूरा of जल निलंबित ऊपर a  combustion chamber .
To find  the enthalpy बदलें प्रति mole of a पदार्थ a in a प्रतिक्रिया between दो substances a और  B , the substances are added to a calorimeter and the initial and final temperatures ( before the reaction started and after it has finished ) are noted .
Multiplying the temperature change by the mass and specific heat capacities of the substances gives a value for  the उर्जा दिए बंद or अवशोषित दौरान the  reaction .
Dividing the energy change by how many moles of A were present gives its enthalpy  बदलें of प्रतिक्रिया  .
This method  is प्रयुक्त primarily in अकादमिक  teaching as it describes the theory of calorimetry .
It does not account for the heat loss through the container or the heat capacity  of the थर्मामीटर और संग्राहक  itself .
In addition , the object placed inside the calorimeter  shows कि the वस्तुएँ transferred उनके ऊष्मा to the ऊष्मामापी और  into the liquid , and the heat absorbed by the calorimeter and the liquid is equal to the heat given off by the metals .
A pair of green  flip-flops
Flip-flops (  भी पुकारा zōri , thongs , jandals , or a किस्में of अन्य names throughout  the world ) are a type of open-toed sandal typically worn in casual situations , such as outside or at the beach .
They consist of a flat sole held loosely on the foot by a Y-shaped strap that passes between the  पहला और दूसरी toes और around either  side of the foot .
They may also be held to the foot with a single  डोरी over the सामने of the पैर  rather than a thong .
The name ``  flip-flop '' originated  because of the sound that is made by slapping between the sole of the foot and the floor when walking .
This style of footwear has been worn by the people of many cultures throughout the  संसार , originating as जल्दी as the प्राचीन  Egyptians in 4,000 B.C .
The modern flip-flop descends from the Japanese zōri , which became popular after  संसार युद्ध ii जब सैनिको returning to the संयुक्त राज्य brought उन्हें वापस .
They  became लोकप्रिय in कैज़ुअल जमावट दौरान the 1960s ,  1990s , and 2000s , and some varieties have even found their way into more formal attire , despite criticism .
the उपयोग of flip-flops can परिणाम  in many pains and injuries , including ankle sprains and broken bones .
Some individuals who walk for long  अवधि रपट पीड़ा in the फीट ,  ankles , and lower legs .
The lack of support provided by flip-flops often results in  over-pronation चोटों , caused by the पैर घुसते  inwards further than normal .
This can lead  to चपटा  feet and tendonitis .
Other injuries that may result are due  to the जूते 's open-toed प्रकृति , ऐसे  as stubbed toes , cuts , and bruises .
Doctors recommend purchasing pricier sandals with thick-cushioned  सोल्स , as खूब as those कि have a डोरी कि is नहीं कैनवास और  that comes back almost to the ankle .
The owners of  hanjin ओसाका , देखी यहाँ transiting the पनामा कनाल in 2008  , declared general average following an explosion in the ship 's engine room on .
The law of general average is a legal principle of  मेरीटाइम विधि according to जिससे सब पार्टियों in a समुद्र venture proportionally share  any losses resulting from a voluntary sacrifice of part of the ship or cargo to save the whole in an emergency .
In the exigencies of hazards faced at sea , crew members often have precious little time in  जिससे to determine precisely जिनकी कार्गो वे  are jettisoning .
Thus , to avoid quarrelling that could waste valuable time , there arose the equitable practice whereby all the merchants whose cargo landed safely  होता be पुकारा on to योगदान a portion , आधारित upon a share or प्रतिशत , to the व्यापारी or व्यापारियों जिनकी goods था  been tossed overboard to avert imminent peril .
While general  औसत traces इसके origins in प्राचीन मेरीटाइम  law , still it remains part of the admiralty law of most countries .
The first codification of general average was  the यॉर्क antwerp  Rules of 1890 .
American  कंपनियाँ स्वीकृत it  in 1949 .
General average requires three  तत्व जिससे हैं clearly stated  by Mr. Justice Grier in Barnard v. Adams:
``  1st .
A common danger :  a खतरे in जिससे पोत , कार्गो और क्रू सब participate ; a खतरे  imminent and apparently 'inevitable , ' except by voluntarily incurring the loss of a portion of the whole to save the remainder . ''
`` 2nd . There must be a voluntary jettison , jactus  , or ढलाई दूर , of कुछ portion of the संयुक्त चिंता लिये the purpose of बचने  this imminent peril , periculi imminentis evitandi causa , or , in other words , a transfer of the peril from the whole to a particular portion of the whole . ''
`` 3rd  .
This attempt to avoid  the निकट आम  peril must be successful '' .
Example Polish call for  टीकाकरण विरूद्ध डिप्थीरिया  and Tetanus .
A vaccination schedule is a  श्रेणी of vaccinations , सहित the समय of सब doses , जिससे may be either  recommended or compulsory , depending on the country of residence .
A vaccine is an antigenic preparation used to produce active immunity to a  बीमारी , in अनुक्रम to prevent or reduce the प्रभाव of संक्रमण by  any natural or `` wild '' pathogen .
Many vaccines require multiple doses for  अधिकतम प्रभावकारिता , either to उपज sufficient आरंभिक प्रतिरक्षा  response or to boost response that fades over time .
For example , tetanus vaccine  boosters हैं प्रायः अनुशंसित  every 10 years .
Vaccine schedules are developed by governmental agencies or physicians groups to achieve maximum effectiveness  using जरूरी और अनुशंसित टीके लिये a मोहल्ले  while minimizing the number of health care system interactions .
Over the past two decades , the recommended vaccination  अनुसूची रै grown rapidly और become अधिक जटिल as अनेक नई टीके  have been developed .
Some vaccines are recommended only in certain areas ( countries  , subnational क्षेत्रों , or at-risk  populations ) where a disease is common .
For instance , yellow fever vaccination is on the routine  टीका अनुसूची of फ्रेंच guiana , is अनुशंसित in निश्चित  regions of Brazil but in the United States is only given to travelers heading to countries with a history of the disease .
In developing countries , vaccine  सुझाव भी लो into खाता the स्तर of स्वास्थ्य परवाह अभिगम , the  cost of vaccines and issues with vaccine availability and storage .
Sample vaccinations schedules discussed by the World Health Organization show a developed country using a schedule which extends over the first five years of a child 's life  और उपयोग टीके जिससे लागत over $ 700 सहित प्रशासन लागत जबकि a विकासशील देश उपयोग a अनुसूची providing टीके in the पहला  9 months of life and costing only $ 25 .
This difference is due to the lower cost of health care , the lower cost of many vaccines provided to developing nations , and  कि अधिक महंगी टीके , प्रायः लिये कम आम रोगों , हैं नहीं utilized  .
In 1900 , the smallpox  टीका थी the तभी एक administered  to children .
By the early 1950s , children routinely received four vaccines , for protection against ( diphtheria  , pertussis , टेटनस , पोलियो , और smallpox  ) , and as many as five shots by two years of age .
Since the mid-1980s , many vaccines  have महरूम added to the अनुसूची  .
, the US Centers  लिये बीमारी कंट्रोल और रोकथाम ( सीडीसी ) अभी अनुशंसा  vaccination against at least fourteen diseases .
By two years of age , U.S. children receive as many as 24  टीका injections , और might प्राप्त up  to five shots during one visit to the doctor .
The use of combination vaccine products means that , , the United  किंगडम 's immunization कार्यक्रम consists of 10 injections by the आयु of दो  , rather than 25 if vaccination for each disease was given as a separate injection .
Two revellers dance  in the गलियों  .
The form of dancing is  पुकारा `` wining '' ( घुमावदार )  pronounced wine-ing
A Music Truck  entertains the भीड on the गलियों  .
Trucks are an  अभिन्न भाग of the गली परेड , featuring सजीव  performances or deejays
The Trinidad and Tobago  कार्निवल is an सालाना इवेंट आयोजित on the सोमवार और मंगलवार पहले राख बुधवार  , and is well known for participant 's colorful costumes and exuberant celebrations .
Carnival in Trinidad  और टोबैगो is the सबसे significant इवेंट on the आइलैंड्स ' सांस्कृतिक और पर्यटन  calendar , with numerous cultural events running in the lead up to the street parade on Carnival Monday and Tuesday .
It is said that if the islanders are not celebrating it , then they are preparing for it , while  reminiscing परिचय the  past year 's festival .
The heart of the musical celebration has been calypso ; recently soca  रै replaced  calypso as the most celebrated type of music .
Costumes , stickfighting and  limbo प्रतियोगिताओं  are also important components of the festival .
Carnival as it is celebrated in Trinidad and  टोबैगो is भी मनाये in शहरों  worldwide .
These including Toronto 's Caribana , Miami 's Miami Carnival , Houston  carifest , लंदन 's नॉटिंग हिल कार्निवल as खूब  as New York City 's Labor Day Carnival to name a few .
Carnival was created when West African slaves  mimicked उनके फ्रेंच स्वामी जो  where known for their lavish costumes balls .
Forbidden to  partake in ये festivities और confined  to their quarters , slaves combined elements from their own cultures to their master 's fete .
Hence the creation of characters such as Jab  jab or jab molassie ( शैतानों ) , मध्यरात्रि लुटेरों , imps , lagahroo  , Soucouyant , La Diablesse and Demons .
With  the abolition of गुलामी in 1838 , freed africans took  their version of Carnival to the streets through expression of drums , riddim sections like tamboo bamboo and as each new immigrant population entered Trinidad , Carnival evolved into what we know today .
The city of Chicago , Illinois held a nonpartisan  mayoral चुनाव on मंगलवार ,  February 22 , 2011 .
Incumbent Mayor Richard M. Daley , a member of the Democratic  पार्टी जो था महरूम in दफ्तर चूंकि 1989 , किया नहीं तलाश  a seventh term as mayor .
उम्मीदवार needed to collect 12,500 याचिका  signatures by November 22 , 2010 to qualify for a place on the ballot .
April 5 , 2011 was scheduled to be a  runoff चुनाव तिथि if no प्रत्याशी  received an absolute majority .
Rahm  emanuel जीती the रेस  for mayor with more than 55 % of the vote .
He was  उदघाटन on  May 16 , 2011 .
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' is a song by American indie pop  बैंड फोस्टर the लोगों  .
It  थी released as the समूह 's डेब्यू सिंगल in सितंबर  2010 , and the following year was included on their EP Foster the People and their debut album Torches .
`` Pumped  up kicks '' became the समूह  's breakthrough hit and was one of the most popular songs of 2011 .
The song was written and recorded by frontman  चिह्नित फोस्टर जबकि he थी  working as a commercial jingle writer .
Contrasting with the upbeat musical  संयोजन , the गीत describe the homicidal  thoughts of a troubled youth .
The track  प्राप्त considerable ध्यान बाद it थी posted ऑनलाइन in 2010 as a फ़्री डाउनलोड  , and it helped the group garner a multi-album record deal with Columbia Records imprint Startime International .
``  उत्तेजित up kicks '' proved to be a स्लीपर hit ; in 2011 ,  after receiving significant airplay on modern rock stations , the song crossed-over onto contemporary hit radio stations .
The song spent eight consecutive weeks at number three on the Billboard Hot 100 chart in the United States , making it the first Billboard  वैकल्पिक गीतों number-one सिंगल to क्रैक the u.S. शीर्ष 5 चूंकि किंग्स of लिओन 's `` उपयोग  Somebody `` in 2009 .
The song was widely  praised by आलोचकों , और it रै महरूम licensed  for use in a wide range of popular media since its release .
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' received a Grammy Award  नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन पॉप duo/group  Performance .
The State  मेला of वेस्ट वर्जिनिया is an सालाना  state fair for West Virginia .
It is held annually in mid-August on the State  fairgrounds in fairlea , निकट lewisburg , वेस्ट वर्जिनिया  in the southeastern part of the state .
The State Fairgrounds consists of a large open field for  carnivals और प्रदर्शनियों , a घोड़ा track , grandstands , और अनेक प्रदर्शनी  buildings .
Free parking is provided adjacent to the  fairgrounds और , जबतक 2006 , फ़्री कैंप थी भी उपलब्धियाँ in a  large field with running-water toilets and showers , but no hookups .
Campers are now  चार्ज a छोटी शुल्क  .
The White House , the  अध्यक्ष 's आधिकारिक निवास और बीच of the प्रशासन
Under the United States Constitution , the President of the United States is the head of state and head of  सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य  .
As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a whole , the  प्रेसिडेंसी is the उच्चतम राजनैतिक दफ्तर in the संयुक्त राज्य by influence  and recognition .
The president is  भी the commander-in-chief  of the United States Armed Forces .
The president is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an  चुनावी कॉलेज ( or by the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि चाहिए the चुनावी कॉलेज  fail to award an absolute majority of votes to any person ) .
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second Amendment to the United States  संविधान in 1951 , no व्यक्ति may be निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष अधिक than twice , और no एक जो रै परोसा अधिक than दो सालो of a पद  to which someone else was elected may be elected more than once .
Upon the death , resignation , or removal from office  of an लाज़िम अध्यक्ष , the वाइस अध्यक्ष  assumes the office .
the अध्यक्ष जरूर be  at least 35 years of age and a `` natural born '' citizen of the United States .
This list includes only those persons who were sworn  into दफ्तर as अध्यक्ष following the अनुसमर्थन  of the United States Constitution , which took effect on March 4 , 1789 .
For American  नेताओ पहले इस अनुसमर्थन  , see President of the Continental Congress .
The list  करता नहीं शामिल कोई एक्टिंग  Presidents under the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution .
There have been 43 people sworn into office , and 44 presidencies , as Grover  क्लीवलैंड परोसा दो non-consecutive  terms and is counted chronologically as both the 22nd and 24th president .
Of the individuals elected as president , four died in office of natural causes ( William Henry Harrison , Zachary Taylor , Warren G. Harding , and Franklin D. Roosevelt ) , four were assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln , James A. Garfield ,  विलियम mckinley , और जॉन F. कैनेडी ) और एक resigned ( रिचर्ड  Nixon ) .
George Washington , the first  अध्यक्ष , थी उदघाटन in 1789 बाद a सर्वसम्मत  vote of the Electoral College .
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in office with 32 days in 1841 , and  फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट खर्च the longest  with over twelve years , but died shortly into his fourth term in 1945 .
He is the only president to serve more than two terms , and a constitutional amendment , affecting presidents after Harry  ट्रूमैन , थी passed to सीमा the क्रमांक of टाइम्स an व्यक्तिगत can be निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष  .
Andrew Jackson , the seventh president , was the first to be elected by men of all classes in  1828 बाद सबसे कानून barring  non-land-owners from voting were repealed .
Warren Harding was the first  निर्वाचित बाद महिलाओं gained मतदान अधिकारों  in 1920 .
History records four presidents – John Q Adams , Rutherford B.  हेज़ , बेंजामिन हैरिसन और जार्ज W. बुश – जो खोया  the popular vote but assumed office .
John F.  कैनेडी रै महरूम the तभी अध्यक्ष  of Roman Catholic faith , and the current president , Barack Obama , is the first president of African descent .
`` Lombardi  ट्रॉफी '' redirects  here .
For the award awarded annually to the best  कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल lineman or linebacker  , see Lombardi Award .
The Vince Lombardi Trophy is the trophy awarded each year to the winning team of the National  फ़ुटबॉल लीग 's चैंपियनशिप खेल , the सुपर कटोरी  .
The trophy  is नामित in सम्मान  of legendary NFL coach Vince Lombardi .
This is a list of tables of the verified oldest  लोगों in the संसार in ordinal  rank , such as oldest person or oldest man .
In these tables , a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his or her claim has been validated by an international body that  specifically सौदे in आयु शोध , ऐसे as the जराविद्या  Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records .
The longest unambiguously documented human lifespan is that of Jeanne Calment of  फ़्रांस ( 1875–1997 ) , जो died at आयु 122 सालो  , 164 days .
She  मिले विंसेंट  van Gogh when she was 12 or 13 .
This led to news media attention in 1985  , बाद calment turned 110  .
Subsequent investigation  मिला दस्तावेज़ीकरण लिये calment 's आयु ,  beyond any reasonable question , in the records of her native city , Arles , France .
More evidence of Calment 's lifespan has been produced than for  कोई अन्य supercentenarian ; उसके मामला serves as an archetype in the methodology लिये  verifying the ages of the world 's oldest people .
The longest undisputed lifespan for male  supercentenarians is कि of jiroemon किमुरा , जो फिलहाल  lives in Japan and is age as of .
Since the death of  115-year बूढ़ा दीना manfredini of the संयुक्त राज्य , on 17 दिसम्बर 2012  , Kimura , born 19 April 1897 , is the oldest living person in the world whose age can be documented .
He has  भी महरूम the oldest जीना man चूंकि the मौत of 114-year बूढ़ा  Walter Breuning on 14 April 2011 .
Since the death of 115-year old Koto Okubo of Japan on 12  जनवरी 2013 , the oldest जीना स्त्री रै महरूम -year-old misao okawa , भी  from Japan , born on 5 March 1898 .
The People 's Court is an American  arbitration-based वास्तविकता अदालत दिखाएँ , फिलहाल presided over by रिटायर्ड  Florida State Circuit Court Judge Marilyn Milian , in which small claims disputes are handled .
The People 's Court is  the पहला अदालत दिखाएँ to उपयोग  binding arbitration , introducing the format into the genre in 1981 .
The system has been  duplicated by सबसे of the दिखाएँ 's successors  in the judicial genre .
Moreover , The People 's Court is the first popular ,  long-running वास्तविकता in the  judicial genre .
It was preceded  तभी by a few short-lived हकीकत in the विधा ; ये short-lived पूर्ववर्तियों यहूद तभी loosely  related to judicial proceedings , except for one : Parole ( 1959 ) took footage from real-life courtrooms holding legal proceedings .
Prior to The People 's  अदालत , the विशाल बहुमत of tv courtroom shows प्रयुक्त अभिनेताओं , और बनाई or fictional  cases ( as did radio before that ) .
Among  उदाहरण of ये प्रकार of  court shows include Famous Jury Trials and Your Witness .
The People 's  अदालत रै था दो चिहृ  lives .
The show 's first life was presided  over solely by पूर्व लॉस एंजिल्स काउंटी श्रेष्ठ  Court Judge Joseph Wapner .
His tenure lasted from the show 's debut on September  14 , 1981 , जबतक may 21 , 1993 , जब the दिखाएँ थी रद्द  due to low ratings .
This left the show with a total of 2,484 1⁄2-hour  एपीसोड और 12 सीज़न  .
the दिखाएँ थी taped  in Los Angeles during its first life .
After being  रद्द , reruns aired जबतक  September 9 , 1994 .
On September 8 , 1997 , after being out  of उत्पादन लिये चार सालो , the  People 's Court was revived for a second life in first-run syndication as a 60-minute program .
Former lawyer  और महापौर of नई यॉर्क ed koch थी चुनी as arbiter , जिससे he कायम लिये 2 सीज़न इससे the  1997–98 season through the 1998–99 season ( the present life 's 2nd season and overall show 's 14th ) .
By the 1999–00 season , husband of Judith Sheindlin ( who  presides over न्यायधीश जुडी ) और पूर्व नई यॉर्क राज्य परम् अदालत  Judge Jerry Sheindlin succeeded Koch .
Sheindlin lasted one and a  हाफ सीज़न as he थी replaced towards  the end of the 2000–01 season ( present life 's 4th season and overall show 's 17th ) .
Beginning in  वसन्त 2001 , फ्लोरिडा न्यायधीश मर्लिन milian took  over The People 's Court and has presided over the show ever since .
Once Milian completes the 2012–13 season , she will  have परोसा as longest  arbiter over the series with 12 and a half seasons .
As of the present , however ,  उसके सालो on the कार्यक्रम टाई wapner  at 12 seasons .
In the 2009-10  टेलीविज़न ऋतु , the लोगों 's न्यायालयों 2nd/present जीवन  outlasted its first when it reached 13 seasons .
While the show taped  in नई यॉर्क नगर लिये the पहला 15 सीज़न of  its second life , it now tapes in Stamford , Connecticut as of the 2012-13 season .
On  सितंबर 3 , 2012 , the लोगों 's अदालत 's 2nd/present  life entered its 16th season ( 28th overall season ) .
With 28 total seasons , The People 's Court ranks as the 2nd longest-running courtroom program behind the ongoing Divorce  अदालत at 33 सीज़न ( इससे इसके 3 संयुक्त जीवनदान )  .
Utah ( or ) ( Arapaho : Wo'tééneihí  ' ) is a राज्य in the पश्चिमी  United States .
It became  the 45th राज्य admitted to  the Union on January 4 , 1896 .
Utah is the  13th-largest , the 34th-most populous , और the  10th-least-densely populated of the 50 United States .
Approximately 80 % of Utah 's 2,817,222 people live along the Wasatch Front , centering on  नमक झील नगर , leaving विशाल expanses of the राज्य nearly uninhabited और बनाना  the population the sixth most urbanized in the U.S. Utah is bordered by Colorado on the east , Wyoming on the northeast , Idaho on the north , Arizona on the south , and Nevada on the west .
It also  छू a कोने of  New Mexico on the southeast .
Utah is the most religiously  समरूप राज्य in the संघ  .
Approximately 63 % of Utahns are reported to be members of The  गिरिजाघर of यीशु मसीह of latter-day संतो or lds ( mormons  ) , which greatly influences Utah culture and daily life .
The world headquarters of The  गिरिजाघर of यीशु मसीह of latter-day  Saints ( LDS Church ) is located in Utah 's state capital .
The state is a center of  परिवहन , शिक्षा , सूचना  technology and research , government services , mining , and a major tourist destination for outdoor recreation .
According to the U.S. Census Bureau 's population estimates , Utah is the  पांचवां fastest-growing राज्य in the संयुक्त राज्य as of  2012 .
St. George , was the fastest–growing  महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the संयुक्त राज्य इससे  2000 to 2005 .
A 2012 Gallup national survey found Utah overall to  be the `` बेहतरीन राज्य to सजीव in '' आधारित  on 13 forward-looking measurements including various economic , lifestyle , and health-related outlook metrics .
Coldwater is a small  कस्बा in टेट काउंटी  , Mississippi .
It  is in the मेम्फिस  Metropolitan Area .
The population was 1,674  at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी  .
The hard palate is a  पतला आड़ा  bony plate of the skull , located in the roof of the mouth .
It spans the arch  formed by the  upper teeth .
It is  formed by the palatine प्रक्रम of the  maxilla and horizontal plate of palatine bone .
it फ़ॉर्म a विभाजन between the  nasal passages and the mouth .
Also on the anterior portion of the roof of the hard palate is the Rugae which are the irregular ridges in the mucous  झिल्ली कि सहायता सुकर the गति of खाना पीछे towards the pharynx  .
इस विभाजन is जारी  deeper into the mouth by a fleshy extension called the soft palate .
Complete set of scrolls ,  constituting the संपूर्ण tanakh  .
The Tanakh ( , or ;  भी tenakh , tenak , tanach ) is a नाम  used in Judaism for the canon of the Hebrew Bible .
the tanakh is भी ज्ञात as  the Masoretic Text or the Miqra .
The name is an acronym formed from the initial Hebrew letters of  the masoretic टेक्स्ट 's तीन परंपरागत subdivisions : the तोरा ( `` शिक्षण '' , भी  known as the Five Books of Moses ) , Nevi'im ( `` Prophets '' ) and Ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh .
The name ``  miqra '' ( מקרא ) , अर्थ `` कि जिससे is पढ़ा  '' , is an alternative Hebrew term for the Tanakh .
The  किताबे of the tanakh यहूद relayed साथ an accompanying मौखिक  tradition passed on by each generation , called the Oral Torah .
गम्भीरता नाका  in Germany
Driving under the influence ( DUI ) , driving while intoxicated ( DWI ) ,  शराबी ड्राइविंग , नशे ड्राइविंग , पेय ड्राइविंग , ऑपरेटिंग अंतर्गत the influence , पीने और ड्राइविंग , or impaired  driving is the crime of driving a motor vehicle with blood levels of alcohol in excess of a legal limit ( `` Blood Alcohol Content '' , or `` BAC '' ) .
Similar regulations  कवर ड्राइविंग or ऑपरेटिंग निश्चित प्रकार of मशीनरी जबकि प्रभावित by पीने  alcohol or taking other drugs , including , but not limited to prescription drugs .
This is a  दण्ड ठोकर in  most nations .
Convictions do not  necessarily involve वास्तविक ड्राइविंग of  the vehicle .
In most jurisdictions a measurement such as a blood alcohol content ( BAC ) in  excess of a विशिष्ट दहलीज स्तर , ऐसे as 0.05 % or 0.08 % defines  the offense , with no need to prove impairment or being under the influence of alcohol .
In some jurisdictions , there is an aggravated category of the  ठोकर at a उच्चतर स्तर e.g . 0.12 % .
In most countries , anyone who is convicted of injuring or killing someone while under the influence of alcohol or drugs can be  heavily fined , as in फ़्रांस , in जोड to होने दिए a lengthy थाना  sentence .
Some jobs have their own  नियम और bac हद , लिये उदाहरण वाणिज्यिक पायलट  , and the Federal Railroad Administration in the United States has a 0.04 % limit for train crew .
Some jurisdictions have multiple levels of BAC ;  लिये उदाहरण , the राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया रै a 0.08 % bac सीमा , जिससे is lowered to 0.04 % if the ऑपरेटर  holds a commercial driver 's license .
The California BAC  सीमा is 0.01 % लिये those younger than 21 सालो of आयु और those  on probation for a previous DUI conviction .
Some large corporations have  उनके अपना नियम ; संघ प्रशांत रेलरोड रै उनके अपना bac सीमा of 0.02 % कि , if violated दौरान a यादृच्छिक परीक्षण or  a for-cause test — for example , after a traffic accident — can result in termination of employment with no chance of future re-hire .
अनेक राज्य in the u.S. और प्रांतों in कनाडा have अपनाया सच्चाई in sentencing कानून  that enforce strict guidelines on sentencing , differing from previous practice where prison time was reduced or suspended after sentencing had been issued .
Some  jurisdictions have न्यायिक  guidelines requiring a mandatory minimum sentence .
Penalties for DUI charges range from expensive  शुल्क to forfetiruree of अपना अनुज्ञा प्लेटों और  in some serious circumstances , your vehicle .
A  नशे ड्राइविंग सिम्युलेटर  in Montréal , Canada
The specific criminal  ठोकर may be पुकारा , depending on the क्षेत्राधिकार , ड्राइविंग अंतर्गत the influence [ of दारू or अन्य दवाएँ ] ( dui ) , ड्राइविंग अंतर्गत तीव्र influence ( duii ) , ड्राइविंग जबकि intoxicated ( dwi ) , ऑपरेटिंग  under the influence ( OUI ) operating while intoxicated ( OWI ) , operating a motor vehicle while intoxicated ( OMVI ) , driving under the combined influence of alcohol and/or other drugs , driving under the influence per se or drunk in charge [ of a vehicle ] .
Many such laws apply also to motorcycling , boating , piloting aircraft ,  उपयोग of motile फार्म उपकरण ऐसे as tractors और combines , सवारी घोड़े  or driving a horse-drawn vehicle , or bicycling , possibly with different BAC level than driving .
In some jurisdictions there are separate charges depending on the vehicle used , such  as bwi ( bicycling जबकि intoxicated ) , जिससे may carry a हल्का  sentence .
In the United States , local law enforcement agencies made 1,467,300 arrests nationwide for driving under the influence of alcohol in 1996 ,  compared to 1.9 लाख ऐसे रखवाले दौरान the शिखर साल  in 1983 .
In 1997 an estimated 513,200 DWI  अपराधियों यहूद in थाना  or jail , down from 593,000 in 1990 and up from 270,100 in 1986 .
Officers from US  कस्टम और किनारा सुरक्षा बोर्डिंग a जलयान
Law enforcement in the United States is one of three  प्रमुख components of the दण्ड इंसाफ प्रणाली of  the United States , along with courts and corrections .
Although there exists an inherent interrelatedness between the different groups that make up the criminal justice system based on their crime  deterrence purpose , प्रत्येक घटक operates independently इससे एक another  .
However , the judiciary  is vested साथ the शक्ति to मेक विधिक determinations regarding  the conduct of the other two components .
Apart from maintaining order and service functions , the purpose  of policing is the  investigation of suspected criminal activity and the referral of the results of investigations and of suspected criminals to the courts .
Law enforcement , to varying degrees at different levels of government and in different agencies , is  भी commonly चार्ज साथ the जिम्मेदारियों of deterring दण्ड कार्यकलाप और of preventing the कामयाब आयोग of अपराधों in प्रगति ; the सेवा और प्रवर्तन  of warrants , writs and other orders of the courts .
Law enforcement agencies are also  शामिल in providing पहला जवाब to emergencies और अन्य खतरे to पब्लिक  safety ; the protection of certain public facilities and infrastructure ; the maintenance of public order ; the protection of public officials ; and the operation of some correctional facilities ( usually at the local level ) .
Elmer Figueroa Arce ( born June 28 , 1968 ) , best  ज्ञात अंतर्गत the स्टेज नाम chayanne , is  a Puerto Rican Latin pop singer and actor .
As a solo artist ,  chayanne रै  released 21 solo albums and sold over 15 million albums worldwide .
`` World War Hulk '' is a comic book crossover storyline that ran through a self titled  सीमित श्रेणी और विभिन्न अन्य शीर्षक प्रकाशित by आश्चर्य कॉमिक्स  in 2007 , featuring the Hulk .
The series consists of five main issues titled World War Hulk , with Greg Pak as writer and John Romita , Jr.  as penciller , और तीन अन्य सीमित श्रेणी : संसार युद्ध हल्क :  Front Line , World War Hulk : Gamma Corps , and World War Hulk : X-Men .
It  भी भागा through अनेक  other Marvel comics series .
The plot is the culmination of a series of events that began with the Hulk  होने tricked into स्पेस by the illuminati और a जीवन मॉडल decoy of उपनाम फ़्यूरी , the हल्क 's subsequent  exile seen in Planet Hulk and his imminent return to Earth to seek revenge on the Illuminati .
Marion Mitchell  मॉरिसन ( born marion रॉबर्ट मॉरिसन ; may 26 , 1907 – जून 11 , 1979 ) , बेहतर ज्ञात  by his stage name John Wayne , was an American film actor , director and producer .
An Academy Award -winner ,  वेन थी among the शीर्ष बक्सा दफ्तर draws लिये तीन  decades , and was named the all-time top money-making star .
An enduring American icon , he epitomized rugged masculinity and is famous  लिये उसके demeanor , सहित उसके distinctive शांत  voice , walk , and height .
Wayne was born in Winterset , Iowa but his family relocated to the  वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल जब he थी  four years old .
He found work at local film studios  जब he खोया उसके फ़ुटबॉल स्कॉलरशिप to यूएससी  as a result of a bodysurfing accident .
initially working लिये the फॉक्स फिल्मी निगम  , he mostly appeared in small bit parts .
His first leading role came in the widescreen  एपिक the बिग ट्रेल ( 1930 ) , जिससे led to अग्रणी भूमिकाएँ in numerous  films throughout the 1930s , many of them in the western genre .
His career rose to further heights in 1939 ,  साथ जॉन घाट 's stagecoach बनाना उसे an  instant superstar .
Wayne would go on to star in 142  तस्वीरें , primarily  typecast in Western films .
Among his best known later films are The Quiet Man ( 1952 ) , which follows him as an Irish-American boxer and his love affair with a fiery spinster played by Maureen O'Hara ; The Searchers ( 1956 ) , in which he plays a  सिविल युद्ध दिग्गज जो seeks आउट उसके abducted भांजी ; रिओ ब्रावो ( 1959 ) , playing a शेरिफ साथ डीन मार्टिन ; सच्चा grit ( 1969 ) , playing a humorous u.s . मार्शल जो सेट आउट to avenge a man 's मौत in the भूमिका कि जीती वेन an अकादमी  Award ; and The Shootist ( 1976 ) , his final screen performance in which he plays an aging gunslinger battling cancer .
Wayne moved to Orange County , California in the 1960s ,  और थी a prominent रिपब्लिकन in हॉलीवुड , supporting  anti-communist positions .
He  died of पेट कर्कट  in 1979 .
In June 1999  , the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान नामित वेन 13th  among the Greatest Male Screen Legends of All Time .
Galileo  गैलिली ( ; 15 फ़रवरी 1564 – 8 जनवरी 1642 ) , थी an इतालवी physicist , गणितज्ञ  , astronomer , and philosopher who played a major role in the Scientific Revolution .
उसके उपलब्धियाँ शामिल सुधार to the  telescope and consequent astronomical observations and support for Copernicanism .
Galileo has been called the `` father of modern observational astronomy `` , the `` father of modern physics  `` , the `` पिता of विज्ञान '' , और `` the पिता of आधुनिक  Science '' .
His contributions to observational astronomy include the telescopic confirmation of the phases of Venus , the discovery of the four largest  satellites of बृहस्पति ( नामित the galilean moons in उसके इज्ज़त ) , और the अवलोकन और विश्लेषण  of sunspots .
Galileo also worked in applied science and technology , inventing an improved  सैन्य कम्पास और अन्य यंत्र  .
Galileo 's championing of heliocentrism was controversial within his lifetime , when most  subscribed to either geocentrism  or the Tychonic system .
He met with  विपक्ष इससे खगोलशास्त्रियों , जो doubted heliocentrism  due to the absence of an observed stellar parallax .
The matter was investigated by the Roman Inquisition in 1615 , and they concluded that it  could be समर्थित as तभी a सम्भावना , नहीं an स्थापित फैक्ट  .
Galileo later defended his views in Dialogue  concerning the दो मुख्य संसार प्रणालियों , जिससे appeared to आक्रमण पोप शहरी viii और यूँ  alienated him and the Jesuits , who had both supported Galileo up until this point .
He was tried by the Inquisition , found `` vehemently suspect of heresy '' ,  मजबूर  to recant , and spent the rest of his life under house arrest .
It was while Galileo was under house arrest that he wrote one of his finest  works , दो नई sciences , in जिससे he summarised the कार्य he था किया कुछ चालीस सालो पहले , on the दो sciences अभी पुकारा  kinematics and strength of materials .
55 '' LG OLED TV showcased  at ces 2012
Prototype OLED lighting  फलक विकसित  by Lumiotec
Demonstration of a  लचीली oled यंत्र
an oled ( सशुल्क light-emitting डायोड ) is a light-emitting डायोड ( led ) in  which the emissive electroluminescent layer is a film of organic compound which emits light in response to an electric current .
This  परत of सशुल्क सेमीकंडक्टर  is situated between two electrodes .
generally , at तनिक एक  of these electrodes is transparent .
OLEDs are used to create digital displays in devices such as  टेलीविज़न screens , कंप्यूटर मॉनीटर , पोर्टेबल  systems such as mobile phones , handheld games consoles and PDAs .
A major area of research is the development of white  oled डिवाइस लिये उपयोग in solid-state lighting अनुप्रयोग  .
There are two main families  of oleds : those आधारित on छोटी अणुओं  and those employing polymers .
Adding  मोबाईल ions to an oled creates a light-emitting electrochemical  cell or LEC , which has a slightly different mode of operation .
OLED displays can use  either passive-matrix ( pmoled )  or active-matrix addressing schemes .
Active-matrix OLEDs ( AMOLED  ) आवश्यकता a thin-film ट्रांजिस्टर backplane to स्विच प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत  pixel on or off , but allow for higher resolution and larger display sizes .
An OLED display  works बगैर  a backlight .
यूँ , it can प्रदर्शक गहन ब्लैक  levels and can be thinner and lighter than a liquid crystal display ( LCD ) .
In low ambient light  शर्तें ऐसे as a अंधेरा रूम an oled स्क्रीन can achieve a  higher contrast ratio than an LCD , whether the LCD uses cold cathode fluorescent lamps or LED backlight .
A carton and a glass of eggnog from Montreal , Canada , showing its French facade ( English reverse ) and the French term  लेत de poule ( वस्तुतः , `` मुर्गी 's मिल्क '' )
Eggnog , or egg nog , is a  sweetened दुग्ध -आधारd पेय traditionally बना साथ मिल्क and/or  cream , sugar , and whipped eggs ( which gives it a frothy texture ) .
ब्रांडी , rum , व्हिस्की , bourbon , वोदका , or a संयोजन  of liquors are often added .
The finished serving is  प्रायः garnished साथ a sprinkling of  ground cinnamon or nutmeg .
It was also  ज्ञात as the अंडा मिल्क  punch .
Eggnog  is a लोकप्रिय पेय throughout the संयुक्त  States and Canada , and is usually associated with Christmas .
Eggnog may be added as a flavoring to food  or पेय ऐसे as कॉफी और चाय .
Eggnog as a custard can also be  प्रयुक्त as an बर्फ मलाई  base .
A pasty ( , ) , ( sometimes known in Britain as a Cornish pasty , and in the United States as a pastie or British pasty ) is a baked pastry , a  परंपरागत किस्में of जिससे is विशेषकर  associated with Cornwall , the westernmost county in England .
It is made by placing uncooked filling typically of meat and vegetables , without meat in vegetarian versions ,  on a चपटा पेस्ट्री वृत्त और फोल्डिंग it to रैप the भरना , crimping the  edge to form a seal .
After baking , the result is a  उठाया semicircular  comestible .
The traditional Cornish pasty ,  जिससे रै सुरक्षित भौगोलिक indication ( pgi ) औकात in यूरोपीय , is भर साथ बीफ , sliced or  diced potato , swede ( also known as a yellow turnip or rutabaga – referred to in Cornwall as turnip ) and onion , seasoned with salt and pepper , and is baked .
Today , the pasty is the food most associated with Cornwall , it is  regarded as the नेशनल डिश , और it खाते  for 6 % of the Cornish food economy .
Pasties with many different fillings are made ; some shops specialise in  selling सब sorts of pasties  .
The origins of the pasty are unclear , though there are many  सन्दर्भ to उन्हें throughout ऐतिहासिक दस्तावेज़ और fiction  .
The pasty is now  लोकप्रिय world-wide due to the स्प्रेड of cornish खनिक  , and variations can be found in Australia , the United States , Mexico and elsewhere .
The ( ortho- ) sympathetic nervous system ( SNS ) is one of three major parts of  the autonomic बेचैन प्रणाली : the अन्य होने  the enteric and parasympathetic systems .
Its general action is  to mobilize the देह 's  nervous system fight-or-flight response .
It is  , however , constantly क्रियाशील at a मौलिक  level to maintain homeostasis .
Secure Digital or ( SD ) is a  non-volatile मेमोरी कार्ड स्वरूप लिये उपयोग in  portable devices , such as mobile phones , digital cameras , GPS navigation devices , and tablet computers .
The Secure Digital standard is  कायम by the sd  Card Association ( SDA ) .
SD technologies have been implemented in  अधिक than 400 ब्रांड्स आरपार दर्जनों of उत्पाद  categories and more than 8,000 models .
The Secure Digital format includes four card  परिवारों उपलब्धियाँ in  three different form factors .
The four families are the original Standard-Capacity (  sdsc ) , the high-capacity ( sdhc ) , the extended-capacity  ( SDXC ) , and the SDIO , which combines input/output functions with data storage .
The three form factors are the original size , the  `` मिनी '' आकार , और the `` सूक्ष्म '' आकार  ( see illustration ) .
There are many  combinations of रूप कारकों और यंत्र  families .
Electrically  passive adapters allow the उपयोग  of a smaller card in a host device built to hold a larger card .
Host devices that comply with newer versions of the specification provide backward  संगतता और accept पुरानी sd ताश , लकिन इस आलेख explains अनेक कारकों कि can  prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A newer card may  प्रस्ताव वृहद  capacity than the host device can handle .
A newer card may use a file system the host  यंत्र can नहीं navigate  .
उपयोग of an sdio कार्ड requires the मेजबान  device be designed for the input/output functions the card provides .
The  संगठन of the कार्ड थी बदला  starting with the SDHC family .
Some  विक्रेता उत्पादित sdsc ताश ऊपर 1 gb पहले the sda  had standardized a method of doing so .
The SDA uses several trademarked logos to enforce  अनुपालन साथ इसके विशेषताएँ और assure  users of compatibility .
