Daniel Lawrence Whitney ( born February 17 , 1963 ) best known by his stage name and character Larry the Cable Guy , is an  अमरीकी stand-up हास्य , कर्ता , देश म्यूज़िक कलाकार , आवाज़ कर्ता ,  and former radio personality .
He was one of the members of the  ब्लू कॉलर कॉमेडी दौरे , a कॉमेडी troupe जिससे शामिल विधेयक engvall  , Ron White , and Jeff Foxworthy ( with whom he has starred on Blue Collar TV ) .
Whitney has released seven  कॉमेडी एल्बम , of जिससे तीन have  been certified gold by the RIAA for shipments of 500,000 copies .
In addition , he has starred in three Blue Collar Comedy Tour-related movies , as  खूब as in the films लैरी the केबल guy : स्वास्थ्य  Inspector , Delta Farce , and Witless Protection , as well as voicing Mater in the Cars franchise .
Whitney 's  catchphrase : `` git-r-done  ! '' is also the title of his book .
On January 26 , 2010 , the TV  चैनल इतिहास घोषित कि it थी ordering a श्रेणी अभिनीत व्हिटनी पुकारा तभी in अमेरिका साथ लैरी the  Cable Guy , in which he would explore the country and immerse himself in different lifestyles , jobs , and hobbies .
The  पहला एपीसोड of the श्रेणी aired  on February 8 , 2011 .
Vitamin D is a group of fat-soluble  secosteroids जिम्मेदार लिये intestinal अवशोषण of कैल्सियम  and phosphate .
In humans , the most important related  यौगिकों of विटामिन d हैं विटामिन d2 और विटामिन  D3 .
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) and ergocalciferol ( vitamin D2 ) are unique as they  constitute कया we जान as विटामिन d और can be ingested इससे the  diet and/or supplements .
The  देह can भी synthesize विटामिन d ( इससे कोलेस्ट्रॉल  ) when sun exposure is adequate ( hence its nickname , the `` sunshine vitamin '' ) .
Although vitamin D is commonly  पुकारा a विटामिन , it is नहीं दरअसल an अनिवार्य dietary विटामिन in the सख्त भाव , as it  can be synthesized in adequate amounts by most mammals exposed to sunlight .
( Cats  और कुत्तो can नहीं synthesize  vitamin D efficiently and must receive it in their diet . )
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of compounds ) is only scientifically called a vitamin when it can not be  synthesized in sufficient quantities by an सजीव , और जरूर be प्राप्त इससे उनके  diet .
However , as with other  यौगिकों commonly पुकारा विटामिन , विटामिन d थी खोजा  in an effort to find the dietary substance that was lacking in a disease , namely , rickets , the childhood form of osteomalacia .
Additionally , like other compounds called vitamins , in the developed world vitamin D  is added to स्टेपल भोजन , ऐसे as मिल्क , to avoid बीमारी  due to deficiency .
Measures of serum levels reflect endogenous synthesis from exposure to sunlight as well as  सेवन इससे the आहार , और it is believed कि संश्लेषण may योगदान generally to the मेंटेनेंस of पर्याप्त  serum concentrations .
The evidence indicates that the synthesis of vitamin D from sun exposure works in a feedback loop that prevents toxicity but , because of  अनिश्चितता परिचय the कर्कट रिस्क इससे धूप , no सुझाव हैं जारी by the संस्थान of आयुर्विज्ञान , यूएसए , लिये the राशि of सूर्य  exposure required to meet vitamin D requirements .
Accordingly , the Dietary Reference Intakes for  विटामिन d assume  that no synthesis occurs and that all of a person 's vitamin D is from their diet , although that will rarely occur in practice .
In the liver vitamin D is converted to calcidiol , which is also known as calcifediol ( INN ) , 25-hydroxycholecalciferol , or 25-hydroxyvitamin D—abbreviated 25 ( OH ) D ; and which is the specific vitamin D  metabolite कि is measured in सीरम  to determine a person 's vitamin D status .
Part of the calcidiol is  परिवर्तित by the गुर्दे to calcitriol , the biologically क्रियाशील रूप of विटामिन D. calcitriol circulates as a हार्मोन in the रक्त ,  regulating the concentration of calcium and phosphate in the bloodstream and promoting the healthy growth and remodeling of bone .
Calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol outside of the kidneys for other purposes , such as the proliferation ,  differentiation और apoptosis of कोशिकाएं ; calcitriol  also affects neuromuscular function and inflammation .
Beyond its use to prevent osteomalacia or rickets , the evidence for other health effects of  विटामिन d supplementation in the सामान्य जनसांख्यिकी is असंगत  .
The best evidence of benefit is for  अस्थि स्वास्थ्य और a घटी in मृत्यु  in elderly women .
Standard form of  the आवधिक तालिका  .
The colors  represent अलग श्रेणी of तत्व  explained below .
The periodic table is a tabular display of the chemical  तत्व , व्यवस्थित on the आधार of उनके परमाणु संख्याएँ , इलेक्ट्रॉन configurations  , and recurring chemical properties .
Elements are presented in order of increasing atomic  क्रमांक ( क्रमांक of protons ) .
The standard form of  तालिका comprises an 18 × 7 ग्रिड or प्रमुख देह of  elements , positioned above a smaller double row of elements .
The table can also be deconstructed into four rectangular blocks : the s-block to the left ,  the p-block to the सही , the d-block in the मध्य , और the f-block  below that .
The rows of the table are called periods ; the columns of the s- , d- , and p-blocks  हैं पुकारा समूह , साथ कुछ  of these having names such as the halogens or the noble gases .
Since , by definition , a periodic table incorporates recurring trends , any such table can be used  to derive संबंध between the गुण of the तत्व और भविष्यवाणी the गुण  of new , yet to be discovered or synthesized , elements .
As a result , a periodic table—whether in the standard form or some other variant—provides a useful framework for analyzing chemical  बर्ताव , और ऐसे टेबल हैं widely प्रयुक्त in रसायन और अन्य sciences  .
Although precursors exist ,  dmitri mendeleev is generally  credited with the publication , in 1869 , of the first widely recognized periodic table .
he विकसित उसके तालिका to illustrate आवधिक रुझान  in the properties of the then-known elements .
Mendeleev also  पूर्वानुमानित कुछ गुण of then-unknown तत्व  that would be expected to fill gaps in this table .
Most of his predictions were proved correct when  the तत्व in सवाल यहूद subsequently  discovered .
Mendeleev 's periodic table has since been expanded and refined with the discovery or synthesis of further new elements and the  विकास of नई सैद्धांतिक मॉडल to बताइये रासायनिक  behavior .
All elements from atomic numbers 1 ( hydrogen ) to 118 (  ununoctium ) have महरूम खोजा or synthesized  .
The elements from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have been found to exist  naturally , हालांकि कुछ हैं मिला तभी in ट्रेस amounts और यहूद initially  discovered by synthesis in laboratories .
The  तत्व बाद 98 have तभी  been synthesized in laboratories .
Production of elements beyond  ununoctium is होने धड़ा , साथ the  question of how the periodic table may need to be modified to accommodate any such additions being a matter of ongoing debate .
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally  occurring तत्व have भी महरूम उत्पादित in laboratories  .
Minimum wage by U.S. state and U.S.  territory ( अमरीकी समोआ , गुआम , प्यूर्टो  Rico , Virgin Islands ) , as of Jan. 1 , 2013 .
In the United States , workers are  generally हकदार to be सशुल्क no कम than the statutory  minimum wage .
The federal government mandates a nationwide minimum wage level of $ 7.25 per hour , while some  राज्य और municipalities have नियत न्यूनतम मजदूरी स्तर उच्चतर than the संघीय स्तर , साथ the उच्चतम राज्य न्यूनतम  wage being $ 9.19 per hour in Washington as of 2013 .
Among those paid by the hour  in 2012 , 1.6 लाख यहूद reported  as earning exactly the prevailing federal minimum wage .
About 2.0 million  यहूद reported as कमाई मजदूरी  below the minimum .
Together , these 3.6 million  मजदूर साथ मजदूरी at or नीचे  the minimum made up 4.7 percent of all hourly-paid workers .
A selection of Bourbons and Tennessee  whiskeys offered at a liquor स्टोर in decatur  , Georgia
Evan Williams  bourbon whiskey
Bourbon whiskey is a  प्रकार of अमरीकी whiskey – a barrel-aged  distilled spirit made primarily from corn .
The name of the spirit derives from its historical association with an area known as Old Bourbon , around  कया is अभी bourbon काउंटी , केंटकी ( जिससे , in फेरे , थी नामित बाद the फ्रेंच  House of Bourbon royal family ) .
It has been produced since  the 18th सदी  .
While it may be made anywhere in the United States , it  is strongly संबद्ध साथ the अमरीकी दक्षिण in सामान्य  , and Kentucky in particular .
The Mona Lisa ( La Gioconda or La Joconde ) is a half-length portrait of a woman by the Italian artist Leonardo da Vinci , which has been acclaimed as `` the best  ज्ञात , the सबसे visited , the सबसे लिखा परिचय , the सबसे सुंग परिचय , the सबसे parodied कार्य of आर्ट in the संसार .  ''
The painting , thought to be a  पोर्ट्रेट of लिसा gherardini , the बीवी of francesco डेल giocondo , is in आयल on a poplar फलक , और  is believed to have been painted between 1503 and 1506 .
It was acquired  by किंग फ्रांसिस i of फ़्रांस और is अभी the प्रॉपर्टी  of the French Republic , on permanent display at the Musée du Louvre in Paris since 1797 .
The ambiguity of the subject 's expression , which is frequently described as enigmatic , the monumentality of the composition , the subtle modeling of forms  और the वायुमंडलीय illusionism यहूद अनोखा qualities कि have contributed  to the continuing fascination and study of the work .
Robert  एलन पामर ( 19 जनवरी 1949 – 26  September 2003 ) , was an English singer-songwriter and musician .
He was known for his distinctive voice and the eclectic mix of  musical शैलियाँ on उसके एल्बम , combining आत्मा  , jazz , rock , pop , reggae and blues .
he मिला कामयाबी दोनो in उसके सोलो करियर  and in the musical act The Power Station , and had Top 10 songs in both the UK and the US .
His iconic music videos by Terence Donovan for the hits ``  आदी to प्रेम `` और `` बस irresistible `` प्रदर्शित identically वेश नाचना  women with pale faces , dark eye makeup and bright red lipstick , which resembled the women in the art of Patrick Nagel , an artist popular in the 1980s .
sharp-suited , उसके भागीदारी in the म्यूज़िक उद्योग  commenced in the 1960s , covered five decades and included a spell with Vinegar Joe .
Palmer received a number  of पुरस्कार throughout उसके करियर , सहित दो ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन पुरूष चट्टान गायन प्रदर्शन  , an MTV Video Music Award , and was twice nominated for the Brit Award for Best British Male .
Computed tomography angiography ( CTA ) is a computed tomography  तकनीक प्रयुक्त to visualize arterial और venous बरतन throughout  the body .
This ranges from arteries serving the brain to those bringing blood to  the फेफड़े , गुर्दे , बाहें  and legs .
The Champs-Élysées  सजा साथ  flags for Bastille Day
Horseman of the French  रिपब्लिकन गार्ड दौरान the 2007 सैन्य परेड  on the Champs-Élysées .
Prise de la Bastille by  jean-pierre-louis-laurent houel
Bastille Day is the name given in  english-speaking देशों to the फ्रेंच  National Day , which is celebrated on the 14th of July each year .
In France , it is formally  पुकारा la fête nationale ( ; the नेशनल जश्न ) और  commonly Le quatorze juillet ( ; the fourteenth of July ) .
It commemorates the 1790 Fête de la Fédération , held on the first anniversary of  the storming of the bastille on 14 जुलाई 1789 ; the वर्षगांठ of the storming of the bastille fortress-prison  was seen as a symbol of the uprising of the modern nation , and of the reconciliation of all the French inside the constitutional monarchy which preceded the First Republic , during the French Revolution .
Festivities and official ceremonies are  आयोजित सब over फ़्रांस  .
The oldest and largest regular military parade  in यूरोपीय is आयोजित on the morning of 14 जुलाई , on the champs-élysées  avenue in Paris in front of the President of the Republic , French officials and foreign guests .
The United States of America ( USA or U.S.A. ) , commonly called the United States ( US or U.S. ) or America , is a federal  गणतंत्र consisting of पचास राज्य और a संघीय ज़िला  .
The lower forty-eight contiguous states and the federal district of  वॉशिंगटन , d.C. हैं in सेंट्रल उत्तर अमेरिका between कनाडा और मैक्सिको  .
The state of Alaska is  वेस्ट of कनाडा और ईस्ट of रूस आरपार the बेरिंग जलसन्धि  , and the state of Hawaii is in the mid-North Pacific .
The country also has five  आबादी और नौ unpopulated territories  in the Pacific and the Caribbean .
At 3.79 million square miles ( 9.83  लाख km2 ) और साथ around 315 लाख लोगों , the संयुक्त राज्य is the  third- or fourth-largest country by total area and the third-largest by both land area and population .
It is one  of the संसार 's सबसे ethnically विविध और multicultural  nations , the product of large-scale immigration from many countries .
The geography and climate of the U.S. is also  अत्यधिक विविध , साथ रेगिस्तान , मैदान , वनों , और kyu कि  are home to a wide variety of species .
Paleoindians  migrated इससे एशिया to कया is अभी  the United States mainland around 15,000 years ago .
After 1500 ,  बूढ़ा संसार रोगों introduced by europeans  greatly reduced their populations .
European colonization began around 1600 and  आए ज़्यादातर इससे इंग्लैण्ड  .
The  संयुक्त राज्य उभरा इससे तेरह  British colonies located along the Atlantic seaboard .
विवादों between ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और the अमरीकी  colonies led to the American Revolution .
On July 4 , 1776 , delegates from the 13 colonies unanimously issued the  घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता , जिससे स्थापित the संयुक्त राज्य  of America .
The American Revolutionary War , which ended with the recognition of  स्वतंत्रता of the संयुक्त राज्य इससे the किंगडम of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , थी the पहला कामयाब  war of independence against a European colonial empire .
The current Constitution  थी अपनाया on सितंबर 17 , 1787 ; twenty-seven  Amendments have since been added to the Constitution .
The first ten amendments , collectively named the Bill of Rights , were ratified in 1791 and guarantee many fundamental civil  अधिकारों और freedoms  .
Driven by the doctrine of manifest  नियति , the संयुक्त  States embarked on a vigorous expansion across North America throughout the 19th century .
This involved displacing native tribes , acquiring new  territories , और धीरे  admitting new states .
The American Civil War ended  legalized गुलामी  in the United States .
by the समाप्त of the उन्नीसवीं सदी , the  United States extended into the Pacific Ocean , and its economy was the world 's largest .
The  spanish–american युद्ध और पुष्टि  the country 's status as a global military power .
The United  राज्य उभरा इससे as a वैश्विक महाशक्ति , the पहला देश  with nuclear weapons , and a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council .
The end of the Cold War and the  विच्छेद of the सोवियत  Union left the United States as the sole superpower .
The United States is a developed country and has the world 's largest national economy , with an  अनुमानित 2012 जीडीपी of $ 15.6 खरब 19 % of वैश्विक जीडीपी at purchasing-power पैरिटी  , as of 2011 .
The per capita GDP of the U.S. was the world 's sixth-highest as of 2010 , although America 's wealth  असमानता थी भी क्रमित उच्चतम  among OECD countries by the World Bank .
The economy is  fueled by an प्रचुरता of प्राकृतिक संसाधन , a well-developed अवसंरचना , और  high productivity ; and while its economy is considered post-industrial it continues to be one of the world 's largest manufacturers .
The country accounts for 39 % of global military  बिता , और is a अग्रणी आर्थिक , राजनैतिक , और सांस्कृतिक फ़ोर्स in the संसार , as खूब as a नेता in वैज्ञानिक शोध और technological  innovation .
The NCAA Men 's Division I Basketball Championship is a single-elimination tournament played each spring in the United States , currently featuring 68 college basketball teams , to determine the national championship of the  प्रमुख कॉलेज बास्केट  teams .
The tournament ,  व्यवस्थित by the नेशनल कॉलेजिएट एथलेटिक संघ ( ncaa ) , थी निर्मित  during 1939 by the National Association of Basketball Coaches , and was the idea of Ohio State University coach Harold Olsen .
Played mostly during March , it is known informally  as कूच दीवानगी or the बिग नृत्य , और रै become एक of the  most famous annual sporting events in the United States .
The NCAA has credited Bob Walsh  of the सिएटल आयोजन  Committee for starting the March Madness celebration during 1984 .
The tournament teams include champions from 31 Division I conferences (  जिससे प्राप्त स्वचालित बोलियों ) , और 37 टीमों जिससे  are awarded at-large berths .
These `` at-large '' teams are  चुनी by an ncaa चयन  committee , as detailed below .
The 64 teams are divided into four regions and  व्यवस्थित into a सिंगल विलोपन  `` bracket '' , which predetermines , when a team wins a game , which team it will face next .
Each team is ``  seeded '' , or क्रमित , भीतर  its region .
After an initial four games  between आठ lower-ranked टीमों , the टूर्नामेंट occurs  during the course of three weekends , at pre-selected neutral sites around the United States .
Lower-ranked teams are placed  in the कोष्ठक विरूद्ध उच्चतर  ranked teams .
Each weekend eliminates three-fourths of  the टीमों , इससे a गोलाकार of 64 , to a `` मीठी सोलह '' , और लिये the  last weekend of the Tournament a Final Four ; the Final Four is usually played during the first weekend of April .
These four teams , one from each  प्रदेश , तब compete in एक स्थान  for the national championship .
The tournament has  महरूम at तनिक partially televised  since 1969 .
Presently ,  the खेल हैं reported by सीबीएस , tbs  , TNT , and truTV by the trade-name NCAA March Madness .
Since 2011 , all games are  उपलब्धियाँ लिये देखने देशभर  .
as टेलीविज़न कवरेज रै grown  , so too has the tournament 's popularity .
Presently ,  लाखो of अमेरिकी  `` fill out a bracket '' , predicting winners of all 67 games .
With 11 national titles , UCLA has  the रिकार्ड लिये the सबसे ncaa मेन 's प्रभाग i बास्केट  Championships ; John Wooden coached UCLA to 10 of its 11 titles .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों of केंटकी  is second , with 8 national titles , while Indiana University and the University of North Carolina are tied for third with 5 national titles .
ड्यूक विश्वविद्यालयों बाँधने पांचवां साथ  4 national titles .
A sample of  सिंथेटिक मोटर  oil
Synthetic oil is a lubricant consisting of chemical  यौगिकों कि हैं artificially बना (  synthesized ) .
Synthetic lubricants can be manufactured using chemically  परिवर्धित पेट्रोलियम components बल्कि than पूरे crude आयल , लकिन  can also be synthesized from other raw materials .
सिंथेटिक आयल is प्रयुक्त as a स्थानापन्न लिये स्नेहक परिष्कृत इससे पेट्रोलियम जब ऑपरेटिंग in extremes of तापमान ,  because , in general , it provides superior mechanical and chemical properties than those found in traditional mineral oils .
Aircraft jet engines , for example , require the use of synthetic oils ,  whereas वायुयान पिस्टन इंजन  do not .
Jackass is an American reality series , originally shown on MTV from 2000 to 2002 , featuring people performing various dangerous , crude  self-injuring  stunts and pranks .
The show served as a launchpad for the television and acting careers of Bam Margera , Steve-O , and also Johnny Knoxville , who previously had  तभी a few  minor acting roles .
Since 2002 , three Jackass  films have महरूम उत्पादित और released by एमटीवी कॉरपोरेट  sibling Paramount Pictures , continuing the franchise after its run on television .
The show sparked several spin-offs including Viva La Bam , Wildboyz ,  homewrecker , dr. steve-o और blastazoid .
The  दिखाएँ लगाई # 68 on entertainment साप्ताहिक  `` New TV Classics '' list .
Roseanne Cherrie Barr ( born November 3 , 1952 ) is an American actress , comedienne , writer , television producer , director  , और 2012 अध्यक्षीय nominee of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया -आधारd सलाम और स्वतंत्रता  Party .
Barr began her  करियर in stand-up कॉमेडी at क्लब पहले gaining कीर्ति लिये  her role in the sitcom Roseanne .
The show was a hit and lasted nine  सीज़न , इससे 1988 to  1997 .
She won both an Emmy and a Golden Globe  पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री लिये उसके कार्य on the  show .
Barr had crafted a `` fierce working-class domestic goddess '' persona in the eight years  preceding उसके sitcom और चाही to do a यथार्थवादी दिखाएँ परिचय a  strong mother who was not a victim of patriarchal consumerism .
The granddaughter of immigrants  इससे यूरोपीय और रूस , barr थी the oldest of चार children in a working-class यहूदी नमक झील नगर परिवार ;  she was also active in the LDS Church .
In 1974 , she married Bill Pentland , with whom she had three children ,  पहले divorcing in 1990 और marrying  comedian Tom Arnold for four years .
Controversy arose when she sang `` The Star-Spangled Banner `` off-key at a 1990  nationally aired बेसबॉल खेल , followed  by grabbing her crotch and spitting .
After her  sitcom ended , वो शुभारम्भ  her own talk show , The Roseanne Show , which aired from 1998 to 2000 .
In 2005 , she returned  to stand-up कॉमेडी  with a world tour .
In 2011 , she starred in an unscripted TV show , Roseanne 's Nuts ,  कि lasted इससे जुलाई to सितंबर of  that year , about her life on a Hawaiian farm .
In early 2012 , Barr announced her  उम्मीदवारी लिये the अध्यक्षीय नामांकन  of the Green Party .
Barr lost  the नामांकन to jill  Stein .
She then  sought the अध्यक्षीय नामांकन of the सलाम  and Freedom Party , which she won on August 4 , 2012 .
Barr received 61,971 votes in the  सामान्य चुनाव , रखकर  sixth overall .
Francesco Albani 's  17th सदी बपतिस्मा of मसीह is a ठेठ चित्रण साथ the आसमान  opening and the Holy Spirit descending as a dove .
The baptism of  यीशु marks the शुरूआत  of his public ministry .
इस इवेंट is अंकित in the canonical  gospels of Matthew , Mark and Luke .
John 's gospel does not describe  यीशु ' बपतिस्मा , लकिन जॉन the बैपटिस्ट  does testify of the other things in .
In the New Testament , John the Baptist preached the baptism of repentance for the  remission of पापों ( ) , और घोषित खुद a forerunner of he कि होता baptize `` साथ the पावन भुत और साथ  fire '' ( ) .
In so doing he was  तैयारी the रास्ता लिये  Jesus .
Jesus came to the Jordan  नदी जहाँ he थी  baptized by John .
the baptismal झाँकी शामिल the आकाश खोलने , a dove-like descent of the पावन  Spirit , and a voice from heaven saying , `` This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased . ''
Most modern scholars view the fact that Jesus was baptized by John as an historical  इवेंट to जिससे a ऊँची उपाधि of certainty  can be assigned .
Along with the crucifixion of Jesus most scholars view it as one of the two historically certain  तथ्य परिचय उसे , और प्रायः उपयोग it as the starting अंक लिये the पढ़ाई of the ऐतिहासिक यीशु .
The baptism  is एक of the पाँच प्रमुख माइलस्टोन in  the gospel narrative of the life of Jesus , the others being the Transfiguration , Crucifixion , Resurrection , and Ascension .
Most Christian denominations  दृश्य the बपतिस्मा of यीशु as an महत्वपूर्ण  event and a basis for the Christian rite of baptism ( see also ) .
In Eastern Christianity , Jesus '  बपतिस्मा is commemorated on 6 जनवरी  , the feast of Epiphany .
In the Roman Catholic Church , the Anglican Communion ,  the लूथरन चर्च और कुछ अन्य पश्चिमी denominations , it is recalled on a दिन  within the following week , the feast of the baptism of the Lord .
In Roman Catholicism , the baptism of Jesus is  एक of the चमकदार रहस्यों sometimes added to  the Rosary .
It is a  trinitarian feast in the  Eastern Orthodox Churches .
Methylcobalamin  ( दिखाया ) is a रूप of  vitamin B12 .
Physically it resembles  the अन्य फ़ॉर्म of विटामिन b12 , occurring as अंधेरा रेड crystals कि freely  form cherry-colored transparent solutions in water .
Vitamin B12 , vitamin B12 or vitamin B-12 , also called cobalamin , is a water-soluble vitamin with a key  भूमिका in the सामान्य कामकाज of the दिमाग और बेचैन प्रणाली , और लिये the गठन of रक्त  .
It is one of the eight B  विटामिन  .
It is normally involved in the metabolism of every cell of the human body , especially affecting DNA synthesis  और विनियमन , लकिन  also fatty acid synthesis and energy production .
Neither fungi ,  पौधे , nor पशु हैं सक्षम  of producing vitamin B12 .
Only bacteria and archaea have the enzymes required for its synthesis , although  अनेक भोजन हैं a प्राकृतिक सोर्स of b12 क्युकी of बैक्टीरियल symbiosis  .
The vitamin is  the largest और सबसे structurally जटिल विटामिन और can be  produced industrially only through bacterial fermentation-synthesis .
Vitamin B12 consists of a class of chemically  सम्बन्धित यौगिकों ( vitamers ) , सब of जिससे have  vitamin activity .
It contains the biochemically  विरल तत्व कोबाल्ट  .
Biosynthesis of the basic structure of the vitamin  is संपन्नता तभी by जीवाणु ( जिससे प्रायः उपज hydroxocobalamin ) , लकिन परिवर्तन between  different forms of the vitamin can be accomplished in the human body .
A common semi-synthetic form of the vitamin , cyanocobalamin , does not occur in nature , but is produced from bacterial hydroxocobalamin and then used in many pharmaceuticals and supplements ,  और as a खाना योगात्मक , क्युकी of इसके स्थिरता और निम्नतर उत्पादन  cost .
In the  देह it is परिवर्तित to the इंसान physiological फ़ॉर्म methylcobalamin  and adenosylcobalamin , leaving behind the cyanide , albeit in minimal concentration .
More recently ,  hydroxocobalamin , methylcobalamin , और adenosylcobalamin can be मिला in  more expensive pharmacological products and food supplements .
The extra  यूटिलिटी of ये is  currently debated .
Vitamin B12 was discovered from its relationship to the disease pernicious anemia , which is an autoimmune  बीमारी in जिससे parietal कोशिकाएं of the पेट जिम्मेदार लिये  secreting intrinsic factor are destroyed .
Intrinsic factor is crucial for  the सामान्य अवशोषण of b12 , so a कमी of मूलभूत फ़ैक्टर ,  as seen in pernicious anemia , causes a vitamin B12 deficiency .
Many other subtler kinds of  विटामिन b12 कमियां और उनके biochemical  effects have since been elucidated .
Full Metal Jacket is a 1987 war  फिल्मी उत्पादित , निर्देशित  and co-written by Stanley Kubrick .
It is an adaptation of Gustav Hasford 's 1979 novel The Short-Timers  और सितारों मैथ्यू modine , विंसेंट d'onofrio , R. ली ermey , arliss  Howard , and Adam Baldwin .
the फिल्मी फ़ॉलो a प्लाटून of u.S. marines through  their training and the experiences of two of the platoon 's Marines in the Tet Offensive during the Vietnam War .
The film 's title refers to the  पूरा मेटल जैकेट गोली प्रयुक्त  by infantry riflemen .
The film  प्राप्त नाजुक acclaim  .
It received an Academy Award nomination for Best  adapted पटकथा लिये kubrick ,  Michael Herr and Gustav Hasford .
In 2001 , the American Film Institute  लगाई पूरा मेटल जैकेट at # 95 in उनके `` एएफआई  's 100 Years ... 100 Thrills `` poll .
TMZ  is a हस्ती न्यूज जालस्थल कि  debuted on November 8 , 2005 .
It was a collaboration between AOL and  telepictures प्रोडक्शन्स , a प्रभाग of warner  Bros. , until Time Warner divested AOL in 2009 .
However , it remained affiliated with  एओएल न्यूज और रै the एओएल न्यूज लोगो affixed in  the upper right corner .
The  नाम tmz स्टैंड लिये the ऐतिहासिक `` स्टुडियो मण्डल `` or 30-mile मण्डल दायरा  from the intersection of West Beverly Boulevard and North La Cienega Boulevard in Los Angeles .
TMZ 's  मैनेजिंग एडिटर is घनघोर levin , a lawyer-turned-journalist  who was previously a legal expert for the Los Angeles television station KCBS-TV .
The site claims that it does not pay for stories or interviews ; however , Levin has  admitted कि tmz करता `` sometimes अदा स्त्रोत लिये  leads on stories '' .
Levin has stated that `` everything is  शोधकार्य और vetted लिये सटीकता  . ''
A  साथी  TV series , TMZ on TV , debuted on September 10 , 2007 .
Scream 3 is a 2000 American slasher film created by Kevin Williamson , directed by  वेस craven और लिखा by ehren क्रूगर , अभिनीत neve कैम्पबेल , courteney कॉक्स arquette और दाउद  Arquette .
It was released on February 4 , 2000  as the तीसरा किश्त in the चीख फिल्मी  series .
The events of the story are set three years after those of Scream 2 and  फ़ॉलो sidney प्रेस्कॉट ( कैम्पबेल ) जो रै गए into self-imposed अलगाव following  the events of the previous two films but is drawn to Hollywood after a new Ghostface begins killing the cast of the film within a film `` Stab 3 '' .
Scream 3  combines the हिंसा of the slasher विधा साथ कॉमेडी और `` whodunit `` रहस्य  while satirizing the cliché of film trilogies .
Unlike the  पिछला चीख films , वहीँ थी an increased जोर on comedic तत्व और the  violence and horror was reduced in response to increased public scrutiny about violence in media following the Columbine High School massacre .
The film was the concluding chapter of the Scream series until it was revived  साथ a sequel , चीख 4 ,  in 2011 .
Williamson provided a five-page outline for two sequels to Scream when  auctioning उसके असली स्क्रिप्ट , उम्मीद to entice bidders साथ the संभावित of खरीदे  a franchise .
Williamson 's commitments to other projects meant he was unable to develop a complete script for Scream 3 and writing duties  यहूद undertaken by ehren  Kruger who discarded much of Williamson 's notes .
Craven and Marco Beltrami returned to direct  और स्कोर the फिल्मी क्रमशः as वे  had with the previous two series entries .
Production was troubled with script rewrites , with pages sometimes only ready on the  दिन of फिल्मांकन , और scheduling कठिनाइयों  with the main cast .
Scream 3 performed both financially and critically worse  than इसके preceding films , कमाई over $ 161 लाख और साथ  many critics claiming that the film had become what Scream originally `` spoofed `` .
Despite negative criticism the film did  प्राप्त तारीफ़ साथ reviewers कॉलिंग it the पूर्ण  end to the Scream trilogy .
As of 2012 , the film is  फिलहाल the क्रमांक 3 highest-grossing slasher-film in उत्तर अमेरिका  , following Scream at number 1 and Scream 2 at number 2 .
The film 's soundtrack was well-received , spending fourteen weeks on  the बिलबोर्ड 200 और reaching a ऊँची of #  32 .
कंधे impingement सिंड्रोम , भी पुकारा दुखद चाप सिंड्रोम , supraspinatus सिंड्रोम , तैराक 's कंधे  , and thrower 's shoulder , is a clinical syndrome which occurs when the tendons of the rotator cuff muscles become irritated and inflamed as they pass through the subacromial space , the passage beneath the acromion .
इस can परिणाम in पीड़ा  , weakness and loss of movement at the shoulder .
JLA was a monthly comic book published  by dc कॉमिक्स इससे जनवरी 1997 to अप्रैल 2006 featuring  the Justice League .
The colonial history of the United States covers the history of  यूरोपीय settlements इससे the प्रारंभ of colonization of अमेरिका  until their incorporation into the United States .
In the late 16th century ,  इंग्लैण्ड , फ़्रांस , स्पेन और the नीदरलैंड्स  launched major colonization programs in eastern North America .
Small early attempts—such as the English Lost Colony of Roanoke —often  disappeared ; everywhere the मौत रेट of the पहला आमद थी बहुत ऊँची  .
nevertheless कामयाब  colonies were established .
European  settlers आए इससे a किस्में of सोशल और  religious groups .
No  aristocrats settled permanently  , but a number of adventurers , soldiers , farmers , and tradesmen arrived .
Diversity was an American characteristic as the Dutch of New  netherland , the swedes और finns of नई स्वीडन , the अंग्रेज़ी quakers of पेन्सिलवेनिया , the अंग्रेज़ी puritans of नई इंग्लैण्ड  , the English settlers of Jamestown , and the `` worthy poor '' of Georgia , came to the new continent and built colonies with distinctive social , religious , political and economic styles .
Occasionally one colony took control of another ( during  युद्धों between उनके यूरोपीय अभिभावक  ) .
Only in Nova Scotia (  अभी भाग of कनाडा ) किया the conquerors  expel the previous colonists .
बजाय वे सब  lived side by side in peace .
There were no major civil wars among the 13 colonies , and the two chief armed rebellions ( in Virginia in  1676 और in नई यॉर्क in 1689–91 ) यहूद short-lived  failures .
Wars between the French and the British—the  फ्रेंच और भारतीय युद्धों और पिता rale 's युद्ध —were तूल , और शामिल  French-support for Wabanaki Confederacy attacks on the frontiers .
By 1760 France was defeated and the British  जब्त इसके colonies  .
The four distinct regions were : New England , the Middle  colonies , the chesapeake खाड़ी colonies ( अपर दक्षिण )  and the Lower South .
कुछ इतिहासकारों add a पांचवां प्रदेश , the  Frontier , which was never separately organized .
By the time European settlers arrived around 1600–1650 , the majority of the Native Americans living in the eastern United States had  महरूम decimated by नई रोगों , introduced to उन्हें  decades before by explorers and sailors .
See  समयरेखा of औपनिवेशिक अमेरिका लिये सूची of  historical events .
Gloria Laura  वेंडरबिल्ट ( born फ़रवरी 20 , 1924 ) is an अमरीकी कलाकार , लेखक  , actress , heiress , and socialite most noted as an early developer of designer blue jeans .
She is a member of the prominent  वेंडरबिल्ट परिवार of नई यॉर्क और the  mother of CNN 's Anderson Cooper .
Greece ( Romanization of  greek| ) , officially  the Hellenic Republic ( ' ) , is a country in Southeast Europe .
According to the  2011 जनसांख्यिकी  , Greece 's population is around 11 million .
Athens is the nation 's capital and largest city , its urban  क्षेत्रफल भी सहित piraeus  .
Greece is strategically located at the crossroads of Europe , Asia , the Middle East , and Africa , and has land borders with Albania  , the गणतंत्र of मकदूनिया और बुल्गारिया to the उत्तर , और तुर्कों to the पूर्वोत्तर  .
The Aegean Sea lies to the east of mainland Greece , the Ionian Sea to the  वेस्ट , और the भूमध्यसागरीय समुद्र to the  south .
Greece has the 11th longest  तटरेखा in the संसार at in लंबाई , featuring a विशाल क्रमांक of आइलैंड्स  ( approximately 1,400 , of which 227 are inhabited ) , including Crete , the Dodecanese , the Cyclades , and the Ionian Islands among others .
Eighty percent of Greece  consists of kyu , of जिससे  Mount Olympus is the highest at .
Modern Greece traces its roots to the civilization of  प्राचीन यूनानियों , generally माना  the cradle of Western civilization .
As such , it is the birthplace of democracy , Western philosophy , the Olympic Games , Western literature and historiography , political  विज्ञान , प्रमुख वैज्ञानिक और गणितीय सिद्धान्त , और पश्चिमी नाटक , सहित दोनो त्रासदी  and comedy .
This legacy is partly reflected in the seventeen UNESCO  संसार विरासत साइट स्तिथ in यूनानियों , रैंकिंग it 7th in  Europe and 13th in the world .
The  आधुनिक यूनानी  state was established in 1830 , following the Greek War of Independence .
Greece is a founding member of the United Nations , has been a member of what is now the European  संघ चूंकि 1981 ( और the eurozone चूंकि 2001 ) , और रै महरूम a सदस्य of  NATO since 1952 .
यूनानियों is a विकसित देश साथ an उन्नत , high-income अर्थव्यवस्था और बहुत ऊँची मानकों  of living , including the world 's 21st highest quality of life as of 2010 .
Greece 's economy is also the largest in  the balkans , जहाँ यूनानियों is an महत्वपूर्ण क्षेत्रीय  investor .
A prime meridian is a meridian , i.e . a line of  देशांतर , at जिससे देशांतर is पारिभाषित to be  0° .
A prime meridian and its opposite in a 360°-system , the  180th मध्याह्न ( at 180° देशांतर ) , रूप  a great circle .
This  ग्रेट वृत्त divides the गोला  , e.g . the Earth , into two hemispheres .
If one uses  दिशानिर्देश of ईस्ट और वेस्ट इससे a पारिभाषित प्रधान मध्याह्न  , then they can be called Eastern Hemisphere and Western Hemisphere .
Gerardus Mercator in his Atlas Cosmographicae ( 1595 ) uses a  प्रधान मध्याह्न कही बंद to 25°w , गुजर बस  to the west of Santa Maria Island in the Atlantic .
His 180th  मध्याह्न रनों साथ the जलसन्धि  of Anián ( Bering Strait )
A prime meridian is ultimately arbitrary , unlike an equator , which  is संकल्पित by the अक्ष of rotation—and विभिन्न  conventions have been used or advocated in different regions and throughout history .
Minka Dumont Kelly ( born Minka Dumont Dufay  ; जून 24 , 1980 ) is  an American actress .
She is perhaps best known for her roles in  चार्ली 's फ़रिश्ते  , Friday Night Lights , and The Roommate .
R.O.B . ( Robotic Operating Buddy ) , released in  जापानी as the , is an accessory लिये the निन्टेंडो  Entertainment System ( NES ) .
It was released in July 1985 in  जापानी और बाद कि साल in  North America .
It had  a छोटी उत्पाद जीवनकाल , साथ support लिये तभी दो  games which comprised the `` Robot Series '' ; Gyromite and Stack-Up .
R.O.B . was released with the intention of portraying the Nintendo  entertainment प्रणाली as कुछ अनोखा  in order to alleviate retail fears following the video game crash of 1983 .
R.O.B . was available in the Deluxe Set , a configuration for the  कंसोल कि शामिल , among अन्य बाते , r.o.b  . and Gyromite .
Stack-Up was  खरीदा separately  and included its own physical game pieces .
The Walking Liberty  हाफ डालर थी a चांदी 50-cent टुकड़ा or हाफ डालर  coin issued by the United States Mint from 1916 to 1947 ; it was designed by Adolph A. Weinman .
In 1915 , the new Mint Director , Robert W. Woolley , came to believe that he was not only allowed but required  by विधि to बदलें सिक्का डिजाइन कि था महरूम in उपयोग लिये 25 सालो  .
He therefore  began the प्रक्रम of replacing the नाई coinage : dimes , quarters और हाफ डॉलर , सब bearing समान  designs by long-time Mint Engraver Charles E. Barber , and first struck in 1892 .
Woolley had the Commission of Fine  कला conduct a प्रतियोगिता , as a परिणाम of जिससे weinman  was selected to design the dime and half dollar .
Weinman 's design of Liberty striding towards the Sun for the  हाफ डालर proved मुश्किल to पूर्ण , और राजकोष सचिव  William G. McAdoo , whose department included the Mint , considered having Barber create his own design .
Mint officials were successful in getting  weinman 's डिज़ाइन into उत्पादन , हालांकि  it never struck very well , which may have been a factor in its replacement by the Franklin half dollar beginning in 1948 .
Nevertheless , art historian Cornelius  vermeule माना the टुकड़ा to be among  the most beautiful US coins .
Since 1986 , a  परिवर्धन of weinman 's obverse डिज़ाइन रै महरूम प्रयुक्त  for the American Silver Eagle .
The Toyota 4Runner is a mid-size sport utility vehicle (  एसयूवी ) उत्पादित by the जापानी निर्माता टोयोटा और बेची throughout the संसार  from 1984 to present .
In Japan  it थी ज्ञात as  the Toyota Hilux Surf .
The original 4Runner was a compact SUV and little more than a Toyota pickup truck with a fiberglass shell over the bed , but the model has since undergone significant  स्वतंत्र विकास into a क्रॉस between a कॉम्पैक्ट और a mid-size  SUV .
All 4Runners have been built at Toyota 's Tahara plant in Tahara , Aichi , Japan  , or at hino मोटर्स ' hamura , जापानी संयंत्र , और in  Brazil .
Its mid-size crossover SUV  बंटवारा is the टोयोटा  Highlander .
This article deals with medicine as practiced by trained  पेशेवर इससे प्राचीन टाइम्स to the उपस्थित  .
the प्राचीन उन्होंने था  a system of medicine that was very advanced for its time and influenced later medical traditions .
The Egyptians and Babylonians both introduced the concepts of diagnosis ,  prognosis , और चिकित्सा परिक्षा  .
the यूनानियों गई भी  further , and advanced as well medical ethics .
the hippocratic शपथ , स्टिल लिया by  doctors today , was written in Greece in the 5th century BCE .
In  the मध्यकालीन era , सर्जिकल practices inherited इससे the प्राचीन  masters were improved and then systematized in Rogerius 's The Practice of Surgery .
विश्वविद्यालयों began व्यवस्थित प्रशिक्षण  of physicians around the years 1220 in Italy .
During the  पुनर्जागरण , समझना of anatomy improved  , and the microscope was invented .
The germ theory of  बीमारी in the 19th  century led to cures for many infectious diseases .
Military doctors advanced the  विधि of आघात  treatment and surgery .
Public health measures were developed especially in the 19th century as  the रैपिड विकास of शहरों जरूरी व्यवस्थित  sanitary measures .
Advanced research  centers खोली in the जल्दी  20th century , often connected with major hospitals .
The mid-20th century was characterized by new  biological उपचार , ऐसे as एंटीबायोटिक  .
These advancements ,  साथ साथ developments  in chemistry , genetics , and lab technology ( such as the x-ray ) led to modern medicine .
Medicine was heavily professionalized in the  20th सदी , और नई करियर खोली to महिलाओं  as nurses ( from the 1870s ) and as physicians ( especially after 1970 ) .
The 21st century is characterized by very  उन्नत शोध involving numerous फ़ील्ड  of science .
The Hippocratic Corpus ,  is a संग्रहण of जल्दी चिकित्सा works इससे प्राचीन यूनानियों strongly संबद्ध  with the ancient Greek physician Hippocrates and his teachings .
Potassium is a  रासायनिक तत्व साथ प्रतीक k ( इससे neo-latin  kalium ) and atomic number 19 .
Elemental potassium is a soft silvery-white alkali metal  कि oxidizes rapidly in एयर और is बहुत प्रतिक्रिया साथ जल , generating  sufficient heat to ignite the hydrogen emitted in the reaction and burning with a lilac flame .
Because potassium and sodium are chemically very  समान , उनके लवण यहूद नहीं  at first differentiated .
The existence of multiple elements in their salts was suspected from 1702 , and this was proven in  1807 जब पोटैशियम और सोडियम यहूद  individually isolated from different salts by electrolysis .
Potassium in nature occurs only in  ionic लवण  .
As such , it is found dissolved in seawater ( which is 0.04 %  पोटैशियम by वज़न ) , और is भाग of  many minerals .
Most industrial chemical applications of potassium employ the  अपेक्षाकृत ऊँची घुलनशीलता in जल of पोटैशियम यौगिकों  , such as potassium soaps .
Potassium metal has only a few special applications , being replaced  in सबसे रासायनिक  reactions with sodium metal .
Potassium ions are necessary for the  फलन of सब जीना  cells .
Potassium ion diffusion is a key mechanism in nerve transmission , and potassium depletion in  पशु , सहित इंसानो , परिणाम in  various cardiac dysfunctions .
Potassium  accumulates in संयंत्र कोशिकाएं , और यूँ भैस  fruits and vegetables are a good dietary source of it .
conversely , सबसे पौधे मगर  specialist halophytes are intolerant of salt , and sodium is present in them only in low concentration .
This resulted in potassium first being isolated from potash , the ashes  of पौधे , giving the  element its name .
लिये the वही कारण , भारी क्रॉप उत्पादन rapidly depletes  soils of potassium , and agricultural fertilizers consume 95 % of global potassium chemical production .
The Singapore dollar or  डालर ( चिह्न : $ ; कोड : sgd ) is the  official currency of Singapore .
It is  सामान्यतः abbreviated साथ the डालर चिह्न $ , or alternatively s $  to distinguish it from other dollar -denominated currencies .
it is विभाजित  into 100 cents .
The Monetary Authority of Singapore and the Brunei  करेंसी और मौद्रिक फलक स्टिल maintain the ऐतिहासिक  exchangeability of their two currencies , the Singaporean dollar and the Brunei dollar , respectively .
The dollar is accepted as ``  प्रथागत टेंडर  '' in Brunei according to the Currency Interchangeability Agreement .
Likewise , the Brunei dollar is customarily  स्वीकृत in सिंगापुर
James Samuel Coleman ( May 12 , 1926 – March 25 , 1995 )  थी an अमरीकी समाजशास्त्री , theorist और अनुभवजन्य शोधकर्ता , आधारित chiefly  at the University of Chicago .
He was elected president of the  अमरीकी समाजशास्त्रीय  Association .
Coleman studied  the समाजशास्त्र of शिक्षा , पब्लिक नीति , और थी  one of the earliest users of the term `` social capital `` .
His Foundations of  सोशल सिद्धान्त बहकावे समाजशास्त्रीय  theory .
His The Adolescent Society ( 1961 ) and `` Coleman Report '' ( Equality of Educational  अवसर , 1966 ) यहूद दो of the सबसे heavily cited किताबे in शैक्षणिक समाजशास्त्र  .
The  लैंडमार्क कोलमैन रपट helped रूपांतरण शैक्षणिक सिद्धान्त , reshape नेशनल शिक्षा  policies , and influenced public and scholarly opinion regarding the role of schooling in determining equality and productivity in the United States .
Superman ( from DC comics  ) थी the पहला सुपरहीरो  created , art by Jim Lee .
A superhero ( sometimes rendered super-hero or super  नायिका ) is a प्रकार of भण्डार अक्षर possessing  `` extraordinary or superhuman powers '' and dedicated to protecting the public .
Since the debut of the prototypical superhero  सुपरमैन in 1938 , कहानियां of superheroes—ranging इससे ब्रैड episodic adventures to continuing  years-long sagas—have dominated American comic books and crossed over into other media .
The word itself  तिथियाँ to at तनिक  1917 .
A female superhero is sometimes called a superheroine (  भी rendered super-heroine  or super heroine ) .
`` SUPER HEROES '' is  a ट्रेडमार्क co-owned by dc कॉमिक्स और  Marvel Comics .
By most definitions , characters do not strictly require actual superhuman powers to be deemed superheroes , although terms such as costumed crime  सेनानी or नकाबपोश vigilantes हैं sometimes प्रयुक्त to refer to those ऐसे as बैटमैन और ग्रीन तीर बगैर ऐसे  powers who share other common superhero traits .
Such characters were  generally referred to as `` रहस्य मेन '' in the so-called सुनहरी  Age of Comic Books to distinguish them from characters with super-powers .
Normally , superheroes use their powers to counter  day-to-day अपराधों जबकि भी combating खतरे विरूद्ध मानवता by supervillains  , their criminal counterparts .
Often , one of these  supervillains होगा be the सुपरहीरो  's archenemy .
As  खूब , कुछ longrunning superheroes  , such as Superman , Batman , Spider-Man and Iron Man each has a rogues gallery of enemies .
As well , superheroes sometimes will combat such irregular threats  as एलियंस , magical/ काल्पनिक  entities , American war enemies such as nazism or communism , and godlike or demonic creatures .

The  shawshank मोचन is a 1994 अमरीकी  drama film written and directed by Frank Darabont and starring Tim Robbins and Morgan Freeman .
Adapted from the Stephen King novella Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption , the film tells the story of Andy Dufresne , a  बैंकर जो खर्च nearly दो दशकों in shawshank राज्य थाना लिये  the murder of his wife and her lover despite his claims of innocence .
During his time at the prison , he befriends a fellow inmate , Ellis Boyd `` Red ''  redding , और पाता खुद सुरक्षित by the गार्ड बाद the वार्डन begins using उसे in उसके  money laundering operation .
Despite a lukewarm box office reception that barely recouped its budget , the film  प्राप्त अनुकूल समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों , अनेक पुरस्कार nominations  , and has since enjoyed a remarkable life on cable television , VHS , DVD , and Blu-ray .
It was included in the American Film Institute 's 100 Years ... 100 Movies  10th वर्षगांठ  Edition .
IT  प्रबन्धन is the अनुशासन whereby सब  of the technology resources of a firm are managed in accordance with its needs and priorities .
These resources may  शामिल ठोस निवेश जैसे कंप्यूटर हार्डवेयर  , software , data , networks and data centre facilities , as well as the staffs who are hired to maintain them .
मैनेजिंग इस जिम्मेदारी भीतर a कम्पनी entails अनेक of the मौलिक प्रबन्धन कृत्यों , जैसे budgeting  , staffing , and organizing and controlling , along with other aspects that are unique to technology , like change management , software design , network planning , tech support etc .
The Penitentiary of New Mexico Prison Riot , which took place on February 2 and 3 , 1980 , in the state 's maximum  सुरक्षा थाना दक्षिण of सांता fe , थी एक of the सबसे हिंसक थाना दंगे in the इतिहास of the अमरीकी correctional  system : 33 inmates died and more than 200 inmates were treated for injuries .
None of the 12 officers taken hostage were killed ,  लकिन सात यहूद treated लिये चोटों caused by beatings  and rapes .
इस थी the तीसरा प्रमुख riot at  the NM State Penitentiary , the first occurring on 19 July 1922 and the second on 15 June 1953 .
Author Roger Morris suggests the death toll may have been higher , as a number  of लाशें यहूद incinerated or dismembered दौरान the  course of the mayhem .
`` Red Cardinal ''  redirects यहाँ  .
For the plant Erythrina  herbacea , देखिए मूँगा  Bean .
The Northern Cardinal ( Cardinalis cardinalis ) is a North  अमरीकी बर्ड in the genus cardinalis ; it is भी ज्ञात colloquially  as the redbird or common cardinal .
It  can be मिला in दक्षिणी कनाडा , through the  eastern United States from Maine to Texas and south through Mexico .
It is found in woodlands ,  gardens , shrublands , और  swamps .
The Northern  कार्डिनल is a mid-sized songbird साथ  a body length of 21 centimeters ( 8.3 inches ) .
It  रै a distinctive crest on the  head and a mask on the face which is black in the male and gray in the female .
The male is a vibrant red , while the female  is a फीकी red-brown शेड  .
The Northern Cardinal is mainly  granivorous , लकिन भी फ़ीड्स on कीट  and fruit .
The male behaves territorially ,  अंकन आउट उसके territory साथ  song .
दौरान प्रेमालाप  , the male feeds seed to the female beak-to-beak .
A clutch of three to four eggs is  रखी , और दो to चार चंगुल  are produced each year .
It was once prized as  a पालतु , लकिन इसके बिक्री as पिंजरा पक्षियों is  now banned in the United States by the Migratory Bird Treaty Act of 1918 .
Surface runoff , also  पुकारा nonpoint सोर्स प्रदूषण , इससे a फार्म  field in Iowa during a rain storm .
Topsoil as well as farm fertilizers and other potential pollutants run  बंद unprotected फार्म फ़ील्ड जब भारी  rains occur .
Topsoil is the  अपर , outermost परत of  soil , usually the top to .
It has the highest concentration of organic matter and  microorganisms और is जहाँ सबसे of the धरती 's biological  soil activity occurs .
Musical  cryptogram : `` aschbeg '' नियत in schoenberg 's sechs  kleine Klavierstücke , Op . 19 , no . 1 , m. 5 .
Note that the  टीप do नहीं आइये in स्पेलिंग  order but are all adjacent ( not separated by other notes ) .
Sechs kleine Klavierstücke , Op . 19 ( or Six Little Piano Pieces  ) is a नियत of टुकड़े लिये सोलो पियानो लिखा  by the Austrian composer Arnold Schoenberg , published in 1913 .
McAfee ,  inc. ( ) is an अमरीकी वैश्विक कंप्यूटर सुरक्षा तन्त्र कम्पनी headquartered  in Santa Clara , California , and the world 's largest dedicated security technology company .
As  of फ़रवरी  28 , 2011 , McAfee is a wholly owned subsidiary of Intel .
McAfee 's competitors in the antivirus  उद्योग हैं avira  , BitDefender , BullGuard , F-Secure , Frisk , Kaspersky , Symantec , and Trend Micro to name a few .
Saint Rita of Cascia ( Born Margherita Lotti 1381 - May 22 ,  1457 ) थी an इतालवी augustinian नन , विधवा और संत venerated  in the Roman Catholic Church .
Rita was married  at an जल्दी  age .
The marriage lasted for 18 years , during which she is  remembered लिये उसके ईसाई मान as a  model wife and mother who made efforts to convert her husband from his abusive behavior .
Upon the murder of her husband  by another feuding परिवार , वो  sought to dissuade her sons from revenge .
She subsequently joined an Augustinian community of religious sisters , where she was known for practicing  mortification of the flesh , साथ साथ the apparent efficacy  of her prayers .
St. Rita is venerated due to various  चमत्कार attributed to उसके सिफ़ारिश , और is प्रायः portrayed साथ a bleeding घाव on उसके माथे , जिससे the रोमन कैथोलिक  Church claims to have been a partial stigmata .
The Roman Catholic Church , under the pontificate of Pope  leo xiii officially canonized रीता on may 24 , 1900  , while her feast day is celebrated every May 22 .
in अनेक परहेज़गारों कैथोलिक देशों  , Rita is known to be a patroness for abused wives and mourning women .
North America is a continent wholly  भीतर the उत्तरी गोलार्ध और लगभग  wholly within the Western Hemisphere .
It is also considered a northern  उपमहाद्वीप of the americas  .
It is bordered to the north by the Arctic Ocean , to the east by  the अटलांटिक समंदर , to the वेस्ट और दक्षिण by the प्रशांत समंदर ,  and to the southeast by South America and the Caribbean Sea .
North America covers an area of about 24,709,000 square kilometers (  9,540,000 वर्गाकार मील ) , परिचय  4.8 % of the planet 's surface or about 16.5 % of its land area .
As of July 2008 , its population was estimated at nearly 529  लाख लोगों आरपार 23 स्वतंत्र राज्य  , representing about 7.5 % of the human population .
North America is the third-largest continent in area  , following एशिया और  Africa , and the fourth in population after Asia , Africa , and Europe .
The first  लोगों to सजीव in उत्तर अमेरिका यहूद paleoindians जो  began to arrive during the last glacial period by crossing the Bering land bridge .
They differentiated into a  क्रमांक of विविध संस्कृतियों  and communities across the continent .
The largest  और सबसे उन्नत pre-columbian सभ्यताओं in उत्तर अमेरिका  were the Aztecs in what is now Mexico and the Mayans in Central America .
European colonists began to arrive starting in the 16th and 17th centuries , wiping out large  संख्याएँ of the देशी populations और शुरूआत an era of  European dominance .
Jermaine Lamarr  कोल ( born जनवरी 28  , 1985 ) , better known by his stage name J. Cole , is an American hip-hop recording artist and record producer from Fayetteville , North Carolina .
In 2009 , he  became the पहला कलाकार to चिह्न to jay-z  's Roc Nation label .
His long-awaited debut album , entitled Cole World : The  sideline स्टोरी , थी released on सितंबर  27 , 2011 .
the एल्बम debuted at क्रमांक एक on the us बिलबोर्ड  200 , Top R & B Albums and Top Rap Albums chart , selling more than 218,000 in its first week .
He  प्राप्त a नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन नई  Artist at the 54th Grammy Awards .
The two main characters of the series ,  ratchet ( सही ) और  Clank ( left ) .
Ratchet & Clank is a series of  मंच वीडियो खेल  .
The franchise was created and developed by Insomniac Games and published by Sony Computer Entertainment for many different PlayStation consoles  , ऐसे as प्लेस्टेशन 2 और प्लेस्टेशन 3 साथ the exclusion of आकार matters और रहस्य एजेंट clank , जिससे यहूद विकसित by ऊँची प्रभाव खेल लिये  the PlayStation Portable .
Every game in the series has been released for every console , as the IP  is स्वामित्व by सोनी कंप्यूटर entertainment  .
An animated feature film  अनुकूलन उत्पादित by rainmaker  Entertainment and Blockade Entertainment is scheduled for a theatrical release sometime in 2015 .
The games take place in a science fiction setting and follow the adventures of  ratchet ( an animalistic human-like अक्षर ज्ञात as a lombax , जो is a मैकेनिक ) और clank ( a diminutive , sentient रोबोट ) as वे सफर through  the universe , saving it from evil forces on a regular basis .
The series is noted for the inclusion of many exotic and unique , over the  शीर्ष हथियार और डिवाइस , a अवधारणा कि insomniac खेल  also expanded into their other games .
A will or testament is a legal declaration by which a person  , the testator , names एक or अधिक व्यक्तियों to मैनेज his/her एस्टेट और provides  for the transfer of his property at death .
For the devolution  of प्रॉपर्टी नहीं disposed of by होगा , देखिए उत्तराधिकार  and intestacy .
In the strictest sense , a `` will '' has historically been limited to real property while `` testament '' applies only to dispositions of personal property ( thus giving rise to the popular  शीर्षक of the दस्तावेज़ as `` पिछला होगा और वसीयत '' ) , हालांकि इस भेद is seldom  observed today .
A will may also create a testamentary trust  कि is प्रभावी तभी बाद  the death of the testator .
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar plant in Spain features 15 hours of storage and can  सप्लाई शक्ति 24 घंटों a  day .
Solar energy , radiant light and heat from the sun , has been  harnessed by इंसानो चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स using a  range of ever-evolving technologies .
Solar energy technologies include solar heating , solar photovoltaics , solar thermal electricity , solar architecture and  कृत्रिम photosynthesis , जिससे can मेक considerable  contributions to solving some of the most urgent energy problems the world now faces .
Solar technologies are broadly characterized  as either passive सौर or क्रियाशील सौर depending  on the way they capture , convert and distribute solar energy .
Active  सौर तकनीकों शामिल the उपयोग of photovoltaic panels  and solar thermal collectors to harness the energy .
Passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun , selecting materials with favorable thermal mass or light dispersing properties ,  और डिजाइनिंग स्पेसेस कि  naturally circulate air .
In 2011 , the International Energy Agency said that `` the  विकास of सस्ती , inexhaustible और साफ सौर  energy technologies will have huge longer-term benefits .
It will increase countries’  उर्जा सुरक्षा through रिलायंस on an स्वदेशी , inexhaustible  and mostly import-independent resource , enhance sustainability , reduce pollution , lower the costs of mitigating climate change , and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise .
These  लाभ  are global .
Hence the additional costs of the incentives for early deployment  चाहिए be माना सीखना निवेश ; वे जरूर be बुद्धिमानी खर्च और  need to be widely shared '' .
Sir Thomas More ( ; 7 February 14786 July 1535 ) , known to Roman Catholics as Saint Thomas More since 1935 , was an English lawyer ,  सोशल पारस , लेखक , statesman  , and noted Renaissance humanist .
he थी an महत्वपूर्ण पार्षद to हेनरी viii of  England and was Lord Chancellor from October 1529 to 16 May 1532 .
He was  canonized by पोप पायस xi  in 1935 as one of the early martyrs of the schism that separated the Church of England from Rome in the 16th century .
In  2000 , पोप जॉन पॉल ii घोषित  him patron of Catholic statesmen and politicians .
More was an opponent of the Protestant Reformation , in particular of  मार्टिन लूथर और विलियम टिंडेल  .
However  , चूंकि 1980 , he is भी commemorated by the गिरिजाघर  of England as a reformation martyr .
More coined the word `` utopia `` – a name he gave to the ideal and imaginary island nation ,  the राजनैतिक प्रणाली of जिससे he वर्णित in यूटोपिया , प्रकाशित in  1516 .
He opposed the  किंग 's विरह इससे the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर और refused  to accept him as Supreme Head of the Church of England , a title which had been given by parliament through the Act of Supremacy of 1534 .
He  थी imprisoned in 1534 लिये उसके refusal to लो the शपथ जरूरी by the पहला  Succession Act , because the act disparaged Papal Authority and Henry’s marriage to Catherine of Aragon .
In 1535 ,  he थी आजमाया लिये देशद्रोह ,  convicted on perjured testimony , and beheaded .
More also  helped to originate the phrase `` grasp at लोभी '' to औसत  `` desperately trying even useless things '' , in his Dialogue of Comfort Against Tribulation .
Intellectuals  और कूटनीतिज्ञों आरपार  Europe were stunned by More 's execution .
Erasmus saluted him as one `` whose  आत्मा थी अधिक pure than कोई हिम , जिनकी  genius was such that England never had and never again will have its like '' .
There was a more  विवादास्पद पक्ष to अधिक 's जीवन , क्युकी  he advocated the persecution and execution of Protestants who refused to recant their faith .
However , the judgement of history has been  largely willing to forgive इस in लाइट of the टाइम्स he  lived in and his martyrdom in the Roman Catholic cause .
Two centuries later Jonathan Swift said More was `` the person of the  महानतम पुण्य इस किंगडम कभी उत्पादित '' , a भावना साथ  which Samuel Johnson agreed .
Historian Hugh  trevor-roper कहा in 1977 कि अधिक थी `` the  first great Englishman whom we feel that we know , the most saintly of humanists , the most human of saints , the universal man of our cool northern renaissance . ''
Captain Nemo , also known as Prince Dakkar  , is a fictional अक्षर invented by the फ्रेंच विज्ञान  fiction author Jules Verne .
Nemo appears in two of Verne 's novels , Twenty Thousand  लीग अंतर्गत the समुद्र ( 1870 ) और the रहस्यमय द्वीप ( 1874 ) , और makes a कैमियो रूप  in Verne 's play Journey Through the Impossible ( 1882 ) .
Nemo , one of the most  प्रसिद्ध antiheroes in fiction , is a रहस्यमय  figure .
The son of an Indian Raja , he is a scientific genius who roams the depths of the sea in his submarine , the Nautilus ,  जिससे थी निर्मित on a उजाड़  island .
Nemo tries to project a stern , controlled confidence , but he is driven by a thirst for vengeance and  a द्वेष of साम्राज्यवाद ( विशेषकर the  British Empire ) .
He is also wracked by remorse over the deaths of his crew members and even  by the मौतों of दुश्मन sailors  .
Nemo has appeared in  विभिन्न adaptations of वर्न 's novels , सहित  films , where he has been portrayed by a number of different actors .
he रै furthermore महरूम अपनाया by अन्य लेखक लिये समावेश in उनके novels , सबसे notably in  Alan Moore 's The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen and Philip José Farmer 's The Other Log of Phileas Fogg .
