Mrs. Claus is the wife of Santa Claus , the  क्रिसमस gift-bringer in उत्तर अमरीकी  and European Christmas tradition .
She  is ज्ञात लिये बनाना कुकीज़ साथ the elves  and preparing toys with her husband Santa Claus .
Her first name is a mystery ,  हालांकि वो रै महरूम referred to as मरियम , जेसिका  , Layla , Annette , Heidi , or Martha .
HijackThis ( also HiJackThis or  hjt ) is an खोलें सोर्स enumerating औजार लिये microsoft खिड़कियाँ  originally created by Merijn Bellekom , and later sold to Trend Micro .
The program is notable for targeting browser-hijacking methods , rather  than relying on a डेटाबेस of  known spyware .
It scans a user 's computer quickly , and  प्रदर्शक ब्राउजर hijacking स्थितियाँ  , showing what entries are there .
HijackThis is used primarily for diagnosis of browser hijacking , as uninformed use of its  हटाना सुविधाएं can कारण significant तन्त्र क्षति to a कंप्यूटर  .
HijackThis does not remove or detect spyware ;  it सूचियाँ सबसे आम स्थितियाँ  where browser hijacking activity can occur .
Browser hijacking  can कारण मैलवेयर to  be installed on a computer .
On  फ़रवरी 16 , 2012 , ट्रेंड सूक्ष्म released the hijackthis सोर्स  code as open source and it is now available on the SourceForge site .
Saddle Creek  रिकॉर्ड is an अमरीकी रिकार्ड लेबल  based in Omaha , Nebraska .
प्रारंभ as a कॉलेज क्लास प्रोजेक्ट on उद्यमिता  , the label was founded by Mike Mogis and Justin Oberst in 1993 ( as Lumberjack Records ) .
Mogis soon  turned over उसके भूमिका  in the company to Robb Nansel .
The label is named after Saddle Creek Road , a street that cuts through the east side of midtown Omaha , and the beginnings of a scene whose members included Conor Oberst ( then a solo artist , currently of Bright Eyes , Conor Oberst and the Mystic  घाटी बैंड , desaparecidos और राक्षस of लोक ) , टिम kasher ( तब of slowdown वर्जिनिया , फिलहाल of कर्सिव  and The Good Life ) , and others .
Collectively , they were known  unofficially as the `` creekers  '' .
काठी क्रीक पहला appeared in छपाई on  a show flyer , offering to `` Spend an evening with Saddle Creek '' ( later to be the title of the label 's DVD . )
Saddle Creek became an  incorporated एंटिटी as a परिणाम of a क्लास  project on entrepreneurship .
वितरण is संभाला by the वैकल्पिक  Distribution Alliance , which is under the Warner Music Group umbrella .
Saddle Creek Records continues to be the flagship label of a style of music called `` The Omaha Sound ``  , characterized by a पतला  country twang .
This is  increasingly inaccurate , हालांकि , साथ the वृद्धि of अधिक इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  sounds such as those favored by The Faint and Broken Spindles .
The eclectic sounds of Saddle Creek 's  disparate सदस्य bands is somewhat समझाया by उनके  history ; a number of the original members of the label attended grade school together .
A `` sister label '' , of  sorts , to काठी क्रीक is टोली प्रेम  , started by Conor Oberst in 2004 .
The label opened arms to their first  bands नहीं आधारित in ओमाहा in 2001 साथ रिलीज by अभी it 's ओवरहेड और sorry  About Dresden .
Other non-Nebraskan artists followed , including Los Angeles 's Rilo Kiley , Eric Bachmann ( formerly leader of Archers of Loaf and Crooked Fingers from North  कैरोलिना ) , georgie जेम्स ( वॉशिंगटन d.C. ) , दो gallants ( सैन फ्रांसिस्को ) , और सबसे recently टोकियो  Police Club ( Toronto ) .
In 2005 , Spend an  संध्या साथ काठी क्रीक  , a documentary detailing the first ten years of the record label 's history , was released .
The DVD features extensive  साक्षात्कार साथ the काठी क्रीक bands  , archival footage , and rare live performances .
On June 8 ,  2007 , the लेबल खोली उनके अपना म्यूज़िक  venue named Slowdown ( after the group Slowdown Virginia ) , located in downtown Omaha , Nebraska .
The following is a list of episodes for the  टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ  Full House .
In total , there  यहूद 192 एपीसोड फिल्माया लिये the  show over the course of its eight seasons , from 1987 to 1995 .
Full House is a situation comedy which  क्रॉनिकल्स a विधवा पिता 's struggles of उठाने  his three young daughters and the lives that they have touched .
The patriarch of the family , Danny ( Bob Saget ) , invites his brother-in-law Jesse ( John Stamos ) and his best friend Joey ( Dave Coulier ) , to help raise  उसके children ( candace cameron , jodie sweetin , और मरियम kate/ashley olsen ) , बाद उसके बीवी थी मारे  during an automobile accident involving a drunk driver .
After episodes 88 and 89 , Jesse marries  बेकी ( लोरी loughlin ) , और वे  move into the attic .
Then , after episodes 104 and 105 , Becky and Jesse have twin  लड़कों नामित nicky और एलेक्स ( डेनियल और केविन renteria/blake  and Dylan Tuomy-Wilhoit ) .
The  श्रेणी ends साथ एपीसोड 192 , `` मिशेल यात्राएँ again  Part 2 '' , when Michelle loses her memory and the family tries to restore it .
Notice of Stamp  अधिनियम of 1765  in Newspaper
American newspapers reacted to the Stamp Act  साथ गुस्सा और पूर्वानुमान  of the demise of journalism .
The Stamp Act 1765 ( short title Duties in American Colonies Act 1765  ; 5 जार्ज iii , c. 12 ) imposed a सीधा कर by the अंग्रेजों पार्लियामेंट specifically on the colonies of अंग्रेजों अमेरिका , और it जरूरी कि अनेक मुद्रित सामग्री in the  colonies be produced on stamped paper produced in London , carrying an embossed revenue stamp .
ये मुद्रित सामग्री यहूद विधिक दस्तावेज़ , मैगज़ीन , अखबारों और अनेक  other types of paper used throughout the colonies .
Like previous taxes , the stamp tax had to be  सशुल्क in मान्य अंग्रेजों करेंसी , नहीं in औपनिवेशिक पेपर  money .
The purpose of the tax was to help pay for troops  stationed in उत्तर  America after the British victory in the Seven Years ' War .
The British  सरकारी लगा कि the colonies यहूद the प्राथमिक  beneficiaries of this military presence , and should pay at least a portion of the expense .
The Stamp Act  मिले ग्रेट प्रतिरोध  in the colonies .
The colonies sent no representatives to Parliament , and therefore had no influence over  कया कर यहूद उठाया  , how they were levied , or how they would be spent .
Many  colonists माना it a उल्लंघन of उनके अधिकारों as अंग्रेजो to be taxed  without their consent —consent that only the colonial legislatures could grant .
Colonial assemblies sent  याचिकाएं और विरोध  .
The Stamp Act Congress held in New York City ,  reflecting the पहला significant संयुक्त औपनिवेशिक जवाब to कोई अंग्रेजों माप ,  also petitioned Parliament and the King .
Local protest groups , led by colonial merchants and landowners , established connections through correspondence that created  a ढीला गठबन्धन कि विस्तारित इससे  New England to Georgia .
Protests and demonstrations initiated by the Sons of Liberty often turned  हिंसक और destructive as the  masses became involved .
Very soon all stamp tax distributors were intimidated into  resigning उनके आयोग  , and the tax was never effectively collected .
Opposition to the Stamp  अधिनियम थी नहीं सीमित to the  colonies .
British merchants and manufacturers , whose exports to the colonies were threatened by colonial economic problems  exacerbated by the कर  , also pressured Parliament .
The Act was repealed on  कूच 18 , 1766 as a पदार्थ of expedience , लकिन पार्लियामेंट affirmed इसके शक्ति to legislate लिये the colonies  “in all cases whatsoever” by also passing the Declaratory Act .
There  followed a श्रेणी of नई कर और regulations , likewise  opposed by the colonists .
The episode played a major role in defining the  grievances और enabling the व्यवस्थित औपनिवेशिक  resistance that led to the American Revolution in 1775 .
pt-105 underway  .
PT boats were a variety of torpedo-armed fast  आक्रमण शिल्प प्रयुक्त by the संयुक्त राज्य नेवी in संसार युद्ध ii to आक्रमण  larger surface ships .
`` PT '' is  the  US hull classification symbol for `` Patrol Torpedo '' .
The PT boat  squadrons यहूद nicknamed ``  the mosquito fleet '' .
the जापानी पुकारा  them `` Devil Boats '' .
The original pre– World War I torpedo  नौकाएँ यहूद designed साथ `` विस्थापन  '' hulls .
They  विस्थापित up to  300 tons and the top speed was .
The PT  नौकाएँ प्रयुक्त in संसार युद्ध ii यहूद निर्मित  using the planing -type hull form developed for racing boats .
They were much smaller ( 30–75 tons  ) और तेज़ ( 35–40  knots ) .
दोनो प्रकार यहूद designed to स्ट्राइक at larger warships साथ torpedoes  , using relatively high speed to get close , and small size to avoid being spotted and hit by gunfire .
They were  much कम महंगी than  large warships .
PT boats were  much तेज़ , छोटी , और सस्ता than conventional ( विस्थापन  hull ) vessels .
दौरान संसार युद्ध ii , अमरीकी pt नौकाएँ सगाई दुश्मन destroyers और  numerous other surface craft , ranging from small boats to large supply ships .
PT boats also operated as gunboats against enemy small craft , such as armored barges used by the Japanese forces  लिये inter-island हस्तांतरण .
Good Friday is a religious holiday observed primarily by  ईसाइयों commemorating the crucifixion of यीशु  Christ and his death at Calvary .
The holiday is observed during  पावन सप्ताह as भाग of the paschal  Triduum on the Friday preceding Easter Sunday , and may coincide with the Jewish observance of Passover .
It is also known as Holy Friday , Great Friday , Black Friday , or Easter Friday ,  हालांकि the latter properly refers to the शुक्रवार  in Easter week .
Based on the details of the  canonical gospels , the crucifixion of यीशु थी सबसे  likely to have been on a Friday ( the day before the Sabbath ) ( ) .
The estimated year of the Crucifixion is AD 33 , by two different groups , and originally as AD 34 by Isaac Newton via the differences between the Biblical and Julian  पंचांग और the crescent of the चंद्रमा  .
A third  विधि , using a completely अलग खगोलीय दृष्टिकोण  based on a lunar Crucifixion darkness and eclipse model ( consistent with Apostle Peter 's reference to a `` moon of blood '' in Acts 2:20 ) , points to Friday , 3 April AD 33 .
The Great Basin is the  largest क्षेत्रफल of endorheic watersheds in  North America .
It is noted for both its arid conditions and its Basin and range topography that varies from the North American low point at Badwater Basin to the highest point of the contiguous United States  , कम than दूर at the समिट of माउंट व्हिटनी  .
The region spans  अनेक physiographic विभाजन ,  biomes / ecoregions , and deserts .
Raster  may refer to:
Raster graphics ,  आलेखीय तकनीकों using arrays  of pixel values
Raster graphics editor , a  कंप्यूटर कार्यक्रम
Raster scan , the pattern of image readout , transmission ,  भंडार , और पुनर्निर्माण in टेलीविज़न  and computer images
Rasterisation , or rasterization ,  परिवर्तन of a वेक्टर चित्र to  a raster image
Raster image  प्रोसेसर , or rip , a घटक  of a printing system that performs rasterisation
Raster interrupt  , a कंप्यूटर  interrupt signal
रास्टर to वेक्टर  , an image conversion process
रास्टर बार , an प्रभाव प्रयुक्त  in computer demos
Raster-Noton , a  रिकार्ड लेबल
Rastrum , a device used  in मध्यकालीन म्यूज़िक पांडुलिपियों  to draw staff lines
Raster  दस्तावेज़ ऑब्जेक्ट  , a file format
Beowulf ( ; Old English : ) is a legendary Geatish hero and later turned  किंग in the एपिक कविता नामित बाद उसे , एक of the oldest surviving  pieces of literature in the English language .
The attack on  पर्ल हार्बर ( पुकारा हवाई आपरेशन or आपरेशन ai by the जापानी इम्पीरियल सामान्य मुख्यालय ( आपरेशन z in नियोजन ) और  the Battle of Pearl Harbor ) was a surprise military strike conducted by the Imperial Japanese Navy against the United States naval base at Pearl Harbor , Hawaii , on the morning of December 7 , 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ) .
From the  standpoint of the defenders ,  the attack commenced at 7:48 a.m. Hawaiian Time .
The attack was intended as a preventive action in order to keep the U.S. Pacific Fleet from interfering with military actions the Empire of Japan  थी नियोजन in southeast एशिया विरूद्ध विदेशी territories of the संयुक्त किंगडम  , the Netherlands , and the United States .
The base was attacked by 353 Japanese  सेनानी , बमवर्षक और  torpedo planes in two waves , launched from six aircraft carriers .
All eight U.S. Navy battleships were  क्षतिग्रस्त , साथ चार  being sunk .
Two of  ये यहूद बाद उठाया , और साथ the  remaining four repaired , six battleships returned to service later in the war .
The Japanese also sank or damaged three cruisers , three destroyers , an  anti-aircraft प्रशिक्षण जलयान , और एक minelayer  .
188  u.S. वायुयान  were destroyed ; 2,402 Americans were killed and 1,282 wounded .
Important base installations such as the power station , shipyard , maintenance , and fuel and torpedo storage  सुविधाएं , as खूब as the पनडुब्बी पियर और मुख्यालय भवन ( भी घर of the प्रज्ञा खण्ड ) यहूद नहीं  attacked .
Japanese losses were light : 29  वायुयान और पाँच midget submarines खोया , और  65 servicemen killed or wounded .
One Japanese sailor was  captured  .
the आक्रमण आए as a profound शॉक to the अमरीकी लोगों  and led directly to the American entry into World War II in both the Pacific and European theaters .
The following day (  दिसम्बर 8 ) , the संयुक्त राज्य  declared war on Japan .
Domestic support for  non-interventionism , जिससे था महरूम दमदार  , disappeared .
Clandestine support of Britain (  लिये उदाहरण the neutrality पैट्रोल  ) was replaced by active alliance .
Subsequent operations by the U.S. prompted Germany and  इटली to घोषित युद्ध on the u.S. on दिसम्बर 11 , जिससे थी reciprocated  by the U.S. the same day .
वहीँ यहूद numerous ऐतिहासिक precedents  for unannounced military action by Japan .
However , the lack of any formal warning , particularly while negotiations were  स्टिल जाहिर जारी , led अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट to proclaim  December 7 , 1941 , `` a date which will live in infamy `` .
U.S. Route 85 ( US 85 ) is a  north–south संयुक्त राज्य राजमार्ग कि रनों लिये in  the Mountain - Northern Plains states of the United States .
The southern terminus of the route is at the United  states-mexico किनारा in el पासो , टेक्सास , connecting  with Mexican Federal Highway 45 .
The northern  टर्मिनस is at the संयुक्त states-canada किनारा  in Fortuna , North Dakota , where the route continues north as Saskatchewan Highway 35 .
In both the United States and Saskatchewan ,  कनाडा the रूट is ज्ञात as the canam  Highway .
Sections of US 85 are  माना भाग of the थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट  Expressway .
The  संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्षीय चुनाव of 1968 थी the 46th  quadrennial presidential election , held on Tuesday , November 5 , 1968 .
The Republican nominee , former  vice-president रिचर्ड निक्सन , जीती  the election over the Democratic nominee , incumbent Vice-President Hubert Humphrey .
Nixon ran on a  अभियान कि promised to restore विधि  and order to the nation 's cities , torn by riots and crime .
Analysts have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning  चुनाव as it permanently disrupted the नई सौदे गठबन्धन  that had dominated presidential politics for 36 years .
Coming four years after Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson won in a historic landslide , the  चुनाव देखी the लाज़िम अध्यक्ष  forced out of the race and a Republican elected for the first time in twelve years .
It was a  विदारक नेशनल अनुभव , conducted दौरान a साल of हिंसा कि शामिल the हत्या of सिविल अधिकारों नेता मार्टिन लूथर किंग , jr. , और  subsequent race riots across the nation , the assasination of Democratic presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy , widespread opposition to the Vietnam War across university campuses , and violent confrontations between police and anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic National Convention as the Democratic party split again and again .
The election featured  the strongest तीसरा पार्टी प्रयत्न चूंकि 1912 by पूर्व  Alabama Governor George Wallace , a Democrat .
Because Wallace 's campaign  opposed संघीय हस्तक्षेप in the दक्षिण to समाप्त स्कूल पृथक्करण  , he carried the Deep South and ran well in ethnic industrial districts in the North .
This was  the पिछला चुनाव in जिससे नई यॉर्क था the सबसे मत  in the electoral college ( 43 votes ) .
After the 1970 census , California gained  the सबसे चुनावी मत और रै remained the  most populous state since then .
This is the latest election where a presidential ticket won  बगैर carrying the वाइस अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी 's घर  state .
खिड़कियाँ कार्य मैनेजर is a कार्य मैनेजर or प्रणाली मॉनिटर अनुप्रयोग शामिल साथ the microsoft खिड़कियाँ nt परिवार of ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों कि provides सीमित सूचना परिचय कंप्यूटर प्रदर्शन और कार्यशील अनुप्रयोग , प्रक्रियाओं और cpu उपयोग ,  commit charge and memory information , network activity and statistics , logged-in users , and system services ( and as often is the case with software tools provided by Microsoft for Windows , 3rd party software is available which fills the requirements more thoroughly , e.g , `` Process Explorer '' , `` Extended Task Manager '' , `` Anvir Task Manager '' , `` Process Hacker '' , and `` System Explorer '' ) .
The Task Manager can also be used to set process priorities , processor affinity , forcibly terminate processes , and shut down , restart ,  hibernate or log बंद इससे  Windows .
Windows Task  मैनेजर थी introduced साथ  Windows NT 4.0 .
Previous versions of Windows NT included the  कार्य सूची अनुप्रयोग , जिससे था दूर कम  features .
The task list was  सक्षम of लिस्टिंग फिलहाल कार्यशील प्रक्रियाओं  and killing them , or creating a new process .
In Windows XP only , a Shutdown menu is also present that allows  अभिगम to standby , hibernate , फेरे  off , Restart , Log Off and Switch User .
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows ( Microsoft Windows 3.x , Windows 95 , Windows 98 ) had a program  ज्ञात as कार्य to प्रदर्शक the कार्यक्रम फिलहाल  running .
इस संचिका थी चलाया by  running the taskman.exe file from the C : \Windows directory .
Kanji ( ; ) are the adopted logographic Chinese characters ( hanzi ) that are used in the modern Japanese writing system along with hiragana ( ひらがな , ) , katakana ( カタカナ  , ) , hindu-arabic numerals , और the occasional उपयोग of the लैटिन वर्णमाला  .
The Japanese term kanji ( ) for the Chinese  वर्ण वस्तुतः अर्थात् `` हान वर्ण '' और is  written using the same characters as the Chinese hanzi ( ) .
John R  विलियम्स ( may 4 , 1782 – अक्तूबर 20 , 1854 ) थी an अमरीकी सिपाही , व्यापारी  , and politician who is most well known for serving as the first mayor of Detroit , Michigan .
In total , he served as Detroit  's महापौर लिये पाँच अन्य शर्तें  .
He also  थी a ब्रिगेडियर सामान्य in the संयुक्त राज्य  Army during the Black Hawk War .
a सरल शुष्क चुम्बकीय  portable compass .
A smartphone that  can be प्रयुक्त as a कम्पास क्युकी  of the magnetometer inside .
An  iphone कि can be प्रयुक्त as a  geological compass because of the 3-axis teslameter and 3-axis accelerometer inside it
A military compass  कि थी प्रयुक्त दौरान संसार  War I .
A compass is a navigational instrument that shows directions in a  फ़्रेम of सन्दर्भ कि is stationary सापेक्ष  to the surface of the earth .
The frame of  सन्दर्भ defines the चार कार्डिनल दिशानिर्देश ( or अंक )  – north , south , east , and west .
इंटरमीडिएट दिशानिर्देश  are also defined .
Usually , a diagram called a compass rose , which shows  the दिशानिर्देश ( साथ उनके names प्रायः abbreviated to आद्याक्षर ) , is चिह्नित  on the compass .
When the compass is in use ,  the रोज़ is लकीर साथ the रियल दिशानिर्देश in the फ़्रेम of सन्दर्भ ,  so , for example , the `` N '' mark on the rose really points to the north .
Frequently , in addition to the rose or sometimes instead of it ,  कोण markings in डिग्री हैं दिखाया on the कम्पास  .
North  corresponds to शून्य डिग्री , और the कोण बढ़ाएँ  clockwise , so east is 90 degrees , south is 180 , and west is 270 .
These numbers allow the compass to  दिखाएँ azimuths or बियरिंग , जिससे हैं commonly  stated in this notation .
the चुम्बकीय कम्पास थी पहला invented as a यंत्र लिये  divination as early as the Chinese Han Dynasty ( Since about 206 BC ) .
The compass was used in Song Dynasty China by the military for  navigational orienteering by 1040-1044 , और थी प्रयुक्त  for maritime navigation by 1111 to 1117 .
The  उपयोग of a कम्पास is अंकित  in Western Europe between 1187 and 1202 , and in Persia in 1232 .
The dry compass was invented  in यूरोपीय around  1300 .
This was supplanted in the early 20th century by  the liquid-filled चुम्बकीय  compass .
The Inca Empire or Inka Empire  ( quechua : tawantinsuyu  ) was the largest empire in pre-Columbian America .
The administrative , political and  सैन्य बीच of the साम्राज्य थी स्तिथ in कुज़्को  in modern-day Peru .
The Inca civilization arose from the highlands of Peru sometime  in the जल्दी 13th सदी  .
From 1438 to 1533 , the Incas used a variety of methods , from conquest to peaceful assimilation , to incorporate a large portion of western South America , centered on the Andean mountain ranges , including , besides Peru , large parts of  आधुनिक इक्वाडोर , पश्चिमी और दक्षिण सेंट्रल बोलीविया , उत्तरपश्चिम अर्जेंटीना , उत्तर और सेंट्रल चिली , और दक्षिणी कोलंबिया into a राज्य comparable to the ऐतिहासिक empires  of Eurasia .
The official language of the empire was  quechua , हालांकि सैंकड़ों  of local languages and dialects of Quechua were spoken .
The  इन्का referred to उनके साम्राज्य as tawantinsuyu  which can be translated as The Four Regions or The Four United Provinces .
There were  अनेक लोकल फ़ॉर्म of इबादत , सबसे of उन्हें concerning लोकल पवित्र `` huacas `` , लकिन the  Inca leadership encouraged the worship of Inti —the sun god—and imposed its sovereignty above other cults such as that of Pachamama .
The Incas considered their King , the Sapa Inca , to  be the `` चाइल्ड of the सूर्य .  ''
The kidneys are organs that  serve अनेक अनिवार्य नियामक भूमिकाएँ  in most animals , including vertebrates and some invertebrates .
वे हैं अनिवार्य in the urinary प्रणाली और भी serve  homeostatic functions such as the regulation of electrolytes , maintenance of acid–base balance , and regulation of blood pressure ( via maintaining salt and water balance ) .
They serve the  देह as a प्राकृतिक फिल्टर of the रक्त ,  and remove wastes which are diverted to the urinary bladder .
In producing urine  , the गुर्दे excrete wastes ऐसे  as urea and ammonium , and they are also responsible for the reabsorption of water , glucose , and amino acids .
The kidneys  भी उपज हार्मोन सहित calcitriol  , erythropoietin , and the enzyme renin .
Located at the rear of the  abdominal गुहा in the retroperitoneum , the गुर्दे प्राप्त रक्त  from the paired renal arteries , and drain into the paired renal veins .
Each kidney excretes urine into a ureter , itself a paired  ढांचा कि empties into the urinary ब्लैडर  .
Renal physiology is the study of kidney  फलन , जबकि nephrology  is the medical specialty concerned with kidney diseases .
Diseases of the kidney are diverse , but individuals with kidney  बीमारी अक्सर प्रदर्शक characteristic नैदानिक  features .
आम नैदानिक शर्तें involving the गुर्दा शामिल the  nephritic and nephrotic syndromes , renal cysts , acute kidney injury , chronic kidney disease , urinary tract infection , nephrolithiasis , and urinary tract obstruction .
Various cancers of the kidney exist ; the  सबसे आम वयस्क renal कर्कट is renal कोशिका  carcinoma .
Cancers , cysts , and some other renal  शर्तें can be प्रबंधित साथ  removal of the kidney , or nephrectomy .
When renal  फलन , measured  by glomerular filtration rate , is persistently poor , dialysis and kidney transplantation may be treatment options .
Although they are not severely harmful , kidney  पत्थरों can be दुखद और a  nuisance .
The removal of kidney stones involves ultrasound treatment to break up the stones into smaller  टुकड़े , जिससे हैं तब passed  through the urinary tract .
One common symptom of kidney  पत्थरों is a शार्प पीड़ा in the  medial/lateral segments of the lower back .
Lockton Companies Inc. is the world 's largest privately held insurance brokerage firm ,  providing बीमे , रिस्क प्रबन्धन और कर्मचारी लाभ समाधान  .
In addition to its  कान्सास नगर , मिसौरी मुख्यालय  , Lockton operates 60 locations in 17 countries .
Lockton is currently home to  अधिक than 4,450 शरीक  worldwide .
The company was  संस्थापित by जोकर lockton in 1966 और रै चूंकि become  the world’s 9th largest insurance brokerage firm .
Lockton serves a wide array of industries with services that include risk management  , casualty , surety , पेशेवर indemnity और अधिक  .
For 46 years , Lockton posted extraordinary  सशुल्क विकास , साथ वैश्विक revenues reaching  $ 915 million in fiscal 2012 .
lockton लाभ समूह : lockton’s कर्मचारी benefit’s टोली  works closely with insurance carriers and administrators to create comprehensive and integrated benefits strategies for clients .
The Lockton Benefits Group provides services including compliance ,  कार्यपालिका लाभ , स्वास्थ्य और welfare , स्वास्थ्य रिस्क समाधान , रिटायरमेंट  and more .
lockton अपनापन : lockton अपनापन , an संबद्ध of lockton कंपनियाँ , meets the बीमे  needs of affinity groups , franchises , professional organizations , and associations of all sizes .
Lockton  अपनापन offers a किस्में  of insurance product options and programs .
Products include : General Liability , Professional Liability , Property , Workers Compensation , Directors & Officers Liability , Commercial Auto ,  specialty कवरेज , excess , स्वास्थ्य योजनाएँ और अधिक  .
Lockton International : Lockton International operates offices in the UK and Ireland , as well  as कार्यालयों throughout एशिया और लैटिन अमेरिका  .
In Europe , Lockton  अंतरराष्ट्रीय is a संगी in eos risq , europe’s अग्रणी बीमे ब्रोकिंग और रिस्क  management consultancy .
EOS RISQ is an equity-based European partnership of major independent insurance brokers with  over 3,500 कर्मचारी आधारित  in more than 30 countries in Europe .
Lockton  अंतरराष्ट्रीय provides specialized समाधान लिये  personal lines , SME’s and major multi-national clients .
White  चॉकलेट is a चॉकलेट  derivative .
It commonly consists of cocoa butter ,  शुगर , मिल्क solids और नमक , और  is characterized by a pale yellow or ivory appearance .
The melting point of cocoa butter , its primary  cocoa सेम घटक , is ऊँची पर्याप्त to रखना  white chocolate solid at room temperature .
Donald Leon `` Don ''  blankenship ( born कूच 14 , 1950 ) थी अध्यक्ष और सीईओ of massey उर्जा  Co. , the sixth largest coal company ( by 2008 production ) in the United States .
He served in  those भूमिकाएँ इससे नवम्बर 30 ,  2000 , until December 31 , 2010 .
Blankenship is an active financial  backer of the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी और भागीदार  in local and state politics , especially in his home state of West Virginia .
He has frequently spoken out publicly about politics ,  the पर्यावरण ,  unions , and coal production .
U.S.  प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज आयोग filings दिखाएँ blankenship  was paid $ 17.8 million in 2009 , the highest in the coal industry .
उसके 2009 अदा represents a $ 6.8  million raise over 2008 and almost double his compensation package in 2007 .
Blankenship also received a deferred compensation package  valued at $ 27.2  million in 2009 .
On December 3 , 2010 , Blankenship announced that he was retiring as CEO at the end of the year , and  होता be succeeded by massey अध्यक्ष बैक्सटर F. phillips  Jr .

Negligence ( Lat . negligentia , from  neglegere , to उपेक्षा , वस्तुतः `` नहीं to चुनें up कुछ '' ) is a विफलता  to exercise the care that a reasonably prudent person would exercise in like circumstances .
The area of tort law known as negligence  involves नुक़सान caused by carelessness  , not intentional harm .
According to Jay M. Feinman of the Rutgers  विश्वविद्यालयों स्कूल  of Law ;
`` The core  विचार of लापरवाही is कि लोगों चाहिए कसरत उचित  care when they act by taking account of the potential harm that they might foreseeably cause harm to other people . ''
`` those who go personally or bring property where they know  कि वे or it may आइये into टक्कर साथ the व्यक्तियों  or property of others have by law a duty cast upon them to use reasonable care and skill to avoid such a collision . ''
Fletcher v Rylands ( [ 1866 ]  lr 1 ex 265  )
Through civil litigation , if an injured person proves that another person  acted negligently to कारण उनके चोट , वे can रिकवर क्षतिपूर्ति to compensate लिये  their harm .
Proving a case for negligence can potentially entitle the injured  अभियोक्ता to मुआवजे लिये नुक़सान to उनके देह , प्रॉपर्टी  , mental well-being , financial status , or intimate relationships .
However , because negligence cases are very fact-specific , this general definition does not fully explain the concept of when the law will  आवश्यकता एक व्यक्ति to compensate another लिये नुकसान caused  by accidental injury .
Further , the law of  लापरवाही at आम विधि is  only one aspect of the law of liability .
Although resulting damages must be proven in order to recover compensation in a  लापरवाही कार्रवाई , the प्रकृति और extent of those क्षतिपूर्ति हैं नहीं the प्राथमिक फ़ोकस of लापरवाही मामले  .
A melanocytic nevus ( also known as `` Nevocytic nevus ''  ) is a प्रकार of lesion कि contains nevus कोशिकाएं ( a प्रकार  of melanocyte ) .
Some sources  equate the पद mole साथ  `` melanocytic nevus '' .
Other  स्त्रोत आरक्षित the पद  `` mole '' for other purposes .
The majority of moles appear during the first two decades of a person’s life , while  परिचय एक in प्रत्येक 100 शिशु is born साथ औज़ार  .
acquired औज़ार हैं a रूप of benign फुलाव , जबकि जन्मजात औज़ार , or जन्मजात  nevi , are considered a minor malformation or hamartoma and may be at a higher risk for melanoma .
A mole can  be either subdermal ( अंतर्गत the स्किन ) or a pigmented  growth on the skin , formed mostly of a type of cell known as a melanocyte .
The high concentration  of the body’s pigmenting एजेंट , मेलेनिन  , is responsible for their dark color .
Moles are a member of the  परिवार of स्किन lesions ज्ञात as  nevi .
The comprehensive metabolic panel , or chemical screen , ( CMP ; CPT  कोड 80053 ) is a फलक of 14 रक्त परीक्षण जिससे serves as an आरंभिक  broad medical screening tool .
The CMP provides a rough check of kidney function , liver function , and electrolyte and fluid  संतुलन , लकिन it is दूर इससे पूर्ण  .
Abnormal values from a CBC may be a result of false positives and  यूँ the cbc may need to be दोहराया लिये a रोगी ( or replaced साथ a  more specific test ) .
The CMP is an expanded version of the basic metabolic  फलक ( bmp ) , जिससे करता नहीं शामिल  liver tests .
A CMP  ( or bmp ) can be ordered as भाग of a दिनचर्या शारीरिक  examination , or may be used to monitor a patient with a chronic disease , such as diabetes mellitus or hypertension .
Previous names for the panel of tests have been Chem 12 , Chemistry panel ,  रसायन स्क्रीन , sma 12 , sma 20 और smac ( sequential अनेक  Analysis - Computer ) .
The tests are performed on machines  आधारित on the autoanalyzer invented  in 1957 .
Natural gas extraction by countries  in घन मीटर प्रति साल .
Natural gas is a naturally occurring hydrocarbon gas  मिश्रण consisting primarily of मिथेन , लकिन commonly  including varying amounts of other hydrocarbons , carbon dioxide , nitrogen , and hydrogen sulfide .
Natural gas is an energy source often  प्रयुक्त लिये हीटिंग , कुकिंग , और विद्युत  generation .
It is also used as fuel for vehicles and as a chemical feedstock in the  manufacture of प्लास्टिक और अन्य commercially महत्वपूर्ण  organic chemicals .
Natural gas is found in  गहन भूमिगत प्राकृतिक चट्टान formations  or associated with other hydrocarbon reservoirs in coal beds and as methane clathrates .
Petroleum is also another resource found in  निकटता to और साथ प्राकृतिक गैस  .
Most natural gas was created  over समय by दो mechanisms : biogenic और  thermogenic .
Biogenic gas is created by  methanogenic जीवों in marshes ,  bogs , landfills , and shallow sediments .
Deeper in the earth , at greater temperature and pressure , thermogenic gas  is निर्मित इससे दफ्न  organic material .
Before natural gas can be used as a fuel , it must undergo processing  to हटाएँ impurities , सहित जल , to मिलें the  specifications of marketable natural gas .
The by-products of processing include ethane , propane , butanes , pentanes , and higher molecular weight hydrocarbons , hydrogen sulfide ( which may be converted into  pure गंधक ) , कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड , जल वाष्प , और sometimes हीलियम और नाइट्रोजन  .
Natural gas is often informally referred to simply as  गैस , विशेषकर जब compared to अन्य उर्जा  sources such as oil or coal .
This page is  परिचय the कल्पना  Movers band .
For  सूचना परिचय the tv दिखाएँ  starring the band , see Imagination Movers ( TV series ) .
Imagination  मूवर्स is a बैंड formed in नई ऑरलियन्स  , Louisiana , in 2003 .
The lineup  शामिल समृद्ध कॉलिन्स , स्कॉट durbin  , Dave Poche , and Scott `` Smitty '' Smith .
सदस्यों of the समूह यहूद  longtime friends and neighbors .
The group started as a television/music concept which  थी pitched to  local PBS affiliates in New Orleans .
WLAE-TV was the first to take an interest in the group and later introduced them to Beth Courtney , the President & Chief  कार्यपालिका अधिकारी at louisiana पब्लिक प्रसारण  .
Soon after , LPB began airing  one-minute वीडियो उत्पादित by  the Imagination Movers themselves .
The Movers built a sizable regional following by setting educational songs for  बच्चे to melodies और लय कि वयस्कों  appreciate as well .
They sold more than 100,000 copies  of उनके self-produced cds और dvds  .
Their three indie CDs : ``  शुभ विचार , '' `` कॉलिंग सब मूवर्स , '' और `` आठ फीट '' साथ साथ उनके ग्रास जड़ें dvd ``  Stir It Up '' have , combined , won fourteen national awards , from such groups as the National Association of Parenting Publications ( NAPPA ) and Parents ' Choice .
In early 2005 , Disney took notice ,  और initiated negotiations to add  the Movers to the company 's roster .
These were interrupted in August when the flood protection designed  और निर्मित by the फौज  Corps of Engineers to protect New Orleans failed .
The resulting  floodwater claimed the बैंड 's दफ्तर , as खूब as the घरों of  Collins , Durbin and Poche – but the deal was signed in the spring of 2006 .
In 2008 , Walt Disney Records introduced the Imagination  मूवर्स ' म्यूज़िक to the स्वदेश साथ the रिलीज  of the Movers ' first nationally-released CD , `` Juice Box Heroes . ''
In  सितंबर 2008 , a 30-minute दिखाएँ featuring the समूह began airing on the  Disney Channel 's preschool programming block known as Playhouse Disney , and currently airs on Playhouse Disney 's replacement , Disney Junior .
The Movers write and perform all the  गीतों on उनके  show .
Moreover , the Imagination Movers have received critical kudos  लिये उनके सजीव  concert performances .
In October 2009 , the Imagination  मूवर्स प्रारंभ the `` सजीव इससे the विचार गोदाम  Concert Tour 2009 '' .
Traveling from mid-October to mid-December 2009 their live performances include lots of  उनके पसंदीदा गीतों और नाचना , as खूब as वीडियो दिखावे  of Warehouse Mouse .
Beginning in early-February 2011 and wrapping up in late May 2011 , the  कल्पना मूवर्स प्रस्तुत उनके `` in a बिग गोदाम कॉन्सर्ट दौरे , '' playing अधिक than  100 shows in 50+ cities across North America .
From March to October 2012 , the  कल्पना मूवर्स toured उत्तर अमेरिका  on their post-Disney `` Rock-O-Matic '' tour .
The show maintained several elements of the original TV concept , such as an on-stage `` idea emergency '' and several  सेट इससे उनके पुरानी कैटलॉग ; however , साथ the प्रस्थान of वेन्डी calio वापस to उसके देशी हवाई , the अक्षर `` नीना '' , साथ  with her musical numbers , is not present .
The tour promotes the Imagination Movers ' new album/DVD release , ``  rock-o-matic  '' , which features all new music from the band .
The album itself is produced independently of Disney and has a  notably अधिक वयस्क , समकालीन rock-and-roll ध्वनि  , though still very appropriate for children .
Several performance dates were moved to later in 2012 to  लाभ इससे the increased एक्सपोज़र  of the Imagination Movers TV show now playing daily on Disney Junior .
The platypus ( Ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic mammal  endemic to पूर्वी ऑस्ट्रेलिया , सहित तस्मानिया .
Together with the four species of echidna , it is one of the five extant species of  monotremes , the तभी स्तनधारियों कि lay अंडे बजाय of  giving birth .
It is the sole living representative of its family ( Ornithorhynchidae ) and genus ( Ornithorhynchus ) ,  हालांकि a क्रमांक of सम्बन्धित प्रजाति  have been found in the fossil record .
The unusual appearance of this egg-laying , duck -billed , beaver -tailed ,  otter -footed स्तनधारी मनोरथ यूरोपीय naturalists जब वे पहला encountered  it , with some considering it an elaborate fraud .
It is one of the few venomous mammals  , the पुरूष platypus having a spur on the हिन्द पैर  that delivers a venom capable of causing severe pain to humans .
The unique features of the platypus make it an important subject in the study of  विकासवादी जीवविज्ञान और a recognisable और iconic प्रतीक of ऑस्ट्रेलिया ; it रै appeared  as a mascot at national events and is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent coin .
The platypus is the animal emblem of the state of  नई दक्षिण वेल्स  .
Until the early 20th century , it was hunted for its fur ,  लकिन it is अभी सुरक्षित throughout  its range .
Although captive breeding programmes have had only limited success and the  platypus is vulnerable to the प्रभाव of प्रदूषण , it is नहीं अंतर्गत  any immediate threat .
The Chupacabra or Chupacabras ( , from chupar `` to suck '' and cabra `` goat '' ,  वस्तुतः `` बकरी चूषक '' ) is a legendary cryptid rumored to inhabit भाग  of the Americas .
It is associated more recently with sightings of an allegedly unknown animal in Puerto Rico ( where  ये sightings यहूद पहला reported ) , मैक्सिको  , and the United States , especially in the latter 's Latin American communities .
The name comes  इससे the एनिमल 's reported आदत of attacking  and drinking the blood of livestock , especially goats .
Physical  descriptions of the  creature vary .
Eyewitness sightings have been claimed as early as 1995 in Puerto Rico , and have since been  reported as दूर उत्तर as maine , और as दूर दक्षिण as चिली , और भी होने spotted  outside the Americas in countries like Russia and The Philippines .
It is  माना a भारी प्राणी , the आकार of a छोटी भालू  , with a row of spines reaching from the neck to the base of the tail .
Sighting reports of the Chupacabra have been  disregarded as uncorroborated or lacking प्रमाण , जबकि सबसे रिपोर्ट्स in उत्तरी  Mexico and the southern United States have been verified as canids afflicted by mange .
Biologists and wildlife management  officials दृश्य the chupacabra as a समकालीन  legend .
The North American Free Trade Agreement ( NAFTA ) is an agreement  हस्ताक्षरित by कनाडा , मैक्सिको , और the संयुक्त राज्य  , creating a trilateral trade bloc in North America .
the अनुबंध आए into फ़ोर्स  on January 1 , 1994 .
It superseded the Canada–United States Free Trade  अनुबंध between the u.S. , कनाडा , और  Mexico
NAFTA has two supplements : the North American  अनुबंध on पर्यावरणीय सहयोग ( naaec ) और the उत्तर अमरीकी अनुबंध  on Labor Cooperation ( NAALC ) .
Thermal comfort is the condition of mind that expresses  संतोष साथ the थर्मल पर्यावरण और is assessed by subjective मूल्यांकन  ( ANSI / ASHRAE Standard 55 ) .
Maintaining this standard of thermal comfort for occupants of buildings or other enclosures is one of the important goals of HVAC ( heating ,  वेंटिलेशन , और एयर कंडीशनिंग  ) design engineers .
The Predicted Mean Vote ( PMV ) model stands  among the सबसे पहचाना थर्मल सुकून मॉडल .
It was developed using principles of heat balance and experimental data collected in a controlled climate  कक्ष अंतर्गत स्थिर राज्य शर्तें  .
Because the PMV model was derived from data  एकत्रित in a नियंत्रित जलवायु , it is नहीं उपयुक्त लिये अनुप्रयोग in  naturally ventilated spaces which often have high levels of air movement .
This shortcoming motivated the development of a family of empirical  सांख्यिकीय मॉडल of थर्मल सुकून  in naturally ventilated spaces known as adaptive models .
Adaptive models of thermal comfort consider occupants as  dynamically interacting साथ उनके पर्यावरण , और controlling उनके थर्मल सुकून by अर्थात्  of clothing or window-opening and closing .
This is in contrast to thermal comfort in sealed buildings , in which occupants  अनुभव the पर्यावरण passively  .
Thermal comfort is affected by heat  conduction , संवहन , विकिरण , और evaporative ऊष्मा घाटा  .
Thermal comfort is maintained when the heat generated by human metabolism is allowed to dissipate  , यूँ maintaining थर्मल संतुलन  with the surroundings .
It has been long  पहचाना कि the सनसनी of अहसास hot  or cold is not just dependent on air temperature alone .
Thermal  सुकून calculations according to ansi/ashrae  Standard 55 can be freely performed with the CBE Thermal Comfort Tool for ASHRAE-55 .
Durante degli Alighieri , simply referred to  as दांते ( , ; ; c. 1265–1321 ) , थी a प्रमुख  Italian poet of the Middle Ages .
His Divine Comedy , originally called ' and later called ' by  boccaccio , is widely माना the महानतम  literary work composed in the Italian language and a masterpiece of world literature .
In  इटली he  is known as ' ( `` the Supreme Poet '' ) or just ' .
He ,  petrarch और boccaccio हैं भी ज्ञात  as `` the three fountains '' or `` the three crowns '' .
Dante is also called the `` Father of the  इतालवी भाषा ''  .
Headquarters (  कोबे , जापानी  )
( ) is a tire and  रबर कम्पनी आधारित  in Japan .
It is part of the  sumitomo समूह  .
The company traces its origins to 1909 , when the Sumitomo Group made an investment in Dunlop Japan , the  newly formed जापानी subsidiary of the अंग्रेजों  company Dunlop Rubber .
Over the years Sumitomo and Dunlop developed a  बंद कारोबार संबंध , और in 1963 the sumitomo  Group acquired control of Dunlop Japan and renamed it Sumitomo Rubber Industries Ltd .
In 1985 , when Dunlop Rubber was taken over by BTR plc , the company acquired the automobile  टायर एसेट of dunlop , सहित the सही to उपयोग the dunlop ब्रांड  on automobile tires .
the अधिग्रहण किया नहीं शामिल the us और ऑस्ट्रेलियाई व्यवसायों  , which were separately owned , but in 1986 Sumitomo also acquired the Dunlop Tire Corporation of the US from its management .
In 1997 ,  sumitomo formed a संयुक्त venture साथ goodyear टायर और रबर  Company , by which Goodyear and Sumitomo agreed to manufacture tires for each other 's markets , including Dunlop branded tires .
As part of the agreement , Goodyear acquired 75 %  रूचि in dunlop टायर , the uk कम्पनी जिससे sumitomo था formed , और  in Dunlop Tire Corporation .
Goodyear and Sumitomo also  बना निवेश in प्रत्येक  other .
Today , the company makes a wide range of rubber based products , including automobile  टायर , गोल्फ़ गेंदें और टेनिस  balls .
Microsoft Visual Studio Express is a set of freeware integrated development  environments ( आईडीई ) विकसित by microsoft कि हैं lightweight संस्करण of the microsoft विज़ुअल स्टुडियो  product line .
Express  संस्करण यहूद conceived शुरूआत  with Visual Studio 2005 .
The idea of Express  संस्करण is to provide streamlined , easy-to-use और easy-to-learn ides लिये उपयोक्ता  other than professional software developers , such as hobbyists and students .
The Alps are one of the great mountain range systems of Europe stretching approximately across  आठ अल्पाइन देशों इससे ऑस्ट्रिया और स्लोवेनियाई in the ईस्ट , स्विट्ज़रलैंड , liechtenstein , जर्मनी , फ़्रांस  to the west and Italy and Monaco to the south .
The mountains were formed over hundreds of  लाखो of सालो  as the African and Eurasian tectonic plates collided .
Extreme shortening caused by the event resulted in marine  sedimentary रॉक्स उठती by thrusting और फोल्डिंग into ऊँची  mountain peaks such as Mont Blanc and the Matterhorn .
Mont Blanc  spans the french–italian किनारा , और  at is the highest mountain in the Alps .
The Alpine region area contains many peaks higher than ,  ज्ञात as the `` four-thousanders  `` .
The altitude and size of the range  affects the जलवायु in यूरोपीय ; in the kyu  precipitation levels vary greatly and climatic conditions consist of distinct zones .
Wildlife such as ibex live in the higher peaks to  elevations of , और पौधे ऐसे as edelweiss grow in रॉकी क्षेत्रों  in lower elevations as well as in higher elevations .
प्रमाण of इंसान habitation in  the Alps goes back to the Paleolithic era .
A mummified man , determined to be 5,000  सालो बूढ़ा , थी खोजा on a हिमानी  at the Austrian–Italian border in 1991 .
By the 6th century BC , the  सेल्टिक la tène संस्कृति थी खूब  established .
Hannibal may have crossed the Alps with a herd of  हाथियों , और the romans था settlements  in the region .
In 1800 Napoleon  crossed एक of the  mountain passes with an army of 40,000 .
The 18th and 19th centuries saw  an influx of naturalists , लेखक , और कलाकारों , in particular the romantics , followed by the सुनहरी आयु  of alpinism as mountaineers began to ascend the peaks .
In World War II the  तीसरा reich invaded the अल्पाइन देशों , साथ the एक्सेप्शन of  Switzerland and Liechtenstein ; Adolf Hitler kept a base of operation in the Bavarian Alps throughout the war .
The  अल्पाइन प्रदेश रै  a strong cultural identity .
The traditional culture of farming , cheesemaking , and woodworking still exists in Alpine villages , although the tourist industry  began to grow जल्दी in the 20th सदी और विस्तारित greatly बाद संसार युद्ध ii  to become the dominant industry by the end of the century .
The Winter Olympic Games have  महरूम hosted in the स्विस , फ्रेंच , इतालवी  , Austrian and German Alps .
At present the region is home to 14 million people and has 120  लाख सालाना विज़िटर  .
लोइस patrice griffin  ( née Pewterschmidt ) is a character from the animated television series Family Guy .
She is voiced by writer Alex Borstein and first appeared on television , along with the  बाकी of the परिवार in the 15-minute छोटी on दिसम्बर  20 , 1998 .
Lois was created and designed  by श्रेणी निर्माता सेठ macfarlane  .
MacFarlane was asked to pitch a pilot to the Fox Broadcasting Company based on Larry and Steve , a short made by MacFarlane  जिससे प्रदर्शित a middle-aged अक्षर नामित लैरी और an बौद्धिक  dog , Steve .
After the  पायलट थी दिए the ग्रीन लाइट , the griffin परिवार appeared on the  episode `` Death Has a Shadow `` .
Lois  is the माँ  of the Griffin family .
With her husband Peter ,  वो रै था तीन  children : Meg , Chris , and Stewie .
Lois is often portrayed as a stereotypical television mother , despite her admitting to being a  ड्रग उपयोक्ता , a recovering मेथ नशेड़ी kleptomaniac  .
Lois has also had several affairs , one of which  allegedly resulted in the धारणा of मेग  .
She has appeared in other media relating to Family Guy—including a video game , commercials and  books—and प्रेरित an संपूर्ण लकीर of merchandise  .
Lois 's distinctive New York accent originated from a character in a stage show that  एलेक्स borstein था performed in , जिससे थी largely  inspired by a relative who grew up on Long Island , New York .
Family  हस्तांतरण of बास्क भाषा (  Basque as initial language )
Percentage of students  पंजीकृत in बास्क भाषा स्कूलों ( 2000–2005  ) .
Location of the  basque-language प्रांतों भीतर स्पेन  and France
Basque ( endonym : , ) is the ancestral language of the Basque people , who  inhabit the बास्क देश , a प्रदेश spanning an क्षेत्रफल in northeastern स्पेन और southwestern  France .
It is  बोला by 27 % of  Basques in all territories ( 714,136 out of 2,648,998 ) .
Of these , 663,035 live in the  स्पेनी भाग  of the Basque country and the remaining 51,100 live in the French part .
In academic discussions of the distribution of Basque in Spain and France , it is customary  to refer to तीन प्राचीन प्रांतों in फ़्रांस और चार स्पेनी  provinces .
Native speakers are concentrated  in a संलग्न क्षेत्रफल सहित भाग of the स्पेनी autonomous  communities of the Basque Country and Navarre and in the western half of the French département of Pyrénées-Atlantiques .
The Basque Autonomous Community is an administrative  एंटिटी भीतर the binational ethnographic बास्क देश incorporating the परंपरागत  Spanish provinces of Biscay , Gipuzkoa , and Álava , which retain their existence as politico-administrative divisions .
These provinces and many areas of Navarre are heavily populated by ethnic Basques , but Basque was , at least until the 1990s , not spoken as a native language in most of Álava ,  पश्चिमी भाग of biscay और सेंट्रल और दक्षिणी क्षेत्रों of नावारा , either क्युकी it था महरूम replaced by स्पेनी साथ the सदियां , in कुछ क्षेत्रों , or क्युकी it था never महरूम बोला वहीँ , in अन्य क्षेत्रों  .
In southwestern France , the  प्राचीन basque-populated प्रांतों यहूद labourd  , Lower Navarre , and Soule .
They and other regions were consolidated  into a सिंगल département in 1790 अंतर्गत the नाम basses-pyrénées  , a name which persisted until 1970 .
A standardized form of the Basque language ,  पुकारा euskara batua , थी विकसित  by the Basque Language Academy in the late 1960s .
Euskara Batua was created so that Basque language could be used—and easily understood by all Basque speakers—in formal  परिस्थितियों ( शिक्षा , द्रव्यमान मीडिया , साहित्य ) , और इस  is its main use today .
The role of this  मानक बास्क भाषा depends  on the linguistic educational model of each region and each school .
In most areas of the Spanish Basque Country , the educational Model D , where all subjects are taught in Basque , except `` Spanish  भाषा और साहित्य '' ( जिससे is सिखाया in  Spanish ) is now the predominant model .
In France , the Basque language school Seaska and the association for a bilingual ( Basque and French ) schooling Ikasbi meet a  चौड़ी दायरा of बास्क भाषा शैक्षणिक needs up to the छठे रूप , जबकि प्रायः struggling to surmount वित्तीय और  administrative constraints .
Apart from this  मानकीकृत संस्करण , वहीँ हैं पाँच प्रमुख बास्क dialects : bizkaian  , Gipuzkoan , and Upper Navarrese in Spain , and Navarrese–Lapurdian and Zuberoan ( in France ) .
हालांकि वे लो उनके names इससे the उल्लेखित ऐतिहासिक प्रांतों  , the dialect boundaries are not congruent with province boundaries .
The President , Directors and Company , of the Bank of the  संयुक्त राज्य , commonly ज्ञात as the पहला बैंको of the संयुक्त राज्य , थी a सेंट्रल  bank , chartered for a term of twenty years , by the United States Congress on February 25 , 1791 .
Establishment of the  बैंको थी शामिल in a three-part विस्तार of संघीय फिस्कल और मौद्रिक शक्ति ( साथ साथ a संघीय  mint and excise taxes ) championed by Alexander Hamilton , first Secretary of the Treasury .
Hamilton believed a central bank was necessary to  stabilize और improve the स्वदेश 's क्रेडिट , और  to improve handling of the financial business of the United States government under the newly enacted Constitution .
Officially proposed to the first session of the First  कॉंग्रेस in 1790 , हैमिल्टन 's बैंको faced फैली प्रतिरोध इससे  opponents of increased federal power .
सचिव of राज्य थामस जेफरसन और जेम्स मैडिसन led the विपक्ष , जिससे claimed  that the bank was unconstitutional , and that it benefited merchants and investors at the expense of the majority of the population .
The First Bank building is  अभी a नेशनल ऐतिहासिक लैंडमार्क स्तिथ in  Philadelphia , Pennsylvania within Independence National Historical Park .
James Wesley Marsters ( born  अगस्त 20 , 1962 ) is an अमरीकी कर्ता  and musician .
Marsters first came to the attention of the  सामान्य पब्लिक playing the लोकप्रिय अक्षर स्पाइक , a platinum-blond yobbish अंग्रेज़ी पिशाच in the  television series Buffy the Vampire Slayer and its spin-off series , Angel , from 1997 to 2004 .
Since then , he has gone on to play other science fiction roles , such as the alien supervillain Brainiac on the Superman -inspired  श्रेणी smallville , the omnisexual समय मुसाफ़िर कप्तान जॉन हार्ट in अंग्रेजों science-fiction दिखाएँ torchwood और आतंकवादी  Barnabas Greeley in Sci fi 's Caprica .
marsters appeared in a supporting  role in the 2007 movie P.S .
I Love You and as the main antagonist  , piccolo , in the 2009 काल्पनिक  adventure film Dragonball Evolution .
He appeared as a recurring character in  the पहला ऋतु of the पुनरुद्धार  of Hawaii 5-0 .
In molecular biology , human chorionic gonadotropin (  hcg ) is a हार्मोन उत्पादित by the निषेचित  egg after conception .
Later during pregnancy it is made by  the विकासशील placenta , और बाद by the  placental component syncytiotrophoblast .
Some cancerous tumors produce this hormone ;  इसलिए , elevated स्तर measured जब the रोगी  is not pregnant can lead to a cancer diagnosis .
However , it is not known whether this production  is a contributing कारण or an प्रभाव of tumorigenesis  .
The pituitary analogue of hCG , known as luteinizing hormone ( LH ) , is  उत्पादित in the pituitary ग्रंथि of males और महिलाओं  of all ages .
, the  एफडीए रै निषिद्ध the बिक्री of `` होम्योपैथिक '' और over the काउंटर  hCG diet products and declared them fraudulent and illegal .
Beyoncé Giselle Knowles-Carter ,  ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम बेयोंस ( ; born  September 4 , 1981 ) , is an American singer , songwriter , dancer , and actress .
born और उठाया in ह्यूस्टन , टेक्सास , वो performed in गायन और नाचना प्रतियोगिताओं as a चाइल्ड पहले  forming in 1990 a group with Kelly Rowland and LaTavia Roberson that was eventually named Destiny 's Child .
Once signed to  कोलंबिया रिकॉर्ड , the लड़कियों subsequently became  one of the world 's best-selling girl groups of all time .
The group was plagued by internal conflict and legal turmoil  और नॉलेस suffered इससे अवसाद कि lasted  for a number of years .
During the group 's hiatus , Knowles released her debut solo album  dangerously in प्रेम ( 2003 ) , जिससे अर्जित उसके पाँच ग्रैमी  Awards and has sold a total of 4.9 million copies in the US alone .
It spawned  बिलबोर्ड क्रमांक एक singles `` क्रेजी in प्रेम , '' माना  by VH1 to be the `` Greatest Song Of the 00 's , '' and `` Baby Boy . ''
Following the disbandment of Destiny 's Child in 2005 , Knowles  's दूसरी सोलो एल्बम b'day ( 2006 ) contained the शीर्ष पाँच singles `` déjà vu  `` , `` Irreplaceable `` , and `` Beautiful Liar `` .
Her  प्रदर्शन in dreamgirls ( 2006 ) अर्जित उसके  two Golden Globe nominations .
नॉलेस ' कार्य playing etta  James in that film inspired her subsequent album I Am ...
Sasha Fierce ( 2008 ) which spawned hits `` If I Were a Boy `` , `` Single Ladies (  put a रिंग on it ) `` , `` हेलो `` , और `` मीठी सपनो  `` .
The album also helped  नॉलेस earn छह grammys in 2010  , breaking the record for most Grammy Awards won by a female artist in one night .
Her fourth  एल्बम 4 ( 2011 ) deviated towards परंपरागत  R & B and became her fourth consecutive number one album on the Billboard 200 .
In January 2012 , Knowles gave birth to daughter  ब्लू आइवी कार्टर , उसके पहला चाइल्ड साथ husband jay-z  .
Knowles has  बेची over 13 लाख एल्बम in the us और 118 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी ( as खूब as a further  50 million records with Destiny 's Child ) , and is one of the best-selling music artists of all time .
The Recording Industry Association of America ( RIAA )  पहचाना नॉलेस as the शीर्ष certified कलाकार  of the 2000s .
In 2009 , Billboard named her  the शीर्ष रेडियो गीतों कलाकार of the दशक और क्रमित उसके  the Top Female Artist and the fourth Artist of the Decade .
Beyoncé Knowles is the most nominated woman in Grammy Award history , receiving 17 awards ; other accolades  शामिल 12 एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार , 7 बिलबोर्ड पुरस्कार सहित a मिलेनियम पुरस्कार , और a स्टार on the हॉलीवुड चलना of कीर्ति as भाग of नियति 's चाइल्ड .
`` Angry All the Time '' is the title of a song written by  ब्रूस robison और पहला अंकित  on his 1998 album Wrapped .
It was later covered by Tim  mcgraw साथ अतिथि vocalist  Faith Hill .
Released in July  2001 , mcgraw 's संस्करण थी the दूसरी सिंगल इससे mcgraw  's Set This Circus Down album .
The song reached Number One on the Billboard Hot Country Singles &  ट्रैक्स ( अभी hot देश  Songs ) charts .
Dear John is a 2010 American romantic drama - war film starring Amanda Seyfried  और चेनिंग  Tatum .
It was released  theatrically in उत्तर अमेरिका  on February 5 , 2010 .
The film was  निर्देशित by lasse hallström , और it is  an adaptation of Nicholas Sparks 's novel of the same name .
It follows the life of a soldier ( Channing Tatum ) after he falls in love with  a यंग स्त्री ( अमांडा  Seyfried ) .
They decide to exchange letters to each other after he is  तैनात to the युद्ध .
The movie was filmed in 2009 in  चार्ल्सटन ,  South Carolina .
Despite receiving negative reviews , the film made a strong box  दफ्तर प्रदर्शन , knocking बंद अवतार बाद सात सप्ताहांत  in first place and grossing a total of $ 114,977,104 worldwide .
The film was released on May 25 , 2010 on  dvd और blu-ray  .
These are lists of the  व्यस्ततम एयरपोर्ट in the संयुक्त  States .
Hartsfield–Jackson Atlanta International Airport  is the व्यस्ततम सिंगल विमानक्षेत्र in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
However , all of  the नई यॉर्क नगर महानगर क्षेत्रफल 's एयरपोर्ट combine to बनाएँ the largest विमानक्षेत्र प्रणाली in the संयुक्त राज्य ,  second in the world in terms of passenger traffic , and first in the world in terms of total flight operations .
Dora the  एक्सप्लोरर is an अमरीकी एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न श्रेणी  created by Chris Gifford , Valerie Walsh , and Eric Weiner .
Dora the Explorer became a  नियमित श्रेणी in 2000 .
The show is carried on the Nickelodeon cable  टेलीविज़न संजाल , सहित  the associated Nick Jr. channel .
It aired  on सीबीएस जबतक सितंबर  2006 .
A Spanish-dubbed version first aired as part of a Nick en español block on NBC Universal -owned Telemundo through September  2006 ; चूंकि अप्रैल 2008 , इस संस्करण of the कार्यक्रम रै महरूम carried  on Univision as part of the Planeta U block .
Santa Fe ( ;  ( tewa : ogha po'oge , ) ) is  the capital of the U.S. state of New Mexico .
it is the fourth-largest  city in the state and is the seat of .
Santa Fe ( meaning “holy faith” in Spanish ) had a  जनसांख्यिकी of 67,947 in the 2010  census .
It is the principal city of a Metropolitan  सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल जिससे encompasses सब of सांता fe काउंटी और  is part of the larger Albuquerque-Santa Fe-Las Vegas Combined Statistical Area .
The city’s full  नाम जब संस्थापित थी la विला रियल de la सांता fé de सैन फ्रांसिस्को de  Asís ( “The Royal Town of the Holy Faith of St. Francis of Assisi” ) .
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase  as पेप्सी , formerly stylized in अपरकेस as पेप्सी ) is  a carbonated soft drink that is produced and manufactured by PepsiCo .
Created and developed in 1893 and introduced as Brad 's  पेय , it थी renamed as pepsi-cola on अगस्त 28 ,  1898 , then to Pepsi in 1961 .

The Sons of Liberty  थी a समूह consisting of अमरीकी देशप्रेमी कि originated  in the pre-independence North American British colonies .
the समूह थी formed to protect  the rights of the colonists and to take to the streets against the taxes by the British government .
They are best known for  undertaking the बोस्टन चाय पार्टी in 1773 , जिससे led to the असहनीय  Acts ( an intense crackdown by the British government ) , and a counter-mobilization by the Patriots .
ओसाका किला
is a city in the Kansai region of  जापानी 's प्रमुख द्वीप of होन्शू , a designated नगर अंतर्गत the लोकल स्वायत्तता  Law , the capital city of Osaka Prefecture and also the largest part of the Keihanshin metropolis , which comprises three major cities of Japan , Kyoto , Osaka and Kobe .
Located at  the मुँह of the yodo नदी on ओसाका  Bay , Osaka is Japan 's third largest city by population after Tokyo ( special wards ) and Yokohama .
keihanshin is the दूसरी largest महानगर क्षेत्रफल in जापानी by जनसांख्यिकी और एक  of the largest metropolitan areas highly ranked in the world , with nearly 19 million people , and by GDP the second largest area in Japan and the seventh largest area in the world .
Historically  the वाणिज्यिक बीच of  Japan , Osaka functions as one of the command centers for the Japanese economy .
The ratio  between दिन और  night time population is 141 % , the highest in Japan , highlighting its status as an economic center .
Its nighttime population is 2.6 million , the third in the country , but in daytime the population surges to 3.7 million , second only after Tokyo ( combining the special wards of  टोकियो , जिससे is नहीं a सिंगल incorporated नगर , लिये सांख्यिकीय  purposes ; see the Tokyo article for more information on the definition and makeup of Tokyo ) .
Osaka used to be  referred to as the in सामंती ईदो काल क्युकी it थी the केन्द्र of व्यापार  for rice , creating the first modern futures exchange market in the world .
The Little Mermaid  is a 1989 अमरीकी एनिमेटेड musical काल्पनिक  film produced by Walt Disney Feature Animation and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures .
Based on the Danish  परी टेल by hans ईसाई andersen , the छोटी मरमेड tells  the story of a beautiful mermaid who dreams of becoming human .
Written , directed , and produced by  रॉन क्लेमेंट्स और जॉन musker , साथ म्यूज़िक by एलन menken और हावर्ड ashman , the फिल्मी सुविधाएँ the आवाज़ें  Jodi Benson , Christopher Daniel Barnes , Pat Carroll , Samuel E. Wright , Jason Marin , Kenneth Mars , Buddy Hacket , and Rene Auberjonois .
The 28th film in the Walt Disney Animated Classics series , The Little Mermaid was released to theaters on November 14 , 1989 to largely positive reviews , garnering $ 84 million at the box  दफ्तर दौरान इसके आरंभिक रिलीज  , and $ 211 million in total lifetime gross .
After  the कामयाबी of the 1988 डिज़्नी / amblin फिल्मी जो framed रोजर खरगोश , the  Little Mermaid is given credit for breathing life back into the art of Disney animated feature films after a string of critical or commercial failures produced by Disney that dated back to the early 1970s .
It  भी चिह्नित the प्रारंभ of the  era known as the Disney Renaissance .
a स्टेज अनुकूलन of the फिल्मी साथ a किताब by डग राइट और  additional songs by Alan Menken and new lyricist Glenn Slater opened in Denver in July 2007 and began performances on Broadway January 10 , 2008 .
alt=Close-up  फ़ोटो of a मेटल चमचा भर  with a viscous , clear purple fluid
Purple drank is a slang term for  a recreational ड्रग लोकप्रिय in the हिप हॉप जातियाँ  in the southern United States , originating in Houston , Texas .
Its main  संघटक is नुस्खा  -strength cough syrup containing codeine and promethazine .
Cough  सिरप is typically मिश्रित साथ संघटक  such as Sprite soft drink or Mountain Dew and pieces of Jolly Rancher candy .
The  purplish वर्ण of जामुनी  drank comes from dyes in the cough syrup .
There are numerous slang terms for  जामुनी पिया , सहित sizzurp , झुकना , सिरप  , drank , barre , purple jelly , Texas tea , and Tsikuni .
First/given , middle , and  last/family/surname आरेख साथ J. S.  Bach as example .
J. S. Bach shared his given name with six  तात्कालिक परिवार सदस्यों और अनेक विस्तारित  family members .
He shared  उसके परिवार  name with most family members .
A given name , in Western contexts often referred to as a first name , is a personal name that specifies and differentiates between members of a group of  individuals , विशेषकर in a परिवार , सब of जिनकी सदस्यों प्रायः share the वही परिवार  name ( surname ) .
A  दिए नाम is purposefully दिए , प्रायः by  a child 's parents at or near birth , in contrast to an inherited one such as a family name .
A given name is  sometimes legally बदला through  a name change .
Given names are often used in a familiar and  दोस्ताना manner in अनौपचारिक परिस्थितियों  .
In more formal  परिस्थितियों the उपनाम is प्रयुक्त बजाय , जबतक  it is necessary to distinguish between people with the same surname .
The idiom `` on a first-name basis '' ( or `` on  first-name शर्तें '' ) alludes to the अपनेपन  of addressing another by a given name .
The western style of having both a family name ( surname ) and  a दिए नाम is दूर इससे सार्वभौमिक  .
In many countries it is common for ordinary  लोगों to have तभी एक नाम ( a mononym  ) .
Hydrochloric  एसिड is a साफ , colourless  solution of hydrogen chloride ( H Cl ) in water .
It is a highly  क्षयकारी , दमदार खनिज एसिड साथ अनेक औद्योगिक  uses .
Hydrochloric acid is found  naturally in gastric  acid .
historically पुकारा muriatic एसिड , और आत्माओं  of salt , hydrochloric acid was produced from vitriol ( sulfuric acid ) and common salt .
It first appeared during the Renaissance , and then it was used by chemists such as  glauber , प्रीस्टलि और डेवी in उनके  scientific research .
With major production starting in the Industrial Revolution , hydrochloric acid is used in the  रासायनिक उद्योग as a रासायनिक अभिकर्मक in the large-scale उत्पादन of विनाइल chloride  for PVC plastic , and MDI / TDI for polyurethane .
It has numerous smaller-scale  अनुप्रयोग , सहित household सफ़ाई , उत्पादन of जिलेटिन और  other food additives , descaling , and leather processing .
About 20 million tonnes of  हाइड्रोक्लोरिक एसिड हैं उत्पादित  annually .
Wheat ( Triticum spp  . ) is a खाद्यान्न अनाज , originally  from the Levant region of the Near East and Ethiopian Highlands , but now cultivated worldwide .
In 2010 , world  उत्पादन of गेहूं थी 651 लाख टन , बनाना it the तीसरा most-produced  cereal after maize ( 844 million tons ) and rice ( 672 million tons ) .
Wheat was the second most-produced cereal in  2009 ; संसार उत्पादन in कि साल थी 682 लाख टन  , after maize ( 817 million tons ) , and with rice as a close third ( 679 million tons ) .
इस अनाज is grown  on more land area than any other commercial food .
World trade in wheat is greater  than लिये सब अन्य फसलों  combined .
Globally , wheat is the leading  सोर्स of सब्ज़ी प्रोटीन in इंसान खाना , having a उच्चतर  protein content than soybeans or the other major cereals , maize ( corn ) or rice .
In terms of total production tonnages used for food , it is currently second to rice as the main human food crop and ahead of maize ,  बाद allowing लिये मक्का 's अधिक extensive उपयोग in एनिमल फ़ीड्स  .
Wheat was a key factor enabling the emergence of city-based societies at the start of civilization because it was one of the  पहला फसलों कि could be easily cultivated on a विशाल स्केल , और था the अतिरिक्त लाभ of  yielding a harvest that provides long-term storage of food .
Wheat contributed to the  emergence of city-states in the fertile crescent  , including the Babylonian and Assyrian empires .
Wheat grain is a staple food used to make flour for leavened , flat and steamed breads , biscuits , cookies , cakes ,  नाश्ता खाद्यान्न , पास्ता , नूडल्स , couscous और  for fermentation to make beer , other alcoholic beverages , or biofuel .
Wheat is planted to a limited extent as a forage crop for livestock , and its straw can be  प्रयुक्त as a निर्माण सामग्री लिये  roofing thatch .
The whole grain can be milled to  छोड़ बस the भ्रूणपोष लिये  white flour .
The  by-products of इस  are bran and germ .
The whole grain is a concentrated source of vitamins , minerals , and  प्रोटीन , जबकि the परिष्कृत अनाज is ज़्यादातर  starch .
मुद्रण
To publish is to make  सामग्री उपलब्धियाँ to the  general public .
While specific use of the term may vary among countries , it is usually  लागू to टेक्स्ट , बिंब , or अन्य audio-visual सामग्री on कोई परंपरागत  medium , including paper ( newspapers , magazines , catalogs , etc . ) .
The word publication means the act of  प्रकाशन , और भी refers to कोई मुद्रित  copies .
Melissa & Joey is an ABC  परिवार असली टेलीविज़न श्रेणी  starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence .
It first  aired on एबीसी  Family on August 17 , 2010 .
The series  फ़ॉलो लोकल राजनेता mel बुर्के ( मेलिसा जोन हार्ट ) और जो longo ( जॉय  Lawrence ) , whom Mel hires to look after her niece and nephew after a Ponzi scheme leaves him broke .
The series was renewed by ABC Family for a second season of fifteen  एपीसोड , जिससे began airing on may 30 , 2012 और  ended on August 29 , 2012 .
Melissa & Joey ranks as cable TV 's # 1 telecast at 8 o'clock across target  ऑडियंस 18–34 , 18–49 और  12–34 demographics .
On  अगस्त 17 , 2012 , एबीसी परिवार नवीनीकृत  Melissa & Joey for a third season , set to premiere in spring 2013 .
The  धर्मं व्हील  , often used to represent the Noble Eightfold Path
The Noble Eightfold Path ( , ) is one of the  प्रिंसिपल शिक्षाओं of the बुद्ध , जो वर्णित it as  the way leading to the cessation of suffering ( dukkha ) and the achievement of self-awakening .
It is used to develop insight into the true  प्रकृति of phenomena ( or वास्तविकता ) और to eradicate लोभ  , hatred , and delusion .
The Noble Eightfold Path is the fourth of the Buddha 's Four Noble Truths ; the first element of the Noble Eightfold Path is  , in फेरे , an समझना of the चार प्रतिष्ठित सच्चाई  .
It is also  ज्ञात as  the Middle Path or Middle Way .
All eight elements of  the पाथ शुरू साथ the शब्द `` सही '' , जिससे  translates the word samyañc ( in Sanskrit ) or sammā ( in Pāli ) .
These denote completion ,  एकजुटता , और coherence , और can भी  suggest the senses of `` perfect '' or `` ideal '' .
'Samma ' is also  अनूदित as `` wholesome '' , ``  wise '' and `` skillful '' .
In Buddhist symbolism , the Noble Eightfold Path is often  represented by अर्थात् of the धर्मं व्हील ( dharmachakra ) , जिनकी आठ तीलियां  represent the eight elements of the path .
The Grammy Award for Song of the Year is an honor presented at the Grammy Awards , a ceremony  कि थी स्थापित in 1958 और originally  called the Gramophone Awards .
Awards in several categories are distributed annually by the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences of the United States to `` honor artistic achievement ,  तकनीकी proficiency और overall excellence in the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग , बगैर लिहाज़ to एल्बम बिक्री or  chart position . ''
Economics is  the सोशल विज्ञान कि  analyzes the production , distribution , and consumption of goods and services .
The term economics comes from the  प्राचीन यूनानी ( ' , `` प्रबन्धन of a household , प्रशासन '' ) इससे ( ' , `` हाउस  '' ) + ( ' , `` custom '' or `` law '' ) , hence `` rules of the house ( hold ) '' .
Political economy was the earlier name for the subject , but economists in the late 19th century suggested `` economics '' as a shorter term for `` economic science '' that also avoided a narrow  political-interest connotation और as समान in रूप to `` गणित `` , `` आचार '' , और  so forth .
A focus of the subject is how economic agents  व्यवहार or interact और कैसा economies  work .
Consistent with this ,  a प्राथमिक textbook  distinction is between microeconomics and macroeconomics .
microeconomics examines the बर्ताव of मौलिक तत्व in the अर्थव्यवस्था , सहित  individual agents ( such as households and firms or as buyers and sellers ) and markets , and their interactions .
macroeconomics analyzes the संपूर्ण अर्थव्यवस्था और  issues affecting it , including unemployment , inflation , economic growth , and monetary and fiscal policy .
Other broad distinctions include those between positive economics ( describing `` what is '' ) and normative economics ( advocating `` what ought to be '' ) ; between economic theory and applied economics ; between rational and behavioral economics ; and between mainstream economics (  अधिक `` परंपरागत '' और dealing साथ the `` rationality-individualism-equilibrium नेक्सस '' ) और शास्त अर्थशास्त्र ( अधिक `` कट्टरपंथी '' और dealing साथ the `` institutions-history-social  structure nexus '' ) .
Economic  विश्लेषण may be लागू throughout समाज , as in कारोबार , वित्त  , health care , and government , but also to such diverse subjects as crime , education , the family , law , politics , religion , social institutions , war , and science .
At the turn of the 21st century , the  expanding डोमेन  of economics in the social sciences has been described as economic imperialism .
An increasing number of economists have called for increased emphasis on environmental  स्थिरता ; इस क्षेत्रफल of शोध is ज्ञात as ecological  economics .
This is a list of Schedule IV drugs under the Controlled  substances अधिनियम लिये the संयुक्त  States .
जरूरी निष्कर्षों लिये  drugs to be placed in this schedule:
The drug or other substance has a low potential for abuse  सापेक्ष to the दवाएँ or अन्य substances  in schedule III .
The drug or other substance has a  फिलहाल स्वीकृत चिकित्सा  use in treatment in the United States .
Abuse of the drug or other substance may lead to limited physical dependence or psychological  dependence सापेक्ष to the दवाएँ or अन्य substances  in schedule III .
The complete list of Schedule IV  दवाएँ हैं as फ़ॉलो  .
The Administrative Controlled Substances Code  क्रमांक लिये प्रत्येक ड्रग is शामिल  .
US county household  मध्य आय 2009  .
Median US  household आय , 2001-2011
household आय is a माप  commonly used by the United States government and private institutions .
Each household is measured by the income of every  निवासी over the आयु  of 15 .
Income includes wages and salaries ,  बेरोजगारी बीमे , विकलांगता भुगतान , चाइल्ड support भुगतान  received , regular rental receipts , as well as any personal business , investment , or other kinds of income received routinely .
While inflation-adjusted ( `` real '' ) household income had  महरूम increasing लगभग प्रत्येक साल इससे 1945 to 1999  , it has since been flat and even decreased recently .
U.S. median  household आय गिरी इससे $ 51,144  in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011 .
Extreme poverty in the United States , meaning households living on less than $ 2 per day before government  लाभ , doubled इससे 1996 to 1.5 लाख households in 2011 , सहित  2.8 million children .
The  निवासियों of the household do नहीं have to be सम्बन्धित  to the head of the household for their earnings to be considered part of the household 's income .
As households tend to share a similar economic  कॉन्टेक्स्ट , the उपयोग of household आय remains  among the most widely accepted measures of income .
That the size of a household is not commonly taken into account in such measures may distort any analysis of fluctuations within or among the household income  श्रेणी , और may रेंडर सीधा comparisons between quintiles मुश्किल or भी नामुमकिन  .
The lapse rate is defined as the rate  of घटी साथ ऊँचाई लिये  an atmospheric variable .
The variable involved  is तापमान जबतक  specified otherwise .
The terminology arises from the word lapse in the  भाव of a घटी or मनाही  .
While most often applied to Earth 's atmosphere the concept can be extended  to कोई gravitationally समर्थित  ball of gas .
Blue Mountain State is an American comedy  श्रेणी कि premiered on स्पाइक on जनवरी 11 , 2010 .
The series producers include Chris Romano and Eric Falconer , and it is produced  by lionsgate टेलीविज़न  .
The series is  परिचय a fictional विश्वविद्यालयों , ब्लू पहाड़  State , and its football team , `` The Mountain Goats . ''
It portrays certain aspects of American  विश्वविद्यालयों जीवन , सहित फ़ुटबॉल  , sex , binge drinking , drugs , wild partying , and hazing .
In February 2012 , it was  reported कि  Blue Mountain State would not be renewed for a fourth season .
In March 2013 , Ed Marinaro stated that he is working on a  ब्लू पहाड़ राज्य फिल्मी  .
Apple Inc. , formerly Apple  कंप्यूटर , inc. , is an अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय निगम headquartered  in Cupertino , California that designs , develops , and sells consumer electronics , computer software and personal computers .
Its best-known hardware products are the Mac line of computers , the iPod music player ,  the iphone स्मार्टफोन , और the ipad टैब्लेट कंप्यूटर .
Its software includes the OS X  और आईओएस ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों , the itunes मीडिया ब्राउजर , the safari  web browser , and the iLife and iWork creativity and production suites .
The company was founded on April 1 , 1976 , and incorporated as  ठहराना कंप्यूटर , inc. on  January 3 , 1977 .
The word `` Computer '' was removed from its name on January 9 ,  2007 , reflecting इसके shifted फ़ोकस towards  consumer electronics after the introduction of the iPhone .
Apple is the world 's second-largest information technology company by revenue  बाद samsung इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स , और the संसार 's third-largest मोबाईल फोन मेकर बाद samsung और  Nokia .
Fortune magazine  नामित ठहराना the सबसे admired  company in the United States in 2008 , and in the world from 2008 to 2012 .
however , the कम्पनी रै प्राप्त आलोचना लिये इसके  contractors ' labor practices , and for Apple 's own environmental and business practices .
,  ठहराना maintains 394 खुदरा स्टोर्स in चौदह  countries as well as the online Apple Store and iTunes Store .
It is the second-largest  सरेआम traded निगम in the संसार  by market capitalization , with an estimated value of US $ 414 billion as of January 2013 .
, the company had 72,800 permanent full-time employees and 3,300 temporary full-time  कर्मचारी विश्वव्यापी  .
Its worldwide  सालाना आय in 2012 totalled $ 156  billion .
खण्ड 8 आवास  in the South Bronx
Section 8 of the Housing Act of 1937 ( ) , often simply known as Section 8 , as repeatedly amended , authorizes the  भुगतान of rental आवास सहायता to निजी जमींदार on निमित्त of लगभग  3.1 million low-income households .
It operates through several programs , the largest of which , the  आवास चुनाव वाउचर कार्यक्रम , pays  a large portion of the rents and utilities of about 2.1 million households .
The US Department of Housing  और शहरी विकास manages the खण्ड  8 programs .
The Housing Choice  वाउचर कार्यक्रम provides `` tenant-based '' rental सहायता , so a किरायेदार can मूव  from one unit of at least minimum housing quality to another .
It also allows individuals to apply their  मासिक वाउचर towards the खरीदें of a घर , साथ over $ 17 अरब going towards  such purchases each year ( from ncsha.org analysis ) .
The  अधिकतम अनुमत वाउचर  is $ 2200 a month .
Section 8 also authorizes a variety of `` project-based '' rental assistance programs , under which the owner reserves some or all of the units in a building for low-income tenants , in return  लिये a संघीय सरकारी गारंटी to मेक up the अंतर between the किरायेदार 's योगदान और  the rent for 1 cent in the owner 's contract with the government .
A tenant who leaves a  subsidized प्रोजेक्ट होगा खोना अभिगम  to the project-based subsidy .
The United States Department of Housing and Urban Development and United States Department of Veterans Affairs have a special Section 8 program called VASH ( Veterans Affairs Supportive Housing ) , or HUD-VASH , which gives out a certain number of  खण्ड 8 वाउचर to योग्य बेघर और वरना vulnerable us हथियारबंद शक्तियां दिग्गजों  .
Restaurants categorized by type  और सूचना परिचय ये  different types .
U.S.  संघीय आरक्षित टीप  in the mid-1990s
The history of the  संयुक्त राज्य डालर कवर  more than 200 years .
